# 灵宝无量度人上品妙经

**Scripture Title:** *The Marvelous Scripture of the Upper Chapters on Salvation Through the Infinite, from the Numinous Treasure* (Abbreviated as *Scripture of Salvation*)

**Author:** Unknown
**Volume Count:** Sixty-one in total. The first volume contains the main text of the *Scripture of Salvation*, one of the ancient Numinous Treasure scriptures from the late Eastern Jin period. The remaining sixty volumes were later expansions by disciples, composed by Daoist masters of the Shenxiao sect in the late Northern Song dynasty. Additionally, there is a preface and a one-volume catalog titled *The Highest Ritual for the Transmission of Scriptures by the Divine Empyrean Sect Masters* (see separate entry).

**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongzhen* Section, *Benwen* Category.

**Volume One:**
The Dao spoke: Long ago, in the Azure Heavens of the Beginning, within the Great Floating Li Land of the Azure Vault’s Empty Song, the Primordial Beginning bestowed the *Infinite Salvation of the Upper Chapters’ Marvelous Scripture*.

When the Primordial Heavenly Worthy was to expound this scripture, he circumambulated ten times to summon the ten directions. Only then did he ascend his seat. Celestial perfected spirits, exalted sages, and transcendents of wondrous conduct—innumerable multitudes—rode the void to arrive, soaring upon cinnabar clouds. Their chariots were of jade-green, their wheels of luminous jasper, their feathered canopies casting shade. Streaming essences and radiant jade light, in five resplendent hues, suffused the Great Void, blazing for seven days and seven nights. The sun, moon, and stellar lodges of the heavens, the jade celestial pivots, all halted their revolutions. Divine winds stilled, mountains and seas concealed their clouds. The heavens were free of drifting veils; the four qi shone bright and clear. Throughout the land, mountains, rivers, forests, and groves leveled as one, no longer high or low. The earth transformed into azure jade, uniform in hue.

The assembled perfected ones took their places beside the seat. The Primordial Heavenly Worthy suspended himself upon a five-colored lion in the floating void. After reciting the scripture once, the celestial sages and great spirits all proclaimed its excellence.

At that time, the deaf and ailing of the land regained their hearing. After the second recitation, the blind received sight. After the third, the mute could speak. After the fourth, the lame and those long bedridden rose and walked. After the fifth, chronic and incurable illnesses were restored to wholeness. After the sixth, white hair turned black again, and fallen teeth regrew. After the seventh, the aged reverted to youth, and the young grew strong. After the eighth, pregnant women and creatures with child—whether born or unborn—all came to perfect birth. After the ninth, the earth’s treasuries opened, revealing gold and jade. After the tenth, withered bones revived, rising as whole persons.

At that time, every man and woman of the land turned their hearts in devotion. All received protection and salvation, attaining eternal life.

The Dao spoke: When the Primordial Heavenly Worthy recited the scripture once, the boundless and infinite perfected great spirits of the eastern direction, with their innumerable multitudes, arrived upon the void. After the second recitation, those of the southern direction came. After the third, those of the west. After the fourth, those of the north. After the fifth, those of the northeast. After the sixth, those of the southeast. After the seventh, those of the southwest. After the eighth, those of the northwest. After the ninth, those of the upper direction. After the tenth, those of the lower direction.

When the ten recitations were complete, the boundless celestial perfected great spirits of the ten directions arrived as one. The men and women of the land turned their hearts in reverence. The arrivals were like fine rain or dense mist—innumerable multitudes—filling half the land, causing the earth to sink unevenly, beyond restraint.

Thereupon, the Primordial suspended a single precious pearl, as small as a millet grain, in the dark void five *zhang* above the earth. The Primordial led the celestial perfected spirits, exalted sages, transcendents of wondrous conduct, and the boundless perfected great spirits of the ten directions—innumerable multitudes—all to enter the pearl. The heavenly beings gazed upward, seeing only a surging movement as they entered the pearl’s mouth. Once inside, their whereabouts were unknown. The people dispersed, and the earth returned to levelness, no longer uneven.

Within the pearl, the Primordial completed the scripture’s recitation. The assembled perfected ones oversaw the salvation, transmitting it to me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. When the ritual was roughly concluded, the celestial beings returned to their stations. In an instant, all was silent, without lingering resonance.

At that time, the heavenly beings who encountered the scripture’s teachings were universally saved, preserving their allotted years without harm. The entire land turned in reverence, all cultivating virtuous hearts. They did not kill or harm, did not envy or covet, did not indulge in lust or theft, did not greed or desire, did not hate or resent. Their words were free of embellishment, their mouths free of harsh speech. Equal in compassion, they regarded even strangers as kin. The land was at peace, the people prosperous, rejoicing in great harmony. From the scripture’s first promulgation, the land followed the Dao. Those with prior devotion who revered and honored it all attained liberation from the world.

The Dao spoke: The words uttered by the Primordial Heavenly Worthy in reciting the scripture are the hidden names and secret rhymes of the celestial emperors, as well as the inner taboos of demon kings and the concealed names of the hundred spirits. They are not the common speech of the mundane world. Only those who have attained the rank of perfected transcendents, who penetrate the mysteries and fathom the subtle, can fully grasp its verses. Reciting it ten times, the celestial beings chant from afar, the ten thousand emperors offer rites, rivers and seas fall silent, mountains and peaks conceal their clouds, the sun and moon halt their radiance, the celestial pivots cease their turning. Demon hordes bind their forms, ghostly spirits vanish, corpses revive, and white bones become living persons.

For scholars of the highest learning, reciting it ten times will summon the Five Emperors to stand guard, the Three Realms to bow in reverence, demonic essences to lose their sight, and ghostly malevolence to vanish utterly. Those on the verge of death shall be delivered and, though cut off from life, be restored to it. The reason for this is that scholars, though their impure qi has not yet dissipated and their bodies have not fully attained the True, may still summon and command the ten directions, their majesty not yet sufficient to govern the heavens. Their virtue can only subdue and bind the earthly deities, restrain demonic spirits, and reverse death—but not restore life. To recite these verses lightly brings misfortune upon oneself. Yet those who honor and revere them with offerings and rites shall see their households flourish, their generations prosper, and their good karmic connections endure. Ten thousand calamities shall not touch them, and divine beings shall guard their gates.

This scripture is most venerable and wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital. It delivers countless beings, serving as the root of all Dao. Vast and majestic is its Brahmanic power—its virtue beyond measure.

The Dao speaks: When one recites this scripture ten times, all the heavens assemble. The suffering souls of ancestors across myriad generations shall immediately receive deliverance, ascending to the Crimson Palace. After nine years of refinement, they shall be transformed and reborn, becoming noble persons. Those who diligently study this scripture, their merit complete and virtue perfected, shall attain immortality, soaring to the Golden Gates and roaming the Jade Capital. Scholars of the highest learning who cultivate and recite this scripture shall all be delivered, ascending to the Southern Palace. Those in the world who recite it shall extend their years and lengthen their lives, later attaining the Dao of liberation through simulated death. Their souls shall briefly dissolve, sparing them the trials of hell, and they shall swiftly regain form, roaming the vastness of the heavens.

This scripture is subtle and wondrous, universally delivering boundless beings. All heavenly and mortal beings receive its blessings, its immeasurable fortune bestowed upon the living and the dead. It is treasured by the heavens above and not transmitted to the lower world. Only the most devoted scholars, offering gold and treasures with sincere hearts and swearing oaths to heaven, may receive it. To leak or slight it carelessly brings calamity upon nine generations, condemning them to eternal servitude under the ghostly officials.

The Five Emperors attend this scripture, accompanied by twenty-four Jade Lads and twenty-four Jade Maidens, who safeguard its divine writ and protect the bodies of its reciters.

The Dao speaks: During the long fast of the first month, recite this scripture to sever the earthly bonds of past generations and deliver their souls to the Southern Palace. During the long fast of the seventh month, recite this scripture to attain immortality, your name inscribed in the heavens on yellow registers and white tablets, death erased and life restored. During the long fast of the tenth month, recite this scripture for the sake of kings and emperors, rulers and ministers, fathers and sons, to stabilize the nation’s destiny, preserve the heavens’ longevity, and ensure unbroken generations of sovereigns who shall govern their realms in peace, their people calling it the Great Peace. On the eight seasonal festivals, recite this scripture to become a Perfected One of the Nine Palaces. On one’s natal day, recite this scripture to purify the soul, preserve eternal qi, avoid suffering, and radiate light. The Three Realms shall attend, the Five Emperors shall receive, and myriad spirits shall pay homage. Your name shall be recorded in the heavens, and upon merit’s completion and virtue’s fulfillment, you shall ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The Dao speaks: On the day of ritual practice, one must bathe in fragrant waters, enter the chamber in purification, face east, and knock the teeth thirty-two times to reach the thirty-two heavens. Bow thirty-two times in reverence, close the eyes, and silently visualize oneself seated amidst clouds of blue, yellow, and white qi, enveloped in mist. A Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Warrior, Lion, and White Crane shall array themselves to left and right, the sun and moon illuminating the chamber with radiance. A circular halo shall appear above the head, its light suffusing the ten directions—all must be vividly perceived.

Recite the secret incantation:
*"Supreme Mysterious Origin, Most High Dao Lord, summon forth from within this servant’s body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the Attendant Envoys of the Left and Right, the Jade Lads who tend incense, the Jade Maidens who transmit words, the Direct Talismans of the Five Emperors, and the thirty-two Incense Officials of the Day. Open the gates of my petition on this auspicious day of long fast and pure chamber, as I cultivate the scripture of boundless deliverance. May my words ascend swiftly to the presence of the Most High Primordial Sovereign of the Thirty-Two Heavens."*

Afterward, draw qi thirty-two times and recite the scripture facing east.

**The Primordial Limitless Deliverance, Supreme Wondrous Scripture**

The Primordial Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure’s Fundamental Chapter—supreme and wondrous beginning. Ten recitations deliver beings, a hundred demons conceal their rhymes. Separation and union arise naturally, the Crimson Writ of the Chaotic Abyss. The Non-Ultimate’s Supreme Perfected, the Primordial Ancestor of Kalpas, who transforms and gives birth to all heavens, illumines the Three Luminaries—this is the root of heaven. Above, there is no further ancestor; only the Dao is the body. The Five Writs unfold and expand, universally planting divine spirits. No writ is unilluminated, no writ is unbright, no writ is unestablished, no writ is unaccomplished, no writ is undelivered, no writ is unborn. This is the Great Brahman Heaven within Heaven, the Towering Canopy of Yu Luo, the Jade Mountain’s Upper Capital, supreme beyond all, the Great Net of the Jade Clarity. Vast and boundless, as if absent, as if present, the Three Flowers separate and converge, the Great Existence’s Wondrous Court, Golden Gates and Jade Chambers, a forest of purity and clarity. The great Brahmanic qi circulates through the ten directions. Within it dwells the immortal-delivering spirit, the Southern Culmen’s Lord of Longevity, the Deliverer of the World’s Marshal Great Spirit, the Life-Loving Elder Han, the Southern Supreme’s Directors of Destiny and Records, the Venerable Spirits who extend life, increase years, and deliver from calamity. They reverse decay and revive the dead, delivering boundless beings. Today, the celestial records are examined, and all the heavens descend in audience.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the East, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the South, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the West, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the North, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the Northeast, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the Southeast, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the Southwest, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the Northwest, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver boundless beings.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the Upper Realm, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the Lower Realm, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver boundless beings.
The Perfected Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of the Ten Directions, Great Sages of Longevity, deliver the world’s boundless divine spirits.

Together they ride upon crimson chariots and emerald carriages, their feathered canopies and jade wheels drawn by vermilion phoenixes and five-colored dark dragons. They raise nine-hued standards and ten sacred banners; before them, nine phoenixes cry in unison, while behind, eight simurghs sing in harmony. Lions and white cranes chant melodiously; the Five Elders lead the way as hosts of immortals flank their procession. Myriad chariots and ten thousand riders float through the void to arrive.

Their radiant light turns back their steeds as they oversee the deliverance of the true and the salvation of the living. The celestial chancellors of the Southern Palace, Han the Recorder of Lives, holding registers and ledgers, all assemble before the Emperor. According to those who ought to be delivered, they strictly examine the heavens and universally proclaim to the Three Realms, the boundless divine realms, the Yellow Springs, the Northern Capital of Fengdu, the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus, and the Twelve River Sources.

They absolve the sins of ancestors and kin across countless kalpas, swiftly erasing transgression records and severing evil roots, preventing confinement among ghostly throngs. By the Mandate of the Primordial Beginning, they ascend at the appointed hour: from the Northern Capital’s icy pools, they guard and escort souls, restrain demons, and ensure protection. Those delivered ascend to the Southern Palace, where the dead undergo refinement and transform into immortals, while the living receive deliverance, enduring through kalpas, turning with the ages, and attaining lifespans equal to heaven.

They forever deliver beings from the Three Ways, Five Sufferings, and Eight Difficulties, transcending the Three Realms to roam freely in the Upper Clarity. Within the Upper Clarity’s heavens, the Heavenly Emperor and Jade Perfected dwell in the formless realm of pure conduct.

**The Eight Heavens of the East:**
The Supreme August Yellow-Bright Heaven, ruled by Emperor Yulan Yuming.
The Great Bright Jade-Perfect Heaven, ruled by Emperor Xu’anatian.
The Clear Bright Hekaton Heaven, ruled by Emperor Yuanyu Qijing.
The Mysterious Womb Nurturing Heaven, ruled by Emperor Liuduneixian.
The Literary Brilliance Heaven, ruled by Emperor Chou Falun.
The Upper Bright Seven Luminaries Heaven, ruled by Emperor Tianhuaiyan.
The Void Transcending Balance Heaven, ruled by Emperor Zhengdingguang.
The Supreme Ultimate Veiled Heaven, ruled by Emperor Quyu Jiuchang.

**The Eight Heavens of the South:**
The Vermilion Bright Harmonious Yang Heaven, ruled by Emperor Lijin Shangzhen.
The Mysterious Bright Reverent Flower Heaven, ruled by Emperor Kongyaochouyin.
The Radiant Bright Ancestral Heaven, ruled by Emperor Chongguangming.
The Bamboo Grove August Drum Heaven, ruled by Emperor Moyi Miaobian.
The Void Bright Hall Heaven, ruled by Emperor A’lousheng.
The Observant Bright Hall Heaven, ruled by Emperor Yumiluoqian.
The Mysterious Bright Reverent Celebration Heaven, ruled by Emperor Longluo Puti.
The Great Radiant Jade Heaven, ruled by Emperor Wanli Wuyan.

**The Eight Heavens of the West:**
The Primordial Vast Ascending Heaven, ruled by Emperor Kaizhen Dingguang.
The Great Peace August Cliff Heaven, ruled by Emperor Polou Atan.
The Manifestly Fixed Ultimate Wind Heaven, ruled by Emperor Zhaozhentong.
The Primordial August Filial Aura Heaven, ruled by Emperor Saloulouwang.
The Supreme August Vast Floating Heaven, ruled by Emperor Minbakuang.
The Thoughtless River Origin Heaven, ruled by Emperor Mingfantian.
The Upper Joyous Heaven, ruled by Emperor Bobojian.
The Boundless Vow Heaven, ruled by Emperor Piaonuqionglong.

**The Eight Heavens of the North:**
The Luminous Court Night Crossing Heaven, ruled by Emperor Huijuehun.
The Abyssal Penetrating Primordial Cavern Heaven, ruled by Emperor Fanxing Guantian.
The Supreme Literary Adorned Wondrous Heaven, ruled by Emperor Nayu Chouying.
The Supreme Pure Elegant Forbidden Heaven, ruled by Emperor Longluo Juechang.
The Supreme Void Primordial Constant Heaven, ruled by Emperor Zongjian Guishen.
The Supreme Release Jade Ascending Heaven, ruled by Emperor Miaomiao Xingyuan.
The Dragon-Transformed Brahman Heaven, ruled by Emperor Yunshang Xuanxuan.
The Supreme Ultimate Nurturing Heaven, ruled by Emperor Daze Famen.

Thirty-two heavens, thirty-two emperors. The heavens conceal their secrets; the heavens veil their names. Within the heavens lies the empty cavern, the spontaneous numinous scripture. The heavens conceal their rhythms, the sounds within the heavens. The heavens’ revered ones, the heavens’ spirits, the great demons of the heavens, the numinous ones of the heavens. Nine harmonies and ten unions transform into the Upper Clarity. The boundless mysteries are profound and unfathomable.

The divine perfected scatter and descend, universally delivering heaven and humanity. Today, rejoicing in receiving deliverance, they pass through the barriers of all heavens, beseeching the eradication of the Three Evils and the severance of earthly roots. They ascend through the Five Gates, their names recorded in the Supreme Mystery. The Demon Kings oversee and ensure no hindrance at the celestial gates.

The Eastern Dipper governs fate, the Western Dipper records names, the Northern Dipper severs death, the Southern Dipper bestows life, and the Central Dipper, the Great Chief, oversees all spirits. The Azure Emperor guards the soul, the White Emperor attends the po, the Vermilion Emperor nurtures qi, the Black Emperor circulates blood, and the Yellow Emperor presides at the center—none among the myriad spirits transgress.

The Azure Heaven Demon King, Bayuan Choubo.
The Vermilion Heaven Demon King, Futian Danshi.
The White Heaven Demon King, Fanshan Liumu.
The Black Heaven Demon King, Jianshou Langfu.
The Yellow Heaven Demon King, Hengtian Danli.

The Five Emperors and Great Demons, lords of all spirits, fly with drumming retinues, commanding ghostly legions. Wielding banners and drums, they roam the vast heavens, proclaiming their majesty as all heavens acknowledge their merit.

The heavens deliver humanity, strictly governing Fengdu. The divine lords receive their mandate, universally sweeping away misfortune. The Eight Mighties spew venom, fierce horses bare their fangs. Heavenly soldiers lead the vanguard, great marshals brandish banners. Fire is hurled for ten thousand leagues, and flowing bells resound in eight directions. Should any dare to challenge or obstruct the perfected, golden axes strike first, and the Queen Mother of the West metes out punishment. Ghosts are butchered and severed, wind and fire unceasing. Thousands upon thousands are beheaded, myriads upon myriads are dismembered. Demons dare not transgress; ghosts dare not harbor malevolence.

The Three Offices and Fengdu meticulously inspect ghostly camps, permitting no concealment. The Golden Horse post ensures swift transmission. Universally proclaimed, boundless and eternal. All spirits heed: the Five Emperors of the Three Realms declare to the Upper Clarity.

The Jade Calendar of the Primordial Cavern spans the Dragon Han and Yan Kang eras. In the distant kalpas, within the primordial chaos, above there was no longer color, below there was no longer abyss. Wind and marsh pervaded the void; the Diamond rode the heavens.

Heaven above and heaven below, no darkness nor obscurity.
No form nor shadow, no limit nor end.
The vast Brahmā of primordial chaos, boundless and lightless.
The Crimson Clarity unfurls its chart, the cycles turn naturally.
The Primordial Beginning settles in stillness, unfolding the Five Scriptures.
Crimson writings on jade, eight mighty dragon scripts.
They govern the kalpas’ passage, ensuring heaven’s eternal endurance.
Brahmā-qi suffuses the cosmos, myriad patterns unfold.
The primordial net flows and evolves, the thirty-two heavens.
Wheeling without color, circling the ten directions.
The Dipper revolves through the southern asterism *Ji*,
returning through the five constants.
Thirty-five divisions gather the qi of the Upper Primordial.
Eight luminous scenes merge in darkness, qi enters the profound profound.
Within the profound, the Great August One, the Highest Perfected.
Floating upon the radiance of supreme auroras, chanting the cavernous hymns.
Golden perfection shines resplendent, its echoes streaming through cloudy encampments.
Jade tones gather qi, numinous winds amass mist.
Purple emptiness flourishes in elegance, aiding and sheltering the myriad immortals.
A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions—naturally they attain perfection.
Within perfection dwells the spirit, the Great Lord of Longevity.
The Lord of Non-Excellence, the Venerable White Prime.
The Great One who Oversees Destiny, Peach and Health unite in extension.
Grasping talismans and holding registers, they safeguard life and root existence.
Ascending to the Upper Clarity, entering and exiting the Flowery Chambers,
within the eightfold darkness, within the minutest subtleties.
Below, they govern the human body, the Mud-Pill Palace and the Crimson Palace.
Within, they order the five qi, blending the hundred spirits.
Ten revolutions return the numinous, ten thousand qi purify the immortal.
The immortal Dao values life, endlessly delivering beings.
Above, the eight gates open, the flying celestial wheel.
Karmic retribution and prohibitions, past-life causes and conditions.
Universally received and delivered, the dead soul revives in a new body.
The body attains rebirth, ascending to be heard by the various heavens.
Above the various heavens, each has its gate of life.
Within lies the empty cavern, the hymns of chant and song.
The demon kings’ numinous scriptures, their verses matching the Highest Perfected.

**First Desire Realm: The Flying Void’s Melody**
The human path stretches distant, the immortal path vast and boundless.
The ghostly path delights—yet when one stands at the gate of human life,
the immortal Dao values life, the ghostly path values its end.
The immortal Dao is ever auspicious, the ghostly path ever inauspicious.
The lofty Upper Clarity’s numinous essence, its mournful song resounds through the great void.
I only wish for the immortal Dao to succeed, not for the human path to be exhausted.
The Northern Capital’s Yellow Springs and Crooked Mansion,
within dwell the myriad ghostly hosts.
They only seek to cut short human destiny, to sever the gate of human life.
Ah, chant the cavernous hymns to restrain the Northern Fengdu.
Bind and dispatch the malevolent demonic essences,
beheading and vanquishing the six ghostly blades.
The qi of the various heavens surges boundless,
my Dao daily flourishes and rises.

**Second Form Realm: The Demon King’s Hymn**
Lofty and vast, the luminous qi soars in all four directions.
The Brahmā-conduct heavens encircle the ten directions.
The boundless great spirits all arise from my body.
I possess the cavernous hymns—ten thousand times they perfect immortals.
The immortal Dao values deliverance, the ghostly path clings close.
Heaven and earth stretch vast and desolate, foul qi swirls thickly.
The three realms delight—passing through them, one abides forever.
Crossing into my realm, the body enters the natural.
At this time, delight arises—yet it is by my grace.
The Dragon Han era surges boundless—how can one distinguish the true?
My realm is difficult to cross, thus I compose the cavernous scriptures.
Transforming and flying through the void, to test your body.
Success or failure, slackening or retreat—how many achieve deliverance?
I laugh at those who do not cross, thus I sing this melody.

**Third Formless Realm: The Demon King’s Song**
Above the three realms, the distant and vast Great Luo.
No root of color above, cloudy layers towering.
Only the Primordial Beginning dwells in the kalpa’s vastness.
It commands and orders my realm, governing from the Mysterious Capital.
Those who transgress my realm enter the Jade Void.
I reign as the supreme king, rectifying and ruling the myriad demons.
Within the void, ten thousand transformations—foul qi blooms in profusion.
Few preserve the true, many are deluded and confused.
The immortal Dao is difficult to secure, the ghostly path easily led astray.
The human path lies in the heart—truly, it does not depend on others.
The immortal Dao values substance, the human path values splendor.
If you do not delight in the immortal Dao, how can you pass through the three realms?
Should you desire to traverse the five paths, what then can I do for you?

Above the three realms, within the flying void,
the demon kings’ melodies, their tones matching the cavernous hymns.
Recite them a hundred times, and your name is delivered to the Southern Palace.
Recite them a thousand times, and the demon kings will protect and welcome you.
Ten thousand recitations perfect the Dao, ascending to the great void.
Passing through the three realms, your rank attains that of an immortal lord.
Those who hear the numinous melodies—the demon kings respectfully manifest and restrain,
earth spirits attend and escort, delivering you from the earthly prisons,
the five sufferings and eight difficulties. Seven generations of ancestors ascend,
forever departing the ghostly bureaus.
The soul crosses the Vermilion Mound, undergoes refinement, and is reborn.
This is called the boundless, the universal deliverance without end.

There exists a secret celestial scripture, revered by all heavens.
Those who recklessly divulge it fall into hell, their calamity extending to seven generations of ancestors.

The Dao declares: These two hymns are the hidden melodies of the various heavenly emperors
and the numinous demon kings, all words of the great Brahmā.
They are not the common speech of the world, their language lacks ornate beauty,
their tunes lack florid elegance—thus they are called profound and obscure,
difficult to fathom in detail.
The heavens treasure them, secreting them in the Purple Tenuity’s Upper Palace of the Mysterious Capital.
According to the mysterious statutes, they are transmitted once every forty thousand kalpas.
If a perfected person offers gold and treasures with a sincere heart,
following the old protocols and pledging allegiance to the ten heavens,
only then are they bestowed.

The Dao declares: The cycles of heaven and earth also have their ends.
The sun, moon, and five planets also wax and wane.
Even the most sagely and divine persons have their periods of rest and decline.
Those of shallow learning also suffer illness and harm.

Whenever such calamities afflict those of shared qi, all must unite in heart to perform purification rites, burn incense through the six periods, and recite the sutras ten times over—then blessings and virtue will descend at once, dispelling all inauspicious omens. These boundless scriptures universally deliver limitless beings.

The Dao declares: Those of shallow learning in the Way, whose immortal rank remains unfulfilled, when their destined time of passing arrives and their bodies enter the Great Yin, at the moment of transition, their fellow students and perfected persons shall burn incense and recite the sutras ten times to deliver the corporeal form according to the proper method. Thus the hun-soul will ascend directly to the Southern Palace, and in accordance with their accumulated merit, they shall be reborn after a calculated span of days, escaping the wheel of rebirth to attain immortality.

The Dao declares: When the cycles of heaven and earth reach their end, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the sutras. When the stellar lodges fall into disarray and the sun and moon lose their proper course, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the sutras. When the four seasons lose their order and yin and yang fall out of harmony, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the sutras. When the sovereign faces calamity and warfare erupts on all sides, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the sutras. When pestilence spreads and the multitudes perish, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the sutras. When masters or companions pass from this life, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the sutras.

The merit of purification rites and sutra recitation is profoundly weighty: above, it dissolves heavenly disasters and safeguards the emperor; below, it wards off poison and harm, delivering the multitudes. In life and death, all depend upon it—its blessings are immeasurable, universally delivering gods and humans.

The Dao declares: Whoever possesses these scriptures and performs such meritorious deeds for heaven and earth, the sovereign, and the multitudes—on the day of calamity, if they resolve in heart to perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the sutras ten times—all the heavens will record their names, and the ten thousand spirits will attend and guard them. Those who distinguish themselves as perfected persons shall become ministers of the Golden Gates of the Sage Lord. The heavens record the merits and transgressions of each person without the slightest error. Even the demon kings of heaven shall protect and recommend them. Only those who attain the Dao shall fully comprehend these most profound words.

The boundless hidden speech of the Great Brahma in the heavens
Composed by the Dao Lord
*Upper Scroll of the Numinous Writ of the Primordial Beginning*
*Eastern Eight Heavens*

Vast begetting, lofty illumination—awakening the primordial, penetrating the void.
The Nine Perfected of the Mysterious Respond, their transformative intermingling initiating the chart.
The patterns of the numinous unfold in structure; the ancestral model resides in the Mysterious Capital.
Responsive changes are wholly embraced; majestic radiance arises of itself.
Green peaks shift their scenes; the imperial Dao contains brightness.
The jade forests of heaven gleam with authority; qi-crystals nurture the soul.
Fused nets stand in support; the hidden patterns of the Perfect Circle conceal their script.
The vast spirit envelops all; the grand network proclaims tranquility.

*Southern Eight Heavens*
The blazing flames spread and surge; firmness is arrayed to clarify the lineage.
The empty image of the Mysterious Flower; the Dragon-Yang dances in the vault.
Subtle rectitude shines in the clouds; the profound and great congeal in stillness.
The primordial pass of the Three Bonds; the Great Brahma soars through the void.
Hidden awakening swells like the dragon; the celestial order presents its blessings.
The divine portals are entwined; the true primordial scatters its essence.
Pure grasp illumines the dark; revolving and uniting, one ascends and migrates.
Guiding the soaring, feasting upon the clouds; the numinous response ascends to heaven.

*Western Eight Heavens*
Firm moisture subtly governs; the yin’s austere solitary majesty.
Piercing qi clarifies the plain; the thunderous cavern opens the subtle.
The transformations of Zhou respond in the hidden; limpid radiance graces the imperial terrace.
Pacifying the distant, drawing from the void; expanding the luxuriant, adorning the pool.
Binding the whirlwind to nurture; beauty unfurls without scattering.
The yang penetrates the hundred and six; submerged awnings conceal the steps.
The hidden vastness is profoundly silent; the true peaks convene the numinous.
Firmness and grandeur follow the Dao; proclaiming the mandate to the soaring groves.

*Northern Eight Heavens*
The dragon’s peace transforms in the cavern; pure yang conceals the mysterious.
The square root returns to qi; the image lies hidden in the lofty round.
Divine transformations bestow wisdom; refining the numinous root.
The red essence is pure Dao; its completed title is Majestic Honored One.
Beneficial clouds are ever constant; the hundred-thousand-yard central mound.
Lush citadels of jade ramparts; ballads flow with blessings.
Receiving position in the Jade Chamber; the great statute penetrates the hidden.
The mysterious chapters blaze and scatter; the network’s wheel thus turns.

*Middle Scroll of the Numinous Writ of the Primordial Beginning*
*Composed by the Dao Lord*

*Eastern Eight Heavens*
Dǎnlóu Āhuì, the Perceiver of No-Thought.
Xūyán of the Bright Countenance; Fǎlǎn of the Bodhi-Tree.
Jiànà Āyì; Hūhē’s flowing chant.
Huādū’s winding beauty; Xiānpú nurtures its perfection.
Dáluò of the Great Brahma; scattering mist and blessing clouds.
Flying and sprinkling the Jade Capital; the bright demons ascend the gate.
The foremost of the Unmoving; Huízhí’s flowing mystery.
Ātuó Lóngluó; the Four Symbols exhale their rounds.

*Southern Eight Heavens*
Nányán’s floating cavern; jade eyes gleaming.
The Brahma-form descends from the void; the Nine Numinous press forward.
Zéluò’s Bodhi-Terrace; the Green Net of the Great Thousand.
The distant vastness of the Nine Ugly; the Sháo ballads wind in cycles.
Above the clouds, the Nine Capitals; soaring life arises of itself.
Nàyù’s lush fragrance; Móluó’s Dharma-Wheel.
Hóngchí holds the mirrorless; grasping posture, moving countenance.
Fragrant clarity, vast brilliance; the divine tassels adorn their palaces.

*Western Eight Heavens*
Dāolì’s Chan stratagems; Póní’s faultless passage.
The winding marsh washes its hues; the hall of the supremely subtle.
Flowing nets, Brahma-sprouts; radiant luxuriance in the desolate vale.
The distant and remote, without stillness; the winding head of the Lesser Capital.
Ālán’s lush bamboo; Huàmò extends its reason.
The Nine Openings discern themselves; Ānà is the foremost of ranks.
The boundless supports the canopy; the floating net unites with the divine.
Jade births the Long Mulberry; the cypress void conveys the immortals.

*Northern Eight Heavens*
Juéwú self-nurtures; the Nine Suns guide the qián.
The Kun-Mother covers the east; form gathers the supreme mystery.
Tuóluó nurtures the distant; the subtle qi merges with the clouds.
The Flying Celestials, the Great Ugly; together they oversee the upper heavens.
Shātuó’s kalpa-measures; the Dragon-Han’s lustrous freshness.
The Azure Vault, the Floating Li; empty songs preserve the precious.
Evil and artifice lack rank; the cavern’s wonder is naturally true.
The primordial Brahma’s vast desert; the hidden and still convey humanity.

The Dao speaks: These are the boundless hidden speeches of the Great Brahma in the heavens, their ancient characters each a full *zhang* in length. The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign of Old inscribed their script to establish the correct sounds. Those who know these sounds and can purify themselves to recite them shall have all the heavens dispatch Flying Celestial Divine Kings to descend and observe their persons, record their meritorious diligence, and report it to the heavens above. The myriad spirits shall pay homage; the earthly deities shall attend at their gates. The great merit demon kings shall protect and recommend them as Transcendent Ones. When the Dao is complete and attained, they may wander the Three Realms and ascend through the Golden Gates. These sounds repel all, exorcise all, deliver all, and accomplish all—such are the natural sounds of the Heavenly Perfected. Thus, reciting them summons the Flying Celestials to descend and observe; the Supreme Lord chants from afar; the myriad spirits pay homage; the Three Realms attend at their chariots; the demonic hordes bow their heads; ghostly essences perish of themselves. The jade chimes resound; the ten directions grow solemn and clear. Rivers and seas fall silent; mountains and peaks swallow their mists. The myriad numina tremble and submit; the assembled Transcendents are summoned. Heaven is free of foul vapors; earth is free of demonic dust. Profound wisdom illumines the hidden; the vast measure is profoundly mysterious.

*Lower Scroll of the Numinous Writ of the Primordial Beginning*
*Composed by the Heavenly Perfected Sovereign*

*Eastern Eight Heavens*
Sēnlù stores the clouds; the Nine Souls refine their crystals.
Zhǐmò peers through the jade ring; floating plumes and mortar-stalks.
The deer’s bench in the Yang Chamber; the azure stem winds and returns.
The pond’s depths bear their burdens; the forked paths lead and accompany.
Algal patterns transform into jade; orchids and jade disks encircle.
The vast and surging grow wild; the utmost center is pure and clear.
Radiance unfolds in the cavern’s drought; stillness is without the subtle’s congealment.
The plain leans upon the empty net; the imperial departs from the primordial numen.

*Southern Eight Heavens*
The blazing forge in the spacious hall; the Great Empyrean’s ballad-corner.
Traversing the distant, offering ripples; the Zhou lock adds its chart.
Scaling the towering, treading the rugged; the solitary vessel of the Hùn Capital.
The halberd’s clouds blaze; the well deceives, holding its reeds.
The palm’s maintenance restrains its rites; brilliance and luster gleam.
The flat shoes benefit the weary; the hidden and subtle complete the thunder.
The tiny streams flow east; the red radiance gathers its reckoning.
The jade mystery evolves its lord; the cypress channel attains its rule.

*Western Eight Heavens*
The proper cauldron aligns to the left; Póní slays the numinous.
Sorrowful summons equal the borders; reaching the southern path of the *kui*.
The tranquil Yi diminishes its light; the primordial merged awakens its affinity.
The Dao guards the distant peak; the continuous journey knows its proclamation.
The Supreme Numen is submerged in vastness; the bright harmony follows the Lu.
The wise capital’s constant splendor; the ruins and sands stand firm.
The chestnut bells cast out the stocks; the assembly extends its adorned spheres.
The eminent clouds of the Azure Mansion; the karma beholds its foundation.

*Northern Eight Heavens*
The sunken child drinks sweetness; the emerald palace of the Nine Orchids.
The solemn hooks rise in succession; the dragon’s Fen guards the divine pass.
The ditches and abysses sink the demons; the vast Man beseeches passage.

The profound void breathes deeply, the unknowing freely radiates.
The python cultivates auspicious evenings; fragrant altars mark seasonal furrows.
Tang’s long reign spreads prosperity; not by mediocrity is careful deliverance achieved.
Morning peace and tranquil ease; secret methods abound in propriety.
The vast Emperor governs life; the guardian initiates the great multitude.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign, the Brahman qi stretches boundlessly,
the Celestial Treasure is spontaneous, the sound of the Eight Harmonies.
Presiding over the world’s assemblies, the earth’s ramparts and vast marshes,
transforming calamities and hardships.
Those who recite and chant shall dispel evil and invite fortune,
the pure and tranquil Dao qi—none shall not find peace.
The Earthly Offices present the scripture; the hundred spirits revere and fear.
Divine cinnabar transcribes the text; wearing or bearing it brings clear verification.
Applied to the utmost learning, it is not proclaimed to the vulgar below.

*Eulogy of the Supreme Ultimate Perfected*
The divine clouds gleam in layered emptiness; the Brahman net gathers in the azure sky.
The Primordial Beginning’s nine dragons draw the chariot; the Sovereign holds the reins of the blue carriage.
Luminous radiance gathers the myriad Perfected; pearlescent light unfolds the vast void.
Revealing the *Scripture of Numinous Treasure*, fortune and virtue are thereby summoned.
The *Cavernous Mystery* conceals lofty solemnity; jade tones ripple through cloud-borne zithers.
The immeasurable is beyond contemplation; the Dao’s sea gives rise to waves.
Dharma principles flow like rivulets, nourishing and fostering fine sprouts.
Used to relieve hunger and poverty, teachings flourish to protect the central court.
May the August Emperor live a hundred million years; great peace extinguishes the blades of war.
Bowing in reverence toward the Jade Palace, numinous blossoms scatter golden rays.

*Thus concludes the first scroll of the* Wondrous Scripture of the Uppermost Grade on the Limitless Salvation of Humanity *of the Numinous Treasure.*

*The Wondrous Scripture of the Uppermost Grade on the Limitless Salvation of Humanity*
*Scroll the Second: The Jade Palace’s Great Dao*

The Dao speaks: Long ago, in the Azure Heavens of Primordial Beginning, within the Great Floating Li Land, the Limitless Uppermost Grade for the Salvation of Humanity was received. When the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning first descended to the Pure Subtlety Realm, he manifested a pearl of numinous瑞, gathering the boundless host—heavenly perfected, great spirits, exalted sages, and wondrously accomplished perfected beings—all entered within the pearl. With the Limitless Salvation’s Uppermost Grade of the Numinous Treasure’s scriptural Dharma, the assembled perfected oversaw the transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that time, joy and celebration were beyond words; the Dharma rites were roughly complete, and the myriad heavens returned to their stations.

Then, at the inception of the Five Kaihuang Kalpas, when the dark dragon ascended through the Celestial Pass, he descended again to the Vermilion Radiance of the Great Cinnabar Heavens. In the congealed luminance of the Cavernous Yang, within the Jade Mystery’s Crimson Realm, he salvaged ten thousand myriads of beings, entrusting the Great Dao of the Jade Palace to me.

When the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning expounded this scripture, he circumambulated ten times, summoning the ten directions, and only then took his seat. Heavenly perfected, great spirits, exalted sages, wondrously accomplished perfected beings, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace, the Primordial Masters and Immortal Lords, the Supreme Pole’s Imperial Perfected, the Nine Radiant Spirits of Flying Blossoms, the Heavenly Emperor of Yu Yu, the Purple Radiance Venerable, and the boundless host arrived borne upon the void. Jade emptiness streamed with mist; the Three Luminances blazed with color. Azure wheels and jeweled chariots, feathered carriages and crimson canopies, divine brocades and phoenix silks, dark clarity shading the armrests, cavernous voids merging in revolution, divine crystals interluminating—nine qi wafted with auroras, three chambers revolved in splendor. Heaven’s expanse stilled; the azure vault congealed in perfection. Whirlwinds dispersed radiance; returning winds blended in harmony. The Imperial Unity oversaw life; the Round Net infused qi. The Eight Gates stirred in flight; the sun-pearl held brilliance, the moon-disc shed waves. Numinous nets thickened with haze, pervading and transforming the realm entire.

The Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning, seated in mystery upon the floating Jade Scriptural Terrace, expounded the scripture once. The Jade Dawn’s Great Sage simultaneously acclaimed its excellence. At that time, the men and women of the land heard it throughout the ten directions, without hindrance or obstruction.

When the scripture was expounded a second time, all gazed upon the boundless, penetrating and perceiving all.

When expounded a third time, the voice was pure and wondrous, transforming and salvaging those who came.

When expounded a fourth time, one spirit responded to ten thousand, and ten thousand spirits merged in perfection.

When expounded a fifth time, the myriad beings of the Three Realms, upon recalling, arrived instantly, their spirit-travel leaving no trace.

When expounded a sixth time, he pointed and pressed the Two Modes, traversing all in an instant.

When expounded a seventh time, birth and extinction were forever severed, and eternal existence endured through kalpas uncounted.

When expounded an eighth time, the Dao’s sea manifested auspicious signs, and the Mystery Mountain emitted瑞.

When expounded a ninth time, form was refined into qi, and qi refined into spirit.

When expounded a tenth time, spontaneity attained perfection; the Jade Palace realized the Dao. The ten directions and Three Realms all achieved transcendence. At that time, the men and women of the land, without exception, harmonized in mind, without distinction of self or other, all attaining eternal life.

The Dao speaks: At that time, when the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning expounded the scripture once, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits of the eastern direction, with their boundless host, arrived borne upon the void.

When expounded a second time, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits of the southern direction, with their boundless host, arrived borne upon the void.

When expounded a third time, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits of the western direction, with their boundless host, arrived borne upon the void.

When expounded a fourth time, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits of the northern direction, with their boundless host, arrived borne upon the void.

When expounded a fifth time, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits of the northeastern direction, with their boundless host, arrived borne upon the void.

When expounded a sixth time, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits of the southeastern direction, with their boundless host, arrived borne upon the void.

When expounded a seventh time, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits of the southwestern direction, with their boundless host, arrived borne upon the void.

When expounded an eighth time, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits of the northwestern direction, with their boundless host, arrived borne upon the void.

When expounded a ninth time, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits of the upper direction, with their boundless host, arrived borne upon the void.

When expounded a tenth time, the Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits of the lower direction, with their boundless host, arrived borne upon the void.

When the ten circumambulations were complete, the spontaneous great spirits of the boundless heavens of the ten directions arrived as one. The men and women of the land harmonized in mind, revering as one. Those who came were like layered clouds and accumulated mists, beyond reckoning, pervading the land entire, filling the fourfold void, unstoppable.

Thereupon, the Primordial Beginning gathered his fingers and emitted flying light, minute as a radiant star, gleaming with nine hues. It stood erect in the mysterious void, illuminating above and below, ten ren from the earth, penetrating inner and outer. These ten directional realms became like lapis lazuli, blended in a single hue.

The Primordial Beginning settled into his seat; his radiant light pervaded all. Gazing upon this land, it was like an image in a mirror. The garments of heaven’s people, the forms of men and women, every thread and hair were revealed in clarity. In the great void, not the slightest obstruction remained.

The Great Dao of the Jade Palace’s spontaneous great spirits, with the assembled exalted sages, boundless high perfected, wondrously accomplished perfected beings, and the great spirits of the ten directions’ transformative qi and Dao-grade, all entered within a single light. Their Dharma-bodies, ten, hundred, thousand, ten thousandfold, dense as layered valleys, reflected and returned the light, their forms and images mutually mirrored. Bright and transparent, distinct yet unconfused.

The heaven’s people of that land who came to bear witness looked upward: the divine light raced like wind, coiled like clouds. The ten thousand sages were all within the great void, perceiving the wondrous stillness devoid of form.

Then, within the Dao’s light, the Primordial Beginning expounded the Jade Palace’s Great Dao for the salvation of humanity. When the circumambulation was complete, the assembled perfected oversaw the transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that time, joy and celebration were beyond words. When the Dharma rites were complete, the myriad heavens returned to their stations. In an instant, all was silent, without lingering resonance.

At that time, the heaven’s people encountered the great model, universally achieving transcendence and eternal life. Spirit congealed, qi focused, harmonized yet undivided. The land turned in reverence, taking the Dao as their heart. Without thought, without action, without cogitation, without scheming, without awareness, without knowledge, without extinction, without birth, without arising, without abiding, without self, without name—words merged with the utmost subtlety. Spirit soared to the Purple Clarity, equal in compassion and love. Different bones became kin; the land was secure, the people prosperous, rejoicing in great peace.

The Jade Clarity Great Dao, immeasurably delivering beings, reverently believes, awakens, and comprehends—attaining the Dao and becoming perfected.

The Dao speaks: All that the Primordial Heavenly Worthy expounds in the sutras are the hidden rhymes of the Jade Clarity Great Dao’s Supreme Deity’s inner names, also the esoteric titles of the exalted perfected Jade Clarity Divine Kings, the concealed names of the hundred spirits—none are ordinary words of the mundane world.

When the highest sages have attained perfection, true persons penetrate the mysteries and fathom the subtleties, fully mastering these chapters. Reciting them ten times, the ten thousand heavens pay reverence, a thousand emperors bow in listening, the Jade Capital sways in motion, seas settle and mountains stand firm, the Three Radiances merge in illumination, the Seven Luminaries shine as one. Demonic souls are extinguished at their roots, ghostly spirits severed from their bonds, perverse qi is purged and purified, the Three Primordials expand in stillness. Withered forms and white bones return to life and restore their spirits.

For those of utmost learning who recite this ten times: the Five Elders oversee the covenant, the Four Marshals descend to observe, the Three Officials record merit, the Eight Scribes manage external affairs, demon kings submit

Whether manifest or concealed, whether vanished or present, in profound tranquility and emptiness, amidst the tangled web of interconnections—the Dao is most wondrous. Where numinous transformations are heard, it illumines the Nine Origins, spans the Seven Celestial Palaces, supports the left with the Vast and Falling, and upholds the right with Golden Perfection. Purple auroras flow in resonance, crimson radiance surges horizontally, weaving its chapters in ceaseless transformation.

The Dao’s root is born, concealed within the Jade Capital, upon the Terrace of Mist and Net, descending to coil at the source of the Twin Pure Pools. Paired, they emerge from the Gates of the Sun and Moon, casting fire ten thousand fathoms high to sweep away demonic vapors. The Vermilion Essence of Yang’s Radiance and the Eightfold Crimson Mists bathe and refine the spirit’s windows. The Nine Void Peaks of Kunlun blaze with luminous clouds, jade spirits and net-like blossoms imbibe the Long Tower’s nectar, scattering jade splendor. Spirits merge, bones transform, the ten thousand qi harmonize in brilliance. The Jade Capital enters the Mysterious, the Dao’s qi forms the body, resplendent in the indistinct, merging at the ultimate to command immortality.

The Dao gives birth to spirit, qi forms the body, illumination guards the true, transformation spreads glory—wherever it goes, it arrives without fail, and all works are instantly accomplished. The Grand Tenuity refines essence, the profound vastness sinks into obscurity, the Azure Void and Crimson Realm—these are the Primordial Capital of the Great Dao, the Cloud Court floating above, the Mysterious Gate towering in purity. The Yu-Yu transforms qi, cycling through the ten directions.

Within lies the Spirit of the Vast and Falling Northern Terrace; within lies the Crimson Essence Lord of the Nine Harmonies; within lies the True Person of the Mud-Pill Heavenly Canopy; within lies the Minister of the Golden Gate Assisting the August Emperor; within lies the Venerable One of the Three Upper Clarities; within lies the Spirit of Longevity and Transcendent Transformation; within lie the Twin Lads of Flowing Light, crimson script forming pearls, the natural Jade Capital, the Golden Perfection Venerable.

The Grand Aurora’s Bright Hall, the Lesser Essence’s Green Chariot, the Great Circle’s Abundance, the Grand Unity summons immortals, bestowing blessings and delivering beings. Heaven’s transformations stretch endlessly; today, the imperial radiance arrives as the Ten Thousand Emperors descend to the throne.

The Boundless Natural Divine King of the East—Jade Capital Great Dao, Limitless Deliverance of Beings.
The Primordial Natural Divine King of the South—Jade Capital Great Dao, Limitless Deliverance of Beings.

The Perfected Natural Divine Kings of the Ten Directions—Longevity, Flying Radiance, Jade Capital Great Dao, Limitless Great Divinity.

Together they ride the Nine Yangs’ divine chariot, the Azure Empyrean’s golden-rooted crimson simurgh carriage, bearing the cords of ten thousand transformations, the canopy of pure numinous radiance. Vermilion banners veil the sun, jade wheels grind the void. Each drives a chariot of dark crystal, drawn by black-armored poison dragons, celestial apes, and endlessly shifting forms.

They strike the *aoluo* zither and beat the Grand Empyrean’s drum. Purple mists and white clouds conceal and reveal the ten thousand spirits. Heavenly heralds bear banners, great marshals set forth, wind and fire unite, divine auroras scatter brilliance. Auspicious omens descend, floating through the void to arrive. Their voices resound through the empty waves, subduing demons and protecting life. The Upper Clarity’s Marshal, the High Numinous Sovereign Perfected, the Jade Capital’s Imperial Office, the Great Dao’s divinities, deliver beings to transcendence, the Great Lord of Longevity.

Bearing registers and holding talismans, they assemble at the imperial court. The Supreme Nine Voids, the Palace of the Spirit Canopy, the division of the Mud-Pill, the flowing crystals of the Three Purities, the Mysterious Cinnabar and Grand Tranquility, the Central Yellow and Purple Tenuity. The numinous spirits of the Upper Perfected universally proclaim to the Three Origins. Purple portals and azure chambers, misty nets and cloud encampments. The Jade Hall’s Purple Infants, the spirits of the White Flower, the heroes of bone transformation, the Twin Lads of Flowing Bells. Golden Perfection and Jade Radiance, the Two Radiant Great Spirits, leftward turning the Vast and Falling, rightward flashing the Fire Bells.

Swiftly summon the Three and Five, the Upper Clarity’s officers and soldiers, crimson veins and purple networks entwining the celestial scriptures. Glancing with flying light, they inhale and absorb the Jade City, descending to the profound springs, the river valleys and dark abysses. The intricacies of winding principles, the black waters’ inner stillness, jade maidens turning the mechanism, golden lads twisting the ropes. The ancient ancestors of former kalpas examine and punish without cease. The Jade Capital’s Dao qi swiftly verifies names. Sin registers are erased, karmic paths lose their glory—none may detain them, for the Emperor’s punishments are severe. By the Primordial Beginning’s talismanic command, they ascend at the appointed hour.

The Nine Capitals of accumulated nights, the Grand Abyss and Weak Depths—all demonic souls, cold-dew-suffering spirits, fire-refined yin obstructions, the hundred barriers burned away. Malevolent villains and their lineages are extinguished, swiftly subdued at Mount Feng. The Jade Capital’s Great Dao transforms the body to birth immortals; immortals refine the body to transcend kalpas, ever unshaken. Following the light to guide qi, the spirit pool exhales mist, born together with the Dao, their lifespan surpassing a hundred million years.

Forever delivered from the Seven Harms, Eight Difficulties, and Nine Calamities, they step through the Heavenly Gate, surpassing the Three Realms, ascending the Phoenix Terrace and lofty chariots to roam the Upper Clarity. In the Upper Clarity’s heavens, the Heavenly Emperor and Primordial Perfected dwell in the wondrous emptiness of Brahman conduct.

Thirty-six Heavens, thirty-six Emperors—Jade Palace’s hidden taboos, Jade Palace’s concealed names.

Transforming Ascension’s pattern, Liberating Salvation’s numen—Ninefold Crystals, Tenfold Lights, Bright Hall’s descent to life.
Jade Palace’s Great Dao, profound beyond fathoming.
Vast and Lofty Seven Perfected, universally liberating heaven and humanity.
Its Dao most weighty, lesser immortals dare not hear.
Body girded with Five Bushels, head crowned with Three Luminaries, spirit soaring to luminous clouds, harmonizing with utmost truth.
Today, joyously receiving liberation, traversing the passes of all heavens, name inscribed in cinnabar registers, summoning true destiny’s immortals.
Purple Salvation’s scorching radiance, qi entering Grand Mystery, severing the Five Paths, ancestral burdens wholly absolved.
Three Spirits jointly ascend, Five Emperors share the same chariot, Dao perfected in Highest Clarity, unbound by Heaven’s gates.
Eastern Dipper initiates form, Western Dipper circulates essence, Northern Dipper nurtures substance, Southern Dipper descends spirit.

Five Directions’ Jade Palace, Three Realms’ shared guests—soaring through heaven, overturning earth, lightning’s fury, thunder’s charge.
Patrolling the ten directions, scrutinizing the profound and obscure, divine marshals commanding, hundreds of millions of spirit troops.
Scouring mountains, searching seas—banners and pendants in profusion, transforming the vast emptiness, divine mechanisms now divide.

Shooting fire without limit, great slaughter wielding the whip—Eightfold Scenery’s purity and remoteness, Tenfold Flowers’ arrayed proclamations.
All obey the Jade Palace, naturally utmost truth—mysterious talismans’ commands, cleaving heaven to aid the wheel.
Exterminating demons, eradicating ugliness—fire’s decree without script, myriad upon myriad, beheading and extinguishing demonic souls.
Heavenly beasts spew poison, lightning and fire spray clouds—swiftly dispatched to the Three Offices, relentless in pursuit and capture.
Those harming the true Dao, pursued by the Northern Lord—Jade Palace’s Great Dao, moving the August Honored One.
Cloud standards and feathered canopies, ascending to audience in Jade Clarity.
Merging kalpas’ imperial records, essence concealed in Grand Luminosity.
Flowering rays swiftly transform, Nine Paths open life.
Cavernous towers of sun and moon, mysterious radiance of twin eyes.
Inwardly penetrating the Mud Pill, Crimson Script’s courtyard.
Jade branches knotting qi, flying fire bells.
Left purified, right cleansed—Three Palaces clarified.
Wielding and striking, transforming majesty through Heaven’s Capital.
Left as Metal Perfected, right as Jade Radiance.
Soaring through the Eight Ultimates, stone’s radiance in Central Chamber.
Body ascending Grand Rosy Clouds, ranked among Immortal Kings.
Jade ramparts’ supreme wonder, Dao’s constant passage.
Nine Elixirs’ Grand Tenuity, crimson towers and jasper chambers.

Neither form nor name, neither short nor long.
Flowing radiance in jasper chambers, gazing upward to consume mysterious frost.

Universally bestowing essential words, inscribing texts on azure langgan.
Liberating the Nine Darks, dispersing whirlwinds and scattering mists.
Phoenix’s calendar in vermilion script, Dragon’s chapters in hidden scrolls.
Secretly spreading the Five Qi, liberating billions of humans.
Grasping the balance, bowing to the Chief—merit归 to the Upper Mystery.
Great Wheel’s revolving governance, thirty-six heavens.
Above connecting to divine palaces, Nine Emperors’ true chariots.
Marshal recording texts, Grand Scribe preserving continuance.
Transcending sun and moon, merging palaces in hidden transference.
Enacting governance, offering sounds—Great Transformation’s unbroken continuity.
Encompassing the Six Voids, yang’s radiance intertwined.
Ten crossings, nine circuits—qi harmonizing the Three Origins.
Origin’s Grand Consort, azure clouds’ flying skirts.
Seven Perfected driving in union, Upper Scenery’s numinous honor.
Mystery’s utmost yin, Purple Tower’s great spirit.
Spirit dwelling in Mysterious Elixir, Crimson Terrace’s sprouting root.
Feminine One’s jade tally, Yellow Path’s rising mist.
Boundless liberation of humans, Grand Cavern’s azure compilation.

Wandering in jade radiance, they gather life and command imperial immortals.
Wind pairs with fire, emerging and vanishing without interval.
Brahma-chants stir the qi, celestial voices dance the Mystery.
Purple clouds converge in shade, white purity swirls in revolution.
Jade Heaven’s floating canopy, registering the myriad immortals.
One union, then another—nature’s utmost truth.
Five-colored essence flows, Grand Harmony enters the body.
The true within the body, the Mud-Pill Palace’s honored spirit.
Assisting ministers and assisting immortals, the Three Origins’ Imperial Lords.
Guarding and protecting the Jade Towers, nurturing the vitality of life.
Mysterious Unity’s Laozi, Forest Master of the Great Truth.
White Origin’s Pistil Pearl, Purple Origin’s refined essence.
Three luminances of the Bright Hall, Jade Heaven delivers humans.
Transforming and shifting, the ten thousand qi ascend in distinction.
Grand Clarity, Grand Ultimate—profound void’s supreme numen.
Broidered robes, star-fringed hems, dragon robes with tiger patterns.
Gathering qi to preserve life, the hundred million sages share this principle.
Boundless supreme transformation, wondrously established without limit.
Roaming the Upper Clarity, entering and exiting the Grand Tenuity.
Within the Eight Sceneries, the great mechanism of Abundance.
Below, they stabilize the human body, the Azure-Cinnabar Pool.
At center, the five qi merge, partaking of dawn’s radiance.
Glancing left and right,
the seven ancestors ascend together.
Immortal nobility is long life; the life-Dao values truth.
True spirits attain the Dao, delivering boundless humans.
Above, the Mysterious Pass opens, four gates and eight portals.
Within, the utmost essence—Mud-Pill Palace’s Lady.
Hand grasping divine light, body streaming purple clouds.
Jade Heaven’s utmost weight, the Dao is not distant spirit.
Spirit and clarity attain truth, true qi unites with life.
Upper Clarity’s numinous verses, arrayed and presented to the various heavens.
The various heavens summon the spirits—now you know the truth.
Above the Three Origins, each has its Gate of Life.

Within, the flying spirits’ verses of qi-transformation:
*Jade Chapters of the Immortal Kings, matching the exalted perfected.*

**First: Lower Origin’s Jade Heaven Grand Dao, Azure Void Immortal King’s Chant**
Cloud-light surging and merging,
celestial winds eightfold open.
Green chariots attend the banners, commanding dragon-drawn carriages.
Mystic sea stilled to azure, vermilion standards subdue demons.
Nine Heavens unite in might, shaking and dispelling the hundred evils.
This is my Mud-Pill Palace—
numinous light flying as rosy clouds.
Streaming mist through eight paths, azure crystal and jade gauze.
Purple dawn’s Dao accomplished, irrigating qi through the Three Radiances.
Measuring boundless deliverance, inscribing merit for the Imperial Lords.
Primal Beginning’s talismanic decree, Heavenly Tally records the name.
Transcending the dark netherworld, flying across the Vermilion Mound.
Imperial court’s towering peaks, refining and tempering form and soul.

**Second: Middle Origin’s Jade Heaven Grand Dao, Purple Grotto Immortal King’s Chapter**
Luminous Purple Tenuity, vast and boundless in eight directions.
Transforming form to ride the Mystery, encircling the numinous precincts.
Heavenly River irrigates the ford, the Dipper’s handle and stars bow low.
Jade pendants in profuse brilliance, great pearls and lesser beads.
The host of stars quiver with light, following the Imperial Banner’s command.
Seated in stability in the Purple Heaven, molten gold’s fourfold radiance.
Vermilion mist unfolds, fire essence whirls in tempest.
Within, an elder—crimson script on cloud-garments.
Ascending my Jade Capital, gazing below at the luxuriant sun.
Circling winds fan the gale, merging with the shadowy and subtle.
Sun-lads blend the pearl, illuminating the central compass.
Soaring luminance through a hundred realms, the two qi unite and part.
The Dao’s secrecy in Jade Perfection—
his name is Profound Pool,
hand wielding the long halberd, waist girdled with jade tassels.
Left authority, right balance—cinnabar serpent and mysterious tortoise.
Bestowing deliverance upon me, returning together to Upper Clarity.

**Third: Upper Origin’s Jade Heaven Grand Dao, Grand Void Immortal King’s Song**
Exhaling qi to form dragons, sighing qi to birth winds.
Adorning my spirit-chariot, treading the radiance to fly through space.
Sun and moon revolve and turn, intersecting without end.

Do not behold my spirit—
my spirit communes with the Void.
You ask of the Great Dao—
what form does the Dao assume?
None can truly know—
the Mud-Pill Palace’s cavernous tower.
The spirit’s canopy billows azure,
true transformation flourishes and thrives.
Nurture and refine your spirit,
lush and radiant as the twin lads.
Tossing the ringing bells, hurling fire,
crimson radiance through ninefold layers.
Circling the eight poles,
heaven’s motion in the firm and the profound.
Refining yin to extinguish malevolence,
attending the Jade Enclosure’s celestial wall.
This Dao is wondrous and subtle,
boundless fortune unending.

Above the Three Voids, within the Three Origins’ palace,
the Jade Capital Immortal King’s deliverance chant—
its sound interwoven with cavernous scriptures.
Recite it a hundred times,
your name inscribed in Upper Clarity;
recite it a thousand times,
the Three Origins descend to your court;
ten thousand recitations perfect the Dao,
ascending in flight to Upper Clarity.
Govern and align the Three Origins,
myriad spirits pay homage in your court.
Those who hear this numinous sound,
the Immortal King preserves their authenticity.
Commanding the Three Realms,
directing the thousand spirits,
forever dissolving the Earth Bureau,
the Five Offices’ examining deities.
Entering and exiting without hindrance,
village altars escort you forth and back.
Nine generations refine and transform,
souls and spirits transcend and ascend.
This is called Jade Dawn—
the Dao perfected, the utmost truth,
delivering boundless beings,
recorded in the Supreme Ultimate’s register.

There exists a secret Upper Clarity text,
revered by all heavens.
Revealed to the indolent, it sinks into the dark prison,
eternally parting from the Supreme Ultimate Elder.
The Dao declares:
This Jade Capital cavernous scripture
comprises the hidden chants of all Heavenly Thearchs
and the Three Origins’ Immortal Kings—
all are the words of the Great Brahma,
not the common speech of the world.
Its language merges with the primordial chaos,
its text heaven-born,
thus in its secret subtlety, beyond thought and detail.
Upper Clarity treasures it,
concealed in the Mysterious Metropolis’ Purple Tenuity Upper Palace,
transmitted once every forty thousand kalpas according to the Mysterious Statutes.
If a perfected one offers gold and treasures with a sincere heart,
following the Jade Capital’s transmission protocols,
pledging oaths to the Nine Thearchs,
only then is it passed on.

The Dao declares:
The Two Modes’ revolutions also have ends and beginnings.
The Seven Governors and Nine Palaces also have calamitous alignments.
Perfected Daoists also have concealments and revelations.
Those of shallow learning also suffer afflictions.
For all who share these calamities and affinities,
you must unite in heart to perform purification rites,
burn incense in the six watches,
recite the scriptures ten times,
through the power of the Jade Capital’s Great Dao’s profound secrecy—
heaven turns, earth revolves,
spirits are pacified, ghosts silenced,
blessings and virtue descend at once,
dissolving all inauspiciousness.
The Jade Capital’s cavernous scripture
universally delivers without end.

The Dao declares:
Those of shallow Daoist learning,
whose immortal rank is yet unfulfilled,
or who have not fully comprehended the Jade Capital’s practices,
failing to awaken to the Dao’s essentials,
naturally entrust their hearts to fate,
falling into the reckoning of existence.
When their destined time of extinction arrives,
their bodies pass through the Great Yin.
At the hour of their passing,
fellow students and perfected ones
perform incense rites for them,
recite the scriptures ten times,
to deliver their corporeal forms according to the method.
Then the spirit’s palace is sealed and secure,
the Mud-Pill fortress firm,
the ringing bells blaze within,
the Jade Capital enfolds its light.
The corpse refines, the po-soul vanishes,
the hun-soul ascends,
following the merit of their studies,
calculating the days to attain rebirth.
Yang fire enters the body,
restoring the decayed form,
spirit and flesh suffuse the frame,
suddenly reborn,
the turning wheel no longer confounds,
ascending to the rank of lofty immortals.

The Dao declares:
When the cycles of chen and shen reach their limit,
kalpas exhaust and fortunes decline,
you must perform purification rites,
burn incense, and recite the scriptures.
When the Yellow and Red shift their measures,
eclipses and encroachments occur,
you must perform purification rites,
burn incense, and recite the scriptures.
When seasonal qi prevail and oppress,
the heavenly stems and earthly branches clash,
you must perform purification rites,
burn incense, and recite the scriptures.
When a nation’s borders suffer flood and drought,
weapons and war arise on all sides,
you must perform purification rites,
burn incense, and recite the scriptures.
When epidemics spread,
ghosts and spirits cause harm,
you must perform purification rites,
burn incense, and recite the scriptures.
When teachers and friends pass away,
you must perform purification rites,
burn incense, and recite the scriptures.
Purification rites and scripture recitation
carry immense merit and virtue,
dissolving heavenly disasters above,
dissolving human calamities below,
preserving and extending the emperor’s life for a hundred million years,
pacifying the nation,
delivering the myriad people.
In life and death, they rely upon it—
its blessings are immeasurable,
universally delivering heaven and humanity.

The Dao declares:
Whoever possesses this scripture,
able to perform these merits for the Thearchs of Heaven and Earth and the myriad people,
reverently petitioning the Jade Capital’s Primordial August Perfected,
on the day of their vow,
resolving to perform purification rites,
burning incense,
reciting the scriptures ten times—
all are recorded in Upper Clarity,
myriad spirits attend and guard them.
Those distinguished on the right as perfected ones
become sagely lords,
Immortals of Longevity and Great Thearchs,
ministers of the royal court.
All heavens inscribe their Daoist merits,
displaying them in the Jade Capital.
Their merits and transgressions are tallied,
not a hair’s breadth lost.
The Three Origins’ Immortal Kings
also safeguard and recommend their persons.
Those who attain the Dao
truly comprehend these profound words.

*Upper Clarity Heaven’s Jade Capital Great Dao’s Hidden Speech and Numinous Chant*
Composed by the Dao Lord

**The Primordial Jade Chapters, First Scroll**

**The Eight Heavens of the East**
Vast and boundless, the void of Brahmā’s emptiness,
Jade assemblies gather in Loujing.
The Jade Luminance Emperor’s firmness,
Radiant blossoms reach Wanxu.
Brightness scatters wisdom’s silence,
Obscurity alone completes the design.
Cypress vast, extremes dispelled,
Torrents flow through lush peaks.
Veiled diligence, weariness dispelled.
Establishing and settling the profound plan.
Lofty scenes, vast and limpid,
Jade eyes rise high in Su.
Jade tablets drive away evil,
Discerning streams of Qionghu.
The Hall of Scriptures, upright and sharp,
Fierce and coarse, Yuan’s capital.
Moonlit ford congeals its radiance,
Luminous spirits pierce the pearl.

**The Eight Heavens of the South**
Jing’s luxuriance, sighing at the assembly,
Purple rhythms, Yi’s remnants.
Pouring into the pole’s resplendent flames,
Summoning the sturdy Ox.
Fierce fire turns back at its peak,
The plain Way embraces serenity.
Ancient perfected ones, primordial and empty,
Qi’s abyss, the dragon’s majesty.
Firm and stern, the magpie’s benefit,
Chariots and carriages bear their countenance.
Heaven’s wisdom rises in strength,
Dark governance calls forth the profound.
Jade nets, Jing’s fragility,
Capitals open, Du’s canopy.
Nine destinies of Shamo,
Green spades link in succession.
Ascending, traversing the celestial cycles,
Grand vastness intertwines.

**The Eight Heavens of the West**
The Dipper’s stomach, Kang’s peace,
Purple currents overflow in Lu.
Lifting the river’s crimson path,
Turning and halting, heard in Yu.
The boundless blazes brightly,
Passing through clods, supporting Luo.
Heaven’s banners, luminous essence,
Vast spirits illumine the capital.
The Emperor’s calendar, Mao’s chamber,
True Bing, the western ancestor.
Vigorous awakening, the moon’s seal,
Pools limpid, seeking sincerity.
The Dao’s rarity, reaping benefit,
Upright substance flourishes and extends.
Relying on the vast ocean’s depths,
The abyss’s power, vain and empty.
Mirror’s purity transcends all bounds,
Four caverns’ orchid storehouses.

**The Eight Heavens of the North**
Jia’s origin seeks the numinous,
Listening alone to the self’s few.
Slow teeth, the sun’s record,
Qiu’s blossoms, the net’s threads.
Fire’s flames, whirlwinds rise,
Racing omens round the times.
Life’s register, green thorns,
Auspicious talismans lie in repose.
Tuo’s multitudes, hailed and nurtured,
Joy unfurls the scene’s doors.
One pattern of jade walls,
Depending on and extending Bi’s hope.
The Winnowing Basket attends the hook’s tail,
Youthful factions hold fast.
Virtuous ones traverse the pure and numinous,
Clouds bear purple in their shift.
Wind’s prohibitions, silent transmission,
The Great Profundity’s marvels.

**The Dao Speaks:**
These are the hidden writings of the Jade Capital’s Great Dao Lord in Upper Clarity Heaven, the Jade Emperor’s secrets, the boundless sounds. The ancient script was inscribed upon the canopy of the Great Void’s Purple Tenuity Heaven, in green characters coiled and curved, a full ten feet in length. The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign of Old once transcribed this text to rectify the celestial sounds. Those who know its sounds and purify themselves to recite it shall have the myriad heavens of Upper Clarity dispatch the Three Origins’ Immortal Kings and the Jade Capital’s ten thousand perfected ones to descend and observe their persons, recording their meritorious diligence. These deeds are then memorialized to the heavens, the Four Offices stand in solemn reverence, and the Nine Palaces bow in welcome. Though the heart has yet to fully comprehend, merely reciting its words ensures the Immortal Kings’ protection, ascending in flight to the Jade Capital, roaming and feasting in Cavernous Yang, soaring to the Purple Court.

This sound is the Jade Capital Great Dao’s chapter—nothing it does not move, nothing it does not illumine, nothing it does not pacify, nothing it does not govern. The Three Origins employ it, and nothing is not divine. It is the Heavenly Perfected Supreme Emperor’s naturally perfected sound. Thus, reciting it aligns the Eight Simplicities with the light, the spirit’s radiance reflecting one’s form. Within the Mud Pill Palace, ten thousand spirits stand in array, the Great Perfected Lord of the Mysterious revealing to you the wondrous Dao.

Reciting this scripture daily sharpens hearing and brightens vision, lost hair regrows, and one naturally harmonizes with the profound. Golden perfection and jade radiance encircle your body, the spirit’s palace thrives in harmony, the myriad qi return to the true, a thousand sages descend in rosy clouds, the Dao’s ocean shines in clarity. The boundless opens to salvation, the vast profundity of the profound and mysterious.

*The Marvelous Scripture of the Numinous Treasure’s Limitless Salvation of Humankind, Upper Grade, Scroll the Second, Complete*
*Scroll the Third*

*The Chapter on Stabilizing the Eight Directions of Heaven and Earth and Securing the Nation’s Fortune*
