The Eight Heavens of the North:
The Heaven of Dark Ruins and Stirring the Obscure,
where the Thearch’s Peng and Luo attend.
The Heaven of Ultimate Cessation and Ordinary Limits,
where the Thearch’s wondrous Dharma wheel turns.
The Heaven of Boundless Luminous Clarity,
where the Thearch’s dragon head governs the mysterious.
The Heaven of Ultimate Truth and Cavernous Emptiness,
where the Thearch transcends and stabilizes the primal origin.
The Heaven of Universal Salvation and Divine Ox,
where the Thearch’s Dipper embodies true and mysterious righteousness.
The Heaven of Secret Constellations and Pivotal Subtlety,
where the Thearch’s radiance illuminates the true.
The Heaven of Ghostly Chambers and Hanging Willows,
where the Thearch’s luxuriant head bears auspicious wings.
The Heaven of Eternal Peace and Ancestral Prosperity,
where the Thearch’s profound mystery flourishes and shifts.

The Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Thearchs,
with hidden taboos and concealed names,
the Great One’s cavernous emptiness,
the natural numinous scripture.
The Great One’s hidden rhyme,
the Great One’s divine sound,
the Great One’s majesty,
the Great One’s spirit,
the Great One’s perfection,
the Great One’s taboo,
the Great One’s numen.
The Nine Palaces and Ten Directions,
transforming into the Upper Purity,
the boundless mysteries,
too profound to detail.
The scattered numinous perfected,
descend to govern heaven and humanity.
Today, in joyous celebration,
we infer and distribute the various passes,
turning misfortune into fortune,
severing worldly roots,
exiting death and entering life,
facing and worshipping the Jade Lord.
Flying through the Seven Governors,
revolving with the Grand Mystery,
offering petitions at the year’s turn,
requesting control of the Heavenly Gate.
The Eastern Dipper supports on the left,
the Western Dipper carries on the right,
the Northern Dipper pivots the central axis,
the Southern Dipper turns the mechanism,
the Central Dipper forms the heavenly canopy,
while the Great One moves within.
The Azure Thearch wields the tally,
the White Thearch holds the weapon,
the Vermilion Thearch issues commands,
the Black Thearch gathers essence,
the Yellow Thearch governs the course,
advancing ten thousand leagues ahead.

The Azure Heaven’s Direct Envoy,
brandishing the halberd and raising the banner.
The Vermilion Heaven’s Direct Envoy,
the Great One’s returning banner.
The White Heaven’s Direct Envoy,
the shield and piled corpses.
The Black Heaven’s Direct Envoy,

the great fork of the Five Fortunes.
The Five Heavenly Envoys,
with the Great One as their宗.
Commanding the celestial soldiers,
devouring demons and drinking wind,
the dark banners and whistling standards,
attacking in unison with the troops.
How dare the petty rebels of the Qiang Dao act arrogantly?
The Dipper’s pointer shifts the diviner’s board,
the Jade Chart alters its seals.
Ten thousand fortunes converge with the Thearch,
ensuring victory without misfortune,
heavenly couriers lead the way,
flying cavalry soar through the void.
Eight paths hurl fire,
the Four Heavens track traces,
protecting the state and aiding the times,
the Great One’s divine duke.
First establishing the sun and moon,
grasping the golden bell in hand,
clad in yellow armor,
riding ten flying dragons.
Unstoppable in all directions,
wind and fire surge in succession,
the Five Fortunes descend,
purple mist swirls and gathers.
Immortal clouds cover the palace,
the Three Origins command the retinue,
weapons and slaughter dispel inauspiciousness,
all consigned to the Northern Feng.
Thus, the qi of specters and demons,
concealing their forms within qi,
meeting with yin and calamity,
causing the people’s illnesses and infirmities.
They cannot hide,
as the Golden Horse post connects all.
Universally proclaimed without end,
the myriad spirits all listen,
the Three Realms and Five Thearchs,
declare to the Upper Purity.
The boundless and ultimate emptiness,
dragons transform and spirits shift,
the Great One, ancestor of the Dao,
the resource of all life.
Heaven and earth assist in completion,
the central course subtly operates,
the Great One receives the numinous,
the sun and moon fly together.
In the vastness of countless kalpas,
within the primordial chaos,
spirits are tranquil and qi congeals,
planting and establishing the Nine Palaces.
The Nine Palaces become one,
one becomes the Nine Palaces,
the Dao of nine and one,
the宗 of the Great One.
Numbers proceed and return,
true qi like a dragon,
the Great One’s arrival and governance,
the Three Origins’ laws in harmony.
Enveloping the animate and inanimate,
the Jade Capital’s exquisite intricacy,
wrapped externally by the fierce wind,
within the primordial chaos.
Above, no color of action,
below, no emptiness of inaction,
the Great One holds the reins,
solemnly attended by jade youths.
One drumbeat, then another,
becoming water, becoming wind,
one connection, then another,
the heavenly auspice points east.
For the Dao, wisdom and clarity,
all things harmonize and flourish,
the Great One enters the mysterious,
the nine qi open the heavens.
Above heaven and below heaven,
no darkness, no obscurity,
no form, no shadow,
no limit, no end.
The vast expanse of the primordial ocean,
the boundless and lightless void,
the Great One’s divine transformations,
naturally govern the cycles.
The cinnabar elixir across the nine wilds,
arranging the chessboard to record the years,
the Great One’s divine qi,
condenses into the numinous scripture.
The mysterious prophecy and jade calendar,
tiger scripts and dragon texts,
preserve and control the kalpic cycles,
ensuring heaven’s eternal existence.
The Brahmā qi pervades the net,
myriad patterns unfold,
the round mechanism flows and evolves,
the Thirty-Two Heavens.

The Nine Palaces wheel in rotation,
circling the ten directions,
the revolving star passes Shen,
the returning cycles traverse the eight gates.
The Twenty-Eight Lodges gather qi at the Upper Prime,
the Eight Sceneries merge in darkness,
qi enters the profound mystery.
Within the mystery, the Great One,
the Most High Lord,
floats by the Dipper, leans on the Northern Apex,
the Heavenly Thearch and the Curved Array.
The Nine Palaces and Ten Essences,
jade wefts and golden scriptures,
divine winds follow the chariot,
assisting the myriad immortals.
A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions,
heaven and earth share the same balance,
the One True Great Spirit.
The Most Exalted of the Great One,
ascends the Grand Stair,
opens audience with the Great Lord,
the Feathered Forest leads the way.
Drums resound, solemn tones echo,
cutting off demonic lineages,
preserving life and rooting existence,
ascending to the Upper Clarity,
entering and exiting the Three Primes,
within the Eight Darknesses,
amidst the subtlest realms.
Below, it governs the human body,
the Mud-Pill Palace and the Crimson Palace,
ordering the five qi,
circulating the myriad spirits.
Ten revolutions return the numinous,
the myriad qi unite as immortals,
the immortal Dao values life,
the Great One’s perfected beings.
Above, the eight gates open,
heaven and earth become the wheel,
sin and fortune, prohibitions and precepts,
karmic causes and conditions.
Universally received and delivered,
the dead path gives birth to the body,
the body attains rebirth,
ascending through the various heavens.
Above the various heavens,
each has its gate of life,
within are the empty and cavernous odes and songs,
the Great One’s numinous scripture,
its verses matching the lofty perfected.
---
The First, the Lower Prime’s Nine Palaces Great One Perfected Lord,
the flying sound of the void,
morning rides the yellow steed,
entering the Grand Tenuity.
Below, gazing upon the Nine Provinces,
chess-like, stars scatter.
Above, beholding the Upright Gate,
the Thearch’s sole felicity.
The Dipper’s chariot races fourfold, green mist flies,
the golden halberd’s cold light, the celestial arc hangs.
Cinnabar talismans blaze with yang, the five fortunes return,
ten thousand soldiers invincible, heaven’s virtue reverts.
Divine martial transformations shine, the year knows no famine,
the Emperor’s radiance returns, the jade-embroidered dragon robe.
The Great One descends to the Bright Hall, auspiciousness fills the suburbs,
the attendants clear the purple void, the vermilion gates overflow with light.
---
The Second, the Middle Prime’s Nine Palaces Great One Perfected Lord’s Chapter
I propel heaven’s strategy,
fortune resides in the imperial house.
The myriad states submit their lives,
the chariot’s patterns unite as one.
Resplendent, the great star,
brilliant, the purple light.
At its center, the Purple Enclosure,
below, it overlooks the Jade Chamber.
Your spirit, the Hairy Head,
your soldiers, the Flanking Ones.
The Great One joins talismans,
rides the Apex, treads the firm.
Watering horses with green hay,
greasing chariots, reinforcing boxes.
Unarrayed, yet victorious,
the Great One establishes the directions.
Golden lads bear banners,
jade maidens offer libations.
Divining the altar, pouring sincerity,
the five fortunes flow abundantly.
Prolonging our Emperor’s honor,
a hundred auspices descend from heaven.
The people sing with joy,
the times are peaceful and prosperous.
Clouds drift in azure vastness,
pearl-like dew, dark frost.
Auspicious responses fill all under heaven,
our Dao flourishes.
---
The Third, the Upper Prime’s Nine Palaces Great One Perfected Lord’s Song
I ride the refined serpent,
crowned and girded with clouds and rosy dawn.
Entering the celestial thoroughfare,
exiting to wander the imperial house.
Where the dragon banner points,
the myriad things shine with splendor.
The Great One’s qi,
joy overflows with abundant fortune.
Attending the Emperor’s hall,
the numinous radiance glows resplendent.
Reciting my jade scripture,
the Five Thearchs burn incense.
The Three Realms bow their heads,
the Queen Mother of the West passes the cup.
Phoenix diagrams by the thousands,
dragon longevity knows no end.
I journey in the blue carriage,
the eight winds come to court.
Gazing in homage to the Great One,
brocade robes and kingfisher-feathered gowns.
Altar clouds swirl fourfold,
striking stone, thunder resounds.
Offering my sweet blossoms,
a hundred yellow threads.
Heaven’s voice distant and faint,
vibrant echoes like jade chimes.
Left, I glance at the Purple Tenuity,
right, I support the Jade Pendants.
Turning the Dipper’s pivot,
ten thousand treasures fill the storehouse.
Descending fortune overflows,
harmonizing the palace and court notes.
---
Above these Three Primes,
within the Nine Palaces,
the Great One’s songs and sounds,
their tones matching the cavernous chapters.
Reciting them a hundred times,
one may avoid the three disasters.
Reciting them a thousand times,
the Great One protects and welcomes.
Ten thousand recitations, the Dao is complete,
one merges into the great void.
Knowing where the One abides,
one ascends as an immortal elder.
Hearing the numinous sound,
demons and ghosts vanish in form.
Commanding and controlling earth spirits,
attendants escort and receive.
Drawn from the earth’s gates,
the five sufferings and eight hardships.
Worldly gains and promotions,
eternally departing the Three Offices.
One’s name is recorded by the Great One,
arrayed to attend the imperial chariot.
This is called the immeasurable,
universal deliverance without end.
There is a secret celestial pattern,
revered by all heavens.
Revealing it carelessly casts one into hell,
misfortune extends to seven generations of ancestors.
---
The Dao says: These cavernous chapters are all the celestial hymns of the Thearchs of the various heavens,
and the Three Primes, Nine Palaces,
Ten Spirits, Eight Marvels, Six Concealments, Five Perfected, Four Gates, Two Luminaries, One Prime,
the Great One’s hidden sounds,
all are the revolving jade mechanisms,
turning misfortune into fortune,
transforming calamity into blessing.
Their words lack ornate beauty,
their melodies lack florid grace,
thus they are called profound and abstruse,
difficult to fathom in detail.
Heaven’s treasures,
secretly kept in the Great One’s Three Primes Purple Palace of the Dark Capital,
transmitted once every forty thousand kalpas according to the mysterious statutes.
If there is a perfected being who offers gold and treasures,
pledges sincerity according to the ancient rules,
and swears oaths to the Ten Heavens,
only then are they entrusted with it.
---
The Dao says: When heaven and earth’s revolutions
approach an inauspicious end,
the Great One Perfected Lord transforms in response,
appearing as a divine horse with fleshly mane,
one horn, red in color,
emerging to draw water from the sea.
When the sun, moon, and five stars
are about to wane or wax,
the Great One Perfected Lord transforms in response,
appearing as a female shaman carrying a zither,
wandering the Tang marketplaces.
When the most sagely and divine beings
are about to experience fortune or misfortune,
the Great One Perfected Lord transforms in response,
appearing as a black qi traversing east and west,
thick frost clinging to trees,
great winds toppling and snapping,
whirling and pouring in alarming violence.
When lesser scholars
are about to suffer illness or injury,
the Great One Perfected Lord transforms in response,
appearing in dreams as bloody corpses, death,
weapons, slaughter, thunderous illness,
falling from cliffs, or drowning in rivers.
For all such disasters,
when observing these divine transformations,
those of the same qi should all wholeheartedly perform purification rites.
Practicing the Dao at the six hours,
reciting the scriptures ten times,
blessings and virtue will immediately descend.
If one encounters the Great One’s descent,
welcoming, meeting, and reverently inviting,
one will surely attain longevity.

The esoteric Dao of immortals manifests according to the time of encounter—observe it with good intent, do not resist its numinous power, and you shall preserve the great prosperity of the true Way. The boundless scriptures universally deliver the limitless.

The Dao declares: When lesser scholars of shallow attainment, whose immortal rank remains unfulfilled, face the destined hour of passing, and their bodies undergo the transit of the Great Yin, the Great One Perfected Lord of the Corpse descends in response, revealing divine transformations—now as white cranes flying forth, now as tortoise and serpent emerging together, now as sudden gales, the heavens and earth darkening, birds and beasts wailing in sorrow, white rainbows piercing the sun, mountains and forests altering their hues, or dreams bearing extraordinary portents. Then the Great One guards the corpse, the Three Officials record the soul, the Nine Elders seize the qi, and after one cycle of sixty days, life returns and form is restored. Fellow perfected ones, performing incense rites and reciting the scriptures ten times to deliver the corpse-form according to the method, the soul and spirit ascend directly to the Southern Palace, where, in accordance with their cultivation, they reckon the days to rebirth. Once the Wheel turns without confusion, they attain immortality.

The Dao declares: When the cycles of heaven and earth reach their end, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite the scriptures. When the stellar lodgings fall into disorder and the sun and moon lose their proper times, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite the scriptures. When the four seasons lose their order and yin and yang fall out of harmony, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite the scriptures. When barbarian tribes invade the borders and military violence erupts, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite the scriptures. When pestilence spreads and the multitudes suffer death and injury, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite the scriptures. When masters or companions pass away, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite the scriptures.

The merit of purification rites and scripture recitation is exceedingly weighty. Above, it dissolves heavenly calamities and safeguards the emperor; below, it wards off poisonous harm and delivers the multitudes. In life and death, all rely upon it—its blessings are beyond measure. Thus it is called boundless, universally delivering heaven and humanity.

The Dao declares: Whoever possesses this scripture and understands the Way of the Great One’s divine transformations to protect the state and avert warfare, and performs these meritorious deeds for the lord of heaven and earth and the multitudes—on the day of calamity, if they resolve to perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures ten times, all the heavens record their names, ten thousand spirits attend and guard them, and those distinguished as perfected ones shall surely become ministers of the Golden Gates of the Sage Lord. The heavens record the merits and transgressions of people without the slightest error. The great deities of the Nine Palaces of Heaven also protect and recommend you. Those who attain the Dao shall thoroughly comprehend these profound words.

*The Boundless Sounds of the Great Brahma’s Hidden Speech in the Heavens*
*The Jade Chapters of the Great One’s Divine Transformations to Protect the State and Avert Warfare*
*The Seven Heavens of the East*

The Auspicious Luo holds fast, the Deluded Leak bestows with Yi.
Zhang and Tuo ford the Jiang, Bing and Geng part ways.
The Qian’s radiance gathers in the hollow, the Purple Decree issues from the few.
Zan and Hua dwell in the cave of profit, Li and Zhou abide by the deep and fitting.
Yue and Dan turn back in multitude, Han and Si govern the Dark River.
Profound stillness, mysterious and serene—verdant light illumines the net.

*The Seven Heavens of the South*
Wei and Dan name the path, Guan and Ding lodge in Yan and Lu.
The Emperor’s bond flows vast, Mian and Duo flourish in Ying and Yu.
The whirlwind fills the soaring journey, subtle qi drifts as the White Lone.
The Dao scatters in the Upper Capital, towering peaks survey Su.
Changyang’s robust domain, Yao’s brilliance spreads in radiance.
Sound stabilizes the Dharma’s aid, Heavenly Lin glows in crimson lushness.
Governance untangles the threads, the Nine Perfected howl the chart.

*The Seven Heavens of the West*
Lan and Tao serve Shang, Juan and Chi hope for the sun.
Scattered rates roam the Ghost Capital, Xun and Hou receive the talisman.
Lang and Ze chill the islet, Dou and Si ascend in lofty Su.
Right discernment, the Yi’s straightness—immortals drift in misty damp.
Trigrams expound in Lang’s wanderings, marvels and caverns assist the August.
Vast the primal scene’s splendor, Ghost Spring conceals the severed.
Xian and Niang journey to the desert, uniting spirits in lush darkness.

*The Seven Heavens of the North*
Fish and Lu settle the sea, Fu and Qian flourish in Hua.
Peaceful skin, the Xian’s mystery—wisdom vast as immortal rosy clouds.
Chaos Primordial’s carefree bonds, light connects the obscure and fine.
Jade tablets summon spirits in awe, writings array the trembling awn.
The Black Beast sighs at Yuan, the Red Chariot races the Dragon’s standard.
The Longevity Mirror treasures the removal, Zhi and Fang proclaim the plan.
Awakening enriches the radiant clouds, divine jade offers the ring.

The Dao speaks: The Divine Transformations of the Great One course through the qi of the Twenty-Eight Heavens, and the heavenly qi spreads and flows through the Nine Palaces. These are the great Brahma’s hidden speech within the Nine Palaces of the Heavens—boundless words, whose ancient script was carved upon the azure walls of the Vermilion Phoenix Hall in the Grand Tenuity. The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign of Old inscribed their text to establish the correct intonation. Those who know these sounds and can purify themselves to recite them shall have all the heavens dispatch flying heavenly spirit-kings to descend and observe their person, record their meritorious diligence, and report it above to the heavens. The myriad spirits shall pay homage in audience, the earth spirits shall attend at the gates, and great merit shall be achieved at the Three Origins, ensuring the Great One’s protection and recommendation. When the Dao is complete and attained, one may wander the Three Realms and ascend into the Golden Gates. These sounds repel all, exorcise all, deliver all, and accomplish all—they are the Great One’s celestial and spontaneous sounds.

Thus, to recite them:
Summons flying heavens to descend and observe, the Great One responds from afar, the myriad spirits pay homage in audience, the Three Realms attend at the carriage. Hosts of malevolent spirits bow their heads, ghostly essences vanish of themselves, jade-like tones resound, the ten directions grow solemn and clear. The heavenly wheel shines on high, the myriad images hang in luminous clarity. The sea’s light is deep and limpid, the mountain caverns congeal in mist. The myriad states tremble in submission, prostrating before the Emperor. The martial Dao prevails of itself, divine valor arises naturally. Profound wisdom illumines the pure, the vast and mysterious abides in mystery.

*The Marvelous Scripture of the Numinous Treasure, the Upper Grade for Delivering All Beings, Chapter Six Concludes*
*Chapter Seven*

**Chapter on Manifesting Auspicious Signs and Responses**

The Dao spoke: Long ago in the Great Cinnabar Heaven, within the Mysterious Yang’s secluded and desolate Crimson Essence Realm, the Primordial Beginning received the *Upper Scripture on Manifesting Auspicious Signs and Responses for Delivering All Beings*. When the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning was to expound this scripture, he circumambulated ten times to summon the ten directions, then ascended his seat. Manifesting transformation spirits, lords of auspicious numina, perfected ones of talismanic response, and countless hosts arrived borne upon the void. They drifted upon the purple clouds of qi, riding jade carriages and latticed chariots, canopies of blossoms casting shade, gold and azure radiance intermingling, flying clouds dense and lush, illuminating the vast expanse.

For nine days and nine nights, the celestial net’s wheel turned, felicitous mists soared aloft, the Seven Luminaries congealed their splendor, earthly spirits emitted omens, the Three Origins grew solemn, the Four Qi clarified, the jeweled towers of the heavens’ palaces and jasper pavilions were suffused with auspicious glow, all revealing the Eight Assemblies’ true writ, resplendent within the Upper Palace, without a single discordant hue. The assembled perfected ones attended the seat as the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning sat in mystery upon a floating five-colored mountain of treasure.

When the scripture was expounded once, the host of sages throughout the heavens simultaneously proclaimed its excellence, and suddenly a cinnabar phoenix and yellow dragon came to announce universal peace. When expounded twice, the mountains and rivers of the great earth yielded forth the Seven Treasures. When expounded thrice, the distant shadows of yin blossoms formed luminous layered wheels. When expounded four times, the Celestial Market and Supreme Subtlety constellations manifested auspicious stars. When expounded five times, jade blossoms filled the void, felicitous clouds scattered in the four directions. When expounded six times, sweet dew congealed into pearls, moistening all things. When expounded seven times, city walls and towers, terraces and observatories sprouted jade mushrooms in profusion. When expounded eight times, numinous scriptures unfolded, true talismans descended. When expounded nine times, the heavens bestowed the Mysterious Chart, the emperor received the precious register. When expounded ten times, the people enjoyed well-being, universally receiving a hundred blessings; grasses and trees, birds and insects all equally attained the supreme transformation.

At that time, every man and woman in the land, without exception, turned their hearts in devotion, beholding the mysterious auspices, their signs aligning with the sagely era. Each received protection and deliverance, all attaining longevity. The Dao spoke: When the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning expounded the scripture once, the Vast and Boundless Hosts of Immortal-Raising Spirits from the eastern direction arrived borne upon the void. When expounded twice, the Vast and Boundless Crimson Pool Spirits from the southern direction, with their countless hosts, arrived borne upon the void. When expounded thrice, the Vast and Boundless Luminous Radiance Spirits from the western direction, with their countless hosts, arrived borne upon the void. When expounded four times, the Vast and Boundless Twin Gates Spirits from the northern direction, with their countless hosts, arrived borne upon the void. When expounded five times, the Vast and Boundless Azure Cloud Spirits from the northeastern direction, with their countless hosts, arrived borne upon the void. When expounded six times, the Vast and Boundless Yellow Earth Spirits from the southeastern direction, with their countless hosts, arrived borne upon the void. When expounded seven times, the Vast and Boundless Central August Spirits from the southwestern direction, with their countless hosts, arrived borne upon the void. When expounded eight times, the Vast and Boundless Heavenly Origin Spirits from the northwestern direction, with their countless hosts, arrived borne upon the void. When expounded nine times, the Vast and Boundless Mysterious Void Spirits from the upper direction, with their countless hosts, arrived borne upon the void. When expounded ten times, the Vast and Boundless Abyssal Depth Spirits from the lower direction, with their countless hosts, arrived borne upon the void.

When the ten circumambulations were complete, the Vast and Boundless Spirits of Manifest Auspicious Signs and Responses from the ten directions arrived simultaneously. Every man and woman in the land said to one another: “We once heard that when the Five Chapters first emerged, the Three Realms were first divided, the Celestial Worthy and the emperor descended to be born among the heavens, numinous spirits announced auspices, and transformations unfolded therein. Now we hear the Primordial Beginning expounding the origins of heaven and earth, all of which return to the emperor. The emperor’s virtue matches heaven and earth; the Dao flourishes, virtue expands, spirit is complete, qi is replete. The Five Agents’ supreme essences each manifest their mysterious wonders, spontaneously generating marvels to proclaim to the emperor as auspicious signs and responses, principles encompassing the profound and mysterious.”

Their hearts turned in devotion, those who came were like the tide’s appointed return or the wind’s timely signal—countless hosts so vast that half the land sank beneath their weight, an irresistible force. Thereupon the Primordial Beginning emitted a great radiance, now hidden, now revealed, beyond measure. The treasure mountain upon which he rode transformed into a single pearl, vast as the bright moon, suspended in the great void ten thousand leagues above the earth. The Primordial Beginning ascended, leading the perfected ones of the Nine Heavens, the exalted sages, the transcendent immortals of wondrous practice, the Vast and Boundless Spirits of Auspicious Response from the ten directions, and their countless hosts—all entered the pearl. The heavenly beings gazed upward, seeing only a shimmering light entering through the pearl’s mouth. Once within, their whereabouts were unknown. The people of the land dispersed, the earth returned to levelness, the uneven sinking no more.

Within the pearl, the Primordial Beginning completed the full exposition of the scripture. The assembled perfected ones oversaw the deliverance and transmitted it to me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. The ritual matters concluded, the heavens’ hosts returned to their stations. In an instant, all was silent, without lingering resonance. At that time, the heavenly beings who encountered the scriptural Dharma were universally delivered, preserving their allotted years without harm. The entire land turned in devotion, all cultivating good hearts—neither reckless nor transgressive, neither partisan nor biased, neither careless nor flattering, neither indulgent nor arrogant, neither negligent nor deceitful. Their hearts practiced reverence and yielding, their mouths spoke no frivolous words. They were uniformly compassionate and loving, transforming even strangers into kin. The land was at peace, the people prosperous, all rejoicing in great tranquility.

When the scripture first emerged as teaching, the entire land followed the Dao. Those who in advance had held sincere hearts, revered and honored it, all attained deliverance across the ages. The Dao spoke: What the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning expounded in the scripture are all the primordial qi of the Mysterious and Numinous, the inner names of the Numinous Treasure, the hidden rhymes of sound—also the concealed names of the perfected ones of descending auspicious talismans and transcendent immortals, not the common words of the world. The exalted sages who have already attained perfection, who fathom the mysterious and investigate the subtle, can fully grasp its chapters. Reciting it ten times, the heavens descend auspices, the myriad emperors bestow talismans, rivers and seas grow still, mountains and peaks conceal their clouds, earthly omens manifest clearly, lofty spirits illuminate the hidden, and demonic hosts bind their forms.

Ghostly spirits vanish in clarity, the dead revive from corpses, and white bones become human. For those of utmost learning, reciting it ten times brings the Five Emperors to bestow auspices, the Three Realms to pledge alliance, manifest responses of utmost benevolence, and the exalted Dao to be proclaimed. The reason for this is that heaven and earth emit auspiciousness, their signs aligning with the perfected and sacred—this is the qi of auspices. Its qi is wondrous and subtle, conceivable yet unattainable, discussable yet unknowable; the myriad things transform through it, and the Five Phases generate marvels. When people resonate with its essence, they do not become withered corpses. To recite this chapter lightly brings calamity upon oneself; to revere and honor it brings prosperity to one’s household. Generation after generation flourishes, bound to good karmic causes; ten thousand disasters do not approach, and divine companions guard the gate. This scripture is exalted and wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital; it delivers countless beings and is the root of the myriad Dao. Its towering greatness and virtue are beyond measure.

The Dao spoke: Those who recite this scripture ten times with focused devotion move the Supreme Mystery, gathering auspicious signs; wondrous qi congeals, and the myriad things transform into radiance. It aids the sovereign above, ensuring the Dao’s fortune is boundless and preserving it for a hundred million years. Those who diligently study this scripture, fulfilling their merit and perfecting their virtue, all attain divine transcendence, ascending to the Golden Gates and roaming the Jade Capital. For scholars of the highest learning who cultivate and recite this scripture, celestial auspices shine forth, and blessings extend to the entire region. Their names are submitted to the celestial bureaus and recorded in the Southern Palace. When the people of the world recite it, magic mushrooms sprout, pools well with sweet springs, and the qi of the Dao descends and gathers. Refining and ingesting its essence, they extend their years and lengthen their lives, wandering the Five Peaks and attaining the rank of earthbound transcendent.

This scripture is subtle and wondrous, its blessings boundless; all celestial and human beings receive its grace, and immeasurable fortune extends to the living and the dead. Treasured by the heavens, it is not transmitted to the lower world. Only the most devoted offer gold and treasures, pledging their hearts to heaven before passing it on. To leak or slight it lightly brings misfortune to the Seven Mysteries and endless servitude to the ghostly officials. The Five Emperors assign twelve jade lads and twelve jade maidens each to attend the scripture, safeguarding its precious chapters and protecting the body of the one who receives it.

The Dao spoke: During the long fast of the first month, recite and chant this scripture to harmonize the celestial qi, make grasses and trees flourish, ensure no blight afflicts beings, and bring all treasures to fruition. During the long fast of the seventh month, recite and chant this scripture to summon the gods of the Nine Heavens, make mountains and peaks conceive essence, and give birth to worthy ones who yearn for the Dao and study transcendence. During the long fast of the tenth month, recite and chant this scripture to open the paths of heaven and earth, seal mountains to invoke their spirits, and bring talismanic auspices to gather in the imperial court, eternally stabilizing all directions and bringing the people to acclaim great peace. On the days of the eight solar terms, recite and chant this scripture to make the five grains flourish abundantly and rare blossoms present auspices. On the last day of the month, recite and chant this scripture to obtain cinnabar and azure magic mushrooms, which deliver one’s body without undergoing trials. One’s body shines with light, jade radiance gleams, feathered canopies and banners welcome them, and the myriad spirits pay homage. Their names are inscribed in the heavens above. When merit is fulfilled and virtue perfected, they ascend to the Supreme Clarity.

The Dao spoke: On the days of practicing the Dao, one should bathe in fragrant waters, enter the chamber in purification, face east, and knock the teeth thirty-two times to reach the thirty-two heavens above. Bow thirty-two times in the heart, close the eyes, and silently visualize oneself seated amidst clouds of azure, crimson, and vermilion qi, the interior and exterior shrouded in mist. A green dragon, white tiger, vermilion bird, dark warrior, lion, and white crane array themselves to the left and right. The sun and moon illuminate brightly, filling the chamber with brilliance. A circular image appears above the neck, its light shining in all directions—all this must be vividly clear. The secret incantation says:

*"Supreme Mystery of the Primordial, Most High Dao Lord, summon forth from within this servant’s body the thirty-five Merit Officers, the attendants of the left and right, the jade lads who tend incense, the jade maidens who transmit words, the talismanic attendants of the Five Emperors, and the incense officials of the appointed day—thirty-two each—to open and convey these words. Today is an auspicious day, a long fast in the pure hall, cultivating the supreme scripture to deliver countless beings. May these words ascend directly to the Primordial Supreme Lord of the Thirty-Two Heavens before the Celestial Worthy’s throne."*

Afterward, draw in qi thirty-two times and recite the scripture facing east.

The Primordial *Dongxuan Lingbao* Original Chapter, Supreme Grade, manifests auspicious signs and responses, transforming and delivering beings. Its subtle and hidden rhymes align with spontaneity. The primordial chaos flows with essence, refining the embryo to form transcendent beings. Wondrous light and radiance generate crimson script; interwoven and structured, auspicious mists entwine. Planting the root of the Mystery, it shines brilliantly across the heavens. Cinnabar light and jade script universally gather the Five Spirits, vast and boundless, floating echoes in the profound stillness. The true palace’s imperial qi, crimson and green, generates sound, flowing through the Nine Heavens; water and fire soar. This is the precious auspice, the dwelling of primordial unity. The Seven Treasures’ Mysterious Terrace, the Supreme Palace of the Purple Tenuity, ascends to the Great Non-Being, the lofty Clarity of Yu Shan. Grasping the primordial mechanism, towering and supreme, it governs yin and yang, creating and completing all things. Its pattern spans the void and silence, its principles subtle and profoundly hidden. It dwells in the Great Net, gazing afar across the ten directions. Within it resides the true one of the Primordial Great Transformation; within it resides the Lord of the Seven Transformations of the Supreme Clarity; within it resides the Exalted One who manifests celestial auspices; within it resides the perfected one who aligns with the imperial fortune; within it reside the gods who revolve the celestial net, stabilize the earthly records, traverse the empty realms, and establish the supreme pole. They collectively review the charts and records, the boundless transformed bodies. Today, at this auspicious gathering, the myriad spirits attend the court.

The King of Infinite Benevolent Virtue of the Eastern Direction, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who Delivers Countless Beings.
The King of Infinite Illuminating Virtue of the Southern Direction, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who Delivers Countless Beings.
The King of Infinite Transformative Virtue of the Western Direction, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who Delivers Countless Beings.
The King of Infinite Wise Virtue of the Northern Direction, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who Delivers Countless Beings.
The King of Infinite Gentle Virtue of the Northeast, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who Delivers Countless Beings.
The King of Infinite Upright Virtue of the Southeast, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who Delivers Countless Beings.
The King of Infinite Literary Virtue of the Southwest, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who Delivers Countless Beings.

The King of Infinite Pure Virtue of the Northwest, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who Delivers Countless Beings.
The King of Infinite Mysterious Virtue of the Upper Direction, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who Delivers Countless Beings.
The King of Infinite Profound Virtue of the Lower Direction, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who Delivers Countless Beings.
The Divine King of Manifest Auspicious Signs and Responses of the Ten Directions, the Great Divine One of Eternal Life who Delivers the World in Infinite Measure.

Together they ride upon crimson mist, jade chariots and jasper carriages, beneath purple canopies and dragon banners, drawn by celestial deer and flanked by spirit phoenixes and *zouyu*. They bear the standards of Mystic Radiance and the Three Pristine Banners. To their left stand the Flying Heavenly Generals; to their right follow the Flowing Gold Fire Bells. Heavenly horses and *qilin* leap and prance, warding off evil, while tenfold blossoms mark their path, and five attendants flank their shafts. Myriad chariots and ten thousand riders float through the void to arrive. Divine light shines in return, summoning immortals and gathering perfected beings.

From the Tortoise Terrace’s canonical records, the Kunlun’s *Langfeng*, the Mystic Bureau’s sovereigns, and the Auspicious Divine Ones of Signs—all holding tablets and attending to writs—proceed together to the Jade Court. As their radiance manifests, they summon and gather the hosts of heaven. Universally they proclaim to the divine realms and sacred isles within the world’s bounds, to the Eight Seas and Four Rivers, the famous mountains and great streams, the grotto-heavens and palatial precincts, the Twelve Spirit Sources, the earthly bureaus and departments, the Yellow Gates and Nine Palaces: swiftly spread the Dao’s transformation, initiate auspicious omens, and let no obstruction hinder the advent of primordial signs.

The True Kings receive the talismans, and their blessings shade the people below. Cold and heat follow their seasons, and the Three Luminaries shine forever. No disasters or plagues afflict beings; the hundred grains flourish abundantly. Transformation extends to the four barbarians; benevolence reaches even insects. All follow their nature in carefree ease, rejoicing in great peace. Through the turning of kalpas, all together attain flight as immortals. Forever they sever the trials of the Six Heavens’ demons, tread the void aloft, and wander in feast through the Great Darkness.

In the Heaven of Great Darkness, the Celestial Emperor of Literary Prosperity presides over the ultimate realm of the Dao’s pure practices.

**The Eight Heavens of the Eastern Direction:**
The Heaven of Responding Virtue and Treasured Mystery, where the Emperor Tai Jing rules the Ancestral Gate.
The Heaven of Manifest Spirit and Reverent Radiance, where Emperor Bo Gong Rong presides.
The Heaven of Moving Blessings and Dark Responses, where Emperor Hou Yuan Liu Chang governs.
The Heaven of Round Brightness and Transformative Qi, where Emperor Zhao Lin Yong Xian rules.
The Heaven of Opening Light and Wondrous Perfection, where Emperor He Ji Chong presides.
The Heaven of Immortal Crossing and Benevolent Reception, where Emperor Zheng Guang Tong Sheng governs.
The Heaven of August Chapters and Broad Aspirations, where Emperor Hao Ji Gao Qing rules.
The Heaven of Mystic Transformation and Overflowing Blessing, where Emperor Tan Cheng Li Gong presides.

**The Eight Heavens of the Southern Direction:**
The Heaven of Revering Culture and Kind Hearing, where Emperor Fu Jian Lang rules.
The Heaven of Extending Great Merit, where Emperor Zhu Qiu Wen presides.
The Heaven of Ritual Reverence and Proclaiming Mystery, where Emperor Lian Zui Zhao Dun governs.
The Heaven of Grand Splendor and Radiant Spirit, where Emperor Jiang Xian Fei Yong rules.
The Heaven of Lofty Emptiness and Bright Kindness, where Emperor Dong Pu Lin presides.
