The Heaven of the Lord’s Benevolence Spreading Kindness, where Emperor Jing Hui Wan Rong rules.
The Heaven of Accomplishing Transformations through Accumulation, where Emperor Qiong Jing Zi presides.

**The Eight Heavens of the Western Direction:**
The Heaven of Nurturing Kings and Honoring Change, where Emperor Fang Jian Jing Kang rules.
The Heaven of Upright Meaning and Perfect Wonder, where Emperor Hong Fei Yi Liang presides.
The Heaven of Profound Trust and Flourishing Teachings, where Emperor Hun Zhi Bei Geng governs.
The Heaven of Achieving Sensitivity and Bestowing Shared Blessings, where Emperor Dao Chang Hua Yan rules.
The Heaven of Subtle Frugality and Primordial Radiance, where Emperor Luan Hong Yuan Chong presides.
The Heaven of Mystic Supervision and Flowing Essence, where Emperor Zhao Que Shan Xi governs.
The Heaven of Primordial Sagehood and Ranking Immortals, where Emperor Zhuo Bao Lin rules.
The Heaven of Auspicious Adornment and Bright Signs, where Emperor Gong Meng Bi Yuan presides.

**The Eight Heavens of the Northern Direction:**
The Heaven of the Dharma Sea’s Dragon Radiance and Great Treasure, where Emperor Kun Luo Ju rules.
The Heaven of Empty Cavern and Secret Brilliance, where Emperor Jue Shen Ji presides.
The Heaven of Honoring the Origin and Wondrous Light, where Emperor Hao Cong Fu Chang governs.
The Heaven of Merging and Blending Abundant Qi, where Emperor Shou Cang Liu Xuan rules.
The Heaven of Vast Seal and Conjoined Wheels, where Emperor Yang Qi Bu An presides.
The Heaven of Supreme Wonder and Protecting the World, where Emperor Ji Zhi Yue Chu governs.
The Heaven of Passing through Changes and Preserving the Dao, where Emperor Tu Si Qian Men rules.
The Heaven of Broad Life and August Observance, where Emperor He Fu Zhao Yan presides.

The Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Emperors—all the heavens’ hidden taboos, the heavens’ concealed names. Within the heavens’ empty caverns, the natural numinous chapters; the heavens’ hidden melodies, the Great Cavern’s sounds. The honored ones of the Numinous Treasure, the divine ones of auspicious response, who open blessings and initiate fortune, the spirits of blended qi.

Through nine revolutions and ten traversals, they ascend the void and tread the empty sky. Divine, wondrous, and profoundly mysterious, they overshadow the Two Modes. Scattering cinnabar blossoms, they manifest responses to heaven and humanity. Today, all together rejoice in the ultimate transformation, moved by the heavens’ influences. Floating upon the purple clouds of dawn, they dance in return within the cloudy encampments. Transcending the weak abyss, jade radiance gleams upon the numinous ford. Immortals and sages bestow talismans; they receive the writs at the Emperor’s Gate.

The Eastern Dipper moves the spirits; the Western Dipper refines the essence. The Northern Dipper congeals and binds; the Southern Dipper spreads the numinous. The Central Dipper gathers qi, and auspicious signs transform and give birth.

The Azure Heaven commands the perfected; the White Heaven elevates the immortals. The Mystic Heaven determines the records; the Vermilion Heaven summons the immortals. The Yellow Heaven celebrates the assembly, together opening the Primordial Pass.

The Divine King of Vast Clouds oversees the warp and weft of scriptures. The Divine King of Eternal Fire blazes upward in flowing smoke. The Divine King of Prosperous Opening governs the seven passes. The Divine King of *Yudan* refines the eight mights. The Divine King of Central Yellow monitors the perfected and corrects transgressions.

The Five Heavenly High Perfected, honored ones of myriad transformations, govern the heavens’ administration and turn the jade pivot. Riding dragons and driving clouds, they fly through the Grand Tenuity. Illuminating and dispelling baleful qi, the upright qi returns in unison.

The Supreme Thearch descends the charts; the cinnabar radiance of the flaming landscape blazes. The Great Lord receives the decree, his majesty ruling the ten directions. All evil is shattered and destroyed; the Dao’s transformation spreads and extends. Auspicious signs arrive; the realms become clear and pure. The Five Phases follow their courses; the imperial Dao shines forever. Should any dare to act with violence and disorder, they shall be bound and delivered to the Lady of Azure.

The Three Primes’ ranked bureaus determine crimes and impose severe punishments. The Nine Heavens and Eight Poles examine and assess without cease. The human sovereign receives blessings; the state is secure and the people prosperous. The altars of soil and grain endure forever, through kalpas without end. They enjoy great peace, flourishing together with the Dao. Spirits fly to the Jade Capital, feasting and wandering in the Upper Palaces.

Proclaiming to the myriad spirits, universally announcing without end, the Three Realms’ Five Thearchs present their memorials to the lofty vault. The great destiny becomes clear and vast, initiating the ultimate cinnabar radiance. Establishing the heavens, they flow through the transformations of yin and yang. Above, the Three Qi ascend; below, the hundred constants transform. The Primordial Cavern’s profound mysteries, the flying standards’ firm strength.

The Mystic Calendar completes its cycles, through the Six Turbidities and Nine Purities. The Great Desert broods in obscurity, formless and shapeless. In the chaos of primordial chaos and the Yellow Mystery, the numinous sound scatters and arises. It unfolds my supreme transformation, vast and naturally operating.

The fiery essence fans the whirlwind, stirring the celestial abyss. Jade tablets and vermilion slips, the Jade Register’s true script. It gathers and summons the primordial qi, commanding the myriad spirits. The celestial writings spread in array, the great Dharma expands and extends.

Following the kalpas, it unfolds the Great Simplicity’s wondrous chapters. Bestowing the chart upon the Divine Empyrean, it eternally guards the Jasper Palace. The numbers align with the auspicious convergence, the felicitous destiny flowing and transmitting. Universally delivering all beings, together they return to the Three Origins.

The supreme teaching is clear and luminous, its merit equaling the Highest Mystery. Within the Mystic, auspicious omens respond to the Perfected. The people rejoice in well-being, the lands remain perpetually tranquil. Radiance concealed and effulgence hidden, it pacifies and abides endlessly.

Preserving the essence of the Mystic Flower, refining the embryo in purple mist. Riding the rosy clouds and drifting light, the form ascends as a flying immortal. Through a thousand transformations and myriad changes, it unites with qi to attain the true. Within the true, the supreme spirit, the Lord of the Myriad Ways.

Rightfully governing the heavens and wielding the supreme pole, uniquely revered through kalpas unnumbered. Named the Primordial Beginning, this is my own body. The Three Realms’ administrative offices, governing the roots of life. Above, roaming the Jade Void, the spirit soars to the Great Nothingness.

Within the Round Net, amid the Primal Yellow, the Profound Abyss is colorless. The Eight Poles’ numinous gates. Swiftly summoning the great demons, convening at the Mystic Capital. Ten revolutions of the returning wind, blessings extend to the hidden and dark.

The Dao of Heaven descends auspiciousness, delivering beings without measure. Above, opening the Gate of Life, the scripture enters the Flying Wheel. Examining and assessing the charts and registers, the causes of good and evil. All receive deliverance and salvation, the dead souls gain new bodies.

Having attained rebirth, they ascend to memorialize the Purple Purity. Above the Purple Purity, each possesses its Mystic Sound. Within it, the manifest auspicious omens and responsive chapters, the Three Simplicities’ Jade Stanzas, their words equaling the Highest Perfected.

**First: The Flying Immortal’s Chant of the Primordial Beginning Establishing the Pole**
Vast and distant, beholding the Great Nothingness,
All heavens revere the Void Sovereign.
Since the Dragon Han has passed,
In darkness, it measures the extended well-being.
Heaven and earth return to primordial chaos,
The Eight Enclosures conceal their essence and light.
The Three Realms all dissolve and vanish,
Living spirits thus become faint and indistinct.
Only the realm of the Ultimate Dao remains,
Where all existence suffers no premature harm.
Crimson light unfolds the Mystic Chart,
True scriptures scatter in the ten directions.
Wondrous qi descends to the Pure and Subtle,
The Flying Wheel binds the Primal Net.
The Numinous Treasure nurtures the Three Luminaries,
Myriad transformations again flourish and manifest.
Mystic talismans guard the Five Mountains,
The world’s mandate endures without end.
The Supreme Sage sits in the Round Net,
Ever dwelling in the Hall of Great Fortune.
The orthodox and imperial Dao of the Pole,
Is forever entrusted to the Perfected King.

**Second: The Great Demon’s Hymn of Praise, Expounding the Scripture’s Illuminating Influence**
Resplendent, the Mystic Net,
Circulating through the Eight Voids.
The wheels turn through all heavens,
Governing and convening at the Mystic Capital.
Majestic, the myriad spirits,
Encircling and attending the Emperor’s abode.
The Supreme Sage magnifies the supreme teaching,
The Yang-Permeating Net’s scriptures.
Ten transgressions unfold the numinous chapters,
All beings are illuminated and revived.
The wondrous Dao knows no limit,
A myriad heavens conceal a single pearl.
The immortals and Perfected rejoice without end,
The Jade Void receives the Mystic Talisman.
Crimson scriptures blaze in the azure empyrean,
Auspicious mists fill the floating void.
The great earth brings forth treasures and rarities,
The soaring trees bear jade pendants.
Phoenixes and unicorns descend to the world,
Jade mushrooms flourish in courtyard corners.
Through ten thousand kalpas, they attain peace,
The Mystic Transformation henceforth spreads.

**Third: The Perfected’s Proclamation of Manifest Auspicious Omens**
The Primordial Beginning, the Void Sovereign,
Loftily dwelling in the Jade Purity.
Giving birth to the Three Luminaries,
Establishing the heavens’ root.
To the right, arrayed in Mystic Splendor,
To the left, revolving the Round Brightness.
Dividing qi to descend to the Middle Heaven,
The Dipper and Pole Star are the supreme lords.
Uprightly seated, facing the Eight Directions,
Below, responding to the human sovereign.
If the human sovereign follows the Dao of Heaven,
Auspicious omens arise with virtue.
The earth yields the Register of Longevity,
Heaven bestows the Mystic Luminous Script.
Mountains and rivers float with refined qi,
Precious omens gather in the royal court.
The people suffer no disasters or pestilence,
The five grains ensure abundant harvests.
Clearly proclaiming the Supreme Lord’s decree,
All heavens are made to hear.
All beings rejoice and delight,
Bowing their heads to bear the Mystic Grace.

Above the Three Realms, amid the flying void,
The true demons’ song,
Its sound equaling the cavernous stanzas.
Reciting it a hundred times,
The name is recorded in the Southern Palace.
Reciting it a thousand times,
The true demons protect and welcome.
Ten thousand recitations, the Dao is complete,
Ascending to the Great Void,
Passing beyond the Three Realms,
Attaining the rank of Immortal Duke.
Those who hear the numinous sound,
Heavenly omens descend upon their bodies.
Demon kings revere their forms,
Commanding and restraining earthly deities.
Attending and escorting, sending and receiving,
They extricate them from the earthly gates.
The Five Sufferings and Eight Difficulties,
Seven generations of ancestors ascend and migrate,
Forever departing the Dark Palace,
Their souls cross the Vermilion Mound,
Undergoing refinement and rebirth.

This is called the immeasurable,
Universally delivering without end.
There are secret celestial writings,
Revered by all heavens.
Those who leak or profane them fall into hell,
Bringing calamity to their seven generations of ancestors.

The Dao says: These two chapters are the most numinous and hidden sounds of the Heavenly Emperors of all heavens. The qi of the Supreme Origin’s Great Harmony and Myriad Blessings, serving as omens and auspicious signs, are manifestly proclaimed to the sovereign. In humans, they become loyal, virtuous, and wise; in things, they become precious jades and wondrous marvels; among birds and beasts, they become unicorns, phoenixes, tortoises, and dragons; on earth, they become the five mushrooms, rare trees, precious stones, and the mountains and rivers’ auspices; in heaven, they become auspicious clouds, luminous stars, and sweet dew. When the human sovereign possesses the Dao, omens respond to the virtue he practices.

All are the words of the Great Brahma,
Not the common speech of the world.
Their words lack ornate beauty,
Their melodies lack florid embellishment,
Thus they are called profound and obscure,
Difficult to fathom in detail.
Heaven treasures them,
Secretly kept in the Divine Empyrean’s Jade Purity, the Jade Treasury’s Eastern Repository.
When the numbers align with the ren-chen day,
The destiny responds and transmits them below.
If a Perfected One offers gold and treasures with a sincere heart,
Following the old protocols to pledge alliance with the Three Heavens,
Only then are they bestowed.

The Dao says: When one practices benevolent virtue,
Heaven manifests auspicious omens to reward the sovereign.
When one commits the transgressions of an evil age,
Heaven displays calamities and anomalies to warn the people.
Thus, when the cycles of heaven and earth reach their end,
When the sun, moon, and five planets wane and wax,
When the sagely and divine persons prosper or decline,
When the lesser scholars suffer illness and harm—
In all such disasters,
Those of the same qi should unite in heart to perform purification rites,
Burn incense in the six watches,
Recite the scriptures ten times.
Auspicious omens will immediately descend,
Dispelling all inauspiciousness.

The scriptures of boundless measure deliver all beings without end.

The Dao says: When lesser scholars of shallow attainment face the destined end of their mortal span, their bodies passing through the Great Yin, at the moment of their passing, fellow practitioners of the Dao should burn incense and recite the scriptures ten times to properly conduct the departed form. Subtle and auspicious qi will silently descend upon the body, and the hun-soul will ascend directly to the Southern Palace, where, according to the merit of their studies, they will be reborn after a calculated number of days. Once the Wheel of Rebirth is no longer a source of confusion, they will attain the rank of divine immortals.

The Dao says: When the cycles of heaven and earth reach their end, when the constellations fall out of alignment, when the sun and moon lose their brightness, when the four seasons fall into disorder, when yin and yang are out of balance, when the realm is unsettled, when agriculture and commerce fail, when pestilence and poison spread—when the people suffer death and injury, when teachers and companions pass away—all should perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures. For the merit of purification rites and scripture recitation is profound: above, it dispels heavenly disasters and safeguards the emperor; below, it wards off poison and harm, delivering the people. In life and death, all depend upon it, and its blessings are immeasurable. Thus it is called "boundless," universally delivering heaven and humanity.

The Dao says: Whoever possesses this scripture and performs these meritorious deeds for the rulers of heaven and earth and the people—on days of calamity, if they resolve to perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures ten times—auspicious omens will descend at once, and great peace will be eternally preserved. All the heavens will record their names, and the ten thousand spirits will attend and protect them. Those exceptional practitioners who succeed will become ministers of the Golden Gates of the Sage Lord. The heavens record the merits and transgressions of people without the slightest error. The true demons of heaven will also protect and recommend them, and those who attain the Dao will fully comprehend these most profound words.

Within the heavens, the Great Brahma’s hidden language resounds in boundless tones—composed by the Dao Lord, the *Primal Beginning’s Numinous Writ of Auspicious Talismans, the Melodic Chapter*.

**Eastern Eight Heavens:**
Zheji Huyan, Choufei Guanchen.
Miluo Manchou, Juedu Hecen.
Gue Wangji, Mianhong Meiqin.
Donghe Bingluo, Huayao Zixun.
Qubo Fanna, Mingmo Dalin.
Miaoji Jifan, Mufen Xuantan.
Huangzhu Xujie, Liqiong Pixin.
Huzhuo Bianke, Mingmou Fuxin.

**Southern Eight Heavens:**
Zhechiyan Shu, Jiujia Minxian.
Guocheng Liding, Gongmi Jingdan.
Yuena Yunuo, Xianshe Ziyuan.
Maojun Douge, Yizheng Fuqian.
Heshu Minnong, Bishi Jiuhui.
Langhua Zhibo, Sijixuan Ju.
Shejia Faqi, Luzu Weimiao.
Guangtun Youshuang, Qianling Zicui.

**Western Eight Heavens:**
Chongguang Luyuan, Moutuo Jiongxuan.
Biyi Dansuo, Qimeng Shiyun.
Boyue Longdian, Fuyou Jiancun.
Jianjiang Hengzu, Bixian Puquan.
Yaowen Zetai, Yingxi Canglun.
Yuwu Zhaosu, Yunhe Guqiong.
Liaoyan Lumi, Shejing Miqing.
Lumo Xuke, Baolun Youtun.

**Northern Eight Heavens:**
Jiaohuan Wutang, Yilin Xijiang.
Xuandun Qingwei, Gushen Feiyang.
Xialuan Yaochen, Wenjue Tonghuang.
Zhiping Youkui, Keji Shilang.
Oudu Lishan, Zhaofeng Huaguang.
Gongchong Zuyu, Douyuan Binggang.
Piaolu Jianxu, Xuanfu Yindang.
Lingzhou Juandu, Taichi Hunfang.

The Dao says: These are the Great Brahma’s hidden words within the heavens, the boundless tones recorded in the ancient texts of the Heavenly Yellow Numinous Terrace. They summon the Twelve Mysterious Auspices and the Twenty-Four Responses within the realm of the Five Elders of the Primal Beginning’s Great Blessing Hall. The vermilion script and jade writ reveal the inception of auspicious talismans and responses, each character a full *zhang* in length. The Heavenly Perfected and August Ones of old inscribed these words to establish the correct sounds. Those who know these sounds and recite them with purification rites will have the Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings of all the heavens descend to observe them, record their merits, and report to the heavens above. The ten thousand spirits will pay homage, the earthly deities will attend at their gates, and the Great Merit True Demons will protect and recommend them to the Divine Empyrean. Once their Dao is complete, they will traverse the Three Realms and ascend through the Golden Gates.

This sound averts all, wards off all, delivers all, and accomplishes all—it is the natural sound of the Heavenly Perfected. Thus, reciting it causes the Flying Heavenly Ones to descend in observation, the Supreme Emperor to chant from afar, the ten thousand spirits to pay homage, the Three Realms to attend in reverence, the myriad demons to bow their heads, and ghostly spirits to vanish of their own accord. The chiming of jade-like tones resounds, the ten directions grow solemn and clear, rivers and seas fall silent, mountains and peaks swallow their mists, the ten thousand spirits tremble and submit, and the host of immortals is summoned. The heavens are free of impurity, the earth is free of demonic dust, dark wisdom becomes perfectly clear, and the boundless mystery of mysteries is revealed.

*The Supreme Wondrous Scripture of the Numinous Treasure for the Boundless Deliverance of Humanity, Upper Chapter, Scroll the Seventh—End. Scroll the Eighth.*

**The Pure and Subtle Golden Regulations**

The Dao spoke: Long ago, in the wondrous bounds of the Supreme Ultimate Heaven, within the numinous cavern of the Cloud-Soaring Tone of the Grand Mystery Transformation Realm, the Primordial Beginning received the *Pure and Subtle Golden Regulations of the Boundless Upper Chapters for the Deliverance of Humanity*. As the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning was about to expound this scripture, he circumambulated ten times to summon the ten directions, then took his seat.

The Heavenly Perfected Divinities, the Lofty and Venerable Upper Sages, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct, the Nine Sages of the Pure and Subtle, the Heavenly Officials of the Upper Origin, the Guardian Immortal Kings of the Dharma, and an innumerable host arrived borne upon the void. Jade radiance and emerald chariots, the threefold purity of soaring clouds, feathered canopies streaming splendor, the dark emptiness scattering rosy mists, cinnabar landscapes floating in blossoming light—all dazzled the vast heavens.

For seven days and seven nights, the yang palaces and yin temples of the various heavens, the golden towers and jade pavilions, arrayed the true writ. A numinous breeze fanned the skies, concealed rhythms gave birth to sound, the primal net ceased its motion, and the twin luminaries ascended in brilliance. The lands, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees of the entire realm were leveled as one, no longer high or low, the earth transformed into azure jade, without any differing hue.

The host of Perfected attended the seat as the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning, in profound repose, floated upon a nine-colored divine dragon. When the scripture was expounded once, the great sages of the various heavens simultaneously proclaimed its excellence. At that time, the men and women of the realm each roused their sincere devotion, yearning to behold the wondrous mystery.

When the scripture was expounded a second time, the numinous palace became empty and luminous, and understanding opened boundlessly. When expounded a third time, spirit and qi merged as one, and the ten directions were beheld in contemplation. When expounded a fourth time, enlightenment arose within the heart, and the power to transform and guide others was attained. When expounded a fifth time, future sentient beings were broadly received and led forth. When expounded a sixth time, the celestial immortals’ karma was realized, and the path of the Upper Perfected was cultivated. When expounded a seventh time, they transcended the Three Realms, becoming the seed-people of heaven. When expounded an eighth time, they beheld the Primordial Worthy and received divine titles and ranks. When expounded a ninth time, their names were inscribed in the Pure and Subtle register, entering the Upper Golden Regulations. When expounded a tenth time, they united with the sagely and became Perfected, forever severing the cycle of rebirth.

At that time, all the men and women of the realm, without exception, turned their hearts in devotion. All received protection and deliverance, attaining everlasting life.

The Dao spoke: At that time,

When the Primordial Heavenly Worthy expounded the scripture once, the Great Divine Lords of Boundless and Measureless Ranks who preside over generation in the eastern direction, with their innumerable hosts, arrived floating through the void. When expounded a second time, the Great Divine Lords of Boundless and Measureless Ranks who strike and uphold the law in the southern direction, with their innumerable hosts, arrived floating through the void. When expounded a third time, the Great Divine Lords of Boundless and Measureless Ranks who determine names in the western direction, with their innumerable hosts, arrived floating through the void. When expounded a fourth time, the Great Divine Lords of Boundless and Measureless Ranks who govern transformation in the northern direction, with their innumerable hosts, arrived floating through the void. When expounded a fifth time, the Great Divine Lords of Boundless and Measureless Ranks who review and memorialize in the northeastern direction, with their innumerable hosts, arrived floating through the void. When expounded a sixth time, the Great Divine Lords of Boundless and Measureless Ranks who disseminate teachings in the southeastern direction, with their innumerable hosts, arrived floating through the void. When expounded a seventh time, the Great Divine Lords of Boundless and Measureless Ranks who wield transformation in the southwestern direction, with their innumerable hosts, arrived floating through the void. When expounded an eighth time, the Great Divine Lords of Boundless and Measureless Ranks who inspect and examine in the northwestern direction, with their innumerable hosts, arrived floating through the void. When expounded a ninth time, the Great Divine Lords of Boundless and Measureless Ranks who oversee and observe in the upper direction, with their innumerable hosts, arrived floating through the void. When expounded a tenth time, the Great Divine Lords of Boundless and Measureless Ranks who perfect virtue in the lower direction, with their innumerable hosts, arrived floating through the void.

When the ten expositions were complete, the Great Perfected Divine Lords of the Ten Directions’ Boundless Realms arrived all at once. The men and women of the realm turned their hearts in devotion and reverence. Those who came were like fine rain or dense mist—innumerable hosts so vast that half the land of the realm sank beneath their weight, an event beyond restraint.

Thereupon, the Primordial Worthy gathered the subtle and wondrous qi of the Pure and Subtle, transforming it into a precious pearl. Its radiance was like a great star, suspended in the empty void a hundred paces above the earth. The Primordial Worthy ascended and led forth, and the Golden Regulations gave birth to the Perfected. The exalted transformations of the Highest Worthy manifested as Perfected of qi. The Great Divine Lords of the Ten Directions’ Boundless Realms who open and guide, with their innumerable hosts, all entered into the precious pearl. The celestials gazed upward and saw only a surging stream entering the pearl’s mouth. Once within, their whereabouts were unknown. The people of the realm dispersed, and the earth returned to levelness, no longer sunken or slanted.

Within the precious pearl, the Primordial Worthy completed the full exposition of the scripture. The Perfected oversaw the deliverance and bestowed it upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. When the Dharma affairs were roughly concluded, the myriad heavens returned to their stations. In an instant, all was silent, with no lingering resonance.

At that time, the celestials who encountered the scripture universally attained deliverance. All sentient beings realized auspicious conditions. The entire realm turned in reverence, all harmonizing with emptiness and clarity. Marvelous sight and marvelous hearing, marvelous awakening and marvelous knowing, marvelous being and marvelous non-being, marvelous union and marvelous separation, marvelous transformation and marvelous change—words aligned with the Supreme Dao, hearts practiced great compassion. Together they attained profound awakening, pure and unconditioned. The realm was at peace, the people prosperous, rejoicing in great harmony. From the scripture’s first promulgation, the realm was guided by the Dao. Those who had cultivated utmost sincerity, revered and honored it, all immediately received deliverance.

The Dao spoke: What the Primordial Heavenly Worthy expounded in the scripture are the concealed sacred titles of the Celestial Sovereigns of Transformative qi, the hidden and esoteric names of the Highest Perfected of the Ten Directions’ Boundless Realms, the inner secret chapters. These are also the sounds of the Nine Tiers establishing the Ultimate, the texts by which the Hundred Demons are examined—words not of this world’s common speech. The Supreme Perfected inscribed and recorded the Golden Regulations, concealing them within the Pure and Subtle. The prohibitions are most severe; even demonic officials cannot hear them. Within the Jade Void’s Mysterious Cavern, the Great Ultimate and Great Clarity, the thirty-nine heavens of the four realms, the divine immortals and Perfected, can all comprehend these chapters. Reciting them ten times, one’s voice shakes the Circular Net; the Great One oversees and protects, securing heaven and earth for kalpas without end. The Five Luminaries follow the Dao, sun and moon remain ever bright, the lands are at peace, and great harmony is forever preserved. The dead are revived, white bones become living persons. Flying immortals of the Great Void—reciting ten times, the Five Elders will sponsor them. The Three Realms bow in reverence, great demons submit in obeisance. Heavenly officials record their merit, and they ascend into the Cavern Perfected, forever attending the Primordial Worthy. Earthly immortals of the Nine Palaces—reciting ten times, the Primordial Elders descend to their courts, delivering them according to their wishes. Great compassion embraces all beings; the Jade Edict commands their reception, and they ascend to the heavens. Those who recite these chapters lightly bring calamity upon themselves. Those who honor and revere them will see their households flourish, generation after generation prospering, bound to auspicious conditions. Ten thousand disasters will not approach; a hundred spirits will guard their bodies.

This scripture is most exalted and wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital. It delivers countless beings, serving as the root of the myriad Dao. Its majestic model is of virtue beyond measure.

The Dao spoke: Whenever this scripture is recited ten times, all heavens arrive in unison. The suffering souls of ancestors from a hundred thousand generations are immediately delivered, ascending to the Vermilion Palace. After nine years of refinement, they receive transformation and rebirth, becoming noble persons. Those who diligently study the wondrous scripture, fulfilling their merit and perfecting their virtue, all attain divine immortality, ascending to the Golden Gates and roaming the Jade Capital. Scholars of the highest learning who cultivate and recite this scripture will have their names inscribed in the Golden Regulations. Myriad virtues will be perfected, and they will immediately receive deliverance, ascending to the Southern Palace. Those in the world who recite it will have divine officials descend to their bodies, extending their years and granting long life. Thereafter, all will realize the Dao of flying immortality. Their mysterious merit manifests externally, their divine qi fills them internally. Form and spirit are both wondrous, roaming the Great Void. This scripture is subtle and wondrous, universally delivering without end. All celestials receive its blessings; the living and the dead are graced with its kindness.

This treasure of heaven is not transmitted to the lower world. Only the most devoted scholars, offering gold and treasures to express their sincerity, may receive it by swearing an oath to heaven. Those who lightly disclose or disrespect it will bring calamity upon nine generations, eternally bound to serve as ghostly officials. The Cinnabar Jade Lads and Azure-Waisted Jade Maidens, forty-two each, patrol and guard the sacred text, protecting those who receive the scripture.

The Dao spoke: During the first month’s prolonged fast, recite and chant this scripture to open and guide the Nine Springs, illuminating the Nine Dark Realms. For the departed souls of past generations, sever their earthly bonds and deliver them to the Southern Palace.

In the seventh month’s prolonged fast, recite and chant this scripture, presenting petitions to the Clear and Subtle Realm. Your name shall ascend to the Golden Register, and your body shall attain immortality. The heavens shall inscribe your merit, and upon the Yellow Register and White Tablet, your death shall be erased and your life exalted.

In the tenth month’s prolonged fast, recite and chant this scripture. The Three Primes shall shine brightly, and your merit shall be attributed to the Lord Emperor. For the lord and master of the nation, for ruler and minister, father and son, may the dynastic fortune be securely established, the celestial mandate preserved, and the lineage endure unbroken. May he ever remain the sovereign of men, securely ruling his domain, and may the people proclaim great peace.

On the eight seasonal festivals, recite and chant this scripture. The heavenly immortals shall welcome you, and you shall become a Perfected One of the Nine Palaces.

On your natal day, recite and chant this scripture. Your soul and spirit shall become pure and upright, and the myriad qi shall unite with the immortal. You shall not endure suffering or distress; your form shall ascend and be promoted. Your radiance shall illuminate the Eight Darknesses, the Five Emperors shall attend your court, and the myriad spirits shall pay homage. Your name shall be inscribed in the heavens, and when your merit is complete and your virtue perfected, you shall ascend to the Great Mystery.

The Dao spoke: On the days of practicing the Dao, you must bathe in fragrant waters, fast, and enter the chamber. Face east, strike your teeth thirty-two times to ascend to the Thirty-Two Heavens, and bow in reverence thirty-two times. Close your eyes and silently envision yourself seated amidst clouds of blue, yellow, and white qi, both within and without shrouded in mist. A Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Warrior, Lion, and White Crane stand arrayed to your left and right. The sun and moon illuminate the chamber with radiant brilliance. A circular halo emerges from your crown, its light suffusing the ten directions—all this must be vividly perceived.

Recite the secret incantation:
*"Supreme Mysterious Origin, Most High Lord of the Dao, summon forth from within my body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the Attendant Messengers of the Left and Right, the Jade Lads who tend the incense, the Jade Maidens who transmit words, the Direct Attendants of the Five Emperors, and the Incense Officials of the Day—thirty-two each in number—to convey my entreaty. Today is an auspicious occasion, a prolonged fast in the pure hall, the cultivation of the supreme scripture for the boundless deliverance of beings. May my words ascend directly to the presence of the Most Honored One before the Supreme Thirty-Two Heavens of the Primordial Beginning."*

Conclude by drawing in qi thirty-two times, then face east and recite the scripture.

*The Supreme Primordial Scripture of Boundless Salvation, Wondrous Upper Chapter*

The Primordial Beginning’s Mysterious Treasure, the Root Canon of the Clear and Subtle Golden Register, Upper Chapter—its talismans respond to deliver humanity. The hidden secrets of celestial perfected ones coalesce with the qi of spontaneity, merging with the mysterious writ to conceal its utmost essence. The Void Sovereign opened the kalpa, giving birth to the manifold heavens. The radiant light of the Cavern expanded, and the Three Qi soared. It encompasses the great image and establishes the root of heaven. Inscribed on blue-green tablets and golden slips, it records the spirits universally. It upholds and extends the true Dao, resplendent in the unseen. The Twin Origins fly as luminous scenes, and the Five Qi flow as forms. Profoundly illuminating transformations, it generates and completes all kinds—this is the subtle and wondrous, the origin of the myriad Dao.

The Grand Tenuity’s Yang Florescence, the Purple Empyrean’s Jade Palace, ascends to the Great Veil and the lofty void of the Brahma heavens. The Three Perfected Ones dwell in profound obscurity, boundless and infinite. The Crimson Chaos merges with the Great Nonbeing, and the Jade Realm holds the honored seat. Manifesting in the ten directions, its boundless emanations spread the teachings of the Clear and Subtle, inscribing names in the Golden Register. Within it are the names of the myriad heavens and ten thousand emperors; within it is the Jade Emperor, the true ruler who roams the Brahma heavens; within it are the forms of mountains, rivers, seas, and peaks; within it are the texts for examining the multitude of demons; within it are the Three Heavens—Cavern Real, Cavern Mystery, and Cavern Spirit.

Opening heaven and establishing the ultimate, the great statutes soar as wheels. I now proclaim and universally summon the hundred spirits. The Three Primes convene as one, and the manifold heavens attend the court.

The Boundless Life-Recording Divine King of the East, Great Sage of Boundless Salvation.
The Boundless Law-Upholding Divine King of the South, Great Sage of Boundless Salvation.
The Boundless Name-Fixing Divine King of the West, Great Sage of Boundless Salvation.
The Boundless Transformation-Administering Divine King of the North, Great Sage of Boundless Salvation.
The Boundless Petition-Presenting Divine King of the Northeast, Great Sage of Boundless Salvation.
The Boundless Teaching-Spreading Divine King of the Southeast, Great Sage of Boundless Salvation.
The Boundless Authority-Exercising Divine King of the Southwest, Great Sage of Boundless Salvation.
The Boundless Investigating Divine King of the Northwest, Great Sage of Boundless Salvation.
The Boundless Overseeing Divine King of the Above, Great Sage of Boundless Salvation.
The Boundless Virtue-Perfecting Divine King of the Below, Great Sage of Boundless Salvation.
The Ten Directional Divine Kings of the Golden Register, Flying Heavenly Spirits of Boundless Salvation.

Together they ride upon luminous jade chariots and radiant cloud-borne carriages, drawn by threefold-pure flying clouds and celestial steeds with variegated beasts. Azure dragons gleam, and phoenix standards are raised. Streaming banners of light flutter, with the Nine Heavens’ feathered guards to the left and the Three Realms’ divine soldiers to the right. The Supreme Unity’s Primordial Emperor governs the myriad spirits, with the Crimson Emperor leading the way and the Dark Elder overseeing the covenant. Countless chariots and ten thousand riders float through the void, their luminous procession turning back as they summon immortals and gather perfected ones.

The imperial qi of the Clear and Subtle, the Great Cavern’s Mysterious Palace—nine luminaries assist in governance, and the great spirits merge as one. They collectively uphold the Golden Register, arraying their ranks in welcome. They review talismanic mandates and conceal the names of immortals and sages. Universally announcing to the Three Realms, the boundless and exalted ones, the Jade Towers of the Great Empyrean, the kalpa-measuring jade peaks—

The Purple Tenuity’s Northern Mansion, the Thirty-Nine Lords, seven revolutions and seven transformations, whirling waters dance in the heavens. The Mysterious Subtle coalesces into radiance, governing the Fengdu below. Curved mornings fly with canopies, convening at the Eastern River. Light unfurls the whirlwind, turning the celestial gate. The Dipper and Pole Star center the directions, aligning Kunlun. Unfolding the utmost subtlety, descending the qi of the mysterious elixir, it weaves through heaven and earth, preserving and delivering humanity. Generating, completing, and nurturing, it unites with me as an immortal. The Five Spirits become clear and bright, enduring for a billion kalpas without decline. Forever delivering the heavens’ practitioners, the people who study the Dao—inscribe their names on golden tablets and present them to the Purple Court.

The Purple Court Heaven, where the Heavenly Emperor radiates light, the colorless realm of Brahma conduct—

The Eight Heavens of the East:
The Langqiu Assembly-Origin Heaven, where Emperor Ze rules with mighty strength.
The Chonggou Assembly-Real Heaven, where Emperor Hua governs with evening brilliance.

The Radiant Cloud-Forest Heaven of Dawn’s Splendor, where Lord Yu of the Towering Peaks presides in majesty.
The Primordial Celebration of the Cavernous Clan Heaven, where the Emperor governs the Luminous Surveillance of the Dipper.
The Flying Numinous Heaven of Refined Brahma, where the Emperor unites the Departments in extension.
The Vast Expanse’s Demon-Quelling Heaven, where the Emperor initiates solemn resolve.
The Heaven of Jade Script Transcending Chapters, where the Emperor Meng governs the Totality of Nets.
The Heaven of Cosmic Refinement and Cavernous Yang, where the Emperor commands the Balance of Dark and Light.

The Eight Heavens of the South:
The Heaven of Fixed Names and Perfected Response, where Emperor Dong presides over the Radiant Chamber.
The Heaven of Mysterious Void and Resplendent Emptiness, where Emperor Luo oversees the Treasure Surveillance.
The Heaven of Flame Spirits Bearing Talismans, where Emperor Ge neighbors the Ancient Mountain.
The Heaven of Jade Script and Vermilion Text, where the Emperor attains transformation’s stability.
The Heaven of Cinnabar Radiance and Dawn’s Awakening, where the Emperor fans the resonance of sound.
The Heaven of Radiant Fortune and Purple Florescence, where the Emperor Dragon abides at the Kalpa’s Edge.
The Heaven of Ultimate Origin and Cavernous Sovereignty, where the Emperor seals the True Extension of Spirits.
The Heaven of Imperial Model and Total Generation, where Emperor Yuan supervises the Proclamation of Benefit.

The Eight Heavens of the West:

The Heaven of Cavernous Stillness and Illumined Response to the Void, where the Emperor proclaims the Jade of the World.
The Heaven of Purple Clarity and Vast Desert’s Cavernous Extremity, where the Emperor commands the Chanting of the Six Clans.
The Heaven of Jade Yang and Wondrous Perfection, where the Emperor interflows with the transformation of spirits.
The Heaven of Revolving Winds and Converging Transformations, where the Emperor nurtures the primordial.
The Heaven of Flowing Radiance and Resplendent Chapters, where the Emperor establishes the rhythm of Jade Florescence.
The Heaven of Illumined Origin and Simplified Qi, where Emperor Liang presides over Qiong and Bo’e.
The Heaven of Fused Coherence and Rectified Network, where the Emperor revolves the Radiance of the Imperial Ultimate.

The Eight Heavens of the North:
The Heaven of Transformative Qi Ascending to the Origin, where Emperor Miao maintains the Profound Abyss.
The Heaven of Eightfold Walls Dancing in the Void, where the Emperor perfects the Plan of the Void’s Flourishing.
The Heaven of Flying Spirits Descending to Perfection, where the Emperor subtly fuses the wondrous and mysterious.
