The Heaven of Azure Florescence Aiding the Mysterious, where the Emperor Ming spreads and ascends.
The Heaven of Three Voids and the Ultimate Dao, where the Emperor Lin cherishes the wisdom of Huang.
The Heaven of Grand Splendor Descending to the Jade Scribe of the Chamber, where the Emperor Chen abides by the constant rhythm.
The Heaven of Grand Clarity and the Orthodox Clan, where the Emperor observes the sealed contemplation of Brahma-conduct.

The Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Emperors—
the arcana of the heavens, the hidden names of the heavens.
Within the heavens’ cavernous emptiness, the spontaneous numinous script,
the hidden rhymes of the heavens, the sound within the heavens,
the honor within the heavens, the spirits within the heavens,
the great demons within the heavens, the numina within the heavens.
The Four Mysteries and Seven Voids enfold the utmost perfection,
the Golden Regulations and Grand Network knit qi into script.
Spreading transformation through Jade Clarity, universally delivering heaven and humanity,
today we rejoice and celebrate, revolving winds receive refinement.
Solemnly swearing the Hundred Spirits, inscribing names in the Wenchang,
arraying and proclaiming the arcane mechanism, soaring to traverse Grand Simplicity,
converging with the luminous and subtle, true immortals undergo examination,
the myriad transformations return as one.

The Eastern Dipper confers talismans, the Western Dipper administers justice,
the Northern Dipper records merit, the Southern Dipper determines destinies,
the Central Dipper unites extension, rectifying heaven’s boundlessness.
The Azure Emperor elevates immortals, the White Emperor dispatches servitors,
the Vermilion Emperor gathers qi, the Black Emperor governs records,
the Yellow Emperor subdues demons, overseeing transformation and nurturance.

The Azure Origin Dao Lord holds the Dragon’s Soaring.
The Cinnabar Radiance Dao Lord enforces the law with luminous clarity.
The Lesser Yin Dao Lord summons mountains and opens paths.
The Profound Subtlety Dao Lord revolves the mysterious and wondrous.
The Central Yellow Dao Lord issues commands and promulgates decrees.
The Supreme Numinous Ones of the Five Directions, the origin of the utmost Dao,
soaring through the Three Realms, governing the host of immortals.
Boundless in transformation, roaming and observing the myriad heavens,
generating and completing the ranks of beings, wielding my authority.

The perfected ones transform the people, blending and enduring without end,
the Purple Emperor receives the mandate, subduing and capturing the perverse and treacherous.
Yang’s radiance sparks lightning, illuminating the Feng Mountains through and through,
the network of rectified principles shines, revealing the primordial barrier.
The Six Heavens’ sunken souls receive refinement in the Cavernous Yang,
the great domain of the Divine Continent forever preserves auspicious fortune.
Ceasing and halting evil opposition, all attest to good affinity,
the boundless myriad existences all attain long years.

Spirits soar to the Grand Void, washing qi in the Three Florescence,
radiant splendor robes the body, bathing and refining in the Heavenly River.
The Three Origins’ supreme assistants clearly examine the Hundred Demons—
dare any transgress, their crimes shall be sentenced to the Hanging Sands.
Universally proclaiming to the host of spirits, assembling together in the Round Net,
ascending the steps and advancing in rank, merits recorded in the Golden Regulations.

The Golden Regulations of Qingwei begin with thirty-six characters, the remainder listed in the original canon.
The hidden names of the Three Heavens’ Dao Lords proclaim the number of Four Nines,
the spontaneous script of Jade Clarity’s High Mystery.
Written in vermilion on azure silk, worn on the body—
no myriad evils dare approach; ash garments cure illness.
Those who practice shall have their names inscribed in the Golden Regulations.

The Cavernous Origin’s expansive fall, ascending and descending the round and square,
the boundless great transformation traverses the Dragon’s Peace.
Above, opening the One Qi; below, spreading yin and yang,
enfolding the myriad heavens, the wind and Brahma stand firm and unyielding.
Mysterious transformations flow essence, Grand Simplicity’s obscurity,
emptiness and clarity vast and distant, boundless and formless.
The primordial image of the Vast Muddle, the Three Ways’ transformations complete,
the Eight Levels’ purity and subtlety, their number’s extremity spontaneous.

The Jade Capital unfolds, the Golden Regulations’ first chapter,
yellow slips and azure script, the Eight Luminaries’ mysterious text.
Inscribing and recording the spirits’ names, enduring with the Dao forever,
the Chaos-Unity soars and spreads, weaving through heaven and encompassing all.
The myriad scenes revolve, the dual luminaries and five celestial bodies,
governing the primordial network, darkly uniting with the numinous root.

The Grand Cavern of the August Elder, thirty-nine chapters,
the Emperor’s Unity divides the origin, pacifying and securing the myriad directions.
The Flying Heaven’s wondrous script traverses the Cinnabar Radiance,
the Cinnabar Radiance transforms and generates the Nine Heavens’ supreme numina.
Driving the luminous Purple Void, steering qi and the mysterious sound,
green auroras scatter in the void, spreading hues through the soaring forests.
The Three Florescence dance in mist, revolving elegance flows in clouds,
fanning the cloudy canopy of Yu, shining and illuminating the Eternal Star.
A thousand harmonies and myriad unions spontaneously attain perfection—
within perfection dwell spirits, the Primordial Essence Dao Lords.
The Perfected Ones of the Square Reservoirs, the Azure Florescence Emperor Honored,
the Grand Unity converging with the luminous, the Controller of Destinies revolving winds.
Holding tablets and maintaining regulations, recording and inscribing primordial merit,
ascending to roam Jade Clarity, kalpas measured in the Jade Palace.

Within the Grand Tenuity, at the center of the celestial realm,
below reaching the profound abyss, the Yellow Gate’s Mysterious Palace.
Turning back to the Nine Ramparts, the Thirty-Six August Ones,
the Five Great Domains’ pacification, the Ten Isles of the Immortals.
Cavern-heavens and blessed lands, boundless famous mountains,
the Eight Seas and Four Watercourses, the governing spirits and numina.

The Three Primordials’ Palace Lords, the boundless flying immortals,
all bestowed with true talismans, their merits inscribed in the imperial celestial archives.
Ranked in order and registers fixed, reported upward to the Three Heavens—
above the Three Heavens, joyous assemblies and karmic affinities arise.

Within lies the Golden Statutes of the Pristine Subtlety,
sacred realms’ immortal hymns, verses matching the lofty perfected.
**First: The Hymn of the Pristine Subtlety’s Transformative Qi**

Vast and distant, above Great Luo,
imperial qi descends to the Pristine Subtlety.
True radiance illumines the Jade Capital,
grasping and guiding the mechanism of right transformation.
Boundless, traversing the Dragon’s Haven,
flying past defeat and accomplishment.
The Three Realms dissolve into emptiness,
the great earth sinks into the Nine Abysses.
The Primordial Beginning pities the multitudes,
jade chapters descend upon the Five Mountains.
Dual luminaries soar with brilliance,
the primordial net encompasses the ten thousand spirits.
The *Dongzhen* conceals the jade texts,
the *Lingbao* establishes the root of heaven.
The *Dongshen* governs mysterious transformations,
the myriad forms arise therefrom.
The Heavenly Emperors of all directions are commanded,
to collectively examine the long-lived.
The firm winds uphold the earth’s pivot,
heaven’s decrees return to the August Lord.
Living beings bear great shelter,
through kalpas unnumbered, forever unshaken.

**Second: The Golden Statutes’ Register-Fixing Chapter**

Phoenix chariots dance in the wheeling sky,
halting their steeds at the misty mountain’s curve.
Kalpas measure the vast emptiness,
in an instant, the Three Florets unfold.
The Primordial Sage reviews the registers,
summoning spirits and demons from the void.
The Grand Clarity is difficult to cross,
revolving like dust and sand.
Pitying this cycle of departure and return,
flying immortals chant their odes.
Vast is the Dragon Han’s foundation,
the Dark Peak towers, lofty and jagged.
The ten thousand spirits gather at the imperial court,
the Eastern Well pierces the Celestial River.
Impure realms follow karmic bonds,
sinking and drowning—what recourse remains?
Recite this Pristine Subtlety’s scripture,
upright qi dispels perverse afflictions.
The Three Realms’ celestial folk,
all hasten to bathe in the Luminous Net.
May your Dao-fruit ripen,
your name carved in the Golden Statutes.
Eternally attuned to the principle of long life,
what are mere billions of years?

**Third: The True Immortals’ Hymn of the Sacred Realm**

The Round Net enfolds the Jade Void,
towering high, the Palace of Great Possession.
The soaring forests canopy the heavens,
the Nine Sages tread the numinous winds.
Feasting on radiance, embracing floral brilliance,
they wander carefree in the Grand Primordial.
Below, they roam the Mysterious Cavern’s realm,
commanding and guiding the flying celestial dragons.
The Thirty-Nine Dao Lords,
pay homage to the Void Sovereign.
Great compassion shakes the Dharma’s sound,
sacred blessings ever mist-like.
Edicts and seals open the celestial gates,
dispersing the Three Luminaries’ texts.
Jade decrees descend to Fengdu,
delivering the long-night souls.
Ghostly officials cease their interrogations,
yang light illumines the Nine Netherworlds.
The Three Paths’ torments still,
the Eight Ways’ flying wheels turn.
All beings preserve long years,
the world’s lands forever at peace.

This, above the Three Realms,
amidst the flying void,
the true immortals’ hymns,
their sounds matching the cavern’s scriptures.
Recite them a hundred times,
your name ascends to the Southern Palace.
Recite them a thousand times,
the demon kings guard and welcome you.
Ten thousand recitations, the Dao complete,
you ascend to the great void,
pass beyond the Three Realms,
and attain the rank of Immortal Duke.
Those who hear the true sounds,
spirits and demons show reverence,
edicts command earth deities,
to escort and receive you.
Delivered from the earth’s gates,
the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships,
seven generations of ancestors ascend,
forever freed from ghostly officials,
souls cross to Vermilion Mound,
refined and reborn anew.

This is called boundless,
universal deliverance without end.
Yet these are the secret celestial texts,
revered by all heavens—
those who leak them fall to hell,
bringing calamity to seven generations of ancestors.

The Dao states:
These two chapters, along with the hymns of the Celestial Emperors and the Numinous Perfected Kings,
are hidden sounds,
all the speech of the Great Brahma,
not the common words of the mortal world.
Their words lack ornate beauty,
their melodies lack florid grace—
thus they are called profound and obscure,
difficult to fathom in detail.
Treasured by heaven,
secretly kept in the Jade Capital of the Divine Empyrean’s Mysterious Bureau,
they descend in accordance with the mysterious statutes every thirty-seven thousand years.
Only if a perfected person offers gold and treasures with a sincere heart,
following the old protocols to pledge allegiance to the Jade Clarity,
are they then transmitted.

The Dao states:
The revolutions of heaven and earth, too, have their ends.
The sun, moon, and five planets, too, wax and wane.
The utmost sagely divine persons, too, have their flourishing and decline.
The lesser learners, too, suffer illness and harm.

Whenever such calamities arise, all of like qi must unite in heart to perform purification rites, burn incense in the six periods, recite the scriptures ten times through, and harmonize the Three Qi with the spirits—thus all ten thousand disasters dissolve, heaven and earth attain clarity and tranquility, and the qi of the Mysterious Real descends.

The Golden Statutes and Jade Laws subdue and command spirits; the boundless scriptures universally deliver the limitless. The Dao states:

Those of shallow learning in the Dao, whose immortal ranks remain unfulfilled, when their destined time of dissolution arrives and their bodies pass through the Great Yin, at the moment of their crossing, fellow perfected persons of the same learning shall burn incense and recite the scriptures ten times on their behalf, thereby delivering the corporeal form according to the proper method. Unbroken and unharmed, their bodies remain firm and whole, their hun and shen ascend directly to the Southern Palace, and in accordance with their accumulated merit, they are reborn after a calculated span of days. With the Wheel of Transmigration unceasing, they then attain the immortality of divine transcendents.

The Dao states:

When the revolutions of heaven and earth reach their end and the great kalpa shifts, the stellar lodgings fall into disorder, the sun and moon lose their brightness, the four seasons lose their measure, yin and yang fall out of harmony, the lands suffer famine in their years, floods and droughts arise in their seasons, pestilential toxins spread, and masters and companions pass away—all should then perform purification rites, burn incense, recite scriptures, and meditate upon the Golden Statutes of the Pure and Subtle, invoking the qi of the Yang Florescence and the spirits of the Great Subtlety to sweep away the miasma of disaster.

The merit of purification rites and scripture recitation is most weighty: above, it dissolves the calamities of heaven and safeguards the sovereign; below, it wards off poisonous harms and delivers the myriad people. In life and death, all rely upon it—its blessings are immeasurable, universally delivering heaven and humanity.

The Dao states:

Whoever possesses this scripture and performs these meritorious deeds for the lords of heaven and earth and the myriad people—on the day of calamity, if they resolve in heart to perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scripture ten times—all the heavens shall record their names, and the ten thousand spirits shall attend and guard them. Those of exceptional attainment shall become sagely lords and ministers of the Golden Towers. The heavens record the merits and transgressions of people with flawless precision to the finest detail. The True Kings of Heaven shall also protect and recommend them. Only those who attain the Dao shall fully comprehend these most profound words.

The boundless hidden speech of the Great Brahma in the heavens—
*Scripture of the Primordial Numinous Writ: Golden Statutes and Jade Chapters of the Pure and Subtle*
Composed by the Dao Lord of the Eight Heavens of the East

The Flying Celestials convene in vast assembly, drifting transformations endlessly shift.
Dwelling long in the Primordial Pear, they oversee the expanses of the Southern Dipper.
Yin and Yang govern the straight path, bearing the golden shores of the marsh.
Vacuity is enriched to the utmost, the transmitted writ alone divides.
The Jade Ultimate awaits its threading, tribute and promotion turn the true wheel.
When the fruits of practice are perfected, the Pure Net’s script and clouds emerge.
Yet those who incline toward shallowness may only match the numinous origin in talent.
Wave-flowers still, winds cease, qi ascends to summon the years.

**Southern Eighth Heaven**
Mountains extend in luminous clarity, dark discourses flow in harmonious passage.
Radiance scatters through empty space, the Dipper’s tail scatters pearls.
Mountain thorns bind the records, bright revolutions respond to the tally.
Cinnabar dwellings blaze with cavernous flame, the Astral Strider points to the jade girdle.
Dazzling concealment draws upon repose, the Jasper Palace casts into the void.
What bamboo gives birth to nurture? The numinous court’s cypress-script.
Vast simplicity and righteous blossoms, the Dark Ford’s palace-capital.
Verdant pillars, crimson heavens, the Purple Empyrean floats in true alignment.

**Western Eighth Heaven**
The Boundary Master drifts in mist, establishing Jin and forging auxiliary bonds.
Great Purple recounts the Net, carefree and offering plainness.
Yang Tang records the directions, winding paths barely reach.
True awakening fills Wu, the imperial decree remains unfurled.
Luminous fluids intermingle, efficacious incantations guard the door alone.
The Gate of Reverence truly hastens, the vulgar expanse pities the measure.
Illumination pierces the hidden depths, intent and seal yearn for admiration.
First omens yield to harmony, ascending to the jade reins of leisure.

**Northern Eighth Heaven**
Primordial Simplicity, Eternal Light, the drum sounds before Xi Lü.
Supervision spreads to neighboring realms, martial brightness precedes righteousness.
The Northern Seal summons the ultimate, the Dragon Emperor’s flame and smoke.
Spirits distant, guiding birds, all causes contemplate the pattern.
Wondrous mystery circles six times, galloping ceases at Feng’s cinnabar.
Youthful constancy extends compassion, sincerity and vacuity dwell in the tranquil palace.
The Window’s strategy aids diligently, transcribing and dispelling with grasped brush.
Decrees bind the beginning of nurture, numinous themes compose the script.

**Dao’s Words:**
These are the boundless hidden speeches of the Great Brahma within the heavens, ancient scripts carved and inscribed within the Golden Towers and Jade Pavilions of the Flowering Chambers, to harmonize and regulate the Three Qi and pacify the myriad spirits. Each character spans a full *zhang* in breadth. The Heavenly Perfected and August Ones of old inscribed these texts to establish the true sounds. Those who know these sounds and can purify themselves to recite them shall have all the heavens dispatch Flying Celestial Divine Kings to descend and observe their persons, record their meritorious diligence, and ascend to report to the heavens. The myriad spirits shall pay homage, earthly deities attend at the gates, and the Great Merit Demon Kings shall protect and recommend the Three Mysteries. With the Dao perfected and attained, they may wander the Three Realms and ascend through the Golden Gate.

These sounds repel all, exorcise all, deliver all, and accomplish all—sounds of the Heavenly Perfected, spontaneous and natural. Thus, to recite them is to summon divine kings to descend and observe, the Supreme Emperor to chant from afar, the myriad spirits to pay homage, the Three Realms to attend in reverence. All malevolent beings bow their heads, ghostly essences vanish of themselves, jade chimes resound, the ten directions grow solemn and clear, rivers and seas fall silent, mountains and peaks swallow their mists. The myriad spirits tremble and submit, gathering immortals in assembly. The heavens are free of defilement, the earth devoid of demonic dust. Dark wisdom shines with luminous clarity, the vast measure is profoundly mysterious.

*The Marvelous Scripture of the Upper Chapters on the Limitless Salvation of Humanity, Scroll the Eighth—Concluded*
*Scroll the Ninth*

**The Jade Statutes of Yu-Yu: A Chapter**

The Dao spoke: Long ago in the Golden Radiance Azure-Light Heaven, within the Vermilion Empyrean’s flowing hymns of the Supreme Mystery’s wondrous land, the Limitless Upper Chapters of the Yu-Yu Jade Statutes were received from the Primordial Beginning’s salvation of humanity.

As the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning was about to expound this scripture, he circumambulated ten times to summon the ten directions, then ascended his seat. Heavenly perfected spirits, exalted sages, lofty worthies, perfected beings of wondrous conduct, the Nine Perfected of Highest Clarity, the perfected immortals of Yu-Yu, the true kings of the Three Realms, and countless multitudes arrived borne upon the void. Verdant blossoms and purple mists, jeweled chariots and cloud-borne carriages, numinous radiance and kingfisher canopies intermingled with the dawn’s glow, myriad hues resplendent, illuminating the empyrean vastness. For seven days and seven nights, the suns and moons of all heavens converged their light, the stars and constellations stilled their motion, and jade towers and pearl palaces shone as one. Heavenly winds brought gentle harmony, seas and mountains grew serene and clear. Throughout the land, mountains, rivers, forests, and groves leveled to perfect evenness, no longer high or low; the earth turned lustrous azure, moist and gleaming, its hues undifferentiated.

The assembled perfected beings took their seats as the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning sat in profound stillness upon a ninefold luminous jade-flowered treasure dais floating in the void. When he had expounded the scripture once, the great sages of all heavens simultaneously voiced their approval. At that moment, all men and women of the land awakened to the perfect enlightenment of wondrous nature, each attaining numinous clarity.

When he had expounded it a second time, their ears and eyes grew keen, awakening to Highest Clarity as the realm of Primordial Emptiness.

When he had expounded it a third time, their spirit and essence became firmly real.

When he had expounded it a fourth time, accumulated karmic deeds dissolved, and together they realized pure emptiness.

When he had expounded it a fifth time, calamities and illnesses ceased, and the seasons turned harmonious.

When he had expounded it a sixth time, wondrous qi transformed and circulated, and all things flourished.

When he had expounded it a seventh time, the true wind suffused all, and virtue/power renewed daily.

When he had expounded it an eighth time, the aged and infirm regained youth, all attaining long years.

When he had expounded it a ninth time, all universally received deliverance, ascending together as immortals.

When he had expounded it a tenth time, above in the heavens and below upon the earth, the myriad sages voiced their praise. At that moment, all men and women of the land were enveloped in the profound grace of the Dao, gazing upward in boundless reverence.

The Dao spoke: As the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning expounded the scripture once, the boundless and limitless perfected great spirits of the eastern direction, countless in number, arrived floating upon the void.

When he had expounded it a second time, the boundless and limitless perfected great spirits of the southern direction, countless in number, arrived floating upon the void.

When he had expounded it a third time, the boundless and limitless perfected great spirits of the western direction, countless in number, arrived floating upon the void.

When he had expounded it a fourth time, the boundless and limitless perfected great spirits of the northern direction, countless in number, arrived floating upon the void.

When he had expounded it a fifth time, the boundless and limitless perfected great spirits of the northeastern direction, countless in number, arrived floating upon the void.

When he had expounded it a sixth time, the boundless and limitless perfected great spirits of the southeastern direction, countless in number, arrived floating upon the void.

When he had expounded it a seventh time, the boundless and limitless perfected great spirits of the southwestern direction, countless in number, arrived floating upon the void.

When he had expounded it an eighth time, the boundless and limitless perfected great spirits of the northwestern direction, countless in number, arrived floating upon the void.

When he had expounded it a ninth time, the boundless and limitless perfected great spirits of the upper direction, countless in number, arrived floating upon the void.

When he had expounded it a tenth time, the boundless and limitless perfected great spirits of the lower direction, countless in number, arrived floating upon the void.

When the ten recitations were complete, the boundless perfected great spirits of the ten directions arrived as one. All men and women of the land turned their hearts in devotion, their numbers like fine rain or dense mist. Heavenly beings of subtle wonder merged with the utmost reality, their transformed bodies taking shape, branching into countless millions. Each declared to the other: “Through kalpas of awakening, we have realized the Dao, free from all defilements of dust. We have attained the dharmakāya, entered the contemplation of qi, and awakened to the profound emptiness. First, we dwelt in the Great Crimson Realm of Primordial Qi, the domain of the Dao’s wondrousness, within the realm of non-action. Next, we reached Yu-Yu, advancing in purity and truth, attaining the wondrous fruit and traversing the ultimate of the Dao. *Yu* speaks of vastness, *yu* of remoteness—boundless and infinite, thus it is called Yu-Yu, merging with the primordial essence to encompass all.”

“We have heard the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning expound the teachings, revealing the text of the Yu-Yu Jade Statutes, the supreme and greatest Dharma. It examines the true and tests the immortal, commands the myriad demons, dispels evil spirits, and transforms malevolence into goodness. Yet countless multitudes, half the land’s population, have caused the earth to sink unevenly, beyond restraint.”

The Celestial Worthy gazed down and addressed them all: “You who now study the Dao and ascend to truth, ranked among the Highest Clarity, dwelling in Yu-Yu—your dharmic nature is spontaneous, no longer subject to change. Gross habits are purified, subtle attachments do not arise; naturally, there are no faults, so what need is there for statutes? If one establishes teachings and imparts instruction to others, yet does not institute precepts and statutes to guide cultivation—it is like the Heavenly Emperor and the perfected immortals, who have transcended the nine grades and exhausted all karmic conditions, yet still wear square-toed shoes and round caps, bear swords and hold jade tablets, ride feathered chariots, and display dragon banners and phoenix canopies. These are established as models; how can they be disregarded? Now, I reveal the wondrousness of the Yu-Yu Jade Statutes, the texts that regulate the gods and sages of heaven and earth. Uphold them in your person, and their blessings will extend to ten thousand ancestors; practice them for a thousand days, and their grace will pervade the ten directions. Listen with reverence; do not neglect this divine text.”

Thereupon, the Celestial Worthy suspended a single treasure pearl, as large as a millet grain, in the midst of the empty mystery, five *zhang* above the earth. The Celestial Worthy led the way as the heavenly perfected spirits, exalted sages, lofty worthies, perfected beings of wondrous conduct, and the boundless perfected great spirits of the ten directions—countless multitudes—all entered the pearl. The heavenly beings gazed upward, seeing only a shimmering light entering the pearl’s mouth. Once inside, they knew not where they were. The people of the land dispersed, and the earth returned to levelness, no longer uneven or sunken.

Within the treasure pearl, the Celestial Worthy expounded the sutra in its entirety. The assembled perfected beings oversaw the transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration defied expression. Once the ritual affairs were roughly concluded, the myriad heavens resumed their positions, and in an instant, all fell silent without a trace of lingering resonance.

At that time, the celestial and mortal beings who encountered this scriptural Dharma were universally delivered and saved, preserving their allotted years without harm or injury. The entire land turned in reverence, all practicing the true Dao. Without selfishness or malice, without leakage or defilement, without entanglement or delusion, without desire or impurity, without greed or wrath. Their words were free from falsehood, their mouths chanting only virtuous sounds. Equal in compassion and love, even those of different bones became kin. The land was at peace, the people prosperous, rejoicing in great harmony as the scripture first emerged to teach.

In a kingdom where the Dao prevailed, those with sincere devotion who revered and honored it were all delivered across the world. The Dao declared: The teachings expounded by the Celestial Worthy of Original Beginning within this sutra are the inner names of the myriad heavenly Thearchs, the hidden rhymes of sound, as well as the concealed appellations of the True King of Jade Law of Yu Yu and the hundred spirits. They are the secrets of the Highest Clarity and the essentials of the Nine Perfected. Those who comprehend this Dao, through the Dharma, become real; through reality, they meet the Dao; the Dao’s subtlety merges with the spirit, forgetting the spirit in emptiness and guarding the Dao in nothingness. It presides before heaven and earth, and dwells alone after heaven and earth. Without the Jade Law of Yu Yu, how could the divine transformations reach every corner? This is no ordinary speech of the world.

The exalted sages who have attained perfection, who fathom the profound and investigate the subtle, can fully grasp its chapters. Reciting it ten times, the various immortals praise it, the ten thousand Thearchs rejoice, heaven and earth become pure and solemn, harmonious qi surges and blends. The Three Origins bestow auspicious signs, the Nine Ramparts emit blessings, subduing evil and demons, dispelling malevolent spirits and omens. The realms of suffering vanish, and all ascend to bliss. For those scholars devoted to learning, reciting it ten times will summon descending perfected spirits, attract wondrous essences, refine the spirit to attain immortality, and command the life-protecting deities to welcome them. They will deliver their seven ancestors, receive transformation in the Vermilion Mound, avert and dispel calamities—nothing will not be divine.

The reason for this is that the primordial true qi emerges from the Supreme Sovereign; the sounds of the mysterious void fully accord with the utmost extremity. The Primordial Chaos intermingles and excites, spreading virtue to generate and complete. All things in the multitude universally receive its grace. To recite this chapter lightly brings misfortune upon oneself. To honor and revere it brings prosperity to one’s household, flourishing through the generations, intertwined with good causes. Ten thousand disasters will not encroach, and divine luminaries will guard the gate.

This sutra is revered and wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital. It delivers boundless beings and is the origin of the ten thousand Dao. Its majestic and vast model is of virtue too great to surpass. The Dao declared: Whenever this sutra is recited ten times, the ten thousand sages stand in awe, and the myriad heavens arrive in unison. With the Jade Law of Yu Yu, they examine and restrain the immortals and sages, commanding the divine spirits—none fail to revere and fear it. It commands the release of the Northern Feng, delivering the suffering souls of billions of ancestors, guiding them to ascend to the Vermilion Palace, where after nine years of refinement, they receive transformation and rebirth, becoming noble persons.

Those who diligently study this sutra, fulfilling their merit and perfecting their virtue, will govern the ten thousand spirits, their Dao extending to all beings, all attaining divine immortality. They will ascend to the Golden Gates and wander in the Jade Capital. For advanced scholars who cultivate and recite this sutra, the divine Thearchs descend in assembly. The Three Fields and Nine Palaces, the Caverns of Radiance, gather and illuminate, their jade light resplendent. The body’s spiritual fortress is secured, and they attain longevity.

For mortals who receive and recite it, past sins are dissolved. Those who follow the Dao and aspire to immortality, accumulating good deeds, will transcend worldly bonds. Later, they will all achieve the Dao of liberation through apparent death, their souls and spirits temporarily extinguished, bypassing hell to immediately regain their forms and roam the great void. This sutra is subtle and wondrous, universally delivering without end. All celestial and mortal beings receive its blessings, its boundless fortune bestowing grace upon life and death.

It is treasured by heaven and not transmitted to the lower world. Only the most devoted scholars, offering gold and treasures to express their sincerity, may swear an oath to heaven and transmit it. To leak or disrespect it lightly brings calamity upon nine generations, condemning them to long servitude under the ghost officials. The Five Thearchs attend the sutra, with twenty-four Jade Lads and twenty-four Jade Maidens each, safeguarding the divine text and protecting the bodies of those who receive it.

The Dao declared: During the long fast of the first month, recite and chant this sutra, and the Azure Thearch will uphold the law, the Heavenly Officials will report merit, delivering the souls of past generations from earthly servitude to ascend to the Southern Palace. During the long fast of the seventh month, recite and chant this sutra, and the White Thearch will uphold the law, the Earthly Officials will report merit. The body attains divine immortality, and the names of the various heavens are inscribed on the Yellow Register and White Slips, erasing death and recording life. During the long fast of the tenth month, recite and chant this sutra, and the Black Thearch will uphold the law, the Water Officials will report merit. For kings, emperors, lords, ministers, fathers, and sons, it will stabilize the nation’s destiny, preserving the heavens’ longevity, ensuring the lineage endures through the generations, perpetually ruling as sovereigns, securing their domains, and bringing peace to the people.

On the days of the eight solar terms, recite and chant this sutra, and the laws will encompass the eight heavens, alerting and exhorting the hundred spirits, enabling one to become a Perfected of the Nine Palaces. On one’s natal day, recite and chant this sutra, and the Crimson Palace will receive the true, summoning spirits in accordance with the law. The hun and po souls will be purified, the ten thousand qi will endure, suffering will be avoided, and the body will radiate light. The Three Realms will attend and guard, the Five Thearchs will welcome, the ten thousand spirits will pay homage, the name will be inscribed in heaven. With merit fulfilled and virtue perfected, one will ascend to the Highest Clarity.

The Dao declared: On the days of practicing the Dao, one should bathe with fragrant water, enter the chamber in purification, face east, and knock the teeth thirty-two times, ascending to be heard by the thirty-two heavens. Bow thirty-two times in the heart. Close the eyes and silently envision the body seated amidst clouds of nine-colored luminous qi, both within and without shrouded in mystery. A Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Warrior, Lion, and White Crane array themselves to the left and right. The sun and moon illuminate brilliantly, suffusing the chamber with radiance. A circular image appears above the neck, its light shining in the ten directions—all clearly manifest.

The secret incantation says:
"Supreme Mysterious Origin, Most High Dao Lord, summon forth from within my body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the left and right official messengers, the Jade Lads attending incense, the Jade Maidens transmitting words, the Five Thearchs’ direct talismans, the incense officials of the day—thirty-two each—to report and convey these words."

Today is an auspicious and joyous occasion, the hall purified through prolonged fasting, the scripture of cultivation recited to deliver boundless beings. May these words ascend unobstructed, reaching the august presence of the Most High Primordial Sovereign of the Thirty-Two Heavens. Conclude by drawing qi thirty-two times, then face east to recite the scripture:

*The Supreme and Wondrous Scripture of the Limitless Salvation of Humankind*
*The Primordial Dao of the Cavernous Mystery, the Fundamental Chapter of Numinous Treasure*
*The Jade Canon of Yu’s Remnant, the Supreme Scripture of Salvation*
*The Hidden Rhymes of the Thearch’s Perfection, spontaneously coalescing and dispersing*
*Crimson Chaos of the Great Non-Being, the Jade Void of the Mysterious Above*
*The Three Origins open the kalpas, giving birth and transformation to Yu’s Remnant*
*Vast and boundless, the most wondrous realm*
*The Numinous Treasure Heavenly Lords, deities of the Cavernous Mystery,*
*Emerging from the Jade Capital, forming the Perfected of the Highest Clarity*
*At the dawn of the Dragon Han kalpa, accumulated qi blossoms in radiance,*
*Flying spirits resplendent, the luminous and wondrous scripture shines forth*
*Arranged into regulations and compendia, the canonical chapters*
*Govern the myriad heavens, the immortals, sages, and numinous perfected*
*Discerning good and evil, restraining malevolent influences,*
*Preventing their wanton rampage, corruption, and deviation from rectitude*
*Regulating and restraining the sources of evil, blocking and severing the roots of calamity*
*This is the primordial model, the foundation of transformation and nurturance*

*The Flowery Gates of Great Harmony, the Cloud City of Eight Effulgences*
*The Purple Palace of Great Illumination, the Jade Firmament’s Gem Chambers*
*The Grand Tenuity harmonizing the dawn, the Sevenfold Radiance of the Long Towers*
*Vaulted domes linked in succession, streaming light scattering and floating*
*Within resides the Mysterious Perfected, the deity of life-deliverance*
*Within resides the Cinnabar Spirit, the lord of life-prolonging and fate-determining registers*
*Within resides the Great Deity of Jade Dawn’s Ascendant Life*
*Within resides the Heavenly Venerable of the Great Origin*
*Within resides the Most High Purple Tenuity’s Inspector of Deeds and Examiner of Transgressions*

*Resurrecting the dead, delivering boundless beings,*
*Today the celestial records are examined, the heavens descend in state*
*The Limitless Flying Heaven’s Master of the Law, Divine King of the East,*
*The Great Sage of Longevity, the Limitless Deliverer of Humankind*
*The Limitless Flying Heaven’s Master of the Law, Divine King of the South,*
*The Great Sage of Longevity, the Limitless Deliverer of Humankind*

*The Great Sage of Longevity, the Limitless Deliverer of Humankind*
*The Limitless Flying Heaven’s Master of the Law, Divine King of the North,*
*The Great Sage of Longevity, the Limitless Deliverer of Humankind*
*The Limitless Flying Heaven’s Master of the Law, Divine King of the Northeast,*
*The Great Sage of Longevity, the Limitless Deliverer of Humankind*
*The Limitless Flying Heaven’s Master of the Law, Divine King of the Southeast,*
*The Great Sage of Longevity, the Limitless Deliverer of Humankind*
*The Limitless Flying Heaven’s Master of the Law, Divine King of the Southwest,*
*The Great Sage of Longevity, the Limitless Deliverer of Humankind*
*The Limitless Flying Heaven’s Master of the Law, Divine King of the Northwest,*
*The Great Sage of Longevity, the Limitless Deliverer of Humankind*
*The Limitless Flying Heaven’s Master of the Law, Divine King of the Above,*
*The Great Sage of Longevity, the Limitless Deliverer of Humankind*
*The Limitless Flying Heaven’s Master of the Law, Divine King of the Below,*
*The Great Sage of Longevity, the Limitless Deliverer of Humankind*
*The Perfect Lords of the Ten Directions, the Flying Heaven’s Masters of the Law,*
*The Great Deities of Longevity and World-Deliverance*

*All ride upon the morning clouds, vermilion chariots and jeweled carriages,*
*Emerald canopies and feathered canopies, drawn by jade-flower phoenixes and nine-qi black dragons*
*Bearing the Three-Colored Standards of the Highest Clarity, myriad-effulgence numinous banners,*
*Preceded by the wondrous music of Great Harmony, followed by the divine hymns of Cavernous Transformation*
*Lions and white cranes, roaring and singing in melodious harmony,*
*Nine-hued banners flanking, three-pure escorts attending the carriage*
*Countless chariots and ten thousand riders, arriving through the void,*
*Dancing and circling the celestial vault, their gazes streaming toward the Highest Mystery*
*The True Thearchs of the Eight Poles, the Dao Lords of the Ten Directions,*
*The divine officials and masters of the law, the numinous officials and high ministers*
*Purple texts and azure tablets, universally presiding and arriving in unison,*
*Examining merits and delivering the virtuous, inspecting and restraining the sources of evil*
*Swiftly traversing the myriad realms, the cavernous palaces and hidden passes,*
*The Great Origin’s Register of Destiny, safeguarding the primordial vitality of the young*
*The Thirty-Six Palaces, the shifting of Kunlun and Langfeng,*
*Each receiving the decrees, safeguarding and delivering the people*
*Dispelling baleful qi, extending auspicious blessings,*
*Refining the numinous essence, flourishing together with the Dao*
*Descending to aid the dark springs, the Three Offices and Northern Feng,*
*Investigating the origins of sin and fortune, refining and transforming in the Crimson Mound*
*All converge in true qi, returning to form and receiving life,*
*Embodied and delivered, enduring through kalpas*
*Revolving with the kalpas, sharing the years of heaven,*
*Forever delivered from the Three Paths, Five Sufferings, and Eight Difficulties,*
*Transcending the Three Realms, roaming freely in the Highest Clarity*

*The Heaven of Highest Clarity, where the Heavenly Thearch dwells in purity,*
*The realm of the Mysterious Void, the pure conduct of Brahma*
*The Eight Heavens of the East:*
*Heaven of Azure Transformation and Yang Model, ruled by the August Lord Huiji Puzun*
*Heaven of the Departmental Perfected and Talismanic Dragons, ruled by the August Lord Nihe Yiyuan*
*Heaven of Radiant Prosperity and Great Illumination, ruled by the August Lord Yaochang Biyun*

*The Eight Heavens of the South:*

*Heaven of the Prime Minister’s Noble Life, ruled by the August Lord Queyun Zhucang*

*Heaven of Northern Administration and Balanced Power, ruled by the August Lord Yinzheng Qushi*
*Heaven of True Dao’s Manifest Fragrance and Lofty Command, ruled by the August Lord Juelong Zongwang*

The Heaven of Mysterious Yellow and Cavernous Void with Radiant Descent, ruled by the August Lord Miaosheng Zhiyun.
The Heaven of Jade Court and Primordial Essence, ruled by the August Lord Lizhen Weifen.
The Heaven of Dragon Brahma and Infant Transformation, ruled by the August Lord Gechang Ju.
The Heaven of Spring Spirit and Utmost Darkness, ruled by the August Lord Tuibai Lei.

The Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two August Lords—
the hidden names of the heavens, the concealed titles of the heavens.
Within the heavens lies emptiness, the spontaneous numinous script;
the hidden rhymes of the heavens, the sounds of Yu Yu.

The honor of Supreme Clarity, the spirits of Supreme Clarity,
the true demons of Supreme Clarity, the numina of Supreme Clarity.
Mysterious Void in its ultimate function, the root of all transformations,
the boundless mystery, too profound to fathom.

Overseeing the numinous net, directing the mechanism to activate the true,
today we proclaim the wondrous transformation, universally announcing to the Three Origins.
Crushing demons and eradicating trials, exalting the virtuous and promoting their ascent.
Examining and determining the illustrated registers, inscribing names as Emperor-Immortals,
recommended by the Mysterious Master, transcending the Great Mystery.

The Eastern Dipper governs calendars, the Western Dipper determines punishments,
the Northern Dipper investigates wrongs, the Southern Dipper oversees treachery,
the Central Dipper upholds transformation, wielding and distributing great authority.

The Azure Emperor preserves life, the White Emperor assists in completion,
the Red Emperor presents merits, the Black Emperor pardons sins,
the Yellow Emperor circulates everywhere, expanding auspicious assemblies.

The Azure Rhythm Divine King guards the Emperor’s Net-Heaven.
The Red Rhythm Divine King publicly declares the origins of punishment.
The White Rhythm Divine King beheads and captures at Feng Spring.
The Black Rhythm Divine King rescues and judges hidden treachery.
The Yellow Rhythm Divine King oversees the Five Peaks’ central offices.

The Inspecting Rhythm True Demons, the ancestors of all spirits,
flying and marching in procession, commanding the ghostly legions.
Brandishing banners and drums, roaming and observing the Great Void,
divine majesty resplendent, all heavens unite in merit.

The Jade Rhythm of Supreme Clarity strictly governs Northern Feng,
the Divine Kings receive their mandate, universally sweeping away inauspiciousness.
Golden essence soars in radiance, lightning bolts surge in all four directions,
the Tail of the Tiger leads the vanguard, jade-armored soldiers raise their banners.
Flowing essence hurls fire, threatening the eight southern passes.
Dare any resist or obstruct the Perfected Ones?
Golden-headed beings execute the front, heavenly couriers punish from behind.
Slaughtering and dismembering ghostly fiends, wind and fire never cease.
Thousands upon thousands beheaded, myriads upon myriads dismembered—
demons dare not trespass, ghosts dare not harbor malevolent essence.

The Three Offices of Northern Feng meticulously inspect ghostly encampments,
no concealment permitted, reported by the Golden Horse Post.
Universally proclaimed without end, all spirits heed,
the Five Emperors of the Three Realms submit their words to Supreme Clarity.

The Jade Rhythm of Yu Yu, Celestial Script of One Hundred Sixty-One Characters:
Inscribed in azure on white silk, worn to guard the body with a hundred spirits.
Carved on the heart of red dates, used to seal all illnesses—effective.
All spirits follow the heart, every use instantly responsive.

The Great Jade Rhythm of the Jade Dawn, the wondrous script of the Three Heavens.
The Three Qi cavernously unite, blending and transforming into primordial clarity,
the Heavenly Title: Great Crimson.
The Primordial as Supreme Clarity, the Heavenly Title: Yu Yu.
The Origin as Jade Clarity, the Heavenly Title: Pure Subtlety.
Before the Three Qi divided, all cavernously merged as one;
when the Three Radiances opened their light, the Three Qi then separated.

In the era of Crimson Chaos, the Jade Rhythm lay hidden,
primordial qi interwoven, forming patterns in its embrace.
Its qi concealed and stored, merging into jade essence,
through countless eons in the midst of primordial chaos.
The Upper Mystery dense and misty, the Lower Origin scattered and dispersed,
wondrous qi vast and boundless, jade light congealing into essence.

The Primordial Beginning’s Emperor-Soul, first becoming a divine infant,
wind as the primordial, water as the mysterious, cavernous void as its body.
Golden radiance illuminating the heavens, the beginning of resplendent script,
the Dao’s model already manifest, opening transformation without end.

The realm of Yu Yu, the source of all Ways,
flowing and evolving regulations, naturally operating and delivering.
The scriptures uphold all deliverances, boundless and innumerable,
the numinous records of the Mysterious Palace, governing and inspecting the true and dark.

Preserving the kalpa’s assembly, the qi of life eternally enduring,
primordial Brahma intertwined, the Thirty-Two Heavens.
Revolving the wheel of numinous virtue, circling the ten directions,
above connecting the Emperor’s abode, below traversing the cavernous palaces.

Proclaiming the hidden chapters, the nine-ranked talismanic scripts,
whistling and chanting to gather qi, numinous winds amassing mists.
Purple emptiness lush and elegant, assisting and sheltering the myriad immortals,
thousands harmonizing, myriads uniting, spontaneously becoming true.

Within the true resides the spirit, the Great Lord of Longevity,
the Peerless Duke, the Venerable White Prime.
The Lords of the Four Poles, the Primordial August Sovereign,
the Prohibiting Honorable Spirits, the keepers of the records in the Mysterious Capital.

Determining and selecting the lofty spirits, encompassing the mysterious registers,
promoting and delivering those destined for immortality, ascending to roam Supreme Clarity,
entering and exiting the Flowery Chambers, descending to extend true qi.
The essence of numinous subtlety, descending to irrigate the Gate of Life,
the Crimson Chamber of the Muddy Pellet, harmonizing the Five Qi within,
merging the hundred spirits.

Nine transformations revolving the winds, myriad qi uniting as immortals,
the immortal Dao values life, boundlessly delivering people.
Opening the Eight Gates above, flying spirits to convey sincerity,
paying homage to the Emperor-Sovereigns, the seven ancestors ascending together.
Prohibitions on sin and blessings, karmic causes and conditions,
universally receiving deliverance, dead souls reborn in bodies,
bodies attaining rebirth, ascending to report to the various heavens.
Above the various heavens, each has its immortal gate.
Within lies the Cavernous Void’s ballad and song,
the true kings’ numinous chapters, verses matching the lofty Perfected.

**First: The Jade Rhythm of Yu Yu, the Pure Mystery’s Flying Void Melody**
Beyond the three realms, vast and distant,
primordial qi congeals into cinnabar mystery.
Amid jade towers and resplendent mists,
crimson gates connect with vermilion smoke.
Within resides the Lord of Emptiness,
governing and transforming, ruling all heavens.
Wondrously inspecting, inscribing jade script,
emerging before the Great Beginning.
The Three Luminaries radiant and bright,
weaving and encompassing all spirits.
Investigating and restraining a hundred wrongs,
preserving and delivering moral people.
Aligning with the pure and responding to the standard,
what need to fear demonic hordes?
Cavernous radiance without distant burdens,
countless kalpas forgetting loss and gain.
Who knows this ultimate use?
It can preserve eternal endurance.

**Second: The Jade Rhythm’s Chapter on Inspecting and Restraining Spirits**
At the dawn of the Crimson Clarity’s great kalpa,
mysterious purity illuminated jade script.
Majestic the Numinous Treasure Lord,
grasping the origin of all transformations.
Lord of heaven, earth, mountains, and rivers,
spirits and controllers wield my authority.
Yin and yang harmoniously unite,
vast and boundless, free from evil and treachery.
Regulating the qi of great peace,
evil and upright must not interfere.
Upholding my rhythmic scriptures,
daily preserving the flourishing of virtue and power.

Should any dare to spread poisonous tyranny,
defiling my pure and tranquil breeze,
the Five Emperors shall unleash their might,
swiftly dispatching them to the Flowing Fire Palace.
Deceit and recklessness, though clamorous,
shall find no tolerance in my restraint.
Merits and faults bear no slightest error—
their records ascend to the Jade Firmament’s halls.
Those with karmic affinity transcend,
together returning to the Great Mystery.

**Third: The Jade Rhythm’s Hymn of the Primordial Sovereign’s Ascension**
I traverse the Upper Clarity’s realm,
gazing back upon the Three Realms below.
With a gesture, I overlook the myriad heavens;
in an instant, I rein the soaring dragons.
The human body is but a temporary hut,
while the inch-field is assailed by a hundred delusions.
Unknowing that spirit and qi will exhaust,
the Five Paths become like cages.
One must contemplate the vision of absolute learning,
where the Dao’s qi perpetually intermingles.
Spirit congeals, form naturally parts,
mysterious shadows blend in obscurity.
Yin extinguished, demonic filth vanishes,
pure emptiness merges with the Great Void.
Refined into an immortal’s essence,
the record ascends to the Azure Lads.
When true subtlety fills to overflowing,
blessings extend to ancestral lineages.
Treading the radiance, I stride the vast expanse—
how could ten thousand kalpas ever end?
Were I not a lofty perfected one,
how could I aspire to the Primordial Chaos?
Heavenly beings join my journey,
unsurpassed joy knows no bounds.
Were it not for these rhythmic precepts,
how could the mysterious breeze be stirred?

Above the Three Realms,
within the flight of emptiness,
resounds the song of the True Kings,
its melody interwoven with cavernous hymns.
Recite it a hundred times,
and your name shall pass through the Southern Palace.
Recite it a thousand times,
and the True Kings shall safeguard and welcome you.
Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao,
ascending through the Great Void,
transcending the Three Realms,
to be enthroned as an Immortal Duke.
Those who hear this numinous sound
shall be revered by the True Kings,
who command earthly deities
to escort and attend them.
Delivered from the earthly gates,
the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships,
seven generations of ancestors ascend,
forever freed from the earthly barriers.
The soul crosses the Vermilion Mound,
undergoes refinement, and is reborn—
this is called the immeasurable,
universal deliverance without end.

Secret scriptures of the heavens above,
revered by all celestial realms.
To leak or profane them is to fall into hell,
bringing calamity upon seven generations of ancestors.

The Dao declares: These two chapters are the hidden melodies of the Celestial Emperors and the Numinous True Kings, the Jade Rhythms of Yu’s Remnant. They govern heaven and earth, restrain immortals and spirits, and comprise the most solemn celestial prohibitions—no ordinary words of the world. Their language lacks ornate beauty, their tunes lack florid embellishment; thus, they are profound and obscure, difficult to fathom. Treasured by the heavens, they are concealed within the Eastern Scripture’s Treasure Chamber of the Divine Firmament’s Jade Clarity. When the Dao Lord opened the teachings, they flowed forth in accordance with the kalpa’s turning.

Should a perfected one, bearing gold and treasures with a sincere heart, follow the ancient rites to pledge allegiance to the Ten Heavens, only then shall they be bestowed.

The Dao declares: The Jade Rhythms of Yu’s Remnant oversee the myriad perfected ones, recording merits and faults, scrutinizing the hundred spirits. When heaven and earth’s movements reach their end, when the sun, moon, and five stars wane and wax, when the most sagely and divine suffer decline, or when lesser scholars fall ill—all such disasters are governed by celestial officials appointed to oversee them. Thus, the gains and losses of the azure heavens are subject to the Jade Rhythms’ examination; no private interference is permitted. Should any dare to conceal or act recklessly, inviting misfortune and blame, the Rhythms shall not pardon them. All of shared destiny must unite in heart to perform purification rites, burn incense in the six periods, and recite the scriptures ten times.

When Daoists ascend the altar, solemn and orderly, reciting this great scripture of the Jade Rhythms in accordance with the rites, blessings and virtue shall descend at once, dispelling all inauspicious omens. This boundless text universally delivers without end.

The Dao declares: When lesser scholars of shallow attainment, or those whose immortal rank remains unfulfilled, face the kalpa’s end and pass through the Great Yin, at the moment of their crossing, fellow scholars and perfected ones shall burn incense and recite the scriptures ten times on their behalf, to deliver the corpse in accordance with the rites. Then the Earthly Officials, upholding the Rhythms, shall investigate; earthly deities shall restrain the soul and refine the corpse. The wind-tigers within the earth shall not harm them, and the soul shall ascend directly to the Southern Palace, where, according to their accumulated merit, they shall be reborn after a calculated time. No longer bewildered by the turning wheel, they shall attain immortality.

The Dao declares: When the movements of heaven and earth reach their end, when the constellations fall into disarray, the sun and moon lose their brightness, the four seasons falter, yin and yang fall out of harmony, nations suffer floods and droughts, warfare and banditry arise, plagues and poisons spread, the people perish in great numbers, masters and friends pass away, and those of shared destiny meet their end—all such transgressions against the Jade Rhythms and violations feared by the spirits—one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures. The merit of fasting and reciting scriptures is profound: above, it dispels celestial disasters and safeguards the emperor; below, it wards off poisons and delivers the people. Both the living and the dead benefit, their blessings beyond measure—thus it is called the immeasurable, universally delivering heaven and humanity.

The Dao declares: Whoever possesses this scripture and performs these meritorious deeds for the rulers of heaven and earth and the people shall, on days of disaster, resolve to perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures ten times. All the heavens shall record their names, and the myriad spirits shall attend and protect them. Those distinguished as perfected ones shall become ministers of the Golden Gates of the Sagely Lord. The heavens record merits and faults with flawless precision. The True Kings of the heavens shall also safeguard and recommend them, and those who attain the Dao shall thoroughly comprehend these ultimate words.

The immeasurable hidden sounds of the Great Brahma in the heavens—
Composed by the Dao Lord,
The Jade Volume of the Numinous Writings of Yu’s Remnant from the Primordial Beginning,
The Eight Heavens of the Eastern Direction.

The Chamber and Heaven’s Odes intertwine, Han and Tuo pledge in darkness.
Veiled leaks and the Marquises of Yi, the true Alignments of Guan and Shen.
Encroaching shadows and silk-bound strikes, azure threads winding through courier peaks.
Jade endures to revive governance, proclaimed as the Nine Nets of Huan.
Elusive nets and upright ugliness, rosy clouds spun to discard gold.
Dew’s radiance suddenly soars, rejoicing in the embankments of streams.
Joy unfolds in jade stillness, the treasure-fluid cauldron overflows.
Discerning the celestial stems’ auspices, the Three Perfected of Ren and He.

**The Eight Heavens of the Southern Direction**
The Divine Auroras of Shenxiao, alerting the Azure Tiger’s mists.
The pot’s square settles within, decrees empowering the numinous.
Peaks shall slay demons, wisdom’s light purifies the primordial.
Relying on shamans to appear, examining souls and hidden proclamations.
Immortal arts depend on intent, the true flower’s mandate summons.
Escaping the scorched path to save the burning, the Great Celestial Purple Lord.
The Heavenly Peak’s secret taboos, the inner seclusion of the Dharma Wheel.
The Pengfu oversees and monitors, transforming and delivering the seed-people.

**The Eight Heavens of the Western Direction**
The Jade Gates of the Luminous Capital, unveiling the Kunlun’s jade moon.
Fire commands hurl thunder, the Eight Slaughters restrain and inspect.
The stalwart fortresses of divine emperors, quaking sincerity governs immortals.
Vast and drifting, servitude and punishment, the outstanding summon the Dragon Crags.
Engraving distant paths, the Prosperous Gate enters the true.
Flying armor and hastening halberds, stabilizing the marvelous Left Spirits.
Surveying Jin and Yin’s springs, darkly penetrating the lucid souls.
Returning transformations to hidden protection, the Eastern Talisman Dao Lord.

**The Eight Heavens of the Northern Direction**
The Dao’s vast beauty in time, the void’s essence and the Yellow Governance.
Pervasive samādhi, Dharma treasures played and presented.
The Jade Mystery’s radiant scripture, the Mao light’s embryonic subtlety.
Concealed purity spans the distant, the silent abyss of pure subtlety.
Crimson shrines awaken the numinous, relying on them to assist the king.
Glancing to aid vast shores, moisture nourishing the splendid wilderness.
The Dipper Youth records the charts, unfolding the ford’s ancestral roots.
Endless obscurity without trace, the echoing resilience of Lu’s strength.

The Dao states: These are the Great Brahma’s hidden sounds within the heavens, the inner stanzas of the Jade Canon, the immeasurable tones. The ancient text was inscribed upon the Jade Gates of Yu’s Remnant, to rectify the script of the Jade Canon. The Upper, Middle, and Lower Perfected, the honored spirits of the heavenly officials, reverently bear it and dare not transgress. It is not for the governors of the underworld, the two-thousand-bushel lords, to receive and uphold. Each character spans a full *zhang* in length. Those who study and attain it may soar in spirit to Yu’s Remnant, receive office in the Jade Celestial Court, or dwell hidden in cloud abodes, descending to wander among mortals. They may employ its Dao to summon and command mountain spirits, examine and record the myriad ghosts, and inscribe their names in the Upper Clarity.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign of old transcribed this text to establish the correct intonation. Those who know its sounds and can fast and recite it shall have all the heavens dispatch the Central Heaven’s demonic generals—seven named great commanders—and the Perfected Immortals of the Great One to descend and observe their bodies, attaching to their original spirits. For the multitudes, they bestow numinosity, record their meritorious diligence, and memorialize the heavens. The myriad spirits pay homage, earth deities attend at the gates, and the Great Merit Perfected Kings safeguard and recommend the Divine Auroras. When the Dao is complete and attained, one may wander the Three Realms and ascend through the Golden Gates.

This sound repels all, exorcises all, delivers all, and accomplishes all—it is the Heavenly Perfected’s natural tone. Thus, reciting it causes divine demons to descend and observe, the Celestial Thearch to echo in song, the myriad spirits to pay homage, the Three Realms to attend at the chariots, and all malevolent beings to bow their heads while ghostly essences perish of themselves. The jade-like resonance vibrates, the ten directions grow solemn and pure, rivers and seas fall silent, mountains and peaks swallow their mists. The myriad spirits tremble and submit, summoning and gathering the host of immortals. Heaven is free of miasmic filth, earth is without demonic dust. Profound wisdom illuminates the pure, the vast and mysterious abyss of the abyss.

**The Wondrous Sutra of the Numinous Treasure’s Immeasurable Deliverance of Humanity, Upper Chapter, Scroll the Ninth—Concluded**
**Scroll the Tenth**

**The Great Scarlet Writ of the Numinous Treasure**

The Dao spoke: Long ago in the Purple Dawn Heaven, within the Great Luminous Treasure Land of soaring golden and azure radiance, the Primordial Beginning received the *Great Scarlet Writ of the Immeasurable Upper Chapters on Deliverance*. As the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning was about to expound this sutra, he circumambulated ten times to summon the ten directions, then ascended his seat.

The Heavenly Perfected, the Most High and Venerable, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct, the True Kings of Grand Purity, the Sages of the Seven Heavens, the Jade Bureau of the Supreme Ultimate, their attendant officials left and right, the numinous officials and youths—an innumerable host—came riding upon the void. Cloud-borne chariots and flying carriages, jade palanquins and wheel-rimmed coaches, crimson canopies casting shadows, jade blossoms scattering radiance, five hues streaming in dazzling brilliance, illumining the vast firmament.

For five days and five nights, the realms of the heavens and the Dao’s domains, the profound and flourishing carriages, the divine nets ceasing their wheels, the jade standards and golden pivots—all halted their motion at once. The winds of heaven stilled their whispers, empty images congealed in the empyrean, clouds concealed their ripples, and the cosmos grew serene and pure. The lands, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees of the entire realm leveled into perfect evenness, no longer high or low; the earth became translucent, its piled verdure glowing with radiance, no hue differing from another.

The host of Perfected attended the seat as the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning sat in profound stillness upon a floating five-hued luminous jade lotus. After expounding the sutra once, the great sages of the heavens all praised it as excellent. At that moment, all men and women of the realm awakened to the Great Void and attained the Dao of non-action.

After expounding the sutra a second time, they perceived the Dharma-body in its entirety, forever free from the dust of defilement.

After expounding it a third time, their minds transcended the wondrous origin, penetrating all Dharma-aspects.

After expounding it a fourth time, their divine wisdom became complete, and they roamed freely in flight.

After expounding it a fifth time, their eloquence flowed like a stream, proclaiming the supreme Dao.

After expounding it a sixth time, they reflected upon the radiance of the womb-light, their concentration endless.

After expounding it a seventh time, the Jade Palaces harmonized their qi, and the divine palaces streamed with pearls.

After expounding it an eighth time, the kalpa-trees turned their shadows, universally shading the heavens.

After expounding it a ninth time, the myriad beings flourished, none perishing prematurely.

After expounding it a tenth time, heavenly music floated in the void, cloud encampments and auspicious mists gathered. At that moment, all men and women of the realm turned their hearts in devotion, all received protection and deliverance, and all attained longevity.

The Dao spoke: At that time, as the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning expounded the sutra once, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the East, an innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

After expounding it a second time, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the South, an innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

After expounding it a third time, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the West, an innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

After expounding it a fourth time, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the North, an innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

After expounding it a fifth time, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the Northeast, an innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

After expounding it a sixth time, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the Southeast, an innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

After expounding it a seventh time, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the Southwest, an innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

After expounding it an eighth time, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the Northwest, an innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

After expounding it a ninth time, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the Upper Realm, an innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

After expounding it a tenth time, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the Primordial Ultimate of the Lower Realm, an innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

When the ten recitations were complete, the boundless Heavenly Perfected Great Spirits of the ten directions and ten realms arrived as one. All men and women of the realm turned their hearts in devotion. Those who came were like drifting clouds laden with rain—an innumerable host, each bowing their heads to reverently salute the jade steps.

They declared: "Our heavens reside above the multitudes of living beings, within the Great Scarlet Void of Grand Purity. The myriad phenomena of heaven arise with thought and vanish with its cessation. Vast and boundless, radiant and expansive, within the realm of the Dao, the nine qi and sacred ranks ascend beyond all karmic entanglements. All empty imaginings, neither existing nor non-existing, are transcended, and enlightenment is eternal.

The Great Scarlet Heaven is the third of the Great Voids, its luminous realm suffused with the hues of the Three Flowers. Below, it stabilizes the revolving wheels, safeguarding the celestial palaces. We reverently hear that the Celestial Worthy has revealed this Numinous Writ in the Supreme Ultimate and August Perfected Immortal Realm, manifesting its profound mysteries. Within the empyrean, all beings—even those in the divine continents and immeasurable worlds—attain the supreme fruit and accumulate boundless merit. We each align our minds with the Dao, awaiting the supreme words of the Great Perfected Law."

Thereupon, the Primordial Beginning suspended a single treasure-pearl, as large as a millet grain, in the void five *zhang* above the earth. The Celestial Worthy ascended and led the Heavenly Perfected, the Most High and Venerable, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected Great Spirits of the ten directions, and the innumerable host—all entering into the treasure-pearl. The heavenly beings gazed upward and saw the Great Scarlet Writ of the Numinous Treasure entirely within the pearl, its expanse a *zhang* wide, its eight corners casting rays. They saw only a surging brilliance entering through the pearl’s opening. Once inside, its whereabouts were unknown.

The people dispersed, and the earth returned to levelness, no longer sunken. Within the treasure-pearl, the Celestial Worthy completed the sutra’s exposition in full. The host of Perfected oversaw its transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words.

When the Dharma rites were roughly concluded, the heavens returned to their stations. In an instant, all was silent, no sound lingering. At that time, the heavenly beings who encountered the sutra’s teachings were universally delivered, their lifespans preserved in full, free from harm. The entire realm turned in devotion, all attaining the mysterious void—thoughtless and unthinking, formless and soundless, free from killing and desire, from defilement and filth, from delusion and selfishness.

Words held no florid adornment, speech bore no harsh sound. Alike in compassion and love, even those of different bones became kin. The land stood secure, the people prospered, rejoicing in great peace. When the sutra first emerged as teaching, the entire realm followed the Dao. Those who held utmost sincerity, revered and honored it, all attained deliverance across the ages.

The Dao declared: The names spoken by the Boundless Celestial Worthy within the sutra’s exposition are the inner appellations of the myriad heavenly Lords, the hidden rhymes of sound, also the Great Crimson Numinous Script, the Jade Characters of the Nine Empyreans, the concealed names of the Supreme Perfected. They are not the common words of this world.

The ranked sages, having realized true immortality, penetrated the profound and fathomed the subtle, girding themselves with the Crimson Script. Those who master its chapters and recite them ten times over—heavenly hosts chant afar, the ten thousand Emperors render homage, the numinous script unfolds in vastness, transforming the ten directions into mystery. All divine spirits return to perfect resonance; the true Dao emerges in manifestation. Hordes of demons bind their forms, ghostly essences extinguish their clarity, cinnabar characters open life, reviving corpses from death, transmuting white bones into living beings.

For scholars of the highest learning, reciting it ten times elevates their qi beyond the five celestial bodies, their virtue stirs the three realms. Demon essences lose their sight, ghostly perversities extinguish their clarity. Those on the brink of death are rescued and delivered; the sunken rise to ascend.

The reason for this: when scholars first comprehend the mysterious void, their Dao ascends to the Great Crimson, reverently savoring the numinous script. Though their embodiment has yet to merge with the ultimate truth, they wield power to restrain the hundred demons and penetrate the profound. They deliver the myriad subtleties, yet only ascend—unable to fully penetrate the mystery.

To recite these chapters lightly brings calamity upon oneself. To offer reverent devotion and honor opens the gates to flourishing; generation after generation thrives in splendor, bound to good karmic causes. Ten thousand disasters cannot encroach; divine luminaries guard the gate. This sutra is most venerable and wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital. It delivers countless beings, serving as the root of all Dao. Its majestic and vast model of virtue is beyond measure.

The Dao speaks: Those who recite this sutra ten times and attain comprehension shall have their Dao harmonize with the Great Crimson, their qi unite with the Supreme Clarity. All karmic entanglements and worldly obstructions dissolve in that very moment. Abiding in singular mystery and void, faint as a shadow, radiant and serene, they perceive with crystalline clarity the wondrous essence of the Dao—thus becoming perfected beings. All heavens assemble; billions of ancestors across myriad generations, along with suffering souls in darkness, are immediately delivered. They ascend to the Vermilion Palace, where after nine years of refinement, they undergo transformation and rebirth, attaining noble status. Those who diligently study this sutra, fulfilling their merit and perfecting their virtue, all achieve immortality, soaring to the Golden Gates and roaming the Jade Capital.

Scholars of higher learning who cultivate and recite this sutra, awakening to the Dao and realizing the profound, ascend to the Palace of the Great Ultimate. All worldly entanglements dissolve into emptiness; silently aligning with this principle, they awaken to the luminous void, forever unchanging. Transcending mortality, they attain eternal life, undergoing refinement to ascend to the Southern Palace.

For those in the world who recite this sutra without entering true stillness, gradually relinquishing attachment to thought, true qi naturally arises within the Great Void. Infusing their mortal form, it extends their years and prolongs life. Later, they achieve the Dao of liberation through simulated death: their ethereal soul temporarily departs, bypassing hell, and swiftly regains form to roam the Great Void.

This sutra is subtle and wondrous, universally delivering boundless beings. All heavenly and mortal realms receive its blessings. Immeasurable fortune arises; life and death are graced with its favor. Treasured by the heavens above, it is not transmitted to the lower world. Only the most devoted offer gold and treasures, swearing celestial oaths to transmit it. Those who lightly disclose or disrespect it bring calamity upon nine generations, condemned to eternal servitude under demonic officials.

Five Emperors attend this sutra, with twenty-four Jade Lads and twenty-four Jade Maidens each, safeguarding its divine script and protecting those who receive it.

The Dao speaks: During the long fast of the first month, recite this sutra. Harmonious divine winds will circulate, nurturing all spirits. Karmic bonds dissolve, merging with the primordial essence. For ancestors of past ages, earthly servitude is severed, and they ascend to the Southern Palace.

During the long fast of the seventh month, recite this sutra. Golden perfection stirs the clouds, summoning the primordial to unite with the true. Communing with spirits, they attain immortality and ascend. The heavens inscribe their names on yellow registers and white tablets, erasing death and granting eternal life.

During the long fast of the tenth month, recite this sutra. Purple clouds refine their forms; whirlwinds spiral leftward. The Eight Luminaries and Three Perfected Ones meet the deities of destiny. Roaring, they command tiger legions. For kings, emperors, rulers, ministers, fathers, and sons, the nation is stabilized, its mandate secured. Heaven’s longevity is preserved; generations endure unbroken. They remain sovereigns, governing their realms in peace, with people proclaiming great harmony.

On the eight seasonal nodes, recite this sutra. The Eight Luminaries open; the Five Palaces become perfectly clear. The body enters the Great Non-Being, merging with the mysterious void, becoming a Perfected One of the Nine Palaces.

On one’s life-destiny day, recite this sutra. The numinous script of the Great Crimson aligns with one’s fate. Through countless transformations, one naturally attains truth. The ethereal soul becomes pure and upright; myriad qi endure forever. Free from suffering, the body radiates light. The Three Realms attend; the Five Emperors welcome. Myriad spirits pay homage; names are inscribed in heaven. Merit fulfilled and virtue perfected, they ascend to the Supreme Clarity.

The Dao speaks: On days of ritual practice, bathe in fragrant waters, fast, and enter the chamber. Face east, knock the teeth thirty-two times to resonate with the thirty-two heavens, and bow thirty-two times in reverence. Close the eyes and silently envision the body seated amidst clouds of azure, crimson, and yellow. Within and without, all is veiled in mist. A Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Warrior, Lion, and White Crane array to left and right. Sun and moon illuminate the chamber, its interior resplendent. A circular halo emanates from the crown, its light suffusing the ten directions—all vividly manifest.

Recite the secret incantation:
*"Supreme Mystery and Primordial Origin, Most High Dao Lord, summon forth from within this servant the Three and Five Merit Officers, the Attendant Messengers of the Left and Right, the Jade Lads who tend incense, the Jade Maidens who transmit words, the Direct Attendants of the Five Emperors, and the Incense Officials of the Day—thirty-two each—to convey this petition. Today is an auspicious occasion; the hall is pure for the long fast. We cultivate the supreme sutra, delivering boundless beings. May this prayer ascend swiftly to the presence of the Most High Primordial Sovereign of the Thirty-Two Heavens."*

Conclude by drawing qi thirty-two times. Face east and recite the sutra:

*The Wondrous Scripture of the Primordial Limitless Salvation of Beings, Supreme and Marvelous*
*Primordial Mystery, Cavernous Mystery—Fundamental Chapter of the Numinous Treasure, Numinous Script of the Great Crimson, Supreme Mystery of the Void.*
*Limitless salvation of beings, hidden rhymes of the Supreme Clarity, naturally converging and diverging, Cavernous Mystery’s jade script.*
*In the era of the Mysterious and Tranquil Primordial Sovereign, the divine treasure transformed and arose; the numinous script delivered destinies.*
*Congealing and dispersing in the mysterious void, beneath the Supreme Clarity, the Three Palaces stand in solemn array, merging with the Dao.*
*The Nine Radiance Venerable One, in the boundless great kalpa, established the myriad heavens, and the sages within them.*
