The celestial officials manage the calculations, observe the qi, and survey the signs, adhering to the charts to know the Jade Luminance’s revolutions and degrees. The revolutions conclude in yin and yang, yin and yang root in life and death. Life and death flow and turn, yoked to yin and yang. Able to release thought into emptiness, extinguish the heart into nothingness, merge qi with the vast, and unite the spirit with the void—then the seed’s minute form, refined like plain silk, like light, like shadow, like wind, like that which cannot be contained, the body’s tangible obstruction. Like the snake’s scales, like the cicada’s wings. One should cast off the robes and ascend as a perfected being. The cosmos all spans a chang in breadth and length.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign of Antiquity inscribed these words to establish the correct sounds. Those who know these sounds and can purify themselves to recite them—the heavens shall dispatch the true officials who govern the revolutions and degrees to descend and observe their bodies, record their meritorious diligence, and ascend to report to the heavens. The myriad spirits shall pay homage, the earthly deities shall attend the Dipper. The great and moving Perfected Kings shall protect and recommend them to the Upper Clarity! Those who perfect the Dao shall be able to wander the Three Realms, ascend through the Golden Gates. These sounds repel nothing, adorn nothing, deliver nothing, and fail to accomplish nothing—they are the heavens’ spontaneous and true sounds.

Thus, reciting them summons the celestial officers to descend and observe, the Supreme Thearch to chant from afar, the myriad spirits to pay homage, the Three Realms to attend the chariots. The host of demons bow their heads, the ghostly essences vanish of themselves. The jade-like tones resound. The ten directions grow solemn and clear. The rivers and seas fall silent, the mountains and peaks swallow the mist, the myriad numina tremble and submit, summoning and gathering the host of immortals. The heavens are free of foul vapors, the earth free of demonic dust. The dark wisdom dissolves in the profound, the great measure of the Mystery’s Mystery.

*The Upper Chapter of the Numinous Treasure’s Immeasurable Scripture of Salvation, Scroll Eleven—Concluded*
*Scroll Twelve*

**The Chapter on the Transformation and Generation of Yin and Yang**

The Dao spoke: Long ago, in the Supreme Primordial Heaven of the Grand Simplicity, within the Purple Dawn’s Flowing Radiance and the Great Goodness Bright Land, the Primordial Beginning received the *Uppermost Scripture of the Immeasurable Salvation of the Transformation and Generation of Yin and Yang*. The Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning was about to expound this scripture. He circumambulated ten times to summon the ten directions. As he took his seat, the celestial perfected, the lofty sages, the exalted worthies, and the innumerable hosts of the wondrously accomplished perfected arrived borne upon the void. Azure clouds congealed their brilliance, purple and gold intermingled their splendor, jade blossoms gathered on all sides, celestial winds composed their sounds. Vermilion jade chariots and golden flowered treasure carriages, brocade canopies casting shade, resplendent hues in dazzling display—threefold purities encircled the wheels, ninefold perfected drew the reins. For seven days and seven nights, ritual lusters intermingled their radiance; the five planets grew serene and bright, auspicious mists soared into the sky. Fragrant forests flourished in lush verdure; throughout the land, mountains, rivers, groves, and trees were leveled as one. No longer did high and low persist; the earth and marshes turned deep crimson, moist and rich. Flowering pavilions sent forth rosy clouds.

The host of perfected attended the seat as the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning, in profound repose, floated upon a five-colored lion. He expounded the scripture once. The great sages of the myriad heavens simultaneously proclaimed its goodness. At that moment, the men and women of the land awakened to the mechanism of life, no longer dying prematurely or meeting untimely ends.

When he expounded the scripture a second time, yin and yang conjoined their virtue, and the mysterious elixir ascended in harmony.

When he expounded it a third time, flying immortals tread the void, and numinous perfected bestowed registers.

When he expounded it a fourth time, divine dragons roused themselves, dispelling evil and dissolving calamity.

When he expounded it a fifth time, green chambers exhaled mist, and spirit windows shone through.

When he expounded it a sixth time, buds split their husks, and yang’s virtue surged aloft.

When he expounded it a seventh time, the Way of life became universally complete, and all forms attained perfect symmetry.

When he expounded it an eighth time, numinous radiance cast its shade, and winding springs received grace.

When he expounded it a ninth time, the heavens and earth in all their ranks brought forth life and transformation.

When he expounded it a tenth time, the host of perfected witnessed the covenant, revealing the great Dharma. At that moment, every man and woman of the land turned their hearts in devotion, all received protection and deliverance, and each attained long life.

The Dao spoke: As the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning expounded the scripture once, the Boundless and Immeasurable Great Spirits of the Non-Transforming East arrived with their innumerable hosts, floating upon the void.

When he expounded it a second time, the Boundless and Immeasurable Crimson Crystal Great Spirits of the South arrived with their innumerable hosts, floating upon the void.

When he expounded it a third time, the Boundless and Immeasurable House of Might Great Spirits of the West arrived with their innumerable hosts, floating upon the void.

When he expounded it a fourth time, the Boundless and Immeasurable Constant Subtlety Great Spirits of the North arrived with their innumerable hosts, floating upon the void.

When he expounded it a fifth time, the Boundless and Immeasurable Stabilizing Pole Great Spirits of the Northeast arrived with their innumerable hosts, floating upon the void.

When he expounded it a sixth time, the Boundless and Immeasurable Wind Wheel Great Spirits of the Southeast arrived with their innumerable hosts, floating upon the void.

When he expounded it a seventh time, the Boundless and Immeasurable Great Empyrean Great Spirits of the Southwest arrived with their innumerable hosts, floating upon the void.

When he expounded it an eighth time, the Boundless and Immeasurable Vast Circulation Great Spirits of the Northwest arrived with their innumerable hosts, floating upon the void.

When he expounded it a ninth time, the Boundless and Immeasurable Lofty Mystery Great Spirits of the Upper Realm arrived with their innumerable hosts, floating upon the void.

When he expounded it a tenth time, the Boundless and Immeasurable Upholding Completion Great Spirits of the Lower Realm arrived with their innumerable hosts, floating upon the void.

When the ten circumambulations were complete, the Boundless Celestial Perfected of the ten directions arrived as one. The men and women of the land turned their hearts in reverence, bearing treasure banners and flowered canopies in profusion. Cloud chariots and wind steeds gathered in countless multitudes. Gazing upward, they awaited the Celestial Worthy as he unfolded the subtle and wondrous great Dharma of the transformation and generation of yin and yang. The innumerable hosts filled the land; the earth yielded gold and jade, and sweet dew suffused the sky.

Then the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning, from between his brows, emitted the radiance of the sun and moon—nine rays and ten blossoms, each as large as a pellet, hovering nine feet from his face, leaping and soaring. Their brilliance blazed forth, and in an instant, they filled heaven and earth. The ten directions merged into a single hue; the celestial and human sage multitudes gazed in rapture, unable to turn away. The sun and moon intermingled their light, transforming into a single pearl of wondrous and unique color, astonishing all who beheld it.

Within this pearl appeared celestial writings in great characters, jade-script true diagrams, dragon-phoenix treasure seals, and the configurations of the hearth serpents, vast and deeply arrayed. And within the pearl’s radiance, towering pavilions and lofty terraces of many fathoms, phoenix towers and unicorn halls, jade forests and resplendent hues, all fused into the azure void, suspended a hundred yards above this land.

The Celestial Worthy ascended, leading the celestial perfected, the lofty sages, the exalted worthies, the wondrously accomplished perfected, and the innumerable hosts of the Boundless Great Spirits of the Transformation and Generation of Yin and Yang from the ten directions—all entered the divine pearl. The celestial and human multitudes gazed upward, seeing only flickering forms entering through the pearl’s mouth. Once within, their whereabouts were unknown. The people of the land dispersed, and the earth returned to levelness, no longer sloping or sinking.

Then, within the divine pearl, in the treasure hall, the Celestial Worthy summoned the Thearchs of the Myriad Heavens to govern yin and yang and regulate the nurturing of transformation and generation. The Celestial Worthies of the Myriad Heavens, the True Lords of the Eight Directions, the Five Elder Thearchs, the Great Lords of Long Life, the Purple Dawn Emperor of the Eastern Ultimate’s Upper Palace, the Pristine Radiance of the Golden Court’s Ancestral Qi and Primordial Sovereign, the Southern Brilliance’s Jade Perfected, the Northern Dark Water Thearch, the Central Yellow Supreme Perfected, the Jade Flower Numinous Consort, the Mother of the Great Mystery’s Qi, the Ninefold Numinous Supreme Mystery, the Mother of the Transformation and Generation of Yin and Yang, the Mother of the Myriad Dao, and the Lofty Emperor of the Thearchs—all took their seats above. The ten directions reflected their forms as though seen through crystal. Their radiance merged into darkness, and celestial songs lifted their voices. The sound was graceful and refined, the wind harmonious and wafting. All things thus attained completion.

The Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning turned his gaze upon the immortal throng, surveying the wondrous and sublime. The myriad heavens paid homage; dragons leapt and tigers bounded, transforming to reveal the five-wheel purple-golden luminous circular image.

Then, smoothing the flowing clouds and the verdant, mist-woven mountain waters of his robe, and grasping the table of carved jade, strung pearls, and golden essence radiating flying light, he proclaimed to the assembled perfected beings: "These celestial scriptures of great characters are the primordial root of yin and yang. In their indistinctness, they form the gate; spirit is the basis of transformation, and qi is the cause of generation.

The two substances of yin and yang, originally nameless, seek each other and thus open the way to all change. One floats, one sinks; one follows, one resists; one is firm, one is yielding; one is inner, one is outer; one is yin, one is yang; one is dragon, one is tiger. They embrace, conceive, and construct essence, thereby giving birth to the Great Void. The Great Void gives birth to the Great Non-Being; the Great Non-Being gives birth to the Great Cavern; the Great Cavern gives birth to the Great Emptiness; the Great Emptiness gives birth to the Great Vastness.

This Great Vastness lies beyond the boundless and the limitless of empty mystery. Through the interplay of yin and yang, the Two Modes are born. The Two Modes give birth to the Three Powers; the Three Powers give birth to the myriad things. The Three Realms are complete, and immortals and perfected beings stand apart. The Golden Towers and Jade Capitals, with their millions of palaces, mountains standing in ranks, rivers and seas serene—all these are the great vessels of the Primordial Beginning’s creation. From this, the Thearchs of the various heavens, the lofty perfected emperors, the divine sages, and the wise and enlightened are also born. Even down to the Nine Bureaus of the Northern Darkness, the gates of the Nine Earths, the spirits, demons, and demon marshals—all follow this same Dao.

As for humans ascending to become immortals, turning from the mortal to become sacred, and attaining the ranks of the perfected—this is like yin and yang establishing heaven and earth. By refining yin and yang, dragon and tiger, in their reversal and compliance, one may refine the form with spirit and qi, refine qi with form, refine spirit with qi, and refine the primordial with spirit, merging with the non-being of the Dao to become a lofty perfected being. The true spirit soars and transforms, penetrating into spontaneity, transforming and generating, becoming one with the Dao. Its resonance spans ten thousand kalpas, its light enduring through countless nights and days.

If you fail to awaken, you will revolve through the karmic conditions of the various destinies, suffering retribution and encountering hardship—all because you do not understand the wonders of yin and yang’s generation and the origins of the great vessel of creation. There are also those who gather the essence of yin and yang, ascending and descending with water and fire, the sun to the left and the moon to the right, containing within the Great Non-Being. Circulating the nine nines, it congeals into a purple efflorescence. If you can ingest this, you will merge with the radiance and ascend, ascending to pay homage in the Grand Purity. This, too, is the external manifestation of the harmonious Dao of yin and yang’s transformation and generation.

These profound and hidden mysteries are detailed in the golden tablets and jade registers, sealed within the Highest Perfected King’s Jade Capital of the Grand Mystery’s precinct in the Eastern Florescence’s treasure vault. When a great kalpa unfolds, the deliverance of beings is boundless."

Then, within the divine pearl, the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning completed his exposition of the sutra. The perfected beings oversaw the transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. The ritual matters were roughly concluded, and the various heavens returned to their stations. In an instant, all was silent, without lingering resonance.

At that time, the celestial and human beings who encountered this scripture universally attained deliverance, awakening to the transformations of generation. Their lifespans became as long as heaven’s. The lands turned in reverence, all witnessing the transformation of the Dao’s origin and nature, the manifestation of transformation, the illumination of transformation, the causes of transformation, the generation of spirit, the generation of qi, the generation of essence, the generation of movement, and the generation of things. Their bodies bore jade radiance, and their voices resounded with numinous tones. They became equally compassionate and loving, even strangers becoming kin. The nations were at peace, the people prosperous, rejoicing in great harmony. From the scripture’s initial revelation, the land was thus transformed. Those who had devoted their hearts, revered and honored it, all attained deliverance from the world.

The Dao declares: The names spoken by the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning in this sutra are the inner names of the Thearchs of the various heavens. The sounds perceived in contemplation are also the inner appellations of the lofty perfected ones, the true kings of yin and yang’s transformation and generation, the hidden names of the hundred spirits. These are not ordinary words of the world. The perfected beings who have already attained realization, who have penetrated the mysteries and investigated the subtle, can fully comprehend these passages. Reciting them ten times, the various heavens flourish from afar. The myriad emperors establish rites. Celestial waves ripple with auspiciousness, purple seas congeal with mist, the sun and moon emit their radiance, and the jade celestial sphere shines with surpassing brilliance. The courts of the various heavens gather in formation, and demonic spirits lose their clarity. Corpses revive, and the dead return to life. The most devoted scholars, reciting this ten times, will have the Five Thearchs attend them, the Three Realms bow in reverence, demonic essences lose their sight, and demonic perversities vanish. They will deliver those on the verge of death, snatching them back from the brink of extinction.

Thus it is: by exploring the origins of yin and yang’s transformation and generation, mending what is broken and reviving what is injured, one regains the root of life and nature. The Dao is the father, virtue the mother, spirit the teacher, and life the master. Impure qi universally dissipates, and the body gradually merges with the true. One summons and commands the ten directions, wielding authority over demonic spirits, subduing the earth’s only ones, and binding malevolent perversities. Yet this only averts death—it cannot restore life. To recite this passage lightly brings calamity upon oneself. To honor and revere it brings prosperity to one’s household. Generation after generation flourishes, forming good karmic connections. Ten thousand disasters do not approach, and divine luminaries guard the gate.

This scripture is revered and wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital. It delivers boundless beings and is the root of the myriad Dao. Its majestic model is of virtue beyond measure.

The Dao declares: Whoever recites this sutra ten times invokes the Celestial Assembly. The suffering souls of countless generations of ancestors, trapped in the dark realms, all immediately receive deliverance, ascending to the Vermilion Palace. After nine years of refinement, they are transformed and reborn, becoming noble persons. Those who diligently study this sutra, fulfilling their merit and perfecting their virtue, all attain divine transcendence, soaring to the Golden Towers and roaming the Jade Capital.

The most devoted scholars who cultivate and recite this sutra all immediately receive deliverance, ascending to the Southern Palace. Those in the world who recite it find yin and yang harmoniously transformed, the Dao of life entering their bodies. Their lifespans extend, and they attain peace. Later, they all achieve the Dao of liberation through apparent death, their spirit-souls briefly extinguished without passing through hell. They immediately regain their forms and roam the Great Emptiness.

This scripture is subtle and wondrous, universally delivering without end. All celestial and human beings receive its blessings. Boundless merit arises, and the living and the dead are moved. It is treasured by heaven and not transmitted to the lower world. Only the most devoted scholars, offering gold with sincere hearts and swearing oaths to heaven, may receive it.

Those who lightly disclose or arrogantly neglect it bring calamity upon the seven ancestral generations, subjecting them to the servitude of the underworld officials. They shall attend this scripture before the Five Emperors. Twenty-four Jade Lads and twenty-four Jade Maidens shall guard and protect the scripture’s recipient, shielding their body with divine talismans.

The Dao declares: In the first month, observe a prolonged fast and recite this scripture, thereby extolling Heaven and Earth. All things transform and flourish in their season. Withered forests and dried trunks regain lushness; white bones and decayed remains receive the harmony of Heaven, their essence restored. True nourishment wells within, the Red Writ operates, and the Great Mystery generates talismans. The hundred spirits are summoned back, and for the departed souls of past ages, the bonds of earthly servitude are severed, allowing them to ascend to the Southern Palace.

In the seventh month, observe a prolonged fast and recite this scripture. The Celestial Perfected descend in attendance, and the myriad treasures ripen. Yin transforms into yang, hardness softens, and the skin congeals. The Five Flowers knit into bloom, and the cinnabar soul radiates its spirit. Green bones are forged anew, sinews of gold and marrow of jade form. The body attains immortality, and one’s name is inscribed in the registers of Heaven. On the Yellow Register and White Tablet, death is erased and life is conferred.

In the tenth month, observe a prolonged fast and recite this scripture. The Mysterious One stands before, the True One serves in attendance, and the Great One abides at the center. Yin and yang converge, and the numinous arises from the indistinct. The primordial simplicity is restored, and the Dao’s movement renews daily. For kings and emperors, rulers and ministers, fathers and sons, the nation is stabilized, the mandate secured, and Heaven’s longevity preserved. Generation after generation, they remain sovereigns, ruling their domains in peace, and the people proclaim great harmony.

On the eight nodal days, recite this scripture. The Eight Radiant Spirits gather, and primordial qi intermingles. Yang bestows, yin receives; essence is complete, and nature is true. The cycle returns in full, and one’s name is recorded in golden script. Through the Eight Gates and Nine Chambers, one ascends at will, becoming a Perfected of the Nine Palaces.

On one’s natal day, recite this scripture. The embryo of truth begins to form, its origin in the Great Perfected. Yin and yang follow the Dao, and Heaven’s blessings arise naturally. The hun and po souls are firmly preserved, and the myriad qi attain immortality without undergoing trials. Lifespan stretches endlessly, one’s celestial register is fixed, and the great demons announce one’s name. The myriad spirits pay homage, one’s name is inscribed in Heaven, and with merit fulfilled and virtue perfected, one ascends to the Great Mystery.

The Dao declares: On the day of practicing the Dao, bathe in fragrant waters, fast, and enter the chamber. Face east, knock the teeth thirty-two times to reach the Thirty-Two Heavens, and bow thirty-two times in reverence. Close the eyes and silently envision oneself seated amidst clouds of blue, yellow, and white qi, the inner and outer suffused with mist. A Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Warrior, Lion, and White Crane array themselves to left and right. Sun and moon illuminate the chamber, and a circular halo emanates from the crown, its light suffusing the ten directions. All must be vividly perceived.

Recite the secret incantation:
*"Supreme Mysterious Origin, Most High Dao Lord, summon forth from within my body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the Attendant Officials to the Left and Right, the Jade Lads who tend incense, the Jade Maidens who transmit words, the Talisman-Bearing Officers of the Five Emperors, and the Incense Officials of the Day—thirty-six each in number—to convey my entreaty. Today is an auspicious day, a prolonged fast in a purified hall, practicing this supreme scripture to deliver boundless beings. May my words ascend swiftly to the presence of the Most High Primordial Sovereign of the Thirty-Two Heavens."*

Conclude by drawing qi thirty-two times, then face east and recite the scripture:

*The Supreme Primordial Wondrous Scripture of the Limitless Salvation of Beings*
*The Primordial Cavern-Mysterious, the Numinous Treasure’s Original Chapter, yin and yang transform and generate, ten cycles deliver beings. The Heavenly Origin’s hidden rhymes, the primordial chaos’s spontaneity, vast kalpas beyond naming, yin and yang conjoin their essence. Qi permeates the firmament, the Great Image unfolds in clarity. Movement reaches its extreme and becomes flame; stillness reaches its extreme and becomes a spring. Yang exhales, yin inhales, and the myriad origins are transformed. The dragon calls to the tiger, the tiger plunges into the abyss; the dragon emerges from fire, and transformation endlessly recurs. The Mysterious Wave’s wondrous existence, the void’s extremity forms shape. The Five Movements inaugurate creation, and the Golden Perfected becomes Heaven. Jade palaces and jasper towers rise upon the Nine Verdant Mountains. Within the Inner Capital, a hundred million spirits govern the myriad immortals. Jade essence congeals into splendor, cloud-script treasures unfold. Sixty-four bodies branch into eight thousand transformations; yin and yang’s qi intermingle, generating the Red Writ. No script is without divinity, no script without illumination, no script without establishment, no script without form, no script without transformation, no script without ascent—this is the Great Brahma Heaven within the heavens.*

*From the indistinct, existence and non-existence arise; the true Dao propels change. Those who grasp its subtlety transform their bodies into immortals. Immortality values long life, and the qi of life stretches endlessly. The qi of the Nine Heavens’ phoenix abides on the Great Possession Mountain, governing the hundred passes below, the long valleys, and the Great Origin. One hundred twenty officials encircle and attend the Great Mystery. The Great Brahma Qi circulates through the ten directions. Within it dwells the spirit of delivering beings from death, the Great Lord of Longevity of the Southern Culmen, the Emperor of Peace and Treasure of the Eastern Grove, the Great Spirit Sima who delivers the world, the Venerable Han Jun who cherishes life, the Exalted Deities of the Southern Upper Bureau—Life-Controllers, Recorders, Extenders of Lifespan, and Dispellers of Misfortune—who restore bones and revive the dead, delivering boundless beings. Today, the celestial registers are reviewed, and the various heavens descend in attendance.*

*The Eastern Limitless Dao Statute Divine King, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.*
*The Southern Limitless Divine Response Divine King, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.*
*The Western Limitless Black Convergence Divine King, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.*
*The Northern Limitless Mysterious Unity Divine King, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.*
*The Northeastern Limitless Yang Boundary Divine King, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.*
*The Southeastern Limitless Yin Realm Divine King, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.*
*The Southwestern Limitless True Nature Divine King, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.*
*The Northwestern Limitless Intent Transformation Divine King, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.*
*The Upper Limitless Numinous Wonder Divine King, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.*
*The Lower Limitless True Spirit Divine King, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.*

*The Ten Directions’ Divine Kings of Longevity, who transform and generate through yin and yang, deliver boundless beings. All ride upon jasper-script purple-cloud celestial chariots, their radiant canopies streaming light, flying feathered canopies shimmering with azure mist. Their pearl-encrusted cinnabar carriages are shaded by white clouds, their rainbow wheels turning in the void. They are drawn by divine phoenixes and white tigers, bearing ten-flowered banners and demon-subduing staffs. Their cloud-brocade pennants gleam, and their purple-jade standards ripple. Heavenly dragons and numinous beasts roar and sing in unison. The Primordial Sovereign opens the way, and wondrous ranks flank the chariots. A hundred million chariots and ten thousand riders float through the void to arrive.*

Their radiant chariots turn back, overseeing the deliverance of the true and the salvation of the living. The Celestial Emperor of the Grand Tenuity, the Perfected of the Jade Tower, the Central Yellow Venerable, and the Primordial Essence Dao Lord—all wielders of the Cavernous Scriptures—gather before the Imperial Throne. They refine and transmute, then proclaim their decrees to the myriad heavens.

Through karmic consciousness and conditioned arising, the Five Phases transform and give birth. The Three Primes and Nine Bureaus distinguish the ranks of the sacred and the profane. Below, they inspect the Three Realms and the boundless divine lands: the Great Cinnabar’s crimson mists, the Purple Crossing’s blazing light, the Jade Crystal’s golden steeds, the Stone Radiance’s central realm, the Celestial Ford’s imperial terrace, and the Dark Gate of Fusang.

They intermingle and purify, harmonizing yin and yang, reviewing the jade registers to rectify the luminous wheel of the true Dao. They establish domains within yin and yang, where the two qi merge, nurturing the ten thousand kinds and unfolding the primordial root of transformation.

Those who awaken to the wondrous primordial return to their divine essence. The Three Palaces circulate their flow, and the Jade Tower blooms with splendor. The body attains immortality, blessings extend to descendants, and nine generations of ancestors—seven lineages of forebears—are delivered. Black ledgers are swiftly erased, sins expunged, and none are left to linger. The Dark Gates open without delay.

The August Sovereign of the Void issues his decree, marking the hour of ascension. In the Northern Capital’s frigid pools, the guardians marshal form and soul. Yang transforms the soul, yin nurtures the form; when form and soul unite with the Dao, they soar across the Vermilion Mound. Liberated and carefree, they ascend as the seed-people of transformation. All living beings rejoice, abiding by the turning of the cosmic wheel, their years matching heaven’s span. They forever transcend the trials of the great demon, the ordeals of celestial testing, rising beyond the Three Realms to roam the Supreme Clarity.

In the Heaven of Supreme Clarity, the Heavenly Emperor’s profound mystery dwells within the formless realm of pure conduct.

**The Eight Heavens of the East:**
The heavens of yin-yang transformation begin in the northwest, manifest in the Zi position, emerge in the northeast, take form in the east, align in the southeast, meet in Li, reach fruition in the west, and follow the sun’s measure to establish their celestial divisions.
- The Heaven of Jade Splendor and Primordial Radiance, ruled by Emperor Sire of the Capital Origin.
- The Heaven of Boundless Transformation and Deliverance, ruled by Emperor Willow of the Questioning Stream.
- The Heaven of Myriad Tranquilities and Resplendent Light, ruled by Emperor Thunder’s Illuminating Governance.
- The Heaven of Mystic Harmony and Timely Balance, ruled by Emperor Need of the Secret Hay.
- The Heaven of Gathering Prosperity and Luminous Brilliance, ruled by Emperor Peak of the Clarifying Transformation.
- The Heaven of Upholding Reverence and Serene Stillness, ruled by Emperor Drifting of the Resting Prosperity.
- The Heaven of Grand Simplicity and Cavernous Floating, ruled by Emperor Companion of Overflowing Abundance.
- The Heaven of Jade Light’s Waxing and Waning, ruled by Emperor Perfected of the Mystic Ascent.

**The Eight Heavens of the South:**
- The Heaven of Flaming Brilliance and Renowned Fame, ruled by Emperor Pact of the Profound Diagram.
- The Heaven of Vermilion Qi and Cinnabar Splendor, ruled by Emperor Governance of the Qian Direction’s Transcendence.
- The Heaven of Scarlet Spirit and Vermilion Radiance, ruled by Emperor Peace of the Endless Field.
- The Heaven of Purple Simplicity and Forbidden Governance, ruled by Emperor Dragon Horn’s Blazing Foundation.
- The Heaven of Radiant Spirit and Immortal Covenant, ruled by Emperor Circle of Power and Treasure Prosperity.
- The Heaven of Transformative Response and Morning Devotion, ruled by Emperor Brahma-Sun’s Reverence for the Mystic.
- The Heaven of Tasked Endeavors and True Union, ruled by Emperor Profound Spirit’s Standard.
- The Heaven of Double Fire and Cavernous Yang, ruled by Emperor Solemn Ancestor of the Nine Voids.

**The Eight Heavens of the West:**
- The Heaven of Cloud Radiance and Beneficent Perfection, ruled by Emperor Ancestor of the Jeweled Name.
- The Heaven of Flowing Brilliance and Plain Perfection, ruled by Emperor Guardian of the Covenant of Longevity.
- The Heaven of Grand Splendor and Celebratory Illumination, ruled by Emperor Wondrous Net of Eternal Spirit.
- The Heaven of Ultimate Origin and Initiating Lineage, ruled by Emperor Spreading of the Correct Banner.
- The Heaven of Golden Radiance and Nine Offices, ruled by Emperor Discerning Elder of the Historical Flower.
- The Heaven of Vast Capital and Treasure Light, ruled by Emperor Spirit of the Primordial Prosperity.
- The Heaven of Grand Clarity and Supervising Transformation, ruled by Emperor Three Paths of the Primordial.
- The Heaven of Luminous Beam and Primordial Simplicity, ruled by Emperor Reflection of the Divine Circle.

**The Eight Heavens of the North:**
- The Heaven of Jade Grove and Primordial Superiority, ruled by Emperor Descendant of the Mystic Root’s Flower.
- The Heaven of Containing Radiance and Grand Perfection, ruled by Emperor Stern Constancy of Eternal Promise.
- The Heaven of Dragon’s Cheek and Longevity’s Peace, ruled by Emperor Return to the Qi’s Ancestral Dao.
- The Heaven of Flowing Brilliance and Jade Clarity, ruled by Emperor Revered of the Grand Liquid’s Beginning.
- The Heaven of Wondrous Culmination and Circulating Transformation, ruled by Emperor Designation of the Grand Nothingness.
- The Heaven of Purple Canopy and Radiant Separation, ruled by Emperor Peace of the Defining Wisdom.
- The Heaven of Mystic Congealment and Divine Elegance, ruled by Emperor Du of the Auspicious Primordial Duke.
- The Heaven of Abysmal Clarity and Luminous Void, ruled by Emperor Crystal of the Heavenly Center’s Sovereign.

The Thirty-Two Heavens. The Thirty-Two Emperors. The hidden taboos of the heavens. The hidden names of the heavens. The empty cavern of the celestial center, the spontaneous numinous scriptures, the hidden rhymes of the heavens—the celestial center’s sound, the celestial center’s reverence, the celestial center’s spirits, the celestial center’s great demons, the celestial center’s numina.

Nine yangs and ten yins, the root of transformation and arising, the unfathomable mystery—profound beyond reckoning. The divine perfected scatter and descend, universally delivering heavenly and mortal beings. Yang’s womb and yin’s embryo are sealed and secured by spirit. Spirit is the root of the heart; the heart moves through intention. When heart and intention unite with the Dao, they dwell within a forced name. Without knowing the natural, the spirit shifts and changes. Guarding the path’s crevices, the spirit transforms into cinnabar. Cinnabar transforms into the ancestral qi, the mysterious unfolds endlessly. Yin bestows, yang flourishes; refine essence to preserve spirit. The divine soul is eternally firm.

Uniting with radiance, they ascend in flight, roaming and feasting across the Eight Poles. Knots of stagnation dissolve. The wondrous root of the Nine Primordials opens the barrier of the mysterious realm. In the great kalpa of primordial chaos, the Three Paths surge and intertwine. The Demon Kings oversee and summon, unrestrained by the celestial gates.

The Eastern Dipper’s yang essence, the Western Dipper’s yin fluid, the Northern Dipper’s nurturing of the embryo, the Southern Dipper’s bestowal of life, the Central Dipper’s revolving governance—five qi merge in darkness. The Azure Emperor enacts governance, the White Emperor spreads virtue, the Vermilion Emperor nurtures and refines, the Black Emperor transforms and fosters, the Yellow Emperor guards the Dao—none among the myriad spirits transgress.

The Azure Heaven’s Demon King, Dragon Radiance of the Mystic Pattern. The Vermilion Heaven’s Demon King, Cinnabar Spirit’s Inspired Manifestation. The White Heaven’s Demon King, Luminous Splendor of Jade Moisture. The Black Heaven’s Demon King, Spirit Gate’s Penetrating Clarity. The Yellow Heaven’s Demon King, Vermilion Infant’s Concealed Moon. The Five Emperors’ Great Demons, ancestors of the myriad spirits, fly through the Three Realms, commanding the immortal legions.

Their banners wave, drums beat, and standards flutter as they roam the vast emptiness. The boundless yin expanse stirs with divine winds. The Nine Yangs’ primordial transformation, the Three Radiances’ net across the void—realms great and small, the perfected lords and immortal sages. In the ten thousand shifts of the indistinct, fierce horses and venomous dragons, towering spears leaning against the sky, jade pestles shattering peaks. True talismans stream fire, incinerating malevolent fiends. The Nine Heavens advance in formation, the Great Uglies submit to discipline. Arrayed before the Northern Capital, they slay a hundred million ghosts. Unobstructed, yin and yang each follow their transformations and give birth.

The Three Mysteries and Nine Palaces—let none disperse or stray. Jade petitions ascend in offering, golden steeds soar on high. A universal proclamation resounds without end, the ten thousand *qi* converge as one. The Three Realms and Five Emperors rouse the primal mechanism. The Hidden Capital’s cavernous purity gleams with veiled divine radiance; Brahmanic conduct weaves a net, clouds congeal into a celestial metropolis. Azure peaks float in the void, the Great Granary refines its courtyard. Mist swirls, winds sway, and the myriad spirits of Yu Lü gather in throngs.

The imperial *qi* of the primordial origin suffuses hundreds and thousands, arising from one completion and branching into kings and infants. The Way of yin enacts vast transformation, the yang soul wields authority. Nine changes and ten unions link the golden gates in a haloed chain. Green windows exhale sunlight, the numinous net commands immortals. Water becomes the Great One, its form like a lotus in bloom. The great spirit of transformation bears the jade title *Jingyan*, clad in brocade robes and a jade turban, enthroned to govern the ten thousand heavens.

Yet it too arises from yin and yang, transmitted through the transformations of generation. The five talismans and jade scriptures are the root of the supreme Dao. From them, heaven and earth are born, sun and moon cycle endlessly. Within the nine *qi* of the great void lies a jade abyss. Its still mirror reflects inner images, while the stars trace their paths beyond. Above heaven and below heaven, no darkness is too deep, no shadow too faint—without limit, without end.

The vast Brahmanic expanse stretches boundless, lightless. Crimson clarity opens the path, its revolution turning naturally. The primordial vast *qi* drifts like clouds, like mist, coalescing in the void to form characters—treasured seals of golden script. Crimson writings and jade talismans, the eight luminous texts of mystery, preserve and regulate the kalpas, ensuring heaven’s eternal endurance.

Brahmanic *qi* pervades the net of all things, unfolding the ten thousand forms. The primal warp flows forth, the thirty-two heavens. Wheeling without color, circling the ten directions, revolving the Dipper and Winnowing Basket, cycling through the five constants. Thirty-five divisions gather the *qi* of the Upper Origin; the eight luminosities merge in darkness, *qi* entering the profoundest mystery.

The profound is the mother of spirits, yin commands the yang officials. It regulates growth and decline, movement and stillness, vast and minute. Through unchanging constancy, earth aligns with heaven. The left enters the right, the last reaches the first. The mechanism of the supreme Dao transcends the great void’s barriers. The true One equals emptiness, the root of transformation.

At the extreme of transformation, change arises; at the extreme of change, the profound emerges. Within the profound dwells the Great August One, the upper luminosity coiling in flight. Vermilion auroras dance in the sky, harmonious chants resound at the banquet. Golden perfection shines brightly, flowing through the cloud palaces. Jade script summons *qi*, the profound wind scatters mist. The grand empyrean flourishes in elegance, aiding the flight of immortals.

A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions—naturally they become real. Within the real dwells the spirit, the Great Lord of Longevity. The Yellow Elder of the Grotto Chamber, the Azure Emperor, the jade consorts to left and right, the august deities of the Great One. The Controller of Destiny resides in the heart, peach and vitality circulate essence. Crimson script adorns the brain’s membranes, blending with the primordial yellow truth.

The nameless is called the profound; crimson script commands the spirits. Holding talismans and grasping registers, it preserves life and roots existence. Ascending to the Jade Hut, entering and exiting the Yellow Court, within the eight darknesses and the subtlest realms. Below, it governs the human body, the Mud Pill Palace and Crimson Palace. At the center, it orders the five *qi* and harmonizes the hundred spirits. Ten revolutions return the numinous, the ten thousand *qi* unite as immortals.

The immortal way values life, endlessly delivering beings. Above, it opens the eight gates, the flying heavenly dharma-wheel. Sin and fortune, prohibitions and precepts, karmic causes and conditions. Universally receiving liberation, the dead soul gains a living body. The body attains rebirth, ascending to be heard by the various heavens. Above the various heavens, each has its gate of generation. Within lies the chapter of the great void’s transformations, the hidden texts of demon kings, and the words that match the lofty perfected.

**First: The Hidden Formula of the Desire Realm’s Demon King—Yin-Yang Transformation for Prolonging Life**
The Great One abides in empty nothingness, solitary and serene. Stillness reaches its extreme, and movement arises; yin and yang then nurture. Yang fire and yin water circulate fully. At the center, great harmony flourishes, the ten thousand *qi* all fresh. Mysterious resonance responds in wondrous accord; yellow chambers emit mist. At the gate of white clouds, *qi* flows like a spring. Take from that to obtain this, take from this to obtain that. Endlessly flowing, the spirit settles and halts.

Crimson enters black, black returns to crimson. Sometimes guard with the masculine, sometimes with the feminine. Transforming emotions and nature, preserve this to attain longevity.

**Second: The Hidden Formula of the Form Realm’s Demon King—Yin-Yang Transformation for Ascending as an Immortal**

Boundless and formless, the great void is dark and obscure. Two forces devour each other, and suddenly the primordial chaos arises. Brahma-*qi* intertwines, spanning ninety trillion leagues. In profound stillness, the spirit is born, and celestial essence blazes radiant. A perfect circle a thousand *li* in diameter holds divine script within. Dragons and phoenixes coil and twist, transmuting the Three Spirits. The Jade Capital and the Dark Mountain brim with the *qi* of the Nine Perfected. The golden well gleams limpid, its waters trickling in abundance. Crimson towers rise through ten thousand heavens, all sharing a single root. Return to the origin, shed all adornment, and ascend to the immortal realm. If you grasp this in your heart, inhale and swallow the flowing rosy clouds. They scatter like jade beads, like lingzhi and cinnabar. None but the wondrous may glimpse this—daily, the dragon chariot turns.

**Third: The Hidden Formula of the Formless Realm’s Demon King—Yin-Yang Transformation for Creating Heaven and Earth**

When desire and form are exhausted, the formless appears before you. Vast and indistinct, the empty expanse conceals ten thousand heavens within. Dwell in formless intent, and let your mind be true and pure. Summon with your mind, and it arrives—five stars and three luminaries hasten forth. The essence of the sun and the radiance of the moon take root in luminous splendor. Within the square-inch palace of the spirit, jade perfected ones array themselves. The heart’s fire, ninefold yang, refines the bones into gold. Above, it reaches the utmost height; below, it delves into the deepest source. Let the fire command swiftness, and the flying dragon circles eight times. Now yin, now yang—transformation and concealment arise of themselves. The great cauldron of heaven and earth divides water and fire at its center. The origin of life remains unknown; the gate to the Dao is unseen. Life arises from joyful resonance, where spirit and *qi* attain utmost purity. Auspicious mists drift gently, bathing and refining all spirits. The Three Realms stand firm, the great desert merges into oneness. Mount the dragon and soar through the clouds, your feathered canopy and azure skirt trailing behind.

Above these Three Realms, amidst the flight through empty space, the Demon Kings chant their songs, their verses harmonizing with the cavern hymns. Recite them a hundred times, and your name ascends to the Southern Palace. Recite them a thousand times, and the Demon Kings will safeguard and welcome you. With the Dao perfected in ten thousand apertures, you will ascend to the great void, traverse the Three Realms, and attain the rank of Immortal Duke. Those who hear these sacred verses will command the reverence of the Demon Kings, who will dispatch earth spirits to escort and attend you, liberating you from the earthly prison. The five sufferings and eight hardships will be overcome, your seven ancestors will ascend, and you will forever depart the realm of ghosts. Your soul will cross the Vermilion Mound, undergo refinement, and be reborn anew. This is called boundless deliverance, universal salvation without end.

There exists a secret celestial script, revered by all heavens. To leak or profane it is to fall into hell, bringing calamity upon your seven ancestors. The Dao declares: These two chapters are the hidden songs of the Heavenly Emperors and the numinous Demon Kings. They reveal the inner workings of yin-yang transformation, the union of heaven and earth, and the esoteric essence by which the ten thousand things are conceived. Those who grasp their essentials will enjoy prolonged vision and extended years, attaining the immortality of the divine transcendent. In the highest sense, they emulate the Three Honored Ones, giving birth to heaven and establishing earth, nurturing the primordial chaos. In the middle sense, they shift and harmonize yin and yang, contracting and expanding creation, aligning with the virtue of heaven. In the lowest sense, they blend the yin and yang of dragon and tiger, uniting the hundred spirits, summoning the returning wind and purple mist, harmonizing the hundred joints, and subtly employing the five phases. Through the ebb and flow of yin and yang, they attain the Dao. All these are the words of the Great Brahma, not the common speech of the mundane world. Their language lacks ornate beauty, their melodies lack florid embellishment—thus they are called profound and obscure, difficult to fathom in detail.

This treasure of the heavens is concealed within the Purple Vault of the Dark Capital’s Upper Palace. According to the dark statutes, it is transmitted but once every forty thousand kalpas. If a perfected one arrives bearing gold and treasures, offering sincerity, and follows the ancient rites to pledge allegiance to the Ten Heavens, the text may then be entrusted to them after the sacred shuttle is woven.

The Dao declares: This scripture, expounding the Dao of yin-yang transformation, was spoken by the Primordial Heavenly Worthy. Those who recite it will see their virtue flourish and never meet their end. Within it lies the hidden secret of yin-yang, the principle by which generative *qi* brings forth auspiciousness. Misfortunes and calamities dissolve, and primordial fortune is naturally attained. Should the revolutions of heaven and earth reach their inauspicious end, should the sun and moon and five planets wane and wax erratically, should the sagely and divine withdraw or the unlearned suffer affliction—whenever such disasters arise, all beings of the same *qi* must unite in heart to perform purification rites. For six hours, they will burn incense; ten times, they will recite the scripture. Blessings and virtue will descend at once, dispelling all misfortune. This is the boundless scripture, universal deliverance without end.

The Dao speaks: When the unlearned’s cultivation of the Way is shallow or their immortal rank incomplete, their destined time of dissolution arrives, and their body enters the Great Yin. At the moment of their passing, fellow students and perfected beings shall burn incense and recite this scripture ten times to deliver their corporeal form according to the proper method. The officials of yin and yang will transform their generative *qi* into spirit, and their five viscera will regenerate of themselves. Their complexion shall return to the fairness of youth, and their spirit-soul will ascend directly to the Southern Palace. According to the merit of their cultivation, they will be reborn after a calculated number of days. Revolving without cessation, they will attain the rank of divine immortals.

The Dao speaks: Within the great vessel of primordial chaos lies the divine wind, which governs generation and transformation. It expands and contracts in accord with the seasons, like a key turning in a lock. Yin and yang become spirits, moving to and fro within it, their *qi* and spirits intermingling. Hard and soft unite in essence, and transformation occurs naturally, though none perceive its arising. Generation has no beginning, and its bounds are unseen. When this scripture is recited, the spirits of generation descend, and the primordial *qi* surges in abundance.

When the revolutions of heaven and earth reach their end, when the stellar lodges deviate from their courses, when the sun and moon lose their proper times of rising and setting, when the four seasons fall out of order, when yin and yang are unbalanced, when the realm suffers poor harvests, when warfare and invasion arise, when pestilence and poison spread, when the people perish young, when teachers and friends pass away—whenever such calamities occur, all must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scripture. The merit of great purification rites and scripture recitation is profound. Above, it dissolves heavenly disasters and safeguards the emperor; below, it wards off poison and harm, delivering the people. In life and death, all depend upon it, and its blessings are beyond measure. Thus it is called boundless, universally delivering heaven and humanity.

The Dao speaks: Whoever possesses this scripture and performs these meritorious deeds for the sake of the lord of heaven and earth and the people—on the day of calamity, if they resolve to perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scripture ten times—all the heavens will record their names, the myriad spirits will attend and protect them, and the perfected beings on high will enable them to become ministers of the Golden Gates of the Sagely Lord. The heavens record the merits and transgressions of people with utmost precision, down to the finest detail. Even the demon kings of heaven will safeguard their persons. Those who attain the Way shall fully comprehend these most profound words.

Within the heavens, the great Brahma’s hidden speech resounds in boundless tones.
—*The Middle Chapter of the Numinous Writ of the Primordial Beginning*, composed by the Lord of the Dao of the Eight Heavens of the East.

The Elixir of Valley’s Origin, darkly nurtured, radiantly bright.
Mournful reverence stirs the secret furnace; the vast pool recites its inscriptions.
The hollow yin gives rise to yang; the Three Primes take flight in essence.
The Northern Numen’s paired script bears qi’s form, conceiving the true.
Jade peaks and golden springs—divine liquid drips in purity.
At last, the jade-like kernel enfolds the azure husk; the primal root abides in the numinous marsh.
The mighty and luminous chant within the cavern; the resplendent thunder divides and conjoins.
Transforming and irrigating the great source, blossoms arise in precious splendor.

In the Eight Heavens of the South:
The liquid of the heart, blended with metal, surges in dragon waves of dense radiance.
Bright clouds moisten lead; the nest’s fire advances in exaltation.
Dispersing and suffusing the luminous blossoms, nurturing cinnabar into ointment.
Jade-like brilliance drips as dew; the winding pavilion blooms upon its terrace.
The swift gale of intent thunders; the Nine Banners summon through the void.
Fierce smoke blends with the subtle; the forge’s melt congeals as syrup.
The jeweled strands rejoice in harmony; the Yellow Chamber mediates in peace.
The male guards the Great Expanse; the female embraces the dark marrow.

In the Eight Heavens of the West:
The wheel of flame, the crimson numen, interlaces with the Dipper’s ministers.
The cauldron’s aid turns to azure; the Feng’s restraint shatters might.
Bing seeks Gui’s fellowship; the radiant and elegant flourish in the western darkness.
The Great Mound’s purple blaze steams in the morning’s departure.
Sprouting transformations of the Tail’s lineage, illuminating the Pure Subtlety.
Birth alters substance to hardness; blending transforms the banquet’s rites.
The hook’s earth stirs the Winnowing Basket; the hall’s brilliance unfurls in splendor.
The rosy clouds bestow again; the vast and boundless drift in distant bends.

In the Eight Heavens of the North:
The perfected complete the luminous capital; the Mao Stream’s dryad maidens.
Vast and boundless, encircling the bells; assisting and expanding the clustered obscurity.
The thief’s few summonings shift; the mournful lord’s circuitous passage.
Privately attaining return to darkness; the muddy script in purple haze.
The boundless and distant, the distant and remote—walking the true in the hidden peaks.
Preserving benefit and vast life; the Great Vastness of the dark vault.
The distant cosmos in minute detail; dragons conceal immortal traces.
The sea’s lineage expands in brilliance; the jade descendants of the numinous palace.

The Dao speaks: These are the great Brahma’s hidden utterances within the heavens, the boundless tones—ancient script concealed in the Purple Tenuity’s Upper Palace—to illuminate the transformations of yin and yang, the divine changes of creation, the true mechanism of the Three Realms, the profound mysteries of the Great Dao, the five-colored clouds coiling into characters. The boundaries are of purple gold; the scrolls are of dragon brocade. Each character spans a full *zhang* in length. The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign of Old inscribed these words to establish the correct intonation.

Those who know these tones and can purify themselves in fasting to recite them shall have all the heavens dispatch the Flying Heavenly Divine Kings to descend and observe their persons, record their meritorious diligence, and report it above to the heavens. The myriad spirits shall pay homage; the earthly deities shall attend at their gates. The mighty demon kings shall safeguard and recommend the perfected. With the Dao complete, they shall attain the ability to wander the Three Realms and ascend through the Golden Gates.

These tones repel all, exorcise all, deliver all, and accomplish all—tones of the Heavenly Perfected, natural and spontaneous. Thus, reciting them summons the Flying Heavenly Ones to descend in observation. The Supreme Lord chants from afar; the myriad spirits pay homage. The Three Realms attend in their chariots; the host of demons bow their heads. Ghostly essences vanish of themselves; the jade-like chimes resound. The ten directions grow solemn and clear; rivers and seas fall silent. Mountains and peaks swallow their mists; the myriad numina tremble and submit. The gathered immortals are summoned; the heavens are free of defilement, the earth free of demonic dust. Profound wisdom illumines the pure; the vast and mysterious abides in the most profound mystery.

The *Supreme and Wondrous Scripture of the Numinous Treasure for the Limitless Salvation of Humanity*, Scroll Twelve, concludes.
Scroll Thirteen.

The *Supreme Scripture of the Primordial Essence of the Great One*

The Dao spoke: Long ago, in the Primordial Yellow Heaven, within the Purple Void and Golden Azure Realm of Great Radiance, the Primordial Beginning received the *Supreme and Wondrous Scripture of the Primordial Essence of the Great One for the Limitless Salvation of Humanity*. As the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning was about to expound this scripture, he circumambulated ten times to summon the ten directions, and only then ascended his throne.

The Heavenly Perfected, the Most August and Exalted, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct, the Primordial Emperor of the Yellow and the Old, the Primordial Essence of the Great One, the Perfected Lord of the Wondrous Void, the Ninefold Central Citadel, the Thirty-Six August Sovereigns and Immortal Kings, the Earthly Perfected, the True Sovereigns and Numinous Immortals within the Earth, the officials and marshals beneath the soil—an innumerable host—all came riding upon the void. Azure mists and golden clouds, jade palanquins and wheeling chariots, cinnabar blossoms casting shade, the jade-like radiance of primordial essence, auspicious hues converging in splendor, illumined the vast heavens.

For five days and five nights, the Perfected of the Great One pervaded all heavens, the palaces of the sun and moon, the celestial courts of the stars and constellations. Dragon-drawn chariots halted their course; jade mechanisms stilled their motion. Traversing orbits congealed in brilliance; the void shone like gold. The cool breeze grew tranquil; the celestial valleys deepened in stillness. Verdant mists settled low; luminous radiance shone forth. Azure heavens flowed with cosmic order; purple mists drifted as mist. The Three Origins surged in vast cycles; the Four Qi stretched into distant clarity.

The lands of the realm—its mountains, rivers, forests, and groves—all lay smooth and level, without height or depth. The earth became golden glass, thick and yielding, suffused with radiance. Brocade-like clouds and rosy hues appeared, yet no other colors remained.

The assembled Perfected attended the throne as the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning sat upon his mysterious dais, floating above five-colored divine dragons. As he expounded the scripture once, the Great Sages of all heavens simultaneously acclaimed its virtue.

At that moment, the men and women of the realm beheld with their eyes and pondered in their hearts: from whence did the heavens and earth, the celestial bodies and terrestrial realms, the jeweled terraces and treasure pavilions, the immortals, sages, ghosts, and spirits arise, and how did they come to possess these forms?

As he expounded the scripture a second time, they reflected upon the sun and moon in their ceaseless flow, the rivers and seas in their converging currents—by what power do they move and turn, and upon what do they depend to stand alone in the void?

As he expounded the scripture a third time, all the heaven-dwellers turned their radiance inward in profound vision; their qi entered the Primordial Origin, and their Dao merged with the Sovereign of the Void.

As he expounded the scripture a fourth time, all the heaven-dwellers gazed upon the Three Realms above and below, where clouds stirred and winds bestowed auspicious omens.

As he expounded the scripture a fifth time, they awakened to the transformative origin: the Primordial Essence of the Great One, the Ninefold True Earth, which through resonance gives rise to all things.

As he expounded the scripture a sixth time, their numinous minds suddenly opened, and they comprehended the heavens and earth, the harmonious progression of yin and yang, and the completion of the myriad things.

As he expounded the scripture a seventh time, the primordial vastness overflowed and scattered; jade mushrooms sprouted of themselves. Dragons and tigers intoned in sorrow, awakening to the dharma-realm.

As he expounded the scripture an eighth time, their bodies refined into emptiness, and emptiness transformed into the Real. Such divine transformations were truly rare.

As he expounded the scripture a ninth time, the great assembly rejoiced as one. Gazing upon the Primordial Beginning, they awakened to the mechanism of the Dao, and the Primordial Essence revealed its wonder.

As he expounded the scripture a tenth time, celestial music flowed in melody; all sounds harmonized as one. Jade-like forms descended in compassion, pure as the void and unadorned.

At that moment, all the men and women of the realm turned their hearts in devotion, received protection and deliverance, and attained longevity without exception.

The Dao spoke: As the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning expounded the scripture once, the boundless and immeasurable Perfected of the Primordial Essence of the Great One from the eastern direction, with their innumerable host, arrived floating upon the void.

As he expounded the scripture a second time, those from the southern direction arrived in like manner.

As he expounded the scripture a third time, those from the western direction arrived in like manner.

As he expounded the scripture a fourth time, those from the northern direction arrived in like manner.

As he expounded the scripture a fifth time, those from the northeastern direction arrived in like manner.

As he expounded the scripture a sixth time, those from the southeastern direction arrived in like manner.

As he expounded the scripture a seventh time, those from the southwestern direction arrived in like manner.

As he expounded the scripture an eighth time, those from the northwestern direction arrived in like manner.

As he expounded the scripture a ninth time, those from the upper direction arrived in like manner.

As he expounded the scripture a tenth time, those from the lower direction arrived in like manner.

When the ten recitations were complete, the boundless Perfected of the Primordial Essence of the Great One from the ten directions arrived simultaneously. The men and women of the realm turned their hearts in reverence.

All heard the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning proclaim the teachings of the Primordial Essence of the Great One, declaring that the heavens and earth, the immortals, sages, ghosts, and spirits of the Three Realms, all depend upon the True Earth for gestation, nurturance, and completion.

This True Earth is not the coarse, inert soil of the mundane world, but rather the perfected transformation of the Five Agents, existing before heaven and earth, the complete embodiment of the Dao—formless True Earth. Those who recognize this True Earth naturally attain the Dao.

They must pay homage to the Primordial Beginning and seek this wondrous teaching. The arriving multitude was like fine rain or dense mist, an innumerable host, pressing upon the land until half the realm sank beneath them, beyond all restraint.

Thereupon, the Primordial Beginning suspended a precious pearl, as small as a millet grain, in the mysterious void five *zhang* above the earth. The Celestial Worthy ascended and led the Heavenly Perfected, the Most August and Exalted, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct, the Primordial Emperor of the Yellow and the Old, the Primordial Essence of the Great One, the Perfected Lord of the Wondrous Void, all the true numina within and beneath the earth, the boundless assembly of sages, and the boundless Perfected of the Primordial Essence of the Great One from the ten directions—all entered the pearl.

Gazing upward, the heaven-dwellers saw only a gentle stirring as all passed through the pearl’s opening.

Once they entered the pearl’s mouth, none knew where they had gone. The people of the realm dispersed, and the land returned to levelness, no longer slanting or sinking. Within the precious pearl, the Primordial Beginning then expounded the sutra in full, while the assembled Perfected oversaw the transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration defied description. When the ritual matters were roughly complete, the heavens resumed their positions, and in the space of a breath, all fell silent without a trace of lingering sound.

At that time, the heaven-dwellers and mortals who encountered this sutra universally attained deliverance, preserving their allotted years without harm or injury. The entire realm turned in reverence, all cultivating faith of the heart. They trusted in the Dao and the sutra, trusted in the master and the dharma, trusted in the rank and the realization, trusted in the eternal and the living, trusted in transformation and the root. Their words held no embellishment or deceit, their mouths uttered no false sounds. With unified compassion and love, even those of different bones became kin. The realm knew peace, the people abundance, and all rejoiced in great harmony. From the moment the sutra’s teachings emerged, the entire realm followed the Dao. Those who had cultivated utmost sincerity, revered and honored it, all attained transcendence of the world.

The Dao declares: All that the Primordial Celestial Worthy spoke within this sutra are the inner names of the Heavenly Emperors, the hidden rhymes of sound, as well as the inner taboos of the true kings and the concealed names of the hundred spirits. The Primordial Essence of the Great One is the formless true earth. True earth being formless is the Great Void. The Great Void as earth gives birth to all within the Three Realms—heaven and earth, true immortals, dragons, gods, humans, and ghosts. If one knows this and unites being with non-being, nature with emptiness, spirit with the Dao, one becomes a lofty Perfected. Those who reject these constant teachings are not the same as the exalted sages who have already attained Perfected-hood, who penetrate the mysterious and exhaust the subtle, and who can fully grasp its verses.

Reciting it ten times, the heavens chant from afar, the myriad gods pay homage, the Great One descends in radiance, rivers and seas grow still, primordial essence spreads transformation, mountains and peaks conceal their clouds, true earth nurtures light, the inner sun and moon appear, the formless manifests signs, and the celestial pivot ceases its turning. All demons bind their forms, ghostly spirits lose their clarity, the dead return to life, and white bones become human again. For those of utmost learning who recite it ten times, the Five Emperors stand guard, the Three Realms bow in reverence, demonic spirits lose their sight, ghostly evils vanish, the dying are delivered, the severed are restored to life, the Great One bestows virtue, primordial essence scatters numinous power, qi is gathered from the void, spirits are summoned from non-being, life is prolonged, and rebirth continues—earth precedes life.

The reason for this is that scholars’ impure qi has not yet dissipated, their bodies have not fully penetrated the true, and though they may govern the ten directions, their might does not yet command the celestial administration. Their virtue can only subdue earthly deities, bind demonic spirits, and avert death, but they cannot restore life. To recite this chapter lightly brings misfortune upon oneself. To honor and revere it brings prosperity to one’s household. Generation after generation flourishes, bound to good karmic conditions, untouched by the ten thousand calamities, with divine luminaries guarding the gate.

This sutra is supremely wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital. It delivers countless beings and serves as the root of the ten thousand Daoist teachings. Its majestic and vast model of virtue is beyond measure.

The Dao declares: For those who recite this sutra ten times, all the heavens arrive in unison, the Primordial Essence of the Great One and the true earth transform and give life. The embryo of the Dao divides the spirit, the hidden springs and valleys brighten, and the suffering souls of ancestors across billions of generations are all immediately delivered, ascending to the Vermilion Palace. After nine years of refinement, they receive transformation and rebirth, becoming noble persons. Those who diligently study this sutra, when their merit is complete and their virtue perfected, all attain divine transcendence, soaring to the Golden Gates and roaming the Jade Capital.

Those of higher learning who cultivate and recite this sutra have the Great One nurture their numinous power, the earth lord bestows the five fortunes, and primordial essence enters their bodies—all attain deliverance and ascend to the Southern Palace. For mortals who recite it, their lifespans are extended, their years prolonged. Earth is the mother of metal, water the grandson of earth. Earth is primordial qi, metal true lead. When water encounters metal, lead unites with mercury. Those who recognize this do not die; those who encounter it know the true. Thereafter, all may practice the Dao of corpse liberation—though the soul and spirit temporarily vanish, they do not pass through hell but immediately regain their forms, roaming the Great Void. Ingesting the essence of earth, they deliver boundless beings, and all heaven-dwellers and mortals receive blessings. Immeasurable fortune and grace extend to life and death, treasured by heaven and not transmitted to the lower world. Only the most devoted scholars, offering gold and treasures with sincere hearts and swearing oaths to heaven, may receive it. To leak or slight it lightly brings calamity upon seven generations of ancestors, condemning them to long servitude in the Three Wretched Realms.

Five Emperors attend this sutra, with twenty-four Jade Lads and twenty-four Jade Maidens each, safeguarding the sacred script and protecting the bodies of those who receive it.

The Dao declares: During the long fast of the first month, reciting this sutra causes the Primordial Essence of the Great One to transform and take myriad forms, delivering the souls of the departed from past ages, severing their earthly servitude, and ascending them to the Southern Palace. During the long fast of the seventh month, reciting this sutra causes the Primordial Essence of the Great One to become the root of life in earth, and the body attains divine transcendence. The heavens record their names on yellow registers and white tablets, erasing death and inscribing life. During the long fast of the tenth month, reciting this sutra causes the Primordial Essence of the Great One to be titled the Imperial Lord of Earth, who oversees the four directions from the center, riding a yellow chariot adorned with abundant patterns. As king, emperor, lord, minister, father, and son, he stabilizes the nation’s destiny, ensuring the heavens’ eternal protection, the dynasty’s unbroken continuity, and perpetual rule over the realm. The people rejoice in great peace.

On the days of the eight solar terms, reciting this sutra causes the Primordial Essence of the Great One to gather the eight winds at the origin, the Great One to appear in the courtyard, and the five fortunes to come as blessings. The eight difficulties are avoided, and one becomes a Perfected of the Nine Palaces. On one’s life-destiny day, reciting this sutra causes the Primordial Essence of the Great One to protect life and bestow long life. The formless ancestors, the former lives of the Primordial Beginning, the root of life—all are hidden in the Great Mystery. Opening one’s eyes, one sees nothing but the empty mystery. The empty mystery is the treasure; awakening to it, one ascends as an immortal. The soul and spirit become pure and upright, the ten thousand qi endure forever, suffering is avoided, the body radiates light, the Three Realms stand guard, the Five Emperors oversee the reception, the myriad gods pay homage, one’s name is inscribed in heaven, and when merit is complete and virtue perfected, one soars to the Upper Clarity.

The Dao speaks: On the day of practicing the Dao, one must bathe in fragrant waters, fast and purify, then enter the chamber. Facing east, knock the teeth thirty-two times, so that it is heard in the thirty-two heavens. Bow in the heart thirty-two times. Close the eyes and silently visualize the body seated amidst clouds of blue, yellow, and white qi, both within and without shrouded in mist. There appear the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Warrior, Lion, and White Crane, arrayed to left and right. The sun and moon shine brightly, illuminating the chamber. The qi of the Primordial Essence of the Great One blazes as a crimson radiance above the crown of the head, with a circular image forming at the nape, its light illuminating the ten directions—all in vivid clarity.

The secret incantation says:
Supreme Mystery and Primordial Origin, Most High Dao Lord,
Summon forth from within my body the Three and Five Merit Officers,
The attendants of the left and right, the jade lads who tend incense,
The jade maidens who transmit words, the Five Emperors’ direct talismans,
The incense officials of the day—thirty-six each—
To open and convey my words.
Today is auspicious; the hall is pure with long fasting.
I cultivate the supreme sutra to deliver boundless beings.
May what I now declare ascend directly to the august presence
Of the Most High Primordial Lord of the Thirty-Two Heavens.

Conclude by drawing qi thirty-two times, then face east and recite the sutra.

*The Supreme Primordial Sutra of Boundless Salvation*
The Primordial Wondrous Treasure of the Cavernous Mystery,
The Primordial Essence of the Great One—supreme and wondrous beginning.
Delivering beings through the Yellow Court,
The hundred demons concealed in its rhymes,
Naturally uniting and dividing,
The Primordial Essence of the Great One.

The peerless supreme Perfected,
The Primordial Ancestral Earth,
Is called the Great Void.
The Void is the Great One.
The Ancestral Earth’s Primordial Essence
Nurtures the Three Realms,
Giving birth to the myriad heavens,
Illuminating the Three Luminaries—
This is the root of heaven.
Above, there is no further ancestor;
Only the Dao is the body.
Where there is no place, there is no Void;
Where there is no place, it is not Earth.
Void and Earth, Earth and Void—
The mother of the Dao.
The formless is the Void;
The formed is Earth.
The Void gives birth to transformation—
This is the true Void.
The Primordial Earth is formless—
This is the true Earth.
Earth is the source of life;
Those who comprehend the Void become immortals.
The Void can transform alone;
Earth possesses the supreme pattern.
The Primordial Essence of the Great One
Is the name of the true Earth.
The Five Patterns unfold and expand,
Universally nurturing the divine spirits.
Without pattern, there is no light;
Without pattern, there is no clarity;
Without pattern, there is no establishment;
Without pattern, there is no completion;
Without pattern, there is no deliverance;
Without pattern, there is no birth.
This is the Heaven within the Great Brahmā Heaven,
The Yu Luo Xiao Terrace, the Jade Mountain’s Upper Capital,
The supreme limit of the highest, the Great Luo Jade Clarity.
Vast and measureless, as if absent, as if present,
The Three Flowers separate and converge,
The wondrous court of the Great Existence.
Golden gates and jade chambers,
A forest of purity and radiance.
The divine qi of the Divine Empyrean
Pervades the ten directions.
Within it dwells the spirit of the Primordial Essence of the Great One,
Within it dwells the Lord of Longevity of the Southern Culmen,
Within it dwells the Lord of Azure Radiance of the Eastern Culmen,
Within it dwells the Great God Sima who delivers the world,
Within it dwells the Venerable Lord Han who cherishes life,
Within it dwell the exalted deities of the Southern Supreme—
The Controller of Destiny, the Recorder of Life,
The Extender of Longevity, the Augmenter of Years,
The Deliverer from Calamity—
Who restore the decayed frame and raise the dead,
Delivering boundless beings.
Today, they conduct the celestial audit,
As the myriad heavens descend in attendance.

The King of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the East,
Great Sage of Longevity, who delivers boundless beings.
The King of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the South,
Great Sage of Longevity, who delivers boundless beings.
The King of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the West,
Great Sage of Longevity, who delivers boundless beings.
The King of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the North,
Great Sage of Longevity, who delivers boundless beings.
The King of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the Northeast,
Great Sage of Longevity, who delivers boundless beings.
The King of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the Southeast,
Great Sage of Longevity, who delivers boundless beings.
The King of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the Southwest,
Great Sage of Longevity, who delivers boundless beings.
The King of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the Northwest,
Great Sage of Longevity, who delivers boundless beings.
The King of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the Above,
Great Sage of Longevity, who delivers boundless beings.
The King of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the Below,
Great Sage of Longevity, who delivers boundless beings.
The Perfected Kings of the Primordial Spirit of the Great One of the Boundless Flying Heavens of the Ten Directions,
Great Sages of Longevity, boundless great deities.

All ride upon auspicious clouds,
Crimson chariots and azure escorts,
Canopies of patterned wheels,
Drawn by yellow phoenixes and five-colored golden dragons,
Bearing the banner of the Great One,
With the Primordial Essence’s numinous pennants fluttering ahead,
Pí and tigers chanting in unison behind,
Luan and cranes singing together,
Lions and apotropaic beasts roaring,
The Five Elders leading the way,
Legions of immortals flanking the carriage,
Myriad chariots and ten thousand riders,
Floating through the void to arrive,
Turning their radiant chariots to oversee the deliverance of beings.

The Prime Minister of the Imperial Culmen,
The Supreme Palace of Southern Prosperity,
The Recorder Han who oversees life,
The great deities who monitor existence,
Holding registers and grasping ledgers,
All assemble before the Emperor,
Their bodies transforming to probe the mysteries,
Examining the numinous gates.
The Gate of the Mysterious Female,
The root of the Eight Poles.
Drawing in the Great Void,
The qi of Earth swirling and billowing.
Within the Void dwells the Perfected,
The spirit of ancestral destiny.
Harmonizing and swallowing saliva,
The brain contains the essence of Earth.
Flowing downward to the Yellow Court,
Ascending to connect with the Muddy Pellet,
The Mysterious Female’s breath,
The boundless qi of the Void.
Heavenly light enters the abyss,
The seven generations become immortals.
As each is delivered according to their due,
