The myriad spirits will pay homage, earth deities will stand at their gates, and the great merit-perfected kings will safeguard and recommend them to the Divine Empyrean. Once their Dao is complete, they may traverse the Three Realms and ascend through the Golden Gate.

These sounds repel all harm, dispel all misfortune, deliver all beings, and accomplish all ends—they are the spontaneous sounds of the Heavenly Perfected. Thus, reciting them summons the descent of flying heavens to observe, the Celestial Thearch to chant from afar, and the myriad spirits to pay homage. The Three Realms attend their chariots, all demonic forces bow their heads, ghostly essences vanish of themselves, and the chiming of jade-like tones resounds. The ten directions grow solemn and clear, rivers and seas fall silent, mountains and peaks swallow their mists, and the myriad spirits tremble in submission. They summon and gather the host of immortals, the heavens become free of impurity, the earth is cleansed of demonic dust, dark wisdom illumines the pure, and the vastness of the mysterious deepens into profundity.

*The Marvelous Scripture of the Upper Chapters of the Numinous Treasure’s Limitless Salvation of Humanity, Chapter Sixteen, concludes. Chapter Seventeen begins.*

**The Mulberry and Azure Yang Chapter**

The Dao speaks: Long ago in the Azure Spirit Heaven, the Great Cloud-Sprout hymned the fertile soil of life, receiving from the Primordial Beginning the *Limitless Upper Chapters of Salvation* of the Mulberry and Azure Yang. As the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning was about to expound this scripture, he circled ten times to summon the ten directions. At the first recitation, the Heavenly Perfected, the Great Spirits, the Lofty and Venerable, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct, the Great Emperor of the Mulberry, the Azure Radiance Emperor, the Azure Yang Treasure-Luster Wood Sovereign, the Nine Qi Upper Perfected Dao Lords, the Heavenly Officials and their retinues, the Perfected Immortals and True Persons—an innumerable host—rode the void and arrived. Jeweled clouds veiled the azure firmament, purple mists layered thick, jade-green chariots and eight-perfected flying palanquins advanced, canopies of precious foliage cast their shade, numinous radiance scattered across the sky, and seven-hued vapors blazed through the high heavens.

For nine days and nine nights, the sun, moon, and stars of all heavens halted their courses, the Five Wefts unfurled their light, the celestial scriptures flowed in order, the primordial net stilled, the Three Paths grew clear and level, streaming brilliance bound the passes, the Seven Luminaries blazed forth, and throughout the land—mountains, rivers, forests, and groves—all lay smooth and even, no longer high or low. The earth glistened with jade-like moisture, its hues undifferentiated.

The host of Perfected attended the throne as the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning sat in profound stillness upon a floating seat of azure unicorn, jade terrace, and sea-light treasure clouds. With the first recitation of the scripture, the Great Sages of all heavens voiced their approval in unison. At that moment, the men and women of the land saw their myriad evils dissolve, silently aligning with the True Dao.

With the second recitation, flowing essence descended into their bodies, fortifying the myriad spirits.
With the third, the five viscera bloomed with radiance, forever free of the hundred ailments.
With the fourth, golden light transformed their bones, and jade splendor refined their forms.
With the fifth, their entire beings grew empty and luminous, soaring and roaming at will.
With the sixth, their transformations spanned the Eight Extremes, universally delivering the ten directions.
With the seventh, the nether courts ceased their judgments, and they advanced to join the ranks of True Immortals.
With the eighth, the Primordial Elders and Five Emperors intoned wondrous sounds, and all heavenly beings came to know the Cloud-Sprout.
With the ninth, the heavens and earth manifested auspicious signs.
With the tenth, withered bones revived, returning to life and restoring their original destiny.

At that time, every man and woman in the land turned their hearts in devotion, all received protection and deliverance, and each attained longevity.

The Dao speaks: When the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning recited the scripture once, the Boundless and Limitless Vast-Life Great Spirits of the East, an innumerable host, arrived upon the void.
With the second recitation, the Boundless and Limitless Luminous Radiance Great Spirits of the South, an innumerable host, arrived upon the void.
With the third, the Boundless and Limitless Resplendent Purity Great Spirits of the West, an innumerable host, arrived upon the void.
With the fourth, the Boundless and Limitless Mysterious Transformation Great Spirits of the North, an innumerable host, arrived upon the void.
With the fifth, the Boundless and Limitless Numinous Brilliance Great Spirits of the Northeast, an innumerable host, arrived upon the void.
With the sixth, the Boundless and Limitless Blended Harmony Great Spirits of the Southeast, an innumerable host, arrived upon the void.
With the seventh, the Boundless and Limitless Stabilizing Peace Great Spirits of the Southwest, an innumerable host, arrived upon the void.
With the eighth, the Boundless and Limitless Returning Wind Great Spirits of the Northwest, an innumerable host, arrived upon the void.
With the ninth, the Boundless and Limitless Pure Virtue Great Spirits of the Above, an innumerable host, arrived upon the void.
With the tenth, the Boundless and Limitless Assisting Transformation Great Spirits of the Below, an innumerable host, arrived upon the void.

When the ten recitations were complete, the Boundless Heavenly Perfected of the Ten Directions and the Azure Yang Radiant Luminaries arrived as one. The men and women of the land turned their hearts in reverence. Each offered celestial treasure flowers, dragon incense, and a hundred fruits in respectful veneration. Those who came were like clouds or flying mists—an innumerable host—advancing until half the land had sunken, an unstoppable force.

Then the Primordial Beginning suspended a single treasure pearl, vast as a bright star, in the great void, nine *zhang* above the earth. The Celestial Worthy ascended, leading the Heavenly Perfected, the Great Spirits, the Lofty and Venerable, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct, the Boundless Azure Yang Great Spirits of the Ten Directions, and the innumerable host—all entered the treasure pearl. Gazing upward, the heavenly beings saw only a surging throng pouring into the pearl’s mouth. Once inside, their whereabouts were unknown. The people of the land dispersed, and the earth returned to levelness, no longer slanted or sunken.

Within the treasure pearl, the Celestial Worthy completed the full recitation of the scripture. The host of Perfected oversaw the deliverance and transmitted it to me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. The ritual matters concluded, the heavens returned to their stations, and in an instant, all fell silent without a trace.

At that time, the heavenly beings who encountered the scripture’s teachings were universally saved, their allotted years preserved, free from harm. The entire land turned in reverence, all venerating the Lofty Perfected. They merged with the radiant, merged with the wondrous, merged with qi, merged with spirit, merged with the primordial, merged with the original, merged with wisdom, merged with the numinous, merged with transformation, merged with change, merged with nature, merged with luminosity. Their hearts aligned with the Lofty Sages, their conduct flowing as a model. The Azure Yang descended into their bodies, and the Cloud-Sprout flourished. The twin brilliances refined them, the True Dao was perfected, the scripture’s teachings spread, and the entire land looked to its guidance. All poured forth their utmost sincerity, safeguarding life and preserving their essence, each attaining deliverance across the ages.

The Dao speaks: The names spoken by the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning in the recitation of this scripture are the inner appellations of the Heavenly Thearchs, the hidden rhymes of sound, the inner taboos of the True Kings, and the concealed names of the hundred spirits. Proclaiming the Mulberry Emperor’s Radiant Mountain, it connects below to the Azure Yang qi of the Great Abyss, entwining the Nine Firmaments with a perfect radiance of true light spanning three hundred thousand *li*. Those who draw upon its radiance become Immortal Ministers; those who revere its splendor become Supreme Perfected. The ninefold crimson mists ferry the Three Spirits across, jade and jasper transform their essences, and precious blossoms unfold in profusion—words beyond the common speech of the world.

The perfected of highest sagacity, having attained the status of True Person, penetrate the mysterious and fathom the subtle. Those who master its verses and recite them ten times refine their spirits in the Mulberry’s crucible, where the radiance of Yang’s blossom naturally forms. Precious luminosity blazes forth, and great fortune arrives in full. The Dao of the highest sagacity races to embrace the five celestial bodies; wondrous qi merges with the formless. They ascend in flight to the Jade Capital, all demonic forces submit and vanish, great demons bind their forms, the dead return to life, and white bones become human again.

For scholars of utmost devotion who recite it ten times, green-robed attendants present the scripture, the Great Cinnabar emits its splendor, and they contain the radiance and float upon the light. Heavenly spirits open the gates, the Eastern Pole bestows its seal, and the myriad qi converge as one. They deliver and ferry all beings, roaming through the Grand Tenuity. The reason for this is that the Mulberry is the essence born of Kunlun’s jade, and the Azure Yang is the qi of the Nine Blossoms of longevity. It reverses the years and averts calamity, bestowing upon you the Dao of the Primordial Elder Thearch.

The spirits of dragon mist stretch and coil, shaking the celestial walls; the liver’s leaves unfold like jade, and purple mist fills the gateways. Those who know this Dao ascend as ranked immortals, their complexions renewed to that of an infant. They transform like divine springs, eternally preserving life’s subtlety, merging with qi to extend their years. They penetrate the true and reach the numinous, receiving boundless blessings. Those who recite this chapter lightly bring misfortune upon themselves. Those who honor and revere it see their households flourish, their generations prosper, and their good karmic connections endure. Ten thousand disasters will not touch them, and divine spirits guard their gates.

This scripture is supremely wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital. It delivers countless beings and is the root of the ten thousand Dao. Its majestic and vast model is a virtue too great to surpass.

Dao speaks: Whenever this scripture is recited ten times, all the heavens assemble. The Azure Prime High Thearch, the luminous essence of the Nine Blossoms, the Mulberry Thearch’s Green Jade Pavilion, and the Heavenly Treasure Palace of Lesser Yang’s Azure Jasper—all issue decrees. The Phoenix Radiance Jade Maidens bear the Great Mystery’s Luminous Azure True Talismans, and they command the Nine Dark Prisons of the Yellow Springs’ subterranean courts to summon the spirits of Azure Yang. Those who escape death and receive life, the host of spirits of Great Yang, ascend with the light. The nine generations of ancestral souls in the netherworld are delivered and ascend in flight. After nine years of refinement, they receive transformation and rebirth, becoming noble persons. Those who diligently study this scripture, their merit complete and virtue perfected, all attain divine transcendence, ascending in flight to the Jade Treasury to feast in the Square Cauldrons below.

For scholars of high learning who cultivate and recite this scripture, Azure Yang enters the body, jade essence transforms within, and the Flowing Radiance of the Primal Efflorescence circulates. The Majestic Luminosity wields its battle-axe, severing the roots of the corpse. All immediately receive deliverance, ascending in flight to the Jade Clarity.

When the people of the world recite it, their chambers become resplendent with jade and jasper, crimson fires gleam like pearl pendants, and the Yang Perfected respond. Cinnabar transforms into purple chambers, the Dao of life continues their destiny, and ten thousand buds diffuse their fragrance. They preserve the jade-like sweetness, the six palaces bear crimson script, and the Five Ladles adorn their breasts. They sit enthroned upon the Demon-Subduing Star, guarding its power.

This scripture is subtle and wondrous, universally delivering without limit. All heavenly and human beings receive its blessings. Boundless fortune bestows grace upon life and death. Treasured by the heavens above, it is not transmitted to the lower world. Only the most devoted scholars, offering gold and treasures to express their sincerity, may swear celestial oaths to transmit it. Those who lightly disclose or disdain it bring calamity upon their nine generations, condemned to eternal servitude under the netherworld officials.

Twelve Jade Lads of the Beginning Yang and twelve Vermilion Radiance Jade Maidens attend the scripture, safeguarding its jade-like script and protecting the bodies of those who receive it.

Dao speaks: During the long fast of the first month, recite and chant this scripture. The Mulberry’s branches hang low, Azure Yang scatters its blossoms, and the qi of life transforms the dark. The torments of the netherworld cease, allowing the souls of past generations, severed from earthly bonds and freed from servitude, to ascend to the Southern Palace.

During the long fast of the seventh month, recite and chant this scripture. The Square Cauldrons descend the true, and Azure Blossom summons the spirits. The body attains divine transcendence, and the names of all heavens are inscribed on yellow registers and white tablets, erasing death and inscribing life.

During the long fast of the tenth month, recite and chant this scripture. The Eastern Radiance preserves life, the Yang Valley opens and forms. The Eight Passes reveal their mysteries, and the Nine Qi unfold in completion. They become kings, emperors, and lords, their ministers, fathers, and sons. The nation is peacefully governed, the celestial mandate preserved, and the throne endures through generations without end. They perpetually reign as sovereigns, peacefully governing their lands, where the people delight in great peace.

On the days of the eight solar nodes, recite and chant this scripture. The Celestial Mountain connects with its radiance, the Jade Ultimate extends longevity, and one becomes a True Person of the Lower Primordial.

On one’s natal day, recite and chant this scripture. The Great Unity descends, the Azure Thearch oversees the covenant. Externally, the mysterious qi circulates; internally, the Three Infants are nurtured. The hun and shen become pure and upright, and the myriad qi endure forever. They avoid suffering and affliction, their bodies radiant with light. The Three Realms attend and guard them, the Five Thearchs receive and welcome them, and the ten thousand spirits pay homage. Their names are inscribed in the heavens above. With merit complete and virtue perfected, they ascend in flight to the Highest Clarity.

Dao speaks: On the days of practicing the Dao, one must bathe in fragrant waters, fast, and enter the chamber. Facing east, knock the teeth thirty-two times to ascend through the thirty-two heavens. Bow thirty-two times with the heart, close the eyes, and silently visualize the body seated amidst the Nine Yang’s azure clouds. Within and without, all is dark and lush. A green dragon, white tiger, vermilion bird, dark warrior, lion, and white crane array themselves to the left and right. The sun and moon shine brightly, illuminating the chamber within. A circular image forms above the head, its light radiating in the ten directions—all must be vividly clear.

Recite the secret incantation:
*"Supreme Mystery and Primordial, Most High Dao Lord. Summon forth from within my body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the left and right official messengers, the jade lads attending incense, the jade maidens transmitting words, the Five Thearchs’ direct talismans, and the incense officials of the day—thirty-two each—to open and convey my words. Today is an auspicious and joyous occasion, a long fast in the pure hall, cultivating the supreme scripture to deliver countless beings. May what I declare ascend directly to the presence of the Most High Primordial Thearch before the throne of the thirty-two heavens."*

Conclude by drawing qi thirty-two times, then face east and recite the scripture.

*The Primordial Beginning’s Wondrous Scripture of the Upper Grade for Delivering Countless Beings*
*The Primordial Beginning’s Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Root Chapter*
*Mulberry Azure Yang, Nine Blossoms Upper Grade*
*Transforming qi to deliver beings, the Primordial Crystal’s hidden rhymes*
*Correctly moving with spontaneity, the Eastern Pole’s Azure Perfected*
*The Mysterious Pass transforms the spirit, the Nine Rays’ Jade Azure*
*Illuminating the Yang Gate, the Great Non-Being’s Supreme Kalpa*

The Eight Numinous Spirits transform and give birth, the Azure Palace is first established. The Fusang tree rises a hundred million fathoms high, where coiling dragons intertwine. Jiaoli jade coils and twines, the essence of Azure Yang, ascending to become the Year Star, illuminating the verdant radiance. This is the root of Heaven, below it becomes Azure Florescence, the Jade Palace of Fangzhu, above it has no further origin. Coeternal with the Dao, the true qi of the Jade Enclosure, it divides into sacred script, securely anchoring the Eastern Quarter. Mysterious transformations pure in benevolence, drawing forth resplendent rays, knotting luminous clarity, where hidden mushrooms spontaneously grow. Jade marrow and golden sinews, azure talismans unfold vastness, universally planting divine script.

No script fails to spread, no script fails to penetrate, no script fails to establish, no script fails to exalt, no script fails to transform, no script fails to elevate—this is the utmost subtlety. The palace amidst Heaven, of jasper and jade, a net of jewels, the Dragon Mountain’s unyielding peaks. Ascending to the utmost height, its radiance encircles the lofty vault, a boundless transforming city, securely anchoring the Great Void.

Azure Florescence departs and convenes, divine transformations of the Nine Dragons. Golden towers and yellow chambers, an array of purity and brilliance, the divine qi of the Divine Empyrean pervades the celestial capital. Within it dwells the immortal-delivering deity of deathlessness; within it dwells the Azure Youth Dao Lord of Fangzhu; within it dwells the Southern Culmen Lord of Longevity; within it dwells the Eastern Culmen Azure Florescence Thearch; within it dwells the Radiance-Gathering, Light-Drawing, World-Delivering Marshal Great Deity; within it dwells the Life-Cherishing Venerable Lord Han; within it dwell the exalted deities of the Southern Supreme, the Life-Recording Bureau, the Longevity-Extending and Fate-Delivering Register.

They restore bones and raise the dead, delivering countless beings. Today, the celestial records are examined, as the hosts of Heaven descend in audience. The Eastern Infinite Flying Celestial Azure Talisman Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer of Beings. The Southern Infinite Flying Celestial Azure Qi Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer of Beings. The Western Infinite Flying Celestial Azure Flame Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer of Beings. The Northern Infinite Flying Celestial Azure Spirit Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer of Beings. The Northeastern Infinite Flying Celestial Azure Void Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer of Beings. The Southeastern Infinite Flying Celestial Azure Yang Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer of Beings. The Southwestern Infinite Flying Celestial Azure Fortune Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer of Beings. The Northwestern Infinite Flying Celestial Azure Thearch Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer of Beings. The Upper Infinite Flying Celestial Azure Radiance Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer of Beings. The Lower Infinite Flying Celestial Azure Sprout Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer of Beings.

The perfected divine kings of the Ten Directions, the flying celestial deities, the great gods of longevity and world-deliverance, all ride upon flying chariots of azure light, drawn by carriages of azure pearls and jade-green luster. Green canopies and dark wheels, paired with cinnabar phoenixes, nine-headed azure dragons bearing banners of flowing rosy clouds, broad life-bestowing pennants. Before them, the concordant performance of cavernous scriptures; behind them, the harmonious chanting of jade hymns. White phoenixes and qilin sing in unison, azure spirits open the path. The Year’s Radiance flanks the axle-tree, a hundred million chariots and ten thousand riders arrive floating through the void. Their luminous return illuminates the path as they oversee the deliverance of beings.

The Eastern Culmen’s Prime Minister, the Divine Palace of Yang Valley, the Thearch’s Controller of the Mysterious Unity, the Great Deity of the Nine Qi, guides the descent of azure essence, its light illuminating the Eight Darknesses. Azure mists scatter and fly, the Three and Five move in harmony. Bones generate golden radiance, their brilliance reflecting upon jasper blossoms. The Azure Thearch receives the scriptures, the ranks of immortals and perfected take their places. They examine and determine the multitude of classes, distinguishing the hosts of spirits, holding registers and grasping ledgers, all arrive at the Mysterious Court. According to those who ought to be delivered, they strictly examine the Pure Capital, universally proclaiming to the Ten Poles, the distant and boundless heights.

The transforming abyss’s mansion, the numinous dwelling of Northern Lang, the Gate Wind and Kunlun’s hills, the jade terrace and thearch’s ruins. Extending down to the Cold Pool, the long night’s hidden bolts, they deliver and uplift ancestors, severing evil roots. No lingering restraints remain, and all attain transcendence. The Azure Palace’s talismanic mandate flies without cease, the divine peaks of Yu Luo open to guard body and soul. Great demons oversee the examination, delivering ranks to the Vermilion Mound. Dead souls refine their qi, transforming decay into living beings. Those who receive deliverance in life endure through kalpas, revolving with the ages, their years equaling Heaven’s. They forever transcend the Three Calamities and Eight Adversities, the Nine Perils and Five Sufferings, rising beyond the Three Realms, roaming freely in the Nine Purities.

In the Nine Pure Heavens, the Heavenly Thearch ensures peace, the formless realm of Brahman conduct. The Eight Heavens of the East: the Cultivating Rectitude and Flourishing Heaven, where the Thearch Ji Yi presides; the Azure Radiance and Harmonious Net Heaven, where the Thearch Min governs divine awakening; the Resonant Truth and Cavernous Radiance Heaven, where the Thearch Shan Cu Yue Wen presides; the Flourishing Lineage and Luminous Master Heaven, where the Thearch Yao Fu Yu Wo reigns; the Discerning Constancy and Rising Position Heaven, where the Thearch Guan Xian Zi Ren presides; the Passing Relief and Steady Chariot Heaven, where the Thearch Hu Hui Nan reigns; the Wooden Culmen and Essence-Generating Heaven, where the Thearch Gong Ji Xian Fang presides; the Broad Wind and Utmost Transformation Heaven, where the Thearch Meng Lin Jiu Zhong reigns.

The Eight Heavens of the South: the Celebrating Flame and Revering Antiquity Heaven, where the Thearch Xin Shi Bai Fan presides; the Verdant Truth and Responsive Net Heaven, where the Thearch Ben Ning Dao Xuan reigns; the Ancestral Principle and Lofty Clarity Heaven, where the Thearch Xuan You Xu Jia presides; the Solar Banner and Qi-Summoning Heaven, where the Thearch Tai Yi Zi Ting reigns; the Fluid Florescence and Marsh-Limiting Heaven, where the Thearch Yun Pu Lu Ying presides; the Constant Scripture and Guarding Harmony Heaven, where the Thearch Yao Ling Ji Yuan reigns; the Cavernous Void and Luxuriant Yang Heaven, where the Thearch Fei Ri Lu Xian presides; the Azure Palace and Life-Initiating Heaven, where the Thearch Shi Sheng Yu Ju reigns.

The Eight Heavens of the West: the Stabilizing Dawn and Supporting Dawn Heaven, where the Thearch Guang Kong Ji Zhen presides; the Curved Mulberry and Jade-Rinsing Heaven, where the Thearch Ying Ding Tai Jiao reigns; the Multitude of Peoples and Tranquil Lock Heaven, where the Thearch Qi Mo You Ning presides; the Mysterious Ruins and Demon-Rectifying Heaven, where the Thearch Zhi Huan Zhan Fu reigns; the Revolving Calendar and Spirit-Opening Heaven, where the Thearch Shi Wei Kang Jia presides; the Plain Contract and Governance-Regulating Heaven, where the Thearch Zhao Ke Si Fei reigns; the Western Purity and Jade Guest Heaven, where the Thearch Ci Liu Jiang presides; the Dao Origin and Sacred Mountain Heaven, where the Thearch Tai Jian Yong reigns.

The Eight Heavens of the North: the Hidden Pool and Overflowing Moisture Heaven, where the Thearch Jue Yin Shao Pi presides; the Void Gate and Spirit-Facing Heaven, where the Thearch Miao Zhi Lu Yi reigns; the Vast Net and Thearch’s Seat Heaven, where the Thearch Hu Hua Yi Guang presides.

The Fengying General-Overseeing Heaven, where the Thearch Shu Lu You Peng presides; the Wisdom-Hut Descending Perfection Heaven, where the Thearch Su Du Shan Ti reigns; the Proclamation Capital Assisting Governance and Blessing Heaven, where the Thearch Bu You Yun Fei presides; the Sea-Stilled Cloud-Adorned Jade Yi Heaven, where the Thearch Dong Yi Ming Chi reigns; the Ren-Led Six Offices Heaven, where the Thearch Kao An Gui Shen presides. The Thirty-Two Heavens. The Thirty-Two Thearchs. The mysteries of the Heavens are concealed, the names of the Heavens are hidden. Within the Heavens is emptiness and cavernous space, the natural numinous scriptures, the hidden rhymes of the Heavens.

The sound of the Green Yang. The honor of the Green Yang. The spirit of the Green Yang, the Green Yang’s misty crystal. The numen of the Green Yang. The Nine Qi and Ten Flowers transform into the Upper Clarity, boundless mysteries. Profound and beyond full comprehension, they spread forth the divine perfected, universally delivering heaven and humanity.

Today, joyously celebrating the reception of deliverance, passing through the celestial passes of Xu Tian, the Nine Wooden Perfected of Mu Zhen lean upon the Fusang staff. The wondrous numen gathers qi, forming the Green Yang. The Green Yang’s flying essence ascends as azure light. The great circle illuminates the void, a hundred million qi as its measure. Benevolent virtue reaches downward. Blessings bestow upon the sagely lord. Universally covering the cosmos, transforming and giving life to spirits, the divine immortals and dragon spirits. Perfectly responding to the utmost numinous.

Harmonizing and radiant, compassionate and forgiving, subtly wondrous and manifestly bright, those who study above feel the numinous, gazing upward to savor the essence of Heaven. Divine light flows downward, bones like jade and countenance like gold. They ascend the divine clouds by strategy, donning robes adorned with woven patterns. Delivering from suffering and aiding the distressed, they shake and protect the living people. They beseech the eradication of the Three Evils, severing the roots of the earth.

The Fusang tree emits blossoms, its coiled branches scattering petals, jade-green leaves by the myriad. Azure clouds in a thousand layers. Above, the numinous treasures are born. Purple light and cinnabar clusters, nine rays entwining the void, blazing radiance in the eastern dawn. Distant thoughts of the green chariot, dragon banners in profusion, green qi like a bowstring, drawing forth the hues of the mysterious twilight.

Washing the marrow and refining the spirit, galloping through the jade fluids, flying through the Nine Gates, opening wide the Eight Doors. The perfected descend to oversee and raise, arraying and proclaiming to the primordial perfected. The Eastern Dipper descends yang, the Western Dipper shines brightness, the Northern Dipper’s dark vastness, the Southern Dipper’s radiant brilliance, the Central Dipper benefits life, together embracing the ten thousand spirits.

Green Florescence initiates splendor, luminous fragrance awakens nature. Cinnabar buds support and guard, dark fluids preserve life. Yellow blossoms penetrate the center, universally enacting the teachings and commands. The Great Thearch of the Azure Net establishes great peace in the Three Realms. The Upper Perfected of the Azure Origin, green qi from the eastern mulberry. The Upper Perfected of the Cinnabar Origin, refining jade and vermilion light. The Upper Perfected of the White Origin, luminous fragrance flowing forth. The Upper Perfected of the Dark Origin, the twin gates upholding the essentials. The Upper Perfected of the Central Origin, seated and guarding the Hall of Light.

The Five Origins’ utmost spirits, the perfected of the upper realms, containing fragrance and embracing dew, intertwining the twin canopies. Flying dragons ascend high, falling phoenixes soar among the stars, governing the spirits and demons, the ancestors of the ten thousand spirits. Flying through the Three Paths, commanding the immortal soldiers, demonic banners and drummed rhythms, roaming and observing the Nine Clarities. Self-proclaimed resplendent, the Heavens unite in merit, transforming the people above. Sternly governing the Feng and Ying.

The Perfected Kings receive their mandate, universally sweeping away the pernicious and inauspicious. The Earl of Hua descends with crystal, dragon radiance wielding the blade. Great cinnabar flows like clouds, majestic transformation without bounds. Divine marshals hurl fire, flying smoke for ten thousand miles. Golden bells strike forth, jade halberds hang in eight directions. Whoever dares to test them, defying the lofty immortals. The dark battle-axe executes in front, divine metal punishes behind, slaughtering and dissecting the pernicious and reckless, surging and stirring without cease.

Severing a thousand thousand heads, shearing ten thousand ten thousand forms. Demons dare not trespass, ghosts have no pernicious essence. The Three Offices and Nine Bureaus clearly investigate the demonic camps, permitting no concealment. Jade horses cross and present. Universally proclaimed without direction, the ten thousand classes all listen. The Five Thearchs of the Three Realms array their words to the Upper Clarity.

The Primordial Cavernous Jade Calendar, the easternmost Fusang. Before the Five Kalpas opened, the Green Yang was first distinguished. Yang’s blossoms arose, the Three Origins’ guiding principles. Born to become divine immortals, the pivot of the Dao already extended. Shocking and awakening, the Dragon Han extended its peace. In the distant and boundless kalpas, within the primordial chaos, green manifested as color, yang fell and formed the abyss. Wind became the spirit of wood, marsh became the origin of wood. Wind and marsh interpenetrated the void, metal and stone congealed the heavens. Above the heavens and below the heavens, the great transformation is obscure.

Yang’s light vast and boundless, without limit and without name. The vast and chaotic Great Dao, expansive and without light. Cinnabar radiance initiated the chart, the movements naturally measured. Green Florescence peacefully guarded, the green proclamations of jade chapters. Red writings of jade characters, the Nine Qi’s dragon script, preserving and controlling the kalpic movements, causing the heavens to endure forever.

Brahma qi pervaded the net, the ten thousand patterns opened and extended. The Wooden Perfected flowed and evolved, the Four Nets and all heavens. The revolving guiding principles, boundless cycles of deliverance. The turning horns and passing smiles, the resplendent Dipper’s chariot. Flanking and assisting the celestial scriptures, transforming the Five Thearchs.

The Jade City’s Nine Gates, the Green Thearch of the eastern quarter. Thirty-five divisions, gathering qi into the Upper Origin. The Eight Sceneries darkly unite, qi enters the mysterious and profound. Within the mysterious is the Great August, the jade ultimate and immortal perfected. Riding the scenery and pacing the void, descending to illuminate the mulberry groves. A thousand perfected together assemble in the Thearch’s court, drinking and eating of the Green Yang. Through profound kalpas and deep sinkings, floating scenery entwining the clouds, chanting and intoning the cavernous scriptures.

The golden perfected, bright and elegant, flowing echoes in the cloud palaces. Numinous sounds transform the scenery, blending and returning with the wind. The Great Void’s dense subtlety, assisting and winging the mysterious emptiness.

The Green Yang enters the liver, the Azure Jade Mountain. Within is the Youthful Lad, clad in brocade robes and fine caps, holding the celestial keys, blowing and exhaling through the hundred gates. Internally communicating with the realms. Feeling and responding, donning orchid, white pearls strung in rows, flowing through the Three Fields. Beating the bellows and inhaling harmony, resplendently forming the cinnabar. A thousand harmonies and ten thousand unions, naturally becoming perfected.

The perfected is the Green Yang, within yang is the spirit. The Great Lord of Longevity, the Radiant Yuan Lord’s son. The vast and crystalline honored spirit. The Square Reservoirs’ Controller of Destiny, the Yang Valley’s harmonious extension, holding talismans and grasping registers, preserving life and rooting existence. Ascending through the Nine Clarities, entering and exiting the jade chambers. Within the Eight Passes, amid the subtle and minute, descending to guard the human body.

The jade towers and crimson palaces, centrally governing the Five Qi, blending the hundred spirits. Ten revolutions return the numen, uniting with qi to become immortal. The immortal path values life, the azure enclosure delivers humanity.

The Nine Gates open above, a great wheel of azure light. It governs the celestial administration, subjugates ghosts and spirits below, and presides over the people in the middle, determining the karmic causes of sin and fortune. Universally receiving deliverance, the dead souls are reborn in bodies, and having received life, they ascend to be heard by the various heavens.

Above the various heavens, each has its Gate of Life. Within lies the *Green Mulberry Cloud-Leaf*, the spontaneous *Azure Yang Hollow Melody*, the *True King’s Numinous Scroll*, its verses harmonizing with the lofty perfected. The first: *The Flying Song of Fusang across the Azure Sea*

Jade Capital and Emerald Metropolis, linked below to the Azure Abyss.
Radiant rosy clouds in millions, the Nine Mysteries of Azure Yang.
Cold waves surge and overflow, the green expanse of Fusang.
Together they grow ten thousand fathoms, the divine wind transforming the net.
Leaves reflect the azure void, within are concealed the dragon scripts.
Singing in the void forms rhythm, branches dance with soaring luan birds.
Primal essence entwines in gauze, green blossoms and jade pendants.
Forests dense as clouds, within dwell the highest perfected.
Precious crowns towering, feathered skirts of intertwining dragons.
Their title: the Supreme Emperor, the Venerable of Fusang.
Wu Ying and Bo Hua, the nine-souled dragon embryo.
They preside over the ultimate teachings, refining the five forms.
A thousand transformations, ten thousand changes, the eight paths raise their banners.
They inscribe my supreme model, recording names in the Square Reservoirs.

The second: *The True King’s Chapter of Azure Yang’s Precious Radiance*

Fusang’s interwoven branches stand side by side.
Touching clouds, dragons ascend; pressing waves, thunder rises.
Coiling roots stretch sinuously, connecting a thousand miles of bends.
The great spirit of the Azure Palace, the Supreme Unity’s primordial honored one.
Azure rosy clouds layered, the Dark Elder of the Mysterious Phase.
The Three Realms look up to its virtue, the Nine Lands receive its grace.
The perfected of the Mulberry Forest, whose qi is named Azure Yang.
Ascending to the divine heavens, knotting blossoms in the purple chambers.
Precious radiance blazing, overturning the cinnabar-transformed realm.
Illuminating below the myriad heavens, boundless majesty and light.
Nurturing the ranked sages, flying deliverance to extend well-being.
Looking up to draw in divine rosy clouds, weaving through the heavens as constant principles.
Awakening to this, one attains the Dao of life; those who comprehend commune with the divine.
Chanting the *Azure Yang Chapter*, the Nine Heavens bow to the cloud wheel.

The third: *The Hymn of the Azure Flower Emperor Lord of the Eastern Ultimate* sings:

A precious mountain stands in the southeast, above lies the True King’s palace.
Its roots coil through the vast void, gazing down into the Nine Empyreans.
Within are arrayed the various spirit offices, governing the billions of heavenly lineages.
The primal heir assists the Supreme Emperor, commanding and reviving the true wind.
Observing below the Round Net, riding a chariot of flying celestial dragons.
The Ten Ultimates hold to the primal transformation, the Great Demon serves as examiner.
Subduing the armies of the Six Heavens, ensuring the Dao’s eternal flourishing.
Flying petitions request jade decrees, dark talismans absolve Fengdu’s netherworld.
Great compassion pities the long night, halting the Five Sufferings.
With me, it shares the same qi, soaring freely in the Crimson Clarity.
Transformations without bound, universally delivering the heavens’ people.
Why delight in fleeting pleasures, wearying the spirit with desires?
Not learning the supreme true Dao, passing years in vain sorrow.
I now sing this hymn, its pure tones moving the mysterious ones.

Above the Three Realms, amid the flying void, the True King’s song, its sounds harmonizing with the cavernous hymns. Reciting it a hundred times, one’s name is registered in the Southern Palace. Reciting it a thousand times, the True King protects and welcomes. Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao, soaring to the Great Void, transcending the Three Realms, and ascending to the rank of Immortal Duke. Hearing the numinous sound, the True King summons the spirits, commands the earth deities, and provides escort and reception. Drawn from the earthly prison, freed from the Five Sufferings and Eight Difficulties, seven generations of ancestors ascend, forever leaving the dark mountains. The soul crosses the Vermilion Mound, undergoes refinement, and is reborn. This is called boundless, universally delivering without end.

There are secret celestial texts, revered by all the heavens. Revealing them carelessly casts one into hell, bringing calamity to seven generations of ancestors. The Dao states: These two chapters are the hidden sounds of the Celestial Emperor and the various numinous True Kings, revealing the Fusang Mountain and its vast immortal realm. This mountain spans ten thousand *li* on each side, located east of the Azure Sea, ninety thousand *li* from the Middle Kingdom. Above, it connects to the Five Offices of the Divine Empyrean, within a hundred million *li*, where the Great True King, the Fusang Supreme Emperor, the Azure Lad Dao Lord of the Square Reservoirs, and the detached palace of the Azure Flower Emperor of the Eastern Ultimate reside.

The mountain bears a giant mulberry, yellow within and red without. Its flowers, when eaten, bestow longevity; its sap, like jade syrup, grants a thousand kalpas of life when consumed. Refined into elixir and ingested, it makes one a lofty perfected. Its roots draw the jade essence from the Jade Capital and Kunlun Mountains, gestating within the mulberry to produce jade ore below, like the pine roots of the world that bear *fuling*. The *fuling* grows for a thousand years, gaining numinous efficacy. Beneath Fusang lies jade ore, warm and lustrously beautiful, capable of commanding phoenixes to alight upon it. Below, jade forms incompletely, congealing into flowing liquid. Consuming it transforms one into an infant, with a lifespan equal to heaven and earth.

Above Fusang, there are spirit chickens, luan birds, and nine-colored phoenixes. At dawn, they ascend the *Ruomu* tree, while the golden crow flies upon the mulberry—this is the sun rising from Yang Valley. At Fusang’s summit, there is a qi named Azure Yang, which above becomes Jupiter. Its light illuminates three hundred thousand *li*, with a diameter of a hundred *li*. It completes one celestial circuit in twelve years, appearing and disappearing every 399 days. Over eighty-three years and seventy-six appearances, it completes seven celestial circuits. Within it, there are stellar emperors, empresses, consorts, officials, and attendants, with the Wood Sovereign as their ruler.

Cultivating this Dao, the Primal Cinnabar and Supreme Unity practice exhaling and inhaling the azure qi. The Supreme Heavenly Honored One bestows upon the practitioner the Azure Talisman. The Duke of Wu Ying drinks the azure essence with the practitioner. The Dragon Smoke Elder and the Mighty Alliance Perfected receive the practitioner’s Eastern True Script, ascending eastward with the Azure Yang. The subtle and wondrous tones are all the words of the Great Brahma, not the common speech of the world. Their words lack ornate beauty, their melodies lack florid grace—thus they are called profound and obscure, difficult to fathom in detail.

The heavens treasure them, secreting them in the Eastern Repository of the Jade Capital’s Highest Divine Empyrean Jade Treasury. According to the regulations, they are transmitted downward every thirty-seven thousand years when the time is ripe. If a perfected one offers gold and treasures with a sincere heart, following the old protocols to pledge allegiance to the Ten Heavens, they may then be bestowed.

The Dao speaks: The Azure Yang is the power that generates blessings, upon which all beings with form depend. When the revolutions of heaven and earth reach their end, when the sun, moon, and five planets wane and wax, when the most sagely and divine ones prosper or decline, and when those of shallow learning suffer harm—whenever such calamities arise, all of like qi must unite in heart to perform purification rites, burn incense in the six periods, and recite the scriptures ten times over. Then virtue and blessings will descend at once, dissolving all inauspiciousness. The boundless scriptures universally deliver the limitless.

The Dao speaks: When those of shallow learning in the Dao have not yet fulfilled their immortal rank and the time comes for their dissolution, their bodies pass through the Great Yin. At the hour of their passing, fellow perfected ones of the same learning burn incense and recite the scriptures ten times to deliver the corpse-form according to the proper method. Then the Azure Florescence Emperor of the Eastern Ultimate bestows the Talisman of Pervading Radiance, summoning the qi of the Azure Yang. In the Palace of the Peerless, the Primordial Azure Essence of the Great Mystery flows forth, entering the liver-residence of the practitioner. The Gate of Death is sealed, the Wood Sovereign roams within, and the Luminous Elder opens the Purple Orchid Chamber for the practitioner, unfastening the Azure Pearl Seal. There, the practitioner receives the hidden script of their own essence-spirit, reciting it in accordance. The hun-soul ascends directly to the Southern Palace, where, by the measure of their cultivated merit, they are reborn after a calculated number of days. No longer deluded by the turning wheel, they attain the immortality of divine transcendents.

The Dao speaks: When the revolutions of heaven and earth reach their end, when the stellar lodgings fall into disarray, when the sun and moon lose their brightness, when the four seasons fall out of order, when yin and yang are unbalanced, when the land is beset by calamities and portents, when water and fire bring dire straits, when pestilential toxins spread, when the people perish and suffer, when masters and companions pass away, when the virtuous meet untimely misfortune—then all must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures. The merit of purification rites and scripture recitation is most weighty: above, it dissolves heavenly disasters and safeguards the emperor; below, it wards off poisonous harm and delivers the people. In life and death, all depend upon it, its blessings beyond measure. Thus it is called boundless, universally delivering heaven and humanity.

The Dao speaks: Whoever possesses these scriptures and performs these meritorious deeds for the lords of heaven and earth and the people—on the day of calamity, if they resolve in heart to perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures ten times—all the heavens will record their names, the myriad spirits will attend and protect them, and the perfected ones of the right will distinguish them, enabling them to become ministers of the Golden Watchtower of the Sagely Lord. The heavens record the merits and transgressions of people without the slightest error. The True Kings of Heaven will also safeguard and recommend your person. Those who attain the Dao will then thoroughly comprehend the most profound words. The boundless hidden language of the Great Brahma resounds throughout the heavens.

The Heavenly Worthy of the Dao composed this,
The Numinous Writ of the Primordial One from the Fusang Azure Yang Jade Chapters of the Eight Heavens of the East.

The lofty peaks of Zhai and Xuan, the resounding hymns of Mo and Guang.
Through the ages, echoes reverberate, welcoming redemption at the Mystic Mound.
The rushing waters cascade in layers, firmly concealing the radiance of the abyss.
Compassion aligns with the traces of splendor, illuminating the chambers of the Shi and Fang.
The wondrous fish stands as consort, its ritual form tempered by firmness.
The nightly depths of Haizou, the unfurling brilliance of Linlang.
The inscribed tablet and the few unite as one, encountering fullness in the eastern auspices.
How much more the measuring of pheasants and ducks, the convergence of Hu and Tang.

**Southern Eight Heavens**
The blazing battles of Zhan and Chi, the soaring brilliance of Tuo and Teng.
The sorrowful youths of Qi and Ru, the dark abundance of Zang and Yin—
the demon lords establish their offices.
At the summit of the terrace, officials are commanded; swift messengers proclaim the strictures.
Yang resides at the primal capital, exhaustively investigating the origins of all divisions.
Fierce gatherings stabilize the thorns; the warmth of deer and the darkness of the prison.
The radiant supplements the imperial throne; the tranquil divisions maintain constancy.
Fierce and humble, the handle of power is weighty; auspicious omens convey trust.
The flourishing era is profound in sincerity; the brilliance of Kun and Yi shines forth.

**Western Eight Heavens**
The will of Senashi is numinous; the path of Ruda reaches the mark.
Atop the towering capital, Lu surveys all with complete assistance.
Anyi spreads ferocity; seeking the slightest measure, he examines correctness.
The wolf’s patterns and the ruggedness of Xie; the way is encamped with arrayed forces.
Yan Teng releases the brilliance of Lin; Bao Chou and Yin Cang.
The myriad scholars and masters of discipline; the pools and palaces, the corpses of nobility.
The fleeing and the hidden, the seals and the orchids; recounting the gates of darkness.
The spirits of the dark rivers and the Dipper; the golden names extend in invocation.

**Northern Eight Heavens**
The beams of Fusang support the rosy clouds; cutting off rebellion and stubbornness.
Illuminating learning and primordial quiescence, embracing the gate of the imperial grace.
The talisman of Ding in purple; the nightly abode pursues emulation.
Entrusting to marvels and hidden depths; the sands of Po and the praise of Yan.
Binding the springs and the hidden; intertwining wonders with the floating net.
Pure faith and shared dharma; without compassion, striking the high.
The profligate and the dragon’s gathering; the calculations of Luo and the transmissions of Zhuo.
The karma of Ye and Zheng, the brilliance of Fan; the stone thunder and the luminous clarity.

The Dao speaks: These are the boundless hidden languages of the Great Brahma within the heavens, the sounds of the infinite.
The ancient script was inscribed upon the Jade Terrace to the left of the Azure Emperor, the Azure Yang cavern resplendent.
The Way of Wood flourishes; benevolent grace pervades purely.
Longevity and joy extend afar; life is bestowed upon the earth, and virtuous power upon the heavens.
Roaming the utmost void, subtly returning to the Three Origins.
Fortune and nobility trace back to the beginning; the Dao rewards its mystery.
Each character spans a full *zhang* in breadth.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign of old transcribed this text, establishing it as the correct intonation.
Those who know its sounds and can fast and recite it shall have the flying heavenly spirit-kings of all heavens descend to observe their person.
Their diligence is recorded and reported above to the heavens; the myriad spirits pay homage, the earthly deities attend at the gates.
The Perfected King of Great Accomplishment safeguards and recommends the true essence of Wood.
With the Dao complete, one may roam the Three Realms and ascend through the Golden Gate.
This sound repels all, exorcises all, delivers all, and accomplishes all—it is the natural sound of the Heavenly Perfected.
Thus, reciting it summons the spirit-kings to descend and observe; the Supreme Emperor chants from afar.
The myriad spirits pay homage; the Three Realms attend in reverence.
All malevolent forces bow their heads; demonic essences vanish of themselves.
The jade-like resonance vibrates; the ten directions grow solemn and clear.
The rivers and seas fall silent; the mountains and peaks swallow their mists.
The myriad spirits tremble and submit; the assembled immortals are summoned.
The heavens are free of impurity; the earth is without demonic dust.
Dark wisdom is thoroughly purified; the vast measure is profoundly mysterious.

**The Wondrous Scripture of the Numinous Treasure, the Uppermost Rank for Delivering Humanity, Chapter Seventeen Concludes**
**Chapter Eighteen**

The Radiant Chapter of Pristine Light

The Dao spoke: Long ago in the Primordial Grotto-Heaven, amidst jubilant rosy clouds streaming with celestial sounds and the alchemical soil of the void, the Primordial Commencement transmitted the *Primal Scripture for Delivering Humanity, the Radiant Chapter of Pristine Light of the Uppermost Rank*. As the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Commencement was about to expound this scripture, he circumambulated ten times to summon the ten directions, then ascended his seat.

The Heavenly Perfected, the Most High and Revered, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct, the Jade Consort of the Western Florescence, the True Kings of the Four Poles, the Primordial Sovereign of Yellow Simplicity, the Flying Celestial Couriers, the Divine Officials and Governors—an innumerable host—rode the void to arrive. White clouds and verdant mists bore their feathered chariots; their floral canopies drifted upon the dawn, pearls and jades interreflecting their radiance. Five-hued effulgences surged and billowed, illuminating the vastness of the Great Void.

For nine days and nine nights, the solar palaces and lunar mansions of the manifold heavens, the starry towers and celestial pavilions, the Primordial Dipper stilled its mechanism, the Three Paths aligned in perfect circuit. The adamantine winds grew tranquil; the Kunlun peaks withdrew their clouds. The earth floated upon five auspicious omens; the heavens opened their eight gates. The lands, mountains, rivers, cities, and forests stretched level and uniform, no longer distinguished by height or depth. All soil transformed into luminous jade, without variation in hue.

The assembled Perfected attended in reverence as the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Commencement, in profound repose, sat upon a lotus of ten thousand petals afloat in the void. When he had expounded the scripture once, the Great Saints of the manifold heavens simultaneously proclaimed its excellence. At that time, all men and women of the realm, gazing upward to heed the Dharma-sound, awakened in spirit and insight.

When he had expounded it twice, their numinous palaces grew empty and luminous.
When thrice, they silently accorded with the mysterious and wondrous.
When four times, true qi bathed their bodies, and all ailments were healed.
When five times, their forms harmonized with the Orthodox Dao, and all evils were dispelled.
When six times, the thirty-two heavens revealed their true scriptures.
When seven times, the Jade Realms of the Nine Heavens, the Mysterious Palaces of the Four Poles, and the Treasured Scriptures of the Three Caverns became clearly and fully visible.
When eight times, beneath the encircling heavens and within the Great Void, all sounds partook of the Great Pattern.
When nine times, nine-hued wondrous lights descended to illumine the darkest nights, universally absolving the suffering souls of the Northern Feng.
When ten times, the ten thousand kinds of the ten directions followed their natures in carefree wandering.

At that time, all men and women of the realm, without exception, turned their hearts in devotion. All received protection and deliverance, attaining longevity without end.

The Dao spoke: At that time,

When the Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning expounded the scripture once, the boundless and measureless multitudes of the Flowery Forest Great Spirits of the Eastern Direction arrived floating through the void. When twice, the boundless and measureless multitudes of the Vermilion Script Great Spirits of the Southern Direction arrived floating through the void. When thrice, the boundless and measureless multitudes of the Imperial Talisman Great Spirits of the Western Direction arrived floating through the void. When four times, the boundless and measureless multitudes of the Primordial Radiance Great Spirits of the Northern Direction arrived floating through the void. When five times, the boundless and measureless multitudes of the Azure Essence Great Spirits of the Northeastern Direction arrived floating through the void. When six times, the boundless and measureless multitudes of the Round Pearl Great Spirits of the Southeastern Direction arrived floating through the void. When seven times, the boundless and measureless multitudes of the Vast Rosy Clouds Great Spirits of the Southwestern Direction arrived floating through the void. When eight times, the boundless and measureless multitudes of the Golden Flower Great Spirits of the Northwestern Direction arrived floating through the void. When nine times, the boundless and measureless multitudes of the Purple Empyrean Great Spirits of the Upper Direction arrived floating through the void. When ten times, the boundless and measureless multitudes of the Numinous Capital Great Spirits of the Lower Direction arrived floating through the void.

When the ten recitations were complete, the Perfected Great Spirits of the Nine Ultimates of the Ten Directions arrived all at once. All men and women of the realm turned their hearts in devotion, rejoicing to hear the Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning proclaim the teachings of the Luminous Radiance of the Plain Light. Externally, they gave birth to heaven and earth, coalescing into primordial chaos; internally, they gave birth to the myriad things, transforming into mountains and rivers. All arose from the formless Five Agents, the true nature of primordial metal, their empty luminosity joining as one force, indestructible. Even the gods and spirits of humankind, with their perceptions of sorrow and joy, were formed from the uncarved hardness of the Plain Light and the illuminating, discerning body of Luminous Radiance. Things may be hard or brittle, yet their becoming is one. Humans may be sagely or common, yet their knowledge is one. Though we possess this metal, it has not yet been smelted. Now, encountering the Most High Lord’s method-fire, we refine this divine metal, casting it into ritual vessels, perfecting this power of the Dao, enabling boundless transformations.

Having spoken thus, they rejoiced and bowed again, then withdrew to the side of their seats. Those who came were like fine rain or dense mist—countless multitudes—so that half the land of the realm sank unevenly, beyond all restraint. Thereupon, the Most High Lord suspended a single precious pearl, as large as a millet grain, in the dark emptiness seven *zhang* above the earth. The Most High Lord ascended and led the Perfected Great Spirits of Heaven, the Lofty Perfected Ones, and the Wondrously Practiced Realized Ones, along with the boundless multitudes of the Luminous Radiance of the Plain Light from the Ten Directions, all entering into the pearl. The heavenly beings looked up and saw only a surging flow entering through the pearl’s mouth. Once inside, they knew not where they were. The people of the realm dispersed, and the earth returned to levelness, no longer uneven or sunken.

Within the pearl, the Most High Lord completed the full exposition of the scripture. The assembled Perfected Ones oversaw the transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. When the ritual matters were roughly concluded, the myriad heavens returned to their places, and in an instant, all was silent, without lingering resonance.

At that time, the heavenly beings who encountered the scriptural teachings universally attained deliverance, preserving their original years without harm. The entire land turned in devotion, all perceiving the wondrous subtleties. Without attachment or stagnation, without thought or entanglement, without love or hatred, without suffering or affliction, without defeat or loss—their minds aligned with the true Dao, their words accorded with heavenly patterns. Equal in compassion and love, even those of different bones became kin. The land flourished in peace, forever celebrating great tranquility. From the scripture’s first emergence as teaching, the realm was guided by the Dao. Those who in advance held sincere hearts, revered and honored it, all attained transcendence of the world.

The Dao spoke: What the Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning expounded in the scripture are the inner names of the Celestial Emperors of the various heavens, the hidden rhymes of sound, as well as the inner taboos of the True Kings and the concealed names of the hundred spirits. They reveal the wondrous subtleties of the Dao: the formless Five Agents, born before heaven and earth, cohabiting in a single *qi*, undivided through kalpas. Within lies divine metal, the Luminous Radiance of the Plain Light; externally, they form the various heavens, internally, the true spirits—hard and indestructible. The myriad things depend on them for completion. If you can know this, you may endure forever. These are not the common words of the world. Only the Perfected Ones who have already attained realization can fully grasp their verses. Reciting them ten times, the various heavens chant from afar, the ten thousand emperors perform rites, rivers and seas fall silent, mountains and peaks conceal their clouds, the golden wheel halts its radiance, the jade pivot ceases its turning. The vast and boundless Great Void flies through the Gate of Life. The soft becomes ultimate hardness, the empty becomes ultimate concealment. Vast beyond enclosure, broad beyond measure. Golden light and Plain Light, Luminous Radiance without limit, congealed yet flowing, attaining the frontier of the Dao. Hordes of demons bind their forms, ghostly spirits extinguish their clarity, the dead return to life, white bones become human.

For those of utmost learning who recite this ten times, the Golden Gate verifies their transcendence, the True Registers serve the Mysterious. The Five Emperors stand guard, the Three Realms bow in reverence. Demon spirits lose their sight, ghostly *xie* extinguish their clarity. They deliver those on the verge of death, reviving those who have perished. The reason for this is that the scholar’s polluted *qi* has not yet dissipated, their body has not yet penetrated the true, their divine metal is not yet firm—when exposed to fire, it melts. Their Plain Light is not yet pure, their Luminous Radiance dim and obscure. Though they summon and command the Ten Directions, their power does not yet govern the celestial administration. Their virtue can only subdue earthly spirits, bind demonic spirits, and avert death—but they cannot restore life. To recite these verses lightly brings calamity upon oneself. To offer reverent veneration opens the gateway to prosperity, flourishing through generations, forming good karmic conditions. Ten thousand disasters do not approach, and divine luminaries guard the gate.

This scripture is supremely wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital, delivering boundless beings as the root of the ten thousand Dao. Its majestic pattern is vast, its virtue beyond measure.

The Dao spoke: For those who recite this scripture ten times, the divine metal of Plain Light does not scatter, its numinous essence endures. The luminous soul remains forever, the Yin Pass opens of itself, and all heavens arrive together. Countless generations of ancestors, the souls of the dark realms if still sentient, all immediately receive deliverance, ascending to the Vermilion Palace. After nine years of refinement, they receive transformation and rebirth, becoming noble persons.

Those who diligently study the scriptures to their culmination, fulfilling their merit and perfecting their virtue, all attain divine transcendence, ascending to the Golden Gates and roaming the Jade Capital in celestial feasting. Scholars who cultivate and recite this scripture align their primordial luminosity with their nature, their empty bodies attaining the divine. Their golden bodies achieve the Dao, dwelling in the Supreme Clarity, all receiving deliverance and ascending to the Southern Palace.

When worldly beings recite it, preserving the True Unity within their bodies and safeguarding their golden virtue from decay, their karmic fires cannot consume them. Thus, they extend their years and attain longevity, later all achieving the Dao of liberation through simulated death. Their souls and spirits temporarily dissolve, never passing through hell, and swiftly regain their forms to roam the great void.

This scripture is subtly wondrous, universally delivering boundless beings. All heavenly and mortal beings receive its blessings. Immeasurable fortune arises, and the cycles of life and death are graced with its favor. Treasured by the heavens above, it is not transmitted to the lower worlds. Only the most devoted offer gold and treasures in sincerity, swearing celestial oaths to transmit it. Those who lightly disclose or profane it bring calamity upon nine generations, forever bound to serve as officials in the nether realms.

Five Emperors attend this scripture, with twenty-four Jade Lads and twenty-four Jade Maidens each, safeguarding its divine writ and protecting the bodies of those who receive it.

The Dao spoke: During the long fast of the first month, recite and chant this scripture. Wood manifests its golden embryo, and the five viscera generate spring. The withered, decayed, and aged are renewed, attaining eternal life. For the souls of the departed in past ages, it severs their earthly bonds and toils, delivering them to the Southern Palace.

During the long fast of the seventh month, recite and chant this scripture. The radiant essence of the golden stream shines within, and divine might pervades the inner darkness. A hundred passages grow firm and strong, the abyssal pool dredged of its numinous essence. The body attains divine transcendence, and the names of all heavens are inscribed—on yellow registers and white tablets, death is erased and life restored.

During the long fast of the tenth month, recite and chant this scripture. Water unites with metal, coalescing into a sacred embryo. Heaven and earth become a single speck of dust, most wondrous and most mysterious. Those who practice this transform and ascend as flying immortals.

For kings and emperors, rulers and ministers, fathers and sons, it brings peace and stabilizes the nation, preserving the celestial mandate for eternity. Dynasty after dynasty, they remain sovereigns, securing their realms, and the people proclaim great peace.

On the eight nodal days, recite and chant this scripture. Water, fire, earth, and wood are all subsumed by metal. The spirit is eternally fortified, and one becomes a True Person of the Nine Palaces.

On one’s natal day, recite and chant this scripture. The Supreme Unity descends, and the primordial radiance shines with numinous essence. The three souls are summoned—three on the left, seven on the right—ceaselessly employed. The souls and spirits become serene and upright, the ten thousand qi enduring forever. No suffering is endured, and the body emits light. The Three Realms attend in guard, the Five Emperors oversee the reception, and ten thousand spirits pay homage. Names are inscribed in the Earthly Heaven, and upon the fulfillment of merit and virtue, one ascends to the Supreme Clarity.

The Dao spoke: On the days of ritual practice, one must bathe in fragrant waters, fast, and enter the chamber. Facing east, knock the teeth thirty-two times, ascending to the thirty-two heavens. Bow thirty-two times in reverence, close the eyes, and silently envision the body seated amidst clouds of blue, yellow, and white qi, both within and without shrouded in mist. Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Warrior, Lion, and White Crane array themselves to the left and right. The radiant essence of the primordial luminosity shines like the bright moon, its brilliance illuminating the crown. Sun and moon cast their light, suffusing the chamber with splendor. A circular image forms above the head, its radiance illuminating the ten directions—all must be vividly clear.

The secret incantation states:
Supreme Mysterious Origin, Most High Dao Lord.
Summon forth from within my body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the Attendant Envoys of the Left and Right, the Jade Lads who tend incense, the Jade Maidens who transmit words, the Direct Attendants of the Five Emperors, and the Incense Officials of the Day—thirty-two each—opening the passage for my words.
On this auspicious day, in a pure hall of long fasting, cultivating the supreme scripture, delivering boundless beings, may my entreaties ascend directly to the presence of the Most High Primordial Sovereign of the Thirty-Two Heavens.
Conclude by drawing qi thirty-two times, then face east and recite the scripture.

*The Wondrous Scripture of the Primordial Limitless Deliverance of Beings, Supreme and Marvelous*
The Primordial Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure’s Fundamental Chapter, the Supreme and Marvelous Beginning of the Radiant Primordial Luminosity, opens the heavens to deliver beings. The Hidden Rhythms of the Celestial Sovereign merge with spontaneity. The Great Cavern’s Primordial Metal, the Empty Mystery’s Utmost Perfection, is firm, resolute, and luminously decisive. Its divine transformations pervade all, indestructible and unstained. It transcends boundaries to reach the highest clarity, embracing the great void and generating the nine origins within. Formless and truly wondrous, the Dao’s nature is numinously mysterious.

The Primordial Sovereign spreads qi, establishing the myriad heavens. The firm winds stir within, and the primordial radiance revolves without. The utmost yang congeals into substance, the brahmic qi flowing like springs, coalescing into a great vessel. The two images then part. The radiant primordial luminosity emerges—this is the numinous root. Above, it has no further ancestor; only the Dao is its body. Its radiant splendor flows and coalesces, universally planting divine spirits.

The peerless jade scripture secures the Cinnabar Citadel. Without its writ, there is no illumination; without its writ, there is no clarity; without its writ, there is no establishment; without its writ, there is no completion; without its writ, there is no deliverance; without its writ, there is no life. This is the Heaven within the Great Brahmā Heaven, the solemn peaks of Yu Luo, the Golden Gates of the Jasper Mountain, ascending to the utmost mystery above the Great Crimson Clarity.

Vast and boundless through eons, now present, now absent, the Three Luminaries’ Imperial Chambers, the Great Yellow Court, the Jasper Blade and Vermilion Palace, the Heavenly Perfected’s Jade Chambers, the primordial qi of the Great Simplicity pervade the ten directions. Within it dwells the True One of radiant primordial luminosity; within it dwells the Nine Mysteries’ Lord of the Southern Culmen; within it dwells the Great Divine Elder who delivers the world; within it dwells the Perfected Person of Supreme Clarity’s Accomplished Mystery; within it dwells the Primordial Sovereign of the Purple Court, the Lord of the Dao of Primordial Simplicity; within it dwells the Venerable Deity of the Southern Prosperity’s Life-Determining Office, who governs transformation, records destiny, and safeguards the realm.

Reanimating the decayed and reviving the dead, delivering boundless beings, today the celestial records are examined as the myriad heavens descend in attendance.

The Boundless Divine King of the Eastern Flowery Grove, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who delivers boundless beings.
The Boundless Divine King of the Southern Vermilion Writ, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who delivers boundless beings.
The Boundless Divine King of the Western Imperial Talisman, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who delivers boundless beings.
The Boundless Divine King of the Northern Primordial Radiance, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who delivers boundless beings.
The Boundless Divine King of the Northeastern Azure Spirit, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who delivers boundless beings.

The Boundless Divine King of the Southeastern Round Pearl, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who delivers boundless beings.
The Boundless Divine King of the Southwestern Vast Radiance, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who delivers boundless beings.
The Boundless Divine King of the Northwestern Golden Flower, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who delivers boundless beings.
The Boundless Divine King of the Upper Purple Empyrean, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who delivers boundless beings.
The Boundless Divine King of the Lower Numinous Capital, the Great Sage of Eternal Life who delivers boundless beings.

The Ten Directions’ Radiant Divine Kings of Primordial Light, the Great Gods of Eternal Life who deliver boundless worlds, all ascend layered clouds and golden skies, riding the eight-scene chariots, jade carriages and feathered canopies, with flying wheels of white canopies. They harness nine-light divine tigers and dark-armored azure dragons, bearing stream-gold standards and summoning-spirit great banners. Before them stand the Supreme Mystery’s treasure weapons; behind follow the Three Heavens’ transforming soldiers. White phoenixes and qilin chant and sing in resonant harmony. The Seven Luminaries open the path; the Three Perfected flank the axle. Myriad chariots and ten thousand riders float through the void, their radiance cascading as they turn their carriages to summon spirits and deliver beings.

In the Western Kunlun’s upper void, the jade towers’ lofty immortals, the Nine Subtleties’ supreme wonders, the Yellow Radiance Primordial Lords, holding talismans and grasping registers, all arrive before the Celestial Emperor.

From the origin of life’s conception, since receiving the Dao, karmic consciousness and fleeting thoughts have entangled countless grievances, muddling the pristine realm. The radiant spirit’s true nature, obscured for kalpas, has grown dull and stubborn. The Primordial Beginning’s cavernous fire refines and forges purity, transforming the golden flower’s body to become a perfected being.

Coarse defilements and ruinous failures scatter with desire’s dispersal. According to what each must be delivered, the spirits are strictly examined. Universally proclaimed to the cavernous abysses, the boundless famous mountains, the peaks of rivers and sands, the Northern Palace’s cold courts, the Five Marchmounts of the Divine Continent, the twelve stream sources, the three rivers and four waterways, the vast seas and formed pools—swiftly erase the ledgers of sins, sever the roots of evil, and allow no lingering or negligence, nor indulgence of demonic hordes.

Since the Primordial Beginning’s transformative opening, following the cycles of ascent and descent, the yin officials of the Six Heavens have been uplifted from their sunken souls. The mysterious supervisors oversee and refine the Crimson Mound, as the Great Clarity descends its qi, transmuting immortals into perfection. Those born in the body receive deliverance, enduring kalpa after kalpa, revolving with the kalpas, their years equaling Heaven’s. Forever delivered from the Three Wretched Paths, the Five Sufferings, and Eight Difficulties, they transcend the Three Realms and roam freely in the Upper Clarity.

In the Heaven of Upper Clarity, the Celestial Emperor’s wondrous mystery resides in the formless realm of Brahman conduct.

The Eight Heavens of the East:
The Jade Branch’s Flourishing Fruit Heaven, where Emperor Bo of Wu’s Radiant Merit reigns.
The Verdant Peak’s Emerald Flower Heaven, where Emperor Miao of the Treasure Pond’s Achievement presides.
The Treasure Grove’s Radiant Light Heaven, where Emperor Fang of the Cloudy Retreat governs.
The True Origin’s Spirit-Concealing Heaven, where Emperor Ming of the Wondrous Yi rules.
The Mysterious Talisman’s Manifest Spirit Heaven, where Emperor Zhao, Initiator of the Primordial August, reigns.
The Auspicious Assembly’s Celebrated August Heaven, where Emperor Fang of the Origin’s Examination presides.
The Jade Splendor’s Illuminating Void Immortal Cavern Heaven, where Emperor Ze of the Mountain Artisan’s Spirit governs.
The Wen Wave’s Azure Cavern Divine Palace Heaven, where Emperor Dao of the Radiant Immortal rules.

The Eight Heavens of the South:
The Sunlit Terrace’s Transformative Radiance Refining Perfection Heaven, where Emperor Bao of the Proclaimed Chronicle’s Extension reigns.
The Southern Brightness’ Cavern Yang Heaven, where Emperor He of the Divine Measurement’s Decree presides.
The Flame-Controlling Bright Governance Heaven, where Emperor Hu of the Life-Protecting Ultimate Speech rules.
The Real-Examining Fixed Calendar Heaven, where Emperor Zhi of the Mechanism’s Mastery over the People governs.
The Descending Qi’s Great Light Heaven, where Emperor Yan of the Four Directions’ Majestic Might reigns.
The Harmonious Unifying Governance Heaven, where Emperor Hua of the Correct Conduct’s Mandate presides.
The Vast Origin’s Crimson Radiance Heaven, where Emperor Feng of the August Jade’s Reverence rules.
The Transforming Fixed Register Heaven, where Emperor Jian of the Brilliant and Resplendent Determination governs.

The Eight Heavens of the West:
The Blessing-Mastering Life-Fixing Heaven, where Emperor Xun of the Capital’s Radiant Yang reigns.
The Primordial Light’s Radiant Spirit Heaven, where Emperor Mian of the Observed Constant Canon presides.
The Jasper Forest’s Jade Grove Heaven, where Emperor Lu of the Pervasive Compliant Flower governs.
The Western Terrace’s Jade Casket Heaven, where Emperor Bao of the Primordial’s Proper Epoch rules.
The Numinous Jade’s Governance Heaven, where Emperor Xun of the Inquiry’s Prior Clarity presides.
The Steep Mountain’s Summit Dragon Heaven, where Emperor Fen of the Vigorous Purple Spirit’s Light reigns.
The Seven Ultimates’ Divine Tiger Heaven, where Emperor Li of the Mighty Pass’s Majestic Capital governs.
The Brahman Qi’s Golden Chariot Heaven, where Emperor Yan of the Serene Mountain’s Stillness rules.

The Eight Heavens of the North:
The Mysterious Elder’s Sea Treasury Heaven, where Emperor Zhai of the Divine Marchmount Luo reigns.
The Dragon Light’s Myriad Void Heaven, where Emperor Yao of the Golden Flame’s Rigidity presides.
The Cloud Camp’s Surrounding Flower Heaven, where Emperor Wei of the Subtle Mystery’s Ministry governs.
The Loyal Marchmount’s Cavern Wave Azure Jade Heaven, where Emperor Jue of the Steep Pearl rules.
The Jade Palace’s Boundless Heaven, where Emperor Zhao of the Lofty Jade’s Luminous Turning presides.
The Azure Eye’s Transformative Mountain Heaven, where Emperor Ba of the Direction’s Rising Cloud governs.
The Capital Terrace’s Sea Cavern Heaven, where Emperor Yao of the Upper Compassionate Perfection rules.
The Five Spirits’ Ocean-Floating Summoning Spirit Heaven, where Emperor Wan of the Curving Command’s Western Waves governs.

The Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Emperors—each heaven’s hidden taboos, each heaven’s concealed names. Within the heavens’ empty caverns, the natural numinous verses, each heaven’s hidden rhymes, the heavens’ inner sounds. The heavens’ inner honor, the heavens’ inner spirits, the great transformative true demons, the harmonizing transformative spirits. Nine returns to one; ten reverts to nine. Nine unites with ten and ascends; the pristine radiance is born. Gold without obstruction merges with the spirit; the spirit without decay, when refined, shines anew. Radiant light becomes brilliance, collectively named the Fire Palace. The spirit and gold are smelted, uniting with the Great Clarity. The boundless mysteries are profound and unfathomable, scattering the Three Flowers to universally refine the divine beings.

Today, joyfully encountering the transformative deliverance, having undergone trials across the heavens, we request the descent of the most wondrous, the great auspicious karmic connection. Treading the Five Celestial Bodies, names inscribed in the Lofty Mystery, the True Kings supervise and restrain the primordial passes. The Eastern Dipper bestows spirit; the Western Dipper transforms form. The Northern Dipper inscribes the register; the Southern Dipper opens life.
