The Central Dipper’s Yellow Flower merges with the radiant spirit. The Three Perfected’s qi blossoms into golden splendor.

The Azure Emperor wields the compass; the White Emperor commands the soldiers. The Crimson Emperor guards; the Black Emperor congeals. The Yellow Emperor evolves transformations—myriad Dao are thus accomplished. The Azure Flower Heavenly King gathers qi and uplifts immortals. The Cinnabar Empyrean Heavenly King ascends flaming smoke. The Primordial Light Heavenly King opens heaven and summons mountains. The Mysterious Radiance Heavenly King guides the hundred rivers. The Primal Ultimate Heavenly King sits enthroned upon Kunlun. The Five Heavenly True Kings are the myriad spirits’ ancestors. Flying through the Six Directions, they feast in the heavenly palaces, gathering qi and radiating spirit, dispersing through the Great Void.

Radiant in self-proclaimed glory, all heavens unite in merit, ascending to refine perfection and assemble in the Hall of Companions. The Divine Kings shake their might, sweeping away inauspicious omens; azure mists spread across the sky while lightning and fire deploy. Cinnabar spirits fan the whirlwinds, gathering and extinguishing wandering lights. The Great Marshals of the Realm hurl swords into the fierce winds, their brilliance soaring ten thousand leagues, their ringing bells traversing the eight directions. Should any dare to challenge, defying the Three Officials, the Mystic Halberd strikes first, the Divine Metal executes thereafter. Demonic specters are butchered and severed, wind and fire ceaseless. Thousands upon thousands are slain, myriads upon myriads annihilated in form. Evil cannot encroach, and the people are safeguarded.

The Six Heavens and Nine Palaces scrutinize demonic encampments with clarity, permitting no negligence; golden steeds cross in presentation. A universal decree is proclaimed to Mount Luofeng, to the boundless depths of the Nether Abyss. The great demons of the Three Realms submit memorials to the Jade Capital. The Primordial Cavern’s Jade Registers merge the Five Qi into chaos: metal qi forms the bones, wood qi the sinews, water qi the blood, fire qi the spirit, and earth qi the intent—thus do beings transform into form.

The Mysterious August’s wondrous Dao completes the Three Images; the Primordial Origin is established, and spirits array in ranks. Illuminating to reveal all things, blazing to discern the true, in motion they fulfill ritual, in stillness they veil warmth. Divine light transmutes, ever returning to metal; the metal body remains unchanging, revolving and wheeling through flight. The radiant orb flashes and gleams, wind fans its brilliance, thus forming the Great Image—august and supremely pure.

The Primordial Subtle and Vast Plain manifests as the enduring Metal Star; purple fusion irrigates the void, white patterns permeate the boundless heavens. Flowing and coalescing into the Five Qi, they engender the Seven Mysteries. The Great Cavern dispels demons, the Jade Wisdom’s sacred scriptures together unfold the supreme transformation, the Heavenly Crystal’s wondrous light. The Nine Dragons’ Great Kalpa reaches its term, extending peace. Through countless eons, chaotic transformation hardens into firmness; the Five Qi become color, the Five Essences become abysses. Wind and water envelop one another, the Supreme Ultimate knows no bounds. The Yellow Terrace recedes into the distant, the Crimson Gates sink into obscurity.

Without form, without shadow, without limit, without end, the primordial chaos of vast simplicity unfolds life in boundless expanse. Radiant blooms stream with color, revolving and traversing naturally. The Mysterious August safeguards the kalpa, the primordial elements inscribe jade verses. Cinnabar scenes crystallize into luster, spreading the Azure Chamber far and wide; the crimson brilliance of supreme numina evolves qi in the ten directions. Revolving the Dipper and traversing the Winnowing Basket, cycling through the Five Constants, the Three Enclosures transform into palaces, clearly arraying the primordial principles.

The Eight Scenes’ crimson script gathers qi in the High Mystery; within the Mystery dwells the Great Perfected—God ascends as a flying immortal. The Pristine Scene’s golden mists chant and intone the Cavernous Void; luminous spirits and green silk resound with cloud chariots. Jade tones ripple through the empyrean; the Yellow Flower wields talismans. The Purple Clarity’s fragrant peaks wheel their wings to the Primordial Abode. Metal becomes divine nectar, flowing through the azure charts, harmonizing a thousandfold, uniting ten thousandfold—naturally attaining perfection.

Within perfection dwells the supreme spirit, the Supreme Numinous of Southern Prosperity, the Celestial Ranks of Primordial Elders, the Peaceful Treasure Emperor Honored. The Mysterious One’s Nine Assistants, the True Lords Who Govern Life, review the registers of the living, transforming and flying through roots. Ascending the Pure Registers, entering and exiting the Flourishing Source, within the Eight Nether Realms and the subtlest of subtleties, descending to the Ninefold Abyss of the Yellow Springs, the Nine Enclosures’ deep palaces, they govern the people at the center, all things merging as one.

Ten revolutions return the spirit, uniting with qi to become immortal. The immortal Dao treasures life, endlessly delivering beings. Above, the Eight Gates open, illuminating the celestial passages. Transgressions, prohibitions, and karmic retributions are examined and assessed. Universally receiving deliverance, the dead souls gain new bodies, their rebirths ascending to be heard by all heavens. Above the heavens, each has its Gate of Life.

Within lies the manifest and radiant scripture of ascension, the Yellow Plain’s sacred scrolls, verses that join the High Perfected. The first: *The Pristine Scene’s Manifest and Wondrous Flying Void Chant*

The Great Void engenders the Supreme Perfected,
The Great Emptiness forms tangible shapes.
Revolving without bounds or shores,
Nurturing all divine spirits.
The Mysterious Clarity transforms the Round Net,
The Chaotic Yellow sinks into obscurity.
Errors scatter into things,
The Harmonious Void constructs human relations.
Bright and clear are the realms of all heavens,
Holding fast to the root of the Dao of life.
Vast and boundless is the foundation of the Great Transformation,
The Eight Nether Realms return to the Jade Capital.
The Primordial Beginning reveals true wonders,
The Pristine Scene fuses divine metal.
Having awakened to the profound mystery’s purport,
Body and spirit unite in luminous clarity.
Seven ancestors ascend to the heavenly halls,
Southern Prosperity pays homage to the Emperor Honored.
The Five Sufferings are forever dissolved,
Heavenly demons chant hymns of joy.
In harmony with the True Kings’ transformation,
All beings attain long life.

The second: *The Luminous Spirit’s Eternal Illumination True King’s Chant*

In the Dragon Han, the kalpa is established,
Cinnabar light founds the primordial chart.
The Great Sage, the Primordial One Emperor,
Unfurls the flying celestial scriptures.
High immortals receive the heavenly mandate,
The true Dao is concealed in the Pure Capital.
Cavernous scriptures descend to the Jade Capital,
Divine light illumines the eight directions.
The Primordial Honored reveals divine transformations,
Myriad heavens conceal the pistil pearls.
Thus with the ever-bright metal,
Refining and tempering the followers of greed and attachment.
Divine metal truly transforms qi,
Pouring into and delivering mortal frames.
Bright and clear, without defilement,
The Mysterious Essence shall never wither.
The Luminous Spirit’s Jade Scene Source,
Eternally illumines the attainment of emptiness.
Majestic is the Great Compassionate Honored,
Proclaiming and unfolding the talismans of life.
The wondrous and subtle purport of the High Clarity,
Truly awakened, unites with the Mysterious Void.
Refining qi, ascending the seed people,
The Jade Scriptures henceforth spread.

The third: *The Song of Attaining the Dao and Transforming*

A hundred demons delight in sinking and drowning,
Flying immortals only cherish life.
Divine qi remains firm and complete,
The Three Realms know no death or birth.
Having awakened to the High Clarity’s Dao,
Harmonizing with transformation in accord.
Feasting in the Eternal Yang Palace,
The Eastern Well moistens the celestial ford.
Carefree, traversing the fierce winds,
The Three Enclosures pay homage to the Emperor Honored.
Beneath the vast turning wheel,
How the world below toils and strives!
A moment becomes the void,
How can the vast kalpa have measure?
Hand in hand, chanting the Great Model,
The Pristine Scene forever pure and clear.
Revolving the Dharma Wheel’s principles,
Transforming and communicating with divine spirits.
Gazing at the Eastern Mulberry’s washing net,
Glancing at the Western Kunlun’s enduring Metal Star.
Let you witness the true teaching,
The spirit’s abode forever empty and bright.
Inscribe names on the Jade Perfected’s register,
Striking off names from the Feng Springs.
Shaking robes, ascending the Grand Empyrean,
Bowing heads in the Mysterious August’s court.

Above these Three Realms, within the flying void, the flying immortals’ songs resound, their verses joining the cavernous scriptures. Reciting them a hundred times, names are delivered to the Southern Palace.

Reciting it a thousand times, the True Kings safeguard and welcome.
Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao, ascending to the Great Void,
Passing beyond the Three Realms,
Attaining the rank of Immortal Duke.
Hearing the numinous sounds,
Even demon kings show reverence,
Commanding earth spirits to serve as escorts,
Lifting from the earthly prison,
Freeing from the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships.
Seven generations of ancestors ascend,
Forever departing the gates of darkness.
Souls cross the Vermilion Mound,
Refined and reborn anew.
This is called boundless,
Universally delivering the infinite.

There exists a secret celestial scripture,
Revered by all heavens.
Those who leak it arrogantly fall into hell,
Bringing calamity to seven generations of ancestors.
The Dao states: These two chapters are the hidden sounds of the Celestial Emperors and Numinous True Kings,
Revealing the wondrous origin of the primordial Great Spirit.
Though born of the Primordial Beginning’s Ninefold Refinement of Yang—crimson qi and the true fire of the Mysterious Void—
As the enlightened essence of awareness,
Yet it knows not the indestructible, unchanging,
Eternal and constant, serene and steadfast in contemplation.
It wholly relies on the supreme, pure, unshakable, vast, and firm true gold as its essence,
Able to generate and activate.
Wood and wind assist,
Metal and wind radiate,
Forming a blazing brilliance,
Luminous and clear,
Called the pure and wondrous numinous qi,
The profound mystery of the Dao,
Establishing the primordial chaos,
Giving birth to the Three Powers—
All arises from this.
If you embody it,
It polishes your spiritual root,
Empowering you with divine might,
Pervading boundless realms.
Immortals, spirits, ghosts, and gods,
Humans, dragons, and the myriad beings,
All are molded by the self.
The ten directions’ heavens,
Nothing is obtained from without—
All are the words of the Great Brahma,
Not the common speech of the world.
Words lack ornate rhythm,
Melodies lack florid embellishment,
Thus it is called profound and mysterious,
Difficult to fathom in detail.
Cherished by the heavens,
It is secreted in the Jade Capital of the Divine Empyrean,
Within the Eastern Treasure Scripture Chamber of the Jade Pure Jade Treasury.
According to the canon, after thirty-seven thousand years,
It descends in accord with the cosmic cycle.
If a perfected one offers gold and treasures with a sincere heart,
Following the ancient rites to pledge allegiance to the Dao Lord,
Only then is it bestowed.

The Dao states: When the heavens and earth complete their cycle and decline,
When the sun, moon, and five stars wane and wax,
When the most sagely and divine suffer adversity,
And the unlearned meet with harm,
This is due to the inner depletion of spiritual qi,
The dulling of pure gold,
Thus their radiance depends on external conditions,
And misfortune and decay take hold.
For all such calamities,
Those of the same qi must unite in heart to perform the fast,
Burn incense in the six watches,
And recite the scripture ten times—
Blessings and virtue will descend at once,
Dispelling all inauspiciousness.
The boundless scripture
Universally delivers the infinite.

The Dao states: If the unlearned in the Dao are shallow in cultivation,
Or their immortal rank is incomplete,
And their destined end arrives,
Their body passes through the Great Yin,
At the moment of transition,
Fellow perfected ones should burn incense for them
And recite the scripture ten times,
To deliver their corporeal form according to the method.
The pristine scene returns,
Their luminous spirit shines brighter,
And their soul ascends directly to the Southern Palace.
According to their merit in study,
They are reborn by the day.
Revolving without cessation,
They attain immortality.

The Dao states: When the heavens and earth reach their end,
The constellations fall into disorder,
The sun and moon lose their dusk,
The four seasons lose their order,
Yin and yang fall out of harmony,
The land suffers calamities,
With disasters of water, fire, and wind,
Plagues and poisons spreading,
The people perish,
Masters, friends, and fellow students pass away—
All should perform the fast,
Burn incense, and recite the scripture.
The merit of fasting and reciting the scripture is profound.
Above, it dispels celestial disasters,
Protecting and stabilizing the emperor.
Below, it wards off poison and harm,
Delivering the people.
In life and death, all rely on it,
Its blessings are immeasurable.
Thus it is called boundless,
Universally delivering gods and humans.

The Dao states: Whoever possesses this scripture
And performs these meritorious deeds for the heavens, earth, emperors, and people,
On days of calamity,
If they resolve to perform the fast, burn incense,
And recite the scripture ten times,
All the heavens record their names,
Myriad spirits guard and escort them.
Those distinguished as perfected ones
Will become ministers of the Golden Gate of the Sage Lord.
The heavens record the merits and faults of people
With absolute precision.
The True Kings of the heavens
Will also safeguard and recommend them.
Those who attain the Dao will thoroughly understand these profound words.
The boundless hidden sounds of the Great Brahma in the heavens—
Composed by the Dao Lord,
The Primordial Beginning’s *Luminous Jade Chapters of the Pristine Scene*,
From the Eight Heavens of the East.

In the Kui constellation’s fields, transformations rise into Shen;
Rosy mists surge through the void, their radiance cascading into pools.
Ten thousand towering zhe trees cradle the stars,
While the jasper blooms of Qi drink in reverence.
Turning orchid hues gaze afar,
As morning essence seeks the canonical.
Luminous abundance fills the numinous workshops,
Yet divination stumbles, hesitant to ascend.
Holding dew-laden branches aloft,
Dragons and flood-dragons relinquish their depths.
In stillness, they swiftly aid the Dao,
Their earnest devotion flowing like Liu Bin’s legacy.
Weeds and chaff are swept low,
While village paths gleam brighter than gold.

**Southern Eight Heavens**
The Peng’s might is unmatched, its strength beyond measure;
Fiery trials forge wills beyond the ordinary.
Yin’s adornments spark with keen delight,
As Yan Xu’s jade glows with profit.
Carved splendor pierces all directions,
While propriety races toward Fen’s domain.
Wise frontiers teem with rare immortals,
Precious marvels truly advance.
Scorching shoals dissolve illusions,
Colors part, aiding responses.
The distant Kun’s array stirs awe,
Secret wilds settle in constancy.
Angles and Ni are chastised and slain,
While Yang Mountain bears witness.
Winds unfold Kong’s valor,
Filling the emperor’s realm to its brim.

**Western Eight Heavens**
The Pristine Scene establishes life,
As Jiudu nurtures fine sprouts.
Vigorous acceptance of armor and script,
Vows to attack the root spirits.
Ze’s eastern tribute displays might,
While the consort seeks revered honor.
Reverence concludes the tasks,
As slave armies gather like clouds.
Auspicious halls circle in fellowship,
Their halberds and tripods aglow.
Ten thousand mirrors held alone,
Transforming masters in ninefold perfection.
Favorable days open anew,
As the Dipper moves toward Gang’s birth.
Waves of shame follow in pursuit,
While Gui Mountain deploys its forces.

**Northern Eight Heavens**
The Huicheng’s blades stretch afar,
As scenes arise, binding the Lang.
Dark jade advances in purple splendor,
Tossed into distant, radiant pursuits.
Dong’s true essence anchors the numinous,
Stars matching the Ji and Qiang.
Treading the path of Great Obscurity,
The Northern Kun’s chambers lie deep.
Sheltering night armies with advantage,
The Shi’s zithers harmonize the realm.
Crossing hidden depths with rosy hues,
Command banners scatter and conceal.
Mulberry’s azure coils at the dragon’s head,
While the Cavernous Mystery’s words address the Sovereign.
Rituals ascend, dispelling demonic ugliness,
As terraces halt to welcome auspicious guests.

The Dao speaks: These are the Great Brahma’s hidden sounds within the heavens, the boundless tones. The ancient script was inscribed upon the Jade Terrace of the Western True Pristine Scene’s hall, to unfold the radiance of the Three Luminaries. The Supreme One’s canonical scripture, the Purple Numinous incense offering, the Primordial Emperor’s command to the spirits—myriad numina compose its verses. Seen with the eyes, spoken with the mouth, its divine metal flows with hardness. The heavens lift, the earth bears, enlightening the multitudes to wisdom. It grasps the mechanisms of the unseen, preserving presence and absence in the indistinct. Spirits enter, gods emerge, transformations without limit. The Emperor’s treasure scripture—how could the world have heard it? Each character spans a full *zhang*.

The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign of Old inscribed its text, establishing the correct intonation. Those who know its sounds and fast while reciting it will have the Pristine Scene’s divine kings descend to observe their forms, record their merits and diligence, and report to the heavens. Myriad spirits will pay homage, earthly deities guard their gates, and the Great Merit Demon Kings will safeguard and recommend them as perfected ones. With the Dao complete, they will roam the Three Realms, ascend through the Golden Gate, for these sounds repel all, exorcise all, deliver all, and accomplish all—these are the Heavenly Perfected’s natural tones.

Thus, reciting them summons the Pristine Scene’s descent, the Supreme Emperor’s distant chant, myriad spirits’ homage, the Three Realms’ attendance at the chariot, demonic hordes bowing their heads, ghostly essences vanishing of themselves. Jade chimes resound, the ten directions grow solemn and clear, rivers and seas fall silent, mountains and peaks swallow their mists. Myriad numina tremble and submit, gathering immortals from all quarters. The heavens are free of filth, the earth devoid of demonic dust. Profound wisdom illumines the unseen, the vast and mysterious reaches the ultimate mystery.

*The Marvelous Scripture of the Upper Chapters on the Limitless Salvation of Lives, Volume Eighteen, Concludes*
*Volume Nineteen*

**The Chapter on the Ten Directions’ Sacred Realms**

The Dao spoke: Long ago in the Radiant Flower Heaven, within the Luminous Brilliance’s Revolving Wind and the Great Round Transformed Land, the Primordial Beginning received the *Limitless Upper Scripture on the Salvation of Lives* for the ten directions’ sacred realms.

When the Primordial Heavenly Worthy was to expound this scripture, he circumambulated ten times to summon the ten directions. Only then did he ascend his seat. The Heavenly Perfected, the Most High and Venerable, the Wondrous-Practiced Realized Ones, the Immortal Lords and Immortal Kings of the ten directions’ sacred realms and transformed lands—innumerable multitudes—rode the void to arrive. Dark clouds and flying auroras, phoenix chariots and vermilion wheels, interlacing canopies of jade and emerald radiance pierced the eight darknesses and illuminated the vast heavens. For nine days and nine nights, the sun and moon of the various heavens, the palaces and starry enclosures, the imperial towers and jeweled observatories, the vermilion towers and divine peaks, the jasper mountains and jade terraces—from the kalpas’ heights down to the Azure-Cinnabar Realm and the Dark-Pristine Land, the Nine Pure Abysses, the Six Circuits and Ten Poles—all shone with luminous clarity, unimpeded and boundless. The land, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees of the entire realm were leveled as one, no longer high or low, and the earth became yellow jade. The Central Heaven’s true qi interpenetrated the earthen mounds; divine transformation made all even, without distinction of hue.

The assembled Perfected surrounded and attended the Primordial Heavenly Worthy, who was seated upon the Nine-Rayed Crimson-Glyph Fire-Jade Throne of the Great Void. When he had expounded the scripture once, the Great Sages of the various heavens simultaneously praised its excellence. At that time, all the men and women of the realm, gazing upward to hear the mysterious tones, fully awakened to the wondrous Dao.

When he had expounded it twice, their eyes beheld divine transformations, penetrating the myriad verdant depths.

When he had expounded it thrice, they merged with the true qi and all could expound the Dharma.

When he had expounded it four times, the obstructions of kalpas’ accumulation dissolved at the thought.

When he had expounded it five times, golden perfection dispersed knots, and the hundred passages flowed freely.

When he had expounded it six times, the earth bore precious blossoms, and the heavens spread jade patterns.

When he had expounded it seven times, the boundless multitudes preserved their wholeness and firmness.

When he had expounded it eight times, the ghostly officials ceased their accusations, and the hidden souls ascended.

When he had expounded it nine times, the wondrous light of the Celestial August One illuminated the ten directions, and the Limitless Primordial Palaces manifested in responsive transformation. All the gods and humans of every region reverently gazed upward.

When he had expounded it ten times, jade talismans descended to pacify and secure the divine mountains. Salvation and ascension brought eternal peace, and the kalpic destinies ceased forever. At that time, all the men and women of the realm, without exception, turned their hearts in devotion, received liberation and deliverance, and all attained longevity.

The Dao spoke: When the Primordial Heavenly Worthy had expounded the scripture once, the Great Spirits of the Boundless and Limitless East, the Multitudes of Benevolent Glory, arrived floating through the void.

When he had expounded it twice, the Great Spirits of the Boundless and Limitless South, the Multitudes of Conjoined Brilliance, arrived floating through the void.

When he had expounded it thrice, the Great Spirits of the Boundless and Limitless West, the Multitudes of Luminous Primordiality, arrived floating through the void.

When he had expounded it four times, the Great Spirits of the Boundless and Limitless North, the Multitudes of Mysterious Radiance, arrived floating through the void.

When he had expounded it five times, the Great Spirits of the Boundless and Limitless Northeast, the Multitudes of Preserving Peace, arrived floating through the void.

When he had expounded it six times, the Great Spirits of the Boundless and Limitless Southeast, the Multitudes of Flowing Fortune, arrived floating through the void.

When he had expounded it seven times, the Great Spirits of the Boundless and Limitless Southwest, the Multitudes of Stabilizing Order, arrived floating through the void.

When he had expounded it eight times, the Great Spirits of the Boundless and Limitless Northwest, the Multitudes of Upholding the Net, arrived floating through the void.

When he had expounded it nine times, the Great Spirits of the Boundless and Limitless Above, the Multitudes of Generating Regions, arrived floating through the void.

When he had expounded it ten times, the Great Spirits of the Primordial Limitless Below, the Multitudes of Extending Prosperity, arrived floating through the void.

When the ten circumambulations were complete, the Great Spirits of the ten directions’ sacred realms arrived as one. All the men and women of the realm turned their hearts in devotion. Those who came were as numerous as light dust or heavy mist, with a hundred million chariots and ten thousand riders. Dark clouds gathered on all sides; celestial blessings enveloped all. Pristine mists layered in the distance, beyond any restraint.

Thereupon, the Primordial Heavenly Worthy extended his hand to emit wondrous light, transforming it into a circular image that coalesced into a cloud of precious radiance, lustrous as the bright moon, suspended a hundred *zhang* above the earth in the dark void. The Primordial Heavenly Worthy ascended and led the Heavenly Perfected, the Most High and Venerable, the Wondrous-Practiced Realized Ones, and the Great Spirits of the ten directions’ boundless heavens—innumerable multitudes—all into the Wheel of Jewels. The gods and humans gazed upward, seeing only the retinue enter the shadowy radiance. Once within the shadowy radiance, they knew not where they had gone. The people of the realm dispersed, and the land remained perpetually pure and moist, never changing again.

The Primordial Heavenly Worthy then completed the full exposition of the scripture within the Wheel of Jewels. The assembled Perfected oversaw the deliverance and transmitted it to me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. When the Dharma rites were fully accomplished, the multitudes of spirits returned to their positions. In an instant, all traces vanished without a sound.

At that time, the people of heaven who encountered this great model universally received its beneficent deliverance, preserving their heavenly years without premature death. The entire realm turned in reverence, all awakening to the karmic conditions of the Dao. Unwearied and unrelenting, uncorrupted and unchanging, without deceit or flattery, without partiality or bias, without artifice or faction, without transgression or error—they spoke the ultimate principle, preserved their lives for long extension, harmonized in compassion and wisdom, and their hearts resonated with the profound mystery. The realm flourished in abundance; the imperial destiny endured without end. The Dharma’s inception spread throughout the land, and all who held sincere devotion—even those who did not serve in reverent protection—were delivered and ascended.

The Dao spoke: The words spoken by the Primordial Heavenly Worthy in his exposition of the scripture are all the tones of the Three Heavens’ transforming qi and the great model of their hymns, as well as the hidden names of the true immortals of the ten directions’ sacred realms. They are not the common words of this world. When the Upper Prime inaugurates its fortune, the Realized Ones penetrate the subtle and awaken to the mysterious. Those who fully grasp its verses and recite them ten times will cause the Nine Heavens to rejoice, the multitudes of spirits to array their words, the Three Offices to hold their registers and memorialize the Jade Capital. The sun and moon will surge in brilliance; the stellar net will move in harmony. The great demons will prostrate in submission; the myriad malevolent spirits will constrain their forms. The living will be delivered; the dead will be saved. Withered bones will become human again, and the Supreme Ultimate will soar as immortals.

Reciting it ten times, the ten directions’ realms, the boundless numinous lands—down to the divine continents, grotto springs, seas, and mountains—will know peace and prosperity, each attaining carefree ease. The reason for this is that the loftiest sages and perfected immortals, born of nature’s finest essence, nurtured in the azure vault, inherently grasp the Dao. Thus, they move the Jade Purity to respond, delivering all without exception. Flying immortals and middle perfected ones, through accumulated study and refinement, align with the mysterious. Though their attainment equals that of the sages, they are not comparable to those of the Upper Prime, for they merely deliver the world’s realms and cannot govern the celestial administration.

To recite this chapter lightly brings misfortune upon oneself. Revering and guarding its secrecy, one establishes primordial merit, ensuring flourishing prosperity across generations, the thriving of good roots, the repelling of all malevolent forces, and the protection of celestial spirits at one’s gate. This scripture is profoundly mysterious, revered by all realms, delivering beings without limit, serving as the foundation of the Dao of life. Its august and upright model is beyond measure.

The Dao declares: Whenever this scripture is recited ten times, its cavernous verses and numinous sounds ascend to the Jade Purity, moving the Void Sovereign to respond. The descending qi of the Three Heavens’ true and upright Nine Yangs, accumulated subtleties, and Supreme Mystery opens the Eight Gates, pouring forth to irrigate the dark tones of Mount Fengdu’s nether springs, the hidden passes of the Yellow Springs. It delivers your countless ancestors and suffering souls, enabling their refinement and ascent to the Vermilion Court, where they meet the appointed time of the perfected. With the numinous talismans gathering life, they become perfected beings. Those who diligently study the supreme scriptures, their merit complete, all attain flying immortality, ascending to the Jade Towers and roaming the Nine Heavens.

Scholars of vast learning who cultivate and recite this scripture are immediately delivered, feasting in the Southern Palace. Those of the world who receive and recite it will live to the full span of the Three Primes, later attaining the Dao of refining the form in the Great Yin, concealing their essence in the Nine Abysses, entrusting their bodies to the earth. Their souls will not drift in emptiness, nor their spirits sink into stagnation. Through kalpas and cycles, they will attain rebirth, and all celestial and human beings will protect and deliver them. Boundless luminous blessings will grace both the hidden and manifest, for what the Supreme Mystery forbids is not transmitted to the world. Only the most devoted scholars, treasuring it with utmost sincerity, transmit it under oath. To recklessly reveal its jade-like verses brings calamity upon seven generations, condemning them to long servitude under the Earth Bureau.

Forty-eight jade lads and forty-eight jade maidens from the scripture’s sacred realm guard its divine writ and protect the bodies of those who receive it.

The Dao declares: During the long fast of the first month, reciting and chanting this scripture causes true light to descend, universally releasing the dark yin of past-world souls, severing their karmic entanglements, and ascending them to the Vermilion Palace. During the long fast of the seventh month, reciting and chanting this scripture allows the qi of the true and upright to flow and irrigate the heart’s field, inscribing one’s name in the Golden Register and attaining high immortality. During the long fast of the tenth month, reciting and chanting this scripture opens inner communication with the sacred realm, its dharma radiance illuminating externally. For kings and emperors, it preserves and extends their reign, pacifying the myriad states, bringing joyous peace, boundless great fortune, the harmony of the Three Luminaries, and eternal celestial longevity.

On the eight seasonal nodes, reciting and chanting this scripture allows one to become a Flowing Pearl, a Vermilion Tower’s Guardian of Life Perfected One. On one’s life-destiny day, reciting and chanting this scripture summons the great sages of the ten directions, the exalted ones of transformed realms, who ride clouds and drive dragons to witness the covenant. Their names are inscribed in the Primordial Dipper, listed in memorials to the Dark Mystery. A hundred spirits gather in assembly, merit recorded in the Nine Heavens. The great demons act as guarantors, and one’s form ascends among the immortals.

The Dao declares: On days of practicing the Dao, one should bathe in fragrant waters, enter the chamber in purification, face east, and knock the teeth thirty-two times to ascend to the Thirty-Two Heavens. Bow thirty-two times in the heart, close the eyes, and silently envision oneself seated amidst clouds of azure, crimson, and purple qi, inwardly and outwardly shrouded in mist. A green dragon, white tiger, vermilion bird, dark warrior, lion, and white crane array themselves to left and right. The sacred realms of the ten directions appear simultaneously, the sun and moon illuminating the chamber with radiance. A circular image arises from the crown, its light shining in all directions—all clearly visible.

The secret incantation states: Supreme Mystery Prime, Supreme Dao Lord. Summon forth from within my body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the attendants of the left and right, the jade lads bearing incense, the jade maidens transmitting words, the Five Emperors’ direct talismans, and the incense officials of the day—thirty-two each—to open and convey these words. Today is an auspicious occasion, a long fast in the pure hall, cultivating the supreme scripture to deliver beings without limit. May what is declared ascend directly to the presence of the Supreme Lord of the Thirty-Two Heavens, the Primordial Thearch.

Afterward, draw qi thirty-two times and recite the scripture facing east.

*The Supreme Primordial’s Limitless Deliverance, Uppermost Wondrous Scripture*

The Primordial Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure’s Original Chapter, the sacred realms of the ten directions, the uppermost divine empyrean. Its numinous transformations deliver beings, the red talismans conceal its rhymes, soaring in natural radiance, merging the vast and dark. The Jade Perfected of Emptiness and Nothingness inaugurates the primordial model, uniting the divine and numinous, the Void Sovereign’s singular qi. It establishes the myriad heavens, constructs the ten directions. Through five kalpas it evolves, seven transformations shape the divine continents. Ten revolutions of the celestial gate, the mysterious and sacred realms. Immortal perfected ones and imperial ministers open the Three Paths. Dispersing and transforming the five forms, the myriad images stand in unison. The root of the numinous in utmost emptiness, circling above to return to the radiance. Alone it moves as the body, the crystalline response of the flower’s essence. The great uncarved numinous writ, the soaring resonance of the Nine Heavens. Wind stirs the flying mist, the swift net of the celestial wheel. Interlacing jade in the deep abyss, the vast and bright Sovereign spreads forth. The primordial motion enfolds and binds—this is creation. As the ten poles prepare to divide, the fragrant peaks and jade terraces arise. Towering and distant, the capital of the empyrean, reaching the limits of the circular image. The jade towers soar in azure, the distant imperial qi. The towering kalpa city, the Jade Banquet of the Three Numinous Ones. The Supreme Mystery’s dark courtyard, the golden pavilions and flowery chambers, arrayed with flowing essence, vast mists nurturing qi, transforming a thousand spirits. Within are the gods of the Ten Heavens’ records, the lords of the Square Reservoirs’ upper paths, the perfected ones of the Vast Sage’s wondrous origin, the Elders who open and guide the united realms. Within are the Eastern Florescence and Southern Culmen, the Western Numinous and Northern Dark, the four corners and above and below. The exalted perfected ones of the arrayed sages together unfold the great model, opening and transforming celestial and human beings.

Upholding the celestial ordinances, immeasurably delivering beings, today’s assembly convenes, summoning them to approach the imperial terrace.

The Divine King of the Sagely Realm of the Eastern Florescence and the Upright Transformation World of Goodness, the Great Sage of Longevity who Immeasurably Delivers Beings.
The Divine King of the Sagely Realm of the Southern Culmen and the True Wisdom World of Radiant Separation, the Great Sage of Longevity who Immeasurably Delivers Beings.
The Divine King of the Sagely Realm of the Western Numinous and the Luminous Grotto World of Summoning Immortals, the Great Sage of Longevity who Immeasurably Delivers Beings.
The Divine King of the Sagely Realm of the Northern Dark and the Pure World of Auspiciousness, the Great Sage of Longevity who Immeasurably Delivers Beings.
The Divine King of the Sagely Realm of the Northeast and the Wondrous Flower World of Majestic Virtue, the Great Sage of Longevity who Immeasurably Delivers Beings.
The Divine King of the Sagely Realm of the Southeast and the Nine Perfected World of Blessed Fullness, the Great Sage of Longevity who Immeasurably Delivers Beings.
The Divine King of the Sagely Realm of the Southwest and the Flowing Light World of Golden Flower, the Great Sage of Longevity who Immeasurably Delivers Beings.
The Divine King of the Sagely Realm of the Northwest and the Jade Palace World of Divine Wisdom, the Great Sage of Longevity who Immeasurably Delivers Beings.
The Divine King of the Sagely Realm of the Upper Void and the Purple Emptiness World of the Dao’s Pivot, the Great Sage of Longevity who Immeasurably Delivers Beings.
The Divine King of the Sagely Realm of the Lower Realm and the Compassionate Protection World of Deliverance from Distress, the Great Sage of Longevity who Immeasurably Delivers Beings.
The Divine Kings of the Ten Directions and the Boundless Transformations, the Great Gods who Fly through the Void, Deliver the World, and Open Transformations—all ride upon crimson clouds, green chariots, and azure carriages, with feathered canopies and jade wheels, drawn by dark phoenixes, white tigers, and striped dragons. They bear the Yuanhui Jade Standards and the Seven Luminaries’ numinous banners. Before them march the Great Marshals of the Ten Heavens; behind follow the transformative soldiers of the Yellow Watchtower, fierce steeds, azure unicorns, leaping and dispelling evil. The celestial officials open the paths, the perfected ones of the Mysterious Realms flank the axle-trees. Myriad chariots and ten thousand riders float through the void, their radiance turning back as they arrive. The sagely realms deliver beings.

The Jade Assistants of the Supreme Tenuity, the primordial essence and highest numina, the divine scriptures and vast transformations, the exalted ones of the Great Grotto—governing the heavens and upholding the law, they assemble before the Celestial Emperor. Responding to each direction, they manifest and issue decrees to the various heavens, universally proclaiming to the eight extremities, the numinous passes and grotto spirits, the Northern Water of the Left Bureau, the Nine Abysses and the Supreme. The Six Grottoes of Mount Luo, the winding pools of the Three Palaces, the great kalpas of the Dragon Stables, the majestic radiance of the River Sources, the nine-ren-long labors, the wind courts and fire mountains, the icy mirrors of myriad fragments.

By the talismanic command of the Great Lady of Azure Youth, the moments fly upward, severing evil destinies and extinguishing the roots of transgression. The yang radiance descends to aid, pardoning the souls of the dark depths. The Vermilion Palace receives refinement; immortals transform and become human. The living body harmonizes with qi, enduring with the turning of the cycles, sharing the same years as Heaven. Forever delivered from the ninety-six calamities of the yang cycle, the perils of wind blades and water fires, they transcend the Three Realms and roam freely in the Nine Purities.

In the heavens of the Nine Purities, the Celestial Emperor peers into darkness, the formless realms of pure conduct.

**The Eight Heavens of the East:**
The Heaven of Numinous Orchids and Cloud Chambers, where the Emperor records the flourishing of conduct.
The Heaven of Opening the Perfected and Completing Transformations, where Emperor Yan governs with solemnity.
The Heaven of Secret Radiance and Congealed Spirit, where Emperor Yi drifts alone in clouds.
The Heaven of the Jade Yang Sagely Realm, where Emperor Chi presides over the ascending sequence.
The Heaven of the Sea Kingdom’s Flying Homeland, where Emperor Mu extends the reed.
The Heaven of the Mountain’s Tranquil Empty Sounds, where Emperor Gan responds to timely blessings.
The Heaven of Wisdom, Constancy, and Ultimate Benevolence, where Emperor Shu recites paired names.
The Heaven of the Divine Isle’s Traveling Chariots, where Emperor Yi relies on Master Ke.

**The Eight Heavens of the South:**
The Heaven of the Flaming Upright Administering Governance, where Emperor Liang receives the square.
The Heaven of Hundredfold Abundance Approaching Harmony, where Emperor Di harmonizes the central propriety.
The Heaven of the Vermilion Mound Overseeing Prohibitions, where Emperor Chong ascends the Nine Purities.
The Heaven of Descending Capitals and Illustrious Numinosity, where Emperor Bing exorcises with Zhong He.
The Heaven of the Character-Courts Rectifying Essence and White Demons, where Emperor Hui purifies the Dao.
The Heaven of the Rigid Mechanism Measuring Light, where Emperor Xiang governs the bureau of Mei.
The Heaven of the Capital Gods Illuminating the Net, where Emperor Da gazes into the mysterious pardon.
The Heaven of Majestic Radiance and Vast Soldiers, where Emperor Cheng establishes the capital and prays to the yang.

**The Eight Heavens of the West:**
The Heaven of the Feathered Terrace and Martial Valor, where Emperor He transmits the legacy of Ji Lu.
The Heaven of the Han Palace’s Sincere Punishments, where Emperor Ming guards Master Kang.
The Heaven of the Tortoise Crag’s Western Terrace, where Emperor Mao rises with Li Yan.
The Heaven of Direct Petition and Swift Numinosity, where Emperor Xi entrusts his thoughts.
The Heaven of the Dark Ruins and Hidden Rectifications, where Emperor Bo shines with radiance.
The Heaven of the Drawn Channels and Descending Spirits, where Emperor Zhu guards against Kuo Ming.
The Heaven of the Wave Pass and Dragon Deliverance, where Emperor He harmonizes with Chong Fu.
The Heaven of the Three Heads Celebrating Life, where Emperor Chi commands Li Zhu Bin.

**The Eight Heavens of the North:**
The Heaven of the Grotto Darkness and Night City, where Emperor Ding pacifies Ruo Cheng.
The Heaven of the Solitary Radiance and Kingly Peaks, where Emperor Ji transforms Shen Shen.
The Heaven of the Black Mounds and Thunder Administration, where Emperor Ze spreads Ji Guang.
The Heaven of the Upright Dwelling and Bestowed Mystery, where Emperor Bei prays to Lu Qi Chang.
The Heaven of the Supreme Unity’s Extended Reach, where Emperor You guards Quan Zi Ying.
The Heaven of the White Qi’s Lingering Hall, where Emperor Min grieves for Du Jiao Hua.
The Heaven of the Dragon’s Might and Abandoned Marshes, where Emperor Zhu dispels Xian Pi.
The Heaven of the Ultimate Marsh and Vast Numinosity, where Emperor Du demonstrates Xiang Gong.

The thirty-two heavens, the thirty-two emperors—hidden are the heavens’ taboos, hidden the heavens’ names. Within the heavens is emptiness, the natural numinous scriptures; hidden are the heavens’ rhymes, the sounds within the heavens, the honored ones within the heavens, the gods within the heavens, the great demons within the heavens, the numina within the heavens.

The nine openings and ten unfoldings merge with the Highest Purity. The great canon of the Mysterious Pass is profound and unfathomable. Establishing the heavens and founding the ultimate, they spread throughout the ten directions.

Today, in joyous celebration of this encounter, the heavens are examined. Worldly burdens are extinguished, evil roots severed. Flying past the five perils, riding the radiance in lofty flight, the Perfected Kings oversee and inspect, unrestrained by the Mysterious Gate.

The Eastern Dipper inscribes life, the Western Dipper administers punishment, the Northern Dipper holds the tally, the Southern Dipper fixes destiny, the Central Dipper is the Celestial Emperor’s chamber, proclaiming the flow of sagely grace.

The Azure Emperor deploys the loom, the White Emperor holds the reckoning, the Red Emperor governs qi, the Black Emperor interweaves, the Yellow Emperor resides at the center—great transformations are apportioned.

The Perfected King of the Azure Heaven unites blessings and separations.
The Perfected King of the Red Heaven rectifies wrongs with the Mysterious Perfected.
The Perfected King of the White Heaven moves with the Great Simplicity’s seasons.
The Perfected King of the Black Heaven transforms with the dawn’s radiance.
The Perfected King of the Yellow Heaven is where the numinous qi returns.
The Five Perfected Kings of the Heavens are the honored ones of the myriad realms.

Flying through the Three Realms, they command the mighty soldiers.

Holding banners and staffs of authority, they roam the Great Clarity,
Their ranks and titles resplendent, coeval with Heaven.
The Supreme Mystery transforms the people, sternly governing the hidden gates;
The Purple Tenuity receives decrees, sweeping away inauspicious omens.

The Heavenly Peng bears the seal, the Divine Tiger spreads its might,
Streaming fire rushes ahead, the Vermilion Phoenix soars behind.
The Six Heavens’ Great Uglies seize and deliver the demonic stars—
Who dares offend or resist the Perfected of Heaven?
Divine soldiers strike to the left, the Mighty Slayer executes to the right,
Slaughtering, severing, and annihilating—wind and fire never cease.
Thousands upon thousands beheaded, myriads upon myriads destroyed in form,
Demons dare not test their might, ghosts dare not oppose or encroach.

The Three Officials of the Northern Feng scrutinize the ghostly camps—
Who dares harbor negligence or indulgence? Reports take flight to the throne.
Universally proclaimed to the ten directions, the boundless divine spirits,
The Emperors of the Eight Darknesses, all declare before the Purple Chamber.

The Primordial Nameless, neither turbid nor pure,
Divides into two halves—pristine mystery begins its leveling.
Accumulated subtleties form a fathom; great transformations give birth to regions.
Once the kalpa’s name is fixed, the dark shifts to Dragon Prosperity.

Vast and distant, the ancestral source,
Merges with the flourishing of celestial patterns.
Above, no radiant hues; below, no transformative abyss.
Wind courses through the Great Void, empty and boundless—
The sacred realm of spontaneity, the mystery of the Supreme Dao.

Azure skies descend to earth, metal and water form the heavens;
Between heaven above and heaven below, the great abode sinks into obscurity.
No brilliance, no shadow, no image, no form—
The primordial qi of the vast darkness, twin luminosities intertwined.

The Vermilion Clarity and Jade Emptiness revolve by nature;
Heaven’s Unity flows and transforms, inscribed on golden tablets and jade scrolls.
The supreme essence of the Vermilion Yang, the mysterious script of the Eight Enclosures,
Preserves and governs Kunlun, enduring through eternal kalpas.

The Brahmā qi pervades the net of Indra; the myriad dharmas unfold.
The primordial net interweaves, spanning the Nine Earths and Nine Heavens.
Revolving through emptiness, giving rise to billions upon billions,
Circling Mount Xiao, traversing the celestial paths.

Thirty-nine Emperors govern the Upper Prime,
The sacred realms of the ten directions rule the cinnabar mystery.
Within the mystery, the Supreme Perfected—
The Lofty Emperor of the Upper Radiance,
Floating in jade-hued mist, chanting in the Pure Cavern.
Golden light extends and flourishes, gazing upon the cloudy encampments;
Heavenly tones ring clear, divine radiance scatters like smoke.

The Great Xiao and Yu Luo, the luminous transformation of the Golden Canon,
A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions—spontaneously perfected.
Within the Perfected dwells the spirit, the Great Lord of Longevity:
Azure Florescence crouches to the left, the Jade Consort squats to the right.
The Great Unity and the Controller of Destiny, Peach Prosperity in harmonious purity,
Hold talismans and grasp registers, preserving and delivering the numinous root.

Roaming the Purple Clarity, entering and exiting the Mysterious Cinnabar,
Within the Three Regions, amid the Six Poles.
Below, they guard the human body, the Hall of Light and the Crimson Palace,
Governing the five spirits, uniting the hundred bones.

Ten revolutions of wind, myriad qi ascend as immortals;
Flying spirits summon numina, transformations boundless.
The immortal path values life, boundlessly delivering beings—
The ten directions’ mysterious extremity opens the Eight Gates.
Soaring through the Three Realms, receiving scriptures in the Jade Chamber,
Sins and blessings, prohibitions and precepts, karmic causes and conditions.
All receive salvation and deliverance, Heaven rectifies their incarnations.
Having attained rebirth, they ascend to the various heavens.

Above the various heavens, each has its gate of life;
Within lies the Heavenly Prime’s chapter of union and transformation,
The Supreme Numinous Canon, its verses matching the Lofty Perfected.

**First: The Hymn of the Sacred Realm of the Ten Directions’ Soaring Void**
Mysterious light and vermilion motion, the Great Brahmā is nameless.
Soaring realms drift ethereally, transforming the nine gates of the celestial palace.
Jade cities spiral, the azure expanse unfolds in brightness.
Rotating terraces span ten thousand kalpas, their sounds and splendor resplendent.

Within stands the Great Sage,
Clad in dragon robes and tiger garments.
Atop his head, the Purple Chamber; at his waist, golden pendants.
Holding and grasping the four realms, transforming the central region.

If you can maintain long fasts, refining and delivering the flourishing of celestial patterns,
Sweeping away defilement from the purple portals, admitting the Perfected into the Crimson Chamber—
Two spirits hurl fire, the Primordial Unity radiates light.
Behold my true form, emerging to serve, rising and falling.

Resplendent in your cultivation, radiant at my side,
Riding the spirit to wander the verdant chambers and vermilion windows.
My Dao is profound and recondite, your heart aligns with the numinous homeland.

**Second: The Chapter of the Sacred Realm of the Ten Directions**
One qi transforms all, myriad realms become limpid.
The mysterious peaks rise jagged, the immortal capital is the Jade Metropolis.
Endless forests flourish in lush beauty, the great precincts of jade.
Crimson-robed, dragon-patterned, opening and transforming the roots of life.

The sagely destiny follows Heaven’s motion, the true Dao spreads forth.
Qi pierces the flying mist, knotting flowers inconstant.
Lofty towers reach a thousand feet, the mighty watchtower is the Hall of Light.
Dragons roam, tigers gallop, vermilion banners are the cloudy nets.

Hidden like the Great Void, manifest like the constellations spread.
Wherever they appear, they reveal the directions of good and evil.
Jade Perfected ride striped dragons, divine winds soar aloft.

**Third: The Hymn of the Sacred Realm of the Ten Directions**
In the Dragon Han’s great kalpa, the myriad forms are mysterious emptiness.
The Primordial Beginning opened Heaven, first creating emptiness.
The Great Cavern’s Upper Prime, the Pure Subtlety and Yu Remnant,
The numinous scripture’s nine instructions, the mysterious Perfected’s seven unfoldings.

The vast Eight Enclosures rise to the four corners.
The Vermilion Clarity inaugurates the kalpa, the sagely host governs the charts.
Five mountains rise jagged, the Vermilion Writ unfolds.
The vast celestial gates, the towering imperial abode—
Divine radiance descends to aid, ceasing the labors of the Three Paths.
Proclaiming amnesties at the river’s source, the true wind spreads widely.

Sing this hymn, and it accords with the sagely.
Above the Three Realms, amid the soaring void,
The Perfected Kings’ hymns, their verses matching the cavernous canons.
Recite it a hundred times, your name enters the Southern Palace.
Recite it a thousand times, the Perfected Kings protect and welcome.
Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao, soaring into the Great Void,
Transcending the Three Realms, attaining the rank of Immortal Duke.

Those who hear the numinous hymn, even demon kings show reverence.
They restrain earthly deities, escorting and welcoming.
Drawn from the earthly prisons, freed from the Five Sufferings and Eight Difficulties,
Seven generations of ancestors ascend, forever departing the dark gates.
Souls cross the Vermilion Mound, receiving refinement and rebirth—
This is called boundless deliverance, universal salvation without end.

There are secret celestial texts, revered by all heavens.
Those who reveal them carelessly fall into hell, bringing calamity to seven generations of ancestors.

The Dao declares: These two chapters are the hidden hymns of the Heavenly Emperors
and the Perfected Numinous Kings.
Profoundly revealing the supreme mystery, elucidating the great transformations,
They enable the celestial people to enter the sacred realms—
All are the words of the Great Brahmā, not the common speech of the world.

Words lack ornate cadence, melodies lack florid grace—
Thus they are called profound and obscure, difficult to trace in full.
Treasured by the heavens above, concealed within the Highest Divine Empyrean’s Jade Clarity Jade Repository.
When the Great Lord enacts the teachings, they spread in accordance with the flow of qi.
Should a perfected one offer gold and precious treasures with a sincere heart,
and follow the ancient rites to pledge allegiance to the Ten Heavens,
only then shall they be bestowed.

The Dao declares:
When the cycles of heaven and earth reach their end,
when the sun, moon, and five planets wane and wax,
when the most sagely and divine beings prosper or decline,
the ignorant and shallow suffer harm.
Whenever such calamities arise, all who share this qi must unite in heart,
perform purification rites, burn incense through the six watches,
and recite the scriptures ten times over—
blessings and virtue will descend at once, dispelling all misfortune.
These boundless texts deliver without end.

The Dao declares:
When those of shallow cultivation face the destined end of their immortal rank,
when their bodies pass through the Great Yin,
at the moment of transition, their fellow perfected ones shall burn incense on their behalf
and recite the scriptures ten times to deliver the corporeal form according to the rites.
Then the good deeds they performed in life, the hidden virtues they cultivated,
at the hour of their passing, the sacred realms of the ten directions shall manifest.
The Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning shall sit in tranquil exposition,
or extend a hand to guide them, or send canopies to welcome them.
Their souls shall ascend directly to the Southern Palace,
and in accordance with their cultivation, they shall be reborn after a calculated span.
No longer bewildered by the turning of the wheel, they shall attain immortality.

The Dao declares:
When the cycles of heaven and earth reach their end,
when the constellations drift out of alignment,
when the sun and moon lose their light,
when the four seasons fall out of order,
when yin and yang fall into discord,
when nations suffer calamities,
when pestilence spreads and the people perish,
when masters, companions, and pure friends meet their end or face disaster—
all must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures.
The merit of purification rites and scripture recitation is immense:
above, it dispels heavenly disasters and safeguards the emperor;
below, it wards off poison and harm, delivering the multitudes.
From life to death, such blessings are beyond measure.
Thus it is said: boundless, universally delivering heaven and humanity.

The Dao declares:
Whoever possesses these scriptures and performs such meritorious deeds
for the lords of heaven and earth and the multitudes,
on days of calamity, if they resolve to perform purification rites, burn incense,
and recite the scriptures ten times,
all the heavens shall record their names,
ten thousand spirits shall attend and guard them,
and those who distinguish themselves as perfected ones
shall become ministers of the Golden Towers of the Sacred Lords.
The heavens record the merits and transgressions of all, not missing even a hair’s breadth.
The True Kings of Heaven shall also protect and recommend them,
and those who attain the Dao shall fully comprehend these profound words.

The boundless hidden speech of the Great Brahmā in the heavens,
composed by the Lord of the Dao—
*The Primordial Numinous Writ of the Ten Directions’ Sacred Realms: Secret Chapters of the Eight Heavens of the East.*

Amidst the thronging *tanyin* and *suo*, the mirror of the abyssal depths is summoned forth.
The numinous steed leaps beyond the net, its appointed brilliance veiled in obscurity.
The distant barriers stretch with jade-like vastness, where ordered capitals stand in tranquil harmony.
Shrouded in rocky fastnesses, the swift return to the encompassing vessel.
The crow’s sun unfurls in crimson, while the pale malevolence desiccates its edge.
In recompense for beauty, the *Bing* mountains, where jade-like purity and tainted essence intermingle.
Prayers prolong the seasons, and the verdant true ones emerge as radiant immortals.
Profound and serene, they gaze upon the still—only the most excellent perceive the subtle.
**The Eight Heavens of the South**

The *Dou* and *Xia* span vast strategies, the whale’s pool and the purple *Chan*.
The lame *Jiu* ponders, the southern *Xiao* teeters on the brink.
Precious standards advance, secret pacts inscribed in mystery.
Joyous melodies ascend, unbroken threads of progress.
They hasten toward the *Taiyi*, parting from the salty to wield authority.
Indigo clings in order, ascending heights in measured proclamation.
Numinous rites soar in splendor, towers and cities surveyed.
The *Ji* faction aids the drive, the cavern’s flute resounds through the deep.
**The Eight Heavens of the West**

The *Ku* peaks stand in harmonious array, hills of compassion bear first sorrow.
The *Geng* well and dragon’s net, cypress chambers where incense lingers.
Pouring from the *Xie* cliffs, the currents surge; the screen of hemp bids farewell to truth.
Cloud-borne karma defines form, the worn and many sink into spirit.
Piercing emptiness with *lang* and *qu*, the swallow’s capital gleams in stillness.
Kindred stir the rustic, wisdom transmits the *Qi* counsels.
The mixed awakening probes the numinous, severing coarse roots.
Bright reeds shed their sheaths, the city’s ruins stretch boundless.
**The Eight Heavens of the North**

The *Hou* and *Wang* trace origins, unfolding radiance to seize the numinous.
Garments thicken with covenants, the *Guo* multiply the people’s paths.
Refining the deep in frigid caverns, summoning immortals with the *Ben* wheel.
The undulating realms of leisure vie in luminous forms.
Early *qi* smelts the east, the overseer of sprouts adjudicates alike.
Wisdom soars in circling brilliance, the *Gui* and *Lin* press toward equilibrium.
The cavern nurtures distant realms, the *Ying* and *Kui* pay homage to abundance.
Myriad immortals unite in perfection, the empty and numinous achieve their work.

The Dao speaks: These are the boundless hidden speeches of the Great Brahmā within the ten directions’ sacred realms, the sounds of the infinite. The ancient text inscribed them above the Jade Capitals of the Ten Directions’ Terrace-Heavens, where divine transformations manifest across the ten directions, the numinous responds as it emerges, and the empty converges with the subtle Dao. Those who awaken to their meaning shall perceive the divine lands and sacred realms in their entirety.

Each character spans a *zhang* in breadth. The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign of Old inscribed these words to establish the correct intonation. Those who know their sounds and recite them with purificatory devotion shall have the divine kings of the ten directions’ sacred realms descend to observe their persons, record their meritorious diligence, and memorialize the heavens above. Myriad spirits shall pay homage, earthly deities attend at their gates, and the great perfected kings of virtue shall recommend them as transcendent beings. With the Dao complete, they shall attain the ability to wander the Three Realms and ascend through the Golden Gate.

This sound repels all, expiates all, delivers all, and accomplishes all—it is the spontaneous sound of the Heavenly Perfected. Thus, reciting it summons the flying heavens of the ten directions to descend in observation. The Supreme Emperor chants from afar, myriad spirits pay homage, the Three Realms attend in reverence, and all malevolent forces bow their heads. Ghostly essences vanish of themselves, the resonance of jade and jasper shakes the ten directions into solemn clarity. Rivers and seas grow still, mountains and peaks swallow their mists, and the myriad spirits tremble in submission. Immortals are gathered, the heavens are purged of impurity, the earth is cleansed of demonic dust, and profound wisdom illumines the depths. Vast and mysterious, the infinite unfolds.

*The Marvelous Scripture of the Upper Chapters on the Limitless Salvation of Humanity, Scroll the Nineteenth—Concluded*
*Scroll the Twentieth*

**The Chapter on the Azure Vault’s Empty Song**

The Dao spoke: Long ago, in the Primordial Azure Heaven, within the Great Floating Li Land of the Azure Vault’s Empty Song, the Original Beginning received the spontaneous sounds of the Limitless Salvation’s Cavernous Numinous Chapters. The Azure Vault coiled through the void, celestial rosy clouds flowed in ripples, divine winds stirred and surged, and myriad tones harmonized in resonance. Rising and sinking, clear and turbid, swelling and fading, intertwining to form a song—its voice pierced through all, and the heavens joined in chorus. At that moment, all things in heaven and earth, even the voiceless, spoke as one, expounding the Dao and establishing the teachings. The Mysterious was revealed, the School founded, and all living beings came to understand the principles and illumine the Dharma.

When the Most High Heavenly Worthy expounded this scripture, he circled ten times to summon the Azure Vault worlds of the ten directions. Flying rosy clouds wove into strands, wondrous as jeweled nets, and all heavenly beings—dragon chariots and phoenix canopies—flashed to and fro. Passing through dark caverns, the azure void blazed with radiance, utterly unbounded, its luminous glow streaming like shadows. Illuminating one to penetrate ten thousand, a divine wind arose within, its pace swift or slow as all attained deliverance, their songs and chants attuned to rhythm. The empty zither’s Dharma-sounds filled all without limit; pearl towers and jeweled palaces all emitted numinous melodies. They praised the Dao, praised the Dharma, praised the Immortals, exhorting all heavenly beings to cultivate meritorious deeds and deeply awaken to the Supreme Dao.

Heavenly Perfected, Great Spirits, Lofty and Venerable Transcendents, Perfected Ones of Wondrous Practice, Azure Vault’s Utmost Perfected, spontaneous singers of the Empty Song, Jade Lads and Jade Maidens—an innumerable host—rode the void to arrive. The azure emptiness congealed in stillness, the cold azure shone with cavernous clarity. Jade steeds and whirlwind wheels, jeweled parasols unfurled their shade; celestial tones and wondrous chants arose in hidden interplay. Ninefold lights coiled and circled, fivefold brilliances suffused and gleamed. For seven days and seven nights, the inner Perfected of all heavens ascended their terraced towers, striking celestial drums in unison. Dragons and tigers roared, the stellar loom swayed in the east, and within the twenty-four heavens’ jeweled palaces, all merged into azure hue. Peaks rose like waves stilled, the seven luminaries gleamed with luster, clouds drifted and winds hushed. The vast expanse stretched bright and clear, forming a single realm. Lands, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees—all lay level and equal, without height or depth. Heaven and sea embraced in a ring, the earth’s jade glowed with verdant splendor. The cavernous song flowed purely, without distinction of hue.

The assembled Perfected attended in their seats as the Most High Heavenly Worthy sat in profound stillness upon the Ninefold Azure Jade Terrace, the divine dragon’s myriad-pearl throne. When the scripture was expounded once, the Azure Void’s Empty Song resounded, and all voices joined in praise. Then, every man and woman in the realm, hearing through windows and gates, perceived even the most secluded sounds.

When expounded a second time, flower lads scattered radiance, illuminating without limit.

When expounded a third time, the Azure Vault formed its tones, divine winds played gently, and words rang clear and resonant.

When expounded a fourth time, great wisdom encompassed all, and the Dharma-body became universally identical.

When expounded a fifth time, those who heard the song awakened to the Dharma, returning to their origin and restoring their mandate.

When expounded a sixth time, they beheld their bodies and surroundings, pure as precious pearls, manifesting colors according to direction, while the Dao and emptiness remained unchanging.

When expounded a seventh time, they realized this Empty Song arose neither from inception nor cessation; rosy clouds spread and winds arrived, tones tuned themselves, and entering the Dao to ascend as Perfected, the principle was attained thereby.

When expounded an eighth time, they wandered through floating palaces and towers, drifting through the azure void, where inner tones and pure songs flowed, now hidden, now revealed.

When expounded a ninth time, the empty cavern gave birth to flowers, surging to form a thousand realms. Heavenly beings, men and women, entered and exited the Yellow Chamber, sinking into azure to return to the void, revealing the Dao’s essence.

When expounded a tenth time, rosy clouds spread across the ten directions, and the song formed ninefold harmonies. Above, it reached the Great Illumination; below, it opened the darkest night. Heavenly beings rejoiced greatly, and the Numinous Treasure manifested auspicious signs. Then, every man and woman in the realm, without exception, joined their hands in celestial knots, set their feet upon cloud-lattices, and soared in bodily form to the Upper Clarity, all receiving protection and deliverance, attaining longevity without end.

The Dao spoke: At that time, when the Most High Heavenly Worthy expounded the scripture once, the Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits of the eastern direction—an innumerable host—floated through the void to arrive.

When expounded a second time, the Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits of the southern direction—an innumerable host—floated through the void to arrive.

When expounded a third time, the Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits of the western direction—an innumerable host—floated through the void to arrive.

When expounded a fourth time, the Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits of the northern direction—an innumerable host—floated through the void to arrive.

When expounded a fifth time, the Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits of the northeastern direction—an innumerable host—floated through the void to arrive.

When expounded a sixth time, the Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits of the southeastern direction—an innumerable host—floated through the void to arrive.

When expounded a seventh time, the Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits of the southwestern direction—an innumerable host—floated through the void to arrive.

When expounded an eighth time, the Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits of the northwestern direction—an innumerable host—floated through the void to arrive.

When expounded a ninth time, the Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits of the upper direction—an innumerable host—floated through the void to arrive.

When expounded a tenth time, the Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits of the lower direction—an innumerable host—floated through the void to arrive.

When the tenfold circling was complete, the ten directions were without limit. The Azure Vault’s Empty Song Utmost Perfected Great Spirits arrived all at once. Every man and woman in the realm, hearing and awakening to the Dharma-sounds, turned their hearts in reverence. Those who came produced a sound like boundless winds and clouds, a vast and unparalleled resonance—before their forms were seen, this sound was heard first. Scenes like songs and ballads, laughter and praise, sorrowful weeping and jade pendants’ chime, footsteps without end—myriad tones surged forth, filling the realm’s bounds, unstoppable.

Then the Most High extended his hand to grasp the Azure Vault’s long strands of rosy clouds, curling his jeweled palm into a circle like an azure pearl. Its luminous brilliance pierced through the ten-directional worlds, revealing the Azure Vault’s Empty Song as a matter without bounds, as near as one’s brows and lashes. Gazing down or glancing aside, all appeared as pure beryl. First, he displayed the Dharma assembly; next, the great multitude. Before their gazes lingered long, in an instant, he cast it into the void, nine kalpas above the earth, vast as a shooting star.

The Most High ascended, and the celestial perfected deities, the supreme sages and exalted venerables, the wondrous practitioners and upright ones—boundless across the ten directions—along with the Empty Song of the Azure Vault, the utmost true great deities, and the innumerable multitudes, all entered the wondrous radiance of the shooting star. Every celestial and human being ascended without exception. The divine light blazed resplendent: those outside saw within, those within saw without; those above seemed to cling, those below seemed to gaze upward. Inner and outer were wholly illumined, their source unknown. All beheld one another, merged in the same luminous body, every point suffused with a single light. The Empty Song resounded of itself; the azure clouds thickened and swirled; the divine winds chimed and rang. The jade cities of the ten directions shone with equal splendor, while the boundless celestial beings knew not where they stood.

Then, within the wondrous radiance of the jeweled light, the Most High expounded this Empty Song of the Azure Vault as the Dao of transcendence, the Dharma of longevity, the source of great transformation, the profound and wondrous origin. All beings of the ten directions, possessing this sacred mind, could comprehend with eyes, ears, mouth, and nose. Every realm of the Dao had not arisen but from the Azure Vault’s emptiness, where the Empty Song resounded, the Dharma-sound of the utmost Dao pervading all living kinds. In response to their words, the sound answered—thus the Dao was born.

When the discourse on the Dharma was complete, the assembled perfected observed and transmitted it to me. At that moment, joy and celebration defied expression. The Dharma rites concluded in rough outline, and the myriad heavens returned to their stations. In an instant, all fell silent, without lingering echo.

At that time, the celestial and human beings who encountered this scripture universally awakened, thoroughly discerning their original true nature. They knew this azure cloud to be the primordial essence of the Most High. When heaven and earth first opened, the cloud’s essence scattered afar, weaving and unfolding like warp and weft, threads and strands. The wind stirred within, and the five tones arose together—not crafted by heaven, not born of conditions. Thus they knew the Dao’s mystery naturally produced sound. Hearing this numinous tone, the eyes and mind opened to discernment; distinctions arose, and the true Dao was awakened. Within soundlessness, distant chanting was heard. The Dao knows no end; with hearts inclined, all turned in reverence, cultivating the great mind—without action, without desire, without intent, without thought, without love, without attachment, without attainment, without emptiness, without reality, without diminution, without birth.

Words held no deceit; speech bore no harsh sound. Equal in compassion and love, even strangers became kin. The land was at peace, the people prosperous, rejoicing in great harmony. From the scripture’s first teaching, the entire realm embraced the Dao, baring their utmost hearts, chanting and revering in homage. All attained deliverance from the world.

The Dao declared: All spoken in the scripture expounded by the Most High Celestial Worthy is the Empty Song of the Azure Vault, where azure clouds scatter in the four directions and divine winds murmur in secret, striking and strumming to produce sound. Within it unfolds the inner names of the Celestial Emperors of the various heavens, the hidden rhymes of sound—also the inner taboo names of the divine kings of the ten directions and the concealed names of the hundred spirits. These are no ordinary words of the world.

The exalted sages who have attained perfection and the perfected ones who fathom the profound and subtle can fully grasp its verses. Reciting them ten times, the Empty Cavern becomes song. The divine sound resonates afar; ten thousand emperors bow their heads, a thousand perfected stand in awe. The seas calm, weapons lay down; the celestial valleys conceal their mists. The Three Luminaries halt their wheels; scales and balances cease their motion. The Eight Mighties stir their qi; the myriad demons lose their sight. Green bones flourish anew; numinous skeletons return to life.

For the most devoted scholars who recite it ten times, the Three Origins will attend their carriage, the Five Emperors ride alongside. They can seal mountains and summon clouds, command demonic camps, heal illness and deliver from calamity, sever fate and restore life. This is because the scholar’s body penetrates the utmost straightness, their qi harmonizes with the Azure Mystery. The scripture of the Azure Vault is engraved upon their heart and bones. They can summon and command the Three Realms, govern the celestial bureaus, admonish the earthly officials, swiftly dispatch demonic ugliness, enjoy endless years, restore form, and deliver beings.

To recite this scripture lightly brings seven generations of misfortune. To uphold it with reverence and devotion ensures the flourishing of the Dao, prosperity through the ages, and favorable karmic connections. Ten thousand trials cannot disturb it; numinous beings descend to one’s chamber. This scripture is supremely wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital, delivering countless beings. Illuminating the sound of the Azure Vault, it is the august and peerless origin of the Dao.

The Dao declared: Whoever recites this scripture ten times will summon all the heavens. A hundred million ancestors and suffering souls in the dark realms will all receive deliverance, ascending to the Eastern Flowery Azure Palace. The Empty Song calls the souls; the souls recognize its sound and return to attach to the body. The souls refine the true qi, returning to life as humans. They can consume the mysterious radiance of the azure clouds and bathe their spirits in the divine winds to open their robes.

Those who diligently study this scripture, fulfilling their merit and perfecting their virtue, all attain divine transcendence, ascending to the Jade Palaces to wander and feast in the azure void. The most devoted scholars who cultivate and recite this scripture will all receive deliverance, ascending to the Azure Palace. Worldly beings who recite it will prolong their lives and attain longevity, later achieving the Dao of liberation through apparent death. Their souls and spirits briefly vanish, yet they hear the Empty Song and do not stray into delusion. Like one removing a garment, their spirits rest in peace, their qi settled. They become sacred beings, spared from the hells.

Using obscurity to attain clarity, the heart unites with the Dao. Universally delivering celestial and human beings, none fail to receive blessings. Boundless merit extends to life and death. Treasured by heaven, it is not transmitted to the lower world. The most devoted offer gold and treasures, pledging to heaven in transmission. To treat it lightly or with disdain brings calamity upon nine generations, condemning them to long servitude under demonic officials.

The Azure Emperor of the Empty Song of the Azure Vault, along with twenty-four Jade Lads and twenty-four Jade Maidens, guards the scripture’s divine text, protecting and sheltering those who receive it.

The Dao declared: During the long fast of the first month, recite and chant this scripture to open the qi of the Azure Cloud’s first arising, delivering the souls of past generations from the long night’s toil in the Cold Pool, reviving their souls and spirits to ascend to the Azure Palace. During the long fast of the seventh month, recite and chant this scripture to descend the numinous sound of the Azure Vault and moisten the adamantine qi of the Golden Perfected. Thus the Three Fields are purified, the body attains divine transcendence, the Azure Vault forms its scripture, and immortal names are inscribed. On the azure jade tablets, death is erased and life is recorded.

During the long fast of the tenth month, recite and chant this scripture so that the Azure Cloud forms its talismanic seals, the Empty Cavern manifests its text, and the numinous sound of the Mysterious Artisan offers felicitations to the Imperial Divine. On the azure jade tablets, the tally is held; from the Eastern Culmen, the scripture is conferred. Ruler and minister, father and son—all enjoy virtue for ten thousand years. The Four Seas know great peace, and from generation to generation, it never ceases. As lord of the realm under Heaven, one securely stabilizes the ten directions, enduring through kalpas without end.

On the days of the Eight Nodal Festivals, recite and chant this scripture so that the Eight Winds carry their resounding tones and the Azure Vault suspends its text. Consuming the swallow’s azure sprout, one attains the rank of Upper Perfected.

On the day of one’s life-destiny, recite and chant this scripture so that the hun-souls become true, the po-souls numinous, and jade blossoms grow within the bones. The body attains longevity, harmonizing with the Dao, and suffers no worldly calamities.
