The radiance of the embryonic landscape shines brightly; the Three Elders bestow destiny, and the Five Emperors govern the capital. The divine administrators present their morning obeisance, and one’s name is inscribed in the heavens above. When merit is complete and virtue perfected, one ascends in flight to the Upper Clarity.

The Dao declared: On the days of performing the Dao, one must bathe in fragrant waters, enter the chamber in purification, face east, and knock the teeth twenty-four times to be heard by the Twenty-Four Heavens. Bow in reverence twenty-four times, then close the eyes. In stillness, visualize the body seated amidst clouds of azure, yellow, and white qi. After a long while, they transform into Azure Cloud, and within and without, all becomes dimly luminous. A Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Warrior, Lion, and White Crane array themselves to left and right, while sun and moon illuminate the chamber with their brilliance. A circular image appears above the neck, its light suffusing the ten directions. When this vision becomes distinct, recite the secret incantation in silence:

Supreme Mystery and Primordial, the Most High Dao Lord. Summon forth from within this servant’s body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the Attendants of the Left and Right, the Jade Lads who tend incense, the Jade Maidens who transmit words, the Twenty-Four Direct Attendants of the Five Thearchs, the Incense Officials of the Day—each in their twenty-four ranks—to receive and convey these words. Today is an auspicious and joyous day. The hall is pure, the fast unbroken. The scripture of cultivation is recited, its boundless power to deliver beings. May these words ascend directly to the august presence of the Supreme Twenty-Four Heavens’ Primordial Thearch before his throne.

This done, draw in qi twenty-four times. Facing east, recite the scripture:

*The Supreme Scripture of Boundless Deliverance, the Wondrous Sutra of Primordial Limitless Salvation*
Primordial Cavern-Mystery, Numinous Treasure’s original text,
Azure Empyrean’s empty hymn, nine transformations to deliver beings.
Divine tones conceal their rhymes, parting and uniting by nature.
Chaos and the Great Void—
Void beyond void, void as vast emptiness,
emptiness conjoined with the Dao, emptiness reaching its limit and becoming luminous.
Luminosity is yang essence, yang essence is fire,
fire is the Primordial, the Cavern-Yang’s crimson qi.
Within crimson qi, a yellow halo takes form;
the yellow halo is earth, the fire’s child.
The qi of fire and earth, refined ninefold, grows firm—
firmness is the nature of metal, metal subdued becomes lead.
Lead transforms into water, water gives rise to wood’s abode,
called Azure, Yellow, White—the Mysterious Primordial.
The Three Qi plant their root; fire’s power refines them.
After ninety thousand years, their color congeals as azure,
its jade-like radiance shimmering.
The crystal gleams, now soaring, now leaping,
now crouching, now flying, now emerging, now vanishing,
now pacing, now racing.
Yin fire becomes wind, yang light becomes fire.
Wind and fire unite their powers; azure crystal fuses and disperses,
now cloud, now mist, now east, now west.
Divine wind stirs it; azure mist branches forth,
its limbs bending and twisting, now upright, now aslant.
Round as a ring, sharp as a ritual tablet,
its movements ever-changing, beyond mortal sight.
The azure void stretches boundless, its light embracing the four directions,
mist unfurling to the eight poles, wondrous in its transformations.
The Heavenly Elder Thearch takes up his brush to bestow it,
modeling it into celestial script. The Cavern’s tones run deep and subtle,
the cloud-mist’s writing—Three Origins, Eight Mighties,
Sixty-Four Sections—each form fitting its purpose.
Dragons ascend their heavens, phoenixes soar to the imperial chariot,
unicorns repose on jeweled thoroughfares, tortoises tread marshlands’ edges.
Three, nine, five, seven—constellations linked in sequence,
Straddler, Chamber, Net, and Purple Tenuity govern the Ten Heavens.
Azure mist spreads and arrays, weaving its mechanism,
falling like a net, binding without end.
Its center hollow, embracing emptiness, wind hums within.
Divine tones arise naturally, now hidden, now revealed, circling and soaring.
The Cavern’s hymn, jade script, the Numinous Treasure’s secret chapters,
the inner illumination of the Supreme Perfected, words of transcendence and ascent.
At the first hearing of the empty hymn, the palace of the brain emits smoke,
purple qi fills the chamber, the Six Dings draw near.
Without the hymn, no light; without the hymn, no clarity;
without the hymn, no establishment; without the hymn, no completion;
without the hymn, no deliverance; without the hymn, no life—
this is the Great Brahma, the Azure Empyrean’s empty hymn, the Shangqing’s divine tones.
To shed the bonds of death and life, the heaven within heaven,
the verdant terraces of Yu Luo, the jade mountain’s upper capital.
Supreme beyond the supreme, the Great Canopy’s Jade Clarity,
fathomless kalpas, now gone, now present.
All possess the Azure Empyrean, the natural empty hymn.
Singing praises to the Supreme Perfected, the Cavern unseals celestial numina.
The myriad spirits of heaven and earth gain their names through the hymn;
the Azure Void’s divine tones—call, and they are heard.
Thus are born the divine and numinous, and all the Supreme Perfected.
The secret taboos hold it in reverence; through the hymn, its light is revealed.
Within the Azure Empyrean, vast and indistinct,
a Jade Perfected breathes forth misty qi.
Azure mist and Brahma qi encircle the ten directions,
within them, the divine power to deliver beings from death.
In the Eastern Ultimate’s palace, the Lord of Azure Florescence,
within it, the divine of the empty hymn’s natural tones,
within it, the Azure Thearch of Life’s Favor, the Nine Numinous and Most Wondrous Power of Life.
The Azure Void’s True Elder, the Heaven-Transforming Venerable,
within it, the Shangqing’s *Azure Mist’s Empty Ultimate Jade Chant*, the Cavern’s script of the Supreme Perfected,
the Lord of Heavenly Unity, who delivers life and refines the spirit.

Today, the reckoning is recorded; all heavens descend in state.
The Eastern Ultimate’s Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine King,
Great Sage of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life.
The Southern Ultimate’s Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine King,
Great Sage of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life.
The Western Ultimate’s Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine King,
Great Sage of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life.
The Northern Ultimate’s Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine King,
Great Sage of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life.
The Northeastern Ultimate’s Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine King,
Great Sage of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life.
The Southeastern Ultimate’s Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine King,
Great Sage of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life.
The Southwestern Ultimate’s Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine King,
Great Sage of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life.
The Northwestern Ultimate’s Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine King,
Great Sage of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life.
The Upper Ultimate’s Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine King,
Great Sage of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life.
The Lower Ultimate’s Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine King,
Great Sage of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life.
The Ten Directions’ Supreme Perfected Azure Empyrean Empty Hymn Jade-Toned Divine Kings,
Great Divinities of Boundless Deliverance and Eternal Life—
all ride azure-green chariots with wheel-patterned wheels,
drawn by green phoenixes and dark-armored black dragons,
bearing banners of azure mist, ten sacred pennants,
flutes of jade sounding in unison before, flutes of jasper harmonizing behind,
divine birds and dark cranes joining their voices in resonant song,
their melodies blending with the empty hymn, flowing in perfect accord.
Heavenly ministers hold their tablets, marshals steady the chariot poles,
myriad chariots and ten thousand riders surge forth on azure waves,
their hymns shaking seas and mountains, their voices piercing metal and stone.
Their radiant light turns back; their procession oversees the deliverance of the true and the living.
The heavens’ chancellors, the Shangqing’s dukes and ministers,
the numinous palaces of the Empyrean’s heights, the Azure Void’s Great Sages,
the cloud encampments’ four bureaus, the nine paths of the firm winds,
the inspecting immortals’ great divinities—
all, bearing registers and celestial charts, assemble before the Thearch,
to review and verify the immortals’ names, to rigorously examine the Six Heavens.

Those who comprehend the empty hymns of the Azure Vault’s cavern-chapters, whose divine embrace spans the Great Void and whose qi abides in the vast abyss, transcend worldly calamities and fulfill their karmic destiny as immortals. A universal proclamation resounds through the Three Realms, the boundless divine lands, and the subterranean courts of the Yellow Springs—save only those realms barred by Heaven’s pivots, the nine solar boundaries of the Azure Mist’s towering ramparts, whose registers lie with the Three Bureaus, whose ranks extend through the Nine Treasuries and the Twelve River Sources.

They absolve their ancestors and progenitors across kalpas, their kin bound by countless ties, resolving hidden grievances and ancestral lawsuits, erasing the records of transgressions, swiftly severing evil roots to prevent confinement, delivering souls to immortality. By the Primordial Beginning’s decree, their ascent is timed to the hour: the Night River’s accumulated corpses, the polluted streams of the Cold Springs, the concealed torments of sin—all are examined to govern form and soul. They are graded in the Azure Palace, their bones enveloped in azure mist, their divine tones entering the Mystery, summoning the hundred spirits to restore the Nine Palaces.

Those whose bodies receive deliverance endure kalpa after kalpa, forever freed from the wheel of rebirth, aging in harmony with the Dao. They eternally transcend the pillars of suffering, the radiance of life opening as death’s terrors dissolve through the Eight Passes, ascending to everlasting life, surmounting lingering tribulations, and roaming freely in the Shangqing. The heavens of the Shangqing, the qi of the Azure Vault—these are the practices of the Brahmanic path.

**The Six Heavens of the East**
The qi of the Azure Vault arises at Horn Mansion, one *du* per instant, one *xu* per breath, gradually advancing northward.
- Azure Brahmanic Profound Void Heaven: The Thearch deeply awakens to the assembly of heroes.
- Azure Boundary’s Ultimate Heaven: The Thearch discerns the utmost subtleties.
- Azure Net of the Primordial Beginning Heaven: The Thearch soars through true flight and life.
- Azure Convergence of Clarity Heaven: The Thearch surpasses conventional rites in flourishing.
- Azure Countenance of Vermilion Radiance Heaven: The Thearch’s benevolence expands to nurture life.
- Azure Vastness of Empty Expanse Heaven: The Thearch’s path is doubly profound.

**The Six Heavens of the South**
The qi of the Azure Vault arises at Winnowing Basket Mansion, twelve *du* per casket’s instant, advancing northward in sequence.
- Azure True Cavern-Yang Heaven: The Thearch’s nine reed-pipes resound in empty mystery.
- Azure Jade Vermilion Palace Heaven: The Thearch’s dragons merge in awakening.
- Azure Mist of Luminous Simplicity Heaven: The Thearch’s purple radiance exalts emptiness.
- Azure Radiance-Free Cavern Heaven: The Thearch’s flourishing surpasses all propriety.
- Azure Movement of Primordial Design Heaven: The Thearch’s origin extends to the Nine Perfected.
- Azure Vastness of Upright Emptiness Heaven: The Thearch’s capital grows ever more distant and rare.

**The Six Heavens of the West**
The qi of the Azure Vault arises at Woman Mansion, three *du* and twelve and a half instants, advancing northward near the west.
- Azure Divine Illumination of Wisdom Heaven: The Thearch’s constancy knows no awakening.
- Azure Surge of Purple Radiance Heaven: The Thearch stabilizes the ultimate Great Origin.
- Azure Canopy of Brahmanic Emptiness Heaven: The Thearch’s wondrous inquiry extends endlessly.
- Azure Cavern of Rosy Dawn Heaven: The Thearch’s subtlety roams in self-true nature.
- Azure Florescence of Open Calendar Heaven: The Thearch transcends the star Lou to celebrate mystery.
- Azure Brahmanic Luminous Distant Heaven: The Thearch’s son embodies the Great Clarity.

**The Six Heavens of the North**
The qi of the Azure Vault arises at Well Mansion, fifteen *du* and twenty-four and a half parts—this is the true axis of the Azure Vault.
- Azure Light of Cold Florescence Heaven: The Thearch’s dragons radiate transformation in truth.
- Azure Fluid of Pouring Extension Heaven: The Thearch’s dark spirit abides in the Great Capital.
- Azure Cinnabar of Transformative Qi Heaven: The Thearch’s muddy towers lie in repose.
- Azure Expanse of Compassionate Clarity Heaven: The Thearch’s refined ones live in primordial constancy.
- Azure Vault of Hymnal Tones Heaven: The Thearch’s captives attain wondrous trust.
- Azure Emptiness of Congealed Yang Heaven: The Thearch’s subtlety reveres the Great Tranquility.

The Twenty-Four Heavens, the Twenty-Four Thearchs, the Azure Vault’s hidden texts, the Azure Vault’s hidden names—within the Azure Vault’s heavens, the empty cavern is naturally so. The empty hymns and numinous tones are the hidden rhythms of all heavens. The tones within heaven, the honor within heaven, the spirits within heaven, the jade texts within heaven, the numina within heaven. The Nine Transformations and Six Harmonies transform into the Shangqing, the mysteries of the Azure Vault too profound to fathom.

The dissemination of the utmost truth universally delivers gods and humans. Cloudy chapters and rosy scriptures curve and bend into sound. Metal is clear, earth is turbid; wood floats, fire is light; the Great One becomes water—its tones are wholly blended. The five qi assume their positions, the five palaces are thus formed, azure mist weaves through the void, divine winds stir and chant. Flowing *shang*, restrained *zhi*, containing *gong*, nurturing *yu*—the empty hymns harmonize in concert, and the myriad heavens rise in dance. Today is the great celebration: receiving deliverance in the Azure Heavens. Proclaiming through the Three Origins, beseeching the severance of the Five *You*, the karmic enmities of seven generations are erased, the roots of death are excised, life’s origin is renewed, and souls depart the Great Yin. Mounting azure dragons, they bow to jade maidens and sit upright in the Hall of Light.

Descending to wander the Nine Palaces, subduing the celestial prisons, concealing themselves in the Eight Earths, appearing and vanishing without fixed abode. The Azure Vault’s utmost truth, the jade tones of the divine king, gather mists and gather qi, sealing the gates of ghosts. The Eastern Dipper’s jade light, the Western Dipper’s luminous splendor, the Northern Dipper’s supreme wonder, the Southern Dipper’s brilliance, the Central Dipper’s yellow clouds—covering the realm of our lives, the five qi interweave with rosy mist, composing the Azure Vault’s chapters.

The Azure Thearch wields the staff, the White Thearch shakes the bronze chime, the Red Thearch strikes the drum, the Black Thearch casts the bell, the Yellow Thearch offers the jade vessel. Breaths are exhaled to raise the tones, harmonizing the empty hymns in the Azure Vault’s immortal capital. Within it resides the Great August One, clad in flying azure, leftward summoning the Earl of Hua, rightward summoning the Lord of Cheng.

The Azure Heaven’s jade tones form jade texts of their own. The Red Heaven’s jade tones manifest divine traces in the celestial scriptures. The White Heaven’s jade tones strike stone and knock on jade. The Black Heaven’s jade tones flourish with myriad feathers. The Yellow Heaven’s jade tones chant the divine hymns of the Great Clarity. The five heavens’ jade tones ascend together in the Azure Vault. The empty hymns and Brahmanic echoes sing of the nameless Dao.

The boundless divine king rides a tiger and mounts a whale, spewing fire for ten thousand *li*, commanding flying thunder to garrison the troops. Floating through the azure void’s radiance, descending to the utmost depths of darkness, he slaughters, beheads, and dismembers, annihilating the ghostly encampments. The great demons of all heavens, the stern guards of the fire troops, the qi of the Six Heavens, the foremost names of the hundred spirits—all purge the demonic capitals, utterly extinguishing the cavern’s gloom. Brandishing spears and waving banners, arrows fly and drums boil over. Cries resound through the northern mountains, leaving no ghost to escape form. The Five Thearchs receive their mandates, the Four Lords audit the registers. Those with merit are recorded; those with faults are suspended. The ghost lords have six eyes, the lightning masters have *yun*-bodies. Flowing fire and surging poison swiftly converge on all eight paths. Should any dare to resist or obstruct the perfected ones, the Azure Vault’s divine tones, the natural scriptures, the Jade Thearch’s decrees, the Shangqing’s talismans, fire bells and wind chimes—all lead the myriad spirits forward.

A universal proclamation resounds without end—let the Six Heavens all hearken, the Three Realms and Five Thearchs array their words before the Azure Void.

The primordial Jade Essence of the Origin, its radiance stored in azure vaults, suffuses the boundless dark, and the divine Dao unfolds. The Great Void stretches vast, the myriad perfected ones open the charts; above they float, below they sink, east they coil, west they unfurl. Streaming hues fill the Nine Gates, resplendent light adorns the Three Paths. The Most High Divine Lords wield authority over being and non-being. Jade axes and golden thunderbolts—ten thousand heavens raise their voices; the Cavernous Scriptures spread in four directions, the mottled Treasure Books gleam.

Azure auroras spew forth rays, dragons soar and phoenixes ascend; threads of immortal brocade drift, clouds coil around sacred tablets. The heroes of the Azure Void’s Dao transform without limit. In heaven above, on earth below—no emptiness, no darkness, no light, no sound, no color, no name. Vast and boundless, merged into oneness, neither formed nor completed.

Completion and the Dao take form, and that form is the Jade Capital. Azure peaks tower high, the Great Existence’s wondrous courts. Within resides the Origin’s Beginning, whose visage outshines the feminine infant. Clad in a blue-green robe, girded with a sash of moonlight, crowned with divine radiance, riding the Five Spirits. Azure auroras congeal in the void, divine winds surge through the eight directions; the Valley Spirit hums in the dark, the empty song bears sound.

This is the Numinous Treasure’s Red Script, the Nine Heavens’ True Writ, preserving and governing the kalpas’ fate—my Dao endures forever.

The Azure Empyrean spreads boundlessly, the ten thousand forms expand in full. Wondrous qi revolves and redeems the Twenty-Four Heavens. The wheel turns through Horn and Horn, Well and Ghost, Willow and Chamber; qi enters the Supreme Mystery, following the Dipper’s rise and fall. Where primordial qi flows, creation and the Great Yang arise. Qi is refined into script, script interweaves into sound. Sound, stirred by wind, becomes the aurora’s ninefold numen. Its chants shake demons, subduing the Dark River below.

Azure mists spiral rightward, gathering qi into the Supreme Origin. Void and azure merge with darkness, qi enters the Mystery of Mysteries. Within the Mystery, the Jade Honored One cradles the sun to shine, pacing the Dragon Marsh, inspecting and commanding the Crimson Host. Whoever dares oppose me shall be slain by the Heavenly Soldiers. Divine banners ripple in jade-green, waves surge through the Great Clarity. Purple clouds weave blossoms, green petals scatter through the courts. A thousand partings, ten thousand unions—qi is refined into the perfected.

Within the perfected dwells the divine: the Azure Perfected ascends as consort, auroral script and immortal branches, the Supreme Unity’s lofty perfected. The Celestial Throne’s Jade Aides, the Heavenly Elders as ministers, exhale yin and inhale yang, preserving life at the Crimson Ford. Above they wander the Supreme Clarity, entering and leaving the cinnabar chambers. Within the Three Caverns, below they connect to the Yellow Court. White clouds guard the dark gates, pristine frost layers the peaks; azure mists weave their welcome, descending to guard the human body.

The Orchid Terrace holds a palace, its walls of purple jade. Within resides a great spirit, named Non-Male. His body shines with blue-green light, his mouth swallows jade nectar. Transforming naturally, he merges with the formless void. He governs the Five Dippers, commands and restrains the hundred spirits. The Nine Paths return to brightness, the Three Origins respond to the immortals.

The immortal Dao values the true; immeasurable is the deliverance of beings. Above they enter the Mystery Gate, soaring through the Nine Celestial Palaces. Transgressions and blessings, prohibitions and precepts, karmic causes from past lives—ascending the Flowery Palace, they escape the dark underworld. Bones are refined, corpses destroyed; flying souls gain new bodies. Having attained rebirth, they ascend to report before the myriad heavens.

Above the myriad heavens, the vast and open immortal gates. Within resides a divine king, singing the Azure Empyrean’s empty song—the Dao’s mysterious verses, words that join the lofty perfected.

**First: The East’s Boundless Azure Empyrean’s Empty Song of the Jade-Sound Divine King**
Utterly non-divine, the Dao receives its numen.
Transforming without limit, its use is most divine.
The Dao does not display the divine—supreme transformation is dark.
Divine smoke billows in blue-green, carefree in the Jade Capital.

**Second: The South’s Boundless Azure Empyrean’s Empty Song of the Jade-Sound Divine King**
Faint and distant, the Terrace of Reaching;
flowery patterns, dragon-script.
This empty song is completed—
the Azure Palace’s crimson chariot.
Roaming the Nine Heavens, its command sounds like pipes and flutes.
Chanting this Dao-King, utterly true without remainder.

**Third: The West’s Boundless Azure Empyrean’s Empty Song of the Jade-Sound Divine King**
Straddling the western curtains, bright and scattered are the stars.
The azure void contains qi, qi equal to the void.
True qi has no form, the true Dao has no name.
Relying on this emptiness, the Jade Perfected forms naturally.

**Fourth: The North’s Boundless Azure Empyrean’s Empty Song of the Jade-Sound Divine King**
The Great Ox and Dark Plow—
in Xu and Hai they drink.
The womb of yin is removed, the Celestial Dipper shines brilliantly.
Nurturing the ten thousand kinds, harmonizing the Six Principles.
Wailing in the night, the ghostly courts scatter.

**Fifth: The Northeast’s Boundless Azure Empyrean’s Empty Song of the Jade-Sound Divine King**
The Dark Phoenix is on the field, pure and most yang.
Azure auroras fan the void, singing the divine wind.
Its sound is mournful, its melody faint—
the Dao has the subtle and inaudible.
My realm is the Yellow Mound—
the ten thousand lives find their place.

**Sixth: The Southeast’s Boundless Azure Empyrean’s Empty Song of the Jade-Sound Divine King**
The Thearch rides the cinnabar chariot, issuing commands at the Heavenly Gate.
Azure script in golden caskets, summoning the underworld’s souls.
Refining qi into crimson brightness, green sprouts arise.
Singing the cavernous divine tones, the Great Matriarch mounts the carriage.

**Seventh: The Southwest’s Boundless Azure Empyrean’s Empty Song of the Jade-Sound Divine King**
The Bird Mother holds the banner, the Water King bears the staff.
The Jade Chime delivers beings, washing clean the Nine Darks.
Dragon immortals turn the mechanism, bathing the moon in the Eastern Well.
Today is a great celebration—ancestors and descendants are distinguished.

**Eighth: The Northwest’s Boundless Azure Empyrean’s Empty Song of the Jade-Sound Divine King**
The Heavenly Father with yellow hair, clad in brocade of ten thousand flowers.
His mouth exhales sunlight, his feet tread the divine toad.
Jade blades sever demons, bells and drums resound.
Severing the blood of the dark and yellow, the Azure Empyrean’s Dao prospers.

**Ninth: The Above’s Boundless Azure Empyrean’s Empty Song of the Jade-Sound Divine King**
Azure auroras vast and boundless, spreading through the Jade Clarity.
Sealing the void into script, the Eight Meetings’ Cavernous Writ.
Planting the root of the supreme Dao, transforming and birthing the multitudes.
Towering is the Heavenly Terrace—within resides the Celestial Lord.

**Tenth: The Below’s Boundless Azure Empyrean’s Empty Song of the Jade-Sound Divine King**
Layer upon layer of rigid marshes, wind and sea plunge into darkness.
The Dark Elder audits the registers, fire and smoke in the iron city.
Black vipers bare their fangs, venomous beasts devour forms.
When the heavenly light arrives, the ten thousand sufferings cease.

Here at the summit of the Azure Empyrean, within the ten directions, the Jade-Sound Divine King sings his spontaneous hymn. Recite it a hundred times, and your name ascends to the Azure Palace. Recite it a thousand times, and the Divine King himself safeguards and welcomes you. Ten thousand recitations perfect the Dao, allowing you to soar into the Great Void, traverse the Three Realms, and join the Perfected Lords of the Upper Clarity.

Those who hear the Jade Sound are shielded in form by the hundred spirits; the earthly deities are commanded to escort them in and out, bearing them beyond the earthly gates. The three disasters and nine calamities are left behind; the seven ancestors ascend in turn, forever freed from the gates of darkness. The soul rises to the Azure Palace, the very household of the Great One.

Azure is one of the Four Palaces, where one dons the imperial robes and mounts the dragon—unlike the black and red realms, where the Dipper’s steps reverse and misfortune reigns. The Azure Void’s utmost Perfected: those who know it achieve great penetration, their years of life boundless, their mysterious merits recorded.

This is the secret celestial sound, revered by all heavens. To leak or profane it is to plunge into hell, bringing calamity upon seven generations of ancestors. The Dao declares: these cavernous verses are the Jade Sound of the ten directions of the Azure Empyrean, the hidden and spontaneous hymns of the utmost Perfected Divine King—all in the language of the Great Brahma, not the common words of the world. They illuminate the Empty Song of the Azure Empyrean as the supreme Perfected Dao.

In great measure, they align with the mysterious transformations, moving through the ten thousand mechanisms, rightly guiding the mysterious deliverance, and unfolding the world to form heaven. In lesser measure, they enable the body to attain immortality and ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The blackness of the Azure Empyrean, for humans, corresponds to the ears and eyes, connecting below to the essence of liver and kidney, emerging from Kan and entering Li, employed day and night. Within the divine furnace of the brain’s chamber, there should be a mysterious elixir, large as a millet grain, emerging from your ears. If you obtain and ingest it, your bones are exchanged and your form renewed, elevating you as an imperial guest. Should this Dao be accomplished, your spirit roams the Azure Land, where you behold the Azure City’s jeweled towers and jade palaces, the towering dragon and tiger, the lion and white crane, the coiling flood-dragons—all within the Azure Empyrean’s world, a realm of ten thousand leagues surveyed in an instant. Yet this is no worldly learning; its depths are difficult to fathom.

This is what heaven treasures, concealed in the Mysterious Capital’s Purple Tenuity Upper Palace, transmitted but once every forty thousand kalpas according to the mysterious statutes. Only if a perfected one arrives bearing a ring of azure jade and a pledge of blue brocade, swearing an oath in accord with the Upper Clarity’s regulations, shall it then be bestowed.

The Dao declares: even in the revolutions of the lofty and profound, there are gradations and ranks.

The Three Luminaries and Nine Origins also have their concealments and withdrawals. The utmost sagely divine beings also have their hiddenness and manifestations. Even those of shallow learning may encounter calamities. Whenever such disasters arise, all of shared qi must unite in heart to perform purification rites, offer incense in the six watches, recite scriptures ten times through, and chant the celestial hymns of the Azure Empyrean. Blessings and felicity will then arise of themselves, the numinous perfected will descend in an instant, and all inauspiciousness will dissolve.

The boundless scripture universally delivers the limitless. The Dao declares: those of shallow learning, whose immortal rank remains unfulfilled, may face the turning of their destined dissolution. As their bodies pass through the Great Yin and the hour of passage draws near, fellow students and perfected ones shall offer incense and recite the scriptures ten times on their behalf, so that the celestial hymns of the Azure Empyrean may summon their ethereal souls. The qi of the Azure Empyrean will descend to bind with their bones and appearance, the six viscera will regain their brightness, and true qi will arise of itself. Thus, the corpse-form is delivered according to the method, and the ethereal soul ascends directly to the Azure Palace, where, by the measure of their cultivated merit, they may be reborn after a reckoning of days. Once the Wheel is turned without confusion, they shall attain divine transcendence.

The Dao declares: when the cycles of yin and yang falter in the hours of *yin* and *shen*, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite scriptures. When the radiance of the constellations dims, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite scriptures. When water and fire clash violently and the people’s qi is disordered, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite scriptures. When the borders of the realm are threatened and warfare and banditry cease not, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite scriptures. When strange qi brings disaster and the people suffer from pestilence, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite scriptures. When masters or companions pass from this life, one must perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite scriptures.

For the merit of purification rites and scripture recitation is most weighty: above, it rectifies the movements of heaven; in the middle, it pacifies the emperor and king; below, it dispels poison and harm, delivering the multitudes of the people. In life and death, all rely upon it, and its blessings are beyond measure. Thus it is called boundless, universally delivering heaven and humanity.

The Dao declares: whoever possesses this scripture and performs these meritorious deeds for the lords of heaven and earth and the multitudes of the people—on the day of disaster, if they resolve in heart to perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scripture ten times—all the heavens shall record their names, the ten thousand spirits shall attend and guard them, and those of exceptional attainment shall be counted among the ministers of the Azure Empyrean’s Lord and the Azure Palace. The heavens record the merit and transgressions of people without the slightest error. The divine kings of heaven shall also protect and recommend them, and those who attain the Dao shall come to comprehend these most profound words.

The great Brahmā hymns of the Azure Empyrean, the boundless hidden verses of the celestial hymns—composed by the Dao Lord, the *Primordial Commencement’s Numinous Writ of Azure Radiance*, the *Numinous Chapters*:
**The Six Heavens of the East**
The Six Heavens of the East hold mirrors aloft in towering splendor, rosy mists filling the four directions of the void. Their luminous countenance is distant and unseen, yet the Dipper and *Wei* constellations assume their form. Their brightness thins the Nine Suns, circling to the utmost origin. Meeting at the *you* hour, they enter the eightfold thoroughfares. Hills and pits are cleansed like a tripod, the golden register and lunar spring. Embracing the bright jade wilds, the numinous chapters traverse the level void.

**The Six Heavens of the South**
The well arises from *Wei* and *Ji*, *Liu* and *Zhang* converge at the fork. The true bell sounds in the eastern glory, cloud-dragons partake of jasper nectar. A second mandate is given to the yellow network, encountering the corners of *Bi* and *Zhi*. Qi circulates universally, the forest streams and jade pupils. The Dao’s subtlety approaches the true diagram, the Five Yangs intersect in the palace. Wisteria maidens and purple radiance, the mysterious and the trustworthy scatter like lords.

**The Six Heavens of the West**
The Xiao Pool and Yu Wei, pearls gleam in the night’s haze. *Gui* and *Liu* mark the dark borders, running ledgers in the fire pool. The cavernous horse harmonizes, the jade consorts disperse the barbarians. *Mao* and *Zhang* gallop side by side, the woman’s chamber is fitting. The Yang rains curve in purity, the golden pivot and tiger maidens. The interwoven lords of *Yan* and *Chen*, the *Ao* heaven and grand ceremony.

**The Six Heavens of the North**
Kun and Tai stand beside You, the road is straight through the prison of jade. Jade repentance and swift bestowal, the fire lord and lightning marquis. The true laughter and true pool, the pure brightness and immortal schemes. Hooks join in numinous ease, the palace army and Earl Xiu. The boundless depths of the non-existent, the cavern gazes upon the inverted tower. The dragon’s mechanism and river inscription, the Purple Tenuity and Nine Mounds.

The Dao declares: these are the great Brahmā hidden verses of the Azure Empyrean’s celestial hymns, boundless in sound. The ancient script was all azure radiance, winding and turning, curving to form the text, its rays trailing in the eightfold convergence. The celestial perfected and august ones left their traces in lingering phrases, brush in hand to record them, establishing the true sounds.

Whoever knows these sounds and can perform purification rites while reciting them shall have the jade-voiced divine kings of all the heavens, the great spirits of the Azure Empyrean’s void, descend to observe their person. Their merit and diligence shall be inscribed, reported to the heavens above, and the ten thousand spirits shall come to pay homage. The earthly deities shall attend at their gates, the great merit-demons and kings shall protect and recommend them, enabling them to wander the Azure Empyrean and enter the Azure Gate in bodily form.

This sound averts all, dispels all, delivers all, and accomplishes all. It is the natural sound of the Azure Empyrean’s divine wind. Thus, reciting it summons the flying celestial spirits of the Azure Empyrean to descend and observe, the Supreme Emperor to chant from afar, the ten thousand spirits to pay homage, the Three Realms to attend in their chariots. The demonic hordes bow their heads, ghostly essences vanish of themselves, the divine wind resounds, the Azure Empyrean is cleansed and luminous. The ten directions reflect one another, seas and mountains are profound and clear, the void congeals in radiance, shining and merging in brightness. The host of immortals bow their heads, soaring to the Jade Capital. Heaven and earth stretch boundlessly, the celestial sounds ring clear and cold, dark wisdom knows no limit, the boundless profundity is most mysterious.

*The Wondrous Scripture of the Numinous Treasure, the Upper Chapter on Universally Delivering the Limitless*, Scroll Twenty—concluded.
Scroll Twenty-One.

**The Chapter on Generating Transformation and Severing the Root of the Womb to Eliminate Defilements**

The Dao spoke: In ancient times, within the Primordial Azure Heaven, amidst the Purple Empyrean’s empty hymns of the Supreme Ultimate’s Mysterious Land, the *Original Beginning’s Scripture on Universally Delivering the Limitless, the Upper Chapter on Generating Transformation and Severing the Root of the Womb to Eliminate Defilements* was received.

When the Celestial Worthy of the Original Beginning was about to expound this scripture, he circumambulated ten times to summon the ten directions. Only then did he ascend his seat. Heavenly perfected ones, great spirits, lofty sages, and exalted worthies—along with a boundless host of wondrously accomplished perfected persons—came riding upon the void. Crimson mists bore incense, crystalline flowers adorned their chariots, cinnabar and azure hues floated in their carriages, cavernous radiance gleamed from their feathered wheels, fivefold brilliance shimmered in brocade hues, canopies reflected the fragrance of rosy clouds, and the ninefold qi merged in splendor, illuminating the Great Void. For seven days and seven nights, the palaces and towers of the myriad heavens opened from afar. Jade rays flickered in concealment and revelation, starry pearls wove their patterns, the sun’s brilliance stilled of itself, and the divine yin unfolded its radiance. Golden waves surged, the jade pivot and stellar balance turned in harmony, infusing the empty seas with spiritual concord. The divine wind revolved and merged, emerald peaks coiled in repose. The heavens were free of drifting veils, the four qi shone in clarity, and throughout the land—its mountains, rivers, forests, and groves—all was leveled as one, no longer high or low. The earth transformed into azure jade, uniform in hue.

The assembled perfected ones attended the seat as the Celestial Worthy of the Original Beginning sat in profound stillness upon the Seven Celestial Thrones and Ninefold Radiant Luminous Jeweled Seat suspended in the void. After he expounded the scripture once, the great sages of the myriad heavens simultaneously proclaimed its excellence. At that moment, the men and women of the land congealed their wondrous qi into wombs, their roots of birth transcending and flourishing. After the second recitation, defilements were severed, and knots dissolved. After the third, spirits dwelled in the cavernous void, and the brahmic qi pervaded the unseen. After the fourth, their bones bore jadelike blossoms, and their countenances shone with golden hue. After the fifth, enmities from seven lifetimes scattered, and blessings filled their halls with rejoicing. After the sixth, purple mists bathed their bodies, and the hundred spirits rejoiced in harmony. After the seventh, male and female merged in transformation, and the Three Ones ascended in wandering. After the eighth, divine light reflected within, revealing the hundred passages. After the ninth, their minds awakened to the cavernous spirit, and they attained the realization of the Imperial Terrace. After the tenth, their names were inscribed in the Jade Clarity, and they attended the Golden Gates of the Celestial Thrones.

At that time, none among the men and women of the land failed to turn their hearts in devotion. All received protection and deliverance, attaining longevity without end.

The Dao spoke: When the Celestial Worthy of the Original Beginning had expounded the scripture once, the Azure Emperor of the Eastern Limitless and Boundless Realm, Liang Xu Sheng, the Great Spirit of Transforming the Womb and Perfected Truth, arrived with his boundless host, floating upon the void. After the second recitation, the Vermilion Emperor of the Southern Limitless and Boundless Realm, Zhong Ming Bin, the Great Spirit of Eliminating Defilements and Perfected Truth, arrived with his boundless host, floating upon the void. After the third, the White Emperor of the Western Limitless and Boundless Realm, Ling Cheng Yu, the Great Spirit of Transforming the Womb and Perfected Truth, arrived with his boundless host, floating upon the void. After the fourth, the Black Emperor of the Northern Limitless and Boundless Realm, Yuan Dao Ming, the Great Spirit of Eliminating Defilements and Perfected Truth, arrived with his boundless host, floating upon the void. After the fifth, the Lord of the Eight Radiant Luminous Microcosm of the Northeastern Limitless Heavenly Realm, arrived with his boundless host, floating upon the void. After the sixth, the Lord of the Eight Radiant Mysterious Numinous of the Southeastern Limitless and Boundless Realm, the Great Spirit of Eliminating Defilements and Perfected Truth, arrived with his boundless host, floating upon the void. After the seventh, the Lord of the Eight Radiant True Florescence of the Southwestern Limitless and Boundless Realm, the Great Spirit of Transforming the Womb and Perfected Truth, arrived with his boundless host, floating upon the void. After the eighth, the Lord of the Eight Radiant Numinous Radiance of the Northwestern Limitless and Boundless Realm, the Great Spirit of Eliminating Defilements and Perfected Truth, arrived with his boundless host, floating upon the void. After the ninth, the Lord of the Eight Radiant Singing Cavern of the Upper Limitless and Boundless Realm, the Great Spirit of Transforming the Womb and Perfected Truth, arrived with his boundless host, floating upon the void. After the tenth, the Lord of the Eight Radiant Secret Form of the Lower Limitless and Boundless Realm, the Great Spirit of Eliminating Defilements and Perfected Truth, arrived with his boundless host, floating upon the void.

When the ten recitations were complete, the great perfected spirits of the ten directions and limitless heavens arrived as one. The men and women of the land turned their hearts in reverence. Those who came spoke to one another, saying: "The Celestial Worthy of the Original Beginning, within the Primordial Azure Heaven, expounds the method of generating transformation and severing the root of the womb to eliminate defilements. We, since entering the cycle of rebirth, have not escaped birth and death. Greed, anger, and delusion have cast us into the various states of existence. Though by fortunate karma we have been born in the heavens, the heavenly beings remain entangled in love and attachment. Even after relinquishing worldly dust, they still dwell in subtle defilements. Habitual tendencies remain unsevered, and their actions entangle them in knots. The womb’s root of transformation is not thoroughly purified, and the root of birth becomes firm, clinging to impermanence, taking abiding as its foundation. Not knowing the mysterious subtlety of the Dao’s essence—which embraces and nurtures the Great Void, where the Nine Sages and Ten Perfected Ones are fundamentally without birth or extinction—they remain bound by the unsevered womb-root, leading to this strife and contention. They transform into one another, alternating as species, their corpses and blood flowing, their bones decaying, and their forms crumbling. Though we are heavenly beings, we have not transcended the Three Realms. Our forms have not attained independent transformation, and we remain separated from the Dao. Even if we manifest transformed bodies, we still dwell in the realm of form. Thus, in gazing upon one another, in clasping hands, in speech and sound, we do not accord with the Great Cavern. This allows the Three Corpses to surge and flow, impure blood to generate tumors, and demonic forces to seize the opportunity, turning us far from the true Dao. Today, we must incline our ears to the Dharma-sound, as the rain encircles the celestial seat. The assembly of beings from kalpas beyond count gathers as one—this cannot be restrained."

Thereupon, the Celestial Worthy lowered his robes and gazed straight ahead. He commanded the Primordial Lord of the Yellow Simplicity to take up the compass and square’s mirror, upon which the true forms of heaven and earth took shape, their configurations forming characters. The Primordial Lord of the White Simplicity struck the Cavernous Yang Bell, and the ten directions resounded in harmony, the myriad heavens joining in chant. The Primordial Lord of the Purple Simplicity suspended the Vast Radiance Pearl, as large as a millet grain, within the mysterious void, nine *zhang* above the earth. The Celestial Worthy led the way as the heavenly perfected ones, great spirits, lofty sages, exalted worthies, wondrously accomplished perfected persons, the limitless great spirits of the ten directions, and the boundless host all entered the jeweled pearl.

The heavenly beings gazed upward, seeing only a surging radiance entering through the mouth of the pearl. Once within, its whereabouts became unknown; the assembled multitudes dispersed, and the celestial light shone brilliantly, the myriad *qi* purified and serene.

Within the jeweled pearl, the Celestial Worthy expounded the sutra in full. The perfected ones oversaw the deliverance, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration defied description. When the Dharma rites were roughly complete, the hosts of heaven returned to their stations, and in an instant, all fell silent without a trace of sound.

At that time, the heavenly beings who encountered the sutra’s teachings were universally delivered, their karmic knots untied, their evil roots severed. The entire land turned in reverence, all practicing with utmost sincerity. They forgot burdens, forgot existence, forgot transformation, forgot attainment, forgot thoughts, forgot emotions, forgot perception, forgot movement, forgot breath, forgot form. Words held no doctrinal essence; mouths uttered no desires. Compassion and love became uniform, bones of strangers turned kin. Nations were at peace, people prospered, and all rejoiced in great harmony. From the sutra’s first proclamation, the land was guided by the Dao. Those who held sincere devotion, revered and honored it, all attained deliverance across the ages.

The Dao declares: The words spoken by the Celestial Worthy of Original Beginning within the sutra are the inner names of the heavenly Emperors, the hidden rhymes of sound, also the secret taboos of demon kings and the concealed names of the hundred spirits. They are not the common speech of the world but the essential words of the generative Dao-embryo, the refining of the womb’s roots, the severing of evil *qi*, the annihilation of the blood-corpse, and the cultivation of the profoundest truths of the perfected and the ultimate. The lofty sages who have already attained perfection, who comprehend the mysterious and fathom the subtle, can fully grasp its chapters. Reciting it ten times, the hosts of heaven chant from afar, the ten thousand Emperors render homage, rivers and seas fall silent, mountains and peaks conceal their clouds, the sun and moon halt their radiance, the celestial pivots cease turning. All demons bind their forms, ghostly spirits lose their vitality, the dead rise from their corpses, and white bones become living beings.

For the most devoted scholars who recite it ten times, the womb’s roots generate transformation, free from worldly entanglements. Evil impurities wither away, the hundred spirits unite in form, the Five Emperors stand guard, the Three Realms bow in reverence, demonic spirits lose their sight, ghostly malevolence vanishes, and those on the verge of death are delivered, cut off from demise yet restored to life. The reason for this is that while the scholar’s impurities gradually dissipate, their minds have not yet penetrated the profound mystery. They can restrain the ten directions but have not yet governed the celestial administration. Their virtue can subdue earthly deities and bind demonic spirits, yet they only attain deliverance for themselves and cannot universally save all beings. To recite these chapters lightly brings misfortune upon oneself.

Those who honor and revere it will see their households flourish, their generations prosper, bound to good karmic causes, untouched by the ten thousand calamities, with divine luminaries guarding their gates. This sutra is supremely sacred, unmatched in the Jade Capital, delivering countless beings and serving as the foundation of the ten thousand Daoist paths. Its majestic model of virtue is beyond measure.

The Dao declares: Whoever recites this sutra ten times will have all the heavens assemble. The Venerable Elder of the Mysterious Above will dissolve the accumulated blood-stasis and impurities from the adept’s womb since the beginning of their karmic gestation. The Lord of Western Clarity will dissolve the amassed turbid waters and foulness within the womb, the drowned corpses and ghostly filth, the afflictions of the winding springs and frigid pools. If disputes linger in the Water Bureau, with unceasing investigations and annotations, extending to the living, the roots of life and death, the sprouts of disaster and misfortune will never flourish.

The womb’s roots will generate transformation into jade-like nectar, the wondrous countenance of an immortal, naturally attaining the Dao. The seven *po* spirits wander astray, demonic *peng* spirits lie in ambush, external evil ghosts invade, defiling the womb-palace, indulging in nocturnal dreams and revelry with ghosts. The Jade Emperor of the Great Loftiness dispatches the Ninefold Numinous Talismans of Purple Light to the Venerable Elder Han of the Southern Palace, within the Celestial Mechanism Bureau, to oversee the ledgers, examine merits, and verify the generation of the womb’s roots. Evil impurities are severed, and the suffering souls of countless generations of ancestors are all delivered, ascending to the Vermilion Palace. After nine years of refinement, they receive transformation and rebirth, becoming noble persons.

Those who diligently study the supreme sutra, their merits fulfilled and virtues perfected, all attain divine transcendence, ascending to the Golden Gates and roaming the Jade Capital. Scholars of the highest learning who cultivate and recite this sutra are immediately delivered, ascending to the Southern Palace. Worldly adepts who recite it refine the foul impurities of their womb’s roots, transforming their old *qi*, swiftly severing and annihilating them, generating the immortal perfected. Evil souls and impure *po* spirits are cleansed and purified, extending their years and prolonging their lives. Thereafter, they all attain the Dao of corpse-liberation: their ethereal souls temporarily perish, bypassing hell, immediately regaining their forms and roaming the great void. This sutra is subtly wondrous, universally delivering boundless beings. All heavenly beings receive its blessings, its immeasurable fortune bestowing grace upon life and death. Treasured by heaven, it is not transmitted to the lower world. Only the most devoted scholars, offering gold and treasures with sincerity, may swear celestial oaths to transmit it. To leak or slight it lightly brings calamity upon nine generations, consigning them to long servitude under the ghostly officials.

The Five Emperors attend the sutra, with twenty-four Jade Lads and twenty-four Jade Maidens each, safeguarding the sacred texts and protecting the bodies of those who receive the sutra.

The Dao declares: During the long fast of the first month, reciting this sutra, the Azure Emperor Luo Wenying of the Upper Nine Palaces, wielding the talisman of the Azure Palace, opens the adept’s hundred passages, unties karmic knots, and delights the Inner Unity. Purple mist bathes the body, divine light penetrates and illuminates, feathered radiance reflects the mysterious, delivering the souls of past generations from earthly servitude to ascend to the Celestial Mechanism Bureau of the Southern Palace.

During the long fast of the seventh month, reciting this sutra, the White Emperor □ Wen Sheng of the Middle Nine Palaces, wielding the talisman of the Numinous White, generates the transformation of the adept’s womb’s roots, severing worldly causes, halting the cycle of rebirth, swiftly distinguishing the pure from the impure. Filth and grime are cleansed, the body gleams with solar radiance, the Great Simplicity generates the five viscera, the seven clouds enter the mud-pill, and the body attains divine transcendence. The heavens inscribe their names on the Yellow Register and White Slips, erasing death and inscribing life.

During the long fast of the tenth month, reciting this sutra, the Black Emperor Zheng Wentong of the Lower Nine Palaces, wielding the talisman of the Black Emperor, enters the adept’s bladder, annihilating the womb’s corpse, cutting off the hundred impurities, and extinguishing demonic malevolence. The adept’s body radiates the jade-like splendor of the Five Emperors, their face adorned with the luminous countenance of flowing gold. They constantly sleep with the Great Unity, embracing the bright moon, becoming kings, emperors, lords, ministers, fathers, and sons, securing the nation’s destiny, preserving heaven’s longevity, and ensuring their lineage endures unbroken. They will forever be sovereigns, stabilizing their domains, with the people proclaiming great peace.

On the days of the eight solar terms, reciting this sutra, one becomes a Perfected of the Nine Palaces, the Three Origins and Three Palaces, the Twenty-Seven Perfected, the Male Unity and Non-Male, the Female Unity and White Origin. The Five Palaces’ odd and even align, their transformations profound and mysterious, generating and transforming the root of the embryo. Sweeping away and executing the source of evil, conceiving essence and streaming light, a jade infant blooms from the lotus. The Primordial Unity sits upon the altar, with the myriad spirits yielding precedence.

On one’s natal day, reciting this sutra, the twelve great knots, the three hundred and sixty bone joints, the eight barriers and nine palaces, the divine canopy youth, and the inner spirits of the central pool are moved to refinement and transformation, generating and transforming the root of the embryo. Cutting off evil impurities, the body remains uninclined, the hun-soul and spirit purified and upright, the myriad qi enduring forever. Unafflicted by suffering, the body radiates light, attended by the Three Realms, received by the Five Emperors, with the myriad spirits paying homage. One’s name is inscribed in the heavens above, and upon the completion of merit and virtue, one ascends to the Highest Clarity.

The Dao states: On the day of practicing the Dao, one must bathe in fragrant waters, enter the chamber in purification, face east, and knock the teeth thirty-two times, ascending to the thirty-two heavens. Bowing thirty-two times in the heart, close the eyes and silently envision the body seated amidst clouds of azure, yellow, and white qi, both within and without shrouded in mist. Green Dragons, White Tigers, Vermilion Birds, Dark Warriors, lions, and white cranes array to the left and right. The sun and moon illuminate brilliantly, suffusing the chamber with radiance. The Three Divisions and Eight Effulgences, the Twenty-Four Perfected, encircle and guard with solemnity. A circular image arises from the crown, its light illuminating the ten directions—all vividly manifest.

The secret incantation says:
Supreme Mysterious Origin, Most High Dao Lord.
Summon forth from within my body the Three and Five Merit Officials, the left and right attending messengers, the jade lads of incense, the jade maidens of transmission, the Five Emperors’ direct talismans, and the incense officials of the day—thirty-two each—to open and convey my words.
Today is auspicious, a long fast in the pure hall, practicing the supreme sutra to deliver boundless beings.
May what is petitioned ascend directly to the presence of the Most High Primordial Sovereign of the Thirty-Two Heavens.
Conclude, then draw qi thirty-two times and recite the sutra facing east.

*The Supreme Primordial Sutra of Boundless Salvation, Wondrous Scripture of the Highest Grade*
The Primordial opens the boundless, the Numinous Treasure’s original chapter, generating and transforming the root of the embryo, cutting off impure qi.
Ten cycles deliver beings, the hundred spirits stabilize destiny, separation and union occur naturally. The Female Unity transforms the po-soul, the Male Unity transforms the hun-soul.
The Primal Chaos transforms, within it the honored sovereign. Calling forth yang and summoning yin, refining essence within the jade womb.
Ascending and descending the Hall of Light, its brilliance reflecting the radiant heavens. Within, a flowing pearl coalesces, harmonizing the myriad directions.
Purple auroras and white clouds, a jade infant and golden light. Crimson towers and divine pools, gentle winds meandering.
Below lies the Northern Capital, the encampment of the ten thousand ghosts. Green demons and white hags devour the embryo’s spirit.
The red and black dual demons, the foundation of life’s thieves. The Lord Emperor’s talisman commands, executing the blood corpse.
Washing clean the impurities of the embryo, merging with qi, forging the true origin, circulating and transforming the Great Obscurity.
The Upper Palace’s perfect void, the Cavern Chamber’s mysterious elixir.
The luminous youth holds fire, burning away the roots of evil. The graceful maiden hears the flute, dispelling misfortune and harmonizing smoke.
The embryo’s life of the Imperial Perfected is recorded in the Highest Mystery. The numinous palace scatters its radiance, ascending to the exalted throne.
The Terrace of Fragrant Reeds falls silent, the Jade Mountain’s upper capital. Ascending to the utmost, the Great Veil’s Jade Clarity.
Vast as kalpas, seemingly absent yet present. Below, preparing the single body, mastering the seven barriers.
The Three Divisions and Eight Effulgences, the myriad spirits arrayed in ranks. The Three Flowers separate and convene, the Great Existence’s wondrous court.
Golden towers and jade chambers, mysterious brilliance illuminating the numinous. The great distribution of true qi pervades the ten directions.
Within is the spirit of generating and transforming the root of the embryo. Within is the lord of cutting off evil impurities. Within is the lord of harmonizing the hundred spirits. Within is the spirit of untying knots and dispersing joints. Within is the spirit of transforming the embryo and renewing the womb. Within is the South Pole Lord Emperor of Longevity. Within is the East Pole Lord Emperor of Azure Radiance. Within is the Heavenly Mechanism Lord Han the Venerable. Within are the exalted deities of the Southern Upper Office—Controller of Destinies, Recorder of Deeds, Prolonger of Lifespan, Increaser of Years, and Deliverer from Tribulation.
Reviving the decayed and raising the dead, delivering boundless beings. Today, the celestial records are reviewed, the various heavens descend in audience.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly King of Life-Fixing of the East, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly King of Transformation-Feeling of the South, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly King of Embryo-Transformation of the West, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly King of Root-Cutting of the North, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly King of Womb-Renewal of the Northeast, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly King of Knot-Untying of the Southeast, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly King of Joint-Dispersing of the Southwest, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly King of Ultimate Perfection of the Northwest, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly King of Evil-Removing of the Above, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.
The Limitless Flying Heavenly King of Impurity-Cleansing of the Below, Great Sage of Longevity, delivers boundless beings.
The Perfected Flying Heavenly Kings of the Ten Directions, Great Spirits of Longevity and Deliverance, all ride upon jade chariots of threefold effulgent auroras, ten-petaled white clouds, and cinnabar carriages, with feathered canopies and jade wheels, drawn by vermilion phoenixes and five-colored dark dragons. They bear the nine-stepped talismanic banners for summoning spirits and the seven-jointed frost-silk pennants. Ahead, nine phoenixes cry in unison; behind, eight simurghs sing in harmony. Numinous Perfected lead the way, chanting cavernous scriptures. The assembled immortals follow in radiant procession, their whistles and songs resounding. Myriad chariots and ten thousand riders float through the void, their luminous return journey transforming and fixing life.
The Heavenly Mechanism Chancellor, the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace, Han the Controller of Records, the Great Spirit overseeing life—for the adept’s embryo root, generating and transforming the mysterious numen, the Purple Chamber of the Womb Gate.

Within it stands a great spirit, striking jade chimes and ringing bells, casting fiery streaming bells. All defilements and impurities are cleansed, the blood-corpses and Peng specters banished. The twenty-four passes of crimson and black knots are bound, infusing the adept’s life-breath, dispelling all demonic entanglements. Holding registers and grasping ledgers, they assemble before the Celestial Emperor, where each is measured for ascension and the heavens are strictly examined.

A universal proclamation is issued to the Three Realms, the boundless divine lands, the Yellow Springs’ winding courts, the Northern Capital of Fengdu, the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus, the Twelve River Sources. Above, ancestors and progenitors of countless kalpas, all karmic kin, are swiftly absolved of their transgressions; their evil roots are severed and destroyed. They shall not be detained or forced into the throngs of ghosts. By the primordial Mandate of Yuanshi, at the appointed hour they ascend, the embryo root generating transformation, returning from dust to truth. Demonic filth is severed, impurities purged, the hundred spirits summoned and pacified. The seven generations of ancestors disperse their enmities, the Five Emperors oversee the covenant. In the Northern Capital’s icy pools, their forms are reshaped, bones refined into immortality. They pass through no gates, subdue demons, and receive promotion, their ranks recorded in the Southern Palace. The dead souls receive talismans and transform into immortals; those born in the flesh attain liberation and endure through kalpas. Drifting with the eons, they share the heavens’ longevity. Forever delivered from the Three Wretched Paths, the Five Sufferings, and Eight Hardships, they transcend the Three Realms and roam freely in the Shangqing.

In the heavens of Shangqing, the Celestial Emperor Kui Ling presides over the Formless Realm of Brahman conduct.

**Eastern Eight Heavens:**
- The Zhen Tang Hui Tian, where the Emperor’s radiance departs from non-being.
- The Xu Dong Pu Yao Tian, where the Emperor He greets the true and boundless.
- The Yuan Shi Chong Ji Tian, where the Emperor Yuanxu Zichang governs.
- The Hao Jing Huan Zong Tian, where the Emperor Boyun Ziguang shines.
- The Lüe Wu Yan Shen Tian, where the Emperor Zu Siyuezhang rules.
- The Niu Xu Zhao Hu Tian, where the Emperor Zhilu Xidun resides.
- The Miao Gong Bi Wu Tian, where the Emperor Liang Bian Youdu presides.
- The Gu Ling Ding Du Tian, where the Emperor Kang Hua Zhi Yan governs.

**Southern Eight Heavens:**
- The Qiao Fan Li Kong Tian, where the Emperor Bian Wu Yuan Chang transforms.
- The Chi Ming Dian Xian Tian, where the Emperor Jue Xuan Lan Chang perceives.
- The Yuan Shi Jiu You Tian, where the Emperor Ji Du Meng Dou inquires.
- The Ba Ze Hui Hua Tian, where the Emperor Li Ming Zheng Qian rectifies.
- The Tai Su Yi Wei Tian, where the Emperor Kuo Yi Liao Zhen expands.
- The Xu Qian Biao Gu Tian, where the Emperor Yang Lu Guo Bin marks.
- The Dao Biao Zhen Xiang Tian, where the Emperor Lu Xi Lai arrives.
- The Ming Zhuan Yun Bang Tian, where the Emperor Qing Zu Ci Ren revolves.

**Western Eight Heavens:**
- The Long Xuan Tai Shen Tian, where the Emperor Che Liang Ci Di nurtures.
- The Qiu Ding Yang Qi Tian, where the Emperor Yi Qiong Jing Chong harmonizes.
- The Zhao Li Zhi Luo Tian, where the Emperor Jiu Yong Zi Ying governs.
- The Xiao Zhi Gang Yu Tian, where the Emperor Ji Gen Huan Yuan perfects.
- The Dong Hua Bao Yang Tian, where the Emperor Yu Bian Zi Tan presides.
- The Ling Xu Hun Gan Tian, where the Emperor Chan Zhu Ning Fang forms.
- The Jiu Lao Ba Tu Tian, where the Emperor Bi Shan Du Zhen rescues.
- The Liu Yao Jiang Zhang Tian, where the Emperor Jin Guan Zhao Xuan proclaims.

**Northern Eight Heavens:**
- The Geng Yi Huo Di Tian, where the Emperor Qiang Wan Ming Hua strengthens.
- The Yi Bao Ju Zhen Tian, where the Emperor Bai Qi Yin Cheng rests.
- The Gai Ben Li Fu Tian, where the Emperor Zhi Xuan De Rong knows.
- The He Zhen Si Shi Tian, where the Emperor Gu Yuan Yan Sheng rises.
- The Zhu Jing Yu Shen Tian, where the Emperor Jiao Qin Zi Si forges.
- The Bao Ming Yuan Hua Jing Guang Tian, where the Emperor Xiu Long You Xu flourishes.
- The Mang Sun Yu Du Tian, where the Emperor Bing Qi Hu Wan completes.
- The Guan Zhu Ji You Tian, where the Emperor Zheng Di Ji Xian observes.

The Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Emperors—each heaven’s hidden taboos, each heaven’s concealed names, the empty void within the heavens, the spontaneous numinous verses, each heaven’s hidden rhythms, the sounds of the Cavernous Truth. The Venerable of the Cavernous Void, the Spirits of the Cavernous Vision, they subdue great demons and transform divine spirits. The stinking lungs devour thieves, sharing heaven’s life; drinking blood and shaking essence, they lurk in the embryo root, obstructing the Gate of Heavenly Destiny so the immortal path cannot be achieved. Corpse-ghosts alter forms, flying into the Mud Pill. Concealing the womb’s stem, yin constructs external demons, entering the Mysterious Window to disrupt the Celestial Radiance. The Celestial Emperor severs and destroys, the divine swallows the Jade Hall. Nine harmonies and ten unions transform the empty and constant. The profound mysteries of the boundless are too deep to fathom; the divine perfected are scattered to universally deliver heaven and humanity.

Today, rejoicing in receiving deliverance, passing through the heavens’ passes, the knots are untied, the embryo root severed. Flying through the Five Portals, names are recorded in the Supreme Mystery. The Demon Kings oversee and promote, unrestrained at the Heavenly Gates. The Eastern Dipper extends life, the Western Dipper refines the embryo, the Northern Dipper purges impurities, the Southern Dipper transforms the fetus, the Central Dipper blends the Cavernous—one union generates the spirit.

The Azure Emperor commands the returning winds, the White Emperor commands the numinous, the Vermilion Emperor protects the root, the Black Emperor bathes the form, the Yellow Emperor guards the center—no fetal impurities arise.

The Azure Heaven Demon King, Yu Zhu Dong Luo.
The Vermilion Heaven Demon King, Yan Guang Mie Jing.
The White Heaven Demon King, Duan Bao Jiao Zhen.
The Black Heaven Demon King, Fa Xie Ming Shen.
The Yellow Heaven Demon King, Dong Guan Tai Ying.

The Five Emperors’ Great Demons, lords of the myriad spirits. Flying through the Three Realms, they govern the true embryo, expel demons, command the numinous, and open the seven passes. The wondrous transformations flow forth, ascending through the Nine Revolutions. Impurities and stagnations are swept away, bones and flesh fly together. The celestial perfected receive the mandate, summoning blessings and auspices. True merit fills within, divine might expands without. Malevolent omens perish, demonic essences hide. Vast qi entwines and binds the Three Elixirs and Jade Chambers. Together they assist the Celestial Emperor’s transformation, repelling and extinguishing misfortune and decay. The Six Heavens’ great ugliness is shattered and destroyed. Golden light scatters radiance, the jade path intertwines. Seven generations of ancestors are delivered, a hundred wrongs are cast aside. The Three Offices’ black records forever fall from the roots of calamity, no longer concealed—clarity rectifies the primordial mechanism.

A universal proclamation is issued without end; the myriad spirits all return. They roam and feast in the Jade Palace, their ranks arrayed in the Supreme Subtlety. The empty and cavernous Nine Mysteries, the Jade Emperor’s mysterious numen, summon rosy clouds and scatter radiance, embracing the void’s purple mist. Divine maidens descend, dancing as embryonic immortals. The Dao’s root generates transformation, the numinous root knows no bounds. Loftily transcending the Supreme Non-Being, ascending through the heavens above and below—no darkness, no obscurity, no form, no shadow, no limit, no end.

The vast primordial chaos, boundless and lightless, opens with the Crimson Clarity’s chart—its revolutions and deliverances arise naturally. The Primordial Beginning stabilizes and settles, unfolding the Five Scriptures. Crimson writings on jade, the Eight Might’s dragon scripts. They safeguard the kalpas’ course, ensuring heaven’s eternal endurance. The Brahma-qi pervades the cosmos, myriad patterns unfurl. The primal net flows and evolves, the thirty-two heavens, descending to unify all, blending and transforming the Five Spirits. True destiny responds to immortals, the Mystic Record interweaves all. The Nine Bureaus and Six Ministers array themselves upon lotus embryos. The Mystic Unity pervades the soul, straddling the Dipper and the Chief Star. To the left, it supports the Fire King; to the right, it establishes Bo Ying. Sweeping away filth and expelling evil, the Jade Numen opens in four directions. Attaining the Golden Throne’s position, it governs the myriad spirits. The Wheel turns without color, circling the ten directions. Mounting the flying steps, it revolves the Seven Origins. Driving out evil and defilement, it clarifies and expands the celestial net. Filling the seven gates, it irrigates and nourishes the green sprouts. The twenty-four charts wholly gather the true methods. The Eight Radiant Sceneries darkly merge, ascending and descending in the Yellow’s blend. Within lies the Mystic Unity, the Highest Perfected of the Supreme Emperor. Floating upon the great rosy clouds, they chant and intone the cavernous hymns. Golden perfection shines resplendently, its echoes flowing through the cloud camps. Jade tones gather qi, numinous winds assemble mist. The Purple Void flourishes in elegance, aiding and sheltering the myriad immortals. A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions—naturally they become true. Within the true lies the spirit, the Great Lord of Longevity. The Purple Chamber and Azure House, the great gods of flowing bells. Seated and guarding the Hall of Light, they protect the Mystic True, wielding talismans and grasping registers, generating and transforming the embryonic root, severing and removing evil defilement. Entering and exiting the Nine Palaces, within the Eight Sceneries, amid the subtlest realms, they cleanse the Stomach Pool, unblock and regulate the hundred passages, swiftly summoning the myriad spirits. Blending and merging with the Mud-Pill Palace, ten revolutions return the numinous—equal to qi, they ascend as immortals. The immortal Dao values life, immeasurably delivering beings. Above, the eight gates open, the Wheel of Flying Heaven. Sins and blessings, prohibitions and precepts, karmic causes from past lives—universally they receive deliverance. The dead souls gain bodies, their bodies receive life, ascending to be heard by the various heavens. Above the various heavens, each has its gate of life. Within lies the cavernous hymn of chanting, the demon kings’ numinous scriptures, their verses matching the Highest Perfected.

**First: The Desire Realm’s Flying Void’s Sound**
The human path is distant and faint, the immortal Dao vast and boundless.
Ghosts lurk in the embryonic root, where the human gate of life lies.
Causing you, foolish mortals, to not delight in the immortal true.
The empty palace is assailed by evil, foul decay comes to attack.
The lofty and pure numinous clarity, cavernously subtle, aligns with the Great Void.
The precious embryonic root of generation and transformation—may your immortal Dao be accomplished.
Thus, qi fades with the sun, the divine wind rises from Kunlun.
Gazing upon the Jade Perfected in the Great Cavern, purple clouds encircle the Crimson Court.
The Noble Son bestows the numinous talisman, the Supreme Unity bows and attends.
Renouncing this imperial path of defilement, the eight ways naturally part.
Feathered canopies flutter distinctively, the feathered carriage journeys to the Nine Purities.
Bestowing and proclaiming to the flowery heaven’s heroes, the jade writings gleam with numinous scriptures.

**Second: The Form Realm’s Demon King’s Hymn**
Faint and distant, the lofty void, jade towers towering.
The Primordial Beginning’s numinous scriptures universally teach the immortal worthies.
Below, reaching the net’s guiding threads; above, reaching the various heavens.
The immeasurable mysteries all align with my body.
How can evil defilement disturb my embryonic root?
Blood corpses and sunken bones, yin spirits detain souls.
The precious mountain transforms and dissolves—how can it endure alone?
Receiving the numinous talisman in mystery, presenting oneself before the Emperor.
At this moment, joyous—facing and returning to the Jade Infant.
Though the Crimson Clarity has passed, one can still distinguish the true.
My realm lightly tainted, thus I bestow the precious writings.
Dispelling and sweeping away the burdens of vapors, summoning and assembling the hundred spirits.
Refining the embryo and flying as an immortal, receiving the mandate from the Jade Throne.
Purifying defilement and ascending through the void, above becoming the Emperor’s guest.

**Third: The Formless Realm’s Demon King’s Song**
Bones hold the great void, within coils the ancient corpse.
Thus, qi scatters in profusion, withering your numinous fungus.
The womb’s gate is veiled and blocked, the flower of desire spreads in four directions.
Blood sinks into strange patterns, defilement severs the primal mechanism.
I, the Upper King, govern and command the host of spirits.
Holding the jade talisman in my left hand, summoning the heavenly soldiers with my right.
The embryonic root’s accumulated poisons—I cast the flowing bells.
Extending the mandate forever, the myriad evils are destroyed.
The thirty-nine perfected, the Crimson Writings open their radiance.
The Dao’s wondrous mystery—serve this celestial hymn.
Tested without precedent, my Dao flourishes.
Cavernously empty, cavernously non-being, cavernously true, cavernously immortal.
Flying spirits upon jade rosy clouds, ascending chariots through azure mists.

Above these three realms, within the flying void, the demon kings’ songs and sounds match the cavernous hymns. Reciting them a hundred times purifies the embryonic root, and one’s name is recorded in the Southern Palace. Reciting them a thousand times forever severs evil defilement, and the demon kings protect and welcome. Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao, ascending to fly through the great void, transcending the three realms, attaining the rank of Immortal Duke. Hearing the numinous sounds, the demon kings show reverence, commanding and restraining the earthly deities to serve, escort, and welcome. They extract one from the earth’s gates, the five sufferings and eight difficulties. The seven ancestors ascend and migrate, forever departing the ghostly bureaus, refining and delivering in the Vermilion Mound, receiving refinement and rebirth. This is called immeasurable, universally delivering without end.

There are secret celestial writings, revered by all heavens. Revealing and slighting them casts one into hell, bringing calamity upon the seven ancestral grandfathers.

The Dao states: These two hymns are the hidden sounds of the various heavens’ Supreme Emperors and the numinous demon kings. They are all the great Brahma’s words, not the common speech of the world. Their words lack ornate beauty, their melodies lack flowery grace—thus they are called profound and obscure, difficult to fathom in detail. Treasured by heaven, they are secreted in the Purple Tenuity’s Upper Palace of the Mystic Capital. According to the Mystic Regulations, they are transmitted once every forty thousand kalpas. If there is a perfected one bearing gold and treasures with a sincere heart, following the old statutes and pledging allegiance to the Ten Heavens, only then are they conferred.

The Dao states: The people of the world, lacking the utmost karmic affinity from past lives, their consciousness lodged in karmic transformations, their embryonic lives coarse and mortal, their life roots impure—rotting, eroding, and decaying. Through the Dao’s transformation and refinement, wondrously resonating and communicating with the divine, evil demons and foul impurities harm and bore into the joints, forming knots that do not open. This causes the numinous clarity to come and dwell, the Three Perfected to retreat. Those who study together in shared qi must all unite their hearts to cultivate the fast, burn incense in the six periods, and recite the scriptures ten times. Blessings and virtue will descend immediately, dissolving all inauspiciousness.

The scriptures of boundless measure universally deliver the limitless.

The Dao states: Those of shallow learning in the Dao, whose immortal rank remains unfulfilled, when their destined time of passing arrives and their bodies enter the Great Yin, at the moment of their departure, fellow students and perfected ones shall burn incense and recite the scriptures ten times to deliver their corporeal forms according to the proper method. With the embryonic root purified and firm, the soul’s terrace illumined on all four sides, and evil impurities severed, they shall dwell beside immortals and sages. The soul and spirit shall ascend directly to the Southern Palace, and according to the merit of their studies, they shall be reborn after a calculated number of days. Free from confusion in karmic transfer, they shall attain the state of divine immortality.

The Dao states: When the body’s foundation is unstable, illness and injury often arise; embryonic impurities corrode and erode, the face withers, the hair turns white, conception fails, descendants perish young, daily life is beset by misfortune, the Dao’s qi is cut off, the Three Corpses stir, and signs of death and harm appear—all should then undertake the fast, burn incense, and recite the scriptures.
