**The Daoist Path to Liberation and Salvation**

To study the Dao and attain *Degree*[1],
to rescue and enlighten living beings,
to sever and extinguish demonic trials,
all may gain ascent and transcendence.

To elevate the Seven Ancestors,
forever free from dark confinement,
no lingering delay shall be permitted—
they undergo refining in *Zhuling*[2].

Proclaiming to the Northern *Ting*[3],
all spirits heed the call,
the Three Officials and Nine Ministries
present petitions to the Jade Capital.

The Heavenly Great Talisman,
transforming and shifting in mystery,
entwines and flows through all,
ascending and descending, sinking and rising.

Below, it plunges into stagnation and cessation,
above, it clears the boundless expanse,
the Soulwind fans the heavens,
opening the gates to command the celestial.

Heaven above and heaven below,
dark and profound in all directions,
the Flowing Light vast and boundless,
the Great Calamity[4] without form.

Primordial Chaos’s *Qi*[5],
the twin symbols ascending in harmony,
the Mixed Void suspended upright,
preserving the natural flow of transformation.

Bearing mountains to summon dragons,
through countless ages, stretch and unbroken,
circuiting in separation and union,
enveloping all the heavens.

The Jade Chamber’s tranquil command,
five directions marked with crimson script,
wondrous transformations giving birth,
thirty-nine chapters of divine instruction.

Established by the Heavenly Emperor,
ruled by the Dao Lord,
flowing through yin and yang,
governing all spirits.

Seizing and leading all demons,
holding and refining the *Qi*[5],
the Great Range proclaims—
eight *Yuan*[6] fields pour forth essence.

Clarifying the Heavenly Radiance,
faint and profound in mystery,
the Mysterious Light’s Supreme Sovereign,
*Qi*[5] merging with true essence.

Flying Light of the Purple Void,
radiant in the Azure Sky,
spreading luminous clouds through space,
the Heavenly True One dances in opening.

The Jade Chapter refines and purifies,
ninefold spiraling Soulsmoke,
the Mysterious Capital receives the true,
assisting in transforming the Three Realms.

All prepared, all complete,
the Dao merges into the True,
the True within the Most Divine,
the Most Exalted of all Emperors.

Feasting in the Round Hall,
my manifestation in form,
through Dragon and Han ages,
established beyond measure.

The Vermilion Light blazes forth,
all things born and formed,
ascending to the Purple Void,
the calamity’s peak[7]—the Tower of *Xiao Tai*[8].

Within the Luminous Palace,
among the Flowery Gates,
summoning the True Spirits,
universally liberating all beings.

Cleansing filth and stagnation,
unlocking the logic of all barriers,
sevenfold revolving winds,
ascending with *Qi*[5] to the Dao.

The Dao of Immortality endures,
limitless salvation for all,
opening the Eight Gates,
governing the wheel of Heavenly Transformation.

Examining deeds and merits,
guilt and karmic bonds,
universally liberating the Seven Ancestors,
all lost souls,
wandering freely through the ten extremes,
ascending to the Nine Heavens.

Above the Nine Heavens,
each has its sound of life,
with chapters of Mysterious Void and responsive sensation,
the List of Sacred Spirits,
words to the Highest True Ones.

**First Chapter: The Sound of Heavenly Sensation**
The Mysterious Transformation surges boundless,
flowing and coalescing with True Essence.

Founding all the heavens,
giving birth to divine spirits,
vast and vague the Three Realms,
limitless the Heavenly People.

Wicked thoughts sink into evil destinies,
sensation ascends to the highest purity.
Filth and turbidity drown in ruin,
so that your Dao may never be fulfilled.

Not receiving the Chapter of the *Dong Yuan*[9],
how can you cross the Mysterious Ford?
Desires follow their own delight,
pursuing immortality brings much toil.

Entanglements vanish in an instant,
karma exhausted, dissolved to dust.
One enlightenment brings eternal freedom,
through countless ages, eternal preservation.

Devotion pierces the Purple Sky,
far-reaching thoughts reach the Jade Capital.
Divine spirits fly and merge with the Great Void,
harmonizing with the Mysterious in all directions.

**Second Chapter: The True King’s Summoning**
The Jade Script arrayed in the Azure Sky,
the True King descends from the Mysterious Peak.
Swallowing the radiance of sun and moon,
he soars aloft to the Jade Emperor’s Palace.
Wandering freely past the Three Realms,
instantly riding the Soulwind’s swift course.
Within, nurturing the infant Dao in safety,
dwelling in the Origin of the *Boshi*[10].

Clad in gold, adorned with green feathers,
ascending brilliance on purple smoke.
He commissions all the celestial officials,
uniting in reverence for the Emperor’s singular glory.
Below, he surveys the limitless land,
how dusty and chaotic its realms appear.
The Vermilion Seal seizes the Great Demon,
the Yellow Banner inspects the Cloud Camp.
The solemn scriptures hide in the Azure Vault,
universally liberating those who study the True.

The Mysterious Talisman descends through the Three Realms,
all *Qi*[5] harmonized, ascending to immortality.
The Primordial Beginning gathers the hundred spirits,
returning light to my hall.
The Seven Ancestors escape eternal night,
lost souls pass the Five Gates.
With me, they shall forever meet again,
transcending the bonds of the mortal world.

**Third Chapter: The Primordial Emperor’s Summoning of Spirits**
Above the Three Heavens,
the Spirit’s Void is pure and bright.
The Mysterious Vision soars in grandeur,
the calamity’s peak[7]—the Palace of *Ling Gong*[11].
Within dwells the Most Exalted,
refining the Primordial Mechanism.
Commanding all beings,
all *Qi*[5] converges in totality.

Majestic Great *Fan*[12],
the Supreme Spirit of the Great Substance.
The Vermilion Light shines eternally,
the twin symbols split and reveal.
The *Yuce*[13] receive instruction,
divine stages arranged in order.
Ascending to Heaven, flowing through transformation,
enveloping the Springs of the *Quan Tai*[14].

The Eight Powers of the Jade Script,
calming the Five Mountains.
Forever preserved through ages,
so that *Qi*[5] may never falter.
Humans can sense the Mysterious—
enlightened to the Dao, spirits respond.
Cultivating True Virtue, advancing in Immortal Deeds,
all Saints come naturally.

Worldly desires obscure the True Path,
why not dwell in mountain forests?
Here, above the Three Realms,
within the flying void,
the True Immortal’s resonant sound,
harmonizing with the Mysterious Chapters.

Recite it a hundred times,
sensation responds beyond measure.
Recite it a thousand times,
True Spirits descend in answer.
Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao,
Mysterious Saints arrive.
Passing beyond the Three Realms,
ascending to the ranks of the Immortals.

Hearing the Spirit’s sound,
all demons bow in reverence,
commanding the Earth Spirits,
guarding and escorting,
freeing those trapped in the Earth’s womb,
from the Five Sufferings and Eight Difficulties,
the Seven Ancestors ascend in rank,
forever parted from the Ghostly Offices,
lost souls pass *Zhuling*[2],
refined and reborn anew.

This is called the Limitless,
universal salvation without end.
There are secret writings of the Upper Heaven,
all heavens hold them in reverence.
Revealing them carelessly leads to hell’s fall,
bringing calamity to the Seven Ancestors.

The Dao says: These two chapters are the hidden words
of the Heavenly Emperor and the Most True Immortal King,
all spoken by the Great *Fan*[12].
They are not the ordinary language of the world.
Without melodious grace,
without ornate curves,
they are called Mysterious and Profound,
difficult to trace in detail.
Treasure of the Upper Heaven,
hidden in the Godly Sky’s Jade-Pure Palace,
in the Eastern Treasure House of *Xuanke*[15].
According to the Mysterious Art, it is transmitted below.

If there is a Perfect One,
carrying gold and precious offerings in sincerity,
following the text to pledge allegiance to the Jade-Pure,
then it shall be bestowed upon them.

The Dao says:
To summon the True is to cease calamities,
to call the Spirits is to remove misfortunes.
Peace for the nation, tranquility for the home,
all arise from Mysterious Sensation.

If the age’s calamity nears its end,
the Three Lights[16] wane and wax,
divine humans rest in peace,
the unlearned suffer greatly,
then all who share the same breath
must unite in heart to observe fasts,
offer incense at the six times,
turn the scriptures tenfold,
and the High Saints shall descend,
dispelling all inauspiciousness.

Infinite are the scriptures, boundless the deliverance.

The Dao speaks: The shallow in learning, their Dao yet unfulfilled,
or those whose celestial rank is not yet complete,
when their fate nears its end,
and their body passes through the Great Darkness,
at the hour of departure,
all who share the same breath—both learned and Perfect Ones—
must for them offer incense,
recite the scriptures tenfold,
and invoke the Five Spirits as children,
with the vitality of the newborn,
refining their mortal form according to the method,
so that their soul and spirit ascend to the Southern Palace,
and, in accordance with their merit,
they shall be reborn on the appointed day.

The turning wheel of doubt shall cease,
and they shall attain the Dao of Immortality.

The Dao speaks: When the celestial cycle of Heaven and Earth draws to its close,
the stars and constellations stray from their courses,
the sun and moon lose their radiance,
and yin and yang fall out of harmony,
when calamities befall the realm,
the populace suffers death and injury,
and when teachers and friends pass away,
all must observe fasts,
offer incense and recite scriptures.

Then the Eight Celestial Lords shall command,
each dispatching a flying immortal,
to dispel and extinguish the malevolent *qi*,
bringing peace to the land and well-being to its people,
and those already transformed shall ascend beyond.

The fasts and recitations of scriptures,
their virtue and power are profound indeed.
Above, they avert celestial calamities,
and safeguard the Emperor.
Below, they ward off poisonous harm,
and deliver the populace.

In proportion to their deeds,
they move the True Spirits with their sincerity,
thus it is said: Infinite,
and boundless deliverance for Heaven and humankind.

The Dao speaks: All who possess this scripture,
may for Heaven and Earth, the Imperial Sovereigns, and the populace,
perform these deeds of virtue.
On the day of invocation and descent,
when they take the vow to observe fasts and burn incense,
and recite the scriptures tenfold,
all True Spirits shall record their names,
and the Ten Thousand Saints shall come in person.
They shall distinguish the Perfect Ones,
and surely attain the rank of minister in the Jade-Pure Palace of the Imperial Sovereigns.

The celestial bureaucracy shall record their merits and demerits,
without the slightest loss,
and the officials of the Southern Palace
shall also recommend their worth,
so that those who attain the Dao
shall come to understand the profound truths.

In the midst of the Eight Celestial Realms,
the Great Brahman[17] utters the Infinite Sound—
The Dao-Lord composed,
The Primordial One descended the True,
The Mysterious Art invokes the Spirits—
The Central Chapter of the Eastern Treasure.

The battle arrays of the Linfight Lodge,
the mournful horns echo through the void.
The Emperor’s bright edicts are solemnly proclaimed,
His august light shines in the realm of the *Huatu*.

In the *Bingchun* shrine of refined texts,
the rites are regulated, their blessings self-fulfilled.
The *Miezhu* ceases, the Universal is stilled,
The *Zhenghe* reigns with compassionate governance.

The *Changji* flourishes, the *Chu* neighbors align,
The *Duixi* draws forth the Primordial Symbol.
The *Zhajian* meets its appointed time,
Ascending to the *Zhenlu* of the Zhangxu.

The *Jiahuazhou* left of the *Zhou*,
The *Zhuanchen* turns to the *Yan* master.
The *Yaotai* vanishes, the *Yiwang* flees,
The *Zitian* splits the *Pifen* in violet skies.

**Southern Eight Celestial Realms**
The *Zhuguang* contains the Dao,
The *Xizhen* flows through the *Liuliang*.
Already it penetrates the *Wen*,
The *Fuxi* gazes upon the *Bodang*.
The *Lugan* traces the *Jifei*,
The *Yunya* presses the *Ningzhang*.
Having obtained the *Youjie*,
The *Mengduo* seizes the *Yuanxiang*.
The *Zhuling* registers the *Lantai*,
The *Shunshi* governs the granaries.
The *Fexian* gains the *Dudu*,
The *Pingtai* shines with *Yongguang*.
The *Chihuazui* radiates imperial splendor,
The *Guangsu* awakens the *Yibing*.
The *Wangzhi* knows no inquiry,
The *Yijing* entrusts to *Weichang*.

**Western Eight Celestial Realms**
The *Duncha* issues the *Yaochi*,
The *Mingmei* blocks the *Zhuishuai*.
The *Shimie* lodges in the *Fangbi*,
The *Dingju* settles what may return.
The *Chengxuan* does not reach its peak,
The *Yumimi* ascends with the *Tihui*.
The *Mengge* sings the *Kunyuan*,
The *Zhuxu* treads the *Shujie*.
The *Gaohua* bends the *Yancong*,
The *Gongshi* opens the *Tuokai*.
The *Huilu* glows with *Zhanjian*,
The *Yuecha* guards the *Shoutai*.
The *Zhizhen* presses toward the *Bomiqui*,
The *Jupao* wears the *Bimi*.
The *Shanzhen* smooths the *Yilang*,
The *Dao*’s brilliance attains the *Yingfei*.

**Northern Eight Celestial Realms**
The *Qinghou* scrutinizes the *Jian*,
The *Zhubing* holds the *Yuanhuan*.
The *Luxi* rises to gaze upon the *Xiji*,
The *Limo* records the *Bojian*.
The *Wenhua* empowers the *Quanyang*,
The *Yexie* embraces the *Yingpan*.
The *Lishen* inspects the *Mihuo*,
The *Huahun* transforms the *Yunlun*.
The *Jiaodao* arrives at the *Yigǔ*,
The *Luoyi* weaves the *Róngmín*.
The *Minghe* harmonizes with *Qingbi*,
The *Zizhen* descends the *Xianlín*.
The *Zhanyi* expands in the *Mòyǐ*,
The *Huizhang* extends to the *Yánmián*.
The *Weitou* casts its pattern into the *Xuéhù*,
The *Bihu* flees with lightness.

The **Dao** speaks: Within these Celestial Realms, the **Great Brahman**’s hidden discourse,
With boundless sounds—
The ancient texts engraved at **Qingcheng Palace’s** Jade Terrace Hall,
Commanding the descent of the **High True** of heaven and earth,
The **profound and manifest** **Dao**’s spirit,
Aiding the **Great Transformation**,
To proclaim the **Sangha** of the Three Realms*—
Each character vast and long, a span of ten feet.

The **Celestial True Person** once inscribed these words,
As the **orthodox sound**.
Those who know this sound and can fast while reciting it—
All the heavens command the **Qi-Transforming Immortal Kings**,
To descend and observe their form,
To record their meritorious deeds,
And ascend to report to the heavens,
Where ten thousand spirits pay homage,
The **Earthly Deities** attend the gates,
The **Great Punishment** **Mara Kings**,
Protect and recommend them to ascend in flight,
The **Dao**’s blessings fully obtained,
Roaming the Three Realms,
Ascending to the **Golden Gate**.

This sound cleaves through all obstacles,
Dispels all calamities,
Transcends all barriers,
Accomplishes all undertakings—
The **natural sound** of the **Celestial True Person**.
Thus, reciting it brings the **flight of the heavens** beneath observation,
The **Supreme Deity**’s distant chant,
Ten thousand spirits in homage,
The Three Realms attending the **veranda**,
The **multitude of deities** bowing in reverence,
The **ghostly spirits** vanishing of their own accord,
The **pearls and jades** resounding,
The **Ten Directions** purified in solemnity,
The **rivers and seas** in tranquil silence,
The **mountains and peaks** swallowing mist,
All **sentient beings** subdued in awe,
Summoning the **host of immortals**,
Heaven without **malleable vapors***,
Earth without **deity-dust**,
The **dark wisdom** piercingly clear,
The **boundless virtue** of the **profound Dao**.

The **High Supreme** **Immortal Kings** descend the **True Person’s** talisman.

**Scroll Twenty-Four: The Chapter of Divine Transformations and Qi Manifestations**

The **Dao** speaks: In days of yore, within the **Taisu Heaven**, the radiant **Huaojing** soared through the lofty void, its brilliance illuminating the earth, as it received from the **Primordial Origin** the **Supreme Transformation of Divine Manifestations and Qi Changes** in its boundless, highest grade.

When the **Primordial Origin Celestial Venerable** was to expound this **Sutra**, He circled ten times, summoning the **Ten Directions**, and then took His seat. The **Heavenly True Gods**, the **Supreme Saints**, the **Mystic Conduct Immortals**, and the countless **unfathomable multitudes** arrived, riding the void.

With **Azure Emptiness** fanning clouds, **Phoenix Chariots** and **Jade Wheels**, **Green Canopies** and **Flowery Palanquins**, they descended in cascading hues, their eight luminous glories converging in splendor, piercingly illuminating the **Great Void**. For three days and three nights, the **Celestial Jade Talismans** and **Treasure Lights** of all the **Heavens** shone upon the **Celestial Capital’s** palaces and gates, the **Forest of Spirits’** grand platforms and observatories, revealing their towering majesty with unobstructed clarity. The **Effulgent Wheels** blazed forth, and the entire land—its earth, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees—lay flattened in equal splendor, all transformed into **auspicious jade**, devoid of distinction.

The **Multitude of True Ones** attended at His seat, while the **Primordial Origin Celestial Venerable** ascended in **Void-Floating Divine Transformation**, His **Qi-Essence** forming a **Treasure Hall** above the **Ten Thousand Spirits**.

When the **Sutra** was expounded once, the **Great Saints of the Heavens** simultaneously proclaimed its excellence. At that time, all men and women within the realm came to know that **transformation and change** stemmed from **Divine Qi**, even unto the **Purple Palaces of the Celestial City**, the **Jade Pavilions and Yellow Halls**, where the **Ten Thousand Saints and True Ones** were all **Divine Manifestations in True Form**, **Qi-Transformed Realms**.

When the **Sutra** was expounded twice, **Golden Dragons** exhaled clouds, and **Treasure Platforms** rose with a thousand pillars.
When the **Sutra** was expounded thrice, **Imperial Mists** dispersed into threads, forming characters in the void.
When the **Sutra** was expounded four times, a **Great Sound** trembled softly, and **Sweet Dew** spread in harmony.
When the **Sutra** was expounded five times, the earth bore **Treasure Lotuses**, their ten thousand leaves congealing into light.
When the **Sutra** was expounded six times, the **Jade Capital and Golden Gates** shone with **Divine Radiance**, piercing the void.
When the **Sutra** was expounded seven times, the **Ten Thousand Spirits** merged as one, emerging from and dissolving into nothingness.
When the **Sutra** was expounded eight times, **Divine Qi** subtly transformed, its essence unified as fine as an **autumn hair**.
When the **Sutra** was expounded nine times, the **Underworlds** were annihilated, and **dead souls** received rebirth.
When the **Sutra** was expounded ten times, **Divine Transformations and Qi Manifestations** penetrated the **Great Darkness**, and at that moment, all men and women within the realm—whether male or female—were moved to devotion, all receiving protection and attaining **Longevity**.

The **Dao** speaks: When the **Sutra** was expounded once, the **Supreme Yang Great God of the Boundless Extremes** from the **East**, with His **unfathomable multitudes**, floated through the void and arrived.
When the **Sutra** was expounded twice, the **Flame Radiance Great God of the Boundless Extremes** from the **South**, with His **unfathomable multitudes**, floated through the void and arrived.
When the **Sutra** was expounded thrice, the **Lesser Yin Great God of the Boundless Extremes** from the **West**, with His **unfathomable multitudes**, floated through the void and arrived.
When the **Sutra** was expounded four times, the **Taiyi Great God of the Boundless Extremes** from the **North**, with His **unfathomable multitudes**, floated through the void and arrived.
When the **Sutra** was expounded five times, the **Preserver-Guardian Great God of the Boundless Extremes** from the **Northeast**, with His **unfathomable multitudes**, floated through the void and arrived.
When the **Sutra** was expounded six times, the **Nurturing-Life Great God of the Boundless Extremes** from the **Southeast**, with His **unfathomable multitudes**, floated through the void and arrived.
When the **Sutra** was expounded seven times, the **Penetrating-Thickness Great God of the Boundless Extremes** from the **Southwest**, with His **unfathomable multitudes**, floated through the void and arrived.
When the **Sutra** was expounded eight times, the **Circulating-Pass Great God of the Boundless Extremes** from the **Northwest**, with His **unfathomable multitudes**, floated through the void and arrived.
When the **Sutra** was expounded nine times, the **Master-of-Transformation Great God of the Boundless Extremes** from **Above**, with His **unfathomable multitudes**, floated through the void and arrived.
When the **Sutra** was expounded ten times, the **Bearer-of-Transformation Great God of the Boundless Extremes** from **Beneath**, with His **unfathomable multitudes**, floated through the void and arrived.

When the tenfold circuit was complete, the **Ten-Directional Boundless Transformation Great Gods** all arrived simultaneously. All men and women within the realm were moved to devotion and reverence, though they had not yet heard the **Law**, each intuiting the **High True Ones of the Three Realms and Ten Directions**, even unto the **palaces and observatories**, not a single name that did not arise from **Divine Transformation and Qi Manifestation**.

Now, beholding the **Celestial Venerable True Kings** proclaiming the **True Dao** and performing its transformations, their **Sage Forms** radiant, their light piercing through the **Boundless Heavens and Worlds**, each realm within them contains a **Celestial Venerable True King** expounding the **Great Law**.

Thus it is known that **Divine Transformations are boundless**, and **Qi Manifestations are without limit**. Our present forms—**color, appearance, roots, dust, motion, sound, and shadow**—are all products of **Divine Transformation and Qi Manifestation**.

The arriving multitudes, numbering in the **hundreds of millions**, with their **unfathomable crowds**, caused half the land to sink unevenly, a phenomenon beyond restraint.

Thus, the **Primordial Origin** manifested the **Way of Divine Qi Transformations**, rising from His **Void-Seated Meditation**, leaping into the void, ascending to heights surpassing **Eon-Peaks**, above the **Floating Clouds and Soaring Scenery**, a thousand *zhang* from the earth.

The **Primordial Origin** ascended, and the **Heavenly True Gods**, the **Supreme Saints**, the **Mystic Conduct Immortals**, and the **Ten-Directional Boundless Transformation Great Gods**, with their **unfathomable multitudes**, all entered the **Floating Scenery**.

The **Heavenly Folk** gazed upward and saw only a **booming surge** descending from the void. Once they entered the void, their whereabouts became unknown. The **People of the Realm** dispersed, and the land returned to its even, unbroken state, no longer tilted or sunken.

The **Primordial Origin** then, from above the **Floating Clouds and Scenery**, completed the expounding of the **Sutra**. The **Multitude of True Ones** oversaw the **Deliverance**, transmitting it to us. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words.

The **Law’s rites** were now fully known. The **Heavens’ multitudes** returned to their stations, and in a flash, all traces of sound vanished.

At that time, those who encountered the **Sutra’s Law** were universally delivered, their **original nature** preserved, none suffering harm. The land’s people, their hearts inclined in reverence, all extinguished their **deluded minds**.

It was **utterly wondrous, utterly profound**, **utterly penetrating, utterly true**, **utterly transformative, utterly functional**, **utterly variable, utterly comprehensive**, **utterly divine, utterly spiritual**.

With hearts awakened to the **Supreme Dao**, they harmonized with **Void-Clarity**, aligned with **Compassionate Love**, and though their **bones differed**, they became **kin in essence**. The realm was **secure and prosperous**, its people **joyful and at peace**, the **Sutra’s teachings** spreading throughout the land.

Those who harbored **sincere aspiration**, who **revered and worshipped**, all attained **deliverance for the world**.

The **Dao** speaks: All that the **Primordial Origin Celestial Venerable** spoke within the **Sutra** were the **inner names** of the **Heavens’ Divine Manifestations and Qi Transformations**, the **hidden, resonant sounds**, also the **True Kings’ inner taboos**, the **concealed names** of the **hundred spirits’ transformations**—not the common speech of the world.

「The **Supreme Sage** having already become a **True Person**, their **Divine Qi** harmonized with **Void-Clarity**.

They could fully grasp its **chapter**, and when reciting it ten times, the **Heavens’ Divine Manifestations** would respond from afar, their **Divine Qi** resonating in accord. **Qi Transformations** would emerge swiftly—rivers, seas, mountains, and valleys would vanish or endure in an instant.

The **Sutra of the Celestial Sphere** (璇玑) would circulate in **hidden and revealed** ways, and when the **Divine Manifestations** transformed, all **True Kings** would gather in attendance. Then, **group demons** would be bound in form, and **ghostly essences** would perish utterly. Where the **Qi** transformed, **corpses** would rise from the dead, and **white bones** would become living beings.

Those who mastered this **Supreme Learning**, reciting it ten times, would manifest the **Five Celestial Emperors** through **Divine Qi**, transform the **Three Realms** through **Qi Transformations**, cause **demonic essences** to lose their sight, and **ghostly spirits** to perish utterly. They would rescue the dying, severing death to grant rebirth.

This is why: **Daoists** with **impure qi** yet to be refined, whose **essence** has not yet pierced **Void-Clarity**, when they summoned and controlled the **Ten Directions**, their **power** had not yet subdued the **Heavens’ governance**. Though they could **subdue and bind** the **Earthly Deities** (地祇) and **demonic spirits**, they could only **ward off death**, not truly **revive the dead**.

To **lightly recite** this **chapter**, one’s body would suffer **misfortune**.

To **offer reverence and nourishment** with **supreme devotion**, their **doorways** would flourish, their **prosperity** enduring through generations, their **affinity with goodness** unbroken, and **ten thousand calamities** would not touch them. The **Divine Manifestations** would guard their gates.

This **Sutra** is **most noble and wondrous**, unmatched in the **Celestial Capital** (玉京), its capacity to **deliver beings** boundless. It stands as the **source of all Dao**.

The **Venerable Great Brahman** (大梵) is **mighty**, their **virtue** surpassing measure.

The **Dao** speaks: For those who recite this **Sutra** ten times, all the **Heavens’ Divine Manifestations** will gather, **Divine Qi** will resonate, and **Qi Transformations** will unfold naturally—**unlike the intentions of worldly beings**, they will conjure myriad **phantasmal illusions**. When **Divine Qi** and **Qi Transformations** merge, **no Dao** will fail to arise. **Ten thousand generations** of **ancestral spirits** and **suffering souls**, all will receive **deliverance**, ascending to the **Palace of Darkness** (昧宫), enduring **nine celestial years** of **transformation**, reborn to become **noble beings**. Those who love this **Supreme Sutra**, their **merits fulfilled**, their **virtue/power** aligned with **Qi Transformations**, will all attain **Divine Immortality**, ascending to the **Golden Gate** (金阙) and feasting in the **Celestial Capital** (玉京).

**Daoists** who study and recite this **Sutra** will refine and transform their **Divine Qi**. All will receive **deliverance**, ascending to the **Southern Palace** (南宫).

Worldly beings who recite it will not have the **Divine Qi** depart their bodies. If the **True Qi** is **nurtured internally**, they will **extend their lifespan**, ultimately attaining the **Dao of Corporeal Dissolution** (尸解), where their **soul-essence** temporarily vanishes, bypassing the **Earthly Realms**, and they will **return to their original form**, roaming the **Great Void**.

This **Sutra** is **subtle yet profound**, its **deliverance** limitless. All **Heavenly and Human Beings** will rejoice in its blessings.

**Infinite blessings** bestow upon **life and death**, granted by the **Heavens**. It is a treasure **not transmitted to the mortal world**.

Only **Supreme Adepts**, bearing **golden treasures** and **sincere devotion**, who **pledge to the Heavens** and pass it on, may do so. If one **carelessly leaks** or **disrespects** this **Sutra**, **misfortune** will descend upon **nine generations of ancestors**, and they will be **endlessly enslaved** by **Ghostly Officials**.

The **Five Emperors** and their **attendants of jade** (玉童) and **maiden of jade** (玉女), twenty-four each, will **guard and shield** the **Divine Texts**, protecting those who receive the **Sutra**.

The **Dao** speaks: On the **first month’s long fast**, reciting and singing this **Sutra**, the **Divine Manifestations** will arise, **Qi Transformations** will flourish, **inner visions** will radiate in splendor. **Jade clouds** will form a **palace**, benefiting the **departed souls of past ages**. They will **sever Earthly bonds**, **deliver to the Southern Palace**.

On the **seventh month’s long fast**, reciting and singing this **Sutra**, the **Divine Manifestations** will manifest the **Dao-body**, **inner visions** will grow clear and pure. The **Divine Child** will take its **rightful place**, and one’s body will attain **Divine Immortality**. The **Heavens’ records** will be inscribed upon **yellow talismans** and **white tablets**, **severing death** to grant **rebirth**.

On the **tenth month’s long fast**, reciting and singing this **Sutra**, the **Divine Manifestations** will become **deep and secret**, **Qi Transformations** will bring **tranquility**. **Inner visions** will align with **Divine Immortality**, feasting in the **Jade Flower Palace** (玉华). As the **Emperor of the Realm**, they will **secure and pacify** the **nation’s destiny**, **preserve the Heavens’ longevity**, ensuring it **never ceases**, and **always rule as sovereign**. Their people will **proclaim the Great Peace**.

On the **eight festivals**, reciting and singing this **Sutra**, the **Divine Manifestations** will follow **natural order**, **Qi Transformations** will adhere to the **Sutra’s path**, and **inner visions** will harmonize. **Golden pools** and **jade mist** will be attained, becoming a **True Person of the Nine Palaces** (九宫真人).

On their **birthday**, reciting and singing this **Sutra**, the **Divine Manifestations** will manifest the **Nine Palaces**, **Qi Transformations** will align with the **Nine Truths** (九真), merging with **natural unity** and **allying with the Celestial Emperors**. Their **soul-essence** will become **serene and upright**, their **Qi** enduring eternally, **free from suffering**. The **Three Realms** will serve as **guardians**, the **Five Emperors** will **escort them**, and **ten thousand spirits** will **pay homage**. Their names will be **recorded in Heaven**, their **merits fulfilled**, their **virtue/power** attained—**ascending to the Upper Purity** (上清).

The **Dao** speaks: On the **day of practice**, one must **bathe in fragrant water**, **fast and purify** within the **chamber**, facing **east**, **striking their teeth** thirty-two times to **hear the Thirty-two Heavens**, and **bowing their heart** thirty-two times for the **Thirty-two Offenses**. With **eyes closed**, they must **quietly contemplate** their body seated amid **three-colored clouds** of **green, purple, and white**—**inner and outer darkness** enveloping them. There will appear **Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Azure Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane**, arrayed to the left and right, with **sun and moon** illuminating the scene. The **chamber** will be **pierced by radiant light**, a **circular halo** forming at their neck, its glow reaching **all directions**.

Next, they should contemplate the **Great Void**, where **True Qi** and **Divine Manifestations** reside, as **purple light clouds** slowly drift to cover their head. The **clouds** will fill the **chamber**, and within, **ten thousand spirits** will stand solemnly, like the **pupils in one’s eyes**, facing them.

Next, they should contemplate the **nine orifices** of their body, where **white smoke-clouds** spiral outward, **right-turning** to encircle their **body’s form** within a **boundless expanse**. **Purple clouds** and **white smoke**, stretching across **Heaven and Earth**.

After a long while, they will perceive their **liver** containing a **palace of jade**, where a **Divine Person** sits, clad in **garments of Green Dragon embroidered with flowered feathers**, blowing **wind from their mouth** to stir the **clouds**. The **clouds** will spiral **leftward**, completing **eighty-one cycles**.

Then, they will see the **ten thousand spirits** that came from the **Void**, along with the **hundred spirits** within their own body, **united as one**, resembling a **child**. Dressed in **embroidered silk and brocade**, they will sit before them, listening as they recite the **Sutra**.

When finished, the **spirits** will return into their **mouth**, ascending to the **upper dan** (泥丸), facing **outward by day** and **inward by night**. This is the **Dao of Divine Manifestations and Qi Transformations**, so **distinct and clear**.

The **Secret Incantation** reads:

*"**Supreme Mysterious Origin**, **Most High Dao Lord**,
Summon forth from my **body** the **Thirty-five Functionaries** (功曹), **attendants** and **messengers** of both left and right, **serving with jade incense**, **transmitting words through jade maidens**, **Five Emperors’ direct talismans**, **directing the sun’s officials** (香官), each **thirty-six in number**, to **open the gates** for what is spoken.

Today is a **day of auspicious joy**,
A **long fast** in a **pure hall**,
Practicing the **Supreme Sutra**,
With **infinite capacity** to **deliver beings.**"*

I pray that what is summoned may ascend directly to the **Supreme Mysterious Origin** (无上玄元), the **Most High Dao Lord** (太上道君), the **Most Venerable Supreme Emperor of Yuan Shi** (元始上帝至尊几) before me.

Upon completion, I **draw forth the Thirty-two Qi Passages** (炁三十二过), facing east to recite the **Sutra**.

**First Dao: The Mysterious God’s Transformation—The Sound of Flying Through the Void**
Formless, nameless,
Standing alone in the Great Emptiness.
Merging with the myriad spirits,
Transformations endless.
All things rely upon it,
The divine movement ever fluid.
Giving birth to Heaven and Earth,
Seizing the primordial chaos.
Boundless dispersion,
Visible yet leaving no trace.
Spontaneously responsive—
This is called the **Supreme Spirit**.

In the Three Realms, the Celestial Worthies,
In the Cloud Palaces of the Heavens,
Divine transformations flow through all—
All arise from the Dao-body.
This Dao is profound and secret;
To attain it is to be true.
Singing this peerless hymn,
The Heaven within the Mysterious.
Within it, the Creative Force,
The cataclysmic Supreme Spirit.
Converging at the cosmic pivot,
Turning the Sovereign’s ultimate wheel.
The eternal *qi* endures—
Guard it and let it never cease.

---

**Second Dao: The Mysterious Qi Transforms—The True King’s Sacred Verse**
The void is true *qi*;
True *qi* is like the void.
I distinguish it—
With the Dao, they are the same.
Things obtain it and live;
Abandon it and perish.
What gives life?
The *qi* and the Spirit.
All the Heavens, the gods and immortals,
Even the Six Paths, the malevolent ghosts and spirits—
The palaces of Heaven and Earth,
Breathing, bending, stretching—
All are transformations of *qi*,
None escape this wheel.
If the Spirit guards the *qi*,
For ten thousand kalpas it shall not falter.
When the Three Realms crumble,
I alone endure.
The Nine Heavens halt their course,
The Spirit ascends to **Taiwei**.
Clasping the **Yin** at the peak of **Yujing**,
Reflecting the golden radiance in the west.
I wish to join the void’s sacred song,
Riding the dragon to till the jade sprig.

---

**Third Dao: The Spirit’s Transformation—The True King’s Hymn of Qi**
Bowing at the eastern mulberry grove,
Gazing upward to the lofty terrace.
Below, the towering halls,
The **Effulgent Sea** and the **Cruel Ghosts**.
A hundred million *li* away—
Soaring, the mirror opens.
Ah, this Great Dao’s realm,
Compressed into the palm’s measure.
The Spirit transforms, the *qi* materializes—
Mystery and form hover in interplay.
Reining the jade dragon’s chariot,
Dashing through the **Supreme Clarity** below.
No embroidered robes of the world’s delusion,
Not like the common illusions of men.
The Spirit transforms, the *qi* materializes—
A thousand kalpas pass without decay.
Laugh at you, O Valley Immortals,
Your petty distinctions of blue and yellow.
Hoary-haired yet achieving nothing,
Blame the Dao for being ill-omened.
You obscure the essence of Spirit and *qi*,
Not knowing the Dao’s true method.
Singing this **Supreme Scripture**,
Serene and reverent before the True King.
This, above the Three Realms,
In the flying void’s midst,
The True King’s sacred hymn—
Its sound harmonizes with the hollow verses.
Recite it a hundred times—
Your name is inscribed in the **Southern Palace**.
Recite it a thousand times—
The True King himself comes to welcome you.
Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao,
Ascending to the void, surpassing the Three Realms,
Ranked among the **Xian Gong**.
Hearing the sacred sound,
The True King’s form appears in reverence,
Commanding the earthly deities,
Guarding and escorting,
Drawing you forth from the earthly gate,
Freeing you from the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships,
The Seven Ancestors ascending,
Forever parted from the earthly officials,
The soul crossing **Zhu Ling**,
Receiving refinement and rebirth.
This is called **Limitless Transmission**,
Universally liberating the boundless.

There is a secret celestial text,
Revered by all the Heavens.
To reveal or slight it leads to the **Hell of Falling**,
Bringing calamity to the Seven Ancestral Worthies.
The Dao says:
These two chapters are the hidden sounds of the Heavenly Sovereigns
And the Most Sacred True King,
Divine transformations, the *qi* materializing—
Fathomless, beyond naming.
They are the words of **Mahāvairocana**,
Not the common speech of the world.
Without melodic grace,
Without ornate tunes,
Thus called **Profound and Mysterious**,
Difficult to trace.
Treasured by the Heavens,
Secreted in the **Eastern Scripture Hall of the Jade Clarity Sovereign of the Divine Vastness**,
Destined to be revealed in the **Year of the Dragon Horse**.
If a perfected one brings gold and jade with a sincere heart,
Following the ancient format to pledge at the **Jade Bureau**,
Then it shall be granted.

The Dao says:
If the Spirit does not transform,
If the *qi* does not materialize,
Then Heaven and Earth’s revolutions will falter,
The sun and moon, the Five Stars will wane and wax erratically,
The most sacred gods and worthies will decline,
And the shallow scholars will fall ill.
When such calamities arise,
All who share the same *qi* must unite in fasting,
Burning incense at the six times,
Turning the sutra ten times.
Blessings and virtues will descend,
Dissolving all ill omens.
Limitless scriptures,
Universally liberating the boundless.

The Dao says:
The shallow scholars, their Dao still shallow,
Their immortal rank not yet complete,
Their fate approaching extinction,
Their bodies passing through **Taiyin**,
At the critical moment,
The perfected among them shall perform the rites for them—
Burning incense, reciting the sutra ten times,
So that their Spirit may transform into an immortal,
Their *qi* materialize into the True,
And their corpse be liberated according to the method,
Their soul and Spirit ascending directly to the **Southern Palace**,
Their rebirth determined by their merit,
Day by day they shall attain new life.
The wheel turns without confusion—
Thus one attains godhood.

The Dao says:
The Spirit’s transformation, the *qi*’s materialization—
The Spirit and *qi* can transform and materialize things,
But it is not the Spirit and *qi* themselves that transform.
The Spirit and *qi* are mighty and unyielding;
They do not transform of their own accord.
When they are made to transform,
It is the Spirit and *qi* that act—
Not the transformation of the Spirit and *qi* itself.
When the Spirit and *qi* are discordant,
They cannot transform,
Bringing disaster to all things.
Thus it is said:
When Heaven and Earth’s revolutions end,
When stars and constellations err,
When the sun and moon lose their light,
When the four seasons falter,
When yin and yang are unbalanced,
When droughts and floods, wars, and plagues spread,
When the people perish in masses,
When teachers and friends meet untimely ends—
All must fast, burn incense, and recite the sutras.
Fasting and recitation are of great merit.
Above, they dispel celestial calamities,
Protecting and stabilizing the imperial land;
Below, they avert poison and harm,
Liberating the people.
Life and death depend upon it—
Their blessings are boundless.
Thus it is called **Limitless Transmission**,
Universally liberating gods and humans.

The Dao says:
All who possess this scripture
Can, for the Heavenly Sovereign and the people,
Perform these meritorious deeds.
On days of calamity,
With a sincere heart, fast and burn incense,
Recite the sutra ten times.
The Spirit and *qi* shall transform,
Turning misfortune into blessing.
The Heavens shall record your name,
Ten thousand spirits shall attend you.
The perfected on the right shall acknowledge you,
And you shall be worthy to serve as a minister of the **True King’s Jade Bureau**.
The **Jade Clarity True King** shall also recommend you,
And those who attain the Dao shall truly comprehend these profound words.

**The Dao’s Words:**
These hidden sounds of the Great Brahman within the Eight Heavens—
Limitless in their resonance—
Were once inscribed on the **Xiaotai**’s **Tian Shou** and **Yu Heng** above.
Through the transformation of Spirit and materialization of *qi*,
They rectify the boundless, limitless worlds of all Heavens,
The Three Primordials and True Emperors,

Knowing them and refining them,
The Spirit and *qi* remain forever.
When great calamities arise and small ones bring death,

Those who know these sounds

Ascending to the **Golden Gate**.

These sounds break all barriers,
Ward off all calamities,
Cross all thresholds,
Accomplish all things—
The natural sounds of the **Tian Zhen**.

All living souls tremble in awe,
Summoning the assembly of immortals,
The Heavens are free of impurities,
The Earth of demonic dust,
The **Minghui** is illuminated,
The **Great Compassion** is profound.

**The *Zhifu Dan Guang* Scroll**

The **Dao** speaks: In days past, within the **Zhi Xiao** Heaven, the **Dan Jing** revealed the **Pure and True Great Primordial Radiance** soil. There, the **Primordial Beginning** received the **Limitless Degree *Zhifu Dan Guang*** Scripture and bestowed upon the **Supreme Primordial Deities** the **Red Talisman of Primordial Radiance**.

When the **Primordial Beginning** Heavenly Venerable was to proclaim this **Sutra**, He circled ten times, summoning the **Ten Directions**, and then ascended to His seat. The **Heavenly True Great Deities**—the **Red Spirit Sage**, the **Three Qi Heavenly Lords**, the **Nine Immortals of Primordial Radiance**, the **Supreme High Venerables**, the **True Persons of Marvelous Practice**—along with countless **unrestricted** spirits, arrived riding the void.

With **jewel-embroidered wheels** flying and **feathered canopies** interweaving, the **Great Azure** ascended in crystalline splendor, while **Eight Pure** lights streamed forth. The **Polar Axis** and the **Pearl’s Position** shone radiant, illuminating the **Primordial Radiance**. For five days and five nights, across the **Three Pure** and **Four Boundaries**, the **Primordial Beginning** traversed all heavens, reaching the **Upper Great Luo** and descending to the **Yellow Gate**. At each stop, the **Red Talisman of Primordial Radiance** opened the **Eon of Flying Azure**, scattering **Dan Xia** light to purify the **Eight Gates**. All lands, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees within a realm became level, with no high or low—all soil transformed into **veined jade**, its luster solid and translucent, its hue unchanging.

The **Heavenly True Deities** gathered in attendance, while the **Primordial Beginning** Heavenly Venerable paused His carriage atop the **Nine Dragons of Solar Emulation**, the **Golden Chariot of Ten Thousand Transformations**. When He proclaimed the **Sutra** once, the **Great Saints of All Heavens** simultaneously praised its excellence. At that time, all men and women of the realm gazed upward, listening to the **Holy Teachings** and silently contemplating the **Deep Mysteries**.

When He proclaimed the **Sutra** twice, celestial light emanated internally, illuminating the dark and obscure. When He proclaimed it thrice, **divine qi** merged with the **Primordial Radiance**, and all phenomena generated **dew**. When He proclaimed it four times, **emptiness and clarity** expanded boundlessly, revealing the **Ten Directions**. When He proclaimed it five times, the **Red Talisman of Primordial Radiance** manifested within His body. When He proclaimed it six times, **Dao and Life** converged, and all sickness and calamity were dispelled. When He proclaimed it seven times, the **Northern Tang** dark domain answered in submission, its disturbances ceasing. When He proclaimed it eight times, **Golden Tablets** recorded His merits, **Jade Talismans** sealed His deeds, the **Three Officials** announced His command, and His form ascended as a **flying immortal**. When He proclaimed it nine times, **Law’s Dew** and **Jewel-like Essence** nourished all things. When He proclaimed it ten times, the **Ten Directions and Three Realms**, the **Limitless Mysteries**, and all **Limitless Beings** wandered free from suffering.

At that time, all men and women of the realm were moved to devotion, receiving His protection and attaining eternal life. The **Dao** speaks: When the **Primordial Beginning** Heavenly Venerable proclaimed the **Sutra** once, the **Great Deity of Limitless Birth** from the **East of the Limitless** arrived with countless **unrestricted** spirits, floating through the void. When He proclaimed it twice, the **Great Deity of Limitless Depth** from the **South of the Limitless** arrived with countless **unrestricted** spirits, floating through the void. **Chapter on Illuminating the Body and Penetrating the Qi**

**The Dao speaks thus:**

In days of yore, within the **Great Cinnabar Heaven** (*Taidan Tian*), the **Crimson Clouds** congealed upon the **Vermilion Expanse**, casting radiance in the **Red Light World** (*Zixiang Jihui Shijie*), I received the **Limitless Transformation**—the **Supreme Illumination of the Body and Penetration of the Qi**—from the **Original Beginning** (*Yuan Shi*) **Heavenly Sovereign**.

When the **Original Beginning** **Heavenly Sovereign** was to expound this **Scripture**, he declared:

*"I am the progenitor of Heaven and Earth,
the precursor of all **Qi**,
the origin of the Three Treasures’ **Heavenly Lords** after the **Great Transformation**.
The Dao’s essence divides into three:
Within the **Great Void**, the **Mixed Yellow**, **Pure and Empty**, and **Cinnabar Radiance**,

transmitting the **Great Pattern** (*Dafan*), having already perfected **nine hundred ninety-nine billion nine hundred ninety-nine million nine thousand nine hundred nine** wondrous breaths of **Qi** (*Miaoxi*).
The **Qi** divides across three eons,
transforming limitless beings.

I, of old, had already illuminated this Dao.
Now I command the **Most High Lord Lao**,
within the **Great Cinnabar Heaven**,
to reveal the **Hidden Secrets** for all beings,
and enlighten **Heavenly and Human** alike.
I have already unfolded the **Eons of All Heavens**,
illuminating the **Essentials of the Dao**,
the **Three Talents and Five Phases** (*San Cai Wuxing*),
and the **Mystic Extremes of Yin and Yang** (*Yinyang Xuanji*),
to achieve **Illumination of the Body and Penetration of the Qi**.
Finally, I decree that the **Most High Lord Lao** should proclaim the **Hidden Marvels**,
so that all beings may awaken to the Dao and attain **Comprehensive Understanding**.

Having formed this resolve,
the **Most High Lord Lao** dwells in the **Great Illumination Hall** (*Daguangming Dian*) of the **Supreme Purity Supreme Extremity Palace** (*Ta Qing Tai Ji Gong*).

*"Your servant obeys the secret decree,
ascending to the **Law Seat** (*Fazuo*)—

witnessing the **Four Assemblies** (*Sizhong*) and **Ten Directions** encircling him,
faces north and pays homage to the **Great Holy Jade Capital Sovereign** (*Yujing Dasheng Yuan Shi Tian Zun*),
the **Supreme Purity Purple Cloud Most High Jade Throne Great Dao Sovereign** (*Shang Qing Zixia Taishang Yucheng Daodao Jun*).

He then takes the **Azure Rainbow and Flowing Clouds** (*Bingni Liuyun*) with **Yellow Threads and Ten Thousand Flowers** (*Huanglu Wan Hua*) **mantle** (*Zhe*),
