and strokes the **Vermilion Expanse’s Golden Illumination Hall** (*Hongxiao Jin Guang Ming Ji*).

The Most High Lord Lao again addressed the assembly:

*"The Dao emerges as Spirit, and Spirit transforms as qi.
This qi—before Heaven and Earth, before yin and yang—is the true primordial source of all transformations, the subtle manifestation of the Dao.
It is neither form nor color, neither being nor non-being, not bound by yin and yang, nor confined to the Five Phases.
It can generate and transform, form and solidify—this is the divine function of the Dao.

Thus, it is as firm as metal and stone,
as pure as ice and jade,
as vast as the Void Space,
as enduring as the ancient past.
Within, it condenses into the utmost essence,
forming the chaotic unity of the undifferentiated.
Below, it extends to all living things—
this is the origin of qi, what is called the *yīnyūn huǎnghū*—
the subtle, indistinct breath.

When qi manifests in form,
its substance is molded by the Great Primordial.
It becomes the wondrous foundation of Heaven and Earth,
and is named *One Qi*.
Thus there is the True One, the Mysterious One, and the Supreme One—
also called the Three Primordial Qi.

From the establishment of the Jade Capital
down to the Gate of the Springs,
all celestial beings, ghosts, gods, and humans
are all born from it,
all generated by the Dao without distinction.
High and low, good and evil,
strong and weak, firm and brittle—
all receive their nature spontaneously,
without contrivance.

When the Three Realms are complete,
and divine spirits take their posts,
with rulers exalted and ministers lowly,
then they govern the transformations,
determine life and death,
raise the wise and humble the foolish,
establish high and low—
then the Dao has its most sacred Spirit,
Heaven its impartial Emperor.
The Three Enclosures and starry hosts,
the Eight Divine Officials,
enact their decrees,
recording human deeds and omissions without fail.
Even the slightest transgression—
no blade of grass or grain of millet escapes.

Thus, first clarify the body to penetrate the qi.
For the Dao is without form,
virtue has form,
illumination is the luminous body,
the Mysterious is the dark body,
yang is the moving body,
yin is the still body,
the True is the celestial body,
the perverse is the ghostly body.
Once the bodies are distinguished,
then the qi is penetrated to receive life.

Without form, it is penetrated by boundless qi;
with form, by primordial qi;
luminous body, by pure qi;
dark body, by turbid qi;
moving body, by dragon qi;
still body, by constant qi;
celestial body, by numinous qi;
ghostly body, by anomalous qi.
When the luminous body penetrates the qi,
the divisions are clear and fixed,
and the great transformations are established.
The governance of the Three Powers is fulfilled,
and the work of the Dao is complete—
transcending the Three Realms,
the deeds of the Highly True are accomplished.

One may observe the records of good and evil,
the principles of reward and retribution,
the great illumination of Heaven, humans, ghosts, and gods,
the countless billions in the Ten Directions,
spreading far and teaching widely,
freeing beings from the wheel of existence,
achieving the Dao of the Celestial Way,
effortless longevity—
all in harmony with the Great Void.

The Most High Lord Lao’s teaching is now complete.
The assembled True Ones, overseeing the transmission,
entrust it to me.
At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words.

The ritual observances were fully attended,
the celestial hosts returned to their stations,
and in an instant, all sound ceased.

At that time, all Heavenly and Human beings
encountered the sacred teaching,
universally receiving salvation,
completing their natural years without harm.
The land was tilted in reverence,
all cultivating benevolent hearts.

They understood the correspondence of cause and effect,
the connection of karma and retribution,
the response of sensation and fruit,
the law and its teaching,
the precepts and the body.

Their words aligned with the Supreme Dao,
their actions harmonized with Heaven’s intent,
their minds unified in compassion,
and those of differing natures became kin.

The nation was secure, the people prosperous,
rejoicing in great peace.
The teaching began to spread,
and the entire land was governed by the Dao.

Those with sincere aspiration,
who revered and followed with ritual,
all attained liberation in this world.

The Dao proclaims:
All the names spoken in this scripture by the Most High Lord Lao
are the inner names of the Celestial Emperors,
hidden and resonant sounds,
also the taboo names of the demon kings,
the secret names of all spirits—
not the common words of the world.

The Most High Sage has already become a True Person,
penetrating the Mysterious Body,
with true qi permeating the form.
Those who fully comprehend its chapters,
reciting them ten times,
will have divine light radiant within,
demons and ghosts blinded,
their adornments and talismans withering,
their celestial globes dimmed,
plagues and calamities cut off,
ghosts and spirits subdued,
the dead revived, bones made flesh.

Scholars who recite it ten times
will be remotely observed by the Most High,
their names recorded in the Three Registries.
Demonic forces will perish,
the stagnant and dim will ascend,
the dying will be saved,
the severed will live again.
This is because scholars have not yet penetrated the Great Mysterious,
still laboring to clarify the body’s principles,
their impure qi not yet exhausted,
still bound by human constraints.
They summon the authority of the Ten Directions,
but their might does not yet govern Heaven’s decrees.
Their virtue can subdue earthly spirits,
bind demonic forces—
yet they can only repel death,
not restore life.

Lightly reciting this chapter brings misfortune upon oneself.

To venerate and honor it,
to establish it at the gate—
generations will flourish,
all calamities averted,
divine spirits guarding the door.

This scripture is most exalted,
unmatched in the Jade Capital,
its salvation beyond measure.
It is the source of all Daoist paths,
a towering and vast framework,
its virtue beyond measure.

The Dao proclaims:
For those who recite this scripture ten times,
all the Celestial Worthies will gather,
their bodies pure, their minds clear,
their obscuring veils dissolved,
their qi and spirit unified,
their inner light bright and flowing.
Countless ancestral spirits,
suffering in darkness,
will all receive salvation,
ascending to the Vermilion Palace,
their term fixed at nine years,
transformed and reborn,
becoming noble beings.
Those who love this scripture and fulfill its practice,
their merits complete, their virtue fulfilled,
will all become Celestial Worthies,
ascending to the Golden Gate,
feasting in the Jade Capital.

Scholars who study and recite this scripture
will immediately receive salvation,
ascending to the Southern Palace,
their sincere recitation resonating with the numinous,
their luminous body unobscured,
their spiritual qi permeating the form—
naturally refined,
attaining the Hall of Flowing Fire,
their faces radiating jade brilliance,
their inner chambers filled with vermilion script.

Mortals who recite it
will accumulate life-giving qi,
their corpses dissolving of their own accord,
their blood flowing as pure essence,
their marrow filling with white fluid—
thus extending their years and strengthening their vitality.
All will attain the Dao of the Emptied Corpse,
their spirits temporarily extinguished,
avoiding the torments of the underworld,
and immediately returning to their forms,
wandering the Great Void.

This scripture is supremely subtle,
its salvation boundless."*

All beings of heaven and earth,
none but receive blessings.
Limitless virtues bestowed,
mercy granted through life and death,
treasured by the Celestial,
never passed to the lower worlds.

The worthy bear the golden treasure with sincere hearts,
pledging to the Celestial and transmitting it.
Lightly revealing or carelessly neglecting it
brings calamity upon the Nine Ancestors,
endless service to the ghostly officials.

Attended by the Five Emperors,
with twenty-four jade boys and girls each,
guarding the divine scriptures,
protecting those who receive the scripture in their forms.

The Dao speaks:
In the first month, observe prolonged fasting,
recite and chant this scripture,
to illuminate the form of all beings as they receive life,
the transformations of Daoist immortals, spirits, and ghosts,
all originating from the boundless void.

Establish form according to the Dao,
draw upon qi for practical use,
employ spirit to awaken wisdom,
use clarity for insight—
refining yin and yang, water and fire,
to transmute and achieve authenticity.

The forms of all beings,
Daoist immortals, spirits, and ghosts,
though similar in transformation,
vary in the qi they channel.
Their divine communications are subtle and profound,
each distinct in their ways,
manifesting or concealing themselves,
revealing the Dao through mysterious insight.
For the departed souls of past ages,
they sever the underworld’s grasp,
ascending to the Southern Palace.

In the seventh month, observe prolonged fasting,
recite and chant this scripture,
to illuminate the form of all beings as they complete their transformations,
the methods of Daoist immortals, spirits, and ghosts to extinguish their yin—
all originating from qi permeating the essence,
refining with the fire of darkness,
establishing firmness through constancy,
relying on spirit for change,
using purity for wisdom,
embracing dryness in their nature,
moonlight cleansing and purifying,
to transmute and achieve authenticity.
The forms of all beings,
Daoist immortals, spirits, and ghosts,
though similar in transformation,
vary in the qi they channel.
Their divine communications run in hidden cycles,
each distinct in their ways,
severing ties and transcending the mundane,
the path of seclusion and vastness,
revealing through secret insight.
The body attains Daoist immortality,
recorded in the heavenly registers,
with yellow talismans and white tablets,
erasing death and ascending to rebirth.

In the tenth month, observe prolonged fasting,
recite and chant this scripture,
to illuminate the form of all beings as they renew their vital breath,
the methods of Daoist immortals, spirits, and ghosts to return to the origin—
all originating from the unity of the primal void,
establishing form through vital breath,
darkness permeating the qi,
success achieved through dual refinement,
sensing life through fluids,
nourishing with pure essence,
concealing to generate clarity,
using stillness for transformation.
With frost and dew of the void,
refining to achieve authenticity.
The forms of all beings,
Daoist immortals, spirits, and ghosts,
though similar in transformation,
vary in the qi they channel.
Their spirits move in silent observation,
each distinct in their ways,
the path of liberation and lofty ascent,
revealing through hidden insight.
For kings and emperors,
their ministers and families,
they bring stability to the realm,
preserve the Celestial’s longevity,
ensuring unbroken succession,
always ruling as sovereigns,
bringing peace to their lands,
where the people praise the Great Harmony.

On the eight seasonal days,
chant this scripture,
as the eight winds conceal the body,
qi channels through the eight directions,
the eight scenes gather in truth,
the mud pellet clears its brilliance,
and one becomes a True Person of the Nine Palaces.

On the day of one’s birth,
chant this scripture,
as omens reveal the body,
qi enters the form.

The virtuous become sages,
mortal bones achieve authenticity,
spirits purified and upright,
vital qi everlasting,
free from suffering,
the body radiant with light,
three realms attending and guarding,
the Five Emperors overseeing their welcome,
ten thousand spirits paying homage,
their names recorded in heaven,
their merits fulfilled and virtues complete,
ascending to the Upper Clarity.

The Dao speaks:
On days of practice,
all must bathe in fragrant water,
fast and enter the chamber,
facing east,
knocking teeth thirty-two times,
ascending to hear the Thirty-two Heavens,
mentally bowing thirty-two times,
eyes closed,
quietly contemplating oneself seated amid the three-colored clouds of blue, yellow, and white,
inner and outer vast and dark.
To the east is the Wooden Primordial True Person,
to the south is the Flame-Elephant True Person,
to the west is the Golden Elixir True Person,
to the north is the Water-Elephant True Person,
above is the Mysterious Primordial True Person,
attended and observed by lions and white cranes,
arrayed on either side,
sun and moon casting radiant light,
illuminating the chamber,
a round symbol forming on the neck,
its glow reflecting in all ten directions—
thus clearly revealed.

The secret incantation states:
*Supreme Primal Dao,*
*Highest Celestial Sovereign,*
*summon forth from my body the Thirty-five Officers of the Five Stars,*
*left and right officials and messengers,*
*attended by fragrant jade boys,*
*transmitted by jade girls,*
*the Five Emperors’ direct talismans,*
*the direct day’s fragrant officials,*
*each thirty-two in number,*
*opening the gates to their words.*

Today is a day of auspicious joy,
of prolonged fasting and pure halls,
of practicing this supreme scripture,
granting limitless salvation to beings.

May those summoned ascend directly,
attending the Supreme Thirty-two Heavens,
before the august throne of the Primordial Emperor,
the Most Venerable and Highest.

Finished,
draw in the breath thirty-two times,
facing east to chant the scripture.

The Heavenly True Person says:
This scripture was spoken by the Divine Treasure Sovereign
in place of the Celestial Emperor of the Void,
thus also reaching the Primordial Emperor of the Beginning.
The Preserver of Life from the Great Polarity’s Original Transformation
composed the preface.

The True Person is a minister of the Highest Celestial Sovereign of the Remnant Heaven,
thus also called the Dao’s words.

**Primordial Emperor’s Supreme Scripture of Limitless Salvation**
**Primordial Primordial Scripture of the Mysterious Treasure of the Spirit,**
Illuminating the form, channeling the qi,
the void’s profound and supreme scripture.

The Celestial Polarity grants salvation,
the profound and mysterious treasure of history,
its talismans responding naturally,
mixing with the jade scriptures.

The True Person of Dragon Tranquility,
the boundless void of the Supreme Polarity,
the flowing forms of the empty symbol,
the limitless vastness of the void.

Rooted in the Ten Thousand Heavens,
the pure qi of the Great Chaos,
the Great Primordial’s divided sources,
ascending and descending in flight.

Enveloping and intertwining,
dual brilliance revealed,
the Celestial One unites with the Daoist,
the void’s supreme overseer.
The lofty and pure transformations unfold,
the radiant and vast mysteries begin,
the origin of divine spirits,
the essence of transformation.

The Primordial Emperor of the Jade Extremes,
the celestial threads of the Purple Mists,
crystal-clear and dazzling,
the flying wheel holding the knot.

Counting the degrees of the vermilion light,
ascending to the Upper Clarity’s peaks,
the Great Harmony of the Yellow Palace,
the vast banquet of the Later Sage.
The Three True Ones’ transformed halls,
governing below at Kunqiu,
the jade terrace’s gentle winds,
dwelling in the Celestial Capital,
teaching all ten directions.

Within are the spirits of the Primordial Emperor’s Great Range,
within are the lords overseeing celestial transformations,
within are the great gods dancing in the swirling waters,
within are the True Persons of the Supreme Micro and Harmonizing Mysteries,
within are the Great True Ones of the Phoenix Terrace and Crimson Gate,
the One in Femininity, the Jade Examination, the Pure and Subtle.

The shared luminosity of the True Form,
boundless in guiding all beings,
today penetrating the cosmic qi—
all the heavens gather at the hall’s threshold.

**The Eight Deities of the Boundless East:**
The God-King of the Eight Scenes, the Eternal Saint of Infinite Guidance.
**The Eight Deities of the Boundless South:**
The God-King of Radiant Clarity, the Eternal Saint of Infinite Guidance.
**The Eight Deities of the Boundless West:**
The God-King of Subduing Demons, the Eternal Saint of Infinite Guidance.
**The Eight Deities of the Boundless North:**
The God-King of the Alchemical Pearl, the Eternal Saint of Infinite Guidance.
**The Eight Deities of the Boundless Northeast:**
The God-King of the Cloud Palace, the Eternal Saint of Infinite Guidance.
**The Eight Deities of the Boundless Southeast:**
The God-King of Transformations, the Eternal Saint of Infinite Guidance.
**The Eight Deities of the Boundless Southwest:**
The God-King of Soul Flight, the Eternal Saint of Infinite Guidance.
**The Eight Deities of the Boundless Northwest:**
The God-King of the Three Pure Ones, the Eternal Saint of Infinite Guidance.
**The Eight Deities of the Boundless Above:**
The God-King of the Jade Void, the Eternal Saint of Infinite Guidance.
**The Eight Deities of the Boundless Below:**
The God-King of Separation and Union, the Eternal Saint of Infinite Guidance.

The Ten-Directional God-Kings of the Void and True Form,
the Great God of Piercing Heaven and Penetrating Qi,
ascending on radiant currents,
in the phoenix chariot and jade palanquin,
beneath the flower-canopied vermilion carriage,
drawn by divine tigers, fierce beasts, and spotted unicorns,
bearing the seven-true axes of the Mysterious Dao,
the crimson flags of the Three Pure Ones,
before them the sacred seal of the Primordial Yang,
behind them the soul-summoning trustworthy banners—
the myriad celestial sages of the Supreme Micro,
soaring through the void, stepping on empty space,
the Five Assistants clearing the path,
the Three Officials winging the chariot,
ten thousand chariots and myriad cavalry,
floating through the sky, their light returning in splendor,
overseeing the True Ones, guiding all beings.

The Supreme Micro’s jade ministers,
the Purple Celestial Sovereign,
the Primordial Yang’s Great God of Purity,
the Mysterious and Marvelous Great God.

Holding the birth-seal in hand,
they come to the Imperial Court,
wherever enlightenment is opened,
summoning all spirits.

Proclaiming to the Three Realms,
the Six Extremes and Eight Dark Abysses,
the vast flying roundel of the crimson mists,
the cold peaks and vermilion gates—
the sacred knots of all spirits,
the sun-valley’s hidden springs,
the Great Clarity’s boundless eon,
the dragon-stables turned into pools.

The tortoise-city’s jade gates,
the floating luminaries of the star-mechanisms,
the Three Primordial Lodges,
the Heavenly Constitutions of the Nine Palaces,
the Twenty-Seven Palaces,
recording primordial merit,
holding the grasp of life and transformation,
examining the registers of the Underworld.

The True Light spreads abroad.
Below, it uplifts guilty souls,
resting the toiling ghost-officials,
halting the retribution of karma.
Grievances and enmities are reconciled.
Following the cosmic flow, eternal existence,
through the turning of causes and conditions,
ascending to the Vermilion Mound.

Forever severing the suffering of clinging desire,
soaring in high freedom,
refined in the Supreme Azure.
The Supreme Azure Heaven—
the Heavenly Emperor’s Awakening,
the realm of formlessness, the Brahman’s conduct.

**The Eight Heavens of the East:**
The Heaven of Fulfilled Aspiration—Emperor Zǔyāng Wēizhēn.
The Heaven of Day’s Reception—Emperor Biàn Chóngzhì.
The Heaven of Splendor’s Display—Emperor Yǎo Liángmíng.
The Heaven of Banishing Falsehood—Emperor Shí Wánfú.
The Heaven of Mysterious Clarity—Emperor Jì Zhēngōng.
The Heaven of Boundless Brilliance—Emperor Hú Chuānxīmíng.
The Heaven of Supreme Truth—Emperor Zhāng Píhuàjū.
The Heaven of Inviting the Mysterious—Emperor Yě Chāngyàoxū.

**The Eight Heavens of the South:**
The Heaven of Beneficent Determination—Emperor Jǐng Chāngzǔmíng.
The Heaven of Han’s Governance—Emperor Méng Yuánpíng.
The Heaven of the Jade Observation—Emperor Zhào Língjīxū.
The Heaven of Joyous Crimson—Emperor Què Duānyóuqú.
The Heaven of the Descending Chariot—Emperor Dù Yóulùyīn.
The Heaven of Serene Brilliance—Emperor Qì Chéngzhuānfú.
The Heaven of the Great Sovereign’s Nurturing—Emperor Kǒng Zūnshēng.
The Heaven of Azure Brilliance’s Aid—Emperor Dòng Juéling.

**The Eight Heavens of the West:**
The Heaven of the Youthful Marvel—Emperor Tú Bīnliáng.
The Heaven of the Ascended Mysterious—Emperor Qiú Zhōu Jiǔwáng.
The Heaven of the Crimson Thunder’s Summoning—Emperor Huǒ Tí Chǔjī.
The Heaven of the Illuminating Light—Emperor Jǐng Míngshānshī.
The Heaven of the Bright Doctrine—Emperor Zhào Yì Bìngtáng.
The Heaven of the Great Symbol’s Foundation—Emperor Yù Liàn Yǎnlùn.
The Heaven of the Void’s Residence—Emperor Yuè Lóu Fúguāng.
The Heaven of the Loaded Brahman—Emperor Yǐn Tí Bùyán.

**The Eight Heavens of the North:**
The Heaven of the Eastern Well’s Piercing—Emperor Běi Huá Cūmí.
The Heaven of the Profound Void—Emperor Zhuāng Jié Dúrú.
The Heaven of the Descending Blade’s Harmony—Emperor Dòu Yǒng Cíyún.
The Heaven of the Mysterious Square’s Rectitude—Emperor Lóng Jīng Máhuì.
The Heaven of the Passing Azure—Emperor Yù Gōng Qiánzūn.
The Heaven of the Extreme’s Expansion—Emperor Dòng Shén Bāwēi.
The Heaven of the Returning Circulation—Emperor Huáng Zhū Jǐngbiāo.
The Heaven of the Wise Transformation—Emperor Xiè Dēng Yìcháng.

The Thirty-Two Heavens,
the Thirty-Two Emperors,
the hidden names of the heavens,
the hidden titles of the heavens.
The central void of the heavens,
naturally the sacred script,
the hidden rhymes of the heavens,
the sounds of the central heaven.

The central sovereign,
the central deity,
the central great demon,
the central spirit.

The Nine Flowers and Ten Crystals,
reveling in the dense single,
the marvelous records of life,
the high secrets of the sacred mountain.

The mystic waves surge,
turning the celestial gates.
Today the twin wheels converge,
the great celebration of causes and conditions,
requesting the removal of old stagnations,
the True Ones descending with the elixir,
all evils forever erased,
the transformed scene soaring as immortals,
the upper spirits overseeing,
all ascending to the Imperial Chariot.

Thursday proclaims might,
Tuesday enforces governance,
Metal leaps to inspect,
Water’s day issues decrees,
Saturday’s four foundations hold fast,
all wielding the sacred commands.

Jǔmáng governs birth,
Sùshōu presides over transformation,
Xuánmíng seals concealment,
Zhùróng’s flow performs,
Hòutǔ resides centrally,
holding the grand rituals.

The Azure Spirit’s Elder,
establishing heaven’s opening.
The Vermilion Spirit’s True Elder,
inspecting the cosmic registers.
The Luminous Spirit’s Sovereign Elder,
commanding slaughter and punishment.
The Profound Spirit’s Elder,
broadly bestowing sacred grace.
The Mysterious Spirit’s Primordial Elder,
enthroned at the Golden Gate.

The Five Elder Emperors,
where all gods converge,
soaring through the Three Realms,
upholding the orthodox primordial mechanism.

Bearing banners and standards,
wandering the Supreme Micro,
their titles manifest,
their teachings widely applied.
Above, heaven slays the wicked,
clearing and destroying,
the Heavenly Sovereign receives the harmonious,
annihilating demons and calamities.

The stone-light shines in exchange,
the arrayed fires surge forth,
the Flame Region gathers essence,
the Ox Lord drives the winds.

The frosty night’s clouded encampment,
the pure caverns of the Yin Palace—
who dares harbor perverse transformations,
blocking the lofty True Ones?

The Great Officer of the Azure Mists,
clearly demonstrates the sacred codes,
the bitter blades of the Springs and Sands,
pursuing without cease.

The Windblades bind and escort,
cleansing the demonic armies,
a hundred evils return to orthodoxy,
the Imperial Way flourishes eternally.

A grand petition to the Great Luo,
shared merit with the Purple Court,
the radiant Phoenix Calendar,
the Nine Qi flowing in harmony.

A universal proclamation to the Ten Directions,
limitless awe-inspiring spirits,
the laws inscribed and registered,
the Three Celestial Cycles preserved in peace.

The Great Edict of the Vermilion Flower,
dividing transformations and migrations,
the Kunqiu’s calamitous blade,
the flying mists dispersing.

Above, the Eight Extremes are opened,
below, the Nine Abysses are arrayed,
the Round Net of Wind turns,
giving birth to all the heavens.

Heaven above and earth below,
mysteriously merged in deep obscurity,
the boundless Hongmeng,
the Primordial Extremity without form.

The vast framework and grand range,
from the profound void comes sound,
the Red Elephant and Yellow Square,
measuring the eons naturally.

The Primordial Origin spreads forth,
the celestial radiance ascends in script,
the Golden Talismans and Simple Chapters,
the Eight Scenes in jade script.

Summoning all demons,
preserving the celestial roots,
the Pure Qi ascends,
forming the Pure Capital’s structure.

The Great Harmony’s transformation unfolds,
the Phoenix True Ones’ jade scriptures,
the secrets of the Xiao Tai compiled,
broadly circulating the Void.

The Purple Micro’s Eight Convergences,
the Primordial Elements’ pearl-threads,
the Yang Radiance summoning spirits,
limitless flying immortals.

Assembling at the Supreme Clarity,
the Qi merging with the High Mysterious,
within the Mysterious, the Jade True Ones,
the Supreme Ultimate’s High Emperor.

Drifting through the Cavernous Mists,
chanting in the Bright Hall,
the Three Capons flourishing in darkness,
radiant in the Vermilion Chamber.

The Jade Chapters transform into Qi,
the Vermilion Characters ascend as light,
the eternal Crystal Eon,
securely preserving longevity.

Ten thousand harmonies, ten thousand unifications,
naturally becoming True,
within the True lies the Spirit,
the Three Heavenly Great Lords.

The Jade Emptiness’s Supreme Deity,
the Yellow Old Master,
the Longevity Lawmaster,
the Great Cavern’s High Venerable.

Holding the Talismans and Scriptures,
saving and guiding the celestial folk,
dwelling above in Xu Yan,
feasting in the Jade Capital.

Within the Void of Nonbeing,
in the Hollow of Emptiness,
below, the Divine Continent is anchored,
the Five Sacred Mountains named.

The Six Non-Forms contend,
revolving at the Heavenly Pass,
not daring to slacken,
the Three Hua’s decrees proclaimed.

The Imperial Way opens life,
limitless salvation for all,
ascending the Eight Luo,
governing heaven’s vast threads.

The Nine-Light Most Holy,
mutually rejoicing in causes,
demonic deceits forever cease,
the orthodox teaching widely proclaimed.

Flowing through ten thousand transformations,
registered in the Three Heavens,
above the Three Heavens,
each opens the Gate of Birth.

The Central Song of Enlightenment,
the Chapter of Unified Bodies,
piercing the Qi’s sacred verses,
words attuned to the High True Ones.

---
**First Chapter: The Mysterious and Boundless, Generating the Vital Qi’s Sound**
Double Brightness first divides,
opening the Heavenly Pass.

The vast Dao’s realm resounds,
the Primordial Origin exalted above.

The Jade Rigidity spans the void,
wheeling through the Four Emptinesses.

The Idle Luo’s Treasure Hall,
deeply concealing the Dragon Chapters.

The Tiger Mountain and Sea’s Promontory,
unfolds the Heavenly Ruling Map.

The High Mysterious descends Qi,
all receive the True Talismans.

Circulating the Eight Substances,
soaring and floating aloft.

The *Great Cavern Chapter of the Upper Clarity*,
the Thirty-Nine Imperial Scriptures.

The Dao Lord receives the Law’s words,
the Vermilion Mists sealing the Pure Capital.

The Imperial Dao now complete,
the True Texts must be broadly spread.

Universally saving those who seek the Dao,
ascending gods to the Supreme Nonbeing.

---
**Second Chapter: The Manifested and Illuminated, the Body’s Transformation into the Dao**
The Profound Profound Ta Luo Heaven,
within which lies the White Jade Capital.

The Glittering Gate towers in the Great Void,
the Void Emperor seated in majesty.

The Three Qi circle the Xiao Tai,
the Heavenly Gate’s spirits arrayed.

The Supreme Emperor holds the Tiger Talisman,
descending to summon the Primordial Sovereign Lord.

All ranks receive the True Body,
dividing and transforming as they generate.

Heavenly Demons take their Mysterious duties,
the Crimson Canopy inspecting the Northern Camp.

The Great Compassionate One pities the drowned,
the Mysterious Chapters descend to the Upper Clarity.

The Primordial Cavern spreads benevolent spirit,
for you unfolding the True Scriptures.

May you advance in the Dao’s work,
all attaining the fruit of the Way.

Light illuminates the dark night,
all sufferings transcend and ascend.

Seeking to sever entanglements,
all grievances cease without trace.

---
**Third Chapter: The Great Mixture, the Song of Piercing Qi**
The Primordial Origin establishes ten thousand heavens,
the Pure Qi of blue, yellow, and white.

The light transforms into the High Clarity,
the heavy settles as turbid.

Within the Central Harmony, right and wrong exist,
for humans, life and death are reborn.

Desires corrupt the True Essence,
the River of Love constantly drowns.

Entering the Dao, you become a spirit,
perfecting your merit at the Imperial Gate.

Creating karma, you fall into the Wheel,
following desires, sinking into dark prisons.

Who knows within the Great Void,
the Three Officials wield the Transformation Brush?

Holding my great authority,
the Nine Palaces marking the sacred laws.

The Heavenly Court’s myriad folk,
in Nanchang, ever joyous.

Having attained the Mysterious Enlightenment,
how could you again sink?

Receive my Heavenly Treasure’s words,
quickly advance in the Longevity Practice.

This, above the Three Realms,
within the flying void,
the Song of the Immortal King’s sound,
its words attuned to the Cavernous Chapters.

Recite it a hundred times,
your name registered in the Southern Palace.

Recite it a thousand times,
the Demon King welcomes you.

Ten thousand times, the Dao is complete,
ascending to the Supreme Void,
crossing the Three Realms,
ranked among the Immortal Lords.

Hearing the sacred sound,
the Demon King reveres your form,
commands the earthly deities,
to attend and escort.

Escaping the earthly gate,
free from the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships,
the Seven Ancestors ascend,
forever parted from the Ghostly Officials,
the soul crosses the Vermilion Mists,
refined and reborn.

This is called the Limitless,
universally saving the boundless.

There are secret Heavenly Texts,
all heavens hold them in reverence.

Revealing arrogance, you fall into Hell,
disaster befalls the Seven Ancestral Uncles.

The Dao says: These two chapters are the hidden sounds
of all Heavenly Emperors and the Most Holy Demon Kings,
all the words of the Great Brahman,
not the common speech of the world.

Clarifying the origin of life,
piercing Qi adapts to the material.
Heaven’s governance extends to the people,
unerringly just and without bias.

Heaven’s utmost fairness,
judged by the Emperors.

The Law of the Dao adapts and transforms,
applied according to the times,
penetrating the hidden mysteries of the Saints,
not measurable by the vulgar.

Thus it is called Profound and Mysterious,
difficult to fully explore.

The Heavenly Treasure is guarded
in the Eastern Treasure Hall of the Jade Clarity’s Supreme Sovereign.
According to the ritual, after thirty-seven thousand years,
it will descend in response to the age.

If a perfected one brings gold and jade with a sincere heart,
and according to the old ritual petitions the Ten Heavens,
then it shall be bestowed.

The Dao speaks:

*"To chant and recite this scripture,
the mortal form becomes true,
defiled qi clears and disperses,
heavenly light enters the heart,
bone marrow flows with jade essence,
and one attains the perfected immortals,
forever free from death’s cause—
all paths open, all deeds succeed.

Above, harmonizing with Heaven’s order,
aligning with sun, moon, and five stars.
Within, balancing human qi,
free from sickness and pain.
Below, subduing malevolent spirits,
a hundred deities guard the form.

All must unite in heart to observe fasts,
offer incense at the six times,
recite the sutra tenfold in all directions—
merit and virtue descend,
dissolving all ill omens.

Its boundless words
universally liberate the endless.

The Dao speaks:

Those of shallow learning, or whose immortal grade is incomplete,
when their fate of extinction arrives and the body enters the Great Yin,
at the moment of passing,
let fellow students of the Way perform incense offerings
and recite the scripture ten times,
to guide the corpse according to the ritual.

The Most High illuminates the form—
the form transforms into supple gold,
the Life Officer channels qi—
qi molds jade essence,
the soul refines the corpse to dissolution,
the Nine Palaces restore spirit,
the spirit ascends directly to the Southern Palace,
and by one’s merit, rebirth follows in due days.

The Wheel of Rebirth turns without hesitation—
thus one attains the immortals.

The Dao speaks:

When Heaven and Earth reach their cycle’s end,
when stars and constellations shift their courses,
when sun and moon lose their eclipses,
when the four seasons fall out of order,
when yin and yang fail to harmonize,
when the realm suffers calamity,
when martial qi manifests,
when pestilence spreads,
when the populace perishes in masses,
when teachers and friends pass away—

All such disasters arise from karmic completion,
from the body’s transformation by virtue,
from the attraction of qi by merit—
each has its origin.
This is the natural Way,
Heaven’s governance.

All must observe fasts,
offer incense and recite scripture.

For fasting and chanting bear great merit—
above, they dispel celestial calamities,
protect and uphold the Emperor,
below, they avert poison and harm,
saving the myriad people.
Life and death depend upon them—
their blessings are immeasurable,
hence it is said: boundless,
universally liberating Heaven and humankind.

The Dao speaks:

Whoever possesses this scripture
may act on behalf of Heaven, Earth, the Sovereign, and the people,
performing these deeds of merit.

On days of disaster, with sincere intent,
observe fasts, burn incense,
recite the scripture ten times—
all the heavens record their names,
ten thousand deities attend as guardians,
and the perfected ones of the Right Path
shall attain the rank of saintly ministers beneath the Golden Gate.

The heavens record each person’s merits and transgressions,
without the slightest omission.

Even the Heavenly Magical Kings will advocate for your life,
and those who attain the Dao shall truly comprehend these profound words.

Hidden speech of the Great Void within the heavens,
Boundless Sound of the Great Prajña—
Composed by the True Person of the Supreme Ultimate,
*Scripture of the Illuminated Form, Penetrating Qi, and Spiritual Chapter*,
The Eight Heavens of the Eastern Quarter."*

**Eastern Quarter Eight Heavens:**
*Henjian Foundations, Yǎnming Commanded the Chariot.*
*Jùhuá’s Virtues Flourish, Orchid Hall’s Mysteries Unseen.*
*Sudden Taboos Arrive, Extinguish the Flame of Earthly Schemes.*
*Establish the Day’s Sacred Statutes, Upright the True Emperor’s Pitcher.*
*Invoke the Virtue’s Inscription, Cross the Cauldron’s Ruins.*
*Shàoyàn Follows the Dew, Ancient Unity in Punishment.*
*Enemies Borrowed Grace, the Hidden Depart—*
*Divine Ridges Shatter the Cord, Zhou’s Cautious Orchard’s End.*

**Southern Quarter Eight Heavens:**
*Lìliáng’s Void Extends, Adorned with Autumn’s Grace.*
*Mèngkuò’s Purity Spreads, Sīliú’s Flight Invested.*
*Command the Ghost-Wells, Bìshēn’s Rest Rewarded.*
*Sever the Spirits’ Torture, Grant the Marquis’ Seal.*
*Flooding Lead Pours, Crystal Scatters in the Mist.*
*Resplendent Souls Nest, Four-Horses’ Clouds Ascend—*
*Eternal Doubt Encompasses, Pure Pool’s Fire Sought.*
*Yědiàn’s Gratitude, Vital Qi’s Brilliance.*

**Western Quarter Eight Heavens:**
*Chaotic Pacts Stir, Fusion’s Gallop Steals.*
*Green Silk Knows the Great, Savage Banners Heave.*
*Lotus Skirts Quell the Arrow, Who Leads the Fugitive’s Rope?*
*Nine-Umbrella’s Bloom, Textures Already Void.*
*Distant Echoes Present the Segment, Jiang’s Purple Spring.*
*Embrace the Nourishing, Yarrow’s Dao First.*
*Divine Frame Splits the Body, Qi Aligns by the Banquet.*
*Ru’s Resolve Dwells, Release the Sprout’s Snare.*

**Northern Quarter Eight Heavens:**
*Strange Mounds Crown the Lingering Ridge, Gu’s Barren Salvation.*
*Shadows Clash with the Azure Sky, Tranquil Spreads Unbroken.*
*Crimson Carvings Order the Jade Ranks, Endless Gates Migrate.*
*Symbols Loose the Cloud’s Bloom, Crimson Birth’s Fleeting Dance.*
*Barrier of the Eastern Gate, Mound’s Treasury Blocks the Year.*
*Towering Parallels Ascend, Hú’s Intent Transmits Afar.*
*Form Congeals in the Square, Secret Elixir’s Source.*
*Han’s Record Punishes the Swift—*
*The Dao Shines in Azure’s Reach.*

**The Dao Speaks:**
*"These are the Great Void’s hidden speech within the heavens,*
*the Boundless Sound of the Great Prajña.*
*Ancient texts stretch a full ten feet in length.*
*Once, the Celestial Sovereign met at the柏林 retreat,*
*confronting the Five Celestial Directions’ hidden emperors,*
*commanding the Imperial Immortals to chant the Void,*
*accepting the Fire Spring’s essence,*
*refining it through nine kalpas—*
*then the script was luminous and fresh,*
*inscribed upon the Supreme Ultimate’s phoenix hall,*
*jewel screen aglow with golden light,*
*illuminating all heavens.*
*Those who bear the text ascend eternally,*
*entering the Dragon Gate,*
*constantly attending the Celestial Sovereign.*
*Burning the script in flame,*
*drinking the jade spring’s waters,*
*all ailments depart the body,*
*lifespan equaling the Nine Heavens.*

*Once, its text was recorded as the true sound.*
*Knowing its sound and transforming it brings Daoic benefit.*
*Fasting while reciting it—*
*all heavens dispatch flying celestial kings*
*to observe your form,*
*recording your merits and labors,*
*reporting to the heavens above,*
*ten thousand deities pay homage,*
*earth spirits guard the gates,*
*great magical kings advocate for the perfected,*
*and those who attain the Dao*
*shall truly comprehend these profound words.*

*This sound repels all obstacles,*
*exorcises all calamities,*
*delivers all beings,*
*fulfills all aspirations.*
*It transforms the vulgar body,*
*summons spiritual qi,*
*secures ascension—*
*the Celestial Sovereign’s natural sound.*

*Thus, when recited, flying celestials descend to observe,*
*the Supreme Sovereign sings from afar,*
*ten thousand deities pay homage,*
*the Three Realms attend the hall,*
*all spirits bow in reverence,*
*ghostly intelligences vanish,*
*precious chimes resound,*
*the Ten Directions grow serene,*
*rivers and seas fall silent,*
*mountains swallow their smoke,*
*all spirits tremble in submission.*
*It gathers the assembled immortals,*
*clears the heavens of impurities,*
*purges the earth of demonic dust,*
*illuminates the dark—*
*the Boundless Great Mysteries.*

*Completion of the Supreme Treasure’s Boundless Scripture*
*for Delivering Beings—*
*Supreme Chapter Twenty-Six.*
*Chapter Twenty-Seven.*

The **Supreme Treasure of Purple Radiance and Elusive Spirit** speaks:

*"In times past, within the Great Dao-Heaven,*
*the Crimson Splendor sang the Great Mysterious* **Pingtu** *of the Void,*
*and received from the Primordial Origin the Supreme Scripture of Purple Radiance and Elusive Spirit*
*for Delivering Beings without Limit.*

*The Primordial Origin, Celestial Sovereign, when proclaiming this Scripture,*
*circuited tenfold across the realms,*
*to summon the Ten Directions,*
*then ascended to His seat.*

*The Great Celestial Deity, the Highest Sage, the Wondrous Conduct Immortal,*
*Purple Radiance and Elusive Spirit,*
*The Great Deity of Primordial Transformation,*
*the countless hosts without number,*
*rode the void and arrived.*

*Floating on crimson clouds and emerald mists,*
*with resounding precious wheels and jade canopies,*
*five-hued brilliance surged,*
*illuminating the Boundless Great.*

*For seven days and seven nights,*
*all heavens’ sacred gates stood open,*
*the Sun’s palace and Moon’s abode*
*shimmered with gathered radiance,*
*the jade pavilions and layered cities*
*glowed with unobstructed clarity,*
*the starry constellations revolved,*
*the Five Battles* **Wudu** *unfurled their light,*
*the Nine Paths scattered their winds,*
*emerald ramparts entwined,*
*precious circles dispersed their splendor,*
*the Celestial Way ascended in flight,*
*across all lands—mountains, valleys, forests, and thickets—*
*the earth leveled to one grade,*
*no longer high or low,*
*all soil transformed to purple jade,*
*no hue remained distinct.*

*The assembled immortals attended His seat,*
*while the Primordial Origin, Celestial Sovereign,*
*ascended in a floating, nine-hued treasure,*
*illuminated by soaring jade,*
*upon the Void’s sacred throne.*

*When the Scripture was recited once,*
*all Great Deities of the heavens simultaneously praised its excellence.*

*At that time,*
*all men and women of the land*
*awakened to the Dao’s nature,*
*penetrating the Mysterious Profound.*

*When recited twice,*
*divine stores overflowed,*
*and the Primordial Qi’s currents surged.*

*When recited thrice,*
*the wondrous patterns revealed their subtleties,*
*and the hidden cycles embraced all forms.*

*When recited four times,*
*the Twin Radiance aligned with the Origin,*
*and the Jade Gates convened in union.*

*When recited five times,*
*the Mysterious Deities responded in transformation,*
*and life’s essence unfolded naturally.*

*When recited six times,*
*the Harmonizing Void descended in embrace,*
*and mortal frames attained the Immortal True.*

*When recited seven times,*
*The Spirit’s power reached afar,*
*and ancestral salvation was opened.*

*When recited eight times,*
*The Sovereign’s body radiated light,*
*ascending to the Great Luo,*
*descending to the Nine Abysses,*
*the eternal night ceased its sorrow,*
*and the Cold Palace abandoned its lamentations.*

*When recited nine times,*
*the Ghostly Officials and Investigating Ministers*
*ascended to fill the ranks of the Immortal.*

*When recited ten times,*
*throughout the Three Realms,*
*all beings saw the Dao of Purple Radiance and Elusive Spirit.*
*At that time,*
*all men and women of the land,*
*without exception, turned their hearts in devotion,*
*each receiving protection and deliverance,*
*all attaining eternal life.*

*The Dao speaks:*

*When the Scripture was recited once,*
*The Great Deity of Boundless Limitless, Green Origin, from the Eastern Quarter,*
*with countless hosts without number,*
*floated upon the void and arrived.*

*When recited twice,*
*The Great Deity of Boundless Limitless, Crimson Dao, from the Southern Quarter,*
*with countless hosts without number,*
*floated upon the void and arrived.*

*When recited thrice,*
*The Great Deity of Boundless Limitless, Luminous Purity, from the Western Quarter,*
*with countless hosts without number,*
*floated upon the void and arrived.*

*When recited four times,*
*The Great Deity of Boundless Limitless, Mysterious Light, from the Northern Quarter,*
*with countless hosts without number,*
*floated upon the void and arrived.*

*When recited five times,*
*The Great Deity of Boundless Limitless, Pacifying Spirits, from the Northeast,*
*with countless hosts without number,*
*floated upon the void and arrived.*

*When recited six times,*
*The Great Deity of Boundless Limitless, Flowing Winds, from the Southeast,*
*with countless hosts without number,*
*floated upon the void and arrived.*

*When recited seven times,*
*The Great Deity of Boundless Limitless, Divine Gold, from the Southwest,*
*with countless hosts without number,*
*floated upon the void and arrived.*

*When recited eight times,*
*The Great Deity of Boundless Limitless, Celestial Enclosure, from the Northwest,*
*with countless hosts without number,*
*floated upon the void and arrived.*

*When recited nine times,*
*The Great Deity of Boundless Limitless, Circular Luo, from Above,*
*with countless hosts without number,*
*floated upon the void and arrived.*

*When recited ten times,*
*The Great Deity of Boundless Limitless, Piercing Marvel, from Below,*
*with countless hosts without number,*
*floated upon the void and arrived.*

*After tenfold recitation,*
*The Great Deities of Boundless Limitless, Purple Radiance and Elusive Spirit,*
*from the Ten Directions,*
*all arrived together at once.*
*All men and women of the land,*
*turning their hearts in reverence,*
*spoke to one another:*
*'When I first heard the Scripture,*
*I immediately awakened to the Spirit-Dan,*
*the True Qi refining my body,*
*unity with the luminous form,*
*the subtle patterns of the Mysterious Dao,*
*and sought verification of the Immortal True.'*

*The arriving hosts were as dense as stars in mist,*
*as clouds in fine dust—*
*countless hosts without number,*
*half the land’s soil sank,*
*unable to be restrained.*

*Then, the Primordial Origin suspended a precious pearl,*
*as large as a millet grain,*
*within the Void’s expanse,*
*five zhang above the earth.*

*With His celestial pull,*
*The Great Celestial Deity, the Highest Sage,*
*The Wondrous Conduct Immortal,*
*and the Great Deities of Boundless Limitless, Purple Radiance and Elusive Spirit,*
*countless hosts without number,*
*all entered the pearl’s mouth.*

*Heavenly beings gazed upward,*
*seeing only a radiant surge descending from the pearl.*
*Once they entered,*
*their whereabouts became unknown.*

*The people dispersed,*
*and the earth returned to its evenness,*
*no longer tilted or sunken.*

*The Primordial Origin, within the pearl,*
*completed the recitation of the Scripture,*
*while the assembled immortals observed and delivered it to me.*
*At that moment,*
*joy and celebration were beyond words.*

*The ritual’s coarse details were exhausted,*
*all heavenly beings resumed their stations,*
*and in an instant,*
*the hall fell silent, leaving no trace.*

*At that time,*
*all heavenly beings who encountered the Scripture’s law*
*universally received deliverance,*
*preserving their original years,*
*no injury or harm,*
*all revering the land,*
*all attaining the Supreme True.*

*Nurturing Qi, nurturing Spirit,*
*nurturing the Origin, nurturing Essence,*
*nurturing Will, nurturing Marvel,*
*nurturing Wisdom, nurturing Form,*
*nurturing Life, nurturing Nature.*

*Radiance and splendor enveloped the body,*
*the Elusive Spirit-Dan was perfected,*
*all aligned in boundless compassion,*
*differing bones became kindred,*
*the land secure, its people flourishing,*
*rejoicing in Great Peace.*
*The Scripture first emerged,*
*and the land was governed by the Dao.*

*Those with resolute hearts,*
*who revered with sincerity,*
*all attained the power to deliver the world.*

*The Dao speaks:*
*All the names mentioned in the Primordial Origin’s recitation*
*are the hidden titles of the heavens’ Supreme Deities,*
*the concealed sounds of the Dao,*
*also the tabooed names of the Highest True Ones,*
*and the veiled names of the listed Saints.*

*Those who chant and recite this*
*will have the Purple Radiance reflected within,*
*the Elusive Spirit aiding their souls,*
*the Jade Dan nourishing their bodies,*
*the Supreme One descending in truth—*
*these are not the common words of the world.*

*Those who have already attained the Highest True Ones,*
*mastered the Mysterious Dao,*
*and penetrated its subtleties,*
*can fully comprehend its chapters."*

「When recited ten times,
the heavens resound in distant chant,
all the Supreme Deities of the ten thousand realms arrange their rites,
the luminous scene ascends to the Mysterious,
the Danling Spirit cradles the clouds,
the inner essence transforms into sun and moon,
the celestial hosts attend as marshals,
the host of demons is bound in form,
the ghostly vitalities are extinguished,
the dead are revived, and the white bones become flesh.*

*Those of utmost learning,*
*when they recite it ten times,*
*shall have the Five Emperors as their guardians,*
*all Three Realms bow in homage,*
*demonic essences lose their sight,*
*ghostly spirits are extinguished,*
*they rescue the dying and bring the lifeless to rebirth.*

*This is why:*
*scholars still bear unclean qi, their bodies not yet perfected in truth,*
*and though they can subdue the ten directions,*
*their power does not yet govern the heavenly laws.*
*Yet they can subdue the earthly spirits,*
*bind the demonic essences,*
*and merely feel the Dan’s light delivering their forms—*
*but cannot yet grant rebirth.*

*To recite this chapter lightly brings calamity upon oneself.*
*Yet to venerate and supply it,*
*one’s gates shall flourish,*
*prosperity endure through generations,*
*all afflictions shall not touch,*
*and the divine luminaries shall guard the door.*

*This scripture is most august and refined,*
*unmatched in the Jade Capital,*
*its deliverance without measure,*
*a foundation for all the Dao.*

*Its vast and sublime scope,*
*virtue beyond reckoning.*

*The Dao speaks:*
*"For those who recite this scripture ten times,*
*all the heavens gather,*
*the Heart Dan becomes luminous,*
*the Purple Radiance shields the body,*
*countless generations of ancestors,*
*their suffering souls relieved,*
*all shall immediately receive deliverance,*
*ascend to the Vermilion Palace,*
*and be granted nine years of rebirth,*
*retransformed and reborn as noble ones.*

*And those who love this scripture to its utmost,*
*fulfilling their merit and attaining virtue,*
*shall all become Immortals.*

*The Supreme One’s Jade Dan,*
*bestows longevity without bound,*
*ascending to the Golden Gate,*
*feasting in the Jade Capital.*

*Those of highest learning,*
*who practice and recite this scripture,*
*shall gain clarity of perception,*
*return to their original fate,*
*the Jade Dan conceal its mark,*
*the Purple Radiance surge upward,*
*and all shall immediately receive deliverance,*
*ascending to the Southern Palace.*

*Mortals who merely recite it*
*shall generate the Dan’s essence,*
*which flows into their fetal spirits,*
*prolonging life and years.*
*Later, they shall all attain the way of corpse dissolution,*
*their souls extinguished temporarily,*
*not experiencing the torments of hell,*
*and immediately regaining form,*
*wandering through the Great Void.*

*This scripture is subtle and profound,*
*its deliverance boundless,*
*all heavenly and human beings*
*shall rejoice in its grace.*

*Its blessings are immeasurable,*
*extending mercy over life and death,*
*a treasure of the highest heavens,*
*not transmitted to the lower worlds.*

*Those of utmost virtue, bearing gold treasures in devotion,*
*pledge to the heavens to transmit it.*
*To leak or reveal it carelessly*
*brings ruin to the Nine Ancestors,*
*and endless servitude in the netherworld.*

*It is guarded by the Five Emperors.*
*The Jade Boys and Jade Girls,*
*thirty-two each,*
*attend to its divine text,*
*protecting those who receive the scripture.*

*The Dao speaks:*
*"In the first month, observe a long fast,*
*recite this scripture,*
*and the Purple Radiance and Danling Spirit shall manifest.*
*The Yang Virtue delivers the netherworld,*
*The Jade Dan revolves nine times,*
*and in seven generations, one attains truth,*
*becoming a departed soul of the upper realm,*
*cutting off the suffering of hellish imprisonment,*
*and ascending to the Southern Palace.*

*"In the seventh month, observe a long fast,*
*recite this scripture,*
*and the Purple Radiance and Danling Spirit shall manifest.*
*The True Dao returns to the body,*
*granting flexibility and resilience,*
*the body attains immortality,*
*the heavens record one’s name,*
*with yellow talismans and white tablets,*
*erasing death and granting rebirth.*

*"In the tenth month, observe a long fast,*
*recite this scripture,*
*and the Purple Radiance and Danling Spirit shall manifest.*
*The Supreme One bestows the scripture,*
*The Jade Dan guards the truth,*
*and one becomes a king or sovereign lord,*
*stabilizing the realm for their descendants,*
*preserving the heavenly mandate,*
*enduring through generations,*
*forever ruling as a noble,*
*stabilizing their domain,*
*and bringing peace to the people.*

*"On the eight festival days,*
*recite this scripture,*
*and the Purple Radiance and Danling Spirit shall manifest.*
*The furnace opens the eight gates,*
*The cauldron holds the nine palaces,*
*The Supreme One as the honored one,*
*and one becomes a True Person of the Nine Palaces.*

*"On one’s original fate day,*
*recite this scripture,*
*and the Purple Radiance and Danling Spirit shall manifest.*
*One awakens to the mark of their original fate,*
*becomes a True Person,*
*their soul refined and clear,*
*all qi enduring,*
*not experiencing suffering,*
*their body radiant,*
*the Three Realms as their attendants,*
*the Five Emperors welcoming them,*
*all spirits paying homage,*
*their name inscribed in heaven,*
*merit fulfilled and virtue attained,*
*and ascend to the Upper Pure."*

*The Dao speaks:*
*"On days of practice,*
*one must bathe in fragrant water,*
*fast and enter the chamber,*
*facing east,*
*knocking teeth thirty-two times,*
*to invoke the thirty-two heavens,*
*bowing in heart to the thirty-two recitations,*
*closing eyes,*
*and quietly contemplating oneself seated within clouds of purple, crimson, and yellow qi,*
*inner and outer darkness vast,*
*with Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise,*
*Lions, and White Cranes arrayed on either side,*
*above the head, the Purple Radiance,*
*within, the Supreme One’s Jade Dan,*
*the crimson light like the sun,*
*great as a pearl nine inches wide,*
*borne aloft in divine clouds,*
*illuminated by sun and moon,*
*the chamber’s interior brightly revealed,*
*a circular symbol forming at the neck,*
*its light reflecting the ten directions—*
*thus, it is manifest.*

*The secret incantation says:*
*"The peerless Primordial Origin,*
*The Supreme Dao Lord.*
*I summon Your ministers within my body—*
*the thirty-two officials of the Five Agents,*
*the attendants of fragrant jade,*
*the messengers of the Jade Girls,*
*the Five Emperors’ direct talismans,*
*the direct sun’s fragrant officials—*
*thirty-two each,*
*opening the gates as You command.*

*"Today is auspicious and joyous,*
*a long fast in the pure hall,*
*practicing this scripture,*
*delivering countless beings.*

*May my invocation reach above,*
*and directly govern the peerless thirty-two heavens,*
*the Primordial Origin’s Supreme Deity,*
*before the august seat.*

*Finished. Now summon the Qi Lord through twelve recitations,*
*facing east to recite the scripture.*

*The Primordial Origin’s Scripture of Immeasurable Deliverance,*
*The Supreme Chapter of the Mysterious Dao,*
*The Essence of the Heart Dan,*
*The Supreme Chapter of the Purple Radiance,*
*Nine transformations delivering beings.*

*The Supreme One’s hidden sounds,*
*The Jade Dan’s natural essence,*
*the mixed void of crimson brilliance,*
*The Primordial Origin’s uppermost true ones.*

*They give birth to heaven and earth,*
*shape the transformations of all beings,*
*possess the mysterious palace,*
*and radiance that pervades all.*

*They open and guide the nine abysses,*
*interconnect with the heavenly roots,*
*The Supreme One’s subtle essence,*
*and all beings born of spirit.*

*Glowing Dan’s radiance,*
*circularly illuminating,*
*outerly linking the four voids,*
*embracing the Jade Embryo.*

*The Primordial Origin’s great kalpa,*
*The five halos flowing in form,*
*This is the spiritual omen,*
*The Purple Extremity’s high purity.*

*Yushan’s verdant peaks,*
*Xiaoshan’s lofty heights,*
*The Supreme’s Primordial Capital,*
*above, the circular illumination,*
*The jade gate’s flying essence.*

*The divine feast’s vast expanse,*
*The pure jade’s flourishing brilliance,*
*now facing the imperial heights,*
*The original transformation opening life.*

The **Supreme Radiance’s Hall of Clarity**,
**Emerald Mists’ Azure City**,
calmly pacify the ten directions,
pierce the **qi** of the eight voids.

Beneath, they link the ordered constellations,
descend to guide the myriad stars.
Majestic, the **Supreme Deity**,

Mortals who recite this **Scripture** (世人受诵) will have the **radiance of the Three Celestial Lights** (三辰光辉) descend into their bodies (降流身中), refining their **form and spirit** (炼形魂).

Their **five viscera turn golden** (五脏金色), their **faces bear jade-like radiance** (面有玉光), and their **lifespans extend** (延寿长年).

Later, all attain the **Way of Corpse Dissolution** (尸解之道), where the **spirit temporarily vanishes** (魂神暂灭).

They **do not pass through the Underworld** (不经地狱) and immediately **return to their forms** (即得返形), wandering through the **Great Void** (太空).

This **Scripture** is **subtle and wondrous** (微妙), **universally delivering without limit** (普度无穷).

All **celestial and human beings** (一切天人) **do not fail to rejoice** (莫不受庆).

Its **infinite blessings** (无量之福) bestow **mercy upon life and death** (生死蒙惠).

It is a **treasure of the Highest Heaven** (上天所宝), **not passed down to the mortal world** (不传下世).

Only **worthy sages** (至士) carrying **golden treasures** (赍金宝) with **sincere devotion** (效心), **pledging to the Heavens** (盟天而传), may transmit it.

If one **lightly leaks or scorns** (轻泄漏慢) this **Scripture**, calamity will fall upon **nine generations of ancestors** (殃及九祖), and they will **suffer long-term servitude in the Ghostly Bureau** (长役鬼官).

The **Five Emperors** (五帝) attend this **Scripture**, along with **Jade Boys and Jade Girls** (玉童玉女), each numbering **twenty-four** (各二十四人), guarding and protecting its **Divine Text** (神文).

They **safeguard and protect those who receive this Scripture** (保护受经者身).

The **Way** states: On the **first month of prolonged fasting** (正月长斋),

reciting and chanting this **Scripture** (诵咏是经), the **Celestial Sovereign descends to observe** (日帝下观),

and **heavenly light envelops their bodies** (天光接身).

The **Nine Clouds refine their bones** (九霞炼骨), the **Purple Qi unites with their spirits** (紫气合神),

and for the **departed souls of past ages** (上世亡魂), they **sever the bonds of Underworld punishment** (断地逮役),

delivering them to the **Southern Palace of the Upper Realm** (度上南宫).

On the **seventh month of prolonged fasting** (七月长斋),

reciting and chanting this **Scripture** (诵咏是经), the **Star Sovereign descends to observe** (星帝下观),

and **heavenly light envelops their bodies** (天光接身).

The **Precious Clouds refine their essence** (宝霞炼质), and their **bodies transform into golden radiance** (金色化精),

attaining the **Way of Immortal Sage** (身得神仙), with all **Heavenly Beings recording their names** (诸天书名).

They **wipe away death and rise anew** (黄箓白简, 削死上生).

On the **tenth month of prolonged fasting** (十月长斋),

reciting and chanting this **Scripture** (诵咏是经), the **Moon Sovereign descends to observe** (月帝下观),

and **heavenly light envelops their bodies** (天光接身).

The **Precious Clouds refine their qi** (宝霞炼气), and the **Three Lights merge with their forms** (三光合身).

Their **spirits ascend in response to their intentions** (神奔意感), undergoing **countless transformations and rebirths** (万变更生),

becoming **kings and sovereigns** (国王帝主), **lords and ministers, fathers and sons** (君臣父子),

**calming and securing their nations** (安镇国祚), **preserving the Heavenly Mandate** (保天长存),

**ensuring their lineages never cease** (世世不绝), **always ruling as sovereigns** (常为人君),

**bringing peace to their lands** (安镇其方), with the **people praising the Great Peace** (民称太平).

On the **eight festive days** (八节之日),

reciting and chanting this **Scripture** (诵咏是经),

the **double radiance faces the Primordial** (双景朝元), and with **eyes closed, they enter inner meditation** (闭目内冥).

The **light pierces the Celestial Valley** (光洞天谷), the **red radiance refines their spirits** (赤景炼神),

the **five stars descend in truth** (五星降真), and the **Three Celestial Lights encircle their bodies** (三辰绕身).

The **Eight Directions’ mighty spirits exhale fire** (八威吐火), and **Primordial Qi spontaneously generates** (元气自生).

They attain the **status of the True Sage of the Nine Palaces** (得为九宫真人).

On their **birthday of the original fate** (本命之日),

reciting and chanting this **Scripture** (诵咏是经), the **sun and moon shine brightly** (日月焕照),

the **Nine Primordials weave around their forms** (九元络形), and **scarlet mist drifts and dissolves** (朱烟飘溶),

granting them **profound clarity** (使尔玄通).

They **ride the Dragon to the Purple Expanse** (乘龙紫霄), **stand upon the Big Dipper and climb the Milky Way** (据斗攀魁),

**wandering among the Three Yang and Three Mysterious** (徘徊三阳, 游行三玄),

**warding off trials and dispelling calamities** (辟试除殃).

The **Eight Spirits and Seven Officials** (八灵七政) **hover in the Dipper** (坐卧斗中),

**repelling all misfortunes** (辟却万凶), while the **radiance of the Three Celestial Lights** (三辰光辉) **restores their youthful appearance** (为我还容).

Their **spirits become clear and upright** (魂神澄正), and their **qi endures eternally** (万气长存).

They **do not undergo suffering** (不经苦恼), their **bodies bear luminous clarity** (身有光明),

with **Three Realms attending in protection** (三界侍卫), **Five Emperors overseeing their welcome** (五帝司迎),

and **ten thousand spirits paying homage** (万神朝礼), their **names inscribed in Heaven** (名书上天).

When their **merits are fulfilled and virtues attained** (功满德就), they **ascend in flight to the Upper Pure** (飞升上清).

The **Way** states: On **days of practicing the Way** (行道之日),

all should **bathe in fragrant water** (皆当香汤沐浴), **observe strict fasting and purification** (斋戒入室),

facing **east**, **knocking teeth thirty-two times** (叩齿三十二通),

**listening to the Thirty-two Heavens** (上闻三十二天),

**bowing in heart thirty-two times** (心拜三二十过), **closing eyes** (闭目),

**quietly contemplating their bodies seated within the three-colored clouds of Azure, Yellow, and White** (静思身坐青黄白三色云气之中),

**inner and outer darkness merging** (内外蓊冥),

with **Green Dragon, White Tiger, Azure Phoenix, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane** (青龙、白虎、朱雀、玄武、狮子、白鹤)

**arrayed on either side** (罗列左右), **sun and moon shining brightly** (日月照明),

**five stars interweaving in shadow** (五星交荫), **illuminating the chamber** (洞焕室内).

A **circular symbol forms at their necks** (项生圆象), **light reflecting in all ten directions** (光映十方),

thus **clearly manifesting** (如此分明).

The **secret incantation** (密咒曰) reads:

**"Supreme Primordial Mystery, the Celestial Sovereign of the Highest Dao** (无上玄元, 太上道君).

**Summon the thirty-five officials of my body** (召出臣身中三五功曹),

**left and right ministers and messengers** (左右官使者),

**attended by fragrant jade boys** (侍香玉童), **and spoken by jade girls** (传言玉女),

**direct orders from the Five Emperors** (五帝直符), **direct commands from the sun and moon officials** (直日香官),

each numbering **thirty-six** (各三十六人), **opening and closing the gates as spoken** (关启所言).

**This day is auspicious and joyous** (今日吉庆),

**with prolonged fasting in a pure hall** (长斋清堂),

**cultivating and reciting this Scripture** (修行至经),

**delivering countless beings without limit** (无量度人).

**Reveal what has been opened above** (显所启上彻),

**directly ascending to the Supreme Thirty-two Heavens** (径御无上三十二天), **the Primordial Sovereign of the Beginning of All** (元始上帝), **the Most Venerable Few** (至尊几前).

When complete, **draw in the breath thirty-two times** (引炁三十二过), facing **east** and reciting the **Scripture**.

**Primordial Scripture of Infinite Deliverance, Supreme Mysterious Scripture of the Highest Dao** (元始无量度人上品妙经),

**Primordial Mysterious Scripture of the Divine Treasure, this Chapter of the Three Celestial Lights’ Radiance Preserving Life and Extending Years** (元始洞玄灵宝本章, 三辰光辉保命延生妙品),

**ten recitations for delivering beings** (十回度人),

**with hidden verses of the Three Enclosures** (三垣隐韵), **transformation and change in accordance with nature** (变化自然),

**a towering framework of virtue’s radiance** (大范腾辉).

The **Divine Light condenses and disperses** (灵光散凝), the **True Qi is vast and chaotic** (真气鸿蒙),

**mixing and merging in boundless mystery** (混合杳冥),

**outer yellow, inner red** (外黄内赤).

The **two symbols interweave and unite** (二象交并), **yin and yang harmoniously absorb** (阴阳吸和),

**Heavenly Treasures forming the Divine Text** (天宝成文), **jade characters in five sections** (玉字五篇).

The **eight-directional mighty spirits** (八方威神) are the **progenitors of Creation** (造化之祖),

the **source of the Two Complements** (二仪之源),

**Great Transformation in Mysterious Unity** (大化玄同),

**boundless and profound** (溟涬无垠),

**opening and illuminating the Three Radiances** (开明三景), **this is the Heavenly Root** (是为天根).

The **sun and moon contain the embryonic essence** (日月含胞),

**from which the Nine Ways branch forth** (九道乃分),

**Primordial Essence and Mysterious Essence** (元晶玄晶),

**giving rise to ten thousand heavens** (万天化生),

**above which there is no further progenitor** (上无复祖), **only the Dao as their body** (惟道为身).

The **five divine texts unfold** (五文开廓), **universally nurturing divine spirits** (普植神灵),

**light and qi coalescing into threads** (光气结缕), **twisting and turning for countless leagues** (宛转亿寻).

The **Dragon’s Chapter and Tiger’s Scripture** (龙章虎书) **are inscribed with jade and laid out in gold** (寊玉布金),

**flowering brilliance constructs a grand framework** (华芒蔚构), **separating and uniting the True Essence** (离合真精).

The **Great Dipper’s stars rise in tiers** (劫仞圆罗), **the Jade Mountain of the Serene Capital** (玉山萧京),

**ascending to the Highest Void** (上极太无),

**mixing and merging with the Three Pure Ones** (混洞三清),

**faint and profound, the Mysterious Microcosm** (渺渺郁微),

**with purple canopy and yellow courtyard** (紫盖黄庭).

To the **left, the sun; to the right, the moon** (左日右月),

**in the center, the Azure Phoenix** (中有赤荧),

**six qi intertwining** (六气交缠), **three lights forming their bodies** (三光结形).

The **Five Emperors issue their orders** (五帝告符), the **seven luminaries proclaim the Mysterious Scripture** (七曜玄经),

**cloudly cords binding and securing** (云纲结带), **the Divine Pool nurturing infants** (神池育婴).

Within are **ascending radiance spirits of red and black** (中有奔景赤黑之神),

**within are the Sovereigns of Encompassing Vital Qi** (中有梵气周回之君),

**within are the True Ones of Sun Boy, Moon Girl, and Star Consorts** (中有日童月女星妃之真),

**within are the Mysterious Lords of profound symbols, structured gems, and flying emeralds in green and purple brilliance** (中有郁仪结璘垒珠飞青耀紫之英),

**within are the Divine Ones of drawing radiance and gathering flowers in eight pure forms** (中有挹辉采华八素之文),

**within are the Red Emperor and Yellow Old Sage** (中有赤帝黄老).

The **Celestial Soul ascends in fiery flight** (天魂高奔), the **Supreme Spirits circle in radiant splendor** (上灵圆景), their **square forms manifest in nine hues** (方象九色), as **autumnal vapors refine and purify** (霞津灌炼).

The **Five Viscera are cleansed** (五脏澡), **a hundred passages are regulated** (治百关).
Swiftly harnessing the **Dragon Chariot**, they **ascend to construct the Imperial Pavilion** (上造帝轩).
The **Three Celestial Luminaries** shine forth (三辰光辉), **preserving life and extending years** (保命延生), **reviving the corpse and resurrecting the dead** (回骸起死), **delivering countless beings** (无量度人).

Today, the **Celestial Records are verified** (今日校录), as **all the Heavens gather at the Imperial Court** (诸天临轩).

---
**The Eight Directions of the Boundless True Sovereigns:**

The **East: Boundless Bright True God-King** (东方无极明真神王), **Eternal Great Sage of Infinite Delivery** (长生大圣无量度人).
The **South: Boundless True Yang God-King** (南方无极真阳神王), **Eternal Great Sage of Infinite Delivery** (长生大圣无量度人).
The **West: Boundless Great Substance God-King** (西方无极太素神王), **Eternal Great Sage of Infinite Delivery** (长生大圣无量度人).
The **North: Boundless Feathered Bright God-King** (北方无极羽明神王), **Eternal Great Sage of Infinite Delivery** (长生大圣无量度人).
The **Northeast: Boundless Verdant Void God-King** (东北无极碧落神王), **Eternal Great Sage of Infinite Delivery** (长生大圣无量度人).
The **Southeast: Boundless Mysterious Portal God-King** (东南无极洞户神王), **Eternal Great Sage of Infinite Delivery** (长生大圣无量度人).
The **Southwest: Boundless Flying Talisman God-King** (西南无极飞符神王), **Eternal Great Sage of Infinite Delivery** (长生大圣无量度人).
The **Northwest: Boundless Barrier-Defying God-King** (西北无极辟非神王), **Eternal Great Sage of Infinite Delivery** (长生大圣无量度人).
The **Upper Realm: Boundless Pure Capital God-King** (上方无极清都神王), **Eternal Great Sage of Infinite Delivery** (长生大圣无量度人).
The **Lower Realm: Boundless Distant Prosperity God-King** (下方无极远昌神王), **Eternal Great Sage of Infinite Delivery** (长生大圣无量度人).

The **Ten Directions’ Supreme True Three Celestial Luminaries**, **Flying Heavenly God-Kings** (十方至真三辰光辉飞天神王), **Eternal World-Delivering Great Gods** (长生度世无量大神),
all riding **clouds of the Eight Pure Forms** (乘八素之云),
the **purple mist procession** (紫霞之辈),
the **piercing-light chariot** (洞光之舆),
**soaring dragons and wandering phoenixes** (飞龙游凤),
the **vanishing mist, fragrant ten-thousandfold carriage** (杳霭万香之车),
the **golden jade, intricate-patterned canopy** (金碧琼文之盖),
the **divine banners** (神明之节),
the **profoundly solemn flags** (郁绝之旛),
with **forebearers striking resonant gongs** (前击鸣璈节奏),
and **rear attendants blowing melodious, unadorned tunes** (后吹曲素生音),
**dark cranes and azure swans** (玄鹤青鸾) singing in **resonant harmony** (啸歌嗈嗈),
**Nine True Ones opening the path** (九真启涂),
**Ten Floral Wings at the chariot’s axle** (十华翼辕),
**ten-thousand chariots and myriad cavalry** (亿乘万骑),
**floating through the void** (浮空而来),
**shining radiance and returning in glory** (倾光回驾),
**preserving life and extending years** (保命延生).

The **Celestial Leader’s inner ministers** (天魁内相), **jade aides to the Imperial Spirit** (玉辅帝灵),
the **Great Constellation’s overseers** (太微司命), and the **Mysterious Union Great Deity** (玄合大神)
**hold the sacred tablets and registers** (执箓把籍),
**all assembled before the Imperial Throne** (齐到帝前).
According to their appointed deliverances, they **severely inspect the Heavens** (随所应度，严校诸天).
The **fiery ascent to the Red Emperor** (高奔赤帝) **absorbs and governs the Nine Primordial Qi** (吸御九元).
The **Five Celestial Bodies harmonize their qi** (五辰协气),
**responding to the Mysterious Primordial** (感接太玄).
Their **radiance flows downward** (光辉俯流),
**preserving ten-thousand lives** (保命亿千).
The **vermilion glow and emerald brilliance** (朱景绿英) **whirl like tempestuous symbols** (飙象韬骞).
The **flaming radiance and rainbow separation** (炎照虹离) **bind the structured gems and golden flowers** (结璘黄华).
**Engraved names at the Vermilion Terrace** (刻名绛台),
**refining the brain and flying through the mists** (炼脑飞霞).
They **sit enthroned in the luminous void** (坐镇明空),
**wearing the sacred scriptures as adornments** (佩服灵篇).
**Universally proclaiming the Three Realms** (普告三界),
the **Boundless Divine Homeland** (无极神乡),
the **Day Palace and Moon Precinct** (日宫月府),
**left for records, right for governance** (左纪右纲).
The **Nine Heavens and Five Star Enclosures** (九天五斗),
**East Well and River Source** (东井河源).
**Descending the Mysterious Elixir** (降气玄丹),
**gathering at Kunlun** (同会昆仑).
**Swiftly erasing the ledger of sins** (疾除罪簿),
**extinguishing the roots of evil** (落灭恶根).
**Not to be detained or confined** (不得拘留),
**forcing the ghosts into their groups** (逼合鬼群).
By the **Primordial Beginning’s decrees** (元始符命),
**hour by hour, they ascend in rank** (时刻升迁).
The **Three Celestial Luminaries flow like fire** (三辰流火),
**transforming into cold springs** (变化寒泉).
**Subduing demons and recommending the worthy** (制魔保举),
**ascending in radiance to become immortals** (奔景成仙).
The **yin essence undergoes refinement** (阴质受炼),
**divine light endless and continuous** (神光绵绵).
The **Three Palaces of Supreme Truth** (三宫极真),
**Dao transformations of Mysterious Essence** (道化玄精).
**The living body receives deliverance** (生身受度),
**eternal across all eons** (劫劫长存).
**With the Wheel of Time, they revolve** (随劫轮转),
**equal in years to Heaven** (与天齐年).
**Forever delivering the Three Paths and Five Sufferings, Eight Hardships** (永度三途五苦八难),
**surpassing the celestial poles** (超凌辰极),
**ascending to the Three Enclosures** (上登三垣).

---
**The Eight Heavens of the East:**
The **Three Celestial Luminaries’ Radiant Transformation Heaven** (三辰光辉应化之天),
like the **Three Ascending Ways** (如三奔之道),
**constructing the Sun and Moon Palaces** (上造日月宫),
with **towered gates and immortal citizen worlds**, all **born of crystalline light** (有楼阙仙民世界，皆晶光所生).

The **Piercing-Light Supreme Jade Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Yi of Static Serenity** (光洞极瑶天，帝越静灵公).
The **Bright Dharma Illuminating White Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Dao of Reverent Observation** (明梵耀白天，帝道谨观元).
The **Mysterious Virtue Joyous-Generating Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Bo of Commanding Vitality** (玄德悦生天，帝伯兹命栖).
The **Reverent Recorded Bright Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Jiao of the Angle and Tong Clan** (恭纪彦张天，帝角牢同氏).
The **Mysterious Nine True Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Zhao of Nurturing Diligent Essence** (妙玄九真天，帝兆育勤精).
The **Piercing-Gate Profound庄 Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Yong of Eternal Nine Saints** (洞关深庄天，帝永幽九英).
The **Great Flight Mysterious Prevailing Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Ding of Rectified Normality** (太飞玄颇天，帝定正常无).
The **Dark Profound Leakage Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Ji of Thorny庄 You** (冥窈漏度天，帝棘兹庄攸).

---
**The Eight Heavens of the South:**
The **Nine Paths Abyssal Fish Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Ri of Floating Capital** (九道渊鱼天，帝日观浮都).
The **Forest Origin Permitting Wind Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Qia of Expatriate Child of Void** (林元允风天，帝侨平子虚).
The **Transformation-Pure Tranquil Yi Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Huan of Returning Window Alou** (化净寂夷天，帝还窦阿娄).
The **Dharma-Cloud Profound Mysterious Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Min of Pitying Jiang, Ascending in Seclusion** (梵云深玄天，帝悯江幽升).
The **Accomplished Virtue Precious Qi Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Shun of Protecting Bright Homeland** (成德宝气天，帝顺护彦丘).
The **Static Rectitude Canopy-Expanding Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Dong of Piercing Truth, Sovereign Yao** (静正霄敷天，帝洞真端尧).
The **Ascending-Descending Governance Achieved Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Qing of Commanding Soldiers** (升降治臻天，帝卿度司兵).
The **Pure Truth Purple Void Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Feng of Upholding Piercing Governance** (清真紫虚天，帝奉贯治王).

---
**The Eight Heavens of the West:**
The **Mingled Precious True Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Tai of Great Substance Capital** (混合宝真天，帝太素京).
The **Seal-Bearing Again Mysterious Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Sha Tuo Xi** (保印又玄天，帝剎陀奚).
The **Venerable Ancestor’s Auspicious Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Du of Crossing Immortality, Venerable Sovereign** (洪拱祖秀天，帝度仙元尊).
The **Arrayed Celestial Nine Masters Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Huang of Imperial Factor, Great Constellation** (列辰九师天，帝皇因太微).
The **Void Illumination Light Primordial Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Chang of Expansive Obscure Qi** (虚明光元天，帝敞冥气玄).
The **Han’s Command Prohibited Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Hua of Numerous True Mechanisms** (韩司明禁天，帝华屡真机).
The **Flowing Essence Jewel Sphere Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Bo of Piercing Caverns, Comprehensive Symbols** (流精琼球天，帝博洞备符).
The **Divine Dragon Transformation Ultimate Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Yu of Jade Purity, Supervising Truth** (神龙变至天，帝玉清监真).

---
**The Eight Heavens of the North:**
The **Transformation Degree True Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Qiu of Seeking Universal Lin** (变度化真天，帝求何普林).
The **Void Dharma Shadow-Concealing Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Jue of Awakened Immortal, Drifting Like** (空梵影藏天，帝觉仙荡如).
The **Wind Origin Changing Qi Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Bi of Humble Retardation Yu** (风元易气天，帝鄙迟忽俞).
The **Mountain-Descending Immortal Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Dou of Battle Axe, Jade Noble** (临山降仙天，帝斗魁玉宸).
The **Gathering Auspicious Azure Chamber Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Du of Observing Many Sands** (集庆苍室天，帝睹多沙留).
The **Morning Swallow Fierce Department Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Tai of Teacher, Declaring Distant** (朝燕猛部天，帝泰师宣遐).
The **Effortous Tower Bright Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Dong of Piercing Performance, Embankment** (劫仞吉明天，帝洞演务陂).
The **Confronting Kui Island Rectified Heaven**, ruled by **Emperor Hao of Embankment Mountain, Venerable Sovereign** (相夔岛正天，帝郝陂山尊).

---
**Thirty-Two Heavens, Thirty-Two Emperors** (三十二天，三十二帝),

**profound beyond measure** (深不可详).
**Manifesting divine truths**, they **universally deliver gods and humans** (敷落神真，普度天人).
