**The Great Compassionate Void Emperor,**
who transforms this Gate of Birth’s opening.
With the Yellow Banner summoning the Celestial Demon,
the Saints assemble in the Great Clarity.

The Six Qi intertwine and bind,
while the Ten Thousand Forms preserve life’s creation.
The Sovereign’s Pole established,
the Three Ways must flow in harmony.

The Eight Substances descend to Yu’s Remnant,
the Heavenly Folk hasten to the Five Celestial Stems.
In unison, they cultivate the True Dao of the Primordial,
ascending divine spirits to the Jade Capital.

Above the Three Celestial Stems,
within the flying void,
the Celestial True Ones chant—
their voices harmonize with the Piercing Hymns.
Recite them a hundred times,
and your name ascends to the Southern Palace.
Recite them a thousand times,
and the Celestial True Ones descend to welcome you.
Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao,
ascending to the Supreme Void,
transcending the Three Realms,
and attaining the rank of the Immortal Lord.

Those who hear the Sacred Sound—
the Demon King bows in reverence,
commanding the Earthly Spirits
to attend and escort.
He extracts the Five Torments and Eight Difficulties from the Earthly Gate,
elevates the Seven Ancestors,
forever removes them from the Ghostly Bureau,
guides their souls across the Vermilion Ridge,
and refines them into rebirth.
This is called the Boundless Salvation,
universally extending without end.

There are hidden Celestial Scriptures,
revered by all the Heavens.
To reveal them carelessly is to fall into the Hell of Arrogance,
bringing calamity upon the Seven Ancestral Uncles.
The Dao says:
These two chapters are the hidden voices of the Three Celestial Stems’ True Ones,
the words of the Great Brahman,
not the common speech of the world.
Drawing radiance and gathering brilliance,
they descend the Heavenly Light,
transmitting the Mysterious to attain Immortality—
thus called the Profound and Obscure,
difficult to trace in detail.

Treasure of the Highest Heaven,
hidden in the Eastern Vault of the Divine Xuan.
According to the ancient formula,
it must be transmitted every 37,000 years.
If a perfected adept brings gold and jade with a sincere heart,
and according to the old formula pledges to the Ten Heavens,
then it shall be bestowed.

The Dao says:
The Three Celestial Stems’ radiance is serene, unwaning.
The Heavenly Rotation completes its course—
how could it ever end?
When the Moon aligns with the Sun,
the Yin invades the Yang, obscuring its light.
When the Sun aligns with the Moon,
the Yang eclipses the Yin, dimming its brilliance.
Yet even when the Qi conceals them,
the Three Celestial Stems are never diminished—
they are the utmost essence of Heaven and Earth.
If you gather their light and brilliance,
you become a True One of the Upper Clarity,
holding the reins at the Mysterious Terrace.
Thus, the revolutions of waxing and waning,
the rise and fall of human fortunes,
even sickness and injury—
by preserving the True and absorbing the light,
massaging where the ailment lingers,
or contemplating grasping the Sun and Moon,
holding the Celestial Stems in hand,
sitting to attain the Divine,
you may preserve life and never age.

With a unified heart, observe the fasts,
offer incense at the Six Times,
turn the scriptures tenfold,
and the blessings of virtue descend,
dissipating all inauspicious omens.
The Boundless Texts universally extend salvation without end.

The Dao says:
The Three Celestial Stems’ radiance preserves life and prolongs existence.
The Nine-Colored Divine Light refines the bones and perfuses the heart.
The Yang Essence merges with the Qi,
and the Immortal Transformation unites with the Spirit.
Or, you may store the Three Manifestations in the Cinnabar Field,
illuminate the Six Palaces of the Universe,
shining through the Chamber of Perfection,
containing the brilliance and swallowing the essence,
thus ascending as a High True One.

But those of shallow Daoist practice,
whose Immortal rank is yet incomplete,
when the Yang declines and the Yin prevails,
lying in the Five Battles’ form,
their Dao should fade and depart—
at the moment of passing,
their fellow adepts shall offer incense and recite the scriptures ten times,
conducting their corpse according to the law,
so their soul and spirit may directly ascend to the Southern Palace,
and by their merit, be reborn on the appointed day.
Without hesitation in the Wheel of Rebirth,
they shall attain the Divine and Immortal.

The Dao says:
The Three Celestial Stems are the origin of the Supreme Dao,
upon which all phenomena depend for life,
and through which Saints and Immortals are perfected.
Revering their might,
one may subdue the Six Heavens,
and cause demons to vanish in form.
Drawing their light,
it pierces the remote passes,
cleansing the womb, the fetus, and the blood of the corpse,
dissolving the grudges of seven lifetimes.
Absorbing their brilliance,
your body glows with golden hue,
your face radiates jade light,
and you ascend to the Taiwei,
your spirit soaring to the Xuanxiao.
When radiance and brilliance bloom,
ten thousand blossoms condense into elixir,
the inch of space gathers treasures,
crystals fly to retrieve the soul,
controlling the Purple Court of the Celestial Stems,
floating in the Upper Clarity,
feasting in the Jade Capital.

When Heaven and Earth complete their cycle,
the stars shift their courses,
the Sun and Moon lose their eclipses,
the Four Seasons falter,
the lands suffer calamity,
martial omens appear,
plagues and poisons spread,
the common folk perish in droves,
and teachers and friends pass away—
all should observe the fasts,
offer incense, and recite the scriptures.

For fasting, abstinence, and scripture-recitation
carry immense merit.
Above, they dispel Heavenly calamities,
protecting and safeguarding the Emperor.
Below, they avert poison and harm,
salvaging the common folk.
Life and death depend upon them—
their blessings are boundless,
thus it is said: Boundless, universally salvaging Heaven and Man.

The Dao says:
All who hold this scripture with reverent faith—
the Three Celestial Stems’ radiance shall descend and illuminate your body.
It repels external misfortune,
binds your spirit within,
transports your subtle essence,
so you may behold the Celestial Spirits,
refines your soul while your corpse dissolves,
preserving life and prolonging existence.
Above, you serve as the Emperor of Heaven and Earth for the myriad folk,
performing these virtues.
On days of calamity,
with a sincere heart, observe the fasts, burn incense,
and recite the scriptures ten times—
all the Heavens shall record your name,
ten thousand spirits shall guard you,
and the Right Separate Adepts
shall make you a minister of the Golden Gate for the Holy Sovereign.

The Heavens record every deed and transgression without omission.
Even the Demon Kings of the Celestial Realm
shall recommend your name.
Only those who attain the Dao
shall truly comprehend these profound words.

**The Boundless Sounds of the Three Celestial Stems’ Great Brahman Hidden Speech**
Composed by the Dao Lord
**The Supreme Three Enclosures Preserve Life and Prolong Existence Jade Classic**
**Eastern Eight Heavens**

**The Boundless Sounds of the Three Celestial Stems’ Great Brahman Hidden Speech**
*(Continued)*

**Southern Eight Heavens**
The luminous soul shines with radiant clarity,
Mountains of mud communicate with spirits.
Jade peaks of the Chou constellation glow,
The Master of Illusions reveals the Crimson Lotus.
The Southern Marsh veils in mist,
The boundless fields of the Dark River stretch endlessly.
The Evil Tooth Monastery stands firm,
The Circle of Heaven’s mechanisms is sealed by the Floating Lotus.
The Demon King’s power fades into the void,
As intent harmonizes with the heart.
No fall nor delay—
All things gather in the distant smoke.
The Brahman’s luminous origin,
The Dharma’s ease, the Path’s clarity.

**Western Eight Heavens**
The Jade Rock of Yama’s Realm,
Where the Preceptor and the Scholar oversee.
The Mirror of the Void reveals itself,
Plowing the evening’s fervent heat.
The Northern Mist clears the celestial pole,
The Great Dipper’s virtue is held in reverence.
The aged Hua returns to its roots,
The Departments of Discrimination drift upon the waves.
The Purple Peaks stand in solemn debate,
Their fragrance pure and distant.
The stillness of the Ba Gate,
The Pool’s performance as the waters surge.
In the silent grove, the treasures hide,
The Imperial Ancestors’ souls linger near.
The Foundry of Vision opens to the capital,
The Chen Clan’s lowly descendants rise.
**Northern Eight Heavens**
The Dark Grace’s schemes unfold,
The Pure Pearl’s brilliance cleanses the Pass.
The Zheng and the Xie, the Witch of the Marsh,
The Cloud Court’s driftwood awaits.
The Golden Return surpasses all,
The Zephyr’s poetry lingers in the Dew.
The Thin Goodness hastens its tribute,
The Wen River’s depths expand.
The Zhou Alliance’s革镠 shines,
The Peak of the Ridge is inscribed with fate.
Transformation’s praise echoes in the void,
The Dark Temple’s rites are refined.
The Spirit’s essence governs the capital,
The Seasons’ harmony blooms with peach blossoms.
The Treasure of the Wan is distinguished,
The distant Preta’s name is recorded.

**The Dao Speaks:**
These are the Great Brahman’s Hidden Words within the Heavens,
Sounds without measure, summoning the Three Celestial Stems’ radiance,
Drawing the True *qi* of the Nine Heavens.
With pure chanting and jade oblation,
The Celestial Worthies descend to welcome.

The ancient scriptures naturally emit Brahmanic *qi*,
Born within the Three Celestial Stems’ palaces,
To govern the great and small calamities of the Three Realms—
The shifts of water and fire.
The Celestial Worthies carve their names upon the Sun, Moon,
And the Great Stars of the Hosts.
Next, they avert disasters and blockings,
Severing misfortune and stagnation,
Enhancing life’s momentum and virtue.

Those who recognize this scripture
Command the ghosts and gods,
Enlist the Six Ding,
Preserve life and prolong existence,
Transmitting the spirit through the void.

The characters are square, a *zhang* in breadth,
With eight angles.
Worn as an amulet or inscribed on silk,
Bound with crimson cords and jade tablets for recording names.

Those who know its sound
And recite it with fasting devotion—
All the Heavens dispatch flying celestial kings
To observe their bodies,
Recording their merits and labor,
Reporting upward to the Heavens.
Ten thousand spirits pay homage,
The Earthly Deities guard the gates,
The Great Demon Kings recommend the Perfected Ones,
And those who attain the Dao
Shall wander the Three Realms,
Ascending to the Golden Gate.

This sound repels all,
Averts all,
Transcends all,
Accomplishes all—
The natural sound of the Celestial Worthies.

Thus, when recited,
The Three Celestial Stems descend with light,
The Nine Clouds gather the *qi*,
Refining mortal bones into the Dao.
Ancestors ascend as Immortals,
Golden flowers bloom upon the crown,
Jade-like complexions shine in unison,
Lifespans equal the radiant round.
Attaining the Dao naturally,
They fly below the Heavens,
The Sovereign of Heaven sings from afar,
Ten thousand spirits bow in reverence,
The Three Realms serve at the hall,
All deities prostrate in submission,
Ghostly spirits vanish in terror,
The chimes of the Linglang resound,
The Ten Directions stand in solemn stillness,
Rivers and seas fall silent,
Mountains swallow the smoke,
All living beings tremble in awe,
Summoning the gathered Immortals.

The Heavens know no filth,
The Earth no demonic dust,
The Dark and the Wise are perfectly clear—
The boundless, the boundless.

**The Supreme Scripture of the Soul’s Treasure for Transcending Mortality, Volume Twenty-Eight Complete**
**Volume Twenty-Nine**

**The Chapter on Descending Truth and Extending Lifespan**

The Dao speaks: *"In the beginning, within the Azure Sky, the vast floating land of the Spacious Void sang the Great Scripture of the Primordial One. The Primordial Venerable One, when expounding this scripture, circled ten times, summoning the Ten Directions, before taking His seat. The Heavenly True Gods, the Highest Saints, the Mystic True Persons—those who descend truth and extend lifespan—along with the Blessed Kings of Virtue, the Openers of Destiny, the Lords of Fixed Birth, the Protectors of Human Spirits, and the countless innumerable True Gods of the Ten Directions, all arrived, riding the void.*

*They controlled the Azure Purple of the Celestial Poles, soared upon the gusts of the Spacious Void, presented the Danxia wheels in crimson mists, and encircled their chariots with verdant scenery. Celestial canopies bore auspicious omens, divine parasols emitted fragrant incense, and divine light blazed in crimson hues. The Six Qi harmonized and accumulated, while the void and the Dharma-realm stood empty.*

*For seven days and seven nights, the Great Saints and High True Ones of the heavens manifested in their domains, their palaces and watchtowers gleaming with radiant brilliance. The Dharma drums and celestial melodies resounded naturally, their rhythms pure and clear, filling ten thousand caves and a thousand valleys. Divine winds swayed, the sun and moon ascended in splendor, their paired luminaries piercing the Nine Heavens. The Star Consorts climbed the celestial cords, their forms unrestrained, while the Jade Emperor established the eternal order, gathering the qi. The Ten Directions shone brightly, the Three Realms bathed in purity, and every mountain, river, forest, and tree within the land—every stream, gorge, cavern, and sea—glowed with golden radiance. Each had its True Immortals, standing in proper reverence, their caps and robes beneath them, gazing afar with distant awe, as if awaiting an appointed time.*

*The divine gateways and lofty towers rose majestically, their emerald peaks towering like dark brows. Heavenly flowers rained down, and brocade silk draped the surroundings. The gathered True Ones attended at His seat, while the Primordial Venerable One sat in seclusion atop the Jade Palace of Ten Treasures, where the Dragon of Pearls and the Soaring Dragon hovered.*

*When the scripture was expounded once, the Heavenly True Gods of the Ten Directions descended in joyous voices, simultaneously praising its virtue, declaring its worth for all who seek the Dao, and extending lifespans. At that time, all men and women within the land possessed the Six Perfections, their transformations natural.*

*When the scripture was expounded twice, the True Thoughts resonated, and the Heavenly Sovereign descended in grace.*

*When the scripture was expounded thrice, the boundless sea stilled its waves, and the Dragon Palaces shone forth in clarity.*

*When the scripture was expounded four times, celestial frost descended in indigo, and the earth bore purple mulberries, offering reverence to the descending truth.*

*When the scripture was expounded five times, all karmic illnesses and demonic afflictions within the Dao’s structures dissolved, and all attained mystical penetration, their divine wisdom awakening.*

*When the scripture was expounded six times, they permanently dwelled in the Dao and the Dharma-realm, no longer subject to retribution’s end before falling away.*

*When the scripture was expounded seven times, they could summon heart-incense across all Immortal Realms, welcoming the descent of the Ten-Direction Three-Realm Heavenly Sovereigns to extend lifespans and deliver beings.*

*When the scripture was expounded eight times, in still observation of the Three Realms, all myriad beings were seen as Heavenly Immortals and High True Ones, manifesting in transformed bodies to perform deeds and protect the land, descending to request the True Spirits, extending lifespans, and delivering beings.*

*When the scripture was expounded nine times, the wondrous altars of the Cloud Forests appeared, each inhabited by the Supreme True Ones, descending in person to teach and extend lifespans for all.*

*When the scripture was expounded ten times, the joyous praises and reverences were without precedent. The Primordial Heavenly Sovereign Himself proclaimed the essential Dharma-teachings, for the sake of all sentient beings, descending truth and extending lifespans.*

*At that time, all men and women within the land inclined their hearts in devotion, receiving protection and all attaining longevity.*

*The Dao speaks: When the scripture was expounded once, the Eastern True Gods of Supreme Truth—those who descend truth and extend lifespans—innumerable in their hosts, arrived floating upon the void. When the scripture was expounded twice, the Southern True Gods of Supreme Truth—those who descend truth and extend lifespans—innumerable in their hosts, arrived floating upon the void. When the scripture was expounded thrice, the Western True Gods of Supreme Truth—those who descend truth and extend lifespans—innumerable in their hosts, arrived floating upon the void. When the scripture was expounded four times, the Northern True Gods of Supreme Truth—those who descend truth and extend lifespans—innumerable in their hosts, arrived floating upon the void. When the scripture was expounded six times, the Southeast True Gods of Supreme Truth—those who descend truth and extend lifespans—innumerable in their hosts, arrived floating upon the void. When the scripture was expounded seven times, the Southwest True Gods of Supreme Truth—those who descend truth and extend lifespans—innumerable in their hosts, arrived floating upon the void. When the scripture was expounded eight times, the Northwest True Gods of Supreme Truth—those who descend truth and extend lifespans—innumerable in their hosts, arrived floating upon the void. *When the tenfold circuit was complete, the True Gods of Supreme Truth from the Ten Directions—those who descend truth and extend lifespans—all arrived together at once. All men and women within the land inclined their hearts in reverence.*

*Those who came each bore flower banners and treasured robes, rare fruits, fragrant groves, and wondrous offerings, chanting praises as they approached to pay homage to the Primordial Venerable One, wishing to hear the descending truth and the extension of lifespans for all.*

*The Upper Pure Ten-Direction Heavenly Beings, the Supreme True Gods, and all men and women within the land each reflected upon the Heavenly Sovereign’s great compassion, how He illuminated their darkness, revealed the essential Dharma-teachings, and proclaimed the Dao’s principles for the sake of lower beings, requesting the descent of the Supreme True Ones to prolong lifespans.*

*Though we heavenly beings have ascended through Daoic merit to our celestial ranks, even the Southern Palace’s Upper Realm is still bound by fate’s limits. Though our lifespans may endure for hundreds, thousands, or millions of years, we have not yet transcended the Three Realms, preserved our heavenly existence, or entered the formless—free from the cycle of birth and death.*

*Now we joyfully hear the Heavenly Sovereign, as the First of the Highest Dao-Lords, expounding the supreme teachings for delivering beings, descending to awaken the True Spirits, and extending human lifespans. We, who have attained the celestial ranks, should rejoice in believing this Dharma, practice according to its teachings, and ascend to the Sacred Way, never again turning in the wheel of existence.*

*Thus they praised and declared, their voices filling the Ten-Direction Realms, like hidden thunder and gusting rains, the clash of metal and stone shaking the Five Peaks, the Eight Seas, and the Twelve Divine Mountains. Mists congealed, waves surged, lions paced in solemn tread, phoenixes and cranes cried in song, dragon pools and misty marshes swirled in undulating clouds. The Spacious Void bore auspicious signs, and the Emerald Capital radiated light."*

Thus, the Primordial Beginning immediately rose from his seat, commanding the attendants—True Spirit Consort, Supreme Polarity Jade Consort, the Boundless Longevity Heavenly Lord of the Lanwei Thousandfold Harmony, and the fragrant incense of the Eightfold Auspicious Blossoms—to stir the sacred teachings with rhythmic sounds. The flutes and pipes played in harmony, the calabash and bamboo pipes were passed in turn, gazing upon the Ten-Direction Realms. He proclaimed to the Supreme Dao-Lord and all beings of the Ten Directions:

*"The Law of Descending Truth and Extending Lifespans has already been attained by those in the Sacred Rank—truly, the True contains the True. This True Master encompasses all Truths, serving as the Transformative Sovereign of the Three Realms. Now, I offer incense and prostrate myself to invite the Descending Truth."*

Once the Truth descended, it merged with the divine *qi* and True Spirit, the True Spirit returning to its form, and lifespans eternally extended. The extended lifespan is the harmonious manifestation of Heavenly Virtue. Dao-Longevity is boundless, Heavenly Lifespan has its limit, human lifespan is uncertain, and Earthly Lifespan has an end. Yet if one can invite the Descending Truth, the Truth communicates with the Dao, and lifespan becomes boundless—this is the so-called Eternal Life, Everlasting Vision, and Infinite Agelessness of ten thousand years!

With joyful laughter and eternal bliss, he spoke thus and bowed his head to the Ten Directions, his heart reverently worshipping the Dao-Source.

Suddenly, within the Spacious Void, radiance overflowed in every direction. Jade-like palaces drifted in the celestial halls, and the lofty, verdant platforms of the Divine Court resounded with the presence of myriad Saints and thousandfold Truths, moving amidst clouds and mists, riding dragons and tigers, their distant forms visible like brushstrokes, their brilliance surpassing the sun’s wheel. The golden *qi* of the adamantine essence encircled the sacred center, manifesting in twenty-four extraordinary, unparalleled hues—appearing and vanishing in splendor and obscurity, their emerald and azure hues dazzling, their clarity rivaling the moon’s pearls.

The Primordial Beginning then summoned the Great Heavenly Truths: the Supreme Sage and High Exalted One, the Marvelous Conducted True Person, and the Descending Truths of the Ten Directions, all entering the drifting palaces. The beings of the upper and lower heavens looked on in awe, seeing only a gentle breeze wafting from the Jade Terrace and the Celestial Gate, eightfold paths leading inward. Once inside the drifting palaces, their presence was unknown.

The land’s people scattered, the earthly clouds softening like a tread upon cotton. Heaven showered myriad flowers, their colors filling the measure, their petals burying wheels and shoes. Fragrant winds purified the void, crimson light flowing in motion. Within the Divine Hall, the Primordial Beginning expounded the scriptures to completion, and the gathered Truths supervised the transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, my joy was indescribable.

The ritual rites were now fully known. The beings of the heavens returned to their ranks, and in an instant, silence remained without trace.

At that time, all heavenly beings encountered the scriptures and teachings, universally receiving deliverance and extending their lifespans without interruption. The land submitted in reverence, all acknowledging the Dao-Truth, extending life, spirit, *qi*, essence, teachings, and form—extending breath, transformation, blessings, and auspiciousness. Their words held no deceit, their voices no falsehood, their hearts united in compassion, their bones, though different, bound in kinship.

The realm was at peace, its people prosperous, with eternal tranquility throughout the *kalpas*. The scriptures first emerged with the teachings, and the nation was governed by the Dao. Those who earnestly sought the scriptures, inviting the Descending Truth and extending lifespans, all attained deliverance for the world.

The Dao-Speech declares: *"The names spoken in the scriptures by the Primordial Beginning Heavenly Lord are the hidden titles of the heavenly beings’ Descending Truths, the secret sounds of extending lifespans, and the concealed names of the hundred spirits. These are not the common words of the world. The Supreme Sage, having already become a True Person, penetrates the Mysterious and fathoms the subtle, comprehending all its chapters.*

*If one recites this chapter ten times, the Jade Purity descends its Truth, and the Divine Expanse commands its Spirits. The Heavenly Emperor recites it to extend the *kalpa*, the True Person recites it to extend the spirit, the Supreme Sage recites it to extend the Dao, and the Immortal recites it to extend their era. The heavens descend from afar, and the Ten Radiant Ones bow at the courtyard. The rivers and seas become clear and serene, the mountains and valleys solidified in stillness. The sun and moon align their brilliance, the Grand Harmony vanishes into purity. Demons bind their forms, and ghostly essences are extinguished. Corpses rise from decay, white bones reform as flesh. Those who study deeply, reciting it ten times, will have the Five Emperors halt their chariots, the Three Officials attend as guests. The Highest Truths will welcome their rites, and the Spirit-Persons will open their gates. Demon-essences will flee into hiding, and ghostly spirits will submit their forms. They will heal the sick and deliver the dead, severing death to attain rebirth.*

*Thus is the power of this chapter: for scholars, their earthly *qi* already dissipated, their spirits descending into Truth, commanding the Ten Directions, extending lifespans of a thousand years, governing the earthly officials, and ordering the watery spirits. They will cut away the dark and simple, the names of the past, extending their term and averting death. The Dao is complete for eternal life.*

*If one recites this lightly, calamity will befall them. Offering reverent worship, their households will flourish eternally, their blessings everlasting, no disasters approaching, and divine spirits guarding their gates.*

*This scripture is supremely noble and unique, surpassing all others in the Jade Capital, delivering countless beings, and serving as the core of Descending Truth and Longevity. Its vast and lofty scope, its virtue beyond measure.*

*The Dao-Speech declares: *‘For those who recite this scripture ten times, all the heavens will gather. The Lords of Fate and Record will extend their lifespans, and the Great God of the Southern Blossom will descend the Truth for them. The purple clouds will rise, the celestial canopy will lower, and their names will be inscribed, their lifespans recorded in the celestial registers, extending without end. The Five Great Ghosts, bringing calamity, will be bound in litigation by the Primordial Hour—none shall dare offend those who invite the Descending Truth.*

*Those who love and study this scripture deeply, their merits fulfilled and virtues attained, will all become Immortals, ascending to the golden gates and feasting in the Jade Capital. The scholars of the highest learning, who recite this scripture and invite the heavenly Truths, will immediately receive deliverance and ascend to the Nine Palaces.*

*Mortal beings who recite it will awaken the divine Spirits, extending their lifespans and years. Later, they will all attain the Way of Corporeal Dissolution, where spirit and *qi* transform their forms, entering and exiting the shadowy and dark realms, returning to the hidden treasures of heaven, and penetrating the formless void.*

*This scripture is subtle and profound, universally delivering without limit. All heavenly beings and mortals cannot but rejoice in receiving its blessings. Its boundless merit extends life and safeguards happiness—it is a treasure of the heavens, not transmitted to the lower world.*

*Only the virtuous scholar, bearing golden treasures and offering sincere devotion, can swear an oath to heaven and pass it down. If one reveals or belittles this lightly, calamity will fall upon the Nine Ancestors, eternal servitude in the Ghostly Offices. The Descending Truths—Longevity Youths and Jade Maidens, each twenty-eight in number—will guard the sacred texts, attending and protecting those who receive the scripture."*

The Dao speaks: In the first month, observe a long fast and recite this scripture to invoke the descent of the Eastern Nine-*qi* Green Emperor, who will sever the bonds of ghostly servitude and summons, granting longevity and entry into the Green Emperor’s Palace. In the seventh month, observe a long fast and recite this scripture to invoke the descent of the Western Seven-*qi* Great Primordial Sovereign, who will sever calamities and injuries, dispel lingering illnesses, and grant immortality—engrave the text on yellow talismans and white tablets, cutting off death and ensuring rebirth.

In the tenth month, observe a long fast and recite this scripture to invoke the descent of the Northern Five-*qi* Mystic Elder Sovereign, who will sever water taboos, tomb disputes, and penal judgments, dispel wind-dampness and malevolent influences, and summon ancestral souls. For kings, emperors, and their ministers and children, this grants longevity, eternal preservation, and unbroken rule, securing peace for their lands.

On the eight seasonal nodes, recite this scripture to invoke the descent of the Eight Scenic High Saints and the Supreme Elder, who will sever ghostly afflictions, poisons, and the thirty-six chronic ailments, allowing escape from wild paths and the Five-*you* calamities, granting longevity and the rank of Nine-Palace True Person.

On one’s birth day, recite this scripture to invoke the descent of the Six-*jia* Spirit Consorts and the Three Sovereigns of the Dao, who will sever the year’s fatal influences, malevolent deities, and all harm, ensuring the practitioner’s spirit remains pure and eternal. Free from suffering, the body radiates light, attended by the Three Realms’ guardians, the Five Emperors’ escorts, and the homage of ten thousand spirits. Their name ascends to heaven, merits fulfilled, and they ascend to the Upper Purity.

The Dao speaks: On days of practice, one must bathe in fragrant water, fast in seclusion, facing east, and strike the teeth twenty-eight times to awaken the Twenty-Eight Heavens. Bowing inwardly twenty-eight times, close the eyes and meditate upon sitting within the three-colored clouds—green, yellow, and white—while inner and outer darkness enfolds. There appear the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane arrayed on either side, with the sun and moon illuminating the chamber. A luminous halo forms at the nape, casting light in all directions, vivid and clear.

The secret incantation:
*"Supreme Mystic Origin, Supreme Dao Sovereign, summon forth from my body the Three Five Functionaries, left and right officials and messengers, the fragrant jade youths attending, the speaking jade maidens, the Five Emperors’ direct seals, and the direct-day incense officials—each thirty-six in number—to open the way for my words.*

*Today is a day of auspicious celebration, a long fast in the pure hall, practicing this wondrous scripture to deliver countless beings.*

*May my petition reach the heights, ascending directly before the Supreme Thirty-Two Heavens’ Elemental Emperor of the Most High.*

*Conclude by drawing the qi twenty-eight times, facing east and reciting the scripture.*

**The Supreme Origin’s Scripture of Boundless Deliverance, Supreme Purity**

**The Supreme Mystic’s Hidden Treasure Chapter, Descending Truths of Longevity and Subtle Spirit**

Tenfold deliverance of beings.

The hidden melodies of the heavens, merging and parting naturally, boundless and formless, void and obscure.

Before primordial *qi* arose, who could know its truth?

The truth dwells in the boundless void, the master of transformation, unchanging and immutable, neither destroyed nor formed—its body as indestructible as gold, its essence the true void.

The truth governs fate, recording all souls.
The truth is the Heavenly Venerable, propagating the teachings and preserving the scriptures.
The truth is the Precious Sovereign, bestowing fortune and prosperity upon the people.
The truth grants longevity, nurturing the world’s affections.
The truth refines destiny, arranging the patterns of life and death.

Thus, the Heavenly Truth is the god of the void, the essence of darkness, the true Dao.

As one calls upon it, pearl carriages and phoenix palanquins arise, their banners nine-hued, their bodies clad in golden green, riding the *qi* and clouds, with myriad officials and soldiers. They prolong life and record names for rebirth.

Above, there is no ancestral return—only the Dao as one’s body.

To invoke the Heavenly Truth is to see one’s lifespan extended daily.

Passing through the Nine Sixes, one’s *qi* and spirit become divine and responsive.

Without the truth, there is no light, no clarity, no establishment, no completion, no deliverance, no birth. This is the Great Brahman, the truth within truth.

In the Azure Void’s net, the Golden Gate’s jade city,
At the summit of divine winds, the layered purple court.

The truth’s origin is neither form nor absence—
As if it exists, as if it does not.

The Great Dao’s *qi* circulates the ten directions,

The Benevolent Life-Nurturing Elder,

Descending truths and boundless deliverance.

the Bureau of Fate, the Palace of Longevity and Augmented Destiny,

subduing demons and safeguarding ascent, granting longevity in the Southern Palace.
Qi and bones receive the Dao; virtue and power manifest as the embodied Self.

the Eight Hells, and Nine Abysses,
transcending the Three Realms, wandering freely in Upper Clarity.

the realm of formless *dharma* and ascetic practice.

descending as fate decrees, interfacing with wind-*qi*,

this is the mechanism by which omens manifest.

The Twenty-Eight Heavens, the Twenty-Eight Sovereigns.
The heavens’ hidden names, the heavens’ concealed titles.
The void within the heavens, the natural numinous diagrams.
The heavens’ hidden melodies, the sounds within the heavens.
The heavens’ supreme, the heavens’ gods, the heavens’ True Ones, the heavens’ spirits.

Divine essences descend, harmonizing in *yīnyún* mist.
The exalted True Gods descend to Upper Clarity.
The boundless mysteries are profound, beyond measure.
Those who know the descending Truths grant longevity and deliverance.

Today, rejoicing in reception of deliverance,
passing through the heavenly gates,
inscribing sincerity for passage,
piercing the depths of the arcane,
flying to the Nine True Ones,
soaring through the Great Mysteries,
the Three True Ones overseeing,
ascending into the Celestial Gate.

The Eastern Dipper records destiny,
the Western Dipper records names,
the Northern Dipper marks death,
the Southern Dipper marks birth,
the Central Dipper’s Great Arc—
the deliverance of the True Ones descending.

The Green Sovereign presents the decrees,
the White Sovereign breaks the contracts,
the Red Sovereign reveals the texts,
the Black Sovereign records the vows,
the Yellow Sovereign opens the way—
the Dao-True Ones merge in transformation.

The Green Heaven’s Command Gods traverse the Nine Mysteries.
The Red Heaven’s Fire Bells decapitate demonic souls.
The White Heaven wields spears, arrayed by imperial edict.
The Black Heaven commands ten thousand divine soldiers.
The Yellow Heaven disperses *qi*, the True Ones assembled in ranks.
The Five Heavenly True Ones, the ten thousand gods’ sovereigns,
soaring through the Three Realms, commanding thunder and lightning.
Brandishing banners, hurling fire—
the Nine Evils flee in terror.
The descending Truths grant longevity,
virtue and power ensure prosperity.
The demonic blades are crushed,
the heavens’ functions unified.
The Celestial Sovereign delivers beings,
sweeping away the Northern *Tíng*.
The Nether Officials’ ghostly courts—
killing *qi* fills the void.

Gazing upward, the High True Ones descend,
the Five Peaks lush and verdant.
The Eight Seas refine purity,
the Six Heavens merge in harmony.
The Heavenly Sovereign inspects the registers,
the Senior Ministers confer titles.
The Purple Emperor decrees longevity,
a billion kālas aligned in termination.
The rear ranks drive the Thunder Officials,
the vanguard urges the Dragon Couriers.
Dare any obstruct—
they block the ascent of the High True Ones.
Galloping through the Vermilion Chambers,
dancing wheels in the Northern Pure—
the True Ones descend with jade talismans,
transforming infantile substance.
Ascending with the Sovereign’s companions,
their ranks inscribed in cinnabar and jade.
Shaking luminous light, boundless azure paths,
central ranks of the Nine Palaces,
harmonizing with the Celestial Capital.
Nurturing life-*qi* anew,
spiritual mechanisms internally cultivated.
Flickering transformations,
personally interfacing with the Dao-True.

The Bureau of Fate holds the brush,
the Sovereign Lords impart the scriptures.
Longevity unbounded, all gods attend.
The Three Realms’ Five Sovereigns
proclaim the decrees of Upper Clarity.
The Great Light descends in silence,
a million kālas illuminated.
Vast yet intangible—
*mixed qi* resolves into void.
The void lacks form, the void lacks depth.
The void’s extreme births wind,
wind descends as dew.
Wind and dew permeate the emptiness—
the heaven within the heavens.
The heaven’s gods—
the gods are the heaven’s True Ones.
Descending *qi* activates the spirit,
heaven and earth thus perfected.
The Three Realms thereby established,
ten thousand phenomena contained.

The heavens above and below—
no depths, no darkness,
no form, no shadow,
no limit, no end.

The boundless Great Brahman,
vast and lightless.
Divine and True Ones spread their transformations,
moving by natural measure.

The Primordial Origin takes its seat,
lotus petals unfurling into scripture.
Nine-Heaven tiger seals,
Eight-Awe dragon scriptures.

Nurturing the enlightened ones,
descending the True Ones from above.
The True Dao flows abroad,
ten thousand patterns unfold.
True Light pierces through—
the Twenty-Eight Heavens.

The Celestial Wheel turns at its pivot,
revolving the Ten Directions.
The Southern Dipper circles the Enclosure,
returning to the Heaven’s apex.

Twenty-Eight Lodges,
gathering *qi* at the Northern Primordial.
Radiance merges in darkness,
True Scenes communicate with the Mysterious.
Within the Mysterious—
the Supreme Sovereign,
the Highest True One of Heaven.

The Celestial Vessel drifts through the sky,
arriving at the Imperial Court.
Stroking the *bi* and stirring sound,
resonating through the Cloud Camp.
Fluttering feathered banners,
the assembled saints and guests.

Recording fate’s decrees in jade calendars,
extending life and guiding birth.
*Qi* complete, spirit perfected—
naturally becoming True.
Within the True lies spirit,
the Eternal Great Lord.

The Left Divine Prince,
the Radiant Flower Venerable God.
The Emperor’s First Minister,
the Divine Mother, the Assistant Marshal.

Seated in solemn grandeur within the Three Palaces,
preserving life and rooting vitality.
True *qi* descends, connecting,
daily increasing lifespan.

Ascending to Upper Clarity,
resting in the Golden Chamber,
within the Nine Curves, the subtlest depths.
Descending to govern the human form,
the Vermilion Palace of the Cinnabar Field,
centralizing Dao-void,
mixed and boundless—spirit and True.

Nine orifices receive essence,
ten thousand *qi* harmonized with the Immortal.
The Immortal Dao values life,
endlessly guiding beings.

Entering and exiting the Heavenly Gate,
descending in the carriage with the girdle and headcloth.
Inspecting the mortal world,
judging guilt and virtue, prohibitions and precepts.
Past lives and karmic ties—
universally receiving enlightenment and liberation,
from ghostly substance to born form.

The form receives rebirth,
hearing the heavens above,
above the heavens—
the descent of the True Ones has its gate,
within which are verses of void and boundless song,
the Three True Sacred Scriptures,
words attuned to the Highest True.

---
**First: The Uppermost Pure Upper True Golden Illumination Great Emperor of the Three Flowers**
The Jade Capital vast and boundless,
the Mysterious Marsh—what lies beyond?
Cloud layers rise in grandeur,
stars concealed in the pestle-mortar.

Descending their gods,
the Pure and Harmonious spring.
Sprouts stretch forth naturally,
the True Dao thus revealed.

**Second: The Uppermost Clarity Upper True Divine Illumination Great Emperor of the Nine Flowers**
I ride the Eight Winds,
wings rustling—dragon in flight.
Descending to observe the mortal world,
my gaze green and clear.
Who dares approach my divine palace?
Wheeling past at night,
favor and blessings descend.

**Third: The Supreme Clarity Upper True Jade Illumination Spirit Great Emperor of the Ten Flowers**
Lifespan decreed by Heaven’s records,
I hold its measure.
Descending True Ones chant in mist,
the phoenix halts at the flowing pavilion.
Jade maidens pour fragrant offerings,
granting commands for ten thousand years.
You do not yet know the True—
the Dao departs from your body.

---
These are the songs of the Three True Ones above the Three Realms,
in the flying void,
their melodies attuned to the Sacred Verses.
Reciting them a hundred times
confers enlightenment in the Southern Palace.
A thousand recitations—
the Three True Ones preserve and welcome.
Ten thousand recitations—
the Dao is complete,
ascending to the Great Void,
transcending the Three Realms,
ranking as an Immortal Official.

Those who hear the Sacred Sounds
have their names recorded by the Heavenly True Ones.
By imperial decree, earthly spirits
attend as escorts and guides,
pulled from the earthly gate,
free from the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships,
the Seven Ancestors ascending—
forever parted from the Ghostly Bureau.
The True Ones descend to the hall,
lifespan exhausted yet reborn anew.

This is called boundless—
endlessly guiding without end.

There are secret celestial texts,
revered by all the heavens.
Revealing arrogance sends one to hell,
disaster befalling the Seven Ancestral Uncles.

The Dao speaks:
These Sacred Verses are the words of the Heavenly Sovereigns,
the Hidden Kings of Spirits and True Ones,
all the speech of the Great Brahman.
Not the common phrases of the world.
Without melodic grace,
without ornate curves—
thus called profound and elusive,
difficult to trace or examine.

Treasured by the heavens above,
secreted in the Mysterious Capital’s Purple Micro Palace,
according to the Mysterious Science,
transmitted once every forty thousand *kalpas*.

If a perfected one brings gold and jewels with sincere devotion,
following the ancient rites and pledging to the Ten Heavens,
then it shall be granted.

The Dao speaks:
Water and fire clash and surge,
the two cycles of decline and termination.
The stars’ stations and transits
also wax and wane.
Even the most sacred gods and spirits
may have departures and retreats.
The unenlightened may fall ill or be injured.

For all who suffer such calamities,
those of like *qi* must likewise employ this method of降真 (descending the True Ones) and延寿 (prolonging life),
in sacred mountains and holy waters,
beside the eastern currents of great forests,
within pure halls and tranquil pavilions—
establishing altars and ritual grounds,
offering incense and flowers in reverent homage,
reciting the scriptures as taught,
and beseeching the exalted降真 (True Ones of the Three Realms),
the holy assemblies of the Ten Directions,
the celestial warriors of the Nine Heavens,
to ward off disasters and eliminate misfortunes,
to invoke the Great God of延寿 (prolonging life) and益算 (augmenting destiny).

For three days, five days, seven days,
and likewise at night.

When the True Ones descend from the heavens,
they must first show signs of response—
strange luminous lights, white cranes, celestial music,
and extraordinary omens.

Or one may dream of traversing the Heavenly Gates,
personally meeting divine beings,
with blessings felt ever more profound,
as disasters and calamities retreat and fade,
延寿 (prolonging life) and添年 (adding years) are granted,
and the Way of长生 (eternal life) is attained.

If worldly bonds are heavy and one lacks strength to erect grand altars,
yet all unite in heart to observe the斋 (fast) and recite the scriptures,
performing the六时行香 (six-period incense offerings)
and十遍转经 (ten recitations of the sutra),
then福德 (merit and virtue) shall descend in response,
dissolving all ill omens.

Its blessings are boundless,
its salvations endless.

The Dao speaks:
The unenlightened are shallow in the Way,
or their仙品 (celestial grade) may not yet be complete,
as fate’s cycle reaches its termination,
and their bodies pass through太阴 (Great Darkness).
At the hour of their passing,
降真缘感 (the descending True Ones’ blessings) may aid them,
yet if they have not fulfilled their worldly destiny,
their lives shall end as decreed by Heaven’s gift.

If延益 (prolongation) is not yet attained,
and prayers are exhausted without divine acceptance,
then one must perform the香 (incense offerings)
and诵经十遍 (recite the sutra ten times),
to guide the corpse as taught by the Dao,
as the魂神 (spirit-soul) ascends to the南宫 (Southern Palace),
following their accumulated merits,
to be reborn in days, restoring their former form.

And the延寿 (prolonged life) they receive
shall be absorbed into their bodies—
when the True *qi* descends,
nourishing their youthful complexion,
the轮转 (cycle) shall not falter,
and they shall attain divinity.

The Dao speaks:
Life is Heaven’s granted harmony,
its origin traced to the天官 (Celestial Bureau’s) decree,
which sets the算 (destiny’s measure).
阴福 (Yin blessings) are added,
阳过 (Yang misfortunes) are extinguished.
One measure’s duration
corresponds to three days.
A lifespan of a hundred and twenty years
exceeds a thousand two hundred days.

Yet Heaven, Earth, Sun, Moon,
and the Four Seasons’阴阳 (yin-yang forces)
all have their divisions and bounds.

If disasters or portents arise in fury,
降真 (descending the True Ones) shall prolong their算 (destiny),
securing Heaven’s boundless blessings.

If calamities or military *qi* clash in battle,
pestilence spreads, and countless people perish young,
or if teachers and disciples meet untimely ends,
their fates exhausted by fate’s cycle—
all must pray to降真灵 (the descending True Ones),
求延寿命 (beg for prolonged life),
炼度尸魂 (refine and guide the corpse-spirit),
and回殃转福 (reverse misfortune into blessing).

For fasting and reciting the scriptures
hold great merit and virtue.
Above, they dispel Heaven’s disasters,
protecting and safeguarding the Emperor.
Below, they avert pestilence and harm,
delivering countless souls.
Life and death depend upon them,
their blessings surpassing measure—
thus called boundless,
universally benefiting all beings.

The Dao speaks:
For all who possess this sutra,
capable of performing such deeds for the Emperor of Heaven and Earth,
and for countless souls—
on days of calamity,
when they dedicate their hearts to fasting and burning incense,
reciting the sutra ten times,
the降真 (True Ones of the heavens) shall descend,
ten thousand gods shall attend in vigil,
延寿度人 (prolonging life and guiding souls),
and they shall surely attain the rank of a saintly minister beneath the golden gates of Heaven.

The heavens record all human deeds and transgressions,
without the slightest loss.
Celestial降真 (True Ones) shall also recommend their merits,
and those who attain the Way
shall comprehend profound truths.

Within the heavens, the Great Brahman’s hidden words resound in boundless tones—
**Dao Lord’s Composition, the *Yusheng* Scripture of the Mysterious Capital’s降真 (Descending True Ones) for Prolonging Life,**
**the Sacred Eastern Seven Heavens.**

「The *Yusheng* Scripture of the Mysterious Capital’s Descending True Ones for Prolonging Life»

**The Seven Heavens of the East:**
The *Juelo* Dragon ascends in floating *luo*,
while *jingyi* jewels and *bianhē* patterns gleam in splendor.
The *Diguang* Lord surveys the lowlands,
as the *yuanji* depths flow in harmony and balance.
The *jingfan* True Ones extend their radiance,
while *qingyān* celebratory mists disperse *sànnà*.
The *Ziqian* True Ones mirror the clouds,
as the *zhōngyōu* Sage dreams in peace.

Grasping the Pool’s misty offerings,
leaving the *lǐjī* Dipper to scatter its blade.
The *wǎn yán* jade True Ones descend,
as the *Dìcí* Lord bestows great *mó* blessings.
The *lǒudū* void is pure and vast,
while the *zhèngzhěn* True Ones align with *xián’ā* mysteries.

The *chìwén* scriptures pierce through the clouds,
as the *lǜyīng* green mists rise without peak.
**The Seven Heavens of the South:**

The *qiūfēng* peaks stretch their schemes,
while the *yuèjǐn* True Ones restrain their solemnity.
The *xiān còu* True Ones gather beneath the *huángyǎn* Emperor,
as the *pílán* True Ones establish their foundations.
The *qíyuán* True Ones stand alone in heaven,
through *zǐyān* purple mists, they wander in confusion.

The *pǔjiǔ* Nine Stars encamp in *yíngshì*,
as the *jǐngguǐ* Well Ghosts and *míngyí* Dark Demons shine.
The *zhǎnlù* True Ones slaughter in *qīngyǒu*,
while the *tàikōng* vast expanse fades into obscurity.

The *luòyuán* True Ones cry resoundingly,
as the *shénfù* Spirit Fathers open their gates.
The *dòngshuǎng* True Ones gleam in the *zhéhé* marshes,
while the *gǔqiàn* ancient seals unite in harmony.
The *lòubǐng* True Ones perform their rites,
as the *qīnjī* True Ones bow in reverence to the seasons.

**The Seven Heavens of the West:**
The *zhāomóu* True Ones ponder their plans,
as the *jiàoliú* True Ones wield authority.
The *fǎyán* True Ones extend their halls,
while the *bēiméi* True Ones’ inscriptions lack propriety.

The *jìnzhí* True Ones align with the *nánfù* Southern Mounds,
as the *huīdiān* True Ones illuminate the *niúkuí* Ox and Dipper constellations.
The *záoluò* True Ones pierce the heavens,
while the *fǔguī* True Ones assist in *huányī* governance.

The *gōngyóu* True Ones respond with *yīngyìng*,
as the *wēidiàn* True Ones guard the *hàoguī* radiant tortoise.
The *hóngwéi* Red Mists reach the *jìngduì* boundary,
while the *hǔbiāo* Tiger Stars command the *sīpī* lofty canopy.

The *dǎngqiú* True Ones pierce through the foundations,
as the *zhìjié* True Ones exhaust their wisdom, known as *míngyí*.
The *qióngluó* vaulted heavens embrace the *yuán* origins,
while the *lónghuàng* Dragon True Ones radiate in resplendent salvation.

**The Seven Heavens of the North:**
The *gé lù* True Ones govern the *zhìdǒu* Fighting Stars,
as the *xīngzhāng* True Ones enter the *liǔliǔ* Willow constellations.
The *mǎgé* True Ones contain the *huǒhán* Fire,
while the *qiánlíng* True Ones bind the *fùchǒu* Hidden Stars.

The *jùkēi* True Ones preside over the *sìzhāng* Four Mounds,
as the *guānnǚ* True Ones lead the *yuánshǒu* Original Heads.
The *yùyuè* True Ones encircle the *lǐhé* River,
while the *qǔcān* True Ones descend to the *jiàngyǒu* Dipper.

The *fúyùn* True Ones mark the *chìtiān* Red Heavens,
as the *léihóng* True Ones thunder over the *jiǔfú* Nine Palaces.
They disperse *mó* demons with the *yuèdǐng* True Ones’ axes,
while the *bīngtú* True Ones plan their *piányóu* paired campaigns.

The *huānyún* True Ones ride the *rìtuó* Sun’s clouds,
as the *yuèfàn* True Ones guide the *mǔfǒu* Mother’s constellations.
The *dūtīan* True Ones command the *kěkān* True Ones,
while the *shèqīng* True Ones gather the *zhēnlián* Treasures of the *qīngyǒu* Netherworld.

The Dao speaks: Within these heavens,
the Descending True Ones of the Three *zhēn* True Ones,
the Ten-Directional *xiānshèng* Saints and True Ones,
prolong life and bring blessings to the years.
The Great Brahman’s hidden words resound in boundless tones.

The ancient texts were inscribed in vermilion and gold
beneath the *xīnlóu* Hypostyle of the Heavenly Canopy,
where they swirled and flowed in intricate patterns,
dividing the mists and scattering the clouds.
The Celestial True Ones and the *huángrén* Yellow Emperor
looked upon and transmitted them,
establishing them as the *zhèngyīn* orthodox tones.

Those who know this sound
and can fast and recite it,
the heavens shall dispatch *fēitiān* Flying Celestial Kings,
who descend to observe such people—
they shall not violate the Dao,
nor harm the world’s *zhēnjí* sacred beings.
The Celestial True Ones shall descend in person,
while the Five Emperors shall hold their brushes in reverence,
recording their meritorious deeds.
Life shall be prolonged, and their commands extended,
as they ascend to the heavens,
where the Ten Thousand Gods shall pay homage,
the Earthly *zhī* spirits shall guard their gates,
and the Three *guān* Excellencies shall confer great honors.
They shall be recommended to the ranks of the Immortals,
their Dao complete, and they shall attain
to wander the Three Realms,
ascending into the Golden Gates.

This sound cleaves through all obstacles,
dispels all calamities,
guides all souls,
and fulfills all aspirations—
it is the Celestial True Ones’ natural sound.
Thus, when recited, it summons the *fēitiān* Flying Celestial Kings to descend in observation,
as the *Shàngdì* Supreme Lord sings from afar,
the Ten Thousand Gods pay homage,
the Three Realms’ spirits guard the *xuān* hall,
the assembled *jiān* deities bow in submission,
the *guǐjīng* ghostly intelligences perish of their own accord,
the True Ones’ sentinels gather in remnants,
the Heavenly chariots halt their steeds,
the winds subside, the mists disperse,
the jade resonates in pure clarity,
and the boundless *liàng* merits of the *xiánxián* Mysterious Dao resound.

**The *Língbǎo* Scripture of the Supreme Mysterious Treasure for Guiding All Souls,**
**Chapter the Twenty-Ninth concludes.**
**Chapter the Thirtieth begins.**

**The *Língbǎo* Scripture of the Supreme Mysterious Treasure for Guiding All Souls,**
**Chapter the Thirtieth: The Section on Severing the Fetal Root and Sealing the Gates of Death**

The Dao speaks: *"In the beginning of the Azure Sky,*
the Purple Void’s Mysterious Cavern, Five-Luminous Flower Palace,
I received from the Primordial Origin the *Língbǎo* Scripture’s
supreme method of Severing the Fetal Root and Sealing the Gates of Death—
its boundless, highest-grade teaching.*

When the Primordial Origin, Celestial True One, proclaimed this sutra,
He circled ten times, calling the Ten Directions,
and then approached the seat.

The Heavenly True Ones’ Great Gods,
the Highest Saints and Lofty Worthies,
the True Kings of the Divine Clouds and Jade Purity,
the Supreme Sovereigns of the Celestial True Ones and the Consuming of Demons,
the Imperial Lords of the Vermilion Phoenix and Green Splendor,
the Imperial Lords of the Posterior Saints and Golden Gates,
the Ten Thousand Celestial Sovereigns,
and countless hosts beyond measure—
all rode the void and arrived,
flying through Clouds of Vermilion and Azure Constellations,
in emerald carriages and jade-wheeled chariots,
their feathered canopies casting shade,
their radiance like flowing elixir and luminous light,
five hues vibrant and resplendent,
illuminating the boundless expanse.

For nine days and nine nights,
all the Celestial realms’ sun, moon, stars, and lodestars,
the *Xuánshū* (Celestial Axis) and *Yùhéng* (Jade Balance),
halted their wheels in unison,
the divine winds stilled, the murmur ceased,
mountains and seas concealed their clouds,
the sky bore no floating veils,
the Four Seasons shone with clarity.
Within a single realm—earth, soil, mountains, rivers,
forests, and trees—
all became level, equalized,
no longer high or low.
All beings attained enlightenment and fulfilled the Dao,
the land transformed into jade of uniform hue,
no longer varied in color.

The assembled True Ones attended the seat,
as the Primordial Origin, Celestial True One,
ascended to His Emerald-Floating, Glasslike, Sun-Yang, and Treasure Seat.

When the sutra was recited once,
the Ten Thousand Celestial Sovereigns simultaneously praised its excellence,
bowed their heads in reverence twice,
and all attained the Dao.
At that time,
within the realm—men and women alike—
the dead revived,
the living attained enlightenment.

When recited twice,
birds, beasts, and armored insects
all gained eternal life.

When recited thrice,
the Four Seasons harmonized,
no longer cold or hot.

When recited four times,
the lodestars, sun, moon, and celestial realms
halted their eastward motion.

When recited five times,
all diseases and deep afflictions
were cured without fail.

When recited six times,
the earth leveled and straightened,
the dust of deities dispersed of its own accord.

When recited seven times,
the Five Phases unified,
blending into the Heavenly Way.

When recited eight times,
all pregnant wombs delivered,
sprouts cracked open their shells—
those already born and those yet unborn
all attained birth in an instant.

When recited nine times,
good and evil left no trace,
the heart returned to true transformation.

When recited ten times,
the civilized and the barbarian became equal,
no more crookedness or perversity.
At that time,
within the realm—men and women alike—
none failed to incline their hearts in devotion,
all receiving protection and attaining eternal life.

The Dao speaks: *"At that time,*
when the Primordial Origin, Celestial True One,
recited the sutra once,
the Supreme Saints of the East—
the Azure Constellation’s Green Splendor and Luminous Cavern—
and countless hosts beyond measure
floated through the void and arrived.

When recited twice,
the Supreme Saints of the South—
the Red Sun-Yang and Radiant Cavern—
and countless hosts beyond measure
floated through the void and arrived.

When recited thrice,
the Supreme Saints of the West—
the White Landscape and Luminous Cavern—
and countless hosts beyond measure
floated through the void and arrived.

When recited four times,
the Supreme Saints of the North—
the Mysterious Cavern’s Most Marvelous Transformation—
and countless hosts beyond measure
floated through the void and arrived.

When recited five times,
the Supreme Saints of the Northeast—
the Uppermost Cavern of Illuminating Reason—
and countless hosts beyond measure
floated through the void and arrived.

When recited six times,
the Supreme Saints of the Southeast—
the Cavern of Subduing Essence and Primordial Body—
and countless hosts beyond measure
floated through the void and arrived.

When recited seven times,
the Supreme Saints of the Southwest—
the Cavern of Radiant Reason and Piercing Void—
and countless hosts beyond measure
floated through the void and arrived.

When recited eight times,
the Supreme Saints of the Northwest—
the Cavern of Flowering Reason and Unifying Transformation—
and countless hosts beyond measure
floated through the void and arrived.

When recited nine times,
the Supreme Saints of the Upper Realm—
the Cavern of Universal Transformation—
and countless hosts beyond measure
floated through the void and arrived.

When recited ten times,
the Supreme Saints of the Lower Realm—
the Cavern of Tranquil Reason and Spontaneous Birth—
and countless hosts beyond measure
floated through the void and arrived.*

When all ten recitations were complete,
the boundless, highest-grade True Ones of the Ten Directions
gathered in unison,
and all within the realm—men and women alike—
inclined their hearts in reverence.

Those who arrived filled the space like dense yellow mist,
august clouds and auspicious vapors,
countless hosts beyond measure—
half the realm’s land sank beneath them,
unable to be restrained.

Then, the Primordial Origin
internally emitted a radiant light,
externally dispatched divine qi,
and ascended, releasing the *Níwán* (Earthly Pill),
its fiery brilliance illuminating
all Ten Directions of the celestial realms.

Afterward, He gathered the light and returned its reflection,
retrieving the essence and condensing the qi,
transforming it into a Treasure Pearl,
shaped like a dewdrop,
a billion ten thousand zhang above the earth.

The Primordial Origin then ascended,
drawing in the Heavenly True Ones’ Great Gods,
the Highest Saints and Lofty Worthies,
all the Celestial Sovereigns,
the boundless, highest-grade Supreme Saints of the Ten Directions,
and countless hosts beyond measure—
all entering the Treasure Pearl.

The mortals and deities gazed upward,
and saw only a brilliant radiance entering the Pearl’s mouth.
Once inside, they vanished from sight.
The people dispersed,
the earth returned to its original level,
its hue once more unchanged—
no longer jade.

The Primordial Origin, within the Treasure Pearl,
completed the recitation of the sutra.
The assembled True Ones, as guardians,
entrusted it to me.
At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words.

The ritual’s coarse details were exhausted,
the deities resumed their stations,
and in an instant—
silence remained, no trace of sound.

At that time,
all mortals and deities who encountered the sutra’s law
attained eternal life,
completing their natural years,
none perishing prematurely.
All inclined their hearts in devotion,
practicing benevolent minds.

They did not act recklessly or covetously,
nor were they full or empty,
leaning or failing,
departing or arriving,
dwelling or unseen.

Their hearts harbored no false thoughts,
their bodies bore no crookedness,
their equalized bones became as one with compassion,
and all perverse forms aligned in kinship.

The realm was secure, its people flourished,
rejoicing in eternal peace.
The teaching first emerged,
and the realm was governed by the Dao.
Those who held sincere devotion,
worshipped and revered it,
all attained the power to guide the world.

The Dao speaks: *"All that was spoken within this sutra*
by the Primordial Origin, Celestial True One,
are the inner realms of the highest deities and sovereigns,
the most subtle transformations of the True Ones into immortals,
the hidden forms of the Mysterious Kings,
the Supreme Lord’s inner taboo,
and the secret names of the Ten Thousand Gods—
not the ordinary words of the mortal world."*

The Most High Sage has already become a True Person,
penetrating the Mysterious and exploring the subtle,
able to discern all its chapters.

Reciting it ten times,
the highest deities sing from afar,
the Ten Thousand Emperors set forth rites,
the rivers and seas fall silent,
the mountains and valleys conceal their clouds,
the sun and moon halt their radiance,
the revolving sky-sphere ceases its motion,
demons submit their forms,
ghostly spirits vanish,
the dead arise and the living return,
white bones become flesh.

Those of supreme learning,
reciting it ten times,
shall have the Five Emperors as their guards,
the Three Realms bow in homage,
the Ten Thousand Gods protect the law,
the Hundred Spirits bless their bodies,
rescuing those near death,
and granting life to those who would perish.

Thus it is—
learned scholars, their impure *qi* not yet purged,
their bodies not yet perfected in truth,
cannot yet subdue the Ten Directions;
their might does not govern the celestial laws,
their virtue can only subdue the earthly *zhi* spirits,
bind the demonic *ling*,
but as common scriptures,
they do not yet grasp the subtle and wondrous,
and thus only repel death,
yet cannot restore life.

Lightly reciting this chapter
brings misfortune upon one’s body.

Supplying offerings and revering it
brings prosperity to one’s household,
generation after generation,
a bond with good causes,
and shields from all calamities,
as divine spirits guard the gate.

This sutra is most sacred and wondrous,
unmatched in the Jade Capital,
its power to guide beings immeasurable,
the root of all Dao/Way.

The vast and august range,
its virtue beyond reckoning.

returning to this **Divine Infant**.
The **Seven Ancestors** sheltered,
the **Hundred Gods** all at peace.
Exit without return,
securing the **Yellow Court**.
Above, preserving the **Mud Pellet**,
within, regulating the **Mysterious Passage**.
Below, flowing through the **Elixir Field**,
the **Hundred Passages** sealed.
The inner body enriched—
my **Dao** is complete.

---
**Second Chapter: The Highest Lord’s Hidden Runes of Jade Purity**
The **Great Hidden Treasure of Heaven**,
the **Bright Beam** seals the **Lower Door**.
Guard the **Mysterious Capital** with caution,
structuring the **Fetus** to reverse life and death.
Guard the **Feminine**, embrace the **One True**—
this is the **Path of Longevity**.
Severing the **roots of life and death**,
grasping the **Nine Fate Doors**.

The **Celestial Court** returns through the Nine Transformations,
the **Divine Essence** gathers, reversing to the **Divine Infant**.
Above, no **Eonless Ancestor** exists—
only the **Dao** transmutes your form.

The **Three Realms** resplendent with sacred texts,
crossing them reveals the **Divine Mound**.
Dispersing **purple clouds** like scattered mist,
uniting and separating by the **Wheel of Shadows**.

The **Taboos** cannot be spoken—
**Luminous Light** gathers at the **Mud Pellet**.
**True Qi** summons the **Ten Thousand Spirits**,
extinguishing the **Seven Emptinesses** of the **Yin Orifices**.

**Divine Luster** shines like the **Sun’s Radiance**,
the **Three Pure Ones** drift through the **Cloud Camp**.
The **Returning Wind** sustains the **Morning Landscape**,
the **True Source**—six **Void Spirits** refined.

**Taiwei** revolves the **Sun and Moon**,
**Souls** ascend to the **Jade Capital**.
From **Chaos** arises the **Great Desert**—
thus it is called the **Mysterious Song’s Sound**.

---
**Third Chapter: The Song of the Green Flower Emperor of the Eastern Exalted Sun**

The **Ten Thousand Phenomena** manifest as **Body**,
the **Hundred Gods** return to their **Root**.
When all is complete, **Spirit** arises—
only **Form** and **Body** are its vessels.

The **Root of the Great Dao** is the **Mysterious Essence**.
**Inner Observation** reveals it,
**External Phenomena** are hidden and still.
Without this **Supreme Dao**,
one cannot preserve life and endure.

Recite silently ten thousand times,
blending with **Heaven’s** completion.
**Blood Impurities** severed,
**Evil Roots** consumed.
Ascend to the **Celestial Rank**,
transcend the **Southern Palace**.

Lost in delusion, one sinks forever into the **Ghostly Realm**.
**Heaven’s Secret Records**—
**Elixir Flowers** vanish into **Obscurity**.

**Southern Harmony** holds the **Nodal Seal**,
**Northern Pole** guards the **Spirit**.
**Golden Qi** enters the **Three Realms**,
**Jade Marrow** opens the **Nine Gates**.

The **Emperor’s Unity** blends with **Truth**—
neither manifest nor luminous.
Above the **Three Realms**,
within the **Jade Texts’ Core**,
the **True King’s Song** resounds—
its sound harmonizes with the **Deep Chapters**.

Recite it a hundred times—
your name is recorded in the **Southern Palace**.
Recite it a thousand times—
the **Door of Death** is severed.
Ten thousand recitations complete the **Dao**,
ascending to the **Supreme Void**,
transcending the **Three Realms**,
ranked among the **Celestial Lords**.

Those who hear the **Divine Chapter**—
the **Ten Thousand Truths** bless the **Form**,
commanding the **Earthly Gate** to open,
warding off the **Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships**.
The **Seven Ancestors** ascend to **Heaven**,
receiving duties in the **Nine Palaces**,
**Souls** cross the **Vermilion Ridge**,
**Corporeal Bodies** are refined anew.
This is called **Boundless Compassion**,
universally liberating the endless.

There exists a **Secret Celestial Text**,
revered by all **Heavenly Deities**.
Revealing arrogance leads to **Hell’s Fall**,
bringing calamity to the **Seven Ancestors**.

The **Dao** speaks: These two chapters are the hidden sounds
of the **Heavenly Sovereigns**, the **Most Sacred Gods**, and the **Jade Purity True King**.
All are the words of **Mahābrahmā**—
not the common speech of the world.
Without melodic grace,
without ornate tunes,
thus called **Mysterious and Profound**—
difficult to trace or examine.

**Heaven’s Treasure** is guarded
within the **Divine Azure Palace’s** Eastern Wall Scripture Hall,
transmitted every **Sixty Million Eons** according to the **Mysterious Method**.
If a **Perfected One** brings **gold and jewels** with sincere devotion,
and pledges allegiance to the **Three Heavens**,
then it shall be granted.

The **Dao** speaks: The **Heavenly Mandate** and **Earthly Rotation** also have their **Terminations**.
The **Sun, Moon, and Five Stars** also have **Eclipses and Fullness**.
The **Most Sacred Immortals** also have **Ascendancies and Declinations**.
The **Unenlightened** also suffer **Illness and Injury**.
When such calamities arise,
those of **Kindred Qi** must refine their **Form** for themselves,
receive **Transformation** and **Liberation**,
recite the **Scripture Ten Times**,
transfer **Spirit** and stabilize **Qi**,
thus regaining **Rebirth**.

The **Boundless Text** universally liberates the endless.

The **Dao** speaks: The **Unenlightened**, with shallow **Dao**,
perhaps their **Immortal Rank** is incomplete,
the **Door of Death** unsealed,
the **Fetal Root** still lingering.
When their **Destiny** approaches annihilation,
their **Body** passes through **Great Yin**,
at the critical moment,
**Kindred Perfected Ones** open their **Spirit** and unfold the **Scripture**,
gather **Qi** and transmit the **Dao**,
thus liberating the **Corporeal Form** according to the **Law**.
The **Soul-Spirit** ascends directly to the **Southern Palace**,
based on their **Merits**, regaining **Rebirth** in calculated days.
Without confusion in the **Wheel of Rebirth**,
one attains **Divinity and Immortality**.

The **Dao** speaks: When the **Heavenly Mandate** reaches its **Termination**,
one must **Observe the Fast**, burn **Incense**, and recite the **Scripture**.
When **Stars and Constellations** misalign,
when the **Sun and Moon** lose their **Eclipses**,
one must **Observe the Fast**, burn **Incense**, and recite the **Scripture**.
When the **Four Seasons** are disordered,
when **Yin and Yang** are unbalanced,
one must **Observe the Fast**, burn **Incense**, and recite the **Scripture**.
When the **Sovereign** faces **Calamity**,
when **Wars** erupt in the **Four Directions**,
one must **Observe the Fast**, burn **Incense**, and recite the **Scripture**.
When **Plagues** spread,
when **Subjects** suffer **Death and Injury**,
one must **Observe the Fast**, burn **Incense**, and recite the **Scripture**.
When a **Kindred Scholar’s Destiny** approaches,
one must **Observe the Fast**, burn **Incense**, and recite the **Scripture**.

**Observing the Fast**, **Burning Incense**, and reciting the **Scripture**—
their **Merits** are profound.
Above, they **Dissolve Heavenly Calamities**,
**Protect and Secure the Emperor**.
Below, they **Ward Off Poisons and Harm**,
**Liberating the Myriad People**.
**Life and Death** depend on it—
their **Blessings** are boundless.
Thus it is said: **Boundless Compassion**,
universally liberating **Heaven and Man**.

The **Dao** speaks: Those who possess this **Scripture**,
for **Heaven, Earth, the Emperor, and the Myriad People**,
performing these **Meritorious Deeds**,
severing **Life and Death**,
transcending the **Celestial Palaces**—
on days of **Calamity**, if they **Resolve to Fast**, burn **Incense**, and recite the **Scripture Ten Times**,
all **Heavens** will record their names,
**Ten Thousand Spirits** will attend as guards,
**Separate Perfected Ones** will aid them,
and they shall become **Holy Ministers** of the **Golden Gate**.

The **Heavens** record **Merits and Offenses** without omission.
Even the **Magical Kings of Heaven** will **Recommend Their Worth**—
only those who attain the **Dao** can truly understand these **Profound Words**.

**The Nine Heavens of the South**
The **Dao** speaks: *"Hua Ming gathers wonders, while the Magical Kings blaze with radiant might.
The **Play of the Mystic Essence** scatters its marvels—
**Crimson Flowers** bloom and **Emerald Wings** take flight.
With reverence they bow and call forth praise,
Wafting **Divine Screens**, harmonizing the realm.
Fragrant **Qi** pervades, deep and boundless,
As **Spiritual Winds** return, light and pure.
The **Luminous Canopy** shines resplendent,
Its waves vast and gathered like mists.
They **Absorb Filth** and become **Pure Rain**,
Celebrating in **Celestial Gatherings**.
The **Exalted Ones** nurture the **Noble Path**,
While **Ten Thousand Spirits** rise in **Mystic Courts**.
They **Invoke the Sacred** in lingering reverence,
And **Sever the Myriad** with **Deep Smoke’s** embrace.
**Wings of Memory** coil in **Horned Bonds**,
The **Six Perfections** dissolve into **Mystic Void**."*

**The Nine Heavens of the South**
**Yan Ju** embraces the **Root Cause**,
His **Radiant Light** shields and **Divine Incense** unfurls.
**Fiery Flames** devour the **Misty Clouds**,
As **Dharma-qi** pierces **Nine Doubts**.
He **Seizes the Mechanism** and **Wafts the Dao**,
With **Dragons** traversing **Crimson Flags**.
Branches **Separate** in **Lofty Reverence**,
While **Forest Peaks** harbor **Inner Hope**.
In **Celestial Celebrations**, they **Gather the Clouds**,
And **Jade Attachments** transform into **Enlightened Corpses**.
They **Ascend in Stillness** beyond the **Sky’s Surface**,
And **Measure the Depths** of **Eternal Extension**.
**Grace** spreads from the **Red Wheel**,
**Illuminating Coverage** holds the **Round**.
**Haloed Mists** link in **Respectful Continuity**,
As **Embroidered Falls** reveal the **Divine Mechanism**.
**Fixed Insight** perceives **Parallel Chambers**,
And **Great Fluids** float the **People of Li**.

**The Nine Heavens of the West**
**Calm Aspiration** mingles with **Refined Splendor**,
**Lofty Mists** bear **Faultless Foundations**.
**Gentle Virtue** flows through **Common Moisture**,
While **Grace** bestows **Emerald Departures**.
They **Point to Profound Shadows** in **Abundant Splendor**,
As **Mists** and **Elegance** align in **Shared Delay**.
**Void** resonates with **Crags and Echoes**,
**Dry Virtue** extends **Inspired Texts**.
They **Trust the Fall** in **Standard Pathways**,
And **Seek the Revival** of **Extended Grace**.
**Flooding Greens** break into **Sharp Debates**,
As **Strength** turns **Spiritual Truth**.
They **Welcome the Radiance** in **Childlike Rectitude**,
And **Lean on the Mother** in **Few Doubts**.
**Bright Reverence** ascends to **Daubed Palaces**,
And **Billions** gather in **True Courts**.
To **Investigate the Root** and **Know the Source**,
**Wings of Life** float in **Spiritual Light**."

**The Nine Heavens of the North**
**The Earthly Symbol** grasps the **Knots**,
Illuminating the **Great Sky** with **Resplendent Radiance**.
**Bamboo and Jade** intrude upon **Clan**,
As **Choosing the Distant** marks the **Mystic Standard**.
**Floating Mists** drift in **Sloping Desolation**,
**Ice** and **Forest** swell in **Empty Woods**.
**Ghostly Light** reveals **Purity**,
And **Equal Shouts** seal the **Sacred Chant**.
**Channels** flow with **Karmic Play**,
As **Evening Merit** adds **Radiant Clarity**.
**Lines** unfold **Covering Walls**,
And **Expositions** shine in **Illustrious Stillness**.
They **Hold the Symbol** in **Resplendent Splendor**,
And **Bribe the Spirits** to **Guard in Peace**.
**Qi** swirls in **Purple Brilliance**,
As **Manifestation** pierces **Elevated Depths**.
They **Connect with Spirits** in **Mystic Void**,
And **Directly Awaken** to **Perfected Beings**."
