**The Dao** speaks: *"Within these Nine Heavens, the **Hidden Words of the Great Dharma**,
Endless **Sounds of the Mystic**,
Engraved in **Lingering Books** and **Jade Texts**,
All are **Dragon Scripts** and **Crimson Seals**,
Treasure **Chests of Jade** and **Gem-Lined Boxes**,
Sealed within the **Eastern Hall of Splendor**.
**Golden Threads** and **Jewel Flowers**,
**Floating Lights** and **Ten Thousand Phenomena**—
All are **Divine Treasures** concealed within.

**The True King of the Heavenly Dao, Jade Purity**,
And **Emperor of the Vermilion Phoenix, Green Splendor**,
All know these **Sounds**,
And **Transmit these Texts**.

Those who **Fast and Recite** them,
All the **Heavens** will dispatch **Flying Heavenly Kings**,
**Scripture-Bearing Officials**,
To **Descend and Observe** their forms,
**Record their Merits and Labors**,
And **Report to the Heavens Above**,
Where **Ten Thousand Spirits** pay homage in **Ceremonial Worship**,
**Earthly Spirits** attend the gates,
And the **Jade Purity, Magic-Subduing Kings**,
**Recommend them to the Perfected Ones**,
Thus **Fulfilling the Dao** and attaining **Supreme Virtue**.
They **Transcend and Ascend** to **Jade Capital**,
And **Enter the Golden Gate**.

This **Sound** reaches **All**,
**All** it descends upon,
**All** it **Transcends**,
**All** it **Accomplishes**—
The **Natural Sound of the Heavens**,
Thus it is.

Therefore, when one **Recites** it,
**Flying Heavenly Kings** descend to **Observe**,
**The Supreme Deity** sings from afar,
**Ten Thousand Spirits** pay homage in **Ceremonial Worship**,
The **Three Realms** attend the **Hall of the Perfected**,
The **Five Emperors** come to **Welcome**,
**Ghostly Essences** perish of their own accord,
And **Lingering Resonances** shake the **Ten Directions**,
All **Ten Thousand Spirits** tremble in submission.
They **Summon** the **Clustered Perfected Ones**,
The **Heavens** are **Free of Filth**,
The **Earth** is **Free of Dust**,
**Dark Wisdom** pierces through **Boundless Clarity**,
And **Great Compassion** is **Mystic and Profound**."

**The Thirty-First Scroll of the *Scripture of the Mystic Treasure for Perfecting and Liberating Beings*** is complete.

**The Chapter on Eternal Life and Everlasting Vision**

The Dao speaks: In ancient times, within the **Celestial Azure**, at the juncture of the **Jade-Luminous True Transformation Heaven**, there existed the **Great Mystic Music Heaven**, named **Eternal Life**. Within it dwelled an **Imperial Sovereign**, the **Great Sovereign of Eternal Life**.

The **Crimson Jade Palace**, the **Vermilion Azure Celestial Gate**, enveloped in swirling **Purple Clouds** and fragrant **Yellow Mists**, housed the **Imperial Treasure Vault**. Mountains, rivers, forests, and trees all radiated in the hues of **Rainbow Arcs and Crimson Glows**. **Celestial Officials and Divine Ministers**, attendants, scribes, and clerks numbered in the **hundreds of millions**.

This heaven connected eastward to the **Eastern Mongolian Palace**, the **Purple Extremity Heaven**, the **Luminous Truth Platform**, and the **Rare Jade Hall**; westward to the **Harmonious Celestial Palace**, the **Radiant Splendor Heaven**, the **Treasure Spirit Platform**, and the **Great Harmony Hall**. From above, it was draped with the **Nine-Luminous Pure-Mist Clouds**, while below, it was supported by the **Sea-Conch Jade Qi**, forming its **throne’s foundation**.

Resplendent and boundless, it shone among all heavens, known as the **Supreme Bliss**. When the **Primordial Beginning Venerable Lord** delivered this scripture, He revealed the **Great Law of Eternal Life and Everlasting Vision**.

The **Primordial Beginning Venerable Lord**, seated upon the **Five-Colored Lion Throne** in the **Celestial Azure**, summoned the **Jade-Luminous Celestial Boundary Great Mystic Music Heaven’s Great Sovereign of Eternal Life**. Because of the **Primordial Beginning’s Supreme Divinity and Auspicious Virtue**, His blessings and merit were complete, He entrusted the **Great Sovereign of Eternal Life** with the task of teaching **all beings in the Ten Directions**—**heavenly and mortal**—this **essential method for transforming mundane existence into sainthood and attaining eternal life**.

The **Great Sovereign of Eternal Life**, moved by the **Primordial Beginning’s profound intent**, rose from His seat. He commanded His **attendant Celestial Worthies**, the **Celestial Officials and Ministers**, the **Incense Officials** who guarded the scriptures, the **Jade Boys and Jade Girls**, and all **myriad heavenly beings and assemblies**, to gather at the **South-and-Harmony Hall of the Jade-Luminous Mystic Cavern**, before the **Supreme Law’s Jade Seat**.

The **Child of the Soul’s Elixir** ascended to support the **Elevated Platform**, striking the **Spotted Dragon Thunder-Sound Drum**. The **Jade-Cavern Maiden** ascended to the **Double-Splendor Cloudless Tower**, ringing the **Nine-Absolute Divine Golden Bell of the Yellow Court**. The **Holy Assembly gathered**, and all under heaven rejoiced.

The **Great Sovereign of Eternal Life** prepared to expound the **Mystic Law**. With **ten full recitations**, He summoned the **Ten Directions**. The **Heavenly Worthies**, **Supreme Saints**, and **True Persons of Marvelous Conduct**, beyond count, arrived **riding the void**, their **natural elixir qi** radiating like **flowing light piercing the heavens**. The **Eight Illuminations** shone round, their **luminous forms** piercing through **morning brilliance**, their **banners, palanquins, and carriages** woven from **nine hues**, their **thousand forms** casting **myriad shadows**, **dragons and phoenixes** intertwining in **splendid patterns**, **mountains and waters** taking shape in **living motion**.

Without obstruction, they manifested and vanished without constancy. **Palaces, halls, and platforms** emerged, along with **music and ritual implements**, **banners and flags** drifting on **floating mists**, the **land forming into patterned jade**. The **Worthy Ones** attended at His seat, while the **Great Sovereign of Eternal Life** ascended the **Nine-Revolutions, Seven-Transformations Red-Precise Red-Lotus Void Seat**.

When the scripture was **recited once**, the **Purple Void echoed**, and **heavenly inscriptions** emerged.
When the scripture was **recited twice**, the **Jade Capital emitted crystals**, and **transformations multiplied by billions**.
When the scripture was **recited thrice**, the **Dao-Void internally shifted**, revealing the **Primordial Source**.
When the scripture was **recited four times**, the **Divine Manifested in True Form**, and **all beings attained eternal life**.
When the scripture was **recited five times**, the **Jade Emperor opened the seals**, and **auspicious talismans granted eternal command**.
When the scripture was **recited six times**, the **Qionglin Whistled Wind**, and **void and dharma merged**.
When the scripture was **recited seven times**, the **Spiritual Pool glistened pure**, and the **Indigo Sea shared its hue**.
When the scripture was **recited eight times**, the **Sun and Moon united their radiance**, and **crimson mists drifted with fragrance**.
When the scripture was **recited nine times**, the **Dao’s operation was boundless**, and **heavenly longevity eternal**.
When the scripture was **recited ten times**, **glowing mushrooms formed platters**, and **sweet dew spread across the void**.

At that moment, **all men and women in the land** were moved to devotion, **all received protection and deliverance**, and **all attained eternal life**.

The Dao speaks: When the scripture was **recited once**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the East—Limitless and Boundless** arrived with **innumerable hosts**, floating through the void.
When the scripture was **recited twice**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the South—Limitless and Boundless** arrived with **innumerable hosts**, floating through the void.
When the scripture was **recited thrice**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the West—Limitless and Boundless** arrived with **innumerable hosts**, floating through the void.
When the scripture was **recited four times**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the North—Limitless and Boundless** arrived with **innumerable hosts**, floating through the void.
When the scripture was **recited five times**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the Northeast—Limitless and Boundless** arrived with **innumerable hosts**, floating through the void.
When the scripture was **recited six times**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the Southeast—Limitless and Boundless** arrived with **innumerable hosts**, floating through the void.
When the scripture was **recited seven times**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the Southwest—Limitless and Boundless** arrived with **innumerable hosts**, floating through the void.
When the scripture was **recited eight times**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the Northwest—Limitless and Boundless** arrived with **innumerable hosts**, floating through the void.
When the scripture was **recited nine times**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the Upper Realm—Limitless and Boundless** arrived with **innumerable hosts**, floating through the void.
When the scripture was **recited ten times**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the Lower Realm—Limitless and Boundless** arrived with **innumerable hosts**, floating through the void.

After **ten full recitations**, the **Eternal Life Great Gods of the Ten Directions** arrived simultaneously. **All men and women in the land** bowed in reverence with **devoted hearts**.

Their arrival was like **ten thousand mountains emerging from clouds**, **a thousand rivers surging with waves**, **thunderous peals shaking the seas**—**innumerable hosts** filling all heavens, pressing upon the **realms of the land**, beyond restraint.

Thus, the **Great Sovereign of Eternal Life**, raising His hand toward the south, **manifested within the void** a **hundred billion treasure lights**. Each **treasure light** contained **worlds without end**. Within each world stood **hundreds of thousands of pavilions and halls**, some nestled among **mountains, forests, and hills**, others near **cities, streams, or wilderness**.

There, **Worthy Ones** were seen **flying through the void**, **shooting flames and water**, **riding dragons and controlling reins**, **soaring over the divine lands**, **mounting phoenixes and ascending clouds**, **dashing and leaping with swift grace**, encircling the **Great Sigh**, eagerly awaiting the **Law’s words**, aspiring to **transcend the net of karmic bonds**, **awaken to the True Stage**, **grasp the Great Vehicle**, and **forget all habitual defilements**.

「Longsheng Dàdìjūn ascended to the **Celestial Realm** [天引], the **Heavenly Pure Great Spirit** [天真大神], the **Supreme Sage of High Veneration** [上圣高尊], the **Zhìxū True Person** [紫虚真人], and the **Ten Directions’ Boundless Longsheng Jiùshì Great Spirit** [十方无极长生久视大神] all ascended into the **Divine Domain** [神境]. The **celestial beings and mortals** gazed upward in reverence, the **Sages gathered and leaned in**, and **penetrated to see the Dao-root** [道根]. The **original essence** [本] was **unchanging and imperishable** [无变灭], the **Primordial Qi** [元始一炁]—those who could attain it would **endure boundless calamities** [浩劫无终].

Within, they **observed the Five Phases** [五体], without, they **beheld the myriad phenomena** [万象], with **sun and moon shining equally**, and **no limit to their vision** [已期]. **Longsheng** [长生] was the **Dao’s original non-birth** [道本无生], yet **born without perishing** [生而不灭]. **Jiùshì** [久视] was **vastly boundless in perception** [邈然无视], **piercingly illuminating the Three Pure Ones** [洞照三清]. **Seeking life in death** [求生於死], death **transformed into life** [死化为生]. **Jiùshì in the void** [久视於无], the **boundless became manifest** [无极为有]. In **retreat and stillness**, they **refined essence and calmed breath** [潜精内息], **silently observing nature’s spontaneity** [默观自然]. There was **no birth nor death within** [无生死中], yet **erroneously perceived as such** [妄有生死]. **Birth and death cycled endlessly** [生死流转], and those who could not **halt the flow** [止者], their **vision would not endure** [视不久也].

Yet **Jiùshì was steadfast** [久视则定], **steadfast vision revealed truth** [定照则真], and the **realms spontaneously manifested** [境自现]—**Eighty-One Days of the Celestial Cycle** [一天], **clear as if held in the palm** [洞如指掌]. The reason **all beings could not attain Longsheng Jiùshì** [众生所以不得长生久视] was due to **punishment and defeat by karmic retribution** [以刑克败绝], the **fluctuation of their qi** [其气有无], and the **true and false nature of their minds** [真妄其心]. When the **mind clung to birth and death** [心着生死], the **form followed its transformation** [则形亦随化]. When the **mind aligned with the Dao** [心与道一], it **merged with the spirit’s profundity** [一与神冥], **preserving the spirit while forgetting the mind** [守神忘心], the **Dao of life endured forever** [生道长久].

The **Tàiwēi Jade Talisman** [太微玉符] **sustained life and harmonized form** [续生和形], ensuring **no harm to the qi** [使气无害] and **granting the Nine Immortals’ Mystic Rituals** [九仙玄箓]. When **vision endured and penetrated** [使视久而彻], it **revealed the Dao** [彻则见道], and the **Dao’s manifestation brought form** [道来现形], which **could be cherished and guarded** [与子相守]—the **Longsheng Treasure Talisman** [长生宝符]. When the **Dao’s nature remained unaltered** [使道性不迁], **abandoning the mind to embrace the spirit** [遗心抱神], the **spirit’s transformation knew no bounds** [神变无方].

In **all ten directions’ worlds** [十方世界], the **eight wondrous voids** [八景妙空], one who **attained Longsheng** [一得长生] would **naturally perceive eternity** [自然久视]. **Floating and sinking through myriad phenomena** [浮沉万象], they **consumed and dissolved with the times** [应时消殒]. Only the **Longsheng Dàdìjūn** [长生大帝君] **manifested in boundless realms** [无量境界], with **limitless Law-body** [无边法身], **inexhaustible benevolent efficacy** [无穷惠用], **boundless transformations** [无极变化], appearing **instantly as if blinking** [一时出现], like **the hairs of one’s eyebrows** [如同眉睫].

All **celestial beings and mortals** [一切天人], upon **awakening to this great Law** [悟此大法], **rode clouds and dragons** [乘云驾龙], **traversing voids and emptiness** [来往空洞], and **viewed the ten directions’ Great Void as a single grain of millet** [视十方太空如一黍米]. The **Dao’s teachings transformed and governed the world** [仙真教化，应世权实], **ascending to the Pure and Perfect** [超证玉清], **ranking among the True Extremes** [位登真极]. When the **sutras were fully expounded** [说经都竟], the **multitude of spirits received initiation** [众真受度], **bore witness in my presence** [作证於我], and at that moment, **joy and celebration were indescribable** [当此之时，喜庆难言].

The **rituals of the Law were now complete** [法事粗悉], the **heavens resumed their stations** [诸天复位], and in an **instant, all was silent, leaving no trace** [倏欻之间，寂无遗响]. At that time, **all beings encountered the Law’s teachings** [天人遇值经法], **universally receiving salvation and deliverance** [普得济度], **Longsheng Jiùshì dwelling with the Dao** [长生久视，与道同居], **all reverently turned toward the earth** [倾土归仰], and **resided in the Wheel of Rebirth** [咸住轮转].

There was **no birth nor death** [无生无死], **no vigor nor decay** [无壮无老], **no sickness nor decline** [无疾无衰], **no suffering nor annihilation** [无苦无灭], **no action nor inaction** [无作无为]. Their **words contained no discord** [言无戾中], their **mouths uttered no foul sounds** [口无恶声], **all in harmony with compassionate love** [齐同慈爱], **diverse yet unified in kinship** [异骨成亲]. The **land was secure, its people prosperous** [国安民丰], **music and joy resounded in great peace** [忤乐太平], and the **Dao’s origin emerged as its teaching** [经始出教], **illuminating the entire realm** [一国以道].

Those who **previously held sincere devotion** [预有至心], **now revered and followed with ritual** [宗奉礼敬], all **achieved worldly transcendence** [皆得度世]. The **Dao’s words** [道言] declared: What was **called this sutra’s ten prohibitions** [凡谓是经十过], the **heavens all assembled** [诸天齐到], **verifying the names of the born** [检定生名], **and eliminating primordial evil** [罔坠元恶]. When **there were lingering offenses** [及有冥愆], those who **guarded the Dao and steadied their minds** [守道正心], the **spirit came to safeguard the body** [神来守身], and the **body attained Longsheng** [身得长生], **enduring eternally in the latter heavens** [后天永存].

Those who **had not heard the Dao** [凡不闻道], their **anger and joy shifted daily** [喜怒日迁], **water and fire clashed and punished** [水火克伐], **metal and wood intermingled** [金木相连], **not nourishing true water** [不滋真水], **nor subduing the flames** [宁制炎光], **water rising while fire descended** [水升火降], **the Dao’s completion ascended to immortality** [道备登仙]. When **balanced**, fire **descended and hid in the Great Abyss** [平则火降，伏藏太渊]. When **enraged**, it **consumed the body**, emitting **four extreme foul vapors** [怒则焚身，四极恶烟].

Knowing the **Dao of Longsheng**, one **entered the Mystic of Mystics** [义入玄玄]. **Tossing water to bathe in the pearl** [掷水泳珠], **fire dwelled in the Nine Abysses** [火居九泉]. **Fiery flames refined the form** [炎火炼形], **the golden body endured forever firm** [金体永坚]. The **dual uses of water and fire** [水火二用], **only the Sage could transmit** [非圣不传]. Within lay **true earth**, named **Natural** [自然]. **Natural was without knowledge** [自然无知], yet **all things were born from it** [万物以生]. **Fathomless and indistinct** [杳冥恍惚], **motion and stillness without interruption** [动静无间], **heaven, earth, and the Three Realms** [天地三界] **all arose from Natural** [从自然生].

**Natural was the earth** [自然为土], **earth capable of transformation** [土能变迁]. All **emanated from the Great Void’s Natural** [皆从太空自然中生], and **birth was thus endless** [生则无尽], **equal to the Dao’s eternal years** [与道齐年].」

Within one’s self, the **Nine Palaces** [九宫] are seen,
With no **White Hero** [英] nor **Primordial Element** [白元].
The **Yellow Sage’s** [黄老] **Divine Circulation** [运神] aligns with **Auspicious Spirits** [兆精].

Knowing this **Way of Long Life** [长生道],
The **Five Scriptures of the Great Emperor** [五帝五篇]—
**Cloud Chapter’s** [云章] **Jade Book** [玉书]—
**Captures the Qi** [摄气] and **Elevates to Immortality** [举仙].

When mortals recite,
Their **lifespan extends** [延寿长年],
**Deathless Dissolution** [尸解] attains the **Way** [道],
**Form transforms** [形变] and **ascends to Mysterious Heights** [升玄].

**Inhaling and exhaling the Rigid Wind** [呼吸刚风],
**Riding the Six Dragons** [乘驾六龙],
**Southern Harmony** [南和] bestows **strategies** [赐策],
The **Azure Emperor** [青帝] grants **youthful vitality** [给童].

This **scripture is subtle and profound** [微妙],
**Universal salvation without end** [普度无穷].
All **celestial beings and mortals** [天人],
**Shall rejoice in receiving its blessings** [莫不受庆].

**Infinite blessings** [无量之福],
The **Three Realms** [三界] **are favored** [蒙惠].
**Heaven’s treasures** [上天所宝],
**Not transmitted to the lower world** [不传下世].

**Noble adepts** [至士] **carry the Golden Treasure** [赍金宝],
**Devoted in heart** [效心],
**Pledging to Heaven** [盟天] and **transmitting** [传].
**Leaking or neglecting** [轻泄漏慢],
**Invokes calamity upon the Nine Ancestors** [殃及九祖],
**Endless servitude to Ghostly Officials** [长役鬼官].

**Attending the Five Emperors** [侍经五帝],
**Jade Boys and Jade Girls** [玉童玉女].
Each **twenty-four in number** [各二十四人],
**Guarding and protecting the scripture-reciter’s body** [营卫神文],
**Shielding those who receive the scripture** [保护受经者身].

The **Dao** [道] speaks:
In the **first month**, **prolonged fasting** [长斋],
Recite and chant this **scripture** [是经],
Wear the **Great Void’s Jade Talisman** [太微玉符],
**Summon the Qi of True Lord of the East** [召东华真公斋满之炁],
**Descend it into the body** [下入身中],
To **generate Wood-Fire Qi** [生木火之气],
**Long Life and Everlasting Youth** [长生久视],
**Postnatal transformations without end** [后天无穷].

In the **seventh month**, **prolonged fasting** [长斋],
Recite and chant this **scripture** [是经],
Wear the **Nine Immortals’ Mysterious Talismans** [九仙玄箓],
**Summon the Yang Vitality of True Mother of the West** [召西灵真母阳色之气],
**Descend it into the body** [下入身中],
To **generate Metal-Earth Qi** [生金土之气],
**Long Life and Everlasting Youth** [长生久视],
**Postnatal transformations without end** [后天无穷].

In the **tenth month**, **prolonged fasting** [长斋],
Recite and chant this **scripture** [是经],
Wear the **Jade Emperor’s Long Life Treasure Talisman** [玉帝长生宝符],
**Summon the Three Qi Lords of the North** [召北方三气君葛贤之气],
**Descend it into the body** [下入身中],
To **generate Water-Wood Qi** [生水木之炁],
**Long Life and Everlasting Youth** [长生久视],
**Postnatal transformations without limit** [后天无终].

On the **Eight Nodes** [八节之日],
Recite and chant this **scripture** [是经],
Wear the **Great Lord’s Everlasting Youth Talisman** [大君久视之章],
**Summon the Qi of Central Yellow Emperor, Lord of Affairs** [召中黄帝君务犹之炁],
**Descend it into the body** [下入身中],
To **generate Fire-Earth Qi** [生火土之气],
**Life prolonged** [命得长生],
**Divine Court of Jade Purity** [神朝玉真],
**Soul and Spirit clarified and rectified** [魂神澄正],
**Ten Thousand Qi preserved eternally** [万气长存],
**No suffering or torment** [不经苦恼],
**Body radiant with light** [身有光明],
**Three Realms’ attendants guard** [三界侍卫],
**Five Emperors oversee the welcome** [五帝司迎],
**Ten Thousand Spirits pay homage** [万神朝礼],
**Name inscribed in Heaven** [名书上天],
**Merits fulfilled, Virtue attained** [功满德就],
**Ascend to High Clarity** [飞升上清].

The **Dao** [道] speaks:
On **days of practice** [行道之日],
All **must bathe in fragrant water** [皆当香汤沐浴],
**Fast and purify within chambers** [斋戒入室],
Facing **east** [东向],
**Knocking teeth thirty-two times** [叩齿三十二通],
**Hearing the Thirty-two Heavens** [上闻三十二天],
**Repenting Thirty-two Offenses** [心拜三十二过],
**Closing eyes in quiet contemplation** [闭目静思],
**Seated within the three-colored Qi-clouds of Azure, Yellow, and White** [身坐青黄白三色云气之中],
**Inner and outer depths profound** [内外蓊冥],
With **Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, White Crane** [青龙、白虎、朱雀、玄武、狮子、白鹤] **arrayed on either side** [罗列左右],
**Sun and Moon casting radiant light** [日月照明],
**Illuminating the chamber’s brilliance** [洞焕室内],
**A circular halo forming at the neck** [项生圆象],
**Light reflecting the Ten Directions** [光映十方],
**Thus distinctly manifest** [如此分明].

**Secret Incantation** [密咒] says:
**Supreme Mysterious Origin** [无上玄元],
**Greatest Dao Lord** [太上道君].

**Summon forth from my body the Thirty-five Officials of the Five and Six** [召出臣身中三五功曹],
**Left and Right Attendants and Messengers** [左右官使者],
**Serving with Fragrant Jade Boys** [侍香玉童],
**Conveying messages to Jade Girls** [传言玉女],
**Five Emperors’ Direct Talismans** [五帝直符],
**Direct Talismans of the Auspicious Day** [直日香官],
Each **thirty-six in number** [各三十六人],
**Opening the gates as spoken** [关启所言].

**Today’s auspicious celebration** [今日吉庆],
**Prolonged fasting in the Pure Hall** [长斋清堂],
**Practicing this supreme scripture** [修行至经],
**Infinite salvation for all beings** [无量度人].

May **what is summoned ascend directly** [所启上彻],
**Reaching the Supreme Throne of the Primordial Origin’s Lord of Heaven** [径御无上三十二天元始上帝至尊几前].

**Completed** [毕],
**Invoke the Qi of the Thirty-two Offenses facing east to recite the scripture** [引炁三十二过东向诵经].
**Primordial Origin’s Supreme Scripture of Infinite Salvation** [元始无量度人上品妙经]
**Great Void’s Jade Talisman** [太微玉符].

**Nine Immortals’ Mysterious Talismans**
**Jade Emperor’s Precious Talisman of Longevity**

**Earth-born** [土命人] **shall forge Wood-qi to subdue malevolence, commanding longevity and clear vision** [制木气克贼令长生久视].
**Metal-born** [金命人] **shall forge Fire-qi to subdue malevolence, commanding longevity and clear vision** [制火气克贼令长生久视].
**Water-born** [水命人] **shall forge Earth-qi to subdue malevolence, commanding longevity and clear vision** [制土气克贼令长生久视].
**Wood-born** [木命人] **shall forge Metal-qi to subdue malevolence, commanding longevity and clear vision** [制金气克贼令长生久视].
**Fire-born** [火命人] **shall forge Water-qi to subdue malevolence, commanding longevity and clear vision** [制水气克贼令长生久视].

**The Great Lord’s Chapter of Enduring Vision** [大君久视之章],
written in **black ink on crimson silk** [右青书绛箔上],
**burned by fire** [火化之],
facing **east** [面东],
**mixed with pure water and ingested** [清水调服之].

**Select a day of longevity** [取长生日],
**avoiding the suppression of higher over lower or malevolent clashes** [忌上制下克贼].
**Best used on auspicious days of inauguration** [宜以开建日],
or **Spring Jia-Yin, Summer Bing-Wu, Autumn Xin-You, Winter Ren-Zi** [春甲寅，夏丙午，秋辛酉，冬壬子],
**for great auspice** [大吉].

**Worn as an amulet**, inscribed in **red ink on blue silk** [佩用，丹书青箔上].
**Ingested**, inscribed in **red qi** [服用，丹书赤炁].

**After ninety days of fasting** [在斋九十日],
**wearing and ingesting** [佩服],
**invoking the gods, achieving immortality and enduring vision** [致神仙，长生久视],
**with great efficacy** [大验].

**Inscribe the talisman in a secret chamber** [书符密室],
**and do not speak of it to others** [勿以语人].

**The Great Longevity Emperor** [长生大帝君]
**engraves it on a golden jade phoenix tablet** [刻以丹金琼凤之简],
**seals it with the Jade Emperor’s Longevity Chapter** [封以玉帝长生之章],
**and hides it within the Southern Harmony’s Nine Caverns’ Treasure Chamber of the Bright Emperor Al** [藏南和琼明帝阿九洞宝室之内].
**When the eon ends, it emerges once more** [劫尽一出],
**to save those of destined fate and name** [以度缘骨宿名之士].

**Possessing this jade inscription** [有此玉文],
**yet ignorant of the secret Dao** [不知秘道],
**one becomes a corpse-severing immortal** [为尸解仙].

**Wearing or ingesting it forbids impurity** [佩服忌厌秽],
**violation brings retribution** [犯之考身].

**The Primordial Origin’s Mysterious Treasure’s Original Chapter** [元始洞玄灵宝本章],
**achieving longevity and enduring vision** [长生久视],
**tenfold salvation for all beings** [十回度人].

**Southern Polarity’s Hidden Rhyme** [南极隐韵],
**spontaneous separation and union** [离合自然],
**vast and boundless, profound and obscure** [浩虚眇玄],
**flickering and elusive, essence transforming** [恍惚精转].

**From transformation arises life** [中变化生],
**boundless celestial realms** [无极诸天],
**the wondrous qi of the Great Brahman** [大梵妙气],
**ancient eons stretching endlessly** [祖劫绵绵].

**Jade mists gather upon the mountain** [玉霞结山],
**true clarity attains immortality** [真明为仙],
**resplendent divine light** [灵光煌煌],
**crimson peaks and azure summits** [绛阿碧巅].

**Nine hues ascend above** [上出九色],
**three conveniences arrayed within** [内列三便],
**nine chambers curving upward** [九室曲峙],
**below, the black spring flows** [下流玄泉].

**Emerald windows, golden towers** [绿窗金楼],
**divine winds swirling mist** [神风回烟],
**Great Harmony’s embrace** [太和摄录],
**cloud-scripted cavernous texts** [云书洞篇].

**Scaled like dragons, patterned like phoenixes** [斑斑龙鳞，落落凤纹],
**twisting trails of treasure blossoms** [宛转流迹，宝华委纷].
**Directly inscribed with primordial symbols** [直元题象],
**void of birth, divine and formless** [空无生神],
**divine motion without shape** [神运无形],
**qi piercing like a cord** [气贯如绳].

**Faint and boundless** [眇眇莽莽],
**as if nonexistent, yet present** [若亡若存],
**profoundly mixed, like the Luo River’s vastness** [玄浑弥罗],
**the flower-palace’s towering peaks** [蕊宫嵯峨].

**The infant’s sun-pool nurtures** [育婴日池],
**true purity subtly applied** [真粹潜施],
**those who obtain it live forever** [得者长生],
**lost, the celestial compass vanishes** [忽失璇玑].

**Heavenly pearls moistened with dew** [天珠浥液],
**cloud-threads of the Eight Directions** [云纲八辟],
**turning purple to green** [转紫成青],
**the Three True Ones inspecting** [三真检饬].

**Piercing outer layers, illuminating within** [视表彻裹],
**illuminating trillions afar** [遐照千亿],
**emerald shadows returning ninefold** [翠影九还],
**the cavern’s yang nurturing the elixir** [洞阳孕丹].

**The Yellow Father in crimson robes** [黄父赭被],
**guarding the soul for enduring vision** [守魂久视],
**seen for ten thousand years** [见之万年],
**golden locks, jade gates** [金锁玉关].

**Divine tigers guard the gate** [神虎卫门],
**the True Mother presents incense** [真母奏香],
**faint Brahmanic qi envelops all directions** [杳杳梵气，周回十方].

Within are:
**the God of Salvation and Immortality** [度人不死之神],
**the Lord of Southern Polarity’s Longevity** [南极长生之君],
**the Great God of Salvation Who Governs the World** [度世司马大神],
**the Benevolent Lord Han the Elder** [好生韩君丈人],
**the Southern Celestial Official of Records, Extending Lifespan, and Mitigating Fate** [南上司命司录延寿益算度厄尊神].

**Longevity and enduring vision** [长生久视],
**infinite salvation for all beings** [无量度人].

**Today’s compilation** [今日校录],
**all celestial beings attend the court** [诸天临轩].

**Eastern** [东方] **— The God-King of Boundless Generative Qi** [无极生气神王],
**Great Saint of Infinite Salvation and Longevity** [长生大圣无量度人].

**Southern** [南方] **— The God-King of Boundless Spiritual Qi** [无极生精神王],
**Great Saint of Infinite Salvation and Longevity** [长生大圣无量度人].

**Great Saint of Infinite Salvation and Longevity** [长生大圣无量度人].

**Northern** [北方] **— The God-King of Boundless Dao-Qi** [无极生道神王],
**Great Saint of Infinite Salvation and Longevity** [长生大圣无量度人].

**Great Saint of Infinite Salvation and Longevity** [长生大圣无量度人].

**Great Saint of Infinite Salvation and Longevity** [长生大圣无量度人].

**Great Saint of Infinite Salvation and Longevity** [长生大圣无量度人].

**Northwest** [西北] **— The God-King of Boundless Marvelous Qi** [无极生妙神王],
**Great Saint of Infinite Salvation and Longevity** [长生大圣无量度人].

**Above** [上方] **— The God-King of Boundless Stabilizing Qi** [无极生定神王],
**Great Saint of Infinite Salvation and Longevity** [长生大圣无量度人].

**Below** [下方] **— The God-King of Boundless Responsive Qi** [无极生感神王],
**Great Saint of Infinite Salvation and Longevity** [长生大圣无量度人].

**The Ten Directions’ Most Authentic God-King of Longevity and Enduring Vision** [十方至真长生久视神王],
**Great God of Infinite Salvation for the World** [长生度世无量大神].

Together they ride:
**the four-rule, eight-photo chariot** [乘四规八照之舆],
**the three-qi, nine-light palanquin** [三气九光之辇],
**the Cavernous Sovereign’s resplendent clouds** [洞皇蒨粲之云],
**the floating celestial waves and crimson mists canopy** [流霄浪霞之盖],
**the double-rainbow wheels** [双虹之轮],
**the seven-absolute banners** [七绝之节],
**drawn by divine tigers with sapphire manes** [骖驾神虎绀鬃之龙],
**before them, golden cranes cry in unison** [前啸金鹤齐唱],
**behind them, jade flutes harmonize** [后吹玉律同音],
**crimson phoenixes and verdant cranes sing in chorus** [丹凤青鸾，啸歌噰噰],
**the Five Elders clear the path** [五老启途],
**the assembled immortals flank the chariot** [群仙翼辕],
**myriad carriages and ten thousand cavalry** [亿乘万骑],
**floating through the sky, their radiance returning** [浮空而来，倾光回驾],
**overseeing true ones and guiding the living** [监真度生].

**Celestial Chancellors** [诸天丞相],
**Southern昌’s Upper Palace** [南昌上宫],
**Han the Record-Keeper** [韩司主录],
**the God Who Oversees Life** [监生大神],
**holding talismans and scriptures** [执符把箓],
**all assemble before the Emperor** [齐到帝前],
**according to their appointed salvations** [随所应度],
**strictly inspecting the celestial ranks** [严校诸天].

**Proclaiming universally to the Three Realms** [普告三界],
**the boundless divine homeland** [无极神乡],
**the mansions of the springs’ curves** [泉曲之府],
**the Northern Capital of Luo and Tang** [北都罗酆],
**the Three Officials and Nine Bureaus** [三官九府],
**the twelve river sources** [十二河源],
**distinguishing the races of the soil** [分别种民],
**recording meritorious deeds** [简记善功].

**Granting the true qi of the Dao** [授道真气],
**wearing talismans and seeking the Mysterious** [佩箓希玄],
**the body attains longevity** [身得长生],
**enduring vision and eternal years** [久视永年].

**The heart responds with generative virtue** [心感生德],
**the spirit enters the Supreme Void** [神入太玄],
**the Purple Boy observes within** [紫童内观],
**the true realm manifests before** [真境现前].

**Piercing the Boundless** [洞彻无极],
**the Dao of immortality unfolds naturally** [仙道自然],
**sitting, one knows auspicious and inauspicious** [坐知休否],
**attaining Heaven within Heaven** [得天中天].

**The great eon does not falter** [大劫不爽],
**ten thousand qi surge from the primal source** [万气洪源],
**nature aligns with light and void** [性合光空],
**soaring through clouds, ascending mists** [骋云泝烟].

**The Primordial Origin’s decrees** [元始符命],
**timed for ascension and promotion** [时刻升迁],
**returning to the infantile recording of qi** [还婴录气],
**changing form to become immortal** [易形变仙].

**Thus, one attains a hundred years** [适尔百龄],
**soon, tens of thousands** [有顷亿千],
**subduing demons and gaining elevation** [制魔保举],
**ranked in the Southern Celestial Bureau** [度品南宫].

**The jade talisman undergoes refinement** [玉符受炼],
**transforming into true immortality** [仙化成真],
**the living body receives salvation** [生身受度],
**eternal across eons** [劫劫长存].

**With the eon’s wheel turning** [随劫轮转],
**matching Heaven’s years** [与天齐年],
**eternally salvaging the Three Tribulations** [永度三涂],

The *Mínghuì* [92] is piercingly clear,
The *Dàliàng* [93] is profound and mysterious.

**Scripture of the *Língbǎo Wúliàng Dùrén* [94] Supreme Secret for Salvation**
*Chapter Thirty-One* concludes.
*Chapter Thirty-Two* ends.

**Chapter of the Five Phases in Harmonious Regulation**

The Dao speaks: In days of old, within the Jade Emptiness of Great Clarity Heaven, the Nine-Petal Treasure-Light Divine Auspicious Soil, I received from the Primordial Origin the *Five Phases in Harmonious Regulation* of wondrous efficacy.

When the Primordial Origin Heavenly Venerable delivered this scripture, circling ten times in recitation to summon the Ten Directions, the Heavenly Worthies of True Nature, the Supreme Saints of High Veneration, the True Persons of Marvelous Practice, and the Five Stars of the Upper Clarity True Lords—along with their countless retinues—descended upon the void.

Five-colored radiance gathered, with luminous clouds encircling them. The crimson jade palanquin and the purple *lín* chariot rolled forth, golden wheels turning in the sky, sun-chariots floating aloft, feathered banners linked with clouds, golden guardians standing vigil, flowing rainbows interweaving, and jade steeds ascending with mist—illuminating the azure void.

For three days and three nights, the Seven Celestial Sovereigns opened their divine halls, the Five Battalions aligned in order, the celestial balance and gnomon ceased their motion, the mountains and valleys settled in profound stillness, the Dao of Heaven shone forth, the groves of flowers bloomed in verdant splendor, and lofty towers lined the horizon. The assembly ascended upon the wind, entering the Golden Gate of the Jade Capital, where distinctions of high and low vanished. The earth was paved with precious stones, their hues exhaling like silk threads, and the myriad True Ones attended at the seat.

The Primordial Origin Heavenly Venerable took his seat upon the floating five-cloud platform of ice, jade, gold, and myriad treasures, alongside the Middle Heaven Purple Enclosure Azure Flower Born-of-Virtue Ten-Thousand-Life Dao Lord, the Crimson Flower Yang Virtue Ten-Thousand-Blessing Dao Lord, the White Flower Rectitude Ten-Thousand-Benefit Dao Lord, the Dark Flower One Virtue Ten-Thousand-Life Dao Lord, and the Great Flower Sacred Virtue Ten-Thousand-Compliance Dao Lord—the Five Directional True Primordial Lords. After the Primordial Origin unfolded his diagram, the Five *Qi* divided, the Dao Ancestors aligned, and the Qi-Mother received her distinctions. Thus, the Five Phases in Harmonious Regulation were proclaimed, nurturing and transforming the Three Realms, and the Dao of benevolent rearing for the myriad assemblies.

When the scripture was recited once, the Great Saints of the heavens simultaneously praised its virtue. At that time, within the land, men and women practiced the Harmonious Teachings without fail, and none suffered harm from conflict.

When the scripture was recited twice, the Four Seasons harmonized, and time moved without deviation.

When the scripture was recited thrice, the *Chong* and *Yong* aligned with Great Harmony, and the seasons flourished eternally.

When the scripture was recited four times, the ascending *qi* flowed evenly, and no one aged or withered.

When the scripture was recited five times, yin and yang regulated their courses, and sickness did not arise.

When the scripture was recited six times, all living beings fulfilled their nature, and the ten thousand realms attained peace.

When the scripture was recited seven times, the Five Stars converged in brilliance, and the celestial pearls circled their orbits.

When the scripture was recited eight times, sweet dew floated in the sky, and spirit mushrooms luxuriantly sprouted.

When the scripture was recited nine times, heavenly light descended to aid, and the springs and valleys opened in clarity.

When the scripture was recited ten times, the land was transformed by the Dao, and all under heaven bowed in reverence. At that time, men and women of the land—without exception—turned their hearts toward it, all receiving protection and attaining longevity.

The Dao speaks: When the scripture was recited once, the East Directional Limitless Measureless Brand Azure Flower Nine *Qi* True Worthies of Ultimate Reality, with their countless retinues, descended upon the void.

When the scripture was recited twice, the South Directional Limitless Measureless Brand Crimson Flower Three *Qi* True Worthies of Ultimate Reality, with their countless retinues, descended upon the void.

When the scripture was recited thrice, the West Directional Limitless Measureless Brand White Flower Seven *Qi* True Worthies of Ultimate Reality, with their countless retinues, descended upon the void.

When the scripture was recited four times, the North Directional Limitless Measureless Brand Dark Flower Five *Qi* True Worthies of Ultimate Reality, with their countless retinues, descended upon the void.

When the scripture was recited five times, the Northeast Directional Limitless Measureless Brand Pure Flower *Fán-qì* True Worthies of Ultimate Reality, with their countless retinues, descended upon the void.

When the scripture was recited six times, the Southeast Directional Limitless Measureless Brand Verdant Flower *Fán-qì* True Worthies of Ultimate Reality, with their countless retinues, descended upon the void.

When the scripture was recited seven times, the Southwest Directional Limitless Measureless Brand Great Flower *Fán-qì* True Worthies of Ultimate Reality, with their countless retinues, descended upon the void.

When the scripture was recited eight times, the Northwest Directional Limitless Measureless Brand Treasure Flower *Fán-qì* True Worthies of Ultimate Reality, with their countless retinues, descended upon the void.

When the scripture was recited nine times, the Upper Directional Limitless Measureless Brand Purple Flower One *Qi* True Worthies of Ultimate Reality, with their countless retinues, descended upon the void.

When the scripture was recited ten times, the Lower Directional Limitless Measureless Brand Yellow Flower Twelve *Qi* True Worthies of Ultimate Reality, with their countless retinues, descended upon the void.

As the ten recitations concluded, the Limitless True Worthies of Ultimate Reality from the Ten Directions arrived together, and men and women of the land turned their hearts in devotion.

Those who came gathered at the sides, encircling the assembly, all desiring to hear the teachings with joy.

The Primordial Origin Heavenly Venerable then summoned the Five Primordial Dao Lords to expound the methods of Harmonious Regulation for eternal life. No creature perished young, and all calamity was forever severed. The entire world rejoiced, and the ages flourished in prosperity.

Thus, the Primordial Origin transformed his form, manifesting in splendor. His celestial seat towered high, vast as the Xiao Terrace, its emerald radiance layered across the eons, measured in billions of *rèn*. The Primordial Saint’s body stood majestic, luminous as a jewel mountain, with the Ten Directional groves of flowers all shading beneath him like an umbrella. His golden hue shone through, illuminating the Limitless.

As the Primordial Origin ascended, the Heavenly Worthies of True Nature, the Supreme Saints of High Veneration, the True Persons of Marvelous Practice, the Five Primordial Dao Lords, and the Limitless True Worthies of Ultimate Reality from the Ten Directions—along with their countless retinues—all ascended to the Mysterious Seat.

The celestial and human assembly gazed upward, each True One dwelling in their own heavenly realm. Jade railings and carved ceilings, golden gates and *láng* halls—none lacked their perfection. The voice of the teaching resounded uniformly among the myriad crowds, hearts communicating without words, the law-sound requiring no question, all delivering the teaching simultaneously without contradiction.

Like cascading springs, the profound meaning poured forth, and all beings clearly understood.

The *qi* of Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, and Earth—
the Five Phases—naturally regulated themselves, their essence free of conflict and punishment.

Though there were occasions of excess or obstruction, they were measured according to Heaven’s subtle intentions, giving rise to harmonious *qi*.

When the Five Phases merged and ascended, their virtues combined, their *qi* balanced, and the Three Realms attained great stability.

As for all sentient beings, their living forms—
constructed by the Three Primordials and refined by the Five Phases—
followed the Harmonious Regulation without obstruction, their vital power nurturing their spirits.

The Void embraces the True Dao, congealed like pearls and jade,
great as a marble ball, its radiance dazzling—
a form manifest in the boundless expanse.

At that time, all celestial beings and sentient life,
through Harmonious Regulation, severed the Path of Death.
All evils ceased to arise; great karmic debts and ancient grudges
were instantly extinguished.

The torments of the hells—fierce flames and molten copper—
transformed into blue lotuses. The Nine Abysses of the Northern Capital
became a Land of Bliss.

When the Five Phases aligned in Harmonious Regulation,
all things flourished in transformation. The Three Realms’ spirits and immortals,
all peoples without exception, were free from guilt or transgression.

The Celestial Hosts sang in unison, the myriad deities arranged rites—
the realm of a single land became like suspended ice-jade,
or a gemstone, its surface luminous and flawless,
without the slightest blemish or speck of dust.

At that moment, when the Primordial Sovereign manifested in the Mystic Seat,
the scripture’s teaching was completed. The Perfected Ones oversaw the transmission,
and bestowed it upon me. At that time, joy and celebration were beyond words.

The Celestial Hosts resumed their stations—
in an instant, silence remained, no trace of sound lingering.

At that time, all beings who encountered the scripture’s law
universally attained salvation, their lives preserved unharmed,
their years complete. All bowed in reverence.

They practiced in accordance with the heart, the Way, virtue, goodness,
the law, the Perfected, clarity, life, and transformation—
speech without contradiction, lips without foul words,
harmonizing in boundless compassion, even strangers becoming kin.

The land was secure, the people prosperous, rejoicing in eternal peace.
The teaching’s origin was the Dao; the entire land governed by the Way.

Those with sincere devotion, revering and honoring it,
all attained the power to save the world.

The Dao declares: Within the scripture’s words spoken by the Primordial Sovereign
lie the inner names of the Celestial Emperors and the hidden sounds
of the Five Phases’ Harmonious Regulation, which preserve all things.
They are also the taboo names of the Five Primordial Dao Lords,
the secret names of the mingled Five *Qi*.

Only the Most Exalted Sage, who has become a True Person,
mastering the Mystic and fathoming the subtle, can fully comprehend them.

If recited ten times, the Celestial Hosts align in salvation,
all things flourish in life, the celestial currents flow in harmony,
*qi* unobstructed, mountains settled, seas pacified.
The Six Heavens run in clarity, the Three Celestial Lights shine steadily,
the Nine Paths converge, demons and spirits submit, returning to the Way.
White bones and corpses, through Harmonious Regulation, are reborn.

For scholars who recite it ten times,
the Five Phases gather essence, the Three Fields nourish the embryo,
no harm befalls them, their lifespan equals Heaven’s.

Thus it is—scholars who chant this scripture
invoke the Five Stars, bringing harmonious joy and peace.
The Six Viscera settle, foul *qi* dissipates,
the heart resonates with the Perfected Truth,
commanding the Ten Directions. The law extends to the Celestial Spirit,
all beings turn in reverence. Disasters do not arise;
one can subdue the Earth Spirits, bind demonic essences,
ward off death and preserve form.

To recite this chapter lightly invites calamity.
To venerate and honor it brings prosperity to one’s gates,
generation after generation, unending flourishing.
With virtuous connections, ten thousand disasters cannot approach,
divine protection guards the door.

This scripture is supreme and wondrous,
unmatched in the Jade Capital, saving countless beings,
the root of all Dao paths.

Its grandeur is vast, its virtue beyond measure.

The Dao declares: For those who recite this scripture ten times,
the Celestial Hosts gather in unison, the Five Star Lords,
and the Five Directional Great Gods descend to their places.

The Three Celestial Lights govern life within the body;
if they collide, rage, or are eclipsed, bringing misfortune,
causing the world’s affairs to falter and logic to invert,
one must fast and recite the scripture.

When the Five Stars align in harmony, the Five Phases regulate,
disasters vanish. Countless ancestors, their suffering souls,
all immediately receive salvation, ascending to the Vermilion Palace,
their term fixed at nine years, transformed and reborn,
becoming noble beings.

Those who love learning and master this scripture,
when their merit is complete and virtue fulfilled,
all attain immortality, ascending to the Golden Gate,
feasting in the Jade Capital.

Scholars who practice and recite this scripture
cause the Five Stars to revolve in harmony,
returning without turning, filling the Three Palaces,
naturally attaining the Perfected State, immediately receiving salvation,
and ascending to the Southern Palace.

When mortals recite it, the Celestial Wheel moves in order,
the Twelve Mansions align without conflict,
their passage timely, *qi* surpassing the seasons,
all in perfect accord. No calamity befalls the body,
True *qi* congeals within, no illness or pestilence approaches,
longevity extends, and all later attain the Path of Corpse-Shedding.

The spirit-soul, though temporarily extinguished,
does not pass through the hells but immediately regains form,
wandering the boundless expanse.

This scripture’s subtlety is profound, its salvation boundless—
all celestial and human beings receive its blessings.

Its immeasurable merit spans life and death, a treasure of Heaven,
not to be passed down to the world below.

Only the virtuous, bearing gold and jade with sincere hearts,
pledging to Heaven before transmitting it.

To leak or neglect it invites retribution upon nine generations,
eternal servitude to ghostly officials.

The scripture is attended by the Five Emperors,
twenty-four Jade Boys and Jade Girls each,
guarding its divine text and protecting those who receive it.

The Dao declares: In the first month, if one observes a long fast
and recites this scripture, the Five Phases regulate,
spring *qi* flourishes, all things sprout and grow,
embryos and eggs develop without loss,
naturally attaining spiritual clarity.
Ancestral souls from past ages, bound to hell or laboring in torment,
are saved and ascend to the Southern Palace.

In the seventh month, if one observes a long fast
and recites this scripture, the Five Phases regulate,
autumn *qi* matures, all creatures harden their forms,
nourished in tranquility. The Golden Essence enters the bones,
the body attains immortality. The Celestial Hosts record their names,
yellow talismans and white tablets erase death for rebirth.

In the tenth month, if one observes a long fast
and recites this scripture, the Five Phases regulate,
winter *qi* solidifies, all things return to their roots,
yang *qi* withdraws, the Supreme One resumes His station,
the Dao of the Sovereign flourishes, the Five Stars converge,
sacred virtue renews daily. The Four Seas calm, the Six *Qi* harmonize,
subjects and ministers rejoice in peace. For ten thousand years,
eternal peace prevails, lifespan equals Heaven and Earth,
the sun and moon never decline. Wars cease, epidemics disperse,
the age is pure, virtue abundant. As king or emperor,
ruler and subject, father and son—
the nation’s destiny is secure, Heaven’s mandate eternal,
generation after generation, unbroken. The sovereign governs his realm,
the people proclaim eternal peace.

On the eight auspicious days,
reciting and chanting this scripture,
the Five Phases align in harmony,
the Ten Directions unite in their ranks,
True *Qi* circulates universally,
the seasons transform naturally—
all undertakings succeed,
inner cultivation is perfected,
and one attains the rank of **Nine Palaces True Person**.

On the day of one’s **Native Destiny**,
reciting and chanting this scripture,
the Five Phases align in harmony,
calamities do not befall—
the Three Punishments and Six Calamities,
the afflictions of *karmic* exhaustion and shock,
all vanish as the stars’ light envelops the body,
the Dao of immortality arises spontaneously,
and the soul and spirit become clear and upright.

The *Qi* of Ten Thousand Years endures,
free from suffering and distress,
the body radiates brilliance,
guarded by the Three Realms,
welcomed by the Five Emperors,
honored by myriad deities—
one’s name is inscribed in Heaven,
cultivation is complete, virtue fulfilled,
and ascension to the **Upper Pure** is achieved.

The Dao instructs:
On days of **Cultivating the Way**,
all should bathe in fragrant waters,
fast and enter the chamber,
facing east,
knocking teeth thirty-two times,
ascending to hear the **Thirty-Two Heavens**,
mentally repenting thirty-two transgressions,
closing the eyes,
quietly contemplating oneself seated within
the **Three Colors of Clouds and *Qi***—blue, yellow, white—
as inner and outer darkness enfolds,
the Five Stars rest upon the head,
their luminous *Qi* swirling around,
the **Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane**
arrayed on either side,
the sun and moon casting radiant light,
illuminating the chamber’s depths,
a circular halo forming at the neck,
its glow reaching the Ten Directions—
so vivid and distinct.

The secret invocation states:

*"Supreme Mysterious Origin,
Highest Dao Sovereign.
I summon forth my body’s Thirty-Five *Qi* Officials,
left and right attendants and celestial messengers,
serving boys of jade and pearl,
transmitting words through girls of jade,
the Five Emperors’ direct talismans,
the fragrant officials of the Thirty-Two Days,
each in groups of thirty-six,
to open the way as spoken.*

*Today is auspicious and joyous,
a long fast in the pure hall,
cultivating this scripture of boundless salvation.
May my invocation ascend directly
to the **Supreme Thirty-Two Heavens**,
before the **Most Venerable Emperor of Primordial Beginnings**,
the Most Exalted One.*

*Finished. Draw forth the breath of Thirty-Two Repentances,
facing east to recite the scripture.*

*Primordial Beginnings—Scripture of Boundless Salvation, Supreme Grade of Marvelous Teachings*

*Primordial Mysterious Dao—Essence of the Spirit Treasure’s Original Chapter,*
the Five Phases aligned in harmony,
True Transformation grants salvation.

A hundred demons retreat in silence,
their separation and union occur naturally—
the Great Void, the Mysterious Origin,
the boundless and the obscure, the True and the False.
From the utmost emptiness, the divine arises,
the True *Qi* and divine spirit endure,
the two halves ascending in unison,
as yin and yang first divide.

The black and white essences,
the Heaven’s most exalted treasures.
The central yellow, the earthly foundation,
as the Four *Qi*s withdraw into obscurity.

The **Red Clarity** unfurls its diagram,
and the Five Stars manifest.
Their luminous array,
the Dao’s profound and mysterious essence.

The **True Soil of the Supreme Void**,
its virtue self-named as **Settling Virtue**.
Its parental origins,
**Jia and Yi** as the source.

**Bound and Unbound** seek each other,
and the earthly form emerges.
**Yi and Geng** merge their *Qi*,
and the earth conceives the metal.

The **Metal’s Virtue** is divine and martial,
bearing Heaven’s root.
The **Metal Essence** transforms into water,
as **Heng** and **Xin** align.
Water’s nature nourishes below,
as metal and earth respond to transformation.

**Juxiang** exhales verdant *Qi*,
green sprouts rise like clouds.
The clouds return to the **Upper Pure**,
as **Gui** and **Wu** take form.

The sun and moon contain and nurture,
the **Red Clarity** ascends in smoke.
The smoke disperses, the body unites,
as *Qi* returns to its True Origin.

Divine transformation knows no gate,
no gate exists—emptiness itself.
This emptiness is the **Earthly Sovereign**,
as the Nine Returns and Seven Reversions unfold.

The **Supreme Dao’s essence**,
thus named the Five Phases.
In harmony and alignment,
yang顺 brings fortune, yin逆 brings calamity—
to align the Five Phases,
only the Emperor’s sacrifice suffices.

The **Ten Thousand Heavens** purify and refine,
as vast *karmic* exhaustion brings tranquility.
The Five Phases submit and conquer,
their oppressive and restraining forces differ in strength.
Without divine communion,
one cannot know the **Most Sacred**.

Earth as the **Central Sovereign**,
its *Qi* of the Five Exhaustions is potent—
wood comes to subdue it,
not to conquer or restrain,
but to ensure its harmonious flourishing.

Wood reaches its peak and offends metal,
metal triumphs, fire flows in retreat,
fire blazes, water rushes to aid—
all these are instances of submission and conquest.

The vulgar and ignorant of this world
fail to grasp Heaven’s Dao.
They prize only central harmony,
its balanced and unbiased virtue,
as the Emperor’s **Sacrificial Rite**,
aligning without deviation—
the **Mysterious**, yet again the **Mysterious**.

The **Most Precious** in harmony gives birth,
as pebbles transform into jade pavilions,
palaces of jade and gates of moonstone,
golden towers and emerald cities.
The **Idyllic and Lofty** halls,
mountains of jade in the **Upper Capital**,
the **Supreme Extremity**—the **Supreme**,
the **Great Luo** and **Jade Purity**.

Whether absent or present,
it manifests at will—
vast and boundless **Dharma *Qi***,
pervading formlessly.

Within are the **Three Pure Ones**—the Great Emperor,
within are the **Nine Elderly Immortals**,
the **True Essence** of the **Nine**,
within is the **Yellow Origin**—the **Nine Substances**’ Great Deity,
within is the **White Origin**—the **Luminous Void** Sovereign,
within is the **Supreme Mysterious**—the **Five Spirits** of the **Dongwei Cavern**,
within is the **Jade Verdure**—the **Nine Immortals**’ Venerable Sage,
within is the **Red Scripture**—the **Purple Text** Sovereign,
within is the **Supreme August**—the **Most Venerable**,
**Emperor of Ten Thousand Blessings**,
**Aligned Virtue**, **Primordial Transformation**,
**Prolonging Life**, **Granting Salvation from Calamities**.

*Today’s recitation*
summons all the Heavens to attend the hall.

**East:** The **Boundless**—**Green Emperor**, **Wood True Spirit** Sovereign,
**Eternal Life** Great Sage,
**Boundless Salvation**.

**Eternal Life** Great Sage,
**Boundless Salvation**.

**Eternal Life** Great Sage,

**Eternal Life** Great Sage,
**Boundless Salvation**.

**Eternal Life** Great Sage,
**Boundless Salvation**.

**Eternal Life** Great Sage,
**Boundless Salvation**.

**Eternal Life** Great Sage,
**Boundless Salvation**.

**Eternal Life** Great Sage,
**Boundless Salvation**.

**Eternal Life** Great Sage,
**Boundless Salvation**.

The **Ten Directions’ Most True**—**Ascending Heaven** Sovereign,
**Eternal Life**, **World-Saving** Great Deity.

All ride upon the **Purple Cloud**,
the **Celestial Chariot of Refined Essence**,
the **Five True** of **Taiwei**,
the **Golden Brilliance**—**Boundless Transformation**,
the **White Deer and Vermilion Phoenix**,
the **Green Crane and Yellow Beast**,
the **Ten Thousand Blessings’** steeds,
the **Heavenly Immortals** in procession,
seven hundred million souls,
holding the **Double Pearl of Moonlight**,
wearing the **White Feathered** and **Dark Dry** crowns and sashes,
adorned with the **Nine *Qi* and Three Celestial Marks**,
chanting the **Nine Songs** with resonant tones,
the **Eight Substances** in harmonious melodies,
their **whistling hymns** clear and resonant,
as the **Five Elders** guide the path,
the **multitude of immortals** escort the carriage—
ten thousand chariots, a hundred thousand cavalry,
floating through the void,
their radiance returning as they align,
in harmonious transformation and generation."

The Celestial Marshals of all realms,
the Southern Palace of Nánchāng’s High Officials,
Kàn the Chief Record-Keeper,
the Supervising Vitality Great Deities,
the Five Emperors’ Marshals,
the Sensing-Generation Primordial Lords—
holding the sacred talismans and registers,
all assembled before the Sovereign’s throne.

Following their appointed salvations,
they traverse the cosmic cycles of the heavens,
repelling rebellion and suppressing violence,
harmonizing the Five Primordial *Qi*.
Water and fire no longer contend—
all things preserved intact.
Heavenly, human, ghostly, and divine—
all transform into immortals through the Way.

As loyal subjects, they prioritize virtue and filial piety,
their loyalty moving the Jade Emperor,
their piety reaching the Supreme Mysteries.
Yin and yang in perfect equilibrium,
the Three Officials’ decrees proclaimed,
humans and spirits alike rejoicing,
their ranks swelling in abundance.

Descending to the lowest abysses of Yōudū,
the northern mountains and river sources,
the suffering and liberated of the underworld,
ascending at every moment.

Through harmony, they attain life—
immortal transformation into humanity.
Their original bodies receive salvation,
eternal across all kalpas.
With the kalpas’ wheel, they align with Heaven’s years,
endlessly salvaging the Three Realms of Suffering,
transcending the Five Torments and Eight Hardships,
soaring freely in the Upper Clarity.
