Thirty-two Heavens, thirty-two Emperors.
The hidden names of the Heavens,
the hidden titles of the Heavens.
Within the celestial void, natural patterns emerge.

In harmony with the Five Stars,
no delay or stagnation.
Those who harbor rebellion are suppressed—
the Dao’s *qi* reverses, leftward.
Offenders are pursued, their *qi* forced back to its course.
From rectitude, all things generate,
nourishing the myriad transformations,
sharing glory with the Sovereign,
none daring to cut short or harm.

Refined essence and concentrated *qi*—
nineteen thousand four hundred twenty-one varieties of grains, fruits, vegetables, and livestock,
the Five Phases generating in order—
those who consume them live long,
free from sickness, naturally attaining immortality.

This text conceals its mysteries—
the enlightened do not speak of it.
Awakening to the True, recognizing the Mysterious,
the Jade Scripts proclaim it clearly.

The Celestial Realms conceal their harmonies,
none prevail through conquest.

Warfare defies nature,
clashing with the Five Stars.

Their divisions in accord bring blessings to the Sovereign.
The eternal *qi* of ten thousand years
extinguishes the *xiān* demons and malevolent calamities,
drowning the perils of water.

The music of rectitude, the eminence of rectitude,
the divinity of rectitude, the magic of rectitude,
the spirit of rectitude.

The two luminaries and six harmonies
follow their courses in the Upper Clarity.

Purple Forbidden spreads its *qi*,
the Wandering Star arrays the stars.

Great Harmony surges and fills—
gold and wood assume the same form.
Water and fire unite as one,
earthly virtue converges together.

Slaying, harming, and wrathful strife—
through rectitude, peace is attained.

Boundless mysteries, profound beyond measure.
The divine and true are manifested,
universally benefiting heaven and humankind.

Today, rejoicing in receiving the passage,
passing through the gates of the Celestial Realms,
I pray to extinguish the delayed, stagnant, rebellious,
and destructive *qi*,
to sever the roots of the *xiān*,
to guide the Five Constants in harmony,
to let the True Flow of the Supreme Mysterious unfold,
as the Five Emperors turn the pivot,
weaving the celestial gates.

The Eastern Dipper prolongs life,
the Western Dipper unites *qi*,
the Northern Dipper nurtures the embryo,
the Southern Dipper directs momentum,
the Central Dipper receives form—
the three realms converge in blessing.

The Green Emperor harmonizes with metal,
the White Emperor aligns with wood,
the Red Emperor governs water,
the Black Emperor aids fire,
the Yellow Emperor embraces the void.

The Five Phases assist in concert—
let any who act wickedly or defy the Dao
be punished by wind and fire.

The True Kings of the Azure Sky subdue the wood spirits,
the True Kings of the Vermilion Sky behead the fire bandits,
the True Kings of the White Sky sever the metal evils,
the True Kings of the Black Sky annihilate the water monsters,
the True Kings of the Yellow Sky suppress the earthly calamities.
The Five Emperors are the sovereigns of ten thousand spirits.

Flying and marching with drumming retinues,
commanding the divine armies.
With banners and drums, they roam the boundless void,
self-proclaimed as resplendent—
the Celestial Realms unite in merit.
The heavens decree for humankind,
strictly restraining the *xiān* demons.

Wood *qi* rebels against earth,
earth exhausts water in restraint.
Water conceals fire’s essence,
fire refines and melts gold.
Gold returns to subdue wood—
their succession brings calamity.

The Five Emperors grasp their talismans,
the Five Stars command dragons.
Guiding the sacred cords,
harmonizing the *qi* in unity,
the Five Phases attain rectitude.
Without conquest or injury,
heaven and humankind align with the Dao,
all things radiant and flourishing,
naturally attaining longevity.

The transformations are bright and harmonious,
heaven and earth revolve in order.
The Six Spirits flourish abundantly,
ten thousand *qi* without fault.
The sacred age is boundless,
ten thousand spirits obey in unison.
The Three Realms and Five Emperors
proclaim the Upper Clarity.

The Dragon Han extends prosperity,
the True Dao endures eternally—
vague and formless, neither hidden nor revealed.

The primordial crystal is vast and boundless,
mixed *qi* radiates brilliance—
dark and red conceal the embryo,
the Five *qi* shine forth.

The domains are fixed in position,
east and west clash and repel,
forms and forces multiply—
some yielding, some rigid.

Wood and metal wage war,
dragons and tigers soar—
yin is restrained by yang,
yang presses against yin.
Seizing and plundering without end,
*qi* and spirit are wounded.

The Primordial Beginning walks the Dao,
the Five Stars are sovereign lords.
The virtuous follow yang’s rectitude,
the wicked bring calamity.
The True One governs the pivot,
the Central Pole commands the spirit.

Through rectitude, transformations unfold,
opening the Jade Capital,
dazzling the Mysterious Platform,
the Azure Abyss as heaven.

Above and below the heavens,
no depths, no darkness,
no form, no shadow,
no limit, no end.

The Crimson Brightness unfurls its diagram,
its movements proceed in order.
The Primordial Beginning settles and governs,
jewel seals and jade scriptures.
Soaring clouds and phoenixes,
the primal *qi* as the root of the Dao.

Preserving the cycles of cosmic ages,
ensuring heaven’s eternal endurance.
The *Fàn* and the Black *Mìluó*—
ten thousand patterns unfold.
The primal cords flow and manifest,
the Thirty-Two Heavens.

Revolving without color,
circulating the ten directions.
The Wheel and Dipper traverse,
returning to the Five Constants.
Thirty-five divisions,
converging *qi* at the Upper Primordial.

This is called rectitude in motion,
not transgressing the divine cords.
The cords govern the *qi*,
advancing and retreating as they lead.
Loving life and assisting in harmony,
the wheel turns without faltering.

Rectitude aligns with harmony,
harmony profound and abyssal.
The Eight Scenes merge in obscurity,
*qi* entering the most mysterious depths.
Within the Mysterious, the Supreme Sovereign,
the Highest True One.

Spreading the luminous diagrams,
manifesting the profound chapters.
The Five Crimson Scriptures
judge and sever inauspiciousness.
The threads of fate are woven,
the Three Realms as a blessed hall.
The Sovereign’s virtue follows its course,
the Purple Court links in fragrance.
The Cloud Residence is serene with jade,
the Sun Gate adorned with golden tassels.
The august and resplendent treasures bloom,
void and natural.

Ten thousand harmonies, ten thousand convergences,
the Five Governments attain truth.
Within truth lies the spirit,
the Great Lord of longevity.

No wood emperor of brilliance,
the White Primordial, the Golden Spirit.
The Great One governs earth,
the Fire Lord commands fate.
The Peach and Kang unite in extension,
the Water Ancestor, the Great Ming.
Holding talismans and scriptures,
preserving life’s roots.

Ascending to the Upper Clarity,
entering and exiting the Azure Chamber.
Within the Eight Scenes, in the most subtle realms,
descending to govern the human form,
the Vermilion Palace of the Cinnabar Field.
Regulating the Five *qi*,
blending with ten thousand spirits.
Ten revolutions return to the numinous,
ten thousand *qi* become immortal.

The Dao of immortality values life,
boundless in its salvation of humankind.
Ascending to the Mysterious Gate,
the flying celestial wheel of law.
Rectitude prolongs command,
sin and blessing are forbidden.

Past lives and karmic ties—
all receive enlightenment.
The flying soul generates the body,
the body attains rebirth,
ascending to hear the Celestial Realms.
Above the Celestial Realms,
each has a gate of birth.

Within are the void and natural songs,
the Five True Sacred Chapters,
words attuned to the Highest True Ones.

First, the True Lords of the Five Stars—
the Fixed Stars of Purple Forbidden
define their celestial positions in flight:
The boundless void, the Dao’s natural essence.
Dark and boundless, before all traces,
the mixed and hollow origin.

「The vague and fleeting essence of things,
when refined to its utmost, does not depart.

Rising in the yin, descending in the yang,
the primordial *qi* flows ceaselessly.

From whence does *qi* arise?
The Great Emptiness emits its mist.

Its clarity is within the embryo,
its divine *qi* a deep, unfathomable spring.

When the Three Five are named,
the Seven Nine are linked in sequence.

*Qi* divides at the cardinal points,
water and fire shift in their transformations.

Strength and weakness, hardness and softness—
the Dao’s work is never complete.

The roots and angles have their origins,
scattered yet present in the heavens.

From this, life and change unfold;
enlightenment brings divinity and immortality.

The Five Agents harmonize in aid,
the Five Bandits as their karmic ties.

Water, fire, metal, wood,
central earth and the heavenly gateways.

Restraining them leads to stagnation,
*qi* shifts into malevolence.

Stillness brings equilibrium,
transformation’s power ceases to flow.

Singing this sacred melody,
one rides the clouds in boundless flight.

---
**The Second Chapter of the True Lords of the Five Stars—
Harmonizing the Five *Qi* to Invoke the Mysterious**

Golden radiance in the East,
blazing, the Precious Dragon.

Western spirit bestows the talisman,
Southern Mountain thunders forth.

The yellow flags unfurl,
encircling the Celestial Enclosure.

Following the Dao brings no regret,
the true *qi* finds its home.

The brocade carriage gleams with resplendence,
golden steeds with jade reins.

What hunt do I pursue?
I roam the Eight Extremes.

Serving lords and serving parents,
loyalty and filial piety come first.

The Dao’s marvel lies here,
its secrets may not be revealed.

Above, it aids the Imperial Palace,
below, it proclaims virtue.

My Dao stands clear and bright,
its light shines through the Nine Heavens.

Life nurtures in harmony,
creation knows no difficulty.

Spread through the heavenly Dao,
pervading *qi* in endless cycles.

All beings flourish and multiply,
each employing its own essence.

Light extends above and below,
ten thousand *qi* ascend to immortality.

Inner blessings fill the Three Realms,
outer transformation opens the Mysterious.

Heaven follows clarity and purity,
earth follows peace and tranquility.

Humans follow the embryo’s elixir,
repeatedly refining the womb’s gate.

Birth without death,
piercing vision attains enlightenment.

The spirit transforms into the void,
riding the Nine Dragons in flight.

Celebration spreads in radiant hues,
the Five Elders receive their mandates.

Jade strategies and crimson seals,
left calls forth the Flowery Youth.

Right supports the True Lord,
golden flames and fire winds flow.

Following the secret Dao,
ten thousand emperors sing in reverence.

The Five Agents return to One,
the Non-existent within the Existent.

---
**The Third Chapter of the True Lords of the Five Stars—
Harmonizing the Movement and Course of the Five Agents in the Great Azure Song**

The Celestial Market, tiered walls,
stars arrayed in unrestrained splendor.

I hold the jade scroll,
its crimson text in grand characters.

Engraved are the luminous gates,
the crystalline halls in the Northern Chamber.

Ten thousand leagues of starry realms,
immortal citizens in endless ranks.

Within, the sovereigns reign,
purple thresholds and crimson mists.

Clouds fill my abode,
light floats over my pavilion.

Yin and yang, two luminaries,
pearls and jade in resplendent array.

Swiftly they move,
five colors manifest anew.

Retardation and obstruction,
disorder and rebellion—
those who follow virtue face no strife.

By following, one serves the Emperor,
actions align with divine decree.

By following, one serves Heaven,
the Dao is attained naturally.

By following, one nurtures life,
the spirit’s power flows unending.

*Qi* merges with the Great Nothingness,
recording the Precious Map.

Five sacred chapters in jade script,
revolving around the Imperial Chariot.

The Imperial Chariot in the East,
benevolent transformations spread far.

The Great Standard points West,
supporting the lance in perfect accord.

Following the Dao brings governance,
divine creation achieves the marvelous.

My station is the Highest King,
radiant in its purity.

Good and evil are not overlooked,
virtue is their refuge.

Following is the sacred virtue,
all underheavens take it as their model.

Disrupting Heaven’s course,
one becomes the Five Bandits.

The Dao is nearly formless,
obscure yet the essence remains.

Life and change know no end,
the dragon’s tracks carved in jade.

Purple clouds begin to stir,
swallowing the elixir of jade.

Gazing upon the Three Seals,
instantly one’s vision attains clarity.

The Divine Mother and Mysterious Father,
their eyes like sun and moon.

This—above the Three Realms,
within the flying void—
is the True Lords of the Five Stars’ harmonizing of the Five Agents in their most wondrous melody,
its words attuned to the sacred chapters.

Recite it a hundred times,
and one’s name ascends to the Southern Palace.

Recite it a thousand times,
and the Five Emperors welcome in person.

Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao,
ascending to the Great Void,
crossing the Three Realms,
and attaining the rank of immortal sage.

Those who hear this sacred melody,
ten thousand spirits reverence its form,
softening the earthly *qi* and gatekeepers,
attending and escorting in solemn procession.
Rising from the earthly gate,
the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships vanish,
the Seven Ancestors ascend in rank,
eternally freed from the ghostly offices,
their spirits crossing to Vermilion Peak,
refined anew to take birth.

This is called boundless,
the Emperor’s salvation knows no end.

There are hidden celestial texts,
all heavens hold them in reverence.

Revealing or belittling them leads to hell,
disaster befalls the Seven Ancestral Sages.

The Dao declares: These two chapters are the sacred, hidden melodies
of the Celestial Emperors and the Five Directions’ True Primordial Lords,
all the words of the Great Brahman,
not the common speech of the world.

Returning to the harmonious course,
one’s movements flow as they should,
avoiding all calamities,
descending to gentle *qi*,
blessings as vast as the Treasury of Heaven—
thus it is called profound and mysterious,
its depths beyond ordinary seeking.

The Celestial Court treasures it,
hidden in the Mysterious Palace’s Purple Forbidden Upper Hall,
according to the secret arts of the Four Ten Thousand Kalpas,
transmitted but once.

If a perfected sage brings a heart of golden, precious essence,
and according to the ancient rites makes a solemn pact with the Ten Heavens,
then it shall be entrusted to them.

The Dao declares: When the Five Agents are harmonized,
all beings have their root.
Yin and yang reach perfect accord,
the Three Realms rejoice in harmony.
Heaven and humans live long,
no untimely death or injury.

If *qi* and transformation stray from order,
the stars’ courses overlap,
and the Five Agents’ restraints prevail—
unending punishment ensues.

Then the movements of Heaven and Earth
also reach their limits.
The sun, moon, and Five Stars
also wax and wane.
Even the most sacred immortals
have times of rest and decline.
The shallow practitioners
also suffer ailments and wounds.

For when the Five Agents’ *qi*
does not follow the Dao,
Heaven and humans grow angry,
not pleased,
and the human and ghostly realms
become ominous, not auspicious.

All who face such calamities,
sharing the same *qi*,
must together cultivate their hearts with fasting,
offer incense at the six times,
recite the sutra ten times in rotation,
and virtue shall descend in blessings,
dispelling all inauspicious signs.

Boundless texts,
salvation for all without end.

The Dao declares: The lives of mortals
are limited by fate’s constraints,
their courses bound by mutual reliance,
water and fire intertwined in error,
their numbers destined for annihilation,
their *qi* exhausted at life’s end—
all because the Five Agents’ restraints
converge at the Absolute Barrier.

They do not know that when the body decays and things wear out,
the true spirit, the master of the original essence,
the Dao’s most refined precision,
has not yet perished.

If the Five Agents go against their order,
Heaven and Earth reach their extremes.
Or if shallow practitioners,
their Dao yet incomplete,
face the fate of annihilation,
their bodies traversing the Great Darkness.»

When the hour of passage arrives,
the learned and the perfected shall perform rites for them—
burning incense, reciting the sutra ten times,
to guide the corpse’s form according to the Dao.

The soul and spirit ascend directly to the Southern Palace,
their rebirth determined by their merit,
the days calculated until they are reborn anew.

The Wheel of Rebirth turns without confusion—
thus, they attain immortality.

The Dao declares:
When the Five Stars transgress,
disordering their proper courses,
above, it brings celestial calamity,
below, terrestrial disaster,
and among mortals, affliction.

When Heaven and Earth exhaust their cycles,
the stars wander from their paths,
the sun and moon lose their eclipses,
the seasons lose their order,
and yin and yang fall into discord—
this is disorder toward Heaven.

When mountains collapse and the earth trembles,
when waters surge and springs run dry,
when beasts devour the people,
when locusts and rodents ravage the crops,
when lands sink and floods burst forth,
when winds and fires erupt,
when people are crushed, drowned, or shattered—
this is disorder toward Earth.

When the realm suffers plague,
when wars erupt and pestilence spreads,
when the common folk perish in masses,
when friends and kin meet untimely ends,
when ghosts arise as scourges—
this is disorder toward humanity.

When the Five Agents lose their order,
all things fall into chaos.

To restore harmony with the Dao naturally,
to bring peace to the world,
one must observe fasts,
display the true scriptures of the Five Directions,
erect altars and offer tribute,
and petition the Five Emperors,
burning incense and reciting sutras.

For fasting, chanting, and merit-making are of great weight.
Above, they dispel celestial calamities,
protecting and safeguarding the sovereign.
Below, they avert poisonous harm,
delivering the common folk.
Life and death depend upon them—
their blessings are boundless,
thus it is said: *unfathomable*,
universally saving both Heaven and humanity.

The Dao declares:
Whoever possesses this sutra
and performs these deeds of virtue
for Heaven and Earth, the sovereign, and the people—
when disaster strikes, if they resolve to fast,
burn incense, and recite the sutras,
ten times complete,
all the heavens shall record their names,
ten thousand spirits shall stand guard,
and the perfected shall be granted audience.
They shall become worthy ministers of the Golden Palace of the Holy Sovereign,
the heavens recording their merits and demerits without fail.
The True King of the Celestial Realm shall also recommend them,
and those who attain the Dao shall truly comprehend these profound words.

The hidden speech of the Great Brahman in the boundless sound,
composed by the Dao Lord,
the *Yushu Wuxing Shunzhi Yupan* of the Primordial Spirit,
the Eastern Eight Heavens.

The spirits often change their designs, the jade passes through the mountain’s return.
The Child of the Dao and the True King awaken sevenfold—
the Immortal’s waves support them deeply.

At dawn, the still and the serene are arrayed;
the *Jiānggěng* calls forth in welcome.
The precious incense spreads its blessing,
the Primordial Spirit’s *Shǐlì* prepares the body.

The mighty and the vast stand strong and upright,
the lowly and the humble are discerned in secrecy.
The *Lǔniǎn* chariot rests in its home,
the *Chǔtán* abode shifts the heart.

The demon’s chanting flows through the rivers,
the *Jiūqū* and *Zhāngpíng* are thoroughly examined.
The *Lánqiú* orb shines with sudden brilliance,
the *Qínlóng* and the *Fàn yīn* emerge in darkness.

**South of the Eight Heavens:**
The *Tàixuān* blends with the subtle,
the *Dǒuzhe* turns with radiant splendor.
The *Yǐyíng* shifts to *Qūlù*,
the *Bàogāi* extends without bound.
The *Niàndàng* surges with *Dōngyí*,
the *Jiùmíng* performs its migration.

The *Jídū* gathers in profound light,
the *Jiǔyáo* contracts with distant resonance.
The *Lùjǐ* pierces through *Hánsī*,
the *Jìxiè* summons the West.
The *Fēiyù* hurls itself into *Jiǎn*,
the *Qióngchóu* floats with sprouting seeds.

The *Dān míng* sinks into obscurity,
the *Chángjǐ* reaches *Yǐnguó*.
The *Qiānchuán* spreads the pure cleansing,
the *Fángdǔ* gazes upon the welcoming *Wèngtuó*.

**West of the Eight Heavens:**
The subtle sounds merge with the true,
the *Liǔjì* stillness settles upon the expanse.
The *Yìdiàn* guards with vast protection,
the *Gòujiàn* bestows the *Xíwú* without fail.

The *Zhàngzhang* swiftly confronts the *Chǒu*,
the *Yuèlú* clouds race with *Yúnbēn*.
The *Bùmáng* trembles with *Duōshēn*,
the *Wángzhōng* stands upon the *Xuántái*.

The *Yuāndòng* pierces through the *Èyì*,
the *Língtóng* ascends with *Fúfú*.
The *Xiángníng* truly attains *Zhájia*,
the *Língtí* stirs with *Dīngmóu*.
The *Qínxiān* delights in the radiant,
the *Yàoxióng* transmits the solitary.

The *Fànmíng* shines with imperial splendor,
the *Fēngxǐ* flourishes with the primordial.

**North of the Eight Heavens:**
The *Tàixuān* dwells in the *Wǎnshì*,
the *Qízhèng* stands upon the *Tíngbái*.
The *Shēnchóu* lingers with *Jǐchéng*,
the *Guìzhēn* bears the name *Xīmíng*.
The *Kuòdìng* stabilizes the *Yìgé*,
the *Shūlíng* awakens with *Sùyìng*.

The *Shàotíng* resounds with *Méihuò*,
the *Chǒunà* ascends with *Yìshēng*.
The *Sùyǔ* marks the *Línlì*,
the *Dàohùn* confounds the *Mó jīng*.
The *Wǎngbèi* envelops the *Yuānmì*,
the *Lónggù* entangles the *Míyuán*.

The *Tàiyīn* gathers the Nine Spirits,
the *Mówēi* aligns with the *Cháozhēng*.
The *Shényīng* sands the *Shālán*,
the *Yùngào* holds the *Xiānméng*.

**The Dao speaks:** This hidden speech of the Great Brahman within the boundless sound,
the limitless resonance of the old texts inscribed in purple script upon the *Xuánjī* gate.
By the first, second, and third characters of the **East of the Eight Heavens**,
the celestial divisions are rectified,
and the red script is inscribed upon the **Dragon Platform** and **Jade Mountain’s** central pavilion.
By the fourth, sixth, and seventh characters of the **South of the Eight Heavens**,
the Five Phases are made to follow their natural order,
and the *qì* does not harm or reverse.

The **Three *Huá* and *Tàixuān*** texts of the *Bìluò* are carved upon the **Central *Dǒu* Palace** and the **Grand Marshal’s** court.
By the third, fifth, and seventh characters of the **West of the Eight Heavens’** third heaven,
and the first and eighth characters of its fourth heaven,
the *Kēnmáng* is cut off to prevent harm.
Those who follow this path of rectitude,
before the Yellow Dao,
shall be made invulnerable—
water and fire shall not overcome them,
the true *qì* shall be harmonized and tranquil,
the Dao of the sovereign shall reach its imperial zenith,
and auspicious fortune shall gather and extend.

The **Great *Sùlù*** records its essence in script,
inscribed upon the **Central *Dǒu* and *Jǐ* Palaces**.
The **Dragon Mother’s** mountain in the northeast,
the **Resounding Drum Tower**,
the **True Spirit’s** jade gate,
above the **Watchtower’s** peak.
By the third and fourth characters of the **North of the Eight Heavens’** second heaven,
and the first, fourth, and seventh characters of its eighth heaven,
the Five Phases are made to follow their natural order,
and blessings descend upon both heaven and earth,
so that all spirits revere them,
and ten thousand deities obey.

Each character is broad and long, a *zhàng* in measure,
with eight corners and drooping rays,
square and vast as a seal.
The **Celestial True King** and **Imperial Sage** once inscribed these texts,
displaying them throughout the Eight Heavens and Ten Directions—
above, below, and all around—
as the standard sound.

If one knows this sound
and fasts while reciting it,
the **Heavenly Kings** shall dispatch the **Flying Heavenly Deities**,
to descend and observe their form,
to record their merits and diligence,
and report them to the heavens,
where ten thousand spirits shall pay homage,
the earth spirits shall guard the gates,
and the **Great Merit *Mó* King** shall recommend them to the **True Emperor**.
Thus, they shall attain the Dao,
fulfill their virtue,
and wander the Three Realms,
ascending to the **Golden Gate**.

This sound emerges from the **Void’s** depths,
from the **Great Harmony’s** boundless *qì*,
forming the true resonance.

When the Five Phases are disordered and bring harm,
or when celestial degrees are lost and their movements err,
and calamity befalls the people,
strike this sound and ward it off—
the heavens shall shower sweet dew,
the earth shall yield divine herbs,
golden treasures shall open freely,
and auspicious signs shall arise spontaneously.
It repels all ills,
wards off all disasters,
delivers all beings,
and fulfills all aspirations—
the natural sound of the Celestial True One.

Thus, when recited, it summons the **Flying Heavenly Deities** to descend and observe,
the **Supreme Sovereign** to sing afar,
the ten thousand spirits to pay homage,
the Three Realms to attend at the veranda,
and all demons to bow their heads.
The **Ghostly Essences** shall perish of their own accord,
the **Línláng** treasures shall resound,
the Ten Directions shall be purified,
the rivers and seas shall fall silent,
the mountains and valleys shall swallow the smoke,
and all spirits shall tremble in submission.
It shall gather all immortals,
clear the heavens of noxious vapors,
purify the earth of demonic dust,
pierce the darkness with wisdom,
and reveal the profound and mysterious—
the **Great Compassion**, the **Mysterious Mystery**.

**The *Língbǎo Wúliàng Dùrén* Miao Scripture** concludes its thirty-second chapter.
The thirty-third chapter ends here.

**The Chapter of the Five Directions’ Pure Qi**

The **Dao** speaks: In days of old, within the **Supreme Sovereign’s** **Great Compassion** and **Mysterious Mystery** realm of the **Way**, the **Pure and True** **Dao** of **Wuwei** and **Great Benevolence** arose in the **Bao Hua Ling** **Celestial Gate** of the **Upper Palace of Primordial Clarity**, transcending **Floating Light** and merging with **Original Transformation’s** **Chaotic Unity**.

The **Nine Mysteries** and **Eight Passes** span the **Blue Abyss**, while the **Celestial Wheel of Stars** shines with its **Effulgent Essence**. Within it dwells the **True Sovereign**, called **She Yun Shu**—the **Axis of Rotation**.

The **Dao’s** power is natural, its **virtue** sublime and profound. Within it lies the **Divine Treasure Mountain**, extending through the **Heavenly Interior**, with the **Celestial Gates** of the **Five Directions’ Heavenly Venerables**—**Zi Xiao Guang Ming Fei Xia**—radiant in **Purple Expanse** and **Luminous Clouds**. Its **officers** number a hundred million, its **common folk** a thousand billion, their **lifespans** endless, their **qi** everlasting as **Eternal Spring**. They adorn themselves with myriad floral hues, manifesting **Light**, and the **Jade Sea’s** **Red-Crested Phoenix** and **Green-Spotted Dragon** ever ride the **Nine True** **Celestial Chariot of Playen**, to pay homage to the **Jade Sovereign**.

**Chapter on the Radiant Ascension of the Two Scenes and Five Stars**

The Dao speaks: In the past, at the Uppermost Pole Heaven, the Celestial Radiance of the Great Bright Land of the Clear Mists and Clouds received the **Virtue** of the Primordial Origin for the Radiant Ascension of the Two Scenes and Five Stars, the highest grade.

When the Primordial Origin Heavenly Venerable expounded this Scripture, tenfold recitation circled the Ten Passes, summoning the Ten Directions—only then did the assembly arrive. The **True Ones** of Heavenly **Qi**, the Highest Saints, the **Virtue**-bearing True Persons, countless without measure, rode the void and came.

Purple mists swirled thickly, jade winds bore resplendent chariots, **Spiritual Clouds** shaded their assembly, casting bright reflections in the morning radiance. Nine-hued splendor shone forth, illuminating the Ten Directions.

For seven days and seven nights, the **Mysterious Breaths** of the Celestial **Qi** gathered and formed into precious treasures, all attending in reverence.

The Eight Winds blew harmoniously, the Four Seas settled in peace, the seasons passed without discord, all things flourished naturally. Within a single realm, earth and mountains, forests and trees, stretched level as one, with no high or low—all soil became moon-white jade and sun-like pearls, five-colored **Spiritual Flowers**.

The assembled **True Ones** attended in reverence. The Primordial Origin Heavenly Venerable, seated in the void, ascended in **Spiritual Transformation** as the **Dragon**’s **Dao**-harmonizing melody dawned upon the myriad forms. After one recitation of the Scripture, the Celestial High Saints all declared it excellent. At that time, the ruler and ministers of the realm, devoted to cultivating the **Dao** and **Virtue**, were moved to reverence the **True Ones**.

After two recitations, the Two Scenes shone brightly.
After three recitations, the Three Talents harmonized.
After four recitations, the Four Seasons followed their order, the jade torches balanced in accord.
After five recitations, the Five Stars circled their paths, never failing through the ages.
After six recitations, the Six **Qi** flowed in cycles, their transformations working in unity.
After seven recitations, the Seven **Primordial Breaths** ceased their vigor, their light extending far.
After eight recitations, the Eight Directions’ constellations aligned, their inscriptions unbroken.
After nine recitations, the Nine Palaces’ sovereigns took command, warding off calamities and averting disasters.
After ten recitations, the Ten Spirits settled in place, eternally bringing blessings and auspiciousness. At that time, all men and women of the realm, without exception, turned their hearts in devotion, all receiving protection and attaining **Long Life**.

The Dao speaks: At that time, when the Primordial Origin Heavenly Venerable expounded the Scripture once,
the **Great True God** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Crystal Radiance of the True One**, arrived in the void.

After two recitations, the **Great True God** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Crystal Radiance of the True One**, arrived in the void from the Southern Direction.

After three recitations, the **Great True God** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Crystal Radiance of the True One**, arrived in the void from the Western Direction.

After four recitations, the **Great True God** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Crystal Radiance of the True One**, arrived in the void from the Northern Direction.

After five recitations, the **Great True God** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Crystal Radiance of the True One**, arrived in the void from the Northeast.

After six recitations, the **Great True God** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Crystal Radiance of the True One**, arrived in the void from the Southeast.

After seven recitations, the **Great True God** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Crystal Radiance of the True One**, arrived in the void from the Southwest.

After eight recitations, the **Great True God** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Crystal Radiance of the True One**, arrived in the void from the Northwest.

After nine recitations, the **Great True God** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Celestial Controller of Constellations and Divine Symbols**, arrived in the void from the Upper Direction.

After ten recitations, the **Great True God** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Bearer of Light and Gatherer of Radiance**, arrived in the void from the Lower Direction.

When the ten recitations were complete, the **Great True Gods** of the Endless and Boundless Uppermost Pole, the **Crystal Radiance of the True One**, the **Void’s Day and Moon Constellations**, and the **Heavenly True Gods** all arrived together. All men and women of the realm turned their hearts in reverence and awe.

Those who came were like fine rain and dense mist—countless without measure, filling half the land, which sank unevenly, beyond restraint.

Then the Primordial Origin descended in grace, smiling and laughing, as the myriad multitudes gazed in adoration.

Then, the **Purple Mist** and **Jade Consort** were commanded to open the **Divine Treasure Furnace**, encircling the **Night Mountain Fire Jade** within. They kindled the **Wandering Mysterious Spirit Incense**, and its smoke gathered in the void, like treasures and clouds. A **Celestial Chamber of Pure Jade** appeared, floating ten zhang above the earth in the boundless heights.

The Primordial Origin ascended and led the way; the **Heavenly True Gods**, the Highest Saints, the **Virtue**-bearing True Persons, and the **Great True Gods** of the Ten Directions—all, countless without measure—entered the **Celestial Chamber of Pure Jade**. The heavenly beings looked up and saw only a wisp of mist emerging from the radiant scene, already vanished within the chamber, their whereabouts unknown.

The people of the realm dispersed, and the earth returned to its proper level, no longer tilted or sunken. The Primordial Origin then completed the full expounding of the Scripture within the **Celestial Chamber of Pure Jade**, and the **True Ones** supervised its transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words.

The ritual matters being roughly understood, the Celestials resumed their stations. In an instant, all sound ceased, leaving no trace.

At that time, those who encountered the Scripture’s **Dharma** all gained enlightenment, preserving their years forever, free from harm. All who received the **Virtue**’s transmission attained the **True Ones**’ essence—no disasters, no injuries, no untimely deaths, no ruin, no failure, no errors, no calamities, no decline, no death. Their faces shone like jade, their bodies gleamed like gold, flawless within and without, their **Spiritual Reflections** merging with the **Mysterious**.

Below, they safeguarded their families and realms, ensuring peace and prosperity. From the beginning of the teaching, the realm adhered to the **Dao**. Those who beforehand held sincere devotion, revering and honoring it, all attained **Liberation in the World**.

The Dao speaks: The names spoken by the Primordial Origin Heavenly Venerable during the expounding of the Scripture are the inner names of the Celestial **Supreme Ones**. They are the **Hidden Sounds** of the **Crystal Radiance of the True One** of the Two Scenes and Five Stars. They are also the **Hidden Names** of the **Linglang**’s Three Substances. These are not the common words of the world.

The Highest Saints, having already become **True Persons**, mastered the **Mysterious** and penetrated the subtle. They understood its full meaning, and when recited ten times, the Celestials sang in response from afar, the myriad **Supreme Ones** arranged their rites. The sun and moon cast their beams, the stars reflected their splendor, the treasures emitted their **Essence**, the **Mysterious Breaths** perfumed the Three Palaces. The hundred spirits drank from the jade, the thousand **True Ones** savored the fragrance, the multitude of demons bowed in submission, the **ghostly intelligences** perished in terror. The dead returned to life, white bones became flesh—all things transformed.

The learned and virtuous, reciting this ten times, shall then be scrutinized by the **Day Sovereign** for virtue, and the **Moon Consort** shall receive its essence. They shall transcend worldly calamities and attain eternal life.

This is so because the scholar, though now comprehending its profound meaning, has yet to refine the **True Essence** and must diligently cultivate through toil. As the **Way** ascends to the **Mysterious**, one may naturally dispel disasters and illnesses, attuning to the **Mysterious Qi**, yet only to avert death—not to restore life. A careless recitation brings misfortune upon the body.

To venerate and honor the **Sages**, one’s lineage shall flourish eternally, bound by ties of virtue, untouched by myriad calamities, with divine guardians watching over the gate. This **Sutra** is supreme and unmatched in the **Celestial Capital**, saving countless beings and serving as the root of all **Dao**s. Its grandeur is vast, its virtue boundless.

The **Way** speaks: For those who recite this **Sutra** ten times, the Celestials shall gather in unison. The **Seven Luminaries** shall protect and guide the virtuous, granting salvation to one body, elevating seven ancestors to the heavens, where they shall dwell in blissful ease within the **Celestial Palaces**. The accomplished scholar, reciting this **Sutra** and aligning with the **Way’s virtue**, shall harmonize with the **Heavenly True**.

Ordinary mortals, upon recitation, shall avert disasters and prolong their years, later achieving success. Encountering its sacred precepts, they may attain the **Way of Transformation** to save the world. This **Sutra** is subtly profound, universally salvific—all **Heavenly Beings** and mortals receive its grace, bestowing immeasurable blessings across life and death. A treasure of the **Heavens**, it is not passed to the mortal world. Only the virtuous, offering gold and jade with sincerity, may pledge to **Heaven** and transmit it. Leakage or negligence invites retribution upon nine generations, binding them to the **Earthly Bureaucracy** for endless service.

The **Sutra** is attended by the **Five Emperors**, each with twenty-four **Jade Boys** and **Jade Maidens**, forming a divine guard to protect those who receive it.

The **Way** speaks: In the **First Month**, observe a long fast and recite this **Sutra** to summon the **Day Soul**, preserving life and refining the corpse, merging with the **Luminaries** to attain **True Personhood**. It shall save the souls of the departed, severing their **Earthly Bonds** and granting passage to the **Upper Southern Palace**.

In the **Seventh Month**, observe a long fast and recite this **Sutra** to summon the **Moon’s Essence**, preserving life and refining the corpse, descending with the **Luminaries** to attain **True Personhood**, becoming an immortal. The Celestials shall record their name, inscribing them on **Yellow Talismans** and **White Tablets**, erasing death and granting rebirth.

In the **Tenth Month**, observe a long fast and recite this **Sutra** to summon the **Essences of the Five Stars**, preserving life and refining the corpse, uniting with the **Luminaries** to attain **True Personhood**, ascending in radiant splendor. All shall rely on this for birth, becoming rulers of nations and emperors, securing the **Mandate of Heaven** for their descendants, ensuring eternal sovereignty. They shall forever govern as sovereigns, bringing eternal peace to their realm.

On the **Eight Festivals**, recite this **Sutra**—the **Divine Qi** shall envelop and transform the body, completing the **Mysterious Work**, granting the title of **True Person of the Nine Palaces**.

On one’s **Birthday**, recite this **Sutra** to fortify the **Commanding Palace**, blocking the **Path of Death**, refining the **Soul and Vital Breath**, renewing the **Dao-Body**, transcending suffering, and radiating light. The **Three Realms** shall guard in attendance, the **Five Emperors** shall welcome, and all **Spirits** shall pay homage. Their names shall be inscribed in **Heaven**, their merits complete, ascending to the **Upper Purity**.

The **Way** speaks: On days of practice, one must bathe in fragrant waters, fast in purity, enter the chamber facing east, and strike the teeth thirty-two times, ascending to the **Thirty-Two Heavens**. With thirty-two bows of the heart, close the eyes and meditate, seated within the **Five-Colored Clouds**, inner and outer darkness merging. There appear the **Azure Dragon**, **White Tiger**, **Vermilion Bird**, **Dark Tortoise**, **Lion**, and **White Crane**, arrayed on either side. The **True Qi of the Five Stars** envelops the body, the sun and moon illuminate, their radiance filling the chamber. A round halo forms at the nape, its light shining in all directions—thus, clearly manifest.

The **Secret Incantation** is as follows:

*"Supreme Mysterious Origin, the **August Dao Sovereign**,
Summon forth from my body the **Three Five Officials**, left and right ministers, **Jade Boys** bearing incense, **Jade Maidens** transmitting words, the **Five Emperors’ Direct Talismans**, and the **Directing Day Incense Officials**, thirty-six each.
Open the **Passage** as spoken.
Today is a day of auspicious joy, a long fast in the pure hall, practicing this supreme **Sutra** to save countless beings.
May my petition reach directly before the **Supreme Emperor of the Thirty-Two Heavens**, the **Origin of All Beginnings**."*

Afterward, draw the **Qi** thirty-two times, facing east and reciting the **Sutra**.

**The Supreme Origin’s Immeasurable Salvation Scripture of the Highest Grade**
**The Supreme Origin’s Hidden Mysteries of the Linglang’s Three Substances**, radiant with the **Two Luminaries and Five Stars**, the supreme and wondrous beginning, tenfold salvation.

Seven mornings of hidden resonance, spontaneous **Transformation and Creation**, the **Highest Primordial Essence**.
The **Heavenly Sovereign of Ultimate Truth**, the **Supreme Origin** forming **Transformation**, illuminating the **Heavenly Scripture**.

The **Yin and Yang** distinguish and distribute the **Five Phases**, from their **Primordial Source**, condensing **Divine Essence**. The **Celestial Symbols** array in the **Mysterious Vault**, the sun and moon ascending in splendor, the **Five Stars** traversing their orbits, each with its **Palace and Bureau**.

The **Illustrious Dao Sovereign**, the **Jade Consort**, govern the **Transformation of Fate**, bestowing blessings and calamities, their radiance weaving the **Heavenly Patterns**, ceaseless day and night. The **Cosmic Threads** extend to the **Hosts of Salvation**, following the **Qi’s cycles**, establishing **Measure and Balance**.

All things receive their **Mandate**, the myriad ranks of **Spirits**, all subject to their illumination, none failing to inherit. Their waxing and waning, rise and fall, decline and flourish—discerning their **Principles**, each has its **Method**.

Above, they govern the **Central Pole**, the **Purple Micro Emperor**.
The **Highest Jade Purity**, the **Bend of the Cloud Room**.
The **Golden Gate’s Sacred Metropolis**, the **Forest of All Things**, the **Assembly of the Supreme**, the **Ultimate Mystery**, encompassing all.

Within are the **Divine Rulers of Heaven and Earth**, the **Great Emperor**, the **Golden Mother**, the **Officials of the Peach Blossom and Wind**, the **Sovereign of the **Primordial Qi’s Ten Thousand**, the **Five Spirits’ True Elder of the Primordial Capital**, and the **Southern Celestial Record-Keeper**, the **Lord of Longevity**, the **Divine Official of Fate, Registration, and Destiny**.

They restore the **Corpse to Life**, saving countless beings.
Today’s compilation is attended by the Celestials in the **Heavenly Courtyard**.
The **God-King of Boundless Radiance in the East**, the **Great Immortal of Immeasurable Salvation**.
The **God-King of Boundless Radiance in the South**, the **Great Immortal of Immeasurable Salvation**.

The **Western Celestial God-King of Boundless Radiance and Soaring Splendor**, the **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, saves countless beings.

The **Northern Celestial God-King of Boundless Radiance and Soaring Splendor**, the **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, saves countless beings.

The **Northeastern Celestial God-King of Boundless Radiance and Soaring Splendor**, the **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, saves countless beings.

The **Southeastern Celestial God-King of Boundless Radiance and Soaring Splendor**, the **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, saves countless beings.

The **Southwestern Celestial God-King of Boundless Radiance and Soaring Splendor**, the **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, saves countless beings.

The **Northwestern Celestial God-King of Boundless Radiance and Soaring Splendor**, the **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, saves countless beings.

The **Lower Celestial God-King of Boundless Radiance and Soaring Splendor**, the **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, saves countless beings.

The **Ten-Directional Celestial God-King of Ultimate Truth and Soaring Splendor**, the **Great God of Boundless Salvation and Eternal Life**, transcends the world.

Together they ride upon the **Resplendent Dragon, Colorful Phoenix, Golden Root, and Solar Chariot of Yang and Yin**, borne in the **Five-Colored Jade Palanquin**, with **Purple Canopies** and **Returning Light**, **Divine Banners** and **Illustrious Flags** fluttering. Before them, **Empty Songs and Celestial Harmonies** resound in chorus; behind them, **Sacred Echoes** blend in unison. **Lions and White Cranes** roar and sing in rhythm, while **Divine Children scatter flowers** and **Jade Maidens attend the veranda**. Countless chariots and myriads of riders float through the sky, their radiance descending and returning, overseeing the **True and Salvaging the Living**.

The **Celestial Marshals of the Eight Directions**, **Southern Palace of Highest Splendor**, **Han the Record-Keeper**, the **Great God of Life Preservation**, and **Guardians of the Dao’s Principles** all gather at the **Imperial Court**, attending to every being to be saved, meticulously compiling the **Heavenly Registers**.

The **Two Luminaries and Five Stars**, their **True Light** stirring the **Heavenly Rotation**.

The **Celestial Officials** of the **Southern Palace** and **Northern Capital**, the **Three Officials and Nine Palaces**, and the **Twelve River Sources**—all these **Sacred Abodes of the Boundless Dao**—are summoned. **Ancestors and Kindred of the Billions of Kalpas** are released from **Sin Scrolls**, their **Evil Roots** extinguished, so they may not be detained or bound to **Ghostly Hosts**. **Primordial Beginnings** and **Divine Mandates** bring swift ascension, while the **Northern Palace’s Cold Pool** guards the **Form and Spirit**. **Subduing Demons and Protecting the Virtuous**, they guide beings to the **Southern Palace’s Merit**.

**Dead souls** undergo **Sacred Refining**, transforming into **Immortal Beings**. **Living bodies** receive **Salvation**, enduring eternally through **Kalpas**. With the **Kalpa Wheel** turning, they align with **Heaven’s Longevity**.

They universally transcend the **Three Realms of Torment**, the **Five Sorrows and Eight Hardships**, rising above the **Three Realms** to **Roam at Will in the Highest Purity**. The **Highest Purity Realm** is where the **Heavenly Sovereign of Perceptive Clarity** reigns, a **Formless Domain of Dharma Practice**.

The **Heavens’ Hidden Names**, the **Heavens’ Concealed Titles**.
Within the **Heavenly Void**, **Natural Spirits** manifest.
The **Seven Crystals** conceal their **Sacred Tunes**, the **Heavenly Sounds**.
**Supreme of Heaven and Earth**, the **Sacred Treasure’s Spirit**.
**Morning Flight of the Three Pure Ones**, their **Gathered Compliance** forming **Jie’s Jewels**.
The **Nine Colors and Ten Splendors** blend in **Transformation’s Highest Purity**.
The **Boundless Mysteries** are explored, yet their depths remain **Unfathomable**.

**Inviting Spirits and Drinking Light**, they universally **Salvate Heavenly Beings and Humans**.

Today’s joyous celebration of **Receiving Salvation**—
**Passing through the Heavenly Gates**, the **Sun’s Soul and Moon’s Spirit**, the **Five Stars’ Dao Lords**, are petitioned to **Bestow Their Luminance**. **Scarlet Clouds** flow across the **Crimson River**, refining the **Hundred Corpses** and **Congealing the Mud Pellets**, ascending to the **Imperial Palace** and entering the **Jade Terrace**.

Riding upon **Jewel Chariots**, they construct the **Sun’s Gate**, while the **Moon’s Consort** presents **Pearls** and the **Wooden Pool** bathes their **Bodies**. **Wood Star** steadies the **Liver**, **Metal Star** guards the **Lungs**, **Jin Star** secures the **Kidneys**, **Yinghuo Star** calms the **Heart**, and the **Central Earthly Sovereign**—**Zhenxing Star**—nourishes the **Spleen’s Essence** and **Unifies the Vital Form**.

**Green Clouds** shield the **Spirit**, **White Clouds** attend the **Soul**, **Red Clouds** nourish the **Qi**, **Inner Clouds** harmonize the **Blood**, and **Yellow Clouds** govern the **Mandate**, ensuring **Ten Thousand Spirits** remain **Unbounded**. The **Five-Colored Clouds** radiate in **Dazzling Brilliance**.

Descending from **Heaven**, they enter the **Nine Palaces of the Mortal Realm**, where the **Three Fields** swirl and the **Eight Sceneries** merge. **Qinghua Sovereign** descends upon **Zhi’s Abode**, **Chihua Sovereign** fills the **Cloud’s Extremes**, **Baihua Sovereign** embraces the **Luo’s Depths**, and **Heihua Sovereign** awaits the **True Lord’s Arrival**.

**Yellow Hua Sovereign**, with **Bao Li** receiving his grace.
**Five-Hued Sovereign**, divine of **Sun and Moon**.
Following the **Mortal Realm’s** call, descending light refines essence.
Divine radiance illuminates the eyes—**Mysterious Pearl** spins the **Mind-Wheel**.

**Seven-Star Imperial Lord**, ancestor of **Ten Thousand Spirits**.
Flying with drumming retinues, commanding **Unity and Clarity**.
Nine hundred million soldiers—**banners and drums** resound.
Roaming the **Heavenly Ford**, scattering **Spiritual Essence** to nurture life,
together completing **Mysterious Merit**—ascending to **Heaven**, guiding mortals,
this **Dao** as the ultimate principle.
**Sun and Moon’s Envoys**.

**Two-Scenery Sovereign**, **Five-Single Emperor**, crossing **Green Clouds and Verdant Brilliance**.
Commanding the **South**, receiving the **Mandate**, sweeping away all calamity,
first slaying **Yin Guilt**, below spreading **Awe’s Radiance**.
**Golden Crystal** spews poison, **Jade Steed** stands proud—**Heavenly Ding** leads the charge,
**Great Marshal** brandishing **banners**.
Hurling fire ten thousand *li*—**flowing bells** at eight **Polar Gates**,
dare any to resist—**blocking the Celestial Worthies**.
**Golden Axe** strikes first, **Giant Halberd** executes last,
slaughtering **Ghostly Offenders**, **Wind and Fire** relentless.
Thousands beheaded, ten thousands dismembered—**no demon dares transgress**,
**no ghost dares steal essence**.

**Three Officials of Northern Ming**—clearly inspecting the **Ghostly Camp**.
No hiding permitted—**Golden Horse Relay** presents the case.
Universal proclamation without end.
**Ten Thousand Spirits** all heed.
**Three Realms’ Five Emperors**—
declaring to **Upper Clarity**.
**Two-Scenery Primordial Essence**, **Five-Star Awe-Spirit**,
with **Dao** sharing **virtue/power**, born with **Heaven and Earth**.
Before differentiation, **Chaos undivided**—
above no hue, below no abyss.
**Divine Wind** surges, **Fire-Liquid** condenses light—
**Sun and Moon** merge as **Jade Disc**, **Five Stars** link as **Pearls**.
Together nurturing in the **Mysterious Womb**, fostering the **Heavenly Frame**.
Above and below **Heaven**, no darkness, no obscurity,
no form, no shadow, no limit, no end—
**Red Clarity** unfurls the **Diagram**, **natural motion** unfolds.
**Primordial Beginning** stabilizes—**Seven Luminaries** array in **Mystery**.
**Two-Scenery** soars, **Five Stars** traverse **Heaven**,
**Water and Fire** divide their duties—**all things revere them**.
Summoning essence, achieving **True Personhood**.
**White Hua** condenses **Liquid Qi**, **Divine Qi** in harmony.
Descending from **Heavenly Tower**, **Twenty-Four Passes**.
**Wood flourishes, Earth transforms**, **Metal refines, Fire smelts**.
**Qi-Arrows** crossfire—**Leaping Tigers coil, Dragons writhe**.
**Red One** weaves **veins**, spreading **networks** through **Three Primordials**.
**Jade Purity Hall**—**Five Chapters** descend.
**Red Script in Jade Cosmos**, **Eight Awe-Dragons** inscribed.
**Preserving the Mandate’s Assembly**—
**body eternally sustained**.
**Dharma-Qi** pervades **Mile-Cloth**, **Ten Thousand Patterns** unfold.
**Primordial Silk** flows—**Thirty-Two Heavens**.
**Wheel-turning without color**, encircling **Ten Directions**.
**Circumnavigating Dipper and Weaver**, aligning **Five Constants**.
**Thirty-Five Divisions**—**Total Qi** ascends to **Upper Primordial**.
**Eight Sceneries** merge in **Obscurity**—**Qi** enters **Deepest Mystery**.
**Supreme Sovereign in Mystery**, **Highest True One of Heaven**.
**Floating Scenery in Azure Clouds**, solemnly chanting **Piercing Hymns**.
**Crowned with Sun and Moon**, **robed in Stars**—
**pendant plumes** radiant, **luminous clarity** ascends.
**Golden Truth** glows dense, **radiance** dazzles the **Cloud-Camp**.
**Jade Voice** gathers **Qi**, **Spirit Wind** condenses **smoke**.
**Purple Void** luxuriant—**auxiliary to Ten Thousand Immortals**.
**Two-Scenery, Five Stars**—**light unites with body**.
**Ten Thousand Harmonies, Ten Thousand Unifications**—
**naturally achieving Truth**.
Within Truth lies **Spirit**—**Long-Life Great Lord**.
**No-Flowered Prince**, **White-Elemental Sovereign-Spirit**.
**Tai Yi** governs **Fate**, **Peach-Kang** prolongs life.
**Holding Talismans and Scriptures**, **preserving life’s roots**.
Ascending to **Upper Clarity**, entering **Flowery Hall**,
within **Eight Obscurities**, in **subtle depths**.
Below stabilizing the **human form**—**Mud Ball, Vermilion Palace**—
**central harmony of Five Qi**, blending **Hundred Spirits**.
**Ten Transformations** surpass **Spirituality**.
**Ten Thousand Qi** become **Immortal**—**Immortal Dao** bestows life,
**limitless guidance for mortals**.
Opening **Eight Gates**, flying the **Heavenly Law-Wheel**,

**body receives rebirth**, **ascending to hear all Heavens**.
Above all Heavens, each has a **Gate of Birth**.
Within—**empty caverns**, **song-chapters**!
**True King’s Sacred Verses**, words aligning with **Highest Worthies**.

**First Chapter: Soaring Luminance in the Sky**
**Water and Fire** enfold—**Qi** named **Mixed Darkness**.
Soft as **wrapped pouches**, round yet unopened.
Floating in **Great Void**, **Heaven and Earth’s Divine Womb**.
**True Qi** like smoke—**left revolving, right spinning**.
**Ultimate Essence** becomes **Stars**—**Sun Black, Moon Green**.

**Heavenly Old One** carves the **Symbol**—
**Jade-Like Divine Infant**.

**Void** then **disseminates Qi**, **Patterns** **refine essence**.
**Spirit** as **Life’s Master**—**movement and growth** balanced.
**Ten Thousand Transformations**—**radiance** the cause.

**Double Scenery radiant**, deeply entering **Lotus Containment**.

**Third Chapter: Five-Star Refining Truth Song**
**Eastern Nine Qi**, **Jupiter’s Nine Gates**.

**Yellow Pool’s Imperial Platform**, **Five Battles seizing essence**.

Riding the **Flying Dragon**, **wandering the Nine Palaces**,

This—**above the Three Realms**, **within the flying void**—
**True King’s Song**, its **tone harmonizing with the Cavernous Chapters**.

Recite it **one thousand times**, the **True Immortal descends to welcome**.

Those who hear the **Sacred Sound**—

**free from Five Torments and Eight Hardships**,
**Seven Ancestors ascending**, **forever leaving the Dark Palace**,

This is called **Infinite Salvation**, **universal liberation without end**.

There exists **Secret Celestial Scripture**, **all heavens hold in reverence**.
**Leaking or carelessness**—**falling into Hell**, **disaster upon the Seven Ancestral Uncles**.

**Dao speaks**: These **Two Chapters** are the **utterances of the Celestial Sovereigns of All Heavens**,
and the **Divine Xuan True King**, **gathering radiance, racing with the scenery**, **soaring upon the Way of the Five Stars and Sun/Moon**—
**hidden, sacred sounds**, all **words of the Great Brahman**,
not the **common speech of the world**.
**Words without melodic grace**, **melodies without ornate beauty**—
thus called **profound and mysterious**, **difficult to trace**.

**Heaven’s treasure**, **secreted in the Divine Xuan’s Jade Purity Hall, Eastern Hua Scripture Chamber**.
The **numbering aligns with the Year of the Dragon**—**destined to descend in this era**.
If a **perfected adept** brings **gold and jewels with sincere heart**,
and **according to the old formula** **pledges to the True King**,
then **it shall be granted**.

**Dao speaks**: The **movements of Heaven and Earth** also have **times of decline**.
The **Sun and Five Stars** also have **eclipses and fullness**.
The **Most Sacred Divine-Human** also has **periods of rest and decline**.
The **unlearned scholar** also has **sickness and injury**.

**When such calamities arise**, all who share the same *qi* must **unitedly purify their hearts through fasting**, **offer incense at the six times**, and **recite the scripture ten times**. **Virtue and blessings shall descend**, dispelling all ill omens. **The boundless texts** **universally liberate the endless**.

**Dao speaks**: The **unlearned in the Way** are shallow in their understanding, or their **adept ranks are yet unfulfilled**; their **fate may be extinguished**, their bodies **consumed by the Great Yin**. When death approaches, **adepts among their fellow students** shall **offer incense for them** and **recite the scripture ten times**, guiding their **corporeal form to transcend as prescribed**. The **essences of the Two Luminaries and Five Stars** shall **refine and purify the defilements of the corpse**, while their **spirit-soul ascends directly to the Southern Palace**, attaining rebirth in accordance with their **merits and cultivation**—**counted by days**. **The Wheel of Rebirth shall not falter**; thus, they **shall attain immortality**.

**Dao speaks**: When **Heaven and Earth’s cycles conclude**, when **constellations stray from their courses**, when **Sun and Moon lose their eclipses**, when **the Four Seasons falter**, when **Yin and Yang fall out of harmony**, when **provinces and counties suffer plagues or locusts**, when **floods and droughts displace the people**, when **pestilence and poison spread**, when **the common folk perish in masses**, when **teachers and friends meet untimely ends**—all these are the **workings of the Two Luminaries and Five Stars**. **Fasting, incense, and scripture-recitation** must be observed.

**Fasting and scripture-recitation** bear **profound virtue**. They **ward off celestial calamities**, **protect and uphold the emperor**. They **ward off poisons and harm**, **deliver the common folk**. **Life and death depend upon them**; their blessings are **immeasurable**. Hence it is said: **boundless**, **universally liberating Heaven and humankind**.

**Dao speaks**: All who possess this scripture may, **for the sake of Heaven, Earth, the Imperial Sovereign, and the common folk**, perform these **meritorious deeds**. On days of calamity, **when one resolves to fast, burn incense, and recite the scripture ten times**, all **celestial beings shall record their names**, and **ten thousand spirits shall stand guard**. The **adepts of the Right Path** shall **secure their ascent as ministers of the Holy Sovereign in the Golden Palace**. The **celestial beings record every deed and transgression without omission**. The **True King of the Celestial Realm** shall also **commend their worth**, and **those who attain the Way** shall **fully comprehend these profound utterances**.

Composed by **the Hidden Speech of the Great Brahman, the Boundless Sound Dao-Jun**,
**The Primordial Sacred Scripture of the Seven Stars’ Treasure Chapter**,
**The Eastern Eight Heavens**.

「The **Lofty Tower** stands firm and the **Shores of Symbols** are resplendent—

A hundredfold **Hu Fen** in reverent awe.

Summoning the **Spirits of the Two Scenes and Five Stars**—

The **Ancient Texts** of **Yuan Shi** first unfolded,

All the **Heavens** dispatch **Divine Cloud Officials**,

They present it to the **Heavens**, where **ten thousand spirits** pay homage,
And the **Earthly Deities** guard the gates.
The **Great Merit** of **Ling Si** preserves them,
The **Divine Way** is complete—
They ascend to the **Golden Gate**, traversing the **Three Realms**.

This **Sound** cleaves all obstacles,
Dispels all calamities,
Transcends all beings,
Accomplishes all things—
The **Natural Sound of the Celestial Truth**.
Thus, when recited, it brings forth **the luminous essence of the sun and moon**,
Makes the **body’s spirit ascend swiftly**,
And causes the **Five Stars** to bestow their splendor.

Refining **qi** into **immortality**.

The **Supreme Way**—
A **Scripture of Hidden Mysteries**, profound and arcane.
The **Highest Deity** sings from afar,
And **ten thousand spirits** bow in reverence.
The **Three Realms** attend its **Lofty Pavilion**,
All **spirits and deities** bind their heads in homage,
The **ghostly essences** vanish in confusion.
**Ling Lang** resounds, and **gold and stone** harmonize in echo.
**Celestial Immortals** and **Brahmanic chants** unite in rhythm,
The **Ten Directions** fall silent,
The **rivers and seas** still their murmurs,
The **Seven Stars** emit their light,
**Heavenly Demons** soar in flight,
The **mountains and valleys** swallow their smoke,
All **sentient beings** tremble and submit—
The **multitude of immortals** is gathered.

The **Heavens** are free of **impurities and filth**,
The **Earth** of **deities’ dust**,
**Ming Hui** is clear and profound—
The **Great Compassion** of **Xuan Xuan**.

**The Scripture of the Precious Treasure of Boundless Dao**—
**Supreme Chapter of Marvelous Teachings**, the thirty-fourth volume complete,
The thirty-fifth volume begins.

**Chapter on the Nine Palaces of the Immortal Register**

The Dao speaks thus: In days of yore, within the **Great Azure Heaven**, the **Purple Cloud** sang the **Primordial Song of the True Soil**, and received from the **Primordial Origin** the **Register of the Nine Palaces of Immortals**, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit**.

When the **Primordial Origin Celestial Venerable** was to proclaim this Scripture, He circled ten times, calling forth the **Ten Directions**, and then took His seat. The **Heavenly True Great Gods**, the **Supreme Saints of High Venerability**, the **Mystic Conduct True Persons**, the **Three Primordial Registers of Immortals**, the **Nine Palace Great Gods**, and the **innumerable hosts**—all rode upon the void, arriving in **flowing clouds and misty heavens**, in **Ling Lang carriages and phoenix chariots**, with **feathered canopies and divine banners**, in **emerald palanquins and pearl-covered pavilions**, their **gold and jade radiance intermingling**, their **nine-hued splendor dense and bright**, illuminating the **vast emptiness**.

For three days and three nights, the **heavens, sun, moon, and celestial palaces** shifted their courses, the **star hosts altered their stations**, the **cosmic threads transformed**, the **Great Scripture unfolded**, the **loom of fate paused**, the **void became profound and silent**, the earth **trembled with jewel-flowers**, the heavens **spread crimson script**, the **harmonious melodies resounded**, the **divine tones emerged**, their **radiance piercing the upper realms**, the **Eight Gates opening wide**. Within a single country, the **earth, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees** all flattened into equality, with no high or low—all the soil became **purple jade**, **translucent and luminous**, reflecting the **round net of the cosmos**, their **flames flowing like crystals**, their hues unchanging.

The **multitude of True Ones** attended at His seat, while the **Primordial Origin Celestial Venerable** ascended the **floating divine transformation seat of the flying dragon’s feathered throne**. When the Scripture was proclaimed once, the **Great Saints of the Heavens** simultaneously praised its excellence. At that time, all men and women of the land **opened their hearts in enlightenment**, intuitively grasping the **mysteries**.

When the Scripture was proclaimed twice, the **hundred deities gathered**, their **bodies descending as jade essences**.

When the Scripture was proclaimed thrice, the **vital breath interwove**, merging into the **True Dao**.

When the Scripture was proclaimed four times, the **round void responded**, the **Five Palaces filled with smoke**.

When the Scripture was proclaimed five times, the **inner wheels turned**, aligning with the **Heavenly Pattern**.

When the Scripture was proclaimed six times, the **great calamities dissolved**, their **obstructions cleared away**.

When the Scripture was proclaimed seven times, the **divine insight became void and luminous**, piercingly revealing the **Ten Directions**.

When the Scripture was proclaimed eight times, the **Nine Palaces registered the names**, and the **bodies flew as listed immortals**.

When the Scripture was proclaimed nine times, the **mercy permeated all existence**, the **blessings extended to the Eight Dark Realms**.

When the Scripture was proclaimed ten times, the **living beings of the cold night** wandered free from suffering. At that time, all men and women of the land **inclined their hearts in devotion**, all receiving protection and guidance, all attaining **eternal life**.

The Dao speaks thus: When the **Primordial Origin Celestial Venerable** proclaimed the Scripture once, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit, Pure Azure Wuyue Palace, Rectifying-Qi Great God of the Upper Primordial** and His **innumerable hosts** floated through the void and arrived.

When the Scripture was proclaimed twice, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit, Yuanhuang Taiji Palace, Illuminating-Scene Great God of the Upper Primordial** and His **innumerable hosts** floated through the void and arrived.

When the Scripture was proclaimed thrice, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit, Dongbai Taqing Palace, Radiant-Luster Great God of the Upper Primordial** and His **innumerable hosts** floated through the void and arrived.

When the Scripture was proclaimed four times, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit, Dongxu Qingling Palace, Functional Great God of the Middle Primordial** and His **innumerable hosts** floated through the void and arrived.

When the Scripture was proclaimed five times, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit, Nanji Dunyang Palace, Register Great God of the Middle Primordial** and His **innumerable hosts** floated through the void and arrived.

When the Scripture was proclaimed six times, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit, Luoyuan Dao Mountain Palace, Primordial-Yin Great God of the Middle Primordial** and His **innumerable hosts** floated through the void and arrived.

When the Scripture was proclaimed seven times, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit, Qinghua Fangzhu Palaces, Preserving Great God of the Lower Primordial** and His **innumerable hosts** floated through the void and arrived.

When the Scripture was proclaimed eight times, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit, Nan Shui Jingxiao Palace, Primordial-Dao Great God of the Lower Primordial** and His **innumerable hosts** floated through the void and arrived.

When the Scripture was proclaimed nine times, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit, Yintian Hunhua Palace, Mysterious Sovereign Great God of the Lower Primordial** and His **innumerable hosts** floated through the void and arrived.

When the Scripture was proclaimed ten times, the **Supreme Grade of Boundless Merit, Xuanji Lingji Palace, Divine Register Great God of the Immortal Treasury** and His **innumerable hosts** floated through the void and arrived.

When the tenfold proclamation was complete, the **Three Primordials and Nine Palaces**, the **Twenty-Seven Palaces**, and the **One Hundred Twenty Departments**—all the **Heavenly Gods who govern life, death, virtue, and vice, and the flying celestial deities**—all arrived together. All men and women of the land **inclined their hearts in reverence**.

The **Primordial Origin Celestial Venerable** then took the **Five-Luminous Treasure Fan** and pointed toward the **eastern-southern quadrant**. The **heavenly light blazed**, illuminating the void. The **heavenly folk**, following the fan’s direction, gazed upward in divine transformation and saw a **Treasure Mountain towering into the Jade Void**, vast beyond measure, its **jade terraces, gem observatories, and flower-adorned gates** arranged in divine order. The **Heavenly True Ones** paid homage to the **Primordial Origin**, ascending the void on **flying steps**, singing praises in chorus.

The Venerable then summoned the **Highest Pure-Mist Heavenly Official of the One-Grade Treasure of the Jade Void**, the **Great Pacifier of the Yellow Gate, the Second-Grade Earthly Official of the Universal Enlightening Territory**, and the **Third-Grade Water Official of the Great Dissolution, Flowing Function, and Mysterious Virtue of the Nine Abysses**, placing them at His right. The **Thirty-Two Heavenly Sovereigns** stood at His left, the **Nine High Saints of the Natural True Kings** before Him, and the **Great Gods of the Sun, Moon, Five Stars, Celestial Loom, and Primordial Threads** behind Him.

The **Yao Crystal and Jade Extremes** held the **cosmic threads**, the **Twenty-Five Great Demon Kings**, the **Ten-Directional Boundless Flying Celestial Gods**, the **Nine-Heaven Commands and Divine Guards**, and the **Three-Realm Divine Soldiers** all stood in order. **Jade flowers scattered through the void**, the **heavenly music played in harmony**, and the **divine procession ascended**, flying into the **eastern-southern heavens**.

The heavenly folk gazed upward and saw **ten thousand chariots and a hundred thousand riders**, **phoenix palanquins and dragon cars**, their **radiance like countless stars**, impossible to count. In an instant, **yellow clouds enveloped them**, and they vanished from sight.

The **Primordial Origin Celestial Venerable** then, within the **eastern-southern jade gate**, completed the proclamation of the Scripture. The **multitude of True Ones** supervised the **transmission of guidance**, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, **joy beyond words filled the heart**.

When the **ritual of the Law** was complete, the **ten thousand True Ones returned to their stations**. In a brief instant, all was **silent and unseen**.

At that time, the **heavenly folk understood this Great Pattern**, universally receiving **salvation and blessings**, all attaining **longevity**, forever severed from **sinking and ruin**. All within the realm **turned in devotion**, all recognizing the **root of life**.

The **Divine and True** opened the transformation, marking the names of the **Nine Palaces**. The **Primordial Harmony** shifted the **qi**, subduing the **evil spirits and calamities**. No creature suffered from **boils or rashes**; all things shone in **harmonious unity**.

The **path of evil was sealed**; the **Dao/Way** was opened wide. Forever aiding the **Supreme Heights**, their **commands spread far**. The **lands flourished in peace**; the **nation thrived, its people abundant**.

The **Scripture began to circulate**, its teachings spread across the realm. Each followed their **innermost truth**, revering and honoring it, all attaining **salvation of the world**.

The **Dao/Way** speaks: All that the **Primordial Origin Celestial Venerable** proclaimed in the Scripture are the **true names of the Nine Heavenly Natural True Kings**, hidden in **coded sounds**. They are also the **taboo names within the Three Primordial Palaces**, the **secret names of the hundred spirits**—not the common words of the world.

When the **Upper Clarity** opened the transformation, the **True Persons** penetrated to **True Understanding** and **Mystic Enlightenment**, all aligning with its chapters.

If one recites it **ten times**, the **Celestial Officials** chant from afar, the **True Lords** arrange the rites, the **Great Abyss** remains tranquil, the **Divine Mountains** gather the clouds, the **Primordial Sovereign** bestows teachings, the **Nine Palaces** register the names, the **Great Demon** is subdued, the **host of evil spirits** is annihilated, the **Returning Spirits** transform their forms, and **rotting bones become human**.

For those of **wondrous learning and high attainment**, reciting it **ten times** brings the **Nine Officials** to guard in ranks, the **Divine Marshals** to bow in homage, the **ghostly spirits** to flee in terror, daring not to offend. They **rescue and elevate** all beings, pulling them from **sinking to ascent**.

The people of the **Divine Land**, newly learning the **Supreme Dao/Way**, if they follow the **rituals** and recite it **ten times**, shall see **ten thousand evils destroyed**, **thousand blessings descend**, and their voices **resonate with the Great Enclosure**. The **Dao/Way** pierces the **Purple Mists**, the **Three Primordials** take up the pen, inscribing the **Nine Palaces above**. When the **fruit is ripe and the merit complete**, they ascend as **Earthly True Ones**, lightly reciting the **Jade Texts**, forever **free from sinking and ruin**.

With **reverent devotion and proper rites**, all wishes shall be fulfilled. **Generation after generation**, the teachings descend, **enlightening all living beings**, with **ten thousand demons** unable to interfere. The **Heavenly True Ones** guard the gates.

This Scripture is **profound and secret**, the **highest treasure of the Jade Clarity**. It **salvages all without limit**, serving as the **foundation of the Spirit Treasure**. Its **sublime and wondrous** nature is **beyond measure**.

The **Dao/Way** speaks: For those who recite this Scripture **ten times**, the **Nine Palaces’ ranked true officials** hold the **registers of life and transformation**, descending to oversee and observe, **erasing the black ledgers of Luo and Tang**, and **inscribing names into the Blue Registers**. The **ancestral spirits** all ascend. In the **Hall of Flowing Fire**, their **essence is refined**, their **spirits summoned**, becoming **heaven’s cultivated people**, harmonizing with **both existence and non-existence**.

For those who **master the profound and attain the ultimate**, the **Great Demon** petitions on their behalf, elevating them to **Red Mound**, soaring through the **Eight Extremes**, feasting in **Upper Clarity**. Descending through the **Heavenly Gates**, they become **worldly sages**. They **proclaim the Supreme Dao/Way**, aiding **enlightened rulers**.

When the world receives its recitation, **all ailments vanish**, the **spiritual storehouse** becomes luminous, **Jade Flower** refines within, **Golden Light** congeals without. Though **temporarily dwelling in the dense earth**, the **Great Yin transforms its form**, the **numbers reach Pure Yang**, and **life regenerates with each cycle**.

This Scripture’s **profound mysteries** universally benefit all, **every living being** receiving its blessings. **Infinite merits** arise from **birth and transformation**. What **Heaven forbids** is not passed to mortals. Only **noble scholars**, bearing **precious jade**, pledge their hearts in **solemn oath** before transmitting it.

To **neglect or slight** this sacred text brings **calamity to the Seven Mysteries**, binding one to **endless toil in the netherworld**.

The **Nine Palaces** attend with **twenty-four Jade Boys and Jade Girls each**, surrounding and guarding the **Sacred Texts**, protecting those who receive them.

The **Dao/Way** speaks: On the **long fast of the first month**, reciting this Scripture, the **Purple Micro Palace** registers the deeds in **Golden Scriptures**. The **wondrously practicing True Persons**, riding the **light of Minor Yang and Bright Mists**, open the **gates of darkness**, rescuing and elevating the **lost souls of past ages** into **Heaven’s Realm**.

On the **long fast of the seventh month**, reciting this Scripture, the **Empty Void Primordial Palace** records the merits on **Jade Tablets**. The **Dragon-Shining Divine Kings** present the names to the **Nine Heavens**, bestowing **vital qi**, granting **immortal bodies**.

On the **long fast of the tenth month**, reciting this Scripture, the **Square Array Caverns** submit the chapters above. Holding the **halter and knot**, the **Heavenly Great Demon** purges the **wicked spirits**, subdues the **hundred precincts**, dispels the **three calamities**, ensuring **peace and prosperity for the world**.

On the **eight seasonal festivals**, reciting this Scripture grants the title of **Earthly True One**, allowing **wandering through the Eight Dark Realms**.

On one’s **birthday**, reciting this Scripture refines the **Five Palaces**, intertwines the **double lights**, gathers the **Nine Primordials** in **harmonious union**, blending **soul and spirit**, ascending on **crimson vapors**, collecting **flowery radiance**, flowing with **spiritual springs**. When **merit is complete and the Dao/Way fulfilled**, the **spirit soars among the immortals**.

The **Dao/Way** speaks: On days of **practice**, one must **bathe in fragrant waters**, **fast and purify** within the chamber, facing **east**, striking the teeth **thirty-two times** to **communicate with the Thirty-Two Heavens**, bowing the heart **thirty-two times**, closing the eyes in **quiet contemplation**, seated amid the **nine-colored cloud qi**.

Within and without, **darkness gathers**: the **Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane** array themselves on either side. The **Three Primordials and Nine Palaces**, the **great gods of the immortal ledgers**, stand solemn before them. The **sun and moon** illuminate, the chamber **shines with radiant clarity**, a **circular symbol** forms at the nape, its light **mirroring the ten directions**, so vividly clear.

The **secret incantation** is thus:

*"Supreme Mysterious Primordial,
Greatest Sovereign of the Dao/Way.
Summon forth from my body the **Three Five Officials**, the **left and right attendants**, the **fragrant jade boys**, the **speaking jade girls**, the **Five Emperors’ direct symbols**, the **direct-day fragrant officials**—each thirty-six in number—**opening the gates** as spoken.

Today is a day of **auspicious joy**, a **long fast in the pure hall**, practicing this **supreme Scripture** to **salvage countless beings**.
May what is invoked **ascend directly** to the **Supreme Thirty-Two Heavens**, before the **Primordial Origin Emperor of Infinite Degrees, Most Exalted**.

Finished. Drawing the **qi thirty-two times**, facing east to recite the Scripture.*
