**The Jade Register of the Nine Palaces, Supreme Grade**
**Ascending and Descending to Salvage Beings**
**The Great Scripture of Separation and Union, naturally structuring the qi.**
**Jade Cavern’s Purple Texts**, arraying the **manifested True Ones**,
**Void and Transformation’s ultimate refinement**, flowing into the **patterned Sovereign**.
**Round Light divides the mysteries**, the **vast symbol flies with its roots**.
The **Nine Palaces nurture the essence**, the **One Emperor generates the body**.
**Luminous and resplendent**, **civilization’s red culture** thrives.
**Chasing Heaven, returning to Water**, the **Three Extremes’ mystic crossing.**

**Lofty and layered passways**, **moving through the void, wheels aloft**.
**The Purple Micro of Peaceful Yang**, **all converging at the Sovereign’s court**.

This is the **Ultimate Transformation**—**Cloud Palace, Supreme Highness**.
**The divine mound of Yùchá**, **Jade Void, Yang’s boundless expanse**,
**Must stretch the flying mists**, **scatter the radiant whirlwinds**.

**The effulgent platform of the kalpas**, **spreading sacred ranks in order**,
**counting the cycles of the Great Destiny**, **their paths intersecting**.
**The vast celestial gates sway**, **weaving the splendor of the华城**,
**flowing brilliance across the realms**, **preserving Heaven’s luminous clarity**.

Within are the **True Sovereign of the Ten Thousand Enclosures**,
within are the **Three Officials of Broad Governance**,
within are the **Nine Palaces’ Master Registers**,
within are the **Sages of the Transforming Cycle** who open the Way,
within are the **Twenty-Seven Offices**, the **One Hundred Twenty Divisions**,
**Yin and Yang, Water and Fire**, **examining life and death**—
the **Great Spirits, mighty gods**.

**Spreading and magnifying the utmost mysteries**,
**salvaging all Heavenly and Human beings**.
**Wandering through the Great Void**, **enduring to protect the world**.

**Ascending to the High Assembly**, **descending to the Water Gates**.
**Overseeing the Northern酆**, **inspecting the Cloud Camp**.
**Divine symbols proclaim the decrees**, **mysterious edicts obeyed in full**.

Today’s proclamation, **all Heavens attend in splendor**.
**The Boundless God-Kings of the Eastern Limitless**—
**Long-Living Great Saints of Infinite Salvation**.
**The Boundless God-Kings of the Southern Limitless**—
**Long-Living Great Saints of Infinite Salvation**.
**The Boundless God-Kings of the Western Limitless**—
**Long-Living Great Saints of Infinite Salvation**.
**The Boundless God-Kings of the Northern Limitless**—
**Long-Living Great Saints of Infinite Salvation**.
**The Boundless God-Kings of the Northeast Limitless, who Subdue the Extremes**—
**Long-Living Great Saints of Infinite Salvation**.
**The Boundless God-Kings of the Southeast Limitless, who Guide Transformation**—
**Long-Living Great Saints of Infinite Salvation**.
**The Boundless God-Kings of the Southwest Limitless, who Preserve the Scriptures**—
**Long-Living Great Saints of Infinite Salvation**.
**The Boundless God-Kings of the Northwest Limitless, Jade Wheels**—

**The Boundless God-Kings of the Ten Directions, Flying Heavens**—
**Long-Living, World-Salvaging Great Gods of Infinite Measure**.

Together they ride **substance clouds, flying chariots**,
**floating light preserves the palanquin**,
**feathered canopies drive the wheels**,
**yoked with the Vermilion Tiger and Golden Phoenix divine birds**,
**establishing the Green Mist’s Mystic Banner**,
**emerald radiance gleaming on the华幢**,
**forebears bearing the Nine-Heaven Divine Seal**,
**rear guards wielding the Subduing-Magic Faith Flags**,
**pure spirits holding the axe of justice**,
**verdant truths bearing the command**,

**mysterious elders leading the alliance**,
**ten million riders, ten million steeds**,
**soaring through the void**,
**tilting light to return in procession**,
**urging the *qi* to summon the immortals**.

**Purple Highness’ Vice-Marshal**, **Supreme Highness’ Upper Palace**,
**Clear Records of Governance**, **First-Rank Heavenly Officials**,
**holding tablets, presenting registers**,
**gathered in assembly before the Sovereign**.

As **each transformation begins**, **they instruct all Heavens**.
**Proclaiming universally to the Eight Murky Realms**,
**the vast celestial gates resound**.

**Mixed Palaces’ Offices**, **seven districts, nine abysses**,
**罗酆’s shadowy dominions**, **icy blades and frozen peaks**,
**flaming cities with fire veils**, **howling winds in nine revolutions**,
**six divisions of judgment**, **all demons in one hall**,
**tempests surge with swift currents**,
**kalpas clash in great cycles**,
**Nine Palaces’ talismans command**,
**subduing all malevolent and fierce**.

**Radiant威光 descends to save**,
**universal pardon granted to guilty souls**.
**Ascending to the Blessed Hall**,
**salvaging beings of the Red Mound**.

「Effortless transcendence and liberation,
All sufferings dissolve into their source.

Ascending to rebirth and receiving transformation,
Celebrating the gathering of auspicious causes,
With the kalpas turning in cycles,
And years aligned with the Heavens.

Passing beyond the Three Calamities,
Escaping the Nine Hardships,
Forever dwelling in the highest realm,
Roaming the Nine Pure Heavens.

The Nine Pure Heavens:
**Dongwen Heaven**, where the Celestial Sovereign illuminates scriptures—
the boundless realm of the *Dharma*’s pure conduct.

**Eastward Eight Heavens:**
**Xuanli Heaven**, where the Sovereign of the Black Mists expands and sustains clarity—
**Lingcheng Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s virtues flourish in hundredfold harmony.
**Bixu Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s brilliance shines in verdant splendor—
**Yuehe Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s majesty governs with measured grace.
**Changling Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s nurturing knows no end—

**Huizhen Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s radiance returns to its source—

**Jingjie Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s stillness aligns with truth—

**Southward Eight Heavens:**
**Haoming Heaven**, where the Sovereign plants virtue and befriends the good—

**Feyi Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s nurturing extends to all beings—
**Zhonghua Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s central authority governs the Middle.

**Westward Eight Heavens:**
**Zhongxian Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s records align with celestial transformation—
**Fushan Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s virtues flourish in boundless abundance.
**Changzhen Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s true essence is revered—
**Jiling Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s divine might banishes malevolent forces.
**Yuxi Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s radiance aids in noble proclamation—
**Liangzhen Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s compassion calls forth the worthy.
**Bohua Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s rectification saves the wounded—
**Zhongxian Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s virtues align with cosmic harmony.

**Northward Eight Heavens:**
**Xuanhua Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s mysteries govern the obscured—
**Fumao Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s might subdues demons.
**Qilun Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s *qi* wheels turn in cycles—
**Shengcheng Heaven**, where the Sovereign ascends to pure clarity.
**Taojing Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s virtues refine and govern—
**Yunzhen Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s solemn decrees oversee the pure *qi*.
**Changling Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s celestial dragon aligns with the sun—
**Dingyuan Heaven**, where the Sovereign’s mysteries harmonize with the Nine Palaces.

**Thirty-Two Heavens**, **Thirty-Two Sovereigns**.
The Heavens conceal their names,
The Heavens conceal their signs.
Within the celestial void, scriptures manifest naturally.

The Heavens conceal their sounds,
The divine voices of the Heavens—
The exalted, the revered, the celestial gods.
They oversee true demons and *Dharma*’s hidden records.

Nine cycles, ten revolutions,
Transformations beyond mortal ken.
Boundless mysteries, vast beyond measure.
The primordial records of truth,
Uniting Heavens and humans.
The sacred registers of virtue,
Ascending to the lofty *Xuan* court.

Today, the Mystic Pass responds in kind,
Revealing the boundless decree—
Erasing the dark ledgers,
Bending the humble to rise high,
Guiding the winds to the upper ranges,
Transcending the weak to cross the abyss,
Subduing great demons,
All bow in unison before the Jade Pavilion.

The **Four Celestial Lodes** arise:
**Eastern Dipper** governs birth,
**Western Dipper** holds authority,
**Northern Dipper** dispenses blessings,
**Southern Dipper** rules migration,
**Central Dipper** broadens transformation,
Commanding the divine officials.

The **Five Celestial Sovereigns** descend:
**Green Sovereign** manifests divine will,
**White Sovereign** regulates the *qi*,
**Red Sovereign** nurtures the embryonic,
**Black Sovereign** unites intentions,
**Yellow Sovereign** sits in vigil,
Bestowing great benevolence upon the Heavens.

The **Five Palaces’ True Kings**:
**Green Palace**, where the Sovereign’s foundation is set in jade mists—
**Red Palace**, where the Sovereign’s crimson scriptures radiate and open—
**White Palace**, where the Sovereign’s luminous scenes flourish in splendor—
**Black Palace**, where the Sovereign’s violet purity enfolds—
**Yellow Palace**, where the Sovereign’s golden transformations manifest naturally.

The Five Palaces’ lofty spirits,
The revered ones of ten thousand Heavens.
Soaring through the Nine Enclosures,
Commanding the Heavenly armies.
Holding banners and wielding decrees,
Roaming the boundless expanse,
Their divine might resounding,
Aligned with the Dao’s eternal flow.

Ascending to govern mortals,
The Great Constitution spreads.
The Primordial Sovereign receives the mandate,
Sweeping away all inauspiciousness.
Stone-light gleams in radiance,
Heaven’s decrees unfold in full.

Jade steeds gallop, colossal beasts bear the peaks.
Fiery essences disperse far,
Sealing the divine villages.
Daring to transgress,
They are bound and slaughtered.
The Mystic Axe strikes left,
The Jade Cleaver fells right.
Dispelling monstrous illusions,
Severing the wayward and rebellious.

Rectifying the Heavenly Primordial,
The sacred movements converge.
Demons dare not test their limits,
Evil cannot hide its form.
The Nine Offices array their officials,
Registering the demonic camps.
No room for negligence,
Heaven’s ministers swiftly present.

Proclaiming to the divine gates,
All true spirits listen in awe.
The Three Realms and Ten Extremes,
All make known the decree.

The sacred texts and jade registers,
The crimson scriptures and hidden volumes.
The Five Transformations align with the eternal laws,
The Three *Qi*’s push forth in endless cycles.
The Great Primordial shapes itself,
Crystal brilliance unfolds in ceaseless radiance.

The boundless void merges with vast kalpas,
Ascending beings cross the abyss.
The Six *Qi*’s alternate in endless succession,
The boundless expanse knows no edge.

Above, the Five Lodes are arrayed,
Below, the Nine Abysses are spread.
Winds envelop the Great Void,
Waters swirl in celestial currents.
The Jade Capital stands firm,
The Nine Cities of the Great Primordial.

Lofty and splendid, the divine mansions,
Where the *Dharma*’s records command the true.
Emerald mists rise in misty splendor,
Long-lasting breezes scatter the Azure.
Congealing into mountains and peaks,
Flowing as rivers and streams.
The Central Treasury holds the upper spirits,
Commanding all cosmic threads.

The Primordial threads turn in cycles,
Through the Three Realms and all Heavens.
Enveloping the jade void,
Twisting the birth-gates.
Recording the revolutions of scriptures,
Returning the courses to their source.

Thirty-Nine Sovereigns,
Commanding the Four Mysteries.
Eight Treatments divide the true,
The *qi*’s merge with the abyssal sources.

Within the Central Palace, the Purple Court,
The Jade Treasury and Vermilion Mists.
Feasting on the divine scene,
Singing in hidden splendor.
Golden scriptures shine forth,
The Void Palace drifts in clouds.
Jade orbs refine the essence,
Divine sounds disperse in currents.
The Azure Gate unfolds in brilliance,
Opening the way to primordial virtue.

Ten thousand revolutions, ten thousand cycles,
Naturally complete the true.
Within the true, the divine resides,
The Heavenly officials and great lords.
The Purple Micro and Jade Auxiliaries,
The lofty eminence of the *Yang* Valley.
The Infant Lord and the Marshal of Records,
The Thousand-Pure Primordial One.
Holding the jade talisman in command,
Preserving the sacred rites of life’s roots.
Ascending to the Great Void,
Entering and exiting the Encircled Rotations.
The Jade Mountains’ crags,
The lofty peaks of the Azure.

Descending to respond to mortal form,
The Five Treasures and divine rivers.」

The brain’s palace gates,
The square pool overflows with myriad treasures.
Six apertures return the primal springs,
The **Yīng** [1] essence soars in emerald brilliance.

Emerald splendor of the Nine Mysteries,
Unlocking the degrees for Heaven and Man.
Above, it ascends to the cloudly **Gāng**[2],
Eight Gates and the jade-wheeled **Lún**[3].

Great blessings and prohibitions,
Karma’s cause and effect.
Universal salvation and deliverance,
For the dead soul and the living body.

The body attains rebirth,
Above, it hears the Imperial Court.
Within the Imperial Court,
Each holds its own **Xuán** [4] sound.
There are Nine Palaces within,
Between the opening and closing,
The Three **Yuán**[5]’s sacred hymns,
Words harmonizing with the lofty **Zhēn**[6].

The first Nine-Palace chant of the gathered immortals,
Flying through the void—
Eight luminous and four ethereal,
Encompassing the Nine Mysteries.

The Crimson **Hún**[7]’s clarity,
Intertwined with the vast **Tài** [8] space.
Above the Eight **Yuán**[9],
Within the Windy **Zé**[10].

The **Dòng** [11] merges with the boundless,
Below, it steadies the Northern **Tíng**[12].
The Three **Guān**[13] govern in unison,
Within, the supreme **Shén**[14].
Holding the Heavenly Great **Xìan**[15],
Matching the Dao’s sovereign power.
Established as the Heavenly Emperor,
Overseen by the Jade **Zhēn**[16].
Wondrous transformations give birth,
To the Thirty-Nine Lords.

Above, they assist the **Yuánshǐ**[17],
In the Great **Jiè**[18], they are revered as **Zūn**[19].
Entering and exiting existence,
Soaring through the Jade **Jīng**[20].
The **Dòng** [21] chapter descends to teach,
The Ten Thousand Heavens proclaim its passage.

The second Nine-Palace chant of the immortal registers—
Purple jade celestial strategy,
Jade **Jí**’s true **Kē**[22].
Lofty **Zhēn**[23] concealed in mystery,
Above, it is sealed within the **Yuánluó**[24].
Crimson beads arrayed in names.
Purple silk of the Three **Huá**[25].
Flying immortals listed as saints,
Crimson script radiant with **Xiá**[26].
Dark gold sacred tablets.
Yellow jade pliant scrolls.
Recording all the **Zhēn**[27],
The Emperor’s heart weighs them.
The **Tàijí Xuán** [28] Palace,
Registers the immortals’ fate.
Pitying worldly beings,
Chasing transient things,
Their souls ascend, their spirits descend,
Drowning in the Nine **Quán**[29].
Why not climb the mountains?
Recite this **Dòng** [30] passage.
One enlightenment to the supreme Dao,
The body ascends to the Imperial **Xuān**[31].

The third **Tàijí** Nine-Palace hymn—
The **Tàiqīng** Nine Directions,
Returning brilliance like flowing clouds.
Holding the Heavenly **Jī**,
Opening the path to the Azure **Míng**[32].
Jade **Shān** and Purple **Hé**,
Dark **Wéi** [33] and Mysteries as neighbors.
The **Tàiwéi** Upper Registry,
Within, the Old Man [34].
Ascending Heaven, concealing the Dao,
Merging with the scene, giving birth to form.
Fanning the sky, the **Lú** clouds unfold,
Crimson light shines resplendent.
The Heavenly wheel revolves in cycles,
Scriptures transform the primal **Chéng**[35].
The Nine **Yuán** [36] enfold,
Opening the Dao at the **Jīn** crossing [37].
The **Qīngwéi** Emperor, the One,
The **Dàdòng** Spirit’s lofty **Zūn**[38].
Silent contemplation aligns with the Great **Yǒu**[39],
Naturally attaining the supreme **Zhēn**[40].
Seeking the Nine-Palace immortal songs,
Aspiring to join the Emperor’s celestial court.

This is the Three Realms above,
The near-void within,
The True King’s sacred melody,
Its words resonating with the **Dòng** chapter.

Recite it a hundred times,
To be named and delivered to the Southern **Gōng**[41].
Recite it a thousand times,
The True King will welcome you.
Ten thousand times, the Dao is complete.
Ascending through the Nine Palaces,
Crossing the Three Realms,
Rank attained among the **Xiān** lords.
Hearing the sacred sounds,
The **Mó** King reveres the form,
The **Dìzhǐ** [42] are ordered to guard,
Escorting and welcoming,
Drawn forth from the earthly **Hù**[43],
Free from the Five Sorrows and Eight Hardships [44],
The Seven **Zǔ** ascend in rank,
Forever departing from the Northern **Shān**[45],
The soul delivered to the Crimson **Líng**[46],
Refined and reborn again.

This is called the boundless,
Universal deliverance without end.
There are secrets to the Heavenly texts,
All the Heavens hold them in reverence.
Revealing them in carelessness,
One falls into the **Dìyù**[47].
Disaster befalls the Seven **Zǔ** Ancestors.

The Dao says: These two chapters are the hidden sounds
Of all the Heavenly Emperors,
And the Nine-Palace immortal registers.
Within, there are the Nine **Zhēn**—
The **Xióngyī** [48] masculine,
The **Cīyī** [49] feminine,
The true **Hùi** [50] names,
The saints’ inner designations.
Those who chant and recite them,
Engrave the **Tàijí**,
Will verify their rank in the Nine Palaces.

Within the brain, there is the **Zǐfáng** True Spirit,
Seated facing outward,
Hearing this scripture’s voice,
Ascending to harmonize with **Tàijí**,
Descending to respond to the **Dòng** echoes,
The Nine-Palace spirits,
Proclaiming the signs of the immortal **Qī**[51].

All are the words of the Great **Fàn**[52],
Not the common speech of the world.
Words without rhyme and grace,
Melodies without splendor and elegance.

Thus it is called the profound and mysterious—
difficult to trace in detail.
The Heavenly Sovereign treasures it,
secreted within the Highest Celestial’s **Shénxiāo** [Divine Mists],
the **Yùqīng** [Jade Clarity] **Yùfǔ** [Jade Palace],
in the Eastern Platform’s **Bǎozàng** [Treasure Vault],
according to the **kē** [scriptural] cycle of thirty-seven thousand years,
transmitted downward with the cosmic flow.

If there be a **Zhìrén** [Perfected Sage] bearing gold and jade with a sincere heart,
and according to the ancient rites pledges with the Nine Palaces,
then alone shall it be bestowed.

**Dao** says: When the Heavenly and Earthly cycles reach their limits,
when the sun and five stars wane and wax,
when the most sacred **Shénrén** [Divine Sage] rests or declines,
when the shallow scholars suffer affliction—
then all who share this **qi** must unite in heart,
observing fasts, offering incense at the six hours,
reciting the **sūtra** ten times in rotation,
and virtue shall descend to dispel all ill omens.

The boundless scriptures universally liberate the boundless.

**Dao** says: The shallow scholar, with Dao yet shallow,
or whose immortal rank is yet incomplete,
when the cosmic response fades and the body enters **Tàiyīn** [Great Darkness],
at the moment of passing,
the fellow **Zhìrén** must for them perform incense rites,
recite the scripture ten times in proper form,
to guide the corpse’s form as law dictates.
Then the **Yùhuá** [Jade Flower] Empress holds the flame to extinguish the yin malevolence,
while the **Yún’ý** [Cloud Comportment] Jade Maiden strikes the celestial **qìng** [stone chimes] in the brain palace—
thus the hundred spirits coalesce,
and the Nine **Guāng** [Luminous] essences
enter to fill the **níwán** [Cinnabar Field],
restoring their origin.
Soul and spirit ascend to the Southern Palace,
according to their merit, and in days are reborn.

The **Zhuánlún** [Turning Wheel] unceasing,
they attain **Shénxiān** [Immortal Sage].

**Dao** says: When the Heavenly and Earthly cycles reach their end,
when stars and constellations stray from their courses,
when sun and moon are obscured and darkened,
when the four seasons lose their order,
when yin and yang fall out of harmony,
when calamities plague the realm,
when pestilence spreads and the common folk perish,
when teachers and friends meet untimely ends,
when fellow students suffer misfortune—
all must observe fasts,
offer incense and recite scriptures.
For fasting and scripture-recitation bear great merit:
above, they dispel celestial disasters,
protecting and safeguarding the sovereign.
Below, they avert poisonous harm,
to deliver the common folk.

The birth and death of beings depend on this merit, which is boundless in its virtue.
Thus it is said: "Infinite, universally delivering all Heavenly and Earthly beings."

The **Dao** proclaims: All who possess this **sutra** may, for the sake of Heaven, Earth, the Celestial Sovereign, and the myriad folk, perform these virtuous deeds. When calamities arise, if one sincerely fasts, burns incense, and recites this **sutra** ten times, the **Devas** [天] will record their names, and the ten thousand **spirits** [神] will attend as guardians. They shall attain the rank of **Zhìrén** [Exalted Ones], becoming worthy ministers of the **Saintly Sovereign** [聖君] at the **Golden Gate** [金阙].

The **Devas** meticulously record the merits and demerits of all beings, not missing even the slightest fraction. The **Zhēnwáng** [True King] of the **Devas** will also champion their worth, and those who attain the **Dao** shall understand its profound truths.

Within the **Devas**, the **Great Brahman** [大梵] conceals the **Infinite Sound** [無量音].
The **Dao Lord** [道君] composed it as the **Elemental Scriptures** [元始靈書], the **Nine Palaces’ Register of the Immortal Worthies** [九宮仙籍], the **Sacred Names of the True Ones** [諸真寶訶]—the first chapter of the **Eight Celestial Devas of the East** [東方八天]:

*"Jia tú yuán líng, liú tǐ shè huí.
Huāng rú chéng Tài, zhōu jiàng míng chuí.
Láo lóng bì chū, dòu jiāng pín léi.
Yǎng duàn hóng jí, zhāo xiān nà huī.
Yǎn pǔ jì zhuó, kōng méng huá cuī.
Dū yáo shěn xú, qiè xuán bì dāo.
Chá chén zǎo kē, mì lái fā shēn.
Biàn huì qí wèi, zhuàng bēi mào bīn."*

The **Eight Celestial Devas of the South** [南方八天]:

*"Hè nuó tí dū, míng yāo zhěn yàn.
Huāng dù jué yóu, xīng biāo xuàn huàn.
Zhàng zhǎng yún jí, céng tuán yóu míng.
Yào qín zhù cí, biān róng qì sī.
Pián hú gěng chí, jīng guī bó wēi.
Zhāi zhuó bǐ xiāo, yōu luó jiān shī.
Jìng lì míng xī, yáng huá jī mí.
Qí yún yì tóng, fēng zuǒ bì guī."*

The **Eight Celestial Devas of the West** [西方八天]:

*"Liáo fàn zhū zhào, huán guāng yù luó.
Yāo bīng wú xíng, duī dá cuán wéi.
Yìng dào luò mò, zhōu méng wǎn pí.
Yì zuǒ yóu fù, zhū bìng bǐng chí.
Miǎo dàn dòng zé, pú yōu zhòu xī.
Liàng suǒ zǔ mù, yóu fén jì zhēn.
Dú mián gé hán, yí xū jiǎo zhāng.
Mì biàn cí fēi, qióng xùn shí jī."*

The **Eight Celestial Devas of the North** [北方八天]:

*"Chì lù qíng bì, yín yín shí lù.
Jiàng hǎi bì zhǔ, xī yōu jiǒng méi.
Yì yuè biàn zhú, xī guāng yáo tuó.
Qīn zài gēng qū, měi guān yuán shī.
Jiù luò lěi yuè, jiān fēng yù bēi.
Zú yáo cuì yuǎn, shù pǐ zài dān.
Yáng fǔ gé zé, yàn chē héng lín.
Chǔ miè shēng jiǔ, guān pán bó yīng."*

The **Dao** proclaims: These are the **Infinite Sound** [無量之音], hidden within the **Devas**. The ancient scriptures were carved upon the **Nine Palaces’ Venerable Walls** [太極九宮崇墉] to summon those yet unenlightened.

For those of profound learning, their **spirit** [神] dwells in the **Nine Palaces**, their **qi** [氣] embraces the **Great Pole** [太極]. If they ponder the concealed melodies, their names shall be inscribed in the **Immortal Register** [仙籍], ascending to the **Great Mysterious** [太玄], their steps mounting to the **Left Primordial** [左元]. Each syllable is vast and long, a span.

The **Heavenly True Person** [天真皇人] of old inscribed these words, establishing them as the **Orthodox Sound** [正音]. Those who know this sound and fast while reciting it shall have the **Great Pole’s Right Minister** [太極右卿] sent down to observe their form, record their diligent merits, and report them to the **Devas**. The ten thousand **spirits** [神] shall pay homage in reverence, the **Earthly Spirits** [地祇] attend at the gate, and the **Great Brahman** [大勋真王] will champion their worth in the **Nine Palaces**.

Thus, the **Dao** is fully attained, and they may act across the **Three Realms** [三界], ascending into the **Golden Gate** [金門]. This sound dispels all that it encounters, averts all calamities, delivers all beings, and fulfills all desires. It is the **Natural Sound of Heaven** [天真自然之音].

Therefore, when recited, it invites the **Great Pole’s** observation below, the **Supreme Deity’s** distant chant, the ten thousand **spirits’** homage, the **Three Realms’** attendance at the hall, and the **group of Devas’** bowed submission. The **ghostly essences** [鬼精] perish of their own accord, while the **resounding treasures** [琳琅] echo vibrant, the **Ten Directions** [十方] grow serene. The **rivers and seas** [河海] fall silent, the **mountains and valleys** [山岳] swallow the mist, and all living souls [萬靈] tremble in awe. It summons the **host of Immortals** [群仙], leaving Heaven without **mists of impurity** [氛秽], Earth without **dust of Devas** [祆塵], and the **Darkly Enlightened** [冥慧] realm in perfect clarity. This is the **Infinite Great Mystery** [大量玄玄].

**Scripture of Infinite Virtue and Delivery of Beings** [靈寶無量度人上品妙經] concludes its thirty-fifth chapter.
**Thirty-sixth chapter** begins.

**Chapter on the Convergence of the Eight Scenic Deities**

The **Way** speaks: *"In days past, within the celestial realm of Zhuyang, the **Primordial Soul** sang the **Sacred Song of Great Fusion** upon the **Land of Pure Harmony**, receiving from **Yuan Shi** the **Supreme Method of Converging the Eight Scenic Deities** in boundless perfection.*

When **Yuan Shi Tianzun** delivered this **Scripture**, circling ten times to summon the **Ten Directions**, the **Celestial Worthies** took their seats. The **Heavenly True Gods**, the **Supreme Saints**, the **Mystic True Persons**, and the **Eight Scenic Great Gods of the Three Primordial Cycles**, with their countless **unfettered hosts**, rode the void and arrived.

**Divine clouds** spread their blossoms, **jewel chariots** and **jade palanquins** gleamed, **purple canopies** sheltered their radiance, and the **divine realm** shone in unison. **Auspicious hues** mingled in brilliance, and the **Eight Paths** blazed luminous. For seven days and seven nights, the **Eight Scenic Deities of the heavens** converged naturally, their reflections merging. **Ten thousand spirits and myriad souls** became one in **qi**, blending harmoniously like a turning wheel. The **entire land’s** mountains, rivers, forests, and trees shone resplendent, their highs and lows uniformly vibrant, the earth adorned with swirling, multicolored patterns like **embroidered silk**.

The **host of Worthies** attended at his side, while **Yuan Shi Tianzun** sat in **void-transcending meditation** upon the **Jade Terrace of the Celestial Vault**, where the **Ten Thousand Qi** converge in a luminous expanse.

When the **Scripture** was recited **once**, the **Heavenly Great Saints** proclaimed its excellence in unison. At that moment, **all men and women of the land** had their **desires for sensuality permanently severed**.

When recited **twice**, they attained **enlightenment to the Ultimate Truth**.

When recited **three times**, their **understanding and application of the Dao became profound**.

When recited **four times**, their **refinement of the Primordial Qi** harmonized with their form.

When recited **five times**, their **spiritual essence condensed**, safeguarding their **vital soul**.

When recited **six times**, **myriad deities formed floral patterns** upon their bodies, merging with their essence.

When recited **seven times**, the **Three Imperial Courts** gathered the **Celestial Worthies** in homage.

When recited **eight times**, the **hundred passages** were sealed in mystery, the **palaces and halls** interconnected, the **gates of death** blocked, and the **roots of birth** extinguished.

When recited **nine times**, the **Three Divisions** opened brightly, and the **Eight Scenic Deities** returned in unity.

When recited **ten times**, the **divine and enlightened** merged perfectly, their forms ascending as **Immortal Worthies**. At that moment, **all men and women of the land**, without exception, turned their hearts in devotion, all receiving **protection and deliverance**, attaining **eternal life**.

The **Way** speaks: *"At that time, when **Yuan Shi Tianzun** had recited the **Scripture once**, the **East’s Supreme True God of Boundless Limitless Perfection, the **Verdant Scenic Deity**, arrived with his **unfettered host**, floating through the void. When recited **twice**, the **South’s Supreme True God of Boundless Limitless Perfection, the **Crimson Scenic Deity**, arrived with his **unfettered host**, floating through the void. When recited **three times**, the **West’s Supreme True God of Boundless Limitless Perfection, the **Pure Scenic Deity**, arrived with his **unfettered host**, floating through the void. When recited **four times**, the **North’s Supreme True God of Boundless Limitless Perfection, the **Mysterious Scenic Deity**, arrived with his **unfettered host**, floating through the void. When recited **five times**, the **Northeast’s Supreme True God of Boundless Limitless Perfection, the **Nascent Scenic Deity**, arrived with his **unfettered host**, floating through the void. When recited **six times**, the **Southeast’s Supreme True God of Boundless Limitless Perfection, the **Luminous Scenic Deity**, arrived with his **unfettered host**, floating through the void. When recited **seven times**, the **Southwest’s Supreme True God of Boundless Limitless Perfection, the **Flourishing Scenic Deity**, arrived with his **unfettered host**, floating through the void. When recited **eight times**, the **Northwest’s Supreme True God of Boundless Limitless Perfection, the **Gloaming Scenic Deity**, arrived with his **unfettered host**, floating through the void. When recited **nine times**, the **Upper Realm’s Supreme True God of Boundless Limitless Perfection, the **Convergent Scenic Deity**, arrived with his **unfettered host**, floating through the void. When recited **ten times**, the **Lower Realm’s Supreme True God of Boundless Limitless Perfection, the **Transformative Scenic Deity**, arrived with his **unfettered host**, floating through the void.*

When the **ten recitations were complete**, the **Eight Scenic Celestial Worthies of the Ten Directions** arrived together. All men and women of the land **turned their hearts in reverence**, exulting and declaring:
*'We have each, through virtuous causes, either followed the **Dao’s practices** or encountered fortunate karmic ties, thus dwelling in this celestial realm and securing the **favor of the Heavenly Sovereign**.'*

To proclaim this **Method of the Convergence of the Eight Scenic Deities**, this **Supreme Transformation of the Highest Truth**, was not something our **unfettered hosts** had previously known. Now, those who hear it **must attain advancement to the rank of Highest Worthies**, fully aligning with **profound principles**.

As for us, we had not heard this **Dao** before, nor recognized the **mystery of the Eight Scenic Deities’ convergence**. How could we have ascended to unite with the **Supreme Dao of the Mixed Primordial**?

Thus, we came before the **Heavenly Sovereign**, petitioning to hear this **Supreme Teaching**. Like **fine rain and dense mist**, our **unfettered hosts** filled half the land, sinking the soil in places—an irresistible force.

At that time, **Yuan Shi Tianzun** surveyed the **Ten Directions**, his gaze descending with solemn attention. He **waved his Five-Luminous Feather Fan**, spoke in **jewel-toned voice**, and expounded the **essential principles**, revealing the **Great Ultimate**. With a single breath, the **Primordial Qi** divided, forming the **Three Celestial Lights**, which further separated into the **Eight Scenic Deities**.

The **Eight Scenic Deities** are the **natural luminous deities of the Eight Directions**. The **Eight Scenic Deities of Heaven** are divided into **three divisions**, each corresponding to the **Three Primordial Cycles**. The **Eight Scenic Deities of Man** are divided into **three divisions**, each corresponding to the **Three Canopies**.

Thus, the **Three Divisions of the Eight Scenic Deities**—**twenty-four Worthies**—are the **highest spirits of the Supreme Dao**. To **practice this method**, merging the **qi of the Eight Scenic Deities** with one’s own **spirit**, is to **converge myriad deities into an Imperial Unity**, dispersing as **thousandfold Worthies**, thereby achieving **highest Immortality**.

The **Eight Scenic Deities of Heaven** reside:
- **Upper Primordial Cycle’s Eight Scenic Deities** at the **Jade Terrace of the Celestial Capital (Yujing Xiaotai)**,
- **Middle Primordial Cycle’s Eight Scenic Deities** at the **Purple Palace of Taiwei (Taiwei Ziyun)**,
- **Lower Primordial Cycle’s Eight Scenic Deities** in the **Halls of Kunlun**.

The **Eight Scenic Deities of Man** correspond to:
- **Upper** merging with the **Nägel Bone (Nihuan)**,
- **Middle** merging with the **Vermilion Palace (Jiangong)**,
- **Lower** merging with the **Elixir Field (Dantian)**.

Each has its **name, size, and color**, dwelling in places where they can **summon celestial luminosity** to merge with human **spirit**.

When the **spirits of the Eight Scenic Deities** blend harmoniously with one’s own, **Highest Worthieship** is attained. Their **essence is profound and mysterious**, **void and luminous**, **serene and radiant**. To **focus solely on these eight matters** in practicing the **Dao** is to **surely achieve success**.

These eight are the **virtues and natures of the Eight Scenic Deities**. If one **diligently cultivates the True Gods of the Eight Scenic Yang-Precisions**, then the **Eight Scenic Deities** will descend upon you, **granting the **profoundly enlightened eternal life of the True Immortal**."*

The Great Assembly, upon hearing these words, prostrated themselves twice in obeisance, desiring to exhaust all teachings so as to enlighten those yet unawakened.

On that day, they rejoiced and were fortunate to hear the wondrous **Dao**—waves washing away my deep stagnation, with threefold supplications ceasing not.

Thus, **Yuan Shi** transformed the **One Primordial Essence (Yuan Jing)**, its form like a crimson sun, its radiant treasures gleaming, suspended within the **Void and Mysterious** expanse, nine *zhang* above the earth.

**Yuan Shi** ascended and summoned:
The **Great Celestial Spirit (Tian Zhen)**, the **Highest Sage (Shang Sheng)**, the **Exalted and Lofty (Gao Zun)**, the **Wondrous Conduct True Person (Miao Xing Zhen Ren)**, the **Limitless Ten Directions (Shi Fang Wu Ji)**, and the **Eight Scenic Deities (Ba Jing Da Shen)**—innumerable in their ranks—all entering the crimson sun’s midst.

The **Heavenly and Human Beings** gazed upward, seeing only a **booming brilliance** descending from the radiant treasures, entering within—whereafter, none knew their whereabouts.

The lands dispersed, the earth restored to its evenness, no longer askew or troubled.

**Yuan Shi** then, within the sun’s luminous core, delivered the **sutra**’s full exposition. The gathered **True Gods (Zhong Zhen)** watched and bestowed upon me, at that moment, joy beyond measure.

The **dharma**’s essentials now known, the **Heavens’ assembly** resumed their stations. In an instant, all was silent, no trace remaining.

At that time,
those **Heavenly and Human Beings** who encountered the **sutra**’s **Dao** universally received salvation, their **original nature (Ben Xing)** preserved, none harmed in mid-life.
All bowed in reverence, their minds filled with marvel.

**Merging with the Dao/Way and the Void**, **merging with the Limitless and the Spirit**, **merging with the Luminous and the Scenic**, **merging with the Illuminating and the Serene**, **merging with the Mysterious and the Wondrous**—
their **emotions** were without deception, their **nature** complete in **Celestial Purity (Tian Zhen)**.
Their **virtue** aligned with **compassion**, though their **forms** differed, their **bones** became kin.
The **land was secure**, the people prosperous, rejoicing in **Great Peace (Tai Ping)**.

The **sutra**’s origin issued forth, teaching the **land** the **Dao**.

Those with **supreme devotion**, who revered and worshipped it, all attained the power to **save the world**.

The **Dao**’s words:
*"What **Yuan Shi Tian Zun** spoke within the **sutra** was but the **inner names (Nei Ming)** of the **Heavens’ Supreme Lords (Zhu Tian Di)**,
the **hidden resonance (Yin Yun)** of sound.
It was also the **taboo names (Xie)** within the **Three Divisions and Eight Scenic Deities (San Bu Ba Jing)***,
the **secret names (Yin Ming)** of the **hundred spirits (Bai Ling)**.
Not the common speech of the world.

If one **diligently fasts and recites**, the **Eight Scenic Deities**’ **spirit** merges,
becoming one with **Heaven**—seven lifetimes extinguished,
the **uterine gate (Bao Hu)** sealed.
The **Highest Sage** thus becomes a **True Person (Zhen Ren)**,
penetrating the **Deep Mysteries (Tong Xuan)**, exhausting the **subtle (Jiu Wei)**,
knowing all its chapters.

To recite it ten times,
the **Heavens** compel song,
the **Ten Thousand Lords (Wan Di)** arrange rites.
The **source of the heart (Xin Yuan)** clears and stills,
**harmful qi (Hai Qi)** sinks and dissolves.

**Piercingly merging** with the **Eight Scenic Deities**,
the **spirit of the True Gods** overflows within.
**Demons (Gun Mo)** bind their forms,
**ghostly essences (Gui Jing)** perish utterly.
**Corpses rise**, **white bones become flesh**—
the **learned of supreme attainment (Zhi Xue Zhi Shi)** recite ten times,
and the **Eight Scenic Deities** escort and guard,
the **Three Primordials (San Yuan)** prostrate in homage.
**Demon essences (Mo Jing)** lose their sight,
**Ghostly spirits (Gui Jing)** vanish completely.
They **salvage the dying**, severing death to attain life.

Thus it is:
For **learned scholars (Xue Shi)**, their **impure qi (Ji Qi)** has not yet dissolved,
their **bodies** not yet **pierced by the True Spirit (Dong Zhen)**.
Though they **summon the Eight Scenic Deities (Cun Chao Ba Jing)**,
their **cultivation** is not yet fully accomplished.
**Heaven’s decrees (Tian Zheng)** may subdue **demons (Mo)** for trial,
**banishing calamities (Jue Mie Zai Huan)**,
yet they do not die—only **regenerate (Bu Neng Geng Sheng)**.
A **light recitation** of this chapter brings **misfortune (Bei Yang)**.

To **offer reverence and supply (Gong Yang Zun Li)**,
gates flourish, prosperity enduring through ages,
with **auspicious karmic connections (Yu Shan Yin Yuan)**,
a **million calamities** not approaching.
**Divine lights (Shen Ming)** guard the threshold.

This **sutra** is **most exalted and wondrous**,
unmatched in the **Jade Capital (Yu Jing)**,
its **salvation** boundless—
the **foundation of ten thousand Dao**’s.

Its **scope (Fan)** vast and profound,
its **virtue** beyond measure.

The **Dao**’s words:
*"For those who recite this **sutra** ten times,
the **Eight Scenic Deities** descend in full assembly.
**Calamities** are **severed and extinguished**.
A **hundred generations of ancestors (Yi Zeng Wan Zu)***,
their **souls in torment (You Hun Ku Shang)***,
all receive **salvation**—
ascending to the **Crimson Palace (Zhu Gong)***,
**attaining the Nine Heavens (Ge Jie Jiu Tian)***,
**regenerating and receiving transformation (Shou Hua Geng Sheng)***,
becoming **noble beings (Gui Ren)**.

Yet those who **love the **sutra**’s supreme teachings**,
whose **cultivation is painful and their **virtue** accomplished (Gong Tong De Jiu)***,
all attain **immortality (Shen Xian)**—
**flying to the Golden Gate (Fei Sheng Jin Que)***,
**wandering the Mysterious Jade Capital (Yao You Ming Yu Jing)**.

For the **learned of highest attainment (Shang Xue Zhi Shi)***,
to **cultivate and recite** this **sutra**,
their **wisdom opens and brightens (Zhi Hui Kai Ming)***,
**embracing light to nurture the refined (Han Guang Yu Ying)***.
The **Eight Scenic Deities**’ **spirit** merges,
**harmonizing with the Mysterious Court (Dao Qi Xuan Ting)***.
All receive **salvation**—
**flying to the Southern Palace (Fei Sheng Nan Gong)**.

When **worldly beings** recite it,
the **Eight Scenic Deities** dwell within their **bodies**,
**binding the gates of death (Gu Lu Si Men)***.
The **Eight Scenic Deities** of **Heaven** descend to **merge with their forms (Xia He Zhao Xing)***,
**spirit and scenic** converging.
They **attain the Dao** and become **True Ones (De Jing Cheng Zhen)***,
**prolonging life and years (Yan Shou Chang Nian)***,
later all attaining the **path of flying ascent (Fei Sheng Zhi Dao)***.
Their **souls and spirits refine (Hun Shen Bian Lian)***,
not suffering the **torments of the Three Realms (San Jie Ai Nao)***,
constantly preserving **innocence (Hai Ying)***,
**wandering the Great Void (Yao Xing Tai Kong)**.

This **sutra** is **subtle and wondrous**,
its **salvation** boundless—
all **Heavenly and Human Beings** rejoice in receiving it.

**Incalculable blessings (Wu Liang Zhi Fu)***,
**life and death** both graced with favor.
**Heaven’s treasures (Shang Tian Suo Bao)***,
not passed to the **lower world (Bu Chuan Xia Shi)**.
Only **supreme scholars (Zhi Shi)**, bearing **golden treasures (Jin Bao)*** in **devoted hearts (Xiao Xin)***,
pledging to **Heaven** to transmit it.
**Light disclosure or negligence (Qing Xie Man Luan)***,
**misfortune** extends to **nine ancestral generations (Ji Ji Jiu Zu)***,
**enduring servitude in the nether offices (Chang Yi You Guan)***.

The **Five Emperors (Wu Di)*** attend this **sutra**,
with **Jade Boys and Jade Girls (Yu Tong Yu Nu)**, each twenty-four in number,
**guarding and escorting the sacred texts (Ying Wei Shen Wen)***.
They **protect those who receive the **sutra**’s teachings**,
their **bodies** unharmed.

The **Dao**’s words:
*"In the first month, with **long fasting (Chang Zhai)***,
recite and chant this **sutra**,
and the **upper division’s Eight Scenic Deities** descend to the **spirit’s court (Shen Ting)***,
the **Elixir Field’s Mysterious Hall (Ni Wan Xuan Tang)***,
the **seven ancestors (Qi Zu)*** **ascend and depart (Chao Qian)***,
**salvaging those of the upper division to the Southern Palace (Du Shang Nan Gong)**.

In the seventh month, with **long fasting**,
recite and chant this **sutra**,
and the **middle division’s Eight Scenic Deities** merge with **one’s form (He Zhao)***,
the **Yellow Primordial (Huang Yuan)*** blending as one.
**Heaven and Earth** share their **spirit (Tong Ling)***,
one’s **body** attains **immortality (De Shen Xian)***,
the **Heavens** record their names.
With **green talismans (Qing Lu)*** and **purple tablets (Zi Jian)***,
their **forms** rise, **becoming flying immortals (Fei Xian)**.

In the tenth month, with **long fasting**,
recite and chant this **sutra**,
and the **lower division’s Eight Scenic Deities** bind **one’s form (Gu Zhao)***,
**nurturing life’s roots (Sheng Gen)***.
The **True Essence (Zhen Jing)*** refines and transforms,
**ten thousand *qi*’s (Wan Qi)*** coalesce into **spirit (Jie Shen)***,
**revolving wheels in the Great Void (Wu Lian Tai Xiao)***,
**soaring through the Upper Purity (Yao You Shang Qing)***,
**a hundred generations rejoicing (Yi Shi Han Huan)***,
**vast calamities** all **extinguished (Hao Jie Qi Ling)**.

On the **Eight Festive Days (Ba Jie Zhi Ri)***,
recite and chant this **sutra**,
and the **Eight Scenic Deities**’ **spirit** merges,
**ascending to the Jade Capital (Chao Deng Yu Jing)***,
becoming **Upper Purity True Ones (Shang Qing Zhen Ren)**.

On the **day of one’s original fate (Ben Ming Zhi Ri)***,
recite and chant this **sutra**,
and the **Three Divisions’ Eight Scenic Deities (San Bu Ba Jing)***,
the **Twenty-Four True Ones (Er Shi Si Zhen)***,
**mingle and transmute as infants (Hun Bian Ying Er)***,
in **embroidered robes and silk skirts (Jin Yi Xiu Qun)***,
**seated in ranks within the Elixir Field (Lie Zu Ni Wan)***,
their **bodies**’ palace.
Their **souls and spirits** clear and rectified,
**ten thousand *qi*’s** eternally preserved.
**A hundred gates** undergo **refinement (Shou Lian)***,
their **bodies** radiant with light.
The **Three Realms** guard and escort,
the **Five Emperors** oversee their welcome.
**Ten thousand spirits** pay homage,
their names recorded in **Heaven**.
Their **cultivation complete**, their **virtue accomplished (Gong Man De Jiu)***,
they **fly to Upper Purity (Fei Sheng Shang Qing)**.

The **Dao**’s words:
*"On the **days of Daoic practice (Xing Dao Zhi Ri)***,
all must **bathe in fragrant waters (Xiang Tang Wu Yu)***,
**fast and enter the chamber (Zhai Jie Ru Shi)***,
facing east,
**knocking teeth thrice (Kou Chi)***—thirty-two times through—
**ascending to hear the Thirty-Two Heavens (Shang Wen San Shi Er Tian)***,
**bowing in heart thirty-two times (Xin Bai San Shi Er Guo)***,
closing eyes,
**quietly contemplating** one’s **self seated amid the Eight Colored Clouds’ *qi* (Ba Se Yun Qi)***,
**inner and outer** enveloped in **darkness (Yong Ming)***.
There appear:
**Azure Dragon (Qing Long)***, **White Tiger (Bai Hu)***, **Vermilion Bird (Zhu Que)***, **Dark Tortoise (Xuan Wu)***, **Lion (Shi Zi)***, and **White Crane (Bai He)***,
**arrayed on left and right (Luo Lie Zuo You)***.
The **Twenty-Four True Ones** come before **one’s form (Zhao Qian)***,
**sun and moon** casting **radiant light (Zhe Yue Zhao Ming)***,
**piercingly illuminating the chamber (Dong Fan Shi Nei)***,
**a circular halo forming at the neck (Xiang Sheng Yuan Xiang)***,
its **light reflecting the Ten Directions (Shu Guang Shi Fang)***.
Thus, **distinct and clear (Fen Ming)***."

The secret incantation proclaims:
*"Supreme Primordial Dao/Way, the Most High Dao Lord.*

**Summon forth** from within my body the **Three Five Officials of Merit**, the **left and right ministerial envoys**, the **attendant jade boys** bearing incense, the **speaking jade maidens**, the **Five Emperors’ direct talismans**, and the **direct-day incense officials**—each **thirty-two in number**—to **open the gates** as spoken.

**On this auspicious day of fasting and purity**, **reciting the sacred scriptures**, **boundless in salvific power**,
I **pray that my petition may ascend directly** before the **Supreme Most High Emperor of the Thirty-Two Heavens of the Primordial Origin**,
**completing the ritual**—**drawing qi through thirty-two passages**, facing east to recite the scripture.

**The Primordial Origin Scripture of Boundless Salvific Power (Upper Grade Marvelous Scripture)**
**The Primordial Cavernous Mystery Treasure Root Chapter**, the **Eight Scenery Gods’ Convergence (Upper Grade Marvelous First Section)**, the **Ten Circuits of Salvific Power**.

**Eight Sceneries in Hidden Rhyme**, **spontaneously merging and parting**.
**Imperial Qi, Primordial Truth**—**lofty and remote, high and august**.
**The origin of murky void**, **empty and luminous, the sacred essence**.
**Differentiation and coalescence forming shape**, **spreading to govern the hundred passes**.
**The Three Palaces arrayed**, **entwined in revolving loops**.
**Mingling transformations ascending to the highest realm**, **refining the essence-root**.

**No god lacks luminosity**, **no god lacks clarity**, **no god lacks manifestation**, **no god lacks completion**, **no god lacks salvific power**, **no god lacks birth**.
This is called **the Marvelous Extremity**, **the Sovereign of Heaven’s Center**.

**Jade Gate’s Bright Hall**, **flowing pearl elixir**.
**Ascending to the Peak of Splendor**, **towering over Kunlun**.
**Purple scriptures coiled like silk**, **radiant and surging**.
**Descending to the Central Yellow**, **the Vermilion Palace’s gate**.
**The navel’s hidden chamber**, **the jade-field of the celestial hall**.
**Eight Scenery divine qi**, **cyclically revolving**.

Within are:
**the Three Divisions of Eight Sceneries’ Twenty-Four True Gods**,
**the Lord of Void-Luminosity, Piercing Clarity, Serene Light**,
**the Southern Pole Great Emperor of Eternal Life**,
**the Eastern Pole Qinghua Emperor**,
**the World-Salvaging Marshal Great God**,
**the Benevolent Life Lord Han the Elder**,
**the Southern Celestial Registrar of Fate, Record-Keeper of Longevity, and Remover of Calamities**.

**Reviving the corpse, resurrecting the dead**, **boundless salvific power**.

**Today’s registration**—**all heavens attend the hall**.
**Eastern**—**Limitless First Scenery Heaven’s Void God-King**, **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, **boundless salvific power**.
**Southern**—**Limitless Second Scenery Heaven’s Seal God-King**, **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, **boundless salvific power**.
**Western**—**Limitless Third Scenery Heaven’s Luminous God-King**, **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, **boundless salvific power**.
**Northern**—**Limitless Fourth Scenery Heaven’s Mysterious God-King**, **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, **boundless salvific power**.
**Northeast**—**Limitless Fifth Scenery Heaven’s Talisman God-King**, **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, **boundless salvific power**.
**Southeast**—**Limitless Sixth Scenery Heaven’s Light God-King**, **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, **boundless salvific power**.
**Southwest**—**Limitless Seventh Scenery Heaven’s Maoling God-King**, **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, **boundless salvific power**.
**Northwest**—**Limitless Eighth Scenery Heaven’s True God-King**, **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, **boundless salvific power**.
**Upper**—**Limitless Three Divisions’ Total True Heaven’s Wisdom God-King**, **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, **boundless salvific power**.
**Lower**—**Limitless Three Divisions’ Divine Convergence Heaven’s Compliance God-King**, **Great Sage of Eternal Life**, **boundless salvific power**.
**The Ten Directions’ Ultimate True Three Divisions’ Eight Scenery God-Kings**, **Great Gods of Eternal Life and World-Salvation**.

**Together they ride the Cloud-Piercing Treasure Chariot of Splendor**, **jade-harnessed with crimson canopies and mist-wheels**, **drawn by the pure-spirited divine tigers and the profound-mystery dragons**.
**They bear the Primordial Dao’s banner**, **piercing the Scenery with vermilion flags**.
**Before them, the Three Celestial Hymns resound**, **behind them, the Five Augmented True Songs ascend**.
**Azure cranes and emerald phoenixes** **cry in harmony**—**high immortals clear the path**, **jade maidens guide the axle**.
**Ten thousand riders, ten thousand steeds**, **floating through the void**, **tilting light to return**.
**Mingling with human form**.

**The Primordial Sovereign, Great One**—**the Cavernous Palace’s Mysterious Realm**.
**Left hand holds the Five Registers**, **right grasps the Five Talismans**.
**Three revolutions, nine transformations**—**piercingly refining the murky void**.
**Responding to the Scenery’s summons**, **opening the eight regions**.
**Condensing and harmonizing qi**, **ascending beyond the Supreme Void**.
**The Great Demon commends**, **the Heavenly Sovereign grants the scripture**.
**Proclaiming to the Ten Extremes**, **the Cavern’s divine lords**.
**Liberating ancestral spirits**, **countless kalpas of submerged souls**,
**stripping away guilt-registers**, **scattering the roots of calamity**.
**Let there be any obstruction**, **let it be consumed by fierce flames**.
**Once ascended and salvaged**, **reaching even ten thousand generations above**.
**Forever exiting the Night Court**, **restoring form and spirit**.
**Universally receiving refinement**, **salvaged to the Southern Palace’s rank**.
**Recorded in the Vermilion Register**, **transfigured into an immortal**.
**The living body receives salvation**, **eternal across kalpas**.
**Flowing with the kalpas**, **aligned with Heaven’s years**.
**Forever salvaged from the Three Realms**, **the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships**,
**transcending the Three Worlds**, **adroit in Upper Clarity**.

**The Heaven of Upper Clarity**—**the Heavenly Emperor**, **Piercing Prosperity**, **the formless realm of Brahmanic conduct**.

**Eastern Eight Heavens**
**Yizhen Yuanci Heaven**, Emperor Jingjue overseeing the divine horn.
**Tongling Kaiji Heaven**, Emperor Tianxian’s serene void.
**Zhaosu Qinzhong Heaven**, Emperor Qingjia’s exhaustive mystery.
**Fuyuan Ganxu Heaven**, Emperor Daji’s rightful support.
**Yulü Xichang Heaven**, Emperor Shenggong’s beneficent canopy.
**Shende Yangzhen Heaven**, Emperor Yiche’s lofty carriage.
**Huangdu Lifang Heaven**, Emperor Shanhui’s returned sun.
**Shengzhi Pingyang Heaven**, Emperor Lingda’s luminous banner.

**Southern Eight Heavens**
**Yuli Jigong Heaven**, Emperor Daoxin’s ascended joy.
**Yuntao Subu Heaven**, Emperor Qigao’s non-alignment.
**Bazhen Qingming Jinghetian**, Emperor Xiaoyi’s reverent immortality.
**Huaji Chongyao Heaven**, Emperor Liechang’s true aspiration.
**Hedan Baonian Heaven**, Emperor Miaoxi’s supported corner.
**Donglu Chaohuang Heaven**, Emperor Jiewen’s discerning will.
**Bagao Jiling Heaven**, Emperor Kaiming’s salvific degree.
**Xuanfang Zhuyue Heaven**, Emperor Pudu’s celestial combat.

**Northern Eight Heavens**
**Xuandao Zhaoling Heaven**, Emperor Xunyu Fucheng’s reverent summons.
**Qiji Sihua Heaven**, Emperor Zhangyaodui’s luminous decree.
**Fan Guang Shenqing Heaven**, Emperor Yinxihongshen’s divine fusion.

**Eight Heavens of the North**
**Pizhen Gongqing Heaven**, Emperor Haoxiao Ziyu’s solemn homage.
**Xili Chongyong Heaven**, Emperor Duoshichen’s dutiful vigilance.
**Yinghua Chenggong Heaven**, Emperor Yutang Yunfan’s accomplished transformation.
**Biqian Naling Heaven**, Emperor Hunshu Jiuwang’s sovereign passage.
**Xiliang Xuming Heaven**, Emperor Zhongfangqi’s enlightened succession.
**Haiying Longgang Heaven**, Emperor Mengchangsheng’s enduring vigor.
**Xingjing Luoji Heaven**, Emperor Lidu Lining’s celestial alignment.
**Bashen Hejing Heaven**, Emperor Jiehuayaoling’s radiant union.

**Thirty-Two Heavens, Thirty-Two Emperors.**
The Heavens conceal their names.
The Heavens conceal their forms.
The central void is naturally illuminated.
The Heavens conceal their melodies—
the eight harmonies of the cosmos.
The eight noble harmonies, the eight divine harmonies,
the true kings of the eight harmonies,
the eight luminous spirits,
the divine convergence of the eight harmonies—
transforming into the Supreme Clarity.
The boundless mysteries, unfathomable depths.
The divine essence unfolds, universally enlightening heaven and man.

Today, rejoicing in the reception of enlightenment,
the divine realm becomes one—
the luminous essence, preserved without doubt,
ascending to the lofty immortals.
Golden visage, jade limbs,
unobstructed in the void,
clear perception untainted,
unimpeded guidance.

Piercing the cosmic flow, free from contrivance,
pure without turbidity,
spotless without defilement,
radiant and resplendent.

Illuminating the silent natural order,
the eight paths of the divine—
uniting these eight gates,
forming transformation into substance.

Silken robes of dragon-cloth,
divine refinement in perfection,
wandering the jade steps,
receiving office in the Eastern Palace.

Commanding the Three Officials,
forever extinguishing all malevolence,
severing the roots of birth,
blocking the gates of death.
Listed among the Supreme Mysteries,
the Three Provinces overseeing all—
no obstruction remains.

The Eastern Dipper governs calculations,
the Western Dipper records names,
the Northern Dipper judges death,
the Southern Dipper grants life,
the Central Dipper, the Great Chief—
overseeing all spirits.

The Azure Sovereign guards the soul,
piercing the luminous scene to attain truth.
The White Sovereign attends the spirit,
the splendid scene securing the abode.
The Vermilion Sovereign nourishes the *qi*,
the primal scene receiving illumination.
The Black Sovereign harmonizes the blood,
the enlightened scene clear and profound.
The Yellow Sovereign, the central master,
the unified scene arrayed in full.

The True Kings of the Five Heavens:
The Azure Heavenly True King—
the azure scene transforming into divinity.
The Vermilion Heavenly True King—
the crimson scene radiant with brilliance.
The White Heavenly True King—
the pure scene blending with the spirit.
The Black Heavenly True King—
the dark scene, still and deep.
The Yellow Heavenly True King—
the eight harmonies revolving in unity.
The Five Heavenly True Kings—
the source of ten thousand deities.

Flying drums and processions,
commanding the divine armies.
Banners and rhythmic beats,
wandering the boundless expanse.

Self-proclaimed as resplendent,
the Heavens’ functions unified.
The Celestial Degree bestows upon mortals,
strictly governing the Northern Underworld.
The Divine King receives command,
sweeping away all inauspiciousness.
The Divine Dragon suppresses poison,
the Heavenly Steed gallops with four hooves.
The Vanguard repels the false,
the Heavenly Marshal wields the banner.
Fires hurl ten thousand *li*,
bell-chimes resound in eight directions.
Dare any trespass—
blocked from ascending to the True Ones,
the golden axe strikes first,
the jade axe executes last.

Slaughtering the ghostly rebels,
wind and fire relentless,
thousands beheaded,
ten thousands dismembered.
No demon dares offend,
no ghost dares linger—
the Three Officials of the Northern Underworld
clearly inspect the ghostly encampments.
No concealment permitted,
the Golden Horse Inn reports,
universally proclaiming the endless—
all deities listen in accord.

The Three Realms’ Five Emperors
declare to the Supreme Clarity.
The True Sovereign’s jade decrees,
the mysterious transformations merging in darkness.
The cosmic *qi* circulates,
in the boundless void.
The upper scene is not color,
the lower scene is not the abyss,
the central scene is the Great Emptiness—
mysteriously uniting with nature.

The eight harmonies converge,
the Golden Vajra ascends the Heavens,
above and below the Heavens—
no darkness, no obscurity.
Formless, shadowless,
boundless, infinite.

Twenty-four True Ones,
cyclically arrayed in palaces.
When Heaven and Earth first formed,
the Divine Emperors concealed the Dragon.
The boundless Great *Dharma*,
vast without light.
The eight harmonies unfold the diagram,
the Three Sections spread out.
The Primordial Beginning stabilizes.
The Five Classics unfold.
The Red Script, Jade Characters,
the Eight Dragon威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威

The **First Chapter of the Eight Scenes Divine Harmony**—
*Expelling the Zoroastrian demons, the Ghostly Confucian evils dare not intrude.*

Within the throat, four scenes of the **Revolving Gods**—
*Revolving, hissing, the divine spirits.*
**Bin Yuan** and **Zi Ke**,
**Qing Qi** and **Bo Luo** the Lord.
**Tao Lan** and **Yi Xi** the Child,
*Piercing, entwined, their essence bound.*
They guard the hidden cycles,
*Divine harmony, pure and whole.*
Eons pass, yet they never fade—
*Endless ages, yet their joy remains.*

---

The **Second Chapter of the Eight Scenes Divine Harmony**—
*The High Lord rides the carved jade chariot,*
*Floating on the Azure Dragon’s celestial light.*
Feasting in the **Three Primordial Palaces**,
*With luminous days and radiant pupils.*
Within the middle realm, eight scenes arise,
*Guarding the birth-gates of life.*
If one preserves and upholds them,
*They ascend to the Jade Capital Peak.*
In the heart, four scenes reside—
**Huang Yin** and **Jing Fei** together.
*Glittering, linked with blessings,*
**Shi Nan** and **Meng Hui** attend.
**Wang Li** and **Lu Qu** depart,
*Guarding the Gates of Eternal Life.*
**Yang Hua** refines the spirit-soul,
*Securing the Mysterious Pass.*
Four scenes dwell within the gallbladder—
*Breathing, the Child Zhang Spirit.*
**Zhen Feng** subdues the demon,
*The Celestial Passage, Lord Yu’s Domain.*
**Can Hui** and **Yao Fang** arrive,
*Golden pitchers, jade cups in harmony.*
They pacify the **Heavenly Virtue Lord**,
*Forever banishing worldly calamities.*
The eight scenes merge as one,
*The Six Qi soar unchecked.*
They bestow the **Omen’s Command Scripture**,
*Endless ages without sorrow.*

---

The **Third Chapter of the Eight Scenes Divine Harmony**—
*The Sun-Chariot with cloud-banners,*
*Jade pendants and pearl ornaments.*
Seated in the Golden Gate,
*Pointing to the **Pang Sang** trees.*
The Twenty-Four True Ones,
*Play with the Sovereign’s wisdom.*
Soaring through the Celestial Mists,
*Treading the Flowery Hall.*
Below, the eight scenes—
*Their names are **Zhuang** and **Qiang**.*
They give birth to all living things,
*Weighing the **Dou** and the **Gang**.*
Within the kidneys, four scenes—
*The Dark True Great Spirit.*
**Mao Mao**, **Chi Chi**,
*Purple Return aids the True One.*
**Yue Nu** descends from the clouds,
*The Four Scenes’ True Persons.*
They guard the Omen, nurture the infant,
*Preserving Heaven’s eternal life.*
In the bladder, four scenes—
**Gong Shu** and **Tian Meng** reside.
*Towering, their light illusory,*
*The Immortal Ke extends his path.*
**Xiong Yuan** follows the **Yang**,
*The Cloud Ropes connect within.*
The Pure Palace knows no defilement,
*Dispelling ghosts and demonic harm.*
The Three Sections, eight scenes,
*Twenty-Four Youths in brocade and silk,*
Dwelling in the Divine Hall,
*United as one, flying high at dawn.*
Sing this song, and the **Xian Gong** responds—
*The Dao’s path is boundless, none can exhaust it.*
The Omen can embody it.
*Riding the Azure Dragon’s reins.*

This is above the **Three Realms**,
*Within the Flying Void,*
The **True King’s Song of Harmony**—
*Its melody echoes the Cavernous Chapters.*
Recite it a hundred times,
*And one attains the Southern Palace.*
Recite it a thousand times,
*The True King comes to welcome.*
Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao,
*Ascending to the Supreme Void,*
*Crossing the Three Realms,*
*Ascending to the Immortal’s Court.*
Hearing the Sacred Sound,
*The True King reveres the form,*
*Commanding the Earth Spirits.*
They attend, escorting, welcoming.
*Emerging from the Earth’s Gate,*
Free from the Five Torments and Eight Hardships,
*The Seven Ancestors ascend,*
Forever parted from the Ghostly Officials,
*The Soul passes the Vermilion Ridge,*
*Refined anew in life.*
This is called **Limitless Salvation**,
*Universal Liberation without end.*

There are **Secret Celestial Scriptures**,
*Which all the Heavens hold in reverence.*
To reveal them carelessly invites the **Hell Realms**,
*And the **Seven Ancestral Uncles** descend.*
The Dao says:
*These two chapters are the voices of the Heavenly Sovereigns*
*And the hidden melodies of the Eight Scenes Divine Kings.*
If one chants and sings them,
*The hundred spirits merge,*
*The eight scenes rejoice as one,*
*Embracing the Spirit to become True,*
*The body sprouts wings—*
*These are the words of the Great Brahman,*
*Not the common speech of mortals.*
Without melodic grace,
Without ornate tunes,
*Thus called profound and elusive,*
*Difficult to fathom.*

Treasured by the Highest,
*Sealed within the Eastern Hall of the Jade Pure Palace,*
*In the Celestial Chamber of the Jade Court.*
The Dao Lord governs below,
*Transmitting the teachings abroad.*
If a perfected one brings gold and jade,
*With a sincere heart,*
And according to the ancient rites,
*Pledges allegiance to the Celestial Mists,*
Then the scripture shall be granted.

The Dao says:
*When Heaven and Earth’s cycles falter,*
*The Sun and Moon, the Five Stars wane and wax,*
*The most sacred gods rest or decline,*
*The shallow scholars suffer ailments.*
Should such calamities arise,
*All who share the same breath must unite in fasting,*
*Offer incense at the six hours,*
*Turn the scripture ten times,*
*And virtue shall descend,*
*Dissolving all ill omens.*
The limitless text,
*Universally liberates without end.*

The Dao says:
*If the unenlightened are shallow in the Dao,*
*Or their Immortal rank is incomplete,*
*And their fate is to perish in the **Great Yin**,*
At the moment of passing,
*Let the perfected among them offer incense,*
*Recite the scripture ten times,*
*And conduct the corpse according to the rites.*
Then the eight scenes shall descend,
*The True Spirits merge,*
*Left flying, right crouching,*
*The Spirit moves through the Qi Valley,*
*Now merging, now separating,*
*The scenes and spirits blend in darkness,*
*The decayed are renewed,*
*The fallen rise anew,*
*The soul ascends directly to the Southern Palace,*
*According to their merit,*
*And on that very day, they are reborn.*
The Wheel of Rebirth brings no confusion,
*And one attains Immortality.*

The Dao says:
*When Heaven and Earth’s cycles end,*
*The stars shift their courses,*
*The Sun and Moon lose their eclipses,*
*The four seasons fall out of order,*
*Yin and Yang grow unbalanced,*
*Disasters plague the lands,*
*Pestilence spreads,*
*The people perish,*
*Teachers and friends meet untimely ends,*
*And the learned suffer misfortune—*
*Then too, they must fast,*
*Offer incense, and recite the scripture.*
For fasting and recitation of scripture
*Are deeds of great merit.*
Above, they dispel celestial calamities,
*Protecting the Emperor’s reign.*
Below, they avert poisonous harm,
*Delivering the people.*
Life and death depend on it—
*Their blessings are boundless.*
Thus it is said:
*The limitless, universally liberates Heaven and Man.*

The Dao says:
*Whoever possesses this scripture*
*Can act as Heaven’s Emperor,*
*Or the people’s sovereign.*
On days of disaster,
*Let them resolve to fast,*
*Burn incense,*
*And recite the scripture ten times.*
All the Heavens shall record their names,
*Ten thousand spirits attend as guards,*
*And the perfected shall be ranked among the Holy Ones*
*As ministers of the Golden Gate.*
The Heavens record every deed and sin,
*Without the slightest omission.*
Even the **True Kings of Heaven** shall recommend you,
*And those who attain the Dao shall truly comprehend these sacred words.*

**The Hidden Speech of the Great Brahman in the Heavens**
*Composed by the Dao Lord,*
*From the **Elemental Beginning’s Sacred Book**—*
*The Inner Chapters of the Eight Scenes Divine Harmony.*
**The Eastern Eight Heavens.**

**The Hidden Speech of the Great Brahman in the Heavens**
*Composed by the Dao Lord,*
*From the **Elemental Beginning’s Sacred Book**—*
*The Inner Chapters of the Eight Scenes Divine Harmony.*

**The Southern Eight Heavens:**
*Shame is made clear by rules,*
*And the waves of the outer realm are bound.*
*Great is the transformation of Hongke,*
*And the path unfolds in its utmost splendor.*
*Brightly the rivers display their virtue,*
*And the Comber of the North reveals its purity.*
*The Hall of the Spirit’s embrace is vast,*
*And the Blessed One cherishes the Jade Seat.*
*Lofty evaluations subdue the demons,*
*And the steps lead to the Exalted Preceptor.*
*Following the performance, the feet are steadied,*
*And the joy of Du’s frequent assembly is realized.*
*Boundless rivers echo with the Hongsi lineage,*
*And the depths of Xu conceal the urgent demons.*
*Paying respects at the Gate of the Pass,*
*One leads to the Immortals,*
*And the descent is met with harmonious grace.*

**The Western Eight Heavens:**
*Wuyian welcomes the realm,*
*And offers up the radiance to the Weifang.*
*Calm is the order of the Shizhu,*
*And the grievances of Qingji are memorialized.*
*Holding the shining Yuelu,*
*Inspired by the marvelous light of Na.*
*The Buqian Secret Guest is concealed,*
*And the Ninggu extreme excellence is manifest.*
*Obstructed by the Binye capital,*
*The Qin Gong beholds the resolute Just.*
*Overshadowed and distant, the flames gather,*
*And the Delphic Ru Hang soars.*
*The Zhumu Huanjun praises the ancient,*
*And the Zhi Ji Qiaolun fulfills the loyal and filial.*
*Bright is the faithfulness of the ancient,*
*And the worthy are gathered in the Steep Group.*

**The Northern Eight Heavens:**
*Bibin’s artistry is beside the rules,*
*And the Zhanren’s warmth is like the Wendi.*
*Extending the search to the Pimi,*
*And the depths of Yan are strict with the Zhan.*
*Silent are the forms that lean upon the nurturing,*
*And the subtle returns to the source of Liao.*
*The Throughway’s seclusion reaches the summit of Xiao,*
*And the Weighted One stands with the Spirit’s following.*
*The Ronghe teems with vitality,*
*And the Jade Spirits fly in the Tu.*
*The Sliding Whirlpools aid the Qiu,*
*And the Straight One fills the Qiniu.*
*Brief is the stillness of the Bian,*
*And the Zhenxuan comes with empty grace.*
*The leisurely clarity descends to the Ding,*
*And the Zheyan bows to the Fu.*

*The Dao speaks: These are the Hidden Speech of the Great Brahman,*
*The boundless sounds of the Heavens.*
*Engraved in the old texts of the Dragon Mountain’s Northern Ridge,*
*To harmonize the Three Primordials,*
*And establish the school of the Perfected.*

*The High Immortal True Person*
*All engraved and recited with reverence,*
*To exchange with the Eight Scenes’ Gods.*

*The True Qi spreads throughout the Heavens,*
*Descending to the mortal world,*
*Where the Immortal Officials set their jade tablets,*
*The Jade Maidens offer incense,*
*And the spirits are joyfully summoned.*
*Calamities and misfortunes cannot approach.*

*The characters are all broad and long, a yard in measure.*
*The True Person of the Heavens once inscribed these words,*
*To establish the correct sounds.*

*Whoever knows these sounds*
*And can fast while reciting them,*
*The Heavens shall dispatch the Flying Immortals and Jade Boys,*
*The Great Gods of the Eight Scenes,*
*To observe their bodies,*
*Record their merits and labors,*
*And report them to the Heavens,*
*Where the Ten Thousand Spirits bow in worship,*
*The Earthly Spirits attend at the gate,*
*The Great Function True King*
*Recommends the Perfected to the Eight Scenes,*
*And the Dao is fully realized,*
*Wandering through the Three Realms,*
*Ascending to the Golden Gate.*

*This sound repels all obstacles,*
*Dispels all calamities,*
*Rescues all beings,*
*Achieves all ends—*
*The natural sounds of the True Person of the Heavens.*
*Thus, recitation brings the Heavens’ observation,*
*The Eight Scenes’ distant descent,*
*The Ten Thousand Spirits’ worship.*
*The Three Realms attend at the veranda,*
*The spirits gather and bow their heads,*
*The ghostly essences perish of their own accord,*
*And the **Línláng** resounds with brilliance,*
*The Ten Directions are cleansed in solemnity,*
*The rivers and seas fall silent,*
*The mountains and hills swallow the smoke,*
*The Ten Thousand Spirits tremble and submit,*
*Summoning the gathered Immortals,*
*The Heavens are free of noxious vapors,*
*The Earth is free of demonic dust,*
*The darkness is illuminated with wisdom,*
*And the boundless virtue is profound indeed.*

**The Seventh Chapter: Removing Noxious Influences**

*The Dao speaks thus:*
*Once, within the Pure and Mysterious Heaven of the Northern Celestial Realm,*
*On the peerless Miao-bao Flowerland of the Great Kui-luo,*
*I received the Boundless Supreme Degree of Humanity from the Original Beginning.*

*Within the Mysterious and Wondrous Heaven,*
*There is the Supreme Void Heaven of Unsurpassed Constant Abiding,*
*Whose Heavenly Sovereign is named*
*The Overarching Inspector of Ghosts and Spirits,*
*Residing in His palace.*

*In contemplation of the Dao’s causes and conditions,*
*I declared: "I cultivate merit,*
*Ascend to the rank of Heavenly Sovereign,*
*And dwell without transference across realms."*

*This central world of the Northern Celestial Realm*
*Is in communion with all ten directions,*
*And all the lands of mighty spirits and ghosts beneath the Heavens*
*Are my domains and subjects.*

*By virtue of my merit,*
*My divine powers extend universally,*
*Suppressing demonic offspring,*
*And I take refuge in the Three Pure Ones.*
