The **Daoist immortal** residing here in **Yujing** disperses into five forms, manifesting countless divine beings.

Now, dwelling in this realm, I behold the **Ten Directions of the Boundless World**, infinite beings all reciting the **essentials of the Dao**, comprehending the ultimate truth, and showing the **Path of Mysterious Clarity**.

The heaven where you dwell reaches upward to the **Colorless Realm**, descends to the **Kunlun Mountains**, extends to the **Northern Platform**, the **Dark Peaks**, and the **Ghostly Metropolis**—all under my dominion. The **Northern Celestial Spirits** bow down to the **Yinlu Underworld**, near the **Sea’s End**, and within human realms, their **interwoven connections** and **erratic movements** bring foulness and filth that cannot be endured. They prey upon the **Six Celestial Realms** and the **Eight Directions’ Ghosts and Spirits**, slaughtering and devouring all peoples, cutting short their natural lifespan and inflicting untimely deaths.

In the **Three Primordial Years** of your life, at the **limits of fate and destiny**, the **Yinlu Underworld’s officials** conspire, and the **Ghostly Judges** decree misfortune. They fabricate calamities and afflictions—various torments and punishments—that bring **the cries of summoning souls** and **the lamentations of the dying**, unceasing to the ears.

Seeing these sufferings, my own body entangled in misfortune, I now wish to descend to that heaven and preach the **Law of Liberation** to mortals.

You, born from the **Empty Void**, occupy this celestial station yet do not understand the **subtle, profound, and vast Dao**. I, the **Wondrous Formless Heavenly Sovereign**, gave birth to the **Three Qi**, the **Three Treasures**, and the **Three Sovereigns**, creating the **Chaos of Primordial Darkness**, distinguishing the **Ten Thousand Heavens**, and establishing imperial courts in order. I made **the Three Sovereigns** soar in unity, and the **Thirty-six Thousand Celestial Beings** shine like the sun and moon in one moment—this is my doing.

Now, descending, I transform into the **Great Primordial Chaos of Jade**, residing beneath the **Jade-Canopied Glorious Imperial Hall**, within the **Purple Weave Enclosure**, known as the **Great Emperor of the Northern Pole**. I wear **Dragon Robes of Mysterious Splendor**, with **pendant sashes and grand headgear**, twelve **Primordial Officials** at my side, **Thunderer and Lightning Lord** stationed beside me, thirty-six generals guarding my rear, and five marshals and four **Celestial Virtues** leading my procession.

At the **Dawn of Crimson Clarity**, I became the **Divine Lord of Upper Purity**. After the **Great Peace**, I was the **Great Emperor of Northern Yin**. With the **world pacified**, I ascended to **Central Heaven**, the **Purple Extremity Court**, where all beings in the **Ten Directions** gaze upon me unmoving—the **Pivot of the Celestial Axis**.

Yet all forms are in motion; only the **Formless remains still**. The **Northern Pole Star** stands apart from the others, threefold in its wonders. The **Central Void** is the **Northern Dipper**, the **True Form of the Heavenly Sovereign**. Gazing upon it, its **radiance gleams**, the five stars casting their light, luminous and bright—this is the **Imperial Seat**. But one sees only the seat; how could one hastily visit its sovereign?

This **Great Emperor of the Northern Pole** commands all **ghosts and spirits of the Three Realms**, the myriad gods and thousand spirits—all bow their heads in supplication. The **Five Sacred Mountains and Four Great Rivers**, the **spirits of earth and water**, all kneel in reverence, beseeching blessings for **water, drought, wind, and rain**.

This **Northern Pole Emperor** is my **fifth manifestation**, seated in the **Supreme Celestial Authority**, the **Jade Emperor** as my ancestor, establishing the **Primordial Element of the Great Void**. In the **Nine Palaces**, I am called the **Central Yellow Sovereign**, wearing a **purple brocade robe**, girdled with **twelve golden fire bells of the Celestial Streams**, appearing as a **baby**, holding the **Seven Primordials**, and exhaling **azure breath**.

Now, I dwell beneath the **Jade-Canopied Glorious Imperial Hall** in the **Central Heaven**, riding the **Big Dipper’s Celestial Chariot**, ascending the **Three Platforms**, taking my place in the **Great Horn**, and sitting in the **Bright Hall**. Seven attendants in **purple embroidered robes** stand beside me—the **Seven Stars of the Big Dipper’s essence**.

You should go there and petition me to descend to this **heavenly palace**, so that I may hear the **essentials of the Dao**. Thus, the **Heavenly Sovereign** adjusts his crown and holds his **ceremonial jade tablet**, kneeling in reverence. I now humbly request the **Northern Pole Emperor** to descend to this **heavenly court**, hoping to hear the **Great Law**.

Then, with the **Heavenly Assembly**, we take leave of **Primordial Sovereign**, descending to the **Central Yellow Purple Court**, beneath the **Jade-Canopied Glorious Imperial Hall**. The **True Officials** guide us forward, the **Law Enforcers** follow behind, directly reaching the **Northern Pole Emperor’s Presence**. We fully recount the matters above, kneeling in reverence and offering obeisance, our pleas sincere and heartfelt, tears streaming down.

The **Emperor** clad in **Mysterious Dragon Robes** descends and speaks: *"I ascend to serve **Primordial Sovereign** in spreading the **Supreme Teaching**; I shall grant this request."*

Thus, the **Heavenly Sovereign** shines his light, gazing upon the **Northern Celestial Spirits**, the **Pure Void of the Supreme Heaven**, and the **Imperial Hall within the Central Heaven’s Jewel**. Within the **Three Qi’s Radiant Hall**, as I prepare to ascend the **Law Seat** and deliver this **Scripture**, I circle ten times to summon the **Ten Directions**. Then, the **Five Celestial Sovereigns**, the **Seven Primordial Lords**, the **Highest Saints**, the **True Persons of the Void**, and countless others without number, ride the **void** and arrive.

**Rainbow clouds** span the heavens, **luminous vapors** spread in all directions. The **Jade Platform’s Phoenix Chariot** descends, **feathered scepters and golden banners** unfurling. The **treasures of myriad hues** gather, **dense and vibrant**, their **radiance piercing the void**. For seven days and seven nights, the **gods and spirits of all heavens**, the **celestial beings of sun and moon**, the **star spirits and cloud generals** pause their wheels. The **rigid winds** harmonize, **bright light** cascades forth, and the **mountains, rivers, forests, and trees** all turn the color of jade. The earth shifts to **emerald glass**, soft and **glowing with pristine clarity**. All spirits attend the seat in awe.

The **Northern Pole Emperor** first faces **Yujing**, bowing his heart in reverence to **Primordial Sovereign**, with utmost respect. Then, he ascends the **Floating Five-Colored Dragon Platform** of the **Void**.

After reciting the **Scripture once**, the **Heavenly Saints** simultaneously declare its excellence. At that moment, all men and women in the land hear the **Northern Pole Emperor** proclaim the **Mysterious Decrees**, countless beings liberated, and the **Seven Stars** expound the **Supreme Essentials of the Dao**.

After reciting the **Scripture twice**, the **Seven Stars** shine brightly, and the **Mysterious Talismans** appear in the void.

After reciting the **Scripture thrice**, the **Great Axe cleaves the heavens**, mountains split and stones fracture.

After reciting the **Scripture four times**, the **Heaven and Earth align in harmony**, the **four seas purified**.

After reciting the **Scripture five times**, **celestial music fills the void**, and **sacred incense drifts afar**.

After reciting the **Scripture six times**, the **heavenly rainbow encircles all**, forming a bridge across the void.

After reciting the **Scripture seven times**, the **Seven True Ones descend to observe**, and the **demonic essences lose their courage**.

After reciting the **Scripture eight times**, the **Ghostly Sovereign flees in terror**, and the **ten thousand demons are crushed**.

After reciting the **Scripture nine times**, the **heavens pour sweet dew**, and **pearls scatter like rain**.

After reciting the **Scripture ten times**, the **ghosts and spirits awaken to the Dao**, the **dark and hidden beings ascend to immortality**. At that time, all men and women in the land—without exception—turn their hearts toward the **Way**, receiving protection and attaining **eternal life**.

The **Dao/Way** speaks: At that time, the **Northern Pole Sovereign** recites the **Scripture** once, and the **Boundless Infinite** of the Eastern **Heavenly Dipper** and the **Seven Stars** dispatch the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith** (祆大神, *Qián Dàshén*), along with the **Unrestrained Host** (無鞅之眾, *Wúyáng Zhī Zhòng*), floating through the void to arrive.

After reciting the **Scripture** twice, the **Boundless Infinite** of the Southern **Heavenly Dipper** and the **Seven Stars** dispatch the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith**, along with the **Unrestrained Host**, floating through the void to arrive.

After reciting the **Scripture** three times, the **Boundless Infinite** of the Western **Heavenly Dipper** and the **Seven Stars** dispatch the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith**, along with the **Unrestrained Host**, floating through the void to arrive.

After reciting the **Scripture** four times, the **Boundless Infinite** of the Northern **Heavenly Dipper** and the **Seven Stars** dispatch the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith**, along with the **Unrestrained Host**, floating through the void to arrive.

After reciting the **Scripture** five times, the **Boundless Infinite** of the **Ghostly Dipper** in the Northeast and the **Seven Stars** dispatch the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith**, along with the **Unrestrained Host**, floating through the void to arrive.

After reciting the **Scripture** six times, the **Boundless Infinite** of the **Yang Dipper** in the Southeast and the **Seven Stars** dispatch the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith**, along with the **Unrestrained Host**, floating through the void to arrive.

After reciting the **Scripture** seven times, the **Boundless Infinite** of the **Retreating Dipper** in the Southwest and the **Seven Stars** dispatch the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith**, along with the **Unrestrained Host**, floating through the void to arrive.

After reciting the **Scripture** eight times, the **Boundless Infinite** of the **Ascending Dipper** in the Northwest and the **Seven Stars** dispatch the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith**, along with the **Unrestrained Host**, floating through the void to arrive.

After reciting the **Scripture** nine times, the **Boundless Infinite** of the **Flying Dipper** in the Upper Realm and the **Seven Stars** dispatch the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith**, along with the **Unrestrained Host**, floating through the void to arrive.

After reciting the **Scripture** ten times, the **Boundless Infinite** of the **Descending Dipper** in the Lower Realm and the **Seven Stars** dispatch the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith**, along with the **Unrestrained Host**, floating through the void to arrive.

When the tenfold recitation is complete, the **Ten Directions** are fulfilled.
The **Boundless Infinite** of the **Heavenly True One** (天真, *Tiānzhēn*), with **Limitless Virtue/Power** (無量, *Wúliàng*), subdues the **demons** and dispatches the **Great God of the Zoroastrian Faith**, all arriving together at once. All men and women in the land turn their hearts toward the **Dao/Way** and bow in reverence.

Those who come forth each vow to eliminate the accumulated suffering of countless past lives, wherein their hearts were not pure, defiled by impure thoughts. The **Three Corpses** (三尸, *Sānshī*) roam unrestrained, the **Seven Spirits** (七魄, *Qībò*) envy and harm, and they consort with **ghostly qi** (鬼氣, *Guǐqì*), along with all manner of **demons**.

Thus, they suffer from **dharma afflictions**, fail to see the **Way** clearly, and though dwelling in the realm of mortals and gods, they fall into the cycle of rebirth.
Even those who attain the **Sages’ Stages** (證位, *Zhèngwèi*) and temporarily ascend the **True Path** (真階, *Zhēnjiē*) are ensnared by the **demonic essences** entering their hearts, the **Zoroastrian trials** (祆試, *Qiánshì*) causing confusion, their thoughts stirring dust, and their **karmic connections** (攴缘, *Qīyuán*) clinging to false paths, generating countless causes and performing myriad deeds.

Now, hearing the **Northern Pole Sovereign** proclaim the **Seven Stars’ Method** of dispelling **Zoroastrian evils** and protecting the **True**, opening the obscured eyes of the deluded, traversing the **Path of Celestial Clarity** (玄清路, *Xuánqīng Lù*), and aspiring to the **Highest True Ones** (高真品, *Gāozhēn Pǐn*), they are filled with shame and prostrate in homage. The **Unrestrained Host** stands in attendance, listening with reverence.

Thus, the **Northern Pole Sovereign** gazes upward to the heavens and downward to the earth, observing all things under the sun, summoning **Limitless Virtue/Power** (無量心, *Wúliàngxīn*), awakening the **Soul-Treasury Wisdom** (靈寶慧, *Língbǎo Huì*), and universally instructing the assembly:

Before the **Primordial Origin** (元始, *Yuánshǐ*) was born, the void of eons left no trace. When the **Chaos of Non-Differentiation** (混沌, *Hùndùn*) was cleft, the **Seven Orifices** (七窍, *Qīqiào*) opened.

The grand became the **Sun and Moon** (日月, *Rìyuè*), the subtle became the **stars** (星辰, *Xīngchén*). The **Sun, Moon, and Five Stars** (日月五星, *Rìyuè Wǔxīng*), collectively called the **Seven Primordials** (七元, *Qīyuán*), are aligned with the **Northern Dipper** (北斗, *Běidǒu*).

The **Northern Dipper’s Twelve Stars** (北斗十二星, *Běidǒu Shíèr Xīng*), with five as the **Hidden Luminaries** (隱曜, *Yǐnyào*), contain within the **Mouth of the Dipper** (斗口, *Dǒukǒu*) the **Twenty-Four Jade Sovereigns** (二十四玉皇, *Èrshísì Yùhuáng*), whose radiance is not visible—only the **Seven Luminaries** (七曜, *Qīyào*) shine brightly, illuminating the **Ten Directions**.

The **essences of the Seven Stars** reside within the **Seven Orifices** of humans.
Their **spirits** also divide, manifesting as **pupils** in the eyes, granting the power of sight, hearing, speech, and smell, with all knowledge derived therefrom.

The **assisting stars’ essences** (辅弼二星, *Fǔbì Èr Xīng*) descend into the **eyes’ pupils** (目中瞳子, *Mùzhōng Tóngzǐ*).
The **Seven Stars’ spirits** possess both **yin-essence** (陰魄, *Yīnbò*) and **yang-soul** (陽魂, *Yánghún*), as well as the **essence of the True Star**.

Within the **Dipper’s Method of Dispelling Zoroastrians** (斗中除祆, *Dǒuzhōng Chúqián*), there are the **Five Marshals** (五帥, *Wǔshuài*), the **Four Virtues/Powers** (四德, *Sìdé*), the **Seven Thousand Divine Generals** (七千神將, *Qīqiān Shénjiàng*), the **Heavenly Ganges and River Bosses** (天罡河魁, *Tiāngāng Hékuí*), the **Great Slayer and Great Horn** (大殺大角, *Dàshā Dàjiǎo*), who stand resolute in the **Dipper’s Array** (豁落立斗, *Huòlà Lìdǒu*), clad in **black robes of primordial darkness** (黑衣玄冥, *Hēiyī Xuānmíng*), and the **Seven Slayer Spirits** (七殺之神, *Qīshā Zhīshén*), who extinguish **malevolent Zoroastrian demons** (凶祆, *Xiōngqián*) and sweep away **wandering malevolent spirits** (魔鬼, *Móguǐ*).

If one can **unify their heart** (齊心, *Jíxīn*) and **observe the fast** (修齋, *Xiūzhāi*), adorn themselves with **talismans and amulets** (服佩符箓, *Fúbèi Fúlù*), and **recite prayers with earnest devotion** (奏告懇祝, *Zòugào Kěnzhù*), then the **Seven Stars’ Great Gods** descend to that person’s dwelling, and the **Zoroastrian evils** are immediately dispelled.

If one can **inquire into the Dao’s essence** (稽索道要, *Jīsuǒ Dàoyào*) and **strive diligently for purity** (勤企止清, *Qínqǐ Zhǐqīng*), the **Seven Stars’ Gods** teach them the **Path to Ascension**, allowing them to **fly upward and become Immortals** (飛升神仙, *Fēishēng Shénxiān*), with the **Seven Ancestors** (七祖, *Qīzǔ*) guiding their **transformation into the Natural** (炼化自然, *Liànhuà Zìrán*).

The **Seven Stars’ essences**, the **Three Celestial Lights** (三辰, *Sānchén*), the **Five Dippers**, and the **Nine Palaces/Eight Trigrams** (九宮八卦, *Jiǔgōng Bāguà*) all reside within the **Sage’s heart**.

The **Seven Stars’ descending divine light** (降神, *Jiàngshén*) fills the **inner chambers** (華房, *Huáráng*), where the **inch of the heart** (方寸, *Fāngcùn*) contains **Seven Sanctums** (七室, *Qīshì*), subtle and profound secrets that must not be divulged.

Those who have already ascended to the **Highest True Path** (上真, *Shàngzhēn*) should not again engage in these practices.

At that moment, within the **Assembly of the Law** (法會, *Fǎhuì*), the **Northern Pole Sovereign** completes the recitation of the **Scripture**, and the **True Ones** oversee and bestow upon me. At that time, joy and celebration are beyond expression.

The **Law’s rites** are now fully known, and the **Ten Thousand Worlds** return to their proper order. In an instant, all sound fades into silence.

At that time, **heavenly beings and mortals** encountering the **Scripture and the Law** universally receive salvation and protection, preserving their **original nature** (本年, *Běnián*) and suffering no harm.

The **Seven Stars’ descending light** (垂光, *Chuíláng*) illuminates their **true forms** (真形, *Zhēnxíng*), internally generating the **Celestial Elixir** (玄丹, *Xuándān*), and externally dispelling the **Zoroastrian essences** (祆精, *Qiánjīng*). All turn toward the **Dao/Way** and follow its teachings with devotion.

They dispel **demons**, **illusions**, **delusions**, **cravings**, **attachment**, **perceptions**, **acquisitions**, **doubts**, and **evil**.
Their words align with the **Heavenly Law** (天律, *Tiānlù*), and their speech contains no falsehood. Their hearts are unified in **compassionate love** (慈愛, *Cí’ài*), and though their **bones differ**, they are bound as kin. The **land is secure**, the people prosperous, and they rejoice in **Great Peace**.

The **Scripture** originates from the **Assembly of the Law**, and the **entire land** follows the **Dao/Way**.
Those who have **sincere aspiration** (至心, *Zhìxīn*) and **reverently uphold** (宗奉, *Zōngfèng*) the teachings will all attain **world-transcendence** (度世, *Duòshì*).

The **Dao/Way** speaks: The names mentioned in the **Northern Pole Sovereign’s** recitation of the **Scripture** are all the **Hidden Titles** (隱韵, *Yǐnyùn*) of the **Seven Stars’ Celestial Array** (七星天中列帝, *Qīxīng Tiānzhōng Lièdì*), the **concealed sounds** of the **Northern Sovereign**, and the **secret names** of the **Hundred Gods** (百神, *Bǎishén*), not the common words of the world.

The **Supreme Sage** (上聖, *Shàngshèng*), having already become a **True Person** (真人, *Zhēnrén*), and **penetrating the Mysteries** (通玄究微, *Tōngxuán Jiūwēi*), knows all its chapters. When recited **ten times**, the **Eight Celestial Thunders** (八威, *Bāwēi*) march their armies, the **Five Heavens** (五天, *Wǔtiān*) hurl their flames, the **demon kings** (魔王, *Mówáng*) take warning in their ranks, the **star generals** (星使, *Xīngshǐ*) ride their celestial chariots, and a **myriad-hosted army** (甲卒億萬, *Jiǎzú Yìwàn*) beheads the **evil** and dispels the **Zoroastrian demons**, burning the **celestial clouds** (烧霞, *Shāoxiá*) and scorching the void (燎空, *Liàokōng*), with the **golden axe** (金鉞, *Jīnyuè*) marking the light. The **hosts of demons** are bound in form, their **essences extinguished**, the **returning corpses** (回尸, *Huíshī*) rise from death, and the **white bones** (白骨, *Báigǔ*) are restored to life.

The **scholars of profound learning** (至學之士, *Zhìxué Zhīshì*), when reciting the **Scripture** ten times, will see the **Seven Primordials** descend in truth, the **Three Realms** bow in homage, the **demonic essences** lose their power, and the **ghostly Zoroastrian demons** be extinguished. They will save the dying and bring life to the departed, severing rebirth and attaining existence.

Thus it is that scholars, with reverent recitation of this profound text,
spread the **Primordial Warrior’s** *qi*, slaughtering and purifying the **Zoroastrian demons**,
sweeping away defiled *qi*, embodying the **Perfect Truth**,
and summoning dominion over the ten directions.
Though their might does not yet govern the **Celestial Mandate**,
their **virtue** suffices to subdue the **Earthly Spirits**,
binding the **demonic essences**—yet only to repel death,
not to restore life.
Light recitation brings calamity to body and wealth,
while reverent offerings and homage bring prosperity to the household,
generation after generation, flourishing and radiant.
Bound to the **auspicious causes**, they escape all misfortune,
and the **Divine Ones** guard their gates.

This **Scripture** is most exalted, unmatched in the **Jade Capital**,
its salvific power boundless, the **root of ten thousand Dao**.
Its grandeur is vast and its **virtue** profound.
The **Way** declares:
*"Whoever recites this Scripture ten times,*
*the **Celestial Steed** of the **Central Dipper** descends,*
*the **Seven Stars’ Great Deities** arrive,*
*and the **Heavenly Emperor’s Envoys** gather,*
*to eradicate the **Zoroastrian demons**,*
*drive away all inauspiciousness,*
*and guide the countless ancestral souls,*
*the tormented spirits,*
*all receiving salvation and ascending to the **Vermilion Palace**.*
*This spans nine years.*
*Those who undergo transformation are reborn,*
*becoming noble beings.*
*Through reciting this Scripture,*
*the body’s **Divine Essence** aligns,*
*the *qi* remains untainted,*
*and the **Mysterious Hall** opens its gates,*
*the **Spirit-Soul** transcends,*
*unbound by the **Dark Realms**.*

*Yet those who earnestly study this Scripture,*
*when their merit is complete and **virtue** fulfilled,*
*all attain **Divine Immortality**,*
*ascending to the **Golden Gate**,*
*wandering the **Jade Capital of the Dark**.*

*The **Noble Scholars** who practice this Scripture*
*see the **Seven True Ones** ascending to the **Celestial Abode**,*
*reaching the **Mystic Extremes of Void and Eternity**,*
*traversing the **Three Revolutions**,*
*treading the **Starry Paths**,*
*gulping clouds and swallowing dew.*
*The **Spirit-Soul and Corporeal Essence** soar together,*
*transforming into the **Supreme Clarity**,*
*their lifespan extending as the Heavens’—*
*all receiving salvation,*
*ascending to the **Southern Palace**.*

*Mortals who recite it*
*bow to the **Northern Dipper**,*
*invite the **Divine Maiden** to sit,*
*with winds bearing her and rains welcoming,*

*Capturing ghosts and searching corpses,*
*they prolong life and years,*
*all attaining the **Method of Corporeal Ascension**.*
*Though the **Spirit-Soul** may temporarily vanish,*
*they avoid the **Underworld**,*
*immediately returning to form,*
*wandering the **Great Void**.*

*This Scripture is subtle and wondrous,*
*its salvific power boundless,*
*all **Heavenly Beings and mortals** rejoicing in its blessings.*
*Infinite blessings bestow life and death’s grace.*
*Treasured by the Heavens, it is not passed to the world below.*
*Only the **Noble Ones**, bearing gold and jewels with sincere devotion,*
*pledge to the Heavens before transmitting it.*
*Leakage or negligence invites calamity upon nine generations,*
*eternal servitude in the **Ghostly Bureaucracy**.*

*Attending this Scripture are the **Five Emperors**,
*with **Jade Boys and Jade Maidens**, twenty-four each,*
*guarding the **Divine Texts** and protecting those who receive it.*

The **Way** declares:
*"In the first month, with prolonged fasting,*
*reciting this Scripture,*
*the **Seven-Star True Lords** open the **Northern Mystic Registers**,*
*examining the guilty spirits,*
*the **Central Dipper’s Commanders** refining the **Seven Stars’ Light**,*
*guiding the **Dark Spirits***
*to save the souls of past ages,*
*severing their **Underworld bonds** and guiding them to the **Southern Palace**.*

*"In the seventh month, with prolonged fasting,*
*reciting this Scripture,*
*the **Seven-Star Arcadian *qi*** shines violet as a bowstring,*
*irrigating the **Omen’s Vital Marrow**,*
*the **Seven Great Deities of the Stars** supporting the **Omen’s Form**,*
*wandering the **Dipper’s Pass**.*
*The body feels divine fatigue,*
*and the **Heavenly Records** are inscribed—*
*with **Yellow Registers and White Tablets**—*
*erasing death to grant rebirth.*

*"In the tenth month, with prolonged fasting,*
*reciting this Scripture,*
*the **Central Dipper’s Heavenly Sovereign** seizes the **Seven Stars***
*to eradicate the **Zoroastrian demons**.*
*The **Red Emperor and Yellow Old One**, together with the **Omen’s Refined Soul**,
*shade beneath the **Flowering Canopy**,*
*sitting upon the **Seven Stars**,*
*their **Stellar Essence** entering the brain,*
*the **True Fire** refining the form.*
*The **Violet Lord of the Vital Marrow**, whose taboo name is **Guiying**,
*reclines upon a **Golden Bed in a Jade Pavilion**,*
*adorned in **Purple Embroidered Silk Skirts**,*
*with a **Fire-Bell Girdle**,*
*eradicating the **Zoroastrian demons** and extinguishing the **Spirit-Essences**—*
*blessings and慶 naturally arise,*
*their station reaching the **Highest Minister**.*
*As **kings and emperors**,*
*rulers and subjects,*
*fathers and sons,*
*they stabilize the **national fate**,*
*preserve the **Heavenly Mandate**,*
*enduring forever without cessation,*
*always as sovereigns,*
*stabilizing their domains,*
*the people calling it the **Great Peace**.*

*"On the **Eight Nodes’ Days**, reciting this Scripture,*
*the **Seven Stars’ Light** spreads across the eight directions,*
*the **Northern Emperor** takes the central position,*
*the **Nine Palaces** aligning,*
*one white, two black,*
*the **Greedy Giant** vanquished in the void,*
*the **Ghostly Ancestors** below cut off from decay and misfortune,*
*attaining the **Nine-Palace True One**.*

*"On one’s **Birthday**, reciting this Scripture,*
*[when the hour is] **Zi, Chou, Wu, Wei**,*
*the **Seven Stars** return to **Yang**,*
*prolonging the **Omen’s Heavenly Years**,*
*granting boundless life,*
*clarifying the **Spirit-Soul**,*
*eternal *qi* enduring,*
*avoiding suffering,*
*the body radiant,*
*the **Three Realms** guarding,*
*the **Five Emperors** welcoming,*
*ten thousand deities paying homage,*
*their names inscribed in Heaven,*
*merit complete and **virtue** fulfilled,*
*ascending to the **Supreme Clarity**."*

The **Way** declares:
*"On the **Day of Practice**, one must bathe in fragrant water,*
*fast and enter the chamber,*
*facing east,*
*knocking the teeth thirty-two times,*
*hearing the **Thirty-Two Heavens** above,*
*bowing in the heart thirty-two times,*
*closing the eyes,*
*quietly visualizing oneself seated within three-colored clouds—*
*purple, green, and crimson—*
*dark and vast within and without,*
*the **Seven Stars** covering the head,*
*the **Five Zang’s True *Qi*** circulating through the body,*
*the **Spleen** generating yellow *qi*,*
*rising from the crown as cloud,*
*gazing upon the **Northern Pole’s Golden Countenance**,*
*with **Ten Thousand Heavenly Horses**,*
*the **Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, and Dark Tortoise**,*
*the **Lion and White Crane** arrayed on either side,*
*the sun and moon illuminating,*
*the chamber brightly revealed,*
*a round symbol forming at the nape,*
*its light radiating the ten directions—*
*thus, clearly.*

*The Secret Incantation:*
*'**Supreme Mystic Origin,**
**Most High Dao-Lord.***
*I summon the **Three Five Functionaries** within my body,*
*the **Left and Right Official Envoys**,*
*the **Jade Boys attending with incense**,*
*the **Jade Maidens transmitting words**,*
*the **Five Emperors’ Direct Symbols**,*
*the **Direct-Day Incense Officials**—*
*each thirty-two in number—*
*to open the **Gate of Speech**.*

*'Today is a day of joyous blessing,*
*a prolonged fast in the pure hall,*
*practicing this most profound Scripture,*
*its salvific power boundless.*
*May what is invoked ascend directly*
*to the **Supreme Thirty-Two Heavens’**
**Primordial Emperor, Most Honored Sovereign**.*

*'Completed. Draw in the *qi* thirty-two times,*
*facing east to recite the Scripture.*

**Primordial Emperor’s Supreme Scripture of Boundless Salvation**
**Primordial Mystic Essence’s Sacred Original Chapter**
**The Seven Stars’ Eradication of Zoroastrian Demons**
**The Primordial Halter’s Salvation of Mortals.'"*

The **Celestial Gate** turns and shifts—
separation and union by nature’s own design.
The heavens hold three souls,
two luminous essences contained within.
The heavens hold seven spirits,
seven luminaries flowing with essence.

The **Azure Pavilion** bends and straightens,
five and three ascending in flight.
Purple clouds form the gate,
green mists drift obscurely.

Within lies the **Northern Pole**,
a golden city of nine layers.
Mountains encircle, peaks arrayed,
dark grasses drooping with dew.

The **Cavern’s Portal** is deep and dim,
eight pathways of pure vacancy.
Head erect, firm and mighty,
feet tread the **Black Dragon**,
hand wields the **Emerald Veil**,
striking jade, knocking bronze bells.

**Heavenly Ding** with nine heads,
four-eyed aged sage,
bearing the **Golden Axe**,
quelling Zoroastrian fiends.

The **Revolving Pearl** as pivot,
moving by void mechanism,
the **True Dao** unfolds naturally,
its light spreading through the Nine Palaces.

The **Great God of the Dipper** stands,
thunderous and majestic.
The **Nine Fiends** vanish,
clad in the Dipper, riding the wind.
Spitting venom, spewing flame,
endlessly guarding the world.

Ghostly spirits scatter and cower,
the **Divine Treasury** shines clear.
Azure *qi* washes through,
blending with the hundred deities.
The **Golden Gate, Jade Chamber**,
red mirror’s radiance takes flight.
Flowing clouds stretch ten thousand *zhang*,
pervading the Eight Dark Realms.

Within are the **Seven-Star Gods of Zoroastrian Eradication**,
within the **Celestial Strategist, Sovereign of Purple Extremity**,
within the **True One of Azure Constellation, Supreme Emperor**,
within the **Great God of Heavenly Ding Binding the Dragon**,
within the **Lord of Black Heavenly Killing, Four Virtues and Five Marshals**,
within the **True Lord of Heavenly Peng’s Mighty Transformation, Mystic Luster**,
within the **Seven-Star Sovereign God of Primordial Halter’s Sacred Ordinance**.

Reviving the dead, boundless salvation.
Today’s transcription—all heavens gather at the court.
**Star Gods of the Boundless Extreme, Kings of the Eight Directions, Long-Living Great Saints, Boundless Salvation:**

East—**Boundless Extreme Star-Symbol God-King**, Long-Living Great Saint, Boundless Salvation.
South—**Boundless Extreme Star-Killing God-King**, Long-Living Great Saint, Boundless Salvation.
West—**Boundless Extreme Star-*Qi* God-King**, Long-Living Great Saint, Boundless Salvation.
North—**Boundless Extreme Star-Platform God-King**, Long-Living Great Saint, Boundless Salvation.
Northeast—**Boundless Extreme Star-Hidden God-King**, Long-Living Great Saint, Boundless Salvation.
Southeast—**Boundless Extreme Star-Messenger God-King**, Long-Living Great Saint, Boundless Salvation.
Southwest—**Boundless Extreme Star-River God-King**, Long-Living Great Saint, Boundless Salvation.
Northwest—**Boundless Extreme Star-Commander God-King**, Long-Living Great Saint, Boundless Salvation.
Above—**Boundless Extreme Star-Awe God-King**, Long-Living Great Saint, Boundless Salvation.
Below—**Boundless Extreme Star-Root God-King**, Long-Living Great Saint, Boundless Salvation.
**Ten-Directional Supreme True Seven-Star Gods of Zoroastrian Eradication**, Long-Living, Boundless World-Salvation Great Gods.

Together they ride the **Seven-Star Fearless Clouds**,
the **Eight-Colored Radiant Hosts**,
**Heavenly Horses** as charioteers,
**Pioneering the Non-Conforming**,
**Six Jia** in full array,
**Heavenly Ding** displaying might,
hovering at the **Crimson Mists**,
soaring through the **Womb of Exhaustion**,
bearing the **Emerald Tassel Standard**,
flowing with luminous banners.
Before them, **Purple Phoenixes** cry in chorus,
behind them, **Mystic Beasts** roar in unison.
Lions and white cranes,
their roars and songs resounding.
**Heaven’s First** opens the path,
**Divine Soldiers** guard the axle,
ten million chariots, a hundred thousand cavalry,
floating through the void, arriving.
Their light returns, their chariots wheel—
**Supervising the True, Salvaging the Living**.

**Star Palace Chancellors**,
**Nine-Heavens High Palace**,
**Heavenly Excellence Record-Keeper**,
**Great God of the Dipper**,
holding scriptures, bearing registers,
all assembled before the Emperor.
As needed, they strictly inspect the heavens.

**Seven-Star Treasure Palace**,
**Seven Primordial True Lords**,
wearing the moon, leading the sun,
**Dragon-Crested, Tiger-Skirted**.
**Pale-Tongued, Tiger-Guarded**,
**Northern Pole Divine Lord**,
**Red Scriptures, Fire Registers**,
**Black Ledgers, Yellow Texts**.
Sweeping away Zoroastrian pests,
wandering corpses, roving souls,
beheading without restraint,
binding them to **Mount Tai**.

Proclaiming to the **Three Realms**,
the **Boundless Divine Homeland**,
the **Bend of the Springs’ Bureau**,
the **Northern Capital of Luo**,
the **Three Officials, Nine Offices**,
the **Twelve River Sources**.

Ascending to absolve ancestors,
countless eons of kindred,
quickly erasing the **Register of Sins**,
extinguishing roots of evil,
preventing detention, forcing them into ghostly throngs.

**Primordial Talismans and Mandates**—
timely ascension at every moment,
the **Northern Capital’s Cold Pool**,
guarding forms and spirits.

**Seven-Star Zoroastrian Eradication**—
salvation ranks in the **Southern Palace**,
dead souls undergo refinement,
transformed into immortals, becoming human.
Living bodies receive salvation,
eternal through every eon.
With the eons’ wheel turning,
they match the heavens in years.
Forever salvaging the **Three Abysses**,
the **Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships**,
transcending the **Three Realms**,
adrift in **Upper Clarity**.

**Upper Clarity’s Heaven**,
**Heavenly Emperor of Jade Purity**,
the **Formless Realm of *Dharma*-Walking**.

**Heavenly True Sovereign** declares:
*"The Seven Stars of the Dipper—
the True Ones of Zoroastrian Eradication—
by the **Great Emperor of the Northern Pole**, successor to the **Primordial Emperor of Heaven**,
entrusted to **Mingwei True Person of Cloud Palace, Purple Chamber, and Manifest Awe**."*

**Mingwei** holds the **Highest True** rank,
sequentially titled **Dao-Speaker**,
for logic resides within.
As for the **Thirty-Two Heavens**,
they are the **spokes** of the **Thirty-Two Heavens**,
the **Twenty-Eight Constellations** as wheels,
the **Seven Stars** as the **box**,
the **Two Luminaries** as **checks**,
the **Northern Pole** as **pivot**,
all converging at the four quarters.
The **Thirty-Two Heavens**—
branches linked, roots steadfast.

Also arranged by east, south, west, north,
each heaven’s hue descending through the Nine Palaces,
divided into **Nine Truths**,
united as the **Great Cavern**.
Scholars must illuminate this.

**Eight Heavens of the East**
**Kanghua Exhausted-Light Heaven**—Emperor **Lè**, indulging in inner life.

**Thirty-Two Heavens, Thirty-Two Emperors**
The hidden names of the Heavens, the hidden titles of the Emperors.
The void within the Heavens, naturally forming sacred diagrams.
The sounds of the Seven Stars, the majesty of the Seven Stars.
The gods of the Seven Stars, the great demons of the Seven Stars, the spirits of the Seven Stars—
Nine harmonies, ten unions, transforming into the Highest Clarity.

The boundless mysteries, profound beyond measure.
Eighty-four thousand stars, great and small, the Celestial River’s Nine Districts,
The True Child of the Northern Dipper.
Dark-bodied, beastly in form, awe-inspiring and revered—
The Seven Stars of the North, the True Form’s essence.

If you know this, the *qì* of the demons will not interfere,
The gates of the spirits will be scattered, the Primordial Dipper’s essence will soar,
The gods will transform, the *qì* will manifest—
Boundless and spiritually resonant.

With a green body, three braids, yellow eyes, and a black form,
Eighteen rays, twelve flying wheels.
Or transformed as a woman, in embroidered robes and crimson skirts,
Or as an old man, with a purple sash and dark headwrap.
Or as a red serpent, a giant tortoise with a serpent’s body,
Spouting fire, emitting smoke, hurling bells to summon clouds.

Before Heaven and Earth were born, the Seven Stars were in chaotic darkness.
The Holy Mother of Wu gave birth to them on Kunlun.
The essence of the Seven Stars transformed into the Seven True Ones,
Wearing jade caps, cloaked in green with golden sashes,
Their *qi* forming talismans, the Supreme’s mysterious script.

The Eastern Dipper opens life, riding the Azure Void on smoke.
The Western Dipper’s brilliance soars through the heavens.
The Northern Dipper’s dark radiance transforms into True Immortals,
Their gaze stealing sunlight, their hands grasping the Celestial Lock.
The Southern Dipper’s Vermilion Precision rides dragons with banners,
Overseeing records and commanding the boundless.
The Central Dipper’s Imperial *Qi* wears a jewel-crowned lotus,
Riding a dragon robe, bearing the Five Classics,
Leading the Heavenly Ganges, with all gods powerless before them.

The **Green Heaven Demon King**—**Bīn Chǐ Yuán Chéng**.
The **Red Heaven Demon King**—**Lín Zhì Fāng Shēng**.
The **White Heaven Demon King**—**Wén Zhū Yù Yīng**.
The **Black Heaven Demon King**—**Huáng Dào Xuán Míng**.
The **Yellow Heaven Demon King**—**Hé Hùn Yuán Jīng**.

The Five Great Demons, the ancestors of all gods,
With flying drums and banners, commanding ghostly armies.
Wielding flags and drums, they roam the cosmos,
Self-proclaimed as **Hè Yì**, their deeds equal to the Heavens.
They judge mortals from above, strictly overseeing the Northern Underworld.

The Seven Stars of Slaying sweep away all inauspiciousness.
The Tortoise summons *qi*, the Vermilion Serpent unfurls its coils,
The Giant Spirit strikes the bell, the Divine Consort presents incense.
The Azure-Tongued Marshal, the Green-Toothed King—
They obey the Seven Stars, their transformations radiant with power.

Black *qi* darkens the sky, the sea wind howls,
The flowing fire blazes, the Lightning Maiden’s jade pendants gleam.
The Dragon Flag sweeps the heavens, its shockwave dazzling—
Demons’ brains are crushed, the *qì* sect hides in defeat.
The Three Officials of the North, the Underworld’s bright inspection—
No hiding place remains; the Golden Horse Relay presents the guilty.

A universal proclamation is made, all gods listen.
The Three Realms’ Five Emperors speak to the Highest Clarity.
The vast **Yù Jīng**—boundless and immeasurable—
The Primordial *qi* forms clouds, the Purple Brightness’s jewel-wheel.
Dazzling the cosmos, firmly rooted in Heaven’s foundation,
Its roots connect to the Wind Marsh, the Hollow Void gives birth to dragons,
As *yin* and *yang* intertwine, movement sparks flight.

The Supreme Light’s dark armor, the Twelve Primordials.
Its body coils around the Azure Veil, its back bears the Divine Continent.
The sun and moon flow beside it, the Three Mysterious Treasures gleam.
All transformations merge in brilliance, illuminating the floating light.
Thirty-five divisions, twenty-eight constellations—
The Heavenly Form’s depiction, the revolving cosmic chart.
The Dipper’s stars—**Dī Fáng Shēn Wěi**—circle the radiant brilliance.
The Horn, Handle, and Net stars soar through the Vermilion Veil.
Within lies the Cloud Cord, its light encircling the Imperial Palace.
[Missing text]—**the Seven Great Kings**, transforming into **Tiān Pēng**.
Ten million fire soldiers, the Eighteen-Eyed Old Man,
Howling to summon black *qi*, the Giant Thunder Dragon.
The Just Wind Spirit-Tiger, the Southern Vermilion Jade Boy—
They behead and exterminate demonic groups, annihilating ghostly blades.

Above Heaven and below Earth, no darkness, no obscurity,
No form, no shadow, no limit, no end.
The boundless **Míng Huǎng Dà Fàn**, vast and lightless.
The Seven Primordial’s radiance extinguishes all inauspiciousness.
The Three Celestial Bodies unite in clarity, the Supreme One presents the script.
The Jade Emperor descends to observe, the Yellow Flag summons spirits.
The Void’s *qi* forms seals, the jade talisman’s sacred text.
Engraved on golden tablets, blending the Nine Primordial *yang*.
Divine omens arise naturally, the Purple Hall’s Mysterious Platform.
The *qi* of the *fàn* pervades, all patterns unfold.
Degrees flow and transform, the Thirty-Two Heavens revolve.
The celestial axis sweeps through the rooms, returning to the Northern Mysterious.
The Seven Stars blaze, gathering *qi* to the Highest Primordial.
The Eight Sceneries merge in darkness, the *qi* enters the Deepest Mysterious.
Within the Mysterious, the Dipper Stars—
The Northern Pole’s exalted eminence,

The Golden True One holds the script, presenting it to the Heavenly Sovereign.
The Jade Sound summons *qi*, the spirit’s transformation shines forth.
The Pure Void radiates, its wheel turning through the ten thousand directions.
Thousands and ten-thousands unite, naturally becoming True.
Within the True lies the spirit, the Primordial Dipper’s Great Lord,
The Emperor of the Primordial Net, the Yellow-Silk Flying Immortal,
The Supreme One who governs fate, the Peach-Kang Union—

The Seven Gods reside within the body, exorcising demons and refining the True.
Heaven has the Three Platforms, man has the Three Souls.
Heaven has the Seven Stars, man has the Seven Spirits.
The Three Souls govern the *yang*, the Seven Spirits govern the *yin*.
The Three Platforms and Six Stars—void essence, pure *qi*—

Heavenly corpses, Earthly corpses, and human corpses—
Together forming the Six Spirits.

Black armor spans the sky,

True and Demon Spirits’ generals,

These Three Chapters—above the Three Realms,

**The Chapter on Divine Talismans for Removing Calamities**

The Dao speaks: *"In days of old, at the Vermilion Spirit’s Dan Heaven, where the Radiant and Illuminating Eightfold Glory shines upon the Divine Gate, I received from the Primordial Origin the sacred and wondrous talisman for removing calamities and saving beings. When the Primordial Origin, the Heavenly Venerable, was to expound this scripture, He circled ten times, calling forth the Ten Directions, and only then did He take His seat.*

*The Celestial True God, the Supreme Sage, the Mysterious Virtue True Person—with their countless retinues beyond reckoning—ascended through the void. The imperial mists mirrored the emptiness, jade wheels and gem-studded carriages gleamed, precious herbs and jeweled canopies unfurled, their radiance intertwining in dazzling splendor, ten thousand lights flashing in brilliance. For five days and five nights, the wondrous qi of the heavens interwove in patterned splendor, dragon-light and phoenix-hovering clouds gathering naturally, forming a chapter in an instant. The spirit wind swept clear, the stars paused their wheels, and all phenomena shone resplendent. Impurities dissolved, and across the land—earth, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees—seven treasures congealed into jade, their heights and depths equalized, all assuming the hue of floating, billowing clouds in the *liluo* pattern. The assembled True Ones took their places, and the Primordial Origin sat in seclusion upon the floating divine diagram of the Eight Spirits and Nine Transformations, the jade array above.

*When the scripture was expounded once, the Heavenly Great Saints all proclaimed its excellence. At that moment, the Ten Realms were purified, the spirit wind dispersed the mists, celestial omens manifested, and terrestrial auspicious signs appeared. All gathered in celebration, extending to all living beings. When the scripture was expounded twice, demonic plagues vanished, and the vermilion talismans shone in the void. When the scripture was expounded thrice, calamities and illnesses were dispelled. When the scripture was expounded four times, natural spirit-writings spontaneously appeared, illuminating the Eight Emptinesses. When the scripture was expounded five times, the people awakened to understanding, grasping the meaning of the talismans. When the scripture was expounded six times, all reverently upheld the sacred writings and attained the Dao/Way. When the scripture was expounded seven times, the precious writings and jade scriptures opened boundless salvation. When the scripture was expounded eight times, the three luminaries’ wondrous qi nourished the form and spirit. When the scripture was expounded nine times, tormented souls underwent transformation, refined in the Vermilion Mound. When the scripture was expounded ten times, the nation’s destiny was secured, eternal peace preserved. At that time, all men and women in the land, without exception, turned their hearts in devotion, all receiving protection and attaining longevity."*

The Dao speaks: *"When the Primordial Origin expounded the scripture once, the God-King of the Measureless Supreme Talisman of the East, the Most True Great God, with His countless retinues beyond reckoning, ascended through the void. When the scripture was expounded twice, the God-King of the Measureless Supreme Talisman of the South, the Most True Great God, with His countless retinues beyond reckoning, ascended through the void. When the scripture was expounded thrice, the God-King of the Measureless Supreme Talisman of the West, the Most True Great God, with His countless retinues beyond reckoning, ascended through the void. When the scripture was expounded four times, the God-King of the Measureless Supreme Talisman of the North, the Most True Great God, with His countless retinues beyond reckoning, ascended through the void. When the scripture was expounded five times, the God-King of the Measureless Supreme Talisman of the Northeast, the Most True Great God, with His countless retinues beyond reckoning, ascended through the void. When the scripture was expounded six times, the God-King of the Measureless Supreme Talisman of the Southeast, the Most True Great God, with His countless retinues beyond reckoning, ascended through the void. When the scripture was expounded seven times, the God-King of the Measureless Supreme Talisman of the Southwest, the Most True Great God, with His countless retinues beyond reckoning, ascended through the void. When the scripture was expounded eight times, the God-King of the Measureless Supreme Talisman of the Northwest, the Most True Great God, with His countless retinues beyond reckoning, ascended through the void. When the scripture was expounded nine times, the God-King of the Measureless Supreme Talisman of the Upper Realm, the Most True Great God, with His countless retinues beyond reckoning, ascended through the void. When the scripture was expounded ten times, the God-King of the Measureless Supreme Talisman of the Lower Realm, the Most True Great God, with His countless retinues beyond reckoning, ascended through the void. When the tenfold circuit was complete, the Measureless Masters of the Ten Directions, the God-Kings of the Supreme Talismans, the Celestial True Gods—all arrived together at once. All men and women in the land turned their hearts in reverence.*

*Those who came were as dense as rain and mist converging, their countless retinues beyond reckoning filling the land, causing the earth to tremble—an unstoppable force. Thus, the Primordial Origin, seated in meditation, gazed into the void and summoned His mighty divine power. From His mouth issued sacred writings in cloud-script and dragon-patterns, flowing like molten gold, their eight-cornered brilliance radiating keenness. They shifted and transformed in the void, forming a precious altar nine zhang above the earth, beneath which floated the华云 (*huayun*—clouds of glory*). The Primordial Origin ascended, along with the Celestial True Gods, the Supreme Sages, the Mysterious Virtue True Persons, the God-Kings of the Measureless Supreme Talismans of the Ten Directions, the Most True Great Gods, the divine talisman officers, and their countless retinues beyond reckoning—all ascending to the altar that had manifested.*

*The heavenly and human beings looked on and saw them ascending gradually from the four sides of the altar. Once ascended, none were left behind. The people of the land dispersed, and the earth returned to its natural stillness. The Primordial Origin then, upon the precious altar, completed the expounding of the scripture. The assembled True Ones oversaw the salvation and transmitted it to me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. The ritual matters were now complete, the heavens and their hosts returned to their places, and in an instant, all sound ceased.*

*At that time, those who encountered the scripture’s teachings were all saved, their lives preserved for the year, calamities and injuries averted. All turned in devotion, and all attained auspicious karmic roots. Free from worry or vexation, from illness or misfortune, from fear or terror, from calamity or disaster, from trials or demonic assaults—speech aligned with the Dao’s intent, the heart with the Dao’s truth. All were harmonized in unity, disparate bones forming kinship. The nation was secure, the people prosperous, rejoicing in great peace. The teaching emerged, and the land was governed by the Dao. Those who approached with sincere hearts, revering and worshipping, all attained world-transcendence."*

The Dao speaks: *"What the Primordial Origin spoke within the scripture are the roots of the Five Elders’ Divine Fire-refining luminous essence, the hidden and void-transforming essence of the Three Primordials’ wondrous qi, the secret inner names of the gods. They are also the taboo names of the Three Heavens and the hidden names of the hundred spirits—not the common words of the world. The Supreme Sage, having already perfected the True Person, penetrating the Mysterious and attaining the Marvelous, could fully comprehend these writings. When recited ten times, the demon kings bowed in reverence, malevolent spirits perished, impurities were cleansed, the Dao’s qi harmonized with the divine, the two luminaries shone forth, the Five Glories received their brilliance, calamities and plagues dispersed, and death was turned back into life."*

The learned and virtuous, reciting this scripture ten times, shall receive the Emperor of the True’s discerning aid, the High Celestial descending in splendor, secretly imparting Mysterious utterances, precious talismans, and jade inscriptions. Together, they govern ghosts and demons, repelling calamity and deceit.

Thus it is: the sacred sounds converge in the subtle purity, the supreme principles harmonize with the Primordial roots. The wondrous essence is stirred, summoning qi and attaining the True. The transformations are boundless, nothing escapes its divine power. Lightly reciting this chapter brings misfortune upon oneself. Reverently supplying offerings and rites, one’s gates flourish. Prosperity endures through generations, divine symbols avert disasters, and ten thousand calamities cannot approach. The numinous protects the door.

This scripture is most exalted and unique, unmatched in the Jade Capital, saving countless beings and serving as the source of ten thousand Dao. Its grandeur is vast and its virtue immeasurable.

The scripture states: Those who recite this text ten times shall have all the heavens converge, the thirty-six thousand divine symbols of wondrous qi, and the eighty-four thousand essences of the Vermilion Texts, all descending upon their bodies. The body undergoes refining and nourishment, forming the True and the Transcendent. After nine years, the jade talismans confirm their birth, erasing the name of death, and all lingering souls—suffering from grievances and entangled in the depths—are all rescued and granted freedom. Their forms transform, their nature and insight become clear, and they reverently uphold the subtle words, their Mysterious powers fully manifest. They ascend to the Nine Palaces, surpass the Great Vermilion, and soar beyond the Purple Clarity.

The learned who cultivate and recite this scripture shall have the true texts of the Nine Heavens gathered within their essence, binding the sacred threads of the spirit, entering their bodies, enveloping the Five Viscera, nourishing the refined essence, extending their lifespan to longevity and ascension. Common folk who recite it shall summon divine officials, talismans following as attendants, the True Rulers of the Three Luminaries, and the Five Qi Celestial Sovereigns, whose awe-inspiring spirits guard against ten thousand calamities. Their bodies are infused with Dao-qi, and at death, their True essence does not perish. They ascend directly to the Southern Palace, returning to transformation and eternal existence.

This scripture is subtly wondrous, universally saving without end, and all heavenly and human beings receive its blessings, their lives and deaths both favored.

A treasure of the heavens, it is not transmitted to the mortal world. Only the virtuous, bearing gold and jewels with sincere devotion, may swear to the heavens and pass it on. Leakage or negligence brings ruin upon nine generations, and eternal servitude to ghostly officials.

The scripture is guarded by the Five Emperors, with twenty-four Direct-Symbol Jade Boys and Jade Girls each, attending and protecting those who receive it.

He bestows the Nine Qi Mysterious Life-Generating Symbols, protecting and saving one’s body. The nine ancestral spirits, submerged in darkness, are all liberated, merging with the Dao.

In the seventh month, with prolonged fasting, recite this scripture to invoke the Precious Flower Most Wondrous Supreme Extremity Highest Sovereign of the Western Ling Highest Brightness Palace in the Middle Primordial. He proclaims the Seven Qi Golden Light Jade Symbols, severing karmic bonds, subduing demonic essences, dissolving guilt, and eternally preserving purity. The Golden True refines the flowered essence, the jade-like vitality flourishes within, the body grows firm, and longevity spans ten thousand years.

In the tenth month, with prolonged fasting, recite this scripture to invoke the Jade Sovereign Great Dao Supreme Emperor of the Northern True Purple Supreme Palace in the Lower Primordial. He scatters divine blessings, bestowing the Five Qi Heavenly Mysterious Great Symbols, sweeping away deceit and impurity, banishing malevolent omens, safeguarding the state and people, ensuring the emperor’s longevity, and extending boundless blessings and fortune to all under heaven, perpetually preserving the Great Peace.

On the eight seasonal festivals, recite this scripture to invoke the Eight Scenes Vermilion Precision Dan Flower Jade Text Eight Mighty Divine Strategies of Luminous Qi, descending upon the body, nourishing the Nine Palaces, and filling the Three Fields with True essence. All ailments are dispelled, ten thousand harms are cut off, demons cower in fear, and one escapes calamity. The Green Book records their merits, the Purple Talisman marks their ascension, and their Mysterious powers ascend to the Upper Clarity.

**Stellar Qi** drifts, **Azure Phoenix** ascends.
**Sun’s Progress** secured, **Lotus Pool’s** four wheels.
**Void’s Nurture** vast, **Treasure’s Peak**—**Mara’s** guise.
**Supreme Exhaustion**, **Immortal Departure**—
**Boundless Darkness**, **Dao’s** profound palace.

**Westward Eight Heavens**—
**Tortoise Pavilion’s** midstream, **Swallow’s** rare passage.
**Mang Ji’s** arrayed ranks, **Rainbow’s** elysian hall.
**Song’s Pavilion** sinks into dusk, **Lu’s** eastern peaks.
**Dharma’s Silence**, **Coiled Songs**—
**Trigrams’ Depths**, **Spiritual Metropolis**.
**Child’s Shadow** seeks **Kushinagar**,
**Steps** toward **Hengshan’s** summit.
**Talisman’s Halt**, **Legal Retribution**—
**Crimson Radiance**, **Flame-Crowned**.
**Cypress Moss**, **Star-Sparkled**—
**Dharma’s Ferry**, **Gods’ Manifestation**.
**Harmonious Celebration**, **Cowherd’s** ascent—
**Subtle Virtue**, **Devoted Immortals**.

**Northward Eight Heavens**—
**Guan Ao’s** noble name, **Cinnabar Essence** spreading through **Heaven’s** pole.
**Transformed Music** from the **Few**, **Ascending Stars** riding the **Void**.
**Inscriptions** inscribed, **Script’s** marvel—**No-Truth Clouds**.
**Seeking the **Gate of Virtue**, **Chunzi’s** path.
**Emerald Circle’s** heavenly use,
**Deep Bait’s** radiant efficacy—
**Dao’s** trust dispels **Xian**’s freshness.
**Ze Lou’s** orchids, **Dragon’s** scales—
**Female Weavers’** treasures refined.
**Rising Void’s** edicts, **Jia’s** discerning truth.
**Di Tu’s** subtle **Hu**—
**Long Rules** multiplying **People**.

**The Dao speaks**: These **Divine Talismans**, spreading **Transformation’s** **Heavens**,
reveal the **Mahābrahmā’s** **Hidden Language** in **Red Script**—
**Limitless Ages** past.
**Ancient Texts** flow through **Heaven’s Gate**, **Louvre’s** halls,
**Celestial Sovereigns’** **True Humans** recording with **Purple Brushes**,
characters a **丈** square, **eight-cornered**, **pendant rays**,
**curved yet majestic**, **refined and wondrous**—
deployed across the **Ten Directions**, above and below,
as **Sacred Talismans’** **Treasure Texts**.

Those who know their **sounds** and recite them in **fasting devotion**,
or inscribe **eight celestial characters** in **cinnabar** as **talismans**,
shall find **great efficacy**.

All **Heavens** dispatch **Talisman-Guarding Kings**,
**Directing Talisman Lords**, **Taiyi’s** envoys,
to inspect their **bodies**, record their **merits and labors**,
and report to the **Heavens**—
**Ten Thousand Spirits** pay homage,
**Earthly Deities** guard the gates,
**Great Merit** spans the **Three Realms**,
**Commending the **True Ones**—
when **Dao** is complete, they **penetrate** **Divine Manifestations**,
ascend through the **Imperial Pass**.

This **Sound** repels **all obstacles**,
**all calamities**, **all barriers**—
**all attainments** are fulfilled.
It is the **Natural Sound of the Celestial Worthies**.

Thus, when recited, it **summons Flying Observers** from below,
**Supreme Sovereigns** sing from afar—
**Ten Thousand Spirits** obey commands,
**Three August Ones** attend the **Hall**,
**All Deities** bow in reverence,
**Ghostly Precursors** vanish in terror,
**Void and Caverns** echo with resonance,
**Seas and Mountains** congeal in mist—
**Heaven** mirrors **emerald hues**,
**Earth** glows with **crimson threads**.
**Purity** shines, **Silence** reigns—
**Ten Thousand Qi** spiral in harmony,
**Sacred Scripts** radiant and vast,
**Gathering all Immortals**—
**Above**, no **impurities**,
**Below**, no **demonic dust**—
**Mystic Wisdom** penetrates, **Great Compassion** profound.

**Completion of the *Supreme Treasure Limitless Salvation Scripture* (上品妙经), Volume Thirty-Eight**
*New Daoist Canon Compilation Committee*

**Volume Thirty-Nine: The *Southern Palace Prolonged Life* Chapter**

The Dao speaks: Once, within the **Danling Heaven**, amid crimson clouds and golden winds, the **Juling Changtu** soil received the **Limitless Prolonged Life** from **Yuan Shi’s** transmission to **Southern Palace Nángōng Yánshēng**. When **Yuan Shi Tianzūn** was to expound this scripture, circling ten times to summon the **Ten Directions**, he then took his seat.

The **Heavenly True Great Deity**, the **Supreme Sage of High Venerability**, the **Mystic Conduct True Person**, the **Inner Supervisor of Southern Palace Nángōng**, the **Preserver of Immortality True Dao Lord**, the **Supreme True Ruler of Southern Palace Nángōng’s Celestial Mechanism**, the **Supreme True Ruler of Celestial Mechanism’s Officials**, the **True Ruler of Celestial Mechanism’s Weary Ones**, the **True Ruler of Celestial Mechanism’s Straight Gods**, the **Dan Yuan Immortal Officials**, the **Three Primordial Immortal Officials**, the **Celestial Mechanism’s Chief Clerks**, the **Godly Cavalry of the First Rank**, and the **Countless Hosts without Reins** arrived, riding the void. Beneath **crimson clouds and divine mists**, their **jewel-carved carriages** and **cinnabar wheels** gleamed, **phoenix canopies** cast their shade, and **flowing violet light** radiated in **nine hues**, resplendent across the boundless expanse.

For six days and six nights, the **Southern Palace Nángōng** stood still—**star pivots guarded their courses**, the **hour-drums fell silent**, **dragon peaks and waters** ceased their flow, **jade droplets** hung suspended, **mist-banners** drifted in the sky, and **vaporous curtains** coiled with fragrance. The **Pivot and Mechanism’s Twin Provinces**, the **Ten Officials bearing their tablets**, led their ranks in solemn order, as **divine winds** brushed lightly, the **void-sea** mirrored pure clarity, the **heavenly visage** shone vast and open, and the **qi realm** radiated boundless. Within this land, mountains, rivers, forests, and plains all flattened into equal measure—no high or low remained. The earth transformed into **soft jade**, deep indigo and lustrous, piercing through the **circular netherworld**, its hue unchanging.

The assembled **True Ones** attended at his side. **Yuan Shi Tianzūn**, seated upon the **floating void-throne of six dragons playing with pearls and ascending cloud-silk**, expounded the scripture once. The **Great Sages of All Heavens** simultaneously proclaimed its excellence.

At that time, within the **Southern Palace Nángōng**, the **Inner Supervisor** recorded the **auspicious name of Nángōng Yánshēng** for the **ten billion**—countless in number—who attained immortality.

When the scripture was expounded a second time, the **Southern Star’s crimson flower** illuminated the **azure void**, while **cloudly cords** swirled and the **wonderful balance** bent low.

A third recitation brought **jewel-tones resounding**, their **praise echoing in profound verses**.

A fourth saw the **Southern Palace’s gates open**, giving birth to **ten thousand assemblies**.

A fifth brought **Celestial Mechanism’s flowing virtue**, as the **Five Powers** flourished in harmony.

A sixth shook the **Six Stars’ radiance**, as **all deities** rejoiced in unison.

A seventh ensured **immortal ranks without end**, and **worldly life extended to the utmost**.

An eighth subdued **true demons**, sealing their fate to **prolong life for the myriad**.

A ninth brought **flowering rains a foot deep**, as **heavenly fragrance merged with clouds**.

A tenth ensured **no untimely death in the world**—all, male and female, **leaned their hearts in devotion**, receiving protection and attaining **eternal life**.

The Dao speaks: When the scripture was expounded once, the **Limitless Prolonged Life Great True God of the East’s Boundless Direction** arrived with his **countless hosts**, floating through the void.

A second recitation summoned the **Limitless Prolonged Life Great True God of the South’s Boundless Direction**, with his **countless hosts**, floating through the void.

A third brought the **West’s**, a fourth the **North’s**, a fifth the **Northeast’s**, a sixth the **Southeast’s**, a seventh the **Southwest’s**, and an eighth the **Northwest’s**—each **Limitless Prolonged Life Great True Gods** of their respective directions, with their **countless hosts**, arriving in turn.

By the tenth recitation, the **Limitless Prolonged Life Heavenly True Great Gods of the Ten Directions’ Southern Palace** all arrived together. The men and women of the land **leaned their hearts in reverence**, prepared to hear **Yuan Shi Tianzūn** proclaim the **method of Southern Palace Nángōng Yánshēng** and the **essentials of attaining Truehood**.

They spoke among themselves: *“We, though certified as Heavenly Humans dwelling in the heavens, have never heard of the **Celestial Officials** governing our ranks, their **names, stations, or residences**, nor how they **rule the Three Primordials**, determine **life and death, rewards and punishments**, or assess **merits and faults**. We only know in broad strokes that the **Southern Palace Nángōng** serves as the **Grand Sovereign of Southern Extremity’s Prolonged Life**, yet where does **Prolonged Life** truly reside? What **typical officials or chief clerks** oversee it? How should the **citizens of the Three Primordials** petition to **attain Prolonged Life** and **enjoy the Boundless**? Today, the **Heavenly Sovereign** unfurls the **array of laws**, enlightening **Heavenly Humans**. We must each **refine our minds**, take refuge in the **Great Law**, and **cultivate our certifications**—prostrating twice in homage.”*

The arrivals came like **dense mist and clouds**, their **countless hosts** causing half the land’s soil to sink unevenly—an unstoppable force. All the **great assemblies** gathered around the seat, gazing in awe at the **divine visage**.

They longed to hear the **mystic law**.

「元始俯仰四顾，揽几回天，俨紫金光容，发言宣告大众曰：夫天地定位，君臣乃立。三天上帝，设官布政，分治三元。紫微太微，为两极之司，以主生死，世人罪福，仙真功过，紫微曹局，系於北斗；太微案掾，隶於南辰。紫微天官之司，则有太玄都省，以统三官；太微大君之司，则有天枢天机二省，以延注生命，校领群灵。

南斗第五星曰天枢，第六星曰天机，枢机二省为上帝之内司，长生大帝正所御也。天有三省，以治三元，则枢机之司并属於南昌上宫，即太微宫也。三省之内，金阙侍中、上相、上宰、侍郎、倦卿司命，以共治之。

兆能长斋，奉词天机省中，恳礼长生大帝，严备供养，勤诚不替，则有九天采察考校真官，按兆功过，上闻机省，上相注笔，为兆延生，寿无纪极，不必丹芝，可俟仙道。大众欣跃，乞获详教，渴伫圣言。

於是元始悬一宝珠，大如黍米，在空玄之中，去地五丈。元始登引，天真大神、上圣高尊、妙行真人、天机内省上相真宰、灵官直符、甲卒统骑、南宫延生无量大神、十方无极至真尊神、无鞅数众，俱入宝珠之中。天人仰看，惟见拂拂从珠口中入，既入珠口，不知所在。国人廓散，地还平正，无复欹陷。

元始即於宝珠之内，说经都竟。众真监度，以授於我，当此之时，喜庆难言。法事粗悉，诸天复位，倏欻之间，寂无遗响。是时，天人遇值经法，普得济度，全其本年，无有中伤，倾土归仰，咸得延生。不杀不害，不嫉不妬，不淫不盗，不贪不欲，不憎不恚。言无华绮，口无恶声，十二善行，专则延生，南宫自闻。

天机列言，七世命仙，齐同慈爱，异骨成亲；国安民丰，欣乐太平，经始出教，一国以道。预有至心，宗奉礼敬，各得度世。道言：元始天尊说经中所言，并是上帝南宫延生内名，隐韵之音；亦是天机省中上相内讳，百灵之隐名也。斋戒诵之，直符诣天机省，乞延生之箓，太上度南宫之契，兆得延生，永世长存。

非世之常辞，上圣已成真人，通玄究微，能悉其章，谓之**Ten Transgressions** [*shíguò*], 诸天遥唱，万帝设礼。南宫延生，天机纪龄，双景照顶，泥丸返精，群魔束形，鬼疠灭爽，回尸起死，白骨成人。至学之士，诵之**Ten Transgressions** [*shíguò*]，则大君流迁，三省言功，魔精丧眼，鬼祆灭爽，济度垂死，绝而得生。

所以尔者，学士秽气未消，体未洞真，召制百神，威未制天政；**德** [*dé*]可伏御地祇，束缚魔灵，但却死而已，不能更生。轻诵此章，身则被殃；供养尊礼，门户兴隆。世世昌炽，与善因缘，万灾不干，神明护门。

斯经尊妙，独步玉京，度人无量，为万道之宗。巍巍大范，**德** [*dé*]难可胜。道言：凡诵是经**Ten Transgressions** [*shíguò*]，诸天齐到，南昌宫中，天机省宰、上相真君，请长生大帝玉篆龙文，九云之书，云章宝箓，统仙驱吏八鸾真符。

告下酆山泉曲之府，使亿曾万祖，幽魂苦爽，皆即受度，上升朱宫，格皆九年，受化更生，得为贵人。而好学至经，功满德就，皆得神仙，飞升金阙，游宴玉京也。上学之士，修诵是经，南极丹元、左灵仙府、真官直符神吏，为兆延生，皆即受度，飞升南宫。

世人受诵，则九元八极，四斗三真，十二仙官，教兆隐迁，延生长年，后皆得作**Emptiness Dissolution** [*xījiě*]/**Body Dissolution** [*shīxiě*]之道，魂神暂灭，不经地狱，即得返形，游行太空。」

This scripture is subtle and wondrous, universally liberating without end.
All celestial and human beings alike receive its blessings.
Infinite blessings bestow life and death with grace.
Treasure of the heavens, it is not passed down to mortal ages.
Only the virtuous, bearing gold and jewels with sincere devotion,
pledge to the heavens before transmitting it.
Leakage or negligence brings calamity upon nine ancestral generations,
and eternal servitude in the underworld.

Attending this scripture in the Southern Palace,
twenty-four celestial boys and girls guard with divine texts,
protecting those who receive the scripture in body.

The Dao speaks:
In the first month, with prolonged fasting,
recite this scripture—
the Southern Palace’s **延生长生大帝** (Yánshēng Chángshēng Dàdì, "Longlife Immortal Emperor of the Southern Palace")
commands **太玄九仙君** (Tàixuān Jiǔxiān Jūn, "Nine Celestial Immortals of the Great Mysterious"),
**太虚无上君** (Tàixū Wúshàng Jūn, "Supreme Lord of the Great Void"),
and **太上九老仙都君** (Tàishàng Jiǔlǎo Xiāndū Jūn, "Nine Elder Immortals of the Supreme Court")
to open the heart’s path,
pierce the depths of the unseen,
and liberate the souls of past ages,
severing their bonds to the underworld and earthly prisons,
elevating them to the Southern Palace.

In the seventh month, with prolonged fasting,
recite this scripture—
the **天机上相** (Tiānjī Shàngxiàng, "Supreme Minister of Heavenly Mechanics")
of the Southern Palace’s **延生** (Yánshēng, "Life-Prolonging")
notifies **太虚紫元洞阳元君** (Tàixū Zǐyuán Dòngyáng Yuán Jūn, "Primordial Lord of the Purple Void and Cavernous Yang"),
**太素仙元君** (Tàisù Xiān Yuán Jūn, "Primordial Celestial Lord of Supreme Purity"),
and **太上秀乐君** (Tàishàng Xiùlè Jūn, "Supreme Lord of Refined Joy")
to banish delusion,
secure eternal truth,
ascend as divine immortals,
and be inscribed in the Southern Palace’s registers—
yellow talismans on white tablets—
erasing death to attain rebirth.

In the tenth month, with prolonged fasting,
recite this scripture—
the **金阙侍郎** (Jīnquè Shìláng, "Attendant Minister of the Golden Gate")
of the Southern Palace’s **延生**
invokes **玉华洞灵君** (Yùhuá Dònglíng Jūn, "Lord of Jade Flower and Cavernous Spirit"),
**玉华紫灵君** (Yùhuá Zǐlíng Jūn, "Lord of Jade Flower and Purple Spirit"),
and **元丹中皇君** (Yuándān Zhōnghuáng Jūn, "Central Sovereign Lord of the Primordial Elixir")
to shield the body,
serve the august with loyalty,
extend filial piety to one’s household,
and for kings and emperors,
ministers and subjects,
fathers and sons—
stabilize the nation’s fate,
preserve the heavens’ longevity,
ensure unbroken succession,
and perpetually rule as sovereigns,
bringing eternal peace to the land.

On the eight festivals,
recite this scripture—
the **玉清三皇太帝** (Yùqīng Sānhuáng Tàidì, "Three Sovereign Emperors of Jade Purity"),
**华阳仙君** (Huáyáng Xiān Jūn, "Celestial Lord of Radiant Yang"),
**紫灵仙君** (Zǐlíng Xiān Jūn, "Celestial Lord of Purple Spirit"),
and **洞阳仙君** (Dòngyáng Xiān Jūn, "Celestial Lord of Cavernous Yang")
open the eight gates,
grant visions of true immortals,
and attain the rank of **Nine Palace True Person**.

On one’s birthdate,
recite this scripture—
the **延生长生大帝** (Yánshēng Chángshēng Dàdì, "Longlife Immortal Emperor of the Southern Palace")
commands **太极仙君** (Tàijí Xiān Jūn, "Celestial Lord of the Supreme Polarity"),
**清灵仙君** (Qīnglíng Xiān Jūn, "Celestial Lord of Pure Spirit"),
**九光仙君** (Jiǔguāng Xiān Jūn, "Celestial Lord of Nine Radiances"),
and **十华仙君** (Shíhuá Xiān Jūn, "Celestial Lord of Ten Flowers")
to extend the register of life,
pardon sins and transcend the spirit,
purify the soul and vital essence,
ensure eternal vitality,
avoid suffering,
and radiate luminous light—
with the Three Realms’ guardians,
the Five Emperors’ escorts,
and the myriad gods’ homage—
one’s name inscribed in heaven,
virtue fulfilled, power attained—
ascending to the Upper Clarity.

The Dao speaks:
On days of practice,
one must bathe in fragrant waters,
fast and enter the chamber,
facing east,
knocking the teeth thirty-two times to honor the **Thirty-two Heavens**,
mentally bowing to the **Thirty-two Transgressions**,
closing the eyes,
and meditating in stillness upon the three-colored clouds—
purple, crimson, and vermilion—
surrounding the body within and without,
where **Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane**
stand arrayed on either side.
The **Heavenly Mechanics of the Southern Palace** and the **Ministerial Gods**
descend before you,
illuminating the chamber with sun and moon,
a radiant halo forming at the nape,
light shining in all ten directions—
so vivid and clear.

The secret incantation:
*"Supreme Mysterious Origin,
Great Dao Lord on High.
Summon forth from my body
the thirty-two **Functional Officials**,
left and right attendants,
celestial boys bearing incense and jade,
celestial maidens transmitting words,
the Five Emperors’ direct talismans,
and the **Direct-Day Incense Officials**—
each thirty-two in number—
to open what is spoken.*

*Today is a day of auspicious joy,
prolonged fasting in the pure hall,
practicing this wondrous scripture of boundless liberation.
May what is invoked ascend directly
before the **Thirty-two Heavens’ Supreme Origin Emperor of Infinite Degrees**.*

*Complete, drawing the **qi** thirty-two times,
facing east to recite the scripture."*

**元始洞玄灵宝本章**
**南宫延生上品**
**天机度人**

*Hidden resonance of the **Great Mystery**,
natural union and separation.
Mingled with **赤精** (Chìjīng, "Vermilion Essence"),
the **Supreme Truth without limit**.
Transformed into the **Southern Extremity**,
the Six Bureaus rule in high grandeur.
**Heaven’s Pivot** commands the armies,
governing the Three Origins.
**Heavenly Mechanics** inspect within,
the **Heavenly Administration**’s concerns—
overseeing the Southern Palace,
supervising the **Life-Prolonging Register**.

From the **元始祖劫** (Yuánshǐ Zǔjié, "Primordial Ancestral Kalpa"),
all heavens were born through transformation.
Illuminating the Two Poles,
water and fire as **Heaven’s Roots**.
Above, no further ancestors—
only the **Dao** as body.
**Nine Dragons’ Cloud Scriptures**,
**Eight Cranes’ True Texts**,
summoning **qi** to command immortals,
invoking spirits to call the true.
**Ten Extremes** fly with reports,
jade tablets and jade inscriptions.
The **Three Provinces** open wide,
planting gods universally.
**太玄都紏** (Tàixuān Dūlǎn, "Supreme Mysterious Capital"),
**枢机辅丞** (Shūjī Fǔchéng, "Pivot-Mechanism Assistants"),
holding seals and enforcing laws,
**Eight Heaven’s Phoenix Texts**.
Without texts, no light,
without texts, no clarity,
without texts, no establishment,
without texts, no completion,
without texts, no liberation,
without texts, no birth—
this is called **Mahābrahmā**,
the **Heaven within Heaven**.

**郁罗萧台** (Yùluó Xiāotái, "Luxuriant Reeds Terrace"),
**玉山上京** (Yùshān Shàngjīng, "Jade Mountain Capital Above").
**上极无上** (Shàngjí Wúshàng, "Supreme Extremity Beyond"),
**大罗玉清** (Dàluó Yùqīng, "Great Luo’s Jade Purity").
**眇眇劫刃** (Miǎomiǎo Jié Rèn, "Faint Kalpa’s Blade"),
as if vanished, as if existing.
**三华离便** (Sānhuá Líbiàn, "Three Flowers’ Separation"),
**南昌妙庭** (Nánchāng Miáotíng, "Wondrous Court of Southern Prosperity").
**金阙玉房** (Jīnquè Yùfáng, "Golden Gate, Jade Chamber"),
**森罗净霐** (Sēnluó Jìngxiāo, "Netherworld’s Pure Mist").
**神霄梵气** (Shénxiāo Fànqì, "Divine Azure’s Sacred Qi")
circulates the ten directions.

Within are the gods of:
**延生** (Yánshēng, "Life-Prolonging") in the Southern Palace,
**南极长生大帝君** (Nánjí Chángshēng Dàdì Jūn, "Great Emperor of Eternal Life at the Southern Pole"),
**神府青华帝君** (Shénfǔ Qīnghuá Dì Jūn, "Emperor of Divine Treasury and Azure Flower"),
**天机上相上吏真神真宰真君** (Tiānjī Shàngxiàng Shànglì Zhēnshén Zhēnzǎi Zhēnjūn, "Supreme Ministerial True God, True Sovereign of Heavenly Mechanics"),
**延生司马大神** (Yánshēng Sīmǎ Dàshén, "Great Spirit Marshal of Life-Prolonging"),
**好生主录韩司丈人真君** (Hǎoshēng Zhǔlù Hán Sī Zhàngrén Zhēnjūn, "True Lord Han, Chief Registrar of Benevolent Life"),
**南上司命司录延寿益算度厄尊神** (Nánshàng Sīmìng Sīlù Yánshòu Yìsuàn Dù’È Zūnshén, "Venerable God of Southern Ascension, Registrar of Fate, Extending Longevity, Calculating Fate and Avoiding Calamities").

Reviving the dead, liberating without measure.
Today’s registration—
all heavens gather at the hall.
**East:** **无极延生注善神王** (Wújí Yánshēng Zhùshàn Shénwáng, "King of Boundless Life-Prolonging, Recording Merit"),
**长生大圣** (Chángshēng Dàshèng, "Great Sage of Eternal Life"),
