**Southern Palace’s Great Longevity Secret Chapter**—
**Eastern Eight Heavens**.

「The **Dao** of the **Eastern Eight Heavens**:
Lo Wu holds the pivot, and its borders stretch with surging waves.
Chuo Mo rejoices in its generals, and the Six Tu stand firm beneath the Emperor’s decree.
It embraces **virtue/power** to nurture life,
and leans on the solitary grace of the **Xian**—
the sharp and noble **Lin** of the **Primordial Spirit**,
the boundless and radiant **Hong** of the **Flame**—
the horns fly in unison, the **Lu** resounds with joy and wisdom.
The **Yue** bestows upon the **Jia** of the **Tong**,
and the **Yun** bestows upon the **Chu** of the **Fu**.
The **Great Brahman’s** **Dao** descends in response,
and the **Pale** **Yin** follows its course.
The **Bite** **Doors** ascend to the **Xiang**,
and the **Ping** **Ning** overflows with sacred script.

**Dao** speaks: Within these **Heavens**, the **Great Brahman’s** **hidden language** is infinite in sound.
The ancient script was carved upon the **Southern Palace’s** **Fengtai**,
summoning the **True Person of the Southern Dipper**,
opening the **auspicious jade calendar**,
prolonging life through endless ages,
and elevating the **Seven Ancestors**.
The Emperor’s blessings descend in abundance,
the body ascends to the **Golden Room**,
and the scriptures are held by the **Red Infant**,
each character vast as a yard.
The **Great Lord of Longevity** once treasured this text,
deeming it the **orthodox sound**.

Those who know this sound,
and practice **fasting** while reciting it,
shall have the **Heavenly Hosts** dispatch the **True Spirit Kings** to descend and observe their **self**.
Their merits shall be recorded with diligence,
and presented to the **Heavenly Hosts** above.
The **Ten Thousand Spirits** shall pay homage,
the **Earthly Deities** shall guard the gates,
and the **True King of Great Function** shall recommend them to **Nanchang**,
thus attaining the **Dao** in full.
They shall wander the **Three Realms**,
ascend to the **Divine Tower**.

This sound banishes all that it encounters,
cleanses all impurities,
elevates all beings,
and fulfills all aspirations—
the **natural sound** of the **Heavenly True**.
Thus, when recited, it summons the **Spirit Kings** to descend and observe,
the **Supreme Sage** to sing from afar,
the **Ten Thousand Spirits** to pay homage,
the **Three Realms** to guard the **Xuan**,
and the **hosts of spirits** to bow in submission.
The **ghostly essences** shall perish of their own accord.

The **Lingbao** resounds with splendor,
the **Ten Directions** grow serene,
the **rivers and seas** fall silent,
and the **mountains and valleys** swallow the mist.
All **sentient beings** tremble in awe,
summoning the **cluster of immortals**,
while **Heaven** remains free of **Yin** **impurities**,
and **Earth** free of **spirit-dust**.
The **Dark Wisdom** penetrates with clarity—
a **mystic abundance** of the **Primordial Spirit**.

*End of the Thirty-Ninth Volume of the **Lingbao Scripture of Infinite Virtue/Power for Elevating Beings***
*Begin the Fortieth Volume.*

**Chapter on the Northern Capital’s Removal of Calamities**

The Dao speaks thus: In days of old, within the Purple Primordial Heaven, the **Elemental Lord of Great Mysterious Light** drifted upon flowing clouds, receiving from **Primordial Origin** the **Supreme Scripture for Removing Calamities from the Northern Capital**. When **Primordial Origin, Lord of the Highest**, was to proclaim this scripture, He circled ten times, summoning the **Ten Directions**, before taking His seat.

Then descended:
- **Heaven-True Great God**, **Supreme Sage of High Veneration**, **True Person of Marvelous Conduct**,
- **Great Emperor of the Northern Capital**,
- **Assemblies of the Luo and Tang Spirits**,
- **Star Lords of the Seven Mansions of the Northern Dipper, Bull, Girl, Empty, Danger, and Wall**,
- **Marshal of the Northern Dipper**, **Inspector of the Northern Capital**, **Officials and Attendants of the Bureau**,
- **Flying Cavalry of the Northern Capital**, **Great God of the Standing Dipper**, **Black Armored Guards of the North**, **Five Qi Chiefs of the Bureau**, **Great God of the Boundless Cold**,
- **Nine Malevolent Spirits of the Northern Capital**, **Captors of the Five Heavenly Marshals**, **God-Kings Who Remove Calamities**, and the **Hosts of the Unrestrained**—all riding the void.

Their **Purple-Hued and Azure-Canopied Chariots**, drawn by **Clouds of Carved-Jade Mountains**, cast **Emerald Shades** and **Jade-Lustered Radiance**, their **Sea-Hued Aura** dense and luminous, piercing the **Great Void**. For seven days and seven nights, the **celestial wheels of the heavens** ceased their turning, the **celestial coordinates** halted, the **Dragon Mountains** stilled their drums, the **Jade Gnomon** moved no more, the **Divine Winds** fell silent, and the **Mountain Clouds** dispersed their shadows. **Heaven’s Virtue** shone pure, **Earth’s Foundation** settled in clarity—within the realm, all **mountains, rivers, forests, and fields** leveled as one, their soil transformed into **spotted jade**, without variation.

The **Assemblies of the Perfected** took their places. **Primordial Origin, Lord of the Highest**, sat aloft in **Void-Floating Purity**, His **Six Radiant Orbs** illuminating the **Nine Palaces of Mixed Qi**, upon the **Jade Mountains and Treasure Forests**.

When the scripture was recited once, the **Great Saints of the Heavens** proclaimed its excellence in unison. At that moment, all men and women of the land, through the **Power of the Dao**, found their hearts suddenly illuminated with clarity.

In past lives, the people had accumulated **karmic debts**, their **retributive sufferings** unceasing, binding them to **Luo and Tang**. Had they not heard this scripture, their calamities could not have been removed.

When the scripture was recited twice, they beheld **Primordial Origin**, His body radiant with **Wisdom-Light**, illuminating the **Ten Directions** like the rising sun. The **Three Officials of the Northern Capital**, the **Upper and Lower Six Abysses**, the **Nine Profound Realms without Interval**, all **grievances and enmities** dissolved, and the **Five Sufferings** ceased their torment.

When the scripture was recited thrice, its **Law-Sound** pure and wondrous, it was heard throughout the **Ten Directions**, and all **heavenly and human beings** attained **flawless enlightenment**.

When the scripture was recited four times, all **common beings** abandoned **venomous hatred**, their **shadowy plots of harm** transformed into **Dharma companions**.

When the scripture was recited five times, the **sufferings of calamities**, the **three great disasters**, and **lingering illnesses** were instantly liberated, and all rejoiced in rebirth.

When the scripture was recited six times, the **true disciples of the land** stilled the **Supreme Void**, their **right-mindedness** penetrating the **Divine Court**.

When the scripture was recited seven times, the **land endured eternal peace**, **venerating the Dao and cherishing life**, free of **private desires**, and none perished by **arrows or wounds**.

When the scripture was recited eight times, the **heavens rejoiced**, the **Northern Capital’s calamities removed**, and all moved in **harmony and sincerity**, attaining the **True Principle**.

When the scripture was recited nine times, **heavenly rainbows descended**, and **earth bore divine fungi**.

When the scripture was recited ten times, the **Great Emperor** appeared in person, arriving to **attest to the Law**, and **heavenly and human beings** praised in unison, their voices echoing through the **Nine Purity Realms**. At that moment, all men and women of the land, without exception, **turned their hearts in devotion**, receiving **protection and deliverance**, all attaining **longevity**.

The Dao speaks thus: When **Primordial Origin, Lord of the Highest**, recited the scripture once, the **Great God of the Northern Capital Who Removes Calamities—Limitless and Boundless of the Eastern Quarter**, with his **Unrestrained Hosts**, floated through the void. When recited twice, the **Southern Quarter’s Great God** arrived. When recited thrice, the **Western Quarter’s Great God** came. When recited four times, the **Northern Quarter’s Great God** descended. When recited five times, the **Northeast’s Great God** appeared. When recited six times, the **Southeast’s Great God** arrived. When recited seven times, the **Southwest’s Great God** came. When recited eight times, the **Northwest’s Great God** descended. When recited nine times, the **Upper Quarter’s Great God** appeared. When recited ten times, the **Lower Quarter’s Great God** arrived.

After ten recitations, the **Great Gods Who Remove Calamities from the Ten Directions** gathered at once. All men and women of the land, **turning their hearts in reverence**, united in **non-action**, finally understanding that **one mind** had forged these **many karmic deeds**.

The **foolish and ignorant**, acting without wisdom, **transgressed loyalty and filiality**, harbored **shadowy treacheries**, were **greedy, ruthless, and obstinate**, **licentious and murderous**, **jealous and destructive of the virtuous**, **violating the forbidden Mysterious Statutes**. Their **souls returned to the Northern Capital**, their **bodies abandoned by the Three Officials**, enduring **sufferings for countless kalpas**, without respite.

Even upon rebirth, **disasters and illnesses** clung to them, none escaping **a single virtue**, unaware of their **accumulated sins**—thus they endured these calamities. If they did not **chant the True Scriptures**, **pray to the Northern Capital**, or **offer thanks to the Seven Mansions**, their calamities could not be removed.

Now, those who hear the **Manifest Law of the Northern Capital’s Removal of Calamities by Primordial Origin**—when they arrive, they come like **fine rain and dense mist**, their **Unrestrained Hosts** causing half the land to sink unevenly, beyond restraint.

Thus, **Primordial Origin** proclaimed to the **Ten Directions of Heaven and Man**: *"Within the Northern Capital’s Luo and Tang lie the **Great Emperor**, the **Six Abyssal Mountain-Cities**, the **Twelve Minor Abysses**, the **Three Officials and Nine Ministries**, the **One Hundred and Twenty Bureaus**, the **Sixteen Prisons**, the **Twenty-Four Prisons**, the **Thirty-Six Prisons**, the **Eighty-One Prisons**, and the **One Hundred and Twenty Prisons."*

Thus, the Great Abyss of the Northern Capital, the Cold Pool, lies far in the Lower Realm’s Eastern North, within the Great Sea. There is the Luo-Tang Mountain-City, named the Northern Capital, governed by the Heavenly Venerable, the Dark True Ghost Emperor—thus it is called Zhengdu.

"Luo" is the name of the city, "Tang" of the mountain, and "Du" signifies its gathering place. Though distant from this Heavenly Domain when viewed from afar, the mountain’s height spans thirty-six million *li*, and its roots sink into the waters another thirty-six million *li*. Its palaces, towers, and gates rival those of the Celestial Realms. Within its bounds, the interrogation of guilty souls never ceases, day or night, their lamentations echoing through the heavens and earth.

This great mountain reaches up to the **Seven Mansions of the Big Dipper and Bull**, each mansion’s **qi** descending into the city below. It is thus under the dominion of the **Yin Spirit of the Northern Dipper**.

Within the Northern Capital resides the Great Emperor, the **Venerable Heavenly Lord Black Emperor**, whose divine form stretches a thousand *chi* in length. He wears the **Primordial Dragon’s Garment**, a round crown and square footwear, riding upon the **Nine Dragons’ Boundless Chariot**. His ministers and attendants number countless billions of ghostly deities.

Yet these ghostly deities are truly no different from mortals—they too are born from the womb, their bodies naturally endowed with **ling** and capable of **bianhua** transformation. Like dragons, serpents, and venomous beasts, they emerge from the egg or the womb, their forms varying in size, their divine transformations beyond measure. The ghostly deities of the Northern Capital are all such.

Their countless multitudes return to the human realm, mingling in marriage, officialdom, commerce, and livelihood—identical in every way to mortals. All are secretly dispatched by the Great Emperor to observe living beings.

When beings fail to restrain their hearts and natures, indulging in unrestrained wickedness—disloyal, unfilial, unrighteous, and lacking in benevolence—their transgressions are meticulously recorded and reported to the Northern Capital. The **Ghostly Kings of the Northern Capital** then tally them by the day and present the records to the Great Emperor. Upon imperial decree, the lives of mortals are thwarted, leading to untimely calamities, all manner of misfortune, and premature deaths—each a self-invited fate. Even after ten thousand deaths and rebirths, escape is impossible.

Out of compassion, I universally rescue and protect, commanding the Northern Capital to remove calamities and extinguish disasters. For the Northern Capital holds many great deities: when all beings submit petitions and supplications, perform solemn rites and erect altars, recite the **True Scripture** openly, and swear to heaven in repentance, their calamities and disasters are instantly dispelled, and their longevity secured.

These great deities are:
The **Ghostly King of the Northern Capital**,
The **Ghostly Marshal of the Northern Capital**,
The **Left Commander of the Yin Dipper**, who oversees birth, named **Ge**,
The **Right Commander of the Yin Dipper**, who oversees death, named **Kai**,
The **Left Commander of the Northern Capital**, who records sins of life and death, named **Guan Sheng**,
The **Right Commander of the Northern Capital**, who presides over all punishments, named **Qi Cheng**,
The **Left Inspector of the Northern Capital**, who examines virtues and transgressions, named **Min**,
The **Right Non-Conformist of the Northern Capital**, who governs the penal archives, named **Guan**.

All the above great deities are the ones who inflict calamities and disasters. Yet they can also remove them. If one submits petitions and prayers with sincerity, even the heaviest burden of calamities will be instantly lifted and released—take it upon yourself to receive this blessing.

All assembled prostrate themselves upon the earth, bow twice, and kneel in reverence, solemnly vowing to uphold this practice. When **Primordial Origin** finished expounding the **Scripture**, the **Crowd of True Ones** supervised and bestowed it upon me. At that moment, my joy and celebration were indescribable.

The essential rites of this **Dao** are now roughly known: the **Ten Directions of Heaven and Man** resumed their positions, and in a flash, all traces of sound vanished. At that time, those who encountered this **Scripture** were universally saved and delivered, their lives preserved for the year, free from any disaster. All under the heavens turned to reverence, their hearts filled with goodness.

They refrained from killing or harming, from witchcraft or jealousy, from lust or theft, from greed or desire, from hatred or **yuan** (resentment). Their words were plain and unadorned, their mouths free from evil speech. They aligned in compassion, transcending differences, and sought harmony as kin. The realm became secure, the people prosperous, rejoicing in eternal peace. The **Scripture of the Dao** emerged, and the entire land followed the **Way**.

Those who approached it with utmost sincerity, revering and worshipping it, were all delivered from the world. The **Dao** proclaims: The names spoken by the Heavenly Venerable **Primordial Origin** within this **Scripture** are all the hidden titles of the Great Emperor within the Northern Capital, their sounds veiled in **yin** (resonance). They are also the internal taboos of the Northern King, the concealed names of the hundred deities—uncommon words of the mortal world.

The **Supreme Sage**, having already attained the **True Person**, delved into the **Primordial Mysteries** and comprehended their depths. Knowing all their chapters, if one recites them ten times, the **Ten Directions of Heaven** will echo in response, the ten thousand emperors will set forth their rites, the **Yin Spirit** will release its grip, and the calamities of suffering will be dispelled. Blessings will naturally manifest, auspicious signs will shine forth, all demons will be subdued, and the **Ghostly Essence** will vanish. Corpses will revive, white bones will reform as flesh, and the dead will return to life.

Scholars of the highest learning, reciting it ten times, will cause the **Northern True One** to tremble in awe, the **Yin Officials** to kneel in reverence, the **Demonic Essence** to lose its sight, and the **Ghostly Calamities** to be severed at their source. They will rescue those near death, who will then live on. This is why: such scholars have yet to purge their **impure qi**, their bodies not yet perfected in **True Essence**. Though they can command the **Ten Directions**, their might does not yet reach the **Heavenly Governance**. Their **virtue/power** can subdue the **Earthly Deities** and bind the **Demonic Spirits**, but only to remove calamities—not to revive the dead.

A lighthearted recitation of this chapter will bring calamities upon oneself. Yet if one honors and venerates it, one’s household will flourish, one’s lineage will prosper eternally, and one will be free from all misfortunes. The **Divine Ones** will protect the gate.

This **Scripture** is supremely noble and wondrous, unmatched in the **Jade Capital**. It delivers countless beings and stands as the **宗** (foundational) of all **Dao**. Its vast and lofty influence is beyond measure, its **virtue/power** insurmountable.

The **Dao** proclaims: For those who recite this **Scripture** ten times, the **Northern Lord** will arrive in full. Countless tens of millions of ancestors will gather, tormented spirits will find relief, and the records of calamities will be severed. All will immediately receive deliverance, ascending to the **Red Palace** and attaining nine years of **hua** (transformation). They will then be reborn as noble beings.

Those who study this **Scripture** with devotion, their calamities lifted and deliverance secured, will ascend to the **Southern Palace**. Mortals who recite it will sever all malevolent influences, and the gates of death will be closed. The Northern Capital will remove calamities, and the **Eastern Hua** (Heavenly Records) will register their names. Thus, their lifespan will be extended, and in the end, they will all attain the **Way of Emptiness Dissolution**—where the **soul-spirit** temporarily vanishes, avoiding the **Earthly Prisons**, and immediately returns to their original form, wandering freely through the **Great Void**.

This **Scripture** is subtle and profound, universally delivering the boundless.
All celestial and mortal beings rejoice in receiving its blessings.
Infinite merits are bestowed upon life and death alike.
Treasured by Heaven, it is not passed down to the mortal world.
Only the virtuous, bearing gold and treasures with sincere devotion,
pledge to Heaven and transmit it.

Leaking or neglecting it brings calamity upon nine generations,
and eternal suffering in the Northern Mountains.

When guarding this **Scripture**, the Five Emperors attend with twenty-four
jade boys and jade girls, their divine retinues protecting the practitioner’s body.

**The Dao speaks:**
In the first month, observe long fasts and recite this **Scripture**—
the Northern Capital removes calamities, and transmission brings swift peace.
For the departed of past ages, it severs earthly imprisonment and rebirth,
ascending to the Southern Palace.

In the seventh month, observe long fasts and recite this **Scripture**—
the Northern Capital removes calamities, and seven generations ascend.
The practitioner attains immortality, their names recorded by the celestial courts,
with yellow talismans and white tablets, erasing death for rebirth.

In the tenth month, observe long fasts and recite this **Scripture**—
the Northern Capital removes calamities, and lifespan flourishes.
As kings and sovereigns, they stabilize their realm,
ensuring eternal rule for their descendants,
forever governing in peace, their lands prosperous.

On the eight festivals, recite this **Scripture**—
the Northern Capital removes calamities, and all beings receive blessings,
becoming True Persons of the Nine Palaces.

On one’s birthdate, recite this **Scripture**—
the Northern Capital removes calamities, erasing fate and death.
The **soul-spirit** clarifies, **qi** endures eternally,
free from suffering, the body radiant.
The Three Realms guard in attendance, the Northern Emperor welcomes,
all spirits pay homage, their names inscribed to Heaven.
With virtue complete and power fulfilled, they ascend to the Upper Purity.

**The Dao speaks:**
On days of practice, bathe in fragrant waters, fast in purity,
enter the chamber facing east, and strike the teeth thirty-two times,
hearing the thirty-two heavens above.
Bow in the heart thirty-two times, close the eyes,
and meditate upon the seated self amid the three-colored clouds—
azure, yellow, and dark.
Within and without, the void expands:
a **Qinglong** (Azure Dragon), **Baihu** (White Tiger), **Zhuque** (Vermilion Bird),
**Xuanwu** (Dark Tortoise), lions, and white cranes arrayed on either side.
The great gods of the Northern Capital stand solemn before the table,
descending to manifest before you.
Sun and moon illuminate the chamber, its brilliance piercing all directions,
a luminous halo forming at the neck, light radiating ten thousand ways—
thus, clearly revealed.

**Secret Incantation:**
*"Supreme Primordial, the Most High Dao Lord.
Summon forth from my body the thirty-two **Gongcao** (Divine Officials),
left and right ministers, jade boys bearing incense,
jade girls transmitting words, the Five Emperors,
Direct Symbols, Direct Day Incense Officials—
each thirty-two in number—
opening the gates as spoken.*

*Today’s joyous blessings, long fasts in the pure hall,
practicing this sublime **Scripture**, delivering countless beings.
May my invocation ascend to the Most High,
before the Celestial Sovereign’s throne of the Thirty-Two Heavens.*

*Thirty-two times the **qi** is drawn forth, facing east to recite the **Scripture**.*

*The Primordial Scripture of Infinite Deliverance, Supreme Mystic Treasure Original Chapter,
Supreme Northern Capital Removal of Calamities, Five **Qi** Deliverance.*

*Yanluo’s hidden echoes, the murky void’s natural law.
The Primordial Elder, the Boundless True One,
Primordial Unity, the Exalted Northern Emperor.
The Seven Battles of Yin, governing Yan City below,
Lo Mountain towering, the Nine Offices divided.
Dragon Han’s ancestral eon, the Northern Capital’s Six Heavens,
Azure River, Vermilion Well, Cloud Gate’s Spring Cavern.*

*Within dwells the great god, his jade sash and dragon cap,
subduing demonic spirits, judging good and evil.
Harsh punishments are meted, sins recorded in detail,
laws upheld without fail, none unheard.*

*The dark bronze prison, the sea’s foundation, mountain roots,
the Ghostly Ancestor of the Great Primordial,
whose bones and flesh form his body.
Through Dao transformation, dragons coil, winds race,
plundering mortal laws, exhaustively probing karmic causes.
Sowing misfortune endlessly, eternally trapped in the Wheel.*

*The Dao possesses the Jade Texts, opening merciful scriptures.
Without scriptures, there is no light,
no clarity, no establishment, no completion.
Without scriptures, there is no deliverance, no rebirth—
this is the Great **Dharma**, Heaven within Heaven.*

*Yanluo’s Northern Terrace, Black Mountain’s Mystic Capital,
the Supreme Highest, the Vast and Pure.
Vast and boundless, as if nonexistent, as if existing,
the Three Hua’s separation, the wondrous court below.*

*The Northern Capital’s lowest realm, the Three Officials of Yanluo,
demonic caves and ghostly encampments, fire mountains and cold pools.
Left purity, right mist—
the Great Radiance’s **Dharma-qi**, encircling the ten directions.*

*Within dwell:
the God of Northern Capital Removal of Calamities,
the Black Emperor Spirit Lord of the Northern Pole,
the Great God Marshal of the Nine-Heaven Capital Prohibitions,
the Northern Yin Heavenly Lord Who Registers Life and Determines Death,
the Northern Dipper God Who Oversees Fate, Records, Extends Lifespan, and Measures Calamities.*

*Reviving the dead, removing calamities, delivering beings.*

*Today’s registration—all heavens attend the hall.*

*The East’s Boundless Flying Heaven Soul-Snatching God-King,
the Long-Living Great Sage, the Infinite Deliverer.*
*The South’s Boundless Flying Heaven Qi-Snatching God-King,
the Long-Living Great Sage, the Infinite Deliverer.*
*The West’s Boundless Flying Heaven Ghost-Slaying God-King,
the Long-Living Great Sage, the Infinite Deliverer.*
*The North’s Boundless Flying Heaven Lo Mountain God-King,
the Long-Living Great Sage, the Infinite Deliverer.*
*The Northeast’s Boundless Flying Heaven Void-Patrolling God-King,
the Long-Living Great Sage, the Infinite Deliverer.*
*The Southeast’s Boundless Flying Heaven Name-Fixing God-King,
the Long-Living Great Sage, the Infinite Deliverer.*
*The Southwest’s Boundless Flying Heaven Capital-Gate God-King,
the Long-Living Great Sage, the Infinite Deliverer.*
*The Northwest’s Boundless Flying Heaven Oversight-Leading God-King,
the Long-Living Great Sage, the Infinite Deliverer.*
*The Upper Boundless Flying Heaven Petition-Recording God-King,
the Long-Living Great Sage, the Infinite Deliverer.*
*The Lower Boundless Flying Heaven Calamity-Removal God-King,
the Long-Living Great Sage, the Infinite Deliverer.*
*The Ten-Direction Most True Flying Heaven Northern Capital Calamity-Removal God-King,
the Long-Living, World-Delivering Great God."*

The Celestial Procession ascends upon Azure Chimeras and colossal beasts,
with flying canopies and galloping wheels, yoked to Qí-Long and the Black-Horned Divine Tiger.
They bear the Summoning Spirits’ banners, radiant with the Divine Pennants’ glory—
before them, the Nine Songs resound in unison, behind them, the Eight Tones harmonize in chorus.
Purple Whales and Dark Feathers chant in melodious wails,
while the Five Elders clear the path and the Host of Immortals wings the chariot’s axle.
Ten thousand chariots, a hundred thousand steeds—
they float through the void, their radiance turning back,
to remove calamities and deliver the living.

The Northern Capital Chancellor, the Six Palaces of Fúchéng,
the Grand Registrar of All Affairs, the Great God of Calamity Removal—
holding the talismanic tablets and registers,
they all present themselves before the Sovereign,
strictly examining the Six Heavens as decreed.

They proclaim to the Three Realms, the Boundless Divine Domain,
the Spirit Valley’s Bureau, the Northern Capital’s Underworld,
the Three Officials and Nine Ministries, the Twelve River Sources—
to absolve ancestral spirits, the countless eons’ kin,
to sever the lineage of calamity and misfortune,
to erase the register of sins and extinguish the roots of evil.
No binding, no forcing into ghostly throngs.
By the Primordial Talismans and Mandates, ascension at the appointed hour.

The Northern Capital’s Cold Pool guards form and spirit,
subdues demons and elevates the worthy,
transcends the Southern Palace’s ranks.
The dead souls undergo refinement, transformed into immortals;
the living bodies receive deliverance, eternal across eons.
With the eons’ wheel turning, they align with Heaven’s years—
eternally delivering from the Three Abysses, the Five Torments, and Eight Hardships,
transcending the Three Realms, unbound in Upper Clarity.

**The Upper Clarity Heavens, the Heavenly Sovereign’s Hollow Void, the Formless Realm of Dharma Practice:**

The Great Primordial Capital of Luo Heaven, ruled by Emperor Mǐn Mǐn Qí Xuān.
The Heaven of Dark Nourishment’s Splendor, ruled by Emperor Pì Qián Dú Wáng.
The Heaven of Jade Treasure’s Transcendence, ruled by Emperor Yǎn Gāng Lóng.
The Heaven of Supreme Clarity’s Salvation, ruled by Emperor Yàn Tú Shēn Méi.
The Heaven of Opening Things and Following Truth, ruled by Emperor Píng Léi Pàn Shēng.
The Heaven of Jade Brightness’ Dawn, ruled by Emperor Mián Dū Qín Zhōng.
The Heaven of Primordial Yang’s Manifestation, ruled by Emperor Gǎn Xiá Luó Wú.
The Heaven of Dao’s Radiant Bloom, ruled by Emperor Dú Xià Yì Duān.

The Heaven of Radiant Virtue’s Proclamation, ruled by Emperor Wáng Jūn Fán Lái.
The Heaven of the Four Extremes’ Broad Crystal, ruled by Emperor Huáng Dù Zhèn Shí.
The Heaven of the Imperial Axis’ Round Stillness, ruled by Emperor Lǜ Yòu Fú Xuán.
The Heaven of Vermilion Clouds’ Recorded Mandate, ruled by Emperor Hū Yán Fú Zhāng.
The Heaven of Sequential Primordial Records, ruled by Emperor Chǐ Jiāng Bǐ Gēng.
The Heaven of Returning Souls’ Sacred End, ruled by Emperor Bǔ Zhí Xī Xīn.
The Heaven of Mixed Clarity’s Deposited Light, ruled by Emperor Bīn Jiā Xī Tíng.
The Heaven of Dao’s Augmented Void, ruled by Emperor Jiāng Lù Cōng Qiáo.

**The Eight Heavens of the West**
The Heaven of Recorded Transcendence’s High Clarity, ruled by Emperor Bào Fú Qì Guī.
The Heaven of Prosperous Wisdom’s Support, ruled by Emperor Lán Xù Qǐ Shí.
The Heaven of Boundless Equanimity’s Wisdom, ruled by Emperor Zhāo Hǔ Yù Míng.
The Heaven of Pure Clouds’ Precious Doctrine, ruled by Emperor Shī Chāng Yù Jǐng.
The Heaven of Universal Illumination’s Earthly Passage, ruled by Emperor Mò Dǐng Kūn.
The Heaven of Elevating Immortals’ Refining Merit, ruled by Emperor Bǎi Zēng Yáo Chǔ.
The Heaven of Pure Spirit’s Rectified Measure, ruled by Emperor Tà Gōu Yǐn Dào.
The Heaven of Auspicious Blessing’s Subtle Operation, ruled by Emperor Hóng Yuán Cì Xú.

**The Eight Heavens of the North**

The **Five Phases Complete and Abundant Realm of Vitality and Longevity**—the Dao speaks:

*"Of old, within the Great Luo Light Heaven, in the wondrously tranquil realm of the Flying True One, the Great Benevolent Ultimate Soil, the Primordial Origin taught the Five Phases Complete and Abundant Realm of Vitality and Longevity, an incomparable supreme grade. When the Primordial Origin Sovereign was to expound this scripture, He circled ten times, summoning the Ten Directions, and then took His seat.

The Heavenly True Gods, the Highest Saints, the Wondrous Conducted True Persons, innumerable hosts without number, rode the void and arrived. Purple mists dispersed their radiance, flowing clouds intermingled in reflection, celestial hymns harmonized, divine winds stilled the echoes, crimson chariots and jeweled canopies, precious cords and jade pavilions, threefold white jade luminosity, ninefold flowery elegance—all resplendent in the boundless expanse. For seven days and seven nights, the palaces of the heavens were observed daily, the moon gates traversed, the starry cords abandoned, the Dipper constellations marked their stations, the revolving spheres and jade weights paused in stillness, divine mists dispersed, mountains and seas concealed their clouds, the heavens knew no floating vapors, the Eight Sceneries shone pure and clear. The land of the realm—its mountains, rivers, forests, and trees—lay level, without high or low, all soil transformed into indigo jade, no hues differing. Vermilion hues and azure clarity intermingled, their reflections shifting in radiance.

The assembled True Ones attended upon His seat, while the Primordial Origin Sovereign sat aloft in the void upon a five-colored lion throne.

After the first recitation of the scripture, the Great Saints of the heavens simultaneously praised its virtue. At that time, the men and women of the realm lived in tranquil longevity, the Five Phases qi fully complete and abundant, without deficiency or harm.

After the second recitation, auspicious clouds shone forth, benevolent dew spread across the void.
After the third recitation, ten thousand treasures displayed their omens, the Five Phases thrived in order.
After the fourth recitation, divine refinement perfected the mind, the people knew no sickness.
After the fifth recitation, celestial lotuses bloomed in splendor, True Immortals manifested in person.
After the sixth recitation, jade infants sang in the void, their voices harmonizing with the Great Cavern.
After the seventh recitation, the Nine Abysses ceased their opposition, water and fire separated at their sources.
After the eighth recitation, true talismans proclaimed grace, both hidden and manifest beings shared in the blessing.
After the ninth recitation, ten thousand spirits welcomed the radiance, the mixed generations unified under the Imperial One.
After the tenth recitation, decayed corpses revived, vital essence formed as human, and at that time, the men and women of the realm—without exception—turned their hearts in devotion, all receiving protection and attaining eternal life.*

The Dao speaks: *At that time, after the first recitation, the Infinite and Boundless Great God of Manifest Virtue from the Eastern Direction arrived with innumerable hosts, floating through the void. After the second recitation, the Infinite and Boundless Great God of Powerful Transformation from the Southern Direction arrived with innumerable hosts, floating through the void. After the third recitation, the Infinite and Boundless Great God of Comprehensive Survey from the Western Direction arrived with innumerable hosts, floating through the void. After the fourth recitation, the Infinite and Boundless Great God of Gathering and Restraining from the Northern Direction arrived with innumerable hosts, floating through the void. After the fifth recitation, the Infinite and Boundless Great God of Steady Will from the Northeast arrived with innumerable hosts, floating through the void. After the sixth recitation, the Infinite and Boundless Great God of Universal Resonance from the Southeast arrived with innumerable hosts, floating through the void. After the seventh recitation, the Infinite and Boundless Great God of Preserving Security from the Southwest arrived with innumerable hosts, floating through the void. After the eighth recitation, the Infinite and Boundless Great God of Rectified Qi from the Northwest arrived with innumerable hosts, floating through the void. After the ninth recitation, the Infinite and Boundless Great God of Primordial Radiance from Above arrived with innumerable hosts, floating through the void. After the tenth recitation, the Infinite and Boundless Great God of Wondrous Spirit from Below arrived with innumerable hosts, floating through the void.*

When the ten recitations were complete, the Infinite and Boundless Heavenly True Gods of the Ten Directions arrived together at once. The men and women of the realm turned their hearts in reverence and submission. Those who came were as fine as mist filling the sky, converging in boundless ranks—innumerable hosts—half the land sinking into a depression, beyond restraint.

Thus, the Primordial Origin moved the True and Divine Realm, gathering eighteen thousand heavens, the Ten Directional lands, the Nine Earthly abyssal springs, and formed them into a single pearl, great as a millet grain, suspended in the void a hundred zhang above the earth. The Primordial Origin ascended and drew in the Heavenly True Gods, the Highest Saints, the Wondrous Conducted True Persons, the Infinite and Boundless Five Directional Complete and Perfect True Gods—innumerable hosts—all entering the precious pearl.

The celestial beings looked on and saw only a surging influx from the pearl’s mouth. Once inside, their whereabouts were unknown. The people of the realm dispersed, the land returned to its even plain, no longer tilted or sunken.

Within the precious pearl, the Primordial Origin addressed all—heavenly beings, humans, immortals, saints, and all ghosts and spirits of the Ten Directions, the innumerable hosts—proclaiming:

*The Five Phases Complete and Abundant Realm of Vitality and Longevity is the ultimate of Heaven and Earth, the essential mystery of the Dao. Only the Highest Saints may comprehend it.

The Five Phases are the divine functions of the Three Powers, the refined essence of the Ultimate Truth. Wind, heat, dryness, dampness, and cold are the Five Phases of Heaven. Wood, fire, earth, metal, and water are the Five Phases of Earth. Joy, anger, thought, worry, and fear are the Five Phases of humanity. Generation, growth, transformation, contraction, and storage are the Five Phases of the Four Seasons. The revolving heavenly qi completes one cycle in six periods. The final span of the earthly realm fulfills one sufficiency in five years. When the Five Phases are complete and abundant, the qi flows in balanced harmony. When the qi flows in balanced harmony, no one meets untimely death, all attaining their full natural lifespan.

The learned of the highest order suppress excess and aid deficiency, ensuring the True Qi endures without the perils of excess or deficiency. Thus, eternal life and immortality are attained, enduring vision without end, securing the Realm of Tranquil Longevity.

The term *domain* refers to boundaries and demarcations, the meaning of sealed territories. The cycles of beginning and end—five and six—converge, and seventy-two periods of qi constitute one era, thirty years in total. Fourteen hundred and forty periods of qi span sixty years, completing one full cycle.*

When the Five Phases are neither excessive nor deficient, then they are not complete and abundant. What is called *complete and abundant* is when the **True Qi** of the **True Dao** is balanced—when the **Lesser Dao** and its **Lesser Qi** are unbalanced, this is not *complete and abundant*.

When the Five Phases are in perfect harmony, the **yin** and **yang** suffer no calamity of mutual suppression. If the **yang** laws are applied in accordance with their nature, one attains **eternal life and immortality**, undergoes **transformation and return**, entering death and rebirth, rebirth and death. Through **feather ascension**, one becomes a **divine immortal**, merging with the Dao, and ascends as a **True Person**.

When the **sutra** is fully recited, the **Dharma Assembly** of all **True Ones** oversees the transmission and grants it to me. At that moment, joy and celebration are beyond words. The **ritual matters** are thoroughly understood; the **Celestial Hosts** return to their proper stations. In an instant, all is silent, leaving no trace of sound.

At that time, **all beings**—both **celestial** and **human**—encounter the **sutra’s Dharma**, universally receiving salvation and attaining their full natural lifespan, without premature injury. All turn to the **Taoist Sage** in reverence, embracing benevolent hearts.

There is **no action, no affair**, **no strife, no desire**, **no greed, no arising**, **no extinction, no thought**, **no gain, no following**. Words are spoken without **singing of the material world**, lips utter no **false sounds**; all are unified in **compassionate love**, and even the **dead** are treated as kin. The realm is **secure and prosperous**, rejoicing in **Great Peace**; the **Dao’s teachings** emerge, and the entire land follows the Way.

Those with **devoted hearts** worship and revere it, all attaining salvation in the world. The Dao speaks: The names of **Primordial Beginning, Celestial Sage**, and others in the **sutra’s** recitation are the **inner names** of the **Celestial Hosts and Supreme Emperors**, the **hidden sounds** of **mystic resonance**. They are also the **taboo names** of **demonic kings**, the **concealed names** of **hundreds of spirits**. These are not the common words of the world.

The **Supreme Sage**, having already become a **True Person**, with the Five Phases complete and abundant, **lifespan unbounded**, mastering the **mysterious and subtle**, knows all its **precepts**. When one recites this **chapter ten times**, the **Celestial Hosts** respond from afar, the **Ten Thousand Emperors** arrange rites, the **rivers and seas** fall silent, the **mountains and peaks** conceal their clouds, the **sun and moon** halt their course, the **celestial sphere** stands still, all **demons** are subdued, **ghostly essences** are extinguished, the **returning dead** rise, and **white bones** become flesh. The **five stellar essences** descend in form, their **qi cycles** complete and abundant, **Dao’s birth** eternally secured. The **purple veins** coil around the brain, the **red sinews** frost the marrow, and the **withered and decayed** are renewed.

Those who study deeply and recite this **chapter ten times** will have the **Five Emperors** as their attendants, the **Three Realms** bowing in homage, and **demonic spirits** blinded. **Ghostly officials** are extinguished, the **dying** are cleansed, and the **dead** are reborn. This is so because the **learned** know the **five qis’** functions, **supplementing deficiencies** and **balancing excesses**, **prolonging life** and **extending vitality**, **fulfilling the Dao’s cycles**, understanding the **principle of birth** and the **root of the Way**. Though the **Five Phases** are not yet fully balanced, **impure qi** has not yet dissipated, the **body** has not yet **penetrated the True**, and one’s **summoning power** extends to the **Ten Directions**, yet the **imperial decrees** of the **Heavenly Sovereigns** remain unmastered. The **virtue/power** can **subdue the Earthly Deities**, **bind demonic spirits**, but only **avert death**—it cannot **revive the dead**. A **lighthearted recitation** of this **chapter** brings **calamity** upon oneself.

With **devotion and reverence**, one’s **gateways flourish**. **Generations prosper**, forming **auspicious connections** with the **good**. **Ten thousand disasters** do not approach, and the **divine luminaries** guard the door.

This **sutra** is **most sacred and subtle**, surpassing all in **Jade Capital**—its salvation is boundless, and it is the **foundation of all Dao**. Its **grand scope** is vast, its **virtue/power** beyond measure.

The Dao speaks: For those who recite this **sutra ten times**, the **Celestial Hosts** gather in full, the **Ten Thousand Ancestors** descend, **wandering souls** are cleansed, and all receive the **transmission**, ascending to the **Vermilion Palace** of the **Southern Celestial Realm**. For nine years, they undergo **transformation**, then are reborn, becoming **noble ones**. The Five Phases, when their **cycles reach nine**, **nine transforms into one**, and **one transforms into nine**, neither excessive nor deficient, great and small in perfect equilibrium.

Then the **metal and wood** cycles harmonize, the **water and fire** merge in **virtue/power**. The **single breath** of **earth** wanders within them. These **four symbols**—the **wandering souls** cleansed—**penetrate the Mysterious and Subtle**, receiving **alchemical refinement**. When the **Five Phases** are complete and abundant, one ascends to **Truth** in nine years, transformed and reborn. Those who **cherish this sutra** and **master its essence** will all become **divine immortals**, ascending to the **Golden Gate**, feasting in **Jade Capital**.

The **highest scholars**, reciting and **cultivating this sutra**, immediately receive the **transmission** and ascend to the **Southern Celestial Realm**. The **Southern Celestial Realm** is the **domain of the five qis and six cycles**—not its proper station is **heresy**, in its proper station is **orthodoxy**. When the Five Phases are complete and abundant, one ascends to the **Vermilion Palace’s** halls of the **Southern Celestial Realm**, receiving the **True Qi** of **orthodoxy**, entering the **body** and attaining **immortality**.

**Worldly beings** who recite this **sutra** will **prolong their lifespan**. *Complete* means **no lack**, *abundant* means **no excess**. All **living beings** who **fulfill this Dao** will have their **lifespan’s domain** securely calculated; afterward, all may attain the **Way of Corporeal Dissolution**.

The **soul-spirit** is temporarily extinguished, **not experiencing Hell’s torments**, immediately **restoring its form**, wandering in **Great Void**. This **sutra** is **subtle and profound**, salvaging **all beings** without end. **All celestial and human beings** rejoice in its blessings. **Boundless merit** extends to **life and death**, all benefiting from its grace.

Though **Heaven’s treasures** are not passed to the **lower world**, the **devoted scholars** offer **golden treasures** with **sincere hearts**, swearing to **Heaven** and receiving its transmission. **Leaking or neglecting** this **sutra** brings **calamity** upon the **Nine Ancestors**, and one is **endlessly enslaved** to **ghostly officials**.

**Twenty-four Jade Attendants**—both **Youths** and **Maidens**—serve this **sutra**, **guarding and protecting** those who receive it. The Dao speaks:

In the **first month**, after **fasting and purification**, recite and **chant this sutra**, and the **nine qis** arise, benefiting the **departed of the upper world**, severing their **Hellish bondage**, and guiding them to the **Southern Celestial Realm**.

In the **fourth month**, after **fasting and purification**, recite and **chant this sutra**, and the **three qis** nourish, bringing **prosperity to all things**. **Relatives and kin** all attain **long life**.

In the **seventh month**, after **fasting and purification**, recite and **chant this sutra**, and the **seven qis** gather, forming **all treasures**. This aids the **myriad people**; one’s **body** attains **divine immortality**, and the **Celestial Hosts** record their names. With **yellow talismans** and **white tablets**, they **abolish death** and **ascend to life**.

In the **tenth month**, after **fasting and purification**, recite and **chant this sutra**, and the **five qis** settle, **blessing the sovereign**. The **nation’s fate** is prolonged, eternally **preserving Great Peace**.

On **auspicious days of the four seasons**, recite and **chant this sutra**, and the **single qi** harmonizes and stands upright, **forever severing harm** and **dispelling pestilence**, ensuring the **people’s safety** and the **land’s joy**. One attains the **station of the Nine-Palace True Person**.

On **days of separation and union**, recite and **chant this sutra**, and the **Heavenly Dao** clarifies, the **Great Earth** stirs not. The **heart** aligns with **Ultimate Truth**, achieving **ascension**, the **soul-spirit** purified, **all qis** enduring. **No suffering** is experienced; the **body** shines with **radiance**, the **Three Realms** stand as **guardians**, the **Five Emperors** **welcome**, and **Ten Thousand Spirits** **pay homage**. Their names are **written to Heaven**; when **merit and virtue** are fulfilled, one **ascends to Upper Clarity**.

The Dao speaks: On the day of practicing the Way, one must first bathe in fragrant water, observe strict fasting and purity within the chamber, and face east. One should strike the teeth thirty-two times, ascending to hear the Thirty-Two Heavens, and with the heart, bow to the Thirty-Two Offenses. Closing the eyes, one meditates quietly, imagining oneself seated amid the three-colored qi-clouds—blue, yellow, and white—while within and without, the darkness thickens. There are nine of Wood, three of Fire, one of Earth, seven of Metal, and five of Water, totaling Twenty-Five True Ones, standing guard on either side. The sun and moon shine brightly, the Five Stars radiate, and a round symbol grows upon the neck, its light illuminating the Ten Directions with such clarity.

The secret incantation is thus:

*"Supreme Mystic Origin, Sovereign Dao Lord of the Highest.*
*Summon forth from my body the Thirty-Six Functionaries of Three-Five, the left and right officials and messengers, the attendants of fragrant jade boys, the speaking jade maidens, the Five Emperors’ direct seals, and the direct-day incense officials—each thirty-six in number—to open the way as spoken.*

*Today is a day of auspicious celebration, with prolonged fasting in the pure hall, practicing this most wondrous sutra to deliver countless beings.*

*May what is invoked ascend directly to the presence of the Most High Supreme Sovereign of the Thirty-Two Heavenly Primordial Emperors.*

*Concluded. Drawing the qi through thirty-two passages, facing east, recite the sutra.*

**The Supreme Primordial Sutra of Infinite Salvation**

The Supreme Primordial *Dongxuan Lingbao* Scripture is complete in the Five Phases, nurturing the domain of eternal life for all sentient beings, and granting tenfold salvation.

The Six Qi and Five Movements converge to achieve ascension, while the Great Void stretches boundless, establishing the Primordial Root.

Divine spirits manifest as fleeting visions, the Great Transformation gives birth to sound, and the Three Mysteries descend to refine, formless and shapeless.

The Eight Enclosures radiate light, yin returns to yang’s clarity, and the interplay of firm and yielding completes the Sovereign Dao’s rotation.

The Jade Mechanism’s flying wheel flows through the Ten Thousand Heavens, its crimson radiance crystalline, the True Qi unbroken.

The Supreme Mystic Emperor, One, opens the Diagram of Life, and the Sovereign’s pristine brilliance receives the True Seal universally.

On green tablets with emerald script, the phoenix-bound divine scriptures shine, the Seven Spirits illuminate, and the Five Phases are complete.

The threads of Heaven and Earth interweave, the wheel turns through the Four Voids, and the august Mystic Scene stands as the abode of Ten Thousand Saints.

Within are the Lords of Broad Mist who record the celestial registers, the Sovereigns of Long Reach who respond to the cosmic cycles, the True Ones of Refined Yin who forge the elixir, the Master of Idle Unity who transforms the qi, and the Lord of Kunlun and Langyang who governs the Primordial Transformation, commands the Dao, extends life, and stands as the Infinite Savior—floating above the clouds, stabilizing the mountains, delivering countless beings.

Today, the teaching is proclaimed, and the Heavenly Hosts gather at the celestial court.

The **East:** The Sovereign God-King of Boundless Origin, the Great Saint of Eternal Life, delivering countless beings.
The **South:** The Sovereign God-King of Boundless Transformation, the Great Saint of Eternal Life, delivering countless beings.
The **West:** The Sovereign God-King of Boundless Mystic Change, the Great Saint of Eternal Life, delivering countless beings.
The **North:** The Sovereign God-King of Boundless Virtue, the Great Saint of Eternal Life, delivering countless beings.
The **Northeast:** The Sovereign God-King of Boundless Hidden Profundity, the Great Saint of Eternal Life, delivering countless beings.
The **Southeast:** The Sovereign God-King of Boundless Supreme Obscurity, the Great Saint of Eternal Life, delivering countless beings.
The **Southwest:** The Sovereign God-King of Boundless Surge Qi, the Great Saint of Eternal Life, delivering countless beings.
The **Northwest:** The Sovereign God-King of Boundless Dao Union, the Great Saint of Eternal Life, delivering countless beings.
The **Upper Realm:** The Sovereign God-King of Boundless Grand Circulation, the Great Saint of Eternal Life, delivering countless beings.
The **Lower Realm:** The Sovereign God-King of Boundless Stabilization, the Great Saint of Eternal Life, delivering countless beings.
The **Ten Directions:** The Supreme True God-King of Established Extremes, the Great God of Infinite Eons.

Together, they ride the gusting winds, in emerald chariots and resplendent palanquins, beneath purple canopies and flying wheels, harnessed by dragons and tigers. The Dao follows the clouds, bearing the crimson-light banner, the sacred phoenix flag, and to the left, the Nine Heavenly Treasures; to the right, the Eight Scenic True Scripts. The divine seals and crimson talismans gather the myriad spirits, with the Heavenly Halters leading and the Seven Primordials following.

From the Four Extremes and Ten Directions, they chant in praise and come.

The Heavenly Scripture shines brightly, summoning spirits and guiding immortals.

Idle Unity assists as minister, the Highest True One of the Great Cavern, the Assistant of Azure Flower, and the First Sage of Ten Thousand Beginnings—all oversee the celestial registers and present themselves at the Imperial Court.

Through the eons, they establish the framework, strictly recording the Five Phases.

Holding the celestial knots, they regulate the cosmic mechanism, ensuring the qi remains unerring.

The Great Eon’s cycle completes, all gather at the Yellow River’s source.
They summon the Bird Mother in haste, command the Qiao Dragon to labor.
The Erdu Hill hosts myriad crowds, below guarding the Kun Mountains.
They pour into the Eastern Well, guiding the waters’ flow.
The vast waves surge and billow, the Ninefold Windy Abyss churning.
Nearly a hundred and sixty times, the Yin reaches its peak and returns to Yang.
Gold and jade dissolve, the Six Extremes dark and boundless.
The Five Constants ebb and surge, water and fire shifting their courses.
When the Auspicious and the Turbid pass, impurities are cleansed and evils purged.
High Immortals descend, raising and guiding the common folk.
The Eternal Peace prevails, feasting in the Celestial Palace.
The Crimson Light unfurls the diagram, the Three Symbols restored in clarity.
I pity all beings, thus descending the Jade Edict.
To the Five Elders I entrust life, ensuring eternal stability.

Vast and boundless, all things governed by the Three Officials.
The Five Sacred Mountains nurture life, above them stand the Five Celestial Deities.
When the Primordial Harmony is complete, forms arise and take shape.
Receiving the Dao’s true mysteries, all attain long years.
The numbers of victory, defeat, and injury are forever severed,
Adrift in the Crimson Palace, ascending to the Great Elixir.

The Great Elixir Heaven—where the Celestial Sovereign, Yuanluo,
Is the realm of mixed unity, the Buddha’s Path of transformation.
The Eight Heavens of the East:
The Great Auspicious Jade Veil Heaven, where the Sovereign holds the Hidden and Illuminates Time.
The Crimson Flower Canopy Heaven, where the Sovereign floats on Radiance, the Primordial Night.

The Heaven of Bright Clarity and Celebrated Name, where the Sovereign Oversees the Celestial Registers.

The Heaven of Illuminating Reason and Extreme Flame, where the Sovereign is the Lu Spirit and Controls Souls.
