The Heaven of Responsive Echo and Congealed Gold, where the Sovereign is the Pool of Jewels and Auspicious Extension.
The Heaven of Splendor and Rectified Austerity, where the Sovereign is the Ghostly Transformation.
The Heaven of Jade Ripples and Initial Splendor, where the Sovereign is the Bright and Illuminating.
The Heaven of Lofty Benevolence and Stirring Depths, where the Sovereign is the Soul’s Guide.
The Heaven of Illuminating the Womb and Transformed Truth, where the Sovereign is the Uprooted and the Elder.

The Eight Heavens of the North:
The Heaven of the Highest Transformation, where the Sovereign is the Crimson Qi and Jade Flower.
The Heaven of Constructing Mysteries and Ascending Leisure, where the Sovereign is the Revealed Immortal.
The Heaven of Restraining Wings and Controlling the Red, where the Sovereign Refines Spirits and Ascends the Clouds.
The Heaven of Straight Wells and Revered Altars, where the Sovereign is the Bright Pine and the Pure Void.
The Heaven of Swallowing Harmony and Accepting Auspiciousness, where the Sovereign is the Hidden Ancestor and the Seeker.
The Heaven of Abyssal Light and Primordial Purity, where the Sovereign is the Fourfold Ascension.
The Heaven of Jade Holiness and Purple Expanse, where the Sovereign is the Residence of the Impermanent.
The Heaven of Cavernous Waves and Mixed Depths, where the Sovereign is the Thunderous and the Five Wheels.

Thirty-two Heavens, thirty-two Sovereigns.
All Heavens conceal their names, the Celestial Names hidden in speech.
The Central Void is empty, yet naturally manifests the Spirit Diagram.
All Heavens conceal their melodies, the sounds of the Central Heaven.
The Central Heaven’s Venerable, the Central Heaven’s Deity,
The Great Celestial Demon, the Central Heaven’s Spirit.

Eight shifts and four coils, merging into the Great Clarity.
The Mysterious Flow’s measure, transformations with eternal constancy.
The Threefold Radiance spreads, nurturing all beings universally.
Ascending and surging, the Two Lights pour and refine the Five Phases.
Upholding the Celestial Norms and Grasping the Cosmic Threads,
They transform all spirits, ensuring the qi is never lacking.
The realm of longevity remains unshaken.

The Seven and Nine interweave, great and small merge.
The Great Wheel turns in transformation, its threads subtle and vast.
The Four Pure Ones return, guiding the spiraling ascent.
Heaven opens, Earth splits—Buddha’s *prana* flows like fire.
The Five Deities soar in light, all beings take form.
The Li and Kan transform into truth, all harmonize in creation.
The Elixir Spirit and Mysterious Abundance,
The Azure Palace vast and clear.

Today, rejoicing in the establishment,
The Three Scenic Radiances ascend,
Stabilizing the Earth’s Knots, turning the Heavenly Threads.
Ascending to the Jade Gates, ranked in the Great Micro,
The Celestial Demon oversees, revealing the Primordial Mechanism.
The Year Star guards the Liver, the Great White inspects the Lungs,
The Mars Star rectifies the Heart, the Venus Star aids the Kidneys,
The Star of Constraint stabilizes the Spleen—
The Celestial Mandate is proclaimed.

The First Elder arises, the Imperial Elder preserves life,
The True Elder descends the qi, the Mysterious Elder opens nature.
The Primordial Elder stands in the Four Directions,
All realms governed in rectitude.

The Nine Qi Immortal Kings strictly review the diagrams,
The Three *Qi* Immortal Kings control and nourish,
The Seven Qi Immortal Kings oversee life and death,
The Five Qi Immortal Kings purify and cleanse,
The One Qi Immortal King sits in vigil at the Heavenly Gates.
The Five Directions’ Highest Truths transform the Heavens, named as Sovereigns.
They fly across the Eight Extremes, commanding the Celestial Hosts.
As the Dao’s Primordial Assistants, they grasp the Four Seas.
They block the origins of evil, dispelling demonic influences.
Their威光 descends to aid, encompassing the Ten Directions.
Thunder and lightning clash, winds and fires spread their might.
All things preserved in safety, the Dao’s transformations bring eternal peace.
The breath of truth settles, all attain longevity.
The Great Range is restored, the Mandate proclaimed far and wide.
The Five Deities join in celebration, their symbols clear and bright.
The Great Killing is revealed, the Dark Combat’s name recorded.
They summon the Six Heavens, inspecting the Cloud Camp.
A hundred evils are crushed, the qi merging with the True Immortals.
The Flame Spirit stirs its威, the Abyssal Radiance holds authority.
All living beings are secure, the realm of longevity extended.
The Primordial Beginning’s symbols are revealed,
The Celestial Officials are commanded to open the path.
No concealment is allowed, the Mysterious Gates are guided.
The submerged multitudes ascend together.
The Azure Flower’s Assistant is ranked above, presenting petitions to the Highest.
The Heavens open, the Calendar is ruled—
The Dragon’s Radiance is fierce, the winds pure.
The Yellow and the White spread truth,
The Great Unity is Mysterious and Void.
The Upper Wheel is the Primordial Dipper,
The Lower Foundation is the Spirit Palace.
The Flying Spirits transform and nurture,
The Buddha’s *prana* is written in clarity.
Faint and distant, the Cavernous Springs,
The Boundless and the Void.
The Heavenly Gates revolve, all grades flow in form.

The Primordial Crafting spans countless kalpas,
In the boundless chaos of Hongmeng’s depths.
The Crimson Light dawns, the Void dissolves in fusion,
Mingled and vast, its essence pure and boundless.

The Great Clarity stretches far and wide,
Faint and boundless, without end.
The Sacred Treasure sets forth its symbols,
The root of all transformations, the ten thousand forms.

The Supreme Micro’s nine pathways,
The Sovereign’s Pole ever more exalted.
The Upper Primordial stands vast,
The Great Cavern’s Jade Scroll revealed.

Thirty-nine Sovereigns, their Red Scripts of jade,
Planting a hundred deities, eternally governing the ten directions.
The Great Void forever secure,
The True Constitution proclaimed abroad.

The Ritual Vessels hold their trials,
Ten thousand scenes unfold their light.
The Mysterious Threads regulate and govern,
Ranked among the Highest True Ones.

Within the True, the Uppermost Spirits,
The Golden Gate’s ministers of aid.
Waving the Purple Mists, the Celestial Qi commands,
The Flowing Sounds extend, their melodies pure.

The Cloud Camps settle their essence,
The Flame Regions fan the gales.
The Dark and Bright weave their net,
Summoned by decree to the Jade Celestial.

The Jade Celestial descends its qi,
Life naturally transforms and arises.
The Dao’s subtleties unfold,
The Whirling Winds honor the Imperial Worthies.

The One, the Primordial Father,
The Dual, the Primordial Sovereign.
Their mingled transformations give birth,
Nurturing the Five Phases.

The Five Phases rule their courses,
The Six Qi succeed in turn.
The Pure Essence’s golden brilliance,
The ten thousand harmonized in transcendence.

The Spirit’s might shines through the Caverns,
Its light illuminates the Nine Heavens.
The True Light descends to aid,
Opening the Dark Gates.

The Great Yin’s bureau and the Yellow Gate’s depths,
Holding the Dao’s commands,
They decree to the Nine Officials.
The Nine Officials present their petitions,
Heard by all the Heavens.

They examine sins and merits,
Fate and karmic ties.
No deviation allowed,
The Precepts clearly proclaimed.

All receive enlightenment, ascend together.
Ascending to the Supreme Pole,
Their names inscribed in Jade Capital.

Above Jade Capital, each has a birth-gate.
Within, the Five Phases’ hollow sounds,
The Magic King’s sacred script,
Words that match the Highest True Ones.

**First, the Flying Immortal praises the Five Phases’ complete sounds:**
The Primordial Beginning unfurls its diagram,
Giving birth to Yin and Yang.
The Two Forms established, the Seven Luminaries fly their light.
The Pure and the Void spread their spirits,
All things unharmed.

The Five Mountains steadfastly settled,
The Earth enduring, the Heavens long.
The Supreme Awakening embodies the Dao,
Merging with qi in unity.

Water and fire ascend and descend,
Their light illuminating Hua Capital.
Above and below, they flow and circulate,
Nurturing the embryonic essences.

The hundred spirits coalesce,
The Whirling Winds return to life.
Flying through the Jade Gates,
Sitting, they observe the ten directions.

They gather the Twin Flowers,
Refining in the Yellow Chamber.
The Five Phases complete,
Preserving Heaven from collapse.

They command the hundred demons,
Their Dao made pure.

**Second, the True Person sings of the realm where life endures:**
The Dragon Han fades into distance,
Returning the Three Flowers.
Born to life, they receive the Dark and Bright qi,
In the net of Yùluó.

Vast and boundless, their desires,
Drowned in the River of Love.
Through endless kalpas, lost in their pursuits,
How could they escape the Wheel?

The Great Demon seizes their forms,
Their wandering souls follow the breath’s return.
Having abandoned the True Path,
Their births—where shall they depend?

Drowning in the Three Paths,
Causing the Heavenly Immortals sorrow.
Why not heed Creation’s heart,
Equalizing life—what need for limits?

The Ten Sections of the Cavernous Mysteries,
As the foundation for attaining the True.
One enlightenment of the Long-Life Dao,
The Spirit Treasury opens wide.

The body enters the Great Void,
The form ascends as an Immortal.

**Third, the Highest True One proclaims the song of transcending the Five Phases to attain the Dao:**

The towering, dark察山,
Where the Jade Celestial was born to this peak.
Entrusted to the Hong lineage’s womb,
In seclusion for countless kalpas.

Meeting the Celestial Sovereign’s grace,
The Sacred Treasure’s laws unfolded.
Heaven steadfast, never tipping,
Serene, he sits in the Golden Gate.

Rescuing countless beings,
His spirit descending to the Dipper’s Pole.
Seizing Heaven and Earth’s mechanisms,
Their threads and measures established.

The Pure Spirit wields the Crimson Banner,
The Azure Sovereign raises the Golden Axe.
Adrift in the Crimson Light,
The Jade Texts emerge, one by one.

All born beings, their Five Phases complete.
Numbers exhausted, returning to the Void—
Who can fix birth and death?

The True Ones who study the Dao,
Why not race the sun and moon?

One recitation of the Flying Heaven’s Text,
A great kalpa may be transcended.
Feasting in the Land of Nowhere,
A hundred thousand Heavens, joy and delight.

This, above the Three Realms,
In the flying space between,
The Immortals’ songs,
Their melodies matching the Cavernous Chapters.

Recite them a hundred times,
Your name ascends to the Southern Palace.
Recite them a thousand times,
The Magic King welcomes you in reverence.

Ten thousand recitations complete,
The Dao is whole—
Ascend to the Great Void,
Cross the Three Realms,
Ranked among the Immortal Lords.

Those who hear the Sacred Sounds,
The Magic King bows in respect,
Commanding the Earth Spirits,
To guard and escort you.
Drawn from the Earth’s Gate,
Free from the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships,
The Seven Ancestors ascend,
Forever parted from the Ghostly Bureau,
The soul passes through Zhu Ling,
Refined and reborn.

This is the boundless,
The endless salvation.

There are secret celestial texts,
Revered by all the Heavens.
To reveal them carelessly is to fall into Hell,
Bringing calamity to the Seven Ancestors.

The Dao says:
These two chapters are the sacred sounds
Of the Heavenly Sovereigns and the Most High Magic Kings,
Hidden in secrecy.

All are for harmonizing the Five Phases,
So they do not clash or harm,
Their courses complete, their qi full,
Summoning the Concordant Breath,
Making life’s commandments
Supplement the broken and severed,
Endlessly renewed,
Blessings descending, the realm of longevity extended.

The Primordial Beginning’s flying mystic qi,
Formed into the Cavernous Chapters, the Great Brahman’s words,
Not the common speech of the world.
Their words lack melodious grace,
Their tunes lack ornate beauty.
Thus they are called profound and obscure,
Difficult to trace in detail.

Treasured by Heaven,
Hidden in the Purple Micro’s Upper Palace,
According to the Mysterious Science,
Transmitted once every four hundred thousand kalpas.

If a perfected one, bearing gold and jade with a sincere heart,
Follows the ancient rites and pledges to the Ten Heavens,
Then it shall be granted.

The Dao says:
When Heaven and Earth’s courses falter,
The sun and moon, the Five Stars wane and wax,
The most sacred and divine rest or decline,
The shallow scholars fall ill—
All are due to the Five Phases being incomplete,
Thus bringing calamities.

When such disasters arise,
All of like breath must unite in heart,
Fast in the six periods,
Burn incense at ten times,
Turn the sutras ten thousand times,
And virtue will descend to dispel all misfortunes.

The boundless texts,
Salvaging the endless.

The Dao says:
The shallow in the Dao are few,
Their Immortal rank not yet complete,
Their fate exhausted, their bodies in the Great Yin,
The Five Phases’ qi
Unfulfilled, insufficient—
Wood and metal steal their essence,
Water and fire assault their breath,
Earth collapses, gold melts,
Their spirits thus depart.

When the time of passing arrives,
The fellow students and sages alike shall perform incense rites for them,
Recite the sutras ten times over,
To guide their mortal forms according to the law.

Then the Five Stars’ qi harmonizes with their vital essence,
Their complete and fulfilled destiny returns to their bodies,
Their souls ascend directly to the Southern Palace,
And according to their learning and merit,
They shall be reborn within a calculated number of days.

With no hesitation in their rebirth,
They attain immortality and divinity.

The Dao says:
When Heaven and Earth’s courses reach their end,
The stars and constellations stray from their paths,
The sun and moon lose their eclipses,
The Four Seasons fall out of order,
Yin and Yang become unbalanced,
The realm suffers plagues and calamities,
Martial qi invades the Dipper,
Pestilence and poison spread,
The common people perish and are wounded,
Teachers and friends meet their fates,
Fellow students perish—
All are due to the varying degrees of the Five Phases’ cycles,
Their actions straying from the Dao,
Defying the complete and fulfilled virtue,
They too must fast, burn incense, and recite sutras.

For fasting, keeping precepts, and reciting sutras,
Their merit and virtue are most profound.
Above, they dispel celestial calamities,
And safeguard the emperor.
Below, they avert poisonous harm,
To deliver the common people.
Life and death depend upon them,
Their blessings are boundless.

Thus it is said: *Unfathomable*—
Universal salvation for Heaven and humanity.

The Dao says:
All who possess this sutra,
Can, for Heaven, Earth, the Emperor, and the people,
Perform such merit.
On days of calamity,
With a sincere heart, they fast, burn incense, and recite the sutras ten times over,
All their deeds are recorded by the celestial hosts,
Ten thousand spirits attend as guardians,
And the sages of the Right Path
Shall surely become holy ministers of the Golden Palace.

The celestial hosts record every person’s merits and transgressions,
Without the slightest omission.
Even the demon kings of Heaven shall recommend your name,
And those who attain the Dao shall truly comprehend these profound words.

From the *Hidden Words of the Great Brahman, Infinite Sound*,
Composed by the Dao Lord,
*Middle Chapter of the Primordial Spirit Scripture*,
Eastern Eight Heavens.

The Mystic Pearl Cavern, the Azure Ford’s unfathomable depths.
The interplay of water and fire—dragon-borne, wondrous Brahman.

Mingled divine and true, without noble splendor or rank.
The White Primordial, brocaded in imperial splendor, within the Tiger’s realm.
The pure landscape returns to golden hue, the scattered halls become clouds.
Qi of male and female overflows, five dews in dazzling profusion.
Their radiant forms intermingle—Emperor of the Central Pool.

Crimson robes, jade caps, purple mists gathering in four.
**Southern Eight Heavens:**
Life’s vitality, enduring longevity—Five Elders ride the Kun.
Light ascends toward the sea, golden elixir seething.
Layered darkness of Luo and Al, void of the Celestial Sovereign.
Swiftly, ten thousand transformations—sacred roots renew themselves.
Heed the Heavenly Taboos, know the depths of an inch.
The verdant capital looms, jade peaks towering and sparse.
Treading white, void-bound, the phoenix’s watchtower wheels with treasure.
Mystic wisdom halts—life and death drift as dust.

**Western Eight Heavens:**
Guard the unknowing, the Dao’s profound obscurity.
Detach from borders, thoughts depart—Divine Expanse has its gate.
Await the utmost void; the void is the honored origin.
Divine motion stirs the cauldron of intent—Three-in-One eternally luminous.
Jade scriptures, precious tablets, the Great Brahman’s golden wheel.
Seal leisure without revealing—naturally attaining the True.
Demons, ghosts, and spirit marshals—summons drive away the miasma.
Fulfill the destined cycles—life’s essence safeguards the body.

**Northern Eight Heavens:**
True longevity, Heaven’s blessings—receiving tribute, nurturing the people.
Nine Chants’ sacred banners, none dare transgress without seeking.
Embrace verdant hues, floating mists over the Luo Terrace.
Nurture the jade canopy’s sprouts—day leads, moon entrusts.
Transforming essence, dragon-spirits—East’s Azure, South’s Netherworld.
Silent reflection on mystic judgments—vast heavens obscure the path.
Thathan’s capital ascends, records of passage inscribed.
The Primordial Emperor’s distant gaze—expansive grace aids sincere devotion.

「The Dao speaks: Within these heavens, the Great Brahman’s hidden words,
Resound in boundless tones. The ancient texts of the Five Senior Emperors of Heaven
Engraved upon the Five Stars and Jade Gate,
To rectify the divisions of destiny,
Descend the *qi* of completeness and sufficiency,
Granting longevity to all living beings—
Each character vast and extended, a *zhang* in breadth.

The True Emperor of Heaven, in ancient times, inscribed these texts,
Establishing them as the correct sounds.
Those who know these sounds,
And can fast while reciting them,
Shall summon the flying heavenly kings of all the heavens,
Who descend to observe their forms,
Record their merits and labors,
And report to the heavens above.
Ten thousand spirits shall pay homage,
Earthly deities attend at the gates,
Great Virtue demon-kings bestow protection,
And elevate the Highly Pure.
The Dao’s completion ensures attainment,
Wandering through the Three Realms,
Ascending into the Golden Gate.

These sounds dispel all obstacles,
Ward off all calamities,
Conduct all beings,
And fulfill all desires—
The natural sounds of the True Emperor of Heaven.
Thus, when recited, they draw the flying kings to descend and witness,
The Supreme Emperor’s distant chant resounds,
Ten thousand spirits pay homage,
The Three Realms attend at the hall,
All deities bow in reverence,
Demon spirits perish of their own accord,
And the *ling* and *lang* gems tremble in response,
The Ten Directions grow serene,
Rivers and seas fall silent,
Mountains and valleys swallow their mists,
All living beings tremble and submit,
Summoning the assembled immortals,
The heavens free of miasma,
The earth free of demonic dust,
The netherworld’s wisdom pierces and clarifies—
This is the boundless, profound Great Virtue.

**Scripture of the *Lingbao* Mystic Treasures: Supreme Method of Boundless Degrees**
*Chapter 41 concludes. Chapter 42 begins.*」

The **Supplication for Continuing Lineage and Prolonged Prosperity** speaks thus:

In days of yore, within the **Great Beginning Broad-Generating Heaven**, in the **Purple Mists Cavernous Song of Great Blessedness and Joyous Realm**, the **Mystic Scripture of Supplication for Continuing Lineage and Prolonged Prosperity** was received from the **Primordial Beginning’s Transmission**.

When the **Primordial Beginning Venerable Sovereign** delivered this scripture, circling ten times in recitation to summon the Ten Directions, the **Heavenly True Gods**, the **Supreme Saints**, the **Wondrous Conduct True Persons**, and the countless **Unfettered Hosts** arrived, riding the void. Fragrant mists floated like smoke, soaring cranes followed their banners, crimson light blazed ahead, jade carriages rolled with thunderous wheels, and resplendent celestial clouds shimmered in myriad hues, illuminating the boundless expanse.

For seven days and seven nights, the heavens and great mountains exchanged azure and roseate brilliance, while the sun, moon, and stars shone with concentrated clarity. Divine winds swept from afar. Jade cliffs glowed with dew, celestial emeralds hung in the high void, and crimson qi drifted, rendering the land’s earth, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees pure and level—so clear that even the finest hairs were visible, with overlapping reflections and unified patterns. The soil transformed into soft jade, all tinged with indigo-green.

The assembled **True Ones** attended at the seat, while the **Primordial Beginning Venerable Sovereign** sat in void-suspended lotus-petal gemstone platform.

After the **first recitation**, the **Heavenly Saints** of all realms simultaneously proclaimed its excellence. At that time, all men and women of the land awakened to the root of birth.

After the **second recitation**, they steadfastly observed the **Original Source**, avoiding suffering’s paths.

After the **third recitation**, they all knew the **Supreme Dao**, the origin of birth and generation.

After the **fourth recitation**, they were born in an **Age of Saints**, becoming virtuous and wise scholars.

After the **fifth recitation**, their hearts practiced filial piety and benevolence, excelling in nurturing the aged.

After the **sixth recitation**, **Yin and Yang harmonized in virtue**, nurturing spiritual embryos.

After the **seventh recitation**, they attained the **Supreme Law’s Gate**, their Dao-born lives unending.

After the **eighth recitation**, though they took birth, they were free from desire and attachment, severing lustful thoughts.

After the **ninth recitation**, they comprehended the **Subtle Mysteries**, blending male and female, their essence penetrating the **Void’s Profound**.

After the **tenth recitation**, all sentient beings eternally prolonged their lineage, rejoicing across the boundless seas, their blessings extending to both the living and the departed. At that time, all men and women of the land—without exception—devoted their hearts, receiving protection and attaining longevity.

The **Way** speaks thus:

When the **Primordial Beginning Venerable Sovereign** completed the **first recitation**, the **Cloud-Bud Divine Dew Great God of the East’s Boundless Limitless Realm** arrived with the **Unfettered Hosts**, floating through the void.

When the **second recitation** concluded, the **Cloud-Bud Jewelous Flower Great God of Illuminated Nature from the South’s Boundless Limitless Realm** arrived with the **Unfettered Hosts**, floating through the void.

When the **third recitation** concluded, the **Cloud-Bud Sensitizing Great God of Great Substance from the West’s Boundless Limitless Realm** arrived with the **Unfettered Hosts**, floating through the void.

When the **fourth recitation** concluded, the **Cloud-Bud Stabilizing Infant Great God of Divine Water from the North’s Boundless Limitless Realm** arrived with the **Unfettered Hosts**, floating through the void.

When the **fifth recitation** concluded, the **Cloud-Bud Illuminating Wisdom Great God of Received Cognition from the Northeast’s Boundless Limitless Realm** arrived with the **Unfettered Hosts**, floating through the void.

When the **sixth recitation** concluded, the **Cloud-Bud Gathering-Use Great God of Threaded Filaments from the Southeast’s Boundless Limitless Realm** arrived with the **Unfettered Hosts**, floating through the void.

When the **seventh recitation** concluded, the **Cloud-Bud Chief Blessing Great God of Virtuous Essence from the Southwest’s Boundless Limitless Realm** arrived with the **Unfettered Hosts**, floating through the void.

When the **eighth recitation** concluded, the **Cloud-Bud Healthy Nurturing Great God of Yang Momentum from the Northwest’s Boundless Limitless Realm** arrived with the **Unfettered Hosts**, floating through the void.

When the **ninth recitation** concluded, the **Cloud-Bud Nine-Palace Great God of Azure Lotus from the Upper Realm’s Boundless Limitless Realm** arrived with the **Unfettered Hosts**, floating through the void.

When the **tenth recitation** concluded, the **Cloud-Bud Reviving Command Great God of Spiritual Treasury from the Lower Realm’s Boundless Limitless Realm** arrived with the **Unfettered Hosts**, floating through the void.

As the tenfold recitation reached completion, the **Boundless Limitless Heavenly True Gods of Transformation** from all Ten Directions arrived simultaneously. All men and women of the land bowed in reverence, awakening to the **Dao’s Source**, establishing lineage continuity, and perpetuating the foundation of birth and generation. They inherited ancestral blessings, extending prosperity without end.

Those who came were as dense as fine rain and mist. The **Unfettered Hosts** caused half the land’s soil to sink unevenly—an occurrence beyond restraint.

The **Primordial Beginning’s Great Compassion** sought to enlighten countless beings, revealing the mysteries of **Creation’s Workings** and the **Dao’s Depths**. Thus, the **Supreme Mysteries** were concealed in secrecy to manifest the **Divine Pair’s Unity**—the **Yin-Yang** as the **Trigram’s union**, blending a hundred deities, swirling like mist and dispersing wind, transforming into the **True One**, which is the **Ultimate Secret of Human Perfection**.

Even the **Flying Transmitted Listed True Ones**, before attaining the Dao, would descend golden elixirs by casting cloud-pearls, their **Profound Sensitivities** merging to produce this **Spiritual Embryo**, its **qi and essence** fully formed. Within, the **True Body’s Unmoving Form** manifested, and the **Method of Supplication for Continuing Lineage and Prolonged Prosperity** was expounded.

The root of life begins with **Primordial Qi’s** cultivation. The **Qi’s essence** is as fine as a thread’s grain.

Thus, a **Treasure Pearl**—as large as a millet grain—was suspended in the void, ten zhang above the earth. The **Primordial Beginning** ascended and summoned the **Heavenly True Gods**, the **Supreme Saints**, the **Wondrous Conduct True Persons**, and the **Ten-Directional Boundless Limitless Cloud-Bud Generative Jade Infant True Child Great Gods**, along with the **Unfettered Hosts**, all entering the pearl.

The **Heavenly and Human** gazed upward, seeing only a faint flutter from the pearl’s mouth. Once inside, their whereabouts were unknown. The people dispersed, and the land returned to its even state, with no further subsidence.

The **Primordial Beginning** then, within the pearl, transformed into the **Lotus-Birth Infant Form**, completing the scripture’s delivery. The **Assembled True Ones** oversaw the transmission.

It was bestowed upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. The **Law’s rites** were fully observed, the **Heavens’ deities resumed their stations**, and in a flash, all traces fell silent.

At that time, those who encountered the **Scripture’s Law** saw their lineages flourish, blessings descend, and their entire year pass without misfortune. All bowed in devotion, their hearts turned to goodness.

「Practicing benevolence and harmony, practicing gentleness and transformation, practicing pity and forgiveness.

Practicing frugality and compassion, practicing steadfastness and humanity. Their words held no sectarian chanting, their mouths no flattery—all in equal accord with compassion. Even the divergent and the profane became kindred.

With the land secure and the people prosperous, they rejoiced in the Great Peace. The Dao/Way began to manifest its teachings, and the realm was governed by the Dao/Way.

Those with sincere devotion revered and honored it, all attaining the power to save the world.

The Dao/Way’s words: The names spoken by the **Primordial Beginning** (元始天尊) within the **Scripture’s Law** are indeed the sacred titles of the **Heavens’ deities** (诸天上帝). The hidden resonance of nurturing life and fostering the infant form. They are also the **true taboos** (真魔内讳) of the **hidden transformations** (混化变胎), leading to the flourishing of lineage and the blessings of the hundred spirits.

To open and expound the Great Law, to illuminate the root of the Dao/Way. Initially from the nurturing of the embryo, **Juzing** (朱精) and **Bailian** (白铅) blend. The harmonious mixing of myriad faults, the **Three—Drums** (三－鼓) dancing in rhythm.

With **Yuyi** (玉饴) nourishing the spirit, **liu-zhu** (流珠) awakening clarity, the **Imperial Consorts** (帝妃) performing the sacred dance, the **purple cells** (紫胞) splitting open, the **Heavenly Infant** (天婴) rising forth.

Named **True One** (真一), with the domain of **Jingyan** (精延). As the sovereign of form, the honored one of all spirits.

Firmly rooted in the **Primordial Dao/Way** (固道元命), the true body of the **Dao/Way’s birth** (生道真身).

Now you wish to pray for a virtuous heir, to ensure the prosperity of your lineage, so that the **qi** does not perish and the Dao/Way remains boundless.

Only those who have attained the **Great Sage of the Dao/Way** (已得道大圣) can fully comprehend its teachings.

Reciting this chapter ten times, the **Heavens’ deities** (诸天) chant in harmony from afar, the **Ten Thousand Deities** (万帝) arrange their rites, the **Holy Mother** (圣母) breaks the bonds, the **Spirit of Life** (司命) decrees birth, the **Guardian of Souls** (监魂) enhances virtue, blessings and rejoicing multiply in abundance, the **host of demons** (群魔) are subdued in form, the **vital essence of ghosts** (鬼精) vanishes completely, the dead rise and the unborn are reborn.

For those of **highest learning** (至学之士), reciting this chapter ten times brings the **Celestial Palace’s** (玉京) protection, the **Three Realms** (三界) singing in reverence, the **Heavenly Mechanism** (天机) descending to assist, and the **Spirit of Life** (注命) granting rebirth.

The lineage flourishes, blessings extend to the gates of the noble, and those in peril are delivered—none are lost, all preserved complete.

Thus, for you: The scholars purify the outer world of its **filth** (世殗), and inwardly attain the **depths of transformation** (化渊). The **Youthful Immortals** (童君) present the **sacred tablets** (箎), the **Female Immortals** (女君) play the **xun flute** (埙), their voices harmonizing as the **spirit** spreads, and the **wondrous taboos** (妙讳) are transmitted. The **Dao/Way’s embryo** (道胎) nurtures the **spirit’s gestation** (灵孕), and the infant breathes naturally.

Summoning and commanding the **ten directions** (十方), they safeguard and refine the **embryonic Immortals** (胎仙), ensuring the descent of noble heirs, with none dying prematurely.

A careless recitation brings calamity upon oneself. Reverent offerings and proper rites extend blessings to the lineage, generation after generation, in eternal flourishing. The Dao/Way’s virtue remains boundless, and the **spirits of light** (神明) guard the gates.

This scripture is most sublime, unparalleled in the **Celestial Capital** (玉京). Its power to deliver beings is immeasurable—it is the **root of the Dao/Way’s birth** (生道之宗).

Awe-inspiring and vast, its **virtue/power** (德) is beyond measure.

The Dao/Way’s words: For those who recite this scripture ten times, the **Heavens’ deities** (诸天) gather in full, opening for you the **Registry of Life** (生录), granting noble descendants to continue the lineage, and perpetuating the **Great Sage’s lineage** (大仙宗).

Even those with **ten thousand ancestors** (亿曾万祖) and **suffering souls** (幽魂苦爽) shall receive this deliverance, ascending to the **Vermilion Palace** (朱宫), all attaining nine years of transformation, reborn through the Dao/Way’s nurturing, and becoming **noble beings** (贵人).

Those who love this scripture and recite it diligently, with **virtue/power** (功满德就) fulfilled, shall have descendants and grandchildren who become **Immortal** (仙), each leaf receiving the Dao/Way, the lineage rejoicing in blessings, all ascending to the **Golden Gate** (金阙) and feasting in the **Celestial Capital** (玉京).

For those of **highest learning** (上学之士) who recite this scripture and pray for descendants among all living beings, ensuring the **Dao/Way’s birth** (生道) never ceases and the people have heirs, honoring the **ancestral mysteries** (祖玄) through sacrifice, their **hidden virtue** (阴德) bestowed in abundance.

All shall receive this deliverance, ascending to the **Southern Palace** (南宫).

When beings of the world recite it, their **lifespans** (冑系) and **progeny** (绵昌) extend, ensuring long life and all attaining the **path of the corpse-resolution** (尸解之道).

Their **soul-spirits** (魂神) temporarily vanish, not passing through the **hells** (地狱), immediately returning to form, wandering freely in the **Great Void** (太空).

This scripture is subtle and profound, delivering beings without end. All **Heavens’ deities and mortals** (天人) receive its blessings.

Immeasurable blessings, granting mercy across life and death. It is treasured by the **Heavens** (上天), not transmitted to the lower world.

Only those of **highest virtue** (至士) who offer **golden treasures** (赍金宝) with sincere devotion may swear to the **Heavens** (盟天) to keep this scripture from being carelessly revealed or leaked.

Calamity falls upon the **nine ancestral lines** (殃及九祖). Endless servitude in the **Netherworld’s offices** (长役冥官).」

Attended by the Five Sovereigns, twenty-four Jade Boys and Jade Girls each, they guard and protect the sacred scripture and those who receive it with divine presence.

The Dao speaks: In the first month, observe a long fast, reciting and chanting this scripture. Pray for descendants and prosperity of one’s lineage, invoking the divine winds and fire lords of the gods, who transmit celestial radiance, granting life to the command. The wise and enlightened, the brightest among mortals, shall be raised from the dead of past ages, freed from earthly bonds and servitude. They ascend to the Southern Palace.

In the seventh month, observe a long fast, reciting and chanting this scripture. Pray for descendants and prosperity of one’s lineage, invoking the golden qi of the Yellow Chamber, transmitting the numinous essence, so that form may be perfected. The palace halls grow firm within, a hundred spirits enter the womb, the body becomes divine and immortal. The names of all the Heavens are inscribed—yellow talismans, white tablets—transforming death into life.

In the tenth month, observe a long fast, reciting and chanting this scripture. Pray for descendants and prosperity of one’s lineage, invoking the supreme essence of the One Dao. Transmit the luminous spirit, so that nature may pierce the boundless void, wisdom illuminate the Nine Dark Realms, foresight discern omens before they arise, and one may harmonize with transformation, becoming king or emperor. Pray for sacred descendants, with jade and orchid blooming in abundance, a hundred spirits rejoicing, all under Heaven receiving blessings. Stabilize the nation’s fate, preserve Heaven’s enduring existence, ensuring the lineage never ceases, always ruling as sovereign, pacifying the realm, and the people calling it the Great Peace.

On the eight seasonal festivals, chant this scripture for those without descendants, descending Dao-qi to grant them children, establishing their families, and making them True Ones of the Nine Palaces.

On one’s birth-day, chant this scripture to return to the Three Primordials, congealing the white pearl of spirit. The Dao-Father and Dao-Mother eternally guard the cinnabar field. The Record-Keeper of Life registers one’s fate, the Lord of Flowers extends one’s years, the soul-spirit clarifies and steadies, and the ten thousand qi endure. One does not pass through suffering, and the body radiates with light. The Three Realms attend as guards, the Five Sovereigns welcome, and ten thousand gods pay homage. One’s name is inscribed in Heaven, virtue fulfilled, ascending to the Upper Purity.

The Dao speaks: On the day of practice, one must bathe in fragrant waters, fast in purity, enter the chamber facing east, and strike the teeth thirty-two times, ascending to hear the Thirty-Two Heavens. Bow in the heart thirty-two times, close the eyes, and in stillness, imagine oneself seated amid five-colored clouds, inner and outer darkness enveloping. There stand the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane, arrayed on either side. Sun and moon illuminate, the chamber glows brightly, a round symbol forms at the nape, its light radiating the ten directions—thus, clearly manifest.

The secret incantation:
*"Supreme Mysterious Origin, the Most High Dao-Lord.
Summon forth from my body the thirty-five officials of the Three-Five, left and right officers and messengers, the Jade Boys attending with incense, the Jade Girls transmitting words, the Five Sovereigns’ direct seals, the direct-day incense officials—each thirty-six in number—opening the way as spoken.*

Today is a day of auspicious joy, a long fast in the pure hall, practicing this most wondrous scripture, delivering countless beings.

May what is invoked ascend directly to the Supreme Throne of the Most High, the Thirty-Two Heavenly Origins, the Most Venerable Emperor of the Beginning.

*Conclude, drawing qi thirty-two times, facing east to chant the scripture.*

**The Supreme Origin’s Scripture of Boundless Deliverance, Supreme Purity, and Sacred Treasure’s Essence Chapter**
*Invoking descendants, blessing the lineage, transforming and delivering beings.*

Hidden in yin and yang, blending with Nature.
From the Void arise the Three Qi, transforming into the Red Script.
In the Primordial Ancestor’s eon, the Heavens are born.
Opposing luminaries arise—this is the Heavenly Root’s beginning.
Transmitting qi to establish the Ancestor, the Dao’s law as body.
The Five Scripts unfold, the Five Viscera house the spirits.
Above lies the Celestial Gate, where the immortals dwell in emptiness.
The meridians and blood vessels—these are the most sacred.
Commanding all things, the body embodies Heaven’s laws.
Transmitting the womb’s continuation, succeeding ancestral lines.
Praying for auspicious qi, noble blessings descend upon the hall.
The embryo receives the True—spirits arrayed, intertwined.
Azure threads pierce the pupils, green silk as sinew.
Destined for the Immortal Lineage, ascending to the High Mysteries.
The body bears the Vermilion Mark, the tongue bears the Brocade Text.
Thirty-six thousand divine symbols encircle the body.
Forever aiding the Emperor’s transformation, ascending to the Jade Court.
Below, nurturing all things, all wear Heaven’s sacred marks,
the Great Brahman’s flow within the body.
The head is the Xiao Terrace, the brain the Jade Mountain.
Nine bends in the spine, palaces connected.
Before lies the Hall of Light, the Three Lords of the Crimson Mirror.
Behind lies the Dark Hall, the Nine Ancestors and Seven Mysteries.
Recording descendants, blessing the family’s door.
The Celestial Hour’s tablet is presented, the Heavenly Horse delivers it.
The son is registered, the grandson continues the line.
The heart’s inch is vast and empty, high immortals seated within.
In purple robes and crimson skirts, like Heaven’s child.
At festivals in valleys and streams, all become the Jade Capital.
A hundred gods gather in the body, a wondrous court.
Golden gates, jade chambers, the Pure Mists arrayed.
The Great Way’s Brahman-qi circulates the ten directions.
Within are the gods of boundless deliverance and no-death,
within is the Southern Pole Lord who descends to grant descendants and longevity,
within is the World-Delivering Marshal God,
within is the Good-Generation Han Lord,
within is the Southern Record-Keeper of Life, the Lord of Extending Years and Calculating Fate,
who turns decay into rebirth, delivering countless beings.

Today’s compilation is attended by all the Heavens in their halls.

**East:** The Boundless Flying Heaven Lord of Fortune, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer.
**South:** The Boundless Flying Heaven Lord of Fixed Birth, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer.
**West:** The Boundless Flying Heaven Lord of Registering Descendants, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer.
**North:** The Boundless Flying Heaven Lord of Bestowing Blessings, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer.
**Northeast:** The Boundless Flying Heaven Lord of Increasing Equality, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer.
**Southeast:** The Boundless Flying Heaven Lord of Enhancing Rank, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer.
**Southwest:** The Boundless Flying Heaven Lord of Sending Life, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer.

The Boundless Flying Heaven Lord of Crossing Calamities, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer.

**Upper Realm:** The Boundless Flying Heaven Lord of Advancing Virtue, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer.

**Lower Realm:** The Boundless Flying Heaven Lord of Assisting the Sage, the Great Sage of Longevity, the Boundless Deliverer.

**Ten Directions:** The Most True Flying Heaven Lord of Bestowing Auspicious Blessings, the Boundless Sage of Longevity and Universal Deliverance.

Riding the Light Cloud and flowing in the jade carriage,
Emerald mist and jade palanquin,
Star-chariot with feathered canopy,
Ornate halberd and wind-wheeled banner,
Yoked with the Azure Phoenix,
Divine Tiger and Azure Dragon,
Establishing the grand rites of myriad transformations,
Heavenly cavalry beneath the spirit banner,
Forefront howling with the Nine Spirits in harmony,
Aftward blowing with the Eight Echoes in unison,
The Lion Sky Ascendant,
Howling in song—*wūwū*,
The Five Elders clearing the path,
The host of sages winging the yoke,
Ten million riders and myriad cavalry,
Floating through the void and returning with radiance,
Descending to nurture and deliver life.

**South:** The Supreme Sovereign of Nanchang,
The Celestial Mechanic Chancellor,
The Golden Threshold Attendant,
The Great Mystic of Life,
The Purple Spirit Celestial Master,
Han the Record-Keeper,
The Superintending Sage of Birth,
Holding the talisman and grasping the register,
All arriving at the Emperor’s court.

As one prays, so it is answered,
Life and progeny flourish abundantly.
Calculating destiny and fortune,
Strictly overseeing all the heavens.
Universally proclaiming to the Three Realms,
The Boundless Divine Realm,
The Watery Bend’s Domain,
The Northern Capital of Luocheng,
The Three Officials and Nine Departments,
The Twelve River Sources.

To attain noble triumph,
And ensure endless lineage.
Above, resolving ancestral debts,
A hundred billion kin of past lives,
Swiftly erasing the ledger of sins,
Extinguishing evil roots,
No longer bound or confined,
Forced to join the ghostly throng.
The Original Beginning’s talisman of fate,
At the appointed hour, ascension and promotion.
The Northern Capital’s Cold Pool,
Guarding the form and spirit.
Subduing demons and safeguarding ascent,
Delivering souls to the Southern Palace.
Dead spirits undergo refining,
Transformed into immortals.
Living bodies receive deliverance,
Enduring through countless eons.
With the eon-wheel’s rotation,
Matching the lifespan of heaven.
Forever crossing the Three Paths,
The Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships,
Transcending the Three Realms,
Leisurely soaring in the Upper Pure.

**Upper Pure Heaven:** The Heavenly Emperor of Cavernous Radiance,
The Boundless Realm of the Formless Dharma.

**Eight Heavens of the East:**
The Heaven of Tenfold Auspicious Summons,
Emperor of Cavernous Awareness and Benevolent Life-Giving.
The Heaven of Victorious Lineage and Augmented Merit,
Emperor of Established Worldly and Mysterious Prosperity.

Emperor of Auspicious Brilliance and Noble Excellence.

Emperor of Resembling the True Original, the Great Kun.
The Heaven of Recorded Talismans and Responding Platform,

The Heaven of Transmitting Auspicious Blessings,

The **Thirty-Two Heavens**, the **Thirty-Two Emperors**.

The hidden names of the heavens,
The mechanism of birth and transformation.
The concealed titles of the heavens,
The subtle designation of nurturing infants.

Harmonizing Yang and uniting Yin,
Continuing generations and succeeding the people.
Spirits emerge from the void,
Sprouts and seeds grow.
Naturally manifesting the sacred script,
The Upper True’s hidden name.
The summoning sound of the Qi,
Emperor of the Single Womb’s Veneration.
The binding spirit of the knot,
Subordinated to the True Original’s Demon.
The nurturing infant’s Immortal,
The Nine Yang’s harmony.
The ten Yin’s union,
Destined lineage and honor,
Gate and house in perpetual joy.

The Boundless’s profound mystery,
Deep beyond measure.
Deploying the divine essence,
Universally delivering gods and mortals.

Today, in supplication for deliverance,
Passing through all the heavens,
Requesting the extinguishing of the karmic register,
Severing all heretical paths.
Giving birth without calamity,
Life extending to the Great Mystic.
The Life Official supervises and safeguards,
No obstruction at the birth gate.

The Eastern Dipper draws the Qi,
The Western Dipper molds the form,
The Northern Dipper descends the spirit,
The Southern Dipper bestows the soul,
The Central Dipper governs the inner master,
The Mud Pellet’s Venerable Spirit.

Palaces of seven treasures,
Windows and doors distinctly partitioned.
Divine Qi overflows,
Overseeing all spirits.
The Green Emperor guards the soul,
The White Emperor attends the spirit,
The Red Emperor nourishes the Qi.
The Black Emperor conducts the blood,
The Yellow Emperor governs the Two Million Spirits—none escape.

**Heavenly Magical Sovereigns:**
The Green Heaven Magical Sovereign,
In wrath, commanding with fierce clarity.
The Red Heaven Magical Sovereign,
In transformation, guarding the true.
The White Heaven Magical Sovereign,
In fury, striking the void.
The Black Heaven Magical Sovereign,
The wheel-hub of dark mystery.
The Yellow Heaven Magical Sovereign,
Holding and clashing in mutual contention.
The Five Emperors’ Great Magical Sovereign,
The lineage of all spirits.
Flying and marching with the drum,
Commanding the ghostly armies.
Waving the banner and beating the drum,
Roving through the vast heavens.
Illusive and fleeting,
Descending into the mortal body.
Lurking in the six senses,
Patrolling the nine palaces.
From crown to sole,
No place they do not occupy.
To summon fate and ensure lineage,
To wish for the birth of a celestial child.
Purifying and dispelling the karmic defilements,
Strictly confining the Northern Luocheng.
The Divine Sovereign receives command,
Sweeping away all inauspiciousness.

The Jade Maiden embraces the Yellow,
Embroidered robe with golden pendants.

The Holy Mother guards life,
Blessings resound resplendent.

The Prefect’s armored ranks advance,
Hunting down calamity and woe.
The Celestial Officers’ armored ranks,
Sever and deliver to Heaven’s decree.
Hurl flames ten thousand *li*,
Ring bells through the eight directions.
Dare any to block or obstruct the womb-child—
Gold-axe strikes first, the Great Mother’s punishment follows.
Slaughtering the ghostly essence,
Wind and fire relent not.
Thousands beheaded, ten-thousands dismembered.
No demon dares transgress, no ghost dares linger.
The Three Officials of the Northern Luocheng,
Inspect the ghostly encampments.
No hiding permitted—
Submitted to the Golden Horse Relay.

Proclaim to the boundless,
All spirits heed.
The Three Realms’ Five Emperors,
Speak to the Highest Purity.

The Primordial Origin begins,
Dragon and Han extend prosperity.
Body akin to mortal embryo,
Chaos enfolds all.
Eyes as sun and moon,
Head as Kunlun,
Brows as the Canopy,
Hair as mountains and forests,
Intestines as rivers and seas,
Breath as wind and clouds,
Voice as thunder and lightning—
First light emerges.

Vast eons pass,
Qi undifferentiated.
Above, no hue remains,
Below, no abyss remains.
Wind and mist pierce the void,
Diamond-ridden, ascending to Heaven.
Heaven births, Earth nurtures,
Outer defenses at every pass.
Golden qi firm and unyielding,
Boundaries vast and obstinate.

At the start of the eon,
No darkness, no obscurity,
No form, no shadow,
No limit, no end.
Boundless Great Brahman,
Vast and lightless.
Crimson Clarity unfurls the diagram,
Natural motion unfolds.
Primordial Beginning stabilizes,
Five Scriptures spread.
Crimson texts, jade characters,
Eight威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威威

Recite it a hundredfold—
The Dao’s qi fills the world.

Recite it a thousandfold—
The weary gaze upon it in awe.

Ten thousandfold, the Dao is complete,
Stirring the divine and the spirit,
Giving birth to pure and virtuous men,
Making them sages of the world,
Advancing their Daoic deeds,
Lifting their forms to ascend.

Hear the sacred sound,
A hundred spirits guard their bodies,
Commanding the earthly deities,
Escorting them at entry and exit,
Drawing them forth from the earthly gate,
Freeing them from the five sufferings and eight hardships,
Ascending the seven ancestral stages,
Forever departing the ghostly realm,
Their souls crossing the Vermilion Mound,
Undergoing refinement and rebirth.

This is called boundless salvation,
Universal deliverance without end.

There are secret celestial texts,
Revered by all the heavens.

To reveal or scorn them leads to hell,
Bringing calamity upon the seven ancestral uncles.

The Dao speaks:
These two chapters are the words of the Celestial Sovereigns of all the heavens,
The Most Exalted True Kings,
The Heavenly Masters of the Highest Mysteries,
Who hang the fate of the living,
Determine succession without end,
Uninterruptedly nurturing,
Flowing the source of transformation,
Making life nearly endless.
Those who attain it from without—
Their descendants flourish, branches and twigs teeming.
Those who attain it from within—
Divine union of male and female,
Drawing upon the qi spring,
Conceiving a jade-like infant,
Inheriting the true and pure,
Resembling in form and essence,
Establishing the lineage of immortals,
Receiving the divine transmission,
Splitting into myriad forms,
Dwelling in the hidden heart,
Their spirits permeating the ten directions with secret sounds.

All are the words of the Great Brahman,
Not the common speech of the world.
Words without melodious grace,
Melodies without ornate beauty.

「Thus it is spoken of the Highest Mysteries,
Difficult to seek and discern in detail.

The treasures of the heavens are kept in secret
Within the **Divine Constellation** (*Shénxiāo*) and **Jade Purity** (*Yùqīng*) Upper Palaces.
When the time is ripe and the transmission descends,
The **Way** (*Dào*) speaks, and the teaching is proclaimed.

**Way** speaks: The virtuous and faithful,
Though their descendants are yet unborn,
Their **filial piety** (*jiǒng*) and **lineage** (*sì*) fail to continue,
Their noble houses wither and decline,
Or they bear sons and daughters in vain,
Who perish young before reaching maturity—
Only to see their children, still in infancy,
Meet with sudden ruin.

All who suffer such calamities,
With shared **qi** (*qì*), must together petition,
Offering prayers and incense,
Supplicating the **Highest Authentic Ones** (*Shàngzhēn*),
With united hearts and fasting,
Burning **sandalwood** (*xiāng*) at all six hours,
Reciting the **Tenfold Universal** (*shíxiàn*) **Sutra** in full cycles,
And the **Virtue and Power** (*fúdé*) of the **Heavenly Lords** (*Tiānzhǔ*) descend in response—
Their descendants take root and flourish,
Their blessings extend across generations,
And all ill omens are dispelled.

The merit is boundless,
And the salvation endless.
**Way** speaks: Those of shallow understanding,
Or whose **meritorious deeds** (*fúyè*) are yet insufficient,
Though they pray for descendants,
Often bear children who die before adulthood—
**Fated harm** (*jiāohài*).

If those of shared learning,
The **Perfect Ones** (*Zhìrén*), perform the rites of incense,
And recite the **Sutra** ten times over,
According to the proper **method** (*fǎ*),
Their **spirits and souls** (*húnshén*) ascend directly to the **Southern Palace** (*Nángōng*),
Following their virtuous deeds,
They are reborn once more.

As **virtuous and enlightened** (*xián dé*) sons,
They bring prosperity to their noble houses,
Their lineage endures without cessation,
And they attain **Divine Immortality** (*Shénxiān*).

**Way** speaks: The common folk do not grasp
That **having no heirs** (*wǔhòu*) is the greatest misfortune.
They fixate on the belief that
This body will perish and all **lineage** (*lù*) will be extinguished,
Yet they fail to comprehend the **Great Dao** (*Dàdào*)
And that **life-giving qi** (*shēngqì*) is boundless,
That **unbroken continuity** (*běn*) across ages is the foundation.

The **Nine Mysteries** (*Jiǔxuān*) and **Seven Ancestors** (*Qīzǔ*),
The **recent-worldly progenitors** (*jìnshì zǔkào*),
Are abandoned, their rites neglected,
Their prohibitions violated most grievously.

Some, though aged, have no descendants,
Though they often conceive,
They fail to fulfill **marriage and official duties** (*hūn yuàn*),
Or bear children who are born **foolish and dull** (*yúlù*),
Their **wisdom and spirit** (*huìlíng*) unopened.
Even if they reach adulthood,
They do not follow the **Four Occupations** (*sìyè*),
Their studies are **common and lowly** (*fán xià*),
Their travels lack purpose (*wúfāng*),
Bringing sorrow and anger to their parents.
The young and weak are plagued by sickness,
And though treated, their ailments never heal.

All these woes are the **karmic retribution** (*yāngzhù*) of their ancestors,
The **suffering invoked** (*xián hū*) by their forebears—
They must perform the rites of incense,
Recite the **Sutras** in supplication,
And pray to the **Heavenly Officials** (*Tiān sī*),
To summon **blessings and joy** (*fúqìng*).

The **fasting and recitation** (*zhāijiè*) of **Sutras** bear great merit.
For the **Heavenly Sovereign** (*Rénjūn*) above,
It brings **prosperous descendants** (*fánqīng*).
For the **myriad households** (*zhàoshù*) below,
It extends the **continuity of the family line** (*jiāmén*).
Life and death depend upon it,
And the blessings are **immeasurable** (*nánshèng*).

Thus it is said: Boundless merit,
Salvation for all **Heavenly Beings and Humans** (*Tiānrén*).

**Way** speaks: All who possess this **Sutra** (*jīng*),
And perform these **merits and virtues** (*gōngdé*) for **emperors and commoners** (*dìzhǔ*),
On the day they pray,
With **devoted resolve** (*fāxīn*) and fasting,
Burning incense and reciting the **Sutra** ten times over,
Will be **recorded by all the heavens** (*Zhūtiān jìmíng*),
Guarded by **ten thousand spirits** (*Wànshén shìwèi*),
And **distinguished by the Perfect Ones** (*Zhìrén*),
Thus attaining the **status of a Saintly Official** (*Shèngjūn*) beneath the **Golden Gate** (*Jīnquè*).

All the heavens **record merit and demerit** (*gōngguò*),
Without the slightest loss.
The **True Sovereigns** (*Zhēnzhǔ*) in the heavens
Also **commend and uphold** (*bǎojǔ*) your person—
Those who attain the **Way** shall **penetrate and clarify** (*dòngmíng*) these **profound utterances** (*zhìyán*).

The **Hidden Speech of the Great Brahman** (*Dàfàn yǐnyǔ*)
Emits **countless sounds** (*Wúliàng yīn*).

**Composed by the Dao Sovereign** (*Dàojūn*),
**The Sacred Scriptures of the Primordial Origin** (*Yuánshǐ Língshū*)
**Middle Section** (*Zhōngpiān*)
**The Eastern Eightfold Heaven** (*Dōngfāng Bātiān*)」

The **Emerald Rescript shines forth**, the **common folk learn the Dao and revive**.
The **south is joyously sealed**, in **harmony with Heaven’s Fish** (*Yú*).
The **hero’s brilliance gleams at dusk**, the **Mingling Mountains stand pure and moist**.

The **Divine Edict spreads sincerely**, and the **Great Proclamation is issued**.
**Tracing omens never falters**, seeking **eternal life’s decree**.
The **Imperial Grace is treasured**, its **celestial intent profound**.
The **Great True Dragon of the Dao** brings **blessings and abundant grace**.
**Security and auspicious schemes** are **verified and broadly established**.

*Glittering Luodou encircling the Dipper*,
The **Child returns to the High Steward**.
Heaven’s **registers record the chosen**,
Their **merits overflowing, strict and solemn**.
**Xilu exults in wrath**, surveying the **void with eloquent words**.
**Dongxian’s hidden strategies** unfold,
**Wondrous and boundless**, feasting at the **banquet of the profound**.
**Libations bind the sacred array**, the **ghostly leader grows fat**.
**Zou’s spirit smiles brightly**, the **flaming cow’s brilliance revealed**.
The **mountains drive the machinations**, the **Mysterious Governor teaches subtly**.

**The Eightfold Heaven of the West**

**Jì’s sacred scene is fixed**, the **Earth’s foundation invites clarity**.
**Yáo’s magic is firm**, the **Warrior of the Dipper and the Magician**.
**Donghóng’s vast shores**, the **Primordial Diagram hidden**.
**Ze’s splendor spreads the lineage**, the **Hill’s steeds return in darkness**.
The **counties receive the list of the blind**, the **ten thousand strong by the banks**.
**Supporting affairs of the Sea and Luo**, diligently **tending the Dìpán**.
**Yǎopǔ’s distant ferry**, leaning on **Qí’s sweeping peaks**.
**Scholars steeped in jade**, the **autumn fire of Gōshān**.

**Mèng’s path is dim and vast**, the **branches of Xī rush with growth**.
**Lì’s True One departs Zhou**, the **clan’s hall transmits Yu**.
**Wùluo’s basin washes clean**, the **Divine Phoenix alights on Jiān**.
**Chénghuáng’s scrolls are rolled**, the **command inscribed with reverence**.

The **Dao’s utterance**: These are the **Hidden Speeches of the Great Brahman** within the heavens,
**Sounds without measure**—the **ancient script** all **a yard long**.

The **Grand Marshal of Destiny**, the **High Steward of the Southern Palace**, the **Overseer of Births, Great God**,
With **cranes’ feathers and purple-pupiled sashes**, inscribed upon the **Crimson Terrace’s jade halls and golden walls**,
As the **standard sound**.

When **Great Stability brings life**, the **Dao’s qi flourishes**—
The **secret taboos’ essence**.
The **attendant jade boys and girls**, six thousand each,
**Adorned with treasure flowers**, **covered with dragon-embroidered caps**.
Those who **know this sound** and **fast while reciting it**—
All the heavens send **Flying Heavenly Kings** to observe their bodies,
**Record their merits and labors**, and **report to the heavens above**,
Ensuring **continued noble life**, **prolonged blessings**, **glory for their lineage**,
**Great merit among the celestial ranks**, **upholding the True Ones**,
**Fulfilling the Dao completely**, **wandering the Three Realms**, **ascending the Golden Gate**.

This sound **repels all**, **exorcises all**, **saves all**, **accomplishes all**—
The **natural sound of Heaven’s True Ones**.
Thus, when **recited, it summons the Flying Heavens to gaze upon**,
The **Supreme Sovereign sings afar**, the **ten thousand spirits shower blessings**,
The **Three Realms hear universally**, the **myriad deities bow in reverence**,
The **ghostly intelligences vanish of their own accord**,
The **precious chimes resound**, the **ten directions grow serene**,
The **rivers and seas fall silent**, the **mountains swallow the smoke**,
The **myriad spirits tremble in submission**,
**Assembling the celestial hosts**—**Heaven has no filth**, **Earth no demonic dust**,
**The Dark Wisdom becomes luminous**, **the Great Measure profound and profound**.
