**Volume Forty-Three Complete**

**The Chapter on Safeguarding the Womb and Protecting Life**

The **Dao** speaks: *"In the past, within the Primordial Azure Heaven,*
The **Floating Earth** sang in the **Spacious Void of the Green Fall**,
And received the **Marvelous Scripture of Boundless Salvation**—
The **Supreme Treasure** for safeguarding the womb and protecting life,
From the **Original Beginning**.*

When the **Original Beginning Heavenly Venerable** proclaimed this **sutra**,
He circled ten times, summoning the **ten directions**,
And then proceeded to His seat.

The **Heavenly True Great Deities**,
The **Highest Saints and Venerables**,
The **True Persons of Wondrous Practice**,
The **Great Deities of the Three Primordials and Six Celestial Stems**—
Safeguarding the womb and protecting life,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Arrived step by step in the **Divine Radiance**.

Floating upon **Cloud-Carriers**, drifting in **Flowing Palanquins**,
Riding **Purple Vehicles of the Sky**, in **Emerald Chariots and Golden Cars**,
With **Rainbow Canopies** draped deep,
**Piercing Light** congealing, **Three Hues** resplendent,
Illuminating the **Void of Empty Heaven**,
For **ten days and ten nights**.

The **Precious Parks of the Ten Heavens**,
**Lush with Azure Capital Walls**,
With **Courtyards and Gateways** floating and piled,
**Palaces of myriad towers**,
**Divine Standards and Sacred Radiance**,
**Stopped Stars and Fixed Luminaries**,
**Sea Clouds presenting omens**, **Mountains and Peaks lingering in mist**,
Reaching far and vast, near and boundless,
**Cloud-Light beating in splendor**, **Celestial Grace drifting and swaying**,
Touching garments, scenting fragrance—
All attained the **High Dao**.

The **entire land of earth, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees**,
Wrapped in **endless emerald mists**,
Bathing in **still orchid breezes**,
Encircled by **gathered rosy vapors**,
The **Dao’s voice** flowing effortlessly—
**Countless Heavenly Immortals**,
Praised its rare and wondrous nature.

The **multitude of True Ones** gathered at His seat,
The **Original Beginning Heavenly Venerable**, seated in **Empty Heaven**,
Floating above the **Ten Thousand Two Hundred Heavenly Palaces**,
On the **Great Jewel Seat of the Manifested Lotus**,
Where **Myriad Dragon Chicks** display the **Bright Reeds of the Precious Pearl**.

As He proclaimed the **sutra** once more,
The **Heavenly Holy Mothers** simultaneously praised its virtues.
At that time,
The **Immortal Consorts and Divine Maidens** of the **entire land**,
Recalling past causes, saw the **source of the Dao**.
They **believed and knew** that before Heaven and Earth arose,
The **Original Qi** began to manifest,
The **Divine Essence** refined and gathered,
**Yin and Yang** established the womb,
For **ninety billion kalpas**,
The **Three Qi** merged in chaos,
Then **ninety great kalpas** passed,
And the **Three Transformations** began to separate.

The **Five Elders** safeguarded the womb,
The **Three Primordials** nurtured the soul.
The **seven orifices** opened wide,
The **Great Earth** split asunder,
**Two Principles** emerged from the womb,
And the **circular seas** were first established.

As He proclaimed the **sutra** twice more,
**Embryos and eggs**, **hair and scales**, **shells and insects**—
None were left incomplete.

As He proclaimed the **sutra** thrice more,
**Beaks chirped, mouths spoke**,
**Voices harmonized**, **tunes aligned**—
The **True Ones** resonated with Heaven’s law.

As He proclaimed the **sutra** four times more,
**Skin and hide solidified**,
**Golden Essence scattered**, **vigorous winds swirled**—
**Rigid Qi** transformed subtly.

As He proclaimed the **sutra** five times more,
The **Dao** revealed its **Heroic Marvels**,
**Talents and eloquence** flourished bright.

As He proclaimed the **sutra** six times more,
**Supreme skill** was perfected,
**Graceful movements** followed **Heaven’s Virtue**.

As He proclaimed the **sutra** seven times more,
**Nurturing infants** reached completion,
**Wisdom and compassion** permeated their bodies.

As He proclaimed the **sutra** eight times more,
**Women with child, birds and beasts with womb**,
Whether already born or yet unborn—
All obtained **birth and completion**.

As He proclaimed the **sutra** nine times more,
**Womb and viscera** emitted their **refined essence**,
**Inner treasures** took form as **dew**.

As He proclaimed the **sutra** ten times more,
The **Dao** applied its **Divine Transformation**,
And **naturally** completed the **human form**.
At that time,
All **men and women** of the **entire land**,
Without exception, **inclined their hearts**—
Safeguarding the womb and protecting life,
All attained **eternal life**.

The **Dao** speaks: *"At that time,*
When the **Original Beginning Heavenly Venerable** proclaimed the **sutra** once more,
The **Great Deity of the First Celestial Stem, Preserving the Womb and Protecting Life**,
From the **East of the Boundless Void**,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Floated through the **Empty Sky** and arrived.*

When He proclaimed the **sutra** twice more,
The **Great Deity of the Third Celestial Stem, Preserving the Womb and Protecting Life**,
From the **South of the Boundless Void**,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Floated through the **Empty Sky** and arrived.*

When He proclaimed the **sutra** thrice more,
The **Great Deity of the Seventh Celestial Stem, Preserving the Womb and Protecting Life**,
From the **West of the Boundless Void**,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Floated through the **Empty Sky** and arrived.*

When He proclaimed the **sutra** four times more,
The **Great Deity of the Ninth Celestial Stem, Preserving the Womb and Protecting Life**,
From the **North of the Boundless Void**,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Floated through the **Empty Sky** and arrived.*

When He proclaimed the **sutra** five times more,
The **Great Deity of the Tenth Celestial Stem, Preserving the Womb and Protecting Life**,
From the **Northeast of the Boundless Void**,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Floated through the **Empty Sky** and arrived.*

When He proclaimed the **sutra** six times more,
The **Great Deity of the Second Celestial Stem, Preserving the Womb and Protecting Life**,
From the **Southeast of the Boundless Void**,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Floated through the **Empty Sky** and arrived.*

When He proclaimed the **sutra** seven times more,
The **Great Deity of the Fourth Celestial Stem, Preserving the Womb and Protecting Life**,
From the **Southwest of the Boundless Void**,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Floated through the **Empty Sky** and arrived.*

When He proclaimed the **sutra** eight times more,
The **Great Deity of the Eighth Celestial Stem, Preserving the Womb and Protecting Life**,
From the **Northwest of the Boundless Void**,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Floated through the **Empty Sky** and arrived.*

When He proclaimed the **sutra** nine times more,
The **Great Deity of the Fifth Celestial Stem, Preserving the Womb and Protecting Life**,
From the **Upper Boundless Void**,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Floated through the **Empty Sky** and arrived.*

When He proclaimed the **sutra** ten times more,
The **Great Deity of the Sixth Celestial Stem, Preserving the Womb and Protecting Life**,
From the **Lower Boundless Void**,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Floated through the **Empty Sky** and arrived.*

As the **ten times** completed,
The **Great Deities of the Boundless Void** from the **ten directions**,
All arrived simultaneously,
And the **entire land’s men and women**,
Inclined their hearts in **reverent devotion**.

Their arrival was like **dust rising in gusts**,
**Stars scattered in mist**—
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
Filling the **entire land**,
Shaking the **nine earths**—
None could restrain them.

Thus, the **Original Beginning** raised His body and emitted light,
Piercingly illuminating the **ten directions** above and below.
After a long while, He withdrew the light,
And emerged from the **Precious Light Cloud-Leaves**,
Manifesting the **Great Compassionate Jade Form** of the **Original Beginning Heavenly Venerable**,
Golden in countenance, radiant in splendor—
From His brow, a **Precious Pearl** emerged.

This **Pearl** was subtle and wondrous,
Its light extending a **league**,
Within it, the **Void Palace of the Empty Sovereign**,
The **Precious Platform of Heavenly Spirits**,
Countless **Heavenly and Human Beings**,
Moving, dwelling, resting, or residing,
Riding **Luan and He**,
Speaking, gazing, and smiling—
All appeared simultaneously,
With **water and fire** intermingling,
**Mountains, rivers, palaces, and halls**,
Compact as a **circular inch** yet vast enough.

The **Original Beginning** having appeared,
The **Supreme True One of Great Unity and Boundless Stillness**,
Immediately divided His **transformed body**,
And **countless beings** were drawn in—
The **Heavenly True Great Deities**,
The **Highest Saints and Venerables**,
The **True Persons of Wondrous Practice**,
The **Great Deities of the Ten Directions’ Boundless Void**—
Safeguarding the womb and protecting life,
Countless as the sands of the **Ganges**,
All entered the **Original Beginning’s Pearl-Light**.

The **Heavenly and Human Beings** looked upward,
And saw only **gentle movements** within the **Pearl’s shadow**.
Once they entered the **Pearl’s shadow**,
They vanished—**nowhere to be found**.
The **people of the land** dispersed,
And the **earth returned to its void**—
No longer crowded or dense.

The **Original Beginning** then,
Within the **wondrous light of the Divine Pearl**,
Completed the **sutra** in full.
The **multitude of True Ones**,
Witnessing the **transmission**,
Conferred it upon **me**."*

At this time,
Joy and celebration were indescribable.
The **ritual observances** were fully known,
And the **celestial beings** resumed their stations—
In an instant, all was silent, no trace remaining.

Then, when the **Heavenly and Human Beings** encountered the **sutra’s teachings**,
All received deliverance and salvation,
Safeguarding the womb and protecting life,
None perished or were harmed.
All bowed in reverence to the heavens,
And all cultivated **virtue** with good intent.

They were neither reckless nor confused,
Nor deceitful nor greedy,
Nor unfaithful nor contrary,
Nor thoughtless nor ashamed,
Nor constrained nor withdrawn.

Their words aligned with the **Dao/Way** of Heaven**,
Their speech held no discord—
In harmony with **compassionate love**,
Yet distinct in essence, they became one.

The land was secure, its people prosperous,
Rejoicing in eternal peace,
As the **Original Beginning** emerged to teach,
And the realm was governed by the **Dao/Way**.

Those with sincere devotion,
Revered and followed with ritual respect,
All attained the power to save the world.

The **Dao/Way** speaks:
All that was uttered within the **sutra** by the **Original Beginning, Heavenly Venerable**,
Are the **inner names** of the **celestial deities** who safeguard the womb and protect life.
They are the **hidden names** of the **Six Celestial Stems** within the **Three Primordial Elements**,
The **secret names** of the hundred spirits—
Not the common words of this world.

The **Highest Saints** have already become **True Persons**,
Mastering the **mysterious** and probing the **subtle**,
Able to discern its chapters fully.
When recited ten times,
The **celestial beings** respond from afar,
And the **Ten Thousand Deities** prepare their rites.
All beings, from heaven to earth,
With their **embryonic essence** and **womb of life**,
None fail to grow and flourish.

Its **hidden meanings** precede the **Dao/Way**,
Its depths grasp the **Original Mysteries**—
From the vastness of heaven and earth,
To the minutest of creatures,
None escape its profound influence over the **embryonic essence** and **True Life**,
Receiving the **True Qi** of the **Dao/Way**,
Condensing **vital essence** and **blood**,
Then transforming into form.

All **saints and sages**,
Celestial beings, **High Deities**, and **Venerables**,
None emerged without nurturing from the **embryonic roots**.

Thus, safeguarding the womb and protecting life,
Reciting the **sutra** to summon the **deities**,
Easily shifts **yin-yang**,
And brings blessings to the birth of mortals.

Those who study the **Greatest Teachings**,
When they recite ten times,
Then the **Holy Mother** descends to the chamber,
The **Divine Marshal** attends the **carriage**,
The **Divine Record-Keeper** fixes the destiny,
The **Five Emperors** extend their favor,
All beings take form,
Safeguarding the womb and protecting life,
Their **virtue and longevity** shining bright.

This is why:
Scholars who chant the **inner incantations** and **hidden names**,
And recite the **True Sutras** aloud,
Summoning the **Ten Directions**,
Share in the glory of the **Dao/Way**,
Subduing the **Earth Spirits**,
Binding the **demonic forces**,
Not only averting death,
But also attaining **transcendence** and **immortality**.

It is said that one may invoke the **Three Primordial Elements** and **Six Celestial Stems** of the **Ten Directions**,
Commanding them to guard the **embryonic essence** within one’s own life and womb,
The **One Hundred Truths** and **Ten Thousand Nodes**,
And the **Red Sovereign** obeys the summons,
Enabling the child to become **immortal**.

Not only for the calamity of a **full-term female womb**,
But also for those who study the **Dao/Way** and refine the **True Essence**,
Recitation is not forbidden.

Lightly reciting this chapter brings misfortune to oneself.
With **reverent offerings** and **proper rites**,
Households flourish and prosper.
Generation after generation, they thrive in abundance,
Bound by **auspicious causes**,
Free from all calamities,
The **Divine and Spirits** guarding their gates.

This **sutra** is supremely **venerable and wondrous**,
Unmatched in the **Celestial Capital of Jade**,
Its power to deliver beings is boundless—
It stands as the **root of all Ten Thousand Dao/Way**.

Its **grand framework** is vast,
Its **virtue/power** is immeasurable.

The **Dao/Way** speaks:
For all who recite this **sutra** ten times,
The **celestial beings**, **Three Primordial Elements**, **Six Celestial Stems**, and **Nine Palaces** of the **deities** who safeguard the womb and protect life,
Descend in response,
Severing the **Six Heavenly Regions’ malevolent spirits**,
And the **departed souls** of past ages.

For those who harm the **embryonic essence** and **life-womb** of all beings,
Causing the **True Qi** to disperse,
And the **divine radiance** to fade,
Preventing conception and birth,
Making progeny impossible—
Their **Qi** flows on, connecting through generations,
Swiftly consigning them to the **Northern Capital**,
Where their **demonic forms** are slain.

Examining the **records of destiny**,
Good and evil are swiftly distinguished.
Those who receive the **Dao/Way** are born in harmony,
And become **noble ones**.

Those who love this **sutra** of the **Greatest Teachings**,
When their **virtue/power** is complete,
Recognize the **embryonic essence** themselves,
All attain **transcendence and immortality**,
Ascending to the **Golden Gates**,
And feasting in the **Celestial Capital of Jade**.

Scholars of the **highest learning**,
Practicing and reciting this **sutra**,
Are immediately granted deliverance,
Their **True Spirits** ascending naturally,
Entering and exiting the **womb palaces**.

Women who receive its recitation,
Attain safeguarding of the womb and protection of life,
Their children born under **celestial favor**,
The **embryonic essence** transformed into a **precious infant**,
On the day of birth,
The **womb deities** guard their lives,
None harmed.

Men who are **naturally virtuous**,
Their blessings and **Dao/Way** flourish,
Celebration and fortune arise together,
Extending their years and **longevity**,
Later attaining the **Dao/Way of the Emptied Corpse**—
Their **soul-spirits** temporarily extinguished,
Not subject to birth and death,
Immediately returning to their **embodied form**,
And wandering in the **Great Void**.

This **sutra** is **subtle and wondrous**,
Its deliverance boundless and endless.
All **Heavenly and Human Beings** rejoice in its blessings.
Its countless mercies benefit the world.

It is a treasure of the **Heavenly Lords**,
Not transmitted to the lower realms.
Those of **highest virtue** who carry **golden treasures** and offer them with sincere hearts,
Swear by heaven and are granted its transmission.

If one **leaks or scorns** it lightly,
Misfortune befalls the **Nine Ancestors**,
And eternal servitude in the **demonic offices**.

The **Jade Boys and Jade Girls** who safeguard the womb and protect life,
Thirty-two each,
Guard and attend the **divine texts**,
Protecting those who receive this **sutra**.

The **Dao/Way** speaks:
In the **first month**, during **long fasting**,
Recite and chant this **sutra**,
Swiftly summoning the **Six Celestial Stems of the Upper Primordial Element**,
To safeguard the womb and protect life,
Severing the **departed souls** of past ages,
Invoking one’s descendants,
Their disputes decided in the **Heavenly Office**,
Causing the womb to fail,
Conception to end in barrenness,
And **demonic forces** to afflict the **orphaned**.

In the **seventh month**, during **long fasting**,
Recite and chant this **sutra**,
Swiftly summoning the **Six Celestial Stems of the Middle Primordial Element**,
To safeguard the womb and protect life,
Severing **curses, hexes, and spells**,
And **malevolent influences** upon males and females,
Their disputes decided in the **Earthly Office**,
Causing the womb to fail,
Conception to end in barrenness,
And **demonic forces** to mark their names.

In the **tenth month**, during **long fasting**,
Recite and chant this **sutra**,
Swiftly summoning the **Six Celestial Stems of the Lower Primordial Element**,
To safeguard the womb and protect life,
Severing **grave disputes** and **moisture afflictions**,
And the **ancestral ties** that drag one down,
Where **demons feed on the womb’s essence**,
Their disputes decided in the **Watery Office**,
Causing the womb to fail,
Conception to end in barrenness,
And **black talismans** to seal their fate.

On the **Eight Festive Days**,
Recite and chant this **sutra**,
Guarding all beings’ **life-wombs**,
Ensuring none are harmed,
The **Eight Directions’ womb deities**,
Each leading their **divine retinue**,
Entering the **Nine Palaces**,
The **True Sovereign of the Great Unity**,
Extending life and safeguarding the womb,
Guarding the **life roots** and **command essence**.

For all who recite this **sutra**,
It extends to all living beings,
Not only to the female body,
But also to cultivate the **Dao/Way’s causes**,
As the **Heavenly Emperors** descend to observe,
And one becomes a **True Person of the Nine Palaces**.

On the day of one’s **original destiny**,
Recite and chant this **sutra**,
Swiftly summoning the **womb deities**,
To hear and receive the **True Sutras**,
The **Three Lords of the Bright Hall**,
Guarding the **womb’s essence**,
The **soul-spirits** clarified and rectified,
The **Ten Thousand Qi** enduring,
Not experiencing suffering,
Their bodies radiant,
Guarded by the **Three Realms**,
The **Five Emperors** overseeing their welcome,
All **spirits** paying homage,
Their names inscribed in heaven,
Their **virtue/power** complete—
Ascending to the **Upper Purity**.

The **Dao/Way** speaks: On the day of practice, one must bathe in fragrant waters, fast, and enter the chamber in purity. Facing southeast, strike the teeth thirty-two times, ascending to hear the **Thirty-two Heavens**. Bow in the heart thirty-two times, close the eyes, and quietly contemplate sitting within the three-colored clouds—**Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane**—arrayed on either side. The sun and moon illuminate the chamber, radiant and resplendent within. A round symbol forms at the nape, its light shining across the ten directions—so clear and distinct.

The secret incantation:
*"Supreme Mystic Origin,
Greatest Dao/Way Lord."*

Summon forth from within my body the **Three Five Functionaries**, the left and right officials and messengers, the **Jade Boys** attendants, the **Jade Girls** heralds, the **Five Emperors’ Direct Symbols**, and the **Direct-Day Incense Officials**—thirty-six each—opening the way as spoken.

Today is a day of joyous celebration, a pure hall of fasting, practicing this most sacred **sutra**, saving countless beings.

May what is invoked ascend directly before the **Supreme Sovereign of the Thirty-two Heavens, the Original Beginning Emperor**.

Then, drawing the **qi** thirty-two times, face east and recite the **sutra**.

---
**Original Beginning’s Supreme Sutra of Infinite Salvation, First Rank of Marvel**

**Original Beginning’s Mystic Treasure Scripture of the Cavernous Depths**—
Preserving the womb, safeguarding life,
Salvaging the ten directions.

Hidden roots and harmonious transformations occur naturally.
Before the **Great Void** divided, the **Great Dao/Way** lay concealed.
Sudden changes gave rise to **spirit-mind**—
**God** as the essence of things, the **Chaos** thus formed.
Above and below intertwined, the two **symbols** rising in mist.
With **white entering red**, yin and yang align.
With **red entering black**, the **fetal sac** congeals.
Within it holds the **Great Emptiness**, its light illuminating the **Three Purities**.
The **Divine Chamber** stands majestic, nameless from the beginning.
There is the **Jade Infant**, entering **Darkness** and emerging in **Azure**.
Above, no ancestral return—only the **Dao/Way** as body.
The **Purple Sac** unfurls its stem, its true form luminous.
The **Mixed Primordium** sheds its shell, birthing **spirit-souls**.
The **Two Principles** merge in harmony, indistinct and boundless.
Within the **Darkness**, the **Most True Spirit**—
No spirit without light, no spirit without clarity,
No spirit without foundation, no spirit without completion,
No spirit without salvation, no spirit without birth.
This is the **Great Brahman**, the **womb within the womb**.

A mountain of jade spanning **a hundred kalpas**, its seven treasures towering.
The **Nine Palaces, Ten Gates**, myriad gates beyond count—
All from the **Dao/Way’s womb**, transforming **spirit-mind** into form.
Reaching **humanity and things**, the **Three Splendors** of marvelous courts.
The **Purple Pavilion, Vermilion Hall**, their womb-light resplendent.
Subtle and profound, the **fetal essence** lies dormant.
The **Divine Wind** swirls, encircling the ten directions.
Within are:
- The **Chu-Huo Lord** who preserves the womb,
- The **Huo-Tu Spirit** of transformation,
- The **Lord Bo-Hua** who oversees males,
- The **Great Mystic Spirit** who monitors birth,
- The **True One of the Courtyard**, **Wei-Fang**—
  Men invoke **Meng-Fei**, women invoke **Zi-Yi**.

Before the **Dark Sac** opens, the two spirits depend as one.
The **ghosts of fetal blood**, hearing the name, are severed and crushed.
Daring not to intrude, they return to the **Dao/Way’s eternal path**.
The **Heavenly Longevity blessing**, the **Mystic Teacher** who guards life.
In **Dragon-text robes, Tiger-clad**, the **Five Battles** of gold and fire.
Swiftly summoning the **Three Officials**, the **Supreme Ultimate’s Master**.
Grasping the bell, they roar—**wind and thunder** resound.
Escorting the **Womb Palace**, mist drifts softly.
The **Five Emperors’ Great Demons**, the **Eight Powers** of metal and flame.
Preserving the womb, attaining truth—
Noble duty shines brightly.
Removing calamities, crossing hardships—
Without thought, without action.

Today, the scriptures are compiled, all heavens gather at the hall.
The **East’s Infinite Preserver of the Womb, Birth-Dao God-King**, **Long-Living Great Sage**, Infinite Savior.
The **South’s Infinite Preserver of the Womb, Virtue-Dao God-King**, **Long-Living Great Sage**, Infinite Savior.
The **West’s Infinite Upholder of the Womb, Noble God-King**, **Long-Living Great Sage**, Infinite Savior.
The **North’s Infinite Guardian of the Womb, True God-King**, **Long-Living Great Sage**, Infinite Savior.
The **Northeast’s Infinite Preserver of the Womb, Benevolent God-King**, **Long-Living Great Sage**, Infinite Savior.
The **Southeast’s Infinite Protector of Life, Manifesting God-King**, **Long-Living Great Sage**, Infinite Savior.
The **Southwest’s Infinite Protector of Life, Spirit God-King**, **Long-Living Great Sage**, Infinite Savior.
The **Northwest’s Infinite Protector of Life, Hunger-Defying God-King**, **Long-Living Great Sage**, Infinite Savior.
The **Upper Infinite Protector of Life, Death-Cutting God-King**, **Long-Living Great Sage**, Infinite Savior.
The **Lower Infinite Protector of Life, Broad-Wisdom God-King**, **Long-Living Great Sage**, Infinite Savior.
The **Ten-Directional Most True Preserver of the Womb, Life-Guarding God-King**, **Long-Living, World-Saving Infinite Great God**.

Together they ride the **Purple Cloud’s Auspicious Light**, the **Auspicious Beast of Azure**, the **Jade Palace’s Jade Carriage**, with **Seven Spirits** on the left and **Nine Absolutes** on the right. The **Great Bird** folds its wings, the **Qilin Dragon** bears the yoke, bearing the **Preserver’s Banner**, the **Life-Guarding Flag**. Before them, the **Eight Stops** chant in harmony; behind, the **Nine Notes** resound together. The **Xin-Hou Dance** unfurls, their **whistled songs** rise—**Five Elders** clear the path, the **Three Elements** speak in order. Ten thousand chariots, ten thousand riders, floating through the sky.

**Heaven’s noble birth-Dao**, life’s womb takes precedence.
The **Supreme Sovereign** personally inspects, the **Great Ultimate** awaits the incense.
The **True Command Spirit** oversees the **Birth Hall**, guiding life’s passage.
The **Nine-Heaven Holy Mother** rides the **Green Palanquin**.
The **Heavenly Queen Consort** is attended by the **Mystic Tiger**.
Preserving the womb, guarding life—
All appear before the Emperor.
As each is to be saved, the heavens convene in solemn review.
Proclaiming to the **Three Realms**, the **Infinite Spirit-Lands**,
The **Hall of Prolonged Life**, the **Three Enclosures of the Supreme One**.
The **Twelve Womb Spirits** disperse **qi** and bestow years.
They summon the **Heavenly True Ones**, the **Crimson Pupil, Purple Abyss**.
The **Yellow Court’s Breath** mingles, sweeping the **Yellow Springs’ Source**.
If there be lingering **old qi**, ancestral and transmitted,
Blocking the **Dao/Way’s birth**, rupturing the womb, causing injury,
Disrupting lineage, bringing harm and calamity—
Sever the **hosted influences**, extinguish the **root of misfortune**.
They may not be detained, nor forced into the **ghostly ranks**.

The **Original Beginning’s Symbol-Command**—
At the appointed hour, ascend.

The **Five Paths** are cut and severed, their omens ill.
To nurture the womb and guard the infant—
**Body** and **Spirit** are shielded, **Form** and **Soul** held.

The **Magical Court** is summoned for protection,
The **Jade Palace** guards the living.
From **Noble Descent** to **Human Transformation**—
**Celestial Birth** receives **Dao/Way’s Grace**,
Enduring through **aeons uncounted**, in endless rotation.
With the **aeon’s wheel**, they turn as one,
And **Heaven’s span** matches their years.

Yet **Great Dao’s** calamities arise,
The **Eight Difficulties in the Womb**,
To transcend the **Three Primordial Cycles**.
When **Dao/Way’s** rites are complete,
They ascend to **Loose and Easy’s** **Upper Purity**.

The **Upper Purity’s** Heaven—
**Northern Azure’s** **Primordial Platform**—
**Master of the World** and **Dao/Way’s Birth**,
Each with their **Celestial Seed**.
The **Heavenly Sovereign’s** **Jade Purity**,
In the **Formless Realm**, the **Dharma’s** **Path**.

The **Eight Heavens of the East**—
These **Thirty-Two Heavens**,
Specializing in womb-guarding, life-nurturing, and soul-protection,
And all **earthly-born** beings under their dominion—
None escape their sway.

Their **womb-qi** moves from **Chenji’s** **Pole** below,
Through **Northern Dipper’s** **Mysterious Dark Star**,
Into the **Three Platforms**.
The **Three Platforms’** **Six Stars**,
Oversee the **nourishment of myriad things**,
And guard the **wombs of all living**.

Descending leftward, they spiral through **Room Host’s** **Thirteen Degrees**,
**Female Host’s** **Seventeen Degrees**,
To the **Precious Ox’s** **Jade Palace**—
There they rest.

When **womb-qi** reaches one’s **natal hour**,
Or the **hosts of birth and womb**,
Then women conceive,
And the womb releases the child—
Thus they are called **Children’s Hosts**.

The **Precious Ox**—
Its name taken for **receiving and birthing**,
Also the **symbol of the womb**.

Only **Celestial Beings** transform without form,
Dwelling in **Formless Wombs**—

**These three Primordial hymns of the six *jia* palaces—**

This is called **infinite salvation, boundless deliverance.**

All heavens hold in reverence—
Revealing them brings fall into hell,

**Dao says:**
These cavernous hymns are the words of the Three Primordial Emperors,
Six *jia* Divine Kings’ hidden sounds—

Not the common phrases of the world.
Words lack melodic grace,

Difficult to trace.
Treasured by Heaven above,
Secreted in the Three Platforms’ Upper Palace of Mystic Capital,
According to the Mystic Science—
Transmitted once every six million *kalpas*.

「Should there be an adept bearing a golden, flawless heart,
In accordance with ancient rites, he pledges to the Ten Heavens,
Then the matter is entrusted to him.

**Dao says:**
When the *yin* of the Lower Primordial’s womanly form carries a fetus,
And she incurs the Five Injuries or *yang* assaults,
Or suffers from celestial calamities and malevolent influences,
Retaliating against her life—
At the time of her descent,
She becomes a restless soul of past generations,
A tormented spirit without Dao,
Obstructing and transferring misfortune,
Unable to take birth,
Facing the Heavenly Executioner’s great slaughter,
Manifesting as all manner of demons and bandits.

All who suffer such calamities
Must then purify their heart and observe fasts,
Burn incense at the six times,
Recite the *sutra* ten times in rotation,
And virtue shall swiftly descend,
Dispelling all ill omens.

The **infinite salvation, boundless deliverance** texts—
**Dao says:**
When the *qi* in the womb weakens,
And no blessings attend her birth,
She often falls into ruin,
Her vitality withered, unprosperous,
Her ancestors summoning her in vain,
Her descendants severed from lineage,
Her mother and child both afflicted,
By the Three Orphans and Nine Illnesses,
Or by poisoned suckling,
With disasters and misfortunes ever in attendance—
If a true adept serves her,
Burning incense and reciting the *sutra* ten times in rotation,
Guarding the womb, shielding the life, and overseeing the birth,
And presents his plea to the Southern Palace of Heaven,
To add to her celestial record,
He shall fully protect her living form.

In accordance with her Daoic merit,
And the measure of her blessings or calamities,
She shall attain wealth, longevity, or transcendence.

**Dao says:**
There are ghosts that harm the womb,
Who petition the Three Officials,
Stealing her years and fortune,
Extinguishing her life’s vitality,
Causing the fetus to suffer afflictions,
And the child to fail in nourishment—
All such deeds are wrought by ghosts and deities.

There are also virtuous souls who suffer unjust harm,
Leaving them childless, unable to continue their lineage,
Their households in decline.

One may swiftly recite this *sutra*,
And pray to the Star of the Womb,
To safeguard the foundation of her life and birth.

Or if she lacks virtue in past lives,
And her ghostly debt provokes anger,
Heaven punishes her womb,
And she cannot bear her child in peace—
She must quickly amend her ways,
Purify her heart, and repent,
To avert this calamity.

The ghosts that harm the womb have nine names:
The ghost devouring the two-month womb is called **Huángqiú** (黄球),
The ghost devouring the three-month womb is called **Lìshēng** (厉生),
The ghost devouring the four-month womb is called **Zhào Fēi** (兆非),
The ghost devouring the five-month womb is called **Lù Qí** (陆蜞),
The ghost devouring the six-month womb is called **Xuěshī** (血尸),
The ghost devouring the seven-month womb is called **Qióngqí** (穷奇),
The ghost devouring the eight-month womb is called **Huǒqí** (火期),
The ghost devouring the nine-month womb is called **Lóngméi** (龙眉),
The ghost devouring the ten-month womb is called **Chìxī** (赤奚).

Knowing their names,
Burning incense and chanting them,
Shall forever preserve her safety.

Life and death depend upon it—
Her blessings shall be immeasurable.»

The Dao speaks thus: *"Limitless, universal salvation for all beings.*

*All who possess this scripture shall, for future generations of men and women, safeguard the womb and preserve life. On days of calamity, if one devotes oneself to fasting, offering incense, and reciting this sutra ten times, all celestial beings shall record their name, and ten thousand spirits shall stand guard.

*Those who study the Dao and recite this scripture shall have their fetal spirits aligned and virtuous, the Three Palaces radiant, attaining longevity and true essence. The sacred womb shall form within, and not only women may practice this—even the most refined sages may thereby become holy ministers of the Golden Gate, serving the Sage-King.

*The celestial beings record human deeds and misdeeds without omission. The Three Primordial Fetal Immortals and the Six Celestial Deities of the Hexagram shall also champion your fate. Only those who attain the Dao shall truly comprehend these profound words.*

*The Celestial Great Brahman’s hidden speech, the Limitless Sound,
The Dao Lord composed the *Elemental Scripture for Preserving the Womb and Safeguarding Life*.

The sacred sound’s subtle resonance brings all immortals to rejoice as guests, the Four Seasons feast in stillness, the Dao’s scene congeals in emptiness—this is the boundless, profound virtue.*

**The Chapter on the Cavern Spirit’s Disaster-Averting Merit**

The Dao speaks: In days of yore, within the Taiji Heaven, the Green Flower Preserved the Great True Land of Bright Soil, receiving the *Lingbao* Scripture’s *Dongshen* Disaster-Averting Merit of Boundless Upper Grade. The Great Dao Lord of the Cavern Spirit of Fuxiang was commissioned to expound this scripture, circling ten times to summon all true immortals of the ten directions’ Fuxiang worlds.

To the east of Taiji, ninety million *li* distant, within the Azure Sea, there lies a great mountain, its roots entwined with the Cavernous Abyss, its golden sands piled high, piercing the Lower Primordial and ascending to the Great Void. Its realm of violet space connects to Taiji in the west, the Flaming Ridge in the south, and the Gloomy Gate in the north, while its center opens to the Mystic Metropolis. This world spans over ten thousand *li*, its divine peaks and towering ridges alternately emerging and vanishing in the Stygian Waves. The floating lotus radiates sacred light, and the qi of the Azure Mists hovers thickly above. The city is of green jade, the palace of emerald groves, the earth congealed in indigo brilliance, arching to nurture the Fuxiang. Its roots coil at the Eastern Extremity, its branches stretching toward one another, their verdant glow illuminating the thousand-petaled tree, where natural celestial patterns emerge—imperial true writings in crimson, the Nine Qi Phoenix script—thus subduing the ten directions’ celestial hosts.

The sun and moon descend from below, their yang essence spontaneously moving. Through the six hours of day and night, the Celestial River’s tides surge, cloud-waves contending in tumult. The people of the Immortal Metropolis possess twelve grades of refinement, myriad species of beings, and the Three Void Qi generating all things—thus it is called the Green Palace Fuxiang World.

The Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable divided his spirit into myriad heavens and scattered his form into countless billions. Suddenly manifesting in this realm, he named it the Fuxiang Heaven, the Green Flower Dao Domain, where the sacred crown nurtured essence, and a being arose at the Cavernous Extremity—named the Great Dao Lord of the Fuxiang Cavern Spirit, externally known as the Great Sovereign of Fuxiang. He regulates the sun’s ascent and descent, hosting and bidding farewell to the sun’s essence, his true form becoming the essence of sun and moon, his soul the Long-Life Sovereign of the Southern Extremity. His junior successor is the Green Flower Sovereign.

The Fuxiang nurtured the Cavern Spirit’s qi, which transformed through nine kalpas, its form and features fully realized, the Eastern True Dao attained—thus becoming the Great Dao Lord of the Cavern Spirit. The Fuxiang Cavern Spirit is the essence of the Nine Yang True Refined Qi, born within the Fuxiang. It transmutes into kalpa-fire, becoming the enlightened, eloquent, and exalted virtue of high sages. The most divine of virtues, it is the Lord of the Dao.

The Dao Lord wields the Mother of All Things, generating the Primordial Embryo, containing the Five Phases’ essence to forge the heavens and earth. All worldly calamities arise from fire’s scourge. Fire is the root of disaster, yet the Dao possesses the ancestral Cavern Spirit of Fuxiang to govern its transformations. The qi of the Fuxiang’s green groves, when vast, refines true scriptures and augments the Mystic Dao. When subtle, it averts disasters and dispels misfortune, blessing all living beings. Just as fire depends on wood, so too does wood’s embryo harbor fire, fire belongs to the spirit, and the spirit is nourished within water—thus celestial calamities subside, and the way of averting them is manifest. Therefore, the Great Dao Lord of the Fuxiang Cavern Spirit is the Master of Disaster-Aversion.

Descending to Taiji, he first arrived at the seat. The Moral Great God of the True Realm of Fuxiang, the Supreme Sage of High Venerability, the True Person of the Azure Sovereign, with countless hosts unnumbered, rode the void and came. Azure clouds flew, green groves flourished luxuriantly, the whirlwind wheels moved in secret, the Cavernous Canopy hung with splendor, the Azure Dragon’s wondrous light stretched boundless, flowing clouds and crimson scenes blending into boundless haze. For seven days and seven nights, the Celestial Manifestation Platform of all heavens shone with the sun’s station, the Star Gate and celestial axle momentarily halting their courses. The sacred wind drifted far, the seas and Tai Mountains brightened with clouds, the sky showed no anomaly, the Nine Qi gathered in purity, and across the land—earth, mountains, rivers, woods, and trees—jewel-buds radiated fragrance, green scriptures rose in ridges, and purple bells chimed in resonance, their harmonies filling the void.

Within this profound stillness, the Great Dao Lord of the Fuxiang Cavern Spirit, for all living beings, resolved their disasters and calamities. Seated in mystic repose upon the Purple Cloud Celestial Light Jade Throne, he expounded the scripture once, and all the great saints of heaven simultaneously praised its virtue. At that time, within the land, all male and female beings saw their calamities and illnesses universally dispersed.

He expounded the scripture a second time, and the Taiji Heaven opened, with all true immortals gathered in assembly. A third time, the Immortal Metropolis rose in smoke, celebrating the Three Realms. A fourth time, the sacred heart communicated inwardly, intuitively recognizing the wondrous body. A fifth time, dragons roared across the sea, their divine waves spreading far. A sixth time, the three calamities ceased, and all things flourished in vigor. A seventh time, divine radiance shone in unison, the layered gates aglow. An eighth time, the Five Sacred Cloud Scripts emerged, and the Purple Chime sounded in harmony. A ninth time, jade flowers flew through the sky, their layered hues intermingling in splendor. A tenth time, the Cavern Spirit’s light descended, and the springs’ curves received its grace—at that moment, all men and women of the land, without exception, inclined their hearts, all receiving protection and salvation, attaining longevity.

The Dao speaks: At that time, as the Great Dao Lord of the Fuxiang Cavern Spirit expounded the scripture once, the *Dongshen* Most True Great God of Boundless Limitless Disaster-Aversion and Calamity-Resolution from the Eastern Direction, with countless hosts unnumbered, floated through the void. A second time, the same from the Southern Direction. A third time, from the Western Direction. A fourth time, from the Northern Direction. A fifth time, from the Northeast. A sixth time, from the Southeast. A seventh time, from the Southwest.

A eighth time, the Dao/Way was expounded, and the **Dongshen** Most True Great God of Boundless Limitless Disaster-Aversion and Calamity-Resolution from the Western Direction, with countless hosts unnumbered, floated through the void.

A ninth time, the same from the Upper Direction.

A tenth time, the same from the Lower Direction.

After tenfold expounding, the **Dongshen** Most True Great God of Boundless Limitless Disaster-Aversion and Calamity-Resolution from all Ten Directions, with countless hosts, descended together. All men and women of the land inclined their hearts in reverence.

The arriving ones were like torrents rushing into the abyss, like tides responding to the moon—boundless and endless, with no visible beginning or end. Countless hosts filled the land within and without.

Some suffered calamities due to **body and use** yet undiscerned (*tǐyòng wèi fēn*), or **karmic forces** at play (*yìlián wéi zāi*).
Some fell prey to **unfulfilled wisdom** (*zhìhuì bù shuàn*), or **defilements clinging to the dharma** (*fǎn rǎn wéi zāi*).
Some were struck by **misaligned qi** (*shénqì bù hé*), or **erroneous distinctions** (*fēnbié wéi zāi*).
Some were ensnared by **obscured Dao/Way-nature** (*Dàoxìng bù míng*), or **grasping at delusions** (*zhí wàng wéi zāi*).
Some were afflicted by **clinging to emptiness and mere existence** (*qùqǔ kōngyǒu*), or **confusion of true and false** (*xiézhèng wéi zāi*).
Some were tormented by **attachment to the dharma-body** (*liànzhuó fǎshēn*), or **self-identification as calamity** (*rènjǐ wéi zāi*).
Some were misled by **coveting spiritual powers** (*tānzhuó shéntōng*), or **erratic transformations** (*biànhuàn wéi zāi*).
Some were trapped by **aspirations beyond the Three Realms** (*yù chū sānjiè*), or **the cycle of birth and death** (*shēngsǐ wéi zāi*).
Some were struck by **grasping at the Great Dao/Way** (*shíwù Dàodào*), or **inaction as calamity** (*wúzuòwéi zāi*).
Some were driven mad by **measuring the primordial transformation** (*cèliáng yuánhuà*), or **foolish speculation** (*kuánggǔ wéi zāi*).
Some were plagued by **ignorance of the Cavern Spirit** (*bùzhī Dòngshén*), or **confusion of yin and yang** (*yīnyáng wéi zāi*).
Some were misguided by **entering and exiting the Womb and Matrix Realms** (*rùchū tāizàng*), or **distinction between ordinary and holy beings** (*fánshèng wéi zāi*).

These twelve great calamities are the **Dao/Way’s** great afflictions for those who seek ultimate learning.

Additionally, there are worldly calamities:
At the time of **conception**, when **karmic forces** manifest (*yèliè suǒ zhuǎn*), **birth complications** occur (*héngcè wéi zāi*).
In **childhood**, **fright and terror** bring disaster (*jīngwù wéi zāi*).
In **maturity**, **fate and destiny** strike (*yùndù wéi zāi*).
In **marriage**, **gain and loss** bring ruin (*dé sàng wéi zāi*).
In **pursuit of cultivation**, **qi and climate** cause affliction (*qìhòu wéi zāi*).
In **daily life**, **illness and disease** arise (*qǐjū wéi zāi*).
In **action**, **malevolent spirits** bring misfortune (*guǐshén wéi zāi*).
In **times of ignorance**, **heaven and earth** themselves become calamitous (*tiāndì wéi zāi*).
In **times of betrayal**, **punishment and execution** befall (*xínglù wéi zāi*).
In **times of disobedience**, **thunder and fire** descend as disaster (*léi huǒ wéi zāi*).
In **times of unbridled conduct**, **heaven’s prohibitions** strike (*tiānjìn wéi zāi*).
In **times of defilement**, **untimely death** occurs (*yāozhé wéi zāi*).
In **times of hidden poison**, **yin and yang** are disrupted (*yīnyáng wéi zāi*).
In **times of greed and corruption**, **excessive fate** brings ruin (*yìfèn wéi zāi*).
In **times of worldly residence**, **hypocrisy and shallowness** prevail (*wěibó wéi zāi*).

These fifteen great calamities are those that all in the world suffer.

Thus, when **fivefold death** befalls, or **celestial stars** bring misfortune, or **earthly officials** record crimes, or the **Three Officials** present petitions, or the **Five Emperors** mark blame—
these calamities strike the body and mind in succession.

All hasten to the **Great Dao Lord’s** vast dharma-seat of the Fuxiang Cavern Spirit, encircling and surrounding, gazing upon the divine countenance, listening to the celestial voice, as the **Great Dao/Way** of universal disaster-aversion and salvation is proclaimed.

At that moment, the **Fuxiang Cavern Spirit’s** teaching master, the **Great Dao Lord**, took the sash of the **Sun and Moon Cloud-Dragon**, turned the **auspicious jade throne of radiant light**, and looked down upon the assembly, delighting in the Ten Directions. In a flash of favor—
the **Great Dao Lord** divided his form into myriad billions, awakening the origins of life for all beings, and every sentient one saw their own reflection, kneeling long before the holy presence to receive blessings, palms pressed to their brows as they heard the sacred teachings.

He expounded that **Fuxiang** is the **root of vital qi**, and the **Cavern Spirit’s** central qi is the **spirit of all ten thousand things**. With the **prayer of the Most True Great God**, all great calamities were dispelled by invoking the **ninefold radiant light** of the Cavern Spirit’s true essence—no disaster remained, all afflictions vanished.

Within that gathering, a **Dao Lord** was seen floating atop the **curved, jade-patterned leaves of Fuxiang’s purple clouds**, where the **Cavern Spirit’s** qi transformed into a **verdant forest of elixir**—a thousandfold truth. Crowns and swords stood tall in orderly ranks, five zhang above the earth.

The **Great Dao Lord** ascended, and the **Dongshen** Most True Great God of Disaster-Aversion and Calamity-Resolution, **Han** the **Lord of Records**, the **Southern Court** **God of Expediency** who averts calamities and guides righteousness, the **Highest Sage** of **Green Splendor** and **Illuminating Treasure**, the **Ten-Directional Boundless Most True Great God**, along with countless hosts—all entered the **Sacred Forest’s** luminous shadow.

The **heavenly and human beings** looked upward, and saw only a **bursting radiance** emerging from the Cavern Light. Once inside the forest’s glow, they vanished—no trace remained. The people dispersed, the **jade ramparts** flattened, and the **Sacred Forest** fell silent.

The **Great Dao Lord** then completed the **expounding of the scripture** within that transformed realm. All the **true ones** oversaw the transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words.

The **dharma-assembly** concluded, and the **celestial hosts** returned to their stations. The **void gave birth to the spirit**, and **stillness left no lingering sound**.

At that time, all who encountered the **scripture and dharma** were universally saved—none suffered injury in that year. The entire land turned in reverence, calamities dispelled, and the **original heart** purified in tranquility.

With the heart thus cleansed and upright, **false Dao/Way** could not intrude.
Celestial **pathways** were no longer violated, **malevolent spirits** could not harm, and the **threefold disasters** and **fourfold killings**, the **fivefold and sixfold afflictions**, the **sevenfold injuries**, **eightfold difficulties**, **ninefold calamities**, and **excessive fate**—all were extinguished. **Inauspicious omens** were banished, and words aligned with the **Central Dao/Way**.

There was **no destruction or blame**, all were equal in **compassionate love**, and **diverse beings** became **kin**. The land was secure, its people prosperous.

Rejoicing in **Great Peace**, the **teachings began to spread**, and the **entire land followed the Dao/Way**. Those with **devoted hearts** revered and upheld the **doctrine**, all attaining **salvation in the world**.

The **Dao/Way** spoke: The words uttered by the **Great Dao Lord** during the **scripture-expounding** were the **hidden sounds** of all **celestial emperors** and **heavenly deities**, averting disasters and bringing fortune—also the **secret names** of **demonic kings**, dispelling ten thousand calamities. These were not the **common phrases** of the world.

The **Highest Sage**, having attained **true personhood**, mastered the **mysteries of the profound**, and knew their full meaning.
When recited **ten times**, the **celestial hosts** descended in truth, **disaster-qi** was submerged, **afflictions** were exhausted, the **original life** illuminated, **blessings of birth** naturally bestowed, the **Most True Great God** guarding with vigilance, **false Dao/Way** having no sway, all **spirits** in awe, the **divine officials** beating their drums in rhythm, **glowing clouds** parting in splendor, the **treasure-sea** radiating light—**worldly afflictions** were annihilated, **evil vapors** dissipated, **calamities** turned back, **fate** transformed into **true attainment**.

Those who seek **ultimate learning**, if they recite it **ten times**, will be **aligned with the celestial emperors**, their **ranks harmonized with the hosts**. All **heavenly beings** will respond from afar, **protecting the world** from disasters and misfortunes, ensuring **peace for all sentient beings**, and the **Dao/Way of life** flourishing eternally. **Poisons and harms** will disperse, **ghostly essences** lose their power, the **Five Emperors** will attend in welcome, the **Three Realms** will submit to command, the **dying** will be **saved**, and the **terminated** will **live again**.

Thus it is that scholars, when their **virtue/power** and **Dao/Way** are complete, command reverence from ghosts and gods, penetrate the **true ultimate**, and their **qi** and **spiritual force** fill the cosmos. When they recite and chant this **sutra**, blessings descend and calamities vanish, and all sentient beings are freed from suffering. They master celestial governance, subdue earthly spirits, and bind demonic essences—not merely averting death, but restoring life.

Even a light recitation of this chapter shields one from misfortune, while proper veneration and offerings bring prosperity to one’s household, flourishing through generations. With virtuous connections, one escapes all disasters, and divine beings guard the gates. This **sutra** is supreme and unmatched in the **Jade Capital**, saving countless beings and serving as the root of all **Dao/Way** traditions. Its grandeur is vast, its **virtue/power** beyond measure.

The **Dao/Way** speaks: Those who recite this **sutra** ten times will see the Nine Heavens dispel disasters and banish misfortune, with celestial deities gathering to avert calamities. Dark stars and ominous influences are quelled, and the **Black Heavenly God** subdues malevolent forces. As one’s fate approaches, fasting and supplication will forever sever decay and misfortune, extending life beyond mortal limits. At the end of one’s allotted span, the soul ascends to the **Vermilion Palace**, attaining nine years of renewed vitality, transformation through **true attainment**, and noble status. Those who earnestly study this **sutra**, fulfilling its merits and **virtue/power**, shall become **immortals**, ascending to the **Golden Gate** and feasting in the **Jade Capital**.

Superior scholars who practice and recite this **sutra** shower blessings upon all life, sparing even the most grievous calamities. All who hear it immediately ascend to the **Southern Palace**. Mortals who recite it will prolong their years, and their descendants shall attain the **Emptiness-Resolution** path. Refining **spiritual fire** and **vital essence**, they transmute bones into **immortality**, their forms and spirits hidden or manifest at will, dwelling in blessed courts and wandering freely in the **Dao/Way** realm—thus returning to their original bodies and traversing the cosmos.

This **sutra** is profound and boundless, its blessings extending to all **heavenly beings and mortals**, granting immeasurable fortune and mercy across life and death. A treasure of the heavens, it was not meant for the mortal world. Only noble scholars, offering gold and jade with sincere devotion and swearing oaths to the heavens, may transmit it. To leak or neglect it invites retribution upon nine generations, condemning one to the **Ghostly Bureaucracy**.

When this **sutra** is kept, the **Five Emperors**, along with twenty-four **Celestial Boys** and **Celestial Girls**, attend as guardians, protecting those who receive it.

The **Dao/Way** decrees:
In the **first month**, with prolonged fasting, recite this **sutra** to absolve the suffering souls of past lives, those entangled in **tomb disputes** and **Ghostly Bureaucracy**, and those facing impending doom. Sever the transmission of misfortune, guide the **Night River** souls to the **Southern Palace**.

In the **seventh month**, with prolonged fasting, recite this **sutra** to absolve oneself from **celestial nets** and **earthly snares**, the **Nine Malevolent Influences**, and the torments of the **Heavenly Prison**. One shall attain **immortality**, with one’s name recorded in celestial registers, **Yellow Talismans** and **White Tablets** erasing death and granting rebirth.

In the **tenth month**, with prolonged fasting, recite this **sutra** to avert **eclipses**, celestial and terrestrial upheavals, **demonic influences**, and regional disasters—plagues, poisonous afflictions, and **Heaven’s Severance**. For kings and emperors, it secures the **Mandate of Heaven**, ensuring eternal stability for their lineage and eternal peace for their people.

On the **eight solar terms**, recite this **sutra** to avert disasters tied to **fate and cosmic shifts**, slanderous accusations, imprisonment, and violent death, as well as **water and fire calamities** and **blocked pathways**. The **Nine Palaces** send deities to guard the practitioner.

On one’s **birthday**, recite this **sutra** to avert the **Northern Dipper’s** influence, recall the wandering soul, and dispel the **fatal blockages** and humiliations of death. The spirit shall be purified, **qi** eternal, the body radiant, and the **Three Realms** shall attend with the **Five Emperors** in welcome. All deities shall pay homage, one’s name inscribed in heaven, and with merits complete, one ascends to the **Upper Purity**.

The **Dao/Way** instructs: On days of practice, one must bathe in scented water, fast in purity, enter the chamber facing east, and strike the teeth **thirty-two times** to communicate with the **Thirty-two Heavens**. Bowing inwardly **thirty-two times**, close the eyes, and meditate upon sitting within clouds of **green, yellow, and white**. Within and without, all is profound darkness—**Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane** arrayed on either side, while the sun and moon illuminate the chamber. The **Averting Disasters Divine Spirits** stand clearly before and behind, their **round halos** radiating light across the ten directions.

The **secret incantation** proclaims:
*"Supreme Mystic Origin, the **Highest Sovereign of the Dao/Way**,
Summon forth from my body the **Three Five Functionaries**, left and right officials, **Perfumed Boys**, **Jade Girls**, the **Five Emperors’ Direct Talismans**, and the **Directing Sun Officials**—each thirty-six in number—to open the way for my words.

Today is a day of auspicious fasting in the pure hall, practicing this **sutra** to save countless beings.
May my petition reach the **Supreme Most High of the Thirty-two Heavens, the Original Beginning Emperor**, the Most Venerable and Exalted.
Having completed the **thirty-two recitations**, face east and recite the **sutra**.

**Original Beginning’s Supreme Sutra for Saving Beings of the Highest Rank and Marvelous Chapter**,
**Original Beginning’s Divine Spirit Averting Disasters and Marvelous Section**,
**Heavenly Blessings for Saving Beings**.

A hundred demons retreat in silence, their **yin-yang transformations** effortless.
The **Divine Spirit’s Crimson Text** reveals the **Non-Ultimate True One**.
From the **Original Beginning’s Eon**, the **Primordial Transformation** gave rise to all heavens.
**Green Flower Wood Essence**, the root of all things, spreads **generative qi**, its **vital fluids** rising in mist.
The **Noble Spirit of Wood**, child of **Primordial Qi**, gives birth to **True Water**, which transforms into **Wood**.
Wood absorbs the **Green Flower Qi**, becoming sovereign over all things.
Within the **Green Flower Wood Essence** lies **Luminous Nature**, which refines into **Fire**.
Fire’s crimson radiance achieves **mystic perfection**, becoming **True**.
Naturally generating **spirit**, it penetrates the **Great Emptiness**.
Awakening to **Sincere Clarity**, its **qi** becomes eternal.
Its flames flicker—thus named **Divine Spirit**.
The **Divine Spirit’s True Essence** brings all things to life.
All **evil calamities**, upon seeing it, are instantly pacified."*

The **True Essence of the Dao** is unassailable by calamities, disasters, or falsehoods.

The earth holds five metals, which reveal their **vital essence** when touched by fire.
All things entering fire undergo boundless transformation.
Ascending to **mystic perfection**, one contemplates the **Mysteries of Heaven**—
its principles ever profound, like the world’s disasters,
which are not of the **True Path**.

The **Divine Spirit** rides upon them, crushing all calamities.
The **Nine Suns of the Divine Spirit** generate boundless blessings.
Those who attain it endure eternally; all beings feel its abiding protection.
The **Divine Wind** stirs, and **Crimson Clouds** drift—
curved into sacred script, the **Three Lights** shine as one.
Warding off disasters and safeguarding life,
its name is inscribed in the **Jade Hall**.

It ascends to the **Three Heavens**, the **Land of the Dao’s Limitless Way**,
descends to the **Jade Mountains**, where **Ida-Ra** blends with gold.
Within, all beings are nurtured, and disasters are averted.
Wearing the **Divine Script**, it draws in the **Great Sun**.
Purple vapors condense within, radiant and dazzling—
the **key to the Dao**, the **gate to transcendence**.
The **Heavenly True** gives birth to **spirit-sages**.
It governs fate and protects the people—all through the **Divine Spirit**.

The **Great Spirit’s Qi** pervades the **Ten Directions**.
Within dwell:
the **God of Warding Disasters** who turns back calamities,
the **Lord of Extinguishing Misfortune and Prolonging Life**,
the **Divine Spirit of Resolving Calamities**,
the **Lord of Eastern Hua Who Degrees Fate**,
the **Great Sage of Ten Thousand Blessings, the Imperial Ancestor**,
the **God of Expiating Disasters and Stabilizing Fate**,
the **Moral Lord of Dissolving Calamities and Scattering Misfortune**—
their responses to supplications are boundless, their salvation of beings infinite.

Today, the **Scriptures are verified**, and the **Heavens attend in splendor**.

Together, they ride the **Whirlwind Chariot of Radiant Splendor**,
in **Crimson Jade Carriages**, beneath **Jewel-Canopied Banners**,
drawn by **Dragons and Phoenixes**, beneath **Nine-Fold Radiant Standards**,
within **Four Qi, Eight Light Tents of Lofty Clarity**—
before them, **Sacred Chants resound in unison**,
behind them, **Jade Reeds harmonize in song**.
**Golden Cranes and Vermilion Birds** sing in chorus,
as the **Six Li** open the **Dao**, and the **Nine Elders** guard the yoke.
Ten thousand chariots, ten thousand riders float through the void,
their light returning as they survey the **True** and guide the living.

The **Celestial Chancellors**,
**Nanchang Upper Palace Officials**,
**Record-Keepers of Fate**—
warding disasters, scattering misfortune,
prolonging life and increasing years,
the **Divine Spirit of Resolving Calamities**—
holding **talismans and registers**,
they assemble before the **Emperor’s Court**,
verifying the **Heavens’ decrees** as they respond to each salvation.

They proclaim to the **Three Realms**, the **Land of the Limitless Spirit**,
the **Bureaus of the Spring’s Bend**, the **Northern Capital of Luo-Hang**,
the **Three Officials and Nine Ministries**, the **Twelve River Sources**—
the **Disaster-Dispensing, Plague-Bringing, Great Killing Ghosts of the Netherworld**—
to **ward off and absolve** the world’s living beings from **punishments, calamities, decline, and emptiness**.

They alter the **registers of fate**, removing **disasters and recording blessings**,
so that life may endure, and fortune daily increase.
They **dissolve guilt and retribution**, **extinguish evil roots**,
so that none may be detained or forced into **ghostly assemblies**.

By the **Dao’s Imperial Edict**, at the appointed hour they ascend,
aligning with the **Yang of the Dipper**, returning through the **Heavenly Gate**.
From **death they emerge into life**, ascending to the **Emperor’s Presence**.
They **subdue demons and uplift the worthy**, guiding souls to the **Southern Palace’s ranks**.
**Souls and spirits undergo refinement**; disasters fade, blessings manifest.
The **living body is saved**; through each **eon**, it endures.
With the **wheel of existence**, it turns alongside the **Heavens**, equal in years.
It **permanently transcends the Three Realms of Suffering**—
the **Five Torments and Eight Hardships**—
soaring in **Adrift Clarity**, the **Upper Pure**.

The **Heaven of the Nine-Colored Robe**—
**Emperor the Moon-Born, the Gentle**.

**Thirty-Two Heavens, Thirty-Two Emperors.**
The Heavens conceal their names,

This is the Third True Sovereign of the Void Spirit, the Sovereign Lord of the Cavernous Dao, who manifests his *Dharma* body, traverses the Great Void, and sings the *Dao* of averting calamity and bringing boundless blessings—a melody harmonizing with the Cavernous Chapters.
Recite it a hundred times, and your name ascends to the Southern Palace.
Recite it a thousand times, and the demon kings come to welcome you.
Recite it ten thousand times, and the *Dao* is complete—you ascend to the heavens, transcend the Three Realms, and attain the rank of Immortal Lord.

Those who hear this sacred melody will see the demon kings bow in reverence, command the earthly spirits to guard and escort you, and pull you free from the underworld’s gates. The Five Torments and Eight Difficulties will be overcome, the Seven Ancestors will ascend, and you will forever depart from the Ghostly Bureaus. No calamity or blame shall remain, and your fate and blessings shall be paired in harmony.

This is called the boundless, universally liberating *Dao*.
It contains the secret celestial scriptures that all the heavens hold in reverence.
To reveal it carelessly is to fall into the hells, and the calamity will extend to the Seven Ancestors.
The *Dao* says: These two chapters are the hidden melodies of the Heavenly Sovereigns and the True Kings who avert calamity, all the words of the Great *Brahman*. They are not the common speech of the world.
Their words lack poetic grace, their tunes lack ornate beauty.
Thus they are called profound and mysterious, difficult to fathom.
They are treasured by Heaven and hidden in the Purple Micro’s Upper Palace of the Mystic Capital, transmitted once every four million *kalpas* according to the Mystic Canon.

If a perfected one brings gold and jade with a sincere heart and, following the ancient rites, pledges to the Ten Heavens, then it shall be bestowed upon them.

The *Dao* says: The method of the Cavernous Spirit for averting calamity is most subtle.
Unless one embodies the Mystic and delves into the subtle, they cannot fully know it.
The calamities of humans and spirits arise from the exhaustion of their celestial allotments, the waxing and waning of the moon, the repose or decline of the saints, or the illnesses of the unenlightened.
When such calamities occur, all who share the same *qi* must unite in heart to observe fasts, burn incense at the six times of day, and recite the scriptures ten thousand times. Then blessings and virtue will descend, dispelling all inauspiciousness.

The boundless text universally liberates without end.
The *Dao* says: When averting the calamities of the common folk—whether their fate is exhausted or their life ends, or whether the unenlightened, with shallow *Dao*, have not yet fulfilled the Immortal grade and their celestial allotment is extinguished, their bodies experiencing the Great Darkness—
at the moment of passing, the perfected ones among their fellow students should burn incense and recite the scriptures ten thousand times to liberate their physical forms according to the method.

Those who act in accordance with the method shall not only avert worldly calamities but also avert the calamities of the afterlife.
Now, though the body has perished and the soul has departed, it is still called a calamity—referring to the prisons of water and fire, the prisons of metal and iron, the torments of interrogation, pursuit, arrest, and confinement, as well as the afflictions of the soul beneath the earth.
Then, at a secluded and silent place by mountains and rivers, a platform of earth is sealed, facing north in prayer. The true scriptures and jade writings of the Five Directions are laid out, and through fasting and recitation of the scriptures, the soul is liberated. The spirit ascends directly to the Southern Celestial, and according to their merit, they are reborn on the appointed day.
The Wheel of *Dharma* turns without confusion, and they attain divinity as Immortals.

The *Dao* says: When the celestial movements of Heaven and Earth reach their limits, the stars and constellations shift their courses, the sun and moon lose their regularity, the four seasons are disordered, *yin* and *yang* are unbalanced, and the sovereign suffers calamity—when wars rage in the four directions, epidemics spread, and the common folk perish in masses, when teachers and friends meet untimely ends—
they must observe fasts, burn incense, and recite the scriptures.
With the Five Emperors’ red scriptures and the Five Directional sacred texts inscribed on blue-green silk, they face the directional fire and scatter them.
Using *zhi* wood tablets, they inscribe the words of averting calamity and cast them into mountains and rivers, burying them in the places where the calamities occur.
Then the Cavernous Great Spirits gather and dispel the calamitous *qi*, bringing forth blessings and auspiciousness.

The observance of fasts and the recitation of scriptures carry immense merit.
Above, they dispel heavenly calamities and protect the sovereign.
Below, they avert poisonous harm and liberate the common folk.
Both the living and the dead rely upon them, and their blessings are boundless.
Thus it is said: boundless, universally liberating for both Heaven and humanity.

The *Dao* says: Those who possess this scripture and perform these deeds for the sake of the Heavenly Sovereign, the imperial master, and the common folk—
on days of calamity, if they take the vow to observe fasts, burn incense, and recite the scriptures ten thousand times, all the heavens will record their names, the myriad spirits will guard them, and the perfected ones of the Right Path will ensure they become ministers of the Golden Gate for the Holy Sovereign.
The heavens record every merit and demerit without omission.
Even the demon kings of the heavens will recommend you, and those who attain the *Dao* shall truly comprehend these profound words.

Composed by the Great Sovereign of the Cavernous Dao, the *Dao* of Averting Calamity and Bringing Auspiciousness, the Middle Chapter.
