**The *Lingbao* Scripture of Boundless Degree for Nourishing Humans—Supreme Marvelous Scripture, Volume Forty-Four Complete**
**Volume Forty-Five**

**The Chapter on Dispelling Malignant Qi of Mountain Valleys**

The Dao speaks: *"In ancient times, within the vast and boundless Heavenly Center, the profound and verdant song of the Great God of the Divine Land was sung. There, the Heavenly True One (元始) received the Supreme Marvelous Scripture for Dispelling Malignant Qi of Mountain Valleys and Nourishing Humans.*

When the Heavenly True One, the Celestial Sovereign of Boundless Degree (元始天尊), spoke this scripture, circling ten times through the Ten Directions to summon all realms, the Ten Directions’ deities then came to take their seats. The Heavenly True Great God, the Supreme Saint of High Eminence, the True Person of Marvelous Conduct—both great and small mountain valleys, the Celestial Officials who rule over all realms, the myriad peaks of the Ten Directions, the spirits and gods of streams and springs, the demonic lords of the dark abodes, the poisonous miasmas of the world—all these, whether as officials of the divine bureaucracy or as subordinate spirits, innumerable in number, ride the void and appear from the mountains. Their purple palanquins and jade carriages gleam with cloud-like radiance, their jeweled wheels and feathered canopies sway in majestic response, their effulgent light like flowing jade, their thousand hues bursting like blooming reeds, their brilliance piercing the mysterious depths.

For seven days and seven nights, the celestial hosts—suns, moons, stars, and constellations—along with the pivot and balance (枢衡), the Jade Pass (玉关), all halt their courses and still their wheels. The divine winds fall silent, the mountain valleys conceal their mists, the heavens shine with pristine clarity, and the harmonious *qi* spreads in all eight directions. In every land, the earth and mountains, rivers and forests, all flatten into equal measure, with no high or low. The soil transforms into *ruiyu zhujian* (蕊珠含碧), a warm and luminous jade, without variation in hue. All the celestial deities attend their seats, while the Heavenly True One, the Celestial Sovereign of Boundless Degree, sits in transcendence upon the floating platform of the Nine Spirits, the Night Light of Myriad Peaks, the Azure Pavilion of the Jade Terrace.

After the first recitation of the scripture, all the celestial saints simultaneously praised its virtue. At that moment, the thirty-six thousand mountains of the world all brightened at once. After the second recitation, the celestial mists congealed in the void, and the sacred mushrooms (灵芝) spread in abundance. After the third recitation, auspicious vapors enveloped all, and fragrant incense arose from the rocky caves. After the fourth recitation, the world’s realm grew serene, and the mountain clouds exhaled their brilliance. After the fifth recitation, the dragon’s light illuminated the seas, and the celestial treasures crystallized in splendor. After the sixth recitation, the Dao’s *qi* revived and clarified, and all living beings rejoiced in harmony. After the seventh recitation, ghosts and demons lay dormant, and the malignant miasmas vanished without trace. After the eighth recitation, the heavenly valleys became void and mysterious, and the divine mists gathered in dense layers. After the ninth recitation, the Pure and True (玉真) descended in response, and wondrous blessings were revealed in profound mystery. After the tenth recitation, the transformation reached the utmost realms, and both heavenly and human beings sighed in awe. At that time, all men and women within the land, without exception, turned their hearts in reverence, all receiving protection and attaining eternal life.*

The Dao speaks: *"At that time, when the Heavenly True One first recited the scripture, the Great God of Boundless Degree from the Eastern World of True Virtue (真贤) arrived, along with his countless retinue, ascending through the void. When the second recitation was complete, the Great God of Boundless Degree from the Southern World of Palmy Wisdom (慧观) came, with his countless retinue ascending through the void. When the third recitation was complete, the Great God of Boundless Degree from the Western World of Tranquil Immortals (定仙) arrived, with his countless retinue ascending through the void. When the fourth recitation was complete, the Great God of Boundless Degree from the Northern World of Constant Benevolence (常善) came, with his countless retinue ascending through the void. When the fifth recitation was complete, the Great God of Boundless Degree from the Northeast World of Illuminating Obscurity (明微) arrived, with his countless retinue ascending through the void. When the sixth recitation was complete, the Great God of Boundless Degree from the Southeast World of Sacred Virtue (灵德) came, with his countless retinue ascending through the void. When the seventh recitation was complete, the Great God of Boundless Degree from the Southwest World of Tranquil Seas (海静) arrived, with his countless retinue ascending through the void. When the eighth recitation was complete, the Great God of Boundless Degree from the Northwest World of Primordial Sovereignty (元皇) came, with his countless retinue ascending through the void. When the ninth recitation was complete, the Great God of Boundless Degree from the Upper World of Piercing Void (洞虚) arrived, with his countless retinue ascending through the void. When the tenth recitation was complete, the Great God of Boundless Degree from the Lower World of Permeating Light (通光) came, with his countless retinue ascending through the void. After the tenfold recitation was complete, the Great Gods of Boundless Degree from all Ten Directions’ worlds arrived simultaneously, and all men and women within the land turned their hearts in devotion, petitioning the Celestial Sovereign with boundless compassion to universally benefit the tenfold realms of the Lower Element (下元), dispelling the malignant miasmas of mountain valleys for all sentient beings, preserving life and safeguarding form.*

The scripture then expounded upon the mountains and valleys of the universal realm, the hidden depths of caves and groves, where myriad ghosts and spirits lurk in concealment or wander at will, alongside the evil and venomous spirits who follow their commands, gathering in factions to unleash their toxic *qi*. The malignant miasmas infest the people, and the Heavenly True One’s divine text collects and dispels them, causing all harm to vanish forever. At that moment, the arriving immortals and celestial deities swarmed like clouds and rain, their ranks stretching in orderly rows around the land, filling half of every realm with their presence—an assembly beyond restraint.

Then, the Heavenly True One fixed his gaze and lowered his brow, surveying the land with distant vision. He gently raised his jade voice and universally declared to the assembly: ‘The Yellow Turban (混黄) established the Pole (立极), from which all ten thousand phenomena were born. Thus arose the thirty-six thousand heavens and earths, the thirty-six thousand suns and moons, and again the Great Three Thousand Worlds, the Middle Three Thousand Worlds, and the Small Three Thousand Worlds. Each world, in its turn, bears its own kind, dividing into clans and lineages. The thirty-six thousand mountain valleys lie within these worlds, followed by the twenty-three thousand, twelve thousand, one thousand two hundred, and three hundred sixty mountain valleys, which form the heavens and earths of the worlds. The stagnant waters, marshes, and valleys of the mountains generate venomous, cruel, and grotesque serpents and scorpions, great and small insects, who ride the morning *qi*, exhaling and inhaling to form poisonous mists that shroud the world. Men and women dwelling near these valleys, breathing and consuming their tainted essence, absorb their malevolence, contracting the miasmas that lead to premature death and widespread ruin across the land."*

With the *Law-Wisdom*, I revealed the divine talismans and methods of exorcism, so that the people of the world might be nourished and at peace, and those who practice might attain the Dao. The great assembly praised and all wished to hear it.

When the Primordial Origin first established the wondrous teaching, he suspended a precious jewel in the void, as large as a millet grain, five *zhang* above the earth. The Primordial Origin then summoned the Celestial True Gods—highest saints and exalted ones of wondrous conduct—the ten-directional Infinite World’s Exorcism Mountain-Valley Pestilence Gods, countless in number, all entering the jewel. The heavenly beings looked up and saw only a surging flow entering the jewel’s mouth; once inside, their whereabouts were unknown. The people dispersed, the land returned to level ground, and no longer sank or tilted.

Within the jewel, the Primordial Origin completed the recitation of the scripture. The assembled True Ones, overseeing the salvation of all, transmitted it to me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. The ritual matters were fully attended to; the celestial beings resumed their stations, and in an instant, all was silent, leaving no trace.

At that time, those who encountered the scripture and its law were universally saved and delivered, preserving their natural lifespan without injury. The land’s people turned in reverence, all cultivating virtuous intentions.

They were neither deceitful nor false, neither unrestrained nor idle, neither arrogant nor haughty, neither deceitful nor confused. Their speech was pure and upright, their bearing dignified and composed. They were harmonized in unity and tranquility, and those of differing natures became kindred. The nation was secure, the people prospered, and all rejoiced in great peace. The teaching began to spread, and the entire land was guided by the Dao.

Those with sincere devotion, who revered and honored it, all attained salvation for the world.

The Dao speaks: The names spoken in the scripture by the Primordial Celestial Venerable are the inner names of the celestial sovereigns, hidden in their resonant tones. They are also the inner taboos of the True Kings, the secret names of the Exorcism Mountain-Valley Pestilence Hundred Spirits, not the common words of the world. The Highest Saints, having already become True Persons, penetrated the Mysterious and fathomed the subtle. They commanded the mountain-valley pestilence to cease its evil poisonous spirits and ghosts, resolving the causes of calamity, suppressing sickness and harm, and safeguarding the people.

Those who master its verses and recite them ten times will have the celestial beings chanting in response from afar, the Northern Emperor offering rites, the ghosts and spirits restraining their poisons, the mountain valleys concealing their clouds, the pestilence unable to spread, the myriad people at peace, the demons bound in form, the ghostly essences extinguished, the dead revived, and white bones restored to life.

Scholars who recite it ten times will have the Five Emperors attending as guards, the Three Realms bowing in homage, the demonic essences losing their sight, the ghostly spirits extinguished, the dying saved, and the dead revived.

This is so because scholars dwelling in the True Mountain Valleys align with the Mysterious Dao; without need of exorcism, they are naturally free from pestilence. If the impure *qi* has not yet dissipated and the body has not yet penetrated to the True, though they may command the ten directions and their威 cannot yet govern celestial authority, their virtue can subdue and bind earthly spirits, restraining demonic spirits, exorcising pestilence, and saving the world—yet they can only repel sickness, not attain longevity.

Reciting this lightly will bring misfortune upon oneself.

Honoring and venerating it will bring prosperity to one’s household, generation after generation, and eternal flourishing, aligning with virtuous causes. A myriad calamities will not approach, and divine spirits will guard the gate.

This scripture is exalted and wondrous, its blessings and wisdom natural, its salvation of beings boundless, and it stands as the foundation for saving all things. Its grandeur is vast, its virtue beyond measure.

The Dao speaks: For those who recite this scripture ten times, the Exorcism Mountain-Valley Pestilence Gods of the ten directions will all assemble. The poisonous and evil *qi*, great and small serpents and scorpions, exhaling foul vapors that harm the living and destroy life—when this profound text is recited, the pestilence will vanish.

The mountain valleys of the ten directions are all under the dominion of pestilence gods. There are seven Immortal Boy Attendants, seven Year-King Attendants, twelve Seasonal Attendants, seventy-two Pestilence Master Immortals, the Disease Master Immortal Mother, the pestilence-controlling Ouyang Divine Lord, the Hua Immortal Gu Master, Zhang Master, Zhong Master, Li Master, and Bai Master, along with the Ghostly Marshal of Pestilence Disease, the Exalted Emperor’s decree. They swiftly suppress the poisonous *qi*, the malevolent spirits of the mountain valleys, resolving the accumulated transmission of pestilence across ages, exorcising disasters and guilt, and establishing a barrier against calamity.

Longevity descends as True Ones, blessings and fortune endure, purity and spirit are unobstructed, and the gods protect. As the talisman decrees, the sickness *qi* is dispelled. Those who earnestly study this scripture, fulfilling its merits and virtues, will all become Immortals, ascending to the Golden Gate and feasting in the Jade Capital.

Scholars who practice and recite this scripture will find that the mountain-valley evils and worldly plagues dare not harm them. Their spiritual *qi* will be complete, and they will immediately be received into transcendence, ascending to the Southern Palace.

If mortals recite it, their lifespan will be prolonged, and they will all attain the method of *shixie* (body dissolution). Their spirits will temporarily perish, avoiding the underworld, and they will immediately return to form, wandering the boundless void.

This scripture is subtle and wondrous, universally salvaging without end. All heavenly beings will rejoice in its blessings, and boundless merit will bestow life and death with grace.

It is a treasure of the heavens, not transmitted to the world below. Only those who carry gold and jade with sincere devotion, swearing to the heavens to pass it on, may do so. Leakage or negligence will bring calamity upon the nine ancestors, and eternal servitude in the ghostly bureaucracy.

The Five Emperors, along with twenty-four Jade Boys and twenty-four Jade Girls, attend as guardians, protecting those who receive the scripture.

The Dao speaks: In the first month, observing a long fast and reciting this scripture will exorcise the spring and summer mountain-valley pestilence, preventing it from infecting the living and becoming the spirits of the departed. It will sever the bonds of the underworld, delivering them to the Southern Palace.

In the seventh month, observing a long fast and reciting this scripture will exorcise the autumn mountain-valley pestilence, preventing it from infecting the living, and the body will attain immortality. The names of all will be recorded in the celestial registers, the yellow talismans and white tablets will erase death and bring rebirth.

In the tenth month, observing a long fast and reciting this scripture will exorcise the winter mountain-valley pestilence, preventing it from infecting the living, and will ensure the stability of the imperial lineage of the land.

「Thus, the Dao ensures eternal preservation of Heaven, unending across generations, perpetually as a sovereign for humankind, bringing stability to the realm, and the people herald a Great Peace.

On the eight seasonal festivals, reciting this scripture will exorcise the mountain-valley pestilence of the respective time, preventing it from infecting the living, and one will attain the status of the True Person of the Nine Palaces.

On the day of one’s birth-star, reciting this scripture will exorcise the mountain-valley pestilence, preventing it from afflicting the living on the day of their birth-star’s punishment, or when their birth-star clashes with the star of death and defeat, thus averting the transmission of poisonous *qi* and calamity upon their fateful body.

With the soul and spirit clarified and rectified, the myriad *qi* endure eternally, free from suffering and torment, the body radiant with luminosity, guarding the Three Realms, attended by the Five Emperors, honored by the myriad spirits. Their names are inscribed in Heaven’s registers, their virtue and power fulfilled, ascending to the Upper Pure Realm.

The Dao states: On the day of one’s birth-star, all should bathe in fragrant water, fast and enter the chamber. Facing southeast, they should strike their teeth thirty-two times, ascending to hear the Thirty-two Heavens, bowing in heart to the Thirty-two Offenses. With eyes closed, they should quietly contemplate their body seated amidst the three-colored *qi* of Azure, Vermilion, and Yellow clouds—within and without, the *qi* becomes dense and true. There appear the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane, arrayed on either side, with the sun and moon casting brilliant light, illuminating the chamber’s interior. This exorcises the Great Spirits, and all guardians gather in full attendance.

A round symbol forms at the nape.
Light shines in all ten directions, thus clear and distinct.»

The Secret Incantation declares:

*"Supreme Dao of Primordial Mystery, Sovereign Lord of Highest Dao.
Summon forth my servant’s body, the Three-Five* **Functionaries** *of office, left and right officials and messengers, the retinue of fragrant jade, the proclamation of the jade maidens, the Five Emperors’ straight talismans, and the Straight-Day Fragrant Officials—each thirty-six in number—unlocking the spoken commands.

On this auspicious day of joy, with a prolonged fast in the pure hall,
practicing the sacred scriptures, boundless salvation for all.
May the commands I unlock ascend to the Supreme,
directly reaching the Most Venerable Primordial Sovereign of the Thirty-Two Heavens.

Thus it is done. Summon the **true-qi** of the Thirty-Two Offenses,
facing east to recite the scriptures.
The **Primordial Sovereign’s** *Sutra of Boundless Salvation*,
The **Primordial Mysterious Treasure’s** *Original Chapter*,
The **Mysterious Treasure’s** *Perfected Scripture for Exorcising Malignant Mountain Valley Qi and Plagues*—
salvation for all ten directions.

Conquer the demons with hidden rhymes, merging in silent harmony with nature.
The **True-Qi’s** *Mysterious Ancestor*, the **Void’s** *Supreme Primordial*—
the **Primordial Qi** condenses into precious elixir,
rooted in Heaven and Earth, mountain peaks, and cavernous palaces.
The **Luminous Array** of myriad spirits,
grasp the **Primordial Principles** of transformation,
orchestrating the workings of creation,
nurturing life in harmony.

When **yin-yang** are discordant and **malignant qi** accumulates,
poisonous essences coalesce, birthing demonic hosts.
The **giant serpent** and **venomous viper**,
the **plague spirits’** *refined essence*—
the Eight Mountains and Four Pillars,
hidden caves and shadowed depths.
Riding their **true-qi**, they surge in demonic transformation,
unleashing their cruel venom, harming the common folk,
as **malignant qi** and **plagues**—none can purge them.

The **Mysterious Treasure’s** *Highest Dao*, the **Primordial’s** *Perfected Text*.
Collecting and commanding, eternally preserving purity.
Without scripture, there is no light,
without scripture, there is no clarity,
without scripture, there is no foundation,
without scripture, there is no completion,
without scripture, there is no salvation,
without scripture, there is no life—
this is the **Great Brahman**, the divine mechanism.

**Yùluó Xiāotái**, the **Jade Mountain’s** *Upper Capital*,
the **Supreme of the Supreme**, the **Great Luo’s** *Jade Purity*.
Vast and boundless are the **eons’** *blades*,
as if vanished, as if extant—
the **Threefold Splendor** departs in ease,
the **Mysterious Court** of boundless wonders.
Golden gateways, jade halls—
the **Forest of Spirits** in pristine clarity,
turning the **Great Knot** with divine authority,
encompassing all ten directions.

Within are the gods who exorcise **malignant mountain valley qi** and **plagues**,
the **Pure and Auspicious Sovereign of Ten Thousand Blessings**,
the **World-Guarding Auspicious Great Deity**,
the **Boundless Longevity Venerable Elder**,
and the **Southern-Soaring Demon-Conquering, Plague-Extinguishing, Longevity-Bringing, Fate-Benefiting, Calamity-Salvaging Venerable God**.

Reviving the dead, boundless salvation for all.
Today’s solemn rites—all heavens attend in splendor.
The **Four Directions’** *Boundless Deities*:

**East**—**Boundless Plague-Conquering God-King**, the **Eternal Sage**, boundless salvation for all.
**South**—**Boundless Life-Preserving God-King**, the **Eternal Sage**, boundless salvation for all.
**West**—**Boundless Evil-Breaking God-King**, the **Eternal Sage**, boundless salvation for all.

**Southeast**—**Boundless Malaria-Dispelling God-King**, the **Eternal Sage**, boundless salvation for all.
**Southwest**—**Boundless Plague-Dissolving God-King**, the **Eternal Sage**, boundless salvation for all.
**Northwest**—**Boundless Demon-Subduing God-King**, the **Eternal Sage**, boundless salvation for all.
**Above**—**Boundless Life-Fixing God-King**, the **Eternal Sage**, boundless salvation for all.
**Below**—**Boundless Body-Guarding God-King**, the **Eternal Sage**, boundless salvation for all.
**All Ten Directions**—**Boundless God-King of Exorcising Malignant Mountain Valley Qi and Plagues**,
the **Eternal Sage of the World**, boundless and great.

All ride upon the **Treasure Cloud**, the **Purple Pearl Jade Palanquin**,
the **Azure Phoenix Divine Chariot**,
with embroidered canopies and carved wheels,
drawn by the **Black Tiger** and the **Five-Colored Yellow Dragon**,
bearing the **Nine-Heaven Talismans** and the **Eight Pure Spirit Flags**,
forefronts chanting the **Mysterious Scripture** in harmonized voices,
rear ranks singing the **Hidden Rhymes** in unison,
the **Lions** and **White Cranes** roaring in song—
**Divine Officials** clear the path, **Five Elders** guard the flanks,
ten million riders, ten million mounts,
floating through the void, their radiance turning back,
inspecting the **True** and salvaging the world.

The **Nine Earths’** *Soil Sovereigns*, the **Five Mountains’** *Upper Lords*,
the **Nine Provinces’** *Altar Commanders*, the **Four Readings’** *God-Kings*—
the **Great Deity of Exorcising Malaria, Plagues, Illnesses, and Calamities**,
holding the **talismans** and **registers**,
all assemble before the Sovereign.

According to the salvation required,
strictly inspecting the heavens.
Proclaim universally to the **Three Realms**,
the **Boundless Divine Realm**,
the **Mountain Valley Abodes**,
the **Four Directions and Eight Winds**,
the **Thirty-Six Thousand** great and small mountains,
hidden caves, shadowed valleys,
rocky precipices, and flowing streams.
Above, dissolve the **five elements’** *oppressive and unbalanced qi*,
the **cold and heat’s** *discordant malignity*,
encountering **ghostly anomalies**, dispersing them as mist,
following the breath of all—
when harm strikes, whether externally piercing the skin
or internally assaulting the **true-qi**,
cold as frost, hot as blazing flames,
the body bears countless torments,
the spirit cries in grief—
urgently exorcise, swiftly deliver to the **Three Officials**.
Do not delay, press upon the living.

The **Primordial Talismans**—dare any linger?
The **Celestial Master’s** *officers* will seize and guard the **form-spirit**.
Do not let evil poison
wrongly bring suffering and violence.

All the world benefits from grace,
auspicious blessings flow naturally.
The living body receives salvation,
through eons everlasting.
Forever free of calamity,
living as long as Heaven’s years.
Beyond the **Three Calamities**, the **Five Sorrows**, and **Eight Hardships**,
ascending the **Pure-Heaven**,
where the **Celestial Sovereign** is **Primordial and True**,
the **Formless Realm** of **Brahman’s** *conduct*.

**The Eight Heavens of the East**:

**The Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Sovereigns.**
The hidden names of the Heavens, the hidden titles of the Heavens.
The void within the Heavens, the natural sacred script.
The hidden melodies of the Heavens, the sounds within the Heavens.
The Sovereign within the Heavens, the God within the Heavens, the Great Demon within the Heavens, the Spirit within the Heavens.

The Nine Harmonies and Ten Unifications—transforming into the Supreme Clarity.
The boundless mysteries, profound beyond measure.
The divine and true unfold, universally benefiting Heaven and humankind.

Today, we dispel pestilence and plague, seize and subdue malevolent vapors, pray for the dissipation of calamities and demons, exterminate the roots of misfortune, and cut away the scourges of sickness. We report to the Jade Sovereign, the True King’s protection, sealing the gates of death.

The Eastern Sovereign beheads the poison, the Western Sovereign records the essence, the Northern Sovereign purifies the filth, the Southern True One guards the form, the Central Sovereign, the Supreme One, governs the authority of transformation, regulating the flow of true *qi* and dispersing the demonic mists.

The Azure Sovereign spreads harmony, the White Sovereign brings tranquility, the Vermilion Sovereign stirs the flames, the Black Sovereign nourishes the dew, the Yellow Sovereign oversees life—let none perish prematurely.

The Azure Mountain Demon King restrains the flying calamities.
The Vermilion Mountain Demon King strikes down disasters and repels evil.
The White Mountain Demon King wields his blade with mighty force.
The Black Mountain Demon King brandishes his spear with fierce resolve.
The Yellow Mountain Demon King commands awe and assists with wings.

The Five Great Mountain Demons—spirits that subdue poison.
Each commands officers and legions, countless armies.
Brandishing weapons and unfurling banners, they dispel all ill omens.
They assist the Mysterious Transformation, aligning with the Dao’s achievements.
The Heavens measure humanity, revealing the true winds.
No deceitful spirits act, and wondrous transformations clarify.

Ten thousand kinds of malevolent beings are annihilated, reduced to dust.
In the black ravines and desolate wilds, even the depths of the underworld are reached.
The *Qú* and *Xī* demons, the *Chīméi*—guests who feast on blood—
beat their drums and summon their forces, riding the dark currents.
Their bells chime, their axes cleave—golden blades sever their forms.
The Primordial Command is proclaimed: dare any delay?
The plague demons vanish, the miasma of pestilence is extinguished.

The Three Officials of the Northern *Tíng*—clearly inspecting the ghostly camps—
none may hide; the *Jīnmǎ Yì* presents them.
A universal proclamation is issued; ten thousand spirits listen.
The Three Realms’ Five Sovereigns speak to the Supreme Clarity.

「The Dao harmonizes the Five *Qi* within,
blending the myriad deities into one.
Tenfold rotation returns the soul’s essence,
ten thousand *Qi* ascend to the realm of the Immortal.

The Immortal Way values life’s preservation,
its boundless compassion extends to all.
Earth’s portals, Heaven’s gates—
the Sun’s chariot, the Moon’s wheel—
follow the Dao’s rectitude of *Qi*,
healing sickness, granting life’s renewal.

In mountain valleys, malevolent *Qi* flows,
but with rites of exorcism, its harm is forever dispelled.
Guarding life’s passage, one secures rebirth,
ascending to hear the celestial hosts.

Above all heavens, each has its own gate of life.
Within lies the *Kōngdòng* hymn of void and song,
the True King’s sacred scripture,
the marvelous transformation of jade inscriptions.

**First Exorcism Hymn** dispels the mountain valley’s pestilential *Qi* and cries—
lofty and distant, its divine efficacy knows no end.
It commands the rectified *Qi* to purify,
sweeping away all malevolent influences.
The rectified *Qi* guards life’s vitality,
while the perverse is ruthlessly eradicated.
When demonic poisons vanish without trace,
and monstrous calamities are extinguished at their source—
the malevolent *Qi* that harms the True,
the rebellious *Qi* that clings and entangles—
the *Yùqīng* King of Consummate Purity dispels all maladies with wondrous efficacy.
His resonant voice calms the mountains,
while the *Tàihé* harmonizes in resplendent song.
The roots of misfortune are scattered,
and pestilential *Qi* leaves no remnant behind.
Alas, my myriad bodies,
unaware of the hymns within the void!
Cut down in their prime, their forms destroyed,
what sorrow and injustice shall they endure?
Without encountering the void’s sacred sound,
how could they escape the net of the world?

**Second Exorcism Hymn** dispels the *Línggǎn*—
the Four *Qi* untrammelled, all calamities extinguished.
Pestilential *Qi*, demonic poisons, malevolent spirits, and errant *Qi*—
the divine talisman drives them away,
its radiant power resplendent and awe-inspiring.
The celestial saints command the soaring *Qi*,
holding the ritual bell in solemn procession,
sweeping away all inauspiciousness.
It purges the Ten Realms,
dissolving all impurities and filth.
Distant afflictions are averted,
tranquility restored by nature’s own accord.
Life’s passage through this trial,
boundless Dao’s mercy bestowed.
This joy relies upon my existence—
the harmonized *Qi* flows boundlessly,
uniting with the Dao’s True essence.
The *Língbǎo* Supreme Method,
the *Yuānshǐ* Jade Text—
no evil it cannot dispel,
no knot it cannot untie.
Its protection is endless,
a bridge for all sentient beings.
Fear not, lest you fail to comprehend,
for this hymn is set forth for you.

**Third Hymn: The True King’s Summoning of the Pure****
Bright and resplendent is the dawn,
illuminating the jade celestial realm.
It issues commands to the ten thousand spirits,
uniting to subdue all demons.
The divine *Jīn* and void scriptures,
summon and regulate the gathered souls.
They guard the world’s transformations,
expounding my luminous teachings.
Those who revere my doctrine,
thus secure longevity’s blessings.
No calamity shall prevail,
in peaceful repose, free from all fears.
The Most High, moved by compassion,
reveals this jade scripture.
It banishes suffering and poison,
my Way never falters.
The True Way cherishes life,
the perverse Way meets untimely ruin.
Follow my True Way,
and align with my True essence.
The True Way is ever steadfast,
no sickness or misfortune shall intrude.
If one fails to know this Way,
how may they invoke the myriad deities?

The True King’s divine might dominates the eight directions,
his *Virtue* renews life’s eternal span.
Above the Three Realms, within the void,
the True King’s hymns resound—
their tones echoing the sacred *Dòng* scriptures.
Recite them universally,
and pestilential calamities shall dissolve.
Recite them ten thousand times,
and malevolent *Qi* shall not take root.
The Dao is fully manifest,
protecting longevity for all.
It transcends the Three Realms,
ranked among the Immortals.
Those who hear the sacred sound,
the Five Peaks guard their forms.
The earthly spirits are commanded,
to escort and welcome them.
They extract them from misfortune,
dispel all inauspiciousness.
The Seven Ancestors ascend,
forever freed from the Northern Peak’s trials.
Their souls cross the *Zhūlíng*,
refined and reborn anew.
This is called boundless,
universal liberation without end.

There is a hidden celestial text,
revered by all the heavens.
To reveal it carelessly,
or to neglect its solemnity,
is to fall into the hells of earth,
and bring ruin upon the Seven Ancestors.
The Dao declares: These two hymns
are the hidden sounds of the Celestial Sovereigns,
the True King of the *Shénxiāo* and the *Yùqīng*.
They dispel the mountain valleys’ malevolent *Qi*,
uniting scattered spirits,
and the strange and perverse *Qi* of insects and spices,
the irregular *Qi* of the four seasons,
which coalesce into pestilence.
Light ailments afflict a household,
heavy epidemics ravage towns and cities,
even nations.
The Most High, in compassion,
reveals the hidden talismans and scriptures
to dispel afflictions and protect the living.
All are the words of the Great *Dàfàn*,
uncommon in the mortal realm.
They lack melodic grace,
their verses unadorned.
Thus called profound and mysterious,
difficult to fathom in detail.
The heavens’ treasures,
hidden in the *Shénxiāo Yùqīng*’s Eastern Chamber of Scriptures,
were revealed in the year *Rénchén*,
in accordance with the celestial mandate.
If a perfected adept brings a heart of golden sincerity,
and in accordance with ancient rites,
pledges allegiance to the True King,
then the text shall be entrusted to them.

The Dao declares: The *Qi* of mountain valleys
varies in ease and difficulty,
differing in elevation and depth,
uneven in cold and damp.
Where the *Qi* reaches, its timing is not uniform—
high places are colder,
low places damper,
warm insects do not nest evenly,
flowing waters do not moisten all.
Poisonous serpents and strange creatures,
riding the *Qi* to stir malevolence,
metals and stones—dry or damp—
when stagnant *Qi* condenses into mist,
wandering spirits and pestilential ghosts
float among them, striking mortals,
and causing sickness and suffering.
The Most High and divine sages
teach two methods of exorcism and dispelling.
If the *Qi* of sickness is rampant,
spreading through villages and towns,
then one must purify the heart,
observe fasts, perform incense rites,
and wear the talismans and scriptures
to dispel it in accordance with the Method.

Again, with the *Dàfàn*’s hidden words written in vermilion,
burn them to ash,
mix with clear water,
and let all drink it—
none shall fail to find peace.

If the seasonal *Qi* is unfavorable,
or if one must traverse mountain valleys,
preparations for exorcism must be made beforehand.
Set up an altar in the dwelling place,
and perform rites to the Twelve Yearly Kings,
the mountain valley’s wandering sickness,
the Five Directions’ celestial emissaries,
and the *Shào Hòu* Divine Lords within and without.
Apply talismans in the Five Directions,
and seal the *Ānbīng* with peach and willow wood,
mugwort, and bamboo leaves,
boiled into water and stored in bottles.
Drink or bathe in it according to need,
or place the *Dàfàn*’s hidden words in vermilion
in the appropriate direction.
Then the pestilence shall disperse,
and the towns shall return to calm.

Perform incense rites at the six times of day,
recite the scriptures ten thousand times,
and blessings shall descend in abundance,
consuming all inauspiciousness.
The boundless text,
universal liberation without end.

The Dao declares: The unlearned, shallow in their understanding,
or those whose Immortal essence is yet incomplete,
may mistakenly encounter pestilential *Qi*,
and fail to dispel it.
When their fate is sealed by the celestial mandate,
their bodies pass through the *Tàiyīn*.
At the moment of crossing,
let fellow adepts and perfected ones
perform incense rites for them,
and recite the scriptures ten thousand times,
to guide their mortal forms across in accordance with the Method.»

The soul and spirit ascend straight to the Southern Palace,
according to one’s learning and merit, reckoning the days to attain rebirth.

The Wheel of Transformation, free from doubt, grants divinity and immortality.

The Dao declares: When yin and yang are discordant,
one must observe fasts, perform incense rites, and recite scriptures.
When pestilence arises from transgression,
and epidemic poisons spread,
one must observe fasts, perform incense rites, and recite scriptures.
When malevolent spirits run rampant,
harassing the living,
one must observe fasts, perform incense rites, and recite scriptures.
When dark spirits are broken and assail the true essence,
one must observe fasts, perform incense rites, and recite scriptures.
When summoning auspiciousness and pacifying the home,
one must observe fasts, perform incense rites, and recite scriptures.

Fasting and reciting scriptures bear great virtue.
They dispel celestial calamities above and avert poisons below,
saving the myriad people.
Life and death depend upon them.
Their blessings are boundless.
Thus it is said: infinite, universally liberating all beings—both heavenly and human.

The Dao declares: Whoever possesses this scripture
can perform these deeds of virtue for all the myriad people.
On days of calamity, if one takes the vow to fast, burn incense,
and recite the scriptures ten thousand times,
all the heavens will record their name,
ten thousand spirits will guard them,
and the perfected ones of the Right Path will ensure they become
a saintly minister beneath the Golden Gate of the Celestial Sovereign.

The heavens record every deed and transgression without omission.
The true and authentic in the Celestial Realm also advocate for your life,
and those who attain the Dao must fully comprehend these profound words.

The hidden speech of the Great Brahman in the Celestial Realm is boundless in sound.
Composed by the Dao Lord,
the *Yuan Shi Ling Shu* for dispelling mountain-valley pestilence,
the *Yu Pian* of the Eastern Eight Heavens.

「The Eight Heavens of the Northern Peak refine their essence, carving mists into hollows where phoenixes dwell.
They slay tigers, centipedes, and serpents with the true *Gan* thunder,
and dispatch the *Tao* spirits of withered willows and moonlit mushrooms.
The *Hu* lizards vanish in seclusion, while the *Ma* talismans and *Yi* demons are struck down.
They shear away sand-dwelling beasts from cliffs, and the dragonflies of the *Yu* flow with crimson elixir.
The *Zi* soil is purified of its rigid *Qiang* force,
and distant decrees command the *Kui* spirits to depart.

In dreams, they transform and awaken the sages,
while the *Zhao* and *Shao* masters gather the vital *Ling*.
The *Qi* currents scour the ocean’s depths,
and nature itself congeals in accordance with their essence.

**The Eight Heavens of the South**—the *She* Marshal and *Hou* Lord,
the Three Masters of the Southern Treasury—
exert their strength to repel calamity and disperse pestilence,
as the *Lao* Father and *Xi* Dragon take their stand.
The *Jiao* hooks and *Yi* nets assist in leisurely repose,
while the *Chi* Pond and *Meng* Swamps are tamed.
They seize fate with talismans and orders,
and turn the blazing fire into a fleeing wind.
The *Shi* prisons lock away the restless,
and the boundless void attains its utmost grandeur.

From their emergence, they manifest in boundless transformation,
and their vast deeds turn stones into sacred power.
They wield branches to channel the *Ling*,
and discern the *Jing* to slay the *Tong* demons.
The Dao wanders through celestial splendor,
and the shores are commanded to cease their tumult.

**The Eight Heavens of the West**—the *Cui* and *Du* Overseers drive away evils,
and the *Jin* talismans swiftly capture the *Gao* female spirits.
The *Qin* orchids and *Lan* grasses hang from *Chui* branches,
while the *Yi* treasures flourish in the farthest east.
They nurture the autumnal sages with reverent texts,
and hold fast to the *Jue* vessels with solemn devotion.
The *Mao* fruits scatter in wild abundance,
and the *Yun* spirits dwell in the *Bao* center.
The *Ma* talismans banish the *Xuan* demons,
while the *Yun* villages are guarded by the *Geng* clan.
The *Dian* halls unite in solitary splendor,
and the *Ming* peaks shine with keen spirits.
The *Kun* and *Lu* realms stretch into the azure depths,
and the *Lun* grasses descend in ranked patterns.

In solitude, they dispel the *Huang* curses,
and the *Ruan* demons flee to the *Yi* marshes.

**The Eight Heavens of the North**—the *Zhen* and *Bo* spirits,
their flaming pearls gating the celestial threshold.
The *Tai* Sovereign of the Left stands firm,
while the *Niu* caldrons float with jade-like clarity.
The *Xian* children depart from harm,
and the *Lu* sages transform into the *Xuan* mysteries.
The *Bo* waves subside at the *Yin* stones,
and the *He* and *Geng* voices proclaim their hidden depths.
The *Zheng* Marshals record hunger’s plight,
and the *Lu* talismans capture the *Xiu* demons.
The springs converge in piercing insight,
and the *Chi* Heavens flow with *Ying* patterns.
They station themselves to dispel poison,
and sever the *Heng* hooks that cross their path.
Those who violate the *Lu* are struck with sorrowful clarity,
and the *Ting* officials bear the *Chuan* pendants of office.

The Dao speaks: These are the hidden words of the Great Brahman in the Eight Heavens,
their boundless sounds inscribed in ancient texts upon the *Lang* Wind and *Xuan* platforms,
to repel ten thousand evils. Not only do they dispel mountain-valley pestilence,
but all manner of malevolent diseases wrought by ghosts and spirits.
By observing the law and commanding them thus,
all shall see immediate results.
Each character is broad and long—one *zhang* in measure.»

The Celestial True Man of old inscribed these words,
establishing them as the true sounds.
Those who know these sounds and, through fasting, recite them,
shall see the Ten Directions’ divine kings descend from the heavens,
observing their bodies and recording their merits and diligence,
then reporting to the heavens above.
All spirits shall pay homage in reverence,
while earthly deities attend at the gates.

This *sutra* spreads far and wide, universally saving all beings,
curing diseases and dispelling malevolence,
eradicating calamity and disaster.
It honors the True King’s great merit,
recommends one to the High Purity Dao,
fulfills all its teachings,
and allows one to roam the Three Realms,
ascending to the Golden Gate.

This sound repels all that it encounters,
dispels all malevolence,
transcends all obstacles,
and fulfills all desires—
the natural sound of the Celestial True One.

Thus, when recited, it draws the Ten Directions’ observation,
the Sovereign of Heaven sings in response,
all spirits pay homage,
the Three Realms attend in reverence,
demons bow their heads,
ghostly spirits perish of their own accord,
the *linlang* chimes resound,
the Ten Directions fall silent and pure,
rivers and seas grow still,
mountains and hills swallow their mists,
all spirits submit in awe.
It gathers all the sages,
leaving Heaven free of haze and Earth free of demonic dust,
the dark wisdom clears with perfect insight—
a boundless, profound virtue indeed.

**Completion of the Forty-Fifth Volume of the Supreme Treasure *Sutra* of Infinite Degrees, Most Wondrous Scripture**
**Beginning of the Forty-Sixth Volume**

The **Sutra of Infinite Degrees, Most Wondrous Scripture**—
**Chapter on Expelling and Warding Off Water-Fire Deluge and Conflagration**

The Dao speaks: Once, in the realm of Tranquil Rejoicing Heaven,
the Song of the Boundless Fearless Soil ascended the Green Void,
where I received the **Mystic Scripture of Infinite Degrees**—
the **Supreme Scripture of Expelling and Warding Off Water-Fire Deluge and Conflagration**—
from the **Venerable Sovereign of Primordial Beginnings**.
When this scripture was proclaimed,
the **Venerable Sovereign of Primordial Beginnings** would first recite it forty times,
summoning the Ten Directions,
before arriving at the seat.

The **Celestial True Ones**, the **Supreme Saints of High Veneration**,
the **Great Generals of Water and Fire**, with their legions and officers,
the officials of Floods and Blazes, the **True Persons of Rescue and Liberation**,
and countless **untethered spirits**—
all mounted the void and came forth.

With **crimson and black clouds** racing,
**tiger-chariots** and armored steeds,
**golden banners** and **crimson flags**,
**emerald parasols** and **vermilion canopies**—
thunderous as **crackling lightning**, winds as **mighty as mountains**,
radiant hues and auspicious lights,
**ethereal and dense**—
illuminating the **Great Void**.

For seven days and seven nights,
the **palaces of all Heavens** trembled with celestial keys,
the halls and towers swayed,
the sun, moon, and stars
cast forth **sacred beams**, blazing and resplendent,
their wheels halted in stillness.

**Celestial hymns** hung in the clouds,
**circumambient mists** swirled around the Dipper,
**jade reflections** drifted lightly,
**purple vapors** coiled into towers—
all mountains, rivers, forests, and trees
flattened into equal levels,
no longer high or low,
the earth transformed into **uniform jade**, without variation.

The **multitude of True Ones** awaited the seat,
while the **Venerable Sovereign of Primordial Beginnings**,
ascending the **five-colored natural flying platform**,
took his **void-suspended lotus seat** of ten *huá* in height.

At the **first recitation** of the scripture,
all **Great Saints of the Heavens** simultaneously praised its excellence.
Then, the people of the land—
men and women alike—
received blessings from the Heavens,
enduring perpetual joy in the **Dao’s transformation**.

At the **second recitation**,
the **Heavenly Ministers of the Celestial Minor**,
and the **Water and Fire officials**,
recorded their merits and extolled their virtues,
balancing the **yin and yang**.

At the **third recitation**,
the **Sovereign of the Sun** presented his tablet,
and the **Lady of the Moon** bowed in reverence.

At the **fourth recitation**,
the **Two Luminaries** and **Three Primordials**
all came to submit their commands.

At the **fifth recitation**,
the **Mother of Water** operated her mechanisms,
extending the **eons and ages**,
while the **Fire Officials** spread their calculations,
increasing the **years and lifespans**.

At the **sixth recitation**,
punishments were meted out justly,
with no wrongful excess.

At the **seventh recitation**,
the **sufferings of deluge and conflagration** ceased,
and the **karmic debts of burning and drowning** were extinguished.

At the **eighth recitation**,
the **Three Realms** found peace and security,
no longer disturbed by fear.

At the **ninth recitation**,
the **Earthly Furnaces** and **Heavenly Kilns**
aligned in **harmonious submission**.

At the **tenth recitation**,
all **calamitous fates** were resolved,
and **all beings** attained **serene repose**.

At that time, the people of the land—
men and women alike—
all turned their hearts in devotion,
receiving protection and liberation,
each attaining **eternal life**.

The Dao speaks: Then,
at the **first recitation**,
the **Great God of Water-Fire Administration** from the **Boundless Infinite Degree** of the East,
with his **untethered spirits**,
floated through the void and arrived.

At the **second recitation**,
the **Great God of Water-Fire Inspection** from the **Boundless Infinite Degree** of the South,
with his **untethered spirits**,
floated through the void and arrived.

At the **third recitation**,
the **Great God of Water-Fire Punishment** from the **Boundless Infinite Degree** of the West,
with his **untethered spirits**,
floated through the void and arrived.

At the **fourth recitation**,
the **Great God of Water-Fire Rectification** from the **Boundless Infinite Degree** of the North,
with his **untethered spirits**,
floated through the void and arrived.

At the **fifth recitation**,
the **Great God of Water-Fire Calamity** from the **Boundless Infinite Degree** of the Northeast,
with his **untethered spirits**,
floated through the void and arrived.

At the **sixth recitation**,
the **Great God of Water-Fire Command** from the **Boundless Infinite Degree** of the Southeast,
with his **untethered spirits**,
floated through the void and arrived.

At the **seventh recitation**,
the **Great God of Water-Fire Registration** from the **Boundless Infinite Degree** of the Southwest,
with his **untethered spirits**,
floated through the void and arrived.

At the **eighth recitation**,
the **Great God of Water-Fire Prohibition** from the **Boundless Infinite Degree** of the Northwest,
with his **untethered spirits**,
floated through the void and arrived.

At the **ninth recitation**,
the **Great God of Water-Fire Destiny** from the **Boundless Infinite Degree** of the Upper Realm,
with his **untethered spirits**,
floated through the void and arrived.

At the **tenth recitation**,
the **Great God of Water-Fire Non-Conformity** from the **Boundless Infinite Degree** of the Lower Realm,
with his **untethered spirits**,
floated through the void and arrived.

When the **ten recitations** were complete,
the **Ten Directions’ Great Gods of Water-Fire Administration and Registration**
all arrived at once.
The people of the land—
men and women alike—
turned their hearts in devotion and reverence.

All who came bowed their heads in homage,
praising and marveling at the **Venerable Sovereign’s attained enlightenment**.
They prayed not to suffer **great or small water-fire calamities**,
nor the **difficulties of transmigration** through the Three Realms.
While still in this worldly form,
they prayed not to endure the **water-fire deluge and burning**,
nor to be recorded by the **Three Officials** as guilty,
condemned to **water-fire punishments**,
or **deluge and conflagration** as retribution.
They begged the **Two Officials** to govern harmoniously,
balancing the **Heavenly Order** and **human realm**,
clearing the **ghostly paths**,
and subduing the **evil spirits and deities**,
so that no **untethered spirits** would recklessly **flood or ignite**,
nor create **unjust calamities**.

With bowed heads to the **Primordial Sovereign**,
they rejoiced at hearing the **most essential truths**.
Each offered their **celestial treasures and wondrous implements**—
**true essences of the land**—
their power gathering like clouds,
the **untethered spirits**,
half the land’s soil suddenly **tilted and sank**,
a phenomenon beyond restraint.

Thus, the **Primordial Sovereign** cast his gaze upon the Ten Directions,
observing the assembly below.
He shook his robes and advanced his seat,
turning the Heavens and shifting the Earth,
**blowing** into **water-light**,
**exhaling** into **fire-glow**—
the **two radiant forms** flew in tandem,
**dragon-clouds** swirling gracefully,
soaring through the **void’s extremes**.
After a long while,
they transformed into a **precious pearl**,
as large as a *shǔmǐ* grain,
suspended seven *zhàng* above the earth.

The **Primordial Sovereign** then ascended,
along with the **Celestial True Ones**,
the **Supreme Saints of High Veneration**,
the **True Persons of Rescue and Liberation**,
the **Water and Fire officials and their legions**,
the **Great Gods of Deluge, Drowning, and Punishment**,
and the **untethered spirits**—
all entering the **precious pearl**.

The **Heavenly Beings** looked upward,
only seeing **a brilliant radiance** emerge from the pearl’s mouth.
Once inside,
they vanished from sight.
The people of the land dispersed,
the earth returning to its **level and upright state**,
no longer tilted or sunken.

The **Primordial Sovereign** then,
within the **precious pearl**,
completed the recitation of the scripture.
The **multitude of True Ones** oversaw the transmission,
bestowing it upon me.
At that moment,
joy and celebration were beyond words.

The **dharma-assembly** concluded,
the **Heavens restored to their stations**,
and in an instant,
all was **utterly silent**, leaving no trace of sound.
Then, those who encountered the **scripture’s teachings**
universally received **salvation and deliverance**,
their **original lifespans** preserved,
no **mid-life injuries**,
all the land’s people bowing in reverence,
each cultivating **good intentions**.

「Not fierce nor wrathful,
not extravagant nor swift,
not probing nor swaying,
not scattering nor timely,
not flattering nor yielding.

Words prized for clarity,
no foul utterance from the lips,
unity in loving-kindness,
diversity in kinship.

The realm secure, its people flourishing,
rejoicing in great peace—
the Dao/Way’s teachings first emerged,
and all the land was governed by it.

With earnest devotion,
they revered and upheld the scripture,
all attaining salvation from the world.

The Dao/Way speaks:
Within the scripture’s recitation by the **Primordial Sovereign** (元始天尊),
all names mentioned are those of the **Heavenly Sovereigns** (诸天上帝) within,
excluding the hidden tones of **water and fire calamities** (水火漂溺焚烧).
They are also the **true kings’** (真王) forbidden names,
commanding the **water and fire officials** (水火二司) not to recklessly unleash the **two great punishments** (行发二考),
nor to harm the living.
They are the secret invocations that summon the **lords of myriad spirits** (主宰百灵),
unuttered in the common world.

The **Supreme Saints** (上圣) have already become **True Ones** (真人),
mastering the **mysteries of the profound** (通玄究微),
their **law treasures** (法宝) now manifest.
The transformations of water and fire—
seeking the source, they grasp the essence.
The blazing conflagrations and scorching violence—
they know the root causes,
and can fathom their full extent.

Reciting this tenfold,
the **Heavens** (诸天) resound in distant praise,
the **Ten Emperors** (万帝) arrange their rites,
water and fire spirits retreat in concealment,
the depths grow still and clarity prevails,
rivers and seas lie in serene silence,
the **flaming prohibitions** (赫烈防扃) are sealed—
the sun and moon pause in their courses,
the **celestial pendants** (璇玑) no longer move,
demons are bound in form,
ghostly essences vanish utterly,
flames and floods subside in repose,
and drowning perils are stilled.

The **adepts of supreme learning** (至学之士),
reciting this tenfold,
find the **black essence** (黑精) guarding its place,
the **red fiends** (赤怪) do not arise,
spells and illusions lose their power,
demonic apparitions vanish,
and salvation from water and fire perils is attained—
no more danger or calamity.

Thus it is:
For scholars whose **elixir palaces** (丹宫) are yet unformed,
when water surges and fire descends,
their bodies not yet perfected in truth,
the **two officials** (二司) are summoned,
their might not yet commanding the **Heavenly laws** (天政),
their **virtue/power** (德) can only subdue and bind the
**wandering fire and great malevolent qi** (游火大丑故气),
but they can only avert misfortune and peril,
not utterly extinguish the **two divine punishments** (水火二神) from their reckonings.

Lightly reciting this chapter
brings suffering upon oneself.

With reverent offerings and devotion,
households thrive in prosperity,
generations prosper in splendor,
aligning with **auspicious causes** (善因缘),
water and fire do not encroach,
and the **spirits of light** (神明) guard the gates.

This scripture’s grandeur is unmatched,
its steps alone traverse the **Jade Capital** (玉京),
commanding water and fire,
warding off floods and flames,
as the **foundation of ten thousand Dao/Way** (万道之宗).

The **august Great Brahman** (大梵) stands sublime,
its **virtue/power** (德) beyond measure.

The Dao/Way speaks:
The **water and fire officials** (水火二司) hold great might,
known as the **True Sovereigns of the Five Peaks** (五岳总领真君).
They command the **great floods** (大水) to drift and drown,
unleash the **violent flames** (暴火) to burn and spread,
protect the virtuous and banish the wicked,
punish the guilty—
from the **cold pools of the underworld** (地狱寒池) to the
**floods and fires of the torturer’s wheels** (火车漂焚),
the **endless torments** (重苦) of boiling punishments,
the **condemned souls** (亡魂) enslaved in the **curved springs** (泉曲),
the **fire-mountains’ halls** (火山之府),
where they are seethed and scorched—
all are under the **True Sovereign’s** dominion.

The **Heavens** have two **radiant luminaries** (二耀),
the **souls of yin and yang** (阴阳灵根),
illuminating the people below,
and bestowing blessings upon disasters—
not the power to inflict calamity or peril.

This **Great Might** (大威神),
alongside the **Nine Heavenly Life Officials** (九天司命),
the **Inspecting Envoys** (采访使者),
the **Five Peaks Venerables** (五岳丈人),
and the **Five Peaks Commanders** (五岳都司),
jointly govern water and fire.

The **punishments of water and fire** (水火之罚)
are carried out by the **Six Generals** (六将军),
who issue decrees to bring disaster.
The **Generals of Water** (主水之将):
**Du Yuanji**, the **General of the River’s Might** (河魁将军),
**Zhang Zi Hua**, the **General of Heaven’s Records** (天录将军),
**Sha Bo Huang**, the **General of the Symbols** (执符将军).

The **Generals of Fire** (主火之将):
**Liu Tian Ke**, the **General of Swift Retribution** (捷疾将军),
**Zhou Jun Cai**, the **General of Fixed Boundaries** (定界将军),
**Shi Wan Fu**, the **General of Flame Unleashed** (发火将军).

In the world,
there are **water and fire caverns** (水火之穴),
concealing the **essences of yin and yang** (阴阳之精),
which transform into the **dragons of water and fire** (水火之龙).
When people face peril,
the **flying dragons** (飞龙) descend with disaster,
and water and fire converge.

The **Northern Dipper’s edicts** (北斗中勑)
and the **Northern Sovereign’s commands** (北帝列司)
oversee the governance of the **water and fire dragon spirits** (水火神龙),
known as the **Lady of Jade Light and Violet Spirit** (玉光紫灵夫人),
with thousands of officials,
each attending to their duties.

The **ancestral souls of the living** (先世有罪幽魂),
if guilty in past lives,
suffer in the **water and fire prisons** (水火之狱),
toiling in the **water and fire services** (徒水火之役),
pouring water into the **four seething pits** (四渍之穴),
chopping wood to boil the **hundred-li cauldrons** (百里之镬).
Torrents rise to the heavens,
flames stretch across the earth—
a day and night of endless torment.

For those who recite this scripture tenfold,
the **Heavens** (诸天) gather in unison,
and the suffering souls
escape the **water prison** (水狱), ascending to the **Violet Spirit Platform** (紫台),
and the **fire prison** (火狱), rising to the **Crimson Palace** (朱官),
all granted a **nine-year reprieve** (格皆九年),
to be reborn and transformed,
becoming **noble ones** (贵人),
warding off floods and flames,
and blessings naturally arise.

For the **adepts of supreme learning** (至学之士),
when their merit is complete and **virtue/power** (德) fulfilled,
their **spiritual treasures** (灵宝) formed into elixir,
and they are born into water and fire,
**seven returns and nine rebirths** (七返九还),
all attain **immortality** (神仙),
ascending to the **Golden Gate** (金阙),
and feasting in the **Jade Capital** (玉京).

The **scholars of highest attainment** (上学之士),
practicing and reciting this scripture,
find the **true water** (真水) floating above,
the **spiritual fire** (灵火) warming below—
the sun concealed in the sea,
clouds arising from myriad caverns—
all immediately receive salvation,
ascending to the **Southern Palace** (南宫).

Those of the world who recite it
extend their lives and years,
later attaining the **way of corpse dissolution** (尸解之道).
Their **souls** (魂神) temporarily vanish,
not passing through the **underworld** (地狱),
and when water and fire perils arise,
they swiftly return to form,
wandering freely in the **Great Void** (太空).

This scripture’s subtlety is boundless,
its salvations infinite.
All **Heavenly Beings and mortals** (天人)
rejoice in its blessings,
and endless **dharma-benefits** (无量之福)
are bestowed upon life and death.

The **Heavens** treasure it,
yet do not pass it to the lower worlds.
The **adepts of supreme learning** (至士), bearing **golden treasures** (金宝) with sincere devotion,
pledge to the **Heavens** and receive its transmission.

If one **carelessly leaks or scorns** (轻泄漏慢) it,
suffering befalls the **Nine Ancestors** (九祖),
and endless servitude in the **ghostly offices** (鬼官).

The **Five Emperors** (五帝) attend this scripture,
along with **twenty-four jade boys and girls** (玉童玉女),
each guarding and protecting the **spiritual texts** (神文),
and safeguarding those who receive the scripture.

The Dao/Way speaks:
In the **first month**, observe a **long fast** (长斋),
reciting and chanting this scripture,
to sever the **underworld’s punishments** (地逮役) for the **ancestral souls of past lives** (先世亡魂),
and to absolve the **water and fire trials** (水火功考),
ascending to the **Southern Palace** (南宫).

In the **seventh month**, observe a **long fast** (长斋),
reciting and chanting this scripture,
to ward off **water and fire floods and flames** (水火漂焚),
and attain **immortality** (神仙).
The **Heavens** (诸天) record their names,
with **yellow talismans and white tablets** (黄箓白简).
Even the **dead are reborn** (削死上生).

In the **tenth month**, observe a **long fast** (长斋),
reciting and chanting this scripture,
to ward off **water and fire perils** (水火),
and harmonize the **two qi** (二气),
for **kings and sovereigns** (国王帝主),
and their **lords and ministers, fathers and sons** (君臣父子),
to stabilize the **national destiny** (国祚),
preserve the **Heavens’ longevity** (天长存),
and ensure their reigns endure forever,
constantly ruling their domains,
and their people calling it the **Great Peace** (太平).」

On the **eight festivals** (八节之日), recite and chant this scripture,
to harmonize the **red and black boundaries** (赤黑顺界),
so that all things flourish and complete,
and one attains the **Nine Palaces True Person** (九宫真人).

On one’s **birthday** (本命之日), recite and chant this scripture,
so that **yin does not usurp yang** (阴无僭阳),
and ministers remain **loyal to their sovereign** (臣忠於君).
Let **fire descend and water ascend** (火降水升),
**virtue descend while honor ascends** (德下而尊),
and **spirit and soul become pure and upright** (魂神澄正).
May **qi endure eternally** (万炁长存),
free from suffering and torment (不经苦恼),
with the body radiant and luminous (身有光明),
guarding the **Three Realms** (三界待卫),
as the **Five Emperors** (五帝) oversee and welcome,
and all spirits pay homage in reverence (万神朝礼).
One’s name is recorded in Heaven (名书上天),
and when **virtue and power are fulfilled** (功满德就),
one ascends to **Upper Clarity** (飞升上清).

The **Way** instructs:
On days of **practicing the Dao** (行道之日),
one must bathe in **fragrant water** (香汤沐浴),
observe **fasting and purity** (斋戒入室),
facing **east** (东向),
and strike the teeth **thirty-two times** (叩齿三十二通),
so that the sound reaches the **Thirty-two Heavens** (上闻三十二天).
With the heart, bow **thirty-two times** (心拜三十二通),
close the eyes,
and quietly contemplate sitting within **three-colored qi of azure, purple, and crimson clouds** (青紫绛三色云炁之中).
Within and without, all is **dark and profound** (蓊冥),
with **Green Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane**
arrayed to the left and right (罗列左右),
overseeing the **Water and Fire Two Great Spirits** (水火二大灵) and their divine officials and attendants (司神官将吏),
guarding front and rear (备卫前后).
The **sun and moon illuminate** (日月照明),
and the chamber shines with **piercing radiance** (洞焕室内).
A **circular halo** (圆象) forms at the neck,
its light reflecting in all ten directions (光映十方),
so clear and distinct (如此分明).

The **secret incantation** (密咒) proclaims:
*"Supreme Mystic Origin, Sovereign Dao Lord of the Highest,
summon forth from my body the **Three Five Functionaries** (三五功曹),
left and right officials and messengers (左右官使者),
attendants of fragrant jade boys (侍香玉童),
messenger maidens of jade (传言玉女),
the **Five Emperors’ direct symbols** (五帝直符),
and the **Direct-Day Fragrant Officials** (直日香官),
each thirty-six in number (各三十六人),
opening the gates as spoken."*

*"Today is a day of auspicious celebration (今日吉庆),
with a long fast in the pure hall (长斋清堂),
practicing this sacred scripture (修行至经),
to universally deliver beings (无量度人).
May what is invoked ascend directly (愿所启上彻),
reaching the **Supreme Thirty-two Heavens** before the **Eternal Origin Emperor of Highest Venerability** (径御无上三十二天元始上帝至尊几前)."*

After completion, **draw the qi thirty-two times** (引炁三十二过),
facing east and reciting the scripture.

---
**Eternal Origin Scripture of Supreme Deliverance, First Rank Marvelous Chapter**
*(元始无量度人上品妙经)*

**Eternal Origin’s Mystic Treasure Scripture of Penetrating Clarity** (元始洞玄灵宝本章),
to **ward off and avert water and fire floods and flames** (除禳水火漂焚),
and **protect and deliver beings across kalpas** (保劫度人).

The **hundred demons hide their voices** (百魔隐韵),
and all are naturally rescued (从济自然).
The **Two Symbols** (二象) revolve in harmony,
and there is **no Supreme True One** (无无上真).

In the **Eternal Origin’s primordial kalpa** (元始祖劫),
**divine transformation transcends the divine** (神化无神),
with **one formless essence** (有一未形),
from which **qi generates the boundless void** (气生空玄).

The **Great Vessel** (大器) warms within,
and warmth causes **qi to ascend** (温则气升).
Ascending, it becomes **mystic dew** (升为玄露),
descending, it becomes **Celestial Ford** (降为天津).
Water is the **Emperor’s precursor** (水为帝先),
and **Great One** (太一) is **profound and obscure** (杳冥).

Warmth generates **flame** (温气成炎),
and **fire is the divine ford** (火为神津).
When **fire is bright and water is dim** (火明水晦),
the **Two Symbols** are fully formed (二象备成).
Water fills the vessel (水盈器中),
and **fire stirs divine warmth** (火动神温).
Prolonged warmth **condenses into jade-like fluid** (温久泫液),
congealing into the **Jade Capital** (结凝玉京).

The **Nine Palaces and Eight Gates** (九宫八门)
are **stabilized across the ten directions** (安镇十方).
The **opening of red and black** (开明赤黑)
is the **Heavenly Root** (是为天根).
Water and fire have **no origin** (水火无祖),
and **one and nine transform into the True** (一九化真).

The **Dan Spirit and Mars** (丹灵荧惑),
the **Mystic Old One and Great Star** (玄老大辰),
**reject the non-conforming Vermilion Bird** (辟非朱凤),
and the **Azure Dragon’s crystalline essence** (苍龙晶精).
**One hundred and six yang, nine yin** (百六阳九)
**sever and annihilate the evil masses** (剪灭凶群).
They **conquer fire and black Zoroastrianism** (游火黑祆),
and **fight against calamities and suffering beings** (战物灾民).

The **Way can avert and transform** (道可除禳),
and **emptiness becomes manifest** (化空成文).
This is called the **Great Law** (是名大法),
the **mystic within the mystic** (玄中之玄).
The **Three Eons and Eight Assemblies** (三元八会),
the **Phoenix True and Jade Scriptures** (凤真玉篇).
**Highly secret divine texts** (高秘神文)
last **a hundred million years** (亿千万年).
The **True Kings govern the age** (真王治世),
responding to the **flow of the cosmic order** (应运流传).
They **universally deliver living and dead** (普度生死),
and all suffering souls (一切苦魂).
All **respond in accordance with the符** (咸悉应符),
and endure **eternally across kalpas** (永劫长年).

Crossing **water and passing fire** (历水过火),
the **three calamities do not befall** (三灾不登).
**Violent and perverse qi** (暴气邪侈)
**alter and transform the world** (移变世间).
When calamities arise, they **can be averted** (成灾可除),
and when they approach, they **must be warded off** (将至乃禳).
**Burning and drowning** (焚爇漂溺)
**quickly depart and vanish** (速离远方).
The **Emperor Lord commands** (帝君行令),
and **dare any dare to confront** (敢有来当).

The **Great Void’s fiery qi** (太虚焚气)
**cycles through the primordial principles** (运转元纲).
Within are **gods who avert water and fire floods and flames** (中有除禳水火漂焚之神),
within are the **Southern Pole Longevity Lords** (中有南极长生之君),
within are the **World-Delivering Marshal Gods** (中有度世司马大神),
within are the **Good-Generation Lord Han** (中有好生韩君丈人),
within are the **Southern Ascension Life-Span Recording and Longevity Extending Official Gods** (中有南上司命司录延寿益算度厄尊神).
They **revive the deceased and deliver countless beings** (回骸起死，无量度人).
Today’s **verification and recording** (今日校录)
summons all **Heavens to attend the hall** (诸天临轩).

---
**Eastern Direction:** The **Limitless Wind-Power God-King** (无极风力神王),
**Longevity Great Sage of Universal Deliverance** (长生大圣无量度人).

**Southern Direction:** The **Limitless Awe-Inspiring God-King** (无极威耀神王),
**Longevity Great Sage of Universal Deliverance** (长生大圣无量度人).

**Western Direction:** The **Limitless Golden Light God-King** (无极金光神王),
**Longevity Great Sage of Universal Deliverance** (长生大圣无量度人).

**Northern Direction:** The **Limitless Abyssal God-King** (无极洞渊神王),
**Longevity Great Sage of Universal Deliverance** (长生大圣无量度人).

**Northeast Direction:** The **Limitless Delusion-Suppressing God-King** (无极制奸神王),
**Longevity Great Sage of Universal Deliverance** (长生大圣无量度人).

**Southeast Direction:** The **Limitless Blazing God-King** (无极炽爓神王),
**Longevity Great Sage of Universal Deliverance** (长生大圣无量度人).

**Southwest Direction:** The **Limitless Water-Hiding God-King** (无极水藏神王),
**Longevity Great Sage of Universal Deliverance** (长生大圣无量度人).

**Northwest Direction:** The **Limitless Calamity-Averting God-King** (无极禳祸神王),
**Longevity Great Sage of Universal Deliverance** (长生大圣无量度人).

**Upper Direction:** The **Limitless Difficulty-Extracting God-King** (无极拔难神王),
**Longevity Great Sage of Universal Deliverance** (长生大圣无量度人).

**Lower Direction:** The **Limitless Calamity-Delivering God-King** (无极度厄神王),
**Longevity Great Sage of Universal Deliverance** (长生大圣无量度人).

**Ten Directions’ Supreme True Gods of Averting Water and Fire Floods and Flames** (十方至真除禳水火漂焚神王),
**Longevity World-Delivering Great Gods** (长生度世无量大神).

Together, they ride upon **imperial clouds and brocade-light jade chariots** (乘宸霞锦光玉舆),
**purple-clarity jade palanquins** (紫清琼辇),
with **rainbow canopies and wheel-axles** (彩盖霓轮),
**yoked to five phoenixes and twelve dark dragons** (骖驾五凤，十二玄龙),
bearing the **banners of True Invitation** (建招真之节)
and **eight scenic spirit flags** (八景灵旛).
Before them, **golden gongs resound in unison** (前啸金箪齐唱),
and behind, **jade keys chime together** (后吹玉钥同鸣).
**Lions and white cranes** (狮子白鹤)
**roar and sing in chorus** (啸歌噰噰),
as **ranked True Ones clear the path** (列真启途),
and **hosts of immortals escort the chariot** (群仙翼辕).
**A hundred million riders** (亿乘万骑)
**float through the void** (浮空而来).

They **control water and fire** (倾驾水火),
and **inspect living beings** (监检生灵).
The **Divine Summit’s officials** (神霄府相),
the **Green Flower Upper Palace** (青华上宫),
**Lord Han the Immortal Sage** (韩君仙伯),
and the **Disaster-Dissolving Great God** (消灾大神)
hold **talismans and registers** (执箓把籍),
all arriving before the **Emperor’s court** (齐到帝前).

In accordance with those to be delivered (随所应度),
they **severely inspect the Heavens** (严校诸天).
They **universally proclaim to the Three Realms** (普告三界),
the **Limitless Spirit Homeland** (无极神乡),
the **Connected and Encircled Palace** (连宛之府),
the **Spiritual Knot Palace** (灵纽之宫),
the **Six Heavens and Nine Prisons** (六天九狱),
the **Ice Pools and Fire Mountains** (冰池火山),
**rescuing and dissolving those swept away and drowned** (救解冲荡，漂溺焚烬),
**crossing the threshold of birth** (过度生关),
**sunken corpses and suffering souls** (沈尸苦魂),
and **pardoning the Three Officials** (释赦三官).

They **redeem ancestral spirits** (上解祖考),
and **countless kalpic kin** (亿劫种亲).
They **quickly erase罪簿** (罪簿),
and **annihilate evil roots** (落灭恶根),
so that none may be **detained or forced into demonic ranks** (不得拘留，逼合鬼群).
The **Eternal Origin’s decrees** (元始符命)
**ascend at every moment** (时刻升迁).

The **flames obscure the cold court**, and the **hosts guard the vital essence and spirit**.
They **subdue demons and uphold the worthy**, and **ferry those in peril to South昌**.
The **dead spirits undergo refinement**, and **mortals attain Daoic transformation**.
The **living receive salvation**, and **endure through kalpas without end**.
With each kalpic cycle, they **wheel through existence**, their years aligned with Heaven’s.

They **forever deliver those drowned, burned, and swept away** from suffering,
**transcending the Three Realms** to wander freely in **Upper Clarity**.
In **Upper Clarity’s Heaven**, the **Celestial Sovereign of the Hollow Awakening**
rules the **formless realm of the Dharma-body**.

The **Heaven of Illuminating Brightness**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Resonant Valley** radiates light.
The **Heaven of the Nine Divine Truths**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Auspicious Drawn** leads fortune.
The **Heaven of Day’s Observation**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Ascending Square** presides.
The **Heaven of the Step of Marvel**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Rope** commands.
The **Heaven of the Eastern Residence**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Flowing Abyss** rules.
The **Heaven of the Wondrous Law**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Path’s Beauty** decrees.
The **Heaven of the Fixed Rite**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Initial Peach Blossom** stands.

The **Heaven of Blessed Peace**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Illustrious and Virtuous** dwells.
The **Heaven of the Dao’s Transformation**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Silent Clouds** presides.
The **Heaven of the Boundless Realm**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Distinct Balance** rules.
The **Heaven of the Drifting Soul**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Symbolic and Tranquil** abides.
The **Heaven of the Crimson Cavern**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Universal and Abyssal** commands.
The **Heaven of the Auspicious and Harmonious**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Unmatched and Just** stands.

The **Heaven of the White Chapter**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Defined and Auspicious** rules.
The **Heaven of the Extreme Doctrine**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Daoic and Obscure** dwells.
The **Heaven of the River’s Congealed Dew**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Concealed and Abundant** commands.
The **Heaven of the Remote and Mysterious**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Recorded and Auspicious** stands.
The **Heaven of the Hollow Light**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Constructed Chapter** presides.

The **Heaven of the Purple and Violet**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Clan’s Radiance** rules.
The **Heaven of the Secret and Auspicious**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Middle and Boundless** dwells.
The **Heaven of the Descending Dragon**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Learned and Auspicious** commands.
The **Heaven of the Cloudy and Fertile**, where the **Celestial Sovereign of the Conducting** stands.

---
**Thirty-two Heavens, thirty-two Sovereigns.**
Their **names and hidden titles** remain veiled.
Within the **central void**, the **natural spirit scriptures** unfold—
their **hidden rhythms** dispel the **sounds of drowning and burning**.
The **Water Primordial, the Venerable of the Great One**,
and the **Fire Primordial, the Divine of the Vermilion Sovereign**,
awaken the **Water Great Demon** and unleash the **True Spirit of Fire**.
The **Nine Suns and Ten Yins** transform into **Upper Clarity**.

The **limitless mysteries** are profound, beyond measure.
The **divine and true** descend to **rescue those drowned and burned**.
Today, we rejoice in **salvation from peril**,
dispelling the **noxious miasma**, restraining the **demonic officials**,
and crossing the **thresholds of the Heavens** to **quell the drowned and burned**,
severing **karmic grudges**, flying through **water and fire**,
and **registering in the Great Mystic’s ledger**.
The **Demon Kings** oversee the **worthy**, with **no restraint at Heaven’s gate**.

The **Eastern Dipper** records virtue, the **Western Dipper** brings fortune,
the **Northern Dipper** judges water, the **Southern Dipper** brings fire,
the **Central Dipper** decrees punishment—
**burning and drowning** determine **life and death**.
The **great crimes** bring **premature death**, the **light offenses** invite **calamity**.

The **Green Sovereign** oversees souls, the **White Sovereign** seizes spirits,
the **Red Sovereign** holds the torch, and **wind and fire** blaze.
The **Black Sovereign** stirs the waves, and the **drowned drift endlessly**.
The **Yellow Sovereign**, the **Central Master**, leads the **punishments**.

Heaven and Earth are the **divine vessels of Water and Fire**—

**six-hourly chanting**, and **tenfold scripture recitation**.

The **limitless scriptures** universally save the boundless.
