None know the world’s joy,
As fragrant eaves pour in torrents.
The **Dao** commands with jade script,
To cease the rain, invoke clear skies.
Morning sunlight dawns,
Wild horses steam like boiling water.
The seas and mountains clear,
Ten thousand valleys conceal clouds.
The talisman wards my fields,
Now I build your **Lú** shelter.
The sun still, the wind gentle,
All life revives.
The blazing chalice pours libations,
To the **Zhēnwáng** of the Four Extremes.
Swiftly ordering the year’s rectification,
Enriching your storehouses.
Protecting the world in enduring peace,
Teaching laws to flourish.
The **Yùlóng** bears the torch,
Illuminating the Ten Directions.
Holy longevity for ten thousand years,
With **gǔnyī** robes and **fǔcháng** patterns.
This, above the Three Realms,
Within the flying void,
The **Zhēnwáng**’s song resounds,
Its melody blending with the *Dòngzhāng*.

If recited a hundredfold,
All things prosper and mature.
If recited a thousandfold,
Harmonious *qì* flows freely.
If recited ten thousandfold,
The Dao is fully realized,
Floods and droughts forever vanish,
Exceeding the Three Realms,
Ascending to the **Shénxiāo**.
With sacred tones,
The Celestial Ministers revere its form.
Commanding the **Dìqí**,
Divine guards attend in escort.
From the dead gates,
Free from the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships,
The Seven Ancestors ascend in rank,
Forever beyond the **Guǐguān**,
Souls cross the **Zhūlíng**,
Refined and reborn.

This is called **Wúliàng**,
Universal salvation without end.
There are hidden celestial texts,
All heavens venerate as their core.
To reveal arrogance is to fall into the **Dìyù**.
Disaster befalls the Seven Ancestors.
The **Dao** speaks: These two chapters are the hidden voices
Of the Celestial Sovereigns and the **Shénxiāo Zhēnwáng**,
Capable of summoning rain and invoking clear skies,
Praying and warding off floods and droughts,
Aiding the state and blessing the people.
All are the words of the Great **Fàn**,
Not the common speech of mortals.
Without melodious beauty,
No ornate curves.
Thus called profound and mysterious,
Hard to trace and explain.
Celestial treasures,
Hidden in the **Shénxiāo Yùqīng Yùfǔ Dōnghuá Jīngshì**,
Encountered in the year of **Rénchén**,
Revealed by Heaven to transmit.
If a perfected one brings gold and jade
With a sincere heart,
According to the old rites to pledge with the Celestial Lords,
Then it shall be entrusted.

The **Dao** speaks: The *qì* of Heaven and Earth
Also has its proper balance.
**Zǐ** and **Wǔ**, **Mǎo** and **Yǒu** are the **zhèng**,
**Yín**, **Shēn**, **Jǐ**, and **Hài** are the **chū**,
**Chén**, **Xiū**, **Chǒu**, and **Wèi** are the **zhōng**—all are deviations.
Floods and droughts arise
From the convergence of Heaven’s timing and these deviations,
Or from the people’s movements and stillness clashing.
Thus, when insufficient, one **qí** for it,
When excessive, one **làng** for it.
To summon rain is **qí**,
To invoke clear skies is **làng**.
For all such disasters,
Those of the same *qì* must unite in heart,
Fast and recite the scriptures,
Offer incense at all six times,
Turn the sutras ten thousandfold.
Virtue and blessings descend,
All ill omens dissolve.
**Wúliàng**’s sacred words,
Universal salvation without end.
The **Dao** speaks: To pray and ward off floods and droughts,
When summoning rain, one must establish an altar
In the southwest of the state,
With the forms of the Ten Dragon Lords of the Ten Directions
Placed at its four sides,
And the **Zhìyǔ Língfú** talisman at its center,
Storing water in the Five Directions,
Using **tóngzhú** and **bamboo** branches, as well as **qīngbái-yáng** branches,
Placed in the water,
And with **qīngzhǐ** script inscribed in ink,
To the **Sāntiān Shìyǔ** and **Tàixuǎn Tiānjī** of the Two Ministries,
To pray for it.
When invoking clear skies,
One must establish an altar
In the south of the state,
Nine feet high—three **rèn**—
Round above, square below,
With four gates opened at its sides,
Each gate leading to nine **lěi**,
As pathways for ascent,
And the forms of the Ten Dragon Lords of the Ten Directions
Placed at its four sides,
With the **Qǐngqíng Língfú** talisman at its center,
Offering incense and lamps in the Five Directions,
To dispel the darkness,
And with **dānshū** and **qīngcí** script,
To the **Huǒcáo** of the Two Ministries,
To ward it off.
The perfected one offers incense,
Recites the sutras ten passes.
Prayers and warding shall respond,
No harm in the coming year.
Depending on the scale of the flood or drought,
From the first seven days to the third seven days,
This is the lesser term.
With focused devotion and sincere aspiration,
The heavens record your merit,
And you shall attain the **Shénxiān**.

The **Dao** speaks: When the four seasons stray,
Yin and Yang misaligned,
Then the *qì* shifts and prevails as excess.
Thus, lingering rain becomes **shuǐ**,
Excessive heat becomes **hàn**.
Where it descends,
The common folk scatter and flee,
Birds and beasts lose their way,
Plagues spread,
And the innocent perish in ruin.
One must also fast,
Offer incense and recite scriptures,
Pray and ward with repentance.

Fasting and reciting scriptures,
Their merit and virtue are profound.
Above, they dispel celestial calamities,
Guard and protect the Emperor.
Below, they ward off poisons and harm,
To save myriad folk.
In this world, all receive their blessings,
Their fortune beyond measure.
Thus it is called **Wúliàng**,
Universal salvation for Heaven and Man.

The **Dao** speaks: For all who possess this sutra,
It can for the Emperor of Heaven and Earth,
And myriad folk,
Remove floods and droughts.
On days of disaster,
With a sincere heart, fast and burn incense,
Recite the sutra ten passes.
All are recorded by the heavens,
Ten thousand spirits attend in escort,
The perfected ones recognize you,
And you shall become a **Shèngjūn**,
A subject of the Golden Gate.
The heavens record your merits and faults,
Without the slightest omission.
The **Zhēnwáng** in Heaven also champions your cause,
And those who attain the **Dao** shall penetrate
The profound truths of the **Dao**.

The hidden words of the Great **Fàn** in the heavens,
Composed by the **Daojūn**,
The **Yuánshǐ Língshū** of the **Sānshíèr Tiān Qí Làng Zhōngpiān**,
The Eight Celestial Lords of the East:
**Pántáng Jī Sūn** shines resplendent,
Piercing the **Yàoché Zhōngzǔ**.
The altar’s pool is a **Yùyuān** of jade,
Where the **Jǐnglóng** resides in splendor.

「The **Yùyuān** of **Dìnglíng** holds its mysteries,
The **Yuèliàn** refines the **Lǔ** scroll.
Stealing the **Xuán** to establish seals,
Filtering the **Qì** to wrap the ancient.

At the **Shénxué**’s cave, the **Chī** is quenched,
The **Báilóng** offers the **Wǔ** sacrifice.
The **Zhèn** flies in harmony with the **Dòuhé**,
The **Guǐ** seizes the **Jiǎo** and **Pǔ**.

The **Yuán** gathers to pray for oil,
The **Shān** departs for **Lǜ** and **Hán**.
Summoning the **Chú** to strike the **Jiǎdǎng**,
The **Jiǔkūn** champions **Yáo** and **Huán**.

---
**Eastern Eight Celestial Lords** verified,
**Yánjī** and **Yùlǎn** resplendent,
**Hèhuí** shines through **Yàodān**.
**Chénlín** vanishes with a roar,
A myriad **Huá** constructs the **Guān**.
**Dìdīng** leads the **Xiá**,
**Mǎzhé** returns to **Liáohuán**.
The appointed day exceeds **Gǎnlóng**,
At the **Yōushā**’s **Qiūyuān**.

---
**Beheading** the **Guǒshù**,
**Xī** pacifies the **Yānlian**.
**Héshēng** ascends to **Lùsuì**,
The **Yāodú** conceals the **Yì**.
The **Hù** presents the **Niúlì**,
The **Huǒ** pierces **Zékān**.
**Lǚsī** governs **Yàomò**,
**Xiūmóu** masters the **Shīléi**.

---
**Western Eight Celestial Lords** revealed,
**Méichóu** and **Yànsǒu** in attendance,
**Jùlíng** repels **Qí** and **Póu**.
Turning the **Chú** to summon the **Xián**,
**Shìní** and **Wèn** battle the **Dǒu**.
The **Cí** confuses the **Jiān**’s **Hún**,
The **Bēntú** flees to **Lóuyí**.
**Bìshǎng** rewards the **Tángyuàn**,
**Yuèxié** dispatches the **Shìchí**.

---
**Northern Eight Celestial Lords** manifest,
The **Hǔdān** slays the **Yòuzhí** and **Kōngjīng**.
The **Dàomì** descends with **Qì**,
The **Yúnhuáng** mingles at the **Jiāomén**.
**Dònghún** blends with **Shúhuǒ**,
**Pǔmù** points to **Zhǐfèn**.
**Héshēng** unites the **Hún** under divine protection,
**Zhāoqīng** clears the **Fányíng**.
The **Mìshì** rectifies the **Tíng**,
**Shěngfǔ** lightens the **Qīngjīng**.
**Gǎoyáng** hums within the **Wénhuái**,
**Qì** resists no **Shùncún**.

---
The **Chìlóu** roars at the **Sìyuàn**,
The **Jiūfù** binds the **Shèkūn**.
**Tàikǎo** begets the **Shēnghuò**,
**Língyín** echoes through the **Jiànxún**.

---
**Dao** speaks: These are the hidden words of the Great **Fàn** in the heavens,
The **Wúliàng**’s boundless **Yīn**,
The ancient texts carved upon **Tàiwēi** and **Zǐwēi**’s **Shuǐhuǒ** halls,
At the **Cāngyù**’s **Língyá**’s summit,
To regulate the **Qì** of the four seasons across the **Tiān** and **Dì**.
A book of divine transformation,
Its efficacy surpasses naming.

---
Scholars of the world,
Praying for relief from floods and droughts,
Follow the **Fǎ** to inscribe the hidden words in **Dānmò**,
Placing them at the four gates of the altar,
To summon the **Qì** of **Yīnyáng**.

When the **Shuǐhuǒ**’s **Jì** descends upon mortal lands to wreak havoc,
Those who know how to settle it shall bring great fortune.
Each character spans a broad length of one *zhàng*.

---
The **Zhēnwáng** and **Huángrén** of old inscribed these texts,
Setting them as the **Zhèngyīn** standard.

Those who know its **Yīn** and can fast and recite it shall have the **Zhūtiān** dispatch flying **Fēitiān**, **Yìlóng**, and celestial envoys to descend and observe their person, recording their merits and reporting them to **Shénxiāo**. The **Wànshén** shall pay homage in procession, the **Dìqí** shall attend at the gates, and their great merit shall be acknowledged by the **Sāntiān**, granting them the office of **Dòngxuán**.

When the **Dao** is fully mastered, one may traverse the **Sānjiè** and ascend into the **Jīnmén**.

This **Yīn** repels all, fulfills all prayers, wards off all calamities, liberates all, and accomplishes all—it is the natural **Yīn** of **Tiānzhēn**.

Thus, reciting it summons celestial officials to descend and observe, the **Shàngdì** to chant from afar, the **Wànshén** to pay homage in procession, the **Sānjiè** to attend at the **Xuān**, the **Qúnjì** to bow in reverence, the **guǐjīng** to vanish of their own accord, the **línláng** to resound, the **Shífāng** to fall silent in awe, the **Héhǎi** to grow still, the **Shānyuè** to swallow their mist—all **Wànlíng** tremble in submission. It gathers the **Qúnxiān**, clears the **Tiān** of all turbidity, the **Dì** of all **jì** filth, and pierces the **Mínghuì** with pristine clarity. Its boundless **liàng** is the **Xuán** of **Xuán**.

*Língbǎo Wúliàng Dùrén Shàngpǐn Miàojīng*, Volume 47 complete.
Volume 48.

**Chapter on Calming the Ninefold Earthly Spirits and Unlucky Demons**

The Dao speaks: *"In days past, at the Hollow Yang within the Celestial Center, the Supreme Pure One of the Great Void sang the Crystal Radiance Music of the Earthly Spirits, thereby receiving the Supreme Pure One’s* **Miaojīng** *of Calming the Ninefold Earthly Spirits and Unlucky Demons.*

When the Supreme Pure One of **Tiānzhēn** delivered this **sutra**, circling ten times, He summoned the Ten Directions, and they came to His seat. The **Tiānzhēn** Great God, the Highest Sage of **Shàngshèng**, the True Person of **Miàoxíng**, the **Xiānwáng** Earthly Sovereign, the officials and attendants, the **Dìzhēn** Masters of the Earth, and the countless **Wànshén**—all riding the void—arrived.

Golden clouds filled the heavens, feathered canopies resounded with **Lángyǔ**, covering the Ninefold Earth, their radiance dazzling the Eight **Mínghuì** of **Yǔ**. Light streamed and scattered, piercing the Great Void, for five days and five nights. The celestial **rìyuè xīngxiù**—the **Xuánshū** and **Yùhéng**—all halted their wheels. The earthly seas and mountains, their caves and ravines, shone with **Bìhuá** clarity; winds and clouds fell silent, the **Tiān** free of floating **fúyì**, the **Dì** free of lurking **guǐjīng**. Within the land, hills, forests, plains, and marshes all flattened into one, with no more high or low. All soil became **wén** jade, and clouds and mists gleamed with **Bìnghuàn** brilliance, their hues undifferentiated.

The **Wànshén** attended His seat, while the Supreme Pure One of **Tiānzhēn** ascended in **Xuánzuò**, floating above the Ninefold Radiant **Jīntāo** Dragon Platform. After the first recitation of the **sutra**, the Earthly Sovereign of the Five Peaks simultaneously declared their praise. In the second recitation, the **Xuánquè** opened in passage. In the third, the **Líquán** surged forth. In the fourth, mountains, lakes, rivers, and springs all bore **xiángruì** omens. In the fifth, the **Dìzàng** treasures flowed into the human realm. In the sixth, the Earthly Spirits and **guǐjīng** abandoned their wickedness and returned to righteousness. In the seventh, calamities and disasters ceased, and misfortunes were extinguished. In the eighth, the Northern Capital’s **Luòchēng**, the Nine **Yōu** Abysses, and all **Dìyù** guilty souls were granted universal pardon. In the ninth, the **guǐguān** and their leaders all ascended to **Xiān** stages. In the tenth, all beings followed their nature; the people suffered no untimely harm. At that time, all men and women within the land turned their hearts in reverence, receiving protection and deliverance, all attaining **Chángshēng**.

The Dao speaks: *"Then, when the Supreme Pure One of **Tiānzhēn** delivered the **sutra** for the first time, the Earthly Sovereigns of the East—limitless, boundless, and radiant—calmed the Ninefold **Lěi** Earth. The **Xiānwáng** and Earthly Sovereigns of **Wànshén**, countless in number, floated through the void and arrived. In the second recitation, the Earthly Sovereigns of the South—limitless, boundless, and fierce—calmed the Ninefold **Lěi**. In the third, the Earthly Sovereigns of the West—limitless, boundless, and **shízhī**-colored—calmed the Ninefold **Lěi**. In the fourth, the Earthly Sovereigns of the North—limitless, boundless, and **rùnzé**-colored—calmed the Ninefold **Lěi**. In the fifth, the Earthly Sovereigns of the Northeast—limitless, boundless, and **jīnsǔ-zé**-colored—calmed the Ninefold **Lěi**. In the sixth, the Earthly Sovereigns of the Southeast—limitless, boundless, and **jīngāng-tiězé**-colored—calmed the Ninefold **Lěi**. In the seventh, the Earthly Sovereigns of the Southwest—limitless, boundless, and **shuǐzhì-zé**-colored—calmed the Ninefold **Lěi**. In the eighth, the Earthly Sovereigns of the Northwest—limitless, boundless, and **Dàfēng-zé**-colored—calmed the Ninefold **Lěi**. In the ninth, the Earthly Sovereigns of the Upper Direction—limitless, boundless, and **Kūnlún-Yángfēng-Zhuānquè-Yáochí-Bājí-Língxiān**, the Nine **Gōng** Earthly Truths—calmed the Ninefold **Lěi**. In the tenth, the Earthly Sovereigns of the Lower Direction—limitless, boundless, and **Dòngyuān-wúsè-Hùnhuáng-Dòngkōng-Gāngwéi**-colored—calmed the Ninefold **Lěi**. As the ten recitations concluded, the Earthly Sovereigns of the Ten Directions—limitless, boundless, and the Ninefold **Lěi**—the **Xiānwáng** and Earthly Sovereigns, all arrived together. The people of the land, men and women alike, turned their hearts in awe and devotion.

Those who came were as thick as flying snow and whirling sand; the countless multitudes filled half the land, causing the earth to sink unevenly, beyond restraint. Then, the Supreme Pure One gazed down upon the Ninefold **Lěi**’s **Yǐngmò** depths, the **Sānyōu** Abysses, and the thirty-six palaces of the **Dìshén**. The great Earthly Sovereigns’ halls, gates, and platforms all ascended in a **Rǎnrǎn** rise, reaching the Celestial Sovereign’s presence.

The Supreme Pure One then used His **Chìguāng** Fire-Jade **fú**, its brilliance illuminating the palaces and gates, transforming it into a single pearl. At first, it was no larger than a pea, yet the thirty-six palaces shone clearly and were visible. The Supreme Pure One again summoned His divine power, lifting this treasure pearl—now as large as a **shúmǐ** grain—into the **Xuán** void, nine **zhàng** above the earth.

As the Supreme Pure One ascended, the **Tiānzhēn** Great God, the Highest Sage of **Shàngshèng**, the True Person of **Miàoxíng**, the Ten Directions’ limitless, boundless, and supreme **Dìshén**, the Ninefold **Lěi** Earthly Sovereigns, and the countless multitudes—all entered the treasure pearl. The **Tiānrén** looked on, seeing only a **Bóbó** surge as they entered the pearl’s mouth, then vanished within it, their whereabouts unknown. The people of the land dispersed, and the earth returned to its even, upright state, no longer tilted.

Within the treasure pearl, the Supreme Pure One perceived the forms and **zhǒngzhǒng-bùxiáng** manifold evils of the Ninefold **Lěi** Earthly Spirits and malevolent ghosts. He displayed the **Língwén**, calming, extinguishing, and benefiting them, and all living beings.

When the **sutra**’s recitation was complete, the **Wànshén** oversaw the deliverance and entrusted it to me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. The **fǎshì** was roughly exhausted, the **Zhūtǐ** treasures returned to their places, and in a **shuǎhū** instant, all was silent with no trace remaining. Then, those who had passed through the **sutra**’s law all received salvation, their lives preserved that year without harm. The earth and its people bowed in reverence, all dwelling in **Lèkāng** ease.

They knew neither joy nor anger, neither sorrow nor grief, neither sickness nor vexation, neither suffering nor toil, neither disturbance nor alarm. Their words returned to **Zhìlǐ**, their intentions aligned with **Tiānzhēn**, their equal compassion merging with the **Yìgǔ**—all beings, though of different **gǔ**, became kin in harmony."

The realm is secure, its people flourish, rejoicing in Great Peace. The **Sutra**’s teachings are proclaimed, and the land unites under the **Dao**.

With hearts of utmost sincerity, they revere and honor the **Sutra**, all attaining deliverance from the world.

The **Dao** speaks: The words uttered by the **Yuan Shǐ Tiānzūn** in this **Sutra** are the hidden names of the Nine Palaces’ Earthly Sovereigns, the **Yìyīn** sounds. They are also the taboo names within the **Xianwáng**’s domain, the **Bǎilíng**’s concealed titles—words not of the common world.

The **Shangshèng** has already attained the **Zhēnrén**, mastering the **Tōng Xuàn** and probing the subtle. He comprehends its full meaning.

When recited ten times, the **Zhūtǐ** resound in distant praise, the Ten Thousand **Dì** offer rites, the Nine Palaces’ truth is revealed, the **Tǔqiàn** submit their forms, and they reverently uphold the **Tiānjié**, daring not to harm mortals. The **Shàngdì**’s decrees are swiftly entrusted to the **Tiāndīng**.

The **Zhìxué** scholars, when reciting ten times, command the Five Earths to obey, the Three **Xuàn** to bow, the **Yéjīng** to lose their sight, and the **Tǔmó** to perish utterly. Even those at death’s door are saved and live again. Yet this is why: the **Zhìxué**’s virtue and **Dao** have not yet fully ripened; their power to subdue the Ten Directions is not yet absolute, nor their might over the Nine Palaces. They can only ensnare the **Jiàn** and bind the **Móling**, but cannot revive the dead.

To recite this **Zhāng** lightly is to invite misfortune upon oneself. To honor and nourish it brings prosperity to one’s lineage, everlasting flourishing, and alignment with **Shàn yīnyuán**. All calamities are averted, and the **Shénmíng** guard the gates.

This **Sūtra** is most sublime, calming the Yellow **Hé**, sweeping away all ill omens, and delivering countless beings. It is the **Zōng** of the Nine Realms.

The **Wēiwēi** Great Compassion’s virtue is beyond measure.

The **Dao** speaks: When this **Sūtra** is recited ten times, the Nine Palaces’ Thirty-Six **Xianwáng**, along with the Earthly Sovereigns, assemble to dispel the **Tǔqiàn**’s criminal offenders, the **Dìxià**’s harmful **Qì**, and the **Jiéshè** of Earthly **Gōng**. In awe of the law, they shield mortals. The countless **Zēng** and **Zǔ**, the tormented **Yōuhún**, all receive deliverance, ascending to the Vermilion **Gōng**, enduring for nine years, and being reborn through **Huà**. They become noble beings.

Those who cherish this **Sūtra** and fulfill its teachings, when their virtue and **Dao** are complete, attain **Shénxiān**, ascending to the Golden **Hé** and feasting in the Jade **Jīng**.

The **Zhìxué** scholars who practice and recite this **Sūtra** summon the **Zhōnggōng**’s **Tǔdé** **Língbǎo Zhēnrén**, who descends the **Hàoyuán** **Qì**, flowing into their bodies. They receive deliverance and ascend to the Southern **Gōng**.

Mortals who recite it have the Earthly **Sī** destroy their records, not daring to restrain their forms. Their bones are repaid to the Earthly **Guān**, their years prolonged, and they ultimately attain the **Shījiě** **Dao**. Their **Húnshén** temporarily perish, escaping the **Dìyù**, and they return to their forms, wandering the Great Void.

This **Sūtra** is profound and boundless in its deliverance. All **Tiānrén** rejoice in its recitation. Infinite blessings flow through life and death, granted by the **Shàng Tiān**.

The **Shàng Tiān** treasures it, not passing it to the lower world. Only the **Zhìshì** who offer **Jīnbǎo** with sincere devotion swear by heaven to transmit it. Those who reveal it carelessly or belittle it suffer the calamity of the Nine Palaces, enduring long servitude to the Earthly **Guān**.

The Five **Dì** and the Thirty-Six Jade **Tóng** and **Nǚ** attend as **Yīngwèi** to the sacred **Shénwén**, safeguarding those who receive this **Sūtra**.

The **Dao** speaks: In the first month, during the **Chángzhāi**, recite this **Sūtra** to calm the **Qīngchì Tǔzhèng**, banishing the Nine Palaces’ Twelve **Tǔhuāng** **Zhùqì**, delivering the departed of past ages from Earthly **Dìdài** servitude, and ascending them to the Southern **Gōng**.

In the seventh month, during the **Chángzhāi**, recite this **Sūtra** to calm the **Báihuáng Tǔsī**, banishing the Nine Palaces’ Twelve **Tǔshā Xíngféng Qì**, and attaining **Shénxiān**. The **Zhūtǐ** record their names, granting them **Diǎnluó** **Báijiǎn**, and they are reborn after death.

In the tenth month, during the **Chángzhāi**, recite this **Sūtra** to calm the **Xuànhēi Tǔguān**, banishing the Nine Palaces’ Twelve **Tǔguài Hàiqì**, and for **Guówáng** and **Dìzhǔ**, ensuring their **Jūnchén** and **Fùzǐ** are secure. The **Guózhuó** is calmed, the **Tiāncháng** preserved, their lineage unbroken, and they remain as rulers forever, bringing **Tàipíng** to their lands.

On the **Bājié** days, recite this **Sūtra** to receive blessings from the Eight **Fú Tǔ**, attaining the **Zhēnrén** of the Nine Palaces.

On one’s **Běn Mìng** day, recite this **Sūtra** to have the Earthly **Guān** bestow blessings, prolonging life from its start, and the **Xianwáng** protect one’s fate, ensuring longevity in the **Huángtíng**.

The **Zhēnrén** drink from the **Zhàohuá Chí**, their **Húnshén** purified, and their **Wànqì** preserved eternally, free from suffering. Their bodies radiate light, and the Three Realms serve as their guardians. The Five **Dì** oversee their ascension, and all **Wànshén** pay homage. Their names are inscribed in the **Shàng Tiān**, their virtue complete, and they ascend to the **Shàngqīng**.

The **Dao** speaks: On the day of **Xíngdào**, one must first bathe in fragrant water, purify oneself in ritual, and face east.

Brush the teeth thirty-two times, heard by the Thirty-Two **Tiān**. Bow the heart in homage thirty-two times, eyes closed, meditating on oneself seated within the Yellow, Black, and Purple **Yúnqì**’s embrace. The inner and outer worlds grow dark, and there appear Green Dragons, White Tigers, Crimson Birds, Dark Turtles, Lions, White Cranes, and others arrayed on either side. The sun and moon illuminate, the chamber glows brightly, and a radiant halo forms at the neck, its light reaching the Ten Directions—so clear and distinct.

The **Mìzhòu** recites:

*"Wúshàng Xuányuán, Tàishàng Dàojūn.
Zhàochū chénshēn zhōng sānwǔ Gōngcáo, zuǒyòu Guānshǐzhě, shìxiāng Yùtóng, chuányán Yùnǚ, wǔ Dì zhífú, zhídì Xiāngguān, gè sānshíliù rén, guānqǐ suǒyán.
Jīnrì Jíqìng, Chángzhāi Qīngtáng, xiūxíng Zhìjīng, wúliàng Dùrén.
Yuàn suǒ qǐ Shàngchè, jìngyù Wúshàng sānshíèr Tiān Yuánshǐ Shàngdì Zhìzūn jìqián.
Bì, yǐn Qì sānshíèr guò, dōngxiàng sòngjīng.*

The **Yuan Shǐ** **Wúliàng** **Dùrén** **Shàngpǐn Miàojīng**—
The **Yuan Shǐ** **Dòngxuàn Língbǎo** **Běnzhāng**, calming the Nine Palaces’ **Tǔqiàn**’s ill omens and opening the **Kāipì Miàopǐn**. Across endless **Miànjíé**, it delivers beings.

The **Zhèngxíng** wander in **Fàn**, ascending and descending by nature’s will.
They merge with the **Jiǔlún**, reaching the **Xūwú Zhìzhēn**.
The **Xuányuán** **Zǔqì** flows, forming shape.
The **Fēngyuān** enfolds, and the **Miàoyùn** circulates through the roots.

The **Great Dao** preserves and secures all things—
All beings transform and take form.
Emerald groves and sapphire pools array the **Mysterious Spirits**.
Nine luminous forces converge under **Heavenly Sovereignty’s** jade decrees.

Separation and union establish transformation—
The **Crimson Dao** unfolds its radiance.
The **Great Void** revolves in cycles,
Its **True Fragrance** borne aloft by winged forms.

This is the **Supreme Mystery**,
The **Mysterious within the Mysterious**.

The **Sixfold Barrier** presses in—
Commanding the **Kun Mountains’** might.
Beneath, the **Wind Marshes** coil,
While **Jiefen’s** springs rise from the abyss.

Boundless **Great Transformation** gathers essence at dawn.
The **Three True Ones** extend their splendor—
Golden radiance fills the **Lín Court**.
At the **First Dawn**, the **Jia Soil** ascends as **Prime Minister**.

Purple mists and crimson clouds
Illumine the lofty and pure.

They subdue the **Hundred Demons**,
And station themselves across the **Ten Directions**.

Within are:
The **True One** who spreads **Yuan Qi**,
The **Sovereign** who unites **Spirit** and transformation,
The **Great God** who examines and enlightens,
The **Venerable Elder** who subdues evil and annihilates **Tǔqiàn**,
And the **Nine Abyssal Sovereign**, **Dòngyuān Dòngjí**, who bears **Heaven** and holds **Earth**—**Huánglǎo Zūnshén**.

Together, they proclaim the **Supreme Teaching**—
The **Dao** manifests as **Body**.

Today, they secure and pacify—
Ten thousand **Saints** gather at the **Hall of Audience**.

The **Nine Directions’** **Wújí Preservers of the World**—
**Longsheng Dàshèng**, **Wúliàng Dùrén**:
East—**Wújí Bǎoshì Shénwáng**,
South—**Wújí Mièxián Shénwáng**,
West—**Wújí Pìxié Shénwáng**,
North—**Wújí Fáè Shénwáng**,
Northeast—**Wújí Wàngdé Shénwáng**,
Southeast—**Wújí Kāidào Shénwáng**,
Southwest—**Wújí Zhèngqì Shénwáng**,
Northwest—**Wújí Chénghuà Shénwáng**,
Above—**Wújí Shàngqīng Shénwáng**,
Below—**Wújí Fēngzé Shénwáng**,
And the **Nine Abyssal Sovereigns of the Ten Directions**—
**Longsheng Dùshì Wúliàng Dàshén**.

They ride the **Yellow Clouds**,
In **Crimson Chariots** and **Emerald Palanquins**,
Beneath **Yellow Canopies** and **Flying Wheels**,
Harnessed by **White Tigers** and **Azure Phoenixes**,
With **Crimson Cranes** and **Vermilion Swans**,
Bearing the **Subduing-Demons Banner**,
And **Dragon-Flag Silks**—
**Yàochāng Zhǔshuài** leads ahead,
While **Tǔlóng** from the **Tiger’s Maw**,
**Lions**, and **Qílín** flank them,
Leaping left and right.
The **Seven Saints** clear the path,
The **Four Bright Ones** bear the **Yoke-Poles**,
And **Ten Thousand Spirits**, **Millions of Immortals**,
Float through the void.

They traverse the **Great Qi of the Supreme Void**,
And soar through the **Luminous Canopy**.

**Zhōngyuán’s** winged ministers,
The **Spirit-Knots** of the **Right Palace**,
The **Mysterious Aides** of the **Upper Assistants**,
And the **Empress of Great Yin**—
All command the **Earthly True Ones**,
And assemble before the **Imperial Court**.

Wherever they secure and pacify,
They eternally guard against collapse.

To the **Nine Abysses** and **Eight Extremes**,
To the **Mysterious Gates** of **Hunhuang’s** threshold,
To the **Azure-Verdant Courts**,
To the **Thirty-Six Lords** of **Huaqi**,
To the **Nine Palaces’** **Dòngtiān** bureaus,
To the **Mountains, Marshes, Rivers, and Springs**,
To the **Five Rivers** and **Eight Seas**,
To the **Double Lights** along the **Streams**,
To the **Three Mysterious** and **Four Origins**,
And to all **Spirits**—

They capture **Tǔqiàn**,
Slay the **Evil Essences**,
Bind the **Northern Capital’s** **Luòchēng**,
And constrain the **Ghostly Camps**.

The living prosper in peace,
The nation’s **Zuo** flourishes in clarity.
The dead souls transmigrate,
And **White Bones** become **Humans**.
The living body receives **Deliverance**,
And abides with **Qi** eternally.

By **Cause and Condition’s** revolving wheel,
They ascend to the **Heavens Above**.
They eternally sever the **Fifteen Harmful Beings** of the **Underworld**,
Annihilate the **Ill Omens**,
And purify the **Four Abysses**.

The **Four Abysses’ Heavens**—
Where **Heavenly Sovereigns** merge and **Dao** unites—
The **Realm of **Fànxíng**—

**East’s Eight Heavens**:
**Huángzhōng Lǐxuān Tiān**—Emperor **Líuliú Zhīyán Sūn**,
**Jiǔlěi Shénkōng Tiān**—Emperor **Shìkāng Yōng**,
**Jízhēn Yàohé Tiān**—Emperor **Hécù Shàngshuì**,
**Shēngjīn Bùhuá Shùlíng Tiān**—Emperor **Mìjǐng Pǔqióng**,
**Dàozhāo Hòuhuà Tiān**—Emperor **Zhàowúdí Yuán**,
**Tàichōng Déróng Tiān**—Emperor **Língfàn Dùguāng**,
**Jìngshùn Yīyuán Tiān**—Emperor **Bàoyóu Jiūfēi**,
**Zǔshēng Wújiù Tiān**—Emperor **Chàngxī Yǐngóng**.

**South’s Eight Heavens**:
**Huǒbì Chìfén Tiān**—Emperor **Niànjí Zhùyuán**,
**Zhānglíng Liújīng Tiān**—Emperor **Wòshàn Yùyáng**,
**Fàn Yuán Dùkōng Tiān**—Emperor **Jìngzhū Shènglóng**,
**Xiùyīng Wěisù Tiān**—Emperor **Shuōluó Tóngzhān**,
**Qǐxué Miàoguāng Tiān**—Emperor **Shíchōng Liàngfū**,
**Pánjī Wēixū Tiān**—Emperor **Zhíjì Dūntí**,
**Yánglì Qūchí Tiān**—Emperor **Diànqì Yòushān**,
**Tǔfǔ Cháyù Tiān**—Emperor **Yùshén Mìshū**.

**West’s Eight Heavens**:
**Kǒngshēng Yōuhuà Tiān**—Emperor **Sèyì Zhìhuí**,
**Huángyá Zǔlíng Tiān**—Emperor **Yáoqìng Bèixiū**,
**Yōugǔ Fányí Tiān**—Emperor **Bái Yuán Kǒngxiàng**,
**Lùmíng Sìcún Tiān**—Emperor **Jué Dàojiè Chún**,
**Dòngjiāng Wēihù Tiān**—Emperor **Fànlóng Jiǔ’ē**,
**Wēishēng Hàojǐng Tiān**—Emperor **Cuīyào Lìngcún**,
**Lízhēn Lècháng Tiān**—Emperor **Zhào Fùsùkōng**,
**Jīngchán Cìyáo Tiān**—Emperor **Jiēxiáng Tèmíng**.

**North’s Eight Heavens**:
**Tàixū Fànróng Zhàowú Tiān**—Emperor **Níngfǔ Lángxū**,
**Tàixū Bǎojié Hòuchéng Tiān**—Emperor **Zhùchǐ Dōu’ān**,
**Zhímíng Biànfú Jìnzhì Tiān**—Emperor **Biānluò Shímíng**,
**Dǒujī Huàngxiāo Tiān**—Emperor **Jíhuà Túxiān**,
**Jìnshén Fùshēng Zài**—Emperor **Wèixùn Wúshēng**,
**Yìhuáng Zǒnglěi Tiān**—Emperor **Díliàng Qiè**,
**Dìnghuái Cháyīn Tiān**—Emperor **Bēiyù Méngsī**,
**Guìlì Shēngyóu Dázhēn Tiān**—Emperor **Wúqiú Tàiyōng**.

The **Thirty-Two Heavens**, the **Thirty-Two Emperors**,
Their **Heavenly Hidden Names** and **Heavenly Hidden Titles**.
Within the **Central Void’s** **Dòng**—
The **Natural Spirit-Chapter**,
The **Nine Abysses’** hidden **Yùn**,
The **Soil Sovereign’s** **Yīn**.

The **Immortal Kings’** **Zūn**,
The **Soil Sovereign’s** **Shén**,
The **Nine Capitals’** **Dàmó**,
And the **Wind Marshes’** **Líng**.

The **Nine Coils** and **Ten Abysses**—
Merging in **Hunhuà’s** **Yuán Gēn**.
The **Mysterious Assembly’s** **Zǔ**,
Whose **virtue** defies measure.
They array the **Arrayed True Ones**,
And govern the **Divine Mechanisms**.

Today, they rejoice in securing the **Nine Abysses**,
Severing **Tǔqiàn**,
And extinguishing the **Ill Omens**.

**Rising and descending the Dao-qi,**
**Conveying the flow of spirit-essence.**

The **Soil-Water-Wind Realms**—
**Twenty-Seven Layers.**

The **True Kings** inspect and govern,
**Mastering divine functions.**

At the **Eastern Pole**, they gather qi,
At the **Western Pole**, they condense essence,
At the **Northern Pole**, they merge the body,
At the **Southern Pole**, they form shape,
At the **Central Pole**, the **Upper Summit**—
**Coiling and settling the Dark Abyss.**

The **Green Emperor** opens the mechanisms,
The **White Emperor** grasps the pass,
The **Red Emperor** turns the axle,
The **Black Emperor** guides the veins,
The **Yellow Emperor** harmonizes—
**The Confucian** [or *Hun* spirit] **disperses and calms.**

The **Green Realm’s Divine King**—
**Dragon-Strength, Radiant Secrecy.**

The **Red Realm’s Divine King**—
**Flame-Bloom, Stirring Wings.**

The **White Realm’s Divine King**—
**Swift-Blade, Lightning-Touch.**

The **Black Realm’s Divine King**—
**Threat-Embracing, Nurturing.**

The **Yellow Realm’s Divine King**—
**Upholding the Void’s Extremes.**

The **Five Realm Great Deities**—
**The Thick Earth’s Sovereigns.**

Roaming the earthly domains,
**Commanding spirit-officials.**

Brandishing blade and axe,
**Overseeing the lower bureaus.**

Grasping the cords and knots,
**The essence and function’s resources.**

Creation and transformation—
**All subject to the Mysterious Pivot.**

Above, they inherit Heaven’s governance,
**Opening and dividing yin-yang.**

In harmony with **One Virtue**,
**All things flourish in rank.**

The **Qí Master** seizes poison,
The **Tiger General** dispels evil,
**Mighty troops stand vigilant,**
**Lynx-beasts prance in power.**

The **Eight Enclosures’** radiance flies,
**Confronting the Ten Directions,**
**Daring to rebel—**
**Blocked and repelled by the True Sovereign.**

**Gold-essence devours,**
**Divine beasts swallow whole,**
**Severing demonic brilliance—**
**None escape destruction.**

**Hordes of demons bound,**
**Ten thousand ghosts vanish,**
**Mountains and rivers serene,**
**Grasses and trees flourish.**

The **Three Lights and Five Elders**—
**Sealing the source of evil,**
**No hiding place—**
**Gold-Horse couriers transmit.**

**Universal proclamation to the boundless,**
**Ten thousand transformations unfold.**

The **Nine Abysses’ Imperial Lord**—
**Arrayed in celestial petition.**

**Void and transformation descend,**
**Unfolding Heaven and Earth.**

**Primordial qi vast and boundless,**
**The form of Chaos.**

**Light and clear ascending,**
**Heavy and turbid congealing below.**

**Calamity’s fate unfolds naturally,**
**Riding yang to bind yin.**

**True essence intertwined,**
**Diamond-Iron Wheels.**

**Constructing palaces and bureaus,**
**Dwelling within their midst.**

**Inner ministers, True Sovereigns,**
**Co-governing spirit-immortals.**

**Partaking of the Three Mysteries,**
**Establishing the title Soil Sovereign.**

**Encompassing all mechanisms,**
**Measuring the boundless.**

**No monstrous calamities allowed,**
**No harm from Confucian [or *Hun*] evil.**

**The Five Directions pacified,**
**True scriptures descend.**

**Eight Convergences of crimson script,**
**Jade-character chapters.**

**Preserving disaster and fate,**
**The earth’s axis unshaken.**

**Dharma-qi pervading,**
**Ten thousand patterns unfold.**

**Primordial cords flow,**
**Nine Abysses’ deep yin.**

**Revolving without color,**
**Circulating through the Dark Void.**

**Spirit-qi passing gates,**
**Returning degrees merge with clarity.**

**Thirty-Six Palaces,**
**Overseeing the Lower Primordial.**

**Eight Landscapes blend,**
**Ascending to the High Mysteries.**

**Within the Mysteries, the Imperial Sovereign—**
**Landless Jade-Truth.**

**Spreading Great Harmony,**
**The Yellow-One’s Spirit.**

**Encompassing seas and mountains,**
**Nourishing flowing forms.**

**Jade-Bloom gathers essence,**
**Divine aura rises as mist.**

**Five Mountains lush and elegant,**
**Ringed by ten thousand heavens.**

**Above connecting, below interfacing,**
**Rising and descending naturally.**

**Within, the True God—**
**The Void Sovereign, Heavenly Lord.**

**The Earth-Mother, Holy Sovereign,**
**The Soil Sovereign’s exalted spirit.**

**From the first soil, the Hall begins,**
**Aiding the Nine Officials.**

**Holding talismans and scrolls,**
**Guarding the earth’s roots.**

**Roaming the Dark Platform,**
**Entering and exiting the spirit-ford.**

**In the depths of the abyss,**
**Within the fragrant void.**

**Below, settling the human form,**
**Purple-Gate, Elixir-Field.**

**Central convergence of the Five Qi,**
**Great mixing of ten thousand deities.**

**Ten revolutions return the spirit,**
**Ten thousand qi ascend as immortals.**

**The Dao of immortality values life,**
**Measureless salvation for all.**

**Below, pacifying the Nine Abysses,**
**Unfolding the Dharma-Wheel.**

**Calamity and blessing in teaching,**
**Fate bearing cause and effect,**
**Universal reception of enlightenment,**
**Ten thousand gather in wholeness.**

**Life’s Dao flourishes,**
**Below reporting to the Dark Mysteries.**

**Within the Mysteries’ gate,**
**Each has a birth-passage.**

**Within, the Primordial Cavern’s song-chapter,**
**The True King’s spirit-text,**
**Words matching High Immortals.**

---
**First Hymn: Pacifying the Nine Abysses’ Void-Cavern**

**Primordial-One binds the qi,**
**Within the mixed void.**

**Below, form takes shape—**
**Coiling bricks in the Dark Void.**

**Earth’s cords take root,**
**Within, the spirit-true.**

**Named the Soil Sovereign Lord,**
**Receiving rank from the Imperial Throne.**

**Thirty-Six Palaces,**
**Scriptures governing ten thousand deities.**

**Gold and stone entwined and fixed,**
**Mechanisms totaled in Kunlun.**

**Void embraces the boundless ford,**
**Wind-Marshes ever-embracing.**

**Mysterious principles, sacred treasures,**
**Thick virtue unshaken.**

**Burgeoning transformation spans great numbers,**
**Kraken and dragons alike bear burdens.**

**The True Path follows nature,**
**How could Confucian [or *Hun*] evil arise?**

**The Two Principles harmonize supreme function,**
**Mystery unites, preserving Yellow Peace.**

---
**Second Hymn: Clearing the Soil-Confucian [or *Hun*] Chapter**

**Primordial-Beginning’s Mysterious Chapter,**
**Spirit-Mystery binding deities.**

**Below, they govern imperial qi,**
**Inspecting and restraining the multitudes.**

**Commanding the Soil Sovereign,**
**Thirty-Six Lords.**

**Partaking of supreme function,**
**Opening the earth’s gates.**

**Nine Abysses, layered defenses—**
**Confucian [or *Hun*] stagnation dispelled.**

**Virtue surging, harmonious,**
**Dissolving into boundless expanse.**

**My True Path circulates,**
**Merging with Mysterious Standards.**

**Calamity’s essence extinguished—**
**All things roam at ease.**

**Preserving the system against calamity,**
**Everlasting prosperity and rectitude.**

**Living beings rejoice—**
**Relying on my High Throne.**

**Systems and models proclaimed,**
**Evil utterly destroyed.**

**Boundless and limitless,**
**Seas and mountains vast.**

**Nurturing creation,**
**Flowing forms radiant.**

**All receive enlightenment,**
**Merit returns to the Upper King.**

---
**Third Hymn: Extinguishing Ill Omens**

**Below the Nine Abysses,**
**Dark and cavernous gates.**

**Cords of Dharma-qi,**
**Mystery and void.**

**Within, the True Sovereign,**
**Receiving transformation, opening realms.**

**Holding the supreme qi,**
**Regulating yin-yang.**

**Perverse calamities released,**
**Dispelling ill omens.**

**Supreme Jade-Scriptures,**
**Scattering disaster, extinguishing misfortune.**

**Earth’s roots vast and distant,**
**Divine essence transforming.**

**Ascending to Kunqiu,**
**Rising and coiling in rotation.**

**Pervading mystery flows,**
**Ten thousand treasures pure and rectified.**

**Humanity secure and prosperous,**
**Blessings multiplied.**

**Nations serene and orderly,**
**Great calamities nonexistent.**

**Majestic Highest Sovereign,**
**Commanding the divine lineage.**

**Ten thousand realms merge with the Mysterious Diagram,**
**Creation preserved in unity.**

**This—above the Three Realms,**
**Within the flying void—**
**The True King’s song,**
**Words matching the Mysterious Chapter.**

**Reciting it universally,**
**Named for the Southern Palace.**

**Reciting it ten thousandfold,**
**The True King’s protection descends.**

**All-encompassing Dao complete,**
**Ascending to the lofty void,**
**Transcending the Three Realms,**
**Rank attained by the Immortal Sovereign.**

**Hearing the sacred tones,**
**The Demon King reveres the form.**

**Persuading the Earthly *Zhi* (地祇),**
**Guarding spirits send and escort.**

**Extracting from the Nine Palaces,**
**The Five Sorrows and Eight Hardships—**
**The Seven Ancestors ascend,**
**Forever parted from the Ghostly Offices,**
**Souls passing through Zhu Ling (朱陵),**
**Refined and reborn.**

**This is called the *Wuliang* (無量) Scripture,**
**Universal salvation without end,**
**With secret celestial texts,**
**All heavens hold in veneration.**

**Arrogance and negligence lead to the Hell Realms,**
**Disaster befalls the Seven Ancestors.**

**The Dao states:**
**These two chapters are the hidden words of the Celestial Sovereigns of the Nine Palaces and Thirty-Six Mansions,**
**And the Earthly *Xianwang* (仙王) of the Nine Palaces—**
**Calming the Earthly *Qian* (祆),**
**Preventing punishment and crime in the Four Directions,**
**Warding off harm to the people and creatures.**
**All are the words of the Great *Fan* (梵),**
**Not the common speech of the mortal world.**

**Without melodious charm,**
**Without ornate curves—**
**Thus called profound and mysterious,**
**Hard to fathom in detail.**

**A treasure of the heavens,**
**Hidden in the *Shenxiao* (神霄) Palace of *Yuqing* (玉清) and *Yufu* (玉府),**
**East Treasure Hall of the Primordial Origin,**
**Encountered in the *Renchen* (壬辰) cycle,**
**Fated to descend and be transmitted.**

**If a perfected sage brings a heart of pure gold and sincere devotion,**
**Following ancient rites to pledge allegiance to the *Yuxuan* (玉玄),**
**Then he shall be entrusted with it.**

**The Dao states:**
**Earthquakes and mountain tremors**
**Are also governed by *Qi* (氣) and cosmic cycles.**
**Collapsing earth and fissures**
**Arise from the passage of time.**
**Even the Nine Palaces have their *Qianxiang* (祆祥) omens.**
**When such calamities occur,**
**All virtuous scholars must unite in heart to observe fasts,**
**Burn incense at the Six Times,**
**Recite the scriptures ten thousandfold—**
**Blessings and *De* (德) shall swiftly descend,**
**Warding off ill omens.**

**The *Wuliang* (無量) scriptures,**
**Universal salvation without end.**

**The Dao states:**
**Those of shallow learning and meager Daoic attainment,**
**Or whose Immortal rank is yet incomplete,**
**If their fate is extinguished,**
**Their bodies pass through the Great *Yin* (太陰),**
**Returning to the Earthly Mansions,**
**Their bones refined and reformed,**
**Their souls lingering in the soil,**
**Unenlightened in the dark.**

**At the hour of departure,**
**Fellow scholars and perfected sages shall burn incense for them,**
**Recite the scriptures ten times,**
**To guide their earthly forms according to the law.**

**The Earthly Sovereign expels malevolent *Qian* (祆),**
**Calms all spirits,**
**And by calculation of days,**
**They attain rebirth.**

**The turning wheel of existence becomes unobstructed,**
**And thus one attains the Immortals.**

**The Dao states:**
**Within heaven and earth,**
**Heaven has Nine *Xiao* (霄),**
**Earth has Nine Palaces.**
**One Palace is ninety-seven thousand two hundred *li* (里) distant from heaven.**
**Below the Nine Palaces,**
**An additional one thousand two hundred eighteen thousand *li* (里) separate them from heaven.**
**Thus, the Nine Palaces above correspond to Kunlun (昆仑),**
**Situated in heaven’s midst,**
**Like the yolk within an egg.**

**The Earthly Offices possess the *Dongyuan* (洞元) Hall,**
**The *Tongyin* (通陰) Gate,**
**And the Forty-Two Tribunals (四十二曹),**
**Below which all are Earthly Governors (地司),**
**To judge guilty souls.**

**There are also Thirty-Six Caverns,**
**Where Immortal Kings reside,**
**And all spirits beneath the earth,**
**Commanding the Thirty-Six kinds of Earthly *Qian* (祆) and monstrous beings,**
**Who harm and slander living humans,**
**Disturbing their graves and homes,**
**Bringing water and fire as calamities.**

**All must observe fasts,**
**Burn incense, and recite scriptures.**

**Fasts and scriptural recitation,**
**Their merit and virtue most weighty.**
**Above, they avert celestial disasters,**
**Calm the Nine Palaces and Earthly *Qian* (祆) omens.**
**Below, they ward off poisonous harm,**
**Saving countless people.**
**Dependence on life and death,**
**Their blessings are boundless.**
**Thus it is said: *Wuliang* (無量),**
**Universal salvation for heaven and humanity.**

**The Dao states:**
**All who possess this scripture**
**Can become the Celestial Sovereigns of heaven and earth,**
**Calming the land and countless people,**
**Warding off disasters and misfortunes.**

**When calamity arises,**
**If one resolves to observe fasts and burn incense,**
**Reciting the scriptures ten times,**
**All the heavens shall send their True Ones,**
**Dissipating ill omens,**
**And the perfected sages shall record your merit—**
**You shall attain the rank of a Golden *Jun* (君) under the Holy Sovereign’s gate.**

**The heavens record human deeds and transgressions,**
**Without the slightest loss.**
**Even the True Demons in heaven shall commend your life,**
**And those who attain the Dao shall comprehend the profound utterances.**

**The hidden speech of the Great *Fan* (梵) in the heavens—**
**The *Wuliangyin* (無量音) of the Dao Sovereign,**
**Composed by the Primordial Origin,**
**The *Jiaolun* (九垒) Marvelous Chapters,**
**The Eight Celestial Treasures of the Eastern Realm.**

**In the depths of the Lanxi’s hidden glades, the luminous pearls of wisdom unfold.**
**Their radiance brightens the jade doors, unfolding the mysteries of the Triple Primordial.**
**The sacred texts bear the essence of the Dao,**
**Their cycles surging like the boundless sea.**
**Manifesting auspicious signs in silent stillness,**
**The celestial diagrams of the Central Peak are revealed.**

**The Imperial Edicts of the Sun’s Speech seek to open salvation’s path,**
**Extending the pure virtues to all,**
**Dispersing the subtle tokens of the Dao’s grace.**
**The accumulated powers of the ancient trees now stand upright,**
**Their techniques refined in leisurely repose.**
**The boundless expanse of the Great Void blazes with unending light.**

**The Eight Celestial Treasures of the Southern Realm—**
**The resplendent *Hèyán Gènkǎ*, the Dragon’s Roar in glory,**
**Swaying the spheres to send forth the True Ones,**
**The *Hánfú* demons subdued, their strange forms concealed.**
**The myriad strictures traverse the revolving wheel,**
**Transforming the array into boundless governance.**
**The sacred rites extend across the vast expanse,**
**The subtle mists weaving endless blessings.**
**The void’s calculations guard against the flames,**
**The fallen *Lán*’s master now invokes the ancient halls.**
**The ancient caves hold no match for his might,**
**Commanding the Azure to fulfill this decree.**
**The overflowing venom of the Liang-Bei is tamed,**
**The *Yīn*’s firmament congeals its power.**
**The *Zhēn*’s nurturing balance is established,**
**The distant guests arrive in proper order.**

**The Eight Celestial Treasures of the Western Realm—**
**The *Biānxī Luánqīng*, the lofty peaks of the Mendian,**
**Their boundless virtues extending to all,**
**The void’s emptiness now stands firm.**
**The luminous symbols unfold in discourse,**
**Saving and transforming through the precepts’ guidance.**
**The harmonious summons gathers all spirits,**
**Swift discernment emerges in debate.**
**The *Lúluán*’s cries echo in the pools of universal vision,**
**The *Yōuxiā Mùduō*’s time now blooms in proper order.**
**The mighty pillars stabilize the foundations,**
**The True Ones’ marvels stretch vast and great.**
**The martial banners bestow favor upon the whirlpools,**
**The willows’ grace extends to the boundaries.**

**The Eight Celestial Treasures of the Northern Realm—**
**The purple clouds gather in the capital,**
**All eight scenes entwined in splendor.**
**The idle *Luó* veils the stars,**
**The blessings raised to the distant *Yíqián*.**
**The commands resound through the celestial palaces,**
**The salvation of the *Zēng* now proclaimed.**
**Beside the silent and the enlightened,**
**The robes fly in the boundless void.**
**The sands of fate shift in their courses,**
**The dense and the sparse now stand firm.**
**The primordial essence reaches its peak in the sun,**
**The floating mats stir the heart’s depths.**
**The chariots’ commands release the bonds,**
**The neighboring withered ones face the eon’s end.**
**The straight gate meets with harmony,**
**The Marshal of War bows to the Celestial.**

**The Dao speaks:**

Within these celestial realms, the Great *Dàfàn* of the Nine Fortifications in silence,
A boundless sound—
The ancient texts of the *Jiùwén* and the *Kānshū* Kings, the *Qīngxū* Caverns of *Wángwū*,
The *Yìnghuà* Gate of the Earthly Officials, marked with yellow jade,
Stand above to suppress the Nine Fortifications’ calamitous *qì*,
The *Tǔqiàn* omens of ill fortune.

Each character is broad and long, a span in measure.

The *Tiānzhēn* Sovereign of old inscribed these texts,
Setting them as the true sound.

Those who know this sound,
And fast while reciting it,
Shall have the Eight Celestial Treasures dispatch their inspectors,
The Earthly Gods and their Kings descend to observe their form,
Record their merit and diligence,
And report it to the Celestial Treasures.
Ten thousand spirits shall pay homage and bow in worship,
The Earthly *Zhǐ* shall attend the gate,
The Great *Zhēnwáng* shall champion the hidden lands,
The Dao shall be complete and all shall attain it,
They shall traverse the Three Realms,
Ascend into the Golden Gate.

This sound cleaves through all barriers,
Dispels all calamities,
Transcends all obstacles,
Accomplishes all things—
It is the natural sound of the *Tiānzhēn*.

Thus, when recited to summon all beneath the heavens,
The Supreme *Dìshàng* sings from afar,
Ten thousand spirits bow in homage and worship.
The Three Realms attend the hall,
All *qiàn* spirits bind their heads in reverence,
Ghostly essences perish of their own accord,
Pearls and panthers resound in echo,
The Ten Directions stand in solemn stillness,
Rivers and seas fall silent,
Mountains and peaks swallow their mist,
All spirits tremble in submission,
Summoning the host of immortals,
The heavens know no turbid defilement,
The earth knows no *qiàn* dust,
The dark wisdom is revealed with clarity—
The boundless virtue of the profound and ineffable.

**The Forty-Eighth Volume of the *Língbǎo* Sutra of Infinite Salvation—**
**The Supreme Marvelous Scripture, concludes.**
**The Forty-Ninth Volume begins.**

**The Chapter on the Elimination of Illness, Calamities, Lameness, and Withering—**

The *Dao* proclaims: In times past, within the *Tài'ān* Heaven, the distant resonance of the *Fēnggē* Wind Song and the *Tàihé* Great Harmony Music of the Land of Blessings was heard, as the *Yuánshǐ* received the *Wúliàng Miàojīng*—the wondrous treasure of infinite measure—for the elimination of illness, calamities, lameness, and withering.

When the *Yuánshǐ* Heavenly Venerable spoke this *sūtra*, circling ten times through the *Ten Passages*, summoning the Ten Directions, the *Tàiyī* Great Heavenly Physician, the *Shàngshèng* Most Exalted, the *Pǔjì* Universal Savior, the *Tōngzhì* All-Healing Sage, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

With radiance accumulating like clouds, vermilion wheels and splendid canopies unfurling, flower-clouds casting shade, luminous mists dancing in splendor, celestial brocades interwoven in brilliance, and the vast sky illuminated—spanning five days and five nights—all the heavens, their hidden recesses and embedded peaks, were bathed in great clarity. The celestial palaces of stars and moon ceased their revolutions day and night, while the *shén* and *fēng* leaned upon the mist, and divine incense wafted through the clouds. The heavens knew no drifting obstructions, and the Six *Xū* (voids) were revealed with boundless purity. Within one land, earth and soil, mountains and rivers, forests and trees stood level and equal, with no elevation or depression, all transformed into a uniform *jìnyǐ* (jade-green) hue, devoid of variation. The myriad *zhēn* (true beings) attended in reverence.

The *Yuánshǐ* Heavenly Venerable ascended to the *playful* (xiānzuò) five-colored crystal-clear treasure seat suspended in the void, and spoke this *sūtra* once more. The great sages of the Ten Directions simultaneously extolled its virtues. At that moment, within one land, all men and women suffering from bodily afflictions gradually found relief and ease.

At the second recitation, the deaf gained hearing, the blind regained sight, and the mute could speak.

At the third recitation, the emaciated and the bloated, those afflicted with deep-seated ailments, were restored to fullness and equilibrium.

At the fourth recitation, accumulated toxins and transmitted diseases failed to reach even the gates.

At the fifth recitation, the lame and those with withered limbs could all rise and walk again.

At the sixth recitation, the malevolent and pestilential *qiàn* (spirits) were eliminated, and the *zhèngqì* (rightful *qi*) flowed freely.

At the seventh recitation, the aged regained their vigor, and the young became robust.

At the eighth recitation, bodily illnesses were dispelled, and the *fǎshēn* (Dharma-body) found joy and delight.

At the ninth recitation, all illnesses, calamities, lameness, and withering were eradicated, and those who had realized their suffering as mere illusion—never truly existent—returned to the radiant clarity of the *Dao*, free from pain. The arising and passing away of all afflictions followed from false and fantastical perceptions; once the true nature of the *Dao* was recognized, whence could illness come?

At the tenth recitation, faces emitted a violet glow, bodies shone with jade-like brilliance, all demonic afflictions were dispelled, and the divine *qi* harmonized with the *Dao*. At that moment, all men and women of that land were moved with reverence, receiving protection and attaining eternal life.

The *Dao* proclaims: At that time, when the *Yuánshǐ* Heavenly Venerable had spoken this *sūtra* once, the *Candid* (hòuqì) Great Heavenly Physician of the *Wújié Wúliàng* Infinite Measure of the Eastern Direction, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

At the second recitation, the *Holding the Course* (chíyùn) Great Heavenly Physician of the *Wújié Wúliàng* Infinite Measure of the Southern Direction, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

At the third recitation, the *Overseeing the Years* (sīnián) Great Heavenly Physician of the *Wújié Wúliàng* Infinite Measure of the Western Direction, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

At the fourth recitation, the *Fate-Ordaining* (dìngmìng) Great Heavenly Physician of the *Wújié Wúliàng* Infinite Measure of the Northern Direction, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

At the fifth recitation, the *Ghostly Sovereign* (guǐzhǔ) Great Heavenly Physician of the *Wújié Wúliàng* Infinite Measure of the Northeast Direction, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

At the sixth recitation, the *Disease-Conducting* (xíngbìng) Great Heavenly Physician of the *Wújié Wúliàng* Infinite Measure of the Southeast Direction, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

At the seventh recitation, the *Pestilence-Warding* (quèlì) Great Heavenly Physician of the *Wújié Wúliàng* Infinite Measure of the Southwest Direction, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

At the eighth recitation, the *Eight Winds* (bāfēng) Great Heavenly Physician of the *Wújié Wúliàng* Infinite Measure of the Northwest Direction, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

At the ninth recitation, the *Tàiyī* Great Heavenly Physician of the *Wújié Wúliàng* Infinite Measure of the Upper Direction, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

At the tenth recitation, the *Expedient* (chúbìng) Great Heavenly Physician of the *Wújié Wúliàng* Infinite Measure of the Lower Direction, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, arrived upon the void.

When the ten recitations were complete, the ten directional *Wújié* Heavenly Physicians, all Universal Savior Great Deities, gathered simultaneously. All men and women of that land bowed in devotion and adoration.

They declared: *"We, by virtue of our blessings, were born in the heavens, not like the impure forms of mortal parents' essence and blood. What illnesses could we possibly have?"*

Thus, they reflected upon the divine *qi*: Though its transformations were clear and harmonious, their own minds, contaminated by habitual defilements, still harbored gross afflictions within their bodies, and their sufferings had not yet been dispelled.

*"It is like the common folk in the world, who in their dreams drink, eat, feel cold or warmth, and rest—just as they do in waking life. The body in the dream is no different from the one now shaped by their mortal parents. Even to the point of illnesses within the dream-body—pain, itch, sorrow, or joy—all manifest in the same manner, with no distinction.*

*Therefore, even now, within our bodies, these illnesses and calamities, lameness and withering, still persist. We must seek the Heavenly Venerable to remove this itch (of suffering). All must pay homage and vow to revere the *Dao* before it."*

When they arrived, it was like a fine rain and dense mist—countless *Wúyāng* spirits, half of whose land had sunk into unevenness, which could not be restrained.

Thus, the *Yuánshǐ* knew that even these heavenly beings, who had attained their fruits, still bore the marks of illness, calamities, lameness, and withering. How much more so the myriad beings of the mortal realm, conceived through *tāihuà* (conception), nurtured by *shīgǎn* (humoral pathogens), and afflicted by the seventy-two categories of suffering—could they possibly escape this torment?

Out of boundless compassion, the *Yuánshǐ* spoke this wondrous *sūtra*, eliminating all afflictions. To remove all afflictions, there is no alternative but the *Dharma* and the *Yào* (medicinal elixirs). The marvel of these *Dharma* elixirs surpasses all divine *shéndān* (pills).

Then, the *Zǐguāng* (violet light) gathered, bright as a treasure flame, forming the five-wheel hand method. The *Yuánshǐ* personally fashioned a nine-colored *Líluó* (silken robe) adorned with myriad treasures, star clouds, and jade brocades, from which emerged a divine pill, transformed into a treasure pearl as large as a millet seed, suspended in the void five *zhàng* (fathoms) above the earth.

The *Yuánshǐ* ascended and summoned: The *Tàiyī* Great Heavenly Physician, the *Shàngshèng* Most Exalted, the *Pǔjì* Universal Savior, and the ten-directional *Wújié* Heavenly Physicians who eliminate illness, along with countless *Wúyāng* spirits, all entered the treasure pearl. The heavenly beings looked on in awe, only seeing a radiant glow issuing from the pearl’s mouth—then they vanished within it, their whereabouts unknown. The people of the land dispersed, and the earth returned to its level and rightful state, free from any tilt or depression.

The *Yuánshǐ* then, within the treasure pearl, completed the recitation of this *sūtra*. The myriad *zhēn* (true beings) supervised the transmission, bestowing it upon us. At that moment, the joy and celebration were beyond words.

The *sūtra*’s rites are now fully known. The myriad heavens reassumed their stations, and in a fleeting instant, all was silent, with no lingering echoes.

At that time, the heavenly beings and people encountered the *sūtra*’s Dao/Way, universally attaining salvation and deliverance, preserving their original life, and suffering no harm or interruption. The land was peaceful, its people abundant, all rejoicing in great harmony. The Dao/Way was spoken: their hearts were sincere, their words truthful, their compassion equal, their differences reconciled in kinship.

The land was secure, its people prosperous, delighting in eternal peace. The Dao/Way began to teach, and the realm was governed by its principles. Those with devout hearts revered and honored it, enduringly attaining deliverance for all.

The Dao/Way declared: The names spoken within the *Yuánshǐ* Heavenly Sovereign’s *sūtra* are all the hidden names of the Supreme Deities within the heavens. They are also the true taboos of the *Zhēnwáng* (True Kings), consuming illness and calamity, curing lameness and chronic afflictions. These are the secret names of the *Bǎiyīng* (Hundred Spirits) that rescue ailments and suppress malevolent *qi*, not the common words of this world.

The Most Exalted has become a *Zhēnrén* (True Person), transcending the five kinds of illness and calamity. Their *fǎshēn* (Dharma body) is vast and pure, radiating *chúnyáng* (pure yang) luminosity, able to conceal and reveal itself. When revealed, they manifest universally in the ten directions; when concealed, even the *shèngzhēn* (exalted and true) cannot fathom them. All diseases and afflictions of this world have been eradicated.

Those who delve into the profound and subtle attain full understanding of its chapters. Reciting it ten times, the myriad heavens resound in distant praise, the ten thousand *Dì* (Deities) offer homage, and the inner realms grow clear. The *éshān* (lofty mountains) flatten, the earth becomes level. Illness and calamity are cured, lameness and chronic afflictions fully healed. The body stands firm, unshaken, like the *yuè* (moon) and *rì* (sun) in perfect alignment. Demons are subdued, ghostly *yīng* (spirits) vanish entirely. The dead revive, the withered flourish anew, and the decayed regain human form.

Scholars of the highest learning, reciting it ten times, will see their five *zàng* (viscera) bloom with radiance, their gallbladder and brain solidify in truth. The myriad spirits will guard their bodies, while malevolent ghosts lose their sight. Even those on the brink of death will be rescued, turning from extinction to life. Yet this is because such scholars have not yet purified their defiled *qi*, nor fully realized their true bodies. Though they may restrain the ten directions, their power has not yet subdued the heavenly laws. Their virtue can only gradually suppress worldly suffering and revive those trapped in misery—it cannot fully restore them to life.

To recite this chapter lightly is to invite misfortune upon oneself. To honor and venerate the Dao/Way, however, will dissolve illness and calamity, ease lameness, and enable healthy movement. Across all generations, one’s fortunes will flourish, free from all evil associations, with divine spirits ever guarding the gates.

This *sūtra* is most sublime and wondrous, unmatched in the *Yùjīng* (Jade Capital), its power to deliver beings boundless. It stands as the supreme source of all Dao/Way teachings.

The Dao/Way declared: For those who recite this *sūtra* ten times, the myriad heavens will gather in response. All beings afflicted by illness and calamity will see their suffering vanish, while those burdened by chronic lameness or long-term sickness will be fully restored to health. Malevolent *qi* will have no sway, the hundred *mài* (vessels) will receive their vital essence. A thousand spirits will dwell within one’s body, never departing, and the body will know no sickness or blame. Natural longevity will follow, and even the ancestors of a hundred generations will be blessed. The tormented souls of the dead will find relief, all ascending to the *Zhūgōng* (Vermilion Palace) and attaining nine years of life. Those who receive the Dao/Way’s transformation will be reborn as noble beings.

For those who study this *sūtra* to its fullest, their virtue and power will be complete, and they shall become *shèngxiān* (immortals), ascending to the *Jīnquè* (Golden Gate) and feasting in the *Yùjīng* (Jade Capital). Through the *sūtra*’s sacred Dao/Way, illness and calamity are dissolved, lameness and chronic afflictions cured. Its blessings extend to countless people, ensuring ease and comfort for all living beings. Pain and suffering will not touch them, the Supreme Deities will gaze upon them favorably, and their true names will be recorded in heaven.

Scholars of the highest order, who practice and recite this *sūtra*, will possess the full Dao/Way of all teachings. Illness and calamity will be swept away, no evil *qi* will arise. Lameness will be cured, chronic afflictions fully absolved. All will ascend to the *Zhūgōng* (Vermilion Palace) and receive deliverance.

Those of this world who recite it will find peace even in their afflictions. The stagnant and filthy *qi* within their bodies will disperse, their innate luminosity and subtlety will unfold, and they will extend their years in life. Ultimately, they will attain the *shījiě* (corporeal dissolution) path, where the soul temporarily vanishes, bypassing the torments of the underworld, and immediately regains its form, wandering freely in the boundless void.

This *sūtra* is profound and subtle, its power to deliver beings infinite. All heavenly beings and people rejoice in its blessings, and its grace extends beyond life and death.

The heavens hold it as their most treasured text, not to be passed down to mortal generations. Only the most virtuous scholars, offering gold and jade in earnest devotion and swearing by heaven, may transmit it.

If this *sūtra* is leaked or treated with negligence, the misfortune will extend to the nine ancestral generations, and they will suffer endless servitude under the Three Officials.

The Five Emperors, along with twenty-four *yùtóng yùnǚ* (jade boys and jade girls), attend this *sūtra*, safeguarding its divine texts and protecting those who receive it.

The Dao/Way declared: During the first month, when *zhǎngqí* (long fasting) is observed, reciting and chanting this *sūtra* will dissolve chronic illness. Those afflicted by diseases accumulated over years, beyond the reach of worldly medicine, or by ghostly *qi* that bewilders even skilled physicians—whether through wisdom or folly, life or death—if they transmit and practice this *sūtra* as their predecessors did, the ancestral curses will be lifted. Ghostly *qi* will no longer haunt objects, nor will the spirits of the deceased invoke retribution. All will be delivered to the *Shàngnángōng* (Upper Southern Palace), free from suffering.

In the seventh month, during *zhǎngzhāi* (long fasting), reciting and chanting this *sūtra* will dissolve the *jīnwàngkèmù* (metallic excess subduing wood), where tendons fall and malevolent *qi* takes hold. Whether caused by earthly or wooden *qi*, or by burial sites, the harmful influences that assail the limbs—rendering hands and feet useless, causing lameness and paralysis, or leaving one mired in deep-rooted afflictions—will be judged in the *Dòugōng* (Fight Palace) and examined in the *Yīnfǔ* (Dark Office). None will suffer injury or severance, and all will attain immortality.

The names of this *sūtra* are inscribed by the heavens. With *huángjī* (yellow paper) and *báijiǎn* (white tablets), it records the deaths and rebirths of beings.

In the tenth month, during *zhǎngzhāi* (long fasting), reciting and chanting this *sūtra* for all living beings will dissolve illness and calamity. It will heal the *rénfēng* (human wind) and malevolent *qi*, chronic consumption and wasting diseases, lingering cold and heat, swollen joints and perspiration, water-induced coughing and inversions, and all manner of strange afflictions, bringing universal harmony.

It will benefit kings and emperors, their ministers and offspring, securing the stability of their realms and ensuring the heavens’ eternal preservation. Their lineage will never perish, and they will always remain as rulers, bringing peace to their lands. The people will proclaim an age of true harmony.

On the eight *jié* (solar festivals), reciting and chanting this *sūtra* will dissolve the human wind, malevolent *qi*, and poisonous diseases, granting the status of *Zhēnrén* (True Person) in the Nine Palaces.

On the day of one’s *běnmìng* (original fate), reciting and chanting this *sūtra* will dispel all manner of sickness. Ghostly calamities will have no power to invade, the soul’s essence will be tranquil, and all *qi* will endure. None will experience suffering, and the body will radiate luminosity.

「Guardians of the Three Realms, attendants of the Five Emperors, and myriad deities all pay homage—names inscribed in the heavens, virtue and power fully attained. Ascend to the Upper Pure.

The Dao/Way instructs: On the day of practice, all shall bathe in fragrant waters. Observe fasts and purifications before entering the chamber. Facing east, strike the teeth thirty-two times. Above, listen to the Thirty-two Heavens; within the heart, bow to the Thirty-two Transgressions. With eyes closed, quietly contemplate the self seated amid clouds of green, purple, and blue *qi*, inner and outer radiance complete. Beside you stand the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane, arrayed left and right. Sun and moon illuminate the chamber, their brilliance piercing through, with the Heavenly Physician and the Junior Clerk of the Moxa-stone at your fore and aft, their images forming on your neck. Light shines in all ten directions, so vivid and distinct.

The secret incantation proclaims:
*"Supreme Mysterious Origin, Most High Dao/Way Lord, summon forth from my body the Thirty-five *Gōngcáo* (Functionary Officials), left and right attendants, fragrant youth bearing incense, and the玉女 (*Yùnǚ*) messengers. The Five Emperors’ direct seals, the Thirty-six officials of the Auspicious Day, all stand ready. Open the gate to what is spoken. Today is a joyous and fortunate day, with prolonged fasting in a purified hall. As one practices this *sūtra*, countless beings are liberated. Reveal the joy of what is spoken to the Supreme Lion, the Thirty-two *Yāoyuán* (Primordial Deities) of the Beginning of the Dao/Way, the Most Venerable Few Before the Celestial Throne. When complete, draw *qi* from the thirty-two directions, face east, and recite the *sūtra*.

The *Sūtra* of the Primordial Beginning, Supreme Mysterious and Spiritually Precious Essentials—
Dissolving sickness, calamity, lameness, and atrophy,
Nurturing transformation and liberation for all,
A hundred banners conceal their subtle harmonies, their separation and union by nature.
This is the support of the body, the birth of spirit from the Great Void.
Spirit tranquil and formless, without the Supreme True One.
The Primordial Ancestor of the Kalpa (eon),
Transforming and giving birth to all *Yāo* (Primordial Deities).
Heaven descends, earth ascends, yin and yang generate humanity.
Humans serve as the embryonic seed; sickness and calamity arise from causes and conditions.
Examining and punishing lameness and atrophy, accumulating retribution through entanglements,
Feeding on the Three Scenes (of existence).
Life is rooted in heaven’s decree.
Once sickness and calamity are dispelled, spirit and *qi* become neighbors—
Mystic enlightenment leads to transcendence, raising the intent to soar as spirit.
Above, there is no further ancestor, only the Dao/Way as the self.
The Five Characters (of the Dao/Way) open the expanse,
Nurturing all divine essences—none remain unilluminated.
Without the Five Characters, there is no illumination,
Without the Five Characters, there is no standing,
Without the Five Characters, there is no completion.
Without the Five Characters, there is no liberation,
Without the Five Characters, there is no birth."*

This is the Great Brahman, the Heaven within Heaven.
The Nioluo Xiaotai, the Jade Mountain’s Upper Capital.

Supreme Beyond the Supreme,
The Great Luo’s Pure Clarity.

The Nine Ranks of Immortal Saints—
Natural beings by nature.
Illnesses of the body, latent afflictions—
All attain peace.

Unattained is the Great Vehicle,
Yet sickness and calamity cling.
Refining the body into *qi*,
Refining *qi* into spirit—
Spirit merges with the Supreme Void,
As if nonexistent, as if present.

The Three Floras depart,
A wondrous palace emerges—
Golden gates, jade halls,
Forest of pure mists.

The Dao’s true *qi* encircles the Ten Directions.
Within it, the God who rescues sickness and calamity, lameness and atrophy,
The Southern Pole Emperor of Eternal Life,
The God of the World’s Salvation, Marshal of the Age,
The Benevolent Lord Han, Master of Life,
The Southern Sovereign of Fate, Lord of the Blade, Extending Longevity, Benefiting Calculations, and Removing Calamities.

Reviving the corpse, raising the dead—
Infinite salvation.

Today’s registration—
All the Heavens attend the hall.
The Eastern **Wují** God-King who dispels sickness and calamity,
The Great Saint of Eternal Life, saving infinitely.
The Southern **Wují** God-King who dispels evil pestilence,
The Great Saint of Eternal Life, saving infinitely.
The Western **Wují** God-King who dispels lopsided lameness,
The Great Saint of Eternal Life, saving infinitely.
The Northern **Wují** God-King who dispels entangled afflictions,
The Great Saint of Eternal Life, saving infinitely.
The Northeast **Wují** God-King who dispels worldly suffering,
The Great Saint of Eternal Life, saving infinitely.
The Southeast **Wují** God-King who dispels stagnant *qi*,
The Great Saint of Eternal Life, saving infinitely.
The Southwest **Wují** God-King who dispels consumption,
The Great Saint of Eternal Life, saving infinitely.
The Northwest **Wují** God-King who dispels karmic retribution,
The Great Saint of Eternal Life, saving infinitely.
The Upper **Wují** God-King who dispels manifest illness,
The Great Saint of Eternal Life, saving infinitely.
The Lower **Wují** God-King who dispels mental affliction,
The Great Saint of Eternal Life, saving infinitely.
The Ten-Directional **Wují** God-King who dispels sickness, calamity, lameness, and atrophy,
The Great Saint of Infinite Salvation—
All riding swift clouds and lightning,
Crimson phoenix chariots,
Accompanied by Heavenly Immortals,
Spirit Officials and Divine Attendants,
Standing directly before the gods,
Yoked to great beasts—heavenly deer and qilong,
Crimson banners and jade standards,
Crystal shafts and emerald feathers—
Before them, the **Hàotàng** and **Tóngxiào** resound in harmony,
Behind them, the **yǔn** and **lì** pipes chime in unison,
Singing celestial melodies, whistling ethereal tunes,
The **Tianding** clear the path, their green locks and winged chariots,
Ten thousand chariots, a hundred thousand cavalry,
Floating through the void, their radiance returning—
Removing sickness, saving lives,
The Heavenly Chancellors,
The Southern Palace’s Upper Hall,
Han the Record-Keeper,
The Supervising God of Life,
Holding sacred tablets and registers,
All assembled before the Emperor.

As needed for salvation,
Severely inspecting the Heavens.
Proclaiming to the Three Realms,
The **Wují** Divine Homeland.

The **Quánqǔ** Bureau, the Northern Capital of **Luòng**,
The Three Officials, Nine Offices,
The Twelve River Plains.

Above, resolving corpse-registers and tomb disputes,
Accumulated retributions passed down through ages,
Illnesses of the starved and pestilential ghosts,
Ancestral *qi*, lameness, and atrophy,
Entangled past deeds—
And the ancestral and ancestral-kins,
All sins erased, evil roots extinguished.
No longer bound, no longer forced into ghostly crowds.
The **Yuánshǐ** talismans—
Ascending promotions at the appointed hour.

The Northern Cold Pool,
Guarding the forms and souls.
Subduing demons, recommending the worthy,
Salvaging the Nine Ranks in the Southern Palace,
Dead souls refined, transformed into immortals.
Living bodies saved—
Eon upon eon, eternally preserved.
With the eons’ wheel turning,
Lifespan equal to the heavens.
Forever transcending the Three Calamities,
The Nine Hardships and Eight Difficulties,
Soaring beyond the Three Realms,
Adrift in Upper Clarity.

The Upper Clarity Heaven,

Wind and fire erupt,

The **Three Officials** of **Northern Fu**,

A universal proclamation,

Speak to the **Upper Purity**.
The **Donghuang** of **Yujue**,
The **Longhan** of **Yankang**.

Above, no visible form,
Below, no abyssal depth.
The **Wind Void** moves the **Empty**,

Heaven above, Earth below—
No darkness, no obscurity,
No form, no shadow,
No limit, no end.
The **Boundless Great Brahman**,
Vast and formless,
**Zhiming** unfurls the diagram,
The **Heavenly Revolutions** proceed naturally.

**The Jade Emperor gazes in awe, the gathered immortals speak in unison.**
**Measure your merit to attain the rank of Immortal—**
**The ten thousand *qi* are forever harmonized and perfected.**
**Illness arises from past karma,**
**Your *hun* departs to the Ghostly Bureau.**
**In vain do you summon your disciples,**
**To suffer grief and bitter sorrow.**
**You fail to grasp the formless Dao,**
**Endlessly revolving through birth and death.**
**Seeing the Dao yet clinging to emptiness,**
**Your spirit flees to the Jade Capital’s peaks.**

**At that time, the enlightened sage—**
**No evil trial shall touch him.**
