**The Second Chapter of Universal Salvation by the True Person**
**The Azure Dragon of *Kui*, clad in dark armor,**
**With ten-zhang steel whiskers.**
**Devouring ten thousand ghosts,**
**No evil or pestilence remains.**
**Plague and poison darken the eyes,**
**The *yinyuan* swiftly drives them away.**
**Summoning the Heavenly Host,**
**Divine officials execute them.**
**By the records and decrees,**
**The Nine Abysses are traversed with peril.**

---

**Why do you linger with decaying *qi*?**
**Feigning form and plotting in vain.**
**Entering the blood and meridians of mortals,**
**Obstructing their sacred abodes.**
**Stalling the flow of *qi*,**
**Becoming a mere corpse’s ghost.**
**Through dreams and thoughts, you connect with the *yinyuan*,**
**Your intentions sensed by the dark spirits.**
**You alter their forms and attire,**
**Disrupting the Yellow Palace’s order.**
**You fail to awaken to this,**
**Sitting in pride with others.**
**Your name is inscribed in the Northern *Ting* registers,**
**And your retribution shall never cease.**

**Why not dwell in mountain forests,**
**Reflecting on the Dao to perfect yourself?**
**I traverse the Purple Mist’s path,**
**Residing in the Yellow Court to save suffering.**
**The Third Chapter: The Great Sage of Longevity’s Song to Lift the Lame and the Afflicted**

**A thousand *ren* tall jade-green mountain,**
**Ten thousand banners of flying fire.**
**The Tiger’s Ridge controls the bowstrings,**
**The *He* river’s *li* beats the drum.**
**The Great God rides the clouds,**
**Stars stream like lightning.**
**Gazing down upon the *Aluoren*,**
**They rise yet fall again.**
**Evil *qi* withers their bones,**
**Their sinews twist into family calamity.**
**The *baifeng* wastes their limbs,**
**The *zhaigui* makes them drag their bodies.**

**They do not know their past karma’s cause,**
**Their true hearts drowned in dust.**
**Greed, anger, doubt, and false views—**
**These ties bind them.**
**They sacrifice lives to appease ghosts and gods,**
**Their deaths sealed in the *Xuansha* prison,**
**A hundred million years—**
**When shall they be freed?**

**You must awaken to the Dao’s mysteries,**
**The wondrous *Xuan* shall birth your spirit.**
**Naturally, there is no death or life,**
**Forever a Pure and High Immortal.**
**Adrift in the art of *Wuwei*,**
**The utmost Yang sustains your endless essence.**
**Above the Three Realms,**
**Within the flying void—**
**The True King’s sacred hymn,**
**Its resonance matching the *Dongzhang*.**

**Recite it a hundred times,**
**And all illnesses shall vanish.**
**Recite it a thousand times,**
**And all karmic ties shall be severed.**
**A myriad times, the Dao is realized,**
**Universal salvation for all beings.**
**Ascend to the Great Void,**
**Transcend the Three Realms,**
**Rank among the Immortals of the Bureau.**
**Those who hear this sacred sound—**
**Ten thousand demons are bound in form,**
**The *Diyu* spirits obey the command,**
**Escorting and welcoming with reverence,**
**Drawn forth from the earthly gate,**
**Free from the five sufferings and eight hardships,**
**The seven ancestors ascend in merit,**
**Forever parted from the Ghostly Bureau,**
**The *hun* passes through the *Zhuling*,**
**Refined and reborn anew.**

**This is called the boundless salvation,**
**Universal deliverance without end.**

**There is a secret celestial diagram,**
**Revered by all the heavens.**
**To reveal it in arrogance or negligence—**
**You shall fall into hell,**
**And your misfortune shall extend to the seven ancestral spirits.**

**The Dao declares:**
**These two chapters are from the Celestial Sovereigns of all the heavens,**
**And the most sacred immortals,**
**To dispel diseases and plagues,**
**To cure the lame and the afflicted,**
**To illuminate the original *Zhenyuan*,**
**The primordial, unchanging Dao,**
**With no alteration or decline.**
**The retribution for illness—**
**All from karmic ties,**
**Endlessly cycling through habits,**
**The *qi* transforming accordingly.**
**Thus there are groans and pains,**
**Such as these.**

**Refining the spirit and penetrating the void,**
**A hundred million *jie* of endless time,**
**Not entering the cycle,**
**The body attains the True Person’s essence,**
**No birth, no death.**

**Hidden sacred sounds—**
**All are the words of the Great Brahman,**
**Not the common speech of the world.**
**No rhyme nor ornate melody,**
**No harmonious tune nor decorative verse.**
**Thus called the profound mysteries,**
**Difficult to trace or discern.**
**Treasure of the heavens above,**
**Secreted in the *Shenxiao* True King’s palace,**
**To be revealed in the *Yuanji* Three Thousand Eight Hundred years of cosmic alignment.**
**If a sage brings a golden treasure with a sincere heart,**
**According to the old format,**
**And pledges with the Three Heavens,**
**Then it shall be granted.**

**The Dao declares:**
**When the heavens and earth fall ill,**
**There are earthquakes and landslides,**
**Floods and droughts,**
**Winds and hail—**
**The cosmic cycles falter and terminate.**
**When the sun, moon, and Five Stars fall ill,**
**They are eclipsed or diminished,**
**Their light obscured or wan.**
**Even the most sacred divine beings,**
**Though abandoning the cause of illness,**
**Free from worldly afflictions,**
**May still have periods of rest or concealment,**
**Following the rise and fall of the cycles.**
**The shallow scholars too may suffer sickness.**
**All who face such calamities—**
**Those of shared *qi* must unite in heart to practice fasting,**
**Burn incense at the six times,**
**Recite the scriptures ten thousand times,**
**And virtue shall descend to dispel all inauspiciousness.**

**The boundless scriptures,**
**Universal salvation without end.**
**The Dao declares:**
**The shallow scholars, their Dao weak,**
**Or their immortality not yet fulfilled,**
**When diseases cling and the lame drag their feet,**
**They may retreat in true thought,**
**Saying the Dao has no power.**
**If fellow scholars and sages practice fasting for them,**
**And recite the scriptures ten thousand times,**
**According to the proper method—**
**Then the spirit-*qi* flows and circulates,**
**Ascending and descending,**
**True nature awakens,**
**Illness dissolves.**
**By their merit and practice,**
**The healing shall be measured in days,**
**Their lifespan extended forever,**
**And they shall attain immortality.**

**The Dao declares:**
**When the heavens and earth’s cycles conclude,**
**The stars’ courses are disrupted,**
**The sun and moon lose their appointed times,**
**The four seasons falter,**
**Yin and Yang are unbalanced,**
**And the realm faces disaster—**
**Then plagues arise in all directions,**
**Epidemics spread,**
**The people suffer death and injury,**
**The teacher and disciple are lost in floods,**
**Or perish in the chaos,**
**Their bodies wracked with pain.**
**All must practice fasting,**
**Burn incense, and recite the scriptures.**

**Fasting and reciting the scriptures—**
**Their merit is profound.**
**Above, it dispels celestial calamities,**
**And secures the safety of the realm.**
**Below, it wards off poison and harm,**
**And delivers the people.**
**Life and death depend upon it,**
**Their blessings are immeasurable.**
**Thus it is called boundless salvation,**
**Universal deliverance for both heaven and man.**

**The Dao declares:**
**All who possess this scripture,**
**May perform these merits for the heavens, earth, and all beings.**
**On days of calamity,**
**With sincere intent, they fast and burn incense,**
**Recite the scriptures ten thousand times,**
**And all illnesses and afflictions—**
**Shall be utterly destroyed.**
**The heavens record their names,**
**Ten thousand gods stand guard,**
**Distinguishing them from the common sages,**
**And they shall be worthy to serve as ministers beneath the Golden Gate of the Holy Sovereign.**

**The heavens record every person’s merits and sins,**
**With no loss of even a hair’s breadth.**
**The Heavenly Demon Kings shall also recommend you,**
**And those who attain the Dao must understand these sacred truths.**

**In the heavens’ midst, the Great Brahman speaks in hidden, boundless sounds.**
**Composed by the Dao Sovereign.**
**The Middle Section of the *Yuanji* Scriptures for Dispelling Illness and Affliction,**
**From the Eastern Eight Heavens.**

**Holy Response Shines Resplendent,**
**Auspicious Blessings Flow Unbroken.**
**Heaven’s Grace Descends in Subtle Light,**
**Reverent Harmony Aligns with the Central Dao.**

**Teachings Shift Like the *Yì*’s Symbols,**
**Yet the Supreme Truth Remains Distant.**
**Exalted Virtues Unmatched,**
**Their Brilliance Echoes in Celestial Decrees.**

**Spirit’s Essence, Qi’s Profound Depth,**
**The Dao’s Pure Intent Unveiled.**
**Proclaiming Laws to Nurture Life,**
**Rescuing the Frail and the Weak.**

**Assisting Heaven’s Sacred Spirits,**
**Expanding Mercy to All.**

**Insight Pierces the Void,**
**Longevity’s Blessings Spread Endless.**

**Southern Eight Heavens**
**Divine Winds Dispel the Mists,**
**Brahman’s Peak Mirrors the Profound.**

**No Boundaries, No Depths Uncrossed,**
**Flowing Springs Beyond Measure.**
**Sacrificial Might Turns the Fount,**
**Fists of Qi Stir the Abyss.**

**Aspirations Cross the Seas,**
**Silencing Demons’ Dark Arts.**
**Nine Dews Descend in Command,**
**Precision Sacrifices the Precise.**

**Radiant Transmission Spreads Verdant,**
**Life’s Splendor Shines Like the *Lìbān*.**
**Owl’s Fang, Public Decrees,**
**Pivotal Mechanisms Govern the South.**

**Crimson Elixirs Blaze,**
**Excessive Hair’s Wild Flight.**

**Western Eight Heavens**
**The Feminine Gate’s Jade Halts,**
**Hooked Flags Stir the Vapors.**
**Yellow’s Veil Enwraps the Cluster,**
**Ghostly Wells Shake the Dipper.**

**Darkness Cleanses the Marsh,**
**First Among None—*Nātharā*.**
**Uniting Gods and Immortals,**
**No *Ālū* nor *Liúdāo* Remains.**

**Mighty *Huānyú* Declares,**
**Lofty Peaks Tower—*Éqǐ Yóuyóu*.**
**Piercing the Supreme Craftsman,**
**Black *Gēng* Struggles with the *Qiú*.**

**Northern Eight Heavens**
**Fish Bend in Mystic Depths,**
**The Female *Huán* Battles the Dipper.**
**Cypress and Hemp at Dawn’s First Light,**
**True Sovereign’s Seal at *Yǒu*.**

**Misty Rivers Conceal the Void,**
**Barbarian’s Humble Offerings Ascend.**
**Earth’s Ribbons Bind the Spleen,**
**Summoning Crimson’s Noble Hour.**

**Moon’s God Adorns the Jade,**
**Branches Fly, Scrutinizing *Zhōu*.**
**Swallows Rest in the Mangrove’s Glow,**
**Leopard’s Delay Marks the Canvas.**

**Awakening Obscurity’s Duality,**
**Chaos and Authority Merge.**

***Āwéi* Ascends as Supreme Sage.**

**The Dao Speaks:**
Within the heavens’ midst, the Great Brahman’s hidden sounds resound—
**Boundless, ineffable tones.**

**The ancient text, inscribed with crimson and gold on the finest bristles,**
**Was written upon the Northern Expanse of the Purple Hall’s celestial gate,**
**Where the Dao’s Qi descends to the *Miànsù*’s starry tail,**
**To heal all illnesses, afflictions, and deformities,**
**To repay past misdeeds,**
**To dissolve entangling curses, grievances, and debts of *qi*,**
**So that virtue may be self-bestowed,**
**And sickness utterly erased.**

**This scripture—traced by the *Fèngjì* and *Lóngjì*’s marks—**
**Each character spanning a full ten feet—**
**Was originally inscribed by the Eastern Flower’s Senior Attendant, the Azure Youth Dao Sovereign,**
**As the true phonetic standard.**

**Those who know its sounds and recite them in fasting devotion,**
**The heavens dispatch flying celestial clerks to observe their merit,**
**And report upward to the gods,**
**Where ten thousand spirits pay homage,**
**Earthly spirits guard the gates,**
**Great merit ascends to the Celestial Pivot,**
**And the worthy are recommended as Supreme Immortals.**

**Thus, the Dao is complete—**
**Wandering the Three Realms, ascending to the Golden Gate.**

**This sound repels all, averts all, transcends all, achieves all—**
**The natural sound of Heavenly Purity.**

**Therefore, when recited, the flying clerks descend to observe,**
**The Supreme Sovereign sings afar,**
**Ten thousand gods pay homage,**
**The Three Realms attend the hall,**
**All spirits bow in reverence.**

**Demon essences flee,**
**Jade chimes resound,**
**The Ten Directions grow serene,**
**Rivers and seas fall silent,**
**Mountains swallow their mists,**
**All beings tremble in submission,**
**Summoning the gathered immortals,**
**Heaven knows no filth,**
**Earth no profane dust,**
**The Dark Wisdom clears—**
**Great Compassion, profound and boundless.**

**The Forty-Ninth Scroll of the *Língbǎo Wúliàng Dùrén Shàngpǐn Miàojīng* concludes.**
**The Fiftieth Scroll begins.**

**The Fifty-First Scroll of the *Língbǎo Wúliàng Dùrén Shàngpǐn Miàojīng* commences.**
**The Scroll of the Daoic Declaration on the Dissolution of Water and Fire Calamities and Plagues.**

**The Dao speaks thus:**
In days of old, within the **Purple Primordial Treasure** of **Supreme Heaven**, the **Void of the Jade Sound** ascended in radiant splendor, receiving the **Mysterious Daoic Scripture** of **Primordial Beginning** to dissolve water and fire calamities and plagues.

When **Primordial Beginning Heavenly Sovereign** spoke this sutra, He circled ten times through the **Ten Passages**, summoning the **Ten Directions** to gather at His seat. The **Heavenly Purity Great Deity**, the **Supreme Sage High Sovereign**, the **Mysterious Daoic True Person**, and countless **innumerable hosts** descended upon the void. Their **auspicious mists** gathered in the sky, their **divine qi** wafted in hues, borne by **jewel-wheeled celestial palanquins**.

The **flowering canopy** cast its shade,
A myriad scenes condensed into light,
Ten thousand precious colors illuminated the boundless expanse,
Seven days and seven nights of resplendent radiance.
All **Heavenly Hosts** moved in measured steps,
The sun and moon revolved in their courses,
Their brilliance converged as one.
The **starry lodges** and **celestial spheres** paused in their orbits,
The **Azure Mountains** layered in peaks,
The **Divine Sea** still in waves,
Heaven draped in **immortal clouds**,
Earth formed of **jade and pearl**,
Towers and gates extended in splendor,
Dragons scaled the heights, phoenixes danced in flight,
White **lingzhi mushrooms** and crimson **sangzhi trees** bore offerings of fragrant dew,
Emerald shadows and golden splendor—
The whole world shared in its hue.

The **innumerable hosts** of **True Ones** attended His seat,
And **Primordial Beginning Heavenly Sovereign** sat in mystical repose above the **Nine-Colored True Dragon** of the floating void.

After one recitation of the sutra,
All **Heavenly Great Sages** simultaneously praised its excellence.
At that time, men and women of the land,
Joyfully listening to the **Heavenly Sovereign’s** proclamation of the **Great Daoic Law** to dissolve water and fire calamities and plagues,
And to **compassionately save** the **Three Realms** without measure.

After two recitations,
Heaven shook, its **jade brush** sweeping wide,
The **Dragon’s Vision** enveloped all.

After three recitations,
The **Celestial River** poured forth its light,
**Dark Pearls** drifted like rain.

After four recitations,
Waters surged, fires descended,
Transformations unfolded in their natural course.

After five recitations,
Calamities and plagues ceased to arise,
The **effulgent cycle** extended far.

After six recitations,
**Yin** was balanced, **Yang** harmonized,
The **qi** knew no suppression or excess.

After seven recitations,
The **Mixed Primordial** revealed its power,
The **Divine Pattern** flourished in abundance.

After eight recitations,
The **Void’s Essence** was refined in **emptiness**,
The **True Deities** shone in clarity.

After nine recitations,
A **golden platform** rose from the depths,
The **gods and immortals** gazed down in reverence.

After ten recitations,
**Dried corpses** regained their flesh,
**Darkened souls** found illumination,
And at that time, men and women of the land,
All without exception, turned their hearts in devotion.
Each received **protection and guidance**,
All attained **eternal life**.

**The Dao speaks thus:**
At that time, when **Primordial Beginning Heavenly Sovereign** recited the sutra once,
The **Great Deity of Limitless Boundless** from the **East** arrived, with **innumerable hosts** descending upon the void.
After two recitations,
The **Jade-Historied Great Deity of Limitless Boundless** from the **South** arrived, with **innumerable hosts** descending upon the void.
After three recitations,
The **Great Deity of Planting the Kalpa** of **Limitless Boundless** from the **West** arrived, with **innumerable hosts** descending upon the void.
After four recitations,
The **Great Deity of Conquering the Kalpa** of **Limitless Boundless** from the **North** arrived, with **innumerable hosts** descending upon the void.
After five recitations,
The **Great Deity of Weighty Measure** of **Limitless Boundless** from the **Northeast** arrived, with **innumerable hosts** descending upon the void.
After six recitations,
The **Great Deity of Governing Water** of **Limitless Boundless** from the **Southeast** arrived, with **innumerable hosts** descending upon the void.
After seven recitations,
The **Great Deity of Extinguishing Fire** of **Limitless Boundless** from the **Southwest** arrived, with **innumerable hosts** descending upon the void.
After eight recitations,
The **Great Deity of Dissolving Calamities** of **Limitless Boundless** from the **Northwest** arrived, with **innumerable hosts** descending upon the void.
After nine recitations,
The **Great Deity of Transmuting Plagues** of **Limitless Boundless** from **Above** arrived, with **innumerable hosts** descending upon the void.
After ten recitations,
The **Great Deity of Receiving the Kalpa’s Aid** of **Limitless Boundless** from **Below** arrived, with **innumerable hosts** descending upon the void.

When the tenfold recitation was complete,
The **Heavenly Purity Great Deities** of the **Ten Directions** all gathered at once.
Men and women of the land turned their hearts in reverence,
Each offering **precious rarities**—
Divine incense, wondrous robes,
Infinite **Daoic implements**,
Banners, flags, and parasols,
Jade pendants and pearled tassels,
Like clouds massed and rain pouring thick.
The **innumerable hosts** bowed in **topknot homage**,
Praising the **Heavenly Sovereign**,
Eager to hear the **Great Law**.

Thus, **Primordial Beginning** caressed the **cloud-carved jade table**,
Waved the **purple-gold elixir dust** from His **celestial brush**,
And with a downward glance, spoke to the **tenfold assembly** of **Heavenly Beings**:
*"I, from the beginning, shaped the **Mixed Primordial**,
Generated the **Two Principles**,
Commanded **Yin** and **Yang**,
First sealed the **Supreme Heavenly Sovereign** above—
**Green-Ling Upper True One**, **Green-Ling Heavenly Sovereign**,
**Green-Heaven Emperor**, **Green-Flower Emperor**,
**Azure-Flower Great Emperor**, **Green-Ling Heavenly Sovereign**,
**Pine-Soil Great Emperor**, **Nine-Old Immortal Capital Sovereign**,
**Upper Attendant Green Boy**, and the **Three Officials of Eastern Splendor**.
They **measured and balanced** water and fire,
Fixed and pacified the **kalpas’ cycles**,
And gathered at the **Nine-Five Eight-Six Assembly**."*

The **earth’s sustaining threads** span
**Three hundred thirty-three thousand three hundred thirty-three billion** leagues.

The south and north decrease by a thousand *li*,
The east and west increase by a thousand *li*.
From the earth’s surface to half the sky,
The **Eight Extremes** of **Just Wind** stretch—
Thus too the earth’s depths conform.

Uniting and expanding, all-encompassing,
Its measure is the **Hook-and-Stock** [method].
The **Suspended Heaven’s Gnomon** marks,
The **Earth’s Instrument** aligns—
A shift of a thousand *li* yields an inch,
Approximating Heaven’s breadth: **three hundred sixty-six million *li***.
Seeking it with ten thousand heavens
Cannot measure its extent.

**Nine Qi** of the Azure Sky,
Heaven has **Nine Primordials**.
The **Nine Primordials** cycle through **Thirty-Two Revolutions**,
Day and night span thirty days,
One exchange of **Heavenly Qi**—
Twelve exchanges make one degree.
**Three hundred thirty degrees**—
The **Heavenly Qi Kings** rule over **Wood**,
Their count reaching **Tiger-Hare** [leap].
**Three thousand three hundred degrees**—
**Green Qi** surges, **Yellow Qi** wanes,
The **Nine-Nine** of **Yang**’s tally—
Heaven’s apex, called **Lesser Yang Nine**.
**Six Heavenly Qi** ascend,
Hundreds of officials gather—
Called **Lesser Hundred Six**.
This **Heavenly Qi** surges in the **Fire Palace**,
In **Snake-Midday** years, pestilence spreads.

**Nine thousand nine hundred degrees**—
**Green Qi** erupts, **Yellow Qi** decays.
The **Nine-Nine** of **Yang**—
Called **Greater Yang Nine**,
**Six Heavenly Qi** reverse,
Hundreds of spirits withdraw—
Called **Greater Hundred Six**.
This **Heavenly Qi** erupts in the **Metal Palace**,
In **Monkey-Rooster** years, war and pestilence march together.

**Three Qi** of the **Crimson Sky**,
Cycle through **Three hundred sixty degrees**,
The **Heavenly Qi Kings** rule over **Fire**,
Their count reaching **Snake-Midday**.
**Three thousand three hundred degrees**—
**Red Qi** surges, **White Qi** wanes,
This is **Lesser Yang Nine**, **Lesser Hundred Six**.
**Heavenly Qi** surges in the **Earth Palace**,
In **Dragon-Sheep-Ox-Horse** years,
Fire stirs within the earth.

**Nine thousand nine hundred degrees**—
**Red Qi** erupts, **White Qi** decays,
This is called **Greater Yang Nine**, **Greater Hundred Six**.
**Heavenly Qi** erupts in the **Water Palace**,
In **Rat-Pig** years, great floods arise.

**Central One Qi**, the **Yellow Sky**,
Cycles through **Three hundred thirty degrees**,
The **Heavenly Qi Kings** rule over **Earth**,
Their count reaching **Dragon-Sheep-Ox-Horse**.
**Three thousand three hundred degrees**—
**Yellow Qi** surges, **Black Qi** wanes,
This is **Lesser Yang Nine**, **Lesser Hundred Six**.
**Heavenly Qi** surges in the **Metal Palace**,
In **Monkey-Rooster** years, miasma and pestilence rage.

**Nine thousand nine hundred degrees**—
**Yellow Qi** erupts, **Black Qi** decays,
This is called **Greater Yang Nine**, **Greater Hundred Six**.
**Heavenly Qi** erupts in the **Wood Palace**,
In **Tiger-Hare** years, rivers overflow,
Plagues and calamities arise together.

**Seven Qi** of the **Unadorned Sky**,
Cycles through **Three hundred sixty degrees**,
The **Heavenly Qi Kings** rule over **Metal**,
Their count reaching **Monkey-Rooster**,
Nations prosper, people thrive.

**Three thousand three hundred degrees**—
**White Qi** surges, **Green Qi** wanes,
This is **Lesser Yang Nine**, **Lesser Hundred Six**.
**Heavenly Qi** surges in the **Water Palace**,
In **Rat-Pig** years, peoples drift adrift,
All perish young.

**Nine thousand nine hundred degrees**—
**White Qi** erupts, **Green Qi** decays,
This is called **Greater Yang Nine**, **Greater Hundred Six**.
**Heavenly Qi** erupts in the **Fire Palace**,
In **Snake-Midday** years, **Red Anomalies** blaze,
Calamities and sicknesses worsen.

**Five Qi** of the **Mysterious Sky**,
Cycles through **Three hundred sixty degrees**,
The **Heavenly Qi Kings** rule over **Water**,
Their count reaching **Rat-Pig**.
**Three thousand three hundred degrees**—
**Black Qi** surges, **Red Qi** wanes,
This is **Lesser Yang Nine**, **Lesser Hundred Six**.
**Heavenly Qi** surges in the **Wood Palace**,
In **Tiger-Hare** years, waters surge and burst,
Peoples perish young.

**Nine thousand nine hundred degrees**—
**Black Qi** erupts, **Red Qi** decays,
This is called **Greater Yang Nine**, **Greater Hundred Six**.
**Heavenly Qi** erupts in the **Earth Palace**,
In **Dragon-Sheep-Ox-Horse** years,
Great droughts shall follow.

The **Five Directions’ Revolutions**,
Thirty-Two Revolutions complete.
**Nine thousand nine hundred degrees** circle—
The **Five Directions’ Qi** all ascend,
**Primordial Green-Yang Qi** returns.
**Soul-Treasury Mystic Capital**,
**Jade-Peace Mountain’s midst**,
Circuits all heavens,
Sun, moon, star hosts—
Beyond the **Ten Voids**.

**Nine hundred ninety-nine million nine hundred ninety-nine degrees**—
**Heavenly Qi** surges,
At the **Kalpa’s exchange**, Heaven and Earth regenerate—
This is the **Dao** of **Water-Fire** transformation.
Only those who **dissolve and transmute** may
Pacify calamities and plagues.

Thus, the **Dao** has its **Nine-One**,
Heaven its **Nine-One**,
Earth its **Nine-One**,
Humans its **Nine-One**.
The **Four Nines** combine—
**Thirty-Six Qi** total.
Gathering **Thirty-Six Heavens**,
Each transforms and gives birth.
**Nine-One, Nine-Nine**—
**Eighty-One Primordial Qi**.
The **Void** has **Eighty-One Dao-Qi**,
Heaven has **Eighty-One Sacred Heavens**,
Earth has **Eighty-One True Qi**,
Humans have **Eighty-One Immortal Qi**—
Gathering **Three Hundred Sixty Qi**.
The **Dao** has **Three Hundred Sixty** void, natural, empty, mysterious ways,
Heaven has **Three Hundred Sixty** sacred transformations,
Earth has **Three Hundred Sixty** cavernous truths,
Humans have **Three Hundred Sixty** bone-joint soaring, flying-immortal transformations—
These are the divisions of the **Three Hundred Sixty Qi**.

Above, **Thirty-Six Voids**,
Midst, **Thirty-Six Heavens**,
Below, **Thirty-Six Earths**.
Mysterious transformations in humans yield **Thirty-Six Portals**.
The **Dao** has **Thirty-Six Thousand** divine, mysterious symbols,
Heaven has **Thirty-Six Thousand** cloud-constructed palaces,
Earth has **Thirty-Six Thousand** caverns,
Humans have **Thirty-Six Thousand** divine cognizances.
The **Dao** is the **Mysterious Void’s** utmost essence,
Humans are Heaven and Earth’s utmost spirit—
Also the transformations of **Water-Fire**.

When Heaven and Earth reach the **kalpa’s** exhaustion,
Water-Fire plagues arise.
Only the **Supreme Sage**, the **Highest Exalted Ones**,
The **Heavenly Emperors**,
Can pacify and harmonize.
Then the **kalpa** knows no end,
Water-Fire suffer no eruption or decay.

In the world, Water-Fire plagues
Are pacified only by **Daoic Sage-Kings**,
**Virtuous** worthy ministers.
In the human body, Water-Fire plagues
Are pacified only by **Serene Tranquility** and **Non-Action**,
Lowering Fire, raising Water.

None but the **Supreme True** highest scholars
Can know this—
The **Great Dao** of dissolving and transforming
Water-Fire plagues.

The **Primordial Beginning**’s teaching now complete,
The gathered **True Ones** overseeing salvation,
Passed it all to me—
At that moment, joy and celebration beyond words.

The **Law’s** rites now roughly fulfilled,
The **Heavens’** ranks restored,
In a flash—
Silence, no lingering echoes.

Then, **Heavenly Beings** and mortals met the **Sutra’s** Law,
All attained deliverance,
Their original years preserved—
None harmed in between.

The land’s people turned in reverence,
All recognizing the **Dao’s** essence,
For **Water-Fire qi** was balanced in harmony.

**Heaven and Earth** serene and tranquil,
Humans and things secure and flourishing.
No strife, no victory—
No eruption, no decay.
No stagnation, no frustration—
No suppression, no confinement,
No blockage, no concealment.

Words held no excess, lips no deceit,
All aligned in compassion—
Differing bones yet bound as kin.

The realm secure, the people prosperous,
Rejoicing in **Great Peace**.

When the **Sutra** first emerged with its teachings,
The land unified under the **Dao**,
All with sincere hearts,
Devoted to ritual and instruction—
All attained **world-transcendence**.

The **Dao’s** words:
What the **Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable** spoke in the **Sutra**
Are the **Heavenly Sovereigns’** inner names,
Hidden resonant sounds.
They are also the **Demon Kings’** tabooed names,
The **Hundred Spirits’** concealed designations.

The **Supreme Sage**, already perfected as **True Person**,
Internally forged the **Spiritual Treasure**—
**True Water** undisturbed, **Elixir Spirit** without smoke.
Balanced and gentle, harmonizing salvation,
Dissolving and transforming malevolence and poison,
Eradicating calamities and plagues,
Penetrating the **Mysterious** and fathoming the subtle—
All its principles known.

Recited ten times,
The **Northern Capital**’s hymns resound,
The **Southern Ridge** records virtue,
The **Fire Mountain** radiates brilliance,
Revealing warmth and depth.
The **Dragon’s Marsh** clears and gleams.

**Heaven’s Virtue** pure and pacified.

The poisons vanish, the age of calamity endures.
No pestilence arises, the people thrive in peace and joy.
The scholars of highest learning,
recite it ten times—
then the Five Phases follow their course,
the Three Calamities vanish on their own,
the demonic essences lose their power,
the ghostly spirits perish utterly.

They rescue those at death’s door,
bringing life from extinction.

This is why:
The learned embrace the Spirit and govern the qi,
water and fire maintain their order,
measured and refined in their transformations,
their principles ever constant—
no deviation, no error.
They rectify the cosmic order,
and the scourge of burning destruction
is returned to Heaven’s decree.

Lightly reciting this chapter,
one’s body may suffer misfortune—
but offering reverence and devotion,
one’s household flourishes eternally,
generation after generation,
untainted by all ills,
divine protection at the gate.

This scripture is most exalted and wondrous,
unmatched in the Jade Capital,
its power to liberate boundless,
the root of ten thousand Ways.
Its grandeur is vast and profound,
its virtue beyond measure.

The Dao speaks:
All who recite this scripture ten times
invite the Heavenly Hosts to assemble,
countless myriads of ancestors,
suffering spirits in torment—
all are immediately liberated,
ascending to the Vermilion Palace,
their term set at nine years.
They are reborn through transformation,
becoming noble as celestial birds.
Through the scripture’s power of resonance,
the True Ones of Water and Fire
merge in dual radiance,
the odd and even in perfect accord.
Yin and Yang are harmonized.
True qi responds within,
ascending to the Mysterious Pass,
the Celestial Hosts descend in attendance,
their echoes resounding at the Southern Ridge.

And those who earnestly study this scripture,
when their merit is complete and virtue fulfilled,
all attain immortality.
They soar to the Golden Gate,
feasting in the Jade Capital.

The advanced scholars who practice this scripture,
with daily recitation beside the sun and moon,
see water and fire’s light take flight,
dissolving calamities and plagues—
all are immediately liberated,
ascending to the Southern Palace.

When the world recites it,
the heart’s fire descends to the Purple Chamber,
the Mysterious Water ascends to the Golden Gate.
The central pool shines with clarity.
The White Primordial rejoices in delight.

Harmful *qi* is purged away,
true spirit eternally preserved—
all thereafter attain the *shìjiě* Dao.

The soul-spirit temporarily extinguished,
avoids the *dìyù*,
immediately regains its form,
wandering through the Great Void.

This scripture is subtle and profound,
universally liberating without end.
All celestial and human beings,
none but receive its blessings.

Infinite merit bestowed,
life and death alike find grace.
A treasure of the Upper Heaven,
not passed down to mortal worlds.

The worthy ones, bearing gold and sincerity,
pledge to Heaven—
yet if they betray with lightness, leak secrets, or indulge in sloth,
they bring ruin to their nine ancestral lines,
endlessly enslaved to ghostly officials.

Twenty-four *yùtóng* and *yùnǚ* attend,
guarding the sacred scripture.
They shield those who receive it in body.

The Dao instructs:
In the first month, observe a long fast,
recite and chant this scripture.
At the *sān yuán* season,
transform the *qi* of water-fire calamities and illness,
for the departed of the Upper World—
severing the bonds of earthly pursuit,
ascending to the Southern Palace.

In the seventh month, observe a long fast,
recite and chant this scripture,
at the *wǔ yùn* season—
dissolving the *qi* of water-fire plagues and afflictions.
The body attains immortality,
all heavens record their names.
With *huáng biàn* and *bái jiǎn*,
death is erased, rebirth secured.

In the tenth month, observe a long fast,
recite and chant this scripture,
at the *liù qì* season—
purifying the *qi* of water-fire plagues and afflictions.
For kings and imperial lords,
their sovereigns, ministers, fathers, and sons.

Stabilize the nation’s fate,
preserve the heavens’ enduring existence,
eternal across generations without cessation,
ever securing the ruler’s domain in peace.
The people proclaim the Great Peace.

On the eight festivals,
recite and chant this scripture;
rectify the records of the eight directions,
great and small calamitous cycles of water and fire—
the disasters of clashing and erosion—
dissipating and harmonizing them.
Thus the Nine Palaces’ *qi* becomes serene,
the people prosper and thrive,
becoming the True Persons of the Nine Palaces.

On one’s natal day,
recite and chant this scripture,
so that the celestial stems and terrestrial branches suffer no harm,
water and fire balance in moderation,
true *qi* spontaneously arises,
spirit and soul become pure and upright,
ten thousand breaths endure eternally,
free from suffering and torment,
the body radiant with light,
attended by the Three Realms.
The Five Emperors lead the welcome,
ten thousand spirits pay homage,
one’s name inscribed in heaven,
merit fulfilled, virtue complete—
ascending to the Upper Clarity.

The Dao speaks:
On days of practice,
bathe in fragrant water, fast and purify within the chamber,
facing east.
Knock the teeth thirty-two times,
hearing the thirty-two heavens above,
mentally bow thirty-two times for past transgressions,
close the eyes,
quietly contemplate sitting amid the three-colored clouds—
green, yellow, and white—
inner and outer gates sealed in darkness.

There appear:
the Azure Dragon, the White Tiger, the Vermilion Bird, the Dark Tortoise,
the Lion, the White Crane,
arrayed on either side.
Sun and moon shine brightly within the hall,
a round effigy grows at the neck,
its light illuminating the ten directions—
so vividly clear.
Recite the secret incantation:

*"Supreme Primordial, the Most High Dao Lord,
summon forth from my body the thirty-six officials of the Five Agents,
left and right ministerial spirits,
attendants of jade and youth,
transmitting maidens of jade,
the Five Emperors’ straight seals,
the straight-day incense officials—
each thirty-six in number—
open the gates as spoken.*

Today’s joyous occasion,
a long fast in the pure hall,
practicing this most wondrous scripture,
countless degrees of liberation.
May what is invoked ascend directly
before the Most High Supreme Sovereign of the Thirty-Two Heavens,
the Primordial Emperor of the Beginning.

When finished,
draw the breath thirty-two times, facing east, and recite the scripture.

*The Primordial’s Supreme Scripture of Countless Liberations,*
*The Primordial’s Mystic Treasure of the Cavernous and Transcendent,*
dissipating and transforming water-fire plagues—
tenfold liberation for beings.
Hundreds of demons vanish in silence,
unity and separation occur naturally.
The Three Heavens grow luminous,
the *congee* of the *xuan* treasures undivided.
The primordial embryo yet unopened,
some float, some sink.
The floating are yang, the sinking yin.
The floating ascend in flame,
the sinking descend in moisture.
Nature formed, substance complete—
named Water and Fire.
Formed yet without substance,
like *qi* yet not *qi*—
the Ancestor of the Ultimate Dao,
the Essence of the Great Void.
Above, water; below, fire—
the divine traverses between.
Above, fire; below, water—
*qi* guards their threshold.
Water and fire intermingle,
wind becomes their spirit,
transforming heaven and earth,
nurturing the cosmos.

Metal *qi* brings clarity,
rigid nature hardens—
water nourishes wood,
wood ignites within.
Water and fire established,
true earth takes dominion—
earth as the Void Mother.
The Jade Mountain’s Upper Capital,
the Yellow Hall, the Purple Courtyard.
The Nine Ranks of the Most High,
the Three True Ones of the Imperial Pole—
arising from the harmony of water and fire.

Suppressed or dominant,
weak or strong—
they shift into plagues and afflictions,
corrupting and decaying,
*qi* obstructed, spirit alarmed.

Fire’s essence becomes the sun,
water’s essence the moon;
the moon fulfills the year’s work,
the sun governs the celestial tracks.
The Three Realms, ten thousand things—
thus all flourish in benefit.
The Five Phases, Six *Qi*—
water and fire take precedence.
Great *qi* refines and nourishes—
nine ten-thousand, nine thousand.
The Vermilion Brightness unfurls the diagram,
cycles move naturally.
Passing through water, overcoming fire—
true attains its true.
Above, no return to the Ancestor—
only the Dao as body.
Water and fire intermingle,
universally planting divine spirits.
Sacred texts form seals,
dragons and phoenixes soar on clouds.
Without texts, no light,
without texts, no clarity,
without texts, no establishment,
without texts, no completion,
without texts, no liberation,
without texts, no birth—
this is the Great Brahman,
the Heaven within Heaven.
The *Yùluó* Tower, the *Xiāotái*,
the Supreme Extremity, the Great Luo’s Jade Purity.
Flickering between life and death—
the True Lords of Water and Fire.
Moving through celestial cycles,
the stars *Bì*, *Zhì*, and *Shēn*.
Traveling through human fate,
water and fire drown and burn.
Moving through the earth,
plagues arise—
land collapses, mountains tilt.
*Qi* has order or reversal,
cycles have ruin or completion.
The Upper True Ones transform and dissipate,
generating the Dao’s tranquil peace.

Within water and fire’s two *qi*,
circulating the ten directions—
there is the god who liberates beings from death,
there is the Southern Polarity Lord of longevity,
there is the god who dissipates plagues,
there is the Great Marshal who governs the world,
there is the Benevolent Lord Han the Elder,
there is the Southern Registrar,
the Venerable who prolongs life and extends fate’s measure.
Reviving the corpse, countless liberations.

Today’s assembly—
the heavens attend the hall.
The East: the Supreme Primordial God-King of the Boundless Void,
the Great Sage of Longevity, Countless Liberator.
The South: the Supreme Primordial God-King of the Crimson Sovereign,
the Great Sage of Longevity, Countless Liberator.
The West: the Supreme Primordial God-King of the Nine Abysses,
the Great Sage of Longevity, Countless Liberator.
The North: the Supreme Primordial God-King of the Cavernous Sea,
the Great Sage of Longevity, Countless Liberator.
The Northeast: the Supreme Primordial God-King of the Fire Treasury,
the Great Sage of Longevity, Countless Liberator.
The Southeast: the Supreme Primordial God-King of the Vermilion Palace,
the Great Sage of Longevity, Countless Liberator.
The Southwest: the Supreme Primordial God-King of the Water Treasury,
the Great Sage of Longevity, Countless Liberator.
The Northwest: the Supreme Primordial God-King of the Black Abyss,
the Great Sage of Longevity, Countless Liberator.
Above: the Supreme Primordial God-King of the Void Expanse,
the Great Sage of Longevity, Countless Liberator.
Below: the Primordial God-King of the Elemental Fire,
the Great Sage of Longevity, Countless Liberator.

The Ten Directions’ Most True Flying Heavenly God-Kings of Longevity,
the Great Gods of World-Liberation,
all riding the Three Substance Clouds,
the Eight Immortal’s Dan Palanquins,
wind-wheels and cloud-canopies,
tiger-umbrellas and coiled-beam carriages,
yoked with vermilion phoenixes and five-colored dragons,
bearing the Seven Radiant Banners,
the Nine-Hued Sacred Pennants—
before them, ten thousand dancers chant in unison,
behind them, a thousand bells resound together.
Vermilion phoenixes and azure dragons
sing in melodious tones,
mystic beasts and divine birds
call with resonant voices.
The Five Elders clear the path,
the host of immortals flank the procession—
countless chariots, ten thousand cavalry,
floating through the void and arriving.

「The radiance is reversed, the True Ones return in procession. The Two Aspects of Water and Fire,

the Upper Palace of Nanchang, where the Lord Han oversees the Records,
the Great God of Life-Liberation, bearing the sacred tablets and registers,
all arriving before the Celestial Sovereign.

They pacify the Water and Fire,
letting no calamity or pestilence touch them.
Wherever they are needed, they liberate—
strictly judging all the heavens.

They universally proclaim to the Mystic Capital,
the Celestial Gate of Jade,
the Twelve Palaces divided,
the First of the Six Jia.

Water does not overflow,
Fire does not blaze recklessly.
The Mystic Essence guards its place,
the Crimson Talisman lies dormant.

Water and Fire merge in *qi*,
unable to stray.

Great and small *kalpas* of fate,
the Nine-Hundred-Six Heavens.
They extinguish calamities and pestilences,
bringing peace to the Three Realms.

The Divine Abode of the Boundless,
the Bureau of the Curved Springs,
the Northern Capital of Luo—
the Three Officials and Nine Offices,
the Twelve River Sources,
where water monsters are quelled,
the surging waves stilled into deep repose,
the Nine Spirits bearing their scriptures,
and grievances made manifest.

They release the Ancestors above,
a billion *kalpas* of kindred souls,
quickly dispel the Register of Sins,
and extinguish the roots of evil.

No power to detain or oppress,
no coercion of the ghostly legions.
The Original Beginning’s decrees ascend,
marked by the hour for advancement.

The Northern Capital’s Cold Pool,
guarding the forms and spirits of the departed.
They subdue demons and uphold the worthy,
and liberate the ranks of the Southern Palace.

The dead souls undergo refining,
becoming immortal and reborn as humans.
The living bodies receive liberation,
and endure through endless *kalpas*.
With the *kalpas*, they flow and transform,
matching the heavens in longevity.

They forever liberate the Three Realms of Suffering,
the Five Grievances and Eight Hardships,
transcending the Three Realms,
and roaming freely in the Upper Clarity.

The Upper Clarity Heaven,
where the Celestial Sovereign’s Jade Truth reigns,
and the Boundless Realm of *Dharma*—
Water, Fire, and pestilence,
are but the great and small variations of the Nine-Hundred-Six.

Only those of the kindred of humanity above the Celestial Sovereign
escape the Three Calamities.
From the Purple Micro Enclosure to the Nine Forts of Heavy Darkness,
all are places where calamities reach.

Even the Saints and True Sovereigns,
cannot alter their course—
like eclipses of the sun and moon.
Only by ascending into the Formless,
does one avoid the Water and Fire calamities.

This Heaven also belongs to the Three Realms,
and follows the same law as the *Lingbao*.

**The Eight Heavens of the East:**
The Great Rescue of Splendor and Honor—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Chu, the Vanished Flow.
The True Manifestation of *Dharma* Light—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Qiu, the Supreme of the *He* Clan.
The Spirit Observation of Yang Symbol—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Peng, the Lifting of Truth.
The Deep Firmament of Exhilarating Support—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Bo, the Original of the *Yue* Clan.
The Great Micro Rectification—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Shou, the Bright Clarity.
The Eight Sceneries of Cavernous Truth—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor He, the Crystal Chief.
The Extended Prosperity of Resplendent Transformation—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Si, the Master of the Axis.
The Purple Crossing of Divine Splendor—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Bian, the Auspicious.

**The Eight Heavens of the South:**
The Cloud and Jade of Compassionate Mystic—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Ding, the Manifested Power.
The Jade Gate of Restraining Fullness—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Du, the Solemn and Stern.
The Spread of Spirit, the True Heaven—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Fu, the Assistant of the *Hu* Clan.
The Pure and Auspicious of Illuminating Trust—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Jiao, the Bright and Auspicious.
The Nine Flower of Transcendent Void—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Shan, the Jade-Like.
The Mystic Firmament of Descending Life—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Cha, the Supervising Spirit.
The Crystal Bright of Universal Benevolence—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Qi, the Illuminator of *Pu* Clan.
The Dazzling and Resplendent of the Great Origin—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Lie, the Intelligent Conductor.

**The Eight Heavens of the West:**
The Cavernous Float of Rectified Axis—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Jian, the Dark and Profound.
The Five Auspicious of Harmonious Nurture—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Lü, the Supreme of the *Ba* Clan.
The Separate Bright of Encountering Grace—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Nan, the Proclaimed of the *Dong* Clan.
The Jade Spirit of Tranquil Rescue—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Lü, the Precious of the *Bao* Clan.
The Purple Cloud of Mystic Ascension—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Cai, the Assistant of the *Fu* Clan.
The Mystic Thread of Auspicious Counsel—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Ci, the Illuminating of the *Yu* Clan.
The Supreme True of Proclaimed Name—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Lian, the Total Sovereign.
The Initial Spirit of Manifested Aid—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Yu, the Map of the Domain.

**The Eight Heavens of the North:**
The Mystic Cavern of Hidden Spirit—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Ju, the Guest of the *Bin* Clan.
The Mound and Marsh of Manifesting Truth—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Han, the Bearer of the *Zheng* Clan.
The Original Void of Concealed Symbol—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Zhi, the Extremes of the Purple *Mang* Clan.
The Seven Transformations of the Boundless—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Zhen, the Awakening of the Mystic.
The High and Subtle of Ascending Hearing—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Yin, the Quiet and Solemn.
The Mystic Cloud of Feathered Splendor—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Tao, the Teacher of the *Yue* Clan.
The Mystic Clarity of the Boundless—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Yi, the Forgiving of the *You* Clan.
The Northern Flower of the Pole’s Resonance—Heaven, ruled by the Emperor Long, the Few and Auspicious.

The Thirty-Two Heavens,
the Thirty-Two Emperors.

All the heavens’ hidden names,
all the heavens’ hidden titles.
The Void within Heaven,
naturally bearing the spirit talisman,
all the heavens’ hidden harmonies,
the sounds within Heaven.

The Celestial Sovereign within Heaven,
the Celestial Spirit within Heaven,
the Great Demon within Heaven,
the Heavenly Essence within Heaven.

The Nine Harmonies and Ten Unifications,
transforming into the Upper Clarity.
The depths of the Mystic Transformation,
are profound beyond measure.

They regulate the fate of Water and Fire,
universally liberating gods and humans.

Today, rejoicing in receiving the liberation,
passing through the gates of all the heavens,
they request the extinguishing of the calamities of drifting, burning, and roaming—
the great and small unions of the Nine-Hundred-Six,
the waxing and waning, eclipses,
and the poisons of the Three Origins.
They transcend the hardships of fate,
and are listed among the Supreme Mystic,
the Demon Kings overseeing the worthy,
with no restriction at the Heavenly Gate.

The Eastern Dipper establishes the Ladle,
the Western Dipper generates *qi*,
the Northern Dipper is the Water Spirit,
the Southern Dipper is the Fire Emperor,
the Central Dipper is the Great Void,
as the gathering of the *kalpa*.

The Green Emperor transforms Wood,
the White Emperor refines Gold,
the Red Emperor nurtures Fire,
the Black Emperor sends forth the Springs,
the Yellow Emperor is the Spirit Treasure—
their transformations are boundless.

The Green Heaven Demon King,
his mother is the Origin of the Supreme Mystic.
The Red Heaven Demon King,
the True Earth forms Heaven.
The White Heaven Demon King,
the Water Virtue is natural.
The Black Heaven Demon King,
the Green Yang emits smoke.
The Yellow Heaven Demon King,
the Firm and Pure surges through the Abyss.
The Five Emperors of Great Demons,
are the ancestors of all the spirits.

They fly and march in procession,
commanding the ghostly armies.
They brandish banners and beat drums,
wandering freely through the Great Void.

They name themselves the Terrific and Resplendent,
and all the heavens acknowledge their deeds.

The Water *Kalpa* is vast,
its waves surging a millionfold.
The Fire *Kalpa* is scorching,
its evil smoke thick and murky.

The raging floods and blazing furnaces,
bring disaster to the Three Realms.
The Original Dao of Rectification,
nurtures and harmonizes.

They pacify the yin and yang,
and the poisons cannot approach.
Pestilence and calamity are repelled,
and the times grow bright, the land prosperous.

The Divine Official receives the command,
descending to bestow blessings upon the world.
The sun and moon bow in unison,
the Four Dippers shine resplendently.
The Mystic Auspicious and the Spirit Phoenix,
soar through the heavens.
Water and Fire become treasures,
gold and jade solidify.
The Six *qi* are balanced,
the Four Seasons revolve in harmony.»

「Gold cannot overcome gold,
Wood and Fire subdue the Yin.

Earth defends against Water,
Wood yields to Earth’s birth.
The Five Phases now aligned,
Water and Fire hold no bias.

Prolonging human life and joy,
No guilt nor shame in heart.
Demons and ghosts are utterly vanquished,
Ten thousand slain in slaughter.

The Three Officials march to Northern *Ding*,
Inspecting the ghostly camps with clarity.
No hiding place is granted,
The Golden Horse Inn presents itself.

The proclamation spreads endlessly,
Ten thousand spirits heed in unison.
The Three Realms and Five *Deities*,
Ranked in speech to the High Purity.

The *Yùluó* Heavenly Gate is closed,
Its central barrier the Eight Portals.
Vast and boundless, a billion *kalpas*,
The Ancestral *Qi* yet undivided.

Above, no hue remains,
Below, no depth persists.
Water and Fire void and hollow,
The *Vajra* rides the heavens.

Heavens above and earth below,
No shadow, no form, no end, no limit—
No bound, no infinity.

*Chìmíng* unfolds his diagram,
Sun and moon adorn the sky,
Water and Fire merge in aid,
Their courses flow naturally.

The Original Dao brings peace,
Water and Fire become the *elixir*,
Within, the *Yùzì* (玉字) is born,
A crimson scroll of five chapters.

Ten thousand *treasures* of *mystic seals*,
Eight *auspicious* dragon scripts,
Guarding the cycles of *kalpas*,
The Two *Qi* endure eternally.

The *Dharma*-*Qi* pervades *Brahma*,
Ten thousand patterns unfold,
The Primordial *principle* flows and spreads,
Thirty-two heavens.

Revolving Water and Fire,
Circumnavigating the Ten Quarters,
Turning through Yin and tracing Yang,
Measuring the Five *Constants*.

Thirty-five divisions,
Dividing *Qi* into the Three *Origins*,
Eight *scenes* merge into the *Mystic*,
*Qi* enters the *Supreme Mystic*.

Within the *Supreme Mystic*, the *Tàihuáng* (太皇),
The Highest *Deity* and Supreme Truth,
Wandering through the *Grand Scenes*,
Whistling and chanting in the *Hollow Chamber*.

The *Golden Truth* radiant and vast,
Its resonance flowing through the clouds,
The *Jade Sound* gathers *Qi*,
The *Spirit Wind* gathers smoke.

The *Purple Void* luxuriant and refined,
Assisting and sheltering Ten Thousand *Immortals*,
Ten thousand harmonies merge,
Truth naturally manifests.

Within Truth lies Spirit,
The Eternal Sovereign of Life,
The *Dark Emperor* of Water *De*,
The *Crimson Origin* of Fire *De*.

The *Tàiyī* (太一) guards the *Qi*,
The *Officer of Destiny* retains the Spirit,
*Táokāng* (桃康) cradles the furnace,
Uniting to prolong the *Essence of Life*,
Wielding talismans and *divine seals*,
Nurturing the roots of life.

Ascending to the High Purity,
Entering and exiting the *Hua Fáng* (華房),
Within the Eight *Mystic* depths,
The subtlest essence.

Descending to govern the mortal form,
The *Níhuán* (泥丸) and *Jiānggōng* (绛宫),
Balancing the Five *Qi*,
Blending the Hundred Spirits.

Ten thousand revolutions restore the *Soul*,
Ten thousand *Qi* align with the *Immortal*.
The *Immortal Dao* values life,
Infinite degrees for all beings.

Water and Fire intermingle,
The *Flying Heavenly Law Wheel* ascends.
Guilt and virtue are restrained,
Karmic causes and conditions.

All receive the *initiation*,
The dead soul takes new life.
The body attains rebirth,
Ascending to hear the *Dharma* of all heavens.

Above all heavens,
Each has its *Gate of Life*,
Midst, the *Hollow Chamber* of boundless songs,
The *Mystic Scripts* of the Demon King,
Words that match the Highest Truth.

**First Desire Realm: A Chapter to Pacify Great and Small *Kalpa* Cycles and Repel Water-Fire Disasters and Plagues**
Nine hundred and sixty *Yin* cycles,
The *Flying Heavenly Law Wheel* of Water-Fire calamities and plagues.
*Yùjīng* (玉京) as the pivot,
Turning all heavens.

The Dragon Tower drums resound,
Nine thousand cycles and more.
Water opens vast sources,
Fierce winds scour the Nine Regions.
Yang prevails, Yin is suppressed,
Wood departs as Metal rewards.
Water and Fire rule as kings,
Their surging floods and blazing flames.
Mountains scorched, *Jade* destroyed,
All beings tremble in distress.
The Original Dao and Highest *Deity*,
Wearing the Tiger Crown and Dragon *Fù* (斿).
Seizing the talisman and bearing the *Divine Seal*,
Summoning the *Ding* (酆) depths.
Unlocking the *Lingbǎo* (灵宝) script,
The *Black Emperor* dispatches his plans.
The Fire *Deity* examines and judges,
Ten thousand spirits confess swiftly.
Disasters and calamities cease,
No waiting, no seeking.

**Second Form Realm: A Chapter for the Demon King to Pacify Great and Small *Kalpa* Cycles and Repel Water-Fire Disasters and Plagues**
The Original *Qi* becomes the Sun,
The *Yin* Mother becomes the Moon.
The Sun moves, the Moon follows,
Completing years and marking seasons.
The Heavenly Gate shifts,
Water surges, Fire ascends.
The *Dòuchē* (斗车) advances,
Three thousand cycles and beyond.
Nine hundred and sixty *Yang* cycles,
Unfurl and roll for the world.
One hundred and sixty *Yin* cycles,
The tally of the *Hall of Destiny*.
Twelve degrees,
Drums resound three times.
Water and Fire *Qi* flow,
Sun and Moon drift beside them.
Water triumphs, rivers overflow,
Fire blazes, boats burn.
The *Supreme Learning* of *Wuwei*,
My *Deity* wanders the heavens.
The cycles reach their end,
Water and Fire intertwine.
The world calls it disaster and plague,
All things face annihilation.
Ninefold rebirth becomes one,
Chaos is reborn.
The Original Dao and Heavenly King,
Emerging and vanishing in transformation.
Manifesting my realm,
The *Yùqīng* (玉清) Wondrous Court.

**Third Formless Realm: A Chapter Where the Demon King’s Water-Fire Disasters and Plagues Do Not Reach the *Yùqīng* Divine Transformation**
The cloud formations drift and scatter,
Vast and boundless, the *Emperor’s Green*.
The Nine-Eyed Dragon Mother,
Coiling across ten thousand miles.
Dark smoke dense and billowing,
The *Grand Sound* thunders like *Tīng* (雷霆).
Curving around the *Jade Mountains*,
Eighty million tiers.
Gazing down on sun and moon,
Flickering stars of fire.
Descending upon the Nine Heavens,
*Jade* gates and golden walls.
My realm is naturally so,
No fiery soldiers exist.
The Nine *Spirits* and True Mother,
All evils pass not through.
The *Dao* is vast and wondrous,
The *Supreme Immortal Truth*.
Ascending into the Formless,
Unstained by the Six *Phenomena*.
Merging with the *Divine Qi*,
Pure and enduring eternally.
The *Heavenly Valley* stretches on,
Awareness and perception undivided.
Knowing the *Origin* is *Wuwei*,
The vast *kalpa* is revered.

Here, above the Three Realms,
Within the *Flying Heavenly Law Wheel*,
The Demon King’s *Mystic Scripts*,
Their words echo the *Hollow Chamber*.

Recite it a hundred times,
The name is granted to *Nán Gōng* (南宫).
Recite it a thousand times,
The Demon King welcomes and guards.
Ten thousand times, the *Dao* is complete,
Ascending to the *Heavenly Void*,
Crossing the Three Realms,
Ranking among the *Immortal Officials*.

Hearing the *Sacred Sound*,
The Demon King reveres its form,
Commands the *Earth Spirits*,
Guards and escorts in attendance.
Emerging from the *Earthly Portal*,
Five *Sufferings* and Eight *Difficulties*,
Seven *Ancestors* ascend in rank,
Forever parted from the *Ghostly Officials*,
The soul crosses to *Zhū Líng* (朱陵),
Refined and reborn anew.

This is called the *Infinite*,
Universal *initiation* without end.
There are *Secret Scripts* of the Highest Heavens,
All heavens hold them in reverence.
Leak or slight them, and one falls into *Hell*,
Bringing calamity to the Seven *Ancestors*.

The *Dao* speaks:
These two chapters are the words of the Highest *Deities* of All Heavens,
And the *Mystic Scripts* of the Demon King,
All belonging to the *Great Dharma* of *Brahma*.
Not the common speech of the world.
Words without melodious grace,
Melodies without ornate beauty.»

The mysteries are profound and difficult to fathom.
Treasure of the Highest Heavens,
Secreted in the *Xuan Du* Purple Micro Palace above,
Transmitted according to the *Mystic Science* once every four *kalpas*.

Its purpose is to regulate water and fire,
To preserve and secure the *kalpa* cycle,
So that the celestial gates’ passage
And the numerical paths know no end,
And abide with Heaven eternally.

Its prohibitions are strict—
No leakage or revelation is permitted.

If a *Zhi Ren* (至人) presents gold and jade with a sincere heart,
And according to the ancient rites petitions the Ten Heavens,
Then alone shall it be bestowed.

The *Dao* speaks:
When the *Heaven-Earth cycle* reaches its end,
Water and fire clash violently,
Floods surge to the skies,
Metals and stones burn and rot.
For mortals, this brings pestilence—
Cold and heat, sickness and plague.
Waters rise, earth collapses,
Winds howl, flames blaze.

When mortal life ends,
It is like the *kalpa*’s conflagration and deluge—
The time of the cycle’s conclusion.

Even the *unlearned* suffer afflictions.
Whenever such calamities arise,
One must erect altars and spread the *True Scripts* of the Five Directions,
Practice the *Dao* at the three times,
Subdue and govern water and fire,
Dissipate and transform disasters and plagues,
Pray to the Highest Spirits—
When calamities subside,
All who share the same *qi* must unite in heart,
Fast and offer incense at the six times,
Recite the *sutra* ten revolutions.
Then virtue and merit descend,
Dissolving all inauspiciousness.

The *Infinite Scripts* universally initiate without end.

The *Dao* speaks:
The unlearned, with shallow *Dao*,
Or whose *immortal rank* is incomplete,
Or whose Four Great Elements are scorched,
Dazed, bewildered, restless,
Or emaciated, withered, cold, crippled, or paralyzed—
These are all from water and fire’s assault,
Where the conquered overcomes the conqueror,
The cycle’s annihilation and rebirth,
The body passing through *Great Yin*,
At the moment of crossing,
The *Zhi Ren* among fellow students
Shall perform incense and recite the *sutra* ten times,
To guide the corpse’s form according to the law,
So the soul and spirit ascend directly to the Southern Palace,
And by their merit, be reborn in due time.

Through endless cycles of rebirth,
One attains *immortality*.

The *Dao* speaks:
When the *Heaven-Earth cycle* reaches its end,
Stars and constellations stray from their paths,
The sun and moon lose their eclipses,
The four seasons fall out of order,
Yin and Yang become unbalanced,
And the realm suffers disasters—
Wars erupt fourfold,
Pestilences spread,
The common folk perish in masses,
Friends and teachers meet untimely ends—
All these are disasters wrought by water and fire.

Water and fire govern the *Taiwei* and *Ziwei* dual celestial bureaus,
Overseeing mortal fate,
Summarizing calamity and blessing.

One must erect the altar according to the law,
Consecrate the Southern and Northern *Dou* Water and Fire Sovereign Emperors,
Present petitions with earnest wishes,
And let the incense of the heart ascend—
The spirits and true ones shall descend in response.

One must also fast and offer incense,
Recite the *sutra*.
For fasting, abstaining, and reciting the *sutra*
Are deeds of great merit.
Above, they dispel celestial calamities,
Protect and defend the emperor.
Below, they avert poisonous harm,
And deliver the common folk.
Life and death depend upon them—
Their blessings are boundless.
Thus it is said: *Infinite*,
Universally initiating *Heaven* and *man*.

The *Dao* speaks:
Whoever possesses this *sutra*
Can, for the *Heaven-Earth Emperor* and the common folk,
Perform these meritorious deeds.
On days of disaster, if one takes the vow,
Fasts, burns incense,
And recites the *sutra* ten times,
All the Heavens shall record their name,
Ten thousand spirits shall attend as escorts,
And the *Zhi Ren* of the Right Branch
Shall attain the rank of a *Holy Sovereign*’s minister in the Golden Gate.

The Heavens record every deed and transgression—
Not a hair’s breadth is missed.
Even the *Demon King* of the Heavens shall recommend your name,
And those who attain the *Dao* shall comprehend these profound words.

From the *Hidden Speech of Great Brahma*,
Composed by the *Dao Lord*,
The *Elemental Scriptures of Primordial Mystery*—
The Middle Chapter of the *Eight Heavens of the East*.

「The lotus blooms without blemish, its treasures lavishly spread.

**The Eight Heavens of the South:**

Light returns in dazzling brilliance,

The paired and the singular birth pearls,

**The Eight Heavens of the North:**
Obscured in silence, retreating to the fences,

The stillness is vast, the knowledge undone,
The misty capital gazes in awe.
The reeds dissolve, the essence glows refined,

The boundless void aligns with the rules,
The eons shrink to a yellow hall.

The Hall of the Big Dipper records its texts,
