Empty splendor governs the Rectified,
Pure gold scatters as mist,
The Purple Expanse looms in verdant layers,
Assisting and guarding the High Immortals.

Ten thousand harmonies merge,
Transforming and giving birth to flowing essence.
Flowing essence refines the elixir,
Naturally becoming the True.

Within the True lies the Spirit,
The Eternal Great Lord of longevity.

The Eastern Extremity’s verdant splendor,
Crimson brilliance and purple essence.
Without flaw, the Ultimate merges,
The White Origin preserves life.

The Supreme One registers the celestial records,
The Azure Boys pour the sacred waters.
Holding talismans and scriptures,
Preserving life and rooting the command.

Ascending the Purple Void,
Entering and exiting the Splendid Chamber.
Within the Eight Obscurities,
At the heart of the Eastern Well.

Descending to govern the human form,
The Yellow Court and Vermilion Abyss,
Regulating the Five Qi,
Mingling with the Hundred Spirits.

Ten revolutions return the Soul,
Ten thousand beings become Immortals.
The Dao of the Immortal values life,
Boundless in saving sentient beings.

Opening the Eight Gates above,
Flying the Heavenly Law Wheel.
Crimes and blessings, prohibitions and vows,
Past lives and karmic connections.

Universally receiving the Mystic Grace,
Refining and giving birth to the True Body.
The body attains rebirth,
Ascending to hear the celestial realms.

Above the celestial realms,
Each has a Gate of Birth.
Within are verses of hollow songs,
True King’s sacred hymns,
Words harmonizing with the High True Ones.

---
**First Hymn of the Mystic Luminous Cavernous King: The Flying Void**
The True Yang is formless,
Stirring the Mystic Luminous to birth.
The Mystic Luminous’s true dew,
Qi exhaled, thus formed.

The Boundless Void knows no edge,
The Primordial Qi billows as mist.
Yin-yang swiftly flies,
Water descends like a spring.

Its vast voice resounds,
Its boundless depths accumulate.
The scorching wind enters the water,
Naturally coiling like a dragon.

Passing through nine cycles,
Scales and horns fully formed.
Sudden transformations arise,
Entering earth, communicating with heaven.

Its mouth holds clouds and rain,
Its body like a jade tortoise.
It roars thunder, spitting mist,
The Thunderfire Immortal.

Nurturing all things,
Opening the source of life.
The Mystic Luminous’s power,
The Divine Dragon leads.

The Cavernous Abyss and Boundless Sea,
Channeling a hundred rivers.
One water as ancestor,
Within containing the Five Phases.

The human form’s law-symbol,
The Spirit Pool’s pure mist.
The Shocking Qi becomes the Dragon,
Swimming in the Three Fields.

Rising and descending by the Dao,
Worldly life spans billions.
Boundless in saving sentient beings,
Reciting this Cavernous Verse.

---
**Second Hymn of the Mystic Luminous Cavernous King**
The Jade Capital Kunlun,
Planted in the Void as root.
Below it spans the Azure Sea,
The Nine Hundred Million’s Origin.

The Mystic Peak stands central,
Where the Sun and Moon cross.
Radiant twin visions,
Overlooking the Seven True Ones of Light.

Flowing springs ascend,
Through the Thirty-Nine Gates.
Nurturing and refining the Two Symbols,
Relying on this Mystic Luminous.

Below it encompasses the Yellow Gate,
Commanding the Spirit Officials.
The Round Net descends with Qi,
Subduing the Primordial Lords.

One Qi, six coils,
The Three Origins transformed.
Entering and exiting the Three Splendors,
Vastly surging through the Wind Abyss.

Verdant mists gather in layers,
Flowing bells scatter in four directions.
The Way of transformation and birth,
Establishing the Divine and Spirit.

Nourishing the Primordial Harmony,
Preserving heaven from collapse.
If one knows this,
The Azure Scroll bears the name.

I now compose this chapter,
Transmitting life with True Water.
Ascending with flying steps to the Spirit Expanse,
The Immortals must respectfully pay homage.

---
**Third Hymn of the Mystic Luminous Cavernous King’s Song**
Hoist the boat on the Cavernous Pool,
The Azure Forest stirs the Spirit Wind.
Heaven’s voice naturally forms sound,
Ten thousand transformations yet unified.

Majestic the Spirit Expanse Gate,
Holding the Edict in the Eastern Capital’s heart.
Guiding sentient beings through the Pure Flow,
Abandoning this, a hundred worries assail.

The Mystic Luminous scatters heavenly dew,
All things’ forms can be nourished and refined.
Refining bones, jade splendor is born,
Longevity attained, without care.

How can one forsake the Immortal Way,
Following filth with corpse-worms?
Not comprehending the Great Dao’s Origin,
How can one avoid decay and calamity?

There are mountains spinning in the Azure Void,
Waters hiding divine dragons.
Why chase greed and competition,
Drowning in filth, aging like infants?

I, the Hollow Void King,
My law-carriage adorned with solemn drums and bells.
Pitying the world, upholding the Great Constitution,
Saving beings, reviving the Teaching Root.

Holding the Jade True’s song,
Ascending to the Hollow Mystic Palace.
The Eight Sufferings dissolve,
Joy and delight endless.

This, above the Three Realms,
Within the Flying Void,
The True King’s sacred song,
Its words harmonizing with the Cavernous Chapter.

Recite it a hundred times,
Your name ascends to the Southern Palace.
Recite it a thousand times,
Fly as an Immortal, welcomed in welcome.

Ten thousand recitations complete,
The Dao is fulfilled,
Ascending to the Supreme Void,
Crossing the Three Realms,
Rank attained as True Duke.

Those who hear the Sacred Sound,
Even the Demon Kings revere their forms,
Commanding the Earthly Spirits,
Attending and escorting.

Emerging from the Earthly Gate,
The Five Sorrows and Eight Sufferings depart,
The Seven Ancestors ascend,
Forever freed from the Dark Officials,
The Soul crosses the Vermilion Mound,
Refined and reborn.

This is called Boundless,
Universally saving without end.

There are secret celestial texts,
All heavens hold them in reverence.
Revealing arrogance, one falls into Hell,
Disaster befalls the Seven Ancestor Lords.

The Dao says:
These two chapters are the sacred sounds of all celestial emperors,
And the hidden hymns of the Most High Spirit Kings—
The wondrous, silent, formless True Water,
Transforming into heaven and earth,
Giving birth to the divine dragon.

Those who embody this,
The Immortals know no end.
All are the words of the Great Brahman,
Not the common speech of the world.
Words without melodious grace,
Music without ornate elegance.
Thus called profound and mysterious,
Difficult to trace in detail.

Treasured by heaven above,
Secreted in the Mystic Capital’s Spirit Expanse,
The Jade Purity King’s Eastern Chamber.
According to the ritual, transmitted every thirty-seven thousand years in accordance with the cosmic cycles.

If a perfected sage brings gold and treasures with a sincere heart,
And according to the old method pledges to the Ten Heavens,
Then it shall be bestowed.

The Dao says:
When heaven and earth’s cycles falter or end,
When the sun, moon, and five stars wane or wax,
When the most sacred divine humans rest or decline,
When shallow scholars suffer illness—
At such times of calamity,
All who share the same breath must unite in heart,
Observing fasts at the six times,
Circulating the scriptures tenfold,
And virtue and blessings shall descend,
Dissolving all ill omens.

Boundless texts,
Universally saving without end.

The Dao says:
For those shallow in the Dao,
Or whose Immortal rank is incomplete,
When their fate is extinguished,
And their bodies pass through the Great Yin—
At the moment of crossing,
Let the perfected sages among them perform incense offerings,
Recite the scriptures ten times,
And guide the corpse-form according to the method.
Then the Mystic Luminous shall arise,
The Mystic Darkness return,
The Jade Maiden in the kidneys,
Holding the *Yanguan* in hand,
The Gate of Death sealed,
The Three Officials dancing with the Wheel,
Life restored, the command returned,
The name recorded in the Imperial Register,
The soul and spirit ascending directly to the Southern Palace,
According to their merit, reborn on the appointed day.

The Wheel of Rebirth turns without doubt—
Then Immortal Sagehood is attained.

The Dao speaks:
When the Heavenly Earth’s cycle reaches its end,
Stars and constellations stray from their courses,
Sun and moon lose their appointed meetings,
The Four Seasons fall out of order,
Yin and Yang fall into discord,
The realm’s borders grow unstable,
The people suffer famine and pestilence,
Plagues and poisons spread rampant,
The common folk perish in droves,
Warriors and friends meet untimely deaths,
Comrades fall in battle—
All must then observe fasts,
Burn incense, and recite the scriptures.

For fasting, keeping precepts, and reciting scriptures—
Their merit is most profound.
Above, it dispels celestial calamities,
Guarding and protecting the sovereign.
Below, it wards off poisons and harm,
Delivering the myriad people,
Saving them from life and death’s grasp—
Their blessings are boundless.

Thus it is said: *Boundless texts,*
Universally saving Heaven and humankind.

The Dao speaks:
Whoever possesses this scripture
Can, for Heaven, Earth, the Imperial Sovereign, and the myriad people,
Perform these meritorious deeds.
On days of calamity, if one resolves to fast,
Burn incense, and recite the scriptures ten times—
All the celestial beings shall record their names,
Ten thousand spirits shall stand guard,
And the perfected sages of the Right Path
Shall surely become holy ministers of the Golden Palace,
Serving the Sacred Sovereign.

The celestial beings record each person’s merits and faults,
Not missing even a hair’s breadth.
The True Kings of Heaven also recommend your name,
And those who attain the Dao shall truly comprehend these profound words.

Hidden within the Great Brahman’s boundless sounds,
The Dao Lord composed the *Elemental Origins: Mystic Clarity, Profound Abyss, Sacred Scriptures*—
The Purple Chapter of the Eastern Eight Heavens.

The eight heavens unfold with boundless splendor—
**Keqin** scatters its sacred nectar, **Yuanlou** pools its abyssal depths.
The **Ming** has conquered **Mian**, its **Yi** resounds with truth;
**Qing** lingers, **Zhi** flows, fulfilling the Perfect and the Real.

The **Tang** screens **Bian**’s teachers, the **Yao** dispels **Zhi**’s radiance.
**Yuluo** fades like moonlight, **Hudeng** stills the distant march.
**Mingze** nourishes **Xianyue**, the **Liyuan** rise in ranks.
**Yuncha** rules the **Difu**, **Libin**’s grace extends in succession.
**Dongjia** borrows from **Youdi**, **Yeying** gazes upward in reverence.

The **Zhuying**’s essence glitters at the mouth,
**Dao**’s silence pervades the **Yuanjing**.
---
**South Eight Heavens**—
**Menghong** overflows with vigor, **Liqiang** thrives in splendor.
**Jianpu** gathers the **Shihui**, **Zixuan** awaits the **Yingying**.
**Luyang** nurtures **Jianwan**, **Biluo** follows **Ciding**.
**Dangmeng** heals with solemn care, **Yuhuo**’s path lies smooth and level.

**Chigong** and **Chisuo** stand resplendent,
**Yuanshou**’s **qi** is divine and luminous.
**Gaoming** at **Tingtai**, the **Dishu**’s tiger ministers.
**Mimie** intercepts the **Long**, **Pulei** captures the stars.

**Yanqi** reflects upon **Hubu**, **Bingqian** seeks expiation.
---
**West Eight Heavens**—
**Zhengeng**’s six pools, **Shenhu**’s four leaps.
**Liluo**’s **Jian** reveals its brilliance,
**Youzheng** commands **Bingshi**.

**Budan** gathers the **Jihui**, **Yedang** exposes the source.
**Ganyan** harmonizes with **Heolu**, the seven **Yuan** and nine **Si**.
**Kaoxie** has already been flattened, **Aolang**’s arrogance is quelled.

The **Zhudian** presides over **Zuihun**,
**Youqing** seals the **Yuan**’s gate.
**Dingjiao** treasures the **Shang**, **Huzhen** safeguards the **Yuan**.
**Yaodu** cuts off the **Huangji**, the **Xishan**’s seal binds the city.
---
**North Eight Heavens**—
Within **Pengnei**, the northern lands are subdued,
**Qizhi**’s flags and **Die**’s swift chariots.
**Cuiyi** mingles with **Jiaowei**, the nine **Hua** align in order.

**Yingdan**’s heart waters the earth,
**Panghang**’s jade **Luo** shines.
**Genna** swallows the **Chimei**,
**Huolong** drifts across the waves.

**Shengshi** radiates with brilliance,
**Bingfu** records the **Ji**’s copper.
**Heiliao** pursues **Ning**, **Jianyu** builds a hundred **Cong**.
**Houyuan**’s waters pierce the depths,
**Shenhuan** sinks at **Jitai**.

**Chucui** urges **Lishang**,
**Bianxian** returns to **Shenhui**.

---
**Dao** speaks: Within these eight heavens, the **Great Brahman** hides its boundless sounds.
The ancient scriptures were carved upon the **Yuanming**’s northern mountains,
At the **Long**’s **A**’s **Xue**’s **Shimo**’s gate—
The root of all things, the nine heavens’ sacred texts.
Its **Dao**’s prohibitions and taboos are profound and unheard,
Each character vast and long, a span in breadth.

**Dao** speaks: The **Tianzhen**’s **Huangren** of old inscribed its scriptures,
To establish the **Zhengyin**—the true sound.

Those who know this sound, and with fasting recite it,
Shall see the **Feitian** gods and **Shenwang** of the **Zhutian** descend,
To observe their bodies and record their **gongqin**—meritorious deeds,
Then ascend to report to the **Zhutian**,
Where the **Wanshen**—myriad spirits—pay homage,
And the **Dizhi**—earthly deities—attend at the gate.
The **Zhenwang** of great merit shall recommend them to the **Shangzhen**—Highest Truth,
And when the **Dao** is complete, they shall attain its **ke**—power,
Wandering through the **Sanjie**—Three Realms—
And ascending into the **Jinmen**—Golden Gate.

This sound cleaves through all obstructions,
Dispels all misfortunes.
It penetrates all beings,
Accomplishes all things—
The **Tianzhen**’s natural sound.

Thus, when recited, it summons the **Feitian** to descend and witness,
The **Shen**’s **Di**—august sovereign—distant chanting,
The **Wanshen** paying homage in procession,
The **Sanjie**’s spirits attending the **Xuan**—celestial hall.
All **Qian**—demonic forces—bow their heads,
The **Gui**’s **Jing**—ghostly essences—self-destruct,
And **Línláng**—resplendent treasures—resound.
The **Shí Fāng**—ten directions—are purified,
The **Héhai**—rivers and seas—fall silent,
The **Shānyuè**—mountains and peaks—swallow mist,
All **Wànlíng**—myriad spirits—are subdued.
Summoning the **Qúnxiān**—multitudes of **Dao**’s immortals—
The heavens are free of **Fēn**’s **Huì**—vapors and impurities,
The earth of **Qian**’s **Chén**—demonic dust,
The **Mínghuì**—dark and enlightened—is clear as a void.
The **Da**’s **Liàng**—great compassion—is **Xuán**’s **Xuán**—profoundly mysterious.

The **Lingbao** *Wúliàng Dùrén Shàngpǐn Miào Jīng* concludes. **Volume the fifty-third** ends.

**The Chapter on Slaying and Extinguishing the Five Phases’ Malevolent Spirits**

The Dao speaks: *"In times past, within the Jade Purity Heaven, the Bright Vision Song of the Great Mighty Spirit was sung to slay and extinguish the myriad malevolent spirits of the Five Phases with the Supreme Way of the Primordial Beginning’s* **Wúliàng** *transformation. When the Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable delivered this sutra, circling ten times through the* **Shí Fāng**—*ten directions—He summoned all* **Qúnxiān**—*multitudes of Dao’s immortals—before taking His seat. The Heavenly True Great Deities, the Highest Saints, the True Persons of Marvelous Practice, the Five Imperial True Officials, the Great Generals of Manifest Might, the Mounting Officers Who Slay Evil, the Three Five of Yin-Yang, the Grand Administrators of Celestial Bureaus, the Purple Cloud Divine Soldiers, countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—all ascended upon the void.*

Golden radiance illumined the emptiness,
Treasure-cars of celestial winds,
Resplendent light’s feathered canopy,
Wreathed in morning mists—
All visions mingled in brilliance,
Shining across the eight* **Yuán**—*orbits,
for seven days and seven nights.

The* **Qúnxiān**—*multitudes of Dao’s immortals—from the* **Shí Fāng**—*ten directions—*
arrived at layered palaces of treasure-gates,
their transformations merging in the void,
the celestial laws suspended,
the starry networks aligned,
divine breezes fanning gently,
wondrous vapors congealing with fragrance,
the* **Qìxiàng**—*phenomena of qi—*harmonized,
rivers and mountains cleansed in stillness.
Within a single realm—its lands, mountains, forests, and streams—
all became level as one,
no longer high or low,
the earth transformed into radiant jade,
its luster clear as the five* **Míng**—*luminous hues.

The assembled immortals stood in attendance,
while the Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable sat in profound mystery,
His divine dragon guiding the Heavenly Primordial Seat.

When the sutra was delivered once,
the Great Saints of all heavens simultaneously extolled its virtue.
At that time,
all men and women of the realm
severed their attachment to the Five* **Yù**—*desires.

When the sutra was delivered twice,
the Five* **Huà**—*transformations—flourished in splendor.
When the sutra was delivered thrice,
the Five* **Wèi**—*celestial pivots—moved in proper course.
When the sutra was delivered four times,
the Five* **Qì**—*energies—remained balanced,
and all beings prospered in harmony.
When the sutra was delivered five times,
the Five* **Cháng**—*constants—were undisturbed,
and the Dao’s governance renewed daily.
When the sutra was delivered six times,
the Five* **Yùn**—*circulations—aligned in sequence,
with no deviation or error.
When the sutra was delivered seven times,
the Five* **Wén**—*patterns—were manifest,
and the mysterious teachings illuminated.
When the sutra was delivered eight times,
the Five* **Shén**—*spirits—held true,
and the might of the Dao spread abroad—
true* **Qì**—*vital energy—overflowed,
dissipating all inauspiciousness.
When the sutra was delivered nine times,
the Five* **Jīng**—*essences—were nurtured and secured,
preserving the luminous light.
When the sutra was delivered ten times,
all malevolent spirits within the Five Phases perished,
and at that moment,
all men and women of the realm
turned their hearts in reverence,
each receiving protection and attaining* **Chángshēng**—*longevity.

The Dao speaks: When the Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable delivered the sutra once,*
**Wújì** *of the* **Wúliàng** *Supreme Way—*
the True Great Deity Who Slays and Extinguishes the Malevolent Spirits of the Green* **Jīng**—*essence—*
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
ascended upon the void.

When the sutra was delivered twice,*
**Wújì** *of the* **Wúliàng** *Supreme Way—*
the True Great Deity Who Slays and Extinguishes the Malevolent Spirits of the Red* **Jīng**—*essence—*
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
ascended upon the void.

When the sutra was delivered thrice,*
**Wújì** *of the* **Wúliàng** *Supreme Way—*
the True Great Deity Who Slays and Extinguishes the Malevolent Spirits of the White* **Jīng**—*essence—*
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
ascended upon the void.

When the sutra was delivered four times,*
**Wújì** *of the* **Wúliàng** *Supreme Way—*
the True Great Deity Who Slays and Extinguishes the Malevolent Spirits of the Black* **Jīng**—*essence—*
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
ascended upon the void.

When the sutra was delivered five times,*
**Wújì** *of the* **Wúliàng** *Supreme Way—*
the True Great Deity Who Slays and Extinguishes the wandering* **Jīng**—*essences—of the Fire Phase—*
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
ascended upon the void.

When the sutra was delivered six times,*
**Wújì** *of the* **Wúliàng** *Supreme Way—*
the True Great Deity Who Slays and Extinguishes the wandering* **Jīng**—*essences—of the Metal Phase—*
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
ascended upon the void.

When the sutra was delivered seven times,*
**Wújì** *of the* **Wúliàng** *Supreme Way—*
the True Great Deity Who Slays and Extinguishes the wandering* **Jīng**—*essences—of the Water Phase,*
and the central Yellow* **Jīng**—*essence—*
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
ascended upon the void.

When the sutra was delivered eight times,*
**Wújì** *of the* **Wúliàng** *Supreme Way—*
the True Great Deity Who Slays and Extinguishes the wandering* **Jīng**—*essences—of the Wood Phase—*
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
ascended upon the void.

When the sutra was delivered nine times,*
**Wújì** *of the* **Wúliàng** *Supreme Way—*
the True Great Deity Who Slays and Extinguishes the Five Phases’ malevolent spirits of the Heavenly Primordial—*
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
ascended upon the void.

When the sutra was delivered ten times,*
**Wújì** *of the* **Wúliàng** *Supreme Way—*
the True Great Deity Who Slays and Extinguishes the Five Phases’ malevolent spirits of the Earthly Primordial—*
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
ascended upon the void.

After ten full recitations,
the True Great Deities of* **Wújì** *from the* **Shí Fāng**—*ten directions—*
Who Slay and Extinguish the Five Phases’ malevolent spirits,
all arrived together.
All men and women of the realm
turned their hearts in reverence.

The arrivals were like dense clouds and fine mists—
countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
they filled half the land,
causing it to tilt and sink,
a force beyond restraining.

Thus, the Primordial Beginning manifested a single* **Yuánxiàng**—*circular form—*
of boundless size and scale,
its five hues radiant,
suspended in the void above the earth by nine* **zhàng**—*fathoms.

The Primordial Beginning ascended,
and the Heavenly True Great Deities,
the Highest Saints,
the True Persons of Marvelous Practice,
the Five Imperial True Officials,
the Great Generals of Manifest Might,
the Mounting Officers Who Slay Evil,
the Three Five of Yin-Yang and Grand Administrators of Celestial Bureaus,
the True Divine Kings of the* **Shí Fāng**—*ten directions—*
Who Slay and Extinguish the Five Phases’ malevolent spirits,
the Purple Cloud Divine Soldiers,
the Three Heavenly Attendants,
and countless as the* **Wúliàng**—*without measure—*
all entered the* **Yuánxiàng**—*circular form.

The celestial beings gazed upward,
and saw only a soft, flowing motion
as they entered the* **Yuánxiàng**—*circular form—*
once inside,
their whereabouts unknown.
The populace dispersed,
the earth restored to its rightful level,
no longer tilted or sunken.

The Primordial Beginning then,
within the* **Yuánxiàng**—*circular form—*
delivered the sutra in full.
The assembled immortals oversaw its transmission,
bestowing it upon me.
At that moment,
joy and celebration were beyond expression.

The ritual matters were thus completed,
the celestial beings returned to their stations,
and in an instant,
all traces of sound vanished.

At that time,
all celestial beings who encountered the sutra’s teachings
universally received salvation,
their lives preserved without injury,
their lands restored to level,
their hearts turned in proper reverence.
They no longer tilted or sank,
no longer deceived or flattered,
no longer cruel or obstinate,
no longer rebellious or perverse,
no longer jealous or malevolent.
Their words and deeds were straight and true,
their wisdom sharp and clear,
their enlightenment unified,
their discordant bones harmonized,
the realm secure and its people at ease,
their joy unbounded and pure.

The sutra’s teachings first emerged,
and all within the realm
turned to the Dao.
Those who approached with sincere devotion,
who revered and honored it,
all attained transcendence of the world.

The Dao speaks: All the names spoken by the Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable in this sutra
are the hidden names of the celestial deities,
their sounds veiled in mystery."*

「亦是真魔内讳，斩灭五行邪怪百灵之隐名也，非世上之常辞。」
This is also the secret name of the True Demon, the hidden names of the hundred spirits that slay and extinguish the Five Phases’ malevolent and monstrous beings—uncommon words of this world.

「上圣已成真人，通玄究微，能悉其章。」
The Most Exalted Sage has already become a True Person, mastering the Profound and exploring the Subtle, and knows all its verses.

「诵之十过，诸天赞咏，五灵敬侍，金木水火，元土合并，神粹凝和，毒害不生，混养内化，洞冥至真，邪怪鬼祆，无缘而兴。」
When recited ten times, the celestial deities praise and chant it, the Five Spirits revere and attend it, and the Five Phases—Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, and Earth—converge in unity. The divine essence condenses and harmonizes, no venom or calamity arises, the nurturing *qi* circulates internally, and the profound truth is illuminated. Malevolent and monstrous spirits, ghosts and demons, cannot manifest without cause.

「至学之士，诵之十过，则五帝鉴观，九真举仙，邪试灭迹，怪祸永蠲，道业保固，善行克全。」
Those of the highest learning, when reciting it ten times, will have the Five Emperors witness and observe, the Nine True Ones ascend as immortals, demonic tests vanish, and strange disasters are forever eradicated. Their Daoic practice is secured, and virtuous deeds are fully accomplished.

「所以尔者，通感五行之神，荡伏邪怪，召制威灵，克成至道，和合真气，保育人命，得跻玄境。」
This is why: it resonates with the spirits of the Five Phases, dispels and subdues malevolent beings, summons and controls formidable spirits, fulfills the Supreme Dao, unifies the true *qi*, nurtures human life, and grants ascension to the Mysterious Realm.

「降会高真，不死而已，岂复更生。」
The High Immortals descend to gather—immortality itself is achieved; how much more can life be prolonged?

「轻诵此章，身则被殃。」
If recited carelessly, one’s body will suffer misfortune.

「共养尊礼，门户兴隆，世世昌炽，与善因缘，万灾不干，神明护门。」
If revered and honored with sincerity, the household will flourish, prosperity enduring through generations. Aligned with virtuous causes, no calamity will touch it, and divine spirits will guard the door.

「斯经尊妙，独步玉京，度人无量，为万道之宗。」
This scripture is most venerable and wondrous, unmatched in the Jade Capital, with boundless power to liberate beings. It stands as the root of all Daoic teachings.

「巍巍大范，德难可胜。」
Its vast and towering principles are profound—virtue beyond measure.

「道言：凡诵是经十过，诸天齐到，十方斩灭五行邪怪之神，剿绝魔精，五行之内，不为殃祸，灾咎永消，用保福祥，而运化常宁，安镇率土，普承玄恩，仁寿富乐，清静自然也。」
The Dao declares: Whenever this scripture is recited ten times, all celestial realms converge, and the spirits of the Five Phases’ malevolent beings across the ten directions are slain and extinguished. Demon essence is eradicated, and within the Five Phases, no misfortune or calamity occurs. Disasters vanish forever, ensuring blessings and auspiciousness, eternal harmony, and tranquility for all lands. The people universally receive the Mysterious Grace, with benevolent longevity and abundant prosperity, in natural stillness and purity.

「上学之士，修诵是经，消涤邪害，道气清真。」
Those of superior learning who practice and recite this scripture will purge malevolent influences, and their Daoic *qi* will be pure and refined.

「世人受诵，则元真受妙，惑念永忘，全其寿年，后皆得受炼度之道。」
All beings who receive its recitation will attain the Original True Essence and its marvels, forever casting off deluded thoughts, preserving their full lifespan, and later all attaining the Dao of Refinement and Liberation.

「魂神暂灭，不经地狱，即得返形，游行太空。」
The soul, though temporarily extinguished, does not pass through the Underworld; it swiftly regains form and wanders in the Great Void.

「此经微妙，普度无穷，一切天人，莫不受庆。」
This scripture is subtle and wondrous, with boundless power to liberate all beings—every celestial and human being rejoices in its grace.

「无量之福，生死蒙惠。」
Its blessings are immeasurable, extending mercy across life and death.

「上天所宝，不传下世。」
It is a treasure of the Most High Heaven, not to be passed down to the mortal world.

「至士赍金宝效心，盟天而传，轻泄漏慢，殃及九祖。」
Only the most noble scholars, bearing golden treasures with sincere devotion and swearing to Heaven, may transmit it. If revealed carelessly or with negligence, misfortune will fall upon their nine generations of ancestors.

「长役考官，侍经五帝，玉童玉女，各三十六人，营卫神文，保护受经者身。」
The Eternal Officials serve the Five Emperors of the scripture, with thirty-six Jade Boys and thirty-six Jade Girls guarding its divine texts, protecting the body of those who receive it.

「道言：正月长斋，诵咏是经，召上元将军，斩灭五行邪怪，不正之祆，即使天界澄廓，七耀常明。」
The Dao declares: During the first month’s long fast, reciting this scripture summons the Upper Primordial General, who slays and extinguishes the Five Phases’ malevolent beings and unrighteous spirits, making the celestial realm clear and the seven luminaries eternally bright.

「七月长斋，诵咏是经，召中元官将，斩灭五行邪怪，不正之精，保卫兆民，使安其生。」
During the seventh month’s long fast, reciting this scripture summons the Middle Primordial Officials and Generals, who slay and extinguish the Five Phases’ malevolent beings and unrighteous essences, safeguarding the myriad people and ensuring their peace.

「十月长斋，诵咏是经，召下元官君将吏，五岳兵马，斩灭五行邪怪，不正之灵，安镇天下，庆佑君亲，历世绵长，后天而存。」
During the tenth month’s long fast, reciting this scripture summons the Lower Primordial Officials, Generals, and attendants, along with the armies of the Five Sacred Peaks, to slay and extinguish the Five Phases’ malevolent beings and unrighteous spirits. This brings tranquility to all lands, blesses the sovereign and kin, and ensures enduring prosperity through generations, persisting beyond Heaven’s decree.

「八节之日，诵咏是经，召天地四方八极兵马，却绝魔灵，顺布五气，长养生成。」
On the eight festival days, reciting this scripture summons the armies of Heaven, Earth, the four directions, and the eight extremes, repelling demonic spirits and harmonizing the Five *qi*, fostering eternal life and growth.

「本命之日，诵咏是经，召天元九宫，星宿真官，威杀之神，检校命箓五行邪怪，祛斩灭踪，五神守正，万气资形，生道灵坚，超迁上清。」
On one’s birth-day, reciting this scripture summons the Nine Palaces of Heaven’s Primordial, the True Officials of the Star Hosts, and the gods of formidable slaughter, to inspect and verify the fate-scriptures, the Five Phases’ malevolent beings, and dispel and annihilate their traces. The Five Spirits uphold their proper order, the myriad *qi* nourish the body, the Daoic life-force becomes invigorated, and one ascends to the Upper Pure Realm.

「道言：行道之日，皆当香汤沐浴，斋戒入室，东向，叩齿三十二通，上闻三十二天，心拜三十二过，闭目，静思身坐青黄赤三色云气之中，内外苍冥，有青龙、白虎、朱雀、玄武、狮子、白鹤，罗列左右，日月照明，洞焕室内，项生圆象，光映十方，如此分明。」
The Dao declares: On the days of Daoic practice, one must bathe in fragrant waters, fast and enter the chamber, facing east, striking the teeth thirty-two times, ascending to hear the Thirty-two Heavens, bowing in heart to the Thirty-two Passages, closing the eyes, and meditating quietly on the body seated within the triple-colored *qi* of Azure, Yellow, and Red. Within and without, all is profound darkness, yet the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane array themselves on either side, with the sun and moon shining brightly. The chamber is illuminated, a luminous halo forms at the neck, and its light radiates across the ten directions—all distinctly manifest.

「密咒曰：无上玄元，太上道君，召出臣身中三五功曹，左右官使者，侍香玉童，传言玉女，五帝直符，直日香官，各三十二人，关启所言。」
The secret incantation proclaims:
*"O Most High Primordial, O Supreme Daoic Lord,
Summon forth from my body the Thirty-five Officials of Three and Five,
The left and right attendants and messengers,
The Fragrant Jade Boys who serve,
The Jade Girls who convey speech,
The Thirty-two Direct Symbols of the Five Emperors,
The Thirty-two Fragrant Officials of the True Day,
To open the gate and fulfill my words."*

「今日吉庆，长斋清堂。」
*"Today is auspicious and joyous,
With a pure hall of long fasting."*

「修行至经，无量度人，愿所启上彻，径御无上三十二天元始上帝至尊几前。」
*"Practicing this most profound scripture,
With boundless power to liberate beings,
I pray my invocation ascends directly
Before the throne of the Most Exalted Primordial Emperor of the Thirty-two Heavens."*

「毕，引炁三十二过，东向诵经。」
*"When finished, draw in the breath thirty-two times,
And recite the scripture facing east."*

**元始无量度人上品妙经**
**The Primordial Beginning’s Supreme Scripture of Boundless Liberation, Most Marvelous and Highest**

**元始洞玄灵宝本章，上品妙首，斩邪灭怪，十回度人。**
The Primordial Beginning’s Chapter of Profound Mysteries and Divine Treasures is the most wondrous of its kind, capable of slaying malevolence and extinguishing demons, and tenfold liberating beings.

**百魔隐韵，离合自然。**
The hundred demons’ secret sounds unfold—separating and uniting by natural law.

**五气真文，玄虚上神。**
The Five *qi*’s true writings belong to the Supreme God of Profound Void.

**大混灵源，天地幽根。**
The Great Convergence is the source of all spirits, the hidden root of Heaven and Earth.

**统运五气，五行之元。**
It governs the Five *qi*, the origin of the Five Phases.

**大化总御，历劫绵绵。**
The Great Transformation is universally sovereign, enduring across countless kalpas.

**五行布育，相保生成。**
The Five Phases spread their nurturing influence, each safeguarding the other’s creation.

**非道不显，非道不明，非道不立，非道不真。**
Without the Dao, nothing is revealed, nothing is illuminated, nothing is established, nothing is true.

**错沴结霭，邪怪流形。**
Malignant and turbid *qi* congeals into mist, and malevolent and monstrous forms emerge.

**自然神德，祛伐无停。**
The natural divine virtue relentlessly dispels and annihilates them without pause.

**是为妙范，玄上之宗，太极玉关，金关灵都。**
This is the wondrous model, the root of the Profound Supreme, the Jade Barrier of the Great Pole, and the Divine Capital of the Golden Barrier.

**阴阳元会，三气之枢。**
The convergence of Yin and Yang is the pivot of the Three *qi*.

**浩浩元气，乍合乍殊。**
The vast Primordial *qi* alternately unites and disperses.

**青琳玉宫，始晖妙庭。**
The Azure and Verdant Jade Palace is the court of the Original Radiance.

**墉台积霄，交和耀晶。**
The ramparts and towers accumulate celestial heights, their harmonizing brilliance gleaming like crystal.

**大周十境，罗络弥纶。**
The Great Encompassing of the Ten Realms is intricately woven and boundless.

**中有调运五行顺化之神，**
Within it dwells the god who regulates the Five Phases, aligning with their natural transformations,

**中有宰御玄极生育之君，**
And the lord who sovereignly oversees the Mysterious Supreme’s life-nurturing power,

**中有馘祆破害大神，**
The great god who beheads malevolent spirits and shatters calamities,

**中有仙灵宝箓官君丈人，**
The immortal officials and revered elders who wield the sacred talismans,

**中有阴阳三五七九明威正一定命尊神。**
And the august gods of Yin and Yang, Three and Five, Seven and Nine, whose manifest might fixes fate unerringly.

「Severing and extinguishing malevolent spirits, boundless in guiding beings.
Today’s compilation is recorded—all the celestial hosts attend in solemn assembly.

**The Eight Directions:**
The Flying Celestial of the Boundless Extreme, God-King Who Beheads Evil and Extinguishes Monsters—Eternal Saint of Great Longevity, Boundless in Guiding Beings—
*East, South, West, North,*
*Northeast, Southeast, Southwest, Northwest,*
*Above, Below,*
*All Ten Directions’ Most True Flying Celestial, God-King Who Beheads Evil and Extinguishes Monsters—Eternal Saint of Boundless World-Guiding Great God—*
Together ascending in the dawn-mist jewel chariot,
On wind-borne celestial radiance, feathered canopy and winged escorts,
With the Three Primordial Official Generals, the Ten Ultimate Immortals,
Raising the banner of demon-slaying, the flag of monster-quelling,
Before chanting the *Hollowed True* hymn, behind singing the *Soul-Void* wondrous song,
Purple cranes and dark geese in harmonious call,
Heavenly Puffball clearing the path, dragon and tiger wings at the axle—
Ten million riders, a hundred thousand steeds,
Floating through the void, their light returning in splendor,
Overseeing the True to guide the living.

The Inner Celestial Warden, the Fire-Bell High Official,
Overseeing the Great Demon, restraining the Mysterious Spirits,
The Purple Clarity Chief Registrar, the Guiding Great God,
Brandishing the battle-axe and mace, deploying boundless might,
All pay homage to the Imperial Edict, inspecting the Five Phases,
Surveying and regulating ten thousand kinds, the Creative Spirit’s office.

Mountains, rivers, seas, and peaks—
The threads of stars’ transits.
The Eight Oceans, Nine Terraces,
The Twelve Constellations—
*Keng-Dang* and *Xian-Te*, the errant and malevolent.
Binding malevolent essences, the forms of monstrous evil,
Not to be slackened or indulged, lest demonic hordes run wild.
By Primordial Beginning’s decree, the gods are commanded:
*"Sever evil without remission, open the Way to nourish life.
Preserve the True Path, reverse the Wheel of Calamity.
Refine the True Principle, spread the Wondrous Qi.
No sickness shall afflict mortals—divine virtue shines clear.
Forever guiding worldly woes, equal to Heaven’s age.
Transcending the Three Realms of Suffering, utterly free from torment.
Ascending beyond the demonic realm, soaring in the High Mysterious.
The High Mysterious Heaven—Heavenly Sovereign Yu-Yan,
The Formless Realm of the Dharma-King.*

**The Eight Eastern Heavens:**
*Bright Rite Heaven of Jade Compliance*, Sovereign Hu-Hui, *Returning to the Theme*.
*Silent Mysterious Heaven of Rectified Path*, Sovereign Liao-Yao, *Initially True*.
*Assisting Awakening, Pacifying Yang Heaven*, Sovereign Xiu-Dan, *Observing the Vermilion Gate*.
*Beginning Illumination, Refining Heaven*, Sovereign Bian-Ying, *Child of Fullness*.
*Spiritual Dew, Following Transformation Heaven*, Sovereign Hai-Guang, *Piercing the Pearl*.
*Square Cavern, Imperial Journey Heaven*, Sovereign Qu-Xie, *Harmony Without End*.
*Capital Foundation, Radiant Heaven*, Sovereign Po-Su, *Universal Platform*.
*Purple Deer, Conjuring Immortal Heaven*, Sovereign Fu-Chang, *Eternal Life*.

**The Eight Southern Heavens:**
*Great Mysterious, Morning Bright Heaven*, Sovereign Bao-Che, *Purple Weave*.
*Crown-Light, Treading True Heaven*, Sovereign Dao-Ji, *Secretly Manifest*.
*Preserving Mysterious, Celebrating Wisdom Heaven*, Sovereign Dun-Xi, *Ren of Valley*.
*Transmitting Spirit, Quelling Demon Heaven*, Sovereign Pian-Zu, *Drowning Demons*.
*Manifesting Life, Transforming Body Heaven*, Sovereign Yin-Xue, *Revealing the Cavern*.
*Crimson Jewel, Descending Security Heaven*, Sovereign Yi-Lu, *Obscure Mechanism*.
*Bestowing Luster, Assisting Bright Heaven*, Sovereign Yuan-Lou, *Sha-Yong’s Virtue*.
*Piercing Light, Revering Mysterious Heaven*, Sovereign He-Tong, *Discerning Clarity*.

**The Eight Western Heavens:**
*Divine Text, Demonstrating Ancestral Heaven*, Sovereign Yu-Qi, *Upper Primordial*.
*Tiger Robes, World-Marking Heaven*, Sovereign Fan-Wu, *Extended Harmony*.
*Wandering True, Applying Void Heaven*, Sovereign Ye-Chang, *Dragon’s Splendor*.
*Rectified Qi, Symbolizing Firm Heaven*, Sovereign Miao-Yu, *Nurturing Rule*.
*Measuring Spirit, Questioning Seal Heaven*, Sovereign Xuan-You, *Declaring Hidden Truth*.
*Performing Merit, Verifying Dao Heaven*, Sovereign Yun-Chang, *Ever-Bright*.
*Fierce Earth, Gathering Darkness Heaven*, Sovereign Hao-Xi, *Path of the Abyss*.
*Slaying Monsters, Communicating Governance Heaven*, Sovereign Chu-Yan, *Noble Spirit*.

**The Eight Northern Heavens:**
*Forbidding, Pacifying the Utterly Harmful Heaven*, Sovereign Qiong-Fu, *Immortal Splendor*.
*High Celestial, Exalted Microcosm, Praising the Ancestral*, Sovereign Feng-Hua, *Flying Standard*.
*Piercing Aspiration, Solemn Void, Upholding Firm Heaven*, Sovereign Wen-He, *Exalted Virtue*.
*Ninefold Transformation, Reflecting Benevolence Heaven*, Sovereign Tu-Miao, *Pure Clarity*.
*Obscured Together, Restoring Tranquility Heaven*, Sovereign Yang-Wen, *Child of Holding*.
*Northern Clarity, Overseeing the Supreme Heaven*, Sovereign Pan-Huang, *Judge of the Imperial Extremes*.
*Mysterious Subtlety, Investigating Fate Heaven*, Sovereign Shou-Meng, *Resourceful Achievement*.
*Mirroring Spirit, Examining Prison, Interrogating Soul Heaven*, Sovereign Wang-Zhe, *Yi-Qing’s Discernment*.

The Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Sovereigns.
The Heavens’ hidden names, the Heavens’ concealed titles.
The Central Void’s emptiness—naturally the Spirit’s mark.
The Heavens’ hidden melodies, the sounds of the Five Phases,
The Five Phases’ august ones, the Five Phases’ gods,
The Five Phases’ Great Demons, the Five Phases’ Spirits.
Nine Harmonies, Ten Unifications—transforming in the Upper Pure.
Boundless Mysterious Profundity, too deep to fathom.
Deploying divine truths, universally guiding Heaven and man.

Today’s joyous celebration of receiving guidance,
Passing through the Celestial Passes—
Praying for the extinguishing of monstrous evil,
Severing the root of heresy,
Regulating the Five Phases, merits equaling the Great Primordial.
The True King’s sovereignty, the Dao-Qi’s unfolding.
*East Extreme—transforming Wood,*
*West Extreme—generating Metal,*
*North Extreme—congealing Water,*
*South Extreme—stirring Fire,*
*Central Extreme—Upper Palace,*
*Converging the Four Mysterious.*

The Green Sovereign preserves life,
The White Sovereign gathers virtue,
The Red Sovereign drowns malevolence,
The Black Sovereign collects poison,
The Yellow Sovereign, Central King—
All calamities cease.

The Wood-phase Great Demon, the Flying Light Jewel Dragon.
The Fire-phase Great Demon, the Radiant Heavenly Purple Boy.
The Metal-phase Great Demon, the Returning Spirit’s Assembly.
The Water-phase Great Demon, the Qi-Riding Wind-Chariot.»

「The Earth-phase Great Demon, the Effulgent Cavernous Arch.
The Five-phase Great Demons, the Ancestors of Ten Thousand Spirits.
Their legions command celestial officers,
Entering and exiting the shadowy netherworld.
Crossing spears and encircling armor,
Ten thousand steeds race upon the clouds.
They wield authority and punishments,
Their ranks aligned with the Dao’s order.

The Jade Heaven opens its transformation,
Inspecting and recording the deceit of spirits.
The Illuminating Clarity flows freely,
Exhausting all that comes before.
The Jade Pivot cascades fiercely,
Its brilliance extending to the Eight Directions.
Three Generals gallop swift,
Four Marshals unfurl their banners.
Seizing the sky and touching the furnace,
Striking thunder and scattering mist.
Dare any trespass—
They block and suppress the Supreme True One.
The Golden Axe strikes in the fore,
The Great Sovereign’s punishment follows.
Sweeping away evil demons,
Wind and fire relentlessly purge.
Thousands upon thousands behead,
Ten thousands upon ten thousands mutilate.
Demons dare not trespass,
Ghosts dare not plot malevolence,
The Three Officials of Northern Acidfield—
Their scrutiny pierces the ghostly encampments.
No hiding place remains,
The Golden Horse Relay presents them.

Proclaiming to the boundless,
All spirits heed the call,
The Five Imperials of the Three Realms—
Their words ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The Mysterious Primordial’s wondrous records,
The Five Qi’s unfolding sovereignty.
Vast and boundless, the Great Chaos,
Its transformation subtle and indistinct.
Above, it bestows celestial splendor,
Below, it spreads luminous light.
Enveloping the Primordial Dharma,
It weaves through Heaven and Earth.
Yin and Yang harmonize,
Sequenced in the Five Phases.
The Five Phases interweave,
Nurturing and giving birth.
Pushing and swaying without obstruction,
Uniting to return to the True.

The wondrous Dao pervades all,
Its movement follows nature’s course.
The Five True Ones flow and perform,
Ascending and descending in rotation.
Nourishing life and transforming existence,
Its Qi mingles like a spring’s welling.
The Five Functions follow their natural order,
Ten thousand kinds flourish and multiply.
The triumphant Qi lingers nearby,
Assuming positions and shifting.
Excess becomes pestilence,
From whence arise malevolent demons.
They manifest as towering calamities,
All creatures bear grievances.

The Supreme Deity commands their annihilation,
And scatters them in the Five Manifestations.
The Scarlet Book and Jade Characters,
The Eight Directions’ Dragon Scriptures.
They safeguard the cosmic cycles,
Ensuring the heavens endure.

The Dharma’s Qi spreads vast,
All patterns unfold.
The Primordial Halter flows and performs,
Thirty-two Heavens revolve.
Turning without color,
Circulating the Ten Directions,
Revolving through the Dipper and Arrow,
Returning to the Five Phases.
Thirty-five divisions,
Collecting the Qi of the Upper Primordial.
Eight Scenes converge in darkness,
The Qi enters the Mysterious Mysteries.
Within the Mysterious, the Great Sovereign,
The Supreme Deity of High Truth.

The Radiant Scenes of the Great Caverns,
Echoing with resounding hymns.
The Golden True One’s brilliance,
Its voice reverberates through the clouded camps.
The Jade Sound gathers the Qi,
The Spirit Wind assembles the mist.
The Purple Void’s luxuriant splendor,
Assists and wings all Ten Thousand Immortals.
The Five Qi’s blend,
Naturally achieves the True.
Within the True, there is Spirit,
The Supreme Ultimate’s Primordial Lord.
The Three Heavenly True Ones,
The Great Chaos’s Venerable Spirit.
The Grand Unity governs transformations,
The Three Five Celestial Officers,
Holding talismans and scriptures,
Preserve and guide the Spirit True Ones.
Ascending the Upper Clarity’s currents,
Entering and exiting the Hall of Splendor,
Within the Eight Mysteries,
In the minutest details.

Below, it steadies the Five Sacred Peaks,
Above, it calms the Nine Heavens.
Within, it regulates the Five Qi,
Blending them with all Ten Thousand Spirits.
Ten thousand rotations return to the Spirit,
Ten thousand Qi’s harmonize with the Immortals,
The Five Phases’ malevolent demons—
All are annihilated, none remain.
The High Clarity of Purple Micro,
Flowing through all the Heavens.
It oversees the world’s sins and blessings,
Its essence aligned with the Dao’s mysteries.
The Immortal Dao values life,
Its boundless guidance for all beings.
The Five Stars blaze resplendent,
Flying through the heavens like a wheel.
Below, it sustains the Nine Palaces,
Above, it opens the Eight Gates.
Sins and blessings are forbidden,
Karmic causes and conditions,
All receive guidance and enlightenment,
The Five Phases give birth to form.
Form attains life’s reception,
Above, it hears the Heavens’ voices.
Beyond the Heavens,
Each has its own birth-gate.
Within, the Five Phases reside,
In the void’s hollow scriptures,
The True King’s Spirit Chapters,
Their words echo with the High Truth.

**First Chapter: The Transformation of the Five Phases into Flying Void’s Sound**
Before the Great Dharma’s opening,
Formless and nameless,
The Two Principles divide,
Their ranks listed among the Five Phases.
East is verdant, West is pure,
South is crimson, North is abyssal.
The Primordial One dwells in Central Yellow,
The Five Qi’s cycle interweaves.
Each holds its master nature,
With the Dao their shifting form.
This is the Dao’s root,
Its essence linked to color.
The Jade Terrace and the Jade Palace,
The Emerald Mountains and the Golden Gates.
The Upper True Ones and Immortal Saints,
The Boundless Imperial Lords.
Within the shadowy depths,
The True Qi harmonizes.
The brocade banners and yellow sashes,
The purple canopies and vermilion wheels.
All are the True’s Five Colors,
Their forms shifting with transformations.
At rest, they merge into the void,
At division, they multiply ten thousandfold.
Ascending beyond the Three Realms,
Flying void to attain immortality.
This Dao the world knows not,
The True King shall now proclaim.

The Spirit Cavern spans ten thousand leagues,
The Golden Gates gleam in brilliance.
In the fleeting instant of the Flying Spirit,
All Saints race upon clouded palanquins.
The mortal path contemplates its turning,
Yet I am always moved with pity.
How better to turn toward the Mysterious Dao,
To meet its wondrous origins and rest.
Malevolent demons all sink and cease,
To dwell eternally before the Jade Emperor.

**Second Chapter: The Annihilation of the Five Phases’ Malevolent Demons**
The Heavenly Primordial, Grand Unity,
The Emperor commands the host of spirits.
Guarding the world above,
Preserving the essence of life.
Garb of embroidered robes and sashes,
Jade crowns and green headbands.
Green Dragons arrayed to the left,
White Tigers to the right as guests.
Wearing the Dragon Saber’s talisman,
The Five Blessings’ scriptures.
They command the legions of spirits,
The Three Five Generals.
They inspect Yin and Yang,
Harmonizing the Primordial Mechanism.
The Five Phases’ malevolent demons,
All are toppled and destroyed.
If evil arises, it is cut down,
If demons appear, they are crushed.
They bestow protection and blessings,
Awakening the hidden and rare.
Malevolent demons now consumed,
The Five Emperors descend with spiritual might.
They guard the world for ten thousand years,
Their virtue ever radiant and bright.
The Yellow Dragon descends from the Middle Heaven,
The Emperor’s longevity is the sky’s hope.
The Spirit Cavern’s hollow scriptures,
Fragrant incense ascends, green mist flies.

**Third Chapter: The Song of Harmonizing the Five Phases to Return to the Dao’s Essence**
The Great Void’s Mysterious Wondrous Spirit,
The Hollow Void’s Primordial Lord.
Born within the boundless depths,
The transformations mark the Primordial Root.
Diluted and indistinct in its true nature,
It reflects back to extinguish the malevolent haze.
Dispelling demons and harm,
It surges and merges with the Supreme True.
Radiant wisdom’s edge,
Its punishments scatter the malevolent.
The Five Turbidities dare not disturb,
Its brilliance and splendor manifest.
Wearing the Spirit Talisman’s scriptures,
Its clouded light shines upon its form.
The Jade Talisman steadies the inner light,
The Dragon and Tiger intertwine within the embryo.
Water, Fire, Metal, Wood intermingle,
Unified in the Sovereign’s Primordial Spirit.
Majestic, it commands the Crimson Gates,
Shadowy, it regulates all Ten Thousand Essences.
Who knows of the cycles of years and eons?
It eternally preserves the boundless lifespan.»

「Beyond the Wheel of *Dharma*’s three realms,
Soaring to the Nine Pure Lands.

Here, above the three realms,
Within the void of boundless sky,
The True Sovereign’s sacred chant resounds,
Its voice harmonizes with the Primordial Scriptures.
Recite it a hundred times,
And your name shall cross the *Nāga*’s Southern Palace.
Recite it a thousand times,
And the *Māra* King shall bid you welcome.
Ten thousand recitations complete the Dao,
Ascending to the void of boundless sky,
Transcending the three realms,
You attain the rank of the Celestial Sage.
Hearing the spirit’s sacred sound,
Malevolent spirits vanish from your form.
Commanding the *Dhātus* of the earth,
You shield the myriad folk from calamity.
Dispelling misfortune and evil,
You cross the *Yama*’s dark threshold,
The Seven Patriarchs ascend in glory,
Forever freed from spectral bands.
Your soul traverses the Vermilion Heights,
Refined anew through trials.

This is called the boundless scripture,
Universal salvation without end.
There are secret celestial texts,
Cherished by all the *Devas*.

To reveal them lightly or scorn them
Is to fall into the *Avīci* hell,
Bringing ruin to the Seven Patriarchs.

The Dao declares: These two stanzas
Are the hidden speech of the Celestial Sovereigns
And the Supreme True Sovereigns—
All are the words of the Great *Brahmā*,
Not the common tongue of mortal men.
No melodious rhyme, no ornate verse,
Thus called profound and elusive,
Hard to fathom in detail.
Treasure of the heavens,
Sealed in the Highest Dao’s Eastern Chamber,
Within the *Lingbao*’s sacred vault,
By the Primordial Science’s decree,
To be revealed after thirty-seven thousand years.

If a perfected adept brings a heart of pure gold,
And solemnly pledges allegiance to the Jade Pure,
Then the texts shall be entrusted to them.

The Dao declares: When the Five *Phases*’ *qi* runs amok,
Lust and usurpation arise.
When *Yin* and *Yang* surge in chaos,
Malevolent spirits take form.
Seizing the nodes of *qi*,
Punishments and harm ensue.
All who suffer such calamities,
Let the virtuous scholar unite in fasting,
Offering incense at all six times,
Turning the *Sutra* tenfold—
Then virtue’s blessings descend,
Dissolving all ill omens.
The boundless scripture,
Universal salvation without end.

The Dao declares: When the Five *Phases* wane and fade,
Life’s measure is spent.
If the Three *Yuan*’s cycle is missed,
The Primordial *Qi* withers away.
Shallow students, Dao yet unfulfilled,
Their sage-grade incomplete—
When the fate of extinction draws near,
And their body passes into the Great *Yin*,
At the hour of departure,
Fellow students of the perfected should offer incense
And recite the *Sutra* ten times,
To guide their earthly form as per the law.
Their spirit ascends to the Southern Palace,
By their merit, day by day they are reborn.
The Wheel of *Dharma* turns without doubt,
And they attain the realm of gods and immortals.

The Dao declares: When the Five *Phases*’ *qi* manifests as malevolence,
It brings the end of heaven and earth’s cycles,
The stars and constellations stray from their paths,
The sun and moon lose their light,
The four seasons fall out of order,
*Yin* and *Yang* grow discordant,
Kingdoms tremble in unrest,
Wars and flames arise,
Plagues and poisons spread,
The myriad folk perish in affliction,
And masters and disciples meet their fate.

All should fast and offer incense,
Reciting the *Sutra*—
Then the malevolent spirits of the Five *Phases*
Hear the scripture’s power and are subdued.
Calling their names aloud,
Describing their origin and primal form,
They kneel and beg for mercy,
Never daring to disturb again.
The hidden, wondrous Dao and its true talismans
Repel all evils without fail.

Fasting and reciting the *Sutra* bear great merit.
Above, they dispel celestial calamities,
Sever malevolent spirits,
Guard and uphold the emperor’s rule,
Below, they avert plagues and harm,
And guide the myriad folk through life and death.
Their blessings are beyond measure,
Thus the scripture is called boundless,
Universal salvation for gods and men.

The Dao declares: All who possess this *Sutra*,
Can for the emperor, the Celestial Sovereigns,
And the myriad folk,
Perform these deeds of virtue.
On days of calamity,
With sincere devotion, they fast and burn incense,
Reciting the *Sutra* ten times—
All the *Devas* record their names,
Ten thousand spirits stand as guardians,
The perfected ones of the Right Branch
Shall surely make them ministers of the Golden Palace.

The *Devas* record each person’s merits and sins,
Without the slightest omission.
Even the True Sovereigns of the heavens
Shall commend their names,
And those who attain the Dao
Shall grasp the profound truth of these words.

Within the heavens, the Great *Brahmā*’s hidden speech
Resounds in boundless sound.»

—Composed by the Dao Sovereign,
From the *Yuan Shi Lingbao*’s Middle Volume,
The Eastern Eight Celestial Lands.

The orange *yu* departs from the jade,
Its melody piercing beyond the *lǜ* and *jiǎo*.
The *qíluó* bends like vermilion,
Its subtle brilliance surpassing *chǔ* and *jǐn*.

Clouds drift in jade expanse,
Swift and wise, their grace refined.
The *shēn* and *zhé* chime in the *jīnfáng*,
While *yǎn* and *shēng* record their deeds.

Pearls gleam in the sun’s radiance,
The *fúliáng* dispels the dark.
The hills bow as the swallows depart,
And virtue spreads with the wind’s embrace.

The *qīngbǐ* flows through *luòwén*,
While *huáguāng* selects the worthy.
The *yīnghuán* holds no empty vessel,
And *zhǐdūn* gathers at the *lùhuì*.

---
**Southern Eight Celestial Lands**
The *àiwǔkuícháng* shines with nine *yún*,
And *bóméi* bears its luminous fruit.
The *yànglǎngjìpàn* glows with polished splendor,
Its essence bright, its dwelling serene.

The *bùlǜqìngyào* radiates boundless light,
While *qiūpíngyìcuī* hastens its decree.
The *jiùyìbǐngláng* bears salvation’s weight,
And *tújūjīnyí* stands firm in might.

The *miǎolìdìngchóu* measures endless grace,
And *héngyòucílǐ* nurtures with tender care.
The *juānpǔniútóng* flows with sacred trust,
As *jiānàyàndōng* ascends in reverence.

The *fànluòmìsī* conceals profound thought,
With *lóngwǒyúyuán* winding through the void.
The *dúmiǎnbǐngdǎi* shines with golden radiance,
In the *jīntíng* where celestial sages dwell.

---
**Western Eight Celestial Lands**
The *niǔtáojìyán* opens with boundless speech,
While *dòngliúqǐxiān* proclaims its truth.
The *jiǎozhuàn* pierces the eastern void,
Swift currents of reverence flow.

The *zhāodìngchúnwēi* refines the pure,
And *yìsùlúquán* guards its perfection.
The *téngbǐngshàoxuān* bears its sacred charge,
As *zhúlùhéngmǐn* walks in solemn grace.

The *jìyōuxīnyuān* guides the lost to light,
And *wénbāngshīdú* teaches with wisdom’s hand.
The *liáojǐqīnyuán* stretches through the void,
While *bùyōngyíquán* weaves fate’s design.

The *zhíyěmóchí* stands firm and true,
As *zhènpiānlángqí* calls upon the high.
The *kūnmòwèitǎn* holds no shallow depth,
Its spirit vast, its awe profound.

---
**Northern Eight Celestial Lands**
The *lièwùzhídìng* aligns with straight decree,
While *gěngchéngwēilái* clears the misted air.
The *jiànméngzītiáo* sprouts with ordered might,
And *yángliàngyìnbù* seals its mark.

The *dǎndànqióngfú* sweeps with jade-like grace,
While *zhěngjìyíngtī* polishes its edge.
The *zuàncíkuīmíng* gazes into the dark,
As *fānbo-shìshí* stands firm in stone.

The *xiāntánbìsū* pools with emerald depth,
And *yǒujùshìtíng* gathers in sacred space.
The *yùlínxùyǎn* unfolds with resplendent art,
While *càndiáochíbǐng* holds the screen in place.

The *shǐchénshuōmù* washes in divine speech,
And *yánglüèbiānfēi* soars beyond the sky.
The *léizúxiánháo* trembles with royal might,
As *jìzhēnhuángwēi* traces truth’s design.

---
The **Way** speaks: These are the hidden words of the Great *Brahmā* within the heavens,
Their sound boundless in resonance.

The ancient script was carved upon the *Tàijí*’s Eastern Terrace,
Where *Qiáochéng* stands as the crossroads of the Five Phases.
With measured divisions, it charts the transformations of creation,
Harmonizing with the times’ sacred symbols—
Each character vast, a span long.

The **Heavenly True Ones** once inscribed these words,
Establishing the true sound.

Those who know this sound and, with fasting devotion, recite it,
Shall have the celestial *Rìzhí*仙吏 sent by the heavens,
Great gods of the void descending to observe their form,
Recording their merits and labors,
Reporting them above to the celestial hosts.
Ten thousand spirits bow in homage,
Earthly spirits guard the gates,
And the True Kings of Great Merit commend the Five Celestial Stems.
When the Dao is complete, one may traverse the Three Realms,
Ascending to the Golden Gate.

This sound repels all that it encounters,
Exorcises all impurities,
Delivers all beings,
And fulfills all desires—
The natural sound of the Heavenly True Ones.

Thus, when recited, celestial ministers descend to observe,
The Supreme Sovereign sings from afar,
Ten thousand spirits pay homage,
The Three Realms attend in reverence,
All spirits bow their heads,
Ghostly intelligences vanish in fear,
The *línláng* resounds with sacred echoes,
The Ten Directions grow serene,
Rivers and seas fall silent,
Mountains swallow their mist,
All spirits tremble in submission,
Summoning the gathered sages.
The heavens know no filth,
The earth no profane dust,
The dark wisdom becomes clear,
And the Great Compassion is profound.

**Exorcising the Evil Spirits of the Wood Palace**
