*Completion of the Supreme Mystic Scripture of Boundless Salvation, Chapter Fifty-Three*

**Chapter Fifty-Four: The Chapter of Beheading and Slaying the Ominous**

The Dao speaks: In days of yore, within the Azure Sky of Primordial Dawn, the Purple Yang floated in song across the Great Land of Auspicious Bliss, receiving from the Primordial Origin the Mystic Chapter of Beheading and Slaying the Ominous.

When the Heavenly Venerable of Primordial Origin proclaimed this Scripture, circling tenfold to summon the Ten Directions, the assembly then took their seats.

The Heavenly True Ones, the Supreme Saints of High Veneration, the Mystic Persons of True Practice, the Spiritually Mighty Kings—Black Heaven’s Great Generals of Jade Capital—with their armies of boundless hosts, wielding the mighty weapons of beheading evil and slaying poison, the Chief Magistrates of Subduing Demons and Executing Spirits, all without number, arrived through the void.

Jade clouds met the heavens, luminous mists draped the seas, celestial chariots and moon-wheels cast their radiant shade, pearl canopies hung in splendor, flying flowers and wondrous lights interwove in layered hues, their verdant brilliance dazzling the azure expanse. For three days and three nights, the palaces of the heavens and the mountains, rivers, and valleys blended in ninefold splendor. The Three Suns steadied their beams, the Five Peaks halted their loom, the Four Quarters radiated clarity, divine mists cleared, and all within the land—high and low, creatures and people—gazed in mutual illumination. Ten thousand bodies merged into one, one form encompassed ten thousand forms; the void and form shone as one, spirit and qi fused in obscurity. Thus did the distant and the near become as one, with no distinction of high or low. The earth softened into jade-green, piercing the Nine Emptinesses.

The assembled True Ones attended at the seat. The Heavenly Venerable of Primordial Origin ascended the Twin-Formed, Rotating-Dragon, Heavenly Treasure Throne.

When the Scripture was proclaimed once, the Great Saints of the heavens simultaneously praised its virtue. At that time, all men and women of the land bore pure, harmonious celestial bodies, and wondrous fragrances drifted abroad.

When the Scripture was proclaimed twice, the heavenly realm grew exalted and solemn, the Nine Heavens dispersed their embroidered splendor.

When the Scripture was proclaimed thrice, the dew congealed into pearls, and the jewel-forests hung with net-like brilliance.

When the Scripture was proclaimed four times, the celestial music took form, the jade and gold resounded in flowing harmony, the natural law sang spontaneously, and praises ascended to the Mystic Void.

When the Scripture was proclaimed five times, the waters shone limpid and luminous, and the mountains and seas displayed auspicious signs.

When the Scripture was proclaimed six times, flying immortals scattered flowers, filling the sky with brocade hues.

When the Scripture was proclaimed seven times, the Spiritually Mighty descended to the world, sweeping away the miasma of the profane.

When the Scripture was proclaimed eight times, the Three Realms received blessings, and humanity found peace.

When the Scripture was proclaimed nine times, the Six Qi aligned with nature, and the Three Calamities were extinguished.

When the Scripture was proclaimed ten times, the Heavenly True Ones descended to save, teaching and delivering all. At that time, all men and women of the land—without exception—turned their hearts in devotion, all receiving protection and attaining longevity.

The Dao speaks: When the Scripture was proclaimed once, the Spiritually Mighty Law-Bearing Great God of Boundless Limitless Virtue from the East, with their boundless hosts, floated through the void.

When the Scripture was proclaimed twice, the Spiritually Mighty Beheading-Profane Great God of Boundless Limitless Virtue from the South, with their boundless hosts, floated through the void.

When the Scripture was proclaimed thrice, the Spiritually Mighty Beheading-Ghost Great God of Boundless Limitless Virtue from the West, with their boundless hosts, floated through the void.

When the Scripture was proclaimed four times, the Spiritually Mighty Beheading-Spirit Great God of Boundless Limitless Virtue from the North, with their boundless hosts, floated through the void.

When the Scripture was proclaimed five times, the Spiritually Mighty Judicial Great God of Boundless Limitless Virtue from the Northeast, with their boundless hosts, floated through the void.

When the Scripture was proclaimed six times, the Spiritually Mighty Beheading-Evil Great God of Boundless Limitless Virtue from the Southeast, with their boundless hosts, floated through the void.

When the Scripture was proclaimed seven times, the Spiritually Mighty Flying-Talisman Great God of Boundless Limitless Virtue from the Southwest, with their boundless hosts, floated through the void.

When the Scripture was proclaimed eight times, the Spiritually Mighty Spitting-Poison Great God of Boundless Limitless Virtue from the Northwest, with their boundless hosts, floated through the void.

When the Scripture was proclaimed nine times, the Spiritually Mighty Nine-Headed Great God of Boundless Limitless Virtue from Above, with their boundless hosts, floated through the void.

When the Scripture was proclaimed ten times, the Spiritually Mighty Slaying Great God of Boundless Limitless Virtue from Below, with their boundless hosts, floated through the void.

When the tenfold proclamation was complete, the Spiritually Mighty Great Gods of Boundless Limitless Virtue from the Ten Directions arrived together. All men and women of the land turned their hearts in reverence.

Those who came were like returning clouds and gathering mists, their boundless hosts filling the land, all yearning for harmony and peace. They beheaded and slew the monstrous, dispelled all omens of ill, and the realm settled in tranquility. The gathered multitude stood in awe, unable to be restrained.

Then, the Heavenly Venerable of Primordial Origin, from between their brows, manifested a golden radiance. The light swirled, and from within it emerged the palaces of the Ten Directions—doors and windows open, tiered halls towering—with their luminous qi flowing in unison, rising five zhang above the earth.

The Heavenly Venerable ascended, and the Heavenly True Ones, the Supreme Saints of High Veneration, the Mystic Persons of True Practice, and the Spiritually Mighty Great Gods of Boundless Limitless Virtue from the Ten Directions, with their boundless hosts, all entered the Transformed Palace.

The celestial beings looked on and saw only the radiant golden light of the Transformed Palace, and those who entered vanished within it, their whereabouts unknown. The gathered people dispersed, and the divine palace drifted like a spinning rainbow.

The Heavenly Venerable then completed the proclamation of the Scripture within. The assembled True Ones oversaw the transmission, bestowing it upon me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words, the ritual matters were fully attended to, and the celestial beings returned to their stations. In the blink of an eye, all traces of sound had vanished.

At that time, all celestial beings who encountered the Scripture were universally saved. The paths of the profane and the orthodox were divided, demons were beheaded, the profane were slain, omens of ill were swept away, and the land turned in reverence. Good deeds took root.

With right wisdom, right Dao, right spirit, right thought, right intention, right power, right might, right conduct, and right ritual—speech clear and direct, the tongue’s wisdom harmonious—all were equal in compassion, and disparate bones became kin.

The land was secure, the people prosperous, and there was joy in great peace. The orthodox teaching spread, and the ogres and demons were slain.

The Dao is most wondrous and true, its radiance boundless and clear.

The sacred scriptures are revered and upheld, all attaining the power to transform the world.

The Dao speaks: The words spoken by the Primordial Origin Sovereign of Heaven in this Scripture are indeed the true inner names of all celestial deities and divine emperors, hidden in esoteric tones. They are also the secret names of the Ten-Directional Spirits of Awe and the Divine Kings, concealed to avoid invoking beheadings or omens of ill fortune. These are not the common words of the world.

The Most High Saints, having already become True Persons, delve into the subtle and the minute, comprehending its entirety. When recited ten times, the celestial beings command spirits, the Eight Awe-Inspiring Forces gather qi, divine officials brandish their talismans, demonic generals receive their decrees, the cosmic threads align, the Primordial Leader radiates brilliance, malevolent essences vanish, ghostly minions lose form, the Dao penetrates the heart, true light guards the soul, and the virtue of Yang is bestowed—death becomes rebirth.

Scholars of the highest learning, when reciting this ten times, shall have their names inscribed in the Nine Heavens, the Five Emperors grant them their mounts, the Three Primordials provide their armies, calamities flee in terror, life’s vitality flourishes, demonic barriers are sealed, the Red Scriptures descend to the court, blessings flow spontaneously, and disasters never strike.

This is so because the learned are attuned to the Jade Purity, gazing upon the lofty and distant, their feathered canopies arrayed in ranks, summoning and commanding the Ten Directions, their awe extending to the Six Heavens. The Dao is revered by the Supreme Ultimate, all spirits unite in homage, trials prove without difficulty, they steadfastly guard the Yellow Peace, earthly deities bow in respect, subduing demonic spirits, banishing misfortune and illness, and ensuring eternal life.

A light recitation of this chapter erases the embryonic essence, collapses the divine dwelling, and scatters the seven spirits. Honoring and nourishing the sacred rites brings prosperity to the gates, celestial courts descend in accord, and fortune and blessings overflow.

The Great Marshal wields the axe, beheading omens of ill. The Way of Virtue is passed down, and descendants flourish. Good fortune follows in succession, and all calamities are concealed.

This Scripture is supremely revered and unmatched in the Jade Capital, saving countless beings and serving as the ultimate Dharma’s foundation. The towering righteous qi triumphs over Heaven’s virtue.

The Dao speaks: Whenever this Scripture is recited ten times, all celestial beings gather, the Five-Direction Divine Halberds converge, the Giant Heavens behead omens of ill, the Heavenly Steeds and armored soldiers advance, the Southern Great Army’s might is unleashed, the Five Heavenly Marshals and the Ten-Directional Spirits of Awe, along with the River Chief Great God, clutching their talismans and axes, arrive at their appointed places. They hunt the Nine Malevolent Ones, lurking in dark marshes and ancient shrines, all demonic and ghostly entities—those who cling to souls, haunt wood and stone, prey on the living, falsely accuse the Three Officials, lurk near prayers and sacrifices, howl with four eyes, or unleash divine tigers, venomous beasts, fiery darts, and lightning. They behead and decapitate, eradicating all ill omens.

Scholars of the highest learning, when practicing and reciting this Scripture, summon the Green Chamber Great God, who rings his bells to repel impurity, and the Purple Door General, who draws his sword to banish demons. The Jade Maidens strike their jade chimes in the Nine Chambers, and the Yellow Old Ones resound their voices in the Three Pure Ones.

When the world receives this recitation, longevity is extended, and beneath the Yellow Court’s gates, in the remote alleys of White Clouds, at the cold pools of the Spring Curves, ten thousand ghosts lie dormant. The Kidney Sea remains undisturbed, water monsters flee, the Upper Palace sings of virtue, the Three Departments rejoice in the Mysterious, and all attain the Way of Corpse Dissolution. Demons and ghosts cannot summon or seize them, and the earthly officials cannot record or bind them.

Divine qi nurtures the form, spontaneously forming the Dharma-body. Demon essences undergo refinement, soaring through the boundless void.

This Scripture is subtly wondrous, universally saving without end. All celestial and human beings receive blessings. The Five Heavenly Demons, the Five Mid-Autumn Corpses, and the Five Earthly Judges are forever severed from ill fortune, eternally preserving primordial auspiciousness.

Infinite blessings permeate life and death. It is a treasure of Heaven, not to be transmitted to the mortal world. Only the virtuous, bearing gold and jewels with sincere devotion, may pledge to Heaven and pass it down.

If the Scripture is leaked or treated carelessly, calamity will fall upon the nine ancestors, and eternal servitude to ghostly officials will ensue.

The Five Emperors and the Twenty-Four Jade Boys and Girls attend the Scripture, guarding its divine text and protecting those who receive it.

The Dao speaks: In the first month, during prolonged fasting, recite this Scripture to summon and subdue the North Pure Dark Yin Sovereign God, commanding divine soldiers to present themselves at the Upper Palace.

In the seventh month, during prolonged fasting, recite this Scripture to summon and subdue the Five Heavenly Marshals, the Three Realm Great Demons, and the Purple Micro Emperor, who统率百神, purifying the source of evil and sweeping away demonic miasma.

In the tenth month, during prolonged fasting, recite this Scripture to summon and subdue the Six Heavenly Platform’s spirits, the Three Officials’ Bureau of Soul Investigation Great Gods, the Eight Mountain Hook-and-Lock Decree-Killing Great Gods, and the Nine-Headed Dragon Lords, who behead residual malevolent qi, exhausted malevolent souls, the Five Hag Plagues, and earth-and-wood spirits that harm living beings among the Qiang, Yi, and ghosts.

Thus, the realm is secured, the people prosper, and kings and emperors, along with their ministers, parents, and children, stabilize the national lineage, preserving Heaven’s longevity and ensuring unbroken succession. The people forever call it the Great Peace.

On the Eight Nodes, recite this Scripture to summon and subdue the Eight Heavenly Great Awe-Inspiring Smoke-Fire Cavern-Perfuming Supreme One’s Eight Gods, the Eight Killing Spirit Lords, who lead the winds and clouds, wandering through the Nine Palaces, the Lone Void and Strange Gates, beheading omens of ill and preventing chaos.

On one’s natal day, recite this Scripture to summon and subdue the Three True Ones, ascending into the Brain Palace, the Northern Pole Purple Mist, the Central Yellow Upper True One, who spits forth the Azure Flower, stabilizing the omen of the body. The Three Corpses dissolve, calamities wither and burn, black knots and white deceits are severed without cease. The Three Emperors record their deeds, the Seven True Ones wield their spirits, divine boys guide the way, and radiance emanates from the body. The Three Realms stand guard, the Five Emperors welcome, ten thousand spirits pay homage, their names inscribed in Heaven, their merits fulfilled and virtue complete—ascending to the Upper Purity.

The Dao speaks: On days of practicing the Way, one must bathe in scented water, fast in seclusion, face east, and strike the teeth thirty-two times, ascending to the Thirty-Two Heavens. With the heart, bow thirty-two times, close the eyes, and meditate quietly, seated within the three-colored clouds of blue, yellow, and white. Within and without, all is dark and vast, with the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane arrayed on either side. The Three Heavens’ direct attendants, left and right officials, slaying ghostly messengers, beheading omens of ill, and executing Heaven’s decrees stand solemnly in guard. The sun and moon shine brightly, illuminating the chamber with radiant clarity. Images form on the neck, their light shining across the Ten Directions—all distinctly manifest.

The Secret Incantation speaks:

*"Supreme Mysterious Origin, Most High Dao/Way Lord, summon forth my servant’s body—its Three Five* 功曹 *attendants, left and right officials and messengers, the fragrant jade boys and virgins of speech, the Five Emperors’ straight seals, and the thirty-two fragrant officials of the day—each in their appointed place.*

*Today is auspicious and joyous. In the pure hall, I fast and refine my practice, reaching the sacred scriptures, and vow to liberate countless beings. May all who have been summoned ascend directly, riding before the Most High Emperor of the Thirty-Two Heavens, Supreme Sovereign at His hallowed seat.*

*When complete, I draw the* qi *thirty-two times, facing east as I recite the scriptures.*

*Supreme Origin’s Scripture of Infinite Liberation, the Supreme Mysterious Essence’s Sacred Chapter,*
*Slaying the omens of ill, tenfold liberation of beings,*
*Breaking the hidden schemes of evil, harmonizing with Nature’s flow.*

*The Most High is Nameless, the Primordial Void of the Northern Pure.*

*The Most High One’s True Essence, transformed into an ancient sage,*
*With purple plumage and brocade* 羽 *and* 衣 *adorned with jingling bells,*
*Crowned with Heaven’s glory, holding the Mysterious Scripture.*

*From His mouth flows sacred harmony,*
*Slaying the myriad* 精 *of ill omen.*
*Heaven’s harmony and True* qi *radiant and clear,*
*Five colors merge into Primordial Yellow, forming eightfold patterns.*

*The Azure Dragon’s seals and White Tiger’s scriptures,*
*Sacred diagrams awakening spirits.*
*Born from the Six* 甲 *Heavens, commanding the Six* 丁 *Heavenly Ministers,*
*Three* 元 *registers fixed, Five Emperors’ forms transformed.*
*Cleansing the dark and foul, the Dao/Way stands upright and flourishes.*

*Without scripture, no light; without scripture, no clarity,*
*Without scripture, no standing; without scripture, no completion,*
*Without scripture, no liberation; without scripture, no birth—*
*This is the Great* Dharma *Vajra,*
*The Heaven within Heaven.*

*The jade seals are wondrous and weighty,*
*All Heavens hold them in reverence.*
*Transformed into golden palaces,*
*Divine spirits of the Most High.*

*The Azure Nine,* Dharma *essence vast and mysterious,*
*The Rounded Azure, Supreme Extremity,*
*Seven Nines unite in the Primordial—*
*Within the Primordial Platform, Jade Capital,*
*The Most High Emperor resides.*

*Slaying the wicked, punishing the deceitful,*
*Cutting off the source of evil,*
*The Dao/Way’s power is natural,*
*Naturally sacred and awe-inspiring.*

*Fire Mountains and Flaming Pools,*
*Refining the most divine.*
*Dragon-silk robes and Phoenix* 衣 *adorned,*
*Commanding the spirits of ill,*
*Saintly decrees open wide,*
*Twelve thousand divine spirits.*

*Scripture-seals and Fire Soldiers,*
*Guardians of the Most High Emperor,*
*Overseers of the Three* 元 *Heavens.*

*Profound and mysterious is the Dao/Way,*
*As if absent, yet present,*
*Double visions within the court,*
*Yin and Yang in endless cycle.*

*Purple visions and white mists,*
*Strictly advancing without pause,*
*The Great* Dharma *essence encircles,*
*Revolving through the Ten Directions.*

*Within are the gods of the Three Heavens’ True Law,*
*Within is the Northern Pure Lord who slays evil,*
*Within is the god who restrains the* 勃法 *forbidden,*
*Within is the Lord who safeguards life with sacred seals,*
*Within is the Six Heavens’ Universal Protector,*
*Within is the Nine Heavens’ Life-Commanding Overseer,*
*The Five Peaks’ Wandering Sage,*
*True Officials who command the barriers,*
*Transformed into water and fire,*
*Instantly summoning winds and clouds.*

*Ten thousand divine officials, a myriad fierce warriors,*
*Slaying the omens of ill,*
*Liberating countless beings.*

*Today’s register is taken,*
*All Heavens attend the hall.*

*East: Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of Beings.*

*South: Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of Beings.*

*West: Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of Beings.*

*North: Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of Beings.*

*Northeast: Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of Beings.*

*Southeast: Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of Beings.*

*Southwest: Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of Beings.*

*Northwest: Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of Beings.*

*Above: Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of Beings.*

*Below: Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of Beings.*

*Ten Directions: Supreme Lord of Infinite Dao/Way’s Sacred Might,*
*Great Immortal of Eternal Life,*
*Infinite Liberator of the World.*

*All riding upon purple* qi *and crimson clouds,*
*Swirling light and blazing radiance,*
*Emerald banners and brocade flags,*
*Silken canopies and jade carriages,*
*Drawn by Dragon and Tiger,*
*Guided by Immortals,*
*Displaying the Five Divine Spirits’ radiant standards,*
*Three Pure Ones’ soaring* 绂 *ribbons,*
*Before them, the jade tones resound in chorus,*
*Behind them, the emerald keys harmonize in echo,*
*Vermilion cranes and green birds,*
*Crying and singing in joyous reverberation,*
*Fourfold encircling of the Dao/Way,*
*Fivefold Immortals accompanying the carriage,*
*Ten thousand riders and a myriad mounts,*
*Floating through the void.*

*Returning light and halting the procession,*
*Inspecting the omens of ill.*

*Heavenly Lords of the Most High,*
*The Northern Pure’s True Sovereign,*
*Overseers of the Nine Heavens,*
*The Seven Governors and Eight Spirits.*

*Riding mist and wind,*
*Chasing flaming beasts,*
*Brandishing flags and beating drums,*
*Shouting with thunderous response,*
*Presenting records for inspection,*
*All standing before the Emperor.*

*According to the worthy to be liberated,*
*Strictly recording all Heavens.*
*Reaching down to mortal cities,*
*Dark prisons and realms of punishment,*
*The Infinite Spirit’s domain,*
*Palaces in the valley’s curves,*
*The Northern Pure’s twelve departments,*
*Twelve rivers’ sources,*
*The twenty-four lands,*
*The* 烁罗 *Ghost King’s realm,*
*And all guilty souls in the underworld,*
*Living spirits and dead souls,*
*Bound to the Five Peaks and Sacred Altars.*

*They harm the world,*
*Rejoice in misfortune,*
*Shorten mortal lifespans,*
*Bring calamity and poison,*
*Cause suffering and false accusations,*
*Spread malevolent* 邪 *forces,*
*Oversee the people’s fates and fortunes,*
*So that virtue and power are lacking,*
*Wisdom dimmed and inclinations perverse,*
*Cutting short entire clans,*
*The underworld’s officials acting with ease,*
*Endless deception and confusion.*

*Strictly uphold the Red Scriptures,*
*Only act by the decrees of the seals,*
*Divine blades slaying and binding,*
*The myriad ghosts’ eyes transfixed,*
*Unraveling ancestral ties,*
*Countless eons of karmic relations,*
*And the Great* 魔 *spirits,*
*Assaulting and consuming the ancestral,
*Harassing the living,*
*Unable to be restrained or confined,*
*Forced into the ghostly throng.*

*Supreme Origin’s decrees—*
*Ascending and advancing at every moment.*

*Forgiving transgressions, punishing crimes,*
*Recording each name in turn.*

*The Northern Pure’s Cold Pools,*
*Guarding the forms of the departed.*

*Subduing demons, safeguarding the worthy,*
*Liberating souls in the Southern Pure.*

*May the world know no disasters,*
*May blessings and joy naturally arise.*

*Those who come to be slain,*
*Shall be recorded in the Ghostly Register.*

*Dead spirits undergo refining,*
*Transformed into Immortals.*

*Living beings receive liberation,*
*Countless eons free from decline.*

*Yin and Yang in their Nine Six cycles,*
*Ever turning toward the good."*

The wheel of kalpas turns in unison with Heaven’s years.
Enduringly crossing the Three Paths, through Five Torments and Eight Hardships,
Ascending beyond the Three Realms, roaming the Upper Pure.

The Upper Pure’s Heaven—Heavenly Sovereign of Jade Purity,
A realm without form, where the Dharma-body walks.
**Eastern Eight Heavens**
The Purple Landscape Jade Flower Heaven—Emperor Zào bestows joyous omens.
The Capital of Supreme Brilliance Heaven—Emperor Yùlì ascends in glory.
The Manifest True Capital Heaven—Emperor Jué proclaims the Radiant Decree.
The Vaulting Radiance Contemplative Heaven—Emperor Zhèng discerns the Nine Regions.
The Azure Veil Emperor Heaven—Emperor Dūn harmonizes with strategy.
The Most Just Ever-True Heaven—Emperor Kōng’s virtues shine.
The Auspicious Lady’s Omen Heaven—Emperor Yuán thrives in splendor.
The Radiant Pivot Observing Transformation Heaven—Emperor Lóng upholds clarity.

**Southern Eight Heavens**
The Crimson Bright Illumination Heaven—Emperor Jiǎ muster’s Chánpú.
The Obscure Glorious Mianbǐng Heaven—Emperor Zhū’s secret diagrams.
The Supreme True Subtle Mist Heaven—Emperor Fèng’s jade solitude.
The Dao Mountain Celestial Expanse Heaven—Emperor Jiǔxīng’s flowing lake.
The Hollow Floating Purple Flower Heaven—Emperor Guāng spreads enlightenment.
The Primordial Principle Marvelous Mechanism Heaven—Emperor Ào’s court stars.
The Cliff Isle Hollow Flood Heaven—Emperor Bié’s southern obscurity.
The Fierce Roar High Dawn Heaven—Emperor Dǎng’s elemental need.

**Western Eight Heavens**
The Lofty Mist Cloudy Substance Heaven—Emperor Yǎn’s court and plowshare.
The Transformation Wandering Mound Thread Heaven—Emperor Yuán’s martial brilliance.
The Nine Paths Transforming Yang Heaven—Emperor Bóluó’s gathered light.
The Eight Earths Subtle Calendar Heaven—Emperor Yuàn’s transcendent truth.
The Supreme Micro Marvelous Observation Heaven—Emperor Niè’s resounding depths.
The Flying Flower Vast Round Heaven—Emperor Xī’s auspicious consort.
The Golden Reflection Radiant Capital Heaven—Emperor Nálí’s authority.
The Jade Refined Dao-Completed Heaven—Emperor Yú’s hallowed peak.

**Northern Eight Heavens**
The Murky Cavern Pole Star Heaven—Emperor Shù’s distant embrace.
The Pheasant Chamber Luo’s Magnificent Heaven—Emperor Yún’s hidden void.
The Mysterious Soul Refining Heaven—Emperor Shàng’s jade clarity.
The Banishing True Vaulted Platform Heaven—Emperor Luó’s primordial void.
The Supreme Mist Pure True Heaven—Emperor Mù’s twilight splendor.
The Merged Bright Radiant Scene Heaven—Emperor Zhēn’s solar period.
The Serene Compliance Auspicious Ancestral Heaven—Emperor Bù’s tranquil virtue.
The Mysterious Essence Refined Light Heaven—Emperor Biàn’s thousand ages.

Thirty-two Heavens, thirty-two Emperors.
The Heavens conceal their names, conceal their mysteries.
The central void’s natural script—
The Heavens conceal their melodies, the Heavenly Rectitude’s sound.
The Heavenly Rectitude’s Sovereign, the Heavenly Rectitude’s Spirit,
The Heavenly Rectitude’s Great Demon, the Heavenly Rectitude’s Essence.

Qi harmonized, the Dao united—
Transforming into Northern Purity, issuing teachings to rectify,
A million evils dare not encroach.
Sword-flashes decapitate the wicked;
Ghostly wells scatter in flight.
Mysterious texts, purple script—
Cloud scrolls, cavernous chapters.
Deploying divine authenticity,
Universally liberating Heaven and man,
Nurturing auspicious qi—
The radiant Dharma-wheel turns.

Long spears and giant arrows,
Drenching blood, blinding eyes.
Today’s urgent decree—
Fiery commands topple, decapitation and annihilation,
The Five Emperors’ rites arrayed,
Flames soar ten thousand zhang, thunder and lightning clash.
Chariots shatter the ghostly encampment,
Soldiers scatter piled corpses—
The Nether Officials dispatch writs,
The Nine Paths pursue in unison.
Flying through the Five Gates,
Chasing the Three Mysteries,
The Spirit Kings prostrate,
The Six Heavens welcome the Demon.

The Eastern Dipper descends its qi,
The Western Dipper sways its cords,
The Northern Dipper’s law surges,
The Southern Dipper blazes—
The Central Dipper’s jade purity,
Commanding the Nine Heavens.

The Azure Heavenly King—Gūluó Píngxīng.
The Vermilion Heavenly King—Gǔbì Chōngmíng.
The White Heavenly King—Tǔmù Chāngyīng.
The Black Heavenly King—Pīshí Piāolíng.
The Yellow Heavenly King—Xiāodū Dāiníng.
The Five Heavenly Kings—
The sovereigns of ten thousand spirits.

Decapitating myriads of ghosts,
Treasure the unauspicious heads.
Commanding ghostly armies,
Swimming through the Great Desolation.
Banners and drums resound—
Soaring, circling, and hovering.
Mists coalesce into script,
Dragons lift it as chapters.
Fierce winds and flames—
The Heavens unite in triumph.
The Upper Heavens slay the wicked,
Severely confining Northern Acid.
The Divine Lord receives the mandate,
Sweeping away all inauspiciousness.
Crimson spirits blaze,
The Yellow Expanse exterminates calamities.
Six-handed wielders of arms,
Iron-browed, hurling smoke.
Devouring evil beasts,
Feasting on ghostly kings.
Frost-armored autumn arrays,
Killing qi in the night river.
The Marshal commands the army,
The Great Emperor summons demons.
The Dark Sage leads the slaughter,
Dragon Generals encircle the hall.
Clad in cloudy peaks,
The King’s axe greets the Alar.
The Dark Beast swallows spears,
The Azure Dipper’s ranks speak—
Swiftly ascend before me.
Dare any resist?
The feathered canopy turns azure,
The phoenix wings the carriage.
Ten thousand troops tremble the roads,
Hosts of spirits return in their carriages,
Slaughtering and cleaving,
Poisonous demons plunge into the abyss.
Wicked paths fall silent—
Executed, none spared.
Ten thousand beheadings,
Thousandfold mutilations.
Demons dare not encroach,
Ghosts dare not steal essence.
The Three Officials of Northern Acid inspect the ghostly camp—
None may hide; the Golden Horse Inn presents them.
Universally proclaimed without end,
The numinous威 bows to listen.
The Five Sovereigns of Earth speak to the Upper Pure.
Vast and boundless, the void contains essence.
The Dragon and Han prolong prosperity,
Boundless Crimson Brightness.
As kalpas complete, the realms unfold,
Yin and Yang manifest their names.
Sudden transformations—
The Three Scenes of Jade Purity.
Above, unending mystery;
Below, no fathomless depths.
Wind as Yin-fire,
Water as Yang-essence.
Wind’s refinement forms the furnace,
Water’s condensation becomes stone.
The hollow void pierces the vault—
The Thirty-two Heavens.
Within, the Rectifying Qi,
The Dao’s lofty True Ones.
Banishing ten thousand evils,
All return to Rectitude’s light.
Ultimate Transformation penetrates mystery—
Ghostly trials dare not intrude.
The Dao as Heavenly Father,
The Spirit as the root of qi.
The Golden Just Heaven—
Heaven knows no darkness,
No form or shadow,
No ultimate end.
The boundless Great Dharma—
The Dao’s sovereign.
Vast Heavenly Light,
Ten thousand phenomena contained.
Hence the Nine Capitals,
The sovereigns of ghosts.

「Born with the Sovereign,
Wandering through the Dragon’s Lair.
Master of the Six Heavens,
Darkness vanquished—no light remains.

Yuan Shi unfurls the Diagram,
Chi Ming’s radiance pierces through.
The Three Realms manifest,
Ten thousand deities adorned with jade pendants.
Jade Script executes the slaughter,
Trophies severed—no ill omens left.
The Unicorn’s mark, the Tiger’s talisman,
Clouds soaring, both concealed within.

Yuan Qi forms the talisman,
Essence [□] vanquished—destruction complete.
The Sovereign holds the sun aloft,
Jade Maidens attend at his side.
Dharma-Qi flows unrestrained,
Immortal Saints resplendent and serene.

Pure Intent vanquishes demonic forces,
Ten thousand laws triumphantly arise.
Weaving clouds, spanning mist,
Strung pearls descending like sharp beams.
Crimson cords and vermilion threads,
Twisting low, then rising high—
Above, the Jade Purity spreads,
Through the Thirty-two Heavens.
Revolving without form,
Circulating the Ten Directions.
Jade Cosmos divides its brilliance,
Great Extremity’s hollow chamber.

Towering Palaces, Jewel Mountains,
Wondrous Platforms, Jade Halls.
The Rectifying Heavenly Cycle proceeds,
Ill omens dissolved—no trace remains.
Qi’s cycle manifests in five hues,
Jade Rainbow steadies the Four Quarters.
Turning at the horns, traversing the constellations,
Encircling the heart—rooted in the Dipper’s handle.
The Ox and Girl enter the Dipper,
Darkness and demons scatter in flight.
Crossing the central pivot,
Circulating the Five Celestial Patterns.
Twenty-eight Lodges,
Gathering Rectifying Qi and True Yuan.
Eightfold Might unites the Qi,
Qi enters the Great Yuan.

Within the Mysterious,
The Sovereign and the Divine.
Piercing the Dark,
The Northern True Ones.
His person bears the Jade Seal,
His head crowned with Divine Light.
Drifting through the Purple Mist,
Humming hymns of the Hollow Chapter.
Flowing bells, lightning-fire,
Echoes shake the demonic realm.
Jade True Ones exhale their Qi,
Spiritual Officers ride the stars.
Wind and fire command,
Gold and stone generate smoke.
The Earth’s womb collapses,
Corpse-spirits ascend as Immortals.
Ten thousand transformations, myriad shifts—
Nature alone knows the True.
Knowing the True, attaining the Dao,
Dao-nature communicates with the Spirit.
Within, the Ultimate True One,
The Great Lord of Eternal Life,
The Nine-Qi Sage of Measure,
The Eight-Extremity Venerable Spirit.
Five-Heaven Yuan Ruler,
Governing Rectifying Spirits and Essences,
Tai Yi revolves in order,
Commanding Officers select their attendants.
Descending to the Lower Planes,
Slaying the demonic host,
Talismans and spells lead the way,
Armies and steeds clash in tumult.
Green locks consumed by eclipse,
Crimson Spirits interrogate souls,
Judging fate’s strictures—
All submit to Kunlun’s decree.

Ascending to Upper Qing,
Emerging from the Yellow Chamber.
Within the Eight Dark Realms,
Ghostly Dao is not auspicious.
Bound and conveyed to the Sovereign,
Reaching the mortal world,
Life and transformation’s origin—
No hiding from retribution.
Woe befalls the virtuous,
Even in the minutest affairs,
Descending to subdue the human form,
At the Mud Pillow’s Vermilion Palace.
Yellow Pool, Purple Sea,
Twelve Springs of the Netherworld,
Chilling nights, shadowed paths—
Ten thousand ghosts in throng.

Those who wear the talismans inscribed,
Eightfold Divine Scriptures,
Qi and blood circulating—
Severing and vanquishing malevolent spirits.
Ghostly Ancestors, all in darkness,
Obey commands—essence extinguished.
Sacred Talismans descend their edicts,
Bones transmuted—spirit realized.

Central harmony of the Five Qi,
Mingling with the Hundred Deities.
Tenfold revolutions return the soul,
Ten thousand Qi ascends as Immortal.
The Dao of Immortality naturally arises,
Infinite degrees of liberation.
Spirits enter Heaven’s Gate,
The heart attains the True Form.

Divine Pearls roll like the Great Law-Wheel,
Essence guards the precepts,
Faith awakens to cause and effect.
Mind and eye open—
The Dao’s True Form revealed.
Universal reception of enlightenment,
Dead souls reborn in flesh.
The body attains new life,
Ascending to hear the Celestial Hymns.
Above the Celestial Realms,
Each has its birth-gate.
Transformations endless—
Naturally eternal.

The Eternal has no form,
Void and emptiness merge in clarity.
The hymns of the Dao’s Chapter,
Spirit-Kings’ sacred verses,
Words echoing the Highest Truth.

**First Chapter: Hymn of the Spirit-King of Rectifying Dao in the Heavenly Realm**
Jade Peak’s azure grandeur,
Phoenix Pavilion’s eightfold expanse.
Serpentine clouds coil in the towers,
Flying Immortals bow in reverence.
Gilded Horses gallop in wild charge,
Celestial Steps layered thick.
Great Extremity manifests life,
True Persons ride the Dragon.
Rectifying Qi swirls in boundless radiance,
Wagon-beams shine without end.
Scarlet Script spreads across the Golden Dipper,
Summoning the Four-Eyed Sage.
To slay the demonic forces of Ten thousand Ways,
No evil shall dare persist.
Three Lights blaze without darkness,
Longevity spans the Great Kalpa’s end.
Heaven’s Elder carves the Azure City,
Long Blade sharpens at Tai Song.
Essences and spirits extinguished—
No form or shadow remains.
The dreadful edge of the Hollow Chapter,
I descend the Nine Expanse’s Qi.
Bestowing pity for the world’s salvation,
Completing this liberating work.

**Second Chapter: Hymn of the Spirit-King of Rectifying Dao in the Human Realm**
Vermilion Chapter, Tiger Robes,
Floating glory through the Ten Heavens.
Dragon Blade slays the wicked,
Six Paths attend the Pavilion.
Seal-Light condenses the sea,
Sword-Qi strikes like thunder.
Punishing ill omens—
Rectitude’s path is their end.
What of these petty fools?
They are the instruments of calamity.
I possess the Hollow Chapter,
Bestowing its original power.
Great Lord’s benevolent birth,
Grace bestowed—difficulties forever banished.
Ninefold Splendor’s golden hues,
In harmony with Heaven’s protection.
Still Wisdom unites with the Spirit,
Mysterious Yuan manifests its marvels.
These gross beings, teeming in life,
Obscure the True Dao.
Broadly liberating Heaven and man,
Ten thousand virtues share a common cause.
Kalpa and Realm endure together,
Supreme Sovereign’s vast mercy.
Subduing demons, attaining the True,
Heaven’s talismans record their names.
No evil dares offend,
Immortal Saints receive their oaths.
Yuan Shi’s hollow void—
How few awaken to its truth.
Those who awaken naturally,
Clear as the flowing Jade Sound.

**Third Chapter: Hymn of the Spirit-King of Rectifying Dao in the Earthly Realm**
Vast and murky, the piled earth,
Below, the layered mountains.
Pale clouds rise from the azure peaks,
Those who pass never return.
The Supreme Sovereign laments,
Granting liberation without obstruction.
Spirit-Winds drift the mist,
Jade Pendants curve in grace.
Emerging from the Nine Abysses,
Scarlet Script now proclaimed.
Controlling the spirits, seizing the souls,
Severing this dark threshold.
Living beings—what offense have they committed?
To suffer punishment, their faces pale with fear.
Bright and clear, the Supreme Sovereign,
Rectifying Qi naturally ascends.
The True Dao shines forth,
You attain promotion and transcendence.
Abandoning the dusty mortal path,
All rabbits flee from the demonic source.

I possess the Yuan Shi Chapter,
Reciting to shift the Ten thousand Ancestors.
Knots of stagnation dissolve in freedom,
Silent accord returns to the Void.
Liberation of mortals shall never end,
Diligently chant this True King’s verse.
Through these Three Realms above,
The flying void within,
The True King’s hymnal echoes,
Its sound harmonizing with the Hollow Chapter.
Chanted a hundred times,
Liberation granted to the Southern Palace.
Chanted a thousand times,
The True King’s protection welcomes.
Ten thousand chants complete the Dao,
Ascending to the Supreme Void,
Crossing the Three Realms,
Rank attained among the Immortal Lords.
Hearing the Sacred Sound,
The Spirit-King reveres its form,
Commanding the Earthly Deities,
Guarding and escorting,
Drawing forth from the Earth’s Gate,
The Five Sufferings and Eight Difficulties,
The Seven Ancestors’ ascent—
Forever departing from the Ghostly Palace.»

「The soul ascends to the Vermilion Mound,
To receive trials and be reborn anew.
Severing the unauspicious and their heads,
Fortune and blessings grow with each passing day.

This is called the Boundless Scripture,
Universal liberation without end.
There are secret celestial texts,
Revered by all Heavenly Hosts.
Revealing arrogance falls into the Underworld,
Disaster befalls the Seven Ancestors’ visitation.

The Dao speaks: These two chapters are the hidden sounds of the Heavenly Sovereigns,
And the Spirit-King of Awe.
All are the words of the Great Brahman,
Not the common speech of mortals.
All sever the unauspicious and their heads,
The names of the Six Heavens’ slayers of ghosts.
The malevolent forces are crushed,
Evil spirits dispelled,
The body attains longevity,
Rank among the Immortal Lords.

Thus called profound and esoteric,
Hard to seek and investigate.
Treasure of the Celestial,
Hidden in the Mysterious Capital’s Purple Micro Palace,
Transmitted through the Mysterious Science in forty thousand kalpas.

If a perfected adept brings a golden treasure with a sincere heart,
And follows the ancient rites to pledge alliance with the Ten Heavens,
Then it shall be bestowed upon them.

The Dao speaks: The method to sever the unauspicious and their heads
Is indeed the Great Law in fourfold form.
The Nine and Six celestial cycles conclude,
The Three Lights wax and wane.
The Holy Spirit rests or declines,
The unworthy scholar suffers harm.
All who bear these calamities—heavy misfortunes—
Must unite in heart to observe fasts,
Burn incense at all six times,
Recite the sutra ten thousandfold.

The Heavenly Sovereign of the Northern Pole and the Mysterious Celestial Emperor,
Shall command the Five Directions’ Thunderbolt and Lightning Cavalry Gods,
The Awe-Sword Spirit-King,
The Talismanic Fire Soldiers,
The White Owl Marshal who terrifies the Heavenly Host,
To descend and sever the unauspicious and their heads,
Bestowing virtue and power to dispel all misfortunes.
The Boundless Scripture,
Universal liberation without end.

The Dao speaks: The unworthy scholar, shallow in the Dao,
Has not yet fulfilled the True Practice.
There are ghosts from the Dark Springs,
And gods of the Six Heavens,
Who falsely bring disaster and calamity,
Encountering all hardships,
Years marked by harm,
Fortune and prosperity diminished,
Households restless,
Families plagued by malevolent spirits.
If the perfected adept and fellow scholars burn incense for them,
And recite the sutra ten thousand times,
To absolve and avert punishments and misfortunes,
And follow the ritual to cleanse impurities as prescribed,
The Great Celestial Gods and the Seven Primordial Qi
Shall descend into their bodies,
Bringing auspicious fortune and eternal protection,
Preserving them from annihilation,
Thus attaining the status of Spirit-King.

The Dao speaks: To invite the Heavenly Hosts to descend,
To have spirit-soldiers guard the body,
To sever the unauspicious and their heads—
Through fasting, keeping vigil, and reciting the sutra,
One may attain the Dao of Immortality,
And dispel all misfortunes and diseases.

When the celestial cycles conclude,
Stars and constellations stray from their paths,
The sun and moon lose their regularity,
The four seasons falter,
Yin and Yang fall out of harmony,
Wars rage in season,
Pestilence and poison spread,
The myriad people perish young,
Teachers and friends meet untimely ends—
All must observe fasts,
Burn incense and recite the sutra.

The merit and virtue of fasting, keeping vigil, and reciting the sutra
Are most profound.
Above, they dispel celestial calamities,
And protect and safeguard the Emperor.
Below, they avert poisonous harm,
And liberate the myriad people.
Dependent upon life and death,
Their blessings are boundless.
Thus it is called Boundless,
Universal liberation for Heaven and Man.

The Dao speaks: All who possess this sutra,
And perform these merits for the Heavenly Sovereigns and myriad people,
On days of calamity, with sincere intent,
Observe fasts, burn incense,
And recite the sutra ten thousand times,
Shall be recorded by all Heavens,
Guarded by ten thousand gods,
Distinguished by the perfected,
And thus become a minister of the Golden Gate of the Holy Sovereign.

The Heavens record all deeds and misdeeds,
Without loss of a single measure.
The Celestial Spirit-Kings also champion your life,
And those who attain the Dao shall comprehend the perfected words.

The hidden language of the Great Brahman in the Heavens—Boundless Sound,
Composed by the Dao Sovereign.
The Primordial Scripture of Severing the Unauspicious—Jade Chapter,
Of the Eastern Eight Heavens.»

The luminous **Jīhǎi** and the **Máng** stars,
The **Dǎnglù** and **Xúxīn** constellations.
The **Jiéqín** stars converge with the **Emperor’s Celestial Mandate**,
As **Rúfǔ** penetrates the **True Essence**.

**Yùyī** abounds with **Duōyú**,
**Màilì** waits upon the **Yún** clouds.
**Zhěng** the **Hé** and **Shā**,
The **Bìzhè** scriptures of the **East**.

**Chí** the **Yùyǐ** and **Nì** the **Fǎ**,
**Pōbó** chants the **True Law**.
The **Lǔ** dynasty’s **Xianyīng**,
**Yīlǒng** aids the **Zhěngkē**.

**Yǎnmì** conceals the **Luózhēn**,
**Yuèzhū** departs the **Sùlí**.
**Měipī** unfurls the **Yuányáo**,
**Bǎochǔ** harmonizes the **Mìocān**.

The **Eight Heavens of the South**:
**Fútu** and **Jiǔshǒu**,
**Yōudūn** and **Èhú**.
**Huángzhèn** pierces the **Dòngfán**,
**Zōu’ā** resounds in **Pínsū**.

**Xuānshàng** flows through the **Hán**,
**Túlùn** blesses the **Yóuxiá**.
**Dàowù** comprehends the **Zhèngyuán**,
**Lùmóu** strategizes the **Xianjū**.

**Jìngmiǎo** respects the **Yuánshǎo**,
**Jǐngzhuó** adorns the **Zhēnqiū**.
**Yuánluó** gathers the **Jìbù**,
**Níngyí** opens the **Qǐzhū**.

**Yún** inscribes the **Diéyuè**,
The **Xiánfàn** arrives from **Zhuānxú**.
**Àiyuán** returns to **Sòngguī**,
**Chéngjǐ** refines the **Yǎnxū**.

The **Eight Heavens of the West**:
**Zhísuí** follows the **Wǎnsǎo**,
**Zhìyīng** thrives in **Zīhóng**,
**Héjiū** explores the **Tōngjí**,
**Zhèngdǒu** ascends the **Fēiyún**.

**Mìkēng** resounds with **Gāngméi**,
**Zhēngchí** pools in **□zōng**.
**Gàobiàn** declares the **Dīngmèng**,
**Jiāshè** celebrates the **Yuánhóu**.

**Jíhé** and **Dàkuí**,
**Jiāngzhě** seeks the **Míngqiú**.
**Jīndù** tempers the **Yèhuá**,
**Zǐzhèn** steadies the **Píngyōu**.

**Xuāndào** sustains the **Wéijì**,
**Wúshǐ** radiates the **Guāngxiū**.
**Xianqì** governs the **Sīlǚ**,
**Yǒulù** drips the **Zhuānjiù**.

The **Eight Heavens of the North**:
**Huángxuān** bears the **Zǎiyuán**,
**Yǐnghǔ** rises to the **Shēngqián**.
**Fànjǐng** flows through the **Liúmǐ**,

**Wéixuān** extends the **Lìyán**.
**Yí** examines the **#1Dānjiàn**,

**Jǐn** assists the **Shùncháng**,
