**Dòngruì** shines with **Sùyōu**,
**Zhīyú** fulfills the **Gōngdū**.

The **Dao** speaks: These are the **Great Brahman’s hidden sounds**,
The **Boundless** **Qì**’s resonance.
Engraved in the **Old Texts** of the **Northern Metropolis’s Purple Palace**,
And the **Southern Observatory**, descending through the **Nine Abysses** of **Chéngluó** and **Jiǔyōu**,
To the **Spring of the Nine Darks** and the **Pass of the Passions**,
Thus the **Dao’s mighty spirits** are summoned,
Severing **ghosts and demons**, the **malevolent vapors** of **yīnbó** and **shíguǐ**.

The **Heavenly Sovereign’s True Essence**,
Gathers the **Dòngqīng**’s radiance,
Dipped in **Dān** ink to form the script,
Each character vast—one **zhàng** in breadth—
As the **True Sound**.

Those who know this **Sound**,
And with **fasting** and **recitation**,
Shall be sent by all **Heavens** the **spirits of rectitude**,
Who **sever the malevolent** and **guard the virtuous**,
The **Eight Celestial Threats**,
The **Nine-Headed, Four-Eyed officials**,
Guided by **Dīngshǐ**’s **Ding** and **Shǐ**,
To **ward and protect** your **body**.

**Severing** the **Unauspicious**,
Bestowing **blessings** and **auspiciousness**,
**Extending life** and **preserving truth**,
Recording your **merits** and **devotion**,
And **reporting** them to the **Heavens**.

All **Ten Thousand Spirits** bow in homage,
The **Earthly Deities** attend the gates,
The **Great Merit’s True Sovereign** champions you,
To **ascend the True**—
The **Dao** is complete, and you shall attain,
**Roaming the Three Realms**, entering the **Golden Gate**.

This **Sound** **cleaves all obstructions**,
**Dispels all calamities**,
**Liberates all beings**,
**Achieves all transformations**—
The **True Essence’s natural resonance**.

Thus, when **recited**, it **invokes the True Essence’s descent**,
The **Supreme Sovereign’s urgent chanting**,
All **Ten Thousand Spirits’ homage**,
The **Three Realms’ attendance**,
The **myriad deities’ obeisance**,
The **ghostly essences’ self-destruction**,
The **pearls and jade’s resonant echo**,
The **Ten Directions’ solemn stillness**,
The **rivers and seas’ tranquil silence**,
The **mountains and peaks’ smoke-swallowing depths**,
All **sentient beings’ trembling submission**,
The **congregation of all immortals**,
The **Heavens’ purity**,
The **Earth’s freedom from defilement**,
The **Dark’s enlightened clarity**,
The **Great Boundless’s profound mystery**.

**The *Língbǎo Wúliàng Dùrén* Upper Scripture of Boundless Liberation**,
The **Fifty-Fourth Scroll** concludes.
**#1『□』**, the **Original Text** is **deficient and unclear**.

**The Fifty-Fifth Scroll**:
**Pursuing the Liberation of the Ancestral Souls**.

The **Dao/Way** speaks:

*"In days of yore, within the **Lóngfàn Tiān** (Dragon-Void Heavens), the **Jǐngxiāo** (Celestial Echo) hummed its primal song, refining the **huàtǔ** (transmuted earth) of **Boundless Liberation’s** highest grade. There, the **Yuánshǐ** (Primordial Origin) taught the **Sutra** of *Pursuing the Liberation of Ancestral Souls*—the **Fifty-Fifth Scroll** of **Boundless Liberation’s** highest grade.

At that time, the **Yuánshǐ Tiānzūn** (Primordial Origin Celestial Sovereign) proclaimed this **Sutra**, circling ten times through the **Ten Directions**, summoning all realms. Then, the **Nine Sovereigns of the High True**, the **Feitian Dasheng** (Flying Heavenly Saints), the **Miáoxíng Zhēnrén** (Wondrous Conduct True Persons), the **Xuánzhōng Fǎshī** (Mysterious Midst Masters), those who traverse the **Dòngyīn Shuòdān Yùjué** (Piercing Darkness, Solitary, and Utterly Obscure) domain—**Wǔlíng Xuánlǎo** (Five Spirits Mysterious Elders), the **Heidi Tiānjūn** (Black Sovereign Heavenly Lords), the **Tīngdū Běidi** (Tīngdū Northern Sovereigns), the **Liùtiān Dàmó** (Six Heavens Great Demons), the **Jiùkǔ Língxiān** (Rescuer of Suffering Immortal), the **Jiǔgōng Cáoshǔ** (Nine Palaces’ Officials), the **Sānyuán Kǎohún** (Three Primordials’ Soul-Investigators), and the **innumerable host**—all ascended upon the void.

With **three pure clouds** and **eight celestial Echoes’ palanquins**, the **huágài** (glorious canopy) cast its shade, while **jīncǎi** (emerald hues) intermingled their radiance. **Nine-hued jade vines** floated in the boundless expanse, their brilliance unfurling for **seven days and seven nights**. The **lǒuguān** (pavilions and towers of all Heavens) mirrored their splendor across the **yōuliáo** (profound void), their **zhūwéi yùháo** (pearl-threaded and jade-bristled) wheels pausing their motion, their **shénfēng xíruì** (divine winds and auspicious mists) converging. The **Kōngzàng** (Void Treasury) poured forth its waves, and within a single realm—its lands, mountains, forests, and waters—all was leveled to equal height, with no high or low. The earth transformed into **qīngyù** (azure jade), its ten thousand miles uniformly reflected, no hue differing.

All **True Ones** attended at the seat, while the **Yuánshǐ Tiānzūn** sat in mystery upon the **jiǔguāng bǎojú** (Nine-Light Jewel Platform), suspended in the void. After reciting the **Sutra** once, the **Great Saints of all Heavens** simultaneously praised its virtue. At that moment, the **sentient beings of the Great Earth**, their **ancestral souls** burdened with accumulated sins, trembled in awe and received pardon.

After reciting the **Sutra** twice, the light illuminated the **Nine Yous** (Nine Abysses), awakening the **宿命** (*sùmìng*, past destinies). After reciting the **Sutra** thrice, clouds encircled the **Dao/Way’s** domain, and **gānlù** (blissful dew) rained upon the void. After reciting the **Sutra** four times, the **fire mountains** subsided their flames, and the **cold pools** stilled their waves. After reciting the **Sutra** five times, the **ten great hells** opened their gates, and the **afoul souls** were liberated. After reciting the **Sutra** six times, evil roots were extinguished, and none sank into **苦趣** (*kǔqù*, suffering realms). After reciting the **Sutra** seven times, the **black ledgers** were burned, and the soul-investigations ceased. After reciting the **Sutra** eight times, the **yuanqu** (abyssal officials) ascended, their **ancestral souls** promoted to **immortal grades**. After reciting the **Sutra** nine times, **dark domains** unfurled their clouds, and **yang light** dispersed their gloom. After reciting the **Sutra** ten times, **枯骨** (*kūgǔ*, dried bones) revived, all rising as **完人** (*wánrén*, perfected beings). Then, within that realm—whether male or female—none failed to incline their hearts, all receiving protection and attaining **long life**.

The **Dao/Way** speaks:

*"At that time, as the **Yuánshǐ Tiānzūn** first expounded the **Sutra**, the **men and women of the realm** each recalled their **ancestral souls** from past lives, numbering in the **myriad myriads**—ancient kin and departed forebears. Some, bound by **宿因** (*sùyīn*, past karma) and **业力** (*yèlì*, karmic forces), had already taken birth, wandering the **Three Realms**. Others remained in **幽境** (*yōujìng*, dark domains), trapped within the **冥关** (*míngguān*, abyssal gates), enduring endless cycles, their time stretched to eternity. Their **souls** lacked refuge, their **bodies** transmuted to dust, yet their **nature and awareness** persisted, still harboring **心念** (*xīnniàn*, mindful traces). They suffered these **阴罪** (*yīnzuì*, dark sins), inevitably incurring **阳愆** (*yángqiān*, bright transgressions).

Now, encountering the **Yuánshǐ** as he unfurled the **追度** (*zhuīdù*, ancestral liberation) **Law**, they rejoiced beyond measure, their **wishes** sincere and **awaiting instruction**. They sought to **broadly benefit all living beings**.

At that time, the **Tiānzūn**’s **fourfold observation** of **Heavenly and Human**, along with **all ghosts and spirits**, and the **saints of the Ten Directions**, raised their **山水云霞** (*shānshuǐ yúnxiá*, mountain-water-cloud-mist) sleeves in homage. They brandished **九色碧光** (*jiǔsè bìguāng*, nine-hued azure radiance) and their **宛转之绂** (*wǎnzhuǎn zhī fú*, supple ritual sashes). For a long while, they extended a **single thread of nine-hued azure light**, descending its brilliance to the **Nine Layers and Seven Circuits**, between the **iron mountains**, to the **ten great hells**—each spanning **eight thousand li**, vast in height, breadth, depth, and magnitude. As this **thread of azure light** ascended, the **六种** (*liùzhǒng*, sixfold) tremors shook the earth.

It was as though **two peaks clashed in the great sea**, or as though the **five thunders of all Heavens** roared in unison. The **game of the **Jìngxiāo** (Celestial Echo) and the **thirty-six palaces** swayed in response, while the **northern hells of Tīngdū** rose in spirals, detaching from the **abyssal void** and ascending to the **absolute heights**. The **thread of azure light** drew up the **hell’s summit**, unleashing **just winds** that reached the **Heavenly Realms**. This great hell was suspended like a **弹丸** (*tánwán*, shot from a catapult) at the **thread’s end**, its **five punishments and myriad torments**—blood knives and fiery roasts—clearly exposed, with no obstruction.

The **innumerable host** gazed without hindrance, all witnessing the **ten great hells**, their **ancestral souls** undergoing **punishments and torments**, imprisoned within the **investigatory halls**. They wailed in sorrow, beseeching salvation. All **sentient beings**, seeing this, raised their voices in lamentation, their cries echoing through the **Heavens**, as they prayed to the **Xūhuáng** (Vacuous Sovereign), imploring **ancestral liberation**.

The **Yuánshǐ Tiānzūn** smiled in contentment, then from his **crown**, emitted a **great luminous radiance**, illuminating **Heaven and Earth**."

Within the **radiant light**, there appeared a **scarlet script** (*chìwén*) of clouds bearing **Heaven’s Precious Vouchers** (*Tiān Bǎo Quàn*), their **golden rays** (*máng jīn*) and **jade-like brilliance** (*yù zhuó*) curling in intricate patterns, displayed before all.

He then proclaimed: *"You, all sentient beings, shall now invoke the **ancestral souls** of past ages, the **departed spirits** (*wánghún*). By reciting this **sacred scripture** (*zhēngjīng*), I shall traverse the **ten transgressions** (*shí guò*), and all shall ascend to **Heaven**.*

When the **vouchers** were displayed, a **misty assembly** of clouds gathered, unable to be restrained. Half the land tilted into **abyssal depths** (*piān xiàn*), and thereupon, a **Precious Pearl** (*Bǎo Zhū*) was suspended—great as a **millet grain** (*shǔmǐ*), floating nine **zhang** above the earth in the **void of emptiness** (*kōng xuán*).

The **Yuánshǐ Tiānzūn** ascended, summoning the **Heavenly Pure Ones** (*Tiān Zhēn*), the **Great Gods of the Highest Saints** (*Shàngshèng Gāozūn*), the **Ten-Directional Saviors of Suffering and Transgressions** (*Shífāng Jiùkǔ Bázuì Zhēnrén*), the **Great Gods of Ultimate Truth** (*Zhìzhēn Dàshén*), and the **countless hosts** (*wú yáng shù zhòng*)—all entering the **Precious Pearl**.

The **Heavenly Beings** (*Tiānrén*) looked upward, seeing only **flickering lights** (*fúfú*) passing through the **Pearl’s mouth**. Once inside, their whereabouts became **unknown**.

The **common folk** dispersed, and the land returned to its **level and upright state** (*píngzhèng*), no longer **tilted or sunken**. Within the **Pearl**, the **Yuánshǐ Tiānzūn** completed the **sacred teachings** (*jīngshì*), and the **Great Gods** (*Zhōngzhēn*) oversaw the **salvation** (*jiùdù*), granting it to me. At that moment, **joy and celebration** were beyond description.

The **ritual matters** (*fǎshì*) were **roughly understood** (*cūxī*), the **Heavens** restored their order (*fùwèi*), and in an instant (*shūxū*), all was **silent and without trace**.

At that time, those who encountered this **sacred scripture and teachings** (*jīngfǎ*) universally received **salvation and deliverance** (*jìhuì bájiù*). The **ancestral souls** did not fall into **evil paths** (*èdào*), the **tilted lands** returned to **upright reverence** (*guīyǎng*), and all practiced **filial piety** (*xiāoxīn*).

They could **respect and yield**, **be frugal and pure**, **gentle and harmonious**, **devoted and obedient**, **enduring and nurturing**. Their **hearts held no rebellion** (*wú bèi màn*), and their **mouths spoke no grievances** (*wú yuàn yán*). They were **unified in compassion** (*qí tóng cí’ài*), and **distant lands** became **kin**.

The **land was secure**, the **people prosperous**, rejoicing in **Great Peace** (*Tàipíng*). The **Dao** began to teach, and the **entire realm** was guided by the **Way**.

Those who **aspired with earnest intent** (*yǒu zhìxīn*), revering and honoring the **sacred scripture**, all achieved **salvation of the world** (*dùshì*).

The **Way** declares: *"The names of the Highest Saints proclaimed in the **Yuánshǐ Tiānzūn’s teachings** are **hidden resonances** (*yǐnyùn*) within the **Heavens**, and also **taboo names** (*nèihuì*) of the **True Kings** (*Zhēnwáng*), the **concealed names** (*cángmíng*) revered by **hundreds of spirits**. These are not the **common words** (*chángcí*) of the world. The **Highest Saints**, having already become **True Ones** (*Zhēnrén*), master the **Mystic Depths** (*tōng xuán jiū wēi*), comprehending its **chapters** (*qīng*). When recited **ten times** (*shí guò*), the **Heavens** respond in distant harmony, and **ten thousand transgressions** are all absolved. The **ancestral souls** of past ages all ascend to **immortality**, benefiting all and **universally saving sentient life** (*pǔdù wànshēng*), reviving the **deceased** (*huíshī qǐsǐ*) and transforming **white bones** into living beings.

For those **who study deeply** (*Zhìxué Zhīshì*), reciting this **ten times**, then the **Five Sacred Mountains** (*Wǔyuè*) resound with **piercing chants** (*zòuzú*), the **Three Officials** (*Sānguān*) present their **sacred words** (*fēngcí*), the **hidden souls** (*yōuhún*) are **transmuted** (*qiānhuà*), and the **departed spirits** (*shìpò*) ascend in **transcendence**. They are **salvaged from death** (*jìdù wángmò*), and the **ceased** obtain **rebirth**. This is because such scholars, their **Daoist virtue and power** (*dàodé*) yet **unfulfilled**, their **essence** (*tǐ*) not yet **penetrating Ultimate Truth**, can **command the Ten Directions** (*shǐ shífāng*) but their **威** (*wēi*, awe/authority) has not yet **subdued Heaven’s governance** (*tiānpèi*), nor their **德** (*dé*, virtue) **overpowered the earthly spirits** (*dìqí*). They can only **assist the hidden souls** (*zījí yōulíng*), **salvage ancestral spirits** (*jìbá zǔxiān*)—no more.

To **casually recite** this **chapter**, one’s **body shall suffer calamity** (*bèiyāng*). To **revere and honor** with **supreme devotion**, one’s **doorways shall flourish** (*ménhù xīnglóng*). For generations, there shall be **prosperity and brilliance** (*chángchì*), **harmonious connections with the good** (*yǔshàn yīnyuán*), and **ten thousand disasters** shall not **touch** (*bùgān*). The **divine spirits** shall **guard the gates**.

This **scripture** is **supremely noble and wondrous**, unmatched in the **Jade Capital** (*Yùjīng*). It **saves countless beings**, serving as the **foundation of ten thousand teachings** (*Zōng*). Its **grand framework** (*wēiwēi dàfàn*) is **virtue** beyond measure.

The **Way** declares: *"For those who recite this **scripture ten times**, the **Heavens** gather in unison, **hundreds of millions of ancestral spirits** (*yìcèng wànzǔ*) and **hidden souls** (*yōulíng*) in torment all receive **salvation** immediately, ascending to the **Vermilion Palace** (*Zhūgōng*). They **abide there nine years**, undergoing **transformation and rebirth**, becoming **noble beings** (*guìrén*).

For those who **love learning** (*hàoxué*) and recite this **scripture ten times**, the **ancestral spirits** of past ages all receive **salvation**, ascending to the **Southern Palace**. Those who **recite it in this world** shall have their **deceased ancestors** (*wángguò zǔkǎo*) attain the **Way of Refining Form in Great Darkness** (*Tàiyīn Liànxíng*), their **souls and spirits** (*húnshén*) **temporarily extinguished**, yet they **avoid the hells**, immediately **regaining their forms** (*fǎnxíng*) and **wandering the Great Void** (*yóuxíng Tàikōng*).

This **scripture** is **mysterious and profound**, its **salvation infinite**. All **Heavenly Beings** (*Tiānrén*) and **sentient beings** shall not fail to **receive its blessings**.

Its **limitless merits** extend to **life and death**, granting **universal grace**. Though **Heaven’s treasures** are not **transmitted to the mortal world**, the **noble scholars** who bring **golden treasures** (*jīnbǎo*) and **devoted hearts** (*xiàoxīn*) may **pledge to Heaven** and **transmit it** (*méngtiān ér chuán*). To **leak or slight it** (*qīngxiè lòumàn*) brings **calamity** upon one’s **descendants**, who shall serve **long terms in the Three Officials’ halls**.

There are **twenty-four Jade Boys** (*Yùtóng*) and **twenty-four Jade Girls** (*Yùnǚ*), attending as **guardians of the sacred texts** (*yíngwèi shénwén*), protecting the **bodies of those who receive the scripture**.

The **Way** declares: *"On the **long fasts** of the **first month**, reciting and chanting this **scripture**, the **ancestral souls** of past ages shall be **freed from earthly imprisonment** (*duàn dìdài yì*), ascending to the **Southern Palace**. On the **long fasts** of the **seventh month**, reciting and chanting this **scripture**, the **nine ancestral spirits** and **seven Mystic Ones** (*jiǔzǔ qīxuán*) shall ascend to the **Heavenly Gates** (*Tiānmén*), their **transgressions pardoned** and **nature refined**. Their **bodies shall attain immortality** (*shēndé shénxiān*).

On the **long fasts** of the **tenth month**, reciting and chanting this **scripture**, the **ancestral spirits** of ancient times and their **affiliated souls** (*guīxiān quànshǔ*) shall be **refined and transformed** (*liànhuà*), their names **recorded in the Supreme Clarity** (*kèlù Tàiqīng*). On the **eight solemn festivals** (*Bājié*), reciting and chanting this **scripture**, the **ancestral souls** of distant ages shall have their **transgressions extinguished** in the **Northern Capital’s Black Mountain** (*Xīnshān*), their **toiling spirits** (*kǎo*) shall **rest** at the **River’s Source** (*Héyuán*), and they shall become **True Ones of the Nine Palaces** (*Zhēnrén*).

On the **day of one’s natal command** (*Běnmìng*), reciting and chanting this **scripture**, the **seven ancestral spirits** of the **Mystic Hall** (*Xuántáng*) and **souls from past kalpas** (*wǎngjié zhìhún*) shall **attach to flesh and bone** (*língròu fùgǔ*), their **nearby descendants** becoming **human**. Their **souls and spirits** shall **clarify and rectify**, their **ten thousand breaths** (*wàngqì*) **enduring**. They shall **avoid suffering**, their **bodies radiant**. The **Three Realms** (*Sānjiè*) shall **guard and attend**, the **Five Emperors** (*Wǔdì*) shall **oversee their welcome**, and **ten thousand spirits** shall **pay homage**. Their names shall be **recorded in Heaven**, their **merits fulfilled** and **virtue complete**, ascending to the **Upper Clarity** (*Shàngqīng*).

The **Way** declares: *"On the **days of practice** (*Xíngdào*), one must first **bathe in fragrant water** (*xiāngtāng mùyù*), observe **fast and purity** (*zhāijiè*), and enter the **chamber** (*shì*), facing **east**. One shall **knock the teeth** (*kòuzú*) **thirty-two times** (*sānshíèr tōng*), heard by the **Thirty-Two Heavens** (*Sānshíèr Tiān*). One shall **bow in heart** (*xīn bài*) **thirty-two times**, closing the eyes, **quietly contemplating** the **self seated within clouds of azure, violet, and crimson** (*Sān sè yúnqì*). Within and without, all is **dark and boundless** (*cāngmíng*), with **Green Dragons, White Tigers, Azure Phoenixes, Dark Tortoises, Lions, and White Cranes** arrayed on either side. The **sun and moon** illuminate, **piercing the chamber** (*dònghuàn shìnèi*), while the **Ten-Directional Saviors of Suffering** (*Shífāng Jiùkǔ Wúliàng Dàshén*) halt their **chariots** in the **void’s extreme** (*kōngjí*), their **neck pendants** (*xiàngshēng yuánxiàng*) casting **radiance** across the **Ten Directions**—so **distinct and clear**.

The **secret incantation** (*Mìzhòu*) reads:

*"**Supreme Mystic Source** (*Wúshàng Xuányuán*), **Highest Dao Sovereign** (*Tàishàng Dàojūn*), summon forth from my **body’s Thirty-Five Functionaries** (*Sānwǔ Gōngcáo*)—the **left and right officials** and **messengers** (*guānshǐ*)—those who **attend with fragrant jade** (*sìxiāng yùtóng*), **transmit words with jade maidens** (*chuányán yùnǚ*), the **Five Emperors’ direct seals** (*Wǔdì zhífú*), and the **fragrant officials of the True Day** (*Zhídì xiāngguān*), each **thirty-two in number** (*gè sānshíèr rén*), to **open and close** as spoken."*

On this auspicious day, I fast and purify the hall, reciting the **Sutra of the Supreme Mystic Source** (*Wúshàng Xuányuán Mìjiāo Jīng*) to liberate countless beings. May the **Way** I have opened ascend directly to the **Supreme Sovereign** (*Sānshíèr rén Yuánshǐ Shàngdì*) of the **Thirty-Two Heavens**, before whose sacred throne it now stands.

When done, I channel the **Qi** of the **Thirty-Two Passages** (*Sānshíèr guò*), facing east and reciting the scriptures.

The **Sutra of the Supreme Mystic Source** (*Yuánshǐ Wúliàng Dùrén Shàngpǐn Miàojīng*)
—The **Original Chapter** (*Běnzhāng*) of the **Supreme Mystic Source** (*Yuánshǐ Xuányuán*)—
**Liberates** (*Zhuīdù*) the souls of past generations (*shàngshì wánghún*), granting **countless degrees of liberation** (*shíbiàn dùrén*).

The **Nine Darknesses** (*Jiǔmíng*) conceal their **hidden melodies** (*yǐnyùn*), yet **nature is transformed** (*kāihuà zìrán*). The **void is pierced** (*kōngdòng jiànglíng*), and **divine spirits are born** (*shénshēng*). The **Great Void** (*Tàixū*) gives rise to **gods** (*shén*).

All **dharma symbols** (*fǎxiàng*) are **governed** (*zhì*), and all are **unified** (*tǒngguī*) under the **Three Primordials** (*Sānyuán*).

The **Celestial Saints of the Jade Palace** (*Qiónggōng Dàshèng*), lofty in their **imperial residence** (*dìzūn*), **proclaim** (*fūhóng*) the **most wondrous** (*zhìmiào*) and **examine** (*kǎoxiào*) the **karma** (*yīnyuán*). With **emerald scripts** (*Qīngbiān*) and **cinnabar tablets** (*Dānjiǎn*), they **record** (*jìlù*) the **mystic texts** (*Xuánwén*).

The **Primordial Yang** (*Yuányáng*) of the **Purple Micro** (*Zǐwēi*) aligns with the **deep celestial springs** (*Dòngyuán*). The **Great Yin** (*Tàiyīn*) **offices** (*shǔfá*) and **punishes** (*jǔqiān*), while the **fire officials** (*Huǒguān*) **conduct migrations** (*jǔqiān*).

**Living beings** (*shēngmín*) follow their **karma** (*yì*), and all are **guided** (*shèsuǒ*) to **Tangshan** (*Āngshān*). The **Nine Rivers** (*Jiǔhé*) and **Six Caverns** (*Liùdòng*) are the **camp of myriad ghosts** (*wànguǐ zhīyíng*).

The **flaming city** (*Huǒchéng*), **sword-trees** (*Jiànshù*), **boiling caldrons** (*fèi niè*), and **chilled courts** (*hántíng*)—here, the **ghostly marshals** (*guǐshuài*) and **great demons** (*Dàmó*) **interrogate** (*kǎozé*) the **sinner-souls** (*zuìhún*). With the **Supreme Mystic Source’s seals** (*Yuánshǐ Yùfú*), they **extract** (*xiàbá*) those trapped in **darkened gates** (*yōuxiāng*).

For all sentient beings, I **liberate** (*zhuīdù*) their **ancestors** (*zǔxiān*). To the **Jade Emperor** (*Zhúlíng Shàngdì*), I **report** (*gōnggào*) to the **Three Officials** (*Sānguān*).

The **Five Sacred Mountains** (*Wǔyuè*), **Four Great Rivers** (*Sìdú*), **named peaks** (*míngshān*), and **great waters** (*dàchuān*)—the **Water Palaces** (*Shuǐfǔ*) and **Cavernous Abodes** (*Dònggōng*)—where **divine sovereigns** (*shénshuài*) **rule** (*zhǔzǎi*), I **petition** (*yuánshè*) for **forgiveness** (*shè*) of those **stagnant in darkness** (*zhìchuàng*), so they may **not be delayed** (*bùdé qǐtíng*).

A **grand assembly** (*Dàhuì*) is held in the **Mystic Capital** (*Xuándū*), swiftly **summoning** (*sùzhuī*) the **myriad gods** (*wànshén*).

Among them are:
- The **Supreme Sovereign of the East** (*Dōngjí Xúnshēng Fùgǎn Tàiyī Jiùkǔ Tiānzūn*), who **responds to calls** (*xúnshēng*) and **attends to entreaties** (*fùgǎn*).
- The **Lord of Liberation and Transformation** (*Dùhún Huàxíng Zhūn*), who **liberates souls** (*dùhún*) and **shapes forms** (*huàxíng*).
- The **Great God of the Supreme Darkness** (*Tàimíng Liànshī Dàshén*), who **refines the corpse** (*liànshī*).
- The **True Person of Great Compassion** (*Dàcí Miàoxíng Zhēnrén*).
- The **Supreme Sovereign of Celestial Pivot and Fate** (*Tiānshū Tiānjī Hǎoshēng Wénchāng Yánshòu Dùè Shàngshén*), who **preserves life** (*yánshòu*) and **degrees beings** (*dùè*).

The **Supreme Mystic** (*Tàixuán*) is **summoned** (*Zhāolíng*), and **countless souls are liberated** (*Wúliàng dùrén*).

Today’s **recording** (*jiàolù*) is witnessed by the **Ten Directions’ gods** (*Shífāng shén*). The **Ten Directions’ gods** (*Shífāng shén*) arrive in their **eight celestial processions** (*Bājǐng*), riding **cloud-borne palanquins** (*fēiyún bǎogài*), **scarlet chariots** (*xiàniè*), and **whirling wheels** (*biāolún*). They **harness** (*piānjià*) the **heavenly steeds** (*Tiānmǎ*), with **white phoenixes** (*Báifèng*) and **green cranes** (*Qīngluán*) leading their **mystic and emerald banners** (*jiàn Xuánlíng Cuìjié*). Their **green-feathered dragons** (*Lǜyǔ Lóngfān*) precede them, while **ten thousand spirits** (*yìlíng wànshén*) follow in the rear, bearing **the eight pure melodies of the sun** (*Bāsù yánggē*), with **giant elephants** (*Jùxiàng*) and **qilins** (*Qílín*) **guarding** (*yìshè*) them. The **ten celestial luminaries** (*Shíjīng*) **clear the path** (*qǐtú*), and the **seven stars** (*Qīchén*) **bear the yoke** (*pěngyuán*), as **myriad spirits and gods** (*yìlíng wànshén*) **float through the void** (*fúkōng*).

Their **radiant light** (*guāngmíng*) **illuminates** (*zhàoyào*), making the **Ten Directions** (*Shífāng*) **clear** (*dònglǎng*).

The **Divine Officials** (*Shénxiào*) of the **Celestial Registry** (*Fǔxiàng*), the **Left Palace of the Primordial Yellow** (*Yuánhuáng Zuǒgōng*), and the **Immortal Masters of the Daoist Sage** (*Táogōng Xiānbó*)—all **holding sacred tablets** (*zhíqiú bǎjí*)—**assemble** (*qí dào*) before the **Celestial Throne** (*Dìqián*).

I **liberate** (*Pǔdù*) all **sentient beings** (*zhòngshēng*) and the **souls of past generations** (*shàngshì wánghún*).

By **imperial decree** (*Chì*), I **summon** (*xiè*) the **Ghostly Sovereigns** (*Guǐdì*), who **come to hear** (*láitīng jiàoyán*) my teachings.

The **Six Palaces of Tangshan** (*Luó Āng Liùgōng*), the **dark caverns** (*yīndòng*), and the **iron mountains** (*tiěshān*)—their **ministers and attendants** (*bīnyǒu liáozuǒ*), the **Four Great Celestial Lords** (*Sìdà Mínggōng*)—**guard the forbidden** (*sījìn shìchén*), **attend the august** (*bīnshén*), and **command the rivers’ lords** (*cǐhé lièhóu*). Each **holds black ledgers** (*hēibù*), **erasing** (*xiāoluò*) the **roots of sin** (*zuìgēn*), so they **cannot be detained** (*bùdé gōulíu*) and **must press onward** (*bīhé guǐqún*).

The **Supreme Mystic Source’s seals** (*Yuánshǐ Fúmìng*) **ascend at the appointed hour** (*shíkè shēngqiān*).

The **suffering souls** (*kǔhún*) are **cleansed** (*xīkǔ*) in the **chilled pools** (*hánchí*), and **purified** (*zhàoguàn*) in the **heavenly ford** (*Tiānjīn*).

The **demons are subdued** (*Zhìmó bǎojǔ*), and the **souls are classified** (*dùpǐn*) in the **Southern Palace** (*Nángōng*). The **Nine Mysteries** (*Jiǔxuán*) **undergo refinement** (*shòuliàn*), and the **souls are transformed into immortals** (*xiānhuà chéngrén*).

Those **liberated in their living bodies** (*shēngshēn shòudù*) endure **eon after eon** (*jiéjié chángcún*), **revolving with the cosmic wheel** (*suíjié lúnzhuǎn*) and **living as long as heaven** (*yǔtiān qínián*).

I **transcend** (*Chāolíng*) the **Three Realms** (*Sānjiè*), **soaring** (*xiáoyáo*) in the **Upper Pure** (*Shàngqīng*), where the **Celestial Emperor** (*Tiāndì*) **summons** (*héyán*) the **formless realm** (*wúsè zhìjìng*) of **dharma practice** (*fǎnxíng*).

The **Eight Heavens of the East**:
- **Base of Transformation, Rightful Proclamation Heaven** (*Jīhuà Zhèngxuān Tiān*), ruled by **Imperial Changes** (*Dìbiàn*) and **Celestial Benevolence** (*Jīnyí*).
- **Manifest Response, Mystic Pervasion Heaven** (*Yóumíng Yìngxuān Tiān*), where the **Emperor traverses** (*Dìbiàn*) and **attains the Primordial** (*zhēnyuán*).
- **Eternal Bliss, Pivotal Darkness Heaven** (*Jílè Shūmíng Tiān*), with the **Emperor guarding the Six Mysteries** (*Dìliùguān Xuánxuán*).
- **True Array, Nine Immortal Heaven** (*Biànzhēn Jiǔxiān Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s ranks** (*Dìzhèn*) are **unfathomable** (*Xīwùkuā*).
- **Radiant Spirit, Flourishing Destiny Heaven** (*Yàolíng Huàyùn Tiān*), ruled by the **Emperor selecting** (*Dìjiǎn*) the **hills and marshes** (*qiūzé fāng*).
- **Unarrogant, Lamenting Awareness Heaven** (*Bùjiāo Bēishí Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s enlightenment** (*Dìjiào*) **illumines the sea-clouds** (*hǎiyún*).
- **Celestial Aid, Pure Treasure, Encircled Reserve Heaven** (*Yòujī Sùbǎo Zhōuchú Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s willow** (*Dìliǔ*) **shields the youthful** (*shàoshì*).
- **Passing Darkness, Ancient Mien, Vast Reflection Heaven** (*Lìshuǎng Gǔmiǎn Hóngsī Tiān*), ruled by the **Emperor of the Seasonal Path** (*Jìlù Shídì*).

The **Eight Heavens of the South**:
- **Lingering Reverence, Sacred Ballads Heaven** (*Lìtán Shùjí Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s wood** (*Dìmù*) **expands and relaxes** (*shū*).
- **Constellation’s Cavern, Feasting Sovereign Heaven** (*Xiàdòng Yànwáng Tiān*), ruled by the **Emperor’s radiance** (*Jǐngtáng*) **endless** (*wúyáng*).
- **Barrier’s Listening, High Transformation Heaven** (*Chà Tīng Huàgāo Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s benevolence** (*Xiàocí*) **echoes in the dome** (*jiāoyōng*).
- **Sealed Darkness, Recording Obscurity Heaven** (*Fēngmíng Lùyīn Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s pardon** (*Bóhuáng*) **is centered** (*yòuzhōng*).
- **Soul’s Liberation, Ascending Auspiciousness Heaven** (*Húndù Shēngqìng Tiān*), ruled by the **Emperor’s virtue** (*Yònglín Déguāng*).
- **Transcending Joy, Hopeful Bliss Heaven** (*Chāoduì Xīlè Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s repose** (*Xīcháng*) **is everlasting** (*Rú*).
- **Compassionate Ascent, Auspicious Fruit Heaven** (*Cídēng Fúguǒ Tiān*), where the **Emperor is never idle** (*Bùyì Pīmén*).
- **Divine Examination, Celestial Officials’ Heaven** (*Shénjiào Sījīn Lǐnglù Tiān*), where the **Emperor treads** (*Dàoyuán*) and **refines the isles** (*xiūyǔ*).

The **Eight Heavens of the West**:
- **Responsive Prayer, Victorious Marvel Heaven** (*Yìngqí Shèngmiào Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s virtue** (*Shìduān*) **awaits** (*Sì*).
- **Pervasive Transformation, Contemplative Immortal, Easy True Heaven** (*Tōnghuà Lǜxiān Yìzhēn Tiān*), ruled by the **Emperor’s tranquility** (*Jìngcháng*) and **majestic ascent** (*Sōng*).
- **Eternal World, Boundless Reverence, Shadowed Transformation Heaven** (*Jiǔshì Yǐngqí Yǐnghuà Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s emptiness** (*Xūfán*) **is self-effacing** (*zìwēi*).
- **Daoist Portal, Silent Tranquility Heaven** (*Dàohù Jìngrán Tiān*), ruled by the **Emperor’s benevolence** (*Jīdòng Chǒngbāng*).
- **Awe-Inspiring, Distant Spirit, Supplementary Heaven** (*Chéngzhèng Yǎolíng Bǔtiān*), where the **Emperor’s light** (*Zhàofú*) **leads the retinue** (*shuàicóng*).
- **Jade Capital, Serene Han, Sovereign’s Heaven** (*Yùdū Xiāokǎn Zhǔchéng Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s command** (*Mìngxiān*) **pierces the void** (*Chōng*).
- **Ascending Void, Mystic Change Heaven** (*Shēngxū Xuánbiàn Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s seals** (*Qǐzhāng*) **are fused and retained** (*róngliú*).
- **Dharma Practice, Supreme Formlessness Heaven** (*Fǎnxíng Tàiwú Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s sovereignty** (*Shèshén*) **encompasses all spirits** (*zǒnglíng*).

The **Eight Heavens of the North**:
- **Great Micro, Jade Splendor Heaven** (*Tàiwēi Yùhuá Tiān*), where the **Emperor’s flow** (*Liúyǐn*) **is resonant and flourishing** (*wǎnxī

**The Eight Heavens of the South:**

- **Yīntái Zhǒng’àn Tiān**, where the **Emperor’s music** (*Zòu Yīlián*) **resounds**.
- **Yuèsháo Qiānzhèng Tiān**, where the **Emperor’s brilliance** (*Tángyào Mínglún*) **illuminates the wheel**.
- **Lónghuà Zhēnhuì Tiān**, where the **Emperor’s wisdom** (*Dìngzhì Pǔxuán*) **transforms and revolves**.
- **Nǚqīng Shūwén Tiān**, where the **Emperor’s grace** (*Ādū Zhǐshū*) **disperses**.

**The Thirty-Two Heavens and Thirty-Two Emperors**
All Heavens conceal their names.
All Heavens conceal their signs.
Within the void of Heaven, the **natural sacred seals** (*Zìrán Língzhāng*) emerge,
All Heavens conceal their melodies—**the sounds of returning to emptiness**.
The **guiding essence** (*Huàlíng Zhǎodǎo*), the **pursuing spirits of passage** (*Zhuīdù Zhīshén*).
The **Great Demon of the Soul’s Warden**, the **spirit of rebirth** (*Fǎnshēng Zhīlíng*).
The **Nine Saints and Ten True Ones**, transforming into **Upper Purity**.
The **limitless mysteries**, profound beyond measure.
**Unfolding divine truths**, pursuing the lost souls.
Today, rejoicing in receiving passage through the **Heavens of the Thresholds**,
I pray to extinguish the **Three Evils**, release the **Earthly Prison**,
and ascend beyond the **Five Paths**—**the soul rises to Supreme Void**.
The **True King** holds high, **unbound by Heaven’s Gate**.
The **Eastern Dipper** lifts the spirit, the **Western Dipper** refines the essence,
The **Northern Dipper** pursues the dark, the **Southern Dipper** guides life,
The **Central Dipper** governs the cycles, commanding all spirits.
The **Green Emperor** guards the soul, the **White Emperor** awaits the shadow,
The **Red Emperor** nourishes the *qi*, the **Black Emperor** harmonizes the blood,
The **Yellow Emperor** rules centrally—**no god surpasses him**.

The **Five Heavenly Demons**:
- **Green Heaven’s Demon King**, opening the **mechanism of fate**.
- **Red Heaven’s Demon King**, seizing **lawful authority**.
- **White Heaven’s Demon King**, commanding the **Eight Powers**.
- **Black Heaven’s Demon King**, inspecting **wickedness and guilt**.
- **Yellow Heaven’s Demon King**, to whom **all gods submit**.

The **Five Great Demons**, the **source of birth and transformation**.
With **flying drums and banners**, they **summon the lost souls**.
With **banners, bells, and drums**, they **examine the ghosts and gods**.
Their titles are **glorious and exalted**, **High and Pure Officials**.
**Heaven’s passage of souls**, its **bright decrees to Northern Míng**.
The **Seven Mysteries receive passage**, summoning **Yīng and Yáng**.
The **Nine Abysses present their records**, **Mount Tai’s registers stand**.
The **True Demons attach to spirits**, **life’s breath gathers light**.
Riding the **transformations of Heaven and Man**, **Dao’s power expands**.
Dare to obstruct? **The High True One repels and blocks**.
With **golden axes**, they **execute before the court**; **the Great Heaven’s punishment** follows.
They **slaughter and sever the heretics**, **wind and fire relentless**.
They **pursue the souls of past ages**, the **distant and lost**.
**Transforming breath receives the spirit**, **rebirth restores the form**.
No demon dares interfere—**the True Awareness shines bright**.
The **Three Officials of Northern Míng** inspect the **Soul Camp**,
**No concealment is permitted**, **the Golden Horse Inn presents the records**.
A **universal proclamation**—**all gods hear the might**.
The **Three Realms’ Five Emperors** declare to **Upper Purity**.
The **mixed Yellow Primordial**, its **transformations boundless**.
Grateful for the **True Mysteries**, establishing the **Two Principles**.
**Wind and Dew ascend**, the **Primordial Halter descends**.
The **Yáng-soul shines**, the **Yīn-shadow glows**.
In the **void and abyss**, the **Ultimate Spirit is concealed**.
Seizing **Primordial Transformation**, the **Supreme Sovereign**.
Named the **Emperor of Emptiness**, dwelling in **Jade Purity**.

The **Great Conflagration of the Dragon Han**, the **Crimson Emperor’s cycle ends**.
**延康溟涬** (*Yánkāng Míngdùn*), the **Great Void of Chang’an**.
Formless, shadowless, **beyond the Ultimate and the Infinite**.
**Crimson Light initiates the cycle**, transmitting **Dao to Jade Sovereignty**.
**Bóling’s Long Happiness**, the **Dan Heaven turns green**.
Opening the **Three Realms**, the **Thirty-Six Palaces**.
**Primordial Transformation flows**, the **Four Quadrants’ Heavens**.
The **Five Dippers align**, their **halters interlinked**.
**Wheeling ascent and descent**, **nurturing all spirits**.
Thus bestowed the **Mystic Seal**, the **Nine-Heaven Jade Script**.
**Stabilizing the Five Mountains**, eternally unshaken.
The **Nine Terraces of the Abyss**, the **Great Earthly Sovereigns**.
**Walking the Dao of the Wandering Sage**, the **Jewel Gate’s Cloud Camp**.
The **First Sovereign**, the **Tiger-Mouthed Earth Dragon**,
Holding **Heaven’s Great Constitution**, **aligned with Dao’s function**.
**Transforming through spirit**, **encompassed by fierce winds**.
This is the **Numinous Treasure**, the **Mystery within Mysteries**.
**Arraying all gods**, submitting to the **Three Officials**.
**Generating and transforming beings**, **governing the people**.
**Recording merit for transcendence**, **condemning evil to sink**.
**Carrying sand, bearing stones**, **draining the boundless sea**.
**Driving thunder, commanding lightning**, the **River of the Dark Night**.
**Ten kalpas of retribution**, enduring **bitter suffering**.
I do not forgive—**how shall they ascend?**
For you, I **pursue the lost souls of past ages**.

Thus I proclaim the **Root of the Great Dao**, making all **awaken and open**,
Binding them to **auspicious causes**—**the Sacred Seal shatters the prison**,
All suffering ceases, **Mystic Light dispels darkness**,
Illuminating the **heavy gloom**, **ghostly officials ascend**,
Their **rankings heard by all Heavens**.
Above all Heavens, each has a **Gate of Life**.
Within lies the **Seal of Pursuing Past Souls**,
**Flying Heaven’s sacred song**, its **words harmonizing with High Truth**.

---
**First Chapter: Pursuing the Desires of the Desire Realm**
**Void and resplendent**, the **Jade-Mystic Primordial Sovereign**.
**Unifying spirits**, opening **life and guiding man**.
**Ten thousand ancestors, a hundred generations**—
Within, **souls sink deep**.
**Desires entangle**, the **endless night of the threshold**.
Not attaining **Harmony with the Mystic Awakening**—
How shall they **cross the River of Darkness?**
**Purifying thoughts**, shedding **earthly filth**,
**Cleansing the heart**, dispelling **impure mists**.
**Turn my merciful light**, the **sacred wind ascends gently**.
**Grudges and debts now cease**—
Through the **Great Law’s vehicle**.
**Shattering the net of delusion**, **freedom in the Ten Directions**.
**Prostrating to the Supreme King**, reciting this **Sacred Treasure Chapter**.
**Refining essence in the Yang-Hua Hall**, receiving passage to **Southern昌**.
**Celebrating the Union**, all ascend to the **Hall of Blessings**.

---
**Second Chapter: Pursuing the Form of the Form Realm**
**Dim and murky**, the **Northern Emperor’s ghostly officials**.
Below, they **govern the Abyss**; within, **guilty souls dwell**.
**Karma and calamity** have **lost their true nature**,
**Form’s bonds torment the spirit**.
**Drowning in kalpas**, they **lose their lives**.
This **realm’s perilous cliffs**, **filthy thoughts swirl**.
Opening the **True Dao**, receiving my **Mystic teachings**.
**Ascending and passing**, **flying beyond the Gourd River**.
**Nine-Heaven’s surging breath**, the **Three Primordials’ marvelous bloom**.
**Mingling with the Ultimate Transformation**, **unfolding the Cloud of Celebration**.
**Guiding the mechanism of response**, **nurturing life’s completion**.
**Billions receive refining**, **dissolving grudges and debts**.
**Misfortune disperses, blessings arrive**, reaching even you.
**Rescuing the boundless**, all **gain imperial transcendence**.
**Pitying the dust-obscured**, thus **showing the Law’s words**.

---
**Third Chapter: The Song of Ascending to Mystic Void in the Formless Realm**
**The Jade Saint’s Eminence**, the **Supreme One of the Great Unity**.
Named **Scenic Precision**, **summoning the True and commanding the spirit**.

**The Song of Ascending to Mystic Void in the Formless Realm (Continued)**

**Receiving life and descending breath**, **passing the soul and transcending the spirit**.
**Majestic and wondrous** the **illuminated scriptures**, **clear and radiant** the **penetrating texts**.
**Awakening without bounds**, **lovingly severing all ties**.
**Wisdom bright as returning light**, **glowing through the shadowed gates**.
**Resplendent with omens**, **ascending to grasp the Seven Mysteries**.
**By imperial decree**, **the stagnant and the wayward**—**who dares to bind or delay?**
**Forever beyond the Three Realms**, **refined into Vermilion Peak**.
**Roaming in Great Purity**, **resting in the Eons of Kalpa**.
**My Dao is vast and boundless**, **nourishing countless lives**.
Not only for our **ancestors and progenitors**, but **all attain this ascension**.
When **ten thousand teachings are complete**, **the body rides the Scenic Cloud**.
**Above the Three Realms**, **within the void of flight**—
the **True King’s sacred hymn**, **its melody harmonizing with the Cavernous Chapter**.
**Chanted a hundred times**, **the Seven Ancestors ascend**.
**Chanted a thousand times**, **the Immortal Host comes to escort**—
**ten thousand, a hundred thousand Ancestors**, **roaming in Great Purity**.
When **ten thousand teachings are complete**, **universally liberating all sentient beings**,
the **body transcends the Three Realms**, **its station proven as Immortal Consort**.

**Hearing the sacred sound**, **the Six Heavens honor its form**,
**by celestial decree**, **the Earth Spirits guard and escort**.
**Drawn from the earthly prison**, **the Five Torments and Eight Hardships**—
**forever parted from Northern Torment**, **the soul passes into Vermilion Peak**.

This is called **the Boundless Scripture**,
**rescuing and benefiting without end**.
**Hidden are the texts of the Highest Heaven**,
**all the Heavens hold them in reverence**.
**If revealed and scattered upon the earthly mountains**,
**disaster befalls the Seven Ancestral Lords**.

**Dao speaks**: These two chapters are the **hidden sounds of the Celestial Sovereigns**,
and the **True King of Jade Purity’s** concealed **words of Great Brahmā**.
**Piercing the Nine Abysses**, **liberating ancestors and progenitors**,
**the souls of those long departed**, **hearing these Cavernous Texts**,
**all sufferings dissolve**, **the divine consciousness ascends**—
**not mere mortal speech**.

**Words without melodious charm**, **verses without ornate grace**.
Thus called **profound and mysterious**, **difficult to trace and explain**.
**Treasure of the Highest Heaven**, **hidden in the Eastern Chamber of the Jade Purity True King’s Palace in Mystic Void**,
**the Scripture sealed in secrecy**.

**Dao flourishes, auspicious fate descends**,
**the talismans bear their efficacy**.
If **the Perfect Sage** brings **golden treasures and sincere devotion**,
**depending on the ancient rites** to **pledge with the Spirit Sovereign of Mystic Void**,
then **it shall be granted**.

**Dao speaks**: The **living of this world**,
all have **mystic ancestors** from **ancient ages and high generations**.
Though **descended through children and grandchildren**,
few reach **distant ancestors**—
**seven generations above**, **rituals no longer suffice**.
**If one has passed on**, **the generations stretch far**,
**sacrifices cannot reach them**, **the merit for cultivation cannot be applied**,
**their karmic burdens remain unsevered**, **their souls linger in the Earthly Prisons**.
All must **pray to the True and Sacred Spirit**,
**begging for retribution and response**.
**If blessed with auspicious retribution and divine response**,
then **they have already attained transcendence**.
**Dreams untrue**, **often seeing tombs and ancestral tablets**,
then **the departed soul strikes in darkness**, **not yet freed from the penal chains**.

All must **united in heart** **observe fasts and set feasts**,
**offer incense at the six times of day**,
**recite the Scripture ten times**,
with **blue paper and cinnabar script** of **Great Brahmā’s hidden words**,
**inscribing the departed’s surname, given name, and year of passing**,
**crafting the Four-Gate talismans**.
On **the front, inscribe in cinnabar the Ascension to Heaven Talisman**,
on **the back, write the year and hour of death**,
**the Master’s title and rank**,
**enclosed in a crimson pouch**,
**invoking the Earthly Prison’s overseers**,
and **the names of the departed souls**,
**burning them at the site of the feast**—**thus attaining liberation**.

**Wearing the talisman**, **born in Heaven**,
**blessings and virtues descend immediately**,
**dissolving all inauspicious omens**.
The **Boundless Scripture**, **universally liberating without end**.

**Dao speaks**: The **six kins and relatives**,
**those of shallow learning**, **whose Immortal rank is yet unfulfilled**,
**whose fate decrees liberation**—**their bodies pass through Great Darkness**.
At **the moment of departure**,
**offer incense for them**, **recite the Scripture ten times**,
**and perform the rites to liberate the corpse**—
**their souls and spirits ascend directly to the Southern Palace**,
**according to their merit and learning**, **and are reborn on the appointed day**.
**Without confusion in the Wheel of Rebirth**, **they attain divinity and immortality**.

**Dao speaks**: When **Heaven and Earth first gave birth**,
**Primordial Origin opened the Diagram**,
**there were already beings and forms**.
**When beings and forms were complete**, **there was death and rebirth**.
**Death and rebirth**—**the coming and going of spirit and qi**—
**the measure of human life**.
**Ancestral souls of ancient times**,
not only **those long departed**,
**ten thousand, a hundred thousand Ancestors**,
**some enduring kalpas of formation and destruction** yet **their souls have not ascended**.
**The scholars of this world**,
**unknowing of how many times Heaven and Earth have formed and destroyed**,
**for the long or short duration of kalpas**,
**the souls of the departed**, **their fixed karmas bound in darkness**, **unresolved**—
all must **present petitions and odes**,
**offer incense and recite Scriptures**,
**burn the Heavenly Talismans**,
**observe fasts and set feasts**,
**praying to the High True Ones**—
then **they shall attain liberation**, **born in the Hall of Great Blessings**.

**Fasts and recitations of Scripture**, **their merit is profound**—
**making the departed souls bright in Great Peace**,
**piercing the endless night with light**,
**dissolving the torments of the Earthly Prisons**,
**quelling the flames of the Fire Mountains**,
**the Dark Tribunals’ punishments cease**,
**all heat and cold receive relief**—
**their blessings are beyond measure**.
Thus called **Boundless**, **universally liberating Heavenly and Human**.

**Dao speaks**: All who possess this Scripture,
**can perform these merits for myriad folk**.
**Taking the vow to observe fasts**, **reciting the Scripture ten times**,
all are **recorded by the Heavens**,
**escorted by ten thousand spirits**,
**distinguished among the Perfect Sages**,
**and shall be worthy to serve as ministers of the Golden Gates of the Holy Sovereign**.

**The Heavens record all deeds and transgressions**,
**without a single loss**.
**The True King of Jade Purity also recommends your worth**,
**and those who attain the Dao shall comprehend these profound utterances**.

**The Hidden Words of Great Brahmā in the Heavens**—
**Boundless Sounds**
**Composed by the Dao Sovereign**
**From the Primordial Origin’s Sacred Scriptures, the Middle Chapter**

**The Eight Celestial Deities of the East:**
Dālang Píji, the Sovereign of Mysterious Records.
The Magus Helú, the Radiant Chant of the Flaming Pool.
Dōulǔ Yōuchá, the Steward of Fixed Boundaries.
Wǎnliǎo Jiūshì, the Household of Abundance and Plenty.
By imperial decree, the wicked and cruel are captured,
The Purple Sovereign’s reign spreads in harmony.
The Hall of Tranquility is purified, the Silent Voice grows strong.
The Spirit of Biànshén drifts free, the Bright Clarity inspects and exorcises.
The Marvelous Conduct is unraveled—its qi illuminates the land.

Jiélu Bātái, the Four Bright Foundations of Immortality.
The Register of Wretched Souls, the Imperial Edict of Mysterious Fate.
Quánshā Bānlā, Āliè Yānzǐ.
The Wondrous Clarity performs enlightenment, the Detached Pearl corrects transgressions.
The Bamboo Horns resound in frequent harmony, the Leaning Connections dispatch their messengers.
The Enclosing Gate restrains the Steward, the Empty Treasury holds the Jade Tablet.
Dōuwén Hèkuí, the Refined Harmony of Dreams.
The Ornate Treasures sink into the depths, the Massive Forehead supports the foundation.

The Sovereign of Heaven’s Splendid Axis, Jiāopíng Guāndū.
The Omen of Calamity in the Balance, the Guest of Zhou’s Germination.

Zhào Zhāng Yánxī, Lùhuán Túntán.

The Solitary Inn ceases its vigil, the Deceptive Leaps pierce the Capital’s depths.
The Carved Murmurs spread in lament, the Calamities align with the Bright.
The Frontier’s Defense surges like a hut, the Nine-Mouthed Ford flows with tides.
Mǎ Měng lüè Nú, the Wild God’s love races on.

**The Dao Speaks:**

Within these heavens, the Great *Dàfàn* speaks in hidden words,
with boundless sounds.

The ancient scriptures are all broad and long, a span of ten feet,
engraved upon the *Bǎozhuàng* of the Pure Heaven of the Northern Celestial Realm.
They scatter the crimes of the Nine *Yōu* of the *Sǎn* and *Chéng* domains,
forgive the souls of those who perished in past ages,
pursue and guide them to transcendence,
extract them from suffering and grant them ease,
sever the bonds of *karmic* causes,
settle debts from past lives,
secure their liberation and boundless freedom,
unconstrained by *Tàishān*.

Their descendants receive blessings,
high honors and fitting offices,
their homes free from malevolent *qi*,
their lineages unbroken by misfortune—
the heavens guard their prosperity,
their virtue and power ever abundant, their bodies unharmed.

Long ago, the Original Sovereign *Yuánjūn* inscribed these words,
establishing them as the true sounds.

Those who know these sounds and can fast while reciting them—
the heavens will dispatch the *Zhuīdù* Spirits of the *Língguān*,
lowering to extract their souls,
recording their meritorious deeds,
and presenting them to the heavens.
Ten thousand deities will pay homage,
the earthly spirits attend at the gates,
the Great Merit *Zhēnwáng* will recommend them to the *Shénxiāo*,
their Dao will be complete and they will attain success,
wandering the Three Realms,
ascending to the *Jīnmén*.

These sounds cleave through all obstructions,
banish all calamities,
transcend all souls,
fulfill all aspirations—
the natural sounds of the Heavenly True.
Thus, when recited, they summon the *Língrén* to descend and manifest,
the Supreme Sovereign to sing from afar,
the myriad deities to pay homage,
the Three Realms to attend at the hall,
all *shén* to bow in reverence,
the malevolent spirits to perish of their own accord,
with *línláng* resounding,
the Ten Directions in solemn silence,
the rivers and seas stilled,
the mountains and hills swallowing their mist,
all souls subdued and trembling—
they gather the host of immortals,
the heavens free of noxious vapors,
the earth free of *shén* dust,
the *Mínghuì* illuminated and clear—
the boundless compassion of the Mystic Dao.

**The *Língbǎo Wúliàng* Scripture of the Supreme Transcendence for Perfectly Attaining Beings**
*Completes Chapter 55, begins Chapter 56.*

**Chapter 56: The Section on Rescuing the Dead Souls**

The Dao speaks: *"Of old, within the Purple Luster Heaven of Mystic Rescue, the Verdant Landscape of Void-Luminous Great Compassion Soil, I received from the Primordial Origin the boundless supreme method for rescuing and delivering the dead souls of all beings.*

When the Primordial Origin Heavenly Venerable was to proclaim this scripture, He circled ten times, calling forth the Ten Directions, and then took His seat. The Heavenly True Great Gods, the Supreme Saints of High Venerability, the Great Emperor of the Northern Du, the Heavenly Venerable of the Nine Abysses Who Extracts Guilt, the Heavenly Venerable of the Golden Gate Who Rescues and Delivers, the Heavenly Venerable of the Great One Who Saves Suffering, the Great Compassionate and Great Merciful True Person Who Saves Suffering, the Great Benevolent True Person, and the countless *wúyàng*—all rode the void and arrived.

Emerald radiance flowed with splendor, clouds of hue mirrored in color, dragon palanquins and phoenix carriages, jewel-canopied and spirit-bannered, spread in procession. Fragrant mists swirled thickly, while the sun and moon paused their light. The boundless void shone clear, for nine days and nine nights. The celestial palaces of jade and pearl, cloud-halls and vermilion chambers, all shone together at once, extending down to Kunlun’s peaks, the Three Mountains, the Ten Isles and Four Seas, the curves of the Nine Rivers, the cold courts of Du’s eternal night, and the gates of the Nine Abysses—all were bathed in divine light, universally enlightened. The myriad forms became pure, the Ten Heavens bright and vast, the lands, mountains, rivers, forests, and trees all leveled as one, with no high or low. The earth turned sapphire-green, its hue unchanging.

The assembled immortals stood in attendance. The Primordial Origin Heavenly Venerable sat in void-floating splendor upon the jade-light, sunlit treasure couch of the *Dòngyáng*.

When the scripture was recited once, the great saints of the heavens simultaneously praised its virtue. At that time, the earth, mountains, and great iron cities all opened naturally, their sins absolved, and all came to hear the law’s sound.

When the scripture was recited twice, the sound of boiling caldrons shook the world, yet suddenly turned cool and clear. Waters birthed blue lotuses, strange qi perfumed the air, and the mountains of blades all became treasure trees. Shackles and chains melted away, bones and flesh regenerated, and the dead restored to living form—all sheltered beneath the Dao’s grace.

When the scripture was recited thrice, the immortals and saints extolled its marvels, and all spiritual omens manifested.

When the scripture was recited four times, all people awakened to the law’s essence.

When the scripture was recited five times, insects and beasts gained wisdom, recognizing their karmic roots.

When the scripture was recited six times, tigers, wolves, and venomous serpents severed their evil natures.

When the scripture was recited seven times, grudges dissolved, and hostile bones became kindred.

When the scripture was recited eight times, the paths of ghosts were sealed, and life’s flow preserved eternally.

When the scripture was recited nine times, the lost and stagnant souls were refined and ascended.

When the scripture was recited ten times, the Dao and virtue became pure and one, and all attained the wondrous True.

At that time, within the land, all sentient and aware beings—whose hearts did not waver in darkness—were protected and delivered, all attaining longevity.

The Dao speaks: *"At that time, when the Primordial Origin Heavenly Venerable recited the scripture once, the Great God of Boundless Rescue and Judgment from the East of the Boundless and Limitless came with the countless *wúyàng*, floating through the void.

When the scripture was recited twice, the Great God of Inspection and Rescue from the South of the Boundless and Limitless came with the countless *wúyàng*, floating through the void.

When the scripture was recited thrice, the Great God of Prohibition and Rescue from the West of the Boundless and Limitless came with the countless *wúyàng*, floating through the void.

When the scripture was recited four times, the Great God of Transformation and Rescue from the North of the Boundless and Limitless came with the countless *wúyàng*, floating through the void.

When the scripture was recited five times, the Great God of Prison-Judgment and Rescue from the Northeast of the Boundless and Limitless came with the countless *wúyàng*, floating through the void.

When the scripture was recited six times, the Great God of the Nine Abysses and Rescue from the Southeast of the Boundless and Limitless came with the countless *wúyàng*, floating through the void.

When the scripture was recited seven times, the Great God of the Springs’ Curves and Rescue from the Southwest of the Boundless and Limitless came with the countless *wúyàng*, floating through the void.

When the scripture was recited eight times, the Great God of Luo-Du and Rescue from the Northwest of the Boundless and Limitless came with the countless *wúyàng*, floating through the void.

When the scripture was recited nine times, the Great God of Transcendent Birth and Rescue from Above of the Boundless and Limitless came with the countless *wúyàng*, floating through the void.

When the scripture was recited ten times, the Great God of Ascension and Transformation and Rescue from Below of the Boundless and Limitless came with the countless *wúyàng*, floating through the void.

When the ten recitations were complete, the Great Gods of Rescue from the Ten Directions of the Boundless and Limitless Heavenly True all arrived together. The men and women of the land bowed their hearts in reverence.

The arriving multitude numbered in the myriads—all riding in unison, their spirit-light scattering hues, and fragrant mists filling the sky. The Eight Departments and Six Heavens, the Three Officials and Nine Ministries, summoned by their awe-inspiring light, gathered the suffering souls of strange destinies, along with the countless *wúyàng*. Half the land’s soil sank unevenly, beyond restraint.

Thus, the Primordial Origin, surveying near and far with compassion, took up the treasure fan and emitted a wondrous light, reaching the Ten Directions. All celestial and saintly beings who heard the law saw their forms as clear as *liúlí* glass, their inner robes washed like *zhùluó* silk. The ghosts, spirits, and lost souls each attained perfection within their kinds, their minds pure, their karmic fires extinguished. Flowers of the immortals scattered in flight, and great jade sounds resounded, proclaiming the law’s essence.

‘O ye beings! Through your accumulated sins and evils, your dead souls wander, rootless, drifting into the various destinies, enduring endless cycles, their Daoic connections unfathomable. Now, with the *jiǔyáng* divine qi of the Great Brahman Heavenly Expanse, the Twelve Spirit-Writings are transformed to rescue the dead souls, elevating them to the celestial realm.

From the moment of death, the corpse’s form is refined. The soul guards the corpse, the stagnant and lost ascend, and the immortals’ virtue restores them to life. They escape the Three Torments and cross the Eight Hardships.

The great assembly rejoiced, awaiting the grace of His light.

Then, the Primordial Origin, moved with pity, lit the incense of the flaming censer, and the smoke condensed into a jade palace, nine *zhàng* above the earth. Within hung a celestial rainbow, shimmering in five colors, to receive the assembly. All entered its midst.

The Primordial Origin then commanded the Heavenly Venerable Who Extracts Guilt, the Duke of Luo-Du, the True Person Who Saves Suffering, and the countless *wúyàng* to ascend together to the platform of wondrous purple jade and spirit-bloom."*

The Heavenly and human beings looked upward, and saw only the vibrant radiance of the Primordial Origin’s form. When the myriad spirits entered the jade palace, their whereabouts became unknown. The people of the land dispersed, the earth returned to its level state, and no longer tilted or collapsed.

The Primordial Origin then, upon the wondrous purple jade platform, completed the teaching of the sacred scripture. The multitude of *wúyàng* spirits, under divine supervision, transmitted it to me. At that moment, joy and celebration were beyond words. The rites were fully observed, and the celestial beings resumed their positions—all in an instant, leaving no trace of sound.

At that time, all Heavenly and human beings who encountered the scripture’s teachings universally received salvation. Their Dao/Way was preserved, and none were lost or submerged. The land turned toward reverence, and all cultivated benevolent hearts.

They neither transgressed nor offended, neither harbored resentment nor quarreled, neither wandered nor forgot, neither clung to attachments nor succumbed to them, neither disturbed nor alarmed. Their words were always true and upright, their speech free of malevolence. They harmonized in compassionate love, their teachings and transformations merging. Life and death were both secure, and they attained joyful rebirth.

The scripture’s origin was revealed in teaching: the hidden and manifest beings aligned in virtue. Those with sincere devotion, revering and honoring it, all gained the power to transcend the world.

The Dao/Way speaks: The words of the Primordial Origin’s sacred teaching are the true names of the Celestial Sovereigns within the Heavenly Domain—hidden tones of the Dao/Way. They are also the internal taboos of the True King, the secret names through which the hundred spirits achieve salvation. These are not the common words of the world.

The Supreme Saints, having already become True Persons, mastering the profound and subtle, know all its chapters. When one recites it ten times, the celestial realms respond in distant chanting, the myriad emperors offer rites, and the submerged, lost souls are restored to the ranks of immortals. Those bound by affectionate habits all attain liberation, and the assembled demons, in awe, dissolve into transformed spirits.

The learned scholars who recite it ten times shall have the Four Officials resolve their disputes, the Nine Abysses clear their grievances, the dead rise from their graves, and white bones return to form. All shall receive salvation and attain rebirth.

Thus it is: When scholars recite and chant this sacred text, they summon the True and the spirits. Wondrous *qi* arrives, and the Dao/Way generates divine virtue—so they may descend to save the dying and immediately ascend to transcendence. None fail to rise and advance.

A casual recitation brings misfortune, but proper veneration and rites ensure prosperity for one’s lineage through generations. With benevolent causes, all calamities are averted, and the divine guardians protect the gate.

This scripture is most exalted, unparalleled in the Heavenly Capital. It saves countless beings, standing as the root of all Dao/Way. Its vast and august influence is beyond measure, its virtue impossible to exhaust.

The Dao/Way speaks: For those who recite this scripture ten times, all celestial realms shall gather. The officials of Luo-Du’s Six Abysses, the river spirits of the cold courts and dark waters, the sovereigns of Tai Mountain and the earthly ramparts, all masters of the divine spirits, shall record their merits above. They shall transcend and free guilty souls—countless ancestors and descendants, the submerged and tormented—all immediately receiving salvation. Ascending to the Vermilion Palace, they shall dwell there for nine years, undergo transformation and rebirth, and become noble beings.

Those who earnestly study this scripture, their merits fulfilled and virtue attained, shall all become immortals, flying to the Golden Palace and feasting in the Heavenly Capital.

The learned scholars of the world, who recite and uphold this scripture, shall immediately receive salvation and ascend to the Southern Palace.

Common folk who recite it shall open the Nine Mysteries, escape the underworld, and be born into celestial bliss. They shall extend their gratitude to the later generations, forever free from bodily suffering.

This scripture is subtle and profound, its salvific power endless. All Heavenly and human beings rejoice in receiving its blessings. Its boundless merit bestows grace upon life and death.

Though Heaven treasures it, it is not passed down to the mortal world. Only the worthy scholars, offering gold and jade treasures with sincere hearts, swear by Heaven to transmit it.

If one reveals or scorns it carelessly, calamity shall fall upon nine generations, and eternal servitude in the netherworld awaits.

The Five Emperors, along with twenty-four jade attendants and twenty-four jade maidens, shall guard and attend the sacred text, protecting those who receive it.

The Dao/Way speaks: On the first month’s long fast, recite and chant this scripture to save the dying souls and absolve the Heavenly Officials of their transgressions in examining guilt. The great killing spirits of the Five Directions shall all cease their malevolence, and the dead shall be pardoned. They shall ascend to the Southern Palace, wandering freely in nature.

On the seventh month’s long fast, recite and chant this scripture to save the dying souls and absolve the Earthly Officials of their transgressions in examining guilt. The Five Mountains, Four Officials, Northern Luo-Du, the boundless wilderness, the spirits of altars and city gods, all prisoners and condemned souls, shall have their afflictions and misfortunes erased. Black ledgers shall be expunged, and white registers shall ascend to life.

On the tenth month’s long fast, recite and chant this scripture to save the dying souls and absolve the Water Officials of their transgressions in examining guilt. The sovereigns of the Northern Sea and river spirits, the marsh lords of the cold and deep waters, the Four Great Waters’ masters, shall all respond to the command of the tormented souls. Their sufferings shall be dispersed, and they shall cross into the realm of rebirth.

On the Eight Festivals, recite and chant this scripture to save the dying souls and examine guilt. The Eight Great Prisons and Eight Abyssal spirit jails shall all submit to the Dao/Way’s transformation, ascending to the Blessed Court. Deluded recognition shall open to enlightenment, and all shall attain the wondrous path. They shall be reborn in the mortal world, their wisdom bright and clear, diligently striving for higher learning and achieving true perfection.

On the Three Primordial Days, recite and chant this scripture to save the dying souls. Each shall fulfill their desires, be refined and ascend to the Southern Palace, return to life and receive spirit. Their souls shall be purified, their *qi* eternal, free from torment. Their bodies shall radiate light, and the Three Realms shall guard them. The Five Emperors shall welcome them, and the myriad spirits shall pay homage. Their names shall be recorded in Heaven, their merits complete and virtue attained, and they shall fly to the Upper Pure.

The Dao/Way speaks: On days of practice, one must bathe in fragrant water, fast and enter the chamber facing east. They shall strike their teeth thirty-two times, invoking the thirty-two heavens above. They shall bow in heart thirty-two times, close their eyes, and quietly meditate on sitting within the three-colored clouds of blue, yellow, and white. Within and without, all shall be obscured and luminous, with the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Crimson Bird, Dark Tortoise, Lion, and White Crane arrayed on either side. The sun and moon shall illuminate the chamber, casting radiant light within. A divine image shall arise upon their neck, its glow reaching the Ten Directions—so clear and distinct.

The secret incantation says:

*"Wúshàng xuán yuán, Tàishàng Dào jūn,*
*Summon forth the thirty-five Functionaries within my body,*
*Left and right officials, attendants bearing incense,*
*Jade maidens transmitting words,*
*The Five Emperors’ direct talismans,*
*The talismans of the thirty-two days,*
*Each thirty-two in number,*
*Unlocking all that is spoken."*

On this auspicious day of fasting and solemn rites, we recite the sacred scriptures to liberate countless souls. May my invocation ascend directly before the Most Venerable Supreme Sovereign of the Thirty-Two Heavens of the Primordial Origin.

Now, drawing the qi through thirty-two cycles, facing east, we recite the scripture:
