The boundless mysteries,
Deep beyond measure,
Unfolding divine scriptures,
Liberating the exhausted souls.

Today, rejoicing in receiving liberation,
Passing through the gates of the heavens,
Requesting the extinguishing of the three evils,
Severing the earthly roots.

Flying beyond the Five Skandhas,
Named ascent to the Supreme Purity,
The True King overseeing the elevation,
Unbound by the Heavenly Gate.

The Eastern Dipper receives essence,
The Western Dipper forms shape,
The Northern Dipper preserves life,
The Southern Dipper ascends transcendent,
The Central Dipper, the Great Chief,
Oversees the formation of all life.

The Azure Sovereign transmits the True,
The White Sovereign guards the Sacred,
The Vermilion Sovereign governs transformation,
The Black Sovereign binds the Spirit,
The Yellow Sovereign nurtures and sustains,
All virtues thus attain perfection.

The nine orifices and four limbs,
All gain full vitality.

The Azure Heaven Demon King, Ba Yuan Chou Bo.
The Vermilion Heaven Demon King, bearing Heaven and stone.
The White Heaven Demon King, reversing mountains with six eyes.
The Black Heaven Demon King, overseeing Chou Lang Fu.
The Yellow Heaven Demon King, crossing Heaven with strength.

The Five Sovereign Demons,
The ancestral lords of all spirits.
Flying with drumming attendants,
Commanding the divine armies.
Brandishing and shaking,
Eight paths display might.
Roaming through Heaven and Earth,
Opening liberation for dead souls.

Self-proclaimed as resplendent,
Functions boundless.
Initiating the flow of life-giving essence,
Strictly governing the Northern Underworld.
The Sacred True receives command,
Sweeping away all inauspiciousness.

The Divine Dragon spits poison,
Scaled steeds gallop.
Heavenly officials brandish flags,
Dispersing inauspiciousness.
Hurling fire ten thousand *li*,
Flowing bells through the eight directions.
Dare any obstruct,
Repulse the Supreme True.
Golden axes strike first,
Massive halberds punish last,
Commanding ghosts to obey,
All attain ascent and promotion.

Grievances and offenses reconciled,
All gain release from form,
Demons dare not interfere,
Ghosts lack malevolent spirits.

The Three Officials of the Northern Underworld,
Clearly inspecting the ghostly encampments.
No room for concealment,
The Golden Horse Relay Station.

Universal proclamation without end,
All spirits heed.
The Three Realms and Five Sovereigns,
Listening to the Supreme Purity.

The Mysterious Void’s marvelous transformation,
Ocean peaks and river sources,
Within lies the Dark Pass,
Sealed shut with guilty souls.

Dark and mysterious, faintly visible,
Eons of endless gloom.
Above, no heavenly light,
Below, no place to rest,
Blades of wind chaotically wielded,
Wails fill the void.

Only the Primordial Sovereign,
The Supreme One’s glory,
Universally bestows mercy,
Divine power natural.
Extracting guilt and suffering,
Unfolding sacred scriptures,
The Crimson Book, Jade Characters,
The Supreme True Scriptures,
Liberating souls,
Guiding them to the Gate of Life.

The Vital Qi of the Dharma Realm,
All forms unfold.
The Primordial Principle flows,
Through the Thirty-Two Heavens.
Turning without color,
Circulating the Ten Directions.
Universally receiving the Mysterious Grace,
All attain ascent and promotion.

The Eight Scenes harmonized,
Qi entering the High Mysterious.
Within the Mysterious, the Supreme Ancestor,
The Highest True Sovereign.
Floating Scenes of the Supreme Expanse,
Whistling and chanting the Mysterious Chapters.
Golden Truths radiant,
Echoes flowing through the cloudy encampments.
Jade Sounds gathering qi,
Spirit Winds assembling souls.
Purple Void luxuriant,
Assisting and sheltering ten thousand immortals.
Thousand harmonies, ten thousand unifications,
Naturally forming the True.
Within the True lies the Spirit,
The Eternal Great Lord,
The Peerless Prince,
The White Primordial Sacred Spirit.

Refining and transforming life and death,
Extracting the omen from the corpse.
The Supreme One governs fate,
Gathering qi to restore the spirit.
Peach and Kang united,
The Three-One Sovereign Emperor.
Holding talismans and scriptures,
Preserving life and rooting essence.
Ascending to the High Purity,
Entering and exiting the Radiant Chamber.
Within the Eight Dark Realms,
The minutest depths.
Below, governing the human form,
The Mud Ball and Vermilion Palace,
Within, regulating the Five Qi,
Mingling with the hundred spirits.
Ten transformations return to the Spirit,
Ten thousand qi align with the Immortal.

The Dao values life,
Liberating countless beings.
Opening the Eight Gates,
Flying the Heavenly Law Wheel.
Crimes and virtues, prohibitions and karmic causes,
Universally receiving liberation,
Dead souls gain rebirth,
Bodies attain new life,
Ascending to hear the heavens.

Above the heavens,
Each has a Gate of Life.
Within lies the boundless song of the Void,
The True King’s sacred scriptures,
Words aligning with the High True.

**First Chapter: The Song of Liberating Souls from the Desire Realm into Empty Space**
Human paths easily fall,
Earthly minds torment the spirit.
The spirit labors and scatters,
Faintly fading, sinking souls.
Where do the souls awaken?
Suddenly departing the form.
The form turns to ash of eons,
The soul and spirit return to nothingness.
Silently retaining old memories,
Restlessly forgetting kin.
Gazing, no three lights,
Wandering, who is neighbor?
Ghostly officials cruelly punish,
Whips and beatings never cease.
Like driving sheep in ranks,
Lost in the boundless Underworld ferry.
Iron prisons eternally burning,
Poisonous smoke rising in confusion.
Piled corpses like mountains,
Tears and snot like rivers overflowing.
Through eons, guilt binds,
Dead souls suffer bitterly.

The Jade Purity Heavenly King,
Issues scriptures to liberate Heaven and Earth.
The Primordial Beginning’s Sacred Treasures,
Supernatural transformation generates spirit.

**Second Chapter: The Song of Ascending to the True King of the Formless Realm**
The Vermilion Gate of Nanchang,
Radiant and splendid.
The home of ten thousand spirits,
The gate of life and transformation.
Within lies eternal life,
The Great Emperor, the Purple Lord.
Feathered dragon robes,
Flying in green and purple skirts.
Holding the Yellow Scripture,
The Sacred Treasure’s upper scroll.
Judging merits in the Jade Pavilion,
Ascending and liberating dead souls.
Soul-qi receives refining,
Planting sacred roots.
Divine True moves through liberation,
Following the Yang to ascend.
Ascending the Mysterious Contract,
Water surging, fire blazing.
Flames flow in pools,
Jade rainbows, ten thousand scales.
Striding the pool as a bridge,
Golden light surging.
The Supreme Seven Elements,
Nine Abyssal guilty souls.
Bearing talismans and commands,
Ascending the transformation wheel.
Riding clouds, driving winds,
Tipping with Heaven.

**Third Chapter: The Song Demonstrating Transformation into the Formless Realm**
The Three Heavenly Realms above,
The Primordial Sovereign’s Mysterious Palace.
Returning beyond the Three Realms,
Luminous and profound.
Within lies the Great Spirit,
Called the True King.
Establishing transformations, opening liberation,
The ancestral lord of all paths.
The Primordial Beginning, Supreme Sovereign,
Bestows command with sacred scriptures.
Universally proclaiming to the underlings,
Guilt and suffering ascend and transform.
Dispersing the dark Underworld,
Universally manifesting light.
Eliminating calamities,
Permanently planting virtuous roots.

**The Song of the Formless Realm’s True King’s Salvation**

Life and death submit to the Way’s decree,
Receiving the Mysterious Sovereign’s grace.
The Underworld’s bureaucracy dissolves,
Celebrating eternal joy and prosperity.
Where the Way’s transformation reaches,
Who dares not obey?

Jade talismans guard the refining,
Peaceful through the eons’ span.
Above, the Formless Realm’s splendor,
Merging with Dao’s profound depths.

The azure void’s vast net,
Naturally spans countless eons.
This realm above the Three Worlds,
Midst the flying void’s expanse—
The True King’s sacred chant resounds,
Its melody harmonizing with the Cavernous Scripture.

Recite it a hundred times,
And your name ascends to the Southern Palace.
Recite it a thousand times,
And the Demon King comes to welcome.
Ten thousand recitations complete,
Ascend to the Celestial Void,
Transcend the Three Realms,
Ascend to the rank of Immortal Lord.
Hearing the sacred sound,
The Demon King bows in reverence,
Commanding the Earthly Deities
To escort and welcome.
Escaping the Earthly Gate,
Free from the Five Torments and Eight Hardships,
The Seven Ancestors ascend,
Forever departing the Ghostly Bureaucracy.
The soul crosses the Vermilion Mound,
Refined and reborn anew.

This is called the Boundless Salvation,
Universally liberating the endless.

There exists a Secret Scripture of the Celestial,
Revered by all the Heavens.
To reveal it carelessly invites the Hell’s fall,
Bringing calamity to the Seven Ancestors.
The Way declares:
These two chapters are the hidden sounds
Of the Celestial Sovereigns and the God of the Divine Tao,
And the True King of the Godly Expanse.
Refining and liberating the dead souls,
Ascending to the highest realms,
Heavenly lifespan spanning nine eons,
All guilt and grudges dissolved—
Their logic profound and mysterious,
All the words of the Great Brahman,
Not the common speech of the world.
Without melodic grace,
Without ornate tunes.
Thus called the Profound and Mysterious,
Difficult to fathom.
A treasure of the Celestial,
Hidden in the Divine Treasury’s Green Jade Vault,
Transmitted according to the Mysterious Principle when the time is right.
If a perfected adept brings sincerity and pledges allegiance,
Following the ancient format to inform the Three Heavens,
Then the Scripture shall be bestowed.

The Way declares:
The Earth and Heaven nurture form,
The Supreme Dao generates spirit.
Form is the dwelling of the soul,
Spirit is the Primordial Essence.
The Spirit Wind refines,
Heaven grants life.
Life forgets the Dao’s origin,
Entangled in karmic bonds.
The net of doubt, the prison of delusion,
Greed as transgression—
Objects confuse the mind,
Thoughts assail the spirit.
Qi fades, essence dissipates,
The body decays and dims.
The Five Viscera rot within,
The Seven Emotions scatter without.
The spirit’s dwelling collapses,
The spirit departs the form,
Sinking into abyssal suffering,
Dragged by past deeds.
The virtuous ascend to Heaven,
The wicked fall into the Black Waters.

The dead soul’s only reliance:
The Dao proclaims its mercy.
Sacred Scriptures save and guide,
True talismans uphold.
The Underworld officials bow in submission,
The True Officers all comply.
The Great Brahman’s lineage,
The Primordial True One’s abode.
All who share this qi must unite in heart,
Observing fasts six times daily,
Burning incense ten times through the sutras,
And virtue descends instantly.
The soul ascends to Heaven’s Hall.
The Boundless Scripture,
Universally liberating the endless.

The Way declares:
Those with shallow learning,
Or whose Immortal rank is incomplete,
When their fate of extinction arrives,
And their body enters the Great Yin—
At that moment, fellow adepts must burn incense,
Recite the sutra ten times,
And guide the corpse according to ritual.
The soul and spirit directly ascend to the Southern Palace,
According to their merit, reborn in due time.
The Wheel of Rebirth halts in confusion,
And enlightenment as an Immortal is attained.

The Way declares:
The truly learned adept,
Reciting the Three Caverns’ Sacred Scriptures,
Upholding precepts and talismans,
Secluding in mountains and marshes,
Forgotten by the world.
Or accumulating merit through deeds,
Their hidden virtue benefiting others—
When parents, teachers, or elders pass,
Desiring to guide their dead souls,
To ascend the Grand Platform,
And be enrolled in the Immortal Register—
They must first prepare the Five Fragrances’ refining broth.
Bathing the corpse’s soul,
With twelve Jade Scriptures of the Primordial Sovereign’s Sacred Text,
Inscribed in red on green silk,
Placed within the Mysterious Palace:
One on the pillow,
One on the face,
One in each hand,
One in each foot’s sole,
One before the heart,
One on each side of the coffin—
Twelve paths in total.
Burning incense, facing north, the invocation is written.
At the appointed hour, the incantation is recited:

*"Citizen of the Dao, Ruler of the King,
In life, you served the Immortal True.
At death, your form is refined.
Returning to the Great Yin.
The Sovereign’s Sacred Talisman,
Red script, jade text.
Guiding the dead soul,
Swiftly delivered to the Jade True.
Ascending to Heaven’s Hall,
Your name inscribed in the Immortal Register.
Your bones become orchid and jade,
Your face radiant with golden bloom.
The Great One guards your corpse,
The Three Officials protect your spirit.
Suddenly light as air,
Ascending to the Supreme Clarity.
The Earthly Underworld’s slaughter ceases,
Ghosts and spirits retreat.
Dare to defy the Sacred Talisman,
Disturbing the Divine’s order.
The Heavenly Executioner wields his axe,
Severing your five forms.
Mountains, marshes, waters, fire—
The True Wind and Qi protect the corpse,
Restoring life and returning the soul.
The Northern Emperor’s thunder shakes,
The corpse’s armor falls, the name of death vanishes.
On a flying cloud’s jade carriage,
You pay homage to the Purple Court.
Swiftly, as the decree commands."*

After the talisman is activated,
Fasting, burning incense, and reciting the sutras must follow.
For fasting, burning incense, and reciting the sutras,
Their merit is most profound.
The soul’s clarity ascends and transforms,
Enjoying blessings in new form.
Below, averting poison and harm,
To guide the myriad people,
Life and death rely on this salvation—
Its blessings are boundless.

Thus it is said:
All who possess this Scripture,
For kings, princes, nobles, or common folk,
Performing these merits on the day of salvation,
Burning incense and reciting the sutras ten times—
All are recorded by the Heavens,
Attended by ten thousand spirits,
And the adept of the Right Path
Shall become a minister of the Golden Gate’s Holy Sovereign.
The Heavens record every deed and transgression,
Not missing a hair’s weight.
The True King of the Celestial also recommends you,
And only those who attain the Dao
Shall truly comprehend these profound words.

**The Hidden Limitless Sound of the Great Brahman in the Midsection of the Primordial Sacred Scripture for Guiding Souls**
**Eastern Eight Heavens’ Revelation**

The radiant star clusters govern the celestial capital’s gates.
The cosmic cycles advance, exhausting their appointed numbers.
Water and fire flow as primordial roots.
Life’s Dao draws from the Mysterious—
Hearkening to Heaven’s spontaneous order.

The adept sheds like a discarded robe,
His spirit and *qi* both refined.
His rounded form manifests divine power,
His bending and extending reveal the Way’s truth.
His thoughts crystallize as jade-like purity,
Ascending through the Cloud Gate’s glory.

The Brahman’s transformation is swift and subtle,
The spirit traverses the Eight Extremes.
The white flower blooms in accordance with fate,
Its talismans aligned with the stars of *Mao* and *Bi*.

---
**Southern Eight Heavens**
Refining the crystalline gaze in the Jade Court,
Registering the female sovereign’s records.
Investigating omens reveals no deceit,
Ascending to flourish in the Prosperous Capital.
Preserving the sacred mechanism,
Rushing to the Imperial Plan’s decree.
The guilty ascend to the Celestial Bureau,
Their names inscribed in the Hall of Merit.
The Seal selects the youthful ministers,
All demonic transformations now complete.
The Mysterious responds with great scrutiny,
The netherworld’s bonds confine the cold pool.
Radiant streams transmit jade-like brilliance,
Transforming to nourish the Valley of Fusion.
Rescuing the spirit’s essence,
The *Bo* and *Yong* scriptures are draped in glory.

---
**Western Eight Heavens**
The *Tíyáng* is separated by the *Chū*,
Rolling flames sweep across the wild expanse.
The whale’s corpse disrupts the ghostly feast,
From the courtyard’s *Yóu* to the *Gēng* star’s domain.
Talismans transmit to the Dragon Palace,
Regretful of past transgressions by the *Píngquán*.
Life converges in the Divine Abode,
Omens interweave to form humanity.
The cavern’s fluids gather in coils,
Fruits dissolve around the body.
Calming the chaos of transformations,
Circulating to aid the True One.
The imprisoned armies and banners,
The wells and mats aligned in order.
Proclaiming through reverent observation,
The surging wheels drumming the *yuán* cart.

---
**Northern Eight Heavens**
Discarding the worm to beg for fish,
Do not linger in sluggish torpor.
The Edict summons the King of Stillness,
Whose mercy equals the *Bǐtú*’s embrace.
The ancient *Hán* is bound in chains,
The *Lóu* shifts the tongue’s deceit.
The *Fú* curses and seizes,
Silent as the *Yuán*’s abyss.
The *Chuò* distinguishes the vulgar from the refined,
The ancient depths resound with spirit.
Unbridled chaos brings no blessings,
The Imperial Decree bestows resources.
The *Qiú* constellations eclipse the Dipper,
The Dragon calls to the lofty heavens.
The Left General commands the *Kuí* and *Yǒu*,
Transformation births joyous wanderings.

---
**The Dao speaks:**
These are the Brahman’s hidden words,
The limitless sound within the Heavens.
The ancient scriptures were inscribed upon the Northern Celestial Jade Gate,
To rectify the Northern Mountain’s *Yīngquán* ghostly prisons,
To restrain the Nine Capitals’ great demons,
To rescue and guide the departed souls,
To birth and transform into the Land of Blessings,
Where spirits wander freely in wisdom.

Each character spans a full ten feet.
The Celestial True Man once inscribed these words,
Establishing them as the true sound.

Those who know this sound
And, with fasting, recite it—
The Heavenly察录神王 shall descend to observe their bodies,
Recording their merits and labors,
Reporting to the Heavens above.
Ten thousand spirits pay homage,
Earthly deities guard the gates,
The Great Merit True King recommends them to the Mysterious,
Their Dao complete, ascending to the Golden Gate,
Wandering the Three Realms.

This sound repels all obstacles,
Exorcises all calamities,
Guides all souls,
Accomplishes all transformations—
The natural sound of the Celestial True.

Thus, when recited, the spirit kings descend to observe,
The Supreme Deity sings from afar,
Ten thousand spirits pay homage,
The Three Realms attend the hall,
All deities bow in reverence,
Ghostly spirits vanish in terror,
The *línláng* chimes resound,
The Ten Directions grow serene,
Rivers and seas fall silent,
Mountains swallow their mists,
All spirits tremble in submission,
Summoning the gathered immortals,
Heaven is free of mist and filth,
Earth is free of demonic dust,
The netherworld’s wisdom is pure—
The boundless, profound virtue.

**The Supreme Scripture of Limitless Salvation for Transforming Beings**
**Volume Fifty-Six Complete**
**Volume Fifty-Seven**

**Explanation of the *Yōuláo* Scripture**
The Dao speaks: In days of old, within the **Primordial Azure Sky** (始青天), the **Void of the Verdant Deeps** (碧落) resounded with a vast celestial hymn, and the **Great Primordial Emperor** (元始) delivered the *Scripture of the Limitless Dao for Exorcising the Netherworld* (度人解释幽牢妙品).

When the **Primordial Emperor of the Dao** (元始天尊) spoke this scripture, He circled ten times, summoning the **Ten Directions** (十方), before ascending to His lofty seat. The **Celestial True Gods** (天真大神), the **Supreme Saints of High Rank** (上圣高尊), the **True Persons of Marvelous Practice** (妙行真人), the **Ten-Directional Emperors of Mercy Who Save from Suffering** (十方救苦天尊), the **Great Merciful Emperor of the Jade Purity Cloud Palace** (玉清云宫大慈天尊), the **True Sovereign of Great Compassion** (大悲真帝), and the **Immortal Officials of the Nine Netherworlds of the Black City** (酆都九幽帝主仙官)—countless as the sands of the **Unbounded** (无鞅)—rode the void and came.

From the **Ten Directions**, clouds arose, swirling like crimson hues. The **Jade Platforms and Precious Palaces** (琼台宝宇) flickered in the boundless expanse, while **Jade Horses and Golden Dragons** (玉马金龙) trotted through the mist, their **glowing light like phoenix canopies** (飞光凤盖) casting shade beneath **pearl-embroidered carriages** (垂荫珠軿). **Celestial auspicious hues** (瑞彩天光) radiated to the **Four Quarters** (四极), dense and verdant as the depths below (蓊郁渊映), piercing the **Azure Void** (明彻碧空). For seven days and seven nights, **crimson mists swayed** (红霞摇曳), revealing the **Divine Realm of the Godly Country** (远幕神乡). The **Celestial Capital of the Purple Micro** (天都紫微) layered its shadows, luminous as the **Star Palaces of the Crimson Hall** (丹殿星宫) and the **Jade Pavilions of the Solar Gate** (琼堂日阙). **Jade measures and celestial bands** (珠纬躔虚, 玉纲流演) wove through the **Nine Netherworlds**, while **purple vapors bloomed** (紫烟纷华), the **mountains and seas congealing into jade-green** (山海凝碧). The **auspicious golden boundary** (瑞金为界) and **colored clouds in formation** (色云合防) marked the **Pure and Tranquil Sacred Path** (清静圣途), its brilliance **unmarred by the slightest stain** (明无纤玷).

The gathered **True Gods** (众真) attended His seat, where the **Primordial Emperor of the Dao** (元始天尊) ascended to the **Floating Void Seat of the Eight Mountains, Nine Seas, Subdued Dragons, and Soaring Tigers** (玄坐空浮八山九海伏龙翔虎十极太玄之座).

As the scripture was spoken once, the **Celestial Emperors beat their drums in rhythm** (天帝鼓节), and the **High True Ones intoned with profound resonance** (高真洞咏). At that moment, the **heavy darkness of the Netherworld** (重冥阴域) was lifted from the land, and **light pervaded the age** (一时光明).

As the scripture was spoken twice, the **Thirty-Six Layers of the Underworld** (地下重垒三十六皇) bowed in submission, listening reverently, and **perused the imperial registers** (简阅皇籍).

As the scripture was spoken thrice, the **qi flowed sweet and moist**, nourishing the **withered and decayed** (气流甘濡，洒润枯朽).

As the scripture was spoken four times, the **ghosts were slain and their spirits extinguished**, the **host of demons fell silent** (杀鬼灭爽，魔众失声).

As the scripture was spoken five times, the **earth yielded eighty-one varieties of auspicious herbs** (地吐芝英八十一种), their **verdant hues and rare forms** (赪苍秀异) bearing **wondrous texts like swallows’ nests** (奇文燕胎).

As the scripture was spoken six times, the **Black Mountains of the Netherworld trembled** (酆山震摇), and the **Black Seas ceased their seething** (黑海停沸).

As the scripture was spoken seven times, the **Nine Netherworlds of Hell** (九幽地狱), with their **ten-thousand-li iron cities** (万里铁城), blazed with **karmic fires**, their **billions of eons glowing scarlet** (业火炽然，亿劫洞赤). At the scripture’s recital, the **venomous forces melted like ice** (毒势冰消), and the **flaming prisons dispersed** (炎牢消荡).

As the scripture was spoken eight times, **auspicious mists filled the void**, forming **nine-colored characters** (灵霞布空，九色成字), and the **True Scriptures radiantly appeared**, pardoning all guilty beings (真文廓现，赦诸罪人).

As the scripture was spoken nine times, the **dark qi congealed into clouds**, and the **wounds of the damned rained as tears** (暗气凝云，伤血陨雨). Those who heard the scripture **cleansed their filth**, as the **Divine Wind swept the dust** (神风扫尘).

As the scripture was spoken ten times, the **corpses rose in reverence**, their **luminous faces fresh and bright**, and they **naturally became living beings** (尸骨钦起，灵颜鲜莹，自然成人). Then, all within the land—**both male and female**—awoke to the **Dao and knew the True**, their **fetal bonds exorcised** (悟道知真，胞结解释), the **Netherworld’s gates recorded** (冥关录籍), their **characteristic marks erased** (字迹除脱), their **plain scrolls refined into sacred texts** (素幅炼章), **free of all guilt** (了无罪目), and all **turned toward the Celestial Emperor**, receiving **abundant life and nourishment** (归向天尊，咸遂生养).

The Dao speaks: Then, as the scripture was spoken once, the **Great Merciful Emperor of the Nine Qi from the Limitless and Boundless Scripture of the East** (东方无极无量品大慈九气救苦天君), with His **Unbounded multitude** (无鞅之众), floated through the void and arrived.

As the scripture was spoken twice, the **Great Wise Emperor of the Three Qi Who Pardons Sins from the Limitless and Boundless Scripture of the South** (南方无极无量品大智三气赦罪天君), with His **Unbounded multitude**, floated through the void and arrived.

As the scripture was spoken thrice, the **Great Illuminating Emperor of the Seven Qi Who Upholds the Law from the Limitless and Boundless Scripture of the West** (西方无极无量品大明七气执法天君), with His **Unbounded multitude**, floated through the void and arrived.

As the scripture was spoken four times, the **Great Beneferent Emperor of the One Qi Who Extinguishes Suffering from the Limitless and Boundless Scripture of the North** (北方无极无量品大惠一气息苦天君), with His **Unbounded multitude**, floated through the void and arrived.

As the scripture was spoken five times, the **Great Compassionate Emperor of the *Brahman* Qi Who Shatters the Prisons from the Limitless and Boundless Scripture of the Northeast** (东北无极无量品大悲梵气破狱天君), with His **Unbounded multitude**, floated through the void and arrived.

As the scripture was spoken six times, the **Great Emperor of the *Brahman* Qi Who Removes Transgressions from the Limitless and Boundless Scripture of the Southeast** (东南无极无量品除过梵气九幽天君), with His **Unbounded multitude**, floated through the void and arrived.

As the scripture was spoken seven times, the **Great Emperor of the *Brahman* Qi Who Extracts Sins from the Limitless and Boundless Scripture of the Southwest** (西南无极无量品大心梵气拔罪天君), with His **Unbounded multitude**, floated through the void and arrived.

As the scripture was spoken eight times, the **Great Merciful Emperor of the *Brahman* Qi from the Limitless and Boundless Scripture of the Northwest** (西北无极无量品大仁梵气玉匮天君), with His **Unbounded multitude**, floated through the void and arrived.

As the scripture was spoken nine times, the **Great Emperor of the Twelve Auspicious Qi Who Universally Saves from the Limitless and Boundless Scripture of the Upper Realm** (上方无极无量品普济一十二气万福天君), with His **Unbounded multitude**, floated through the void and arrived.

As the scripture was spoken ten times, the **Great Emperor of the Five Qi Who Remains Motionless from the Limitless and Boundless Scripture of the Lower Realm** (下方无极无量品不动五气玄母天君), with His **Unbounded multitude**, floated through the void and arrived.

When the ten recitations were complete, the **Limitless Celestial True Gods of the Ten Directions** (十方无极天真大神) and the **Emperors of the Boundless Dao** (无量天君) all arrived together in one moment. The **men and women of the land** (一国男女) turned their hearts in reverence, all **bearing the Emperor’s merciful grace** (咸荷慈恩). Even those who had **fallen into ruin** (下逮沦亡) were **touched by the sacred blessings** (俱沾圣泽). The **voices of their awe and gratitude** (感叹之声) echoed through the **Netherworld’s night**, while **birds and beasts wailed in sorrow** (鸟兽悲嗥), and **humans and ghosts lamented in unison** (人鬼帐惋). Those who came were as **numerous as sand grains drifting in the wind** (来者有如沙尘飘委), pressing toward the **Dao like currents flowing eastward** (向风倾注).

Then, the **Primordial Emperor of the Dao** surveyed all beings, **snapping His fingers and smiling faintly**, His **Golden Mouth emitting radiance** (金口发光), like the **brightness of the moon** (光如皎月). The **Upper Extremity reached the peerless heights** (上极无上), where the **rigid wind struck the heavens** (刚风顶际). The **Lower Extremity descended to the Water Wheel** (下极水轮), its **curved springs pouring through the Nine Leaks** (泉曲九漏). Even the **bottomless yin valleys** (无底阴谷) were **illuminated without obstruction** (无不照见), and within each ray of light, **all beings of the Three Realms** (三界众生) appeared—**good and evil, fate and root** (善恶命根), their **past retributions and new karmic ties** (宿报新缘) **mutually manifesting** (互相酬对), their **karmic fruits self-evident** (业果自明), their **hearts and eyes united in witness** (心目同证).

This **Ninefold Rotation** (九旋行) swirled in **five-colored halos** (晕成五色). It **covered the mortal realm below** (下覆人间) and **ascended to the celestial expanse above** (上接天境). Its motion was **light as a chariot**, its **radiant circular form** (灼灼圆象) **spanning the Nine Paths** (逡巡九道), resembling the **sun’s emergence over the Eastern Mountains** (状如日出东蒙). The **Ten Directions shone as one hue**, five zhang above the earth, **flashing and suspended in the void** (去地五丈，炯烁停空).

The **Primordial Emperor of the Dao** then **ascended and summoned** (登引), and the **Celestial True Gods**, the **Supreme Saints of High Rank**, the **True Persons of Marvelous Practice**, the **Limitless Ten-Directional Emperors Who Save from Suffering**, and the **Great True Gods**—countless as the sands of the **Unbounded**—all **entered the Nine-Colored Circular Form** (俱入九色圆象之中). The **heavenly and human beings** gazed upward, and **only saw a gentle breeze drifting from within the radiant circle** (惟见拂拂从圆光中入). Once they entered the light, **their whereabouts were unknown** (既入光中，不知所在), and the **people of the land scattered** (国人廓散), the **realm restored as before** (境宇如初).

The **Primordial Emperor of the Dao**, within the **Nine-Colored Circular Form**, completed the scripture’s recitation. The **gathered True Gods** oversaw the **transformation**, granting it to me. At that time, **joy and celebration were beyond expression** (喜庆难言).

The **rites of the law** were roughly performed, the **hosts of the heavens** resuming their stations. In a flash, **all sound ceased without remainder**.

At that time, **heavenly and human beings** encountered the **sutra of the law**, all receiving **salvation and deliverance**, their **dark and fettered bonds** dissolved, **no longer harmed by injustice**. The **lowly and obscure** turned upward in reverence, the **hidden and manifest** alike opened their hearts.

They **neither harbored resentment nor clung to grief**, **neither grasped nor hesitated**, **neither adhered nor loved**, **neither harmed nor deceived**, **neither wronged nor quarreled**. Their **words harmonized with reason**, their **speech carried resonant tones**, **united in compassion** though of different **essence**, **diverse in form yet kindred in spirit**.

The **land was secure**, its **people prosperous**, rejoicing in **great peace**. The **Primordial Emperor of the Dao** emerged to **proclaim the teaching**, and the **entire realm followed the Way**. Those with **sincere devotion** worshipped with **reverence**, all attaining **worldly liberation**.

The **Dao’s words**: Within the **sutra’s recitation by the Primordial Emperor**, all are the **proper names of the celestial and august lords**, **hidden sounds of the dharma**, also the **taboo names** of the **demonic kings**, the **secret names** of the **hundred spirits**—not the **common speech** of the world.

The **Supreme Sage**, having become a **True Person**, **penetrated the Mysterious** and **fathomed the subtle**. They **fully comprehended its verses**.

When **recited ten times**, then the **hosts of the heavens** sing from afar, the **Nine Abysses** open their gates, the **dark seas** fall silent, the **mountains of karma** topple in ruin. The **light pierces through the night**, across **accumulated kalpas and ages**, binding the **ghostly capital** in chains, their records **lodged with the Three Officials**. Their **rotting corpses and piled bones**, their **souls and spirits imprisoned in torment**, their **black qi foul and decaying**, shatter their **hearts and split their minds**. The **fires of the mountains** and **ice of the pools** scorch and boil them, **ten thousandfold** in suffering, **without day or night**.

Upon hearing this **pure and heavenly scripture**, the **Great One** records their souls, the **Southern Vermilion** refines their spirits. The **spirit returns to awareness**, abandoning illusion for truth. Their **grievances and resentments** are instantly clarified, the **true qi of Great Harmony** entering their **form and body**. **Lotus flowers** bear their sandals, **auspicious dragons** support their countenance, joining the **heavenly beings in joy**. The **Great Demon** awaits in submission.

The **scholars of profound learning**, when reciting this ten times, see **Mount Tai tremble in command**, and **King Zhou’s severed head** bow in awe.

This **Lord’s scripture**, once received, **erases their name from the Underworld’s ledger**. The **muddy embryo’s dark hall**, the **ancestral qi of the Seven Patriarchs**, **swirling yet unmanifest**, **forms within the womb’s blood**.

The **hundred joints’ insect officials**, their **bones filled with scribes**, the **earthly tigers** and **wind beasts**—**ghouls that devour flesh and consume qi**—and the **guardian deities of the Copper Fire Serpent in the Spring Treasury**, all recoil as **dark fumes billow forth**. The **wandering souls** grow faint and confused, the **spirit officials gnashing their teeth**.

A **hundred-li** cauldron of **seething oil**, a **thousand-fathom iron rampart**, **no stars visible**. The **vast domain of the Dao**.

**True knowledge** sinks into **obscurity**, **roots of sin entwined**. They **drag living beings into retribution**, summoning **lawsuits over ancestral graves and family halls**, **false accusations before the heavenly tribunals**. In **utter darkness**, no recourse exists—**ten thousand deaths** in an instant, **pain and torment without end**.

Upon hearing this **piercing sutra**, the **demon generals** halt their torments, the **Black Emperor** stays his hand. **Ancient kalpas** are purged, **recent suffering souls** transformed. The **Dao’s power** molds them, **harshness dissolved**, **enmity erased**. The **jade records** set the standard, **purple clouds** cover their seats. The **spirit winds** blow gently, their **fallen spirits ascend**, the **gates of death** no longer bind them—**they roam freely through the Three Realms**.

Even a **light recitation** of this **chapter brings calamity**. **Honoring and worshipping** with **devotion**, their **doorways flourish**.

世世昌炽，与善因缘，万灾不干，神明护门。
Through generations, prosperity thrives with virtuous connections—calamities never intrude, divine spirits guard the gate.

斯经尊妙，利乐幽灵，度人无量，为万道之宗。
This sacred scripture is most exalted, bringing joy to wandering souls, liberating countless beings, and serving as the root of all Dao.

巍巍大范，德难可胜。
Its grandeur is vast, its virtue beyond measure.

道言：凡诵是经十过，诸天齐到，亿曾万祖，幽魂苦爽，皆即受度，上升朱宫，格皆九年，受化更生，得为贵人。
The Dao declares: Even reciting this scripture ten times summons all celestial hosts. Countless ancestors—both near and distant—suffering souls in torment—all are immediately liberated, ascending to the Vermilion Palace. Their fates are sealed for nine years, transformed and reborn as noble beings.

而有亿劫结魂，千载滞爽，太上不以闻宥，上帝不以恩原。
Yet there are souls bound by kalpas of suffering, lingering for millennia—even the Most High does not pardon them, nor does the Supreme Lord grant mercy.

禁狱幽牢，在女青天一。
Their prisons lie beneath the Azure Sky’s dominion.

王平女沙，九阴大禁，都司捡形，五老校录，暗黪芒窕之穴。
In the Black Sand’s realm, the Nine-Yin Forbidden Zone, where the Chief Officials inspect forms and the Five Elders record transgressions, within the shadowed, murky caverns of the *Mangtao* pits.

毒风丑类，蕴堕四渎，海闾枯削。
Vile winds and monstrous beings dwell in the Four Great Marshes, where the sea gates wither and erode.

寒丁大魔，勅制之魅。
The Cold Official’s great demon, a specter bound by imperial decree.

诵此洞章，欻然自生。
Reciting this profound chapter—suddenly, life arises anew.

光梵变玄，尸胔得度。
Radiant Buddhas transform into the Mysterious—even the dead and decayed are liberated.

与神同升，洗除罪咎。
Ascending with the gods, their sins are cleansed away.

青箓纪名，刺奸司非。
The Azure Talismans record their names, exposing deceit and rectifying wrongs.

不得鼓猬，锋之断笔。
No tortures of the *Gǔwèi* beast, nor the Pen of Severance may harm them.

韩君丈人将折简於螭笈，是皆玄司九幽酆泉之重刑。
Even the *Han Jun*’s executioner, poised to strike with the *Chī* case, cannot enforce these—all are grave punishments of the Nine Abysses and the *Yingquan* underworld.

此经解释，涣尔浮散。
This scripture’s exposition dissolves all illusions.

而好学至经，功满德就，皆得神仙，飞升金阙，游宴玉京也。
Those who study this scripture with devotion, their merits complete and virtue fulfilled, attain immortality, ascending the Golden Gate and feasting in the Jade Capital.

上学之士，修诵是经，节关开通，胎真明正，洞阴一府，六峰游精，随气变化，与时出入。
Scholars of the highest order, reciting this scripture, open the vital passes—pure essence manifests, the Obscure Palace’s secrets revealed. The Six Peaks roam with vital essence, adapting to qi, entering and exiting with the times.

或感人呼吸流毒饮食，因刍梗以兆体，假冥漠以潜灵，九府捕索，三官定书，经道至神，皆即受度，飞升南宫。
Some sense human breath, poisoned food, or use straw and fodder to manifest their forms, lurking in darkness to deceive. Though the Nine Departments hunt them and the Three Officials record their crimes, the scripture’s divine power liberates them all, ascending to the Southern Palace.

世人受诵，诚贯十天，幽牢苦爽，祖世亲缘，纪过泰山，刊名北都。
Mortals who recite with unwavering sincerity for ten days—even those in deepest prisons or torment—ancestors and kin alike—are recorded as having surpassed Mount Tai’s transgressions, their names inscribed in the Northern Capital.

皆得炼质丹陵，莹魂炎海，诵声成云，载此冥魄，逍遥太无，过度轮转，不经生死。
All refine their essence in the Cinnabar Mounds, their souls luminous in the Flame Sea. Their recitations form clouds, bearing these nether souls to boundless freedom, transcending the Wheel of Rebirth, untouched by death.

奉行之者，则延寿长年，后皆得作尸解之道，魂神暂灭，不住地狱，即得返形，游行太空。
Those who practice it diligently extend their years, ultimately attaining the *Shixie* method—when their spirits temporarily vanish, they avoid the Underworld and swiftly reclaim their forms, wandering the boundless void.

此经微妙，普度无穷。
This scripture’s subtlety is profound, its liberations boundless.

一切天人，莫不受庆。
All celestial and human beings rejoice in its blessings.

无量之福，生死蒙惠。
Infinite blessings bestow grace upon life and death alike.

上天所宝，不传下世。
Heaven’s most treasured secret, not to be passed to the mortal world.

至士赍金宝效心，盟天而传。
Only the most virtuous, offering gold and jade with sincere devotion, may swear to Heaven and transmit it.

轻泄漏慢，殃及九祖，长役鬼官。
Careless disclosure or negligence brings calamity upon nine generations, enslaving them to ghostly officials.

侍经五帝，玉童玉女，各二十四人，营卫神文，保护受经者身。
The Five Emperors attend this scripture, each accompanied by twenty-four Jade Boys and Girls, guarding its divine text and protecting those who receive it.

道言：正月长斋，诵咏是经，为上世亡魂，断地逮役，度上南宫。
The Dao declares: During the first month’s long fast, reciting this scripture liberates ancestral souls from the Underworld’s pursuits, guiding them to the Southern Palace.

诣三元洞宫主生太阳火官，焚除罪簿，赦兔吞火食炭，洋铜沸镬，铜柱铁床，烧烹炮烙，众苦之罚。
They present themselves before the Three Primordial Caverns’ ruler, the Fire Official of the Solar Birth, burning away their records of sin. Pardon is granted for crimes of devouring fire, consuming charcoal, or enduring the seething bronze cauldron, the copper pillars, iron beds, roasting, and branding—all torments are erased.

经道神力，变成清池，狱具恶器，悉为莲花。
The scripture’s divine power transforms the punishments into a pure pool, and all instruments of torment into lotuses.

七月长斋，诵咏是经，为上世亡魂，祖考宗姻，升迁炼化，削灭罪缘，庆流孙曾，诣三元洞宫主死太阴水官，漂荡刑书，涤濯元衅，净除溟波，海渎没溺，寒夜冰池，雷震霹雳，泉曲徒役，绞水暴注，湍激惊涛，众苦之罚，经道神力，变成安室，狱具恶器，悉为乐玩。
During the seventh month’s fast, reciting this scripture for ancestral souls—parents and kin—elevates and refines them, severing the bonds of sin. Their descendants rejoice as they present themselves before the Three Primordial Caverns’ ruler, the Water Official of the Lunar Death. The records of punishment drift away, original offenses are cleansed, and all torments—drowning in the abyss, freezing in ice pools, thunderstrikes, forced labor in the river bends, drowning in violent currents, or turbulent waves—are transformed by the scripture’s power into a hall of ease, where instruments of torment become objects of delight.

十月长斋，诵咏是经，为上世亡魂，姑妣娣姒，往逝妇姬，解断征呼，复连传逮。
In the tenth month’s fast, reciting for ancestral female souls—aunts, mothers, sisters, and deceased wives—severs their summons and restores their connections.

诣三元洞宫主生死罪录官，释放考掠讯讼，簿录证佐，对定冤仇，衔负悔恨，暗呜追召，众苦之罚。
They present themselves before the Three Primordial Caverns’ ruler, the Official of Life-and-Death Crime Records, freeing them from interrogations, beatings, and false accusations. Testimonies are verified, grievances resolved, regrets and lamentations silenced, and all torments lifted.

经道神力，变成德友，狱具恶器，悉为珍宝。
The scripture’s power transforms their tormentors into virtuous companions, and instruments of punishment into treasures.

八节之日，诵咏是经，奉诣九宫直符，九府直事，八方大狱，九幽泉牢，开通八门，受生八道，天人鬼神，地狱饿鬼畜生，魔帅祆魅。
On the eight festival days, reciting this scripture and presenting it to the Nine Palaces’ direct symbols, the Nine Departments’ officials, the Eight Directions’ great prisons, and the Nine Abysses’ watery dungeons—opens the Eight Gates and the Eight Paths of rebirth. It liberates celestial beings, humans, ghosts, gods, beings of the Underworld, hungry ghosts, animals, demon generals, and malevolent spirits.

出离禁狱，各乘生功，度脱九幽，为大施者。
They escape the prisons, each riding the merit of their past lives, liberated from the Nine Abysses as great benefactors.

本命之日，诵咏是经，为北斗司命司录，主非典禁，命在斗宫，计年期月，追召生魂，上诸斗宫。
On one’s birthdate, reciting this scripture aids the Northern Dipper’s Officials of Fate and Records, who oversee unjust prohibitions. Those whose fate lies in the Dipper’s realm—calculating years and months—are summoned back to the Dipper Palaces.

校定罪福，度脱三灾四杀，五苦六害，七伤八难，九厄十极，事在三元考官，冥曹谴谪，众苦之罚。
Their sins and merits are assessed, liberating them from the Three Calamities, Four Killings, Five Sufferings, Six Harms, Seven Injuries, Eight Hardships, Nine Calamities, and Ten Extremes—all matters judged by the Three Primordial Examiners, the Underworld’s condemnations, and universal torments.

经道神力，不有害伤，魂神澄正，万炁长存，不经苦恼，身有光明，三界侍卫，五帝司迎，万神朝礼，名书上天，功满德就，飞升上清。
The scripture’s power ensures no harm befalls them—their spirits purified, vital essence eternal. Free from suffering, their bodies radiant, they are attended by the Three Realms’ guardians, welcomed by the Five Emperors, and honored by ten thousand gods. Their names are inscribed in Heaven; their merits complete, they ascend to the Upper Purity.

道言：行道之日，皆当香汤沐浴，斋戒入室，东向，叩齿三十二通，上闻三十二天，心拜三十二过。
The Dao declares: On the day of practice, one must bathe in fragrant waters, fast in purity, enter the chamber facing east, and strike the teeth thirty-two times, ascending to the Thirty-Two Heavens. With the heart, one bows to the Thirty-Two Transgressions.

闭目，静思身坐青黄白三色云气之中，内外蓊冥，有青龙、白虎、朱雀、玄武、狮子、白鹤，罗列左右，日月照明，洞焕室内，项生图象，光映十方，如此分明。
Close the eyes, meditate upon sitting within the three-colored clouds of blue, yellow, and white. Within and without, darkness enfolds—yet the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Dark Warrior, Lion, and White Crane array themselves on either side. Sun and moon illuminate, the chamber radiant, talismans manifesting on the neck, their light shining across the ten directions, all made clear.

The secret incantation proclaims:

*"Supreme Mysterious Origin, the Most High Dao Lord,
summon forth from my body the thirty-five officials of the Five Stars,
left and right ministerial messengers,
attendants of fragrant jade boys,
messenger maidens of jade,
the Five Emperors’ direct seals,
and the thirty-two officers of the Radiant Incense Bureau—
each thirty-two in number—
to open the gates as spoken.

Today is a day of auspicious celebration, a pure hall of fasting.
Practicing this scripture, one attains boundless liberation for all beings.
May my petition ascend directly to the throne of the Most High Supreme Emperor of the Thirty-Two Heavens,
the Origin of All Beginnings, the Most Venerable Sovereign.

*Concluded. Draw in the qi of the Thirty-Two Transgressions, face east, and recite the scripture.*

**The Supreme Origin’s Boundless Liberation Scripture of the Highest Grade**

The *Supreme Origin’s Mysterious Treasure Scripture of the Cavernous Void*
interprets the hidden prison,
opens the radiant path to liberate beings,
unfolds the hidden melodies of the heavens,
and harmonizes the natural separation and union.

The Primordial Beginning was formless,
a boundless truth within the void.
The Original Qi gave birth to all,
as purple mists swirled in dense clouds.
Wind and fire shaped the crucible,
where essence congealed of its own accord.
Its form swayed low and deep,
carved like jade, refined as gold.
Hanging like a blade of grass,
it traversed the ten directions.
The *Mixed Void’s Crimson Text* inscribed intent as form—
separated, it became the myriad phenomena;
united, it became the Precious Scripture.
Strung like pearls, flowers in sequence,
it stirred the turbid and exalted the pure.
The Five Elders emitted seals,
while the Imperial Sage inscribed the numinous.
Creation thus took form,
and the Three Realms were illuminated.
Heaven was cleansed by it,
Earth was pacified by it,
Humans were born by it,
Spirits were enlivened by it,
and All Things were perfected by it.

The *Dharma-Qi* ascended to the left,
giving rise to spring and summer’s flourishing.
The *Heavenly Light* sped to the right,
nurturing autumn and winter’s growth.
The Supreme Origin Emperor
is named the *Jade Purity*.
Above, there is no further ancestor—
only the Dao as one’s true body.
The Five Talismans spread wide,
nurturing all divine spirits.
The Three Celestial Bodies radiated brilliance,
while the *Yulu* veiled the Jade Purity.
The Nine Terraces rooted deep,
their shadows stretching to the *Yin City*.
Below, the Great Demon
was born alongside the Dao.
The *Luo Mountain Dragon Source*
and the *Chou Capital* schemed in deceit.
Endless were the vast distances,
as the Cavernous Palace shimmered in the void.
Within lay ten thousand ghosts,
brandishing massive armies.
The *Prison of Darkness* examined the hidden,
while the Great Calamity was not abandoned.
Piles of fire and iron,
heaven and earth sealed shut.
The *Compassionate Dao King*,
the Most Exalted in Heaven,
emitted divine light from his mouth,
revealing the Jade Text.
Auspicious clouds gathered in azure,
while the *Phoenix-Qi* formed into mist.
The prison gates were thus opened,
and the Black Realm shone bright.
Nine dragons bore the seals,
refining and liberating the kindred souls.
This is the Great *Dharma*,
the Heaven within Heaven,
where myriad beings flourish,
and wisdom nurtures itself.
Within, vast undertakings were constructed,
silently contending with the divine.
The divine originated from Heaven,
yet primordial evil clung to it.
The suffering souls, lost in darkness,
fell into the heavy abyss.
The ghostly generals seized their contracts,
while tiger soldiers wielded their whips.
They called out names by their deeds—
who dared to obstruct my path?
Black-armored demons spewed fire,
while the *Thunder Mother* seized the immortals.
Ten thousand poisons took form,
sealed by the Heavenly Gate.
Eyes were closed, ears blocked,
as the distant *Southern Elixir* was sought.
Yearning for the Jade Seal,
I pardoned this hidden suffering.
The boundless blue sky,
with its nine calamities and towering peaks,
unfurled the *Supreme Yellow Banner*,
while the *Master of Fate* drove his chariot.
The *Nine Yin Commands* were proclaimed,
and the *Registrar of Life and Death* oversaw executions.
The *Yuan Child* governed the Northern Obscurity,
while the *Great Sovereign* ruled the Northern Yin.
The *Great God of Records* presided,
master of calculations and soul-capture.
The *Four Bright Ones* were born,
and the Five Peaks—*Tai Mountain*—were established.
The *Master of the Void* interpreted the hidden prison,
liberating boundless beings.
Today, the celestial records are examined,
as all the heavens gather at the hall.

**The Ten Directions’ Supreme Truth Compassionate Transformation Kings,**
Long-Living Great Saints,
Boundless Liberators:

*East:* The *Boundless Dao Transformation God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Boundless Liberator.

*South:* The *Boundless Life-Giving God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Boundless Liberator.

*West:* The *Boundless Firm Virtue God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Boundless Liberator.

*North:* The *Boundless Mysterious Illumination God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Boundless Liberator.

*Northeast:* The *Boundless Rescue-Suffering God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Boundless Liberator.

*Southeast:* The *Boundless Eradicate-Sin God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Boundless Liberator.

*Southwest:* The *Boundless Aid-Suffering God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Boundless Liberator.

*Northwest:* The *Boundless Pardon-Sin God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Boundless Liberator.

*Above:* The *Boundless Ascend-Liberation God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Boundless Liberator.

*Below:* The *Boundless Universal-Benefit God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Boundless Liberator.

*The Ten Directions’ Most True Compassionate Transformation God-King,*
Long-Living Great Saint,
Most Great God.

Together, they ride upon flowing clouds and rainbow chariots,
with purple canopies and crimson wheels,
yoked to green elephants and spotted dragons,
bearing the *Summon-Spirits Banner* and the *Return-to-Life Flag*,
leading with the *Nine True Melodies* and trailing the *Eight Harmonious Tunes*.
Heavenly horses and qilins leap and bound,
while the *Six Ding* open the Dao,
and the *Seven Radiant Ones* bear the yoke.
Ten thousand chariots, a hundred thousand riders,
float through the sky,
their light turning back as they oversee true liberation.

The *Northern Yin Right Minister*,
the *Cavernous Abyss Transformation Palace*,
the *Three Primordials* assisting,
the *Supreme Spirit Lord*,
holding the *Sacred Registers* and seals,
converge at the Imperial Court.

As liberation is granted,
the hundred gods swear solemn oaths.
A proclamation is made to the *Yellow Gate*,
the *Boundless Void’s Hidden Pass*.
The *Nine-Song Lament* resounds,
testing the Great Demon.
The *Six Heavens* govern the prison,
while the *Ten Thousand Ghosts* are arrayed.
Boiling cauldrons of ice,
copper pillars and fiery mountains.
Flying spears and whirling halberds,
massive stones and wheel-blades.
Endless toil in the Three Abysses,
five torments in the Night River.
By the *Vacuous Sovereign’s decree*,
all are made to ascend.
The *Northern Capital’s Cold Pool*
guards the forms and souls.
The demons are subdued and recommended,
while the ranks are liberated to the *Southern Palace*.
The dead souls undergo refinement,
transforming into immortals and becoming human.
The living body receives liberation,
enduring through all calamities, age upon age.
With the *Wheel of Calamity* turning,
they align with Heaven’s years.
Forever severed from the abysmal depths,
they escape the sufferings of the Three Realms,
refined in the *Cavernous Yang*.
The *Cavernous Yang Heaven*,
ruled by the *Heavenly Dao-Origin*,
is the formless realm of *Dharma-Walking*.

**The Eight Heavens of the East:**

*The Heaven of Jade Remembrance and Bright Reporting,*
ruled by Emperor *Yi-Lan*, the True Observer.
*The Heaven of Azure Spirit and Hidden Records,*
ruled by Emperor *Ye-Shu*, the Awakener of Mists.
*The Heaven of Mysterious Extremes and Divine Intersection,*
ruled by Emperor *Lu-Duo*, the Many-Cleansed.
*The Heaven of Prolonged Wisdom and Strange Penetration,*
ruled by Emperor *Yuan-Tai*, the Preserver of Truth.
*The Heaven of Rescue-Silence and Profound Harmony,*
ruled by Emperor *Yuan-Xu*, the Illuminator of Sons.*"

**The Eight Heavens of the East:**

*The Heaven of Jade Return and Radiant Sequence*, ruled by Emperor *Zhao-Ling*, the Soul-Calling Sage.
*The Heaven of Crimson Jade and Precious Purity*, ruled by Emperor *Jia-Fu*, the Dragon-Luminous Assistant.
*The Heaven of Illuminating Dao and Clouded Aspiration*, ruled by Emperor *Qing-Xuan*, the Left-Sounding Herald.

**The Eight Heavens of the South:**

*The Heaven of Virtue-Nurturing and Rectifying Transformation*, ruled by Emperor *Chuan-Ming*, the Dao-Origin Illuminator.
*The Heaven of Mysterious Spirit and Wondrous Salvation*, ruled by Emperor *Yue-Xu*, the Life-Extending Sage.
*The Heaven of Void-Luminance and Pure Clarity*, ruled by Emperor *Lu-Min*, the Ever-Responsive Sage.
*The Heaven of Resplendent Form and Unfailing Interval*, ruled by Emperor *Yan-Wei*, the Constant Refiner.
*The Heaven of Resounding Must and Penetrating Tranquility*, ruled by Emperor *Po-Lan*, the Ghostly Sovereign.
*The Heaven of Supreme Mystery and Profound Abstruseness*, ruled by Emperor *Zhao-Zhen*, the Radiant Elemental.
*The Heaven of Harmonious Delay and Final Observation*, ruled by Emperor *Bu-Tuo*, the Boundless Compassion.
*The Heaven of Deep Extremes and Victorious Heights*, ruled by Emperor *Ming-Chao*, the Purple Guest.

**The Eight Heavens of the West:**

*The Heaven of Ghostly Pivot and Star-Mirrored*, ruled by Emperor *Guang-Yu*, the Radiant Chariot.
*The Heaven of Transcending Qi and Imperial Degree*, ruled by Emperor *Bo-Hua*, the Moon-Luminous Sage.
*The Heaven of Dawn Clarity and Penetrating Observation*, ruled by Emperor *Zhi-Fu*, the Tiger-Luminous Assistant.
*The Heaven of Sweeping and Driving the Distant*, ruled by Emperor *Jue-Lu*, the Ghostly Sage.
*The Heaven of Spiritous Subtlety and Four Extremes*, ruled by Emperor *Yan-Guang*, the Leveling Sage.
*The Heaven of Moon-Broad and Illuminating Void*, ruled by Emperor *Bu-Hua*, the Comprehensive Sage.
*The Heaven of Prosperous Ancestry and Governance*, ruled by Emperor *Bi-Kang*, the Three-Parametrical.
*The Heaven of Imperial Edict and Suppressing Demons*, ruled by Emperor *Kai-Tu*, the Mysterious Ancestor.

**The Eight Heavens of the North:**

*The Heaven of Purple Splendor and Auspicious Yang*, ruled by Emperor *Bian-Hui*, the Source of Benevolence.
*The Heaven of Ever-Compassionate and Swift Salvation*, ruled by Emperor *Luo-Xun*, the Abyss of Righteousness.
*The Heaven of Banner-Conquering and Splitting the Abode*, ruled by Emperor *Xu-Qi*, the Hidden Sovereign.
*The Heaven of Strong Clarity and Rescuing Fate*, ruled by Emperor *Lu-Ping*, the Radiant Sage.
*The Heaven of Supreme Extremes and Permitting Clarity*, ruled by Emperor *Wei-Jing*, the Left-Hill Sage.
*The Heaven of Washing and Storing the Resplendent*, ruled by Emperor *Yao-Tong*, the Southern Sage.
*The Heaven of Immersing and Subtle Splendor*, ruled by Emperor *Chuan-Ling*, the Tranquil Sage.
*The Heaven of River-Capital and Crooked Springs*, ruled by Emperor *Jiang-Ding*, the Heroic Sage.

**The Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Emperors.**
The hidden names of the Heavens, the concealed titles of the Heavens.
The central void of the Heavens, naturally luminous scriptures.
The hidden melodies of the Heavens, the sounds of transcending the abyss.
The exalted ones descending into the abyss, the spirits responding to the abyss,
unlocking the abyssal prisons, transforming and enlightening all souls.

The Nine Abysses and Ten Extremes, the transformations of the profound darkness,
the boundless mysteries, deep beyond measure.
The Dao emerges from divine truth, universally enlightening the destitute souls.

Today, rejoice in receiving the refining,
passing through the gates of all Heavens,
praying for the extinguishment of the Three Evils,
severing the earthly roots,
ascending beyond the fiery pools,
ranked among the *Great Dao*,
the Demon King overseeing,
the Heaven of No Constraint.

The Eastern Dipper presides over litigation, the Western Dipper governs punishment,
the Northern Dipper issues fate, the Southern Dipper alters life,
the Central Dipper descends the spirits—all souls are luminous.

The Green Emperor bestows nature, the White Emperor shapes form,
the Red Emperor transmits consciousness, the Black Emperor circulates essence,
the Yellow Emperor nourishes the *Spleen* (vitality)—all ebb and flow are clear.

The Wood Prison’s Demon King, examining and torturing, disputes and analyzes.
The Fire Prison’s Demon King, burning and branding, sears and scorches.
The Metal Prison’s Demon King, beheading and crushing, axes and spears.
The Water Prison’s Demon King, freezing and congealing, ice and chill.
The Earth Prison’s Demon King, sinking and burying, pits and ramparts.
The Five Prisons’ Great Demons, the origin of all prisons.
They fly and wreak havoc, commanding the ghostly armies.
Wielding blades and bearing axes, they stir the *qi* into wind.
Slaughtering the vital souls, their cruelty knows no bounds.

The Heavens enlighten mortals—imperial edicts to the Northern *Ting*.
The ghostly ministers report their fates, their brilliance matching the omens.
The iron city crumbles, the fiery net dissolves.
Shoulders bear spears, they charge like tigers, wielding blades.
Their might becomes breath, the malevolent *qi* perishes.

The prisons transform into Dao-lands, mortals ascend to the *Way*.
Dare to interfere, and the Supreme Truth shall repel you—golden axes surge forward, mystic banners halt behind.

The corpses and ghosts attain enlightenment, all sufferings cease,
thousands upon thousands escape the prisons, millions are reborn in form.

The Demon King interrogates, the ghosts and spirits are examined,
the Three Officials and Northern *Ting* inspect the ghostly encampments.
No concealment is permitted, the golden steeds deliver the messages.

Universal proclamation to the boundless—all spirits listen in obedience.
The Three Realms and Five Emperors, their words ascend to the *Upper Clarity*.

The *Primordial Yang* and jade repository distinguish the souls of darkness.
The Great Eon reaches its peak at *Yang Nine*, the Lesser Eon at *Yin Six*.
At that time, waters surge and flames ascend,
*Nine-Six* becomes the transformation—
weapons and punishments strike, mountains and valleys tremble,
the cosmos tilts, the heavens shift, winds and mists swirl in chaos.

The *Divine Land* of *Jade Capital*, the court of the *Great Dao*,
dimly vast for countless eons, neither dark nor bright.
Ascending to the Eight Firmaments, the unmoving realm,
descending to the roots of humanity, the unchanging land.

The Kunlun Dragon Abyss, the Jade State of Yellow Court,
the Three Calamities do not afflict—all is pure and luminous.

The bright and clear souls are all aided by the Dao’s *qi*,
neither drifting nor straying, naturally free from all entanglements.
The *Primordial Beginning* of boundless compassion,
the crimson scrolls and harmonized brilliance,
the radiant jade banners, the misty purple courts.

The phoenix bears and the dragon supports,
pardoning the suffering souls—
those within the Three Officials,
whose movements span countless eons.
The cycles of creation and destruction,
the karmic burdens without end.

Bound in abyssal prisons, eons of confinement.
Falling into the blackened city,
dimly within the extreme void—
above, the colorless realm,
below, the bottomless abyss.
The winds shake the Nine Voids,
one does not know their Heavens,
without light or clarity,
penetrating the abyss and the profound darkness.

Form and shadow reach their limits,
entering and exiting death and life.
Mingling in the boundless seas,
the souls are lost, their gates sealed.
Locks and chains, hooks and ropes,
all bound by accumulated karma.

The jade decrees open with clarity,
the transformations proceed naturally.
The *Mysterious Elder* brandishes his spear,
the dragon holds the Five Scrolls,
the crimson books and purple charts,
the green banners and tiger scriptures.
The bright rays and golden dippers divide,
preserving the eons’ transformations,
making the Heavens endure forever.

The *Yin* splendor binds the nets,
the Dao’s power expands.
The Northern Mountain’s Primordial Abode,
eastward to the *Pi-Tu* slopes.
The malevolent roots spread,
the Thirty-Six Capitals.
The revolving *Jing* prisons,
the encircling Nine Abysses.
The Dipper and Big Dipper’s constellations,
wheel through the Five Fields.
The Eighty-Thousand Prisons,
all *qi* gathered into the Three Elements.
The Six Voids array their palaces,
the *qi* enters the *Great Dao*.
The Great Demons within the Mysterious,
their karma equals the Highest Truth.

The floating *qi* stirs the mists,
listening to the jade decrees.
The golden steeds deliver the messages,
rescuing the souls from the ghostly encampments.
The pure songs summon the spirits,
the orchid tones assist the True Ones.
The stagnant darkness is dissolved,
all respond to their fates and are reborn.

The Holy True One spreads the transformation,
no hidden realm escapes their hearing.

To the left, the Purple Boy whistles,
to the right, they support the august Emperor.
The Yang vitalizes, the Yin restrains,
the Primordial Essence manifests as form.
Ten thousand harmonies, a hundred thousand unities,
naturally coalesce into humankind.
The Five Destinies revolve,
taking form through borrowed reception.
Within form, there resides a spirit,
the Great Lord of eternal life.
No Heroic Prince exists,
only the White Primordial Sovereign’s spirit.

The Supreme Unity governs fate,
the Peach of Longevity and the Pavilion of Nurturing join to extend life.
Holding talismans and grasping scriptures,
they safeguard life and cultivate its roots.
The Three Officials bestow their seals,
the Mountain Emperor records their names.
According to the fateful connection of their former lives,
they are born across the Three Realms.

At the highest extreme, the *Royal Ancestor*,
the Heaven of the Realm of Form.
With cassia-hall chambers and flowery lodgings,
within the Nine Abysses, amid the minutest.
Down to the *Dinglu* realm,
the shadowy palaces of the Mysterious Abode,
divided into nine categories,
twenty-four existences,
springs and streams, mountain wastelands,
the ghostly void where spirits dwell.
Ten revolutions through the Dark Passages,
the sufferings and torments equal those of immortals.

The Dao of immortals values life,
countless degrees of liberation for beings.
Opening the Eight Gates,
the flying celestial law-wheels.
Sin and merit, prohibitions and precepts,
the fateful causes and conditions.
Universal reception and liberation,
the dead soul regains its form.
The body attains rebirth,
ascending to hear the celestial realms.
Above the celestial realms,
each has its own gate of birth.
Within are hymns of empty caverns,
sacred texts that relieve suffering,
verses that match the Highest Truth.

**First:** The *Quanqufu* Heaven of Quenching Guilt and Aiding Suffering,
the Sovereign explains the sounds of the Dark Prisons and flying through space.
The endless river roars,
its vast currents flow from nine sources.
The waves are venomous and deep,
plunging into abyssal depths.
Their sins are entangled,
seized and bound, inextricably linked.
The great pit has no bottom,
darkly concealing myriad evils.
The myriad sufferings and torments,
receive their retribution in the Northern *Dinglu* and *Fang*.
Swiftly descending from the Spring Mountains,
they are relentlessly pressed—when will their grievances end?
The ghostly officials examine their deeds,
their wails shake the cold void.
Their crimes are recorded by the Three Officials,
no escape from the net of suffering.
The flying celestial descends from the Great Primordial,
the Eight Paths open the Dark Passages.
The scriptures illuminate the endless night,
liberating souls to regain their forms.
Forever unbound in ten thousand kalpas,
they bow in gratitude to the Mysterious Benevolence.

**Second:** The *Jiuyoufu* Heaven of Radiant Light and Liberating Guilt,
the Sovereign explains the chapter of the Dark Prisons.
The Kunqiu Mountains rise majestically,
gazing upward to the Eight Devas.
Gazing far, they survey the Ten Heavens,
their four eyes scan all directions.

「The Nine Mysterious Deities, transforming countless forms,
good deeds are carved into their names—even rotten bones ascend as Immortals.
The Supreme Unity reigns above, its luminous Green Palace boundless,
the Dark Realm lies below, where foul *qi* swirls endlessly.
To the east, the Black Mountains stand—eternal prison of the ghostly court,
to the south, the Iron Dungeon, where flames burn through ten thousand kalpas.

Distant through the Nine Realms, the Dao’s grace flows like rivers.
The Pure Domain clears all impurities, where High Worthies descend in splendor.
Refining ghosts to reach the Mysterious—golden talismans seal sacred texts.
Seated on the lotus, they recognize their true nature, their spirits liberated.
Without passing through the Three Realms, they remain mortal through all ages.

The Auspicious Clouds drift, their resounding jade tones pure.
**Third:** The *Tengdufu* Sovereign of the Five Spirits’ Shadowy Cavern sings:

The Northern Abyss, deep and vast, its *qi* piercing through the Yùluó.
Four gates guard the Ghostly Pass, the Teng Mountains rise in grandeur.
Six Heavens and Nine Realms—here dwell the spirits and deities.

The *Guǐhǎi* Sea, countless in depth, its cliffs embedded with beasts.
Shadowy Caverns radiate light, secretly connecting to the Great Void.
The Primordial Sovereign, True King, subdues all demons.
Heavenly rain and sweet dew descend, lavishly bestowing celestial flowers.
Auspicious omens arrive, blessings multiply—countless souls are liberated.
Virtues and powers are fully realized, blocking all false and evil paths.
Only the Dao is sought, no other trials.
Inner Truth self-sustaining, the spirit ascends to the Three Refined.
Forever departing from the Teng and the Black Pass,
they cross into the Immortal Realm beyond all reckoning.
Above the Three Realms, within the flying void,
High Worthies’ sacred voices resonate, echoing through the Caverns’ chapters.
Reciting them a hundred times earns liberation to the Southern Palace.
A thousand recitations universally gather demonic souls.
Ten thousand recitations fulfill the Dao,
explaining all grievances, transcending the Three Realms,
and recording in the Great Mysterious.

Those who hear the sacred voice—demon kings bow in reverence,
commanding earthly deities to guard and escort,
pulling them from the netherworld’s gates.
Suffering through the Five Torments and Eight Hardships,
seven generations ascend—forever freed from ghostly officials,
their souls liberated to *Zhūlíng*,
refined anew into life.

This is called the *Wúliàng*—universal liberation without end.
There are hidden celestial texts,
shared reverence across all Heavens.
Revealing them invites fall into the Hellrealms,
dooming even seven generations of ancestors.

The Dao speaks: These two chapters are the voices of the Supreme Deities of All Heavens,
and the Hidden Worthies of the Spiritly Darkness.
All are words of the Great *Fàn*—unlike mortal speech.
They speak of the deepest obscurity,
singing of the Spiritly Caverns’ mysteries.
Thus called *Xuàn’ào*—profound and hard to fathom.
Treasure of the Highest Heavens,
hidden in the Purple Micro’s Upper Palace,
transmitted through the Mysterious Science across forty thousand kalpas.

If a True Person descends to aid the *Quánqióng* at the Gate of the Spring,
liberating souls from the deepest darkness,
saving the dying and reviving the dead,
and offers a heart of golden virtue,
then they may petition the Ten Heavens,
and the souls shall be entrusted.

The Dao speaks: The spirit depends on karma, karma reveals the spirit.
The spirit is the master of coming and going,
karma the root of life and death.
Spirit, karma, and cause are one.
Through ten thousand kalpas, they are shrouded,
unable to escape the Dark Pass.
Though the spirit does not depart,
its karma shifts externally.
The Six Paths and Four Births—demons wield authority.
Registering these trials is arduous,
karma and fate intertwined.
Essence *qi* flows and transmigrates—suddenly, one becomes mortal.
Life’s blessings hang by fate:
poverty or wealth, nobility or lowliness,
simply recorded in their origins.
Spirit-winds turn, all forms manifest,
the moment of birth and death.
All who share the same breath must unite in heart to observe fasts,
burn incense in the Six Periods,
recite the sutras ten times.
Blessings descend instantly,
dispelling all doubts.

The boundless texts, universal liberation without end.
The Dao speaks: Mortals with shallow understanding,
or Immortal Virtues yet unfulfilled,
may have their fate extinguished in the Great Darkness.
At the time of passing,
even those with shallow learning should have True Persons burn incense for them,
recite the sutras ten times,
to liberate their mortal forms as per the law.
The souls of those who observe fasts and recite sutras,
whose virtues and powers are pure,
dwell between the ghostly officials in the Three Officials’ Life-Protecting Palace,
where records of Mysterious Merit are verified.
They shall ride the Flying Dragon,
attend the *Xuān Dì* in his Hall,
refine their True Nature and cultivate the Dao,
until their single, unchanging spirit ascends
to the Eastern Honor’s Pure Void in the East,
where they freely wander, their merits increasing.
They shall then drive the White Palanquin to the North,
bow to the Supreme Polarity in the Upper Palace,
and attain High Immortality,
participating in Heaven’s governance,
commanding transformations and powers.

The Pure and Bright—clearing all suffering,
they follow the world’s path to Immortality.
The souls of the Three Vehicles,
guided by mountain and river spirits,
or those who dwell in auspicious lands,
shall ascend directly to the Southern Palace,
their rebirth granted by their merits—day by day.

The Wheel of Transmigration never falters,
and they shall become deities and immortals.

The Dao speaks: The Dao has no end or beginning,
but mortals know life and death.
Only the Great True Spirit,
one with the Dao,
is eternal and unchanging.
Karma rides the spirit,
striking the consciousness and extinguishing its nature,
binding it to form—form identical to matter.
Thus, there is an end.

The end is the limit of form,
the limit of *qi*.
The spirit never ends.
Mortals are deluded by falsehood,
believing in life and death.
Clinging to karma and consciousness,
they fall into the Hellrealms,
self-deceived and shrouded,
ghostly officials seizing their records.
Forever sealed in the Dark Dungeon,
through endless darkness, they never see the Radiant Circle.

The Primordial moves in pity,
sacred texts shine brightly,
jade scrolls radiate light—
ugly forms are liberated,
day by day ascending,
pure *qi* nourishing their essence,
spirits awakened—
as they approach refinement,
all must observe fasts and recite sutras.

Fasts and sutra recitations—
their merits are profound.
They ascend to the Nine Heavens,
protecting and sustaining emperors.
They descend into the Spiritly Paths,
liberating guilty souls.
Life and death depend on them—
their blessings are boundless.
Thus called *Wúliàng*—universal liberation for Heaven and mortals.

The Dao speaks: All who possess this sutra,
capable of easing the suffering of souls through kalpas,
of boundless Spiritly Paths,
shall perform these merits.
On the day of liberation,
they vow to observe fasts and burn incense,
reciting the sutras ten times—
all Heavens shall record their names,
ten thousand spirits guard them,
and they shall be ranked among the True Persons,
worthy to serve as ministers beneath the Golden Gates of the Holy Sovereign.

All Heavens meticulously record mortals’ merits and demerits,
not missing even a hair’s breadth.
Demon kings in Heaven shall also recommend their souls—
those who attain the Dao must deeply understand these sacred words.
