**"Supreme Most High Primordial Dao** (无上玄元),
**Most High Dao Lord** (太上道君),
Summon forth from my body the **Thirty-two Celestial Functionaries** (臣身中三五功曹),
Left and right officials and messengers,
Attended by **fragrant youth** (香玉童),
Conveying words through **jade maidens** (传言玉女),
**Five Emperors’ straight seals** (五帝直符),
**Fragrant officials of the day** (直日香官),
Each thirty-two in number,
Opening the gates as spoken.**

Today is a **auspicious and joyous occasion** (吉庆),
A **long fast** (长斋) in a **pure hall** (清堂),
Practicing this **wondrous Sutra** (至经),
Delivering the **limitless beings** (无量度人),
May all that is summoned ascend directly,
Reaching the **Supreme Most High Thirty-two Heavens** (无上三十二天),
Before the **August Sovereign of Primordial Beginning** (元始上帝至尊几).

**Concluded** (毕),
Draw forth the **qi of the Thirty-two Offenses** (引炁三十二过),
Facing east to recite the **Sutra**.

**Primordial Beginning’s Limitless Deliverance Sutra** (元始无量度人上品妙经),
**Scripture of Primordial Dao’s Mystic Treasure** (元始洞玄灵宝本章),
Forever severing the **wheel of transmigration**,
Circulating to deliver all beings.

**Mystic and Hidden** (洞真隐奥),
**Natural arising of conditions** (缘起自然).
**Vermilion chaos, the numinous root** (赤混灵根),
**Void and transformation** (空无化成).
**Great Emptiness, clear and penetrating** (太虚朗彻),
Giving rise to all **Heavens** (诸天).
**Flowing and unfolding the Three Qi** (流演三气),
The **Great Pattern** (大机) weaving all.

Within is the **Emptiness Emperor** (虚皇),
Who is my very self.

**Mystic scriptures** (玄文) scattered and falling,
Nurturing all **numinous beings** (万灵).
**Vermilion radiance** (赤景) as **yang**,
**Yellow brilliance** (黄华) as **yin**.
**Circular lights** (圆光) arrayed in forest ranks,
Laying out all the **stars** (诸星).
**Great Unity’s purple chamber** (太一紫房),
**Jade slips and green volumes** (瑶简绿编).
**Opening the fate of Primordial Creation** (启运元造),
**The most profound within the profound** (玄中之玄).
**Circular Array of Great Brahman** (圆罗大梵),
**Spiritual Gate of the Numinous Palace** (灵阙琼宫).
**Encompassing the yellow qi** (下包黄气),
**Piercing the depths of the cosmic threads** (洞渊纲维).
**Vast and boundless** (眇眇荡荡),
**Six divisions and nine openings** (六辟九开).
**Summoning spirits to transform beings** (招灵化人),
**Body complete with all hundred gates** (体备百关).
**Divine transformations without limit** (神变无方),
**With the Dao, ever ascendant** (与道俱隆).
**Gazing upon the Eight Enclosures** (顾盼八垣),
**Residing in the Jade Capital** (端居玉京).

Within is the **Most Venerable of Supreme Dao and Ultimate Way** (玄极至道之尊),
Within is the **Lord of the Primordial Life-Symbol Emperor** (主生象帝之君),
Within is the **Great God of the Dragon’s Hoof, Opening the Heavens** (开天龙蹻大神),
Within is the **Nine Sovereigns of Heaven’s True Ones** (九皇天真丈人),
Within is the **Most Venerable God of Seizing the Primordial Records and Directing the Fateful Threads** (把握元纪斡运机纽至妙尊神).

**Limitless beings** (无量度人) are born from the **two symbols** (二象),
Universal proclamation to all:
Awakening to the **source of the Dao** (悟道之元),
Forever severing **output and transmigration** (输转),
Becoming the **root of kindred beings** (种民).
Today’s **transcription and verification** (校录),
All **Heavens** (诸天) descending to the **hall** (临轩).

**Eastern Limitless Pure Faith Divine King** (东方无极清信神王),
**Long-Life Great Sage, Limitless Deliverance** (长生大圣, 无量度人).
**Southern Limitless Illuminating Response Divine King** (南方无极明感神王),
**Long-Life Great Sage, Limitless Deliverance**.
**Western Limitless Firm and Upright Divine King** (西方无极坚立神王),
**Long-Life Great Sage, Limitless Deliverance**.
**Northern Limitless Oceanic Void Divine King** (北方无极海空神王),
**Long-Life Great Sage, Limitless Deliverance**.
**Northeast Limitless Sacred Immortal Divine King** (东北无极圣仙神王),
**Long-Life Great Sage, Limitless Deliverance**.
**Southeast Limitless Wondrous Wisdom Divine King** (东南无极妙慧神王),
**Long-Life Great Sage, Limitless Deliverance**.
**Southwest Limitless Steady and Constant Divine King** (西南无极定常神王),
**Long-Life Great Sage, Limitless Deliverance**.
**Northwest Limitless Verification of Truth Divine King** (西北无极证真神王),
**Long-Life Great Sage, Limitless Deliverance**.
**Upper Limitless Shadowless Divine King** (上方无极无影神王),
**Long-Life Great Sage, Limitless Deliverance**.
**Lower Limitless Non-Retrogressive Divine King** (下方无极不回神王),
**Long-Life Great Sage, Limitless Deliverance**.
**Ten Directions’ Supreme True Flying-Heaven Divine King** (十方至真飞天神王),
Forever severing the **wheel of transmigration**,
**Limitless Great God** (无量大神).

All ride upon **jade radiance and emerald clouds** (琼光绿云),
The **Eight Scenic Chariots** (八景琅舆),
**Crimson mists and jade palanquins** (丹霞玉辇),
**Yoked with verdant phoenixes and nine-colored divine dragons** (骖驾碧凤九色神龙),
Establishing the **rites of the True Dao** (建交真之节),
**White tigers and spirit banners** (素虎灵旛),
Forefronts resounding with **Nine Chapters’ harmony** (前按九章齐奏),
The **Six Pipes’ concordant echo** (后吹六竽同鸣),
**Green cranes and white swans** (青鸾白鹊),
**Harmonious cries and clamorous attendance** (和鸣拥哗),
**Nine Spirits controlling the gales** (九灵控飙),
**Seven True Ones riding the mist** (七真乘烟),
**Melodic hymns and steps in the void** (谣歌步虚),
**Floating through the sky** (浮空而来).

**Radiance descending and chariots returning** (倾光回驾),
**Summoning life and immortals**.
**Southern Capital’s High Overseer** (南昌上宰),
**Chief of the Vermilion Palace** (总御朱宫),
**Han the Record-Keeper** (韩司主录),
**Firm and Great God** (坚固大神),
Holding **sacred seals and registers** (执箓把籍),
All arriving before the **Imperial Court** (齐到帝前).
**Following the beings to be delivered** (随所应度),
**Strictly verifying all Heavens**.
**Universal proclamation to the Three Realms** (普告三界),
The **Limitless Divine Realm** (无极神乡),
The **Spring’s Curved Domain** (泉曲之府),
The **Northern Capital of the Underworld** (北都罗酆),
The **Three Officials and Nine Ministries** (三官九府),
The **Twelve River Sources** (十二河源).

**Guarding the true nature of consciousness** (守识本真),
**Awakening to natural reality** (悟见自然),
No **birth or death** (无有生死),
No **attachment to change** (不着变迁).
The **Dao is without departure or return** (道无去来),
The **form as a treasure mountain** (形为宝山),
**Wisdom fire refining it** (智火炼之),
**Golden radiance and jade mingling**.

Compared to day and night,
The **sun and moon suspended eternally**.
**Coming and going are not delusion** (往还非妄),
**Vast and boundless** (眇眇绵绵).
**Law and body are empty and luminous** (法体虚明),
**True immortals beyond the symbol** (象外真仙).

Forever severing the **wheel of transmigration**,
Ascending into the **Great Primordial Dao** (太玄).
**Resolving the ancestors** (上解祖考),
**A hundred kalpas of kindred beings** (亿劫种亲),
**Swiftly eradicating the register of sins** (疾除罪簿),
**Extinguishing the roots of evil** (落灭恶根).
No **arrest or confinement** (不得拘留),
No **forcing into ghostly ranks** (逼合鬼群).
**Primordial Beginning’s seals and fate** (元始符命),
**Ascending at the appointed hour** (时刻升迁).
**Northern Capital’s Cold Pool** (北都寒池),
**Departmental guardians of form and spirit** (部卫形魂).
**Subduing demons and preserving virtue** (制魔保举),
**Delivering beings to the Southern Palace** (度品南宫).
**Dead spirits undergo refinement** (死魂受炼),
**Transformed into immortals and reborn as humans**.
**Living bodies receive deliverance** (生身受度),
**Kalpa upon kalpa, enduring forever**.

「永断轮转，先天无年。
**Endlessly severing transmigration**, the Primordial Dao knows no age.

永度三途，五苦八难，
**Endlessly delivering beings from the Three Paths**, beyond the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships.

超凌三界，逍遥上清。
**Ascending beyond the Three Realms**, freely wandering in the Supreme Clarity.

上清之天，天帝洞光，
The **Supreme Clarity Heaven**, where the Celestial Sovereign’s **Piercing Radiance** reigns—

无色之境梵行。
a realm without hue, where the **Dharma-Walk** is pure.

东方八天：
**The Eight Heavens of the East:**

玉娑平海天，帝豪真秉符。
**The Heaven of Jade-Sand Pacifying the Sea**, where the Sovereign’s **Magnificent Authentic Seal** is held.

骄炎祥备天，帝思顺孝猷。
**The Heaven of Proud Flame’s Auspicious Array**, where the Sovereign’s **Thoughtful Filial Virtue** is manifest.

云砀龙碛天，帝景命混图。
**The Heaven of Cloudy Waves and Dragon’s Shores**, where the Sovereign’s **Fated Vision** blends with the **Mystic Diagram**.

骊性希蒙天，帝齐丘绿符。
**The Heaven of the Murky Nature’s Rarely Concealed**, where the Sovereign’s **Equalizing Hill’s Emerald Seal** abides.

镇相流誓天，帝古威罕常。
**The Heaven of the Stable Aspect’s Flowing Oath**, where the Sovereign’s **Ancient Awe** is seldom seen.

岳樊膏汀天，帝兆籍监王。
**The Heaven of the Mountainous Enclosure’s Greasy Tides**, where the Sovereign’s **Omen-Register** guards as **King of Records**.

凝仙鹿观天，帝几道元光。
**The Heaven of the Congealed Immortal’s Deerly Gazing**, where the Sovereign’s **Subtle Dao’s Primordial Radiance** shines.

斗浦玄司天，帝荡渊慈宜。
**The Heaven of the Celestial Dipper’s Mystic Pour**, where the Sovereign’s **Dispelling Abyss’s Benevolent Grace** prevails.

南方八天：
**The Eight Heavens of the South:**

嵯鳞飞机天，帝廓洞自幽。
**The Heaven of Towering Scales and Soaring Machines**, where the Sovereign’s **Piercing Cavern’s Self-Concealed** essence dwells.

洞炎赤圭天，帝息觉除营。
**The Heaven of Blazing Caverns and Crimson Rules**, where the Sovereign’s **Quelling Awareness** dispels the **Hosts of Sin**.

阳祁正父天，帝杳晶皓黄。
**The Heaven of the Sunlit Ranks and Upright Patriarchs**, where the Sovereign’s **Obscure Crystal’s Resplendent Yellow** emanates.

金律整灵天，帝弼由肃沙。
**The Heaven of Golden Precepts and Ordered Spirits**, where the Sovereign’s **Aid from the Austere Sands** is invoked.

乌稷无变天，帝密睹思微。
**The Heaven of the Unchanging Black Millet**, where the Sovereign’s **Subtle Contemplation** is veiled in mystery.

神归合明天，帝蹈灵防离。
**The Heaven of Spirits Returning to the Illuminated Union**, where the Sovereign’s **Treading Spirit’s Warded Departure** stands guard.

太元机省天，帝择全施虔。
**The Heaven of the Great Primordial’s Mechanized Inspection**, where the Sovereign’s **Selective Perfection’s Pious Decree** is bestowed.

校录定真天，帝育韩筹冥。
**The Heaven of the Verified Registers’ Stabilized Truth**, where the Sovereign’s **Nurturing Han’s Mystic Counsel** is profound.

西方八天：
**The Eight Heavens of the West:**

明玄圣皇天，帝直义伯銮。
**The Heaven of the Illuminated Mystic’s Sacred Sovereign**, where the Sovereign’s **Rectified Righteousness** is proclaimed by the **Celestial Banner**.

曲生司世天，帝幽都仙。
**The Heaven of the Bent Life’s Worldly Governance**, where the Sovereign’s **Mysterious Capital’s Immortal** presides.

总梵极元天，帝阆骑遐非。
**The Heaven of the Comprehensive Dharma’s Ultimate Primordial**, where the Sovereign’s **Obscure Mount’s Distant Non-Duality** is revealed.

玄化典法天，帝祖定延真。
**The Heaven of the Mystic Transformation’s Dharma-Regulations**, where the Sovereign’s **Ancestral Stability’s Extended Truth** endures.

刑籍真算天，帝长灵度耽。
**The Heaven of the True Registers’ Punitive Calculations**, where the Sovereign’s **Enduring Spirit’s Deliverance** is deep.

华晶庆霄天，帝玉诞昌。
**The Heaven of the Splendid Crystal’s Celebratory Expanse**, where the Sovereign’s **Jade Birth’s Prosperity** flourishes.

妙真德女天，帝九济道户。
**The Heaven of the Marvelous True Virtue’s Feminine**, where the Sovereign’s **Nine Salvations’ Dao-Gate** is opened.

列星交微天，帝应大法谣。
**The Heaven of the Arrayed Stars’ Subtle Intersection**, where the Sovereign’s **Responsive Great Dharma’s Echo** resounds.

北方八天：
**The Eight Heavens of the North:**

孕魂败臼天，帝迁洞伏机。
**The Heaven of the Soul’s Conception and the Shattered Mortar**, where the Sovereign’s **Piercing Cavern’s Transmigratory Scheme** lies dormant.

卵化液流天，帝遵牺眷雷。
**The Heaven of the Egg’s Transformation and Fluid Flow**, where the Sovereign’s **Following the Sacrificial’s Relentless Thunder** is invoked.

温胞育阳天，帝洞混光临。
**The Heaven of the Warm Embryo’s Nourishing Yang**, where the Sovereign’s **Piercing Cavern’s Illuminating Presence** descends.

媾玉中华天，帝括保命生。
**The Heaven of the Conjoined Jade’s Central Realm**, where the Sovereign’s **Encompassing Preservation of Life’s Birth** is decreed.

池阴锁神天，帝师火交侯。
**The Heaven of the Pool’s Shadow and the Spirit’s Seal**, where the Sovereign’s **Fiery Preceptor’s Intersecting Lord** commands.

太极抱爱天，帝道真欲化。
**The Heaven of the Great Primordial’s Embracing Love**, where the Sovereign’s **Dao’s True Transformation** is yearned for.

讳津人山天，帝敌利宝龟。
**The Heaven of the Forbidden Ford’s Mortal Peaks**, where the Sovereign’s **Adversarial Profit’s Precious Tortoise** is revered.

丹精朱阙天，帝妙华玉刚。
**The Heaven of the Vermilion Essence’s Crimson Threshold**, where the Sovereign’s **Marvelous Flower’s Jade-like Firmness** stands resolute.

三十二天，三士二帝。
**The Thirty-Two Heavens**, with **Three Worthies and Two Sovereigns**.

诸天隐讳，诸天隐名。
All the Heavens conceal their **taboos**, all the Heavens conceal their **names**.

天中空洞，自然灵章。
Within the Heavens, a **void of piercing clarity**—the **spontaneous numinous script** unfolds.

诸天隐韵，元始之音。
All the Heavens conceal their **rhymes**, the **Primordial Sound** of the **Beginningless**.

无形之尊，不转之神，
**The Formless Lord**, the **Untransmigrated Spirit**—

超象真魔，断妄之灵。
**transcending the illusory demons**, **severing the deluded soul**.

和合出流，脱离化源。
**Harmonized unity flows forth**, **escaping the root of transformation**.

永住诸轮，变化上清。
**Enduring in all the wheels of existence**, **transforming into the Supreme Clarity**.

无量之奥，深不可详。
**The boundless mysteries**, too profound to fathom.

敷落神真，无三界因。
**The divine truth descends**, with **no cause in the Three Realms**.

今日欣庆受度，
**Today, rejoicing in deliverance**—

历关诸天，请灭三恶，
**passing through the gates of all Heavens**, **praying for the extinguishment of the Three Evils**—

斩绝地根，永净六染，
**severing the earthly roots**, **endlessly purifying the Six Stains**—

名列太玄，真王监观，
**enrolling in the Great Primordial Dao**, **the True King’s Inspection**—

无拘天门。
**no obstruction at the Heavenly Gates**.

东斗发生，西斗义成，
**The Eastern Dipper gives birth**, the **Western Dipper fulfills righteousness**—

北斗存道，南斗降灵，
**the Northern Dipper preserves the Dao**, the **Southern Dipper descends the Spirit**—

中斗运神，九老三真。
**the Central Dipper governs the numinous**, with the **Nine Elders of the Three Truths**.

青帝巧量，白帝坚登，
**The Azure Sovereign’s skillful measure**, the **White Sovereign’s steadfast ascent**—

赤帝通化，黑帝渊清，
**the Vermilion Sovereign’s universal transformation**, the **Black Sovereign’s abyssal purity**—

黄帝中极，指呼万神。
**the Yellow Sovereign’s central equilibrium**, **commanding all spirits with a gesture**.

青天魔王，以文定名。
**The Azure Heaven’s Demon King**, named by **cultural refinement**.

赤天魔王，知识散精。
**The Vermilion Heaven’s Demon King**, whose **knowledge dissipates the vital essence**.

白天魔王，罪恶司刑。
**The White Heaven’s Demon King**, who **supervises punishments for sins**.

黑天魔王，智用乃分。
**The Black Heaven’s Demon King**, whose **wisdom is the portion of skillful means**.

黄天魔王，大宗非声。
**The Yellow Heaven’s Demon King**, the **Great Doctrine without sound**.

五帝大魔，生死元雄。
**The Five Sovereigns’ Great Demon**, the **Primordial Hero of Life and Death**.

飞行鼓从，总领威兵。
**The Flying Procession’s drums command**, **overseeing the mighty hosts**.

麾幢鼓节，游观太空。
**The banners wave and drums beat**, **wandering in the Supreme Void**.

军骑赫奕，佐天举功。
**The mounted troops gleam**, **assisting the Celestial in great deeds**.

永断轮转，严摄北酆。
**Endlessly severing transmigration**, **strictly confining the Northern Tartarus**.

神功受命，普扫不祥。
**The divine power accepts its mandate**, **universally sweeping away inauspiciousness**.

八威吐毒，猛马四张。
**The Eight Awe’s spew venom**, **four fierce steeds gallop forth**.

天丁把斧，大帅持旛。
**The Heavenly Laborers brandish their axes**, **the Great Marshals wield their banners**.

掷火燎焚，流铃四扬。
**Flames are cast and blazing torches ignite**, **four suspended bells swing wide**.

敢有干试，拒遏上真，
**If any dare to obstruct**, **they are repelled from the Supreme Truth**—

金钺前冲，巨剑后刑。
**the golden axe strikes forward**, **the colossal sword punishes behind**.

屠割鬼爽，风火无停，
**The ghostly hosts are slaughtered**, **the winds and fires relent not**—

千千截首，万万翦形。
**thousands are beheaded**, **ten-thousands are mutilated**.

魔无干犯，鬼无祆精，
**No demons dare to trespass**, **no ghosts defile the vital essence**—

三官北酆，明检鬼营。
**the Three Officials of the Northern Tartarus** **inspect the ghostly ranks with clarity**.

不得容隐，金马驿呈。
**No concealment is permitted**, **the Golden Horse Relay presents itself**.

普告无穷，万神咸听。
**The proclamation is boundless**, **all spirits heed it uniformly**.

三界五帝，列言上清。
**The Three Realms and Five Sovereigns** **align their words with the Supreme Clarity**.

元洞已迹，绍历龙康。
**The Primordial Cavern’s traces are gone**, **its lineage continues through the Dragon’s Tranquility**.

眇眇亿劫，轮转无常。
**Infinite kalpas pass in obscurity**, **transmigration is ever-changing**.

劫终劫始，太空难量。
**When kalpas end and begin anew**, **the Supreme Void is immeasurable**.

恍漫不期，混沌之中。
**Fleeting and boundless**, **within the Chaos of the Beginningless**.

上无无色，下无无渊，
**Above, there is no realm without hue**, **below, there is no abyss without form**—

风转九虚，金景定天。
**the winds shift through the Nine Voids**, **the golden landscape stabilizes the Heavens**.

天上天下，无幽无冥，
**Heaven above and heaven below**, **no darkness nor gloom exists**—

无形无影，无极无穷。
**no form nor trace**, **no limit nor end**.

溟涬大梵，辽廓无光，
**The boundless Dharma-Walk**, **vast and without luminosity**—

不名生死，无有去来。
**unnamed in life and death**, **no coming nor going**.

三界轮转，皇道流行，
**The Three Realms’ transmigration**, **the Sovereign Dao’s course**—

六气变化，忽合忽离。
**the Six Qi’s transformations**, **suddenly uniting and suddenly parting**.

神依灵宝，永固精根，
**The spirit relies on the Numinous Treasure**, **endlessly securing the roots of essence**—

赤明开图，运度自然。
**the Crimson Clarity unfolds the diagram**, **governing deliverance spontaneously**.

元始安镇，敷落五篇，
**The Primordial Beginning is tranquil**, **the Five Scriptures descend**—

赤书玉字，八威龙文。
**in crimson script and jade characters**, **the Eight Awe’s Dragon Patterns**.

保制劫运，使天长存。
**Preserving the kalpa’s cycles**, **enabling the Heavens to endure eternally**.

梵炁弥罗，万范开张。
**The Dharma-Qi pervades the universe**, **all patterns expand**.

元纲流演，三十二天。
**The Primordial Principles flow and manifest**, **the Thirty-Two Heavens**.

轮转无色，周回十方。
**Transmigration knows no hue**, **circulating through the Ten Directions**.

旋斗历箕，回度五常。
**The Dipper’s rotation marks the Basket**, **returning to deliver the Five Constants**.

三十五分，总气上玄。
**The Thirty-Five Divisions**, **collecting the Qi to ascend the Mystic**.

八景冥合，气入玄玄。
**The Eight Landscapes merge in darkness**, **the Qi enters the Deep Mystic**.

玄中太皇，上帝高真。
**Within the Mystic**, **the Supreme Sovereign**—
**the Highest True Dao of the Celestial Sovereign**.

泛景太霞，啸咏洞章。
**The boundless landscape’s Supreme Radiance**, **whistling and chanting the Piercing Scripture**.

金真明郁，流响云营。
**The luminous truth of gold is profound**, **its echoes resonate in the Cloud Hosts**.

玉音摄气，灵风聚烟。
**The jade sound gathers the Qi**, **the numinous wind condenses the vapors**.

紫虎郁秀，辅翼万仙。
**The Purple Tiger’s profound splendor**, **assisting all immortals with its wings**.

千和万合，自然成真。
**Thousands harmonize, ten-thousands unite**, **spontaneously achieving the True**.

真中有神，神无方体。
**Within the True is the Spirit**, **the Spirit knows no fixed form**.

道寓姓名，乃号南极太微长生大君。
**The Dao resides in names**, thus called the **Great Sovereign of the South Pole’s Supreme Subtlety and Eternal Life**.

无英青华，白元素真。
**No brilliance in the Azure Flower**, **the White Primordial is the True Essence**.

「太一始生，司命算程。
**Taiyi** first emerges, **governing life’s ordained cycles**.

桃康合延，致兆有生。
**Peach and Blossom** unite and extend, **bringing forth myriad births**.

生为死本，轮转不停。
**Birth is the root of death**, **the wheel of existence revolves endlessly**.

道初无为，岂毁岂成。
**At its origin, the Dao acts without contrivance**, **neither destroying nor creating**.

是为仙真，养教种人。
**This is the True of the Immortals**, **nurturing and instructing humanity**.

执符把箓，保命生根。
**Holding talismans and scriptures**, **guarding life’s vital roots**.

上游上清，出入华房。
**Ascending in the Upper Game**, **entering and exiting the Hall of Splendor**.

八冥之内，细微之中。
**Within the Eight Obscurities**, **amidst the subtlest depths**.

下镇人身，泥丸绛宫。
**Descending to govern the mortal form**, **in the Vermilion Palace of the Mud Ball***.

中理五气，混合百神。
**Balancing the Five Qi**, **mingling with the Hundred Spirits**.

十转回灵，万气齐仙。
**Ten revolutions return the Spirit**, **ten-thousand breaths align with the Dao of the Immortals**.

仙道贵生，无量度人。
**The Dao of the Immortals values life**, **endlessly liberating mortals**.

上开八门，飞天法轮。
**Above, the Eight Gates are opened**, **the flying celestial Law Wheels**.

罪福禁戒，宿命因缘。
**Karma of guilt and merit**, **the causes and conditions of past lives**.

普受开度，死魂生身。
**Universally accepting liberation**, **the departed soul is reborn**.

身得受生，永不轮转。
**The body attains rebirth**, **forever ceasing its revolutions**.

上闻诸天，诸天之上，各有真灵。
**Above, the sounds of all the heavens are heard**, **and beyond the heavens**, **each has its True Spirit**.

中有空洞谣歌之章，真王灵篇，辞参高真。
**Within are the verses of the Hollow Void’s ethereal songs**, **the True King’s numinous scriptures**, **words that align with the Supreme Truth**.

第一欲界飞空之音
**The First Realm of Desire’s celestial hymn**:

天道朗朗，鬼道蒙蒙。
**The Dao of Heaven is bright and clear**, **the Dao of Ghosts is hazy and dim**.

人道杳杳，沈滞轮回。
**The Dao of Mortals is distant and obscured**, **sunk in stagnant cycles of rebirth**.

仙道乐兮，太虚为家。
**The Dao of the Immortals rejoices**, **the Supreme Void as its dwelling**.

男女相牵缠，我界居其多。
**Males and females entangle one another**, **this realm abounds in their world**.

声色昧灵府，顽空张网罗。
**Sounds and desires cloud the Spirit’s abode**, **the dull void spreads its snares**.

浊海流巨浪，尘山郁嵯峨。
**The turbid sea surges with colossal waves**, **the dusty mountains rise in towering majesty**.

但能录其恶，安能遏其邪。
**Only able to record their wickedness**, **how can it suppress their depravity?**

遇我虚皇尊，演此大洞篇。
**When the Venerable Sovereign of the Void encounters me**, **he recites this Great Hollow Scripture**.

顿然为种民，色景何足过。
**Swiftly becoming the people of the Realm**, **what need for lustful illusions?**

悯嗟旷劫迷，空中起悲歌。
**Pitying those lost in boundless kalpas**, **a lament arises from the void**.

茫茫爱欲徒，不悟当奈何。
**Endless are the vain desires of love**, **how shall they be calmed if not understood?**

第二色界真王之章
**The Second Realm of Form’s True King’s Chapter**:

峨峨无极山，上有飞天宫。
**Majestic are the Boundless Mountains**, **above them stands the Celestial Palace of the Flying**.

羽卫罗亿千，我得治其中。
**With countless retinues of feathered guards**, **I rule within it**.

朝游大有庭，丹舆驾灵风。
**Morning wanderings in the Great Abundance’s courtyard**, **riding the Vermilion Chariot on the Spirit Wind**.

夕归校录府，真仙执琼编。
**Evening returns to the Registry Hall**, **the True Immortals holding jade tablets**.

返神入太空，下观诸天民。
**The Spirit returns to the Supreme Void**, **descending to survey the people of all heavens**.

自然浩劫来，身犹染轻尘。
**The kalpas of boundless suffering arrive naturally**, **yet my body still bears the lightest dust**.

未得断轮转，安能忘色根。
**Not yet severed from the revolving wheel**, **how can I forget the roots of desire?**

一闻空洞章，合体皆虚明。
**At one hearing of the Hollow Void’s verses**, **all forms become luminous emptiness**.

息念七宝林，濯身天河津。
**Quelling thoughts in the Seven Treasures’ grove**, **bathing my body in the Celestial River’s currents**.

永契皇极道，稽首礼天尊。
**Forever attuned to the Dao of the Supreme Pole**, **I bow reverently to the Heavenly Sovereign**.

第三无色界真王歌曰
**The Third Realm of Formlessness’s True King’s Song**:

荡荡龙汉，眇眇赤明。
**Vast and boundless is the Dragon Celestial**, **faint and distant is the Crimson Radiance**.

皇极生神，无形无名。
**The Supreme Pole gives birth to the Spirit**, **formless and nameless**.

始立三界，我居其尊。
**First arising are the Three Realms**, **I dwell in their highest**.

统制一切，摄御众灵。
**Commanding all things**, **controlling the myriad Spirits**.

旷朗诸天，境域四开。
**The heavens are vast and clear**, **their domains spread in all directions**.

缘习未断，犹有倾啧。
**Habits not yet severed**, **still there are inclinations to cling**.

乘运促会，得升列真。
**Riding the currents of fate**, **I ascend to the ranks of the True**.

元始敷化，大演真机。
**Yuan Shi unfolds transformations**, **greatly manifesting the True Essence**.

此道坚固，悉入无为。
**This Dao is steadfast**, **all are absorbed into Non-Action**.

既悟绝轮转，大福享尔身。
**Having awakened to sever the revolving wheel**, **great blessings are enjoyed in your body**.

何虑尘沙劫，天地应不倾。
**Why fear the kalpas of dust and sand?** **Heaven and Earth shall not be overturned**.

灵光散十方，齐为白玉京。
**The Spirit Light radiates in all directions**, **united as the Jade Capital of Whiteness**.

此三界之上，飞空之中，真王歌音，音参洞章。
**Above these Three Realms**, **within the flying void**, **the True King’s song resounds**, **its tones harmonizing with the Hollow Verses**.

诵之百遍，名度南宫。
**Reciting it a hundred times**, **one attains the name of liberation in the Southern Palace**.

诵之千遍，群真保迎。
**Reciting it a thousand times**, **the multitude of True Ones safeguard and welcome you**.

万遍道备，飞升太空，过度三界，位登仙公。
**Reciting it ten-thousand times**, **the Dao is complete**, **ascending to the Supreme Void**, **transcending the Three Realms**, **and attaining the rank of the Celestial Lord**.

有闻灵音，三官敬形，勅制地祇，侍卫送迎，拔出地户，五苦八难，七祖升迁，永离冥关。
**Those who hear the Spirit’s sound**, **the Three Officials** reverently acknowledge their form**, **commanding the Earth Spirits**, **with attendants escorting and welcoming**, **pulling them free from the Earthly Gate**, **freeing them from the Five Sufferings and Eight Difficulties**, **and ascending through the Seven Ancestral Stages**, **forever departing the Realm of Darkness**.

魂度朱陵，超度死生。
**The soul crosses the Vermilion Peak**, **transcending the boundaries of death and life**.

是谓无量二普度无穷。
**This is called the boundless Second Universal Liberation, endless in scope**.

有秘上天文，诸天共所崇。
**There are secret celestial texts**, **held in reverence by all heavens**.

泄慢堕地狱，祸及七祖翁。
**If leaked or scorned, they fall into the Hell Realms**, **bringing calamity to the Seven Ancestral Ones**.

道言：此二章并是诸天上帝，及神霄玉清真王隐秘之音。
**The Dao says**: **These two chapters are the hidden sounds of the Heavenly Sovereigns of all heavens**, **and the True King of the Divine Tower’s Jade Purity**.

兆能诵之，见道全体，洞入无名，得悟证真，永断轮转。
**Myriad beings who recite them**, **perceive the Dao’s complete essence**, **penetrate the Nameless**, **attain enlightenment and certify the True**, **forever severing the revolving wheel**.

皆是大梵之言，非世上常辞。
**All are the words of the Great Brahman**, **not the ordinary speech of the world**.

言无韵丽，曲无华宛，故谓玄奥，难可寻详。
**The words lack melodious rhyme**, **the tunes lack ornate embellishment**; **thus called profound and mysterious**, **difficult to explore or examine**.

上天所宝，秘於神府东华藏室，依玄科应运下传。
**Treasured by the heavens**, **hidden in the Eastern Treasure House of the Spirit Treasury**, **transmitted downward according to the Mysterious Method when the time is right**.

若有至人赍金宝质心，依旧格告盟三天，然后而付焉。
**If a perfected sage brings a heart of golden treasure**, **following the ancient pattern and swearing an oath to the Three Heavens**, **then it shall be entrusted to them**.

道言：夫天地运度，亦有否终。
**The Dao says**: **Though Heaven and Earth revolve in their courses**, **they too have periods of cessation**.

日月五星，亦有亏盈。
**The Sun and Moon, the Five Stars**, **also wax and wane**.

至圣神人，亦有休否。
**The Most Venerable Sage**, **also has times of repose**.

末学之夫，亦有疾伤。
**Even the least learned among mortals**, **suffer sickness and injury**.

凡有此灾，皆气数穷极，往来始终，输转三界，诸幻所生。
**All such calamities**, **are the exhaustion of one’s fateful Qi**, **the beginning and end of coming and going**, **the revolving transfer through the Three Realms**, **the birth of all illusions**.

同气皆当齐心修斋，六时行香，十遍转经，福德立降，消诸不祥。
**Those of shared Qi must all sincerely unite in fasting**, **offering incense at six times**, **reciting the scriptures ten times**, **and merit shall swiftly descend**, **dissolving all inauspiciousness**.

无量之文，普度无穷。
**The boundless scriptures**, **universally liberating without end**.

道言：夫末学道浅，或仙品未充，运应灭度，身经太阴。
**The Dao says**: **For those of shallow understanding, or whose Immortal rank is not yet complete**, **when their fate calls for extinction**, **their bodies pass through the Great Darkness**.

临过之时，同学至人为其行香，诵经十过，以度尸形如法。
**At the moment of passing**, **fellow students and perfected sages shall perform incense rites and recite the scriptures ten times**, **to liberate their mortal forms according to the method**.

魂神径上南宫，随其学功，计日而得升玄。
**The soul and Spirit directly ascend to the Southern Palace**, **according to their merit**, **and in due time attain the Ascension to the Mysterious**.

不入轮转，便得神仙。
**Not entering the revolving wheel**, **they achieve the rank of Spirit and Immortal**.

道言：夫天地运终，星宿错度，日月失昏，四时失度，阴阳不调，国境不稔，疫毒流行，兆民死伤，师友命过，悉为有世之患，刑伤之灾。
**The Dao says**: **When Heaven and Earth complete their revolutions**, **the stars and constellations misalign**, **the Sun and Moon lose their eclipses**, **the Four Seasons lose their order**, **Yin and Yang are unbalanced**, **the lands are unstable**, **plagues and poisons spread**, **myriad people perish and are injured**, **and the fates of masters and friends are cut short**; **all are the sufferings and calamities of the mortal world**.

皆当修斋，行香诵经，真道内着，永断输转，超出三界，却灭刑灾，神灵闻之，即当消解。
**All must fast, offer incense, and recite scriptures**, **internalizing the True Dao**, **forever severing the revolving transfer**, **transcending the Three Realms**, **and extinguishing the calamities**; **the Spirits and gods who hear it shall immediately dissolve them**.

夫斋戒诵经，功德甚重。
**For fasting and recitation of scriptures**, **the merits are profound**.

上消天灾，保镇帝王。
**Above, they dispel celestial calamities**, **safeguarding and stabilizing the Emperor**.

下禳毒害，以度兆民。
**Below, they avert plagues and harm**, **to liberate myriad people**.

生死受赖，其福难胜，故曰无量，普度天人。
**Life and death depend upon them**, **their blessings are boundless**; **thus called the boundless Universal Liberation of Heavenly and Human beings**.

**The Dao speaks:** All who possess this scripture may, for the sake of Heaven, Earth, the Emperor, and the myriad people, perform these meritorious deeds. On days of calamity, when one resolves to fast, burn incense, and recite the scripture ten times, all the Celestial Beings shall record their names, and ten thousand spirits shall guard them. The Right Path’s perfected ones shall be granted the rank of saintly ministers beneath the Golden Gate of the Emperor.

The Celestial Beings record a person’s merits and demerits without the slightest loss. Even the True Kings of Heaven shall recommend you, and those who attain the Dao shall fully comprehend these profound words.

**The hidden speech of the Great Brahman within the Celestial Hosts—**
*The Infinite Sound of the Middle Chapter of the Primordial Spirit’s Sacred Text—*
**The Eight Celestial Ones of the East:**
*Yùyù Yǔyǔ, Yuánzuǒ Jùyě,*
*Hékuí Dùjūn, Huáhòu Zhānghuà,*
*Shālùo Wéihuǎng, Qiāngshén Liúshī,*
*Chù Zhōu Língcǎi, Shíwán Tiānzhēn,*
*Lùdú Fùhún, Fúqū Yīnmíng.*
With solemn offerings and strict observances, they safeguard and rescue with equal virtue.
Bound by sincerity and private vows, their summons align with the cosmic order.
Their intentions communicate swiftly, and the Divine威 commands even the neighboring realms.

**The Eight Celestial Ones of the South:**
*Hébì Gǔ Xuán, Miàoyè Jiāohuán,*
*Hùnqì Jiēxīn, Dàoyòu Shíhuì,*
*Hépò Zhīwēi, Duìyì Hóngshī,*
*Huànhù Miàomò, Xuánhuì Déyí,*
*Dòngqīng Juéwǎng, Jièshī Duānqī,*
*Miǎomò Wàishì, Tiānzhēn Fǔxié.*
The twin paths converge in migration, guided by the gentle and the distant.
They return to the void’s emptiness, traversing the ghostly paths of hidden mechanisms.

**The Eight Celestial Ones of the West:**
*Zǔzhuān Kāizōng, Qìgēn Xiálóng,*
*Fàn Yǎn Dòngchéng, Huīhuà Guāngróng.*
*Xiānlù Shēnggé, Dānxiǎng Wénfēng,*
*Guàiwù Yìshēng, Shuǐjī Huǒgōng.*
*Shòuyǐn Jiěyáo, Zūnkòu Mìméng.*
Guarding strictness and cultivating grandeur, the Dao’s [missing] wind spreads.
Following their movements, they observe and succeed, continuing the path of those who came before.
With benevolent teachings, they repel evil, demonstrating the mysterious net of the Dao.

**The Eight Celestial Ones of the North:**
*Yījīng Wànbàn, Shēngjǐ Kōngcháng,*
*Lìpì Shàoxīn, Huàdài Zhōuqiān.*
*Xuányì Wàngchí, Fúzhuǎn Yìlián.*
*Mèiwú Dòngxuán, Fěizhī Bǐtiān.*
*Mǐnzhǎn Fánzhí, Yuánguō Dúkōng.*
*Biànhuí Shízhù, Túxī Láihuán.*
*Héchū Éjū, Huǎngzì Juéru.*
*Pànwēi Qíchǒu, Hùnwǎng Wùguī.*

**The Dao speaks:** These are the hidden words of the Great Brahman within the Celestial Hosts—the Infinite Sound.

The ancient text of the Nine Elders of Mystic Capital was inscribed with yellow *zhu* lacquer upon the Gate of the Eon’s Imperial Threshold. Those of True Perfection, transcending the Three Realms and departing the Ten Directions, must ascend the Gate of the Eon and chant the Middle Chapter to rise into the Formless.

Those of the latter ages, dwelling in the cycle of birth and death and confined to the lesser vehicle, who do not recite this text shall have their forms recorded by the Earthly Officials, their spirits forbidden by the Heavenly Ministers, and their path to the Dao obscured—unaware of the utmost Mysteries.

Those who savor this Sacred Text shall have the spirits of the Central Pool reveal the boundless, opening the Great Clarity at the Window of Wisdom, and illuminating the Ocean at the Capital of Meditation.

Each character spans a breadth of ten feet.

The Heavenly True Ones of old inscribed this text, establishing it as the True Sound. Those who know its sound and recite it while fasting shall have all the Celestial Beings dispatch Flying Heavenly Kings to observe their bodies, record their merits, and report them above. The myriad spirits shall pay homage, the Earthly Deities attend at the gates, and the Ten True Ones of Great Merit shall recommend them to the Upper Purity. With the Dao complete, they shall attain the rank, roam the Three Realms, and ascend the Golden Gate.

This sound repels all, averts all, liberates all, and fulfills all—it is the natural sound of the Heavenly True Ones.

Thus, when it is chanted, the Three Realms below observe, the Supreme Deity sings from afar, the myriad spirits pay homage, the Three Realms attend at the hall, all spirits bow their heads, and the ghostly intelligences vanish. The *linlang* chimes resound, the Ten Directions grow serene, the rivers and seas fall silent, the mountains and hills swallow their smoke, and all spirits tremble in submission. The gathering of all immortals is summoned, Heaven is free of mist and filth, Earth of demonic dust, and the Dark Wisdom becomes utterly clear.

**The boundless, profound, and profoundest mercy.**
*The Scripture of the Supreme Treasure for Universal Liberation, Chapter Sixty-One, concludes.*
